da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
utʰxari israelis dzetʰ tʰu ʃestsʰodos vinmem uneblietʰ upʰlis romelime mtsʰnebatʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ da kʰmnas raime ratsʰ akrdzalulia 
tʰu tsʰxebulma mɣvdelma ʃestsʰoda xalxis ɡarevitʰ danaʃaulʃi dae ʃestsiros upʰals tʰavisi tsʰodvisatʰvis romlitʰatsʰ ʃestsʰoda mozveri msxvilpʰexidan ubitso tsʰodvis msxverplad 
da miiqvanos mozveri sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan upʰlis tsinaʃe da daados tʰavisi xeli mozvers tʰavze da daklas mozveri upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da aiɣos tsʰxebulma mɣvdelma mozvris sisxlidan da miitanos iɡi sakrebulo karavʃi 
da amoatso mɣvdelma tʰitʰi sisxlʃi da ʃvidɡzis moasxuros sisxlidan upʰlis tsinaʃe tsmida pʰardis tsin 
da stsʰxos mɣvdelma sisxlidan upʰlis tsinaʃe sakmevlis samsxverplos rkʰebs romelitsʰ sakrebulo karavʃia da mtʰeli nartʃeni sisxli mozvrisa moapkuros sruladdasatsvelis samsxverplos sadzirkvels romelitsʰ sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰanaa 
da mtʰeli kʰoni tsʰodvis ʃesatsiravis mozvrisa amoatsʰalos mas kʰoni romelitsʰ pʰaravs ʃiɡneuls da mtʰeli kʰoni romelitsʰ ʃiɡneulzea 
da orive tʰirkmeli da kʰoni romelitsʰ matʰzea romelitsʰ bardzaqis kuntʰebzea da apki ɣvidzlze tʰirkmelebitʰurtʰ mokvetʰos iɡi 
roɡortsʰ moikvetʰeba samʃvidobo ʃesatsiravis mozvridan da daakmios isini mɣvdelma sruladdasatsvelis samsxverploze 
xolo tqavi mozvrisa da mtʰeli misi xortsʰi tʰavitʰa da kancebitʰurtʰ da misi ʃiɡneuli skoretʰurtʰ 
mtʰeli mozveri ɡaitanos banakis ɡaretʰ tsmida adɡilze sadatsʰ iqreba natsʰari da datsvas iɡi ʃeʃebze tsʰetsʰxlitʰ natsʰris ɡadaqris adɡilze daitsvas iɡi 
da tʰu mtʰeli tʰemi israelisa ʃetsʰdeba da daipʰareba sakʰme krebulis tʰvaltʰaɡan da tʃaidens raimes upʰlis romelime mtsʰnebis tsinaaɣmdeɡ romelitsʰ ar unda tʃadeniliqo da dadanaʃauldnen 
rodesatsʰ ʃeitqoben tsʰodvas romlitʰatsʰ ʃestsʰodes matʰ ʃestsiros krebulma mozveri msxvilpʰexidan tsʰodvis msxverplad da miitanos iɡi sakrebulo karvis tsin 
da daasxan tʰemis uxutsʰesebma xelebi mozvris tʰavs upʰlis tsinaʃe da daklan mozveri upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da ʃeitanos tsʰxebulma mɣvdelma mozvris sisxlidan sakrebulo karavʃi 
da amoatsos mɣvdelma tʰitʰi sisxlʃi da moasxuros ʃvidɡzis upʰlis tsinaʃe pʰardis tsin 
da sisxlidan mostsʰxos samsxverplos rkʰebs romelitsʰ upʰlis tsinaʃea sakrebulo karavʃi da mtʰeli danartʃeni sisxli moapkuros sruladdasatsveli samsxverplos sadzirkvels romelitsʰ sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰanaa 
da mtʰeli misi kʰoni amoiɣos misɡan da daakmios samsxverploze 
da ɡauketʰos am mozvers iɡive ratsʰ ɡauketʰa tsʰodvis ʃesatsiravis mozvers da ʃeundobs matʰ mɣvdeli da mietevebatʰ matʰ 
da ɡaitanos mozveri banakis ɡaretʰ da datsvas iɡi roɡortsʰ datsva pirveli mozveri es krebulis tsʰodvis ʃesatsiravia 
tʰu mtʰavarma ʃestsʰodos da ɡaaketʰos ʃetsʰdomitʰ rame upʰlis tʰavisi ɣmertʰis mtsʰnebatʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ romelitsʰ ar unda ɡaketʰebuliqo da tʃaidina danaʃauli 
an tsʰnobili ɡaxdeba mistʰvis misi tsʰodva romlitʰatsʰ man stsʰoda miitanos tʰavisi ʃesatsiravi umanko tʰxa 
da daados xeli tʰxas tʰavze da daklas iɡi adɡilze sadatsʰ klaven sruladdasatsvels upʰlis tsinaʃe tsʰodvis msxverplia iɡi 
da aiɣos mɣvdelma tsʰodvis ʃesatsiravis sisxlidan tʰitʰitʰ da mostsʰxos sruladdasatsvelis samsxverplos rkʰebs danartʃeni misi sisxli moapkuros sruladdasatsvelis samsxverplos sadzirkvels 
da mtʰeli misi kʰoni daakmios samsxverploze roɡortsʰ kʰoni samʃvidobo msxverplisa da ʃeundobs mɣvdeli mis tsʰodvas da epatieba mas 
da tʰu tʃaidens vinme xalxidan ʃetsʰdomitʰ raimes upʰlis romelime mtsʰnebis tsinaaɣmdeɡ ratsʰ ar unda tʃadeniliqo da dadanaʃauldeba 
an rodesatsʰ tsʰnobili ɡaxdeba mistʰvis misi tsʰodva romlitʰatsʰ man ʃestsʰoda miitanos msxverplad dedali tʰxa unaklo tʰavisi tsʰodvisatʰvis romlitʰatsʰ ʃestsʰoda 
da daados tʰavisi xeli tsʰodvis msxverpls tʰavze da daklas es tsʰodvis msxverpli sruladdasatsvelis adɡilze 
da aiɣos mɣvdelma misi sisxlidan tʰitʰitʰ da moasxuros sruladdasatsvelis samsxverplos rkʰebs da mtʰeli misi danartʃeni sisxli moapkuros samsxverplos sadzirkvels 
da mtʰeli misi kʰoni mohkvetʰos roɡortsʰ moikvetʰa kʰoni samʃvidobo msxverplidan da daakmios mɣvdelma samsxverploze ketʰilsurnelebad upʰlisatʰvis da ʃeundobs mas mɣvdeli da mieteveba mas 
da tʰu tsʰxvris pʰaridan miitans tsʰodvis msxverplad umanko iqos dedali 
da daados tʰavisi xeli tsʰodvis msxverpls tʰavze da daklas iɡi tsʰodvis msxverplad im adɡilze sadatsʰ klaven sruladdasatsvels 
da aiɣos mɣvdelma tsʰodvis msxverplis sisxlisaɡan tʰitʰitʰ da moasxuros sruladdasatsvelis samsxverplos rkʰebs xolo mtʰeli danartʃeni sisxli moapkuros samsxverplos sadzirkvels 
da mtʰeli misi kʰoni mokvetʰos roɡortsʰ moikvetʰa tsʰxvris kʰoni samʃvidobo msxverplidan da daakmios mɣvdelma isini upʰlis samsxverploze satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravad da ʃeundobs mas mɣvdeli mis tsʰodvas romlitʰatsʰ ʃestsʰoda da mieteveba mas 
vinmem rom ʃestsʰodos isminos xma pʰitsʰisa da iqos motsme an ixilos an itsʰodes da ar ɡanatsʰxados iɡi itvirtʰavs tsʰodvas 
an vinme rom ʃeexos raime utsmidur saɡans an utsmiduri tsʰxovelis mdzors utsmiduri sakʰonlis mdzors an utsmiduri kʰvetsarmavlis mdzors romtsʰ ar itsʰodes es iɡi maintsʰ utsmiduri da damnaʃavea 
an rom ʃeexos adamianis usupʰtʰaobas ra usupʰtʰaobatsʰ ar unda iqos ritʰatsʰ ibiltsebian da es dapʰaruli iqos mistʰvis da ʃemdeɡ ɡaiɡebs amas damnaʃavea iɡi 
an vinmem rom moupʰikʰreblad daipʰitsʰos baɡeebitʰ saborotod an sasiketʰod qvelapʰers rasatsʰ moupʰikʰreblad ɡamotʰkʰvams adamiani pʰitsʰitʰ da es dapʰaruli ikʰneba misɡan da mere ɡaiɡebs iɡi damnaʃavea masʃi 
da tʰu dadanaʃauldeba ertʰ ertʰ matʰɡanʃi da aɣiarebs raʃitsʰ ʃestsʰoda 
ʃestsiros tʰavisi danaʃaulis msxverpli upʰals tʰavisi tsʰodvis ɡamo ritʰatsʰ ʃestsʰoda tsvrilpʰexa sakʰonlidan kravi an tʰikani tsʰodvisatʰvis da ʃeundobs mas mɣvdeli mis tsʰodvas 
da tʰu xeli ar miutsvdeba tsʰxvarze miitanos msxverplad tʰavisi tsʰodvisatʰvis ritʰatsʰ ʃestsʰoda ori ɡvriti an ori martʰve mtredisa upʰlisatʰvis ertʰi tsʰodvis msxverplad meore sruladdasatsvelad 
da miitanos isini mɣvdeltʰan da mɣvdelma ʃestsiros pirvelad tsʰodvis msxverpli da ɡadaucras qeli kepʰastʰan da nu moatsʰilebs 
da moasxuros am tsʰodvis msxverplis sisxli samsxverplos kedels da danartʃeni sisxli datsritos samsxverplos sadzirkveltʰan es tsʰodvis msxverplia 
da meores ʃestsiravs sruladdasatsvelad rdʒulisamebr da ʃeundobs mas mɣvdeli mis tsʰodvas ritʰatsʰ ʃestsʰoda da mieteveba mas 
da tʰu xeli ar miutsvdeba or ɡvritze an mtredis or martʰveze miitanos tʰavis msxverplad imisatʰvis rom ʃestsʰoda tsmida puris pʰkʰvilis epʰis meatʰedi natsili tsʰodvisatʰvis ar daasxas masze zetʰi da nu dadebs masze ɡundruks radɡan iɡi tsʰodvis ɡanmtsmedeli msxverplia 
da miitanos iɡi mɣvdeltʰan da aiɣos misɡan mɣvdelma savse peʃvitʰ misi mosaɡonari natsili da daakmios samsxverploze upʰlis satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravad es tsʰodvis ɡanmtsmedi msxverplia 
da ʃeundobs mas mɣvdeli mis tsʰodvas ritʰatsʰ ʃestsʰoda amatʰɡan da ʃeendoba mas da is ikʰneba mɣvdlistʰvis roɡortsʰ dzɣveni 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
tʰu vinme imuxtʰlebs da ʃestsʰodavs uneblietʰ upʰlis sitsmidetʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ miutanos tʰavisi danaʃaulis msxverplad upʰals verdzi umanko tsvrilpʰexa sakʰonlidan ʃeni ʃepʰasebitʰ vertsʰxlis ʃekelebitʰ satsmidris ʃekelitʰ danaʃaulistʰvis 
da ratsʰ ʃestsʰoda am sitsmides ɡadaixados da mexutʰeditsʰ daumatos da mistsʰes iɡi mɣvdels da mɣvdeli ʃeundobs mis danaʃauls verdzitʰ da mieteveba mas 
da tʰu vinme ʃestsʰodavs da tʃaidenss rames upʰlis romelime mtsʰnebis tsinaaɣmdeɡ ratsʰ ar unda tʃadeniliqo da ar itsʰoda iɡi damnaʃavea da tʰavis tsʰodvas atarebs 
miitanos mɣvdeltʰan verdzi umanko tsvrilpʰexa sakʰonlidan ʃeni ʃepʰasebitʰ danaʃaulistʰvis da ʃeundobs mas mɣvdeli mis ʃetsʰdomas ritʰatsʰ ʃetsʰda da ar itsʰoda da epatieba mas 
es ʃesatsiravia danaʃaulisa ritʰatsʰ iɡi dadanaʃaulda upʰaltʰan 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
tʰu vinme ʃestsʰodavs da muxtʰlobitʰ imuxtʰlebs upʰlis tsinaʃe da uars etqvis tʰavis moqvass ʃesanaxad an ɡiraod mitsʰemul nivtʰze an ɡatatsʰebulze an ɡamosdzalavs tʰavis moqvass 
an ipovis dakarɡuls da uarqopʰs amas da daipʰitsʰebs tsʰrud rameze rasatsʰ stʃadis adamiani stsʰodavs ra amitʰ 
ʃestsʰodavs da damnaʃave ɡaxdeba daabrunos motatsʰebuli romelitsʰ moitatsʰa an ɡamodzaluli ratsʰ ɡamosdzala an anabari romelitsʰ mas miabares an dakarɡuli romelitsʰ ipova 
an qvelapʰrisatʰvis ristʰvisatsʰ tsʰrud daipʰitsʰebs is ɡadaixdis srulad da mexutʰeds daumatebs visatsʰ ekutʰvnis imas mistsʰems danaʃaulis msxverplis ʃetsirvis dɣes 
da tʰavisi danaʃaulis msxverplad miitanos upʰaltʰan verdzi umanko tsvrilpʰexa sakʰonlidan misi ʃepʰasebitʰ roɡortsʰ danaʃaulis msxverpli mɣvdlisadmi 
da ʃeundobs mas mɣvdeli upʰlis tsinaʃe da mieteveba mas ertʰi matʰɡani romlitʰatsʰ iɡi dadanaʃaulda 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
amtsʰne aarons da mis dzetʰ esaa rdʒuli sruladdasatsvelisa sruladdasatsveli iqos kotsʰonze samsxverploze mtʰeli ɣame vidre dilamde da tsʰetsʰxli samsxverplosi ɡizɡizebdes masze 
da ʃeimosos mɣvdelma ʃesamoseli selisa da kʰveda satsʰvali selisave ʃeimosos tanze da aiɣos pʰerpʰli sruladdasatsvelisɡan romelitsʰ datsva tsʰetsʰxlma samsxverploze da dadvas iɡi samsxverplostʰan 
da ɡaixados tʰavisi ʃesamoseli da ʃeimosos sxva ʃesamoseli da ɡamoitanos pʰerpʰli banakis ɡaretʰ tsmida adɡilze 
da tsʰetsʰxli samsxverploze ɡizɡizebdes ar tʃakʰres da moukidos masze mɣvdelma ʃeʃebs dilaobitʰ da ɡanalaɡos masze sruladdasatsveli da daakmios masze kʰoni samʃvidobo msxverplisa 
tsʰetsʰxli maradis ɡizɡizebdes samsxverploze ar tʃakʰres 
da esaa rdʒuli pureuli dzɣvenisa miitanon iɡi aaronis dzetʰ upʰlis tsinaʃe samsxverploze 
da aiɣos misɡan peʃvitʰ tsmida puris pʰkʰvilis dzɣvenisɡan da misi zetʰisɡan da mtʰeli ɡundruki romelitsʰ pureulis dzɣvenzea da daakmios samsxverploze ketʰilsurnelebad mis mosaɡonrad upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da danartʃeni misɡan ʃecamon aaronma da misma dzeebma xmiadi icamos tsmida adɡilze sakrebulo karvis ezoʃi ʃecamon 
ar ɡamotsʰxves ɡapʰuebuli es mivetsʰi matʰ tsilad tʃemi satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravebisaɡan tsmidatʰatsmidaa iɡi roɡortsʰ tsʰodvis msxverpli da danaʃaulis msxverpli 
qoveli mamrobitʰi skʰesisa aaronis dzetʰaɡan camdes mas maradiuli tsesia es tʰkʰvens tʰaobebʃi upʰlis satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravtʰaɡan qoveli romelitsʰ matʰ ʃeexeba ɡanitsmideba 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
esaa aaronisa da mis dzetʰa msxverpli romelsatsʰ ʃestsiraven upʰals matʰi tsʰxebis dɣes epʰis meatʰedi tsmida pʰkʰvili mudmiv ʃesatsiravad naxevari dilitʰ da naxevari saɣamos 
tapʰaze zetʰʃi unda iqos damzadebuli ʃekazmuli miitane iɡi karɡad ɡamomtsʰxvari roɡortsʰ dzɣveni pureulisa ʃestsire iɡi ketʰilsurnelebad upʰlisatʰvis 
da mɣvdelma mis adɡilze tsʰxebulma mis dzetʰaɡan unda ʃeasrulos iɡi es maradiuli tsesia mtʰlianad upʰlisatʰvis daikmeva iɡi 
da qoveli pureuli dzɣveni mɣvdlisɡan ʃetsiruli mtʰlianad unda daitsvas ar ʃeicamos 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
utʰxari aaronsa da mis dzetʰ esaa rdʒuli tsʰodvis msxverplisa im adɡilze sadatsʰ daikvlis sruladdasatsveli daiklas tsʰodvis msxverplitsʰ upʰlis tsinaʃe tsmidatʰa tsmidaa iɡi 
mɣvdelma romelmatsʰ tsʰodvis msxverpli ʃestsira ʃeidzleba ʃecamos iɡi tsmida adɡilze icamos sakrebulo karvis ezoʃi 
qoveli romelitsʰ ʃeexeba mis xortsʰs ɡanitsmideba da tʰu moesxureba misi sisxlidan samosels tsmida adɡilze ɡaretsʰxos is rasatsʰ miesxureba 
curceli tʰixisa romelʃitsʰ iɡi ixarʃeboda daimsxvres da tʰu spilendzis curcelʃi ixarʃeboda maʃin iɡi ɡamoiretsʰxos da ɡamoevlos tsqali 
qovel mamrovans mɣvdeltʰaɡan ʃeudzlia camos iɡi tsmidatʰa tsmidaa iɡi 
da qoveli tsʰodvis msxverpli romlis sisxli sakrebulo karavʃi ikʰneba ʃetanili satsmidarʃi ʃendobisatʰvis ar icamos tsʰetsʰxlze daitsvas 
da esaa rdʒuli danaʃaulisa tsmidatʰa tsmidaa iɡi 
im adɡilze sadatsʰ datsvaven sruladdasatsvels daiklas danaʃaulis msxverplitsʰ da misi sisxli moepkuros samsxverplos irɡvliv 
da mtʰeli misi kʰoni ʃestsiros duma da kʰo ni romelitsʰ pʰaravs ʃiɡneuls 
da orive tʰirkmeli da kʰoni romelitsʰ matʰzea romelitsʰ bardzaqtʰa kuntʰebzea da apki ɣvidzlze tʰirkmelitʰurtʰ mohkvetʰos iɡi 
da daakmios isini mɣvdelma samsxverploze satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravad upʰlisatʰvis iɡi danaʃaulis msxverplia 
qoveli mamrovani mɣvdeltʰaɡan camdes mas tsmida adɡilze icamos tsmidatʰa tsmidaa is 
roɡortsʰ tsʰodvis msxverpls ise danaʃaulis msxverpls ertʰi rdʒuli akʰvs iɡi ekutʰvnis mɣvdels romelitsʰ misitʰ ɡantsmends 
da tʰu mɣvdeli stsiravs ama tʰu im katsʰis sruladdasatsvels maʃin tqavi sruladdasatsvelisa romelitsʰ man ʃestsira mɣvdels ekutʰvnis 
da qoveli dzɣveni pureulisa romelitsʰ ɡamomtsʰxvaria tʰoneʃi da qvelapʰeri ratsʰ damzadebulia kʰotʰanʃi an tapʰaze mɣvdels romelitsʰ stsiravs mas ekutʰvnis 
da qoveli dzɣveni pureulisa zetʰʃi areuli da mʃrali ekutʰvnis aaronis qvela dzes roɡortsʰ ertʰs aseve meoresatsʰ 
da esaa rdʒuli samʃvidobo msxverplisa romelsatsʰ stsiraven upʰals 
tʰu vinme samadlobelos stsiravs mas samadlobelos ʃetsirvisas ʃestsiros upʰuari purebi zetʰʃi ʃezelili da upʰuari namtsʰxvrebi tsʰxebulni zetʰʃi da tsmida puris pʰkʰvilis kʰadapurebi zetʰʃi mozelili 
ɡapʰuebuli puris namtsʰxvrebtʰan ertʰad ʃestsiros tʰavisi ʃesatsiravi madlobis samʃvidobo msxverpltʰan ertʰad 
da ʃestsiros misɡan tʰitʰo tʰitʰod qoveli msxverplisɡan aɣsamartʰavis ʃesatsiravi upʰals es ekutʰvnis mɣvdels romelitsʰ apkurebs samʃvidobo msxverplis sisxls 
da xortsʰi samadlobelo da samʃvidobo msxverplisa icamos misi ʃetsirvis dɣes ar dartʃes arapʰeri misɡan dilamde 
da tʰu aɣtʰkʰmitʰ an nebitʰaa ʃetsiruli misi msxverpli maʃin misi ʃetsirvis dɣes icamos is xolo meore dɣes misi nartʃenitsʰ ʃeidzleba icamos 
dartʃenili msxverplis xortsʰi mesame dɣes tsʰetsʰxlʃi daitsvas 
da tʰu mesame dɣes ʃeicmeba xortsʰi samʃvidobo msxverplisa is ar ikʰneba ketʰilsasurveli mis ʃemtsirvels ar tʃaetʰvleba iɡi sadzaɡlobaa iɡi da vintsʰ ʃecams misɡan tsʰodvas daidebs 
da xortsʰi romelitsʰ ʃeexeba raime utsmidurs ar unda icamos tsʰetsʰxlʃi daitsvas qovelma supʰtʰam ʃeidzleba camos tsmida xortsʰi 
xolo vintsʰ tsabiltsulia da cams upʰlis samʃvidobo msxverplis xortsʰs moispoba iɡi tʰavisi xalxidan 
da vintsʰ ʃeexeba qovel utsmidurs adamianur sibiltses an utsmidur pirutqvs an qovel utsmidur kʰvemdzroms da ʃecams upʰlis samʃvidobo msxverplis xortsʰidan moispoba iɡi tʰavisi xalxidan 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
utʰxari israelis dzetʰ aravitʰari kʰoni xarisa tsʰxvrisa da tʰxisa ar camotʰ 
kʰoni leʃisa da kʰoni namxetsʰavisa ɡamoqenebul ikʰnas qovel sakʰmeʃi camitʰ ki ar camotʰ iɡi 
radɡan qoveli mcameli kʰonisa pirutqvisaɡan romelitsʰ ʃeitsireba satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravad upʰlisatʰvis moispoba tʰavis xalxidan 
da aravitʰari sisxli ar camotʰ tʰkʰvens sadɡomʃi artsʰ pʰrinveltʰa da artsʰ pirutqvtʰa 
qvela vintsʰ ʃecams raime sisxls moispoba tʰavis xalxidan 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
utʰxari israelis dzetʰ upʰlisadmi ʃemtsirvelma tʰavisi samʃvidobo msxverplisa unda miartʰvas tʰavisi ʃesatsiravi upʰals tʰavisi samʃvidobo msxverplidan 
tʰavisi xelitʰ miartʰvas satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravi upʰals kʰoni mkerditʰurtʰ miartʰvas ratʰa ʃerxevitʰ ʃearxios mkerdi upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da daakmevs mɣvdeli kʰons samsxverploze da iqos mkerdi aaronisa da mis dzetʰatʰvis 
mardʒvena kanci mietsʰitʰ mɣvdels roɡortsʰ aɣsamartʰavi ʃesatsiravi tʰkʰveni samʃvidobo msxverplidan 
vintsʰ aaronis dzetʰaɡan ʃestsiravs samʃvidobo msxverplis sisxlsa da kʰons misi ulupʰa ikʰneba mardʒvena kanci 
radɡan mkerdi ʃerxevisa da kanci ʃesatsiravisa aviɣe me israelis dzetʰaɡan matʰ samʃvidobo msxverpltʰaɡan da mivetsʰi isini aaron mɣvdels da mis dzetʰ saukuno tsesad israelis dzetʰatʰvis 
esaa natsili aaronisa da natsili mis dzetʰa upʰlis satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravtʰaɡan im dɣidan rodesatsʰ miuqvana isini upʰals mɣvdlobisatʰvis 
romelitsʰ brdzana upʰalma rom mietsʰatʰ matʰtʰvis matʰi tsʰxebis dɣes israelis dzetʰaɡan esaa saukuno tsesi matʰi tʰaobebisatʰvis 
esaa rdʒuli sruladdasatsvelisa pureulis msxverplisa tsʰodvis msxverplisa danaʃaulis msxverplisa avsebisa da samʃvidobo msxverplisa 
romelitsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma moses sinais mtʰaze im dɣes rotsʰa ubrdzana israelis dzetʰ tʰaviantʰ msxverpltʰa ʃetsirva upʰlisatʰvis sinais udabnoʃi 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
aiqvane aaroni da misi dzeni mastʰan ertʰad da ʃesamoselni da satsʰxebeli zetʰi da tsʰodvis msxverplis mozveri da ori verdzi da kalatʰi xmiadebitʰ 
da ʃekribe mtʰeli tʰemi sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan 
da ɡaaketʰa mosem roɡortsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma mas da ʃeikriba tʰemi sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan 
da utʰxra mosem tʰems es aris sitqva romelitsʰ brdzana upʰalma ʃesasruleblad 
da miiqvana mosem aaroni da misi dzeni da ɡanbana isini tsqlitʰ 
da ʃemosa is kvartʰitʰ da ʃemoartqa mas sartqeli da tʃaatsʰva mas ʃesamoseli da ʃemosa epʰoditʰ da ʃemoartqa mas epʰodis sartqeli da miamaɡra imitʰ epʰodi masze 
da daado aarons samkerduli da urimi da tʰumimi 
da moaxvia dolbandi tʰavze da daadva dolbands misi tsinapiridan okʰros pʰirpʰita tsmida ɡvirɡvini roɡortsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma moses 
da aiɣo mosem satsʰxebeli zetʰi da stsʰxo karavs da qovelives ratsʰ masʃia da ɡantsmida isini 
da moasxura misɡan samsxverplos ʃviddʒer da stsʰxo samsxverplosa da mis qovel curcels da mis sabanels da mis kvartsʰxlbeks matʰ ɡansatsmedad 
da daɣvara satsʰxebeli zetʰi aaronis tʰavze da stsʰxo mas ɡansatsmedad 
da moiqvana mosem aaronis dzeni da ʃemosa isini kvartʰitʰ da ʃemoartqa matʰ sartqlebi da daadɡa matʰ tʰavsaburavebi roɡortsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma moses 
da miiqvana mozveri tsʰodvis msxverplisa da daasxes aaronma da misma dzeebma xelebi tsʰodvis mozveris tʰavs 
da dakla is da aiɣo mosem sisxli da daado samsxverplos rkʰebs irɡvliv tʰavisi tʰitʰitʰ da tsarxotsʰa tsʰodva samsxverplodan da sisxli daɣvara samsxverplos sadzirkveltʰan da ɡantsmida iɡi ratʰa ʃeendo mistʰvis 
da aiɣo mtʰeli kʰoni romelitsʰ ʃiɡneulzea da apki ɣvidzlisa da orive tʰirkmeli matʰi kʰonitʰ da daakmia mosem samsxverploze 
mozveri da misi tqavi misi xortsʰi da misi skore datsva tsʰetsʰxlze banaks ɡaretʰ roɡortsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma moses 
da miiqvana verdzi sruladdasatsvelad da daasxes aaronma da misma dzeebma xelebi verdzs tʰavze 
da dakla mosem da moapkura sisxli samsxverplos irɡvliv 
da verdzi dacra aso asod da daakmia mosem tʰavi da nacrebi da kʰoni 
da ʃiɡneuli da kancebi ɡaretsʰxa tsqlitʰ da datsva mosem mtʰeli verdzi samsxverploze es sruladdasatsveli ketʰilsurnelebaa iɡi satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravia upʰlisatʰvis roɡortsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma moses 
da mohɡvara meore verdzi avsebis verdzi da daasxes aaronma da misma dzeebma xelebi verdzs tʰavze 
da dakla iɡi da aiɣo mosem misi sisxli da stsʰxo aaronis mardʒvena quris bibilos da misi mardʒvena xelis tsʰers da misi mardʒvena pʰexis tsʰers 
da moiqvana aaronis dzeni da stsʰxo mosem sisxli matʰi mardʒvena pʰexis tsʰers da moapkura mosem es sisxli samsxverplos irɡvliv 
da aiɣo kʰoni da duma da mtʰeli kʰoni romelitsʰ ʃiɡneulzea da ɣvidzlis apki da orive tʰirkmeli da matʰi kʰoni mardʒvena beci 
da xmiadebis kalatʰidan romelitsʰ upʰlis tsinaʃea aiɣo man ertʰi xmiadis kveri da ertʰi kveri purisa zetʰiani da ertʰi namtsʰxvari da daado kʰons da mardʒvena becs 
da dado qovelive es aaronis xelisɡulebze da mis dzetʰa xelisɡulebze da ʃearxia isini ʃerxevitʰ upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da aiɣo mosem isini matʰi xelebidan da daakmia samsxverploze sruladdasatsvelitʰurtʰ es avsebis msxverplia ketʰilsurnelebad es satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravia upʰlisatʰvis 
da aiɣo mosem mkerdi da miitana da ʃearxia iɡi ʃerxevitʰ upʰlis tsinaʃe avsebis verdzidan iqo mosestʰvis ulupʰa roɡortsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma moses 
da aiɣo mosem satsʰxebeli zetʰi da sisxli romelitsʰ samsxverploze iqo da moasxura aarons mis ʃesamosels da mis dzetʰa ʃesamosels mastʰan ertʰad da ɡantsmida aaroni misi ʃesamoseli da misi dzeni da mis dzetʰa ʃesamoseli mastʰan ertʰad 
da utʰxra mosem aarons da mis dzetʰ moxarʃetʰ es xortsʰi sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan da ikʰ cametʰ is purtʰan ertʰad romelitsʰ avsebis kalatʰʃia roɡortsʰ me vbrdzane aaronma da misma dzeebma camono is 
xolo nartʃeni xortsʰisa da purisa tsʰetsʰxlʃi datsvitʰ 
sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvlels ar ɡaʃordetʰ ʃvid dɣes vidre ar ʃesruldeba tʰkʰveni avsebis dɣeebi radɡan ʃvid dɣes unda ivsebodes tʰkʰveni xelebi 
roɡortsʰ ɡaketʰda am dɣes ase brdzana upʰalma ketʰeba tʰkʰveni ʃendobistʰvis 
da sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan dartʃitʰ ʃvidi dɣe da ɣame da daimarxetʰ upʰlis samarxvo ratʰa ar daixotsʰotʰ radɡan ase mamtsʰno upʰalma 
da aɣasrules aaronma da misma dzeebma qovelive ratsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma moses xelitʰ 
da iqo merve dɣes mouxmo mosem aarons da mis dzetʰa da israelis uxutsʰesebs 
da utʰxra aarons aiɣe ʃentʰvis xbo tsʰodvis msxverplad da verdzi sruladdasatsvelad orive saɣi da ʃestsire upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da israelis dzetʰ utʰxari ase aiɣetʰ tʰikani tsʰodvis msxverplad da xbo da kravi ertʰtslianebi orive saɣi sruladdasatsvelad 
da mozveri da verdzi samʃvidobo msxverplad ratʰa aɣasrulo msxverplʃetsirva upʰlis tsinaʃe da dzɣveni pureulisa ʃereuli zetʰʃi radɡan dɣes upʰali ɡamoɡetsʰxadebatʰ tʰkʰven 
da moitanes ratsʰ brdzana mosem sakrebulo karvis tsin da mieaxla mtʰeli tʰemi da dadɡa upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da tʰkʰva mosem ai ra brdzana upʰalma da ɡamoɡetsʰxadebatʰ tʰkʰven dideba upʰlisa 
da utʰxra mosem aarons miuaxlovdi samsxverplos da ʃestsire ʃeni tsʰodvis msxverpli da ʃeni sruladdasatsveli da kʰmen ʃendoba ʃentʰvis da ʃeni xalxisatʰvis da kʰmen ʃesatsiravi xalxisa da ʃeunde matʰ roɡortsʰ brdzana upʰalma 
da miuaxlovda aaroni samsxverplos da dakla xbo tʰavisi tsʰodvis ɡamosasqidlad 
da miitanes aaronis dzetʰ mastʰan sisxli da amoatso man masʃi tʰitʰi da moasxura samsxverplos rkʰebs da danartʃeni sisxli daɣvara samsxverplos sadzirkveltʰan 
kʰoni da tʰirkmelebi da apki ɣvidzlisa tsʰodvis msxverplidan daakmia samsxverploze roɡortsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma moses 
xolo xortsʰi da tqavi datsva tsʰetsʰxlze banaks ɡaretʰ 
dakla sruladdasatsveli da miartʰves mas aaronis dzetʰ sisxli da man moapkura iɡi samsxverplos irɡvliv 
xolo sruladdasatsveli miartʰves mas aso aso dacrili matʰ ʃoris tʰavitsʰ da daakmia man samsxverploze 
ɡaretsʰxa ʃiɡneuli da kancebi da daakmia sruladdasatsveltʰan ertʰad samsxverploze 
da miitana xalxis ʃesatsiravi da aiqvana tʰxa xalxis tsʰodvis msxverplad da dakla iɡi da ʃestsira roɡortsʰ tsʰodvis msxverpli roɡortsʰ tsina 
da miitana sruladdasatsveli da aɣasrula iɡi rdʒulisamebr 
da miitana pureulis dzɣveni da aivso peʃvi da daakmia samsxverploze dilis sruladdasatsvelis ɡarda 
da dakla mozveri da verdzi samʃvidobo msxverplad romelitsʰ xalxisaa da miartʰves mas aaronis dzetʰ sisxli da moapkura iɡi samsxverplos irɡvliv 
moartʰves kʰoni mozvrisa da verdzis duma da ɡadaburuli kʰoni da tʰirkmelebi da apki ɣvidzlisa 
da daadves kʰoni mkerdze da daakmia man kʰoni samsxverploze 
da mkerdi da mardʒvena beci ʃearxia aaronma upʰlis tsinaʃe ʃerxevitʰ roɡortsʰ ubrdzana mosem 
da aɣapqro aaronma xelebi xalxis mimartʰ da akurtʰxa isini da tʃamovida tsʰodvis msxverplis sruladdasatsvelisa da samʃvidobos ʃetsirvis ʃemdeɡ 
da ʃevidnen mose da aaroni sakrebulo karavʃi da ɡamovidnen da akurtʰxes xalxi da ɡamoetsʰxada upʰlis dideba mtʰel xalxs 
da ɡamovida tsʰetsʰxli upʰlisaɡan da datsva samsxverploze sruladdasatsveli da kʰoni da ixila mtʰelma xalxma da qiʒina dastsʰes da pirkʰve daemxen 
aiɣes aaronis dzetʰ nadabma da abihum tʰitʰoeulma tʰavisi satsʰetsʰxluri da tʃades matʰʃi tsʰetsʰxli da daades masze sakmeveli da miitanes upʰlis tsinaʃe utsʰxo tsʰetsʰxli romelitsʰ ar ubrdzanebia upʰals matʰtʰvis 
da ɡamovida tsʰetsʰxli upʰlisaɡan da datsva isini da daixotsʰnen upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da utʰxra mosem aarons es tʰkʰva upʰalma tʃems axloblebʃi ɡanvitsmidebi da mtʰeli xalxis tsinaʃe ɡanvdiddebi da dadumda aaroni 
da mouxmo mosem miʃaels da eltsʰapʰans aaronis bidzis quzielis dzetʰ da utʰxra matʰ miditʰ ɡamoitanetʰ tʰkʰveni dzmebi tsmidadan banakis ɡaretʰ 
da mividnen da ɡamoitanes isini matʰi kvartʰebianad banakis ɡaretʰ roɡortsʰ tʰkʰva mosem 
da utʰxra mosem aarons eleazarsa da itʰamars mis dzetʰ tʰavebs nu ɡaiʃiʃvlebtʰ da samosels nu ʃemoiɡledʒtʰ ratʰa ar daixotsʰotʰ da ar ɡanrisxdes iɡi mtʰel tʰemze maɡram tʰkʰvens dzmebs israelis mtʰels saxls ʃeudzlia itiros damtsvrebi romlebitsʰ datsva upʰalma 
sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvlelidan ar ɡamoxvidetʰ rom ar daixotsʰotʰ radɡan upʰlis satsʰxebeli zetʰia tʰkʰvenze da moikʰtsʰnen moses sitqvisamebr 
da utʰxra upʰalma aarons 
ɣvinosa da maɡar sasmelebs nu dalevtʰ ʃen da ʃeni dzeni ʃentʰan ertʰad sakrebulo karavʃi ʃesvlisas ratʰa ar daixotsʰotʰ es saukuno tsesia tʰkʰvens tʰaobebʃi 
ratʰa ɡanasxvaotʰ tsmida da saero utsmiduri da supʰtʰa 
da astsavlotʰ israelis dzetʰ qoveli tsesi romelitsʰ utʰxra matʰ upʰalma moses xelitʰ 
da utʰxra mosem aarons eleazarsa da itʰamars mis dartʃenil ʃvilebs aiɣetʰ pureuli dzɣveni romelitsʰ dartʃa upʰlis satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravidan da cametʰ iɡi upʰuarad samsxverplostʰan radɡan tsmidatʰa tsmidaa is 
da cametʰ is tsminda adɡilze radɡan ʃeni tsili da ʃens dzetʰa tsilia es upʰlis satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravtʰaɡan radɡan ase mebrdzana me 
da mkerdi ʃesarxeveli da beci aɣsamartʰavi cametʰ supʰtʰa adɡilze ʃen ʃenma vaʒebma da ʃenma asulebma ʃentʰan ertʰad radɡan ʃens tsilad da ʃeni ʃvilebis tsiladaa motsʰemuli es israelis dzetʰa samʃvidobo msxverpltʰaɡan 
aɣsamartʰavi beci da ʃesarxeveli mkerdi kʰonis satsʰetsʰxlo msxverplebitʰurtʰ miitanon ʃerxevis ʃesasruleblad upʰlis tsinaʃe da iqos ʃentʰvis da ʃens dzetʰatʰvis ʃentʰan saukuno tsesad roɡortsʰ brdzana upʰalma 
da tsʰodvis vatsʰs edzebda mose maɡram iɡi damtsvari iqo da ɡanrisxda iɡi eleazarsa da itʰamarze aaronis dartʃenil dzeebze 
rad ar cametʰ tsʰodvis msxverpli tsmida adɡilze radɡan tsmidatʰa tsmidaa iɡi da moɡetsʰatʰ tʰkʰven ratʰa tsarxotsʰos tʰemis tsʰodvebi mis ɡansatsmedad upʰlis tsinaʃe 
aha misi sisxli ar ikʰna ʃetanili tsmidaʃi tʰkʰven unda ɡecamatʰ is tsmidaʃi roɡortsʰ mebrdzana me 
da utʰxra aaronma moses aha dɣes ʃestsires matʰ tʰaviantʰi tsʰodvis msxverpli da sruladdasatsveli upʰlis tsinaʃe da es ʃememtʰxva me tʰu ʃevcam me tsʰodvis msxverpls dɣes ɡana ikʰneba es satʰno upʰlis tʰvalʃi 
da moismina mosem da moitsona 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses da aarons 
utʰxaritʰ israelis dzetʰ aha es tsʰxovelebi ʃeɡidzliatʰ camotʰ qovel pirutqvtʰaɡan romelitsʰ mitsazea 
qoveli pirutqvi romelsatsʰ ɡaqopʰili akʰvs tʃlikʰi ɣrma crilitʰ da amoitsʰoxnis satsʰoxnels cametʰ 
xolo imatʰɡani ar camotʰ romelnitsʰ amoitsʰoxnian satsʰoxnels da ara akʰvtʰ ɡaqopʰili tʃlikʰi akʰlemi radɡan iɡi amoitsʰoxnis satsʰoxnels maɡram misi tʃlikʰi araa ɡaqopʰili utsmiduria is tʰkʰventʰvis 
da botsʰveri radɡan iɡi amoitsʰoxnis satsʰoxnels maɡram mas ara akʰvs ɡaqopʰili tʃlikʰi utsmiduria is tʰkʰventʰvis 
da kurdɣeli radɡan iɡi amoitsʰoxnis satsʰoxnels maɡram ara akʰvs mas ɡaqopʰili tʃlikʰi utsmiduria is tʰkʰventʰvis 
da ɣori radɡan mas akʰvs ɡaqopʰili tʃlikʰi ɣrma crilitʰ maɡram ar amoitsʰoxnis satsʰoxnels utsmiduria is tʰkʰventʰvis 
matʰi xortsʰi ar camotʰ da matʰ mdzors ar ʃeexotʰ utsmidurni arian isini tʰkʰventʰvis 
aha eseni ʃeɡidzliatʰ camotʰ qoveltʰaɡan romelnitsʰ tsqalʃi arian qoveli romelsatsʰ akʰvs pʰarpʰli da kʰereci tsqalʃi zɣvebʃi da mdinareebʃi isini ʃeɡidzliatʰ camotʰ 
da qovelni romlebsatsʰ ara akʰvtʰ pʰarpʰli da kʰereci zɣvebʃi da mdinareebʃi tsqlis qovel kʰvetsarmavaltʰaɡan qovel tsʰotsʰxal arsebatʰaɡan romelnitsʰ tsqalʃi arian sadzaɡelni arian tʰkʰventʰvis 
sadzaɡelni unda iqvnen isini tʰkʰventʰvis matʰi xortsʰi ar camotʰ da matʰi mdzori ɡdzaɡdetʰ 
qovels romelsatsʰ ara akʰvs pʰarpʰli da kʰereci tsqalʃi sadzaɡelia tʰkʰventʰvis 
eseni ɡdzaɡdetʰ pʰrinveltʰaɡan ar icamon sadzaɡelni arian isini artsivi zɣvis orbi da zɣvis artsivi 
da dzera da ʃevardeni misi ɡvarisda mixedvitʰ 
qoveli qorani misi ɡvarisda mixedvitʰ 
da sirakʰlema da tʰolia da kʰori misi ɡvarisda mixedvitʰ 
da kioti tʰevziqlapia da dzendzeruki 
da coti varxvi da svavi 
da qarqati qantʃa misi ɡvarisda mixedvitʰ opʰopʰi da ɣamura 
qoveli mtseri mpʰrinavi tʰu otʰxze mosiarule sadzaɡelia tʰkʰventʰvis 
es ki ʃeɡidzliatʰ camotʰ qoveli mpʰrinavi tʰu otʰxze mosiarule mtseri romelsatsʰ akʰvs tsvivebi ratʰa xtunavdes mitʰ mitsaze 
eseni ʃeɡidzliatʰ camotʰ matʰɡan kalia misi ɡvarisda mixedvitʰ solami misi ɡvarisda mixedvitʰ xarɡoli misi ɡvarisda mixedvitʰ da xaɡabi misi ɡvarisda mixedvitʰ 
da qoveli sxva mpʰrinavi mtseri romelsatsʰ otʰxi pʰexi akʰvs sadzaɡelia tʰkʰventʰvis 
matʰɡan ɡautsmidurdebitʰ qoveli vintsʰ ʃeexeba matʰs mdzors ɡautsmidurebuli ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da qvelam vintsʰ aiɣebs rames matʰi mdzorisɡan unda ɡairetsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da ɡautsmidurebuli ikʰneba saɣamomde 
qoveli pirutqvi romelsatsʰ ɡaqopʰili tʃlikʰi akʰvs maɡram ara akʰvs ɣrma crili da ar amoitsʰoxnis satsʰoxnels utsmiduria tʰkʰventʰvis qoveli romelitsʰ ʃeexeba matʰ ɡautsmidurdeba 
da qoveli mavali tʰavis tʰatʰebze qovel tsʰxoveltʰaɡan romlebitsʰ dadian otʰxze utsmiduria tʰkʰventʰvis vintsʰ ki ʃeexeba matʰ mdzors ɡautsmidurebuli ikʰneba saɣamomde 
matʰi mdzoris amɣebma ɡairetsʰxos samoseli da ɡautsmidurebuli ikʰneba is saɣamomde ɡautsmidurebuli arian isini tʰkʰventʰvis 
aha ra aris utsmiduri tʰkʰventʰvis kʰvetsarmavaltʰaɡan dedamitsaze mxoxavni tʰxunela tʰaɡvi da xvliki misi ɡvarisda mixedvitʰ 
anaka msvenlomi dzlokvi xometi da kʰameleoni 
eseni utsmidurebi arian tʰkʰventʰvis qovel kʰvetsarmavaltʰaɡan qoveli romelitsʰ ʃeexeba matʰ mkvdrebs ɡautsmidurebuli ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da qvelapʰeri rasatsʰ daetsʰema romelime matʰɡani mkvdari ɡautsmidurdeba qoveli curceli xisa an samoseli an tqavi an tomara da qoveli saɡani romelitsʰ ɡamoiqeneba sakʰmeʃi tʃaʃvebul unda ikʰnas tsqalʃi da utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde xolo ʃemdeɡ ikʰneba supʰtʰa 
da qoveli curceli tʰixisa romelʃitsʰ tʃavardeba romelime imatʰɡani qvelapʰeri ratsʰ masʃia ɡautsmidurdeba da unda daamsxvriotʰ 
qoveli sacmeli romelitsʰ icmeba romelʃitsʰ ʃeaɣtsia tsqalma asetʰi curclidan ɡautsmidurdeba da qoveli sasmeli romelsatsʰ svamen qovel asetʰ curcelʃi 
da qvelapʰeri razetsʰ daetsʰema raime matʰi mdzorisɡan ɡautsmidurdeba tʰone da kʰura unda daimsxvres isini ɡautsmidurebulni arian da ɡautsmidurebulni ikʰnebian tʰkʰventʰvisatsʰ 
mxolod tsqaro da ca tsqalsatevi supʰtʰa ikʰneba vintsʰ ʃeexeba matʰ mdzors ɡautsmidurdeba 
da tʰu daetsʰa raime matʰi mdzorisɡan romelime mtsʰenaris tʰesls romelitsʰ itʰeseba maʃin iɡi supʰtʰaa 
da tʰu daesxa tsqali tʰesls da daetsʰa raime mdzorisaɡan utsmiduri ikʰneba tʰkʰventʰvis 
tʰu mokvda pirutqvtʰaɡani romelitsʰ ɡecmevatʰ vintsʰ ʃeexeba mis mdzors utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da romelmatsʰ camos mkvdari matʰɡani unda ɡaretsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde da romelmatsʰ tsaiɣos misi mdzori unda ɡaretsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da qoveli kʰvetsarmavali romelitsʰ kʰvemdzromobs mitsaze sadzaɡelia ar unda icamos 
qoveli romelitsʰ xoxavs mutsʰelze da qoveli romelitsʰ dadis otʰxze da qoveli mravalpʰexiani kʰvetsarmavaltʰaɡan romelnitsʰ kʰvemdzromoben mitsaze ar camotʰ isini radɡan sadzaɡelni arian isini 
nu tsabiltsavtʰ tʰkʰvens tʰavs qoveli kʰvemdzromi kʰvetsarmavlitʰ da nu ɡautsmidurdebitʰ matʰitʰ da nu ikʰnebitʰ utsmidurni matʰɡan 
radɡan me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni ɡanitsmidetʰ da iqavitʰ tsmidebi radɡan tsmida var me da nu ɡaautsmidurebtʰ tʰkʰvens tʰavs qoveli kʰvetsarmavlitʰ romelitsʰ kʰvemdzromobs mitsaze 
radɡan me var upʰali romelmatsʰ ɡamoɡiqvanetʰ tʰkʰven eɡviptis kʰveqnidan ratʰa viqo tʰkʰvens ɣmertʰad da iqavitʰ tsmida radɡan tsmida var me 
esaa rdʒuli pirutqvisa pʰrinvelisa da qoveli tsʰotsʰxali arsebisa romelnitsʰ tsqalʃi idzvrian da qoveli arsebisa romelnitsʰ mitsaze kʰvemdzromoben 
ratʰa sxvaoba iqos utsmidursa da tsmidas ʃoris da tsʰxovels ʃoris romelitsʰ ʃeidzleba ʃeicamos da tsʰxovels ʃoris romelitsʰ ar unda ʃeicamos 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
utʰxari israelis dzetʰ tʰu ɡanaqopʰierdes kʰali da ʃobos mamri maʃin is utsmiduria ʃvidi dɣe roɡortsʰ misi tsidovanebis dɣeebʃi utsmiduri ikʰneba iɡi 
da merve dɣes tsinadatsʰvitʰon qrmas tʃutʃis xortsʰi 
da otsʰdatsʰameti dɣe idʒdes kʰali tʰavisi ɡantsmedis sisxlʃi arapʰers tsmidas ar ʃeexos da satsmidarʃi ar ʃevides vidre ar ʃesruldeba misi ɡantsmedis dɣeebi 
da tʰu ʃobs mdedrs maʃin iɡi utsmiduria or kviras roɡortsʰ misi tsidovanebis dɣeebʃi da samotsʰdaekʰvsi dɣe idʒdes tʰavisi ɡantsmedis sisxlʃi 
da rotsʰa ʃesruldeba misi ɡantsmedis dɣeebi dzisa an asulisatʰvis moiqvanos kravi ertʰtsliani sruladdasatsvelad da martʰve mtredisa an ɡvriti tsʰodvis ʃesatsiravad sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan mɣvdeltʰan 
da ʃestsiros iɡi upʰlis tsinaʃe da ʃeundobs mas da ɡanitsmideba tʰavisi sisxldenidan esaa rdʒuli mamrisa da mdedris ʃobisa 
da tʰu ver miutsvda xeli kravze maʃin aiɣos ori ɡvriti an ori martʰve mtredisa ertʰi sruladdasatsvelad xolo meore tsʰodvis msxverplad da ʃeundobs mas mɣvdeli da ɡasupʰtʰavdeba iɡi 
da utʰxra upʰalma mosesa da aarons 
tʰu adamians ɡamoatʃndeba tʰavisi sxeulis kanze simsivne an lakʰa da tʰu es ɡadaikʰtsʰeva misi sxeulis kanze ketʰrovan tsqlulad miqvanil ikʰnas iɡi aarontʰan mɣvdeltʰan an ertʰ ertʰtʰan mis dzetʰaɡan mɣvdeltʰan 
da ʃexedavs mɣvdeli sxeulis kanis tsqluls da tʰu tʰma tsqlulze ɡatʰetʰrebulia da piri tsqlulisa upʰro ɣrmaa sxeulis kanze maʃin es tsqluli ketʰrisaa da dainaxavs mas mɣvdeli da utsmidurad ʃeratsʰxavs 
da tʰu tʰetʰri lakʰaa misi sxeulis kanze da misi piri araaa upʰro ɣrma sxeulis kanze da masze tʰma araa ɡatʰetʰrebuli mɣvdeli ɡanamartoebs tsqlulians ʃvidi dɣitʰ 
da naxavs mas mɣvdeli meʃvide dɣes da tʰu tsqluli dartʃa xilulad maɡram ar ɡavrtsʰelda tsqluli tanze maʃin ɡanamartoos iɡi ʃvidi dɣitʰ meored 
da naxavs mas mɣvdeli meʃvide dɣes meored da tʰu tsqluli nakleb ʃeimtʃneva da ar ɡavrtsʰelda kanze maʃin mɣvdeli ɡamoatsʰxadebs mas supʰtʰad sirsvelia is da ɡairetsʰxos man tʰavisi samoseli da supʰtʰa ikʰneba 
da tʰu sirsveli dzalian ɡavrtsʰelda kanze mɣvdlisɡan misi datʰvalierebisa da misi supʰtʰad mitʃnevis ʃemdeɡ kvlav unda etʃvenos mɣvdels 
da tʰu ʃeamtʃnevs mɣvdeli rom aha ɡavrtsʰelda sirsveli kanze maʃin ʃeratsʰxavs mas mɣvdeli utsmidurad ketʰria is 
tʰu ketʰrovani tsqluli akʰvs adamians maʃin iɡi miqvanil unda ikʰnas mɣvdeltʰan 
da naxavs mɣvdeli da tʰu simsivne tʰetʰria kanze da ɡatʰetʰrebulia tʰma da tsʰotsʰxali xortsʰis xortsʰmetobaa simsivneze 
maʃin es dzvelisdzveli ketʰria mis kanze da mas mɣvdeli utsmidurad ʃeratsʰxavs ar ɡanamartovebs mas radɡan iɡi ukve utsmiduria 
da tʰu kanis daavadeba ɡamopʰurtʃkʰnulia kanze da pʰaravs es daavadeba mtʰel kans tʰavidan pʰexebamde ris danaxvatsʰ ʃeudzlia mɣvdels 
da dainaxavs mɣvdeli rom dapʰara daavadebam mtʰeli misi sxeuli maʃin miitʃnios man avadmqopʰi daavadebisaɡan supʰtʰad radɡan mtʰlad ɡatʰetʰrda supʰtʰaa iɡi 
rotsʰa ɡamotʃndeba masʃi tsʰotsʰxali xortsʰi iɡi utsmiduria 
rotsʰa dainaxavs mɣvdeli tsʰotsʰxal xortsʰs miitʃnevs mas utsmidurad tsʰotsʰxali xortsʰi utsmiduria ketʰria iɡi 
tʰu tsʰotsʰxali xortsʰi kvlav ɡatʰetʰrda maʃin miva is mɣvdeltʰan 
da ʃexedavs mas mɣvdeli da naxavs rom tsqluli ɡatʰetʰrebulia maʃin iɡi supʰtʰad miitʃnevs tsqluls supʰtʰaa iɡi 
da tʰu vinmes kanze ekʰneba tʃirkʰovani mutsuki da ɡanikurneba 
da tʃirkʰovani mutsukis adɡilze ɡatʃndeba tʰetʰri simsivne an tʰetʰrtsitʰeli lakʰa ɡamotsʰxaddes mɣvdeltʰan 
ʃexedavs mas mɣvdeli da aha tʰu imis kanʃia tʃaɣrmavebuli da misi tʰma ɡatʰetʰrebuli maʃin iɡi mas utsmidurad miitʃnevs es ketʰrovani tsqlulia iɡi tʃirkʰovan mutsukʃi aqvavda 
da tʰu dainaxavs mɣvdeli rom araa maszed tʰetʰri tʰma da iɡi araa kanʃi tʃaɣrmavebuli da nakleb ʃesamtʃnevia maʃin ɡanamartovebs mas mɣvdeli ʃvidi dɣitʰ 
da tʰu iɡi metad ɡavrtsʰelda kanze maʃin mɣvdeli mas utsmidurad miitʃnevs tsqlulia is 
da tʰu es lakʰa tʰavis adɡilze rtʃeba ar vrtsʰeldeba maʃin es tʃirkʰovani mutsukis antʰebaa da mɣvdeli mas supʰtʰad miitʃnevs 
tʰu vinmes sxeulis kanze akʰvs sidamtsvre da ʃexortsʰebul sidamtsvreze aɣmotʃndeba tʰetʰrtsitʰeli an tʰetʰri lakʰa 
da dainaxaavs mɣvdeli rom tʰma ɡatʰetʰrda lakʰaze da misi piri tʃaɣrmavebulia kanʃi maʃin es ketʰria is sidamtsvreze aqvavebula mɣvdeli mas utsmidurad miitʃnevs iɡi ketʰrovani tsqlulia 
da tʰu mɣvdeli dainaxavs rom araa lakʰaze tʰetʰri tʰma da iɡi araa kanʃi tʃaɣrmavebuli da dzlivs ʃeimtʃneva mɣvdeli mas ɡanamartovebs ʃvidi dɣitʰ 
da ʃexedavs mas mɣvdeli meʃvide dɣes tʰu es metad ɡavrtsʰelda kanze maʃin miitʃnevs mas mɣvdeli utsmidurad ketʰrovani tsqlulia is 
da tʰu lakʰa rtʃeba tʰavis adɡilze ar vrtsʰeldeba kanze da iɡi mtsʰired ʃeimtʃneva maʃin es simsivne sidamtsvrisɡanaa da mas mɣvdeli supʰtʰad miitʃnevs radɡan es sidamtsvris antʰebaa 
mamakatsʰs an dedakatsʰs rom hkʰondes tsqluli tʰavze an tsverze 
tsqluls naxavs mɣvdeli da tʰu misi piri ɣrmad aris kanʃi da tʰma masze moqvitʰalo da tʰxelia mɣvdeli mas aratsmidad miitʃnevs kʰetsʰia iɡi tʰavis an tsveris ketʰria 
da tʰu mɣvdeli naxavs kʰetsʰis tsqluls rom misi piri ar aris tʃaɣrmavebuli kanʃi da ʃavi tʰma ar aris masze mɣvdelma ɡanamartovos kʰetsʰitʰ datsqlulebuli ʃvidi dɣitʰ 
da naxavs mɣvdeli tsqluls meʃvide dɣes rom kʰetsʰi ar ɡavrtsʰelebula da araa masze moqvitʰalo tʰma da piri kʰetsʰisa kanʃi araa tʃaɣrmavebuli 
ɡaiparsos maɡram kʰetsʰitʰ daavadebuli adɡili ar ɡaiparsos da mɣvdeli ɡanamartovebs kʰetsʰitʰ daavadebuls ʃvidi dɣitʰ meored 
da naxavs mɣvdeli kʰetsʰs meʃvide dɣes da tʰu kʰetsʰi ar ɡavrtsʰelebula kanze da misi piri araa tʃaɣrmavebuli kanʃi maʃin mɣvdeli mas supʰtʰad miitʃnevs da man ɡaretsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da supʰtʰa ikʰneba 
da tʰu metad ɡavrtsʰelda kʰetsʰi kanze misi ɡasupʰtʰavebis ʃemdeɡ 
da ʃexedavs mas mɣvdeli da naxavs rom ɡavrtsʰelda kʰetsʰi mis kanze nu dautsqebs dzebnas moqvitʰalo tʰmas utsmiduria iɡi 
da tʰu kʰetsʰi dartʃa xilulad da masze aɣmotsʰenda ʃavi tʰma kʰetsʰi ɡankurnebulia supʰtʰaa iɡi da mɣvdeli mas supʰtʰad miitʃnevs 
tʰu mamakatsʰs an dedakatsʰs aɣmoatʃndeba sxeulis kanze lakʰebi tʰetʰri lakʰebi 
da dainaxavs mɣvdeli matʰi sxeulis kanze tʰetʰr pʰermkrtʰal lakʰebs es aris ɣia pʰeris kʰetsʰi romelitsʰ aqvavda kanze supʰtʰaa iɡi 
da tʰu vinmes tʰavze ɡastsʰvivda es simelotea supʰtʰaa iɡi 
da tʰu tʰavis tsina natsilidan moxda tʰmis ɡatsʰvena maʃin melotia iɡi supʰtʰaa iɡi 
da tʰu simeloteze an tʰmaɡatsʰvenilobaze ikʰneba tʰetʰrtsitʰeli tsqluli maʃin es ketʰria aqvavebulia mis simeloteze an mis tʰmaɡatsʰvenilobaze 
da ʃexedavs mas mɣvdeli da aha tʰetʰrtsitʰeli tsqlulis simsivne mis simeloteze an tʰmaɡatsʰvenilobaze isetʰivea ʃesaxedaobitʰ roɡortsʰ ketʰri sxeulis kanze 
maʃin is ketʰrovani katsʰia utsmiduria iɡi mɣvdelma utsmidurad unda miitʃnios mas tʰavze tsqluli akʰvs 
ratsʰ ʃeexeba ketʰrovans romelsatsʰ es tsqluli akʰvs misi samoseli unda daixes tʰavi unda ɡaʃiʃvldes da ulvaʃebi daipʰaros da daidzaxos utsmiduri utsmiduri 
mtʰeli dɣeebi sanam tsqluli akʰvs mas iɡi utsmiduria utsmiduria is ɡantsʰalkevebitʰ itsʰxovros man tʰavis sadɡomis banakis ɡaretʰ 
da tʰu samoselze ikʰneba ketʰrovani tsqluli matqlis samoselze an selis samoselze 
an kʰselze an selisa anda matqlis misakʰselze an tqavze an tqavis romelime natsarmze 
da tʰu tsqluli ikʰneba momtsvano an motsitʰalo samoselze an tqavze an kʰselze an tqavis romelime saɡanze maʃin es tsqluli ketʰrovania da unda etʃvenos mɣvdels 
da naxavs iɡi tsqluls da ɡanamartovebs ketʰrovans ʃvidi dɣitʰ 
da naxavs iɡi tsqluls meʃvide dɣes tʰu ɡavrtsʰelebulia tsqluli samoselze an kʰselze an misakʰselze an tqavze an tqavis romelime natsarmze maʃin es ketʰri ɡesliania utsmiduri tsqlulia iɡi 
da man datsvas samoseli an kʰseli an misakʰseli matqlis an selisa an romelime saɡani tqavisa razetsʰ ikʰneba es tsqluli radɡan es tsqluli ɡesliania tsʰetsʰxlʃi unda daitsvas 
tʰu mɣvdeli dainaxavs rom ar ɡavrtsʰelebula tsqluli samoselze an kʰselze an tqavis romelime saɡanze 
maʃin mɣvdeli ubrdzanebs da ɡamoretsʰxaven imas razetsʰ tsqlulia da ɡanamartovebs mas ʃvidi dɣitʰ meored 
da naxavs mɣvdeli tsqluls ɡamoretsʰxvis ʃemdeɡ da aha tsqluls ar ʃeutsʰvlia tʰavisi saxe tʰumtsʰa ar ɡavrtsʰelebula tsqluli is utsmiduria tsʰetsʰxlze datsvi iɡi es amocmulia tsaɣma an ukuɣma pirze 
da tʰu mɣvdeli dainaxavs rom tsqluli nakleb ʃesamtʃnevia misi ɡamoretsʰxvis ʃemdeɡ amoɡlidʒos iɡi samoslidan an kanidan an kʰselidan an misakʰselidan 
da tʰu iɡi kvlav ɡamotʃndeba samoselze an kʰselze an misakʰselze an tqavis romelime saɡanze iɡi aqvavebulia tsʰetsʰxlʃi daitsvas iɡi razetsʰ tsqlulia 
samosels an kʰsels an misakʰsels an tqavis romelime saɡans romelsatsʰ ɡaretsʰxav da romeltʰaɡan ɡanʃordeba tsqluli ɡadairetsʰxos xelmeored da ɡasupʰtʰavdeba 
es aris rdʒuli ketʰrovani tsqlulisa matqlis an selis an kʰselis an misakʰselis samoslisa an tqavis saɡnisa misi supʰtʰad an utsmidurad mitʃnevisatʰvis 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
es ikʰneba rdʒuli ketʰrovanisa misi ɡasupʰtʰavdebis dɣes miqvanil ikʰnes iɡi mɣvdeltʰan 
da ɡamova mɣvdeli banakis ɡaretʰ da tʰu dainaxavs iɡi rom ketʰrovani ɡanikurna ketʰrisaɡan 
maʃin ubrdzanebs mɣvdeli aqvanil ikʰnes ɡasasupʰtʰavebelistʰvis ori tsʰotsʰxali pʰrinveli tsmida da kedris xe da dzotseulis pʰeris dzapʰi da usupi 
da ubrdzanebs ertʰi pʰrinvelis dakvlas tʰixis curcelʃi ɡamdinar tsqalze 
tsʰotsʰxal pʰrinvels iɡi aiqvans kedris xitʰa da dzotseulis pʰeris dzapʰitʰurtʰ da usupitʰ da amoavlebs matʰ dakluli pʰrinvelis sisxlʃi romelitsʰ daklulia ɡamdinar tsqalze 
da moasxurebs ketʰrisaɡan ɡantsmedils ʃviddʒer da miitʃnevs mas supʰtʰad da ɡauʃvebs tsʰotsʰxal pʰrinvels velze 
ɡansatsmidavebelma ɡairetsʰxos samoseli da ɡaikricos mtʰeli tʰma da ɡanibanos tsqlitʰ da ɡaxdeba supʰtʰa da ʃemdeɡ mivides banakʃi da daqos karvis ɡaretʰ ʃvidi dɣe 
da meʃvide dɣes ɡaiparsos mtʰeli tʰma tʰavi da tsveri da tʰvaltʰa tsarbebi da mtʰeli tʰma ɡaiparsos da ɡairetsʰxos samoseli da ɡanibanos sxeuli tsqlitʰ da ɡaxdeba supʰtʰa 
da merve dɣes aiqvanos ori umanko kravi da ertʰi dedali tsʰxvari tselɡamovlili umanko da epʰis sami meatʰedi natsili tsmida puris pʰkʰvilidan pureul dzɣvnad zetʰʃi ʃereuli da ertʰi satsqauli zetʰisa 
da ɡanmasupʰtʰavebeli mɣvdeli daaqenebs ɡasasupʰtʰavebel katsʰs da matʰ upʰlis tsinaʃe sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan 
da aiɣebs mɣvdeli ertʰ kravs da ʃestsiravs mas danaʃaulis ʃesatsiravad da ʃearxevs matʰ upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da daklavs kravs im adɡilze sadatsʰ klaven tsʰodvis msxverplsa da sruladdasatsvels tsmida adɡilze radɡan msɡavsad tsʰodvis msxverplisa danaʃaulis es msxverpli ekutʰvnis mɣvdels tsmidatʰa tsmidaa is 
da aiɣebs mɣvdeli danaʃaulis msxverplis sisxlidan da daadebs mas mɣvdeli ɡasasupʰtʰaveblis mardʒvena quris bibiloze da misi mardʒvena xelis tsʰera tʰitʰze da misi mardʒvena pʰexis tsʰera tʰitʰze 
da aiɣebs mɣvdeli zetʰis satsqaulidan da daisxams tʰavis martsʰxena xelisɡulze 
da amoavlebs mardʒvena tʰitʰs zetʰʃi romelitsʰ mis martsʰxena xelisɡulzea da moasxurebs zetʰitʰ tʰavisi tʰitʰitʰ ʃviddʒer upʰlis tsinaʃe 
danartʃeni zetʰidan romelitsʰ mis xelisɡulzea daadebs ɡasasupʰtʰavebels mardʒvena quris bibiloze misi mardʒvena xelis tsʰera tʰitʰze da misi mardʒvena pʰexis tsʰera tʰitʰze danaʃaulis msxverplis sisxlze 
xolo nartʃeni zetʰisa romelitsʰ mɣvdlis xelisɡulzea daados man ɡasasupʰtʰavebels tʰavze da ʃeundobs mas upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da ʃestsiravs mɣvdeli tsʰodvis msxverpls da ʃeundobs ɡasasupʰtʰavebels mis utsmidurebas da mere daklas sruladdasatsveli 
da aɣavlens mɣvdeli sruladdasatsvels da pureul dzɣvens samsxverploze da ʃeundobs mas mɣvdeli da ɡasupʰtʰavdeba iɡi 
tʰu ɣaribia iɡi da xeli ar miutsvdeba maʃin aiqvanos ertʰi kravi danaʃaulis msxverplad ʃesarxevad tʰavisi ʃendobisatʰvis da epʰis meatʰedi natsili tsmida puris pʰkʰvilisa zetʰʃi azelili pureul dzɣvnad da satsqauli zetʰisa 
da ori ɡvriti an ori martʰve mtredisa razetsʰ miutsvdeba xeli da ikʰneba ertʰi tsʰodvis msxverplad xolo meore sruladdasatsvelad 
da miitanos isini tʰavisi ɡasupʰtʰavebis merve dɣes mɣvdeltʰan sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da aiɣebs mɣvdeli danaʃaulis msxverplis kravs da zetʰis satsqauls da ʃearxevs mas mɣvdeli upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da daklavs kravs danaʃaulis msxverplad da aiɣebs mɣvdeli danaʃaulis msxverplis sisxls da daadebs ɡasasupʰtʰavebels mardʒvena quris bibiloze da misi mardʒvena xelis tsʰerze da misi mardʒvena pʰexis tsʰerze 
da daisxams mɣvdeli tʰavis martsʰxena xelisɡulze 
da moasxurebs mɣvdeli tʰavis mardʒvena tʰitʰitʰ zetʰs romelitsʰ mis martsʰxena xelisɡulzea ʃvidɡzis upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da daadebs mɣvdeli zetʰs romelitsʰ mis xelisɡulzea ɡasasupʰtʰavebels mardʒvena quris bibiloze da misi mardʒvena xelis tsʰerze da misi mardʒvena pʰexis tsʰerze im adɡilze sadatsʰ danaʃaulis msxverplis sisxlia 
nartʃen zetʰs romelitsʰ mɣvdlis xelisɡulzea iɡi daadebs ɡasasupʰtʰavebels tʰavze misi ʃendobisatʰvis upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da ʃestsiravs ɡvrittʰaɡan ertʰs an mtredis martʰvetʰaɡan imatʰtʰaɡan razetsʰ miutsvdeba xeli 
razetsʰ miutsvdeba xeli ertʰs tsʰodvis msxverplad xolo meores sruladdasatsvelad pureul dzɣventʰan ertʰad da ʃeundobs mɣvdeli ɡasasupʰtʰavebels upʰlis tsinaʃe 
esaa rdʒuli imisa visatsʰ ketʰrovani tsqluli akʰvs da visatsʰ xeli ar miutsvdeba tʰavis ɡasupʰtʰavebisas 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses da aarons 
raʒams ʃexvaltʰ kʰanaanis kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ me ɡadzlevtʰ tʰkʰvens sampʰlobelod da me movɡvri ketʰrovan tsqluls tʰkʰveni sampʰlobelo kʰveqnis saxls 
tsavides is visitsʰaa saxli da ɡanutsʰxados mɣvdels tʰitʰkʰos tsqluli metʃvena saxlʃi 
da ubrdzanebs mɣvdeli da datsʰlian saxls vidre miva iɡi tsqlulis saxilvelad ratʰa ar ɡautsmidurdes qovelive ratsʰ saxlʃia da mere miva is saxlis saxilvelad 
da ixilavs tsqluls da naxavs rom tsqluli saxlis kedlebzea momtsvano an motsitʰalo ɣrmulebad da matʰi saxe tʃaɣrmavebulia kedlebʃi 
ɡava mɣvdeli saxlidan saxlis ʃesasvlelisken da tʃaketavs saxls ʃvidi dɣitʰ 
meʃvide dɣes kvlav miva da tʰu dainaxavs rom tsqluli ɡavrtsʰelda saxlis kedlebze 
ubrdzanebs iɡi da amotexen kʰvebs romlebzetsʰ tsqlulia da ɡadaqrian matʰ kʰalakʰɡaretʰ utsmidur adɡilze 
da saxls ɡadapʰxeken ʃiɡnidan irɡvliv da ɡadaapneven mtvers romelitsʰ mopʰxikes kʰalakʰɡaretʰ utsmidur adɡilze 
da aiɣeben sxva kʰvebs da tʃadɡamen im kʰvatʰa adɡilze da aiɣeben sxva ɡasaless da ɡalesen saxls 
tʰu tsqluli kvlav ɡamovlinda da aqvavda saxlʃi mas ʃemdeɡ ratsʰ ɡamotexes is kʰvebi ɡadapʰxikes saxli da ɡaleses 
da miva mɣvdeli da dainaxavs rom tsqluli ɡavrtsʰelda saxlze maʃin ketʰri ɡeslovania saxlʃi utsmiduria iɡi 
daanɡrion saxli misi kʰvebi misi xeebi da mtʰeli batʰkʰaʃi saxlisa ɡaitanon kʰalakʰɡaretʰ utsmidur adɡilze 
da ʃemsvleli im saxlʃi im dɣeebʃi ra droitʰatsʰ tʃahketes iɡi utsmiduria saɣamomde 
mtsoliarem im saxlʃi unda ɡairetsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da mcamelma im saxlʃi unda ɡairetsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli 
da tʰu mova mɣvdeli da dainaxavs rom tsqluli saxlze ar ɡavrtsʰelda saxlis ɡalesvis ʃemdeɡ mɣvdeli miitʃnevs saxls supʰtʰad radɡan tsqluli ɡanikurna 
da aiɣebs iɡi saxlis ɡasasupʰtʰaveblad or pʰrinvels da kedris xes da dzotseulis pʰeris dzapʰs da usups 
da daklavs ertʰ pʰrinvels tʰixis curcelze ɡamdinare tsqalze 
da aiɣebs kedris xesa da usups da dzotseuli pʰeris dzapʰs da tsʰotsʰxal pʰrinvels da amoavlebs matʰ dakluli pʰrinvelis sisxlʃi da ɡamdinare tsqalʃi da moasxurebs saxls ʃvidɡzis 
da ɡaasupʰtʰavebs saxls pʰrinvelis sisxlitʰ da ɡamdinare tsqlitʰ da tsʰotsʰxali pʰrinvelitʰ da kedris xitʰ da usupitʰ da dzotseulis pʰeris dzapʰitʰ 
da ɡauʃvebs tsʰotsʰxal pʰrinvels kʰalakʰɡaretʰ velze da ʃeundobs saxls da ɡasupʰtʰavdeba iɡi 
es aris rdʒuli ketʰrisa da kʰetsʰisa da qoveli tsqlulisa 
da samoslisa da saxlis ketʰrisa 
simsivnisa kʰetsʰisa da lakʰisa 
ratʰa mietʰitʰos rodis aris utsmidureba da rodis sisupʰtʰave esaa ketʰris rdʒuli 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses da aarons 
elaparaketʰ israelis dzetʰ da utʰxaritʰ matʰ tʰu vinmes ekʰneba ɡamonadeni tʰavisi sxeulidan misi ɡamonadenis ɡamo iɡi utsmiduria 
es aris kanoni mis utsmidurebaze misi ɡamonadenis ɡamo rodesatsʰ ʒonavs misi sxeulidan misi ɡamonadeni da rodesatsʰ tʃerdeba mis sxeulʃi ɡamonadeni es misi utsmidurebaa 
qoveli satsoli romelzetsʰ datsveba lortsomdinari utsmiduria da romelzetsʰ dadʒdeba utsmiduria 
da vintsʰ ʃeexeba mis satsols unda ɡairetsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da daibanos tsqlitʰ da utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da vintsʰ dadʒdeba rameze razetsʰ idʒda lortsomdinari man unda ɡairetsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da daibanos tsqlitʰ da utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
lortsomdinaris sxeulis ʃemxebma unda ɡairetsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da daibanos tsqlitʰ da utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da tʰu miapʰurtʰxebs lortsomdinari supʰtʰa visme ɡairetsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da daibanos tsqlitʰ da utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da qoveli dasadʒdomi romlitʰatsʰ mɡzavrobda lortsomdinari utsmiduria 
da qoveli ʃemxebi raimesi ratsʰ iqo mis kʰveʃ utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da qovels romelsatsʰ ʃeexeba lortsomdinari da ar daubania tʰavisi xeli tsqlitʰ unda ɡairetsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da daibanos tsqlitʰ da utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da tʰixis curceli romelsatsʰ ʃeexeba lortsomdinari daimsxvres xolo qoveli xis curceli ɡamovlebuli unda ikʰnes tsqlitʰ 
da rodesatsʰ lortsomdinari ɡasupʰtʰavdeba tʰavisi ɡamonadenisɡan ɡadaitʰvalos ʃvidi dɣe tʰavisi ɡantsmedidan da ɡairetsʰxos tʰavisi samosi da daibanos tʰavisi sxeuli ɡamdinare tsqalʃi da supʰtʰa ikʰneba 
da merve dɣes aiqvanos ori ɡvriti an ori martʰve mtredisa da mivides upʰlis tsinaʃe sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan da mistsʰes isini mɣvdels 
da ʃestsiros matʰɡan mɣvdelma ertʰi tsʰodvis msxverplad xolo meore sruladdasatsvelad da ʃeundos mas upʰlis tsinaʃe misi ɡamonadenisatʰvis 
da mamakatsʰs romelsatsʰ ʃeemtʰxveva tʰesldena daibanos tsqlitʰ mtʰeli tʰavisi sxeuli da ikʰneba utsmiduri saɣamomde 
da qoveli samoseli da qoveli kani romelzetsʰ ekʰneba tʰesldena ɡaretsʰxil unda ikʰnas tsqlitʰ da utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da rodesatsʰ kʰaltʰan datsveba mamakatsʰi da xdeba tʰesldena orivem daibanon tsqlitʰ da utsmidurebi ikʰnebian saɣamomde 
da tʰu kʰals akʰvs sisxldena romelitsʰ moedineba misi sxeulidan ʃvidi dɣe ikʰneba iɡi tʰavis tsidovanebaʃi da qoveli vintsʰ ʃeexeba mas utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da qoveli razetsʰ iɡi datsveba tʰavisi tsidovanebisas ɡautsmidurdeba da qovelive razetsʰ iɡi dadʒdeba ɡautsmidurdeba 
da qovelma vintsʰ ʃeexeba mis satsols unda ɡairetsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da daibanos tsqlitʰ da utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da qovelma vintsʰ ʃeexeba romelime saɡans romelzetsʰ iɡi idʒda unda ɡairetsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da daibanos tsqlitʰ da utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da tʰu vinme ʃeexeba raimes satsolze an im saɡanze romelzetsʰ iɡi idʒda rodesatsʰ mamakatsʰi ʃeexo mas maʃin is utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde 
da tʰu datsveba mastʰan mamakatsʰi da kʰalis tʰviuri ɡamonadeni ikʰneba masze maʃin is mamakatsʰi utsmiduri ikʰneba ʃvidi dɣe da qoveli satsoli romelzetsʰ iɡi datsveba utsmiduri ikʰneba 
da tʰu kʰals akʰvs sisxldena mravali dɣis ɡanmavlobaʃi ara misi tsidovanebis dros an tʰu mas akʰvs ɡamonadeni mis tsidovanebaze metxans maʃin misi utsmidurebis ɡamonadenis mtʰeli drois ɡanmavlobaʃi roɡortsʰ misi tsidovanebis dɣeebʃi iɡi utsmiduria 
qoveli satsoli romelzetsʰ iɡi datsveba tʰavisi ɡamonadenis dros mistʰvis itʰvleba satsolad roɡortsʰ misi tsidovanebis dros 
da qoveli vintsʰ ʃeexeba matʰ utsmiduri ikʰneba unda ɡairetsʰxos tʰavisi samoseli da daibanos tsqlitʰ da ikʰneba utsmiduri saɣamomde 
da rotsʰa is ɡasupʰtʰavdeba tʰavisi ɡamonadenisɡan aɣritsʰxos tʰavistʰvis ʃvidi dɣe da mere supʰtʰa ikʰneba 
da merve dɣes iɡi aiqvans tʰavistʰvis or ɡvrits an mtredis or martʰves da miuqvans mɣvdels sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan 
da ʃestsiravs mɣvdeli ertʰs tsʰodvis msxverplad da meores sruladdasatsvelad da ʃeundos mas upʰlis tsinaʃe misi ɡamonadenis utsmidurebis ɡamo 
da ɡaapʰrətʰxiletʰ israelis dzeni matʰi utsmidurebis ɡamo ratʰa ar daixotsʰon tʰaviantʰi utsmidurebitʰ ɡaautsmidureben ra tʃems motsmobis karavs romelitsʰ matʰ ʃorisaa 
esaa rdʒuli lortsomdinarisa da imisa visatsʰ daemartʰeba tʰesldena ratsʰ ɡaautsmidurebs mas 
da imisi vintsʰ itandʒeba tʰavisi tsidovanebitʰ da im mamakatsʰisa tʰu kʰalisa da kʰmrisa romelitsʰ datsveba utsmidurtʰan 
da elaparaka upʰali moses aaronis ori dzis sikvdilis ʃemdeɡ rotsʰa mieaxlnen upʰals da daixotsʰnen 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses utʰxari aarons ʃens dzmas nu ʃeva qovelʒams tsmidaʃi pʰardis miɣma tʰavsarkʰvelis tsin romelitsʰ kidobanzea ratʰa ar mokvdes radɡan ɡamovtʃndebi tʰavsarkʰvelze ɣrubelʃi 
amitʰ ʃeva aaroni tsmidaʃi nortʃi mozvritʰ tsʰodvis msxverplad da sruladdasatsveli verdzitʰ 
tsmida selis kvartʰi ʃeimosos da selis kʰveda samosi iqos mis sxeulze da sartqeli selisa ʃeirtqas da tʰavsaburavi selisa daixuros radɡan es tsmida ʃesamoselia da ɡanibanos man tʰavisi sxeuli tsqlitʰ da maʃin ʃeimosos isini 
da israelis dzetʰa tʰemisɡan aiqvanos ori vatsʰi tsʰodvis msxverplad da ertʰi verdzi sruladdasatsvelad 
da ʃestsiros aaronma mozveri tʰavisi tsʰodvis msxverplad da kʰmnas ʃendoba tʰavis tʰavze da tʰavis saxlze 
da aiqvanos ori vatsʰi da daaqenos isini upʰlis tsinaʃe sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan 
da qaros aaronma orive vatsʰze tsili ertʰi tsili upʰlisatʰvis meore tsili ɡantevebisatʰvis 
da ʃestsiravs aaroni vatsʰs romelsatsʰ xvda tsili upʰlisatʰvis da ʃestsiros iɡi tsʰodvis msxverplad 
da vatsʰi romelsatsʰ xvda tsili ɡantevebisa daaqenos tsʰotsʰxlad upʰlis tsinaʃe rom ʃeundos da ɡauʃvas ɡansateveblad udabnoʃi 
da ʃestsiros aaronma mozveri tʰavisi tsʰodvis msxverplad da kʰmnas ʃendoba tʰavis tʰavze da tʰavis saxlze da daklas tʰavisi mozveri tʰavisi tsʰodvis msxverplad 
da aiɣos nakvertsʰxlebitʰ savse satsʰetsʰxluri samsxverplodan romelitsʰ upʰlis tsinaʃea da savse peʃvi tsmida ketʰilsurnelovani sakmeveli da ʃeitanos pʰardis miɣma 
da dados sakmeveli tsʰetsʰxlze upʰlis tsinaʃe da dapʰaros sakmevlis ɣrubelma tʰavsarkʰveli romelitsʰ motsmobazea ratʰa ar mokvdes 
da aiɣos mozvris sisxli da moasxuros tʰitʰitʰ tʰavsarkʰvelis zedapirs aɣmosavletʰidan da tʰavsarkʰvelis tsin moasxuros sisxli ʃvidɡzis tʰitʰitʰ 
da daklas vatsʰi tsʰodvis msxverplisa romelitsʰ xalxistʰvisaa da ʃeitanos misi sisxli pʰardis miɣma da ɡaaketʰos misi sisxlitʰ iɡive ratsʰ ɡaaketʰa mozvris sisxlitʰ da moasxuros im tʰavsarkʰvelze da tʰavsarkʰvelis tsin 
kʰmnas ʃendoba tsmidaze israelis dzetʰa utsmidurebatʰa da matʰ danaʃaultʰaɡan qoveli matʰi tsʰodvisaɡan aseve moikʰtsʰes sakrebulo karvisatʰvis romelitsʰ mdebareobs matʰtʰan matʰ utsmidurebatʰa ʃoris 
artsʰ ertʰi adamiani ar iqos sakrebulo karavʃi rotsʰa is ʃedis ʃendobistʰvis tsmidaʃi mis ɡamosvlamde da ʃeundobs tʰavis tʰavs da tʰavis saxls da israelis mtʰel krebuls 
da ɡava samsxverplosaken romelitsʰ upʰlis tsinaʃea da ʃeundobs mas da aiɣebs mozvrisa da vatsʰis sisxls da stsʰxebs samsxverplos rkʰebs irɡvliv 
da moasxurebs mas sisxls tʰavisi tʰitʰitʰ ʃvidɡzis da ɡaasupʰtʰavebs da ɡantsmeds mas israelis dzetʰa utsmidurebisɡan 
da rotsʰa daasrulebs tsmidis sakrebulo karvisa da samsxverplos ʃendobas maʃin miiqvans iɡi tsʰotsʰxal vatsʰs 
da daadebs aaroni tʰavis orive xels tsʰotsʰxal vatsʰs tʰavze da aɣiarebs masze israeliantʰa qovel ukanonobas da matʰ qovel danaʃauls da matʰ qovel tsʰodvas da dadebs matʰ tsʰotsʰxali vatsʰis tʰavze da tsarɡzavnis saɡanɡebo katsʰitʰ udabnoʃi 
rotsʰa tsaiɣebs vatsʰi tʰavisi tʰavitʰ udabur kʰveqanaʃi qvela matʰ tsʰodvas da ɡauʃvebs vatsʰs udabnoʃi 
ʃeva aaroni sakrebulo karavʃi da ɡaixdis selis ʃesamosels romelitsʰ ʃeimosa tsmidaʃi tʰavisi ʃesvlisas da datovebs mas ikʰ 
da ɡanibans sxeuls tsqlitʰ tsmida adɡilze da ʃeimosavs tʰavis ʃesamosels da ɡamova da ʃestsiravs sruladdasatsvels tʰavistʰvis da sruladdasatsvels xalxistʰvis da ʃeundobs tʰavis tʰavs da xalxs 
da tsʰodvis ʃesatsiravis kʰons iɡi daakmevs samsxverploze 
vatsʰis ɡansateveblad ɡamʃvebi ɡairetsʰxavs ʃesamosels da ɡanibans sxeuls tsqlitʰ da ʃemdeɡ ʃeva banakʃi 
mozveri da vatsʰi tsʰodvis msxverplisa romeltʰa sisxli ʃetanil ikʰna tsmidaʃi ʃesandobad ɡaitanon banakis ɡaretʰ da datsvan matʰi tqavi da matʰi xortsʰi da matʰi skore tsʰetsʰxlze 
da matʰma damtsvelma unda ɡairetsʰxos ʃesamoseli da ɡanibanos sxeuli tsqlitʰ da ʃemdeɡ ʃevides banakʃi 
iqos es tʰkʰventʰvis saukuno tsesad meʃvide tʰves tʰvis meatʰe dɣes daimdabletʰ marxvitʰ sulni tʰkʰvenni da aravitʰari sakʰme ar ɡaaketʰotʰ artsʰ mkvidrma da artsʰ tʰkʰvens ʃoris mtsʰxovrebma xizanma 
radɡan am dɣes ʃeɡindobtʰ mɣvdeli ratʰa ʃeɡindotʰ qoveli tʰkʰveni tsʰodva upʰlis tsinaʃe ʃesandobad 
es ʃabatʰi dasvenebisaa tʰkʰventʰvis daimdabletʰ marxvitʰ sulni tʰkʰvenni es saukuno tsesia 
da ʃeundobs mɣvdeli romelsatsʰ stsʰxeben da romelsatsʰ xels auvseben rom ʃeasrulos mɣvdloba tʰavisi mamis maɡier da ʃeimosavs iɡi selis ʃesamosels tsmida ʃesamosels 
da ʃeundobs tsmida sakurtʰxevels da sakrebulo karavs da ʃeundobs samsxverplosatsʰ da ʃeundobs mɣvdlebs da sazoɡadoebis mtʰel xalxs 
iqos es tʰkʰventʰvis saukuno tsesad israelis dzetʰa qvela tsʰodvis ʃesandobad tselitsadʃi ertʰxel da ɡaaketʰa ise roɡortsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma moses 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
elaparake aarons da mis dzetʰ da qvela israelis dzes da utʰxari matʰ es aris sitqva romelitsʰ brdzana upʰalma 
tʰu vinme israelis saxlidan daklavs xbos an kravs an tʰxas banakʃi an tʰu vinme daklavs banakis ɡaretʰ 
da sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan ar miiqvans upʰlisatʰvis ʃesatsiravad upʰlis savanis tsin maʃin sisxlisɣvrad ʃeeratsʰxos es im adamians sisxli daɣvara man da moispoba is adamiani tʰavisi xalxis ɡaremodan 
ratʰa miitanon israelis dzetʰ tʰaviantʰi ʃesatsiravni romeltʰatsʰ isini klaven da miartʰvan isini upʰals sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan mɣvdels da daklan samʃvidobo msxverplad upʰlisatʰvis 
da moapkurebs mɣvdeli sisxls upʰlis samsxverploze sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan da daakmevs kʰons ketʰilsurnelebad upʰlisatʰvis 
ratʰa ar ʃestsiron kvlav tʰaviantʰ ʃesatsiravtʰaɡan kerpebs romeltʰa kvalzetsʰ isini mruʃoben saukuno tsesad iqos es matʰtʰvis matʰ tʰaobebʃi 
da matʰ utʰxari tʰu vinme israelis saxlidan da xizantʰaɡan romelnitsʰ xiznoben matʰ ʃoris aɣavlens sruladdasatsvels an msxverpls 
da sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan ar miitans mas ratʰa ʃestsiros iɡi upʰals maʃin moispoba is katsʰi tʰavisi xalxidan 
da tʰu vinmem israelis saxlidan da xizantʰaɡan romelnitsʰ xiznoben matʰ ʃoris camos raime sisxli maʃin mivakʰtsʰev tʃems saxes im sulze romelitsʰ cams sisxls da movspob mas tʰavisi xalxis ɡaremodan 
radɡan xortsʰielis sitsʰotsʰxle sisxlʃia da me samsxverplosatʰvis moɡetsʰitʰ tʰkʰveni sitsʰotsʰxlis ʃendobisatʰvis radɡan sisxlia suls rom ɡantsmeds 
amitom vutʰxari me israelis dzetʰ artsʰ ertʰi tʰkʰventʰaɡani ar unda camdes sisxls da aseve xizanitsʰ romelitsʰ xiznobs tʰkʰvens ʃoris ar unda camdes sisxls 
da tʰu vinmem israelis dzetʰaɡan da xizantʰaɡan romelitsʰ xiznobs tʰkʰvens ʃoris moinadiros tsʰxoveli an pʰrinveli romelitsʰ icmeva unda dastʰxios sisxli da dapʰaros iɡi mtvritʰ 
radɡan sitsʰotsʰxle qoveli xortsʰielisa misi sisxlia mis sulʃia iɡi vutʰxari israelianebs ara xortsʰielis sisxli ar camotʰ radɡan qoveli xortsʰielis suli misi sisxlia qoveli misi mcameli moispoba 
da qovelma romelitsʰ ʃecams mdzorsa da namxetsʰavs mkvidrma an xizanma unda ɡairetsʰxos samoseli da ɡanibanos tsqlitʰ da saɣamomde utsmiduri ikʰneba da mere ɡanitsmideba 
da tʰu ar ɡairetsʰxavs da ar daibans sxeuls maʃin atarebs tʰavis tsʰodvas 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
elaparake israelis dzetʰ da utʰxari matʰ me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni 
ar moikʰtsʰetʰ msɡavsad eɡviptis kʰveqnis mtsʰxovrebtʰa sadatsʰ tsʰxovrobditʰ tʰkʰven da msɡavsad kʰanaanis kʰveqnis tʃveulebatʰa sadatsʰ me miɡiqvantʰ tʰkʰven da matʰi tsesebitʰ ar itsʰxovrotʰ 
ʃeasruletʰ tʃemi samartʰalni da daitsʰavitʰ tʃemi tsesebi itsʰxovretʰ matʰitʰ me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni 
da daitsʰavitʰ tʃemi tsesebi da tʃemi samartʰalni romeltʰa aɣsrulebitʰ itsʰotsʰxlebs katsʰi me var upʰali 
aravin tʰavis xortsʰitʰ natʰesavs ar miuaxlovdes siʃiʃvlis ɡamosatʃenad me var upʰali 
siʃiʃvle mamaʃenisa da siʃiʃvle dedaʃenisa ar ɡamoatʃino iɡi dedaa ʃeni ar axado misi siʃiʃvle 
siʃiʃvle mamaʃenis tsʰolisa ar ɡamoatʃino mamaʃenis siʃiʃvlea iɡi 
siʃiʃvle ʃeni disa mamaʃenis asulisa an dedaʃenis asulisa saxlʃi ʃobilisa an ɡaretʰ ʃobilisa ar axado matʰi siʃiʃvle 
siʃiʃvle ʃeni dzis asulisa an ʃeni asulis asulisa ar axado matʰi siʃiʃvle radɡan ʃeni siʃiʃvlea isini 
siʃiʃvle mamaʃenis tsʰolis asulisa mamaʃenisɡan ʃobilisa ʃeni da aris iɡi ar axado misi siʃiʃvle 
siʃiʃvle mamaʃenis disa ar axado mamaʃenis xortsʰia iɡi 
siʃiʃvle dedaʃenis disa ar axado radɡan dedaʃenis xortsʰia iɡi 
siʃiʃvle mamaʃenis dzmisa ar axado mis tsʰols ar miuaxlovde ʃeni dzaluaa iɡi 
siʃiʃvle ʃeni rədzlisa ar axado ʃeni dzis tsʰolia iɡi 
siʃiʃvle ʃeni dzmis tsʰolisa ar axado ʃeni dzmis siʃiʃvlea iɡi 
siʃiʃvle ʃeni tsʰolis asulisa ar axado misi dzis asuli da misi asulis asuli ar itʰxovo siʃiʃvlis asaxdelad ertʰi xortsʰisani arian isini es ɡarqvnileba ikʰneba 
tsʰolis das nu itʰxov metokʰed misi siʃiʃvlis asaxdelad tsʰolis sitsʰotsʰxleʃi 
kʰals usupʰtʰaobis ʒams nu miuaxlovdebi misi siʃiʃvlis asaxdelad 
ʃeni moqvasis tsʰoltʰan ar datsve tʰeslis dasaɣvrelad radɡan ɡautsmidurdebi misitʰ 
ʃens ʃtʰamomavaltʰaɡan ar mistsʰe tsʰetsʰxlʃi ɡasatareblad molextʰan da nu ʃebɣalav ʃeni ɣmertʰis saxels me var upʰali 
mamakatsʰtʰan ar datsve roɡortsʰ tsvebian kʰaltʰan es sadzaɡlobaa 
da aravitʰar pirutqvtʰan ar datsve radɡan ɡautsmidurdebi misitʰ kʰali ar dadɡes pirutqvis tsin mastʰan ʃesauɣleblad es sazizɣrobaa 
nu ɡautsmidurdebitʰ qovelive amitʰ radɡan amitʰ iqvnen ɡautsmidurebulni xalxebi romeltʰatsʰ tʰkʰvenɡan vdevni me 
da ɡautsmidurda kʰveqana da davsadʒe iɡi tʰavisi tsʰodvisatʰvis da amoantʰxia kʰveqanam tʰavisi mtsʰxovrebni 
da tʰkʰven daitsʰavitʰ tʃemi tsesebi da tʃemi samartʰalni da nu ɡaaketʰebs nurapʰers qovel am sadzaɡlobidan mkvidri da xizani romelitsʰ xiznobs tʰkʰvens ʃoris 
radɡan qoveli es sadzaɡloba tʃaidina am kʰveqnis xalxma romelitsʰ tʰkʰvenze tsin iqo da ʃeibiltsa kʰveqana 
da rom ar amoɡantʰxiotʰ kʰveqanam tʰu mas ɡaautsmidurebtʰ roɡortsʰ amoantʰxia man xalxi romelitsʰ tʰkʰvenamde iqo 
radɡan qoveli vintsʰ tʃaidens rames am sisadzaɡletʰaɡan sitsʰotsʰxle amis tʃamdentʰa moispoba matʰi xalxis ɡaremodan 
daitsʰavitʰ tʃemi brdzanebani nu moikʰtsʰevitʰ am sadzaɡeli tsesebis mixedvitʰ romlebitsʰ tʰkʰvenamde sruldeboda rom ar ɡautsmidurdetʰ matʰitʰ me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
elaparake israelis dzetʰa mtʰel tʰems da utʰxari matʰ tsmida iqavitʰ radɡan tsmida var me upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni 
tʰitʰoeuls eʃinodes tʰavisi dedisa da tʰavisi mamisa da tʃemi ʃabatʰebi daitsʰavitʰ me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni 
nu mimartʰavtʰ kerpebs da tʃamosxmul ɣmertʰebs nu ɡaiketʰebtʰ tʰkʰventʰvis me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni 
da rotsʰa ʃestsiravtʰ samʃvidobo msxverpls upʰals ise ʃestsiretʰ rom tsqaloba miiɣotʰ 
tʰkʰveni msxverplʃetsirvis dɣes da meore dɣes ʃeicamos iɡi xolo nartʃeni mesame dɣemde tsʰetsʰxlʃi daitsvas 
da tʰu ʃeicmeba mesame dɣes sadzaɡloba ikʰneba da ar miiɣeba 
misi mcameli tʰavis brals daidebs radɡan upʰlis sitsmide ʃebɣala da unda moikvetʰos is katsʰi tʰavisi xalxidan 
da rotsʰa momkitʰ samkals tʰkʰveni mitsisa ar moasrulo samkali tʰkʰveni qanis kidemde da mkis dros tʃabneuls nu akrepʰtʰ 
da tʰkʰvens venaxs nu moimtsʰvrevtʰ da venaxʃi dartʃenil martsʰvlebs nu akrepʰtʰ ɣaribisa da xiznisatʰvis datovetʰ isini me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni 
ar moiparotʰ ar itsʰruotʰ da ar moatquotʰ ertʰimeore 
ar daipʰitsʰotʰ tʃemi saxeli tquilze da ar ʃebɣalotʰ saxeli tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰisa me var upʰali 
ar avno ʃens moqvass da artsʰ ara mostatsʰo da ar ɡaatʰevino ɣame ʃentʰan modʒamaɡiris ʃromis ɡasamrdʒelos ɡantʰiadamde 
ar dastsqevlo qru da brmis tsinaʃe ar dado dabrkoleba aramed ɡeʃinodes ʃeni ɣmertʰisa me var upʰali 
ara kʰmna usamartʰloba sasamartʰloʃi ar iqo pirmotʰne ɡlaxakis mimartʰ da ar miepirpʰero dzliers simartʰlitʰ ɡansadʒe ʃeni moqvasi 
ar ɡaavrtsʰelo cori ʃens xalxʃi ar aɣudɡe ʃeni moqvasis sisxls me var upʰali 
ar ɡdzuldes ʃeni dzma ʃens ɡulʃi mxilebitʰ amxile moqvasi ʃeni da ar daɡekisreba tsʰodva mis ɡamo 
ar idzio ʃuri da ar iɣvardzlo ʃeni xalxis dzetʰa mimartʰ da ʃeiqvare moqvasi ʃeni roɡortsʰ tʰavi ʃeni 
tʃemi tsesebi daitsʰavitʰ sakʰoneli ʃeni ar ʃeauɣlo sxva ɡvars da ʃens mindorze ar datʰeso ori sxvadasxva dʒiʃis tʰesli da ar tʃaitsʰva selis da matqlis ʃereuli dzapʰitʰ nakʰsovi samoseli 
tʰu vinme datsves kʰaltʰan tʰeslisdenistʰvis da iqos iɡi mxevali katsʰis daniʃnuli maɡram ar iqos ɡamosqiduli an tʰavisupʰleba ar hkʰondes minicebuli maʃin sasdʒeli unda daedos maɡram ara sikvdili radɡan iɡi araa tʰavisupʰali 
da miitanos man tʰavisi danaʃaulis msxverpli upʰlisatʰvis sakrebulo karvis ʃesasvleltʰan verdzi danaʃaulis msxverplad 
da ʃeundobs mas mɣvdeli danaʃauls verdzitʰ upʰlis tsinaʃe misi tsʰodvisatʰvis romlitʰatsʰ ʃestsʰoda 
da rotsʰa ʃexvaltʰ kʰveqanaʃi da darɡavtʰ romelime msxmoiare xes miitʃnietʰ misi naqopʰi tsinadautsʰvetʰlad sami tseli unda iqos tʰkʰventʰvis tsinadautsʰvetʰlad ar unda icamos 
meotʰxe tsels iqos qoveli misi naqopʰi nakurtʰxi upʰlis sadideblad 
mexutʰe tsels cametʰ tʰkʰven misi naqopʰi ratʰa ʃeidzinotʰ misi mosavali me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni 
ar camotʰ sisxlianad ar imartʃielotʰ da ar idʒadokʰrotʰ 
ar ʃeikricotʰ tʰmis kide tʰavis irɡvliv da ar tsaaxdino kide ʃeni tsverisa 
ar daikatsrotʰ mkvdristʰvis tʰkʰveni sxeuli da nu ɡaiketʰebtʰ tsartserebs tʃxvletitʰ me var upʰali 
nu tsabiltsav ʃens asuls roskipobitʰ ratʰa ar ɡairqvnas kʰveqana da ar aɣivsos mruʃobitʰ 
tʃemi ʃabatʰebi daitsʰavitʰ da tʃemi sakurtʰxevlis ɡeʃinodetʰ me var upʰali 
nu mimartʰavtʰ mesultʰaneebs da dʒadosnebs nu tsʰdilobtʰ ɡautsmidurebas matʰitʰ me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni 
caɣaris tsinaʃe tsamodekʰi da pativi etsʰi moxutsʰebulis saxes da ɡeʃinodes ʃeni ɣmertʰisa me var upʰali 
rotsʰa ʃemoɡexiznebatʰ xizani tʰkʰvens kʰveqanaʃi ar ʃeavitsrovotʰ iɡi 
roɡortsʰ mkvidri tʰkʰvens ʃoris ise iqos tʰkʰventʰan xizani da ɡiqvardetʰ iɡi roɡortsʰ tʰkʰveni tʰavi radɡan xiznebi iqavitʰ tʰkʰventsʰ eɡviptis kʰveqanaʃi me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni 
ara kʰmnatʰ usamartʰloba samartʰalʃi zoma tsonaʃi da satsqaoʃi 
stsori sastsori stsori satsoni stsori epʰa da stsori hini ɡkʰondetʰ tʰkʰven me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni romelmatsʰ ɡamoɡiqvanetʰ eɡviptis kʰveqnidan 
daitsʰavitʰ qoveli tʃemi tsesi da qoveli tʃemi samartʰali me var upʰali 
da elaparaka upʰali moses 
utʰxari israelis dzetʰ qoveli katsʰi israelis dzetʰaɡan da israelʃi ʃexiznul xizantʰaɡan romelitsʰ mistsʰems tʰavis ʃvilebs molexs sikvdilitʰ mokvdeba kʰveqnis xalxma kʰvitʰ tʃakʰolos iɡi 
da me mivapqrob tʃems saxes im katsʰs da movspob mas misi xalxis ɡaremodan radɡan man mistsʰa tʰavisi tʰeslidan molexs ratʰa ɡaeutsmidurebina tʃemi satsmidari da tsaebiltsa tʃemi tsmida saxeli 
da tʰu xalxi kʰveqnisa aaridebs tʰvals im katsʰs rotsʰa iɡi adzlevs tʰavisi tʰeslidan molexs da ar moklaven mas 
me mivapqrob tʃems saxes im katsʰs da mis modɡmas da movspob mas da qvelas vintsʰ mruʃobs mis kvaldakval samruʃod rom dadian molexis kvaldakval matʰi xalxis ɡaremodan 
da mas romelitsʰ mimartʰavs mesultʰaneebs da dʒadosnebs matʰ kvaldakval samruʃod me mivapqrob tʃems saxes da movspob misi xalxis ɡaremodan 
ɡanitsmidenitʰ da iqavitʰ tsmida radɡan me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni 
da daitsʰavitʰ tʃemi tsesebi da aɣasruletʰ isini rametʰu me var upʰali ɡanmtsmedeli tʰkʰveni 
tʰu vinmem dastsqevlos tʰavisi mama da tʰavisi deda sikvdilitʰ mokvdes mamamisi da dedamisi datsqevla man maszea misi sisxli 
vintsʰ imruʃebs kʰmrian kʰaltʰan vintsʰ imruʃebs tʰavisi moqvasis tsʰoltʰan sikvdilitʰ unda mokvdnen mruʃi mamakatsʰitsʰ da mruʃi dedakatsʰitsʰ 
vintsʰ datsveba tʰavisi mamis tsʰoltʰan tʰavisi mamis siʃiʃvle axada man sikvdilitʰ unda mokvdnen oriveni matʰi sisxli matʰzea 
vintsʰ datsveba tʰavis rdzaltʰan sikvdilitʰ unda mokvdnen oriveni ratsʰ matʰ kʰnes sisadzaɡlea matʰzea matʰi sisxli 
vintsʰ datsveba mamakatsʰtʰan roɡortsʰ tsvebian kʰaltʰan sisadzaɡle kʰnes ortʰavem sikvdilitʰ unda mokvdnen isini matʰi sisxli matʰzea 
tʰu vinmem ʃeirtʰos tsʰolad deda ʃvili es urdʒuloebaa tsʰetsʰxlʃi datsvitʰ iɡi matʰtʰan ertʰad ratʰa ar iqos urdʒuloeba tʰkʰvens ʃoris 
vintsʰ daetsʰema pirutqvtʰan sikvdilitʰ mokvdes da is pirutqvitsʰ mohkalitʰ 
kʰali rom mivides romelime pirutqvtʰan ratʰa daetsʰes mastʰan mokalitʰ kʰalitsʰ da pirutqvitsʰ sikvdilitʰ mokvdnen isini matʰzea matʰi sisxli 
vinmem rom ʃeirtʰos tʰavisi da asuli tʰavisi mamisa an asuli tʰavisi dedisa da dainaxos misi siʃiʃvle da kʰalmatsʰ naxos misi siʃiʃvle sibiltsea es da moispon isini tʰaviantʰi xalxis dzetʰa tʰvaltsin siʃiʃvle tʰavisi disa axada man tʰavis tsʰodvas itvirtʰavs iɡi 
vintsʰ datsveba tsʰoltʰan misi tʰviuris dros da axdis mis siʃiʃvles raki man ɡaaʃiʃvla misi tsqaro xolo kʰalma ɡamoatʃina tʰavisi sisxlis tsqaro moispon orive tʰaviantʰi xalxis ɡaremodan 
siʃiʃvle dedis an mamis disa aravin axados radɡan tʰavis xortsʰs aʃiʃvlebs tʰaviantʰ tsʰodvas itvirtʰaven isini 
vintsʰ datsveba tʰavisi bidzis tsʰoltʰan man tʰavisi bidzis siʃiʃvle axada tʰaviantʰ tsʰodvas itvirtʰaven uʃviloni daixotsʰebian 
vinmem rom ʃeirtʰos tʰavisi dzmis tsʰoli es ʃebiltsvaa siʃiʃvle tʰavisi dzmisa axada man uʃviloni ikʰnebian 
daitsʰavitʰ qoveli tʃemi tsesi da qoveli tʃemi samartʰali da aɣasruletʰ isini da ar amoɡantʰxevtʰ tʰkʰven kʰveqana sadatsʰ me miɡiqvantʰ satsʰxovreblad 
ar moikʰtsʰetʰ im xalxis tsesebisamebr romelsatsʰ me vdevni tʰkʰvenɡan radɡan qovelive es ɡaaketʰes matʰ da mdzaɡs isini 
ɡitʰxaritʰ tʰkʰven daimkvidrebtʰ matʰ mitsas da me moɡtsʰemtʰ mas tʰkʰven samkvidrod kʰveqanas sadatsʰ moedineba rdze da tʰapʰli me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni romelmatsʰ ɡamoɡartʃie tʰkʰven xalxtʰaɡan 
ɡanasxvavetʰ tsmida da utsmiduri pirutqvi da utsmiduri da tsmida pʰrinveli da ar ʃebiltsotʰ tʰkʰveni sulebi pirutqvitʰ da pʰrinvelitʰ da imitʰ ratsʰ kʰvemdzromobs dedamitsaze romelitsʰ me ɡamovatsʰalkeve roɡortsʰ utsmiduri 
iqavitʰ tʃemtʰvis tsmidebi radɡan tsmida var me upʰali da me ɡamoɡatsʰalkevetʰ xalxtʰaɡan ratʰa tʃemi iqotʰ 
mamakatsʰi an dedakatsʰi tʰu aɣmotʃndes mesultʰane an dʒadokʰari sikvdilitʰ mokvdes kʰvebitʰ tʃaikʰolon isini da matʰze ikʰneba matʰi sisxli 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses ɡanutsʰxade mɣvdlebs aaronis dzetʰ da utʰxari matʰ artsʰ ertʰi matʰɡani ar ɡautsmidurdes mkvdartʰan ʃexebitʰ tʰavis xalxʃi 
mxolod tʰavisi xortsʰieli natʰesavis ɡamo tʰavisi dedis da tʰavisi mamis tʰavisi vaʒis da tʰavisi asulis da tʰavisi dzmis 
da tʰavisi dis tʰavisi axlobeli kʰaltsulisa romelitsʰ ar iqo ɡatʰxovili ʃeudzlia ʃexeba ar ɡautsmidureba 
nu ɡaiutsmidurebs tʰavs katsʰi tʰavis xalxʃi ratʰa ar tsaibiltsos iɡi 
ar ɡadaiparson tʰavi da tsveris kideebi ar ʃeicran da sxeulze ar ɡaiketʰon nacdevi 
tsmidebi unda iqvnen isini tʰaviantʰi ɣmertʰisatʰvis da ar ʃebɣalon saxeli tʰaviantʰi ɣmertʰisa radɡan upʰlis satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravs tʰaviantʰi ɣmertʰis pursa stsiraven isini da amitom unda iqvnen isini tsmidebi 
kʰali medzavi da tsabiltsuli ar ʃeirtʰon matʰ aseve kʰali ɡankʰortsinebuli tʰavisi kʰmrisaɡan ar ʃeirtʰon matʰ radɡan tsmidebi arian tʰavisi ɣmertʰisatʰvis 
ʃen akurtʰxe is radɡan ʃens ɣmertʰs stsiravs iɡi purs tsmida iqos is ʃentʰvis radɡan tsmida var me upʰali tʰkʰveni ɡamtsmedeli 
tʰu mɣvdlis asuli tsaibiltsavs tʰavs mruʃobitʰ tʰavisi mamis tsambiltsvelia tsʰetsʰxlʃi daitsvas iɡi 
mtʰavari mɣvdeli tʰavis dzmatʰaɡan romlis tʰavze dasxmul ikʰna satsʰxebeli zetʰi da romelsatsʰ auvses xeli rom ʃeimosos tsmida ʃesamoslitʰ tʰavs nu ɡaiʃiʃvlebs samosels nu daixevs 
mkvdartʰan aravistʰan ar unda ʃevides iɡi tʰavisi mamisa da tʰavisi dedis ɡvamitʰatsʰ ki ar tsaibiltsos tʰavi 
satsmidars ar unda motsʰildes ratʰa ar tsabiltsos satsmidari tʰavisi ɣmertʰisa radɡan misi ɣmertʰis satsʰxebeli zetʰis ɡvirɡvinia masze me var upʰali 
tsʰolad kʰaltsuli ʃeirtʰos 
kʰvrivi an kʰmarɡaqrili an tsabiltsuli medzavi ar ʃeirtʰos mxolod kʰaltsuli ʃeirtʰos tsʰolad tʰavisi xalxidan 
ar tsabiltsos tʰavisi tʰesli tʰavis xalxʃi radɡan me var upʰali misi ɡanmtsmedeli 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
ase utʰxari aarons aravin ʃeni tʰeslidan tʰaviantʰ tʰaobebʃi romelsatsʰ ekʰneba xindʒi sxeulze ar mivides tʰavisi ɣmertʰistʰvis puris ʃesatsirad 
aravin visatsʰ xindʒi akʰvs tanze ar mivides artsʰ brma artsʰ kocli an maxindʒi 
an katsʰi romelsatsʰ pʰexi akʰvs motexili an xeli akʰvs motexili 
an kuziania an kʰondriskatsʰia an romelsatsʰ libri akʰvs tʰvalze an kʰetsʰi an dazianebuli akʰvs kvertsʰxebi 
qoveli katsʰi romelsatsʰ xindʒi akʰvs aaron mɣvdlis tʰeslidan ar mieaxlos upʰlis satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravtʰa ʃesatsirad xindʒiania is ar mieaxlos tʰavisi ɣmertʰistʰvis puris ʃesatsirad 
puri tʰavisi ɣmertʰisa qovlad tsmidisaɡan da tsmidisaɡan ʃeudzlia camos 
maɡram pʰardastʰan ar mivides da samsxverplos ar mieaxlos radɡan xindʒi akʰvs ar tsabiltsos tʃemi sakurtʰxeveli radɡan me var upʰali matʰi ɡanmtsmedeli 
da es ɡamoutsʰxada mosem aarons da mis dzetʰ da qvela israelis dzes 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
utʰxari aaronsa da mis dzetʰ rom ekrdzalnen israelis dzetʰa sitsmideebs da ar tsabiltson tʃemi tsmida saxeli isini arian tʃemi ʃemomtsirvelni me var upʰali 
utʰxari matʰ tʰkʰvens tʰaobebʃi tʰu vinme tʰkʰveni tʰeslidan mieaxlos sitsmideebs romlebsatsʰ stsiraven israelis dzeni upʰals da masze utsmidurebaa mospobil ikʰneba is suli tʃems tsinaʃe me var upʰali 
artsʰ ertʰi katsʰi aaronis tʰeslidan tʰu is ketʰrovania an akʰvs ɡamonadeni ar unda camdes sitsmidetʰaɡan sanam ar ɡasupʰtʰavdeba da vintsʰ ʃeexeba mkvdrisɡan ɡautsmidurebuls an visatsʰ daemartʰeba tʰesldena 
an vintsʰ ʃeexeba romelime kʰvemdzroms romlisɡanatsʰ ɡautsmidurdeba an katsʰs romelitsʰ ɡaautsmidurebs mas tʰavisi romelime utsmidurebitʰ 
vintsʰ ki ʃeexeba mas utsmiduri ikʰneba saɣamomde da ar ʃeidzleba camdes sitsmidetʰaɡan sanam ar ɡanibans sxeuls tsqlitʰ 
da rotsʰa tʃava mze da ɡasupʰtʰavdeba ʃeudzlia camos sitsmidetʰaɡan radɡan es misi sakvebia 
mdzori da namxetsʰavi ar camos ratʰa ar tsaibiltsos me var upʰali 
da daimarxon tʃemi samarxo ratʰa ar ataron tsʰodva da ar daixotsʰnen masʃi rotsʰa tsabiltsaven mas me var upʰali matʰi ɡanmtsmedeli 
da artsʰ ertʰma utsʰxom ar camos tsmida artsʰ mɣvdlis xizanma da modʒamaɡirem ar camos tsmida 
tʰu mɣvdeli ʃeidzens monas tʰavisi vertsʰxlitʰ maʃin mas ʃeudzlia camos misɡan aɡretʰve mis saxlʃi dabadebultʰ ʃeudzliatʰ camon misi puri 
da tʰu misi asuli utsʰxo mamakatsʰs ɡahqva tsʰolad kʰalma ar unda camos sitsmidetʰaɡan 
da tʰu mɣvdlis asuli iqos kʰvrivi an kʰmarɡaʃvebuli da ʃvili hqavdes mas da daubrundes iɡi tʰavis mamis saxls roɡortsʰ tʰavis siqmatsvileʃi ise camos puri tʰavisi mamisa utsʰxos ar ʃeudzlia camos iɡi 
tʰu vinmem camos tsmida ʃetsʰdomitʰ daurtʰos misi mexutʰe tsili mas da mistsʰes mɣvdels tsmidastʰan ertʰad 
ar tsabiltson israelis dzetʰ sitsmideni romlebsatsʰ isini aɣumartʰaven upʰals 
da ar daidon brali danaʃaulze tʰu ʃecamen matʰ sitsmideebs radɡan me var upʰali matʰi ɡamtsmedeli 
da elaparaka upʰali moses 
elaparake aarons da mis dzetʰ da qvela israelis dzes da utʰxari matʰ tʰu vinmem israelis saxlidan da israelʃi xizantʰaɡan ʃestsiros msxverpli tʰavisi romelime aɣtʰkʰmisatʰvis an ama tʰu im ɡulmodɡinebisatʰvis romelsatsʰ stsiraven upʰals sruladdasatsvelad 
imisatʰvis rom tsqaloba moipovotʰ unda iqos umanko mamali msxvilpʰexa sakʰonlidan tsʰxvartʰaɡan an tʰxatʰaɡan 
qoveli romelsatsʰ akʰvs xindʒi ar ʃestsirotʰ radɡan amitʰ tʰkʰven ver moipovebtʰ tsqalobas 
tʰu vinme ʃestsiravs upʰals samʃvidobo msxverpls aɣtʰkʰmis aɣsasruleblad an dzɣvnisatʰvis msxvilpʰexa an tsvrilpʰexa sakʰonlidan maʃin ʃesatsiravi unda iqos umanko ratʰa satʰno iqos iɡi aravitʰari nakli ar hkʰondes mas 
brma an dasaxitʃrebuli an daserili an dakoʒrebuli an kʰetsʰiani ar ʃestsirotʰ upʰals da satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravad ar mistsʰetʰ isini samsxverploze upʰlisatʰvis 
mozveri an kravi romelsatsʰ metismetad ɡrdzeli an mokle asoebi akʰvs ʃeɡidzliatʰ dzɣvnad ʃestsirotʰ xolo aɣtʰkʰmisatʰvis ar ikʰneba satʰno 
da pirutqvi romelsatsʰ akʰvs ɡacqletili ɡasresili moɡledʒili an tʃamoɡledʒili asoebi ar ʃestsirotʰ upʰals tʰkʰvens kʰveqanaʃi ar ɡaaketʰotʰ es 
utsʰxoelis xelidan ar ʃestsirotʰ puri tʰkʰvens ɣmertʰs am qoveltʰaɡan radɡan naklia matʰʃi ar ikʰnebian miɣebulni isini tʰkʰventʰvis tsqalobitʰ 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
xbo kravi an tʰikani rom daibados ʃvidi dɣe iqos dedastʰan merve dɣidan da mere ki satʰnoa satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravad upʰlisatʰvis 
dzroxa an tsʰxvari ar daklatʰ ertʰ dɣes tʰavis naʃobtʰan ertʰad 
rom ʃestsiravtʰ samadlobelo msxverpls upʰals ʃestsiretʰ iɡi imɡvarad rom man ʃeɡdzinotʰ tʰkʰven tsqaloba 
imave dɣes ʃeicamos iɡi ar datovotʰ misɡan ɡantʰiadamde me var upʰali 
daitsʰavitʰ tʃemi mtsʰnebani da aɣasruletʰ isini me var upʰali 
ar tsabiltsotʰ tʃemi tsmida saxeli ratʰa me viqo israelis dzetʰa ʃoris tsmida me var upʰali tʰkʰveni ɡamtsmedeli 
tʰkʰveni ɡamomqvani eɡviptis kʰveqnidan ratʰa viqo tʰkʰventʰvis ɣmertʰad me var upʰali 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
elaparake israelis dzetʰ da utʰxari matʰ upʰlis dɣesastsaulebze romlebsatsʰ tʰkʰven unda utsodotʰ tsmida ʃekrebilebani esenia tʃemi dɣesastsaulebi 
ekʰvsi dɣe aketʰe sakʰme da meʃvide dɣes ʃabatʰia dasvenebisa tsmida ʃekrebilobaa aravitʰari sakʰme ar aketʰotʰ es ʃabatʰia upʰlisa qoveli tʰkʰvenɡanis sadɡomʃi 
esenia upʰlis dɣesastsaulni tsmida ʃekrebilobani romelnitsʰ unda moitsviotʰ matʰtʰvis daniʃnul dros 
pirvel tʰves tʰvis metʰotʰxmete dɣes dabindebisas pasekʰia upʰlisatʰvis 
da am tʰvis metʰxutʰmete dɣes upʰuarobis dɣesastsaulia upʰlisatʰvis ʃvidi dɣe camdetʰ upʰuars 
pirvel dɣes tsmida ʃekrebiloba iqos tʰkʰventʰvis aravitʰari sakʰme ar ɡaaketʰotʰ 
ʃetsiretʰ satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravi upʰals ʃvid dɣes meʃvide dɣes tsmida ʃekrebilobaa aravitʰari sakʰme ar ɡaaketʰotʰ 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
elaparake israelis dzetʰ da utʰxari matʰ rotsʰa mixvaltʰ im kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ me ɡadzlevtʰ tʰkʰven da momkitʰ mis samkals miartʰvitʰ pirveli dzna tʰkʰveni samkalisa mɣvdels 
da ʃearxevs iɡi dznas upʰlis tsinaʃe tʰkʰveni tsqalobisatʰvis 
da ʃestsiretʰ tʰkʰvens mier dznis ʃerxevis dɣes umanko ertʰtsliani kravi sruladdasatsvelad upʰlisatʰvis 
da mastʰan dzɣveni pureulisa epʰis ori meatʰedi natsili tsmida puris pʰkʰvilidan zetʰʃi ʃereuli satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravad upʰlisatʰvis ketʰilsurnelebad da misi saɣvreli hinis meotʰxedi ɣvino 
artsʰ puri artsʰ ɡamomʃrali martsʰvleuli da axali tʰavtʰavi ar camotʰ tʰvitʰ im dɣemde vidre ar ʃestsiravtʰ am msxverpls tʰkʰvens ɣmertʰs es aris saukuno tsesi tʰkʰvens tʰaobebʃi qovel tʰkʰvens sadɡomʃi 
ɡadaitʰvaletʰ dɣesastsaulis meore dɣidan tʰkʰvens mier ʃesarxeveli dznis ʃetsirvis dɣidan ʃvidi sruli kvira 
meʃvide kviris pirvel dɣemde ɡadaitʰvaletʰ ormotsʰdaatʰi dɣe da ʃestsiretʰ pureuli dzɣveni upʰals 
tʰkʰveni sadɡomebidan miitanetʰ ori puri ʃesarxevad tsmida puris pʰkʰvilis ori meatʰedi natsili epʰisa unda iqos da tsʰomovani sapʰuaritʰ ɡapʰuebuli ɡamotsʰxves roɡortsʰ pirvelnaqopʰi upʰlisatʰvis 
da ʃestsiretʰ puris ɡarda ʃvidi tselɡamovlili kravi umanko da ertʰi mozveri da ori verdzi ikʰnebian eseni sruladdasatsvelni upʰlisatʰvis da dzɣveni pureulisa da matʰi saɣvreli satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravad ketʰilsurnelebad upʰlisatʰvis 
da moamzadetʰ ertʰi tʰikani tsʰodvis msxverplad da ori ertʰtsliani kravi samʃvidobo msxverplad 
mɣvdelma unda ʃearxios upʰlis tsinaʃe es ori kravi pirvelnaqopʰtʰa purtʰan ertʰad upʰlisatʰvis dzɣvnad es tsmidaa upʰlisatʰvis mɣvdels ekutʰvnis 
da moitsvietʰ xalxi am dɣes tsmida ʃekrebiloba iqos tʰkʰventʰvis aravitʰari sakʰme ar ɡaaketʰotʰ es aris saukuno tsesi tʰkʰvens qovel sadɡomʃi tʰkʰvens tʰaobebʃi 
da rotsʰa momkitʰ samkals tʰkʰveni mitsisas ar moatʰaotʰ samkali tʰkʰveni qanisa kidemde da tʃabneuli tʰkʰveni namkalisa ar akripʰotʰ ɣaribs da xizans dautovetʰ me var upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
utʰxari israelis dzetʰ meʃvide tʰves tʰvis pirvel dɣes iqos tʰkʰventʰvis dasveneba ɡaxseneba bukis tsʰemisa tsmida ʃekrebiloba 
aravitʰari sakʰme ar ɡaaketʰotʰ da ʃestsiretʰ satsʰetsʰxlo msxverpli upʰals 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
meʃvide tʰvis meatʰe dɣes ʃendobis dɣes tsmida ʃekrebiloba iqos tʰkʰventʰvis daimdabletʰ suli marxvitʰ da ʃestsiretʰ satsʰetsʰxlo msxverpli upʰals 
da aravitʰari sakʰme ar ɡaaketʰotʰ tʰvis am dɣes radɡan ʃendobis dɣea tʰkʰvens ʃesandobad upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe 
xolo qoveli suli romelitsʰ ar daimdablebs tʰavs am dɣes moispoba tʰavisi xalxidan 
da qoveli suli romelitsʰ ɡaaketʰebs rame sakʰmes am dɣes ɡavanadɡureb am suls misi xalxis ɡaremodan 
aravitʰari sakʰme ar ɡaaketʰotʰ saukuno tsesia tʰkʰvens tʰaobebʃi tʰkʰvens qovel sadɡomʃi 
es aris dasvenebis ʃabatʰi tʰkʰventʰvis da daimdabletʰ tʰkʰveni suli tʰvis metsʰxre dɣes saɣamoze saɣamodan saɣamomde iʃabatʰetʰ tʰkʰveni ʃabatʰi 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
utʰxari israelis dzetʰ amave meʃvide tʰvis metʰxutʰmete dɣes karvobis dɣesastsaulia ʃvidi dɣea upʰlisatʰvis 
pirvel dɣes tsmida ʃekrebilobaa aravitʰari sakʰme ar ɡaaketʰotʰ 
ʃvidi dɣe ʃestsiretʰ satsʰetsʰxlo msxverpli upʰals merve dɣes tsmida ʃekrebiloba iqos tʰkʰventʰvis da ʃestsiretʰ satsʰetsʰxlo msxverpli upʰals dɣesastsaulis tsarɡzavnaa aravitʰari sakʰme ar ɡaaketʰotʰ am dɣes 
esenia upʰlis dɣesastsaulebi romlebsatsʰ tʰkʰven daniʃnavtʰ tsmida ʃekrebilobisatʰvis ratʰa msxverplad miartʰvatʰ upʰals sruladdasatsveli pureulis dzɣveni dasaklavi msxverplebi da saɣvreli tʰitʰoeulis tʰavis dɣes 
ɡarda upʰlis ʃabatʰebisa da ɡarda tʰkʰvens ʃemotsirulobatʰa ɡarda qoveli tʰkʰveni aɣtʰkʰmulisa da ɡarda tʰkʰvens dzɣventʰa romeltʰatsʰ tʰkʰven mistsʰemtʰ upʰals
