danis dzetʰa tomisatʰvis mtʰavari buki dze ioɡlisa 
iosebis dzetʰatʰvis menaʃeantʰa tomisatʰvis mtʰavari xanieli dze epʰodisa 
epʰremiantʰa tomisatʰvis mtʰavari kemueli dze ʃipʰtanisa 
zebulunis dzetʰa tomisatʰvis mtʰavari elitsʰapʰani dze pʰarnakʰisa 
isakʰaris dzetʰa tomisatʰvis mtʰavari pʰaltieli dze qazanisa 
aʃeris dzetʰa tomisatʰvis mtʰavari axihudi dze ʃelomisa 
napʰtʰalis dzetʰa tomisatʰvis mtʰavari pʰedaheli dze qamihudisa 
eseni arian isini romlebsatsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma israelis dzetʰa ɡanatsileba kʰanaanis kʰveqanaʃi 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses moabis velebze iordanestʰan ierixos pirdapir 
ubrdzane israelis dzetʰ rom mistsʰen levianebs tʰaviantʰi samkvidro sampʰlobelodan kʰalakʰebi satsʰxovreblad da aɡretʰve sadzovrebi kʰalakʰebis irɡvliv mietsʰitʰ levianebs 
da ikʰneba kʰalakʰebi matʰtʰvis satsʰxovreblad xolo matʰi sadzovrebi ikʰneba matʰi sakʰonlisatʰvis da matʰi kʰonebisatʰvis da qvela matʰi sartʃosatʰvis 
da kʰalakʰebis sadzovrebi romlebsatsʰ mistsʰemtʰ levianebs kʰalakʰis ɡare kedlidan atʰas tsqrtʰaze ɡadiodes irɡvliv 
da ɡazometʰ kʰalakʰɡaretʰ aɣmosavletʰ mxares oriatʰasi tsqrtʰa da samxretʰ mxares ori atʰasi tsqrtʰa da dasavletʰ mxares ori atʰasi tsqrtʰa da tʃrdiloetʰ mxares ori atʰasi tsqrtʰa xolo kʰalakʰi iqos ʃuaʃi es ikʰneba matʰtʰvis kʰalakʰtʰa sadzovrebi 
kʰalakʰidan romlebsatsʰ tʰkʰven mistsʰemtʰ levianebs ekʰvsi kʰalakʰi iqos tʰavʃesapʰrad romlebsatsʰ ɡamoqopʰtʰ mkvlelistʰvis ikʰ ɡasakʰtsʰevad da matʰ ɡarda mietsʰitʰ ormotsʰdaori kʰalakʰi 
qvela kʰalakʰi romelitsʰ tʰkʰven unda mistsʰetʰ levianebs ormotsʰdarva kʰalakʰia tʰavisi sadzovrebianad 
da kʰalakʰebs romlebsatsʰ mistsʰemtʰ israelis dzetʰa sampʰlobelodan mravalritsʰxovantʰaɡan aiɣetʰ meti xolo mtsʰireritsʰxovantʰaɡan naklebi qovelma tomma tʰavisi samkvidreblis mixedvitʰ unda mistsʰes levianebs tʰaviantʰi kʰalakʰebidan rasatsʰ daimkvidreben 
da utʰxra upʰalma moses 
ɡanutsʰxade israelis dzetʰ da utʰxari matʰ rotsʰa ɡadaxvaltʰ iordanes ɡadaɣma kʰanaanis kʰveqanaʃi 
maʃin daniʃnetʰ tʰkʰventʰvis kʰalakʰebi romlebitsʰ tʰavʃesapʰari kʰalakʰebi ikʰneba tʰkʰventʰvis da ɡaikʰtsʰeva ikʰ mkvleli romelsatsʰ uneblied ʃemoakvdeba katsʰi 
es kʰalakʰebi ikʰneba tʰkʰventʰvis tʰavʃesapʰrad ʃuris madzieblisaɡan rom ar mokvdes mkvleli vidre tsarsdɡebodes tʰemis tsinaʃe samsdʒavroze 
da kʰalakʰebidan romlebsatsʰ tʰkʰven mistsʰemtʰ ekʰvsi kʰalakʰi tʰavʃesapʰrad iqos tʰkʰventʰvis 
sami kʰalakʰi mietsʰitʰ iordanes ɡamoɣma mxares da sami kʰalakʰi mietsʰitʰ kʰanaanis kʰveqanaʃi tʰavʃesapʰar kʰalakʰebad ikʰneba isini 
israelis dzetʰatʰvis da xiznistʰvis da axal mosaxlisatʰvis matʰ ʃoris iqos es ekʰvsi kʰalakʰi tʰavʃesapʰrad ratʰa ɡaikʰtsʰes ikʰ qvela visatsʰ uneblied ʃemoakvdeba katsʰi 
xolo tʰu vinme rkinis iaraɣs daartqams vinmes da mokvdeba iɡi maʃin is mkvlelia sikvdilitʰ unda mokvdes mkvleli 
da tʰu vinme xelitʰ kʰvas daartqams vinmes romlitʰatsʰ ʃeidzleba mokvdes da iɡi mokvdeba maʃin is mkvlelia sikvdilitʰ unda mokvdes mkvleli 
an tʰu xis iaraɣs daartqams xelitʰ romlitʰatsʰ ʃeidzleba mokvdes da iɡi mokvdeba maʃin is mkvlelia sikvdilitʰ unda mokvdes mkvleli 
mesisxles tʰvitʰ ʃeudzlia moklas mkvleli rotsʰa ʃexvdeba mas tʰvitʰ ʃeudzlia misi mokvla 
da tʰu vinme sidzulvilitʰ xels hkravs vinmes an mas ɡanzrax stqortsʰnis da iɡi mokvdeba 
an tʰu mtrobitʰ daartqams xels da iɡi mokvdeba sikvdilitʰ unda mokvdes is romelmatsʰ daartqa mas radɡan mkvlelia iɡi mesisxles ʃeudzlia moklas es mkvleli rotsʰa ʃexvdeba mas 
maɡram tʰu utsʰabedad mtrobis ɡareʃe hkra xeli an esrola mas raime saɡani ɡanuzraxvelad 
an raime kʰva romlitʰatsʰ ʃeidzleba mokvdes daunaxavad moaxvedrebs mas da is mokvdeba da iɡi ar qopʰila misi mteri da artsʰ mistʰvis avi mousurvebia 
maʃin unda ɡansadʒos tʰemma mkvlelsa da mesisxles ʃoris am tsesis mixedvitʰ 
da unda ixsnas tʰemma mkvleli mesisxlis xelidan da unda daabrunos iɡi tʰemma mis tʰavʃesapʰar kʰalakʰʃi sadatsʰ ɡaikʰtsʰa ratʰa damkvidrdes ikʰ vidre mokvdebodes mɣvdelmtʰavari tsʰxebuli tsmida zetʰitʰ 
xolo tʰu mkvleli ɡasvlitʰ ɡava tʰavʃesapʰari sazɣvridan sadatsʰ iɡi ɡaikʰtsʰa 
da mas naxavs mesisxle misi tʰavʃesapʰari kʰalakʰis sazɣvris ɡaretʰ sadatsʰ iɡi ɡaikʰtsʰa da moklavs mesisxle mkvlels maʃin araa mesisxleze sisxli 
radɡan tʰavis tʰavʃesapʰar kʰalakʰʃi unda damkvidrdes iɡi vidre mɣvdelmtʰavari mokvdebodes xolo mɣvdelmtʰavris sikvdilis ʃemdeɡ daubrundes mkvleli tʰavis sampʰlobelos 
es iqos tʰkʰventʰvis rdʒulis tsesad tʰkʰvens tʰaobebʃi qvela tʰkʰvens satsʰxovrebel adɡilebʃi 
qvela vintsʰ katsʰs moklavs mkvleli motsmetʰa tʃvenebitʰ unda moiklas marto ertʰi motsmis mxilebitʰ aravin ar unda mokvdes sikvdilitʰ 
ar aiɣotʰ ɡamosasqidi mkvlelis sulisatʰvis romelitsʰ sasikvdilo damnaʃavea aramed sikvdilitʰ unda mokvdes 
da ar aiɣotʰ ɡamosasqidi tʰavʃesapʰar kʰalakʰʃi ɡakʰtsʰeulisaɡan mis dasabruneblad kʰveqanaʃi satsʰxovreblad vidre mɣvdelmtʰavari mokvdebodes 
ar tsabiltsotʰ kʰveqana romelʃitsʰ tʰkʰven imqopʰebitʰ radɡan sisxli biltsavs kʰveqanas da kʰveqana ver ɡamoisqidis masze daɣvril sisxls tʰu ara misi damɣvrelis sisxlitʰ 
da ar tsabiltsotʰ kʰveqana romelʃitsʰ tsʰxovrobtʰ romelʃitsʰ me vmkvidrdebi radɡan me upʰali vmkvidrdebi israelis dzetʰa ʃoris 
da mividnen ɡilqad makʰiris dzis menaʃes dzis mamissaxltʰa saɡvareulos mtʰavarni iosebis dzetʰa saɡvareulodan da ɡanatsʰxades mosesa da israelis dzetʰa mamamtʰavrebis tsinaʃe 
da tʰkʰves tʃvens batons ubrdzana upʰalma ratʰa mistsʰes kʰveqana samkvidrod tsilisqritʰ israelis dzetʰ da tʃvens batons ebrdzana upʰlis mier ratʰa mietsʰa samkvidrebeli tsʰelapʰxadisa tʃveni dzmisa misi asulebisatʰvis 
da tʰu isini mistʰxovdebian israelis dzetʰa sxva romelime tomis dzeebs maʃin matʰi samkvidrebeli moakldeba tʃveni mamebis samkvidrebels da miemateba im tomis samkvidrebels sadatsʰ ikʰnebian isini ɡatʰxovili xolo tʃvens tsilxvedr samkvidrebels moakldeba 
da tʰu ekʰnebatʰ verdzoba israelis dzetʰ maʃin sabolood miemateba matʰi samkvidro im tomis samkvidros sadatsʰ ikʰnebian isini ɡatʰxovili da tʃveni mamebis tomis samkvidros moakldeba matʰi samkvidrebeli 
da amtsʰno mosem israelis dzetʰ brdzaneba martʰals ambobs iosebis dzetʰa tomi 
es aris ratsʰ brdzana upʰalma tsʰelapʰxadis asulebze vintsʰ moetsonebatʰ imatʰ mistʰxovdnen oɣond mamiseuli tomis saɡvareuloʃi ɡatʰxovdnen 
ratʰa ar ɡadavides israelis dzetʰa samkvidrebeli tomidan tomze radɡan israelis dzetʰaɡan tʰitʰoeuli tʰavis mamatʰa tomis samkvidrebelze unda iqos mikruli 
qoveli asuli samkvidreblis memkvidre israelis dzetʰa tomtʰaɡan tʰavisi mamis tomis saɡvareulosas unda mistʰxovdes ratʰa israelis dzetʰaɡan daimkvidros tʰitʰoeulma tʰavis mamatʰa samkvidrebeli 
ar ɡadavides samkvidrebeli tomidan sxva tomze radɡan israelis dzetʰa tʰitʰoeuli tomi tʰavis samkvidrebelze unda iqos mikruli 
roɡortsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma moses ise ɡaaketʰes tsʰelapʰxadis asulebma 
da mistʰxovdnen maxla tʰirtsʰa xoɡla milkʰa da noqa asulni tsʰelapʰxadisa tʰaviantʰ bidzaʃvilebs tsʰolad 
iosebis dzis menaʃes dzetʰa saɡvareuloebʃi ɡatʰxovdnen isini da dartʃa matʰi samkvidro tʰaviantʰi mamis tomis saɡvareulos 
da es aris mtsʰnebani da tsesebi romelnitsʰ amtsʰno upʰalma israelis dzetʰ moses xelitʰ moabis velebze iordanestʰan ierixos pirdapir 
aha sitqvani romelnitsʰ ɡamoutsʰxada mosem mtʰel israels iordanes ɡamoɣma haqarabas udabnoʃi supʰas pirdapir pʰaransa da tʰopʰels labansa xatsʰerotʰsa da dizahabs ʃoris 
romelitsʰ tʰertʰmeti dɣis saval ɡzazea xorebidan seqiris mtʰaze ɡavlitʰ vidre kadeʃ barneaqamde 
da meormotsʰe tslis metʰertʰmete tʰves tʰvis pirvelʃi utʰxra israelianebs qovelive ratsʰ ubrdzana mas upʰalma matʰze 
mas ʃemdeɡ ratsʰ ɡanɡmires sixoni mepʰe amoreveltʰa romelitsʰ mkvidrobda xeʃbonʃi da qoɡi mepʰe baʃanisa romelitsʰ mkvidrobda qaʃtʰarotʰʃi edreqʃi 
iordanes ɡamoɣma moabeltʰa kʰveqanaʃi daitsqo mosem ɡanmarteba am rdʒulisa da tʰkʰva 
upʰalma ɣmertʰma tʃvenma ɡvitʰxra xorebʃi ɡeqopʰatʰ tʰkʰven am mtʰaze tsʰxovreba 
ɡabrunditʰ da ɡaemɡzavretʰ miditʰ amoreveltʰa mtʰaze da qovel mis mezobeltʰan qarabaʃi mtʰasa da barʃi da neɡebʃi da zɣvis sanapiroze kʰanaaneltʰa kʰveqanaʃi da libanʃi did mdinaremde mdinare evpʰratamde 
aha moɡetsʰitʰ tʰkʰven es kʰveqana miditʰ da daimkvidretʰ kʰveqana romlis motsʰematsʰ ɡulitʰ aɣutʰkʰva upʰalma tʰkʰvens mamebs abraams isaksa da iakobs da matʰ modɡmas matʰ ʃemdɡom 
da me ɡitʰxaritʰ tʰkʰven im dros ase ar ʃemidzlia martos tʰkʰveni tareba 
upʰalma tʰkʰvenma ɣmertʰma ɡaɡamravlatʰ tʰkʰven da aha tʰkʰven dɣes mravalni xartʰ roɡortsʰ tsʰis varskvlavebi 
upʰalma tʰkʰveni mamebis ɣmertʰma ɡaɡamravlotʰ tʰkʰven atʰasɡzis vidre dɣesa xartʰ da ɡakurtʰxotʰ tʰkʰven roɡortsʰ ɡitʰxratʰ 
me martom roɡor vataro tʰkʰveni sazrunavi da tʰkʰveni tvirtʰi da tʰkʰveni ʃuɣli 
amoirtʃietʰ tʰkʰveni tomebidan brdzeni ɡonieri da ɡamotsʰdili katsʰebi da matʰ daɡiniʃnavtʰ tsinamdzɣvrebad 
da tʰkʰven mipasuxetʰ karɡia es sakʰme romelitsʰ brdzane aɣsasruleblad 
da aviqvane mtʰavarni tʰkʰveni tomebidan brdzeni da ɡamotsʰdili katsʰebi da daɡiniʃnetʰ isini tsinamdzɣvrebad atʰasistʰavebad asistʰavebad ormotsʰdaatʰistʰavebad atʰistʰavebad da zedamdɡomebad tʰkʰveni tomebisatʰvis 
da me vubrdzane tʰkʰvens msadʒulebs im dros mousminetʰ tʰkʰvens dzmebs da ɡansadʒetʰ samartʰlianad roɡortsʰ dzmatʰa ʃoris aseve mis xizans ʃoris 
nu ikʰnebitʰ mikerdzoebuli samsdʒavroze ertʰnairad mousminetʰ mtsʰiresa da dids nu ʃeuʃindebitʰ katsʰs radɡan samartʰali ɣvtʰisaa da sakʰme romelitsʰ ɡemdzimebatʰ tsarmoadɡinetʰ tʃemtʰan da me movismen 
da im dros ɡibrdzanetʰ qvela sakʰme romelitsʰ unda ʃeasrulotʰ 
da aviqaretʰ xorebidan da ɡaviaretʰ mtʰeli es didi da saʃineli udabno romelitsʰ ixiletʰ amoreveltʰa mtʰisaken mimaval ɡzaze roɡortsʰ ɡvibrdzana upʰalma ɣmertʰma tʃvenma da miveditʰ kadeʃ barneaqamde 
da ɡitʰxaritʰ me tʰkʰven moxveditʰ amoreveltʰa mtʰamde romelsatsʰ upʰali ɣmertʰi tʃveni ɡvadzlevs tʃven 
ixiletʰ moɡtsʰatʰ upʰalma tʰkʰvenma ɣmertʰma es kʰveqana tsaditʰ daimkvidretʰ roɡortsʰ ɡvitʰxra tʃven upʰalma tʃveni mamebis ɣmertʰma nu ɡeʃiniatʰ da nu ʃedzrtsundebitʰ 
maɡram tʰkʰven qvelani moxveditʰ tʃemtʰan da mitʰxaritʰ ɡavɡzavnitʰ katsʰebs tʃvens tsin ratʰa daɡvizveron kʰveqana da moɡvitanon ambavi im ɡzisa romlitʰatsʰ unda viarotʰ da im kʰalakʰebisa romlebʃitsʰ ʃevaltʰ 
da mometsona es sitqvebi da aviqvane tʰkʰvenɡan tʰormeti katsʰi tʰitʰoeuli tomidan 
da ɡaemartʰnen da ɡadaiares mtʰa da mividnen eʃkʰolis xeobamde da dazveres iɡi 
da aiɣes tʰaviantʰi xelitʰ naqopʰi im kʰveqnisa da tʃamoitanes tʃventʰan da ambavi moɡvitanes da ɡvitʰxres karɡia is kʰveqana romelsatsʰ upʰali tʃveni ɣmertʰi ɡvadzlevs tʃven 
da tʰkʰven ar inebetʰ asvla da tsin aɣudekʰitʰ upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis brdzanebas 
da drətvinavditʰ tʰkʰvens karvebʃi da ambobditʰ tʃven upʰals vedʒavrebitʰ amitom ɡamoɡviqvana tʃven eɡviptis kʰveqnidan ratʰa amoreveltʰa xelʃi tʃaveɡdetʰ dasaɣupavad 
sad tsavidetʰ tʃvenma dzmebma ɡulebi daɡviʃines da ɡvitʰxres ikʰauri xalxi tʃvenze didi da maɣalia didi kʰalakʰebi da tsʰamde aziduli simaɡreebi akʰvtʰ da bumberaztʰa dzenitsʰ vixiletʰ ikʰ 
da me ɡitʰxaritʰ tʰkʰven nu dzrtsixartʰ da nu ɡeʃiniatʰ matʰi 
upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi tsin miɡidzɣvitʰ tʰkʰven is ibrdzolebs tʰkʰventʰvis iseve roɡortsʰ eɡvipteʃi moikʰtsʰa tʰkʰvens tʰvaltsin 
da am udabnoʃitsʰ sadatsʰ xedavdi tʰu roɡor ɡatarebda upʰali ɣmertʰi ʃeni roɡortsʰ tʰavisi ʃvili ataros katsʰma mtʰel ɡzaze romelitsʰ ɡanvletʰ vidre moxvidoditʰ am adɡilas 
da am sakʰmeʃitsʰ ar ertsmunetʰ upʰals tʰkʰvens ɣmertʰs 
romelitsʰ tsin miɡidzɣvitʰ ɡzaze rom dasabanakebeli adɡili moɡinaxotʰ ɣame tsʰetsʰxlitʰ da dɣisitʰ ɣrublebitʰ ɡitʃvenotʰ ɡza romlitʰatsʰ unda iarotʰ 
da ɡaiɡona upʰalma xma tʰkʰveni sitqvebisa da ɡanrisxda da daipʰitsʰa ase 
veravin ixilavs am katsʰtʰaɡan am boroti tʰaobidan im ketʰil kʰveqanas romlis mitsʰematsʰ pʰitsʰitʰ aɣvutʰkʰvi tʰkʰvens mamebs 
mxolod kʰaleb iepʰunes dze ixilavs mas mas da mis dzetʰ mivtsʰem im kʰveqanas romelsatsʰ pʰexi daadɡa radɡan iɡi bolomde mihqva upʰals 
tʃemzetsʰ ɡanrisxda upʰali tʰkʰvens ɡamo da ase mitʰxra ʃentsʰ ar ʃexval ikʰ 
ieso dze navesi romelitsʰ ʃens tsinaʃe dɡas ʃeva ikʰ ɡaamxneve radɡan is daumkvidrebs mas israels 
da tʰkʰveni patarebi romlebzetsʰ ambobditʰ nadavlad ɡadikʰtsʰeviano da dzeni tʰkʰvenni romlebmatsʰ dɣes avi da karɡi ar itsʰian isini ʃevlen ikʰ da matʰ mivtsʰem mas da isini daimkvidreben mas 
da tʰkʰven mibrunditʰ da ɡaemɡzavretʰ udabnoʃi metsamuli zɣvis ɡzitʰ 
da momiɡetʰ me da mitʰxaritʰ ʃevtsʰodetʰ upʰals tsavaltʰ da vibrdzolebtʰ roɡortsʰ ɡvibrdzana upʰalma ɣmertʰma tʃvenma da aisxitʰ tʰitʰoeulma tʰavisi sabrdzolo iaraɣi da ɡeiolatʰ mtʰaze asvla 
da mitʰxra upʰalma utʰxari matʰ nu axvaltʰ da nurtsʰ ibrdzolebtʰ radɡan tʰkʰvens ʃoris ara var me ratʰa ar moisratʰ tʰkʰvens mtertʰa tsinaʃe 
da ɡelaparaketʰ da ar isminetʰ da tsin aɣudekʰitʰ upʰlis brdzanebas da ɡakadnierditʰ da axveditʰ mtʰaze 
da ɡamovidnen amorevelni romelnitsʰ mkvidrobdnen im mtʰaze tʰkʰvens tsinaaɣmdeɡ da daɡesivnen roɡortsʰ pʰutkarma itsʰis da musri ɡaɡavles seqirʃi vidre xorebamde 
da dabrunditʰ da tiroditʰ upʰlis tsinaʃe da qurad ar iɣo upʰalma tʰkʰveni xma da ar ʃeismina tʰkʰveni 
da daqavitʰ kadeʃʃi mravali dɣe imdeni dɣe ramdenitsʰ daqavitʰ 
da movbrunditʰ da ɡavemɡzavretʰ udabnoʃi metsamuli zɣvis ɡzitʰ roɡortsʰ mitʰxra me upʰalma da ɡars vuvliditʰ seqiris mtʰas mravali dɣe 
da mitʰxra upʰalma 
ɡeqopʰatʰ am mtʰis ʃemovla ɡadauxvietʰ tʃrdiloetʰisaken 
da am xalxs ubrdzane ase tʰkʰven ɡaivlitʰ tʰkʰvens dzmatʰa esaviantʰa sazɣvars romelnitsʰ tsʰxovroben seqirʃi da ʃeeʃindebatʰ tʰkʰveni maɡram tʰkʰven dzalian ɡapʰrətʰxilditʰ 
nu tsaekidebitʰ matʰ radɡan ertʰ naterpʰalsatsʰ ki ar moɡtsʰemtʰ tʰkʰven matʰi kʰveqnidan radɡan esavs mivetsʰi samkvidrod seqiris mtʰa 
sacmeli iqidetʰ matʰɡan vertsʰxlitʰ da cametʰ da tsqali iqidetʰ matʰɡan vertsʰxlitʰ da svitʰ 
radɡan upʰalma tʰkʰvenma ɣmertʰma ɡakurtʰxatʰ qovel tʰkʰvens sakʰmianobaʃi itsʰoda ra qoveli tʰkʰveni svla am did udabnoʃi aha ormotsʰi tselia upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi tʰkʰventʰanaa da ar moɡklebiatʰ tʰkʰven arapʰeri 
da tʃavuaretʰ tʃvens dzmebs esaviantʰaɡan romelnitsʰ tsʰxovroben seqirʃi qarabas ɡzidan elatʰidan da qetsʰion ɡeberidan da ɡadavuxvietʰ da ɡaviaretʰ moabis udabnos ɡzitʰ 
da mitʰxra me upʰalma nu ʃeavitsroeb moabs da oms nu ɡaumartʰav radɡan ar moɡtsʰem misi kʰveqnidan samkvidrebels radɡan lotis dzetʰ mivetsʰi qari samkvidrod 
utsin emimelni tsʰxovrobdnen ikʰ xalxi didi mravalritsʰxovani da maɣali qenakelebivitʰ 
repʰaimebad itʰvlebodnen isini roɡortsʰ qenakis dzeni maɡram moabelni matʰ emimelebs utsodeben 
utsin seqirʃi mkvidrobdnen xorelni da esavianebma ɡandevnes isini da mosres isini tʰaviantʰ tsinaʃe da dasaxldnen matʰ maɡier roɡortsʰ moekʰtsʰa israeli tʰavis samkvidro kʰveqanas romelitsʰ mistsʰa matʰ upʰalma 
da tʰkʰva upʰalma ats adekʰitʰ da ɡadalaxetʰ zaredis xevi da ɡadavlaxetʰ zaredis xevi 
da xani rotsʰa tsaveditʰ kadeʃ barneaqidan vidre zaredis xevis ɡadalaxvamde otsʰdatʰvrameti tselitsadi moɡvinda vidre ar ɡatsqda meomar katsʰtʰa mtʰeli tʰaoba banakʃi roɡortsʰ dapʰitsʰebuli hkʰonda upʰals matʰtʰvis 
da upʰlis xeli iqo matʰze ratʰa moesra isini banakʃi vidre ar ɡatsqdnen 
da rotsʰa moisra qoveli meomari katsʰi xalxʃi 
maʃin mitʰxra me upʰalma 
ʃen ɡadalaxav dɣes moabis sazɣvars qartʰan 
da miuaxlovdebi qamonis dzetʰ maɡram nu ʃeavitsroveb nu tsaekidebi matʰ radɡan ar moɡtsʰem qamonis dzetʰa kʰveqnidan samkvidros radɡan lotis dzetʰ mivetsʰi iɡi samkvidreblad 
repʰaimtʰa kʰveqnad itʰvleba isitsʰ repʰaimebi tsʰxovrobdnen masʃi utsin maɡram qamonelni matʰ utsodeben zamzumebs 
didi mravalritsʰxovani da maɣali xalxi iqo roɡortsʰ qenakis dzeni da mospo isini upʰalma matʰ tsinaʃe da damkvidrədnen isini da dasaxldnen matʰ maɡier 
roɡortsʰ esavis dzetʰ uqo seqiris mkvidrtʰ mospo matʰ tsinaʃe xorelni da damkvidrədnen isini da dasaxldnen matʰ maɡier dɣevandel dɣemde 
da qavimelni romlebitsʰ tsʰxovrobdnen sopʰlebʃi ɣazamde mosres kʰapʰtʰorelebma romlebitsʰ ɡamovidnen kʰapʰtʰoridan da dasaxldnen matʰ maɡier 
adekʰitʰ ɡastsietʰ da ɡadalaxetʰ arnonis xevi aha xeltʰ tʃaɡiɡdetʰ sixoni xeʃbonis mepʰe amoreveli da misi kʰveqana itsqetʰ damkvidreba da omi ɡaumartʰetʰ mas 
dɣeidan davitsqeb da ʃenitʰ dzrtsolasa da ʃiʃs movɡvri xalxebs mtʰels tsʰiskʰveʃetʰʃi vintsʰ ki ɡaiɡebs ʃens ambavs tʰavzari daetsʰema da atʰrtʰoldeba ʃens ɡamo 
da ɡavuɡzavne motsʰikʰulni kedemotʰis udabnodan sixons xeʃbonis mepʰes samʃvidobo sitqvebitʰ 
ɡavivli ʃens kʰveqanaze mxolod ɡzad vivli ar ɡadavuxvev artsʰ mardʒvniv da artsʰ martsʰxniv 
sacmeli vertsʰxlitʰ momqide da ʃevcam da tsqalitsʰ vertsʰxlitʰ mometsʰi da davlev mxolod tʃemi pʰexitʰ ɡavivli metʰkʰi 
roɡortsʰ momekʰtsʰnen me esavis dzeni romelnitsʰ mkvidroben seqirʃi da moabelebi romlebitsʰ mkvidroben qarʃi vidre ɡadaval iordanes ɡaɣma im kʰveqanaʃi romelitsʰ upʰalma ɣmertʰma tʃvenma moɡvtsʰa tʃven 
maɡram ar ineba sixonma xeʃbonis mepʰem tʃveni ɡavla ikʰ radɡan ɡaumdzvinvara upʰalma tʃvenma ɣmertʰma suli da ɡaudʒiuta ɡuli ratʰa tʰkʰvens xelʃi tʃaeɡdo roɡortsʰ dɣes aris 
da mitʰxra upʰalma me aha me vitsqeb sixonisa da misi kʰveqnis ʃentʰvis motsʰemas itsqe misi kʰveqnis damkvidreba 
da ɡamovida sixoni tʃvens ʃesaxvedrad is da mtʰeli misi xalxi sabrdzolvelad iahtsʰaʃi 
da moɡvtsʰa iɡi upʰalma tʃvenma ɣmertʰma da ʃevmusretʰ iɡi da misi dzeni da mtʰeli misi xalxi 
da davipqaritʰ qvela misi kʰalakʰi im dros da ertʰianad musri ɡavavletʰ qvela kʰalakʰs katsʰebs dedakatsʰebs da patarebs tsʰotsʰxali aravin ɡaɡviʃvia 
mxolod sakʰoneli davitatsʰetʰ da nadavlitsʰ im kʰalakʰebidan romelnitsʰ davipqaritʰ 
qaroqeridan romelitsʰ arnonis xevis pirasaa da kʰalakʰidan romelitsʰ xeobaʃia ɡilqadamde ar qopʰila kʰalakʰi tʃventʰvis miudɡomeli rom qopʰiliqo qovelive moɡvtsʰa tʃven upʰalma tʃvenma ɣmertʰma 
mxolod qamonis dzetʰa kʰveqanas ar midɡomixar iabokis xevis napirebs mtʰis kʰalakʰebs da qvela im adɡils roɡortsʰ brdzana upʰalma tʃvenma ɣmertʰma 
da ɡadavuxvietʰ da aveditʰ baʃanis ɡzitʰ da ɡamovida qoɡi baʃanis mepʰe tʃvens ʃesaxvedrad mtʰel tʰavis xalxtʰan ertʰad sabrdzolvelad edreqʃi 
da mitʰxra upʰalma me nu ɡeʃinia misi radɡan me xelʃi tʃaɡiɡde iɡi da mtʰeli misi xalxi da misi kʰveqana da ise moekʰetsʰi mas roɡortsʰ sixons moekʰetsʰi amorevel mepʰes romelitsʰ tsʰxovrobs xeʃbonʃi 
da xelʃi tʃaɡviɡdo upʰalma tʃvenma ɣmertʰma qoɡitsʰ baʃanis mepʰe da mtʰeli misi xalxi da movspetʰ iɡi ise rom aravin dartʃenila tsʰotsʰxali 
da davipqaritʰ qvela misi kʰalakʰi im dros ar qopʰila kʰalakʰi matʰtʰvis rom ar tsaɡvertʰmia samotsʰi kʰalakʰi arɡobis mtʰeli mxare samepʰo qoɡisa baʃanʃi 
qvela es kʰalakʰi ɡamaɡrebuli iqo maɣali ɡalavnitʰ karibceebitʰ da urdulebitʰ ɡarda mravali uɡalavno kʰalakʰisa 
musri ɡavavletʰ matʰ roɡortsʰ movekʰetsʰitʰ sixons xeʃbonis mepʰes rotsʰa ertʰianad musri ɡavavletʰ qvela kʰalakʰs katsʰebs dedakatsʰebs da patarebs 
maɡram sakʰoneli da nadavli im kʰalakʰebisa davitovetʰ tʃventʰvis 
da tsavartʰvitʰ im dros kʰveqana or amorevel mepʰes iordanes ɡamoɣma arnonis xevidan xermonis mtʰamde 
tsʰidonelebi xermons sirions utsodeben da amorevelni ki senirs utsodeben 
da aviɣetʰ qvela kʰalakʰi vakisa da mtʰeli ɡilqadi da mtʰeli baʃani salkʰamde da edreqamde qoɡis samepʰos kʰalakʰebi baʃanʃi 
radɡan mxolod qoɡi baʃanis mepʰe iqo dartʃenili repʰaimtʰaɡan aha misi saretsʰeli rkinis saretsʰelia is rabatʰʃia qamonis dzeebtʰan tsʰxra tsqrtʰaa misi siɡrdze da otʰxi tsqrtʰaa misi siɡane mamakatsʰtʰa tsqrtʰitʰ 
da es kʰveqana davimkvidretʰ im dros qaroqeridan romelitsʰ arnonis xevzea da naxevari ɡilqadis mtʰisa misi kʰalakʰebitʰ mivetsʰi reubenis dzetʰ da ɡadis dzetʰ 
da danartʃeni ɡilqadi da mtʰeli baʃani samepʰo qoɡisa mivetsʰi menaʃes naxevar toms qvela midamo arɡobisa mtʰeli baʃanitʰ romelsatsʰ repʰaimis kʰveqana etsodeba 
iairma menaʃes dzem daipqro arɡobis mtʰeli mxare ɡeʃurisa da maqakʰatʰelis sazɣvramde da baʃans utsoda tʰavisi saxeli sopʰlebi iairisa roɡortsʰ es am dɣemdea 
da makʰirs mivetsʰi ɡilqadi 
xolo reubenis dzetʰ da ɡadis dzetʰ mivetsʰi ɡilqadidan arnonis xevamde xevis ʃuamde da sazɣvramde iabokis xevamde qamonis dzetʰa sazɣvramde 
da qaraba da iordane sazɣvaria kʰineretʰidan vidre iam qarabamde marilovan zɣvamde pʰisɡas pʰerdobebamde aɣmosavletʰitʰ 
da ɡibrdzanetʰ tʰkʰven im dros ase upʰalma tʰkʰvenma ɣmertʰma moɡtsʰatʰ tʰkʰven es kʰveqana dasamkvidreblad qvela visatsʰ brdzola ʃeudzlia ʃeiaraɣebulebi tsin ɡaudzexitʰ tʰkʰvens dzmebs israelis dzetʰ 
mxolod tʰkʰveni tsʰolebi da tʰkʰveni patarebi da dʒoɡebi vitsʰi rom diddzali dʒoɡebi ɡqavtʰ dartʃnen tʰkʰvens kʰalakʰebʃi romelnitsʰ tʰkʰventʰvis momitsʰia 
rotsʰa daabinavebs upʰali tʰkʰvens dzmebs tʰkʰvensavitʰ da daimkvidreben isinitsʰ kʰveqanas romelsatsʰ upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni adzlevs matʰ iordanes ɡaɣma maʃin dabrunditʰ qvelani tʰav tʰavis samkvidroʃi romelitsʰ moɡetsʰitʰ 
da iesos vamtsʰne im dros ʃeni tʰvalebia mxilveli qovlisa ra damartʰa upʰalma tʰkʰvenma ɣmertʰma am or mepʰes imasve damartʰebs upʰali qvela samepʰos romelsatsʰ ʃen ɡaivli 
nu ɡeʃinia matʰi radɡan upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi ibrədzvis tʰkʰventʰvis 
da ʃevevedre upʰals im dros ase 
upʰalo ɣmertʰo tʃemo ʃen dautsqe ʃens msaxurs ʃeni didebisa da ʃeni dzlieri xelis tʃveneba romeli ɣmertʰia tsʰaze da mitsaze ʃens msɡavs sakʰmeebsa da dzlierebas rom stʃadiodes 
ɡtʰxov ɡadavide da vixilo is karɡi kʰveqana romelitsʰ iordanes ɡaɣmaa da is karɡi mtʰa da libani 
maɡram ɡanrisxda upʰali tʃemze tʰkʰvens ɡamo da ar ismina tʃemi da momiɡo upʰalma kmara amieridan nuɣar damelaparakebi am sakʰmeze 
adi pʰisɡas mtsvervalze da ɡaixede dasavletʰisken da tʃrdiloetʰisken da samxretʰisken da aɣmosavletʰisken da dainaxe ʃeni tʰvalitʰ radɡan ver ɡadaxval am iordanes ɡaɣma 
da ubrdzane iesos da ɡaamxneve iɡi da ɡaamaɡre radɡan is ɡaudzɣveba am xalxs da daumkvidrebs matʰ kʰveqanas romelsatsʰ dainaxav 
da davdekʰitʰ velze betʰ pʰeɣoris ɡastsvriv 
da axla ismine israelo tsesebi da samartʰalni romeltʰatsʰ me ɡastsavlitʰ tʰkʰven ʃesasruleblad ratʰa itsʰotsʰxlotʰ da mixvidetʰ da daimkvidrotʰ is kʰveqana romelsatsʰ upʰali tʰkʰveni mamebis ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevtʰ tʰkʰven 
ar daamatotʰ mas arapʰeri rasatsʰ me ɡamtsʰnebtʰ tʰkʰven da aratsʰ moaklotʰ ratʰa daitsʰvatʰ mtsʰnebani upʰlisa tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰisa romeltʰatsʰ me ɡamtsʰnebtʰ tʰkʰven 
tʰkʰvenma tʰvalebma ixiles ratsʰ uqo upʰalma baqal pʰeɣors radɡan qvela katsʰi romelitsʰ mihqva baqal pʰeɣors mosra upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma ʃenɡan 
xolo tʰkʰven romelnitsʰ mieltvitʰ upʰals tʰkʰvens ɣmertʰs tsʰotsʰxlebi xartʰ qvelani dɣemde 
ʃexedetʰ ɡastsavletʰ tʰkʰven tsesebi da samartʰalni roɡortsʰ mibrdzana me upʰalma tʃemma ɣmertʰma aɣsasruleblad im kʰveqanaʃi sadatsʰ tʰkʰven midixartʰ dasamkvidreblad 
daitsʰavitʰ da aɣasruletʰ radɡan esaa tʰkʰveni sibrədzne da tʰkʰveni ɡoniereba sxvadasxva xalxebis tʰvaltsin romelnitsʰ qurs mokraven am tsesebs da itqvian mxolod es xalxia brdzeni da ɡonieri didi eria es 
radɡan romeli didi eria romeltʰanatsʰ ise axlos iqvnen misi ɣmertʰebi roɡortsʰ axlosaa tʃventʰan upʰali tʃveni ɣmertʰia tʃventʰan rotsʰa ki vuxmobtʰ mas 
da romeli didi eria romelsatsʰ hkʰondes isetʰi samartʰliani tsesebi da samartʰalni roɡortsʰ mtʰeli es rdʒulia romelsatsʰ me ɡadzlevtʰ tʰkʰven dɣes 
mxolod ɡapʰrətʰxildi da ɡulisquritʰ daitsʰavi tʰavi nu daivitsqeb im sakʰmeebs romelnitsʰ ʃenma tʰvalebma ixiles da ɡulidan nu amoɡivardeba sitsʰotsʰxlis ɡanmavlobaʃi da atsʰodine ʃens dzetʰ da ʃens dzetʰa dzeebs 
is dɣe rodesatsʰ idekʰi upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe xorebtʰan da mitʰxra me upʰalma ʃemikribe xalxi da ɡavaɡoneb matʰ tʃems sitqvebs ratʰa istsavlon tʃemdami ʃiʃi mtʰeli im dɣeebis ɡanmavlobaʃi vidre mitsaze tsʰotsʰxloben da astsavlon tʰaviantʰ dzeebs 
da miuaxlovditʰ da dadekʰitʰ mtʰis dziras da mtʰa ɡizɡizebda tsʰetsʰxlitʰ zetsʰis ɡulamde da idɡa tsqvdiadi ɣrubeli da nisli 
da ɡelaparakebodatʰ upʰali ʃuaɡuli tsʰetsʰxlidan sitqvatʰa xma ɡesmodatʰ maɡram saxes ver xedavditʰ mxolod xma ɡesmodatʰ 
da ɡamoɡitsʰxadatʰ man tʰavisi aɣtʰkʰma atʰi mtsʰneba romelitsʰ ɡibrdzanatʰ tʰkʰven ʃesasruleblad da datsera or kʰvis dapʰaze 
me mibrdzana upʰalma im dros mestsavlebina tʰkʰventʰvis tsesebi da samartʰalni ratʰa ʃeasrulotʰ isini im kʰveqanaʃi romlis dasamkvidrebladatsʰ midixartʰ 
mtkitsʰed ɡecirotʰ tʰkʰvens sulebʃi raki ar ɡinaxavtʰ aravitʰari saxe im dɣes rodesatsʰ upʰali ɡelaparakebodatʰ xorebze ʃuaɡuli tsʰetsʰxlidan 
ratʰa ar tsaxdetʰ da ar ɡaiketʰotʰ kʰandakeba xati raime kerpisa romelitsʰ ɡamoxatavs katsʰs an kʰals 
romelime pirutqvisa ratsʰ mitsazea xati qoveli pʰrtʰosani pʰrinvelisa ratsʰ tsʰaʃi dapʰrinavs 
xati qovelɡvari kʰvetsarmavlisa mitsaze xati qovelɡvari tʰevzisa ratsʰ tsqlebʃia mitsis kʰveʃ 
ratʰa rotsʰa aɣapqrobtʰ tʰkʰvens tʰvalebs tsʰisken da ixilavtʰ mzes mtʰvaresa da varskvlavebs mtʰel tsʰiur laʃkʰars ar ʃetsʰdetʰ tʰaqvani ar stsʰetʰ matʰ ar emsaxurotʰ matʰ radɡan utsilada isini upʰalma tʰkʰvenma ɣmertʰma qvela xalxs mtʰel tsʰiskʰveʃetʰʃi 
xolo tʰkʰven aɡiqvanatʰ upʰalma da ɡamoɡiqvanatʰ rkinis brədzmedidan eɡviptidan rom iqotʰ mistʰvis misi tsilxvedri xalxi roɡortsʰ am dɣes 
da upʰali ɡanrisxda tʃemze tʰkʰveni sitqvebis ɡamo da daipʰitsʰa rom me ver ɡadavlaxav iordanes da ver ʃeval karɡ kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevtʰ samkvidrod 
me movkvdebi am kʰveqanaʃi me ver ɡadaval mdinare iordanes ɡaɣma xolo tʰkʰven ɡadaxvaltʰ da daimkvidrebtʰ im karɡ kʰveqanas 
ɡapʰrətʰxilditʰ rom ar daivitsqotʰ upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis aɣtʰkʰma romelitsʰ daɡidotʰ tʰkʰven da ar ɡaiketʰotʰ kerpebi raime ɡamosaxulebani roɡortsʰ ɡibrdzanatʰ tʰkʰven upʰalma tʰkʰvenma ɣmertʰma 
radɡan upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi mʃtʰanmtʰkʰmeli tsʰetsʰxlia ʃurismɡebeli ɣmertʰia iɡi 
tʰu ɡeqolebatʰ dzeni da dzetʰa dzeni da daberdebitʰ kʰveqanaze da tsaxdebitʰ da ɡaaketʰebtʰ kerps raime ɡamosaxulebas da tʃaidentʰ borots upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis tʰvalʃi mis ɡasadʒavreblad 
tʰkʰvens tsinaaɣmdeɡ davimotsmeb tsʰasa da mitsas rom daɣupvitʰ daiɣupebitʰ male im kʰveqnidan romlis dasamkvidrebladatsʰ ɡadadixartʰ iordanes ver ɡaixanɡrədzlivebtʰ dɣeebs masze aramed ɡanadɡurebitʰ ɡanadɡurdebitʰ 
da ɡaɡpʰantavtʰ upʰali xalxebʃi da dartʃebitʰ mtsʰireritsʰxovnad im erebʃi sadatsʰ miɡiqvantʰ upʰali 
da emsaxurebitʰ ikʰ adamianis xelebitʰ ɡaketʰebul ɣmertʰebs xisa da kʰvisaɡan romelnitsʰ ver xedaven da ar esmitʰ ver camen da vertsʰ iqnosen 
da rotsʰa dautsqeb dzebnas ikʰidan upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs ipovi mas tʰu modzebni mas mtʰeli ʃeni ɡulitʰa da mtʰeli ʃeni sulitʰ 
da ʃens ɡacirvebaʃi rotsʰa qovelive es ɡetseva momaval dɣeebʃi dabrundebi upʰaltʰan ʃens ɣmertʰtʰan da ɡaiɡoneb mis xmas 
radɡan motsqalea upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ar miɡatovebs da ar daɡɣupavs da ar daivitsqebs ʃeni mamebis aɣtʰkʰmas romelitsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa matʰ 
aba ʃeekitʰxetʰ ɡardasul dɣeebs ʃenamde rom iqo im dɣidan ratsʰ ʃekʰmna ɣmertʰma adamiani mitsaze tsʰis kididan tsʰis kidemde tʰu momxdara raime msɡavsi am didi sakʰmisa an tʰu ɡaɡonila misi sadari 
tʰu smenia romelime xalxs tsʰetsʰxlis ʃuaɡulidan molaparake ɣvtʰis xma roɡortsʰ ʃen ismine da ɡadartʃi tsʰotsʰxali 
tʰu utsʰdia romelime ɣmertʰs misuliqo da ɡamoeqvana tʰavistʰvis xalxi sxva xalxis tsiaɣidan ɡansatsʰdelebitʰ niʃnebitʰa da sastsaulebitʰ da brdzolitʰ da dzlieri xelitʰ da ɡatsvdili mklavitʰ da didi saʃinelebebitʰ roɡortsʰ moimokʰmeda qovelive tʰkʰventʰvis tʰkʰvenma ɣmertʰma eɡvipteʃi tʰkʰvens tʰvaltsin 
ʃen ɡaxilvina ratʰa ɡtsʰodnoda rom upʰalia ɣmertʰi aravin aris mis ɡarda 
tsʰidan moɡasmenina tʰavisi xma ratʰa ɡanestsavle da kʰveqanaze ɡitʃvena tʰavisi didi tsʰetsʰxli da misi sitqvani ismine tsʰetsʰxlis ʃuaɡulidan 
raki ʃeiqvara man ʃeni mamebi da ɡamoirtʃia matʰi ʃtʰamomavali matʰ ʃemdeɡ da ɡamoɡiqvana tʰavisi diadi dzalitʰ eɡviptidan 
ratʰa ɡanedevna ʃenze upʰro mravalritsʰxovani da dzlieri xalxebi ʃeni pirisaɡan ratʰa mieqvane da moetsʰa ʃentʰvis matʰi kʰveqana samkvidrod 
da dɣes ʃeitsʰani da ɡulʃi tʃaibecde rom tʰvitʰ upʰali ɣmertʰia maɣla zetsʰaʃi da dabla kʰveqanaze sxva aravinaa 
daitsʰavi misi tsesebi da misi mtsʰnebebi romeltʰatsʰ me ɡibrdzaneb dɣes ratʰa karɡad iqotʰ ʃen da ʃeni dzeni ʃens ʃemdɡom da ratʰa ɡaixanɡrədzlivo dɣeni kʰveqanaze romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs samaradisod 
maʃin ɡamoqo mosem sami kʰalakʰi iordanes ɡamoɣma mzis aɣmosavletʰitʰ 
ratʰa ikʰ ɡaikʰtsʰes mkvleli romelsatsʰ uneblied ʃemoakvdeba tʰavisi moqvasi visi sidzulvilitsʰ ar hkʰonia artsʰ ɡuʃin da artsʰ ɡuʃintsin ɡaikʰtsʰes ertʰ ertʰʃi am kʰalakʰtʰaɡan da ɡadartʃes 
betsʰeri udabnoʃi vakeze reubenisa iqo ramotʰi ɡilqadʃi ɡadisa xolo ɡolani baʃanʃi menaʃesi 
es aris rdʒuli romelitsʰ daatsesa mosem israelis dzetʰa tsinaʃe 
da esenia motsmobani da tsesebi da samartʰalni romelnitsʰ utʰxra mosem israelis dzetʰ eɡviptidan ɡamosvlisas 
iordanes ɡaɣma velze betʰ pʰeɣoris pirdapir amoreveltʰa mepʰis sixonis kʰveqanaʃi romelitsʰ tsʰxovrobda xeʃbonʃi da romelitsʰ ʃemusres mosem da israelis dzeebma eɡviptidan matʰi ɡamosvlisas 
da daimkvidres misi kʰveqana da kʰveqana qoɡisa baʃanis mepʰisa amoreveltʰa ori mepʰisa romelnitsʰ iqvnen iordanes ɡaɣma mxares mzis aɣmosavletʰitʰ 
qaroqeridan romelitsʰ arnonis xevis napirzea sionis mtʰamde es aris xermoni 
da aseve mtʰeli veli ordanes ɡaɣma aɣmosavletʰitʰ qarabas zɣvamde pʰisɡas pʰerdobebis dziras 
da moutsoda mosem mtʰels israels da utʰxra matʰ ismine israel tsesebi da samartʰalni romelsatsʰ me vitqvi dɣes tʰkʰvens ɡasaɡonad da ʃeistsavletʰ isini da etsʰadetʰ matʰi ʃeasruleba 
upʰalma tʃvenma ɣmertʰma daɡvido aɣtʰkʰma xorebʃi 
tʃvens mamebtʰan ki ar dado upʰalma es aɣtʰkʰma aramed tʃventʰan qvela tʃvenɡantʰan vintsʰ akʰ tsʰotsʰxlebi vartʰ dɣes 
pirispir ɡelaparakebodatʰ upʰali mtʰaze tsʰetsʰxlis ʃuaɡulidan 
me ki videkʰi upʰalsa da tʰkʰvens ʃoris im dros ratʰa meutsqebina tʰkʰventʰvis sitqva upʰlisa radɡan ɡeʃinodatʰ tsʰetsʰxlisa da ar asulxartʰ mtʰaze da mitʰxra 
me var upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi romelmatsʰ ɡamoɡiqvane eɡviptis kʰveqnidan monobis saxlidan 
ar iqolio sxva ɣmertʰebi tʃems tsinaʃe 
ar ɡaiketʰo kerpi da artsʰ raime xati imisa ratsʰ maɣla tsʰaʃia ratsʰ dabla mitsazea da ratsʰ tsqalʃia mitsis kʰveʃ 
tʰaqvani ar stsʰe matʰ da artsʰ emsaxuro matʰ radɡan me var upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɣmertʰi ʃurismɡebeli romelitsʰ mamatʰa tsʰodvas ʃvilebs movkitʰxav tʃemi modzuleebis mesame da meotʰxe tʰaobas 
da tsqalobis mkʰmneli atʰaseultʰatʰvis tʃems moqvarultʰa da tʃemi mtsʰnebebis damtsʰveltʰatʰvis 
ar tsarmotʰkʰva upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis saxeli amaod radɡan dausdʒeli ver ɡadaurtʃeba upʰals misi saxelis amaod tsarmomtʰkʰmeli 
daitsʰavi ʃabatʰis dɣe ratʰa tsmida hqo iɡi roɡortsʰ ɡibrdzana upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma 
ekʰvsi dɣe imuʃave da aketʰe qoveli ʃeni sakʰme 
xolo meʃvide dɣe upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis ʃabatʰia ara sakʰme ar aketʰo artsʰ ʃen artsʰ ʃenma dzem artsʰ ʃenma asulma artsʰ ʃenma msaxurma artsʰ ʃenma mxevalma artsʰ ʃenma xarma artsʰ ʃenma saxedarma artsʰ ʃenma pirutqvma artsʰ ʃenma xizanma romelitsʰ ʃens karzea ratʰa daisvenos ʃenma msaxurma da ʃenma mxevalma ʃensavitʰ 
ɡaxsovdes rom mona iqavi eɡvipteltʰa kʰveqanaʃi da ɡamoɡiqvana ʃen upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma ikʰidan dzlieri xelitʰ da ɡatsvdili mklavitʰ amisatʰvis ɡibrdzana ʃen upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma ratʰa daitsʰva dɣe ʃabatʰisa 
pativi etsʰi mamaʃens da dedaʃens roɡortsʰ ɡibrdzana ʃen upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma ratʰa dɣeɡrdzeli iqo da karɡad iqo im mitsaze romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs ʃen 
ara kla 
ar imruʃo 
ar ikʰurdo 
ar ɡamoxvide tsʰru motsmed ʃeni moqvasis tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
ar isurvo ʃeni moqvasis tsʰoli da ar inatro ʃeni moqvasis saxli artsʰ misi qana artsʰ misi msaxuri artsʰ misi mxevali artsʰ misi xari artsʰ misi saxedari da arapʰeri ratsʰ ʃeni moqvasisaa 
es sitqvebi ɡitʰxratʰ upʰalma mtʰel tʰkʰvens krebuls mtʰaze tsʰetsʰxlis ɣrublis da nislis ʃuaɡulidan didi xmitʰ da meti arapʰeri daumatebia da datsera isini or kʰvis dapʰaze da momtsʰa me 
da rotsʰa moisminetʰ tʰkʰven xma tsqvdiadidan xolo mtʰa tsʰetsʰxlʃi itsvoda maʃin moxveditʰ axlos tʰkʰveni tomis qvela mtʰavari da tʰkʰveni eris uxutsʰesebi 
da mitʰxaritʰ aha ɡvitʃvena tʃven upʰalma tʃvenma ɣmertʰma tʰavisi dideba da tʰavisi sidiade da misi xma ɡvesma tʃven tsʰetsʰxlis ʃuaɡulidan am dɣes vixiletʰ tʃven rom ɣmertʰi elaparaka adamians da adamiani tsʰotsʰxali dartʃa 
da axla ristʰvis davixotsʰotʰ xom ɡvʃtʰantʰkʰavs es didi tsʰetsʰxli tʰu tʃven kvlav movismentʰ upʰlis tʃveni ɣmertʰis xmas maʃinve davixotsʰebitʰ 
radɡan vinaa is xortsʰieli rom moesminos tsʰetsʰxlis ʃuaɡulidan molaparake ɣvtʰis xma da tʃvensavitʰ tsʰotsʰxali dartʃeniliqos 
ʃen miuaxlovdi da moismine qvelapʰeri rasatsʰ itqvis upʰali tʃveni ɣmertʰi da moɡviqevi tʃven qvelapʰeri rasatsʰ ʃen ɡetqvis upʰali tʃveni ɣmertʰi da tʃven moɡismentʰ da ʃevasrulebtʰ 
ismina upʰalma tʰkʰveni laparakis xma me rom melaparakeboditʰ da mitʰxra upʰalma vismine am xalxis laparakis xma ʃen rom ɡelaparakeboda qvelapʰeri karɡia ratsʰ ilaparakes 
netav isetʰi ɡuli hkʰonodatʰ rom ʃinebodatʰ tʃemi da daetsʰvatʰ qvela tʃemi mtsʰneba qoveldɣe ratʰa karɡad qopʰiliqvnen isini da matʰi dzeni ukunisamde 
tsadi utʰxari matʰ dabrundnen tʰaviantʰ karvebʃi 
xolo ʃen akʰ dadekʰi tʃemtʰan da me ɡetqvi qvela mtsʰnebas da tsesebs da samartʰals romelitsʰ unda astsavlo matʰ ratʰa matʰ ʃeasrulon im kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ me dasamkvidreblad vadzlev matʰ 
ise unda daitsʰvatʰ ʃesasruleblad roɡortsʰ upʰalma tʰkʰvenma ɣmertʰma ɡibrdzanatʰ nu ɡadauxvevtʰ nurtsʰ mardʒvniv da nurtsʰ martsʰxniv 
iaretʰ qvela ɡzitʰ romelitsʰ ɡamtsʰnotʰ tʰkʰvenma ɣmertʰma ratʰa itsʰotsʰxlotʰ da karɡad iqotʰ da dɣeɡrdzelni iqotʰ kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ daimkvidrebtʰ 
da aha mtsʰnebebi tsesebi da samartʰalni romelnitsʰ ɡibrdzanatʰ upʰalma tʰkʰvenma ɣmertʰma rom ɡastsavlotʰ tʰkʰven ratʰa ʃeasrulo im kʰveqanaʃi romlis dasamkvidrebladatsʰ midixartʰ 
ratʰa ɡeʃinodes upʰlisa ʃeni ɣvtʰisa rom daitsʰva qvela misi tsesi da misi mtsʰneba romeltʰatsʰ me ɡibrdzanebtʰ ʃen da ʃens dzes da ʃeni dzis dzes mtʰeli ʃeni sitsʰotsʰxlis dɣeebʃi ratʰa dɣeɡrdzeli iqo 
ismine israel da daitsʰavi ʃesasruleblad ratʰa karɡad iqo da ratʰa ɡamravlde dzalze roɡortsʰ ɡitʰxra upʰalma ʃeni mamebis ɣmertʰma rom moɡtsʰems im kʰveqanas sadatsʰ moedineba rdze da tʰapʰli 
ismine israel upʰali tʃveni ɣmertʰi ertʰi upʰalia 
da ʃeiqvare upʰali ɣmertʰi ʃeni mtʰeli ʃeni ɡulitʰa da sulitʰ da mtʰeli ʃeni dzalitʰ 
da iqos es sitqvani romeltʰatsʰ me ɡibrdzaneb dɣes ʃens ɡulʃi 
tʃaunerɡe isini ʃens dzetʰ da elaparake matʰze saxlʃi dʒdomisas da ɡzaze siarulisas datsolisas da adɡomisas 
da ʃeibi isini niʃnad xelze da iqos isini ʃublsakravad ʃens tʰvalebs zemotʰ 
da daatsere isini ʃeni saxlis karis tsirtʰxlebsa da ʃens karibceebs 
da rotsʰa ʃeɡiqvans upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi im kʰveqanaʃi romlis ɡamotsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa tʰkʰvens mamebs abraams isaksa da iakobs rom ʃen moɡtsʰemda did da karɡ kʰalakʰebs romelnitsʰ ʃen ar aɡiʃenebia 
da qovelnairi siketʰitʰ savse saxlebs romelnitsʰ ʃen ar aɡivsia da amokvetʰil cebs romelnitsʰ ʃen ar amoɡikvetʰia baɣ venaxebsa da zetʰisxilis xeebs romelnitsʰ ʃen ar ɡaɡiʃenebia da ʃecam da ɡadzɣebi 
ɡapʰrətʰxildi ratʰa ar daivitsqo upʰali romelmatsʰ ɡamoɡiqvana eɡviptis kʰveqnidan monobis saxlidan 
ɡeʃinodes upʰlisa ʃeni ɣvtʰisa da mas emsaxure da mis saxels pʰitsʰulobde 
ar ɡahqvetʰ utsʰxo ɣmertʰebis kvals im xalxebis ɣmertʰtʰaɡan romelnitsʰ tʰkʰven irɡvliv arian 
radɡan upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi romelitsʰ ʃens ʃorisaa ʃurismɡebeli ɣmertʰia tʰorem aɣeɡzneba upʰlis ʃeni ɣvtʰis risxva ʃenze da moɡspobs mitsis pirisaɡan 
ar ɡamostsʰadotʰ upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi roɡortsʰ ɡamostsʰadetʰ masaʃi 
mtkitsʰed daitsʰavitʰ upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis mtsʰnebebi misi motsmobani da misi tsesebi romelnitsʰ ɡibrdzana ʃen 
da stsorad da ketʰilad moikʰetsʰi upʰlis tʰvalʃi ratʰa karɡad iqo rom mixvide da daimkvidro karɡi kʰveqana romelitsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa upʰalma ʃens mamebs 
rom ɡandevnos mtʰeli ʃeni mtrebi ʃeni pirisaɡan roɡortsʰ natʰkʰvami akʰvs upʰals 
tʰu ʃeɡekitʰxeba xval ʃeni ʃvili da ɡetqvis ra aris es motsmobani tsesebi da samartʰalni romelitsʰ ɡibrdzanatʰ tʰkʰven upʰalma tʃvenma ɣmertʰma 
utʰxari ʃens ʃvils monebad viqavitʰ pʰaraontʰan eɡvipteʃi da ɡamoɡviqvana tʃven upʰalma eɡviptidan dzlieri xelitʰ 
mouvlina upʰalma didi da saʃineli niʃnebi da sastsaulebi da sasdʒelebi eɡviptes pʰaraonsa da mtʰel mis saxls tʃvens tʰvaltsin 
da tʃven ɡamoɡviqvana ikʰidan ratʰa akʰ moveqvanetʰ ratʰa moetsʰa tʃventʰvis kʰveqana romelitsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa tʃvens mamebs 
da ɡvibrdzana tʃven upʰalma aɣsruleba qvela im tsesisa ratʰa ɡveʃinodes upʰlisa tʃveni ɣmertʰisa dɣeniadaɡ karɡad viqotʰ rom tsʰotsʰxali davrtʃetʰ roɡortsʰ am dɣesa vartʰ 
da tʃven tʃaɡvetʰvleba simartʰled tʰu davitsʰavtʰ ʃesasruleblad qvela am mtsʰnebas upʰlis tʃveni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe roɡortsʰ man ɡvibrdzana 
rotsʰa miɡiqvans upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi im kʰveqanaʃi romlis dasamkvidrebladatsʰ midixar ɡandevnis mravalritsʰxovan xalxebs tʰkʰveni pirisaɡan xetʰelebs da ɡirɡaʃelebs amorevelebsa da kʰanaanelebs pʰerizelebs xivelebs da iebuselebs ʃvid xalxs ʃenze mravalritsʰxovans da dzliers 
da xelʃi tʃaɡaɡdebinebs matʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi da daamartsʰxeb matʰ daarisxe isini ar ʃekra matʰtʰan kavʃiri da artsʰ daindo 
da artsʰ daumoqvrde matʰ asuli ʃeni ar mistsʰe mis dzes da asuli misi ar mouqvano ʃens dzes 
radɡan ɡanaʃoreben ʃens dzes tʃemɡan da msaxurebas dautsqeben utsʰxo ɣmertʰebs da aɣiɡzneba risxva upʰlisa tʰkʰvenze da is stsrapʰad ɡaɡanadɡurebs 
aramed ase moekʰetsʰitʰ matʰ daanɡrietʰ matʰi samsxverploebi da matʰi dzeɡlebi daamsxvrietʰ matʰi aʃerebi akapʰetʰ da matʰi kʰandakebani datsvitʰ tsʰetsʰxlʃi 
radɡan tsmida xalxi xar ʃen upʰlisatʰvis ʃeni ɣmertʰisatʰvis ʃen amoɡirtʃia upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma rom iqotʰ mistʰvis undʒ xalxad qvela xalxtʰaɡan romelnitsʰ dedamitsis zurɡze arseboben 
tʰkʰveni simravlis ɡamo ki ar moɡisurvatʰ upʰalma da ɡamoɡirtʃiatʰ qvela xalxidan tʰkʰven xom qvela xalxze umtsʰiresni xartʰ 
aramed tʰkʰvendami upʰlis siqvarulis ɡamo da imisatʰvis rom daetsʰva pʰitsʰi romelitsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa tʰkʰvens mamebs ɡamoɡiqvanatʰ upʰalma tʰkʰven dzlieri xelitʰ da ɡixsnatʰ monobis saxlidan pʰaraonis eɡviptis mepʰis xelidan 
itsʰode rom upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi aris ɣmertʰi ɣmertʰi mtkitsʰe romelitsʰ itsʰavs aɣtʰkʰmas da tsqalobas tʰavis moqvarultʰatʰvis da tʰavis mtsʰnebatʰa damtsʰveltʰatʰvis atʰas tʰaobamde 
da miuzɣavs tʰavis modzuleebs misaɡebels matʰ dasaɣupavad ar dauɡvianebs is tʰavis modzules piradad miuzɣavs 
daitsʰavi mtsʰnebebi tsesebi da samartʰalni romeltʰatsʰ me ɡamtsʰneb dɣes ʃesasruleblad 
da tʰu ʃeismentʰ am samartʰals da daitsʰavtʰ da ʃeasrulebtʰ mas upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ʃeɡinaxavs aɣtʰkʰmas da tsqalobas romelitsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa ʃens mamebs 
da ʃeɡiqvarebs da ɡakurtʰxebs da ɡaɡamravlebs da ɡikurtʰxebs mutsʰlis naqopʰs da mitsis naqopʰs martsʰvleuls da ɣvinos da zetʰs msxvilpʰexa pirutqvis monaɡebs da tsvrilpʰexa pirutqvis monaɡebs kʰveqanaze romelitsʰ tʰkʰventʰvis mosatsʰemad ʃehpʰitsʰa tʰkʰvens mamebs 
kurtʰxeul ikʰnebi qvela xalxze metad ar ikʰneba artsʰ ʃenʃi da artsʰ ʃens sakʰonelʃi unaqopʰo mamri an mdedri 
da aɡaʃorebs upʰali qovelɡvar sens ar ʃeɡqris eɡvipteltʰa qovel mavne satkivars romelitsʰ itsʰi ʃens modzuleebs ki ɡautʃens 
da ʃtʰantʰkʰav qvela xalxs romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs ar daindos ʃenma tʰvalma isini da ar emsaxuro matʰ ɣmertʰebs radɡan maxe ikʰneba es ʃentʰvis 
tʰu ɡonebaʃi ɡaɡivlis tʃvenze mravalritsʰxovanni arian es xalxebi da roɡor ʃevdzlebtʰ matʰ ɡandevnas 
nu ʃeuʃindebi matʰ ɡaixsene ra uqo upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma pʰaraonsa da mtʰel eɡviptes 
is didi ɡansatsʰdelni romelnitsʰ ixiles ʃenma tʰvalebma da niʃnebi da sastsaulebi da dzlieri xeli da ɡatsvdili mklavi romlitʰatsʰ ɡamoɡiqvana ʃen upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma aseve ɡauketʰebs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi qvela xalxs romlisatsʰ ɡeʃinia 
krazanebsatsʰ miusevs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi vidre ar daiɣupebian dartʃenilni da mimalulni ʃeni pirisaɡan 
nu upʰrətʰxi matʰ radɡan upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ʃens ʃorisaa ɣmertʰi diadi da saʃineli 
ɡandevnis upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi am xalxebs ʃens tsinaʃe tsʰot tsʰotaobitʰ ver ʃedzleb matʰ mospobas stsrapʰad rom ar imravlos ʃenze velis nadirma 
da ɡadmoɡtsʰems matʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi da aatsiokebs matʰ didi atsiokebitʰ vidre ar ɡanadɡurdebian isini 
da xelʃi tʃaɡiɡdebs matʰ mepʰeebs da mospob matʰ saxels tsʰiskʰveʃetʰʃi tsin veravin daɡidɡeba vidre ar ɡaanadɡureb 
matʰi ɣmertʰebis kʰandakebani datsvitʰ tsʰetsʰxlʃi nu isurveb tsasaɣebad vertsʰxlsa da okʰros zed rom akʰvtʰ tʰorem maxeʃi ɡaebmebi radɡan es sisadzaɡlea upʰlisatʰvis ʃeni ɣmertʰisatʰvis 
da nu ʃeitan sisadzaɡles ʃens saxlʃi rom ʃen masavitʰ darisxebuli ar ɡaxde sidzulvilitʰ ʃeidzule da zizɣitʰ ʃeizizɣe radɡan darisxebulia iɡi 
qoveli mtsʰneba romelsatsʰ me dɣes ɡibrdzaneb daitsʰavitʰ ʃesasruleblad ratʰa itsʰotsʰxlotʰ da ɡamravldetʰ da mixvidetʰ da daimkvidrotʰ kʰveqana romelitsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa upʰalma tʰkʰvens mamebs 
ɡaxsovdes mtʰeli ɡza romlitʰatsʰ ɡatara upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma es ormotsʰi tselitsadi udabnoʃi ratʰa moetʰvinierebine da ɡamoetsʰade ratʰa ʃeetqo tʰu ra ɡidevs ɡulʃi daitsʰavdi mis mtsʰnebebs tʰu ara 
da ɡatʰvinierebda ɡaʃimʃilebda ɡacmevda mananas romelitsʰ ar itsʰodi ʃen da artsʰ ʃenma mamebma ratʰa ʃeɡetsʰno rom ara puritʰa ertʰitʰa tsʰotsʰxlobs katsʰi aramed ɣvtʰis piridan momdinare qoveli sitqvitʰ 
tanze samoseli ar ɡaɡtsʰvetʰia da pʰexi ar ɡaɡsivebia es ormotsʰi tselitsadi 
itsʰode ɡulʃi rom roɡortsʰ katsʰma tʰavisi dze ɡatsvrətʰnas ise ɡtsvrətʰnis ʃen upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi 
da daitsʰavi mtsʰnebani upʰlisa ʃeni ɣmertʰisa ratʰa misi ɡzebitʰ iaro da ɡeʃinodes misi 
radɡan upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs karɡ kʰveqanaʃi mihqavxar kʰveqanaʃi sadatsʰ tsqlis nakadulebi tsqaroebi da binulebi moedinebian mtʰasa da barʃi 
xorblisa da kʰeris vazis leɣvisa da brotseulis kʰveqanaʃi zetʰisxilisa da tʰapʰlis kʰveqanaʃi 
kʰveqanaʃi sadatsʰ ara siɡlaxakitʰ ʃecam purs ar daɡakldeba ikʰ arapʰeri kʰveqanaʃi romlis kʰvebi rkinaa da misi mtʰebidan ɡamohkvetʰav spilendzs 
da ʃecam da ɡadzɣebi da akurtʰxeb upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs im karɡi kʰveqnistʰvis romelitsʰ moɡtsʰa 
da ɡapʰrətʰxildi ratʰa ar daivitsqo upʰali ɣmertʰi da aɣar daitsʰva misi mtsʰnebebi misi samartʰalni da misi tsesebi romeltʰatsʰ me dɣes ɡibrdzaneb 
rotsʰa camtʰ da ɡadzɣebitʰ da aiʃenebtʰ mʃvenier saxlebs da matʰʃi itsʰxovrebtʰ 
da ɡamravldeba tʰkʰveni msxvilpʰexa da tsvrilpʰexa sakʰoneli vertsʰxli da okʰro ɡekʰnebatʰ bevri da qovelive ratsʰ ɡabadiatʰ ɡaɡimravldebatʰ 
ar ɡadidɡulde da ar daivitsqo upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi romelmatsʰ ɡamoɡiqvana ʃen eɡviptis kʰveqnidan monobis saxlidan 
romelmatsʰ ɡatara didsa da saʃinel udabnoʃi sadatsʰ ɡesliani ɡvelebi morielebi da xriokebia sadatsʰ ar iqo tsqali man ki sali kldidan tsqali ɡamoadina ʃentʰvis 
romelitsʰ udabnoʃi ɡkvebavda mananitʰ romelsatsʰ ar itsʰnobdnen ʃeni mamebi ratʰa moetʰvinierebine da ɡamoetsʰade ratʰa siketʰe eqo bolos ʃentʰvis 
da rom ar tʰkʰva ʃens ɡulʃi tʃemma dzalam da tʃemma xelis simtkitsʰem ʃemdzina me es kʰoneba 
unda ɡaxsovdes upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi radɡan iɡi ɡadzlevs ʃen dzalas kʰonebis ʃesadzenad ratʰa ʃeasrulos tʰavisi aɣtʰkʰma romelitsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa ʃens mamebs roɡortsʰ dɣes 
da tʰu daivitsqeb upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs da ɡahqvebi utsʰxo ɣmertʰebis kvals da emsaxurebi da tʰaqvans stsʰem matʰ maʃin vmotsmob ʃenze dɣes rom daiɣupebi 
im xalxebivitʰ romeltʰatsʰ upʰali ɣupavs tʰkʰvens tsinaʃe aseve daiɣupebitʰ tʰu ar ʃeismentʰ upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis xmas 
ismine israel ʃen dɣes ɡadalaxav iordanes ratʰa mixvide da daimkvidro ʃenze didi da dzlieri xalxebi didi zetsʰamde ɡamaɡrebuli kʰalakʰebi 
xalxi didi da axovani qenakis dzeni romlebitsʰ itsʰi da romlebzetsʰ amboben vin daudɡeba qenakis dzetʰ 
itsʰode dɣes rom upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi tsin ɡidzɣvis roɡortsʰ tsʰetsʰxli mʃtʰantʰkʰmeli is ɡaanadɡurebs matʰ da is modreks matʰ ʃens tsinaʃe da ʃen ɡandevni matʰ da daɣupav male roɡortsʰ upʰalma ɡitʰxra 
nu itqvi ɡulʃi rotsʰa ɡandevnis matʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ʃeni pirisaɡan tʃemi simartʰlis ɡamo momiqvana upʰalma am kʰveqnis dasamkvidreblad radɡan am xalxebis uɣvtʰoebis ɡamo devnis upʰali matʰ tʰkʰveni pirisaɡan 
ʃeni simartʰlis da ʃeni ɡultsrpʰelobis ɡamo ki ar midixar matʰi kʰveqnis dasamkvidreblad aramed matʰi uɣvtʰoebis ɡamo devnis am xalxs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ʃeni pirisaɡan ratʰa ʃeasrulos sitqva romelitsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa upʰalma ʃens mamebs abraams isaks da iakobs 
itsʰode rom ʃeni simartʰlis ɡamo ar ɡadzlevs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi am karɡ kʰveqanas dasamkvidreblad radɡan ʃen xom dʒiuti xalxi xar 
ɡaxsovdes nu daivitsqeb tʰu roɡor arisxebdi upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs udabnoʃi im dɣidan rodesatsʰ ɡamoxvedi eɡviptis kʰveqnidan vidre moaɣtsevdi am adɡilamde upʰals eurtʃebodi 
da xorebʃi ɡanarisxetʰ upʰali da ise ɡanrisxda upʰali tʰkʰvenze rom ɡanadɡureba daɡipiratʰ 
rotsʰa mtʰaze avedi rom mimeɣo kʰvis dapʰebi dapʰebi aɣtʰkʰmisa upʰalma rom daɡidotʰ davqavi mtʰaze ormotsʰi dɣe da ormotsʰi ɣame puri ar micamia da tsqali ar ʃemisvams 
da momtsʰa upʰalma me ori kʰvis dapʰa datserilni ɣvtʰis tʰitʰitʰ da zed iqo qvela is sitqva romelitsʰ ɡitʰxratʰ upʰalma tsʰetsʰxlis ʃuaɡulidan ʃekrebis dɣes 
da ormotsʰi dɣisa da ormotsʰi ɣamis bolos momtsʰa upʰalma ori kʰvis dapʰa aɣtʰkʰmis dapʰebi 
da mitʰxra upʰalma adekʰi tʃadi akʰedan male radɡan tsaxda ʃeni xalxi romelitsʰ ɡamoiqvane ʃen eɡviptidan male ɡadauxvies ɡzidan romelitsʰ me vubrdzane matʰ ɡaiketʰes tʃamosxmuli kerpi 
da kvlav mitʰxra upʰalma vixile me es xalxi da aha urtʃi xalxia iɡi 
damanebe da ɡavanadɡureb da tsavʃli matʰ saxels tsʰiskʰveʃetʰidan da ʃen ɡakʰtsʰev masze dzlier da mravalritsʰxovan erad 
da movbrundi da tʃamovedi mtʰidan da mtʰas ekida tsʰetsʰxli da aɣtʰkʰmis ori kʰvis dapʰa orive xelitʰ mecira 
da davinaxe rom tʰkʰven ʃestsʰodetʰ upʰals tʰkʰvens ɣmertʰs ɡaiketʰetʰ tʃamosxmuli xbo male ɡadauxvietʰ ɡzidan romelitsʰ ɡibrdzanatʰ upʰalma 
da movkide xeli orive kʰvis dapʰas da davanartsʰxe tʃemi orive xelitʰ da davamsxvrie tʰkʰvens tʰvaltsin 
da me davemxe upʰlis tsinaʃe roɡortsʰ utsin ormotsʰi dɣe da ormotsʰi ɣame puri ar micamia da tsqali ar ʃemisvams mtʰeli tʰkʰveni tsʰodvis ɡamo ratsʰ ʃestsʰodetʰ upʰlis tʰvalʃi borotebis tʃasadenad da mis ɡansarisxeblad 
radɡan meʃinoda risxvisa da tsqromisa romlitʰatsʰ ɡanrisxda upʰali tʰkʰvenze ratʰa ɡaenadɡurebinetʰ da ismina upʰalma tʃemi amdʒeradatsʰ 
da aaronze ɡanrisxda upʰali dzalian mis ɡasanadɡureblad da me vilotsʰe aaronisatʰvis im dros 
aviɣe tʰkʰveni natsʰodvari xbo tʰkʰven rom ɡaɡeketʰebinatʰ da davtsvi tsʰetsʰxlze da davnaqe da davpʰkʰvi mtverivitʰ tsvrilad da misi mtveri mtʰidan momdinare nakadulʃi tʃavqare 
tʰabqeraʃi masaʃi da kibrotʰ hatʰaavaʃi tʰkʰven arisxebditʰ upʰals 
da rotsʰa ɡamoɡɡzavnatʰ upʰalma tʰkʰven kadeʃ barneaqidan am sitqvebitʰ aditʰ da daipqaritʰ kʰveqana romelitsʰ moɡetsʰitʰ tʰkʰven tsin aɣudekʰitʰ upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis brdzanebas da ar ertsmunetʰ mas da ar isminetʰ misi xma 
urtʃni iqavitʰ tʰkʰven upʰlisadmi im dɣidan ratsʰ ɡitsʰnobtʰ 
da me vemxe upʰlis tsinaʃe ormotsʰi dɣe da ormotsʰi ɣame radɡan upʰalma tʰkʰveni ɡanadɡureba ɡadatsqvita 
da vlotsʰulobdi upʰlisadmi da vambobdi upʰalo ɣmertʰo nu daɣupav ʃens xalxs da ʃens samkvidros romelitsʰ ʃen ɡamoisqide ʃeni didebitʰ romelitsʰ ɡamoiqvane eɡviptidan dzlieri xelitʰ 
ɡaixsene ʃeni msaxurni abraami isaki da iakobi nu mixedav am xalxis sidʒiutes da mis uketʰurebas da mis tsʰodvas 
rom ar tʰkʰvas kʰveqanam saidanatsʰ ʃen ɡamoɡviqvane ver ʃedzlo upʰalma matʰi miqvana im kʰveqanaʃi romelitsʰ aɣutʰkʰva matʰ da matʰi sidzulvilis ɡamo ɡamoiqvana isini ratʰa daexotsʰa udabnoʃi 
ʃeni xalxia is da ʃeni samkvidro romelitsʰ ʃen ɡamoiqvane ʃeni diadi dzalitʰ da ʃeni ɡatsvdili mklavitʰ 
da im dros mitʰxra me upʰalma ɡamotʰale ʃentʰvis ori kʰvis dapʰa im pirvandeltʰa msɡavsi da amodi tʃemtʰan mtʰaze da ɡaiketʰe xis kidobani 
da davtser kʰvis dapʰebze im sitqvebs romlebitsʰ iqo pirvandel kʰvis dapʰebze ʃen rom daamsxvrie da kidobanʃi tʃaatsqve isini 
da ɡavaketʰe me kidobani akatsʰiis xisaɡan da ɡamovtʰale ori kʰvis dapʰa pirvandeltʰa msɡavsi da avedi mtʰaze da xelʃi ori kʰvis dapʰa mecira 
da man datsera kʰvis dapʰebze pirvandeli natseris msɡavsad atʰi mtsʰneba romelnitsʰ tsarmotʰkʰva tʰkʰvens mimartʰ upʰalma mtʰaze tsʰetsʰxlis ʃuaɡulidan ʃekrebis dɣes da momtsʰa me isini upʰalma 
da ɡamovbrundi da tʃamovedi mtʰidan da tʃavatsqe kidobanʃi romelitsʰ ɡavaketʰe da atsqvia ikʰ roɡortsʰ me mibrdzana upʰalma 
da israelis dzeni aiqarnen beqerotʰ bene iaqakanidan moserasaken da ikʰ mokvda aaroni da ikʰve daimarxa da dadɡa mis maɡier eleazari misi dze 
ikʰidan aiqarnen ɡudɡodasaken da ɡudɡodadan iotbatʰasaken tsqlis nakadtʰa kʰveqnisaken 
im dros ɡamoatsʰalkeva upʰalma levis tomi rom etarebina upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmis kidobani upʰlis tsinaʃe emsaxura mistʰvis da ekurtʰxebina misi saxelitʰ dɣevandlamde 
amis ɡamo ar hkʰonda levis toms tsili da samkvidro tʰavis dzmebtʰan upʰalia misi samkvidro roɡortsʰ utʰxra mas upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma 
da me davrtʃi mtʰaze pirvandeli dɣeebis msɡavsad ormotsʰi dɣe da ormotsʰi ɣame da mismina upʰalma amdʒeradatsʰ ar isurva upʰalma tʰkʰveni ʃemusvra 
da mitʰxra me upʰalma adekʰ tsin tsaudzex ɡzaʃi am xalxs mividnen da daimkvidron is kʰveqana romlis mitsʰematsʰ pʰitsʰitʰ aɣvutʰkʰvi matʰ mamebs 
da axla israel ras itʰxovs ʃenɡan upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi tʰu ara imas rom ɡeʃinodes upʰlisa ʃeni ɣmertʰisa iaro misi ɡzitʰ ɡiqvardes iɡi da emsaxuro upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs mtʰeli ɡulitʰ da mtʰeli ʃeni sulitʰ 
daitsʰva mtsʰnebani upʰlisa da misi tsesebi romeltʰatsʰ ɡibrdzaneb dɣes ʃens sasiketʰod 
upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰisaa tsʰani da tsʰani tsʰatʰani mitsa da qovelive ratsʰ masʃia 
mxolod ʃeni mamebi ʃeitkbo upʰalma da ʃeiqvara isini da ɡamoɡartʃiatʰ tʰkʰven matʰi ʃtʰamomavloba matʰ ʃemdeɡ qvela xalxidan roɡortsʰ am dɣes 
daitsʰvitʰetʰ ɡulis tʃutʃa da nuɣar ɡadʒiutdebitʰ 
radɡan upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi aris ɣmertʰtʰa ɣmertʰi da meupʰetʰa meupʰe didi dzlieri da saʃineli ɣmertʰi romelitsʰ mikerdzoebas ar itʃens da kʰrtʰams ar iɣebs 
romelitsʰ obolsa da kʰvrivs samartʰals utʃens da uqvars xizani da adzlevs mas pursa da samosels 
da ɡiqvardetʰ xizani radɡan tʰkʰventsʰ xiznebi iqavitʰ eɡviptis kʰveqanaʃi 
upʰlisa tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰisa ɡeʃinodes mas emsaxure mas mietsebe da misi saxelitʰ daipʰitsʰe 
iɡia ʃeni dideba da iɡia ʃeni ɣmertʰi romelmatsʰ moimokʰmeda ʃentʰvis is didi da saʃineli sakʰmeebi ʃenma tʰvalebma rom ixiles 
sul samotsʰdaatʰi sulitʰ tʃavidnen tʰkʰveni mamebi eɡvipteʃi axla ki tsʰis varskvlavebivitʰ mravlad ɡakʰtsʰia upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma 
da ɡiqvardes upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi da daitsʰavi misi dasatsʰvelni da misi tsesebi da misi samartʰalni da misi mtsʰnebani qoveldɣiurad 
itsʰodetʰ es dɣes me ar velaparakebi tʰkʰvens dzetʰ romeltʰatsʰ ar itsʰian da ar unaxavtʰ upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis sasdʒeli misi dideba misi dzlieri xeli da misi ɡatsvdili mklavi 
da misi niʃnebi da misi sakʰmeni romelnitsʰ ʃuaɡul eɡvipteʃi uqo pʰaraons eɡviptis mepʰes da mtʰel mis kʰveqanas 
da ratsʰ uqo eɡviptis laʃkʰars mis tsʰxenebsa da mis etlebs roɡor ʃtʰaantʰkʰmevina isini metsamuli zɣvis tsqals rotsʰa isini daɡedevnen da mospo isini upʰalma dɣemde 
da ratsʰ udabnoʃi ɡaɡiketʰatʰ vidre am adɡils moaɣtsevditʰ 
da ratsʰ man uqo datʰans da abirams reubenis dzis eliabis dzetʰ rotsʰa ɡaaɣo mitsam piri da ʃtʰantʰkʰa isini da matʰi saxlebi da matʰi karvebi da mtʰeli simdidre ratsʰ ram ebadatʰ mtʰels israelʃi 
radɡan tʰkʰvenma tʰvalebma ixiles upʰlis qvela didi sakʰmeebi romelnitsʰ man ɡaaketʰa 
da daitsʰavitʰ qvela mtsʰneba romelsatsʰ me ɡibrdzanebtʰ dɣes ratʰa ɡadzlierdetʰ da mixvidetʰ da daimkvidrotʰ kʰveqana romlis dasamkvidrebladatsʰ ɡadadixartʰ ɡaɣma 
da ratʰa dɣeɡrdzeli iqotʰ kʰveqanaʃi romlis mitsʰematsʰ pʰitsʰitʰ aɣutʰkʰva upʰalma tʰkʰvens mamebs da matʰ ʃtʰamomavlobas kʰveqana sadatsʰ rdze da tʰapʰli moedineba 
radɡan kʰveqana sadatsʰ ʃen midixar dasamkvidreblad ara hɡavs eɡviptis kʰveqanas saidanatsʰ tʰkʰven ɡamoxveditʰ sadatsʰ tʰesavdi tʰesls da rətsqavdi ʃeni pʰexitʰ roɡortsʰ bostans 
xolo kʰveqana romlis dasamkvidrebladatsʰ ɡaɣma ɡadadixar mtʰiani da velebiani kʰveqanaa da tsʰis tsvimis tsqals svams 
kʰveqana romelzetsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi zrunavs mudam maszea upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis tʰvali tselitsadis dasabamidan tselitsadis dasasrulamde 
da tʰu smenitʰ moismentʰ tʃems mtsʰnebebs romeltʰatsʰ me ɡibrdzanebtʰ dɣes rom ɡiqvardetʰ upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi da emsaxurotʰ mas mtʰeli tʰkʰveni ɡulitʰ da mtʰeli tʰkʰveni sulitʰ 
maʃin mivtsʰem tsvimas tʰkʰvens kʰveqanas droulad adreulsa da naɡvianebs da tʰkʰventsʰ moitsevtʰ tʰkʰvens martsʰvleuls ɣvinosa da zetʰs 
da ɡavutʃen balaxs ʃens mdelos ʃeni sakʰonlisatʰvis da cam da ɡadzɣebi 
maɡram ɡapʰrətʰxilditʰ rom ar ʃetsʰdes tʰkʰveni ɡuli da ar ɡadauxviotʰ da ar emsaxurotʰ utsʰxo ɣmertʰebs da ar etʰaqvanotʰ 
da maʃin aɣeɡzneba risxva upʰlisa tʰkʰvenze da daxʃavs tsʰas da ar ikʰneba tsvima da mitsa aɣar moɡtsʰemtʰ tʰavis naqopʰs da maleve daiɣupebitʰ am karɡi kʰveqnidan romelsatsʰ upʰali ɡadzlevtʰ tʰkʰven 
da tʃaidetʰ es tʃemi sitqvebi tʰkʰvens ɡulʃi da sulʃi da ʃeibitʰ iɡi niʃnad tʰkʰvens xelze da iqos isini ʃublsakravad tʰkʰvens tʰvalebs zemotʰ 
da astsavletʰ isini tʰkʰvens dzetʰ da elaparaketʰ matʰ ʃin qopʰnisas ɡzaze svlisas datsolisas da adɡomisas 
da tsaatseretʰ isini tʰkʰveni saxlebis tsirtʰxlebs da tʰkʰvens karibceebs 
ratʰa ɡamravldnen tʰkʰveni dɣeni da dɣeni tʰkʰvens dzetʰa im mitsaze romlis mitsʰematsʰ pʰitsʰitʰ aɣutʰkʰva upʰalma tʰkʰvens mamebs ramden dɣesatsʰ tsʰa iarsebebs mitsis zemotʰ 
radɡan tʰu datsʰvitʰ daitsʰavtʰ qvela am mtsʰnebas romeltʰatsʰ me ɡibrdzanebtʰ ʃesasruleblad ratʰa ɡiqvardetʰ upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi ratʰa iarotʰ misi ɡzitʰ da mietsebotʰ mas 
maʃin ɡandevnis upʰali qvela am xalxs tʰkʰveni pirisaɡan da daimkvidrebtʰ tʰkʰvenze did da dzlier xalxebs 
qvela adɡili sadatsʰ daidɡmeba terpʰi tʰkʰveni pʰexisa tʰkʰveni ikʰneba udabnodan da libanidan mdinare evpʰratidan ɡanapira zɣvamde ikʰneba tʰkʰveni sazɣvari 
tsin veravin daɡidɡebatʰ tʰkʰvens ʃiʃsa da zars dastsʰems upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi mtʰeli dedamitsis zurɡs sadatsʰ ki pʰexs daadɡamtʰ roɡortsʰ man ɡitʰxratʰ 
uquretʰ me dɣes ɡtʰavazobtʰ kurtʰxevasa da tsqevlas 
kurtʰxevas tʰu ʃeismentʰ upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis mtsʰnebebs romlebsatsʰ me ɡibrdzanebtʰ dɣes 
da tsqevlas tʰu ar ʃeismentʰ upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis mtsʰnebebs da ɡadauxvevtʰ im ɡzidan romelsatsʰ me ɡibrdzanebtʰ dɣes da ɡahqvebitʰ utsʰxo ɣmertʰebs romeltʰatsʰ ar itsʰnobtʰ 
da ikʰneba rotsʰa ʃeɡiqvans upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi im kʰveqanaʃi romlis dasamkvidrebladatsʰ ʃedixar aɣavlinetʰ kurtʰxeva ɡerizimis mtʰaze da tsqevla ɣebalis mtʰaze 
iordanes ɡaɣmaa isini mzis dasavlis ɡzaze qarabaʃi mtsʰxovrebi kʰanaanelebis kʰveqanaʃi ɡilɡalis pirdapir mores muxnaris maxloblad 
radɡan tʰkʰven ɡadadixartʰ iordaneze rom mixvidetʰ im kʰveqnis dasamkvidreblad romelsatsʰ upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevtʰ tʰkʰven da daimkvidrebtʰ mas da ikʰ dasaxldebitʰ 
daitsʰavitʰ ʃesasruleblad qvela tsesi da samartʰalni romeltʰatsʰ me ɡadzlevtʰ tʰkʰven dɣes 
aha tsesebi da samartʰalni romelitsʰ unda daitsʰvatʰ ʃesasruleblad im kʰveqanaʃi dasamkvidreblad rom moɡtsʰatʰ upʰalma tʰkʰveni mamebis ɣmertʰma mtʰeli is dɣeebi rasatsʰ itsʰotsʰxlebtʰ im mitsaze 
ɡanadɡurebitʰ ɡaanadɡuretʰ qvela adɡili sadatsʰ xalxebi romeltʰatsʰ tʰkʰven ɡandevnitʰ emsaxurebodnen tʰaviantʰ ɣmertʰebs maɣal mtʰebsa da bortsʰvebze da qvela amtsvanebuli xis kʰveʃ 
da daakʰtsʰietʰ matʰi samsxverploebi da daletsetʰ matʰi dzeɡlebi da matʰi aʃerebi datsvitʰ tsʰetsʰxlitʰ da matʰi ɣmertʰebis kʰandakebebi datʃexetʰ da mospetʰ matʰi saxeli im adɡilidan 
ase ar moekʰtsʰetʰ upʰals tʰkʰvens ɣmertʰs 
mxolod adɡils romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi qvela tʰkʰvens tomtʰaɡan ratʰa ikʰ daadɡinos tʰavisi saxeli mimartʰetʰ da ikʰ miditʰ 
da ikʰ miitanetʰ tʰkʰveni sruladdasatsvelni da tʰkʰveni msxverplebi da tʰkʰveni meatʰedebi da tʰkʰveni xelis aɣsamartʰavi da tʰkʰveni aɣtʰkʰmuli da tʰkʰveni tsvrilpʰexa da msxvilpʰexa sakʰonlis pirvelmoɡebulni 
da cametʰ ikʰ upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe da ɡaixaretʰ tʰkʰven da tʰkʰvenma saxlma tʰkʰveni naamaɡaritʰ romlitʰatsʰ ɡakurtʰxatʰ tʰkʰven upʰalma tʰkʰvenma ɣmertʰma 
ar ɡaaketʰotʰ qovelive is rasatsʰ tʃven akʰ vaketʰebtʰ dɣes tʰitʰoeuli qvelapʰer imas aketʰebs ratsʰ mis tʰvalʃia stsori 
radɡan dʒer kidev ar ʃesulxartʰ ɡansasvenebelʃi da samkvidroʃi romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs ʃen 
maɡram rotsʰa ɡadaxvaltʰ iordanes da dasaxldebitʰ kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi ɡimkvidrebtʰ tʰkʰven da daɡasvenebtʰ tʰkʰven ɡareʃe mtertʰaɡan da itsʰxovrebtʰ uʃiʃrad 
maʃin im adɡilas romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi tʰavisi saxelis dasavaneblad ikʰ miitanetʰ qovelive rasatsʰ me ɡibrdzanebtʰ tʰkʰven tʰkʰveni sruladdasatsvelni da tʰkʰveni msxverplebi tʰkʰveni meatʰedebi da tʰkʰveni xelis aɣsamartʰavebi da qoveli rtʃeuli tʰkʰvens aɣtʰkʰmultʰaɡan romelitsʰ aɣutʰkʰvitʰ upʰals 
da imxiaruletʰ upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe tʰkʰven da tʰkʰvenma dzeebma da tʰkʰvenma asulebma da tʰkʰvenma msaxurebma da tʰkʰvenma mxevlebma da levianma romelitsʰ tʰkʰvens karibcestʰanaa radɡan ara akʰvs tsili da samkvidro tʰkʰventʰan 
ɡapʰrətʰxildi ar aɣavlino ʃeni sruladdasatsvelni qovel adɡilas romelsatsʰ dainaxav 
aramed mxolod im adɡilas romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali ertʰ ertʰ ʃens tomʃi ikʰ aɣavline ʃeni sruladdasatsvelni da ikʰ ɡaaketʰe qvelapʰeri rasatsʰ me ɡibrdzaneb 
oɣond qoveltʰvis rotsʰa moisurvebs ʃeni suli ʃeɡidzlia dakla da upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis kurtʰxevitʰ camo xortsʰi romelitsʰ man moɡtsʰa qovel ʃens karibceʃi utsmidursa da tsmidas ecmeva roɡortsʰ kʰurtsʰiki da roɡortsʰ iremi 
oɣond sisxli ar camotʰ tsqalivitʰ daɣvaretʰ mitsaze 
upʰleba ar ɡakʰvs rom camo ʃens satsʰxovreblebʃi martsʰvleulis ɣvinisa da zetʰis meatʰedi da ʃeni msxvilpʰexa da tsvrilpʰexa sakʰonlis pirvelmoɡebulebi da qoveli ʃeni aɣtʰkʰmuli romelitsʰ aɣtʰkʰmuli ɡakʰvs ʃeni nebaqopʰlobitʰi ʃesatsiravebi da ʃeni xelis aɣsamartʰavi 
aramed mxolod upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe cametʰ iɡi im adɡilze romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ʃen da ʃenma dzem da ʃenma asulma da ʃenma msaxurma da ʃenma mxevalma da levianma romelitsʰ ʃens karibcestʰanaa da ɡaixare upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe mtʰeli ʃeni naamaɡritʰ 
ɡapʰrətʰxildi ar miatovo leviani mtʰeli ʃeni dɣeebis mandzilze ʃens mitsaze 
rodesatsʰ ɡaapʰartʰovebs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ʃens sazɣvars roɡortsʰ ɡautsqa da itqvi ʃevcam xortsʰs radɡan ʃeni suli isurvebs xortsʰis camas maʃin ʃeni sulis survilisamebr came xortsʰi 
tʰu ʃors ikʰneba tʰkʰvenɡan is adɡili romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi tʰavisi saxelis ikʰ dasatseseblad maʃin dakali ʃeni msxvilpʰexa da tsvrilpʰexa pirutqvidan romelitsʰ moɡtsʰa upʰalma roɡortsʰ me ɡibrdzane da came ʃens karibceebʃi ʃeni sulis survilisamebr 
oɣond roɡortsʰ kʰurtsʰiki da iremi icmeva ise cametʰ iɡi utsmidursa da tsmidas ʃeudzlia camos iɡi 
mxolod mkatsʰrad ekrdzale ratʰa ar camo sisxli radɡan sisxli sulia da ar unda camo suli xortsʰtʰan ertʰad 
ar camo iɡi tsqalivitʰ daɣvaretʰ mitsaze 
ar camo iɡi ratʰa karɡad iqvnetʰ ʃen da ʃens ʃemdeɡ ʃeni dzeni radɡan imas ɡaaketʰeb ratsʰ stsoria upʰlis tʰvalʃi 
oɣond aiɣe ʃeni ʃesatsiravebi ratsʰ ɡekʰneba da ʃeni aɣtʰkʰmulebi da midi im adɡilas romelsatsʰ ɡamoartʃevs upʰali 
da ʃestsire ʃeni sruladdasatsveli xortsʰi da sisxli upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis samsxverploze ʃeni msxverplis sisxli unda daiɣvaros upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis samsxverploze xortsʰi ki came 
daitsʰavi da ɡaiɡone qvela es sitqva romelsatsʰ me ɡibrdzaneb ratʰa karɡad iqvnetʰ ʃen da ʃeni dzeni ʃens ʃemdeɡ ukunisamde radɡan imas ɡaaketʰeb ratsʰ karɡi da stsoria upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis tʰvalʃi 
rodesatsʰ mosravs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi xalxebs romlebtʰanatsʰ ʃen mixval rom ɡandevno isini ʃeni pirisaɡan da ɡandevni matʰ da dasaxldebi matʰ kʰveqanaʃi 
ɡapʰrətʰxildi ar ɡaeba maxeʃi matʰ ukan mas ʃemdeɡ ratsʰ moispobian ʃeni pirisaɡan da ar dautsqo dzebna matʰ ɣmertʰebs da ar tʰkʰva roɡortsʰ es xalxebi emsaxurebian tʰaviantʰ ɣmertʰebs metsʰ ise movikʰtsʰevi 
da ar ɡauketʰo ase upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs radɡan qvela sisadzaɡles ratsʰ upʰals edʒavreba isini tʰaviantʰ ɣmertʰebs uketʰeben tʰaviantʰ dzeebsa da tʰaviantʰ asulebs tsʰetsʰxlʃi utsvaven tʰaviantʰ ɣmertʰebs 
qoveli sitqva romelsatsʰ me ɡibrdzanebtʰ daitsʰavitʰ ʃesasruleblad nurtsʰ daumateb mas da nurtsʰ moakleb 
ʃens ʃoris rom aɣdɡes tsinastsarmetqveli an sizmris mxilveli da moɡtsʰetʰ niʃani an sastsauli 
da axdes es niʃani an sastsauli romelitsʰ ɡautsqa da tʰan ɡitʰxras ɡavqvetʰ sxva ɣmertʰebs romeltʰatsʰ ar itsʰnob da vemsaxurotʰ matʰ 
qurs nu dauɡdeb am tsinastsarmetqvelis an sizmris mxilvelis sitqvebs radɡan ɡtsʰditʰ upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi ratʰa ʃeitqos ɡiqvartʰ tʰu ara tʰkʰven upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi mtʰeli tʰkʰveni ɡulitʰa da mtʰeli tʰkʰveni sulitʰ 
ɡahqevitʰ upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis kvals da ɡeʃinodetʰ misi da daitsʰavitʰ mtsʰnebani misi da isminetʰ xma misi da mas emsaxuretʰ da mas mietsebetʰ 
da is tsinastsarmetqveli tʰu sizmris mxilveli ki unda mokvdes radɡan man ɡirtʃiatʰ ɡandɡoma upʰlisaɡan tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰisaɡan romelmatsʰ ɡamoɡiqvanatʰ eɡviptidan da ɡamoɡisqidatʰ monobis saxlidan ratʰa im ɡzidan aetsʰdine romelzetsʰ ɡibrdzana siaruli upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma da aɣmopʰxveri boroteba ʃeni tsiaɣidan 
tʰu tsaɡakʰezos ʃenma dzmam dedaʃenis ʃvilma an ʃenma ʃvilma an ʃenma asulma an ʃens ubestʰan mqopʰma tsiaɣis tsʰolma an meɡobarma romelitsʰ sakutʰari sulivitʰa ɡqavs da saidumlod ɡitʰxras tsavidetʰ da vemsaxurotʰ sxva ɣmertʰebs romeltʰatsʰ artsʰ ʃen itsʰnob da artsʰ ʃeni mamebi ar itsʰnobdnen 
im xalxtʰa ɣmertʰebs romlebitsʰ tʰkʰvens ɡarʃemoa ʃentʰan axlos tʰu ʃenɡan ʃors kʰveqnis kididan kʰveqnis kidemde 
ar datʰanxmde da ar usmino mas ar daindos iɡi ʃenma tʰvalma ar ʃeibralo iɡi da ar dapʰaro iɡi 
aramed mokali pirvelad ʃeni xeli unda aɣimartʰos masze mosaklavad da mere mtʰeli eris xeli 
da tʃakʰole iɡi kʰvebitʰ da mokvdes radɡan ɡanzraxuli hkʰonda tʃamoetsʰilebine upʰlisaɡan ʃeni ɣmertʰisaɡan romelmatsʰ ɡamoɡiqvanatʰ eɡviptis kʰveqnidan monobis saxlidan 
mtʰeli israeli moismens amas da ʃeʃindeba da ʃemdɡom aɣar tʃaidenen asetʰ borotebas ʃens tsiaɣʃi 
da tʰu ɡaiɡebtʰ rom romelime ʃens kʰalakʰtʰaɡanʃi romelitsʰ tʰkʰven moɡtsʰatʰ satsʰxovreblad upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma 
ɡamotʃndnen uɣirsi katsʰebi ʃeni tsiaɣidan da ʃeatsʰdines am kʰalakʰis mtsʰxovreblebi am sitqvebitʰ tsavidetʰ da vemsaxurotʰ im ɣmertʰebs romeltʰatsʰ tʰkʰven ar itsʰnobtʰ 
maʃin ɡamoidzietʰ ɡamoikvlietʰ da karɡad ɡamoikitʰxetʰ da tʰu es sruli ceʃmaritebaa moxda es sisadzaɡle ʃens tsiaɣʃi 
maxvilis piritʰ ʃemusretʰ im kʰalakʰis mtsʰxovrebni da daarisxe iɡi da qvelapʰeri ratsʰ masʃia da pirutqvitsʰ ki ɡaʒlitetʰ maxvilitʰ 
da mtʰeli nadavli ʃekribetʰ mis ʃuaɡul moedanze da tsʰetsʰxlitʰ datsvitʰ es kʰalakʰi da mtʰeli is nadavli upʰlisatʰvis ʃeni ɣmertʰisatʰvis da saukuno nanɡrevebad dartʃes iɡi da aɣar aʃendes arasdros 
da nurapʰeri nu mietsebeba ʃens xels im darisxebulidan ratʰa moikʰtsʰes upʰali tʰavisi risxvisaɡan da moɡtsʰes tsqaloba da ʃeɡitsqalos da ɡaɡamravlos roɡortsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa ʃens mamebs 
tʰu ɡaiɡoneb upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis xmas daitsʰav qvela mis mtsʰnebas romelsatsʰ ɡibrdzaneb dɣes da ɡaaketʰeb ratsʰ stsoria upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis tʰvalʃi 
tʰkʰven xartʰ dzeni upʰlisa tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰisa tans nu daiseravtʰ da tsarbebs nu ɡadaiparsavtʰ mkvdris ɡamo 
radɡan tsmida xalxi xar ʃen upʰlisatʰvis ʃeni ɣmertʰisatʰvis da ʃen amoɡirtʃia upʰalma rom misi undʒi xalxi qopʰiliqavi qvela xalxs ʃoris dedamitsis zurɡze 
ar camo aravitʰari sisadzaɡle 
es tsʰxovelebia romeltʰa camatsʰ ʃeɡidzlia xari tsʰxvari tʰxa 
iremi kʰurtsʰiki ʃveli dʒixvi antilopa kametʃi da niamori 
da qoveli tʃlikʰɡaqopʰili pirutqvi tʰu ɡacrili akʰvs orive tʃlikʰi mtʰlianad da pirutqvi romelitsʰ itsʰoxnis is cametʰ 
oɣond mtsʰoxneltʰaɡan da tʃlikʰɡaqopʰiltʰaɡan romeltʰatsʰ ɡacrili akʰvtʰ tʃlikʰi amatʰɡan ar camotʰ akʰlemi kurdɣeli da botsʰveri radɡan itsʰoxnian da tʃlikʰi ki ara akʰvtʰ ɡaqopʰili mtʰlianad utsmidurebia isini tʰkʰventʰvis 
da ɣori romelsatsʰ tʃlikʰi akʰvs ɡaqopʰili maɡram ar itsʰoxnis utsmiduria tʰkʰventʰvis matʰi xortsʰi ar camotʰ da matʰ mdzorsatsʰ nu miekarebitʰ 
da qoveltʰaɡan ratsʰ tsqalʃia cametʰ ʃemdeɡi qoveli rasatsʰ pʰarpʰli da kʰertsʰli akʰvs cametʰ 
da qoveli rasatsʰ ara akʰvs pʰarpʰli da kʰertsʰli ar camotʰ utsmiduria tʰkʰventʰvis 
qoveli supʰtʰa pʰrinveli cametʰ 
da ai ra ar unda camotʰ artsivi orbi svavi 
dzera ʃevardeni sonɣuli matʰi ɡvaritʰurtʰ 
qvela qorani misi ɡvaritʰurtʰ 
sirakʰlema bu tʰolia kʰori matʰi ɡvaritʰurtʰ 
kiota buknaco coti 
varxvi pʰsovi tʃvama 
qarqati qantʃa tʰavisi ɡvaritʰurtʰ opʰopʰi da ɣamura 
da qoveli pʰrtʰosani mtseri utsmiduria tʰkʰventʰvis ar icmeba 
qoveli supʰtʰa pʰrinveli cametʰ 
ar camotʰ aravitʰari leʃi xizans mietsʰi romelitsʰ ʃens karibceebʃia da camos an mihqidetʰ utsʰxoels radɡan tsmida xalxi xartʰ upʰlisatʰvis ʃeni ɣmertʰisatʰvis nu moxarʃavtʰ tʰikans tʰavisi dedis rdzeʃi 
aiɣe meatʰedi ʃeni natʰesis mtʰeli mosavlidan romelitsʰ modis qanaʃi qoveltsliurad 
da came upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe im adɡilze romelsatsʰ is amoirtʃevs tʰavisi saxelis ikʰ dasavaneblad meatʰedi ʃeni martsʰvleulisa ʃeni ɣvinisa da ʃeni zetʰisa da tʰkʰveni msxvilpʰexa da tsvrilpʰexa sakʰonlis pirvelmoɡebulebi ratʰa istsavlo upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis ʃiʃi ʃeni dɣeni 
da tʰu didi ɡza ikʰneba ʃentʰvis da ver ʃedzleb mis tarebas radɡan ʃors ikʰneba ʃenɡan is adɡili romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi tʰavisi saxelis dasadebad ratʰa ɡakurtʰxos upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma 
ɡadatsʰvale is vertsʰxlze da aiɣe es vertsʰxli xelʃi da tsadi im adɡilisken romelsatsʰ irtʃevs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi 
da mietsʰi pʰuli qvelapʰerʃi rasatsʰ ʃeni suli isurvebs msxvilpʰexa da tsvrilpʰexa sakʰoneli ɣvino maɡari sasmeli qvelapʰeri rasatsʰ ʃeni suli moɡtʰxovs da came ikʰ upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe da ɡaixare ʃen da ʃenma saxlma 
da leviani romelitsʰ ʃens karibceebʃia ar miatovo radɡan mas ʃentʰan ara akʰvs tsili da samkvidro 
sami tslis bolos aiɣe meatʰedi im tslis mosavlidan da daatsqve ʃens karibceebʃi 
da movides leviani radɡan ar ɡaatʃnia mas tsili da samkvidro oboli da kʰvrivi romelnitsʰ ʃens karibceebʃi arian da camon da ɡadzɣnen ratʰa ɡakurtʰxos upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma ʃeni xelis qovel nakʰmarʃi rasatsʰ ɡaaketʰeb 
qoveli meʃvide tsels patieba qav 
ai patiebis raoba apatios ɡamsesxebelma romelitsʰ sesxs mistsʰems tʰavis moqvass da ar ɡadaaxdevinos tʰavis moqvass da tʰavis dzmas radɡan tsʰxaddeba patieba upʰlisatʰvis 
utsʰxoels ɡadaaxdevine maɡram ratsʰ ʃeni emartʰos ʃens dzmas unda apatios ʃenma xelma 
tʰumtsʰa aravin ikʰneba ʃentʰan ɡlaxaki radɡan kurtʰxevitʰ ɡakurtʰxebs upʰali im kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs dasamkvidreblad 
oɣond tʰu ʃeismen upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis xmas ratʰa daitsʰva ʃesasruleblad qvela is mtsʰneba romelsatsʰ me ɡibrdzaneb dɣes 
radɡan upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi ɡakurtʰxebs roɡortsʰ ɡautsqa da ʃen asesxeb mraval xalxs da ʃen ki ar isesxeb ʃen ibatoneb bevr xalxebze isini ki ar ibatoneben ʃenze 
tʰu ikʰneba ʃentʰan ɡlaxaki ertʰi ʃeni dzmatʰaɡani ertʰ ertʰ ʃens karibceʃi im mitsaze romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs ar ɡaikʰvao ɡuli da xelmocerili nu ikʰnebi ʃeni ɡlaxaki dzmis mimartʰ 
aramed xelɡaʃlili iqavi da asesxe mas misi ɡasacirisamebr ratsʰ mas scirdeba 
ɡapʰrətʰxildi rom ɡulʃi uɣirsi pʰikʰri ar ʃeɡeparos da ar tʰkʰva moaxlovda meʃvide tseli tselitsadi patiebisa da ar aitʰvaltsuno ʃeni ɡlaxaki dzma da uari ar utʰxra mas is ʃehɣaɣadebs ʃenze upʰals da ʃenze ikʰneba tsʰodva 
mitsʰemitʰ mietsʰi mas da mitsʰemisas nu itsuxebs ʃeni ɡuli radɡan ɡakurtʰxebs amisatʰvis upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi qovel ʃens sakʰmeʃi da ʃeni xelis qovel naamaɡarʃi 
radɡan ar daileva ɡlaxaki kʰveqanaʃi amitom ɡibrdzaneb xelɡaʃlili iqo ʃeni dzmis mimartʰ ʃeni ɣaribisa da ʃeni ɡlaxakis mimartʰ ʃens kʰveqanaʃi 
tʰu moɡeqidos ebraeli kʰali an katsʰi ɡemsaxuros ekʰvsi tseli da meʃvide tsels ki ɡaatʰavisupʰle ʃenɡan 
da rotsʰa ɡaatʰavisupʰleb ʃenɡan ar ɡauʃva xeltsʰarieli 
daasatʃukʰre ʃeni pʰaridan ʃeni kalodan da ʃeni satsnaxlidan ritʰatsʰ ɡakurtʰxa upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma mietsʰi mas 
ɡaxsovdes rom ʃentsʰ mona iqavi eɡviptis kʰveqanaʃi da ɡamoɡixsna upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma amisatʰvis ɡibrdzaneb am sitqvas dɣes 
da tʰu ɡitʰxras ar tsaval radɡan ʃeɡiqvara man ʃen da ʃeni saxli vinaidan karɡad iqo ʃentʰan 
maʃin aiɣe sadɡisi da quri ɡauxvrite karze da ʃeni msaxuri iqos saukunod da ʃens mxevalsatsʰ ase moekʰetsʰi 
sadznelod nu ɡetʃveneba misi ɡatʰavisupʰleba ʃenɡan radɡan modʒamaɡiris ormaɡi kʰira daimsaxura ʃenɡan ekʰvs tselitsadʃi da ɡakurtʰxebs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi qoveliveʃi rasatsʰ ɡaaketʰeb 
ʃestsire upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs qoveli pirvelmoɡebuli romelitsʰ mamali daibadeba tsvrilpʰexa da msxvilpʰexa sakʰonelʃi ar amuʃao ʃeni pirvelmoɡebuli xari da ar ɡaparso tsvrilpʰexa pirutqvis pirvelmoɡebuli 
upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe cametʰ iɡi qoveltsliurad ʃen da ʃenma saxlma im adɡilas romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali 
da tʰu rame nakli hkʰondes sikocle an sibrmave an raime tsʰudi xindʒi nu ʃestsirav mas upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs 
ʃens karibceebʃi ʃecame iɡi ɡautsmidurebulsatsʰ da ɡantsmedilsatsʰ ʃeudzlia camos iɡi roɡortsʰ kʰurtsʰiki da iremi 
oɣond misi sisxli ar camo tsqalivitʰ daɣvare 
daitsʰavi abibis tʰve da ʃeasrule pasekʰi upʰlisa ʃeni ɣmertʰisa radɡan abibis tʰveʃi ɡamoɡiqvana upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma eɡviptidan ɣamitʰ 
da dakali pasekʰi upʰlisatʰvis ʃeni ɣmertʰisatʰvis tsvrilpʰexa da msxvilpʰexa pirutqvi im adɡilze romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali tʰavisi saxelis ikʰ dasavaneblad 
ar camo mastʰan ertʰad sapʰuariani ʃvidi dɣe came mastʰan ertʰad xmiadi puri ɡacirvebisa radɡan natʃkʰarevad ɡamoxveditʰ eɡviptis kʰveqnidan ratʰa ɡaxsovdes eɡviptis kʰveqnidan ʃeni ɡamosvlis dɣe mtʰeli ʃeni sitsʰotsʰxle 
da ar ɡamotʃndes sapʰuariani mtʰels ʃens aremareʃi ʃvid dɣes da dilamde ar dartʃes im xortsʰidan romelsatsʰ ʃen msxverplad ʃestsirav pirveli dɣis saɣamos 
ver daklav pasekʰs ʃens romelime karibceʃi romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs 
aramed mxolod im adɡilas romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi tʰavisi saxelis ikʰ dasavaneblad ikʰ dakali pasekʰi saɣamos mzis tʃasvlisas eɡviptidan ʃeni ɡamosvlis dros 
da ɡaaketʰe da came im adɡilze romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi da ɡantʰiadze dabrundi da tsadi karvebisaken 
ekʰvsi dɣe came xmiadi da meʃvide dɣes dɣesastsaulia upʰlisa ʃeni ɣmertʰisa ar aketʰo aranairi sakʰme 
ʃvidi ʃvideuli ɡadaitʰvale samkalʃi namɡlis ʃetanidan daitsqe tʰvla ʃvidi ʃvideulisa 
da ɡadauxade ʃvideultʰa dɣesastsauli upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs ʃeni nebitʰ rasatsʰ ɡastsʰem roɡortsʰ ɡakurtʰxebs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi 
da ixare upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe ʃen da ʃenma dzeebma ʃenma asulebma ʃenma msaxurebma ʃenma mxevlebma da levianma romelnitsʰ ʃens karibceebʃia da xizanma obolma da kʰvrivma romelnitsʰ ʃens ʃoris arian im adɡilze romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi tʰavisi saxelis ikʰ dasavaneblad 
da ɡaxsovdes rom mona iqavi eɡvipteʃi da daitsʰavi da ʃeasrule es tsesebi 
izeime karvobis dɣesastsauli ʃvid dɣes rodesatsʰ ʃeni kalodan da satsnaxlidan moitsev mosavals 
da ixare ʃens dɣesastsaulebʃi ʃen da ʃenma dzeebma ʃenma asulebma ʃenma msaxurebma ʃenma mxevlebma da levianma romelitsʰ ʃens karibceebʃia da xizanma obolma da kʰvrivma 
ʃvidi dɣe idɣesastsauletʰ upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰisatʰvis im adɡilze romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs iɡi radɡan ɡakurtʰxebs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi mosavlitʰa da ʃeni xelis qoveli nakʰmaritʰ da sul mxiaruli ikʰnebi 
tselitsadʃi samdʒer ɡamotsʰxaddes qvela ʃeni mamakatsʰi upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe im adɡilas romelsatsʰ is amoirtʃevs upʰuarobis dɣesastsaulze ʃvideulis dɣesastsaulze da karvobis dɣesastsaulze da aravin ar ɡamotsʰxaddes upʰlis tsinaʃe xeltsʰarieli 
aramed tʰitʰoeulma ratsʰ ʃedzlos is udzɣvnas upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis kurtʰxevis kvalobaze ratsʰ upʰals ʃentʰvis moutsʰia 
msadʒulni da zedamdɡomni daiqene qvela ʃens karibceʃi romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs ʃeni tomebis mixedvitʰ ratʰa ɡansadʒon xalxi martʰali samartʰlitʰ 
ar ɡaamrudo samartʰali mikerdzoeba ar ɡamoitʃino da kʰrtʰami ar aiɣo radɡan kʰrtʰami tʰvals ubrmavebs brdzenkatsʰebs da aukuɣmartʰebs martʰaltʰa sakʰmeebs 
simartʰles simartʰles misdie ratʰa itsʰotsʰxlo da daimkvidro is kʰveqana romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs ʃen 
ar dairɡo aʃera ra xisatsʰ ar unda iqos upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis samsxverplostʰan romelsatsʰ ʃentʰvis ɡaiketʰeb 
da ar aɣimartʰo dzeɡlebi radɡan sdzuls iɡi upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs 
ar ʃestsiro upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs xari da kravi romelsatsʰ ekʰneba nakli an raime tsʰudi radɡan sisadzaɡlea es upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰisatʰvis 
tʰu aɣmotʃndeba ʃens tsiaɣʃi ʃens ertʰ ertʰ karibceʃi romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs katsʰi an dedakatsʰi romelitsʰ borotebas tʃaidens upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis tʰvalʃi da ɡadauxvevs mis aɣtʰkʰmas 
tsava da emsaxureba sxva ɣmertʰebs da tʰaqvans stsʰems matʰ an mzes an mtʰvares an mtʰel tsʰiur mxedrobas ratsʰ me ar mibrdzanebia 
da ɡeutsqeba da moismen karɡad ɡamoidzie da aha tʰu es martʰalia sruli ceʃmaritebaa da es sisadzaɡle momxdara israelʃi 
maʃin ɡaiqvane ʃens karibceebtʰan is katsʰi an dedakatsʰi romelmatsʰ es boroteba tʃaidina da tʃakʰole is kʰvebitʰ da mokvdes 
ori motsmis an sami motsmis sitqvis mixedvitʰ unda mokvdes mosaklavi da ar unda mokvdes ertʰi motsmis sitqvis mixedvitʰ 
pirvelad motsmetʰa xeli unda iqos masze mis mosaklavad da mere mtʰeli xalxis xeli da aɣmopʰxvri borotebas ʃeni tsiaɣidan 
tʰu ʃentʰvis raime mizezitʰ dzalian dznelia sakʰme ɡansasdʒelad sisxlsa da sisxls ʃoris msdʒavrsa da msdʒavrs ʃoris tsqlulsa da tsqluls ʃoris sadao sakʰmeebi ʃens karibceebʃi adekʰi da adi im adɡilas romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi 
da midi levian mɣvdlebtʰan da msadʒultʰan romelnitsʰ ikʰnebian im dɣeebʃi da hkitʰxe da ɡetqvian samsdʒavros ɡanatʃens 
da moikʰetsʰi im sitqvisamebr rasatsʰ ɡetqvian im adɡilas romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali da daitsʰavi qovelive ʃesasruleblad rasatsʰ ɡastsavlian 
moikʰetsʰi im rdʒulisamebr rasatsʰ ɡastsavlian da im samartʰlisamebr rasatsʰ ɡetqvian ar ɡadauxvio sitqvas romelsatsʰ ɡetqvian artsʰ mardʒvniv da artsʰ martsʰxniv 
vintsʰ tʰavxedurad moikʰtsʰeva da ar ɡauɡonebs mɣvdels romelitsʰ upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis msaxurad dɡas an msadʒuls mokvdes da aɣmopʰxvri borotebas israelidan 
da mtʰeli xalxi ɡaiɡonebs da ʃeʃindeba da aɣar moikʰtsʰeva tʰavxedurad 
rotsʰa mixval im kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs da daimkvidreb mas dasaxldebi masʃi da itqvi davisvam mepʰes qvela im erebis msɡavsad tʃems ɡarʃemo rom arian 
daisvi mepʰe romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni dzmebidan daisvi mepʰe neba ar ɡakʰvs utsʰxoeli daisva romelitsʰ ʃeni modzme ar aris 
oɣond ar ɡaimravlos tsʰxenebi da ar daabrunos xalxi eɡvipteʃi tsʰxenebis mosamravleblad vinaidan upʰalma ɡitʰxratʰ aɣar dabrundetʰ am ɡzitʰ 
da ar ɡaimravlos tsʰolebi rom ar ɡairqvnas misi ɡuli da vertsʰxli da okʰro ar ɡaimravlos metismetad 
da rotsʰa tʰavis samepʰo taxtze dadʒdeba ɡadaitseros es rdʒulis tsiɡni leviani mɣvdlebisɡan 
da tʰavistʰan ikʰonios da ikitʰxos iɡi mtʰeli sitsʰotsʰxle ratʰa istsavlos ʃiʃi upʰlisa tʰavisi ɣmertʰisa rom daitsʰvas am rdʒulis qoveli sitqva da ʃeasrulos tsesebi 
ratʰa ar ɡaudidɡuldes tʰavis dzmebs da ar ɡadauxvios mtsʰnebas artsʰ mardʒvniv da artsʰ martsʰxniv ratʰa dɣeɡrdzeli iqos tʰavis samepʰoʃi iɡi da misi dzeni israelis tsiaɣʃi 
ar ekʰnebatʰ levian mɣvdlebs levis mtʰel toms tsili da samkvidro israeltʰan upʰlis satsʰetsʰxlo ʃesatsiravebi da misi tsili camon 
samkvidro tsili ar ekʰnebatʰ matʰ tʰaviantʰ dzmatʰa ʃoris tʰvitʰ upʰalia matʰi samkvidro roɡortsʰ autsqa mas 
ai ra unda ɡanekutʰvnotʰ mɣvdlebs xalxisaɡan matʰɡan vintsʰ msxverplad stsiravs xars an kravs tʰitʰoeulma mistsʰes mɣvdels beci qbebi da dvrita 
ʃeni pirvelmotseuli martsʰvleulisa ɣvinisa da zetʰisa da ʃeni tsʰxvris pirvelɡanaparsi mas mietsʰi 
radɡan is amoirtʃia upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma qvela ʃeni tomidan ratʰa idɡnen da emsaxurebodnen upʰlis saxelitʰ is da misi dzeni dɣeniadaɡ 
da tʰu mova leviani ertʰ ertʰi ʃeni karibcidan mtʰeli israelidan sadatsʰ is tsʰxovrobda da mova tʰavisi sulis survilitʰ im adɡilze romelsatsʰ amoirtʃevs upʰali 
da imsaxurebs upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis saxelitʰ roɡortsʰ qvela misi dzma leviani romelnitsʰ dɡanan ikʰ upʰlis tsinaʃe 
tʰanabari tsilitʰ isarɡeblon ɡarda tʰaviantʰi mamiseulis ɡaqidvitʰ miɣebuli kʰonebisa 
rotsʰa mixval im kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs ar istsavlo im xalxtʰa msɡavsad dzeɡltʰa ketʰeba 
ar ipovebodes ʃenʃi tʰavisi dzisa da tʰavisi asulis tsʰetsʰxlʃi ɡamtarebeli artsʰ dʒadokʰari artsʰ misani artsʰ martʃieli artsʰ ɡrədzneuli 
da artsʰ ʃemlotsʰveli da artsʰ mesultʰane artsʰ mkitʰxavi da artsʰ mkvdartʰa ɡamomkitʰxveli 
vinaidan sadzaɡelia upʰlisatʰvis qovelive amis mokʰmedi da am sisadzaɡletʰa ɡamo upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi sdevnis matʰ ʃeni pirisaɡan 
unaklo iqav upʰaltʰan ʃens ɣmertʰtʰan 
radɡan es xalxebi romlebsatsʰ ʃen ɡandevni misnebsa da dʒadokʰrebs usmenen ʃentʰvis ki amis neba ar moutsʰia upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs 
tʃemnair tsinastsarmetqvels ʃeni tsiaɣidan ʃens dzmatʰaɡan aɣɡidɡens upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi mas usminetʰ 
radɡan ratsʰ ʃen itʰxove upʰlisɡan ʃeni ɣmertʰisɡan xorebtʰan tʰavʃeqris dɣes ase rom tʰkʰvi mets nuɣar ɡaviɡoneb upʰlis tʃemi ɣmertʰis xmas da am did tsʰetsʰxls nuɣar davinaxav rom ar movkvde 
da mitʰxra me upʰalma karɡi kʰnes es rom tʰkʰves 
ʃennair tsinastsarmetqvels aɣvudɡen matʰ dzmatʰa tsiaɣidan ʃens msɡavss da tʃavudeb tʃems sitqvas baɡeebʃi da is etqvis matʰ qvelapʰers rasatsʰ vubrdzaneb 
xolo is vintsʰ ar ɡaiɡonebs tʃems sitqvebs romeltʰatsʰ tʃemi saxelitʰ ilaparakebs tsinastsarmetqveli me tʰvitʰon movkitʰxav mas 
maɡram tsinastsarmetqveli romelitsʰ ɡatʰavxeddeba da tʃemi saxelitʰ imas ilaparakebs risi tʰkʰmatsʰ me mistʰvis ar mibrdzanebia da romelitsʰ ilaparakebs sxva ɣmertʰebis saxelitʰ unda moiklas is tsinastsarmetqveli 
da tʰu itqvi ʃens ɡulʃi roɡor ɡaviɡeb sitqvas romelitsʰ upʰals ar utʰkʰvams 
tʰu ilaparakos tsinastsarmetqvelma upʰlis saxelitʰ da ar asruldes is sitqva da ar axdes maʃin es is sitqvaa romelitsʰ ar utʰkʰvams upʰals tʰavxedurad utʰkʰvams iɡi tsinastsarmetqvels nu ɡeʃiniatʰ misi 
rotsʰa mospobs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi xalxebs romeltʰa kʰveqanasatsʰ ʃen ɡadzlevs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi da ɡandevni matʰ da dasaxldebi matʰ kʰalakʰebʃi da matʰ saxlebʃi 
sami kʰalakʰi ɡamoqavi ʃentʰvis ʃens kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs dasamkvidreblad 
ɡanimzade ɡza da sam natsilad ɡaqavi ʃeni kʰveqnis mitsa tsqali romelsatsʰ ɡitsiladebs ʃen upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi da is ikʰneba tʰavʃesapʰari qvela mkvlelistʰvis 
da aha roɡor mkvlels ʃeudzlia tʰavi ʃeapʰaros ikʰ da ɡadartʃes vintsʰ moklavs tʰavis moqvass uneblietʰ da ar sdzulebia iɡi artsʰ ɡuʃin da artsʰ ɡuʃintsin 
an vintsʰ tsava tʰavis moqvastʰan ertʰad tqeʃi ʃeʃis mosacrelad da xelitʰ tsʰuls moikʰnevs xis mosacrelad da tars rkina ɡadzvreba da moxvdeba moqvass da moklavs ɡaikʰtsʰes iɡi ertʰ ertʰʃi am kʰalakʰtʰaɡan ratʰa ɡadartʃes 
rom ar daedevnos mesisxle mkvlels tsʰxel ɡulze ar daetsios tʰu ʃori ikʰneba ɡza da ar moklas mkvleli is ki ar imsaxurebs sikvdils radɡan ar sdzulebia iɡi artsʰ ɡuʃin da artsʰ ɡuʃintsin 
amitom ɡibrdzaneb ase sami kʰalakʰi ɡamoqavi 
da rotsʰa ɡaapʰartʰovebs upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ʃens sazɣvrebs roɡortsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa ʃens mamebs da moɡtsʰems mtʰels kʰveqanas romlis mitsʰematsʰ aɣutʰkʰva ʃens mamebs 
da tʰu daitsʰav qvela am mtsʰnebas ʃesasruleblad romelsatsʰ ɡibrdzaneb dɣes ratʰa ɡiqvardes upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi da iaro mis ɡzaze dɣeniadaɡ daumate kidev sami kʰalakʰi am sam kʰalakʰs 
da nu daiɣvreba udanaʃaulo sisxli ʃens kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs samkvidrod da ar ikʰneba ʃenze sisxli 
xolo tʰu vinmes edzuleba tʰavisi moqvasi da tʃausapʰrdeba mas aɣdɡeba mis tsinaaɣmdeɡ stsʰems da ʃemoakvdeba iɡi da tʰavs ʃeapʰarebs ertʰertʰs am kʰalakʰtʰaɡan 
miavlinon misi kʰalakʰis uxutsʰesebma da moiqvanon iɡi ikʰidan da ɡadastsʰen iɡi mesisxlis xels ratʰa mokvdes 
nu ʃeibralebs ʃeni tʰvali mas da ɡanaʃore udanaʃaulo sisxli israels da karɡi ikʰneba ʃentʰvis 
ar ɡadatsio ʃeni moqvasis midʒna tsinaprebma rom ɡamidʒnes ʃens samkvidroʃi romelsatsʰ daimkvidreb kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡadzlevs 
sakmarisi ar aris mxolod ertʰi motsme vinmes tsinaaɣmdeɡ raime danaʃaulisatʰvis da raime tsʰodvisatʰvis ritʰatsʰ ʃestsʰodavs ori motsmis piritʰ an sami motsmis piritʰ dadɡindes sakʰme 
tʰu ɡamova boroti motsme vinmes tsinaaɣmdeɡ ratʰa raime brali dastsamos mas 
maʃin tsardɡes es ori modave katsʰi upʰlis tsinaʃe mɣvdeltʰa da msadʒultʰa tsinaʃe romelnitsʰ ikʰnebian im dɣeebʃi 
da karɡad ɡamoidzion msadʒulebma da tʰu es motsme tsʰru motsmea tsʰili dastsama tʰavis dzmas 
ɡauketʰetʰ mas risi ɡaketʰebatsʰ hkʰonda ɡanzraxuli tʰavisi dzmisatʰvis da aɣmopʰxvritʰ borotebas ʃeni tsiaɣidan 
da danartʃenebi moismenen da ʃeʃindebian da aɣar tʃaidenen am borotebas ʃens tsiaɣʃi 
da ar ʃeibralos is ʃenma tʰvalma suli sulis tsil tʰvali tʰvalis tsil kbili kbilis tsil xeli xelis tsil pʰexi pʰexis tsil 
rotsʰa omʃi ɡaxval ʃeni mtris tsinaaɣmdeɡ da dainaxav tsʰxens da etls da ʃenze mravalritsʰxovan xalxs nu ʃeuʃindebi matʰ radɡan ʃentʰanaa upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi romelmatsʰ ɡamoɡiqvana ʃen eɡviptis kʰveqnidan 
da rotsʰa oms miuaxlovdebitʰ modɡes mɣvdeli da xalxs elaparakos
