ioabis natsʰvlad qamasa daadɡina abesalomma mxedartʰmtʰavrad qamasas mama iqo katsʰi saxelad itʰra izreqeleli romelitsʰ ʃevida abiɡailtʰan naxaʃis asultʰan tsʰeruias dastʰan ioabis dedastʰan 
da daibanakes israelma da abesalomma ɡilqadis kʰveqanaʃi 
rotsʰa davitʰi maxanaimʃi mivida ʃobim naxaʃis dzem qamonis dzetʰaɡanma rabatʰidan makʰir qamielis dzem lodebaridan barzilai ɡilqadelma roɡelimidan 
kʰveʃaɡebeli tʰasebi da tʰixis curceli xorbali da kʰeri pʰkʰvili da kʰumeli tsʰertsʰvi da ospi 
tʰapʰli da erbo tsʰxvari da xborebi miartʰves davitʰsa da mis xalxs sacmelad radɡan pʰikʰrobdnen mʃier mtsqurvali da dakʰantsʰulni movidodneno udabnodan 
da aɣritsʰxa davitʰma tʰavisi xalxi da dauqena mas atʰasistʰavebi da asistʰavebi 
xalxis ertʰi mesamedi davitʰma ioabs tʃaabara ertʰi mesamedi abiʃais tsʰeruias dzes ioabis dzmas danartʃeni mesamedi itʰai ɡitʰels da utʰxra mepʰem xalxs metsʰ tʰkʰventʰan ɡamoval 
da xalxma utʰxra ar ɡamoxvide radɡan tʃven tʰu ukuvikʰetsʰitʰ quradɣebas ar moɡvakʰtsʰeven naxevaritsʰ rom ɡavtsqdetʰ artsʰ maʃin moɡvakʰtsʰeven quradɣebas tʃvenistʰanas atʰiatʰass itsoni ʃen amitom tʃventʰvis umdʒobesi ikʰneba tʰu kʰalakʰidan ʃemoɡveʃvelebi 
da utʰxra matʰ mepʰem roɡortsʰ ɡidʒobtʰ ise movikʰtsʰevi da dartʃa karibcestʰan mepʰe xalxi ki aseulebad da atʰaseulebad ɡavida 
da ubrdzana mepʰem ioabs abiʃais da itʰais damizoɡetʰ qmatsvili abesalomi da mtʰelma xalxma moismina ratsʰ abesalomis ɡamo ubrdzana mepʰem tʰavis sardlebs 
da ɡavida xalxi velze israelis tsinaaɣmdeɡ da ɡaimartʰa brdzola epʰremis tqeʃi 
da idzlia israelis xalxi davitʰis msaxurtʰaɡan didi xotsʰva ʒleta moxda ikʰ im dɣes ɡatsqda otsʰi atʰasi 
da moedo brdzola mtʰels im aremares da tqem upʰro meti xalxi ʃtʰantʰkʰa vidre maxvilma ʃecama im dɣes 
da ʃeeqara abesalomi davitʰis msaxurtʰ dʒorze iqo abesalomi amxedrebuli rotsʰa dʒori totebɡabardʒɣuli didi muxis kʰveʃ ɡarboda tsamoedo abesalomi tʰmebitʰ muxas da ɡamoekida tsʰasa da mitsas ʃoris dʒori ki ɡamoetsʰala da ɡaikʰtsʰa 
da dainaxa es ertʰma katsʰma da ʃeatqobina ioabs da utʰxra abesalomi davinaxe muxaze tʃamokidebuli 
da utʰxra ioabma ambis momtans tʰu dainaxe ratom ar daakali ikʰve mitsas tʃemze ikʰneboda atʰi ʃekeli vertsʰxli da ertʰi sartqeli 
da utʰxra im katsʰma ioabs atʰasi ʃekeli vertsʰxlitsʰ rom tʃamidon xelʃi xels maintsʰ ar aɣvmartʰav upʰlistsulze radɡan tʃvens ɡasaɡonad ɡibrdzanatʰ mepʰem ʃen abiʃais da itʰais damizoɡetʰ qmatsvili abesalomi 
kidetsʰ rom ɡamebeda da tʃamedina es usamartʰloba arapʰeri daemaleboda mepʰes ʃen ki ɡanze ɡadɡebodi 
da utʰxra ioabma tquilad vkarɡav dros ʃentʰan da xeltʰ ipqra sami isari da ʃiɡ ɡulʃi ɡauqara abesaloms romelitsʰ dʒer kidev tsʰotsʰxali ekida muxaze 
mere ɡars ʃemoadɡa atʰi cabuki ioabis sacurveltʰmtvirtʰvelni abesaloms da ɡaɡmires da mokles iɡi 
da tʃahbera ioabma buks da ukan mobrunda israels dadevnebuli xalxi radɡan ʃeakava ioabma xalxi 
da aiɣes abesalomi da tʃaaɡdes tqeʃi ertʰ did ormoʃi da zed diddzali kʰvebi daaxvaves mere tʰav tʰavis karvebʃi ɡaipʰantnen israelis dzeni 
abesaloms tʰavis sitsʰotsʰxleʃive hkʰonda aɣmartʰuli dzeɡli mepʰis mindorze ambobda ʃvili ara mqavs rom tʃemi saxeli ixseniebodeso da tʰavisi saxeli utsoda dzeɡls da dɣemde abesalomis dzeɡli etsodeba mas 
da utʰxra ioabs aximaqatsʰma tsʰadokis dzem ɡavikʰtsʰevi da vaxareb mepʰes rom dasadʒa upʰalma misi mtrebi 
da utʰxra ioabma ver ikʰnebi dɣes maxarobeli sxva dɣes axare dɣes nu axareb radɡan mokvda upʰlistsuli 
da utʰxra ioabma ertʰ kʰuʃels tsadi moaxsene mepʰes ratsʰ dainaxe tʰaqvanistsʰa kʰuʃelma ioabs da ɡaikʰtsʰa 
da kvlav utʰxra aximaqatsʰma tsʰadokis dzem ioabs ratsʰ unda moxdes maintsʰ ɡavikʰtsʰevi kʰuʃeltʰan ertʰad da utʰxra ioabma ristʰvis unda ɡaikʰtsʰe ʃvilo ver miitan karɡ ambavs 
ratsʰ unda moxdes maintsʰ ɡavikʰtsʰevi da utʰxra ɡaikʰetsʰi da ɡaikʰtsʰa aximaqatsʰi xeobis ɡzitʰ da daastsro kʰuʃels 
davitʰi or karibces ʃoris idʒda xolo karibcis tʰavze kedeltʰan ɡuʃaɡi dadioda ɡaixeda da xedavs viɣatsʰ katsʰi morbis marto 
da ʃesdzaxa ɡuʃaɡma da ʃeatqobina mepʰes da tʰkʰva mepʰem tʰu martoa maxarobeli ikʰneba tʰandatʰan axlovdeboda katsʰi 
da dainaxa ɡuʃaɡma rom kidev morbis sxva katsʰi da tʃamosdzaxa karismtsʰvels da utʰxra aha katsʰi morbis marto da tʰkʰva mepʰem esetsʰ maxarobelia 
da tʰkʰva ɡuʃaɡma sirbilze vatqob rom pirveli katsʰi aximaqatsʰ tsʰadokis dze unda iqos tʰkʰva mepʰem karɡi katsʰia da karɡi ambavitsʰ unda mohkʰondes 
ʃesdzaxa aximaqatsʰma da utʰxra mepʰes mʃvidoba da mdablad tʰaqvanistsʰa mepʰes da utʰxra kurtʰxeulia upʰali ɣmertʰi ʃeni xelʃi rom tʃaɡiɡdo xalxi romeltʰatsʰ xeli aɣmartʰes mepʰe batonze 
da utʰxra mepʰem xom mʃvidobitʰ aris qmatsvili abesalomi da utʰxra aximaqatsʰma didi tʃotʃkʰoli ʃevniʃne rotsʰa ioabi mepʰis msaxurs da ʃens msaxurs aɡzavnida da ver mivxvdi ra iqo 
da tʰkʰva mepʰem ɡanze ɡadi da ikʰ dadekʰi ɡanze ɡavida isitsʰ da dadɡa 
axla kʰuʃeli movida da tʰkʰva kʰuʃelma sasixarulo ambavi momakʰvs mepʰe batonistʰvis upʰalma daɡisadʒa dɣes ʃeni tsinaaɣmdeɡni 
da utʰxra mepʰem kʰuʃels xom mʃvidobitʰ aris qmatsvili abesalomi da utʰxra kʰuʃelma ise mepʰe batonis mtrebi da ʃens saborotod aɣmdɡarni iqvnen roɡortsʰ is qmatsvilia 
da ʃeidzra mepʰe avida karibcis zemotʰvalʃi da atirda rotsʰa midioda ase ambobda ʃvilo abesalom ʃvilo ʃvilo abesalom netav ʃens maɡivrad me movmkvdariqavi abesalom ʃvilo ʃvilo 
da ʃeatqobines ioabs tiriso mepʰe abesaloms ɡlovobso 
da ɡlovad ɡadaekʰtsʰa im dɣis ɡamardʒvebis sixaruli mtʰel xalxs radɡan ɡaiɡo im dɣes xalxma rom tsuxda mepʰe tʰavis ʃvilze 
da pʰarulad moipareboda kʰalakʰʃi xalxi im dɣes roɡortsʰ moipareba xolme brdzolis velidan ukukʰtsʰeuli ʃertsʰxvenili xalxi 
da daepʰara mepʰes saxe da xmamaɣla motʰkʰvamda ʃvilo abesalom ʃvilo ʃvilo 
da mivida iaobi mepʰestʰan saxlʃi da utʰxra sirtsʰxvilʃi tʃaaɡde dɣes ʃeni msaxurni romeltʰatsʰ ɡadaɡirtʃines dɣes ʃeni vaʒebi ʃeni asulebi ʃeni tsʰolebi da xarcebi 
ʃeni modzuleni ʃeɡqvarebia da ʃeni moqvarulni ʃeɡdzulebia dɣes atʃvene rom arapʰers niʃnaven ʃentʰvis sardalni da msaxurni axla vitsʰi tʰurme ɡertʃia abesalomi tsʰotsʰxali ɡqoloda tʃven ki qvelani davxotsʰiliqavitʰ 
axla adekʰi da ɡadi ɡaamxneve ʃeni msaxurni radɡan tʰu ar ɡaxvedi upʰals vpʰitsʰav ertʰi katsʰitsʰ ar ʃeɡrtʃeba am ɣames da es uaresi ikʰneba im ubedurebatʰaɡan ratsʰ siqmatsvilidan dɣemde ʃeɡmtʰxvevia 
da adɡa mepʰe da karibcestʰan dadʒda da autsqes mtʰels xalxs aha karibcestʰan zis mepʰe da modioda xalxi mepʰis tsinaʃe xolo israelianebi tʰav tʰavis karvebʃi ɡaikʰtsʰa 
ase ɡansdʒida mtʰeli xalxi israelis qvela tomʃi mepʰem ɡvixsna mtrebis xelidan da ɡaɡvatʰavisupʰla pʰilistimeltʰaɡan axla ki tʰavad ɡaekʰtsʰa kʰveqnidan abesaloms 
xom mokvda brdzolaʃi abesalomi romelitsʰ vtsʰxetʰ tʃvens mepʰed axla ratom arapʰers ambobtʰ mepʰis dasabruneblad 
mepʰe davitʰma ʃeutʰvala tsʰadoks da abiatʰars mɣvdlebs ase utʰxaritʰ iudas uxutsʰesebs ratom aqovnebtʰ mepʰis dabrunebas mis saxlʃi rotsʰa mtʰeli israelis sitqva ukve miuvida mepʰes tʰavis saxlʃi 
tʃemi dzmebi xartʰ tʰkʰven tʃemi dzvali da xortsʰi da ratomɣa aqovnebtʰ mepʰis dabrunebas tʰavis saxlʃi 
qamasas utʰxaritʰ ɡana tʃemi dzvali da xortsʰi ara xar ase da ase miqos ɣmertʰma da uaresitsʰ momisartʰos tʰu ioabis natsʰvlad ʃen ar ɡaxde tʃemi dʒaris sardali samudamod 
ertʰi katsʰivitʰ ɡadaxara davitʰma mtʰeli iudas ɡuli da matʰatsʰ ʃeutʰvales mepʰes dabrundi qvela ʃens msaxurtʰan ertʰad 
da dabrunda mepʰe da miadɡa iordanes xolo iudaelni mividnen ɡilɡals rom miɡebebodnen mepʰes da iordanes ɡaɣmidan ɡadmoeqvanatʰ mepʰe 
ʃimqi ɡeras dze beniamineli romelitsʰ baxurimidan iqo sastsrapʰod tʃamovida iudaelebtʰan ertʰad mepʰe davitʰis misaɡebeblad 
tʰan axlda atʰasi beniaminieli katsʰi tʃamovida tsʰibatsʰ saulis saxlis msaxuri tʰavis tʰxutʰmeti ʃvilitʰa da otsʰi msaxuritʰurtʰ da ɡadmolaxes iordane mepʰis tʰvaltsin 
da ɡavida ɡaɣma tivi rom ɡadmoeqvana mepʰis saxli da ketʰilad momsaxurebodnen da rotsʰa ɡadmolaxa mepʰem iordane ʃimqi ɡeras dze ɡanertʰxa mis tsinaʃe 
da utʰxra mepʰes nu tʃamitʰvlis tʃemi batoni danaʃaulad nu ɡaixseneb rom daaʃava ʃenma msaxurma im dɣes rotsʰa ierusalims tovebda mepʰe batoni da ɡulʃi nu tʃaideb amas mepʰev 
radɡan itsʰis ʃenma msaxurma rom ʃevtsʰode aha pirveli movedi dɣes iosebis mtʰeli saxlidan rom mivɡebebodi tʃems mepʰe batons 
da miuɡo abiʃaim tsʰeruias dzem da tʰkʰva nutʰu ar unda mokvdes ʃimqi upʰlis tsʰxebulis datsqevlisatʰvis 
da tʰkʰva davitʰma ra sakʰme makʰvs tʰkʰventʰan tsʰeruias dzeno rom kricaʃi midɡaxartʰ dɣes ɡana vinme ʃeidzleba mokvdes dɣes israelʃi ɡana me ar vitsʰi rom dɣes israelis mepʰe var 
da utʰxra mepʰem ʃimqis ar mokvdebi da ʃehpʰitsʰa mas mepʰem 
da tʃamovida mepʰiboʃetʰitsʰ saulis dze mepʰis misaɡebeblad artsʰ pʰexi daubania artsʰ tsver ulvaʃi dauvartsʰxnia da artsʰ tanisamosi ɡauretsʰxavs mepʰis tsasvlis dɣidan misi mʃvidobitʰ dabrunebamde 
da rotsʰa ɡavida ierusalimidan mepʰis misaɡebeblad utʰxra mas mepʰem ratom ar tsamomqevi mepʰiboʃetʰ 
da tʰkʰva mepʰev abtono tʃemma msaxurma momatqua eubneboda ʃeni msaxuri saxedari ʃemikazme rom ʃevdʒde da mepʰes ɡavqve metʰkʰi radɡan koclia ʃeni msaxuri 
da tsʰili damtsama ʃens msaxurs mepʰe batontʰan maɡram ɣvtʰis anɡelozivitʰaa mepʰe batoni miqavi ratsʰ ɡenebos 
ɡana sikvdilis ɣirsi ar iqo mepʰe batonis tsinaʃe mamatʃemis mtʰeli saxli ʃen ki maintsʰ ʃens tʰanameinaxeebtʰan dasvi supʰraze ʃeni msaxuri axla raɣa upʰleba makʰvs mepʰestʰan vtʃiode 
da utʰxra mepʰem riɣistʰvis laparakob amas xom vbrdzane ʃen da tsʰibam ɡaiqavitʰ metʰkʰi mitsebi 
da utʰxra mepʰes qvelapʰeri tsaiɣos rakiɣa mʃvidobitʰ dabrunda mepʰe batoni tʰavis saxlʃi 
barzilai ɡilqadelitsʰ tʃamovida roɡelimidan da mepʰestʰan ertʰad ɡadalaxa iordane ratʰa ɡaetsʰilebina mepʰe iordanes ɡaɣma 
dzalze moxutsʰi iqo barzilai otʰxmotsʰi tslis is artʃenda mepʰes maxanaimʃi qopʰnisas radɡan dzalze mdidari katsʰi iqo 
da utʰxra mepʰem barzilais tsamomqevi da ɡartʃen ierusalimʃi 
da utʰxra barzilaim mepʰes kidev ramdenia tʃemi sitsʰotsʰxlis dɣeni rom ierusalimʃi tsavqve mepʰes 
otʰxmotsʰi tslisa var axla ɡana ʃemidzlia avisa da karɡis ɡartʃeva ra ɡemo unda ɡauɡos ʃenma msaxurma sasmel sacmels ɡana kidev ʃemidzlia mɡalobeltʰa mosmena ratom unda davatsve tvirtʰad tʃems mepʰe batons 
kidev tsʰotaze ɡahqveba mepʰes ʃeni msaxuri iordanes ɡaɣma aseriɡad ristʰvis mtsqalobs mepʰe 
ukan daabrune ʃeni msaxuri ratʰa tʃems kʰalakʰʃi tʃemi ded mamis sapʰlavtʰan movkvde aha ʃeni msaxuri kʰimhami tsamoɡqveba mepʰe batons da moekʰetsʰi roɡortsʰ ɡenebos 
utʰxra mepʰem tsamomqves kʰimhami da ise movekʰtsʰevi roɡortsʰ ʃen ɡaɡixardeba rasatsʰ ki momtʰxov qvelapʰers aɡisruleb 
da ɡavida mtʰeli xalxi iordanes ɡaɣma da ɡadavida mepʰetsʰ da ɡadakotsʰna mepʰem barzilai daemʃvidoba da isitsʰ dabrunda tʰavis kʰveqanaʃi 
da ɡaemartʰa mepʰe ɡilɡalisken da tʰan tsahqva kʰimhamitsʰ mtʰeli iuda da israelis naxevari atsʰilebda mepʰes 
da aha movida mtʰeli israeli mepʰestʰan da utʰxra mepʰes ratom daɡisakutʰres tʃvenma dzmebma iudaelebma da ɡadaiqvanes mepʰe misi saxli da davitʰis mtʰeli xalxi iordanes ɡaɣma 
miuɡo mtʰelma iudam israels imitom rom tʃveni axlobelia mepʰe rad ɡatsuxebtʰ es ambavi ɡana tʃven mepʰe ɡvartʃens ɡana moutsʰia tʃventʰvis satʃukʰrebi 
da miuɡo israelma iudas da utʰxra tʃemia mepʰis meatʰedi tsili davitʰitsʰ upʰro metad me mekutʰvnis vidre ʃen ratom damamtsʰire ɡana pirvelma me ara vtʰkʰvi sitqva tʃemi mepʰis dasabruneblad israelze upʰro mtkitsʰed laparakobda iuda 
da moxvda ikʰ ertʰi uɡvani katsʰi saxelad ʃebaqi bikʰris dze beniamineli hkra buks da ɡamoatsʰxada ara ɡvakʰvs tsili davitʰtʰan da ara ɡvakʰvs tsili ieses dzeʃi qvela tʰavis karvebisaken israelianebo 
da zurɡi akʰtsʰia davitʰs israelma da ɡahqvnen ʃebaq bikʰris dzes xolo iuda ar moʃorebia tʰavis mepʰes iordanedan ierusalimamde 
da dabrunda mepʰe tʰavis saxlʃi ierusalimʃi da ɡamoiqvana mepʰem atʰi xarca saxlis sapatroneblad rom hqavda datovebuli da tʃasxa ɡansakutʰrebul saxlʃi datsʰvis mitʃenitʰ da artʃenda matʰ maɡram ar ʃedioda matʰtʰan da ɡamoketilni iqvnen sikvdilis dɣemde da kʰvrivebad tsʰxovrobdnen 
da utʰxra mepʰem qamasas sam dɣeʃi ʃemiqare iuda da ʃentsʰ akʰ meaxle 
da tsavida qamasa iudas ʃesaqrelad maɡram ɡadaatsʰila mistʰvis datsesebul vadas 
da utʰxra davitʰma abiʃais abesalomze upʰro metad ɡviborotebs axla ʃebaq bikʰris dze tsaiqvane ʃeni batonis msaxurni da daedevne tʰorem ɡamaɡrebul kʰalakʰebs ipovis da miepʰareba tʃvens tʰvals 
da ɡahqva mas ioabis xalxi da kʰeretʰelni da pʰeletʰelni da ɡavida qvela mamatsʰi ierusalimidan ʃebaq bikʰris dzis dasadevneblad 
ɡabaonʃi did kʰvastʰan rom mividnen qamasa tsarudɡa matʰ ioabs abdʒars zemotʰ tʰasmitʰ maxvili hkʰonda ɡadakidebuli zed tʰedzostʰan tʰavis kʰarkʰaʃitʰ da siarulisas mitsaze stsʰemda 
da utʰxra ioabma qamasas xom mʃvidobitʰ xar dzmao da tsverze mohkida ioabma qamasas mardʒvena xeli sakotsʰnelad 
da ver daitsʰva tʰavi qamasam maxvilisaɡan ioabs rom ecira xelʃi da tʃastsʰa ioabma pʰerdʃi da natslavebi ɡadmoaqrevina mitsaze meored aɣar tʃautsʰia mkvdari iqo da daedevnen ioabi da misi dzma abiʃai ʃebaq bikʰris dzes 
tʰavze edɡa mokluls ioabis msaxurtʰaɡani da ambobda visatsʰ ioabi uqvars da vintsʰ davitʰis mxarezea ɡahqves ioabs 
ʃua ɡzaze sisxlʃi eɡdo qamasa dainaxa im katsʰma rom tʃerdeboda xalxi da ɡadaatʰria ɡzidan qamasa mindorʃi da samoseli ɡadaapʰara radɡan xedavda rom vintsʰ ki tʰavs tsaadɡeboda ɡvams tʃerdeboda 
da rotsʰa ɡzidan ikʰna ɡadatʰreuli qvelani ɡahqvnen ioabs rom ʃebaq bikʰris dzes dasdevnebodnen 
man ki israelis qvela ʃto ɡaiara abel betʰ maqakʰamde da ʃeikribnen berielebi da ɡahqvnen mas 
da movida ioabis xalxi da moimtsqvdies iɡi abel betʰ maqakʰaʃi da aɣmartʰes kʰalakʰis tsin mitsaqrili da miadɡnen kedels mtʰeli xalxi ioabs rom axlda ʃeudɡa kedlis nɡrevas 
da daidzaxa ertʰma ɡonierma dedakatsʰma kʰalakʰis kedlidan isminetʰ isminetʰ utʰxaritʰ ioabs rom axlos movides sitqva makʰvs satʰkʰmeli 
da miuaxlovda mas ioabi da tʰkʰva dedakatsʰma ʃena xar ioabi miuɡo me var utʰxra quri uɡde ʃeni mxevlis sitqvas da tʰkʰva qurs vuɡdeb 
utʰxra dedakatsʰma ase itqodnen dzvelad visatsʰ kitʰxva surs abelʃi ikitʰxon da ise tsqvetden sakʰmes 
me ertʰi mʃvidobiani da patiosani kʰalakʰi var israelis kʰalakʰebʃi ʃen ɡinda ɡaanadɡuro kʰalakʰi deda israelʃi ristʰvis spob upʰlis samkvidros 
da miuɡo ioabma da utʰxra numtsʰ mepʰikʰros nɡreva da ɡanadɡureba 
akʰ sxva ambavia ertʰma katsʰmi epʰremis mtʰidan saxelad ʃebaq bikʰris dzem xeli aɣmartʰa mepʰe davitʰze mxolod is moɡvetsʰitʰ da davexsnebi kʰalakʰs da utʰxra dedakatsʰma ioabs ketʰili ɡalavnidan ɡadmoɡiɡdeben mis tʰavs 
da mivida dedakatsʰi xalxtʰan tʰavisi brədznuli sitqvitʰ da mokvetʰes tʰavi ʃebaq bikʰris dzes da ɡadauɡdes ioabs da buks hkra tʰu ara qvelani mostsʰildnen kʰalakʰs da tʰav tʰavis karvebʃi mimoipʰantnen da ɡabrunda ioabi ierusalimʃi mepʰestʰan 
ioabi sardlobda israelis mtʰels laʃkʰars xolo beniahu iehoiadaqis dze kʰeretʰelebsa da pʰeletʰelebs 
da hadorami xarkis akrepʰas ɡanaɡebda da ioʃapʰat axiludis dze mematiane iqo 
da ʃeva mtserali da tsʰadoki da abiatʰari mɣvdlebi 
da qira iairelitsʰ mɣvdeli iqo davitʰtʰan 
kʰveqanaʃi sam tselitsads zedized ʃimʃiloba iqo davitʰis dɣeebʃi da daekitʰxa davitʰi upʰals da utʰxra upʰalma saulisa da misi sisxliani saxlis ɡamoa ɡabaonelni rom ɡatsqvita 
da daibara mepʰem ɡabaonelni da elaparaka matʰ ɡabaonelni ar iqvnen israelis dzeni aramed danaʃtʰom amoreveltʰa ʃtʰamomavalni iqvnen israelis dzetʰ ʃehpʰitsʰes matʰ maɡram sauli tsʰdilobda matʰ ɡatsqvetas israelis dzetʰa da iudas mimartʰ ʃuris ɡamo 
da utʰxra davitʰma ɡabaonelebs ra ɡaɡiketʰotʰ rom ɡamovisqido tsʰodva rom akurtʰxotʰ upʰlis samkvidro 
da utʰxres ɡabaonelebma artsʰ vertsʰxli da artsʰ okʰro ar ɡvinda saulisɡan da misi saxlisɡan artsʰ imas movitʰxovtʰ rom vinme moklan israelʃi da tʰkʰva mepʰem rasatsʰ itqvitʰ aɡisruldebatʰ 
da utʰxres mepʰes raki ɡvanadɡurebda is katsʰi da tʃvens ɡadaʃenebas tsʰdilobda israelis sazɣvrebidan 
tʃaɡvabare ʃvidi katsʰi mis ʃtʰamomavaltʰaɡan da tʃventsʰ tʃamovkidebtʰ matʰ upʰlis tsinaʃe upʰlis rtʃeulis saulis ɡibqaʃi tʰkʰva mepʰem tʃaɡabarebtʰ 
da daindo mepʰem mepʰiboʃetʰi dze ionatʰanisa saulis dzisa da upʰlis pʰitsʰis ɡamo romelitsʰ dadebuli iqo matʰ ʃoris davitʰsa da ionatʰan saulis dzis ʃoris 
da tsamoiqvana mepʰem ori dze ritsʰpʰasi aias asulisa romelmatsʰ uʃva sauls armoni da mepʰiboʃetʰi da tsamoiqvana xutʰi dze mikʰalisa saulis asulisa romlebitsʰ man uʃva qadriels mexolatʰeli barzilais dzes 
da xeltʰ mistsʰa ɡabaonelebs da matʰatsʰ tʃamohkides isini mtʰaze upʰlis tsinaʃe da daiɣupa ʃvidive ertʰad moiklnen isini mkatʰatʰvis pirvel dɣeebʃi kʰerebis mkis dasatsqisʃi 
da aiɣo ritsʰpʰam aias asulma dʒvalo daipʰina kldestʰan da iqo ikʰ mkis datsqebidan vidre tsʰiurma tsqalma ar itsvima matʰze da uɡeriebda ɡvamebs dɣisitʰ tsʰis pʰrinvelebs da ɣamitʰ mtatsʰebel tsʰxovelebs 
da ʃeatqobines davitʰs ratsʰ ɡaaketʰa ritsʰpʰam aias asulma saulis xarcam 
da maʃin tsavida davitʰi da tsamoiɣo saulisa da misi dzis ionatʰanis dzvlebi ɡilqadis iabiʃis mkvidrtʰaɡan romeltʰatsʰ moipares isini betʰ ʃanis moednidan sadatsʰ pʰilistimelebma tʃamokides rotsʰa mokles pʰilistimelebma sauli ɡilboaqʃi 
da amoitana ikʰidan saulisa da misi dzis ionatʰanis dzvlebi da mokripʰes tʃamokidebultʰa dzvlebi 
da damarxes saulisa da misi dzis ionatʰanis dzvlebi beniaminis kʰveqanaʃi tsʰelaqʃi kiʃis misi mamis samarxʃi da qvelapʰeri ʃeasrules ratsʰ nabrdzanebi hkʰonda mepʰes amis ʃemdeɡ moiɣo ɣmertʰma kʰveqanaze motsqaleba 
da kidev moxda brdzola pʰilistimelebsa da israels ʃoris da tʃamovida davitʰi tʰavis xalxitʰurtʰ da ʃeebrdzolnen pʰilistimelebs da daiɣala davitʰi 
maʃin iʃbi benobma rapʰas naʃiertʰaɡanma romelsatsʰ samasʃekeliani spilendzis ʃubi hkʰonda da axali maxvili ertqa tselze davitʰis mokvla ɡanizraxa 
da mieʃvela mas abiʃai tsʰeruias dze da dahkra pʰilistimels da mokla iɡi maʃin daapʰitsʰes davitʰi misma xalxma da utʰxres aɣar ɡamoxvide tʃventʰan ertʰad sabrdzolvelad rom israelis lampari ar tʃaakʰro 
amis ʃemdeɡ kvlav moxda brdzola pʰilistimelebtʰan ɡobʃi maʃin sibekʰai xuʃatʰelma ɡanɡmira sapʰi romelitsʰ rapʰas naʃiertʰaɡani iqo 
kidev moxda brdzola ɡobʃi pʰilistimelebtʰan da elxananma iaqare oreɡimis dzem betʰlemelma ɡanɡmira ɡitʰeli ɡoliatʰi romlis ʃubis tari mkʰsoveltʰa lilvisodena iqo 
kidev moxda brdzola ɡatʰʃi da iqo ikʰ uzarmazari katsʰi romelsatsʰ xelebze da pʰexebze ekʰvs ekʰvsi tʰitʰi esxa sul otsʰdaotʰxi isitsʰ rapʰas naʃieri iqo 
da dastsʰinoda israels maɡram ɡanɡmira iɡi ionatʰanma ʃimqis dzem davitʰis dzmistsulma 
es otʰxi eqola rapʰas ɡatʰʃi da qvelani davitʰisa da mis msaxurtʰa xelitʰ daetsʰnen 
da tsarmotʰkʰva davitʰma upʰlisadmi am ɡalobis sitqvebi ra dɣesatsʰ ixsna upʰalma iɡi qvela misi mtrisa da saulis xelidan 
da tʰkʰva upʰali kldea tʃemi 
ɣmertʰi kldea tʃemi romelsatsʰ vesav pʰaria tʃemi da tʰavʃesapʰari tʃemo mxsnelo ʃen mixseni modzaladisaɡan 
upʰals didebuls ʃevɣaɣade da mtrebs ɡadavurtʃi 
momatsqdnen sikvdilis talɣebi daɣupvis niaɣvrebma ʃemaʃines 
ʃavetʰis kʰselebi ʃemomexlartʰa sikvdilis badeebma momitsʰves 
tʃems ɡasacirʃi ʃevɣaɣade upʰals tʃems ɣmertʰs ʃevdzaxe da ismina tʰavis sasaxleʃi tʃemi xma da tʃemi ɣaɣadi mistsvda mis qurebs 
da ʃebarbatsʰda ʃetokda dedamitsa tsʰatʰa sapʰudzvelni idzrodnen da irqeodnen radɡan risxvitʰ aɣeɡzno iɡi 
avarda kvamli misi nestoebidan da ʃemcmeli tsʰetsʰxli misi baɡeebidan misɡan muɡuzlebi aɡizɡizdnen 
da modrika tsʰani da tʃamovida ɣrubeli moekʰtsʰa pʰexkʰveʃ 
da amxedrda kʰerubimze da ɡapʰrinda da kʰaris pʰrtʰebze ɡamotʃnda 
karvad tsqvdiadi moibura tsqlis dʒurɣmuli da tsʰis ɣrubeli 
misi brətsqinvalebitʰ ɡizɡizeben tsʰetsʰxlis nakvertsʰxlebi 
da tsʰidan daikʰuxa upʰalma da uzenaesma xma ɡamostsʰa 
da isrebi ɡatqortsʰna da mimoipʰanta tʃemi mtrebi da iɡrəɡvina da ɡza kvali aubnia 
da ɡamotʃnda zɣvis pʰskeri ɡaʃiʃvldnen samqaros sapʰudzvelni upʰlis mukʰarisɡan misi risxvis kʰarisaɡan 
xeli ɡadmoqo zeɡardmo tʃamcida da tsqlis morevidan amomiqvana 
mixsna dzlieri mtrisɡan tʃems modzuletʰaɡan 
cirʃi viqav rotsʰa dametsʰnen maɡram upʰali iqo tʃemi saqrdeni 
pʰartʰoze ɡamiqvana da mixsna radɡan ʃemitkbo man 
momizɣo upʰalma tʃemi simartʰlisamebr da tʃemi xelebis sitsmindisamebr ɡadamixada 
radɡan vitsʰavdi upʰlis ɡzas da tʃemi ɣmertʰisatʰvis ar ʃemitsʰodavs 
radɡan misi mtsʰnebebi tsin medo da misi tsesebistʰvis ar ɡadamixvevia 
tsrpʰeli viqav mis mimartʰ da tsʰodvas ɡavurbodi 
da ɡadamixada upʰalma tʃemi simartʰlisaebr da sitsmindisaebr mis tʰvalʃi 
motsqalestʰan motsqaleob tsrpʰel katsʰtʰan tsrpʰelob 
umtsikvlostʰan umtsikvlo xar da ukuɣmartʰtʰan misi tsʰbierebisamebr 
datʃaɡrultʰa mxsneli xar da medidurebs mzeritʰ atsʰamtvereb 
radɡan upʰalo tʃemi lampari xar upʰali bnels minatʰebs 
radɡan ʃenitʰ urdoebs ʃevebmebi tʃemi ɣmertʰitʰ ɡalavans ɡadavevlebi 
tsrpʰelia ɣvtʰis ɡza tsmidaa upʰlis sitqva mis moimedetʰa pʰaria iɡi 
radɡan sad aris sxva ɣmertʰi ɡarda upʰlisa sad aris klde ɡarda tʃveni ɣvtʰisa 
ɣmertʰia tʃemi ɡamadzlierebeli da ɡzis tsrpʰelad tsarmmartʰveli 
irmis pʰexebs ʃemabams da tʃems ɡorakze damaqenebs 
sabrdzolvelad ɡamitsrətʰvnis xelebs da mocimavs spilendzis mʃvilds tʃemi mklavi 
xsnis pʰars ʃen madzlev da ʃeni motsqaleba ɡanmadidebs 
ʃen mipʰartʰoeb nabidʒebs da aɣar metʃortʰeba kocebi 
mters vedevnebi mosaspobad da ar vbrundebi vidre bolos ar movuɣeb 
vspob da vanadɡureb da veɣar dɡebian tʃems pʰexebtʰan etsʰemian 
ʃen ʃemomsartqlav dzalas sabrdzolvelad tʃems tsinaʃe atʃokʰeb tʃems tsinaaɣmdɡomebs 
mtrebis zurɡs matʃveneb da vatsʰamtvereb tʃems modzuleebs 
akʰetʰ ikʰitʰ ixedebian maɡram ara tʃans mxsneli upʰlisaken maɡram xmas ar stsʰems 
mitsis mtverivitʰ vatsʰamtvereb kʰutʃis ɡoroxivitʰ vamtvrev da vdʒeɡav 
ʃen mixsni tʃemi meamboxe xalxisaɡan ʃen minaxav erebis mtʰavrad xalxi romelsatsʰ ar vitsʰnobdi memsaxureba 
utsʰxo xalxebi mepirpʰerebian roɡortsʰ ki moesmebatʰ tʃemi memortʃilebian 
utsʰxotʰesltʰ ɣone exdebatʰ ɡarbian tʰaviantʰi simaɡreebidan 
tsʰotsʰxal ars upʰali kurtʰxeul ars klde tʃemi amaɣldes tʃemi ɣmertʰi klde tʃemi xsnisa 
ɣmertʰi tʃemi ʃurismɡebeli xalxebis tʃemtʰvis dammortʃilebeli 
mtrebisɡan tʃemi ɡamridebeli da tʃems modʒanqeebze tʃemi amamaɣlebeli modzaladetʰaɡan tʃemi dampʰaravi 
amitom ɡadideb ʃen upʰalo xalxtʰa ʃoris da ʃens saxels vuɡalob 
didi xsnis momtani tʰavisi mepʰistʰvis mtsqalobeli tʰavisi tsʰxebulisatʰvis davitʰistʰvis da misi modɡmistʰvis ukunisamde 
es aris davitʰis ukanaskneli sitqvebi romelnitsʰ tsarmotʰkʰva davitʰma ieses dzem katsʰma maɣla dadɡinebulma iakobis ɣvtʰis tsʰxebulma da israelis tkbilxmianma mɡalobelma 
upʰlis suli metqvelebs tʃemitʰ da tʃems enazea misi sitqva 
mitʰxra israelis ɣmertʰma melaparaka israelis klde martʰali katsʰi ɣvtʰis ʃiʃitʰ ixelmtsipʰebs 
da ikʰneba iɡi uɣrublo dila natʰeba natsvimarze mitsidan amoxasxasebuli balaxi 
ɡana asetʰi ar aris radɡan man damido saukuno aɣtʰkʰma qovelmxriv ɡatsqobili da daurɣveveli ɡana misɡan ar aɣmotsʰendeba qoveli tʃemi ɡamardʒveba da qoveli tʃemi natvra 
uketʰurni ɡadaqrilni ikʰnebian qvelani eklebivitʰ xelitʰ rom ar aiɣeba 
axlos mimsvlels rkina unda eciros da ʃubis tari tsʰetsʰxlʃi amoibuɡebian adɡilzeve sadatsʰ qrian 
esenia davitʰis moqmetʰa saxelebi ioʃeb baʃebetʰ tʰaxkʰemoneli etlosantʰa metʰauri romelmatsʰ moukʰnia ʃubi rvaas katsʰs da ertʰ dʒerze daxotsʰa 
mas ʃemdeɡ eleazari dze dodosi axoxis dzisa ertʰ ertʰi im sam moqmetʰaɡani romelnitsʰ axldnen davitʰs rotsʰa landzɣvitʰ itsvevdnen sabrdzolvelad ʃekrebil pʰilistimelebs 
israelni rom ɡamovidnen matʰ tsinaaɣmdeɡ da ʃeimartʰa iɡi da musravda pʰilistimelebs manamde vidre mardʒvena xeli ar daubuʒda da maxvilis vadas ar mietseba didi xsna moitana im dɣes upʰalma da mxolod imistʰvis ɡamohqva mas xalxi rom edzartsʰvatʰ mkvdrebi 
mas ʃemdeɡ ʃama aɡes dze harareli rotsʰa saomrad ʃeiqarnen pʰilistimelebi iqo ikʰ qanis nakvetʰi sadatsʰ tsʰertsʰvi etʰesa da ukuikʰtsʰa xalxi pʰilistimeltʰaɡan 
da tʃadɡa iɡi ʃua qanaʃi da itsʰavda mas musri ɡaavlo pʰilistimelebs didi xsna moitana maʃin upʰalma 
da tʃamovidnen es samni otsʰdaatʰi metʰauridan da mividnen davitʰtʰan qadulamis ɡamokʰvabulʃi mkis dros xolo pʰilistimeltʰa urdoebi repʰaimis velze iqvnen dabanakebulni 
davitʰi maʃin sapʰarʃi iqo xolo pʰilistimelebis qarauli betʰlemʃi idɡa 
da mostsqurda davitʰs da tʰkʰva vin ʃemasmevs betʰlemis cis tsqals karibcestʰan rom aris 
da ɡaarɣvia am samma moqmem pʰilistimeltʰa banaki da amoiɣes tsqali betʰlemis cidan karibcestʰan rom aris tsamoiɣes da miutanes davitʰs maɡram man ar indoma misi ʃesma da upʰals dauɣvara 
da tʰkʰva ʃors iqos tʃemɡan upʰalo asetʰi sakʰme numtsʰ ʃemesvas am vaʒkatsʰtʰa sisxli tʰavis ɡasatsirad rom tsavidnen da ar indoma davitʰma tsqlis ʃesma es sakʰmeebi hkʰonda tʃadenili am sam moqmes 
abiʃai ioabis dzma tsʰeruias dze otsʰdaatʰis tʰavi iqo samas katsʰs moukʰnia ʃubi da ɡanɡmira da hkʰonda mas saxeli im samtʰa ʃoris 
samʃi metad iqo pativdebuli da matʰ metʰaurobda maɡram im sams ver utoldeboda 
benaiahu iehoiadaqis dze dauɣalavi vaʒkatsʰi kabtsʰeelidan man daamartsʰxa ori dze moabelisa is tʃavida ormoʃi da mokla lomi tʰovlian dɣes 
manve mokla ertʰi eɡvipteli katsʰi saʃineli ʃesaxedavi ʃubi ecira xelʃi eɡviptels tʃauxta ketitʰ xelidan ɡamostatsʰa ʃubi eɡviptels da misive ʃubitʰ ɡanɡmira 
es ɡaaketʰa benaiahu iehoiadaqis dzem da saxeli moixveca samtʰa moqmetʰa ʃoris 
otsʰdaatʰidan ɡamoirtʃeoda tʰumtsʰa im sams ver ɡautolda tʰavis mtsʰveltʰa metʰaurad daniʃna iɡi davitʰma 
qasaeli ioabis dzma ertʰ ertʰi otsʰdaatʰtʰaɡani iqo elxanani misi bidzaʃvili betʰlemeli 
ʃama xarodeli elika xarodeli 
xeletsʰ pʰaltieli qira qikeʃis dze tʰekoaqeli 
abiqezer qanatʰotʰeli mebunai xuʃatʰeli 
tsʰalmon axoxeli maharai netopʰatʰeli 
xeleb baqanas dze netopʰatʰeli itʰai ribas dze beniaminis ɡibqadan 
benaiahu pʰirqatʰoneli hidai ɡaqaʃidan 
abiqalbon qarbatʰeli qazmavetʰ barxumeli 
eliaxba ʃaqalboneli iaʃenis dzetʰaɡan ionatʰani 
ʃama harareli axiam ʃararis dze arareli 
elipʰelet axasbais dze maqakʰatʰeli eliqam axitʰopʰelis dze ɡiloneli 
xetsʰrai kʰarmeleli pʰaqarai arbeli 
iɡal natʰanis dze tsʰobadan bani ɡadeli 
tsʰelek qamoneli naxarai beerotʰeli ioabis tsʰeruias dzis sacurveltʰmtvirtʰveli 
qira itʰreli ɡareb itʰreli 
uria xetʰeli sul otsʰdatʃvidmeti 
kvlav aɣiɡzno upʰlis risxva israelze da tsaakʰeza man davitʰi matʰ tsinaaɣmdeɡ da atʰkʰmevina tsadi aɣritsʰxe israeli da iuda 
da utʰxra mepʰem ioabs tʰavis laʃkʰris sardals ʃemoiare israelis qvela ʃto danidan beer ʃebaqamde da aɣritsʰxe xalxi rom vitsʰode xalxis ritsʰxvi 
da utʰxra ioabma mepʰes upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma ʃematos ers ertʰi amdeni da kidev asdʒer meti da amis momstsre ɡaxados mepʰe batoni maɡram rad ineba mepʰe batonma es sakʰme 
da idzala mepʰis sitqvam ioabze da laʃkʰris sardlebze da ɡavidnen mepʰisɡan ioabi da laʃkʰris sardlebi israeli xalxis aɣsaritsʰxavad 
da ɡavidnen iordanes ɡaɣma da qaroqerʃi daibanakes kʰalakʰis mardʒvniv ɡadis xeobaʃi rom mdebareobs iaqezeris pirdapir 
da mividnen ɡilqadʃi da tʰaxtʰim xodʃis mxareʃi akʰedan tsavidnen daniaqanʃi da tsʰidonis midamoebʃi 
mividnen tsʰoris tsʰixe simaɡrestʰan da moiares xiveltʰa da kʰanaaneltʰa qvela kʰalakʰi da ɡavidnen iudas samxretʰitʰ beer ʃebaqʃi 
da moiares mtʰeli kʰveqana da tsʰxra tʰvisa da otsʰi dɣis ʃemdeɡ ierusalimʃi dabrundnen 
da miartʰva iaobma mepʰes xalxis aɣritsʰxvis ɡraɡnili da aɣmotʃnda israelʃi rvaasi atʰasi mebrdzoli maxvilis maʃiʃvelebeli da iudaʃi xutʰasi atʰasi katsʰi 
da ɡulma dahkra davitʰs mas ʃemdeɡ ratsʰ aɣritsʰxa eri da utʰxra davitʰma upʰals didad ʃevtsʰode es rom ɡavaketʰe axla ɡevedrebi ʃen upʰalo miuteve ʃetsʰodeba ʃens msaxurs radɡan uɡunurad movikʰetsʰi 
meore dɣes rotsʰa adɡa davitʰi upʰlis sitqva ɡamoetsʰxada tsinastsarmetqvel ɡads davitʰis misans 
tsadi da utʰxari davitʰs ase ambobs tʰkʰo upʰali sams ʃemoɡtʰavazeb ertʰ ertʰi airtʃie rom daɡsadʒo 
da mivida ɡadi davitʰtʰan da ɡamoutsʰxada es ambavi ra ɡidʒobs ʃvidtsliani ʃimʃili ʃens kʰveqanaʃi sami tʰvis ltolvileba ʃeni mtrebisɡan da matʰɡan ʃeni devna tʰu ʃavi ciri sam dɣes ʃens kʰveqanaʃi axla ipʰikʰre da atson datsone ra pasuxi mivutano tʃems momavlinebels 
da utʰxra davitʰma ɡads metismetad damtsuxrebuli var maɡram midʒobs upʰlis xelʃi tʃavvarde radɡan didia misi motsqaleba oɣond katsʰis xelʃi nu tʃavvardebi 
da moavlina upʰalma ʃavi ciri israelʃi im dɣidan datʰkʰmul dromde da ɡatsqda danidan beer ʃebaqamde samotsʰdaatʰi atʰasi katsʰi 
da ɡaitsoda xeli anɡelozma ierusalimisken mis dasaɣupavad maɡram upʰalma akmara ubedureba da utʰxra xalxis damɣupvel anɡelozs kmara axla ukan tsaiɣe xeli aravna iebusevelis kalostʰan idɡa upʰlis anɡelozi 
da utʰxra davitʰma upʰals xalxis ʃemmusvreli anɡelozis danaxvisas aha me ki ʃevtsʰode da davaʃave maɡram am tsʰxvrebma ra ɡaaketʰes tʃemze da mamatʃemis saxlze iqos ʃeni xeli 
da mivida davitʰtʰan ɡadi imave dɣes da utʰxra tsadi da aɣumartʰe upʰals samsxverplo aravna iebusevelis kaloze 
da tsavida davitʰi ɡadis sitqvisamebr roɡortsʰ ubrdzana upʰalma 
da ɡamoixeda aravnam da dainaxa misken momavali mepʰe da misi msaxurni da ɡamovida aravna da mdablad tʰaqvanistsʰa mepʰes 
da tʰkʰva aravnam ristʰvis mosula mepʰe batoni tʰavis msaxurtʰan utʰxra davitʰma ʃenɡan kalos saqidlad da upʰlis samsxverplos asaɡebad ratʰa ɡaneridos xalxs ʒamianoba 
da utʰxra aravnam davitʰs aiɣos da aɣavlinos mepʰe batonma ratsʰ nebavs aha xarebi sruladdasatsvelad aha kevri da xaris uɣeli ʃeʃad 
qvelapʰeri mistsʰa mepʰes aravnam da utʰxra aravnam mepʰes upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ɡtsqalobdes 
da utʰxra mepʰem aravnas ara sapʰasuritʰ unda viqido ʃenɡan ver ʃevtsirav upʰals tʃems ɣmertʰs mukʰtʰ sruladdasatsvels da iqida mepʰem kalo da xarebi ormotsʰdaatʰ ʃekel vertsʰxlad 
da auɡo davitʰma ikʰ upʰals samsxverplo aɣavlina aɣsavleni da samʃvidobo msxverpli da ʃeitsqala upʰalma kʰveqana da ɡanerida ʒamianoba israels 
moxutsʰda mepʰe davitʰi xanʃi ʃevida axuravdnen samoslebs maɡram ver tʰbeboda 
da utʰxres misma msaxurebma ɡamoudzebnon tʃvens mepʰe batons axalɡazrda kʰaltsuli kʰali rom tsardɡes mepʰis tsinaʃe da mouaros mas da ɡverdʃi dautsves maʃin ɡatʰbeba tʃveni batoni mepʰe 
da dautsqes dzebna lamaz qmatsvil kʰals mtʰels israelʃi da ipovnes abiʃaɡ ʃunameli da mihɡvares iɡi mepʰes 
dzalze lamazi iqo qmatsvili kʰali da ɡaxda iɡi mepʰis momvleli da emsaxureboda mas maɡram mepʰes ar ʃeutsʰvnia is 
ɡamedidurda adonia xaɡitʰis dze da ase ambobda me unda vimepʰo ɡaitʃina etlebi da mxedrebi da ormotsʰdaatʰi malemsrboli 
da ar usaqveduria mamamiss ase ratom ikʰtsʰevio tʰanatsʰ tʰvaltanadi qmatsvili iqo adonia abesalomis ʃemdeɡ eqola iɡi dedamiss 
ioabtʰan tsʰeruias dzestʰan da abitʰar mɣvdeltʰan hkʰonda sakʰme dacerili da isini exmarebodnen adonias 
tsʰadok mɣvdeli benaia iehoiadaqis dze natʰan tsinastsarmetqveli ʃimqi reqi da davitʰis moqmeni mxars ar ucerdnen adonias 
da daxotsʰa adoniam tsʰxvrebi xarebi nasukʰali mozvrebi zoxeletʰis kʰvastʰan qen roɡelis maxloblad rom aris da moitsvia tʰavisi dzmebi upʰlistsulebi da iudaeli katsʰebi mepʰis msaxurni 
xolo natʰan tsinastsarmetqveli benaia da is moqmeni da solomoni tʰavisi dzma ar moitsvia 
da utʰxra natʰanma batʰ ʃebaqs solomonis dedas ɡaiɡe rom ɡamepʰda adonia xaɡitʰis ʃvili tʃvenma batonma davitʰma ki arapʰeri itsʰis 
axla modi ertʰ rames ɡirtʃev uʃvele tʰavs da solomons ʃens ʃvils 
tsadi ʃedi davitʰ mepʰestʰan da utʰxari ɡana ʃen ar iqavi mepʰe batono rom ʃemompʰitsʰe ʃens mxevals ʃeni vaʒi solomoni imepʰebso tʃems ʃemdeɡ is dadʒdebao tʃems taxtze maʃ ratom ɡamepʰda adonia 
da aha vidre ʃen mepʰestʰan laparakʃi ikʰnebi metsʰ ʃemoval da sitqvas ʃeɡatsev 
da ʃevida batʰ ʃebaqi mepʰestʰan otʰaxʃi dzalze moxutsʰi iqo mepʰe da abiʃaɡ ʃunameli uvlida mepʰes 
tʰavi daxara batʰ ʃebaqma da tʰaqvanistsʰa mepʰes da utʰxra mepʰem ra ɡinda 
da utʰxra tʃemo mepʰe batono xom ʃehpʰitsʰe ʃens mxevals upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis saxelitʰ solomoni ʃeni vaʒi ɡamepʰdebao tʃems ʃemdeɡ da dadʒdebao tʃems taxtze 
axla aha adonia ʃen ki mepʰe batono arapʰeri ɡaɡiɡia 
mravlad daxotsʰa xarebi nasukʰali mozvrebi da tsʰxvrebi da moitsvia qvela upʰlistsuli xolo abiatʰar mɣvdeli mxedartʰmtʰavari ioabi ʃeni msaxuri solomoni ar moutsvevia 
ʃen ki tʃemo batono mepʰe xar da ʃenskenaa mtʰeli israelis tʰvali rom ɡamoutsʰxado tʰu vin ava tʃemi mepʰe batonis taxtze ʃens ʃemdeɡ 
tʰorem rotsʰa ɡanisvenebs mepʰe batoni mama papastʰan damnaʃaveni ɡamovaltʰ me da tʃemi ʃvili solomoni 
da aha vidre elaparakeboda mepʰes natʰan tsinastsarmetqvelitsʰ movida 
moaxsenes mepʰes aha natʰan tsinastsarmetqveli ʃevida mepʰestʰan da mdablad tʰaqvanistsʰa mepʰes 
da tʰkʰva natʰanma mepʰe batono ʃen tʰkʰvi adonia ɡamepʰdeso tʃems ʃemdeɡ da dadʒdeso tʃems taxtze 
radɡan tʃamovida dɣes mravlad daxotsʰa xarebi mozvrebi da tsʰxvrebi da moitsvia qvela upʰlistsuli dʒaris sardlebi abiatʰar mɣvdeli axla ikʰ arian da camen da svamen mis tsinaʃe ɡahqvirian itsʰotsʰxlos mepʰe adoniam 
ar mivutsvevivar artsʰ me ʃeni msaxuri artsʰ tsʰadok mɣvdeli artsʰ benaia iehoiadaqis dze da artsʰ solomoni ʃeni msaxuri 
tʰu mepʰe batonisɡan modis es brdzaneba ratom ar ɡamaɡebine ʃens msaxurs vin dadʒdeboda mepʰe batonis taxtze mis ʃemdeɡ 
da miuɡo mepʰe davitʰma da utʰxra batʰ ʃebaqs damidzaxetʰ da ʃevida iɡi mepʰestʰan da tsarudɡa mepʰes 
da daipʰitsʰa mepʰem da tʰkʰva motsme iqos upʰali romelmatsʰ mixsna qvela ɡacirvebidan 
rom roɡortsʰ ʃemoɡpʰitsʰe upʰlis israelis ɣvtʰis saxelitʰ ʃeni vaʒi solomoni ɡamepʰdeba metʰkʰi tʃems ʃemdeɡ da is dadʒdeba metʰkʰi tʃems taxtze tʃems natsʰvlad ase ɡavaketʰeb dɣes 
da mitsamde daxara tʰavi batʰ ʃebaqma da tʰaqvanistsʰa mepʰes da utʰxra itsʰotsʰxlos tʃemma patronma mepʰe davitʰma saukunod 
da tʰkʰva mepʰe davitʰma damidzaxetʰ tsʰadok mɣvdels natʰan tsinastsarmetqvels da benaia iehoiadaqis dzes da isinitsʰ tsardɡnen mepʰis tsinaʃe 
da utʰxra matʰ mepʰem iaxletʰ tʰkʰveni batonis msaxurni ʃesvitʰ tʃemi ʃvili solomoni tʃems dʒorze da ɡixonʃi tʃaiqvanetʰ 
da ikʰ stsʰxon iɡi israelis mepʰed tsʰadok mɣvdelma da natʰan tsinastsarmetqvelma da hkaritʰ buks da ɡamoatsʰxadetʰ itsʰotsʰxlos mepʰe solomonma 
da amohqevitʰ mas mova da dadʒdeba tʃems taxtze da imepʰebs tʃems natsʰvlad is davniʃne me israelisa da iudas mtʰavrad 
da miuɡo benaia ieohoiadaqis dzem mepʰes da utʰxra ceʃmaritad aseve tʰkʰvas upʰalma tʃemi mepʰe batonis ɣmertʰma 
da roɡortsʰ tʃems mepʰe batontʰan iqo upʰali aseve iqos solomontʰanatsʰ tʃemi mepʰe batonis davitʰis taxtze metad aɣamaɣlos misi taxti 
da tʃavidnen tsʰadok mɣvdeli natʰan tsinastsarmetqveli benaia iehoiadaqis dze kʰeretʰelni da pʰeretʰelni ʃesves solomon mepʰe davitʰis dʒorze da ɡixonisken tsaiqvanes 
da ɡamoitana tsʰadok mɣvdelma karvidan rkʰitʰ zetʰi da stsʰxo solomons da hkres buks da tʰkʰva mtʰelma xalxma itsʰotsʰxlos mepʰe solomonma 
da ukan amohqva mtʰeli xalxi solomons da stvirebs ukravda xalxi da xarobda didi sixarulitʰ mitsa irqeoda matʰi qiʒinisaɡan 
is iqo mortʃnen purobas adonia da misi stumrebi rom moesmatʰ es qiʒina da ɡaiɡona ioabma bukis xma da tʰkʰva ram aaxmaura kʰalakʰi 
dʒer isev laparakobda da aha movida ionatʰani abiatʰar mɣvdlis ʃvili da tʰkʰva adoniam modi radɡan vaʒkatsʰi katsʰi xar da karɡi ambavi moɡakʰvs 
da miuɡo ioanatʰanma adonias da utʰxra vaɡlax solomoni ɡaamepʰa tʃvenma batonma davitʰ mepʰem 
da ɡaaqola mas mepʰem tsʰadok mɣvdeli natʰan tsinastsarmetqveli benaia iehoiadaqis dze kʰretʰelebi da pʰeretʰelebi da ʃesves iɡi mepʰis dʒorze 
da mepʰed stsʰxes ɡixonʃi tsʰadok mɣvdelma da natʰan tsinastsarmetqvelma da ɡamxiarulebulni amovidnen ikʰidan da ʃeidzra kʰalakʰi es xma iqo tʰkʰven rom ɡaiɡonetʰ 
ukve zis solomoni samepʰo taxtze 
da mividnen kidetsʰ da miulotsʰes mepʰis msaxurebma tʃvens batons davitʰ mepʰes da utʰxres ʃens saxelze metad ʃeamkos upʰalma solomonis saxeli da ʃens taxtze metad ɡanadidos misi taxti da kʰedi moixara satsolze mepʰem 
ase tʰkʰva kidetsʰ mepʰem kurtʰxeulia upʰali ɣmertʰi israelisa romelmatsʰ momtsʰa tʰvalxiluls tʃemi taxtis memkvidre da tʰvalitʰ maxilvina 
da ʃeeʃindatʰ adonias stumrebs tsamoiʃalnen da tʰav tʰavisi ɡzitʰ tsavidnen 
xolo adoniam solomonis ʃiʃitʰ samsxverplos miaʃura da moecida mis rkʰebs 
da ʃeatqobines solomons aha ʃeeʃinda adonias mepʰe solomonis da samsxverplos rkʰebs moecida da ambobs ʃemompʰitsʰos dɣes mepʰe solomonma rom maxvilitʰ ar moklavs tʰavis msaxurs 
da tʰkʰva solomonma tʰu tsrpʰelad moikʰtsʰeva misi tʰmis ertʰi ɣeritsʰ ar davardeba mitsaze maɡram tʰu mzakvroba ɡaivlo ɡulʃi mokvdeba 
da ɡaɡzavna solomonma xalxi da tʃamoiqvanes iɡi samsxverplodan mivida da tʰaqvanistsʰa mepʰe solomons da utʰxra solomonma tsadi ʃens saxlʃi 
da moaxlovda davitʰis sikvdilis ʒami da es uanderdza man tʰavis ʃvils solomons 
mivdivar mtʰeli kʰveqnis ɡzitʰ ɡamaɡrdi da katsʰi iqavi 
da daimarxe upʰlis ʃeni ɣmertʰis samarxveli iare mis ɡzaze daitsʰavi misi tsesebi misi mtsʰnebani misi samartʰali misi motsmobani roɡortsʰ stseria moses rdʒulʃi rom xeli moɡemartʰos qvelapʰerʃi rasatsʰ ɡaaketʰeb da qvelɡan saitʰkenatsʰ pirs miakʰtsʰev 
rom aɣasrulos upʰalma tʃemze natʰkʰvami tʰavisi sitqva tʰu ʃeni ʃvilebi daitsʰaven tʰaviantʰ ɡzas da ivlian tʃems tsinaʃe ceʃmaritebitʰ da mtʰeli ɡulitʰa da sulitʰ ar daɡeleva katsʰi israelis taxtze 
ʃentsʰ itsʰi ra ɡamiketʰa ioab tsʰeruaias dzem ra ɡauketʰa israelis laʃkʰris or sardals abner neris dzes da qamasa ietʰeris dzes roɡor daxotsʰa isini da mʃvidobis dros brdzolis sisxli daɣvara brdzolis sisxli moitsʰxo sartqelze da pʰexsamosze 
brədznulad moikʰetsʰi da mʃvidobitʰ nu tʃauʃveb mis caɣaras ʃavetʰʃi 
xolo barzilai ɡilqadelis ʃvilebs tsqaloba miaɡe tʰanameinaxeebad ɡqavdes supʰraze radɡan axlobloba hkʰondatʰ tʃemtʰan rotsʰa ʃens dzmas abesaloms ɡavurbodi 
aha ʃentʰan aris ʃimqi ɡeras dze beniamineli baxurimidan is iqo rom mtsared mtsqevlida rotsʰa maxanaimʃi mivdiodi maɡram is iordaneze tʃamovida tʃems ʃesaxvedrad da metsʰ upʰlis saxelitʰ ʃevpʰitsʰe maxvilitʰ ar moɡklav metʰkʰi 
ʃen ki nu datoveb dausdʒels radɡan brdzeni katsʰi xar da itsʰi roɡor unda moekʰtsʰe rom sisxliani caɣaritʰ tʃaiqvano ʃavetʰʃi 
da ɡanisvena davitʰma tʰavis mamebtʰan da daimarxa davitʰis kʰalakʰʃi 
xani davitʰis mepʰobisa israelze iqo ormotsʰi tseli xebronʃi ʃvid tsels mepʰobda ierusalimʃi otsʰdatsʰamet tsels 
da dadʒda solomoni mamamisis davitʰis taxtze da didad ɡanmtkitsʰda misi mepʰoba 
da mivida adonia xaɡitʰis dze batʰ ʃebaqtʰan solomonis dedastʰan da utʰxra kʰalma mʃvidobitʰ xar mosuli da utʰxra mʃvidobitʰ 
da utʰxra sakʰme makʰvs ʃentʰan da utʰxra tʰkʰvi 
da tʰkʰva ʃen itsʰi rom tʃemi iqo mepʰoba da me ʃemomqurebda mtʰeli israeli rom mepʰe ɡavmxdariqavi maɡram tsamivida mepʰoba da tʃems dzmas erɡo radɡan upʰlisɡan hkʰonda mitsʰemuli 
axla ertʰi satʰxovari makʰvs ʃentʰan nu ɡamatsbileb miuɡo kʰalma tʰkʰvi 
da tʰkʰva utʰxari solomon mepʰes uars ar ɡetqvis ʃen rom ar ɡamatsbilos da tsʰolad momtsʰes abiʃaɡ ʃunameli 
da tʰkʰva batʰ ʃebaqma karɡi davelaparakebi ʃenze mepʰes 
da mivida batʰ ʃebaqi mepʰe solomontʰan rom adoniaze dalaparakeboda da tsardɡa mepʰe mis ʃesaxvedrad da tʰaqvanistsʰa mas da dadʒda tʰavis taxtze mepʰis dedasatsʰ daudɡes taxti da mis mxarmardʒvniv dadʒda iɡi 
da utʰxra ertʰi mtsʰire satʰxovari makʰvs ʃentʰan nu ɡamatsbileb utʰxra mepʰem mtʰxove dedatʃemo radɡan ar ɡaɡatsbileb 
da tʰkʰva mietsʰi tsʰolad abiʃaɡ ʃunameli ʃens dzmas adonias 
utʰxra rad moitʰxov adoniastʰvis abiʃaɡ ʃunamels barem samepʰotsʰ moitʰxove mistʰvis raki tʃemi upʰrosi dzmaa da hqavs mɣvdlad abiatʰari da meɡobrad ioab tsʰerutʰas dze 
da daipʰitsʰa mepʰe solomonma upʰali da tʰkʰva ase da ase miqos upʰalma da uaresitsʰ dammartʰos tʰu tʰavis saubedurod ar etʰkʰvas es sitqva adonias 
axla ki vpʰitsʰav upʰals romelmatsʰ ɡanmamtkitsʰa da damsva davitʰis mamatʃemis taxtze romelmatsʰ saxli amiʃena dapirebisamebr rom dɣesve mokvdeba adonia 
da ɡaɡzavna mepʰe solomonma benaia iehoiadaqis dze da dahkra da mokvda iɡi 
abiatʰar mɣvdels ki utʰxra mepʰem qanatʰotʰs tsadi ʃens mamulʃi sikvdilis ɣirsi xar maɡram dɣes ar moɡklav radɡan ʃen ɡitarebia upʰlis kidobani davitʰis mamatʃemis tsinaʃe da qvelapʰers itandi rasatsʰ mamatʃemi itanda 
da mokvetʰa solomonma abiatʰari upʰlis mɣvdlobidan ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo upʰlis sitqva romelitsʰ tʰkʰva man qelis saxlze ʃiloʃi 
da miuvida xma ioabs radɡan ioabi adonias miemxro da abesaloms ar mimxrobia da ɡaikʰtsʰa ioabi upʰlis karvisken da samsxverplos rkʰebs moecida 
da ʃeatqobines mepʰe solomons upʰlis karvisken ɡaikʰtsʰa ioabi da aha samsxverplostʰan dɡaso ɡaɡzavna solomonma benaia iehoiadaqis dze da daabara midi mokali 
da mivida benaia upʰlis karavtʰan da utʰxra ɡamodi ase brdzana mepʰem da tʰkʰva ara akʰ movkvdebi da miutana benaiam mepʰes ambavi ase tʰkʰvao ioabma da ase mipasuxao 
da utʰxra mepʰem ise ɡaaketʰe roɡortsʰ tʰavad tʰkʰva mokali da damarxe amitʰ tʃamoɡvretsʰxav metsʰa da mamatʃemis saxlsatsʰ ubralo sisxls ioabma rom daɣvara 
upʰalma mis tʰavzeve miakʰtsʰios misi sisxli imisatʰvis rom miuxda or masze martʰal da ketʰil katsʰs da maxvilitʰ daxotsʰa mamatʃemis davitʰis utʃumrad abner neris dze israelis dʒaris sardali da qamasa ietʰeris dze iudas dʒaris sardali 
da miekʰtsʰes matʰi sisxli ioabis tʰavs da misi ʃtʰamomavlebis tʰavs saukunod xolo davitʰs mis ʃtʰamomavlobas mis saxls da mis taxts mʃvidoba hkʰondes upʰlisɡan ukunisamde 
da tsavida benaia iehoiadaqis dze tʰavs daesxa mas da mokla iobi da mis saxlʃi udabnoʃi damarxa 
da daniʃna mepʰe solomonma benaia iehoiadaqis dze mis adɡilze dʒaris sardlad xolo abiatʰaris adɡilze tsʰadok mɣvdeli daadɡina mepʰem 
da ɡaɡzavna da ʃeutʰvala mepʰem ʃimqis da utʰxra aiʃene saxli ierusalimʃi da itsʰxovre ikʰ nursad nu ɡaxval ikʰidan 
roɡortsʰ ki ɡaxval da kidronis xevs ɡastsʰdebi itsʰode sikvdili ar aɡtsʰdeba ʃens tʰavze ikʰneba ʃeni sisxli 
da utʰxra ʃimqim mepʰes ketʰili roɡortsʰ brdzana mepʰe batonma ise moikʰtsʰeva ʃeni msaxuri da tsʰxovrobda ʃimqi ierusalimʃi mravali xani 
ɡavida sami tseli da ɡaekʰtsʰa ʃimqis ori msaxuri akʰiʃ maqakʰas dzestʰan ɡatʰis mepʰestʰan da ʃeatqobines ʃimqis ɡatʰʃi ariano ʃeni msaxurni 
da adɡa ʃimqi da ʃekazma saxedari da tsavida ɡatʰs akʰiʃtʰan tʰavis msaxurtʰa sadzebrad tsavida ʃimqi da kidetsʰ moiqvana ɡatʰidan tʰavisi msaxurni 
da ʃeatqobines solomons ierusalimidan ɡatʰʃi tsavida ʃimqi da ukan mobrundao 
da daibara mepʰem ʃimqi da utʰxra rom daɡapʰitsʰe upʰlis saxelitʰ da ɡaɡapʰrətʰxile tʰu ɡaxvedi da sadme tsasulxar itsʰode sikvdili ar aɡtsʰdeba metʰkʰi ʃen mipasuxe ketʰili mesmiso 
ratom ar ʃeinaxe tʃemi brdzaneba ratsʰ ɡibrdzane upʰlis tsinaʃe pʰitsʰitʰ 
da utʰxra mepʰem ʃimqis ʃentsʰ karɡad itsʰi da ʃenma ɡulmatsʰ ra avkatsʰoba ɡaɡiketʰebia davitʰistʰvis mamatʃemistʰvis axla ʃens tʰavze moakʰtsʰevs upʰali ʃens avkatsʰobas 
da kurtʰxeuli iqos mepʰe solomoni da mtkitsʰe iqos davitʰis taxti upʰlis tsinaʃe ukunisamde 
da ubrdzana mepʰem benaia iehoiadaqis dzes isitsʰ tsavida da dahkra ʃimqis da mokvda iɡi 
daumoqvrda solomoni pʰaraons eɡviptis mepʰes da moiqvana pʰaraonis asuli davitʰis kʰalakʰʃi vidre daasrulebda tʰavis saxls upʰlis saxls da zɣudes ierusalimis irɡvliv 
oɣond dʒer kidev ɡorakebze stsiravda xalxi msxverpls radɡan im xanebamde dʒer kidev ar iqo aʃenebuli saxli upʰlis saxelze 
da ʃeiqvara solomonma upʰali da mamamisis davitʰis tsesze dadioda oɣond ɡorakebze stsiravda msxverpls da akmevda sakmevels 
da tsavida mepʰe ɡabaons ratʰa msxverpli ʃeetsira ikʰ radɡan ikʰ iqo mtʰavari ɡoraki atʰasi suli aɣsavleni ʃestsira mepʰem am samsxverploze 
da ɡamoetsʰxada ɡabaonʃi upʰali solomons sizmrad ɣamitʰ da utʰxra ɣmertʰma mtʰxove ratsʰ ɡinda rom moɡtsʰe 
da utʰxra solomonma didad stsqalobdi ʃens msaxurs mamatʃems davitʰs radɡan ceʃmaritebitʰ simartʰlitʰa da ʃendami tsrpʰeli ɡulitʰ dadioda iɡi ʃens tsinaʃe da ʃeunartʃune kidetsʰ es didi tsqaloba da mietsʰi vaʒi romelitsʰ zis dɣes mis taxtze 
axla upʰalo ɣmertʰo tʃemo ʃen ɡaamepʰe mamatʃemis davitʰis natsʰvlad ʃeni msaxuri tʰumtsʰa uasako qmatsvili var da ar vitsʰi ɡamosvla da ʃesvla 
ʃens rtʃeul xalxʃia ʃeni msaxuri mravalritsʰxovan xalxʃi romelitsʰ ar daitʰvleba da artsʰ aɣiritsʰxeba simravlis ɡamo 
da mianice ʃens msaxurs ɡonieri ɡuli ratʰa ɡanaɡos ʃeni eri rom siketʰe ɡaartʃios borotebisɡan radɡan vis ʃeudzlia ɡanaɡos ʃeni eri esoden mravalritsʰxovani 
da moetsona upʰals solomonis satʰxovari 
da utʰxra mas ɣmertʰma imis ɡamo rom mtʰxove es da ar moitʰxove ʃentʰvis xanɡrədzlivi sitsʰotsʰxle ar moitʰxove simdidre ar moitʰxove ʃeni mtrebis suli aramed ɡoniereba mtʰxove samartʰlis ɡasakitʰxavad 
aha mominicebia ʃentʰvis brdzeni da ɡonieri ɡuli ise rom ʃeni msɡavsi artsʰ ʃenamde qopʰila sadme da artsʰ ʃens ʃemdeɡ ɡamotʃndeba ʃeni msɡavsi 
ratsʰ ar ɡitʰxovia imasatsʰ moɡtsʰem simdidresatsʰ didebasatsʰ ise rom vidre tsʰotsʰxali xar aravin ikʰneba mepʰetʰa ʃoris ʃeni msɡavsi 
da tʰu ivli tʃems ɡzaze da daitsʰav tʃems tsesebsa da tʃems brdzanebebs roɡortsʰ mamaʃeni davitʰi dadioda dɣeɡrdzels ɡaɡxdi 
da ɡaeɣvidza solomons da aha esetsʰ sizmari da mivida ierusalimʃi da tsardɡa upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmis kidobnis tsinaʃe da ʃestsira sruladdasatsveli da samʃvidobo msxverpli mere lxini ɡaumartʰa tʰavis msaxurtʰ 
maʃin mivida mepʰestʰan ori medzavi kʰali da dadɡnen mis tsin 
da tʰkʰva ertʰma kʰalma momiteve batono me da es kʰali ertʰ saxlʃi vtsʰxovrobtʰ am saxlʃi vimʃobiare mis tʰvaltsin 
tʃemi mʃobiarobis mesame dɣes ʃva am kʰalmatsʰ ertʰad viqavitʰ utsʰxo aravin qopʰila tʃventʰan saxlʃi mxolod tʃven orni viqavitʰ saxlʃi 
da mokvda ɣamitʰ am kʰalis bavʃvi radɡan zed dastsoloda 
da adɡa ʃuaɣamisas da aiqvana tʃemi bavʃvi tʃemi ɡverdidan rotsʰa edzina ʃens mxevals da tʰavis ubeʃi tʃaitsvina xolo tʰavisi mkvdari bavʃvi me tʃamitsvina ubeʃi 
da avdekʰi dilitʰ rom dzudzu metsovebina bavʃvistʰvis da aha mkvdari damxvda karɡad davakvirdi dilitʰ da mivxvdi rom is bavʃvi ar iqo tʃemi ʃvili romelitsʰ me vʃobe 
da tʰkʰva meore kʰalma ara tsʰotsʰxalia tʃemi ʃvili ʃeni ʃvilia mkvdari es ki ambobda ara ʃeni ʃvilia mkvdari tʃemi ʃvilia tsʰotsʰxali ase laparakobdnen mepʰis tsinaʃe 
da tʰkʰva mepʰem es ambobs tʃemi ʃviliao tsʰotsʰxali ʃeni ʃviliao mkvdari meore ambobs ara ʃeni ʃvilia mkvdari tʃemi ʃviliao tsʰotsʰxali 
da tʰkʰva mepʰem maxvili momitanetʰ da miartʰves maxvili mepʰes 
da tʰkʰva mepʰem orad ɡaceritʰ tsʰotsʰxali bavʃvi ertʰi naxevari ertʰ kʰals mietsʰitʰ meore naxevari meore kʰals 
da utʰxra tsʰotsʰxali bavʃvis dedam mepʰes radɡan ɡul ɣvidzli daetsva tʰavisi ʃvilis ɡamo oh tʃemo batono oɣond nu moklavtʰ da mietsʰitʰ maɡas tsʰotsʰxali bavʃvi meore ambobda nurtsʰ me merɡeba nurtsʰ ʃen ɡaceritʰ 
da miuɡo mepʰem da tʰkʰva amas mietsʰitʰ tsʰotsʰxali bavʃvi nu moklavtʰ es aris misi deda 
da ɡaiɡo mtʰelma israelma ɡanatʃenis ambavi mepʰem rom ɡamoitana da ʃeeʃindatʰ mepʰisa radɡan dainaxes rom ɣvtʰis sibrədzne ʃeetsia mas samartʰlis ɡatʃenaʃi 
da iqo mepʰe solomoni mepʰed mtʰels israelze 
es tʰavkatsʰebi hqavda mas qazariahu tsʰadok mɣvdlis dze 
elixorepʰi da axia ʃiʃas dzeni mtserlebi ioʃapʰat axiludis dze mematiane 
benaiahu iehoiadaqis dze dʒaris sardali tsʰadoki da abiatʰari mɣvdlebi 
qazariahu natʰanis dze mouravtʰ upʰrosi zabud natʰanis dze mɣvdeli mepʰis meɡobari 
axiʃari sasaxlis zedamxedveli adoniram qabdas dze xarkis ɡanmɡebeli 
tʰormeti mouravi hqavda solomons mtʰels israelʃi isini amaraɡebdnen sartʃotʰi mepʰesa da mis saxls tʰitʰoeuls tselitsadʃi ertʰi tʰvis mandzilze unda ezidna sartʃo 
esenia matʰi saxelebi ben xuri epʰremis mtʰidan 
ben dekeri makatsʰʃi ʃaqalbimʃi betʰ ʃemeʃʃi elonʃi da betʰ xananʃi 
ben xesedi arubotʰʃi misi iqo sokʰo da xepʰeris mtʰeli mxare 
ben abinadabi mtʰels napʰatʰ dorʃi solomonis asuli tapʰatʰi hqavda tsʰolad 
baqana axiludis dze tʰaqanakʰʃi meɡidoʃi da mtʰels betʰ ʃeanʃi tsʰartʰanastʰan rom aris izreqelis kʰvemotʰ betʰ ʃeanidan vidre abel mexolamde da iokmeqamis ɡaɣma mxaremde 
ben ɡeberi ɡilqadis ramotʰʃi misi iqo iairisʃenebi menaʃes dzisa ɡilqadʃi misi iqo arɡobis mxare baʃanʃi samotsʰi didi kʰalakʰi ɡalavniani da spilendzis urdulebiani 
axinadab qidos dze maxanaimʃi 
aximaqatsʰi napʰtʰalis mxareʃi masatsʰ solomonis asuli hqavda tsʰolad basmatʰi 
baqana xuʃais dze aʃeris mxareʃi da beqalotʰʃi 
iehoʃapʰat pʰaruaxis dze isakʰaris mxareʃi 
ʃimqi elas dze beniaminis mxareʃi 
ɡeberi uris dze ɡilqadis kʰveqanaʃi sixonis amoreveltʰa mepʰis kʰveqanaʃi da qoɡis baʃanis mepʰis kʰveqanaʃi tʰitʰo mouravi tʰitʰo kʰveqanaʃi 
camdnen svamdnen mxiarulobdnen zɣvis kʰviʃasavitʰ mravalritsʰxovani iuda da israeli 
da epqra solomons qvela samepʰo mdinaridan pʰilistimeltʰa kʰveqnamde da eɡviptis sazɣvramde da moartʰmevdnen xolme dzɣvens da emortʃilebodnen solomons mtʰeli misi sitsʰotsʰxle 
es iqo solomonis qoveldɣiuri sartʃo otsʰdaatʰi kʰori ɡamtkitsʰuli pʰkʰvili da samotsʰi kʰori sadaɡi pʰkʰvili 
atʰi nasukʰali xari da atʰi naialaɣari xari asi tsʰxvari ɡarda nanadirevi irmebisa da kʰurtsʰikebisa dʒeirnebisa da ɡamokvebili batebisa 
es imitom rom batonobda iɡi mtʰels mdinaris ɡamoɣma mxareze tʰipʰsaxidan vidre ɣazamde da mdinaris ɡamoɣma qvela mepʰeze da zavi hkʰonda qvela kʰveqanastʰan irɡvliv 
uʃiʃrad isxda solomonis dros iuda da israeli tʰitʰoeuli tʰavisi vazis dziras da tʰavisi leɣvis dziras danidan vidre beer ʃebaqamde 
hkʰonda solomons otʰxi atʰasi tʰavla etlis tsʰxenebisatʰvis da hqavda tʰormeti atʰasi tsʰxenosani 
amaraɡebdnen is mouravebi tʰitʰoeuli tʰavis ɡankutʰvnil tʰveʃi mepʰe solomons da mepʰe solomonis supʰris qvela meinaxes tʰitʰoeuli tʰavis ɡankutʰvnil tʰveʃi da arapʰers aklebdnen 
mohkʰondatʰ kʰeri da tʰiva tsʰxenebistʰvis da bedaurebistʰvis tʰitʰoeuls mistʰvis mitʃenil adɡilze 
da mihmadla ɣmertʰma solomons sibrədzne didi ckua da zɣvis kʰviʃasavitʰ vrtsʰeli ɡoneba 
solomonis sibrədzne aɣemateboda aɣmosavleltʰa mtʰels sibrədznes da eɡvipteltʰa mtʰels sibrədznes 
qvela adamianze brdzeni iqo iɡi etʰan ezraxelze hemanze kʰalkʰolze dardaq maxolis dzeze da ɡanitʰkʰva misi saxeli qvela xalxʃi vintsʰ ki irɡvliv iqo 
tsarmotʰkʰva sami atʰasi iɡavi da ʃetʰxza atʰas xutʰi ɡaloba 
laparakobda xeebze libanis nadzvidan datsqebuli usupamde kedelze rom izrdeba laparakobda tsʰxovelebze da pʰrinvelebze kʰvemdzromebze da tʰevzebze 
modiodnen qvela modɡmis xalxisɡan solomonis sibrədznis mosasmenad da kʰveqnis qvela mepʰisɡan visatsʰ ki smenoda misi sibrədznis ambavi 
da ɡauɡzavna xiramma tsʰoris mepʰem tʰavisi msaxurni solomons radɡan ɡaiɡo rom iɡi stsʰxes mepʰed mamamisis natsʰvlad xolo xirami davitʰis moqvaruli iqo mtʰeli sitsʰotsʰxle 
da ʃeutʰvala solomonma xirams 
ʃen itsʰi rom ver ʃedzlo mamatʃemma davitʰma aeʃenebina saxli upʰlis tʰavisi ɣmertʰis saxelze radɡan mteri exvia ɡarʃemo vidre upʰalma pʰexis terpʰitʰ ar daatʰrɡunina isini 
axla ki tʃamomiɡdo irɡvliv mʃvidoba upʰalma tʃemma ɣmertʰma aɣar mqavs motsinaaɣmdeɡe da artsʰ xipʰatʰi melis raime 
aha vpʰikʰrob avaʃeno saxli upʰlis tʃemi ɣvtʰis saxelze roɡortsʰ natʰkʰvami akʰvs mamatʃemistʰvis upʰals ʃeni vaʒiʃvili visatsʰ ʃens natsʰvlad taxtze davsvam is amiʃenebso tʃems saxelze saxls 
axla brdzane rom nadzvis xeebi momicran libanʃi tʃemi msaxurni ʃens msaxurebtʰan ertʰad ikʰnebian da me moɡtsʰem ʃens msaxurtʰa ɡasamrdʒelos ramdensatsʰ metqvi radɡan ʃen itsʰi rom tsʰidonelebivitʰ tʃvenʃi tqes vervin tʃexavs 
rotsʰa ɡaiɡo xiramma solomonis sitqvebi didad ɡaixara da tʰkʰva ats kurtʰxeul iqos upʰali romelmatsʰ mistsʰa davitʰs brdzeni ʃvili amdeni xalxistʰvis 
da ʃeutʰvala xiramma solomons movismine ratsʰ ʃemomitʰvale qvelapʰers ʃeɡisruleb ratsʰ ki nadzvisa da kviparosis xeebis ɡamo isurve 
tʃemi msaxurni tʃamozidaven libanidan zɣvamde da tivebad ɡavuʃveb zɣvitʰ im adɡilamde romelsatsʰ damitʰkʰvam ikʰ davʃlitʰ da tsaiɣeb oɣond ʃen ʃemisrule survili sartʃotʰi momimaraɡe saxli 
da uɡzavnida xirami solomons misi survilis tʰanaxmad nadzvisa da kviparosis xeebs 
xolo solomoni uɡzavnida xirams otsʰi atʰas kʰor xorbals misi saxlis sartʃod da otsʰ kʰor ɡatsmendil zetʰs amas uɡzavnida solomoni xirams tslidan tslamde 
da mihmadla upʰalma sibrədzne solomons dapirebisamebr mʃvidoba iqo xiramsa da solomons ʃoris da kavʃiri hkʰondatʰ ʃekruli ertʰmanetʰtʰan 
da daado beɡara solomonma mtʰels israels otsʰdaatʰi atʰasi katsʰi ɡahqavda beɡaraze 
da ɡzavnida matʰ libanʃi tʰveʃi atʰi atʰas katsʰs moriɡeobitʰ ertʰ tʰves libanʃi iqvnen or tʰves tʰav tʰavis saxlebʃi adonirami ɡanaɡebda beɡaras 
solomons hqavda samotsʰdaatʰi atʰasi mtvirtʰavi da otʰxmotsʰi atʰasi kʰvis mcreli mtʰaʃi 
ɡarda sami atʰas samasi tʰavkatsʰisa romelnitsʰ samuʃaoebze hqavda mitʃenili solomons da momuʃaveebs zedamxedvelobdnen 
da brdzana mepʰem rom moezidatʰ didroni lodebi dzvirpʰasi kʰvis zodebi saxlis sadzirkvlisatʰvis mopirketʰebuli kʰvebi 
romeltʰatsʰ tʰlidnen solomonis xelosnebi xiramis xelosnebi da ɡebalelebi da amzadebdnen xeebsa da kʰvebs saxlis asaɡebad 
israelis dzetʰa eɡviptidan ɡamosvlis otʰxasmeotʰxmotsʰe tsels israelze solomonis mepʰobis meotʰxe tsels zivis tʰveʃi romelitsʰ aris meore tʰve ʃeudɡa iɡi upʰlis saxlis ʃenebas 
saxli romelitsʰ solomonma auʃena upʰals siɡrdzitʰ samotsʰi tsqrtʰa iqo siɡanitʰ otsʰi tsqrtʰa simaɣlitʰ otsʰdaatʰi tsqrtʰa 
stoa tadzris tsin siɡrdzitʰ otsʰi tsqrtʰa iqo tadzris siɡanis ʃesabamisad xolo siɡane atʰi tsqrtʰa saxlis tsin 
da ɡauketʰa saxls sarkmlebi romlebitsʰ iɣeboda da iketeboda 
da miuʃena saxlis kedels sartʰulebi saxlis kedlebis irɡvliv tadzrisa da dabiris irɡvliv da miuʃena ʃramelebi irɡvliv 
kʰveda sartʰuli xutʰi tsqrtʰa iqo siɡanitʰ ʃua ekʰvsi tsqrtʰa siɡanitʰ xolo mesame ʃvidi tsqrtʰa siɡanitʰ radɡan saxls irɡvliv ʃverili kocebi hkʰonda ɡaredan datanebuli rom saxlis kedlebs xaratʃoebi ar mihkareboda 
rotsʰa saxli ʃendeboda zodebad mocrili kʰvitʰ ʃendeboda artsʰ tʃakʰutʃis artsʰ kveris da artsʰ ertʰi rkinis iaraɣis xma ar ɡaɣebula saxlʃi misi ʃenebisas 
ʃua sartʰulze asasvleli saxls mardʒvena pʰrtʰaze hkʰonda daxveuli kibitʰ adiodnen ʃuaze da ʃuadan mesameze 
da daasrula saxlis ʃeneba da nadzvis pʰitsʰrebitʰa da kocebitʰ ɡadaxura saxli 
sartʰulebi miuʃena mtʰels saxls tʰitʰo xutʰi tsqrtʰa simaɣlisa da nadzvis dzelebitʰ miamaɡra saxls 
da ɡamoetsʰxada solomons upʰlis sitqva 
aha aʃeneb am saxls maɡram tʰu ivli tʃems tsesze da tʃems samartʰals ɡaatʃen tʰu daitsʰav da ɡahqvebi tʃems nabrdzanevs maʃin ʃeɡisruleb sitqvas romelitsʰ davitʰs mamaʃens vutʰxari 
davmkvidrdebi israelis dzetʰa ʃoris da arasodes mivatoveb tʃems ers israels 
da aaɡo solomonma saxli da daasrula iɡi 
nadzvis pʰitsʰrebi aakra saxlis ʃida kedlebs iatakidan ceramde ceri ʃiɡnidan xitʰ moapirketʰa da saxlis iatakze kviparosis pʰitsʰrebi daaɡo 
saxlis kideebidan otsʰ tsqrtʰaze aakra nadzvis pʰitsʰrebi iatakidan ceramde da ɡanakutʰvna iɡi dabiristʰvis tsmidatʰa tsmidistʰvis 
ormotsʰi tsqrtʰa iqo saxli anu tadzris tsina natsili 
nadzvis pʰitsʰrebze saxlis ʃiɡnitʰ kitrebi da ɡaʃlili qvavilebi iqo amotʃukʰurtʰmebuli qvelapʰeri nadzvisɡan iqo kʰva ar tʃanda 
ʃua saxlʃi moatsqo dabiri rom ikʰ upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmis kidobani daedɡa 
dabiris siɡrdze otsʰi tsqrtʰa iqo siɡanetsʰ otsʰi tsqrtʰa simaɣle otsʰi tsqrtʰa tsmida okʰrotʰi moceda iɡi okʰrotʰive moceda nadzvis samsxverplo 
da moceda ʃiɡnidan saxli tsmida okʰrotʰi solomonma da ɡadacima okʰros dʒacvebi dabiris tsin romelitsʰ okʰrotʰi moceda 
mtʰeli saxli okʰrotʰi moceda mtʰlianad mtʰeli saxli da mtʰeli samsxverplo dabiris tsin mdɡari okʰrotʰi moceda 
da ɡaaketʰa dabirʃi ori kʰerubimi zetʰisxilis xisɡan romlis simaɣle atʰi tsqrtʰa iqo 
ertʰi pʰrtʰa xutʰi tsqrtʰa hkʰonda kʰerubims meore pʰrtʰatsʰ xutʰi tsqrtʰa atʰi tsqrtʰa iqo ertʰi pʰrtʰis bolodan meore pʰrtʰis bolomde 
atʰi tsqrtʰa iqo meore kʰerubimitsʰ orive kʰerubims ertʰi zoma da ertʰi saxe hkʰonda 
ertʰi kʰerubimis simaɣle atʰi tsqrtʰa iqo aseve meore kʰerubimisatsʰ 
dadɡa kʰerubimebi ʃida saxlis ʃuaɡulʃi ɡaʃlili hkʰondatʰ pʰrtʰebi kʰerubimebs ertʰi kʰerubimis pʰrtʰa ertʰ kedels stsvdeboda meore kʰerubimis pʰrtʰa meore kedels xolo saxlis ʃuaɡulisken mimartʰuli matʰi pʰrtʰebi ertʰmanetʰs exebodnen 
okʰrotʰi moceda kʰerubimebi 
saxlis mtʰels kedlebze irɡvliv ʃiɡnidan da ɡaredan kʰerubimebis pʰinikis xeebisa da ɡaʃlili qvavilebis ɡamosaxulebani moatʃukʰurtʰma 
saxlis iatakitsʰ okʰrotʰi moceda ʃiɡnidanatsʰ da ɡaredanatsʰ 
dabirʃi ʃesasvlelad ɡaaketʰa zetʰisxilis xis karedi romlis tʃartʃo da tsirtʰxlebi kedlis simaɣlis mexutʰedi iqo 
zetʰisxilis xis or karedze kʰerubimebi pʰinikis xeebi da ɡaʃlili qvavilebi amoatʃukʰurtʰma da okʰrotʰi moceda moceda kʰerubimitsʰ da pʰinikis xeebitsʰ 
tadzris ʃesasvlelsatsʰ aseve ɡauketʰa zetʰisxilis xis otʰxkutʰxa tsirtʰxlebi 
da kviparosis xis ori karedi ertʰi karedis orive pʰrtʰa trialebda meore karedis orive pʰrtʰa trialebda 
da amoatʃukʰurtʰma kʰerubimebi pʰinikis xeebi da ɡaʃlili qvavilebi da okʰrotʰi moceda tʃukʰurtʰmis ɣarebi 
da moatsqo ʃida ezo sami tsqeba tʰlili kʰvisaɡan da ertʰi tsqeba nadzvis dzelebisaɡan 
meotʰxe tsels zivis tʰveʃi tʃaeqara sadzirkveli upʰlis saxls 
metʰertʰmete tsels bulis tʰveʃi romelitsʰ aris merve tʰve ɡaasrula saxli qoveli tsesisa da riɡis mixedvitʰ ʃvid tselitsads aʃenebda saxls 
tʰavis saxls ki tsʰamet tselitsads aʃeneb da solomoni da ɡaasrula mtʰeli tʰavisi saxli 
da aaʃena libanis maɣnaris saxli siɡrdzitʰ asi tsqrtʰa siɡanitʰ ormotsʰdaatʰi tsqrtʰa simaɣlitʰ otsʰdaatʰi tsqrtʰa otʰx riɡ nadzvis svetebze iqo ʃedɡmuli nadzvisave dzelebi iqo ɡadebuli nadzvis svetebze 
nadzvitʰ iqo ɡadaxuruli otʰaxebi ormotsʰdaxutʰ svetze ʃedɡmuli tʰxutʰmeti sveti tʰitʰo riɡʃi 
sam sartʰulad iqo sarkmlis tʃartʃoebi sarkmlebi ertʰmanetʰis pirdapir iqo sam tsqebad 
qvela kari da tsirtʰxli otʰxkutʰxa dzelebisɡan iqo sam sartʰulad sarkmlebi ertʰmanetʰis pirdapir iqo sam tsqebad 
svetebiani karibce romelitsʰ ɡaaketʰa siɡrdzeʃi ormotsʰdaatʰi tsqrtʰa iqo siɡaneʃi otsʰdaatʰi tsqrtʰa mis tsin sxva karibce svetebitʰ da zɣurblitʰ 
sataxto karibce sadatsʰ msdʒavri unda ɡamoetana samsdʒavro karibce ɡaaketʰa da nadzvitʰ dapʰara iatakidan ceramde 
aseve iqo aɡebuli misi satsʰxovrebeli saxli meore ezoʃi karibcis ukan pʰaraonis asulsatsʰ romelitsʰ tsʰolad hqavda moqvanili solomons am karibcis msɡavsi saxli auʃena 
es qvelapʰeri zomaze ɡatʰlili xerxitʰ daxerxili dzvirpʰasi kʰvebisɡan iqo ɡaketʰebuli roɡortsʰ ʃiɡnitʰ ise ɡaretʰ sadzirkvlidan tʰavxemde da ɡaretʰ did ezomde 
sadzirkvlad edo dzvirpʰasi kʰvebi didi kʰvebi atʰtsqrtʰiani da rvatsqrtʰiani kʰvebi 
xolo zemotʰ zomaze ɡatʰlili dzvirpʰasi kʰvebi da nadzvi 
didi ezo ʃemozɣuduli iqo irɡvliv sami tsqeba tʰlili kʰvitʰ da ertʰi tsqeba nadzvis dzelebitʰ aseve upʰlis saxlis ʃida ezo da saxlis karibce 
da ɡaɡzavna katsʰi mepʰe solomonma da moaqvanina tsʰoridan xirami 
romlis deda ertʰi kʰvrivi kʰali iqo napʰtʰalis ʃtodan xolo mama tsʰoreli spilendzis ostati momadlebuli hkʰonda xirams sibrədzne ɡamcriaxoba da tsʰodna spilendzis naxelavis ɡasaketʰeblad mivida solomon mepʰestʰan da qvela samuʃao ʃeusrula 
da ɡamosaxa spilendzis ori sveti ertʰi svetis simaɣle tʰvrameti tsqrtʰa iqo tʰormeti tsqrtʰa lari stsvdeboda ɡarʃemo orive svets 
ori buɣauri tʃamoasxa spilendzisɡan svetebis tʰavze dasadɡmelad ertʰi buɣauris simaɣle xutʰi tsqrtʰa iqo meore buɣauris simaɣletsʰ xutʰi tsqrtʰa iqo 
da ɡauketʰa svetis tʰavze dasadɡmel buɣaurebs datsnuli tsʰxaurebi da dzetskviseburi dʒindʒilebi ʃvidi ertʰ buɣaurs ʃviditsʰ meore buɣaurs 
da ɡaaketʰa svetebi da ʃemoavlo irɡvliv ertʰ tsʰxaurs or tsqebad brotseulebi svetebis tʰavze dadɡmuli buɣaurebis dasapʰaravad 
karibcis svetebis buɣaurebi ʃroʃanis saxis iqo otʰxi tsqrtʰa 
or svetze ʃedɡmul buɣaurebs ʃemovlebuli hkʰonda orasi brotseuli zemotʰken mutsʰlis pirdapir romelitsʰ tsʰxauris mxares iqo 
da aɣmartʰa svetebi tadzris karibceʃi aɣmartʰa mardʒvena sveti da utsoda saxelad iakʰini aɣmartʰa martsʰxena sveti da utsoda saxelad boqazi 
svetis tʰavebze ʃroʃanebi iqo ɡamosaxuli da dasrulda svetebis samuʃao 
da tʃamoasxa spilendzis zɣva sruliad mrəɡvali kididan kidemde atʰi tsqrtʰa iqo simaɣle xutʰi tsqrtʰa hkʰonda otsʰdaatʰi tsqrtʰa lari stsvdeboda irɡvliv 
irɡvliv kitris tʃukʰurtʰmebi hkʰonda ʃemovlebuli kideze kʰvemodan atʰ atʰi tʰitʰo tsqrtʰaze da or tsqebad ɡars ertqa zɣvas kitrebi mastʰan ertʰad iqo tʃamosxmuli 
tʰormet xarze iqo ʃedɡmuli sami tʃrdiloetʰitʰ iqureboda sami dasavletʰitʰ iqureboda sami samxretʰitʰ iqureboda da sami aɣmosavletʰitʰ iqureboda zɣva zed edɡatʰ da zurɡi qvelas ʃiɡnitʰ hkʰonda mikʰtsʰeuli 
siskʰe ertʰi mtkaveli hkʰonda misi kideebi tʰasis kidesavitʰ iqo ɡaketʰebuli da ɡaʃlil ʃroʃans hɡavda ori atʰas batʰs itevda 
da ɡaaketʰa atʰi spilendzis kvartsʰxlbeki tʰitʰoeuli kvartsʰxlbekis siɡrdze otʰxi tsqrtʰa iqo siɡane otʰxi tsqrtʰa simaɣle sami tsqrtʰa 
amɡvarad iqo ɡaketʰebuli kvartsʰxlbeki dapʰebi hkʰonda matʰ tʃartʃoʃi tʃasmuli 
tʃartʃoebʃi tʃasmul dapʰebze lomebi xarebi da kʰerubimebi iqo ɡamosaxuli aseve tʃartʃoebze lomebsa da xarebs kʰvemotʰ da zemotʰ qvavilebis asxmuli konebi 
otʰx otʰxi spilendzis borbali da spilendzis ɣerdzebi hkʰonda tʰitʰo kvartsʰxlbeks mis otʰxsave kutʰxeze iqo ʃverilebi sabanelis kʰveʃatsʰ tʃamosxmuli ʃverilebi iqo xolo qovel ɡverdze qvaviltsnulebi 
misi crili ʃida ɡvirɡvinidan maɣlitʰamde ertʰi tsqrtʰa iqo crili mrəɡvali iqo roɡortsʰ amɡvari naketʰoba aris xolme tsqrtʰanaxevari crilze tʃukʰurtʰmebi iqo misi kedlebi otʰxkutʰxedi iqo ara mrəɡvali 
otʰxi borbali iqo kedlebs kʰvemotʰ da borblebis ɣerdzebi kvartsʰxlbekze iqo damaɡrebuli tʰitʰo borblis simaɣle ertʰnaxevari tsqrtʰa 
borblebi etlis borblebivitʰ iqo ɡaketʰebuli ɣerdzebi salteebi manebi da morɡvebi sul tʃamosxmuli spilendzisa iqo 
otʰxi ʃverili hkʰonda qoveli kvartsʰxlbekis otʰxsave kutʰxes kvartsʰxlbektʰan ertʰad iqo tʃamosxmuli 
kvartsʰxlbekis tʰavze iqo tsre naxevari tsqrtʰa simaɣlisa kvartsʰxlbekis saxelurebi da kedlebi misive masalisɡan iqo 
da amokvetʰa saxelurebis dapʰebze da mis kedlebze kʰerubimebi lomebi da palmebi ertʰmanetʰis daʃorebitʰ irɡvliv qvaviltsnulebi 
amɡvari ɡaaketʰa atʰi kvartsʰxlbeki qvela ertʰianad iqo tʃamosxmuli ertʰi zoma hkʰonda ertʰi saxe 
da ɡaaketʰa spilendzis atʰi sabaneli ormotsʰ batʰs itevda tʰitʰoeuli sabaneli otʰxi tsqrtʰa iqo tʰitʰoeuli sabaneli tʰitʰoeuli sabaneli im atʰidan ertʰ ertʰ kvartsʰxlbekze idɡa 
xutʰi kvartsʰxlbeki saxlis mardʒvena pʰrtʰaze dadɡa xutʰi saxlis martsʰxena pʰrtʰaze zɣva saxlis mardʒvena mxares moatʰavsa samxretʰ aɣmosavletʰitʰ 
ɡaaketʰa xiramma sabanelebi akʰandazebi da sasxureblebi da moatʰava xiramma qvela samuʃao rasatsʰ uketʰebda iɡi mepʰe solomons upʰlis saxlʃi 
ori sveti da svetebis tʰavze dasadɡmeli buɣaurebi misi ori baliʃitʰurtʰ ori tsʰxauri svetebze dasadɡmeli buɣaurebis dasapʰaravad 
otʰxasi brotseuli ori tsʰxauristʰvis brotseulebis ori riɡi tʰitʰoeul tsʰxaurs svetebze dasadɡmeli buɣauris baliʃebis dasapʰaravad 
atʰi kvartsʰxlbeki atʰi sabaneli kvartsʰxlbekebze ʃesadɡmeli 
ertʰi zɣva da tʰormeti xari zɣvis kʰveʃ 
kʰvabebi akʰandazebi da sasxureblebi qvela es curceli romelnitsʰ xiramma ɡauketʰa mepʰe solomons upʰlis saxlʃi ɡaprialebuli spilendzisa iqo 
iordanes mxareʃi tʃamoasxa isins mepʰem tʰixnar niadaɡze sukʰotʰsa da tsʰartʰans ʃoris 
da daatsqo solomonma qvela es curceli tʰav tʰavis adɡilze didi simravlis ɡamo ver ɡairkva spilendzis tsona 
da ɡaaketʰa solomonma qoveli curceli ratsʰ upʰlis saxlistʰvis iqo ɡankutʰvnili okʰros samsxverplo da okʰrosave tabla romelzedatsʰ satsinaʃeo puri etsqo 
badʒaɣlo okʰros sasantʰleebi xutʰi mardʒvena mxares xutʰitsʰ martsʰxena mxares dabiris tsin qvavilebitʰ santʰurebitʰ da okʰros maʃebitʰurtʰ 
badʒaɣlo okʰros taʃtebi danebi sasxureblebi sacdeebi satsʰetsʰxlurebi da okʰrosave andʒamebi ʃida saxlidan tsmidatʰa tsmidaʃi ʃesasvleli karebistʰvis tadzarʃi ʃesasvleli karebistʰvis 
da motʰavda qoveli samuʃao ratsʰ upʰlis saxlʃi ʃeasrula mepʰe solomonma da moitana solomonma mamamisis davitʰis ʃemotsiruleba okʰro vertsʰxli da curceli da daatsqo upʰlis saxlis saɡandzurʃi 
maʃin ʃeqara solomonma israelis uxutsʰesoba da ʃtotʰa qvela tʰavkatsʰi israelis dzetʰa mamissaxlebis upʰrosebi mepʰe solomontʰan ierusalimʃi rom ɡadmoesvenebinatʰ upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmis kidobani davitʰis kʰalakʰidan anu sionidan 
da ʃeiqara mepʰe solomontʰan mtʰeli israeli etʰanimis tʰveʃi anu meʃvide tʰveʃi dɣesastsaulis dros 
da movida israelis mtʰeli uxutsʰesoba da mɣvdlebma astsies kidobani 
da tsaasvenes upʰlis kidobani da sakrebulo karavi da satsmidaris qvela curceli ratsʰ karavʃi iqo tsaasvenes es mɣvdlebma da levianebma 
mepʰe solomoni da mastʰan ʃekrebili israelis mtʰeli sazoɡadoeba kidobnis tsin midiodnen da msxverplad stsiravdnen tsʰxvarsa da dzroxas romlis datʰvla da aɣritsʰxva ʃeudzlebeli iqo simravlis ɡamo 
da daasvenes mɣvdlebma upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmis kidobani tʰavis ɡankutʰvnil adɡilze tadzris dabirʃi tsmidatʰa tsmidaʃi kʰerubimtʰa pʰrtʰebkʰveʃ 
radɡan pʰrtʰebi hkʰondatʰ ɡaʃlili kʰerubimebs kidobnis adɡilze da zemodan pʰaravdnen kʰerubimebi kidobans da mis ketebs 
ketebi im siɡrdzisa iqo rom mxolod misi tʰavebi tʃanda tsmidatʰa tsmididan dabiris tsin da ar tʃanda ɡaretʰ dɣemde ikʰ aris isini 
arapʰeri iqo kidobanʃi ɡarda kʰvis ori dapʰisa mosem rom tʃaatsqo ikʰ xorebʃi qopʰnisas rotsʰa upʰalma aɣtʰkʰma dado israelianebtʰan eɡviptidan matʰi ɡamosvlis ʃemdeɡ 
da rotsʰa ɡamovidnen mɣvdlebi satsmidaridan ɣrubelma aavso upʰlis saxli 
da veɣar dadɡnen samsaxuristʰvis ikʰ mɣvdlebi am ɣrublis ɡamo radɡan upʰlis didebas daepʰara saxli 
maʃin tʰkʰva solomonma bnelʃi davaneba ineba upʰalma 
saxli aɡiʃene savaned ʃenda adɡili ʃens samaradiso samkvidreblad 
piri xalxisken ibruna mepʰem da akurtʰxa israelis krebuli pʰexze idɡa mtʰeli israelis krebuli 
da tʰkʰva kurtʰxeulia upʰali ɣmertʰi israelisa romelitsʰ tʰavisi piritʰ elaparaka davitʰs mamatʃems da axla tʰavisi xelitʰ ʃeasrula is ambobda 
im dɣidan ratsʰ eɡviptidan ɡamoviqvane tʃemi eri israeli israelis artsʰ ertʰ tomʃi ar amirtʃevia kʰalakʰi saxlis asaʃeneblad ratʰa ikʰ damkvidrebuliqo tʃemi saxeli da avirtʃie davitʰi rom is qopʰiliqo tʃems erze israelze 
ɡulʃi hkʰonda davitʰs mamatʃems saxlis aʃeneba upʰlis israelis ɣmertʰis saxelze 
da utʰxra upʰalma davitʰs mamatʃems ɡulʃi rom ɡkʰonda tʃems saxelze saxlis aʃeneba karɡi hkʰeni rom ɡulʃi ɡkʰonda es sakʰme 
oɣond ʃen ar aaʃeneb saxls aramed ʃeni ʃvili ʃeni sazardulidan ɡamosuli aaʃenebs saxls tʃems saxelze 
da daamtkitsʰa upʰalma tʰavisi natʰkʰvami sitqva da aha me davdekʰi mamatʃemis davitʰis adɡilze avedi israelis taxtze roɡortsʰ brdzana upʰalma da upʰlis israelis ɣmertʰis saxelze avaʃene saxli 
da mivutʃine ikʰ adɡili kidobans romelʃitsʰ inaxeba upʰlis aɣtʰkʰma tʃvens mamebtʰan dadebuli rotsʰa eɡviptidan ɡamoiqvana isini upʰalma 
da dadɡa solomoni upʰlis samsxverplos tsin israelis krebulisken pirʃekʰtsʰevitʰ da tsʰisken aɣapqro xelebi 
da tʰkʰva upʰalo ɣmertʰo israelisa ar arsebobs ʃeni msɡavsi ɣmertʰi artsʰ maɣla tsʰaʃi da artsʰ dabla dedamitsaze ʃen inaxav aɣtʰkʰmas da siqvaruls ʃens msaxurtʰa mimartʰ romelnitsʰ mtʰeli ɡulitʰ dadian ʃens tsinaʃe 
ʃen ʃeusrule sitqva ʃens msaxurs mamatʃems davitʰs da dɣes aɣasrula ʃenma xelma ratsʰ ʃens baɡeebs hkʰonda nabrdzanebi 
axlatsʰ ʃeunaxe upʰalo ɣmertʰo israelisa ʃens msaxurs mamatʃems davitʰs ʃeni natʰkʰvami sitqva rom utʰxari ar daɡeleva memkvidre tʃems tsinaʃe israelis taxtze mdʒdomare oɣond ʃeinaxon ʃenma ʃvilebma tsesi da riɡi da iaron tʃems tsinaʃe roɡortsʰ ʃen dadixar tʃems tsinaʃe 
axlatsʰ mtkitsʰe iqos upʰalo ɣmertʰo israelisa ʃeni sitqva ʃens msaxurs mamatʃems davitʰs rom ubrdzane 
nutʰu namdvilad imkvidrebs mitsaze ɣmertʰi aha ver ɡiteven ʃen tsʰani da tsʰani tsʰatʰani roɡor daɡitevs es tʃemi aʃenebuli saxli 
moxede ʃeni msaxuris lotsʰva vedrebas upʰalo ɣmertʰo tʃemo ismine ɣaɣadi da lotsʰva romlitʰatsʰ moɡmartʰavs dɣes ʃeni msaxuri 
tʰvali ɡeciros am saxlze ɣamitʰ da dɣitʰ am adɡilze romlis ɡamotsʰ natʰkʰvami ɡakʰvs akʰ ikʰnebao tʃemi saxli rom ismino lotsʰva romelsatsʰ itqvis am adɡilas ʃeni msaxuri 
ismine ʃeni msaxurisa da ʃeni eris israelis vedreba rotsʰa dadɡebian lotsʰvad am adɡilas ismine ʃens samqopʰel adɡilze tsʰatʰa ʃina ismine da ʃeɡvitsqale 
rotsʰa ʃestsʰodavs vinme tʰavis modzmes da pʰitsʰitʰ daapʰitsʰeben mas da miva es pʰitsʰi ʃens samsxverplostʰan am saxlʃi 
maʃin mousmine tsʰidan da samartʰali ɡautʃine ʃens msaxurtʰ mtquani ɡaamtqune rom mis tʰavze iqos misi sakʰtsʰieli da martʰali ɡaamartʰle rom misi simartʰlisamebr miezɣos 
rotsʰa damartsʰxdeba mtertʰan ʃeni eri israeli imis ɡamo rom ʃeɡtsʰodes mere mobrundeba ʃensken kʰebas ʃeasxams ʃens saxls da daɡitsqebs lotsʰva vedrebas am saxlʃi 
maʃin mousmine tsʰidan da miuteve ʃetsʰodeba ʃens ers israels daabrune im mitsaze romelitsʰ mis mamebs mietsʰi 
rotsʰa daixureba tsʰa da ar itsvimebs ʃetsʰodebis ɡamo ʃens tsinaʃe da daitsqeben lotsʰvas am adɡilas ɡanadideben ʃens saxels da ɡaneridebian tsʰodvebs radɡan ukve dasdʒili ɡeqoleba isini 
maʃin mousmine tsʰidan da miuteve ʃetsʰodeba ʃens msaxurtʰ da ʃens ers israels rom daaqeno sasiketʰo ɡzaze sadatsʰ siaruli martʰebtʰ atsvimo tsvima mitsaze romelitsʰ samkvidreblad miɡitsʰia ʃeni eristʰvis 
ʃimʃiloba ikʰneba kʰveqanaze ʃavi ciri mtsveli xorʃaki siqvitʰle kalia tʰu matli an tʰu mteri ʃemoadɡeba kʰveqanaʃi mis karibceebs ubedureba moxdeba rame tʰu sneuleba 
qovel lotsʰvas qovel vedrebas tʰitʰoeuli adamianisa mtʰeli ʃeni eris israelisa rotsʰa iɡrədznobs ɡasacirs tʰitʰoeuli tʰavis ɡulʃi da xels ɡaiʃvers am saxlisken 
ʃen mousmine tsʰidan ʃeni samqopʰlidan da miuteve kʰmeni da miaɡe tʰitʰoeuls tʰavisi sakʰtsʰielisamebr romelmatsʰ utsqi matʰi ɡulebi radɡan ʃen ertʰma utsqi mtʰeli adamis modɡmis ɡuli 
rom mudam eʃinodetʰ ʃeni vidre tsʰxovroben am mitsaze romelitsʰ tʃveni mama papistʰvis miɡitsʰia 
utsʰxoelsatsʰ romelitsʰ ar aris ʃeni erisaɡani israelis dzetʰaɡani maɡram ʃori kʰveqnidan mova ʃeni saxelis ɡamo 
radɡan ɡaɡebuli ekʰnebatʰ ʃeni didi saxelis maɡari xelis da moɣerebuli mklavis ambavi mova da ilotsʰebs am saxlʃi 
mousmine tsʰidan ʃeni samqopʰlidan da ausrule qvelapʰeri rasatsʰ ʃemoɡɣaɣadebs utsʰxoeli rom itsʰodes kʰveqnierebis qvela xalxma ʃeni saxeli da eʃinodes ʃeni roɡortsʰ ʃens ers israels itsʰodes qvelam rom ʃeni saxelitʰ itsodeba es saxli me rom avaʃene 
rotsʰa ɡava mtertʰan sabrdzolvelad ʃeni eri daadɡeba ɡzas romelzedatsʰ ʃen daaqeneb da daitsqebs lotsʰvas upʰlisadmi im kʰalakʰisken pirʃekʰtsʰeuli ʃen rom airtʃie da im saxlisaken ʃens saxelze rom avaʃene 
maʃin moismine tsʰidan matʰi lotsʰva da ɣaɣadisi da samartʰali ɡautʃine 
rotsʰa ʃeɡtsʰodaven radɡan ar arsebobs utsʰodveli katsʰi da ɡanurisxdebi mtrebis xelʃi tʃaaɡdeb da tqved tsaasxamen mtris kʰveqanaʃi ʃors ikʰneba tʰu axlos 
da ɡons movlen im kʰveqanaʃi sadatsʰ ikʰnebian tqved moikʰtsʰevian da ʃemoɡɣaɣadeben matʰi tqveobis kʰveqanaʃi ʃevtsʰodetʰ davaʃavetʰ boroteba tʃavidinetʰ 
rotsʰa mtʰeli sulitʰa da ɡulitʰ moikʰtsʰevian ʃensken matʰi mtrebis kʰveqanaʃi romeltʰatsʰ tqved tsaasxes da daitsqeben lotsʰvas ʃendami im kʰveqnisaken pirʃekʰtsʰeulni matʰ mamebs rom mietsʰi im kʰalakʰisken ʃen rom airtʃie im saxlisken me rom avaʃene ʃens saxelze 
maʃin moismine tsʰidan ʃeni samqopʰlidan matʰi lotsʰva vedreba da samartʰali ɡautʃine 
da miuteve ʃens ers ʃetsʰodeba da danaʃauli ratsʰ ki ʃeutsʰodavs ʃentʰvis da sibraluls aɣudzrav matʰ damtqveveblebs rom ʃeibralon isini 
radɡan ʃeni eria isini da ʃeni samkvidro romelitsʰ eɡviptidan rkinis ɣumlidan ɡamoviqvane 
tʰvalɣia iqav ʃeni msaxuris vedrebis mimartʰ da ʃeni eris israelis vedrebis mimartʰ rom ɡesmodes matʰi rotsʰa ki ʃemoɡɣaɣadeben 
radɡan ʃen ɡanikutʰvne isini ʃens samkvidrod dedamitsis qvela erisɡan roɡortsʰ ubrdzane ʃeni msaxuris moses xelitʰ rotsʰa eɡviptidan ɡamoɡqavda tʃveni mama papa upʰalo ɣmertʰo 
rotsʰa daasrula upʰlisadmi es lotsʰva vedreba tsamodɡa samsxverplodan romlis tsinatsʰ datʃokʰili iqo tsʰisken xelapqrobili 
idɡa da xmamaɣla akurtʰxebda israelis mtʰels krebuls 
kurtʰxeulia upʰali romelmatsʰ simʃvide mianica tʰavis ers israels roɡortsʰ dapirebuli iqo ertʰi sitqvatsʰ ar dartʃenila aɣusrulebeli im sasiketʰo sitqvebidan tʰavisi msaxuris moses piritʰ rom brdzana 
tʃventʰan iqos upʰali tʃveni ɣmertʰi roɡortsʰ tʃvens mamebtʰan iqo ar miɡvatovos da ar ɡaɡvtsiros 
da miizidos tʰavisken tʃveni ɡulebi rom mis ɡzaze viarotʰ da davitsʰvatʰ misi ʃeɡonebebi tsesebi da kanonebi romelnitsʰ tʃveni mama papistʰvis dautsesebia 
iqos es tʃemi sitqvebi romlitʰatsʰ upʰals vevedrebi axlos upʰaltʰan tʃvens ɣmertʰtʰan dɣitʰa da ɣamitʰ rom maraddɣe atʃendes samartʰals misi msaxuristʰvis da misi eristʰvis israelistʰvis 
ratʰa ɡaiɡos dedamitsis qovelma xalxma rom ɣmertʰia upʰali da sxva arvinaa mis meti 
iqavitʰ ɡultsrpʰelni upʰlisadmi tʃveni ɣmertʰisadmi roɡortsʰ dɣesa xartʰ rom iarotʰ mis tsesze da daitsʰvatʰ misi ʃeɡonebebi 
da ʃestsires msxverpli upʰals mepʰem da mtʰelma israelma mastʰan ertʰad 
da dakla solomonma otsʰdaori atʰasi xari da asotsʰi atʰasi tsʰxvari da samʃvidobo msxverplad ʃestsira upʰals atpʰures upʰlis saxli mepʰem da mtʰelma israelma 
amave dɣes akurtʰxa mepʰem ʃua ezo upʰlis saxlis tsin radɡan aɣavlina sruladdasatsveli ʃestsira dzɣveni da samʃvidobo msxverplis tsʰximebi radɡan upʰlis tsin mdɡari spilendzis samsxverplo simtsʰiris ɡamo ver daitevda aɣsavlens dzɣvens da samʃvidobo kʰonebs 
da dɣesastsaulobda imʒamad upʰlis tʃveni ɣmertʰis tsinaʃe solomoni da mastʰan ertʰad mtʰeli israeli didi krebuli xamatʰidan vidre eɡviptis xevamde ʃvid dɣes da kidev ʃvid dɣes sul tʰotʰxmet dɣes 
da merve dɣes ɡaistumra xalxi da dalotsʰes mepʰe da tsavid tsamovidnen tʰav tʰavis karvebʃi mxiarulni da ɡulsavseni im siketʰis ɡamo ratsʰ ɡauketʰa upʰalma davitʰs tʰavis msaxurs da israels tʰavis ers 
rotsʰa daasrula solomonma upʰlis saxlisa da mepʰis saxlis ʃeneba da qvelapʰeri risi ɡaketʰebatsʰ surda 
meored ɡamoetsʰxada upʰali solomons roɡortsʰ ɡabaonʃi ɡamoetsʰxada 
da utʰxra upʰalma ʃevismine ʃeni lotsʰva vedreba rom mevedrebodi me vakurtʰxe es saxli ʃen rom aaʃene tʃemi saxelis dasamkvidreblad ukunisamde tʃemi tʰvali da ɡuli samaradʒamod akʰ ikʰneba 
ʃen ki tʰu ivli tʃems tsinaʃe roɡortsʰ mamaʃeni davitʰi dadioda tsminda ɡulitʰa da simartʰlitʰ qvelapʰers aɣasruleb ratsʰ nabrdzanebi makʰvs ʃentʰvis daitsʰav tʃems tsess da samartʰals 
maʃin me ɡanvamtkitsʰeb ʃens taxts israelʃi saukunod roɡortsʰ davitʰistʰvis mamaʃenistʰvis mitʰkʰvams ar daɡeleva metʰkʰi israelis taxtze mdʒdomeli 
maɡram tʰu ɡanmidɡebitʰ tʰkʰven da tʰkʰveni ʃvilebi ar daitsʰavtʰ tʃems brdzanebebs da tsesebs me rom moɡetsʰitʰ ʃeudɡebitʰ utsʰxo ɣmertʰebs da tʰaqvans stsʰemtʰ matʰ 
maʃin me ɡavtsqvet israels im mitsis pirisɡan romelitsʰ mas mivetsʰi moviʃoreb saxls romelitsʰ tʃems saxelze vakurtʰxe da saiɡavod da dasatsʰinad ʃeikʰmneba israeli xalxtʰa ʃoris 
qvela vintsʰ tʃauvlis am maɣal saxls ɡaoɡndeba da daustvens da itqvis ase ristʰvis moekʰtsʰa upʰali am kʰveqanas da am saxls 
da itqvian radɡan daivitsqes upʰali tʰaviantʰi ɣmertʰi romelmatsʰ eɡviptidan ɡamoiqvana matʰi mamebi da moecidnen sxva ɣmertʰebs da tʰaqvans stsʰemdnen matʰ da emsaxurebodnen amis ɡamo daatsia upʰalma qvela es ubedureba 
otsʰi tslis tʰavze iqo rom daasrula solomonma ori saxlis upʰlis saxlis da mepʰis saxlis ʃeneba 
xirami tsʰoris mepʰe uɡzavnida solomons nadzvisa da kviparosis xeebs da okʰros misi survilisamebr maʃin mepʰe solomonma mistsʰa xirams otsʰi kʰalakʰi ɡalileis mxareʃi 
da tsavida xirami tsʰoridan solomonis mitsʰemuli kʰalakʰebis sanaxavad da ar moetsona isini 
da tʰkʰva es ra kʰalakʰebi moɡitsʰia tʃemtʰvis dzmao da utsoda matʰ kʰabulis kʰveqana dɣemde 
da ɡauɡzavna xiramma mepʰes asotsʰi kʰankʰari okʰro 
es aris solomon mepʰisɡan datsesebuli beɡara upʰlis saxlisa da tʰavisi saxlis milos ierusalimis kedlis xatsʰoris meɡidos da ɡezeris asaʃeneblad 
da amovida pʰaraoni eɡviptis mepʰe aiɣo ɡezeri da ɡadatsva da amoxotsʰa misi mtsʰxovrebi kʰanaanelebi xolo kʰalakʰi mzitʰevʃi mistsʰa tʰavis asuls solomonis tsʰols 
da aaʃena solomonma ɡezeri da kʰvemo betʰ xoroni 
baqalatʰi da tʰadmori kʰveqnis udabnoʃi 
samaraɡo kʰalakʰebi romlebitsʰ ki hkʰonda solomons etlis kʰalakʰebi tsʰxenosantʰa kʰalakʰebi da qvelapʰeri risi aʃenebatsʰ undoda ierusalimʃi da libanʃi da mtʰel tʰavis saxelmtsipʰoʃi 
qvela xalxi romelitsʰ dartʃa amoreveltʰaɡan xetʰeltʰaɡan pʰerizeltʰaɡan xiveltʰaɡan da iebuseltʰaɡan romelitsʰ ar iqo israelis dzetʰa modɡmisa 
matʰi ʃtʰamomavlebi matʰs ʃemdeɡ rom dartʃnen kʰveqanaʃi da ar ɡautsqvetiatʰ israelis dzetʰ beɡaraze momuʃaveebad ɡanatsesa solomonma da ase arian dɣemde 
israelis dzetʰaɡan aravistʰvis daudvia mas beɡara radɡan meomrebad hqavda isini tʰavis msaxurebad metʰaurebad da sardlebad tʰavisi etlebisa da mxedrobis metʰaurebad 
xutʰas ormotsʰdaatʰi katsʰi hqavda solomons samuʃaoebis zedamxedveltʰa upʰrosebad romelnitsʰ udzɣvebodnen momuʃave xalxs 
pʰaraonis asuli avida davitʰis kʰalakʰidan tʰavis saxlʃi romelitsʰ auʃena mas davitʰma maʃin aaʃena man milo 
tselitsadʃi samdʒer stsiravda solomoni sruladdasatsvel da samʃvidobo msxverpls samsxverploze romelitsʰ upʰals auʃena da ikʰve akmevda sakmevels upʰlis tsinaʃe ase ɡanasrula saxli 
xomaldi aaɡo mepʰe solomonma qetsʰion ɡeberʃi elotʰtʰan rom aris metsamuli zɣvis napiras edomis kʰveqanaʃi 
da ɡaɡzavna xiramma xomalditʰ solomonis msaxurebtʰan tʰavisi msaxurni xomaldis ostatebi zɣvis mtsʰodneni 
da mividnen isini opʰirʃi da tsamoiɣes ikʰidan otʰxasotsʰi kʰankʰari okʰro da moartʰves mepʰe solomons 
da mistsvda ʃebas dedopʰals solomonis ambavi upʰlis sadidebeli da movida rom ɡamotsʰanebitʰ ɡamoetsʰada iɡi 
mivida ierusalimʃi diddzali kʰonebitʰ akʰlemebs mohkʰondatʰ nelsatsʰxeblebi auratsʰxeli okʰro da dzvirpʰasi tʰvlebi da movida solomontʰan da elaparaka qvelapʰerze ratsʰ ɡulʃi hkʰonda 
qvela kitʰxvaze ɡastsʰa pasuxi solomonma arapʰeri iqo mepʰistʰvis dapʰaruli rom upasuxod daetovebina iɡi 
da dainaxa ʃebas dedopʰalma solomonis mtʰeli sibrədzne da naxa misi aʃenebuli saxli 
misi supʰris sacmel sasmeli mis msaxurtʰa satsʰxovrebeli mis msaxurtʰa sakʰmianoba da ʃesamoseli misi mcdeebi sruladdasatsveli msxverpli romelsatsʰ aɣavlenda upʰlis saxlʃi da ɡaoɡnebulma 
utʰxra mepʰes martʰali qopʰila ratsʰ tʃems kʰveqanaʃi mkʰonda ɡaɡonili ʃenze da ʃens sibrədzneze 
sitqvebis ar mdʒeroda vidre tʰavad ar movedi da tʃemi tʰvalitʰ ar vixile aha tʰurme naxevaritsʰ ki ar utʰkʰvamtʰ tʃemtʰvis upʰro meti sibrədzne da dovlatʰi ɡkʰonia vidre ɡameɡona 
bednieria ʃeni xalxi bednierebi arian es ʃeni msaxurni mudam ʃens tsinaʃe rom dɡanan da ismenen ʃens sibrədznes 
kurtʰxeulia upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi romelmatsʰ moɡisurva ratʰa israelis taxtze daesvi upʰlis saukuno siqvarulis ɡamo israelisadmi daudɡenixar mepʰed samartʰlisa da simartʰlis ɡasatʃenad 
da ubodza mepʰes asotsʰi kʰankʰari okʰro diddzali nelsatsʰxebeli da dzvirpʰasi tʰvlebi metdʒer aɣar ʃemosula amdeni nelsatsʰxebeli ramdenitsʰ ʃebas dedopʰalma ubodza mepʰe solomons 
xiramis xomaldmatsʰ romelsatsʰ okʰro mohkʰonda opʰiridan moitana opʰiridanve diddzali sandalozis xe da dzvirpʰasi tʰvlebi 
da ɡaaketʰa mepʰem sandalozisɡan moadʒiri upʰlis saxlistʰvis da mepʰis saxlistʰvis ebnebi da kʰnarebi mɡalobeltʰatʰvis metdʒer aɣar ʃemosula da dɣemde aravis unaxavs amdeni sandalozis xe 
da mistsʰa mepʰe solomonma ʃebas dedopʰals qvelapʰeri ratsʰ ki man ineba da stʰxova ɡarda imisa ratsʰ tʰavisi xelitʰ hkʰonda natʃukʰari roɡortsʰ mepʰe solomons ekadreboda da ukan ɡabrunda da tsavida iɡi tʰavis kʰveqanaʃi tʰavis msaxurebtʰan ertʰad 
ekʰvsas samotsʰdaekʰvsi kʰankʰari okʰro ʃemosdioda solomons qoveltsliurad 
imis ɡarda ratsʰ ʃemohkʰondatʰ moɡzaurebs da vacrebs arabtʰa mepʰeebs da mxaretʰa ɡanmɡeblebs 
da ɡaaketʰa mepʰe solomonma orasi muzaradi nacedi okʰrosɡan ekʰvsasi okʰro daixardʒa tʰitʰoeul muzaradze 
da samasi pʰari nacedi okʰrosɡan sami mana okʰro daixardʒa tʰitʰoeul pʰarze da daatsqo isini mepʰem libanis maɣnaris saxlʃi 
da ɡaaketʰa mepʰem spilos dzvlisaɡan didi taxti da xalasi okʰrotʰi moceda 
ekʰvsi sapʰexuri hkʰonda taxts sazurɡeze momrəɡvalebuli iqo sadʒdomis orsave mxares sanidaqveebi hkʰonda xolo sanidaqveebs tʰitʰo lomi edɡa ɡverditʰ 
ekʰvs sapʰexurze akʰetʰ ikʰitʰ sxva tʰormeti lomi idɡa artsʰ ertʰ samepʰoʃi ar qopʰila amis msɡavsi ram 
solomonis qvela sasmisi okʰrosi iqo qvela curceli libanis maɣnaris saxlʃi rtʃeuli okʰrosi iqo radɡan vertsʰxli da spilendzi arapʰrad miatʃndatʰ solomonis dros 
radɡan mepʰis tʰarʃiʃuli xomaldebi xiramis xomaldebtʰan ertʰad ɡadioda zɣvaʃi tselitsadʃi ertʰxel modioda tʰarʃiʃuli xomaldi da mohkʰonda okʰro vertsʰxli spilos dzvali mohqavda qapʰuzunebi da pʰarʃevanɡebi 
kʰveqnierebis qvela mepʰes aɣemateboda mepʰe solomoni dovlatʰitʰa da sibrədznitʰ 
mtʰeli kʰveqana estsrapʰoda solomonis naxvas rom moesminatʰ misi sibrədzne romelitsʰ ɡulʃi tʃaudo ɣmertʰma 
qvelas tʰavisi dzɣveni mohkʰonda okʰrosa da vertsʰxlis curceli ʃesamoseli sacurveli nelsatsʰxeblebi tsʰxenebi da dʒorebi ase iqo tslidan tslamde 
tʰavi mouqara solomonma etlebsa da tsʰxenosnebs da hqavda atʰasotʰxasi etli da tʰormeti atʰasi tsʰxenosani ɡanalaɡa isini etlebis sadɡom kʰalakʰebʃi da ierusalimʃi tʰavistʰan 
vertsʰxli kʰvis pʰasi ɡaxada mepʰem ierusalimʃi xolo nadzvi ɡaamravla sikimoris xesavitʰ dablobebʃi rom aris 
solomonis tsʰxenebi eɡviptidan da kevedan iqo moqvanili mepʰis vacrebs mihqavdatʰ kevedan sapʰasuritʰ 
etli ekʰvsas vertsʰxlad amohqavdatʰ eɡviptidan xolo tsʰxenebi asormotsʰdaatʰ vertsʰxlad amave pʰasʃi mihkʰondatʰ tʰaviantʰi xelitʰ xetʰeltʰa da aramis mepʰeebistʰvisatsʰ
