matʰi debi tsʰeruia da abiɡaili tsʰeruias dzeni abiʃai ioabi da qasaeli samni 
abiɡailma ʃva qamasa qamasas mama ietʰeri iqo ismaeliani 
kʰalebma xetsʰronis dzem qazubas tʰavis tsʰols da ieriqotʰs aʃobina aha misi dzeni ieʃeri ʃobabi da ardoni 
da mokvda qazuba da kʰalebma epʰratʰi ʃeirtʰo tsʰolad uʃva mas xuri 
xurma ʃva uri urim ʃva betsʰaleli 
mere xetsʰroni ɡilqadis mamis asultʰan ʃevida da tsʰolad ʃeirtʰo maʃin iɡi samotsʰi tslisa iqo uʃva mas seɡubi 
seɡubma ʃva iairi ɡilqadis kʰveqanaʃi mas otsʰdasami kʰalakʰi hkʰonda 
ɡeʃurma da aramma tsaartʰves matʰ iairis dabebi kenatʰi tʰavis kʰalakʰebianad sul samotsʰi kʰalakʰi qvela eseni ɡilqadis mamis makʰiris dzeni arian 
mas ʃemdeɡ ratsʰ xetsʰroni kʰaleb epʰratʰʃi mokvda xetsʰronis tsʰolma abiamma uʃva mas aʃxuri tʰekoaqis mama 
xetsʰronis pirmʃos ieraxmeelis dzeni iqvnen pirmʃo rami buna oreni otsʰemi da axia 
ieraxmeels sxva tsʰolitsʰ hqavda saxelad qatara is iqo onamis deda 
ieraxmeelis pirmʃos ramis dzeni iqvnen maqatsʰi iamini da qekeri 
onamis dzeni iqvnen ʃamai da idaqi ʃamais dzeni nadabi da abiʃuri 
abiʃuris tsʰols erkʰva abixaili man ʃva axbani da molidi 
nadabis dzeni seledi da apʰaimi seledi uʃvilod mokvda 
apʰaims hqavda dze iʃqi iʃqis dze iqo ʃeʃani ʃeʃanis dze iqo axlai 
iadaqis ʃamais dzmis dzeni axi ʃami ietʰeri da ionatʰani ietʰeri uʃvilod mokvda 
ionatʰanis dzeni pʰeletʰi zaza eseni ieraxmeelis dzeni iqvnen 
ʃeʃans vaʒebi ar hqolia mxolod asulebi hqavda ʃeʃans eɡvipteli qma hqavda saxelad iarxaqi 
ʃeʃanma tʰavisi asuli tʰavis qmas iarxaqs mistsʰa tsʰolad da uʃva mas qatʰai 
qatʰaim ʃva natʰani natʰanma ʃva zabadi 
zabadma ʃva epʰlali epʰlalma ʃva qobedi 
qobedma ʃva iehu iehum ʃva qazaria 
qazariam ʃva xaletsʰi xaletsʰma ʃva elqasa 
elqasam ʃva sismai sismaim ʃva ʃalumi 
ʃalumma ʃva iekamia iekamiam ʃva eliʃamaqi 
ieraxmeelis dzmis kʰalebis dzeni pirmʃo meʃaqi es aris zipʰis mama da mareʃas xebronis mamis dzeni 
xebronis dzeni koraxi tʰapʰuaxi rekemi ʃemaqi 
ʃemaqma ʃva raxami iorkeqamis mama rekemma ʃva ʃamai 
ʃamais dze iqo maqoni maqoni iqo mama betʰ tsʰurisa 
kʰalebis xarcas qepʰas ʃeedzina xarani motsʰa da ɡazezi xaranma ʃva ɡazezi 
iahdais dzeni reɡemi iotʰami ɡeʃani pʰeleti qepʰa da ʃaqapʰi 
kʰalebis xarcas maqakʰas ʃeedzina ʃeberi tʰirxana 
da ʃva madmanas mama ʃaqapʰi makʰbenasa da ɡibqas mama ʃeva kʰalebis asuli iqo qakʰsa 
eseni iqvnen kʰalebis dzeni xuras dze ʃobali epʰratʰas pirmʃo mama kiriatʰ ieqarimisa 
salma mama betʰ lexemisa da xarepʰi mama betʰ ɡaderisa 
ʃobals kiriatʰ ieqarimis mamas hqavda vaʒebi haroe xatsʰi menuxotʰi 
kiriatʰ ieqarimis saɡvareuloni itʰreli pʰutʰeli ʃumatʰeli da miʃraqeli matʰɡan ɡamovidnen tsʰorqatʰeli da eʃtʰaoleli 
salmas dzeni betʰ lexemi netopʰatʰeli qatarotʰ betʰ ioabi manaxtʰieltʰa naxevari da tsʰorqelni 
iaqbetsʰʃi mtsʰxovreb mtsiɡnobartʰa saɡvareuloni tʰirqatʰelni ʃimqatʰelni sukʰatʰelni eseni kinelni arian betʰ rekʰabis mamis xamatʰis ʃtʰamomavlebi 
eseni iqvnen davitʰis dzeni romlebitsʰ xebronʃi ʃeedzinen mas pirmʃo qamnoni axinoqam izreqelelisɡan meore danieli abiɡail kʰarmelelisaɡan 
mesame abesalomi ɡeʃuris mepʰe tʰalmais asulis maqakʰas vaʒi meotʰxe adonia xaɡitʰis vaʒi 
mexutʰe ʃepʰatia abitalisaɡan meekʰvse itʰraqami qeɡlasɡan tʰavisi tsʰolisaɡan 
ekʰvsni ʃeedzinen mas xebronʃi ʃvidi tseli da ekʰvsi tʰve ikʰ imepʰa otsʰdatsʰameti tseli ki ierusalimʃi 
eseni ʃeedzinen ierusalimʃi ʃimqa ʃobabi natʰani solomoni otʰxni batʰ ʃuaqisɡan qamielis asulisaɡan 
ibxari eliʃamaqi elipʰaleti 
noɡa nepʰeɡi iapʰiaqi 
eliʃamaqi eliadaqi elipʰeleti tsʰxrani 
sul eseni arian davitʰis dzeni xarcebis dzetʰa ɡarda tʰamaritsʰ matʰi da iqo 
solomonis dze rexabqami misi dze abia misi dze asa misi dze ioʃapʰati 
misi dze iorami misi dze axaziahu misi dze ioaʃi misi dze amatsʰiahu 
misi dze qazaria misi dze iotʰami 
misi dze axazi misi dze xizkiahu misi dze menaʃe 
misi dze amoni misi dze ioʃiahu 
ioʃiahus dzeni pirmʃo ioxanani meore iehoiakimi mesame tsʰidkiahu meotʰxe ʃalumi 
iehoiakimis dzeni misi dze iekʰonia misi dze tsʰidkiahu 
iekʰonias dzeni asiri misi dze ʃealtʰieli 
malkʰirami pʰedaia ʃenatsʰari iekamia hoʃamaqi nedabia 
pʰedaias dzeni zerubabeli ʃimqi zerubabelis dzeni meʃulami xanania matʰi da ʃelomitʰi 
xaʃuba oheli berekʰia xasadia da iuʃab xesedi xutʰni 
xananias dzeni pʰelatia da esaia repʰaias dzeni arnanis dzeni qobadias dzeni ʃekʰanias dzeni 
da ʃekʰanias dze ʃemaqia ʃemaqias dzeni xatuʃi iɡeali bariaxi neqaria ʃapʰati ekʰvsni 
neqarias dzeni elioqenai xizkia qazrikami samni 
elioqenais dzeni hodaviahu eliaʃibi pʰelaia qakubi ioxanani delaia qanani ʃvidni 
iudas dzeni pʰeretsʰi xetsʰroni kʰarmi xuri da ʃobali 
ʃobalis dzem reaiam ʃva iaxatʰi iaxatʰma ʃva axumai da lahadi aha tsʰorqatʰeltʰa saɡvareuloni 
aha qetamis mamis dzeni izreqeli iʃma idbaʃi matʰ das hatsʰelelpʰoni erkʰva 
pʰenueli ɡedoris mama da qezeri xuʃas mama eseni arian xuris dzeni epʰratʰas pirmʃosi betʰlexemis mamisa 
aʃxurs tʰekoaqis mamas ori tsʰoli hqavda xela da naqara 
naqarasɡan ʃeedzina axuzami xepʰeri tʰemni da haaxaʃtʰari eseni iqvnen naqaras dzeni 
xelas dzeni tsʰeretʰi ietsʰxari da etʰnani 
kotsʰma ʃva qanubi hatsʰobeba da axarxel harumis dzis saɡvareuloni 
iaqbetsʰi tʰavis dzmebze upʰro pativdebuli iqo iaqbetsʰi dedamisma daarkʰva tʰkʰva radɡan tkivilitʰ ɡavatʃineo 
mouxmo iaqbetsʰma israelis ɣmertʰs da utʰxra neta kurtʰxevitʰ makurtʰxebde da sazɣvrebs ɡamididebde ʃeni xeli tʃemtʰan ikʰnebodes da borotebisaɡan damitsʰavde rom ar ɡavitandʒo da mistsʰa ɣmertʰma rasatsʰ itʰxovda 
ʃuxas dzmam kʰelubma ʃva mexiri eʃtʰonis mama 
eʃtʰonma ʃva betʰ rapʰa pʰaseaxi da qir naxaʃis mama tʰexina aha rekʰas mtsʰxovrebni 
kenazis dzeni qatʰnieli da seraia qatʰnielis dze iqo xatʰatʰi 
meqonotʰaim ʃva qopʰra seraiam ʃva ioabi mama xurotʰa velisa radɡan xuroni iqvnen 
kʰalebis iepʰunes dzis dzeni qiru ela da naqami elas dze iqo kenazi 
iehalelis dzeni zipʰi da zipʰa tʰiria da asareli 
qezras dzeni ietʰeri meredi qepʰeri da ialoni ietʰerma ʃva miriami ʃamai da iʃbaxi eʃtʰemoaqis mama 
mis iudael tsʰols ʃeedzina ieredi mama ɡedorisa da xeberi mama soxosi da iekutʰieli mama zanoaxisa 
hodias tsʰolis naxamis dis vaʒebi keqilas mama ɡarmeli da eʃtʰemoaq maqakʰatʰeli 
ʃimonis dzeni qamnoni rina ben xanani da tʰiloni iʃqis dzeni zoxetʰi da ben zoxetʰi 
iudas dzis ʃelas vaʒebi qeri lekʰas mama laqda mareʃas mama da selis sakʰmis saɡvareuloebi aʃbeaqis saxlidan 
iokimi da kʰozebas katsʰebi ioaʃi da sarapʰi moabsa da iaʃubi laxems pʰlobdnen es dzveli ambebia 
isini metʰuneebi iqvnen da netaqimsa da ɡederaʃi saxlobdnen mepʰestʰan tsʰxovrobdnen da mistʰvis ʃromobdnen 
simonis dzeni nemueli iamini iaribi zeraxi da ʃauli 
misi dze ʃalumi misi dze miʃmaqi 
miʃmaqis dzeni misi dze xamueli misi dze zakʰuri misi dze ʃimqi 
ʃimqis tʰekʰvsmeti vaʒi da ekʰvsi kʰali hqavda mis dzmebs bevri vaʒebi ar hqoliatʰ da artsʰ matʰi saɡvareulo iqo iudas dzetʰa saɡvareulosavitʰ mravalritsʰxovani 
isini tsʰxovrobdnen beer ʃebaqʃi moledasa da xatsʰar ʃuqalʃi 
bilhaʃi qetsʰemʃi tʰoladʃi 
betʰuelʃi xormaʃi tsʰiklaɡʃi 
betʰ markʰabotʰʃi xatsʰar susimʃi betʰ birsa da ʃaqaraimʃi aha matʰi kʰalakʰebi davitʰis ɡamepʰebamde 
matʰi dasaxlebebi qetami qaini rimoni tʰokʰeni qaʃani xutʰi kʰalakʰi 
aseve qvela is sopʰlebi romelnitsʰ am kʰalakʰebs ekvrodnen vidre baqalamde aha matʰi satsʰxovrebeli da matʰi saɡvartomo nusxa 
meʃobabi iamlekʰi ioʃa amatsʰias dze 
ioeli da iehu dze ioʃibiasi seraias dzisa qasielis dzisa 
elioqenai iaqakoba iʃoxaia qasaia qadieli iʃimieli benaia 
ziza dze ʃipʰqisa dzisa alonisa dzisa iedaiasi dzisa ʃimrisa 
eseni saxelebitʰ rom arian tʃamotʰvlilni tʰav tʰaviantʰi saɡvareuloebis mtʰavrebi iqvnen matʰi mamis saxli dzalian ɡaizarda 
matʰ ɡedorisaken ɡastsies velis aɣmosavletʰitʰ tʰaviantʰi tsʰxvristʰvis sadzovrebis sadzebnelad 
da poxiersa da karɡ sadzovars miaɡnes vrtsʰeli kʰveqana iqo tʰan mʃvidi da mqudro radɡan utsin akʰ kʰamis ʃtʰamomavlebi tsʰxovrobdnen 
isini saxelebitʰ rom iqvnen tʃamotserilni iudas mepʰis iexizkiahus dɣeebʃi movidnen da ɡaanadɡures matʰi karvebi da maqonelni ikʰ rom iqvnen im dɣes ertʰianad amotsqvites isini da matʰ natsʰvlad dasaxldnen radɡan ikʰ iqo matʰi tsʰxvris sadzovrebi 
matʰɡan simonis dzetʰaɡan xutʰasi katsʰi seqiris mtʰisken ɡaeʃura iʃqis dzetʰa pʰelatias neqarias repʰaias da quzielis metʰaurobitʰ 
da ɡaanadɡures qamalekis dartʃenili natamali da dɣemde ikʰ tsʰxovroben 
dzeni reubenis israelis pirmʃosi iɡi pirmʃo iqo maɡram rotsʰa mamis saretsʰeli tsabiltsa misi pirmʃooba ɡadaetsʰa israelis dzis iosebis dzetʰ ara imisatʰvis rom pirmʃod tʃatseriliqvnen 
iuda dzlieri iqo tʰavis dzmebʃi da tsinamdzɣvaritsʰ misɡan iqo pirmʃooba ki iosebma miiɣo 
reubenis israelis pirmʃos dzeni xanokʰi pʰalu xetsʰroni da kʰarmi 
ioelis dzeni misi dze ʃemaqia misi dze ɡoɡi misi dze ʃimqi 
misi dze mikʰa misi dze reaia misi dze baqali 
misi dze beera romelitsʰ tqved tsaiqvana aʃuris mepʰem tʰiɡlatʰ pʰileserma is iqo reubenis dzetʰa tsinamdzɣoli 
misi dzmebi matʰi saɡvareuloebisa da saɡvartomo nusxis mixedvitʰ iqvnen upʰrosi ieqieli zakʰaria 
belaqi dze qazazisa dze ʃemaqisa dze ioelisa iɡi qaroqerʃi tsʰxovrobda nebomde da baqal meqonamde 
aɣmosavletʰitʰ tsʰxovrobda mdinare evpʰratidan moqolebuli udabnos piramde radɡan diddzali sakʰoneli hqavdatʰ ɡilqadis kʰveqanaʃi 
saulis dros aɡarelebs eomebodnen da matʰ xelʃi tʃatsʰvivdnen da dasaxldnen isini matʰ karvebʃi ɡilqadis mtʰel aɣmosavletʰ mxareʃi 
ɡadis dzeni matʰ mezoblad tsʰxovrobdnen baʃanis kʰveqanaʃi salkʰamde 
upʰrosi ioeli momdevnoni ʃapʰami iaqnai da ʃapʰati baʃanʃi tsʰxovrobdnen 
matʰi dzmebi tʰav tʰaviantʰi mamis saxlidan mikʰaeli meʃulami ʃebaqi iorai iaqkʰani ziaqi qeberi da ʃibqa 
aha dzeni abixailisa xuris dzisa iaroaxis dzisa ɡilqadis dzisa mikʰaelis dzisa ieʃiʃais dzisa iaxdos dzisa buzis dzisa 
axi dze qabdielisa dze ɡunisa matʰi mamissaxlis tʰavkatsʰi 
isini tsʰxovrobdnen ɡilqadʃi baʃansa da mis kutʰvnil kʰalakʰebʃi aseve ʃaronis mtʰel sanaxebʃi vidre ɡamovidodnen 
qvelani aɣiritsʰxnen iudas mepʰis iotʰamis dros da ierobqamis israelis mepʰis dros 
reubenis dzeebʃi ɡadis dzeebʃi da menaʃes naxevar tomʃi iqvnen ɡuladi vaʒkatsʰebi romelnitsʰ pʰarsa da maxvils atarebdnen mʃvildosnobdnen da brdzolaʃi iqvnen natsrtʰobni matʰɡan ritsʰxvitʰ ormotsʰdaotʰxi atʰas ʃvidassamotsʰi ɡamodioda saomrad 
aɡarelebtʰan ieturtʰan napʰiʃtʰan da nodapʰtʰan hkʰondatʰ omi 
da miexmarnen matʰ tsinaaɣmdeɡ brdzolaʃi da matʰ xelʃi tʃatsʰvivdnen aɡarelebi mtʰeli matʰi sabadeblitʰurtʰ es imitom rom omʃi ɣmertʰs mouxmes da manatsʰ usmina matʰ raki misi imedi hkʰondatʰ 
da tsamoasxes matʰi sakʰoneli ormotsʰdaatʰi atʰasi akʰlemi orasormotsʰdaatʰi atʰasi tsvrilpʰexa ori atʰasi viri da asi atʰasi tqve 
mravali mokluli daetsʰa radɡan ɣvtʰisaɡan iqo es omi da saxlobdnen isini matʰs adɡilebze sanam tqveobaʃi moxvdebodnen 
da menaʃes naxevari tomitsʰ dasaxlda im kʰveqanaʃi baʃanidan moqolebuli vidre baqal xermonamde seniramde da xermonis mtʰamde mravalritsʰxovanni iqvnen isini 
esenia matʰi mamissaxlis tʰavkatsʰebi qepʰeri iʃqi elieli qazrieli ieremia hodavia iaxdieli mamatsʰi vaʒkatsʰebi mamissaxlis saxelovani tʰavkatsʰebi 
rotsʰa matʰ zurɡi akʰtsʰies mamatʰa ɣmertʰs da ɡzaabneulni ɡahqvnen im kʰveqnis xalxis ɣmertʰebs matʰɡan rom ɡandevna ɣmertʰma 
maʃin aɣdzra israelis ɣmertʰma pʰulis aʃuris mepʰis suli da aʃuris mepʰis tʰiɡlatʰ pʰileseris suli da ɡaasaxla reubenis dzeni ɡadis dzeni da menaʃes naxevari tomi da tʃaasaxla isini xalaxʃi xaborʃi haraʃi da mdinare ɡozantʰan dɣemde 
levis dzeni ɡerʃoni kehatʰi da merari 
kehatʰis dzeni qamrami itsʰhari xebroni da quzieli 
qamramis dzeni aaroni mose miriami aaronis dzeni nadabi abihu eleazari da itʰamari 
eleazarma ʃva pʰinxasi pʰinxasma ʃva abiʃuaqi 
abiʃuaqma ʃva buki bukma ʃva quzi 
quzma ʃva zeraxia zeraxiam ʃva meraiotʰi 
meraiotʰma ʃva amaria amariam ʃva axitubi 
axitubma ʃva tsʰadoki tsʰadokma ʃva aximaqatsʰi 
aximaqatsʰma ʃva qazaria qazariam ʃva ioxanani 
ioxananma ʃva qazaria es im tadzarʃi mɣvdlobda romelitsʰ solomonma aaʃena ierusalimʃi 
qazariam ʃva amaria amariam ʃva axitubi 
axitubma ʃva tsʰadoki tsʰadokma ʃva ʃalumi 
ʃalumma ʃva xilkia xilkiam ʃva qazaria 
qazariam ʃva seraia seraiam ʃva iehotsʰadaki 
iehotsʰadaki tsavida tqveobaʃi rotsʰa upʰalma iuda da ierusalimi nabukʰodonosoris xelitʰ ɡaasaxla 
levis dzeni ɡerʃomi kehatʰi da merari 
ɡerʃomis dzetʰa saxelebi libni da ʃimqi 
kehatʰis dzeni qamrami itsʰhari xebroni da quzieli 
meraris dzeni maxli da muʃi aha levis saɡvareuloni tʰav tʰaviantʰi mamissaxlis mixedvitʰ 
ɡerʃoms hqavda misi dze libni misi dze iaxatʰi misi dze zima 
misi dze ioaxi misi dze qido misi dze zeraxi misi dze ieatʰrai 
kehatʰis dzeni misi dze qaminadabi misi dze koraxi misi dze asiri 
misi dze elkana misi dze abiasapʰi misi dze asiri 
misi dze tʰaxatʰi misi dze urieli misi dze quzia misi dze ʃauli 
elkanas dzeni qamasai da aximotʰi 
misi dze elkana misi dze tsʰopʰai misi dze naxatʰi 
misi dze eliabi misi dze ieroxami misi dze elkana 
samuelis dzeni ioeli pirmʃo da momdevno abia 
meraris dzeni maxli misi dze libni mə 
misi dze ʃimqa misi dze xaɡia misi dze qasaia 
aha isini mɡaloblebad rom daaqena davitʰma upʰlis saxlʃi kidobnis dadɡmis ʃemdeɡ 
sadɣesastsaulo karavtʰan ɡalobitʰ asrulebdnen msaxurebas sanam solomoni ierusalimʃi upʰlis saxls aaʃenebda isini tʰaviantʰi msaxurebis tsesisamebr idɡnen 
aha isini msaxurebas vintsʰ etseodnen da matʰi dzeni kehatʰis dzetʰaɡan hemani mɡalobeli ioelis dze dzisa samuelisa 
dzisa elkanasi dzisa ieroxamisa dzisa elielisa dzisa tʰoaxisa 
dzisa tsʰupʰisa dzisa elkanasi dzisa maxatʰisa dzisa qamasaisi 
dzisa elkanasi dzisa ioelisa dzisa qazariasi dzisa tsʰepʰaniasi 
dzisa tʰaxatʰisa dzisa asirisa dzisa abiasapʰisa dzisa koraxisa 
dzisa itsʰharisa dzisa kehatʰisa dzisa levisa dzisa israelisa 
misi dzma asapʰi mis mardʒvniv mdɡomi asapʰ berekʰiahus dze ʃimqas dzisa 
dzisa mikʰaelisa dzisa baqaseiasi dzisa malkʰiasi 
dzisa etʰnisa dzisa zeraxisa dzisa qadaiasi 
dzisa etʰanisa dzisa zimasi dzisa ʃimqisa 
dzisa iaxatʰisa dzisa ɡerʃomisa dzisa levisa 
meraris dzeni matʰi dzmebi martsʰxniv rom idɡnen etʰan kiʃis dze dzisa qabdisa dzisa malukʰisa 
dzisa xaʃabiasi dzisa amtsʰiasi dzisa xilkiasi 
dzisa amatsʰisa dzisa banisa dzisa ʃamerisa 
dzisa maxlisa dzisa muʃisa dzisa merarisa dzisa levisa 
matʰi dzmebi levianebi ɣvtʰis saxlis savanis qvelanairi samsaxurisatʰvis iqvnen daqenebulni 
aaroni da misi dzeni sruladdasatsvelis samsxverploze da sakmevlis samsxverploze akmevdnen tsmidatʰa tsmidaʃi qvela sakʰmes aketʰebdnen da qvelapʰers ise asrulebdnen israelis ɡansatsmedad roɡortsʰ brdzana mosem ɣvtʰis msaxurma 
aha aaronis dzeni misi dze eleazari misi dze pʰinxasi misi dze abiʃuaqi 
misi dze buki misi dze quzi misi dze zeraxia 
misi dze meraiotʰi misi dze amaria misi dze axitubi 
misi dze tsʰadoki misi dze aximaqatsʰi 
es matʰi satsʰxovrebeli matʰi dabebisa da sazɣvris mixedvitʰ erɡotʰ aaronis dzetʰ kehatʰeltʰa saɡvareulodan tsilisqritʰ matʰ ekutʰvnodatʰ 
da mistsʰes matʰ xebroni iudas kʰveqanaʃi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰa da ʃemoɡarenitʰurtʰ 
am kʰalakʰis mindor veli da sopʰlebi kʰalebs mistsʰes iepʰunes dzes 
aaronis dzetʰ mistsʰes tʰavʃesapʰari kʰalakʰebi xebroni libna tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ iatʰiri da eʃtʰemoaqi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
xileni tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ debiri tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
qaʃani tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ betʰ ʃemeʃi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
beniaminis tomidan ɡebaqi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ qalemetʰi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ qanatʰotʰi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ matʰ saɡvareuloebʃi sul tsʰameti kʰalakʰi iqo 
xolo danartʃeni kehatʰianebs am tomis saɡvareulodan menaʃes naxevartomis naxevridan atʰi kʰalakʰi erɡotʰ tsilisqritʰ 
ɡerʃomianebs tʰav tʰaviantʰi saɡvareuloebisda mixedvitʰ isakʰaris aʃeris napʰtʰalisa da menaʃes tomebidan tsʰameti kʰalakʰi erɡotʰ baʃanʃi 
merarianebs tʰav tʰaviantʰi saɡvareuloebisda mixedvitʰ reubenis ɡadisa da zebulunis tomebidan tʰormeti kʰalakʰi ʃexvdatʰ tsilisqritʰ 
es kʰalakʰebi mistsʰes tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ israelis dzeebma levianebs 
tsilisqritʰ mistsʰes iudas simonisa da beniaminis dzetʰa tomebidan is kʰalakʰebi romeltʰatsʰ saxelebi erkʰvatʰ 
kehatʰiantʰa saɡvareuloebma tʰaviantʰi sasazɣvro kʰalkʰebi epʰremis tomisaɡan miiɣes 
matʰve mistsʰes tʰavʃesapʰari kʰalakʰebi ʃekʰemi epʰremis mtʰaze tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ ɡezeri tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
iakmeqami tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ betʰ xoroni tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
aialoni tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ da ɡatʰ rimoni tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
menaʃes naxevartomidan qaneri tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ da bilqami tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ mistsʰes kehatʰiantʰa danartʃen saɡvareulos 
ɡerʃomianebs menaʃes naxevartomis saɡvareulodan baʃanʃi mistsʰes ɡolani tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ da qaʃtʰarotʰi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
isakʰaris tomidan mistsʰes kedeʃi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ dabratʰi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
ramotʰi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ qanemi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
aʃeris tomidan mistsʰes maʃali tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ qabdoni tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
xukoki tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ rexobi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
napʰtʰalis tomidan mistsʰes kedeʃi ɡalileaʃi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ xamoni tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ da kiriatʰaimi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
danartʃen merarianebs ki zebulunis tomidan mistsʰes rimono tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ da tʰabori tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
iordanes ɡadaɣma ierixostʰan iordanes aɣmosavletʰitʰ reubenis tomidan mistsʰes betsʰeri udabnoʃi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ da iahtsʰa tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
kedmotʰi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ da mepʰaqatʰi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
ɡadis tomidan mistsʰes ramotʰi ɡilqadʃi tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
da xeʃboni tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ da iaqzeri tʰavisi sanaxebitʰ 
isakʰaris dzeni tʰolaqi pʰua iaʃubi ʃimroni otʰxni 
tʰolaqis dzeni quzi repʰaia ierieli iaxmai iabsami samueli tʰolaqis mamissaxlis tʰavkatsʰebi tʰav tʰaviantʰi modɡmis maɡari vaʒkatsʰebi davitʰis dros matʰi ritsʰxvi otsʰdaoriatʰas ekʰvsasi iqo 
quzis dze izraxia izraxias dzeni mikʰaeli qobadia ioeli iʃia sul xutʰi tʰavkatsʰi 
tʰav tʰaviantʰi modɡmidan da mamiissaxlidan otsʰdatʰekʰvsmetiatʰasiani sabrdzolo razmi ɡamohqavdatʰ omʃi radɡan bevri tsʰol ʃvili hqavdatʰ 
matʰi dzmebi isakʰaris qvela saɡvareulos maɡari vaʒkatsʰebi otʰxmotsʰdaʃvidi atʰasni iqvnen qvelani saɡvartomo nusxaʃi iqvnen tʃatserilni 
beniaminianebi belaqi bekʰeri da iediqaeli samni 
belaqis dzeni etsʰboni quzi quzieli ierimotʰi qiri xutʰni mamissaxlis tʰavkatsʰebi saɡvartomo nusxaʃi otsʰdaori atʰas otsʰdatʰotʰxmetni arian tʃatserilni 
bekʰeris dzeni zemira ioqaʃi eliezeri elioqenai qomri iremotʰi abia qanatʰotʰi da qalametʰi qvela isini bekʰeris dzeni arian 
saɡvartomo nusxaʃi isini tʰav tʰaviantʰ mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebis mixedvitʰ arian tʃatserilni sul otsʰiatʰas orasi dzlieri mebrdzoli 
iediqaelis dzeni bilhani bilhanis dzeni iequʃi beniamini ehudi kʰenaqana zetʰani tʰarʃiʃi da axiʃaxari 
qvela eseni iediqaelis dzeni arian mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebi matʰɡan tʃvidmetiatʰas orasi mebrdzoli ɡamodioda sabrdzolvelad 
ʃupʰimi da xupʰimi qiris dzeni iqvnen xolo xuʃimi axeris dze iqo 
napʰtʰalis dzeni iaxatsʰieli ɡuni ietsʰeri da ʃalumi bilhas ʃvilebi iqvnen 
menaʃes dzeni asrieli romelitsʰ misma aramelma xarcam ɡaatʃina masve eqola makʰiri ɡilqadis mama 
makʰirma tsʰolebi mouqvana xupʰims da ʃupʰims matʰ das maqakʰa erkʰva vaʒs tsʰelapʰxadi tsʰelapʰxads asulebi hqavda 
maqakʰam makʰiris tsʰolma vaʒi ɡaatʃina da pʰereʃi daarkʰva mis dzmas ʃareʃi erkʰva misi vaʒebi iqvnen ulami da rakemi 
ulamis dze bedani aha dzeni ɡilqadisa makʰiris dzisa menaʃes dzisa 
misma dam hamolekʰetʰma ʃva iʃhodi abiqezeri da maxla 
ʃemidaqis dzeni iqvnen axiani ʃekʰemi likxi da aniqami 
epʰremis dzeni ʃutʰalaxi misi dze beredi misi dze tʰaxatʰi misi dze elqada misi dze tʰaxatʰi 
misi dze zabadi misi dze ʃutʰelaxi qezeri da elqadi isini ɡatʰis xalxma amoxotsʰa am kʰveqnis mkvidrebma radɡan isini sakʰonlis tsasartʰmevad daesxnen tʰavs 
didxans ɡlovobda epʰremi matʰi mama mis sanuɡeʃod misi dzmebi movidnen 
da miudɡa iɡi tʰavis tsʰols daorsulda da bici ɡautʃnda saxelad beriqa daarkʰves radɡan mis saxlʃi ubedureba datrialda 
ʃeera misi asuli iqo da man aaʃena zemo da kʰvemo betʰ xoroni da uzen ʃeera 
misi dze iqo repʰaxi misi dze reʃepʰi da tʰelaxi da misi dze tʰaxani 
misi dze laqdani misi dze qamihudi misi dze eliʃamaqi 
misi dze noni misi dze ieso 
matʰi sampʰlobelo da satsʰxovrebeli iqo betʰ eli da misi daba sopʰlebi aɣmosavletʰitʰ naqarani da dasavletʰitʰ ɡezeri tʰavisi daba sopʰlebitʰ ʃekʰemi tʰavisi daba sopʰlebitʰ ɣazamde da mis daba sopʰlebamde 
menaʃes dzetʰa xelʃi iqo betʰ ʃeani tʰavisi daba sopʰlebitʰ tʰaqnakʰi tʰavisi daba sopʰlebitʰ meɡido tʰavisi daba sopʰlebitʰ dori tʰavisi daba sopʰlebitʰ am kʰalakʰebʃi tsʰxovrobdnen iosebis israelis dzis dzeni 
aʃerianebi imna iʃva iʃvi beriqa da matʰi da seraxi 
beriqas dzeni xeberi da malkʰieli birzaitʰis mama 
xeberma ʃva iapʰleti ʃomeri xotʰami da matʰi da ʃuaqa 
iapʰletis dzeni pʰasakʰi bimhali da qaʃvatʰi eseni arian iapʰletis dzeni 
ʃameris dzeni axi rohɡa iexuba da arami 
misi dzmis helemis dzeni tsʰopʰaxi imnaqi ʃeleʃi da qamali 
tsʰopʰaxis dzeni suaxi xarnepʰeri ʃuqali beri da imra 
betsʰeri da hodi ʃama da ʃilʃa itʰrani da beera 
ietʰeris dzeni iepʰune pʰispʰa da ara 
qulas dzeni araxi xanieli da ritsʰia 
qvela eseni aʃeris dzeni arian mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebi rtʃeuli da dzlieri mebrdzolebi mtʰavartʰa tʰavkatsʰebi matʰ saɡvartomo nusxaʃi ritsʰxvitʰ otsʰdaekʰvsi atʰasi omʃi mebrdzoli katsʰia tʃatserili 
beniaminma ʃva tʰavisi pirmʃo belaqi meore aʃbeli mesame axraxi 
meotʰxe noxa mexutʰe rapʰa 
balaqs hqavda dzeebi adari ɡera abihudi 
abiʃuaqi naqamani axoaxi 
ɡera ʃepʰupʰani xurami 
eseni arian axudis dzeni mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebi romelnitsʰ ɡebaqʃi tsʰxovrobdnen da manaxatʰʃi ɡadaasaxles 
naqamani axia da ɡera romelmatsʰ ɡadaasaxla isini mas ʃeedzina quza da axixudi 
ʃaxaraims moabis velze ʃeedzina ʃvilebi mas ʃemdeɡ ratsʰ xuʃimi da baqara tʰavisi tsʰolebi ɡauʃva 
xodeʃisɡan tʰavisi tsʰolisɡan mas ʃeedzina iobabi tsʰibia meʃa malkʰami 
iequtsʰi sakʰia da mirma eseni arian mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebi 
da xuʃimisaɡan ʃva abitumi da elpʰaqali 
elpʰaqalis dzeni qeberi miʃqami ʃemeri man aaʃena ono da lodi tʰavisi daba sopʰlebitʰ 
beriqa da ʃemaqi mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebi iqvnen da aialonʃi tsʰxovrobdnen matʰ ɡandevnes ɡatʰelebi 
axio ʃaʃaki iremotʰi 
zebadia qaradi qaderi 
mikʰaeli iʃpʰa ioxa beriqas dzeni 
zebadia meʃulami xizki xaberi 
iʃmerai izlia iobabi elpʰaqalis dzeni 
iakimi zikʰri zabdi 
eliqenai tsʰiltʰai elieli 
qadaia beraia ʃimratʰi ʃimqis dzeni 
iʃpʰani qeberi elieli 
qabdoni zikʰri xanani 
xanania qelami qantʰotʰia 
ipʰdeia pʰenueli ʃaʃakis dzeni 
ʃamʃerai ʃexaria qatʰalia 
iaqareʃia elia zikʰri ieroxamis dzeni 
eseni arian mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebi tʰavkatsʰebi tʰaviantʰ ɡvartomtʰa eseni ierusalimʃi tsʰxovrobdnen 
ɡabaonʃi tsʰxovrobda ɡabaonis mama romlis tsʰolsatsʰ maqakʰa erkʰva 
misi pirmʃo da dze iqo qabdoni mas mosdevdnen tsʰuri kiʃi baqali nadabi 
ɡedori axio zekʰeri 
miklotʰma ʃva ʃimea isini ierusalimʃi tʰaviantʰi dzmebis mopirispire mxares tsʰxovrobdnen dzmebtʰan ertʰad 
nerma ʃva kiʃi kiʃma ʃva sauli saulma ʃva ionatʰani malkʰiʃuaqi abinadabi da eʃbaqali 
ionatʰanis dze merib baqali iqo merib baqalma ʃva mikʰa 
mikʰas dzeni pʰitʰoni melekʰi tʰareaqi axazi 
axazma ʃva iehoqada iehoqadam ʃva qalametʰi qazmavetʰi da zimri zimrim ʃva motsʰa 
motsʰam ʃva binqa misi dze iqo rapʰa misi dze iqo elqasa misi dze iqo atsʰeli 
atsʰels ekʰvsi vaʒi hqavda aha matʰi saxelebi qazrikami bokʰru iʃmaqeli ʃeqaria qobadia da xanani qvela eseni atsʰelis dzeni arian 
misi dzmis qeʃekis dzeni misi pirmʃo ulami meore iequʃi mesame elipʰeleti 
ulamis dzeni maɡari vaʒkatsʰebi iqvnen mʃvildosnebi da asormotsʰdaatʰi ʃvilisa da ʃviliʃvilis patronebi qvela eseni beniaminis dzetʰaɡan iqvnen 
mtʰeli israeli aɣnusxes da israelis mepʰetʰa tsiɡnʃi tʃatseres iudaelebi ki babilons ɡaasaxles matʰi uketʰurebis ɡamo 
pirveli mkvidrni tʰaviantʰ sampʰlobeloebsa da kʰalakʰebʃi rom tsʰxovrobdnen iqvnen israelianebi mɣvdlebi levianebi netʰinimelni da tadzarʃi momsaxureni 
ierusalimʃi iudas beniaminis epʰremisa da menaʃes dzetʰaɡan tsʰxovrobdnen 
qutʰai dze qamihudisa dze qomrisa dze imrisa dze banisa pʰeretsʰis iudas dzis dzetʰaɡan 
ʃilonisɡan iqvnen misi pirmʃo qasaia da misi dzeni 
zeraxis dzetʰaɡan iequeli da misi dzmebi ekʰvsas otʰxmotsʰdaatʰi 
beniaminis dzetʰaɡan salu dze meʃulamisa dze hodaviasi dze hasenuasi 
ibneia ieroxamis dze ela dze quzisa mikʰris dzisa meʃulami dze ʃepʰatiasi dze reɣuelisa dze ibniasi 
matʰi dzmebi tʰav tʰaviantʰ ɡvar tomtʰa mixedvitʰ tsʰxraas ormotsʰdatʰekʰvsmetni iqvnen qvela es vaʒkatsʰi mamissaxlis tʰavkatsʰi iqo 
mɣvdeltʰaɡan iqvnen iedaqia iehoiaribi iakʰini 
qazaria dze xilkiasi dze meʃulamisa dze tsʰadokisa dze meraiotʰisa dze axitubisa ɣvtʰis saxlis tsinamdzɣvari 
qadaia dze ieroxamisa dze pʰaʃxurisa dze malkʰiasi da maqasai dze qadielisa dze iaxzerasi dze meʃulamisa dze meʃilemitʰisa dze imerisa 
matʰi dzmebi mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebi atʰas ʃvidas samotsʰni ɣvtʰis saxlis msaxuris sakʰmeʃi natsʰadi xalxi 
leviantʰaɡan ʃemaqia dze xaʃubisa dze qazrikamisa dze xaʃabiasi meraris dzetʰaɡan 
bakbakari xereʃi ɡalali matʰania dze mikʰasi dze zikʰrisa dze asapʰisa 
qobadia ʃemaqias dze dze ɡalalisa dze iedutʰunisa berekʰia dze asasi dze elkanasi netopʰatʰeltʰa daba sopʰlebʃi mtsʰxovrebni 
karibcis mtsʰvelni ʃalumi qakubi talmoni aximani da dzmani misni ʃalumi tʰavkatsʰi iqo 
da dɣemde is dɡas samepʰo karibceʃi aɣmosavletʰitʰ eseni arian karismtsʰvelni leviantʰa banakidan 
ʃalumi dze koresi dzisa abiasapʰisa dzisa koraxisa da misi dzmebi misi mamis saxlidan koraxelni samsaxurs etseodnen da karvis zɣurblebs itsʰavdnen xolo matʰi mamebi upʰlis banaktʰan misasvlels daradʒobdnen 
pʰinxas eleazaris dze utsin matʰi tsinamdzɣoli iqo da upʰalitsʰ mastʰan iqo 
zakʰaria meʃelemias dze sadɣesastsaulo karvis karis mtsʰveli iqo 
zɣurblebis mtsʰvelebad amortʃeulni mtʰlianad orastʰormetni iqvnen isini saɡvartomo nusxaʃi tʰav tʰaviantʰ daba sopʰlebis mixedvitʰ arian tʃatserilni isini davitʰma da samuel mxilvelma daaqenes ertʰɡulebis ɡamo 
isini tʰaviantʰ dzeebtʰan ertʰad daradʒobdnen upʰlis saxlis karvis saxlis karibceebs 
karismtsʰvelebi otʰxiv mxriv idɡnen aɣmosavletʰitʰ dasavletʰitʰ tʃrdiloetʰitʰ da samxretʰitʰ 
matʰi dzmebi tʰaviantʰ daba sopʰlebʃi iqvnen ratʰa dro da dro ʃvidi dɣitʰ misuliqvnen matʰtʰan 
radɡan karibceebis mtsʰveltʰa is otʰxi metʰauri romlebitsʰ levianebi iqvnen mudam otʰaxebtʰan da ɣvtʰis saxlis saɡandzurebtʰan idɡnen 
isini ɣvtʰis saxlis irɡvliv atʰevdnen ɣames radɡan matʰ ebaratʰ datsʰva da qovel dilitʰ karibcis ɡaɣeba 
ertʰ matʰɡans samsaxurebeli curceli ebara vinaidan tʰvlitʰ ʃehkʰondatʰ da tʰvlitʰ ɡahkʰondatʰ 
matʰɡan sxvebs tʃabardatʰ curcleuli qvela tsminda curceli ɡamtkitsʰuli pʰkʰvili ɣvino zetʰi ɡundruki da surnelebani 
samɣvdeloni ki zetʰs amzadebdnen nelsatsʰxeblisaɡan 
matʰitʰias leviantʰaɡan ertʰ ertʰs ʃalum koraxelis pirmʃos tapʰebze momzadeba miendo 
zoɡiertʰ matʰ dzmatʰaɡans kehatʰiantʰaɡan satsiri puri tʃaabares ratʰa ʃabatʰobitʰ moemzadebinatʰ 
xolo mɡalobelni leviantʰa mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰni tadzris otʰaxebʃi sakʰmianobisɡan ɡatʰavisupʰlebulni iqvnen radɡan isini dɣe da ɣam tʰaviantʰi sakʰmitʰ iqvnen dakavebulni 
eseni arian levianebis mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebi tʰav tʰaviantʰ ɡvar tomtʰa tʰavkatsʰebi isini ierusalimʃi tsʰxovrobdnen 
ɡabaonʃi tsʰxovrobdnen ɡabaonis mama ieqieli mis tsʰols saxelad maqakʰa erkʰva 
misi dze pirmʃo qabdoni mere tsʰuri kiʃi baqali neri nadabi 
ɡedori axio zakʰaria da miklotʰi 
miklotʰma ʃva ʃimami isini tʰaviantʰi dzmebis mezoblad tʰaviantʰ dzmebtʰan ertʰad tsʰxovrobdnen ierusalimʃi 
nerma ʃva kiʃi kiʃma ʃva sauli saulma ʃva ionatʰani malkʰiʃuaqi abinadabi da eʃbaqali 
ionatʰanis dze iqo merib baqali merib baqalma ʃva mikʰa 
mikʰas dzeni pʰitʰoni melekʰi da tʰaxreaqi 
axazma ʃva iaqra iaqram ʃva qalametʰi qazmavetʰi da zimri zimrim ʃva motsʰa 
motsʰam ʃva binqa misi dze repʰaia misi dze elqasa misi dze atsʰeli 
atsʰels ekʰvsi dze hqavda aha matʰi saxelebi qazrikami bokʰru iʃmaqeli ʃeqaria qobadia xanani eseni arian atsʰelis dzeni 
da ʃeebrdzolen pʰilistimelebi israels da ɡaekʰtsʰnen israelis dzeni pʰilistimelebs da ɡilboaqis mtʰaze etsʰemodnen daxotsʰilni 
da mietsivnen pʰilistimelebi sauls da mis vaʒebs da daxotsʰes pʰilistimelebma ionatʰani abinadabi da malkʰiʃuaqi saulis ʃvilebi 
da ɡaudznelda brdzola sauls niʃanʃi amoiɣes iɡi mʃvildosnebma da mdzimed dacres 
da utʰxra saulma tʰavis sacurveltʰmtvirvels iʃiʃvle maxvili da ɡamiqare rom im tsinadautsʰvetʰelebma ar ʃeuratsʰxmqon da ver ɡabeda sacurveltʰmtvirtʰvelma radɡan dzalian eʃinoda maʃin saulma aiɣo maxvili da zed daeɡo 
rotsʰa dainaxa sacurveltʰmtvirtʰvelma rom mokvda sauli isitsʰ zed daeɡo maxvils da mokvda 
da ertʰad daixotsʰnen sauli misi sami vaʒiʃvili da mtʰeli misi saxli 
rotsʰa velze mqopʰma israelis dzetʰ dainaxes rom ukuikʰtsʰnen israelis dzeni da rom daixotsʰnen sauli da misi vaʒiʃvilebi daaɡdes kʰalakʰebi da ɡadaixvetsnen da movidnen pʰilistimelebi da tʃasaxldnen ikʰ 
meore dɣes movidnen pʰilistimelebi daxotsʰiltʰa ɡasadzartsʰvavad da rotsʰa naxes ɡilboaqis mtʰaze datsʰemuli sauli da misi vaʒiʃvilebi 
ɡadzartsʰves iɡi aiɣes misi tʰavi da sacurveli da moatares pʰilistimeltʰa kʰveqnis irɡvliv ratʰa exarebinatʰ tʰaviantʰi sakerpoebisatʰvis da xalxisatʰvis 
misi sacurveli tʰaviantʰi ɣmertʰis tadzarʃi dades xolo misi tʰavis kʰala daɡonis saxlʃi miacedes 
rotsʰa ɡaiɡes ɡilqadis iabeʃelebma roɡor moekʰtsʰnen pʰilistimelni sauls 
adɡa qvela vintsʰ vaʒkatsʰi iqo da tsamoiɣes saulisa da misi vaʒiʃvilebis ɡvamebi da miitanes iabeʃʃi da damarxes matʰi dzvlebi iabeʃʃi muxis kʰveʃ mere ʃvidi dɣis mandzilze marxulobdnen 
ase mokvda sauli tʰavisi orɡulebis ɡamo romlitʰatsʰ ɣalatobda iɡi upʰals da upʰlis sitqvas ar itsʰavda da ɡamosakitʰxad mesultʰanes mimartʰavda 
upʰals ar ekitʰxeboda amitom mokla iɡi upʰalma da misi samepʰo davitʰs ieses dzes mistsʰa 
movida mtʰeli israeli davitʰtʰan xebronʃi da utʰxres aha ʃeni dzvali da xortsʰi vartʰ 
ɡuʃinatsʰ da imis utsinatsʰ rotsʰa sauli mepʰobda ʃen ɡamoɡqavda da ʃeɡqavda israeli upʰalma ʃenma ɣmertʰma ɡitʰxra ʃen damtsqemsav tʃems ers israels ʃen ikʰnebi tʃemi eris israelis mtʰavari 
da movida israelis mtʰeli uxutsʰesoba mepʰestʰan xebrons da ʃekra davitʰma matʰtʰan kavʃiri xebronʃi upʰlis tsinaʃe da stsʰxes israelze mepʰed davitʰi upʰlis sitqvis tʰanaxmad samuelis xelitʰ 
da ɡailaʃkʰres davitʰma da israelis dzetʰ ierusalimisaken anu iebusisken ikʰ iqvnen iebuselni im kʰveqnis mkvidrni 
da utʰxres iebusis mkvidrebma davitʰs akʰ ver ʃemoxval maɡram aiɣo davitʰma sionis tsʰixe simaɡre es aris davitʰis kʰalakʰi 
da tʰkʰva davitʰma vintsʰ qvelaze utsin ʃemusravs iebuseltʰ is ɡaxdeba tʰavkatsʰi da sardali qvelaze utsin ioabi tsʰeruias dze avida da ɡaxda sardali 
da dadɡa davitʰi im tsʰixe simaɡreʃi amitom utsodes mas davitʰis kʰalakʰi 
man ʃemoaʃena kʰalakʰi ɡarʃemo milodan ʃemoɡarenamde ioabma ki danartʃeni kʰalakʰi aɣadɡina 
da sul maɣla da maɣla midioda davitʰi da tsʰabaotʰ upʰali iqo mastʰan 
aha davitʰis moqmetʰa mtʰavarni romelnitsʰ mxars umaɡrebdnen mas mis samepʰoʃi israeltʰan ertʰad mis ɡasamepʰeblad upʰlis sitqvisamebr 
aha davitʰis moqmetʰa ritsʰxvi iaʃobqam xakʰmonis dze otsʰdaatʰeulis tʰavkatsʰi man tʰavisi ʃubis ertʰi mokʰnevitʰ samasi katsʰi mokla 
mas ʃemdeɡ eleazari dze dodo axoxelisa ertʰ ertʰi im sam moqmetʰaɡani 
iɡi davitʰs axlda pʰas damimʃi sadatsʰ pʰilistimelni saomrad ʃeiqarnen iqo ikʰ qanis nakvetʰi sadatsʰ kʰeri etʰesa da ukuikʰtsʰa xalxi pʰilistimeltʰaɡan 
isini tʃadɡnen ʃua qanaʃi daitsʰves iɡi da musri ɡaavles pʰilistimelebs da didi xsna moitana upʰalma 
otsʰdaatʰi tʰavkatsʰidan es samni avidnen kldeze davitʰtʰan qadulamis ɡamokʰvabulʃi xolo pʰilistimeltʰa urdo repʰaimis velze iqo dabanakebuli 
maʃin davitʰi sapʰarʃi iqo xolo pʰilistimeltʰa qarauli betʰlemʃi idɡa 
da ineba davitʰma da tʰkʰva vin ʃemasmevs betʰlemis cis tsqals karibcestʰan rom aris 
da ɡaarɣvia am samma pʰilistimeltʰa banaki da amoiɣes tsqali betʰlemis cidan karibcestʰan rom aris da tsamoiɣes da davitʰs miutanes ar indoma davitʰma misi ʃesma da upʰals dauɣvara 
da tʰkʰva ʃors iqos tʃemɡan upʰalo asetʰi sakʰme numtsʰ ʃemesvas am vaʒkatsʰtʰa sisxli tʰavis ɡasatsirad rom tsavidnen da aɣar indoma davitʰma tsqlis ʃesma ase moikʰtsʰa es sami moqme 
abiʃai ioabis dzma am samis upʰrosi iqo man samas katsʰs moukʰnia ʃubi da ɡanɡmira mas meti saxeli hkʰonda am samʃi 
am samze metad iqo pativdebuli da matʰ metʰaurobda maɡram im pirvel sams ver utoldeboda 
benaia iehoiadaqis dze maɡari vaʒkatsʰi iqo did sakʰmetʰa mkʰmneli kabtsʰeelidan man daamartsʰxa ori moabeli lomkatsʰi tʃavida ormoʃi da mokla lomi tʰovlian dɣes 
manve mokla eɡvipteli katsʰi xutʰi tsqrtʰis simaɣlisa ʃubi ise ecira eɡviptels xelʃi roɡortsʰ pʰeikʰars sakʰselavi da tʃauxta ketitʰ da xelidan ɡamostatsʰa eɡviptels ʃubi da misive ʃubitʰ ɡanɡmira 
es ɡaaketʰa benaia iehoiadaqis dzem da saxeli moixveca sam moqmes ʃoris 
otsʰdaatʰisɡan ɡamoirtʃeoda maɡram im sams ver utoldeboda tʰavis mtsʰveltʰa metʰaurad daniʃna iɡi davitʰma 
mebrdzoltʰa metʰaurni iqvnen qasaeli ioabis dzma elxanani dodos dze betʰlemeli 
ʃamotʰ haroreli xeletsʰ pʰeloneli 
qira qikeʃis dze tʰekoaqeli abiqezer qanatʰotʰeli 
sibkʰai xuʃatʰeli qilai axoxeli 
maharai netopʰatʰeli xeled baqanas dze netopʰatʰeli 
itʰai ribais dze beniaminis ɡibqadan benaia pʰirqatʰoneli 
xurai ɡaqaʃis xevidan abiel qarbatʰeli 
qazmavetʰ baxarumeli eliaxba ʃaqalboneli 
haʃem ɡizonelis dzeni ionatʰan ʃaɡes dze harareli 
axiam sakʰaris dze harareli elipʰal uris dze 
xepʰer mekʰeratʰeli axia pʰeloneli 
xetsʰro kʰarmeleli naqarai ezbais dze 
ioel natʰanis dzma mibxar haɡris dze 
tsʰelek qamoneli naxarai berotʰeli ioab tsʰeruias dzis sacurveltʰmtvirtʰveli 
qira itʰreli ɡareb itʰreli 
uria xetʰeli zabad axalais dze 
qadina ʃizas dze reubeneli reubenis dzetʰa tʰavkatsʰi da otsʰdaatʰi mastʰan ertʰad 
xanan maqakʰas dze ioʃapʰat mitʰneli 
quzia qaʃtʰeratʰeli ʃamaqi da ieqieli xotʰamis dzeni qaroqerelni 
iediqael ʃimris dze misi dzma ioxa misi dzma tʰitsʰieli 
eliel maxaveli iribai ioʃavia elnaqamis dzeni da itʰma moabeli 
elieli qobedi iaqasiel metsʰobaeli 
aha isini tsʰiklaɡʃi rom mividnen davitʰtʰan rotsʰa iɡi dʒer kidev saul kiʃis dzes emaleboda isini omʃi ʃemtse moqmetʰa ʃoris iqvnen 
mʃvildisritʰ ʃeiaraɣebulni mardʒvena martsʰxenitʰ kʰvisa da mʃvildisris msrolelni saulis dzmatʰaɡanni beniaminidan 
metʰauri axiqezeri da ioaʃi ʃemaqa ɡibqatʰelis dzeni iezieli da pʰeleti qazmavetʰis dzeni berakʰa da iehu qanatʰotʰelni 
iʃmaqia ɡabaoneli ertʰ ertʰi moqme otsʰdaatʰʃi da otsʰdaatʰis metʰauri ieremia iaxazieli ioxanani iozabed ɡederatʰeli 
elquzai ierimotʰi beqalia ʃemariahu ʃepʰatia xarupʰeli 
elkana iʃiahu qazareli ioqezeri iaʃabqami koraxelni 
ioqela da zebadia ieroxam ɡedorelis dzeni 
ɡadelebs tʃamoʃordnen da davitʰtʰan udabnos sapʰarʃi mividnen mamatsʰi moqmeni saomrad ɡatsvrətʰnili vaʒkatsʰebi pʰar ʃubitʰ ʃeiaraɣebulni saxitʰ lomis msɡavsni da mtʰis artʃvivitʰ stsrapʰni 
metʰauri qezeri meore qobadia mesame eliabi 
meotʰxe miʃmana mexutʰe ieremia 
meekʰvse qatʰai meʃvide elieli 
merve ioxanani metsʰxre elzabadi 
meatʰe ieremiahu metʰertʰmete makʰbanai 
eseni iqvnen ɡadis dzetʰaɡanni mxedrobis metʰaurni qvelaze naklebi assa upʰrosobda qvelaze didi atʰass 
matʰ pirvel tʰveʃi ɡadalaxes iordane rodesatsʰ adidebuli mdinare napirebidan ɡadmodioda matʰ aɣmosavletʰitʰ da dasavletʰitʰ ɡandevnes am velis mkvidrni 
beniaminisa da iudas dzetʰaɡanatsʰ mividnen davitʰtʰan sapʰarʃi 
da ɡamoeɡeba matʰ davitʰi da ɡamoelaparaka da utʰxra tʰu samʃvidobod da damxmared moxveditʰ tʃemtʰan ɡiertʰɡulebtʰ tʰu imistʰvis moxvditʰ rom tʃemi mtris xels mzakvrulad mimtsʰetʰ aha tʃemi xeli supʰtʰaa dae tʃveni mama papis ɣmertʰma ixilos es da ɡansadʒos 
maʃin sulma moitsʰva qamasai otsʰdaatʰis metʰauri da tʰkʰva mʃvidoba ʃenda davitʰ ieses dzeo mʃvidoba ʃen da mʃvidoba ʃens ʃemtsetʰ radɡan ɣmertʰia ʃeni ʃemtse da miiɣo isini davitʰma da razmis metʰauroba tʃaabara 
menaʃesaɡanatsʰ miemxren davitʰs rodesatsʰ iɡi pʰilistimelebitʰ midioda saultʰan saomrad maɡram ar mixmarebian isini radɡan pʰilistimeltʰa mtʰavrebi ʃeitʰkʰvnen da ukan ɡamoabrunes davitʰi tʰkʰves tʃvenda sazianod sauls tʰavis batons miemxrobao 
rotsʰa tsʰiklaɡs mivida menaʃesɡan ʃeuertʰdnen qadnaxi iozabadi idiqaeli mikʰaeli iozabadi elihu tsʰilatʰi menaʃeltʰa atʰasistʰavebi 
isini exmarebodnen davitʰs urdotʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ brdzolaʃi radɡan qvelani mamatsʰi moqmeni da dʒaris metʰaurebi iqvnen 
dɣidan dɣemde moedinebodnen vidre misi laʃkʰari ɣvtʰis mxedrobasavitʰ ar ɡaizarda 
aha ritsʰxvi saomrad aɣkazmuli im metʰaurebisa romelnitsʰ davitʰtʰan xebronʃi mividnen ratʰa upʰlis sitqvisamebr saulis samepʰo ɡadaetsʰatʰ mistʰvis 
iudas dzeni pʰar ʃubis mtvirtʰvelni ekʰvsiatʰas rvaasni iqvnen saomrad aɣcurvilni 
simonis dzetʰaɡan ʃvidiatʰas asi mamatsʰi moqme iqo 
levis dzetʰaɡan otʰxiatʰas ekʰvsasi 
xolo iehoiadaqs aaroneltʰa tsinamdzɣols tʰan samiatʰas ʃvidasi axlda 
tsʰadoks mamatsʰ qmatsvils da mis mamissaxls otsʰdaori metʰauri hqavda 
saulis dzmebi beniaminis dzetʰaɡan samiatʰasni iqvnen matʰɡan didi tsili saulis saxlʃi dartʃa 
epʰremis dzeni otsʰiatʰas rvaasni iqvnen mamatsʰi moqmeni da tʰav tʰaviantʰ mamissaxltʰa saxelovani vaʒkatsʰebi 
menaʃes naxevartomidan tʰvrameti atʰasni iqvnen romelnitsʰ saxelebitʰ ɡamoixmes ratʰa davitʰis ɡasamepʰeblad mosuliqvnen 
isakʰaris dzetʰaɡan orasi metʰauri iqo romeltʰatsʰ itsʰodnen dro ʒamtʰa ɡulisxmisqopʰa da utsqodnen tʰu ra unda ɡaeketʰebina israels qvela matʰi dzma matʰi dariɡebitʰ ikʰtsʰeoda 
zebulunidan ɡamodiodnen da saomrad iqvnen darazmuli qvelanairi sabrdzolo aɣcurvilobitʰ ormotsʰdaatʰi atʰasni ratʰa uorɡulod daxmarebodnen 
napʰtʰalidan atʰasi sardali iqo otsʰdatʃvidmeti atʰasi pʰar ʃubosnis tʰanxlebitʰ 
danidan iqvnen otsʰdarva atʰas ekʰvsasni saomrad darazmulni 
aʃeridan sabrdzolvelad ormotsʰi atʰasi saomrad darazmuli ɡimodioda 
iordanes ɡaɣma mxridan ɡamodiodnen reubeniantʰaɡanni ɡadelni menaʃes naxevartomelni qvelanairi sabrdzolo sacurvelitʰ sul asotsʰi atʰasi 
qvela es mebrdzoli vaʒkatsʰi mtsqobrad darazmuli tsrpʰeli ɡulitʰ movida xebronʃi davitʰis ɡasamepʰeblad mtʰels israelze aseve mtʰeli danartʃeni israeli ertʰsulovani iqo davitʰis ɡasamepʰeblad 
sam dɣes dartʃnen isini ikʰ camdnen da svamdnen radɡan matʰ dzmebs qvelapʰeri moemzadebinatʰ matʰtʰvis 
aseve matʰ mezoblebs isakʰaris zebulunisa da napʰtʰalis tomebidanatsʰ ki mohkʰondatʰ virebitʰ akʰlemebitʰ dʒorebitʰa da xarebitʰ sursatʰ sanovaɡe pʰkʰvileuli leɣvi tʃiri ɣvino zetʰi uamravi sakʰoneli da tsʰxvari es imitom rom sixaruli iqo israelʃi 
da etʰatʰbira davitʰi atʰasistʰavebs asistʰavebs da tsinamdzɣolebs 
da utʰxra davitʰma israelis mtʰel krebuls tʰu tʰkʰven tʰanaxma ikʰnebitʰ da tʰu es upʰlis tʃveni ɣvtʰis neba ikʰneba xalxi ɡavuɡzavnotʰ israelis qvela mxareʃi tʃvens dzmebs mɣvdlebs levianebs matʰs ʃemoɡaren kʰalakʰebʃi ratʰa ʃemoɡviertʰdnen 
da tʃventʰan ɡadmovasvenotʰ tʃveni ɣvtʰis kidobani radɡan saulis dros mistʰvis ar miɡvimartʰavs 
da tʰkʰva mtʰelma krebulma ase iqos vinaidan es sakʰme mosatsoni iqo xalxis tʰvalʃi 
da ʃeqara davitʰma mtʰeli israeli eɡviptis ʃixoridan xamatʰis misadɡomamde kiriatʰ ieqarimidan ɣvtʰis kidobnis ɡadmosasveneblad 
da avida davitʰi da mtʰeli israeli baqalatʰaʃi kiriatʰ ieqarimʃi iudas rom ekutʰvnis ratʰa ikʰidan tsamoesvenebinatʰ kidobani ɣvtʰisa kʰerubimebze mdʒdomare upʰlisa romelitsʰ am saxelitʰ itsodeba 
da ʃedɡes ɣvtʰis kidobani axal uremze da tsamoasvenes abinadabis saxlidan da urems quza da axio mihqvebodnen 
davitʰi da mastʰan ertʰad mtʰeli israeli rokavda ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe mtʰeli dzalitʰ da mɣerodnen da ukravdnen kʰnarebs bobɣnebs dapʰdapʰebs tʃanɡebsa da tsintsilebs 
rotsʰa kʰidonis kalostʰan mividnen quzam xeli ʃeaʃvela kidobans radɡan daaqiraves iɡi xarebma 
da aentʰo upʰlis risxva quzaze da ikʰve dastsʰa iɡi ɣmertʰma kidobanze xelis miʃvelebis ɡamo da ikʰve mokvda ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
da ʃetsuxda davitʰi rom daɣupa upʰalma quza da dɣemde im adɡils etsodeba pʰeretsʰ quza 
da ʃeeʃinda davitʰs ɣvtʰisa im dɣes da tʰkʰva roɡor mova tʃemamde ɣvtʰiskidobani 
da ar indoma davitʰma upʰlis kidobnis tʰavisatʰn mitana davitʰis kʰalakʰʃi da ɡitʰeli qobed edomis saxlisken ɡadaaxvevina 
sam tʰves esvena ɣvtʰis kidobani ɡitʰeli qobed edomis saxlʃi da akurtʰxa upʰalma qobed edomis saxli da mtʰeli misi sabadebeli 
ɡauɡzavna xiramma tsʰoris mepʰem davitʰs motsʰikʰulebi da pʰicvis dzelebi kedlis mʃeneblebi xuroebi mistʰvis saxlis asaʃeneblad 
da mixvda davitʰi rom mtkitsʰed hqavda dadɡenili iɡi upʰals israelis mepʰed da rom aɣamaɣla misi samepʰo tʰavisi eris israelis ɡamo 
da kidev moiqvana davitʰma ierusalimʃi tsʰolebi da kidev ʃeedzina davitʰs vaʒebi da asulebi 
aha imatʰi saxelebi romelnitsʰ ierusalimʃi ʃeedzina ʃamuaqi ʃobabi natʰani solomoni 
ibxari eliʃuaqi elipʰaleti 
noɡa nepʰeɡi iapʰiaqi 
eliʃamaqi beqeliadaqi elipʰaleti 
da ʃeitqves pʰilistimelebma rom mtʰeli israelis mepʰed akurtʰxes davitʰi da daidzrnen pʰilistimelni davitʰis ʃesapqrobad da ʃeitqo es davitʰma da ɡamovida matʰ tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
da movidnen pʰilistimelebi da repʰaimis velze ɡanlaɡdnen 
davitʰi ɣmertʰs daekitʰxa ɡavilaʃkʰro pʰilistimelebze tʃamiɡdeb matʰ xelʃi da utʰxra mas upʰalma ɡailaʃkʰre radɡan xelʃi tʃaɡiɡdeb pʰilistimelebs 
da avidnen baqal pʰeratsʰimʃi da ikʰ sdzlia davitʰma da tʰkʰva tsaleka upʰalma tʃemi mtrebi tʃemive xelitʰ roɡortsʰ tsqali tsalekavs amitom etsoda im adɡils baqal pʰeratsʰimi 
da ikʰ miatoves tʰaviantʰi kerpebi davitʰma brdzana da tsʰetsʰxlʃi datsves isini 
da kvlav ɡamoilaʃkʰres pʰilistimelebma da velze ɡanlaɡdnen 
da kvlav daekitʰxa davitʰi ɣmertʰs da utʰxra ɣmertʰma ukan nu ɡaekidebi ɡars mouare da balzamis xeebis mxridan miadekʰi 
da roɡortsʰ ki balzamis xis kentseroebidan ʃrialis xma ʃemoɡesmeba im tsamsve ʃeimartʰe saomrad radɡan maʃin tsaɡidzɣveba ɣmertʰi pʰilistimeltʰa banakis ʃesamusrad 
ise moikʰtsʰa davitʰi roɡortsʰ ɣmertʰma daariɡa da ɡabaonidan ɡezeramde musri ɡaavlo pʰilistimeltʰa urdos 
davitʰma mtʰel kʰveqanaze ɡaitʰkʰva saxeli da upʰalma misi ʃiʃi mistsʰa qvela xalxs 
da aiʃena man saxlebi davitʰis kʰalakʰʃi da moamzada adɡili ɣvtʰis kidobnistʰvis da karavi ɡaʃala 
maʃin tʰkʰva davitʰma leviantʰa ɡarda aravin ataros kidobani radɡan isini amoirtʃia upʰalma ɣvtʰis kidobnis mtareblebad da samaradiso msaxurebad 
da ʃeqara davitʰma mtʰeli israeli ierusalimʃi rom daesvenebinatʰ upʰlis kidobani im adɡilze romelitsʰ mistʰvis iqo ɡamzadebuli 
da ʃeqara davitʰma aaronis dzeni da levianebi 
kehatʰis dzetʰaɡan sardali urieli da misi modzmeni asotsʰi 
meraris dzetʰaɡan sardali qasaia da misi modzmeni orasotsʰi katsʰi 
ɡerʃomis dzetʰaɡan sardali ioeli da misi dzmebi asotsʰdaatʰi katsʰi 
elitsʰapʰanis dzetʰaɡan sardali ʃemaqia da misi dzmani orasni 
xebronis dzetʰaɡan sardali elieli da misi dzmani otʰxmotsʰni 
quzielis dzetʰaɡan sardali qamindabi da misi dzmani astʰormetni 
da mouxmo davitʰma mɣvdlebs tsʰadoksa da abiatʰars da levianebs uriels qasaias ioels ʃemaqias eliels qaminadabs 
da utʰxra tʰkʰvena xartʰ leviantʰa mamissaxlebis tʰavkatsʰebi ɡanitsmidenitʰ tʰkʰven da tʰkʰveni dzmani da daasvenetʰ upʰlis israelis ɣvtʰis kidobani mistʰvis momzadebul adɡilas 
raki utsin amas ar asrulebditʰ upʰalma tʃvenma ɣmertʰma ʃeɡvmusra radɡan tsesisimebr ar vekitʰxeboditʰ mas 
da ɡanitsmidnen mɣvdlebi da levianebi ratʰa aetsiatʰ upʰlis israelis ɣvtʰis kidobani 
da astsies levianebma ɣvtʰis kidobani da roɡortsʰ moses hkʰonda nabrdzanebi upʰlis sitqvisamebr ketebitʰ ʃeidɡes mxrebze 
davitʰma leviantʰa mtʰavrebs ubrdzana rom matʰi dzmebi daeqenebinatʰ mɡaloblebad sakravi iaraɣebitʰ bobɣnebitʰ kʰnarebitʰ tsintsilebitʰ ratʰa sixarulis xmebi ɡamoetsʰatʰ 
da daaqenes levianebma heman ioelis dze mis dzmatʰaɡan asapʰ berekʰiahus dze xolo matʰi dzmebis meraris dzetʰaɡan etʰan kuʃaihus dze 
matʰtʰan ertʰad matʰi dzmani meore riɡis zakʰariahu beni iaqazieli ʃemiramotʰi iexieli quni eliabi beniahu maqasiahu matʰitʰiahu elipʰelehu mikneiahu qobed edomi ieqieli karismtsʰvelni 
mɡalobelni hemani asapʰi da etʰani spilendzis tsintsilebs axmianebdnen 
xolo zakʰaria iaqazieli ʃemiramotʰi iexieli quni eliabi maqasiahu da benaihu kʰnars kʰaltsulur hanɡze 
xolo matʰitʰiahu elipʰelehu mikneiahu qobed edomi ieqieli qazaziahu ebnebs rvasimians salotbarod 
xolo kʰenaniahu leviantʰa mtʰavari saxiobis xelmdzɣvanelad ɡanatseses vinaidan mtsʰodne iqo 
berekʰia da elkana kidobnis karismtsʰvelebi iqvnen 
xolo mɣvdlebi ʃebaniahu ioʃapʰati netʰaneli qamasai zakʰariahu benaihu da eliezeri saqvirs ukravdnen ɣvtʰis kidobnis tsinaʃe qobed edomi da iexia ki kidobnis karismtsʰvelni iqvnen 
da ɡaemartʰnen davitʰi israelis uxutsʰesoba da atʰasistʰavebi sixarulitʰ upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmis kidobnis tsamosasveneblad qobed edomis saxlidan 
ɣvtʰis ʃetsevnitʰ iqo rom ɡadaasvenes levianebma upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmis kidobani da ʃvidi xari da ʃvidi verdzi ʃestsires 
davitʰs bisonis mosasxami emosa da qvela levians kidobans rom miasvenebdnen mɡaloblebs da kʰenanias mɡalobeltʰa lotbars davitʰs amastʰan ertʰad selis epʰoditsʰ emosa 
mtʰeli israeli miatsʰilebda upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmis kidobans qiʒinitʰ bukistsʰemitʰ saqvirebis tsintsilebis bobɣnebisa da kʰnarebis dakvritʰ 
da rotsʰa upʰlis kidobanma davitʰis kʰalakʰs miaɣtsia sarkmlidan ɡamoixeda saulis asulma mikʰalma da dainaxa moxtunave da mrokveli mepʰe davitʰi da ɡulʃi dastsʰina 
moabrdzanes upʰlis kidobani da daasvenes ʃuaɡul karavʃi romelitsʰ mistʰvis hkʰonda davitʰs ɡaʃlili mere ki sruladdasatsveli da samʃvidobo msxverpli ʃestsires ɣmertʰs 
da moamtʰavra davitʰma sruladdasatsveli da samʃvidobo msxverplis ʃetsirva da upʰlis saxelitʰ dalotsʰa eri 
da tʃamouriɡa israelis mtʰel ers israelis mtʰel krebuls katsʰsa da kʰals tʰitʰo puris kveri tʰitʰo xortsʰis tsilobi da tʰitʰo kʰada 
da daaqena levianebi upʰlis kidobnis tsinaʃe samsaxuris ɡasatsevad ratʰa moexsenebinatʰ edidebinatʰ da ekʰotʰ upʰali ɣmertʰi israelisa 
asapʰi matʰi metʰauri misi momdevnoni zakʰaria ieqieli ʃemiramotʰi iexieli matʰitʰia eliabi benaiahu qobed edomi da iqieli bobɣnebsa da kʰnarebze xolo asapʰi tsintsilebis damkvrelad 
mɣvdlebi benaihu da iaxazieli ki saqvirebze mudam upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmis kidobnis tsin 
ʃemdeɡ im dɣes ʃeasxa davitʰma pirvelad kʰeba upʰals asapʰisa da misi dzmebis xelitʰ 
adidetʰ upʰali mouxmetʰ mis saxels autsqetʰ xalxebs sakʰmeni misni 
umɣeretʰ mas uɡalobetʰ mas ilaparaketʰ qvela mis sastsaulze 
daikvexetʰ misi tsmida saxelitʰ ɡamxiaruldes ɡuli upʰlis medziebeltʰa 
edzietʰ upʰali da dzliereba misi edzietʰ piri misi maradis 
ɡaixsenetʰ misi namokʰmedari sastsaulebi saotsʰrebani da misi baɡis samartʰalni 
ʃtʰamomavalno israelisa dzeno iakobisa rtʃeulno misno 
is aris upʰali ɣmertʰi tʃveni mtʰel kʰveqnierebazea samartʰalni misni 
axsovs saukunod aɣtʰkʰma tʰvisi sitqva romelitsʰ brdzana atʰasi tʰaobistʰvis 
romelitsʰ daudo abraams da tʰavisi pʰitsʰi isaktʰan 
da daudɡina iakobs iɡi tsesad da israels saukuno aɣtʰkʰmad 
utʰxra ʃen moɡtsʰem kʰanaanis kʰveqanas tsilad tʰkʰveni memkvidreobisa 
rotsʰa isini tʰitʰze tʃamosatʰvlelni tsʰotani da ikʰ ʃexiznulni 
iarebodnen ertʰi xalxidan meorestʰan samepʰodan sxva ertʰan 
aravis anebebda matʰs datʃaɡvras da miutʰitʰa matʰze mepʰeebs 
ar ʃeexotʰ tʃems tsʰxebulebs da tʃems tsinastsarmetqvelebs ar uborototʰ 
uɡalobe upʰals mtʰelo kʰveqnierebav amaxarobletʰ dɣitʰidɣe xsna mismieri 
moutʰxretʰ xalxebs misi ɣirseba qovel ers misi sastsaulebi 
radɡan didia upʰali qvela ɣmertʰze saʃiʃia is 
radɡan xalxtʰa qvela ɣmertʰi kerpebia xolo upʰalma tsʰani ʃehkʰmna 
mʃveniereba da brətsqinvalebaa mis tsinaʃe sidzliere da momxiblaoba mis tadzarʃi 
ʃestsiretʰ upʰals tomebo xalxtʰa ʃestsiretʰ upʰals kʰeba da dideba 
ʃestsiretʰ upʰals kʰeba misi saxelisa tsauɣetʰ dzɣveni da miditʰ mis ezoebʃi 
atʰrtʰoldi mis tsinaʃe mtʰelo kʰveqnierebav mtkitsʰea samqaro ar ʃeirqeva 
ɡamxiaruldebian tsʰani da moilxens kʰveqana utʰxaritʰ xalxebs upʰali mepʰobs 
ixmaurebs zɣva da savseba misi ɡaixarebs veli da qoveli ratsʰ maszea 
maʃin izeimeben qovelni xeni tevrisani radɡan mova kʰveqnierebis ɡansasdʒelad 
akʰetʰ upʰali radɡan ketʰilia iɡi radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
da tʰkʰvitʰ ɡvixseni ʃeɡvkribe da daɡvitsʰav xalxebisɡan ratʰa davidotʰ ʃeni tsmida saxeli davikʰadno ʃeni kʰeba didebitʰ 
kurtʰxeul ars upʰali ɣmertʰi israelisa ukunitʰi ukunisamde da miuɡo erma amen dideba upʰals 
da datova davitʰma upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmis kidobnis tsinaʃe asapʰi da misi dzmebi ratʰa kidobnis tsinaʃe samsaxuri ɡaetsiotʰ mudmivad qoveldɣiurad 
da qobed edomi da misi dzmebi samotsʰdarvani qobed edom ieditʰunis dze da xosa ki karismtsʰvelebad 
mɣvdeli tsʰadoki da misi mɣvdelmsaxuri dzmebi upʰlis savanis tsin ɡabaonʃi rom bortsʰvia ikʰ daaqena 
rom mudam dila saɣamoobitʰ sruladdasatsveli aɣevlinatʰ upʰlisatʰvis sruladdasatsvelis samsxverploze da rom qovelive ʃeesrulebinatʰ ratsʰ upʰlis rdʒulʃi stseria da ratsʰ man dautsesa israels 
matʰtʰan iqvnen hemani iedutʰuni da sxva rtʃeulni romelnitsʰ saxelebitʰ iqvnen dadɡenilni ratʰa ekʰotʰ upʰlis saxeli radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
matʰtʰan ertʰad hemani da iedutʰuni saqvirebitʰ tsintsilebitʰa da sakravebitʰ ɣvtʰis mɡaloblebad iqvnen dadɡenilni iedutʰenis dzeni ki karibcestʰan 
qvelani tʰav tʰaviantʰ saxlebʃi tsavid tsamovidnen da davitʰitsʰ tʰavisi saxlis dasalotsʰad ɡabrunda 
roɡortsʰ ki davitʰi tʰavis saxlʃi damkvidrda utʰxra natʰan tsinastsarmetqvels ʃexede me kedaris saxlʃi vtsʰxovrob upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmis kidobani ki pʰardebskʰveʃ aris 
utʰxra natʰanma davitʰs qovelive ratsʰ ɡulʃi ɡakʰvs ɡaaketʰe radɡan ʃentʰanaa upʰali 
im ɣames iqo rom tʃaesma natʰans upʰlis sitqva 
tsadi utʰxari tʃems msaxurs davitʰs ase ambobs tʰkʰo upʰali ɡana ʃen unda amiʃeno saxli tʃems samqopʰelad 
me xom ar vimqopʰebodi saxlʃi im droidan ratsʰ israeli ɡamoviqvane da dɣemde karvidan karavʃi da savanidan savaneʃi var 
nutʰu mtʰel israeltʰan moaruls odesme sitqva mitʰkʰvams israelis romelime msadʒulisatʰvis vistʰvisatsʰ tʃemi eris mtsqemsoba mibrdzanebia kedaris saxls ratom ar miʃenebtʰ metʰkʰi 
axla ase utʰxari tʃems msaxurs davitʰs ase ambobs tʰkʰo tsʰabaotʰ upʰali tsʰxvris pʰaridan tsamoɡiqvane rom tʃemi eris israelis tsinamdzɣoli qopʰiliqavi 
qvelɡan ʃentʰan viqavi sadatsʰ ar unda tsasuliqavi vanadɡurebdi ʃens mtrebs ʃens tsinaʃe ɡanvadide ʃeni saxeli msɡavsad didebultʰa saxelisa am kʰveqanaze 
adɡili davudɡine tʃems ers israels da davapʰudzne iɡi axla tʰavistʰvis itsʰxovrebs uʃiʃrad da borotmokʰmedni aɣar ʃeacirveben tsinandeburad 
im droidan ratsʰ me msadʒulebi davuqene tʃems ers israels mosvenebuli mqavxar qvela mtrisaɡan ɡamoɡitsʰxade rom saxls aɡiʃenebs upʰali 
da rotsʰa dro mova da ʃens mamebtʰan ɡanisveneb me aɣvadɡen ʃens ʃemdɡom ʃens tʰesls romelitsʰ ikʰneba ʃeni dzetʰaɡani da mis mepʰobas ɡanvamtkitsʰeb 
is amiʃenebs saxls da me ɡanvamtkitsʰeb mis taxts ukunisamde 
me mama vikʰnebi mistʰvis is ki ʃvili ikʰneba tʃemtʰvis tsqalobas ar tsavartʰmev roɡortsʰ ʃens tsinamorbeds tsavartʰvi 
da davaqeneb mas tʃems saxlʃi da tʃems samepʰoʃi ukunisamde mqari ikʰneba misi taxti ukunisamde 
tʰanaxmad am sitqvebisa da am xilvisa elaparaka natʰani davitʰs 
da mivida davitʰ mepʰe da dadɡa upʰlis tsinaʃe da tʰkʰva vina var me upʰalo ɣmertʰo vin aris tʃemi saxli rom akʰamde aɣmazeve 
esetsʰ mtsʰire ɡetʃvena tʰvalʃi ɣmertʰo rom samomavlodatsʰ aɣutʰkʰvam dapirebas ʃeni msaxuris saxls ʃen mimzer roɡortsʰ ɡandidebul adamians upʰalo ɣmertʰo tʃemo 
kidev ra udna ɡitʰxras davitʰma ʃeni msaxuris didebisatʰvis ʃen tʰavad itsʰnob ʃens msaxurs upʰalo ɣmertʰo 
upʰalo ʃeni msaxurisatʰvis da ʃeni ɡulis tʰanaxmad aketʰeb am didebul sakʰmes ratʰa ɡamoatsʰxado mtʰeli ʃeni sidiade 
upʰalo aravinaa ʃeni msɡavsi ar aris ɣmertʰi ʃens ɡarda tʰanaxmad qvelapʰrisa ratsʰ tʃveni quritʰ movisminetʰ 
tʰu aris am kʰveqnad tʰundatsʰ ertʰi xalxi ʃeni eris israelis msɡavsi romelsatsʰ movlenodes ɣmertʰi rom tʰavistʰvis ɡamoesqidos iɡi rom ekʰtsʰios tʰavis erad rom saxelovani ɡaexados da tʃaedinos diadi da sakvirveli ambebi xalxebis ɡandevnitʰ ʃeni eris tsinaʃe romelitsʰ ɡamoisqide eɡviptidan da xalxebisaɡan 
ʃen ʃehkʰmen ʃeni eri israeli rom ʃeni eri qopʰiliqo ukunisamde da ʃen upʰalo matʰi ɣmertʰi qopʰiliqavi 
axla ki upʰalo es sitqva romelitsʰ tʰkʰvi ʃens msaxurze da mis saxlze ɡanmtkitsʰdes ukunisamde da kʰeni ise roɡortsʰ nabrdzanebi ɡakʰvs 
ɡanmtkitsʰdes da ididos ʃenma saxelma ukunisamde tʰkʰvan upʰali ɣmertʰi israelisa ɣmertʰobs israelze mtkitsʰe iqos ʃens tsinaʃe ʃeni msaxuris davitʰis saxeli 
radɡan ʃen ɡamoutsʰxade ɣmertʰo ʃens msaxurs saxls aɡiʃenebo amitom ɡautsia ɡulma ʃens msaxurs elotsʰa ʃens mimartʰ 
axla upʰalo tʃemo ɣmertʰi xar ʃen da sasiketʰod elaparake ʃens msaxurs 
axla ʃen dalotsʰe ʃeni msaxuris saxli ratʰa saukunod iqos ʃens tsinaʃe radɡan ʃen akurtʰxe upʰalo da kurtʰxeuli ikʰneba saukunod 
amis ʃemdeɡ iqo rom daamartsʰxa davitʰma pʰilistimelebi da daimortʃila isini da xelidan ɡamoɡlidʒa pʰilistimelebs ɡatʰi tʰavis kʰalakʰebianad 
da daamartsʰxa moabitsʰ da ɡaxda moabi davitʰis msaxuri da moxarke 
da daamartsʰxa davitʰma hadar qezeri tsʰobas mepʰe xamatʰʃi rotsʰa is evpʰratze batonobis ɡansamtkitsʰeblad midioda 
da tsaartʰva mas davitʰma atʰasi etli ʃvidi atʰasi tsʰxenosani da otsʰi atʰasi kʰveitʰi etlis tsʰxenebs dzarɣvebi ɡadaucra davitʰma asi etli datova matʰɡan 
da movidnen damaskos aramelebi tsʰobas mepʰis hadar qezeris dasaxmareblad da musri ɡaavlo davitʰma arameltʰaɡan otsʰdaoriatʰas katsʰs 
da daadɡina davitʰma xelisupʰalni damaskos aramʃi da ɡaxdnen aramelebi davitʰis msaxurni da moxarkeni da sadatsʰ ar unda tsasuliqo davitʰi qvelɡan upʰali ʃeetseoda 
da aiɣo davitʰma okʰros pʰarebi hadar qezeris msaxurebs rom hkʰodnatʰ da ierusalimʃi miitana 
diddzali spilendzi tsamoiɣo davitʰma tibxatʰidan da kʰunidan hadar qezeris kʰalakʰebidan romlisɡanatsʰ ʃemdeɡ solomonma ɡaaketʰa spilendzis curceli 
da ʃeitqo tʰoqum xamatʰis mepʰem rom sdzlia davitʰma hadar qezers da tsʰobas mepʰes 
da ɡaɡzavna tʰavisi dze hadorami mepʰe davitʰtʰan mosakitʰxad da misalotsʰad rom ʃeebrdzola hadar qezers da sdzlia mas radɡan tʰoqus mosisxle iqo hadar qezeri tʰan ɡaatana okʰro vertsʰxlisa da spilendzis curceli 
mepʰe davitʰma esetsʰ upʰals ʃestsira im okʰro vertsʰxltʰan ertʰad damortʃilebul xalxebs edoms moabs qamonis dzetʰ pʰilistimeltʰ da qamaleks rom tsaartʰva 
abiʃai tsʰeruias dzem tʰvrameti atʰasi edomeli amotsqvita marilovan velze 
da daaqena edomʃi xelisupʰalni da ɡaxda mtʰeli edomi davitʰis msaxuri da qvelɡan sadatsʰ ar unda tsasuliqo upʰali ʃeetseoda davitʰs 
da mepʰobda davitʰi mtʰels israelze da tsessa da samartʰals adzlevda tʰavis ers 
ioabi tsʰeruias dze dʒars sardlobda xolo ioʃapʰat axiludis dze mematiane iqo 
tsʰadok axitubis dze da abimelekʰ abiatʰaris dze mɣvdlebi iqvnen xolo ʃavʃa mtserali iqo 
benaiahu iehoiadaqis dze kʰeretʰelebsa da pʰeretʰelebs ɡamɡeblobda xolo davitʰis dzeni pirvelni iqvnen mepʰis ɡverditʰ 
amis ʃemdeɡ iqo rom mokvda qamonis dzetʰa mepʰe naxaʃ qamonis dze da ɡamepʰda misi dze mis natsʰvlad 
da tʰkʰva davitʰma tsqalobas vuqopʰ xanun naxaʃis dzes roɡortsʰ mamamisi mtsqalobda da ɡaɡzavna davitʰma motsʰikʰulebi sanuɡeʃod mamis ɡamo da mividnen davitʰis msaxurni qamonis dzetʰa kʰveqanaʃi xanuntʰan sanuɡeʃeblad 
da utʰxres qamonis dzetʰa mtʰavrebma xanuns davidʒero mamaʃenis pativistsʰemis ɡamo ɡiɡzavnis davitʰi nuɡeʃismtsʰemlebs ikʰneb imisatʰvis ɡamoɡzavna davitʰma tʰavisi msaxurni rom dazveros kʰveqana miatʰval moatʰvalieros da mere daakʰtsʰios 
da ʃeipqro xanunma davitʰis msaxurni da naxevari tsveri moparsa tselamde ʃemoacra sanaxevrod samoseli da ɡaistumra 
da tsavidnen da ʃeatqobines davitʰs am katsʰebis ambavi da ɡaɡzavna katsʰebi matʰ ʃesaɡebeblad radɡan dzalze ʃeuratsʰxqopʰilni iqvnen da utʰxra mepʰem ierixoʃi dartʃitʰ vidre tsveri moɡezrdebodetʰ da mere dabrunditʰ 
da dainaxes qamonis dzetʰ rom tʰavi ʃeadzules davitʰs da ɡaɡzavnes xanunma da qamonis dzetʰ atʰasi kʰankʰari vertsʰxli etlebisa da mxedrebis dasakʰiraveblad ʃuamdinaretʰidan maqakʰas aramidan da tsʰobadan 
da ikʰiraves otsʰdatʰormeti atʰasi etli da mepʰe maqakʰa tʰavisi xalxitʰ da mividnen da medibas tsin dabanakdnen qamonis dzeni ki ertʰad ʃeiqarnen da saomrad ɡamoemartʰnen 
da ʃeitqo es davitʰma da ɡaɡzavna ioabi umamatsʰestʰa mtʰeli laʃkʰaritʰurtʰ 
da ɡamovidnen qamonis dzeni da ɡaetsqvnen sabrdzolvelad kʰalakʰis karibcestʰan xolo is mepʰeni romelnitsʰ movidnen tsʰal tsʰalke dadɡnen mindorʃi 
rotsʰa ioabma dainaxa rom mteri tsinidan da zurɡidan iqo misken mimartʰuli ɡamoartʃia israelis dzetʰa ʃoris urtʃeulesni da daatsqo arameltʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
danartʃeni xalxi tʰavis dzmas abiʃais tʃaabares da manatsʰ daatsqo iɡi qamonis dzetʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
da tʰkʰva tʰu aramelebi me mdzleven ʃen momeʃvelebi xolo tʰu ʃen ɡdzleven me moval ʃens mosaʃveleblad 
ɡamaɡrdi da mtkitsʰed idekʰi tʃveni xalxisatʰvis da tʃveni upʰlis tʃveni ɣvtʰis kʰalakʰebisatʰvis da upʰalma kʰmnas ratsʰ enebos 
da ɡavidnen ioabi da misi xalxi aramelebtʰan sabrdzolvelad da ukuikʰtsʰnen aramelebi 
rotsʰa qamonis dzetʰ dainaxes rom ɡarbodnen aramelebi tʰavadatsʰ ɡaekʰtsʰnen abiʃais da kʰalakʰʃi ʃetsʰvivdnen ioabi ɡaetsʰala qamonis dzetʰ da mivida ierusalimʃi 
da dainaxes aramelebma rom martsʰxdebian israeltʰan da katsʰebi ɡauɡzavnes mdinarisɡaɣmel aramelebs da ɡadmoiqvanes matʰ tsinamdzɣolobda hadar qezeris sardali ʃopʰaxi 
da ʃeatqobines es davitʰs da manatsʰ ʃeqara mtʰeli israeli da ɡadalaxa iordane da mivida matʰtʰan da ɡaetsqo matʰ tsinaaɣmdeɡ brdzola ɡaumartʰa davitʰma aramelebs da isinitsʰ ʃeebnen mas 
da ɡaekʰtsʰnen aramelebi israels da dauxotsʰa davitʰma aramelebs ʃvidi atʰasi etlosani da ormotsʰi atʰasi kʰveitʰi da matʰi sardali ʃopʰaxitsʰ moklul ikʰna 
rotsʰa hadar qezeris msaxurebma dainaxes rom martsʰxdebodnen israeltʰan daezavnen davitʰs da daemortʃilnen aramelebma veɣar ɡabedes qamonis dzetʰa daxmareba 
tslis ʃemokʰtsʰevisas mepʰetʰa ɡamosvlis ʒams ioabi tsin tsaudzɣva laʃkʰars da ɡaanadɡura qamonis dzetʰa kʰveqana da mivida da rabas ʃemoadɡa davitʰi ki ierusalimʃi dartʃa da aiɣo ioabma raba da daanɡria 
aiɣo davitʰma matʰi mepʰis ɡvirɡvini misi tʰavidan da naxa rom ertʰi talanti okʰros tsonisa iqo da dzvirpʰasi tʰvlebitʰ moocvili da tʰavze dairkʰva iɡi auratsʰxeli nadavli tsamoiɣo davitʰma kʰalakʰidan 
da ɡamoiqvana ikʰ mqopʰi xalxi da itsqo matʰi xotsʰva xerxebitʰ rkinis satsʰexvebitʰa da rkinis tsʰulebitʰ ase moekʰtsʰa davitʰi qamonis dzetʰa kʰalakʰs da dabrunda davitʰi tʰavisi xalxitʰurtʰ ierusalimʃi 
amis ʃemdeɡ iqo rom pʰilistimelebtʰan omi atqda ɡezerʃi maʃin sibekʰai xuʃatʰelma mokla sipʰai rapʰimeltʰa ertʰi dze da dazavdnen 
da kvlav atqda pʰilistimelebtʰan omi maʃin elxanan iaqiris dzem daamartsʰxa laxmi ɡoliatʰis dzma romlis ʃubis buni mkʰsoveltʰa lilvisodena iqo 
da kvlav atqda omi ɡatʰʃi iqo uzarmazari katsʰi romelsatsʰ xel pʰexze ekʰvs ekʰvsi tʰitʰi esxa sul otsʰdaotʰxi isitsʰ bumberaztʰa naʃieri iqo 
da dastsʰinoda israels maɡram ɡanɡmira iɡi ionatʰan ʃimqas dzem davitʰis dzmistsulma 
eseni ʃeedzinnen rapʰas ɡatʰʃi da qvelani davitʰisa da mis msaxurtʰa xelitʰ daetsʰnen 
satana aɣdɡa israelze da aɣdzra davitʰi israelis aɣsaritsʰxad 
da utʰxra davitʰma ioabsa da xalxis mtʰavrebs tsaditʰ da aɣritsʰxetʰ israeli beer ʃebaqidan danamde da tsarmomidɡinetʰ rom vitsʰode matʰi ritsʰxvi 
da tʰkʰva ioabma ratsʰ aris asmaɡad ɡaamravlos upʰalma tʰavisi eri ɡana qvela isini tʃemo batono mepʰev tʃemi batonis msaxurni ar arian maʃ amas raɣad itʰxovs tʃemi batoni ratom daedos tsʰodva israels 
maɡram mepʰis sitqva kanoni iqo ioabistʰvis da tsavida ioabi da mtʰeli israeli moiara da ierusalimʃi dabrunda 
da miartʰva ioabma davitʰs aɣritsʰxvis tsiɡni da aɣmotʃnda mtʰels israelʃi milion asi atʰasi maxvilis maʃiʃvlebeli katsʰi xolo iudaʃi otʰxas samotsʰdaatʰi atʰasi maxvilis maʃiʃvlebeli katsʰi 
levianebi da beniamini matʰ ʃoris ar aɣuritsʰxavs radɡan ar moetsona ioabs mepʰis sitqva 
boroti iqo es sakʰme ɣvtʰis tʰvalʃi amitom daamartsʰxa israeli 
da utʰxra davitʰma ɣmertʰs didad ʃevtsʰode es rom ɡavaketʰe axla miuteve upʰalo ʃetsʰodeba ʃens msaxurs radɡan uɡunurad movikʰetsʰi 
da daelaparaka upʰali ɡads davitʰis natʰelmxedvels da utʰxra 
tsadi da elaparake davitʰs ase ambobs tʰkʰo upʰali sam sasdʒels ʃemoɡtʰavazeb da ertʰ ertʰi amoirtʃie rom daɡsadʒo 
da mivida ɡadi davitʰtʰan da utʰxra ase ambobs upʰali amoirtʃie 
sami tslis ʃimʃiloba ɡirtʃevnia sami tʰvis devniloba ʃeni mtrisɡan da ʃeni mtris maxvili rom moɡtsvdes tʰu sami dɣis mandzilze upʰlis maxvili ʃavi ciri da upʰlis ʃemmusvreli anɡelozi israelis mtʰel samkvidrebelʃi 
da utʰxra davitʰma ɡads dzalian micirs maɡram midʒobs upʰlis xelʃi tʃavvarde radɡan didia misi motsqaleba oɣondatsʰ katsʰis xelʃi nu tʃavvardebi 
da moavlina upʰalma ʃavi ciri israelʃi da samotsʰdaatʰi atʰasi katsʰi ɡatsqda israelʃi 
da ɡaɡzavna ɣmertʰma ierusalimʃi anɡelozi mis ɡasanadɡureblad da rodesatsʰ man ɡanadɡurebas mihqo xeli moxeda upʰalma da akmara ubedureba da utʰxra ʃemmusvrel anɡelozs kmara axla ukan tsaiɣe xeli upʰlis anɡelozi ornan iebuselis kalostʰan idɡa 
da ɡaixeda da dainaxa davitʰma tsʰisa da dedamitsis ʃua mdɡari upʰlis anɡelozi xelʃi tʰavisi ɡaʃiʃvlebuli maxvili ecira ierusalimze daɣirebuli davitʰi da uxutsʰesni saxeʃeburvilni pirkʰve daemxnen 
da utʰxra davitʰma ɣmertʰs xalxis aɣritsʰxva xom me vbrdzane me ʃevtsʰode me tʃavidine boroteba am tsʰxvrebma raɣa daaʃaves upʰalo ɣmertʰo tʃemo tʃemze da mamatʃemis saxlze iqos ʃeni xeli oɣond ʃens erze nu ikʰneba mis dasaɣupad 
da utʰxra upʰlis anɡelozma davitʰistʰvis satʰkʰmelad ɡads adɡes da upʰlis samsxverplo aaɡos davitʰma ornan iebuselis kaloze 
da tsavida davitʰi ɡadis sitqvisamebr romelitsʰ upʰlis saxelitʰ hkʰonda natʰkʰvami 
da ɡamoixeda ornanma dainaxa anɡelozi da tʰavis otʰx vaʒtʰan ertʰad daimala ornani im dros xorbals pʰkʰvavda 
da mivida davitʰi ornantʰan da ɡamoixeda ornanma da dainaxa davitʰi kalodan ɡamoeɡeba da mdablad tʰaqvani stsʰa davitʰs 
da utʰxra davitʰma ornans mometsʰi ʃeni kalos adɡili da upʰlis samsxverplos avaʃeneb masze srul sapʰasurad mometsʰi ratʰa ɡaneridos xalxs ʒami 
da utʰxra ornanma davitʰs aiɣos da ɡaaketʰos mepʰe batonma ratsʰ enebos aha xarebi sruladdasatsvelad momirtʰmevia kevrebi ʃeʃad xorbali sadzɣvnod qvelapʰers vidzlevi 
da utʰxra mepʰe davitʰma ornans ara srul sapʰasurad unda viqido ʃenɡan radɡan upʰals vertsʰ ʃens sakutʰrebas ʃevtsirav da vertsʰ mukʰtʰa aɣsavlens 
am adɡilis sapʰasurad davitʰma ekʰvsasi ʃekeli okʰro mistsʰa ornans 
im adɡilas auɡo davitʰma upʰals samsxverplo da miitana sruladdasatsveli da samʃvidobo msxverpli da mouxmo upʰals man ki sruladdasatsvelis samsxverploze zetsʰidan tsʰetsʰxlis motsʰemitʰ upasuxa 
da ubrdzana upʰalma anɡelozs da manatsʰ tʰavisi maxvili kʰarkʰaʃʃi tʃaaɡo 
im dros rotsʰa davitʰma dainaxa rom upʰalma upasuxa ornan iebuselis kaloze ikʰ ʃestsira msxverpli 
upʰlis savane mosem udabnoʃi rom ɡaaketʰa da sruladdasatsvelis samsxverplo imʒamad ɡabaonis bortsʰvze idɡa 
da ar ʃeedzlo davitʰs ikʰ misvla ɣvtʰistʰvis ʃesakitʰxad radɡan upʰlis anɡelozis maxvilis eʃinoda 
da tʰkʰva davitʰma aha upʰali ɣmertʰis saxli da aha sruladdasatsvelis samsxverplo israelisatʰvis 
da brdzaneba ɡastsʰa davitʰma rom tʰavi moeqaratʰ xiznebisatʰvis romelnitsʰ israelis kʰveqnad iqvnen da ɡanatsesa isini kʰvismtʰlelebad rom ɣvtʰis saxlis asaʃeneblad kʰvebi daetʰalatʰ 
diddzali rkina ɡaiɣo davitʰma karibcis lursmnebisa da kaucebis dasamzadeblad daxardʒul spilendzs xom tsona ar hkʰonda 
artsʰ nadzvis dzelebs hkʰonda tʰvla radɡan tsʰidonelebsa da tsʰorelebs mohkʰondatʰ davitʰistʰvis 
da tʰkʰva davitʰma tʃemi dze solomoni qmatsvilia da susti upʰlistʰvis asaʃenebeli saxli ki qvelaze didebuli saxelɡantʰkʰmuli da mʃvenieri unda iqos mtʰel kʰveqanaze amitom qvelapʰers movamzadeb mistʰvis da bevri ɡaamzada davitʰma sikvdilis tsin 
da daudzaxa solomons tʰavis dzes da upʰlistʰvis israelis ɣvtʰistʰvis saxlis aɡeba uanderdza 
da utʰxra davitʰma tʰavis dzes solomons ʃvilo ɡulitʰ metsada upʰlis ɣvtʰis saxelistʰvis saxli ameɡo 
da iqo upʰlis sitqva tʃems mimartʰ tʰkʰmuli bevri sisxli ɡakʰvs daɣvrili da didi omebi ɡakʰvs ɡadaxdili amitom ʃen ar aaʃeneb tʃems saxelze saxls radɡan bevri sisxli daɣvare kʰveqnad tʃems tsinaʃe 
aha dze ʃeɡedzineba da mʃvidi katsʰi ikʰneba qvela mtrisaɡan movasveneb amitomatsʰ solomoni ikʰneba misi saxeli da mis dɣeebʃi mʃvidobas mivtsʰem israels 
is aaʃenebs saxls tʃems saxelze is ikʰneba tʃemtʰvis dze da me vikʰnebi mistʰvis mama da ɡanvamtkitsʰeb mis samepʰo taxts israelʃi ukunisamde 
axla ki ʃvilo tʃemo upʰali iqos ʃentʰan ratʰa xeli moɡemartʰos da upʰlis ʃeni ɣvtʰis saxli aaʃeno roɡortsʰ tʰkʰva upʰalma ʃenze 
upʰalma moɡtsʰes azri da ɡoniereba da daɡaqenos israelze upʰlis ɣvtʰis rdʒulis dasatsʰavad 
maʃin ikʰnebi tsarmatebuli tʰu im tsesebsa da kanonebs daitsʰav romelnitsʰ moses ubrdzana upʰalma israelisatʰvis mtkitsʰed deɡ da ɡamaɡrdi nu ʃiʃob da nu tʰrtʰi 
aha tʃems siɣaribeʃi upʰlis saxlisatʰvis ɡavamzade asiatʰasi kʰankʰari okʰro milioni kʰankʰari vertsʰxli spilendzsa da rkinas tsona ara akʰvs radɡan uamravia xe tqe da kʰvatsʰ ɡavamzade maɡram ʃentsʰ ʃeɡidzlia miumato 
bevri xelosani mqavs tqismcrelebi kʰvismtʰlelebi xuroebi da qvelanairi xelobis mtsʰodneni 
okʰros vertsʰxls spilendzs tʰvla ara akʰvs axla adekʰi da sakʰmes ʃeudekʰi da upʰali ʃentʰan ikʰneba 
da brdzana davitʰma rom israelis qvela mtʰavari mixmareboda mis dzes solomons 
ɡana tʰkʰventʰan ar aris upʰali tʃveni ɣmertʰi ɡana man ar moɡtsʰatʰ irɡvliv mʃvidoba man tʃems xelʃi tʃaqara am kʰveqnis mkvidrni da damortʃilda es kʰveqana upʰlisa da misi eris tsinaʃe 
axla ki ɡauxsenitʰ tʰkʰveni ɡuli da suli upʰals tʰkʰvens ɣmertʰs adekʰitʰ da daitsqetʰ upʰlis ɣvtʰis satsmidris ʃeneba ratʰa upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmis kidobani da ɣvtʰis curcleuli upʰlis saxelze aɡebul saxlʃi ɡadaabrdzanotʰ 
da davitʰi moxutsʰda da ɡadzɣa tslebitʰ da tʰavisi vaʒi solomoni ɡaamepʰa israelze 
da tʰavi mouqara israelis mtʰavrebs mɣvdlebsa da levianebs 
da aɣritsʰxes otsʰdaatʰ tsels ɡadatsʰilebuli levianebi da ɡamovida sul otsʰdatʰvrameti atʰasi katsʰi 
akʰedan otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi upʰlis saxlis sakʰmes udzɣveboda ekʰvsi atʰasi ki mtsiɡnobrebi da msadʒulebi iqvnen 
otʰxiatʰasi karismtsʰveli iqo otʰxiatʰasi ki im sakravebitʰ adidebda upʰals romelnitsʰ davitʰma ɡaaketʰa 
da dahqo davitʰma isini levis ɡerʃonis kehatʰis da meraris dzetʰa dasebad 
ɡerʃoneltʰaɡan iqvnen laqdani da ʃimqi 
laqdanis dzeni upʰrosi iexieli zetʰami da ioeli samni 
ʃimqis dzeni ʃelomitʰi xazieli da harani samni eseni arian laqdanis mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebi 
ʃimqis dzeni iaxatʰi zina iequʃi da beriqa eseni arian ʃimqis dzeni otʰxni 
iaxatʰi upʰrosi iqo ziza momdevno iequʃsa da beriqas dzalian tsʰota ʃvilebi hqavdatʰ amitom aɣritsʰxvisas ertʰ mamissaxls ʃeadɡendnen 
kehatʰis dzeni qamrami itsʰhari xebroni da quzieli otʰxni 
qamramis dzeni aaroni da mose aaroni imistʰvis ɡamoirtʃia rom tsmidatʰa tsmidistʰvis ekurtʰxebinatʰ iɡi da misi dzeni ukunisamde ratʰa matʰ ekmiatʰ upʰlis tsinaʃe ratʰa samsaxuri ɡaetsiatʰ mistʰvis da misi saxelitʰ ukunisamde ekurtʰxebinatʰ 
mose ɣvtʰiskatsʰi iqo da misi dzeni leviantʰa toms miatʰvales 
moses dzeni ɡerʃomi eliezeri 
ɡerʃomis dzeni ʃebueli upʰrosi 
eliezeris dzeni iqvnen rexabia upʰrosi eliezers meti ʃvili artsʰ hqolia rexabias dzeni ki dzalian ɡamravldnen 
itsʰharis dzeni ʃelomitʰi upʰrosi 
xebronis dzeni ieriahu upʰrosi amaria meore iaxazieli mesame iekamqami meotʰxe 
quzielis dzeni mikʰa upʰrosi iʃia meore 
meraris dzeni maxli da muʃi maxlis dzeni eleazari da kiʃi 
eleazari ise mokvda rom vaʒi ar hqolia mxolod asulebi dartʃa isini kiʃis dzeebma bidzaʃvilebma ʃeirtʰes 
muʃis dzeni maxli qederi da ieremotʰi samni 
aha levis dzeni tʰav tʰaviantʰi mamissaxlebis mixedvitʰ mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebi saxelebisa da suladobis ritsʰxvis mixedvitʰ aɣritsʰxulni romelnitsʰ upʰlis saxlis samsaxuris sakʰmes udzɣvebodnen otsʰ tsels ɡadatsʰilebulni 
radɡan tʰkʰva davitʰma upʰalma ɣmertʰma mistsʰa mʃvidoba israels tʰavis ers da ierusalimʃi damkvidrda iɡi ukunisamde 
da aɣartsʰ levianebs dascirdebatʰ samsaxuris ɡasatsevad savanisa da misi curcleulis tareba 
davitʰis ukanaskneli sitqvebis mixedvitʰ aɣritsʰxes otsʰ tsels ɡadatsʰilebuli levianebi 
ratʰa isini mdɡariqvnen aaronis dzetʰa ɡverditʰ emsaxuratʰ upʰlis saxlʃi ezoebʃi da otʰaxebʃi supʰtʰad ʃeenaxatʰ qoveli sitsmide da aɣesrulebinatʰ ɣvtʰis saxlis samsaxuri 
da ezrunatʰ satsinaʃeo purebze dzɣvenze upʰuar kverebze tapʰebze da ʃesatsvavze qvelapʰris artsqva atsonaze 
dila saɣamoobitʰ upʰlis kʰeba didebaze 
da qvela sruladdasatsvelze upʰlisatʰvis ʃabatʰobitʰ axalmtʰvarobebis dɣesastsaulebis ɡansazɣvrul ritsʰxvebʃi roɡortsʰ matʰtʰvisaa dadɡenili upʰlis tsinaʃe marad aɣsasruleblad 
rom daitsʰvan dadɡenileba sadɣesastsaulo karvis ʃesaxeb dadɡenileba satsmidris ʃesaxeb da dadɡenileba aaronis dzetʰa matʰi dzmebis ʃesaxeb upʰlis saxlʃi samsaxuris ɡasatsevad 
aaronis dzetʰ tʰaviantʰi dasebi akʰvtʰ aaronis dzeni nadabi abihu eleazari da itʰamari 
nadabi da abihu mamaze adre daixotsʰnen ise rom vaʒebi ar hqoliatʰ eleazari da itʰamari ʃeudɡnen mɣvdelmsaxurebas 
da ɡaamtsesa davitʰma tsʰadoki eleazaris dzetʰaɡan da aximelekʰi itʰamaris dzetʰaɡan tʰav tʰaviantʰ samsaxurʃi tʰav tʰaviantʰi movaleobisda mixedvitʰ 
da aɣmotʃnda rom eleazaris ʃvilebʃi katsʰebi upʰro metni iqvnen vidre itʰamaris ʃvilebʃi da daanatsiles matʰ isini eleazaris dzetʰa mamissaxls tʰekʰvsmeti tʰavkatsʰi arɡunes xolo itʰamaris dzetʰa mamissaxls rva tʰavkatsʰi 
ertʰmanetʰʃi tsilisqritʰ dainatsiles radɡan satsmidris tsinamdzɣolebi eleazarisa da itʰamaris dzetʰaɡan iqvnen 
da aɣnusxa isini ʃemaqia natʰanelis dzem leviantʰa mtsiɡnobarma mepʰisa da mtʰavartʰa tsinaʃe tsʰadok mɣvdlisa da aximelekʰ abiatʰaris dzis tsinaʃe mɣvdeltʰa da levianebis mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebis tsinaʃe ertʰi mamissaxli eleazars uqrida tsils da ertʰi itʰamars uqrida tsils 
da pirveli tsili iehoiaribs ʃexvda meore iedaqias 
mesame xarims meotʰxe seqorims 
mexutʰe malkʰias meekʰvse miamins 
meʃvide hakotsʰs merve abias 
metsʰxre iesos meatʰe ʃekʰaniahus 
metʰertʰmete eliaʃibs metʰormete iakims 
metsʰamete xupʰas metʰotʰxmete ieʃebabs 
metʰxutʰmete bilɡas metʰekʰvsmete imers 
metʃvidmete xezirs metʰvramete hapʰitsʰetsʰs 
metsʰxramete pʰetʰaxias meotsʰe iexezkels 
otsʰdameertʰe iakʰins otsʰdameore ɡamuls 
otsʰdamesame delaiahus otsʰdameotʰxe maqaziahus 
es aris matʰi ɡanatsesi tʰu roɡor unda misuliqvnen upʰlis saxlʃi im samsaxuris ɡasatsevad matʰi mamis aaronis xelitʰ rom iqo datsesebuli ise roɡortsʰ upʰalma israelis ɣmertʰma ubrdzana mas 
danartʃeni levianebi qamramis dzetʰaɡan ʃubaeli ʃubaelis dzetʰaɡan iexdeiahu 
rexabiahusaɡan rexabiahus dzetʰaɡan iʃia iqo tʰavkatsʰi 
itsʰhareltʰaɡan ʃelomotʰi ʃelomotʰis dzetʰaɡan iaxatʰi 
xebronis dzetʰaɡan ieriahu amariahu meore iaxazieli mesame iekamqami meotʰxe 
quzielis dzetʰaɡan mikʰa mikʰas dzetʰaɡan ʃamiri 
mikʰas dzma iqo iʃia iʃias dzetʰaɡan zakʰaria 
meraris dzeni maxli da muʃi iaqaziahus dzetʰaɡan beno 
meraris dzeni iaqaziahusɡan beno ʃohami zakʰuri da qibri 
maxlisɡan eleazari romelsatsʰ vaʒebi ar hqolia 
kiʃisɡan kiʃis dze ieraxmeeli 
muʃis dzeni maxli qederi ierimotʰi aha levianebi tʰav tʰaviantʰi mamissaxlebisda mixedvitʰ 
mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebma umtsʰrosi dzmebis tʰanastsorad qares tsili tʰaviantʰi dzmebis aaroniantʰa msɡavsad mepʰe davitʰis tsʰadokis aximelekʰis mɣvdlebisa da levianebis mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰebis tsinaʃe 
davitʰma da misma mxedartʰmtʰavrebma samsaxurisatʰvis daanatsiles asapʰis hemanis da iedutʰunis dzeni romelnitsʰ bobɣnebze kʰnarebsa da tsintsilebze ukravdnen imatʰi ritsʰxvi vintsʰ tʰaviantʰ samsaxuris sakʰmes etseodnen iqo 
asapʰis dzetʰaɡan zakʰuri iosebi netʰania asarela asapʰis dzeni romelnitsʰ asapʰis lotbarobitʰa da mepʰis xelmdzɣvanelobitʰ ukravdnen 
iedutʰunisɡan iedutʰunis dzeni ɡedaliahu tsʰeri ieʃaqiahu xaʃabiahu matʰitʰiahu ʃiʃa ekʰvsni tʰaviantʰi mamis iedutʰunis xelkʰveitʰ iqvnen romelitsʰ bobɣanze ukravda upʰlis sakʰeb sadidebels 
hemanisɡan hemanis dzeni bukiahu matʰaniahu quzieli ʃebueli ierimotʰi xanania xanani eliatʰa ɡidaltʰi romamtʰi qezeri ioʃbekaʃa malotʰi hotʰiri maxaziotʰi 
qvela eseni im hemanis dzeni arian romelitsʰ mepʰis natʰelmxedveli iqo upʰlis sitqvebis ɡamosatsʰxadeblad da misi didebis rkʰis asamaɣleblad ɣmertʰma hemans tʰormeti vaʒi da sami asuli mistsʰa 
qvela eseni matʰi mamis lotbarobitʰ ɡalobdnen upʰlis saxlʃi tsintsilebitʰ kʰnarebitʰ bobɣnebitʰ ɣvtʰis saxlis samsaxuris ɡasatsevad mepʰis asapʰis iedutʰunisa da hemanis xelmdzɣvanelobitʰ 
upʰlisatʰvis ɡalobaʃi ɡanstsavlultʰa da qvela mtsʰodnetʰa ritsʰxvi tʰaviantʰ dzmebtʰan ertʰad iqo orasotʰxmotsʰdarva 
samsaxuris riɡze tsili tʰanastsorad qares didma da pataram stsavlulma da mostsavlem 
pirveli tsili erɡo asapʰs iosebisatʰvis meore ɡedaliahus iɡi misi dzmebi da ʃvilebi tʰormetni 
mesame zakʰurs misi dzeni da dzmebi tʰormetni 
meotʰxe itsʰris misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
mexutʰe netʰaniahus misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
meekʰvse bukiahus misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
meʃvide iesarelas misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
merve esaias misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
metsʰxre matʰaniahus misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
meatʰe ʃimqis misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
metʰertʰmete qazarels misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
metʰormete xaʃabias misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
metsʰamete ʃubaels misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
metʰotʰxmete matʰitʰiahus misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
metʰxutʰmete ieremotʰs misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
metʰekʰvsmete xananiahus misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
metʃvidmete ioʃbekaʃas misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
metʰvramete xananis misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
metsʰxramete malotʰis misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
meotsʰe eliatʰas misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
otsʰdameertʰe hotʰirs misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
otsʰdameore ɡidaltʰis misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
otsʰdamesame maxaziotʰs misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
otsʰdameotʰxe romamtʰi qezers misi dzeni da dzmani tʰormetni 
karismtsʰveltʰa dasebi koraxeltʰaɡan meʃelemiahu kores dze asapʰis dzetʰaɡan 
meʃelemiahus dzeni zakʰaria pirmʃo iediqaeli meore zebadiahu mesame iatʰnieli meotʰxe 
qelami mexutʰe iehoxanani meekʰvse eliehoqenai meʃvide 
qobed edomis dzeni ʃemaqia pirmʃo iehozabadi meore ioaxi mesame sakʰari meotʰxe netʰaneli mexutʰe 
qamieli meekʰvse isakʰari meʃvide pʰequltʰai merve radɡan ɣmertʰma akurtʰxa iɡi 
mis dzes ʃemaqias vaʒebi ʃeedzina romelnitsʰ mamissaxls ɡanaɡebdnen vinaidan maɡari vaʒkatsʰebi iqvnen 
ʃemaqias dzeni qotʰni repʰaeli qobedi elzabadi misi dzmani maɡari xalxi elihu da semakʰiahu 
qvelani qobed edomis dzeni iqvnen isini tʰaviantʰi dzeebitʰa da dzmebitʰ maɡari vaʒkatsʰebi iqvnen da samsaxuris ɡatsevis unari hkʰondatʰ qobed edoms asetʰebi sul samotsʰdaori hqavda 
meʃelemiahus tʰvrameti vaʒi da dzma hqavda maɡari vaʒkatsʰebi 
xosas meraris ertʰ ertʰi dzetʰaɡanis vaʒebi upʰrosi ʃimri iqo tʰumtsʰa pirmʃo ar qopʰila mamamisma arɡuna mas upʰrosoba 
xilkiahu momdevno iqo tebaliahu mesame zakʰaria meotʰxe xosas sul tsʰameti vaʒi da dzma hqavda 
karismtsʰveltʰa dass moqmetʰa tʰavkatsʰebs tʃabardatʰ datsʰva tʰaviantʰ dzmebtʰan ertʰad upʰlis saxlʃi samsaxuris ɡasatsevad 
qvela karibceze tsili qares roɡortsʰ didebma ise patarebma tʰav tʰaviantʰi mamissaxlebis mixedvitʰ 
aɣmosavletʰis mxare ʃelemiahus erɡo tsilad mis vaʒs zakʰarias ɡonier mrtʃevels uqares tsili da mas tsilad tʃrdiloetʰis mxare ʃexvda 
qobed edoms samxretʰis mxare erɡo tsilad mis dzeebs sakucnaoebtʰan 
ʃupʰimsa da xosas dasavletʰis mxare ʃexvdatʰ ʃalekʰetʰis ciʃkartʰan saidanatsʰ ɡza adis da datsʰva datsʰvis pirispir dɡas 
aɣmosavletʰitʰ ekʰvsi leviani idɡa tʃrdiloetʰitʰ dɣeʃi otʰxi samxretʰitʰ dɣeʃi otʰxi sakucnaoebtʰan or ori 
pʰarbaris dasavletʰitʰ ɡzaze otʰxni idɡnen tʰavad pʰarbartʰan orni 
aha koresa da meraris dzeebis karismtsʰveltʰa dasebi 
leviantʰaɡan axia ɣvtʰis saxlis saɡandzursa da ʃenatsiri nivtʰebis saɡandzurs daradʒobda 
laqdanis dzeni ɡerʃoneltʰa dzeni laqdanisɡan mamissaxlis tʰavkatsʰebi laqdan ɡerʃonelisɡan iexieli 
iexielis dzeni zetʰami da misi dzma ioeli upʰlis saxlis saɡandzurs daradʒobdnen 
qamramelebtʰan itsʰharelebtʰan xebronelebtʰan da quzielebtʰan ertʰad 
ʃebueli dze ɡerʃomisa moses dzisa saɡandzuris mtʰavari zedamxedveli iqo 
misi dzmebi eliezerisɡan misi dze rexabiahu misi dze ieʃaqiahu misi dze iorami misi dze zikʰri misi dze ʃelomitʰi 
es ʃelomitʰi tʰavisi dzmebitʰurtʰ daradʒobda ʃemotsirulobatʰa mtʰel saɡandzurs romelitsʰ mepʰe davitʰma mamissaxlis tʰavkatsʰebma atʰasistʰavebma asistʰavebma da sardlebma ʃestsires 
omidan da naalapʰridan stsiravdnen upʰlis saxlis ʃesaketʰeblad 
qvelapʰeri ratsʰ samuel tsinastsarmetqvelma saul kiʃis dzem abner neris dzem ioab tsʰeruias dzem ʃestsires qvela es ʃenatsiri ʃelomitʰisa da misi dzmebis xelʃi iqo 
itsʰhareltʰaɡan kʰenaniahu da misi dzeni israelʃi saɡareo samsaxurze iqvnen ɡantsesebulni mzirebad da msadʒulebad 
xebroneltʰaɡan xaʃabiahu da misi dzmebi maɡari vaʒkatsʰebi atʰas ʃvidasni daniʃnulni iqvnen israelze iordanes ɡaɣmidan dasavletʰamde upʰlis qovelɡvari sakʰmisatʰvis da mepʰis qovelɡvari samsaxurisatʰvis 
xebronelebs ieria xebroneli hqavdatʰ tʰavkatsʰad tʰaviantʰ modɡmasa da mamissaxlʃi davitʰis mepʰobis meormotsʰe tsels ɡamoikitʰxes da matʰ ʃoris maɡari vaʒkatsʰebi aɣmoatʃines ɡilqadis iaqzerʃi 
matʰi dzmani maɡari vaʒkatsʰebi oriatʰas ʃvidasni iqvnen mamissaxlis tʰiavkatsʰni davitʰ mepʰem isini reubenianebʃi ɡadelebʃi da menaʃes naxevartomʃi ɡaamtsesa ɣvtʰis qvela sakʰmistʰvis da samepʰo sakʰmistʰvis 
eseni arian israelis dzeni matʰi ritsʰxvis mixedvitʰ tʰav tʰaviantʰ mamissaxltʰa tʰavkatsʰni atʰasistʰavebi asistʰavebi da matʰi mzirebi romelnitsʰ mepʰes emsaxurebodnen dasebis qvela sakʰmeʃi midi modiodnen qoveltʰviurad tselitsadis qovel tʰveʃi tʰitʰoeuli dasi otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasisɡan ʃesdɡeboda 
pirvel dasze pirveli tʰvistʰvis dadɡenili iqo ioʃabqam zabdielis dze mis dasʃi otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi iqo 
iɡi iqo pʰeretsʰis ʃviltʰaɡani pirveli tʰvis qvela mxedartʰmtʰavris metʰauri 
meore tʰvis dasze iqo dodai axoxeli mis dasʃive iqo mtʰavari miklotʰi mis dasʃi otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi iqo 
mesame tʰvis mesame mxedartʰmtʰavari iqo benaiahu iehoiadaq mɣvdlis vaʒi mis dasʃitsʰ otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi iqo 
es benaiahu otsʰdaatʰ moqmetʰaɡani da matʰi metʰauri iqo misi dze qamizabaditsʰ mis dasʃi iqo 
meotʰxe tʰveʃi meotʰxe iqo qasaeli ioabis dzma mis ʃemdeɡ ki misi dze zebadia mis dasʃitsʰ otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi iqo 
mexutʰe tʰveʃi mexutʰe mxedartʰmtʰavari iqo ʃamutʰ izraxeli mis dasʃitsʰ otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi iqo 
meekʰvse tʰveʃi meekʰvse iqo qira qikeʃis dze tʰekoaqeli mis dasʃitsʰ otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi iqo 
meʃvide tʰveʃi meʃvide iqo xeletsʰ pʰeloneli epʰremis dzetʰaɡan mis dasʃitsʰ otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi iqo 
merve tʰveʃi merve iqo sibekʰai xuʃatʰeli zarxeltʰaɡan mis dasʃitsʰ otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi iqo 
metsʰxre tʰveʃi metsʰxre iqo abiqezer qanetʰotʰeli beniamineltʰaɡan mis dasʃitsʰ otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi iqo 
meatʰe tʰveʃi meatʰe iqo maharai netopʰatʰeli zarxeltʰaɡan mis dasʃitsʰ otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi iqo 
metʰertʰmete tʰveʃi metʰertʰmete iqo benaia pʰirqatʰoneli epʰremeltʰaɡan mis dasʃitsʰ otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi iqo 
metʰormete tʰveʃi metʰormete iqo xeldai netopʰatʰeli qatʰnieltʰaɡan mis dasʃitsʰ otsʰdaotʰxi atʰasi iqo 
israelis ʃtoebze reubenis dzetʰa tsinamdzɣoli iqo eliezer zikʰris dze simonelebisa ʃepʰatiahu maqakʰas dze 
levianebisa xaʃabia kemuelis dze aaronisa tsʰadoki 
iudasi elihu davitʰis dzmatʰaɡani isakʰarisa qomri dze mikʰaelisa 
zebulunisa iʃmaqiahu qobadiahus dze napʰtʰalisa ierimotʰ qazrielis dze 
epʰremis dzetʰa hoʃeaq qazaziahus dze menaʃes naxevartomisa ioel pʰediahus dze 
menaʃes naxevartomisa ido zakʰarias dze beniaminisa iaqasiel abneris dze 
danisa qazarel ieroxamis dze eseni arian israelis tomtʰa mtʰavarni 
otsʰi tslisani da mis kʰvemotʰ ar aɣuritsʰxavs davitʰs vinaidan upʰalma israels tsʰis varskvlavebivitʰ ɡamravleba aɣutʰkʰva 
ioab tsʰeruias dzem daitsqo aɣritsʰxva maɡram ar daamtʰavra amis ɡamo israels risxva daatqda es aɣritsʰxva davitʰ mepʰis matianis aɣritsʰxvaʃitsʰ ar ʃesula 
samepʰo saundʒeebze iqo qazmavetʰ qadielis dze xolo im saundʒeebze romelitsʰ mindorʃi kʰalakʰebʃi da tsʰixe simaɡreebʃi iqo iehonatʰan quziahus dze 
mindvris samuʃaoebis ʃemsruleblebze mitsas rom amuʃavebdnen qezri kʰelubis dze 
venaxebze ʃimqi ramatʰeli qurdznisa da ɣvinis maraɡze zabdi ʃipʰmeli 
zetʰisxilebze da leɣvebze dablobʃi rom aris baqal xanan ɡedereli zetʰis maraɡze ioqaʃi 
xolo im naxirze ʃaronʃi rom sdzovda ʃitrai ʃaroneli naxirze xeobebʃi ʃapʰat qadlais dze 
akʰlemebze iobil ismaeliani saxedrebze iexdeiahu meronotʰeli 
tsʰxvarze iaziz haɡereli qvela eseni davitʰ mepʰis kʰonebis mouravebi iqvnen 
ionatʰani davitʰis bidza mrtʃeveli iqo katsʰi ɡonieri da mtsiɡnobari iexieli xakʰmonis dze mepʰistsulebtʰan iqo 
axitʰopʰeli mepʰis mrtʃeveli iqo xuʃai arkʰeli ki mepʰis meɡobari 
axitʰopʰelis ʃemdeɡ iqvnen iehoiadaq benaiahus dze da abiatʰari mepʰis mxedartʰmtʰavari iqo ioabi
