ʃeni saxe moaʃukʰe ʃens mortʃils da mastsavle tsesdebani ʃeni 
tsʰremltʰa nakadebi ɡadmomdis tʰvaltʰaɡan radɡan ar itsʰaven ʃens rdʒuls 
martʰali xar ʃen upʰalo da stsoria ɡamɡebulebani ʃeni 
amtsʰne simartʰlitʰ motsmobani ʃenni da ceʃmaritia metad 
damɣrəɣna ecvma radɡan daivitsqes 
xalasia ʃeni natʰkʰvami pʰriad da ʃens mortʃils uqvars iɡi 
mtsʰire var da modzulebuli ʃens brdzanebebs ar vivitsqeb 
simartʰle ʃeni maradiuli simartʰlea da ʃeni rdʒuli ceʃmaritia 
ɡansatsʰdeli da ɡacirveba tsamometsia maɡram ʃeni brdzanebani sixarulia tʃemtʰvis 
simartʰlea ʃeni motsmobani maradis ʃtʰamaɡone da vitsʰotsʰxleb 
moɡixmob mtʰeli ɡulitʰ ʃens tsesdebebs davitsʰav 
ʃen moɡixmob ɡadamartʃine da davitsʰav ʃens motsmobebs 
ɡariʒraʒamde moval da viɣaɣadeb ʃens sitqvaze var daimedebuli 
tʃemma tʰvalebma daastsres ɣamis ebɡurs ratʰa vilaparako ʃens natʰkʰvamze 
tʃemi xma ismine ʃeni tsqalobisamebr upʰalo ʃeni simartʰlisamebr matsʰotsʰxle 
axlos arian avismzraxvelni ʃeni rdʒulisaɡan ki ʃors dɡanan 
axlos xar upʰalo da qoveli mtsʰneba ʃeni ceʃmaritebaa 
adridanve ʃevitqve ʃentʰa motsmobatʰa ʃesaxeb rom samaradʒamod daapʰudzne isini 
ʃexede tʃems siɡlaxakes da ɡadamartʃine radɡan ʃeni rdʒuli ar davivitsqe 
ɡamomesartʃle da damixseni ʃeni sitqvisamebr matsʰotsʰxle 
ʃors aris borottʰaɡan ʃvela radɡan ʃens tsesdebebs ar edzieben 
motsqalebani ʃenni uxvia upʰalo ʃeni samartʰlis mixedvitʰ matsʰotsʰxle 
bevria tʃemi mdevari da modave ʃeni motsmobebisatʰvis ar ɡadamixvevia 
vxedav ɡandɡomiltʰ da zizɣi mipqrobs radɡan ʃens sitqvebs ar itsʰaven 
naxe rariɡ ʃeviqvare ʃeni brdzanebani upʰalo ʃeni tsqalobisamebr matsʰotsʰxle 
dasabami ʃeni sitqvisa ceʃmaritebaa da saukunoa qvela ɡanɡebuleba ʃeni samartʰlisa 
mtʰavarni mdevnian umizezod da ʃeni sitqvebisaɡan daʃinebulia ɡuli tʃemi 
vxarob ʃens sitqvaze vitʰartsʰa mpovneli uxvi nadavlisa 
sitsʰrue mdzuls da mdzaɡs ʃeni rdʒuli miqvars 
dɣeʃi ʃvidɡzis ɡakʰeb ʃeni martʰali ɡansdʒebisatʰvis 
didia mʃvidoba ʃeni rdʒulis moqvarultʰa da ar arsebobs matʰtʰvis dabrkoleba 
imedi mkʰonda ʃeni ʃetsevnisa upʰalo da ʃens brdzanebebs vasrulebdi 
itsʰavda tʃemi suli ʃens motsmobebs da me isini miqvars dzalian 
vitsʰavdi ʃens brdzanebebs da motsmobebs radɡan qvela tʃemi ɡza ʃens tsinaʃea 
moaxlovdes tʃemi ɣaɣadi ʃens tsinaʃe upʰalo da ʃeni sitqvisamebr ɡanmstsavle 
movides tʃemi vedreba ʃens tsinaʃe mixseni ʃeni aɣtʰkʰmitʰ 
tsarmotʰkʰvamen tʃemi baɡeni kʰebas radɡan mastsavle tsesdebani ʃeni 
itqvis tʃemi ena ʃens natʰkʰvams radɡan qvela ʃeni mtsʰneba simartʰlea 
iqos ʃeni xeli tʃemda ʃemtsed radɡan ʃeni brdzanebani amovirtʃie 
vnatrobdi ʃens ʃvelas upʰalo da ʃeni rdʒuli sasiamovnoa tʃemtʰvis 
itsʰotsʰxlos tʃemma sulma da ɡakʰos ʃen da ʃeni ɡanɡebuleba ʃemetsios 
davibeni vitʰartsʰa tsʰxvari dakarɡuli radɡan mtsʰnebani ʃenni ar davivitsqe 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa upʰals tʃemi ɡacirvebis ʒams movuxme da mipasuxa 
upʰalo ixseni tʃemi suli tsʰru baɡetʰaɡan mzakvari enisaɡan 
ras moɡtsʰems ʃen da ras ʃeɡdzens 
iɡia meomris tsamaxuli isari tsnornaris nakvertsʰxlebtʰan ertʰad 
vaime xizani var meʃekʰisa vbinadrob kedaris karvebtʰan 
didxans mkvidrobda tʃemi suli matʰtʰan visatsʰ sdzultʰ mʃvidoba 
me mʃvidoba msurs da rom davilaparakeb 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa mivapqrob tʰvalebs mtʰebs saidan mova tʃemi ʃetsevna 
tʃemi ʃetsevna upʰlisɡanaa romelmatsʰ ʃekʰmna tsʰa da kʰveqana 
ar tsaabordzikebs ʃens pʰexs ar tsatʰvlems damtsʰveli ʃeni 
aha ar tsatʰvlems da ar daidzinebs mtsʰveli israelisa 
upʰalia ʃeni mtsʰveli upʰalia ʃeni mpʰarveli ʃeni mardʒvenis ɡverditʰ 
dɣisitʰ mze ar ɡavnebs da ɣamitʰ mtʰvare 
upʰali daɡitsʰavs qovelɡvari borotisaɡan daitsʰavs ʃens suls 
upʰali daitsʰavs ʃens tsasvlas da mosvlas amieridan da ukunisamde 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa davitʰisa ɡavixare rotsʰa mitʰxres upʰlis saxlʃi tsavidetʰ 
dɡanan pʰerxni tʃvenni ʃens karibceebʃi ierusalimo 
ierusalimi naɡebia roɡortsʰ kʰalakʰi mtʰlianad ʃeduɣabebuli 
sadatsʰ avidnen tomni sadideblad upʰlis saxelisa 
radɡan ikʰ idɡa taxtebi samartʰlisa taxtebi davitʰis saxlisa 
itʰxovetʰ mʃvidoba ierusalimisatʰvis damʃviddnen moqvarulni ʃenni 
iqos mʃvidoba ʃens zɣudeebʃi bedniereba ʃens sasaxleebʃi 
tʃemtʰa dzmatʰa da meɡobartʰa ɡamo vambob mʃvidoba ʃen 
tʃveni upʰali ɣmertʰis saxlistʰvis ɡisurveb siketʰes ʃen 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa ʃensken aɣvapqar tʃemi tʰvalebi zetsʰaʃi damkvidrebulo 
aha vitʰratsʰa monatʰa tʰvalni batontʰa xelisaken vitʰartsʰa tʰvalni mxevlisa kʰalbatonis xelisaken iseve tʃveni tʰvalebi mikʰtsʰeulia tʃveni upʰali ɣmertʰisaken vidre ʃeɡvitsqalebdes 
ʃeɡvitsqale upʰalo ʃeɡvitsqale radɡan metismetad ɡavdzexitʰ sidzulvilitʰ 
metismetad aɣivso tʃveni suli mdidartʰa vedrebitʰ da ampartavantʰa sidzulvilitʰ 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa davitʰisa upʰali rom ar qopʰiliqo tʃventʰan tʰkʰvas israelma 
upʰali rom ar qopʰiliqo tʃventʰan rotsʰa aɣdɡnen tʃvens tsinaaɣmdeɡ katsʰni 
maʃin tsʰotsʰxlad tʃaɡvqlapavdnen raʒams ɡanrisxdnen tʃvenze 
maʃin tsqlebi tsaɡvsilavdnen nakadi ɡadauvlida tʃvens suls 
ɡadauvlidnen tʃvens suls bobokʰari tsqlebi 
kurtʰxeul ars upʰali rom ar miɡvtsʰa ulupʰad matʰtʰa kbiltʰatʰvis 
tʃveni suli ɡadartʃa vitʰartsʰa tʃiti monadiris maxisaɡan maxe daimsxvra da tʃven ɡadavrtʃitʰ 
tʃveni ʃetsevna upʰlis saxelʃia tsʰisa da kʰveqnis ʃemokʰmedisa 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa romelnitsʰ upʰalze arian dandobili sionis mtʰasavitʰ arian romelitsʰ ar irqeva aramed idɡeba ukunisamde 
ierusalims irɡvliv mtʰebi artqia da upʰali tʰavisi eris ɡarʃemoa amieridan ukunisamde 
radɡan ar dartʃeba kvertʰxi borotisa martʰaltʰa tsilze ratʰa ar ɡaitsodon martʰlebma xeli simrudeze 
siketʰe uqav upʰalo ketʰilebs da ɡulmartʰlebs 
xolo ɡadaxrilebs ɡulardznilobad tsaiqvans upʰali borotmokʰmedebtʰan ertʰad mʃvidoba israels 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa rotsʰa daabruna upʰalma tqveebi sionisas tʰavi sizmarʃi ɡveɡona 
maʃin aivso sitsʰilitʰ baɡe tʃveni da ena tʃveni ɡalobitʰ maʃin amboben tsarmartʰtʰa ʃoris diadi sakʰme moimokʰmeda upʰalma matʰtʰan 
diadi sakʰme moimokʰmeda upʰalma tʃventʰan tʃven ɡavmxiarulditʰ 
daabrune upʰalo tʃveni tqveebi vitʰ nakadebi neɡebis mitsaze 
tsʰremlitʰ mtʰesvelni simɣeritʰ moimkian 
midis da tiris mtʰesveli tʰeslisa modis da simɣeritʰ moakʰvs tʰavisi dznebi 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa solomonisa sadatsʰ upʰali ar aaʃenebs saxls ikʰ amaod ɡairdʒebian misi mʃeneblebi sadatsʰ upʰali ar daitsʰavs kʰalakʰs ikʰ amaod pʰxizlobs ɡuʃaɡi 
amaod dɡebitʰ adrian da camtʰ cmunvis purs radɡan dzils anicebs tʰavis saqvarels 
aha memkvidreoba upʰlisaɡan ʃvilebi ɡasamrdʒelo mutsʰlis naqopʰi 
roɡortsʰ isrebi meomris xelʃi isea axalɡazrda tʰaoba 
netaria katsʰi romelmatsʰ ɡaivso kaparci matʰitʰ ar ʃertsʰxveba rotsʰa laparaki mouxdeba mtrebtʰan karibceʃi 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa netaria qoveli romelsatsʰ eʃinia upʰlisa da iareba misi ɡzebitʰ 
ʃeni xelebis naqopʰs tʰu cam netareba ʃen da siketʰe ʃen 
tsʰoli ʃeni vitʰartsʰa vazi msxmoiare ʃeni saxlis kideebʃi ʃeni ʃvilebi vitʰartsʰa zetʰisxilis nortʃi xeebi ʃeni supʰris ɡarʃemo 
ʃexede ase miiɣebs kurtʰxevas katsʰi moʃiʃi upʰlisa 
ɡakurtʰxos ʃenma upʰalma sionidan da ixile siketʰe ierusalimisa mtʰeli ʃeni sitsʰotsʰxle 
ixile ʃvilni ʃviltʰa ʃentʰani mʃvidoba israels 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa mravalɡzis mavitsroebdnen tʃemi qrmobidan tʰkʰvas israelma 
mravalɡzis mavitsroebdnen tʃemi qrmobidan maintsʰ ver mdzlies 
tʃems zurɡze xnavdnen mxvnelebi da ɡahqavdatʰ ɡrdzeli kvlebi 
upʰali samartʰliania daamsxvria xundebi borottʰa 
ʃertsʰxvebian da ukuikʰtsʰevian qovelni modzuleni sionisa 
ikʰnebian vitʰartsʰa erdos balaxi romelitsʰ motsqvetamde xmeba 
romlitʰatsʰ ver aivsebs peʃvs momkeli da iɣlias dznis ʃemkvreli 
da ar etqvian ɡamvlelni kurtʰxeva upʰlisa tʰkʰven ɡakurtʰxebtʰ tʰkʰven upʰlis saxelitʰ 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa siɣrmeebidan moɡixmob ʃen upʰalo 
upʰalo ismine tʃemi xma mzad iqvnen ʃeni qurebi tʃemi vedrebis xmis mosasmenad 
tʰu tsʰodvebs ʃemoɡvinaxav upʰalo vin daɡidɡeba 
maɡram ʃens mier aris ʃendoba ratʰa ɡekrdzalon 
meimedeba upʰali esavs tʃemi suli da mis sitqvas velodebi 
suli tʃemi elodeba upʰals upʰro metad vidre ɡuʃaɡni dilas upʰro metad vidre ɡuʃaɡni dilas 
esavdes israeli upʰals radɡan upʰaltʰan aris tsqaloba da uxvia daxsna mismieri 
da is daixsnis israels qoveltʰa tsʰodvatʰaɡan mistʰa 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa davitʰisa upʰalo ar ɡavdidɡulebulvar da tʰvalni maɣla ar amitsevia da artsʰ mivlia ɡandidebisa da tʃemtʰvis miutsvdomlisaken 
aramed vatsqnarebdi da vaqutʃebdi tʃems suls vitʰ dedis dzudzudan motsqvetil qrmas vitʰartsʰa dzudzus motsqvetili qrma isea tʃemʃi tʃemi suli 
esavdes israeli upʰals amieridan ukunisamde 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa ɡauxsene davitʰs upʰalo qoveli urva misi 
roɡortsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa upʰals aɣtʰkʰma daudo iakobis dzliers 
ar aval tʃems satsol saretsʰelze 
ar mivtsʰem dzils tʃems tʰvalebs da ruls tʃems tsamtsamebs 
vidre ar vipovide adɡils upʰlisatʰvis sadɡomebs iakobis dzlierisatʰvis 
aha ɡvesma masze rom epʰratʰaʃia vipovetʰ iɡi iaqaris velze 
mividetʰ mis sadɡomʃi tʰaqvani vtsʰetʰ mis pʰerxtʰa saqrdens 
aɣsdekʰ upʰalo ɡansasveneblad ʃenda ʃena da kidobani ʃeni dzlierebisa 
ʃeni mɣvdelni ʃeimoson simartʰlitʰ da ʃenma tsmidebma imxiarulon 
ʃeni mortʃilis davitʰis ɡulisatʰvis nu ukuaɡdeb ʃeni tsʰxebulis saxes 
ʃehpʰitsʰa upʰalma davitʰs ceʃmaritad ar ɡadauxvevs misɡan naqopʰisaɡan ʃeni mutsʰlisa davsvam ʃens taxtze 
tʰu daitsʰaven ʃeni dzeni tʃems aɣtʰkʰmas da tʃems motsmobebs romeltʰatsʰ vastsavli matʰ matʰi ʃvilebitsʰ ukunisamde dasxdebian ʃens taxtze 
radɡan amoirtʃia upʰalma sioni isurva samkvidreblad tʰavistʰvis 
es aris tʃemi ɡansasvenebeli ukunisamde akʰ davsaxldebi radɡan visurve iɡi 
sazrdos misas kurtʰxevitʰ vakurtʰxeb mis ɣaribebs ɡavadzɣeb puritʰ 
mis ɣvtʰismsaxurtʰ ʃevmosav ʃetsevnitʰ da tsmidebi misni sixarulitʰ ɡaixareben 
akʰ aɣmovatsʰeneb davitʰis rkʰas ɡavamzadeb sinatʰles tʃemi tsʰxebulisatʰvis 
mis mtrebs ʃevmosav sirtsʰxvilitʰ da masze ibrətsqinebs ɡvirɡvini misi 
ɡaloba aɣsavaltʰa davitʰisa aha ra karɡia da ra saamuria ertʰad rom tsʰxovroben dzmebi 
roɡortsʰ dzvirpʰasi zetʰi tʰavze tsverebze rom tʃamostsvetʰs misi samosis kaltʰebze rom tʃamostsvetʰs 
vitʰartsʰa tsʰvari xermonisa sionis mtʰaze tsamosuli radɡan ikʰ daadɡina upʰalma kurtʰxeva sitsʰotsʰxle ukunisamde 
simɣera aɣsavaltʰa aha adidetʰ upʰali qovelno msaxurno upʰlisa romelnitsʰ upʰlis saxlʃi dɡaxartʰ ɣamɣamobitʰ 
aɣapqaritʰ xelni tʰkʰvenni satsmidrisaken da adidetʰ upʰali 
ɡakurtʰxos sionidan upʰalma tsʰisa da kʰveqnis ʃemokʰmedma 
aleluia adidetʰ saxeli upʰlisa adidetʰ mortʃilno upʰlisa 
romelnitsʰ dɡaxartʰ upʰlis saxlʃi ezoebʃi tʃveni ɣmertʰis saxlisa 
adidetʰ upʰali radɡan ketʰilia upʰali uɡalobetʰ mis saxels radɡan sasurvelia 
radɡan iakobi amoirtʃia tʰavistʰvis upʰalma israeli tʰavis tsartʃinebulad 
radɡan vitsʰodi rom didia upʰali da upʰali tʃveni qvela ɣmertʰze didia 
qovelive ratsʰ surda moimokʰmeda upʰalma tsʰaʃi da kʰveqanaze zɣvebze da qovel upʰskrulʃi 
amohqavs ɣrublebi kʰveqnis kiditʰ kidemde elvebs tsvimad akʰtsʰevs ɡamohqavs kʰari tʰavisi satsʰavebidan 
man mosra pirmʃo eɡviptisa adamianidan pirutqvamde 
moavlina niʃnebi da sastsaulebi pʰaraonisa da mis msaxuretʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
man mosra mravali tʰesl tomi da daxotsʰa dzlieri mepʰeni 
sixoni mepʰe amoreveltʰa qoɡi mepʰe baʃanisa da qvela mepʰe kʰanaanisa 
da mistsʰa matʰi kʰveqana samkvidrod samkvidrod israels tʰavis ers 
upʰalo ʃeni saxeli maradiulia upʰalo ʃeni saxsenebeli tʰaobidan tʰaobamdea 
radɡan ɡanikitʰxavs upʰali tʰavis ers da tʰavis mortʃiltʰ ʃeivrdomebs 
tsarmartʰtʰa kerpebi vertsʰxli da okʰroa adamianis naxelavi 
piri akʰvtʰ da ver laparakoben tʰvalebi akʰvtʰ da ver xedaven 
qurebi akʰvtʰ da ver ismenen artsʰa akʰvtʰ suntʰkʰva matʰ pirebs 
matʰi msɡavsni ikʰnebian matʰi ɡamketʰeblebi qvela vintsʰ matʰzea mindobili 
israelis saxlo akurtʰxe upʰali aaronis saxlo akurtʰxe upʰali 
levis saxlo akurtʰxe upʰali upʰlis moʃiʃno akurtʰxetʰ upʰali 
kurtʰxeulia upʰali sionidan damkvidrebuli ierusalimʃi aleluia 
adidetʰ upʰali radɡan ketʰilia radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
adidetʰ ɣmertʰi ɣmertʰtʰa radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
adidetʰ upʰali upʰaltʰa radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
martodmarto mokʰmedi did saotsʰrebatʰa radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
tsʰatʰa ʃemkʰmneli ɡonierebitʰ radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
dedamitsis ɡanmvrtsʰobi tsqlebze radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
ʃemkʰmneli didi mnatʰobebisa radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
mzisa samartʰavad dɣisa radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
mtʰvaris da varskvlavebisa ɣamis samartʰavad radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
romelmatsʰ ɡanɡmira eɡviptelni tʰaviantʰi pirmʃoebitʰurtʰ radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
da ɡamoiqvana israeli matʰi ʃuaɡulidan radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
xelitʰ dzlieritʰ da mklavitʰ ʃemartʰulitʰ radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
romelmatsʰ ɡaapo metsamuli zɣva orad radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
da ɡaiqvana israeli mis ʃuaɡulʃi radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
da tʃaɣupa pʰaraoni da misi dʒari metsamul zɣvaʃi radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
romelmatsʰ tsaiqvana tʰvisi xalxi udabnoʃi radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
romelmatsʰ ɡanɡmira mepʰeni didni radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
da daxotsʰa mepʰeni dzlierni radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
sixoni mepʰe amoreveltʰa radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
qoɡi mepʰe baʃanisa radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
da mistsʰa matʰi kʰveqana samkvidreblad radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
samkvidreblad israels tʰavis mortʃils radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
romelmatsʰ tʃveni damtsʰirebis ʒams ɡaɡvixsena radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
da ɡvixsna tʃveni mtrebisaɡan radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
romelitsʰ adzlevs purs qovel xortsʰiels radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
adidetʰ tsʰatʰa ɣmertʰi radɡan ukunisamdea tsqaloba misi 
babilonis mdinarebtʰan visxeditʰ da vtiroditʰ rodesatsʰ viɡonebditʰ sions 
dzetsnatʰa zeda ikʰ rom dɡanan tʃamovkidetʰ tʃveni kʰnarebi 
radɡan ikʰ moɡvtʰxoves tʃvenma da tʃvenma mtʃaɡvrelebma simxiarule ɡvimɣeretʰ simɣera sionisa 
roɡor unda ɡvemɣera simɣera upʰlisa utsʰxo mitsaze 
tʰu daɡivitsqo ʃen ierusalimo damivitsqos mardʒvenam tʃemma 
miekras tʃemi ena tʃems sasas tʰu ar ɡaɡixseno tʰu ierusalimi ar davaqeno tʃemi mxiarulebis satʰaveʃi 
ɡauxsene upʰalo edomis ʃvilebs dɣe ierusalimisa rotsʰa ambobdnen daanɡrietʰ daanɡrietʰ is dzirisdziramde 
asulo babilonisa ɡampartaxebelo netar ars romelman moɡizɣos ratsʰ tʃven moɡvatsie 
netaria romelmatsʰ ʃeipqros tʃvilni ʃenni da mianartsʰxos kldesa 
davitʰisa ɡadideb mtʰeli tʃemi ɡulitʰ ɣmertʰebis tsinaʃe ɡiɡalobeb ʃen 
tʰaqvans vtsʰem ʃens tsmida tadzars da vadideb ʃens saxels ʃeni tsqalobisa da ceʃmaritebis ɡamo radɡan ɡanadide mtʰel 
da romel dɣesatsʰ moɡixmobdi ʃen mpasuxobdi mxneobad mietsʰ tʃems suls sidzliere 
ɡanɡadideben upʰalo qovelni mepʰeni kʰveqnierebisa rotsʰa moismenen ʃens baɡetʰa natʰkʰvams 
da uɡalobeben upʰlis ɡzasavals radɡan 
radɡan maɣalia upʰali da damdablebuls xedavs xolo medidurs ʃoridan ʃeitsʰnobs 
tʰu ɡavivili sapʰrətʰxeʃi ʃen matsʰotsʰxleb tʃemi mtrebis dʒibrze ɡamomitsodeb xels da damixsnis mardʒvena ʃeni 
upʰali tʰavis mizans aɣasrulebs tʃemze upʰalo ʃeni tsqaloba maradiulia ar miatoveb xeltʰa ʃentʰa namokʰmedars 
ɡundis lotbars davitʰis pʰsalmuni upʰalo ɡamomtsʰade da mitsʰnob me 
ʃentʰvis tsʰnobilia rodis vdʒdebi da vdɡebi ɡaɡebuli ɡakʰvs tʃemi zraxvani ʃoridan 
tʃems siarulsa da tʃems tsolas ʃen ɡansazɣvrav da qvela tʃemi ɡza ʃen ɡamoikvlie 
tʰundatsʰ dʒer ar iqos sitqva tʃems enaze ʃen ukve itsʰi upʰalo srulad 
uknidan da tsinidan ɡaremomitsʰavi da dade tʃemze xeli ʃeni 
maotsʰebs roɡor ʃemitsʰan ase maɣalia ver ʃevtsvdebi mas 
saitʰ tsauval ʃens suls da ʃens saxes sad ɡavekʰtsʰevi 
zetsʰaʃi rom avide ʃen ikʰa xar kʰvesknelʃi tʃavide ikʰatsʰ xar ʃen 
pʰrtʰani ɡamovisxa ɡantʰiadisa davsaxlde zɣvis kideze 
ikʰatsʰ ʃeni xeli tsamidzɣveba da ʃemivrdomebs mardʒvena ʃeni 
da vitqvi ikʰneb bnelma dampʰaros da ɣame ikʰnas sinatʰled tʃems irɡvliv 
sibneletsʰ araa tsqvdiadi ʃentʰvis da ɣame dɣesavitʰ ɡanatʰdeba ra sibnele da ra sinatʰle 
radɡan ʃen dabade tʰirkmelni tʃemni ʃen ɡamomdzertse dedatʃemis tsiaɣʃi 
ɡadideb radɡan saotsʰrebitʰ ʃemkʰmeni sakvirvelia sakʰmeni ʃenni da tʃemma sulma itsʰis es savsebitʰ 
ar dapʰarula tʃemi dzvlebi ʃenɡan rotsʰa tʃavisaxe idumalebaʃi ʃevnivtʰdi kʰvesknelʃi 
tʃemi tʃanasaxi ixiles ʃenma tʰvalebma da ʃens tsiɡnʃi tʃatserilia dɣeni momavlisa tʃemisa rotsʰa dʒer ar iqo artsʰ ertʰi matʰɡani 
xolo tʃemtʰvis raoden mravlismtʰkʰmelia raoden didia ritsʰxvi matʰi 
davtʰvalo kʰviʃaze umravlesia ɡaviɣvidzeb da isev ʃentʰan var 
netamtsʰ mosravde ɣmertʰo borots da ɡamʃordebodnen sisxlis msmelebi 
avs rom ubnoben ʃenze da borotad sarɡebloben ʃeni saxelitʰ 
ar unda movidzulo upʰalo ʃeni modzuleni da ʃens modaveebs ar unda vedao 
sruli sidzulvilitʰ movidzule isini da mtrebad mekʰtsʰnen me 
ɡamomtsʰade upʰalo da ʃeitsʰan ɡuli tʃemi ʃemamotsme da ʃeitsʰan azrebi tʃemi 
naxe borotebis ɡzaze xom ar vdɡavar da tsamidzexi maradiul ɡzaze 
ɡundis lotbars pʰsalmuni davitʰisa 
mixseni upʰalo boroti adamianisaɡan modzalade katsʰisaɡan damipʰare 
radɡan isini borotebas pʰikʰroben ɡulʃi da qoveldɣe emzadebian saomrad 
moileses enebi vitʰartsʰa ɡvelma aspitis ʃxamia matʰ baɡeebs kʰveʃ 
damitsʰavi upʰalo borottʰa xelidan modzalade katsʰtʰaɡan damipʰare romeltʰatsʰ ɡanizraxes tʃemi nabidʒebis dabrkoleba 
ɡamimzades ampartavnebma maxe da sabeli bade ɡanartʰxes ɡzaze xapʰanɡi damiɡes 
vutʰxari upʰals tʃemi ɣmertʰi xar ʃen ismine upʰalo xma tʃemi vedrebisa 
upʰalo ɣmertʰo tʃemo dzalo tʃemi xsnisa pʰari xar tʃemi tʰavisa brdzolis dɣes 
nu aɣasruleb upʰalo borotis ɡulistsadils mis borot zraxvas nu mistsʰem ɡzas tʰorem aɣzevdeba 
tʰavni tʃemtʰa ɡaremomtsʰveltʰa dapʰaros matʰtʰa baɡetʰa borotebam 
nakvertʃxali daepʰrəkʰvetʰ zemodan tsʰetsʰxlʃi tʃaitanos isini ɣrma ormoʃi rom veɣar tsamodɡnen 
avsitqva katsʰi nu ɡadzlebs kʰveqanaze modzalade katsʰi borotebam moinadiros dzirs dasatsʰemad 
vitsʰi rom ikʰms upʰali da samartʰals upovartʰa 
xolo martʰalni ɡanadideben ʃens saxels da tsrpʰelni daimkvidreben tsinaʃe ʃensa 
pʰsalmuni davitʰisa upʰalo ʃen moɡixmob ɡamoeʃure tʃemsken moismine tʃemi xma raʒams moɡixmob ʃen 
tsarimartʰos tʃemi lotsʰva ʃens tsinaʃe vitʰartsʰa sakmeveli tʃems xeltʰa aɣpqroba iqos saɣamos msxverplad 
dauqene upʰalo ɡuʃaɡi tʃems pirs daitsʰavi baɡeni tʃemni 
ar ɡadaaxvevino tʃems ɡuls avi sitqvisaken borot sakʰmetʰa tʃasadenad urdʒulo katsʰebtʰan ertʰad da nu viɡemeb matʰi supʰridan 
dae damsadʒos martʰalma es tsqalobaa dae mamxilos ar avnebs tʃems tʰavs 
daimsxvrnen kldis kʰimebze msadʒulni matʰni da moismenen tʃems sitqvas radɡan sasurvelia 
roɡortsʰ daletsili tsiskʰvilis kʰva mitsaze ise ɡaibneva tʃveni dzvlebi tʃveni ʃeolis qbaʃi 
radɡan ʃenskenaa upʰalo ɣmertʰo tʃemo tʰvali tʃemi ʃen ɡesav nu daakʰtsʰev tʃems suls 
damitsʰavi maxisaɡan romelitsʰ damiɡes da urdʒulotʰa xapʰanɡtʰaɡan 
ɡaeban tʰaviantʰ badeebʃi borotni ertʰianad vidre me ɡavivlide 
modzɣvreba davitʰisa misi mɣvimeʃi qopʰnis dros lotsʰva tʃemi xmitʰ upʰals ʃevɣaɣadeb tʃemi xmitʰ upʰals ʃevevedrebi 
ɡadmovɣvri mis tsinaʃe tʃems ɡulisnadebs tʃems ɡasacirs mis tsinaʃe vilaparaeb 
rotsʰa tʃems ʃiɡnitʰ ʃetsuxebulia suli tʃemi ɡzaze romlitʰatsʰ davdivar damiɡes maxe 
vimzirebi mardʒvniv da vxedav rom aravin mtsʰnobs me aɣar arsebobs xsna tʃemtʰvis aravin zrunavs tʃems sulze 
amitom moɡixme ʃen upʰalo da vtʰkʰvi ʃen xar tʃemi xvedri tsʰotsʰxaltʰa kʰveqanaʃi 
quri miuɡde tʃems ɣaɣadiss radɡan davmdabldi pʰriad mixseni tʃemtʰa mdevneltʰaɡan vinaidan tʃemze dzlierni ɡaxdnen 
ɡamoiqvane sapqrobilidan suli tʃemi ratʰa vadido saxeli ʃeni ɡars ʃemomexvevian martʰalni tʰu ketʰils momaɡeb 
pʰsalmuni davitʰisa upʰalo ismine lotsʰva tʃemi qurad iɣe tʃemi vedreba mipasuxe ʃeni ceʃmaritebitʰ ʃeni simartʰlitʰ 
da nu ʃexval samartʰalʃi ʃens mortʃiltʰan radɡan ver ɡamartʰldeba ʃens tsinaʃe vertsʰertʰi arseba 
radɡan devna mterma tʃemi suli mitsaze daanartsʰxa tʃemi sitsʰotsʰxle damsva bneletʰʃi didi xnis mkvdrebis msɡavsad 
da ʃetsuxda tʃemze suli tʃemi tʃems ʃiɡnitʰ danaɣvlianda ɡuli tʃemi 
vixseneb adrindel dɣeebs vpʰikʰrob qovel ʃens namokʰmedarze ʃeni xelis nasakʰmarze visaubreb 
vitsvdi xelebs ʃensken tʃems suls vitʰartsʰa mitsas ɡamopʰituls mostsqurdi ʃen 
stsrapʰad mipasuxe upʰalo suli tʃemi ɡailia nu dapʰarav ʃens saxes tʃemɡan tʰorem davemɡvanebi sapʰlavʃi tʃasulebs 
momasmenine dildilobitʰ ʃeni tsqaloba radɡanatsʰ ʃenitʰ vimedovneb mautsqe romeli ɡzitʰ viaro radɡan ʃensken aɣvapqar suli tʃemi 
ɡadamartʃine mtertʰa tʃemtʰaɡan upʰalo ʃentʰan vapʰareb tʰavs 
mastsavle ʃesruleba ʃeni nebisa radɡan ʃen tʃemi ɣmertʰi xar ʃeni ketʰili suli tsamidzɣves simartʰlis kʰveqanaʃi 
ʃeni saxelis ɡulisatʰvis matsʰotsʰxle upʰalo ʃeni simartʰlitʰ ɡamoiqvane ɡacirvebidan tʃemi suli 
da ʃeni tsqalobitʰ mospe tʃemi mtrebi da daɣupe qoveli mtʃaɡvreli tʃemi sulisa radɡan me mortʃili var ʃeni 
davitʰisa kurtʰxeul ars upʰali klde tʃemi romelmatsʰ astsavla tʃems xelebs brdzola tʃems tʰitʰebs omi 
mtsqalobelo tʃemo da simaɡrev tʃemo mtsʰvelo tʃemo da mxsnelo tʃemo tʃemi pʰari xar romelitsʰ mipʰaravs is mimortʃilebs tʃems ers 
upʰalo ra aris katsʰi rom ɡaxsovs is dze adamisa rom ramed miitʃnev 
adamiani hɡavs amaoebas misi dɣeebi vitʰartsʰa tʃrdili ɡardasuli 
upʰalo modrike tsʰani ʃenni da ɡadmodi ʃeexe mtʰebs rom akvamldnen 
ɡamoaelve elvani da ɡapʰante isini ɡamouʃvi isarni ʃenni da tʰavzari daetsʰi matʰ 
ɡamoitsode ʃeni xeli maɣlidan mixseni da ɡadamartʃine mraval tsqaltʰaɡan utsʰxo tomtʰa xelidan 
romeltʰa baɡeni tquils laparakoben da romeltʰa mardʒvena sitsʰruis mardʒvenaa 
ɣmertʰo axal ɡalobas ɡiɡalobeb ʃen atʰsimian tʃanɡze ɡiɡalobeb ʃen 
ʃena xar mepʰetʰatʰvis dzlevis mimtsʰemi ʃen ixsni davitʰs ʃens msaxurs mixseni me boroti maxvilisaɡan 
ɡadamartʃine utsʰxotʰesltʰa xelidan romeltʰa baɡeni tquils laparakoben da romeltʰa mardʒvena sitsʰruis mardʒvenaa 
rom tʃveni dzeni nerɡebivitʰ izrdebodnen matʰs sicabukeʃi tʃveni asulni vitʰartsʰa sasaxlis ostaturad tʰlili svetebi 
tʃveni beɣlebi savse iqos sxvadasxva mosavlitʰ tsʰxvarni tʃvenni atʰasobdnen da atʰiatʰasobdnen tʃvens sadzovrebze 
tʃveni xarebi datvirtʰulni iqvnen artsʰ zarali da artsʰ danaklisi da artsʰ ɡodeba tʃvens kʰutʃebʃi 
netar ars xalxi romlistʰvisatsʰ asea netar ars xalxi romlis ɣmertʰitsʰ upʰalia 
xotba davitʰisa aɣɡamaɣleb ʃen tʃemo ɣmertʰo da mepʰeo da vakurtʰxeb ʃens saxels ukunitʰi ukunisamde 
qoveldɣe ɡakurtʰxeb ʃen da vadideb ʃens saxels ukunitʰi ukunisamde 
didia upʰali da kʰebulia pʰriad da misi sidiade miutsvdomelia 
tʰaoba tʰaobas ukʰebs ʃens sakʰmeebs da ʃens sidzliereze moutʰxroben 
ʃens didmʃvenierebaze ʃens didebaze ʃens saotsʰar sakʰmeebze vilaparakeb 
ʃentʰa saʃiʃroebatʰa sidzlieres itqvian xolo me ʃens sidiadeze vilaparakeb 
xsenebas ʃeni mravali siketʰisas ɡamotʰkʰvamen da ʃens simartʰles umɣereben 
ɡulmotsqale da ʃembralea upʰali sulɡrdzeli da didad motsqale 
karɡia upʰali qvelas mimartʰ da misi tsqalobaa qvela mis namokʰmedarze 
ɡadidebdes ʃen upʰalo qvela ʃeni namokʰmedari da ʃeni ubitsoni ɡadideben ʃen 
ʃeni mepʰobis didebas itqvian da ʃens sidzliereze ilaparakeben 
ratʰa atsʰnobon adamis dzetʰ ʃeni sidzliere da brətsqinvale dideba ʃeni mepʰobisa 
ʃeni mepʰoba mepʰoba qvela saukunisa da ʃeni batonoba tʰaobebʃi 
upʰali ʃemtsea qvela datsʰemulisa da ɡammartʰavi qvela tselʃi moxrilisa 
qvelas tʰvalebi ʃen ʃemoɡtsʰkʰerian da ʃen adzlev matʰ sazrdos tʰavis droze 
aɣapqrob ʃens xels da daakmaqopʰileb qovel suldɡmuls 
martʰalia upʰali qvela tʰavis ɡzaze da motsqalea qvela tʰavis sakʰmeʃi 
axlosaa upʰali qvela mis mlotsʰveltʰan qoveltʰan vintsʰ mas mouxmobs ceʃmaritebitʰ 
mis moʃiʃtʰa survils ʃeasrulebs da matʰs ɣaɣadiss moismens da uʃvelis matʰ 
itsʰavs upʰali qvela mis moqvaruls da qvela borots mospobs 
xotbas upʰlisas ilaparakebs piri tʃemi da akʰebs qoveli xortsʰieli ukunitʰi ukunisamde 
aleluia adide sulo tʃemo upʰali 
vadideb upʰals mtʰeli sitsʰotsʰxle vuɡalobeb tʃems ɣmertʰs vidre varsebob 
imeds nu daamqarebtʰ mtʰavrebze adamis dzeze romelsatsʰ ar ʃeudzlia ʃvela 
amouva suli daubrundeba tʰavis mitsas imave dɣes ɡakʰreba misi azrebi 
netar ars visi ʃemtsetsʰaa ɣmertʰi iakobisa vintsʰ daimedebulia upʰal ɣmertʰze 
romelmatsʰ ʃekʰmna tsʰa da mitsa zɣva da qovelive ratsʰ masʃia romelitsʰ itsʰavs ceʃmaritebas ukunisamde 
ikʰms samartʰals tʃaɡrultʰatʰvis adzlevs purs damʃeulebs upʰali atʰavisupʰlebs borkilɡaqrilebs 
upʰali tʰvals uxels brmebs upʰali martʰavs tselmodrekilebs upʰals uqvars martʰalni 
upʰali itsʰavs ʃemoxiznulebs kʰvriv oblebs ɡaamxnevebs da bororttʰa mrude ɡzebitʰ atarebs 
imepʰebs upʰali ukunisamde ɣmertʰi ʃeni aleluia 
adidetʰ upʰali radɡan karɡia ɡandideba tʃveni upʰlisa radɡan sasurvelia ʃeʃvenis kʰeba dideba 
aaʃenebs ierusalims upʰali ɡandevnilebs israelisas ʃemokrebs 
ɡankurnavs ɡulɡatexilebs da crilobebs ʃeuxvevs matʰ 
iɡi tʰvlis varskvlavtʰa ritsʰxvs qvelas tʰavis saxels utsodebs 
didia upʰali da diddzalovani misi ɡoniereba ɡanuzomelia 
ɡaamxnevebs mortʃilebs upʰali boroteulebs daamdablebs mitsamde 
ɡaexmianetʰ upʰals madlobis ɡalobitʰ uɡalobetʰ tʃvens ɣmertʰs kʰnaritʰ 
romelitsʰ pʰaravs tsʰas ɣrublebitʰ amzadebs dedamitsisatʰvis tsvimas aɣmoatsʰenebs mtʰebʃi balaxs 
adzlevs pirutqvs tʰavis sazrdos qornis baxalebs romelnitsʰ mouxmoben mas 
artsʰ tsʰxenis dzlierebas isurvebs artsʰ katsʰis muxlmaɡrobas inebebs 
isurvebs upʰali tʰavis moʃiʃebs misi tsqalobis moimedeebs 
akʰe ierusalimo upʰali adide ʃeni ɣmertʰi siono 
radɡan ɡaamaɡra urdulebi ʃeni ciʃkrebis akurtʰxa dzeni ʃenni ʃentʰan 
daamkvidrebs ʃens sazɣvrebze mʃvidobas xorblis quatʰitʰ daɡamadzɣrisebs 
iɡi tsarmoavlens tʰavis sitqvas dedamitsaze stsrapʰad rbis brdzaneba misi 
tsarmoɡzavnis tʰovls matqlivitʰ tʰrətʰvils pʰerpʰlad mimopʰantavs 
ɡadmouʃvebs setqvas puris natexebivitʰ mis susxs vin daudɡeba tsin 
moavlens tʰavis sitqvas da daadnobs matʰ dauberavs kʰars da ɡadmodindeba 
amtsʰno tʰavisi sitqva iakobs tsesebi da samartʰalni tʰvisni israels 
ar ukʰnia es artsʰ ertʰi sxva erisatʰvis da misi samartʰalni ar itsʰian matʰ aleluia 
aleluia adidetʰ upʰali zetsʰidan adidetʰ iɡi simaɣleebʃi 
adidetʰ iɡi qovelno anɡelozno misno adidetʰ iɡi qovelno dzalno misno 
adidetʰ iɡi mzeo da mtʰvarev adidetʰ iɡi qovelno ʃukʰurvarskvlavno 
adidetʰ iɡi tsʰano tsʰatʰano da misno tsqlebo romelnitsʰ tsʰatʰa zemotʰ xartʰ 
adidon saxeli upʰlisa radɡan man brdzana da ʃeikʰmnen 
da daaqena isini ukunitʰi ukunisamde rdʒuli mistsʰa da aravin ɡadauxvevs 
adidetʰ upʰali dedamitsidan veʃapno da qovelno upʰskrulno 
tsʰetsʰxlo da setqvav tʰovlo da nislo kʰarbukʰo misi sitqvis ʃemsrulebelo 
mtʰano da qovelno bortsʰvno msxmoiare xev da qovelno kedarno 
mxetsʰno da qovelno pirutqvno kʰvetsarmavalno da pʰrinvelno pʰrtʰosanno 
mepʰeno kʰveqanisa da qovelno tomno mtʰavarno da qovelno msadʒulno kʰveqanisa 
cabukno da tʰkʰventsʰ kʰaltsulno moxutsʰno qmatsvilebtʰan ertʰad 
adidetʰ saxeli upʰlisa radɡan mxolod misi saxelia amaɣlebuli misi sidiadea kʰveqnad da tsʰaʃi 
da moamaɣla rkʰa tʰavisi erisa dideba qoveli misi tsmidisa dzetʰa israelisa mastʰan daaxloebuli erisa aleluia 
aleluia uɡalobetʰ upʰals ɡaloba axali misi dideba tsmidatʰa krebulʃi 
ixarebdes israeli tʰavisi ʃemokʰmeditʰ dzeni sionisa zeimobdnen tʰaviantʰi mepʰitʰ 
ɡanadidon misi saxeli rokvitʰ dapʰitʰ da kʰnaritʰ uɡalobon mas 
radɡan isurvebs upʰali tʰavis ers daamʃvenebs tʰavmdablebs ʃetsevnitʰ 
imxiarulon tsmidebma ɣirsebitʰ iɣaɣadon tʰaviantʰ saretsʰlebze 
ɣmertʰis ɡandideba matʰs xorxʃi da maxvili orpirlesuli matʰ xelʃia 
ratʰa ʃuri idzion erebze dasadʒon tomebi 
ʃekran matʰi mepʰeni borkilebitʰ da didebulni matʰni rkinis xundebitʰ 
ɡanumzadon matʰ samartʰali datserili didebaa is qvela misi tsmidisatʰvis aleluia 
aleluia adidetʰ ɣmertʰi tʰavis satsmidarʃi adidetʰ iɡi misi dzlierebis mqarʃi 
adidetʰ iɡi misi dzlierebitʰ adidetʰ iɡi misi sidiadis mravalɡvarobitʰ 
adidetʰ iɡi bukis tsʰemitʰ adidetʰ iɡi tʃanɡitʰ da kʰnaritʰ 
adidetʰ iɡi dapʰitʰ da rokvitʰ adidetʰ iɡi ebnitʰ da stviritʰ 
adidetʰ iɡi tkbilxmovani tsintsilebitʰ adidetʰ iɡi maɣalxmovani tsintsilebitʰ 
qovelma suldɡmulma adidos upʰali aleluia 
iɡavni solomonisa dzisa davitʰisa israelis mepʰisa 
ʃesatsʰnobad sibrədznisa da ʃeɡonebisa ɡasaɡebad ɡonebis natʰkʰvamisa 
misaɣebad ckuis ʃeɡonebisa simartʰlisa samartʰlisa da samartʰlianobisa 
misatsʰemad briqvtʰatʰvis ɡonierebisa qmatsviltʰatʰvis tsʰodnisa da ɡansdʒisa 
moismens brdzeni da ʃeimatebs stsavlas da ɡonieri sibrədznes ʃeidzens 
ɡasaɡebad iɡavisa da kʰaraɡmisa da brdzentʰa sitqvebisa da ɡamotsʰanebisa 
upʰlis ʃiʃi tsʰodnis satʰavea sibrədzne da dariɡeba ki briqvebs ezizɣebatʰ 
ismine ʃvilo tʃemo mamaʃenis dariɡeba da dedaʃenis stsavlebas nu miatoveb 
radɡan es mʃvenieri ɡvirɡvinia ʃens tʰavze maniaki ʃens qelze 
tʃemo ʃvilo tʰu tsʰodvilni ɡatsʰtʰuneben nu datʰanxmdebi 
tʰu ɡetqvian tsamodi tʃventʰan tʃavusapʰrdetʰ sisxlis saɣvrelad umizezod davudaradʒdetʰ udanaʃaulos 
tʃavqlapotʰ isini roɡortsʰ ʃavetʰma tsʰotsʰxlad da mrtʰelad sapʰlavʃi tʃamavaltʰ msɡavsad 
qovelɡvar dzvirpʰas kʰonebas moixvectʰ tʃvens saxlebs nadavlitʰ ɡavavsebtʰ 
qare ʃeni tsili tʃventʰan ertʰad ertʰi kʰisa ɡvekʰneba tʃven qvelas 
tʃemo ʃvilo nu ivli matʰtʰan ɡzaze ʃeakave ʃeni pʰexi matʰi savalidan 
radɡan matʰi pʰexebi borotisaken ɡarbian da sisxlis saɣvrelad istsrapʰian 
radɡan amaod ipʰineba bade romelime pʰrtʰosanis tʰvalʃi 
isini ki tʰaviantʰ sisxls usapʰrdebian tʰaviantʰ sulebs udaradʒdebian 
asetʰia ɡzani qvela xarbi momxveclisa sitsʰotsʰxles artʰmevs iɡi mis patrons 
sibrədzne kʰutʃaʃi ʃemosdzaxebs moednebze ɡamostsʰems tʰavis xmas 
xalxmraval adɡilebʃi ɣaɣadebs iɡi karibcis zɣurblze kʰalakʰʃi ambobs is tʰavis satʰkʰmels 
rodemde eqvarebatʰ briqvebs sibriqve tʰavkʰarianni masxarobitʰ datkbebian xolo sulelebs edzulebatʰ tsʰodna 
miubrunditʰ tʃems ʃeɡonebas ɡamoɡitʰkʰvamtʰ tʃems ɡulistʰkʰmas ɡautsqebtʰ tʃems sitqvebs 
radɡanatsʰ ɡixmobditʰ me tʰkʰven ki qurs ar atʰxovebditʰ ɡitsvditʰ xels maɡram ar iqo ʃemsmeneli 
da uɡulebel hqavitʰ qvela tʃemi rtʃeva da tʃemi ʃeɡoneba ar indometʰ 
metsʰ tʰkʰvens ubedurebaze ɡavitsʰineb daɡtsʰinebtʰ tʰkʰven ʃiʃis moɡvrisas 
rodesatsʰ ɡetsevatʰ ʃiʃi roɡortsʰ kʰariʃxali da tʰkʰveni ubedureba ɡriɡalivitʰ mova rodesatsʰ ɡetsevatʰ tʰkʰven ubedureba da ɡacirveba 
maʃin momixmoben me da ar vupasuxeb damitsqeben dzebnas maɡram ver mpoveben 
imis tsil rom sdzuldatʰ tsʰodna da upʰlis ʃiʃi ar amoirtʃies 
ar indomes tʃemi rtʃeva moidzules tʃemi qvela ʃeɡoneba 
da iɡemeben tʰaviantʰi ɡzis naqopʰs da tʰaviantʰi boroti ɡanzraxvebitʰ ɡadzɣebian 
radɡan ɡulubrəqviloebs matʰi ɡandɡoma moklavs da briqvebs matʰi kmaqopʰileba mospobs 
maɡram vintsʰ momismens mʃvidad itsʰxovrebs da damʃvidebuls borotis ʃiʃi aɣar ekʰneba 
ʃvilo tʃemo tʰu miiɣeb tʃems natʰkʰvams da tʃems mtsʰnebebs ʃeinaxav 
quradɣebitʰ mousmen sibrədznes ʃens ɡuls mouxri ɡonierebas 
radɡan tʰu ɡonebas mouxmob sazrianobas mistsʰem ʃens xmas 
tʰu modzebni mas roɡortsʰ vertsʰxls da monaxav mas roɡortsʰ saundʒes 
maʃin ɡaiɡeb upʰlis ʃiʃsa da upʰlis ʃetsʰnobas hpoveb 
radɡan upʰali idzleva sibrədznes misɡanaa tsʰodna da ɡoniereba 
ʃeunaxavs mosazrebulobas patiosantʰ is pʰaria ubitsod mavaltʰatʰvis 
ratʰa daitsʰvas samartʰlis ɡzebi da tsmidatʰa bilikebs ɡaupʰrətʰxildes 
maʃin ɡaiɡeb samartʰlianobas da samartʰals da patiosnebas siketʰis qvela biliks 
rodesatsʰ ʃeva sibrədzne ʃens ɡulʃi da tsʰodna eameba ʃens suls 
ɡansdʒa ʃeɡinaxavs ʃen da sazrianoba daɡitsʰavs 
ratʰa ɡixsnas boroti ɡzidan ukuɣmartʰad moubari katsʰisaɡan 
matʰɡan romelnitsʰ toveben stsor ɡzebs ratʰa iaron bneli ɡzitʰ 
romelnitsʰ xaroben borotis kʰmnitʰ ilxenen boroti ukuɣmartʰobitʰ 
romeltʰa ɡzebi mrudea da ukuɣmartʰoben tʰaviantʰ bilikebze 
rom ɡixsnas utsʰxo kʰalisaɡan utsʰxotomelisaɡan romlis natʰkʰvamitsʰ lakʰardiania 
romelmatsʰ datova tʰavisi siqmatsvilis meɡobari da tʰavisi ɣmertʰis aɣtʰkʰma daivitsqa 
radɡan mis saxls sikvdilisaken mihqavs da mis bilikebs mkvdrebisken 
artsʰ ertʰi mastʰan ʃemsvleli ukan ar brundeba da veɣar hpoveben sitsʰotsʰxlis ɡzebs 
ratʰa iaro ketʰiltʰa ɡzitʰ da martʰlis bilikebi ʃeinaxo 
radɡan tsrpʰelni kʰveqnad itsʰxovreben da ubitsoni dartʃebian masʃi 
borotni ki kʰveqnidan moikvetʰebian da moɣalateni aɣmoipʰxvrebian misɡan 
ʃvilo tʃemo tʃems rdʒuls nu daivitsqeb da tʃemi mtsʰnebani daitsʰvas ʃenma ɡulma 
radɡan dɣeɡrdzelobas da tsʰxovrebis tslebs da mʃvidobas ʃeɡmateben ʃen 
tsqaloba da ceʃmariteba nu daɡtovebs ʃeibi isini qelze daitsere ʃeni ɡulis pʰitsʰarze 
da moipoveb madls da ketʰil ɡaɡebas ɣvtʰisa da adamianis tʰvalʃi 
daende upʰals mtʰeli ʃeni ɡulitʰ da ʃens ɡonebas nu daeqrədnobi 
qvela ʃens ɡzaze ʃeitsʰani iɡi da is ɡaastsorebs ʃens bilikebs 
nu ikʰnebi brdzeni ʃens tʰvalʃi ɡeʃinodes upʰlis da ukuikʰetsʰ borotebisaɡan 
kurneba ikʰneba es ʃeni sxeulistʰvis da ɡamaɡrilebeli ʃeni dzvlebisa 
pativi miaɡe upʰals ʃeni kʰonebidan da mtʰeli ʃeni cirnaxulis pirvelnaqopʰidan 
da ɡaivseba ʃeni beɣlebi mosavlitʰ da macari ʃeni satsnaxelidan ɡadmova 
upʰlis dariɡebas ʃvilo tʃemo nu ʃeizizɣeb da misi ʃeɡoneba nu moɡdzuldeba 
vintsʰ uqvars upʰals imas dasdʒis roɡortsʰ mama ʃvils tʰavis sakʰebars 
netaria adamiani sibrədznis mpovneli da adamiani ckuis momxveceli 
radɡan misi sazɣauri vertsʰxlis sazɣaurs sdʒobs da misi mosavali tsmida okʰros 
is marɡalitebze dzvirpʰasia da aranairi ʃeni satsadeli ar ʃeedreba mas 
dɣeɡrdzeloba mis mardʒvenaʃia mis martsʰxenaʃi simdidre da pativi 
misi ɡzebi saamuri ɡzebia da misi qvela biliki mʃvidobaa 
sitsʰotsʰxlis xea is matʰtʰvis vintsʰ ecideba mas da mas mindobilni netarni arian 
upʰalma sibrədznitʰ daapʰudzna dedamitsa ɡonebitʰ ɡanamtkitsʰa tsʰa 
tʰavisi tsʰodnitʰ dʒurɣmulebi ɡaipo da ɣrubelni tsʰvars apʰrəkʰveven 
ʃvilo tʃemo nu moʃordeba ʃens tʰvalebs daitsʰavi ɡoniereba da ɡansdʒa 
da ikʰneba isini sitsʰotsʰxle ʃeni sulisatʰvis da samkauli ʃeni qelisatʰvis 
maʃin ivli usapʰrətʰxod ʃens ɡzaze da ʃeni pʰexi ar dabrkoldeba 
rotsʰa datsvebi ar ʃeɡeʃindeba da tkbili ikʰneba ʃeni dzili 
nu ʃeɡeʃindeba uetsʰari ʃiʃisa da boroteulis tʰavdasxmisa rotsʰa mova 
radɡan upʰali ikʰneba ʃeni saqrdeni da daitsʰavs ʃens pʰexs ʃeborkvisaɡan 
nu daucer siketʰes mas visatsʰ erɡeba rodesatsʰ ʃens xels dzaludzs amis ɡaketʰeba 
nu etqvi moqvass tsadi da xval modi da maʃin moɡtsʰem tʰu tʰana ɡakʰvs 
nu ɡanizraxav ʃeni moqvasisatʰvis borots tʰu is dandobilad tsʰxovrobs ʃentʰan 
nu edavebi adamians umizezod tʰu mas borotitʰ ar mouzɣavs ʃentʰvis 
nu ʃeɡʃurdeba modzaladesi da nu amoirtʃev nurtsʰ ertʰs mis ɡzatʰaɡan 
radɡan sisadzaɡlea upʰlis tsinaʃe mrudi tsrpʰelebtʰan ki meɡobrobs iɡi 
upʰlis tsqevlaa bitsieris saxlze xolo martʰaltʰa binas akurtʰxebs iɡi 
tʰu masxarebs amasxaravebs tʰavmdablebs adzlevs iɡi madls 
brdzenni pativs daimkvidreben xolo briqvni damtsʰirebas miiɣeben 
isminetʰ ʃvilebo mamis dariɡeba quri dauɡdetʰ sibrədznis ʃesatsʰnobad 
radɡan karɡi ʃeɡoneba moɡetsʰitʰ tʰkʰven tʃems modzɣvrebas nu ɡanaɡdebtʰ 
radɡan metsʰ ʃvili viqavi mamatʃemisa satʰutʰi da ertʰadertʰi dedis tsinaʃe 
is mastsavlida da meubneboda daikavos ʃenma ɡulma tʃemi sitqvebi ʃeinaxe tʃemi mtsʰnebebi da itsʰotsʰxleb 
ʃeidzine sibrədzne ʃeidzine ɡaɡeba nu daivitsqeb da nu ɡadauxvev tʃems natʰkʰvams 
nu ɡanaɡdeb mas da is ʃeɡinaxavs ʃen ɡiqvardes iɡi da daɡitsʰavs ʃen 
sibrədznis satʰavea sibrədznis ʃedzena mtʰeli ʃeni ʃenadzenitʰ ɡaɡeba ʃeidzine 
ɡanadide iɡi da aɣɡamaɣlebs ʃen pativs ɡtsʰems tʰu ʃemoexvevi mas 
is daɡadɡams tʰavze mʃvenier ɡvirɡvins didebul dʒiɣas moɡidzɣvnis ʃen 
ismine ʃvilo tʃemo da miiɣe tʃemi natʰkʰvami da ɡaɡimravldeba ʃeni sitsʰotsʰxlis tslebi 
me miɡitʰitʰe ʃen sibrədznis ɡzaze tsaɡidzexi stsor bilikze 
ʃeni svlisas ar ʃevitsrovdeba ʃeni nabidʒi da tʰu ɡaikʰtsʰevi ar tsabordzikdebi 
tʃaecide dariɡebas nu ʃeeʃvebi daitsʰavi radɡan ʃeni sitsʰotsʰxlea iɡi 
uketʰurtʰa kvalze nu ivli da borottʰa ɡzas nu daadɡebi 
miatove iɡi nu ɡaivli masze ɡadauxvie misɡan da ɡaiare 
radɡan ar daidzineben isini siborote tʰu ar tʃaidines da dzili ɡaukrtʰebatʰ tʰu ar daabrkoles 
radɡan uketʰurebis purs camen da dzaladobis ɣvinos svamen 
martʰaltʰa kvali ɡantʰiadivitʰaa romelitsʰ upʰro da upʰro dzlierdeba ʃuadɣemde 
uketʰurtʰa ɡza tsqvdiadivitʰaa ar itsʰian raze tsaibordzikeben 
ʃvilo tʃemo tʃems sitqvebs mousmine tʃems natʰkʰvams quri miapqari 
ar moʃordnen isini ʃens tʰvalebs ʃeinaxe ʃeni ɡulis tsiaɣʃi 
radɡan isini sitsʰotsʰxlea matʰi mpovnelisatʰvis da kurnebaa mtʰeli misi xortsʰisatʰvis 
qvelaze metad daitsʰavi ʃeni ɡuli radɡan misɡan aris sitsʰotsʰxlis tsqaroebi 
moitsʰile mzakvroba da baɡetʰa sibiltse 
ʃenma tʰvalebma pirdapir itsʰkʰiron da ʃeni mzera stsorad tsarimartʰos ʃens tsinaʃe 
ɡatʰele sarbieli ʃeni pʰexisa da qoveli ʃeni ɡza ɡanmtkitsʰdeba 
nurtsʰ mardʒvniv ɡadauxvev nurtsʰ martsʰxniv ɡanaride ʃeni pʰexi borotebas 
ʃvilo tʃemo tʃems sibrədznes mousmine da quri miapqar tʃems ɡonierebas 
ratʰa ʃeinaxo ɡansdʒa da ʃenma baɡeebma daitsʰvan tsʰodna 
radɡan ɡoleul tʰapʰls atsvetʰeben baɡeni utsʰxo kʰalisa da zetʰivitʰ moedinebian sitqvebi misi 
maɡram misi ʃedeɡi mtsarea naɣvelivitʰ da basri vitʰ orlesuli maxvili 
misi pʰexebi sikvdilʃi tʃadian ʃavetʰs arian tʃacidebulni misi nabidʒebi 
rom tsʰxovrebis ɡza ar ɡaikapʰos misi ɡza kvali areulia ver ɡaiɡeb mas 
axla ki ʃvilebo momisminetʰ me da nu ukuikʰtsʰevitʰ tʃemi natʰkʰvamisaɡan 
moaʃore mas ʃeni ɡza da misi saxlis zɣurbls nu miuaxlovdebi 
ratʰa ar mistsʰe sxvas ʃeni mʃveneba da ʃeni tslebi daundobels 
ratʰa ar ɡadzɣnen sxvani ʃeni dzalitʰ da ʃeni naʃromi ar tsavides utsʰxotʰa saxlʃi 
da ʃen akvnesdebi sabolood ʃeni xortsʰisa da ʃeni tanis tʃamoxmobisas 
da itqvi roɡor ʃevidzule dariɡeba ʃeɡoneba ʃeidzaɡa tʃemma sulma 
ar movusmine tʃems mastsavlebeltʰa xmas da tʃems modzɣvartʰ ar mivapqar tʃemi quri 
kinaɣam ɡavnadɡurdi sruliad krebulʃi da sazoɡadoebaʃi 
svi tsqali ʃeni binulidan da nakadebi ʃeni cidan 
idinon ʃenma tsqaroebma kʰutʃaʃi da tsqlis nakadulebma moednebze 
mxolod ʃeni iqos isini da ara ʃentʰan mqopʰ utsʰxotʰesltʰa 
kurtʰxeuli iqos ʃeni tsqaro da ɡaixare ʃeni siqrmis tsʰolitʰ 
saqvareli pʰur irmitʰa da mʃvenieri ʃvelitʰ misma mkerdma daɡakmaqopʰilos qovel ʒams misi siqvaruli ɡitatsʰebdes mudam 
ratom ɡitatsʰebs ʃvilo tʃemo utsʰxo kʰali da utsʰxoelis mkerdze moxveva 
radɡan upʰlis tʰvaltsinaa katsʰis ɡzebi da mis qovel sarbiels is tʰelavs 
sakutʰari urdʒuloebitʰ ikʰneba uketʰuri ʃepqrobili da misi tsʰodvis borkilebi daakaveben mas 
uʃeɡonebod mokvdeba iɡi da tʰavisi uzomo sibriqvis tsaritatsʰeba 
ʃvilo tʃemo tʰu tʰavdebad daudekʰi ʃens moqvass xeli xelze daurtqi utsʰxos 
badeʃi ɡaebi ʃeni piris natʰkʰvamitʰ ʃepqrobili xar ʃeni piris natʰkʰvamitʰ 
ase moikʰetsʰi ʃvilo tʃemo da ɡadartʃebi tʰu xelʃi tʃauvardi ʃens moqvass tsadi emtʰxvie da evedre moqvass 
nu miakareb dzils ʃens tʰvalebs da ruls ʃens kʰutʰutʰoebs 
ɡadairtʃine tʰavi vitʰ kʰurtsʰikma monadiris xelidan da pʰrinvelma pʰrinveltʰmceris xelidan 
tsadi ciancvelastʰan zarmatsʰo naxe misi ɡzebi da dabrdzendi 
ara hqavs mas artsʰ upʰrosi artsʰ zedamxedveli da artsʰ batoni 
imzadebs zapʰxulʃi tʰavis purs aɡrovebs mkis dros tʰavis sazrdos 
rodemde itsvebi zarmatsʰo rodis adɡebi ʃeni dzilidan 
tsʰota dzili tsʰota tʰvlema tsʰota ɡulxeldakrepʰa dasatsolad 
da mova roɡortsʰ mɡzavri ʃeni siɣatake da ɡacirveba roɡortsʰ dʒariskatsʰi 
aramzada adamiani usamartʰlo katsʰi dadis mrudi piritʰ 
tʰvals tʃaukravs ɡauxaxunebs pʰexs aniʃnebs tʰavisi tʰitʰebitʰ 
umtkitsʰobaa mis ɡulʃi borots ɡanizraxavs qovel ʒams ɡanxetʰkʰilebas tʰesavs 
amis ɡamo uetsʰrad mova misi daɣupva utsʰbad dailetseba da ar ekʰneba mas kurneba 
ekʰvsi ram sdzuls upʰals da ʃvidi ram ezizɣeba 
zviadi tʰvalebi matquara ena xelebi udanaʃaulo sisxlis damɣvrelni 
ɡuli boroti ɡanzraxvebis ɡanmzraxveli pʰexni stsrapʰad morbenalni borotebisaken 
tsʰru motsme mzakvrobis tsarmomtʰkʰmeli da ɡanxetʰkʰilebis damtʰesavi dzmatʰa ʃoris 
daitsʰavi ʃvilo tʃemo mamaʃenis mtsʰnebani da dedaʃenis stsavlebas nu miatoveb 
daibnie ʃens ɡulze samudamod ʃeibnie ʃens qelze 
siarulisas tsin tsarɡidzɣveba datsolisas daɡipʰaravs ɡamoɣvidzebisas saubars daɡitsqebs 
radɡan mtsʰneba santʰelia da modzɣvreba sinatʰle tsʰxovrebis ɡza ki damriɡebluri ʃeɡoneba 
ratʰa daɡipʰaros ʃen boroti kʰalisaɡan utsʰxoelis lakʰardiani enisaɡan 
nu isurveb mis silamazes ʃens ɡulʃi da nu ɡaɡitatsʰebs tʰavisi tsamtsamebis xamxamitʰ 
radɡan medzavi kʰalis mizezitʰ matʰxovrdebian lukma puramde kʰmriani ki ʃens dzvirpʰas suls inadirebs 
ɡana ʃexvets vinme tsʰetsʰxls tʰavis ubeʃi tansatsʰmelis dautsvelad 
tʰu ɡaivlis vinme nakvertsʰxlebze pʰexebis dautsvelad 
asevea tʰavisi moqvasis tsʰoltʰan mimsvlelitsʰ aravin ɡamartʰldeba misi mimkarebeli 
ar ʃeizizɣeben kʰurds tʰu iparavs ɡadzɣomisatʰvis rodesatsʰ mʃieria 
maɡram tʰu ipovnian ʃvidmaɡad ɡadaixdis tʰavisi saxlis mtʰel kʰonebas mistsʰems 
vintsʰ kʰaltʰan mruʃobs uɡunuria spobs tʰavis suls vintsʰ amas stʃadis 
tsʰemasa da damtsʰirebas hpovebs da misi sirtsʰxvili ar tsairetsʰxeba 
radɡan ecvianoba mamakatsʰis ɡulistsqromaa da ar daindobs is ʃurisɡebis dɣes 
ar ʃexedavs aravitʰar ɡamosasqids da ar dakmaqopʰildeba ratsʰ unda umravlo kʰrtʰami 
ʃvilo tʃemo ʃeinaxe tʃemi natʰkʰvami da tʃemi mtsʰnebani tʃaimarxe ʃenʃi 
ʃeinaxe tʃemi mtsʰnebani da tʃemi rdʒuli roɡortsʰ tʰvalistʃini 
daibnie iɡi ʃen tʰitʰebze daitsere ʃeni ɡulis pʰitsʰarze 
sibrədznes utʰxari tʃemi da xar ʃen da natʰesavi utsode ɡonebas 
ratʰa daɡipʰaros utsʰxo kʰalisaɡan utsʰxoelisaɡan romlis sitqva lakʰardiania 
radɡan tʃemi saxlis sarkmlidan tʃemi darabidan ɡavicvrite 
da vixile briqvni vaʒebs ʃoris ʃevniʃne uɡunuri qmatsvili 
ɡadamavali kʰutʃaze misi saxlis kutʰxestʰan da tsavida iɡi misi saxlisken 
saɣamos mtsuxrʃi ɣamis sibnelesa da tsqvdiadʃi 
da aha ɡamodis kʰali mis ʃesaxvedrad medzavis samoselʃi da mzakvruli ɡulitʰ 
aɣviraxsnilia is da tʰavʃeukavebeli pʰexebi saxlʃi ar utʃerdeba 
xan kʰutʃaʃia xan moednebze da qovel kutʰxestʰan usapʰrdeba 
aha daicira da hkotsʰnis mas da urtsʰxvi saxitʰ eubneba 
samʃvidobo msxverpli iqo tʃemze dɣes ʃevasrule tʃemi aɣtʰkʰmuli 
amis ɡamo ɡamovedi ʃens ʃesaxvedrad ʃeni saxis sadzebrad da ɡipove 
pʰardaɡebitʰ movpʰine tʃemi saretsʰeli eɡviptis nakʰarɡi kʰsovilitʰ 
tʃems satsols muri vapkure aloe da kinamo 
ʃemodi ɡavdzɣetʰ dilamde siqvarulitʰ vixarotʰ alersitʰ 
radɡan tʃemi kʰmari ʃin ar aris ʃor ɡzaze tsavida 
pʰulitʰ savse kʰisa aiɣo xelʃi da mxolod savse mtʰvarisas dabrundeba ʃin 
da atsʰduna tʰavisi mravali sitqvitʰ tʰavisi mlikʰvneli baɡitʰ moxibla iɡi 
maʃinve ɡahqva ukan roɡortsʰ xari dasaklavad rom midis da roɡortsʰ briqvi borkilebʃi dasasdʒelad 
sanam isari ar dascris mis ɣvidzls pʰrinvelivitʰ itʃkʰaris maxisaken da ar itsʰis rom tʰavs iɣupavs 
axla ki ʃvilebo momisminetʰ me da quri dauɡdetʰ tʃemi piris natʰkʰvams 
ar mibrundes ʃeni ɡuli misi ɡzebisaken nu ixetialeb mis bilikebze 
radɡan mravali ɡanɡmiruli dastsʰa man da ritsʰxvi ara akʰvs mis mier daxotsʰiltʰ 
misi saxli ʃavetʰis ɡzebia mkvdartʰa savaneʃi tʃamavali 
ɡana sibrədzne ar ɣaɣadebs da ɡoniereba ar ɡamostsʰems tʰavis xmas 
simaɣletʰa mtsvervalze ɡzaze ɡzadʒvaredinze dɡas iɡi 
karibcetʰa maxloblad kʰalakʰis tsin kartʰa ʃesasvleltʰan ʃemosdzaxebs 
katsʰebo tʰkʰven ɡedzaxitʰ da tʃemi xma adamis dzetʰa mimartʰ aris 
briqvno ɡaiɡetʰ sibrədzne da reɡvenno ʃeaɡnebinetʰ ɡuls 
isminetʰ radɡan mtʰavars vlaparkob da ɡaɣeba tʃemi baɡisa simartʰlea 
radɡan ceʃmaritebas tsarmotʰkʰvams tʃemi piri da uketʰureba sisadzaɡlea tʃems baɡetʰatʰvis 
samartʰliania qoveli natʰkʰvami tʃemi pirisa araa matʰʃi arapʰeri daklaknili da mrude 
qovlad natʰelia isini ɡonieristʰvis da simartʰlea tsʰodnis mpovneltʰatʰvis 
miiɣetʰ tʃemi dariɡeba da ara vertsʰxli da tsʰodna metad vidre rtʃeuli okʰro 
radɡan sibrədzne marɡalitebze uketʰesia da aravitʰari satsadeli mas ar ʃeedreba 
me sibrədzne vmkvidrob ɡonierebastʰan da ɡansdʒis tsʰodnas vpoveb 
upʰlis ʃiʃi borotebis sidzulvilia siamaqe da kʰedmaɣloba da boroti ɡza da ukuɣmartʰi piri mdzuls me 
tʃemia rtʃeva da ɡoniereba me var ɡoneba tʃemia dzala 
tʃemitʰ mepʰoben mepʰeni da xelisupʰalni samartʰals atseseben 
tʃemitʰ mtʰavroben mtʰavarni da ketʰilʃobilni kʰveqnis qoveli mosamartʰle 
me miqvars tʃemi moqvarulni da tʃemi madziebelni mpoveben me 
simdidre da ɣirseba tʃemtʰanaa diddzali kʰoneba da simartʰle 
tʃemi naqopʰi badʒaɣlo okʰroze uketʰesia da tʃemi mosavali rtʃeul vertsʰxlze 
simartʰlis ɡzitʰ davdivar me samartʰlis bilikebitʰ 
ratʰa davumkvidro tʃems moqvarultʰ arseboba da matʰi saɡandzurebi avavso 
upʰals vqavdi me tʰavisi ɡzis satʰaveʃi tʰavis kʰmnilebebamde im ʒamitʰve 
ukunisidan var dapʰudznebuli tʰavidanve mitsaze utsinares 
upʰskrultʰa arqopʰnisas davibade tsqarotʰa tsqlebis siuxvis arqopʰnisas 
sanam mtʰebi dadɡebodnen bortsʰvebze adre davibade 
rodesatsʰ dʒer kidev ar iqo ʃekʰmnili mitsa da mindvrebi samqaros dasabami mtveri 
rotsʰa is tsʰas amqarebda metsʰ ikʰ viqavi rotsʰa tsres hkravda upʰskrulis zedapirze 
rotsʰa ɣrublebs amaɡrebda maɣlitʰ rotsʰa dzlierdeboda upʰskrultʰa tsqaroebi 
rotsʰa daadɡina zɣvistʰvis sazɣvari ratʰa tsqlebs ar ɡadaelaxatʰ misi napiri rotsʰa atsesebda dedamitsis sapʰudzvlebs 
me viqavi mis ɡverditʰ aɣmʃeneblad da mis sixarulad dɣeniadaɡ moxaruli mis tsinaʃe qovel ʒams 
vxarobdi misi mitsis samqaroʃi da iqo tʃemi sixaruli adamis dzetʰa 
da axla ʃvilebo misminetʰ me radɡan netar arian tʃems ɡzatʰa damtsʰvelni 
isminetʰ tʃemi dariɡeba dabrdzenditʰ da nu ɡandɡebitʰ 
netaria katsʰi vintsʰ momismens me vintsʰ pʰxizlobs tʃems karebtʰan dɣeniadaɡ rom daitsʰvas tʃemi ʃesasvlelis tsirtʰxlebi 
radɡan tʃemma mpovnelma sitsʰotsʰxle hpova da tsqaloba miiɣo upʰlisaɡan 
xolo tʃemi ʃemtsʰode tʰavis suls avnebs qovel tʃems modzules sikvdili uqvars 
sibrədznem saxli aiʃena tʰavistʰvis ɡamotʰala misi ʃvidi sveti 
dakla saklavi ɣvino ʃeazava da supʰra ɡaatsqo 
daɡzavna tʰavisi mxevalni moutsoda kʰalakʰis maɣlobtʰa tsveridan 
vintsʰ brəqvia akʰetʰ ʃemouxvios uɡunurs utʰxra man 
moditʰ cametʰ tʃemi puri da svitʰ ɣvino tʃemi ʃezavebuli 
datovetʰ sibriqve da itsʰotsʰxletʰ da iaretʰ ɡonierebis ɡzitʰ 
mkʰirdavis damriɡebeli damtsʰirebas iɣebs da uketʰurebis mamxilebeli ʃeuratsʰxqopʰas tʰavis tʰavze 
nu amxileb mkʰirdavs ratʰa ar ʃeɡidzulos amxile brdzeni da ʃeɡiqvarebs 
mietsʰi brdzens tsʰodna da upʰro dabrdzendeba astsavle martʰals da ɡaimravlebs tsʰodnas 
sibrədznis dasabami upʰlis ʃiʃia da tsmidis ʃetsʰnoba ɡoniereba 
radɡan tʃemitʰ ɡamravldeba ʃeni dɣeebi da sitsʰotsʰxlis tslebi ʃeɡemateba 
tʰu dabrdzendi ʃentʰvis dabrdzendi da tʰu mkʰirdavi xar marto itvirtʰav 
suleli kʰali briqvi xmauriani da arapʰris mtsʰodne 
dʒdeba tʰavisi saxlis zɣurbltʰan skamze kʰalakʰis maɣlobze 
ratʰa daudzaxos ɡzaze tʃamvleltʰ stsorad mavaltʰ tʰaviantʰi ɡzitʰ 
vintsʰ briqvia ɡadmouxvios akʰetʰ ckuanakluls ki eubneba 
moparuli tsqali tkbilia da tʃumad ʃecmuli puri saamuri 
man ar itsʰis rom mkvdrebi arian ikʰ ʃavetʰis siɣrmeʃi arian misi tsveulni 
brdzeni ʃvili mamas axarebs briqvi ʃvili ki dedamisis dardia 
sarɡebeli ar moakʰvs uketʰur saɡandzurs motsqaleba ki sikvdilisaɡan ixsnis 
upʰali ar daamʃevs martʰlis suls uketʰurtʰa sixarbes ki xels hkravs 
ɡlaxakad akʰtsʰevs moʃvebuli madʒa muqaitʰtʰa xeli ki amdidrebs 
zapʰxulʃi momkrepʰi ckviania mkis dros mdzinare sirtsʰxvilis ʃvili 
kurtʰxevaa martʰlis tʰavze uketʰurtʰa piri ki dzaladobas pʰaravs 
martʰlis xsovna kurtʰxeul ikʰneba uketʰurtʰa saxeli ki dalpeba 
ɡulitʰ brdzeni miiɣebs mtsʰnebebs xolo baɡitʰ suleli tsapʰorxildeba 
simartʰleʃi moaruli uʃiʃrad ivlis da tʰavisi ɡzis ɡammrudebeli ɡamomʒɣavndeba 
tʰvalis tʃamkvreli mxolod dards itsvevs baɡitʰ suleli ki tsapʰorxildeba 
sitsʰotsʰxlis tsqaroa martʰlis piri uketʰurtʰa piri ki dzaladobas pʰaravs 
sidzulvili ɡanxetʰkʰilebas aɣvivebs siqvaruli ki qvela tsʰodvas pʰaravs 
ketʰilɡonieris baɡeʃi sibrədzne ipoveba uɡunuris zurɡze ki tskepla 
brdzenni tsʰodnas aɡroveben sulelis piri ki moaxloebul ɡanadɡurebas 
mdidris kʰoneba misi dzlieri kʰalakʰia ɣaribtʰa ɡanadɡureba matʰi siɣatake 
martʰlis ʃroma sitsʰotsʰxlistʰvisaa uketʰuris mosavali tsʰodvisatʰvis 
dariɡebis ʃemnaxveli sitsʰotsʰxlis ɡzitʰ dadis ʃeɡonebis ukumɡdebeli ki ɡzas stsʰdeba 
vintsʰ sidzulvils pʰaravs tsʰru baɡeebi akʰvs da vintsʰ tsʰilismtsameblobs briqvia 
bevri laparakitʰ ar daqovndeba danaʃauli is ki vintsʰ akavebs tʰavis baɡeebs ckviania 
martʰlis ena rtʃeuli vertsʰxlia uketʰurtʰa ɡuli ki mtsiri 
martʰlis baɡeni mravals mtsqemsaven sulelni ki ckuanaklulobitʰ daixotsʰebian 
upʰlis kurtʰxeva amdidrebs da dardi ar emateba mas 
ɡartʰobasavitʰ akʰvs briqvs borotmokʰmedeba xolo sibrədzne ɡonier katsʰs 
risatsʰ eʃinia uketʰurs is mietseva mas martʰaltʰa tsadils ki sruldeba 
ɡadaivlis kʰariʃxali da aɣar aris uketʰuri martʰali ki saukuno sapʰudzvelia 
vitʰ dzmari kbilebisatʰvis da kvamli tʰvalebisatʰvis isea zarmatsʰi mis tsarmɡzavneltʰatʰvis 
upʰlis ʃiʃi dɣeebs umatebs uketʰurtʰa tslebi ki mokldeba 
martʰaltʰa sasoeba sixarulia uketʰurtʰa imedi ki daiɣupeba 
upʰlis ɡza simaɡrea ubitsostʰvis avismkʰneltʰatʰvis ki ɡanadɡureba 
martʰali saukunod ar tsabordzikdeba uketʰurni ki ver daivaneben kʰveqanaze 
martʰlis piri sibrədznes ɡamoisxams ukuɣmartʰi ena ki moikvetʰeba 
martʰlis baɡeebma itsʰian ra aris mosatsoni uketʰurtʰa pirma ki mxolod ukuɣmartʰoba 
mrudi sastsori sisadzaɡlea upʰlis tsinaʃe sruli tsona ki misi mosatsoni 
mova ampartavnoba da moetseva damtsʰirebatsʰ tʰavmdabaltʰ ki sibrədzne axlavs 
tsrpʰelebs ubitsoba tsarudzɣveba moɣalatetʰ ki matʰive tsʰbiereba daɣupavs 
kʰoneba ver uʃvelis tsqromis dɣes motsqaleba ki sikvdilisaɡan ixsnis 
ubitsos samartʰlianoba ɡaustsorebs ɡzas tʰavisi uketʰurobitʰ ki etsʰema uketʰuri 
tsrpʰelebs matʰi samartʰlianoba ixsnis moɣalateni ki ʃepqrobili ikʰnebian tʰaviantʰi sixarbitʰ 
uketʰuri adamianis sikvdilisas ikarɡeba misi imedi da usamartʰlotʰa sasoeba ikarɡeba 
martʰali ubedurebas aridebs tʰavs da mis natsʰvlad uketʰurs etseva 
mlikʰvneli piritʰ ɣupavs tʰavis moqvass martʰalni ki tsʰodnitʰ ixsnian tʰavs 
martʰaltʰa siketʰitʰ xarobs kʰalakʰi uketʰurtʰa daɣupvisas ki sixarulis qiʒinaa 
tsrpʰeltʰa kurtʰxevitʰ maɣldeba kʰalakʰi uketʰurtʰa piritʰ ki inɡreva 
vintsʰ tʰvis moqvass abutʃad iɡdebs briqvia ɡonieri katsʰi ki dums 
tsʰilismtsamebeli saidumlos amʒɣavnebs sulitʰ mtkitsʰe ki pʰaravs sakʰmes 
brədznul rtʃevatʰa ɡareʃe etsʰema eri mravali mrtʃeveli ki xsnaa 
tʰavis tʰavs borotobs vintsʰ utsʰxos udɡeba tʰavdebad xelis dartqmis modzule ki usapʰrətʰxod aris 
sandomiani kʰali pativs ixvecs mdzlavrni ki simdidres ixvecen 
motsqale katsʰi siketʰes uzɣavs tʰavis suls sastiki ki tʰavis xortsʰs aɣizianebs 
uketʰuri imsaxurebs pʰuc sakʰmes motsqalebis mtʰesveli ki ceʃmarit sazɣaurs 
simartʰleʃi mtkitsʰe sitsʰotsʰxliskenaa borotebis mdevneli ki sikvdilisken 
upʰlis sadzulvelni arian ɡulmrudni misi sasurvelni ki stsori ɡzitʰ mavalni 
xeli xels ver ɡaekʰtsʰeva da boroti sasdʒels martʰaltʰa tʰesli ki ɡadartʃeba 
ratsʰ ɣoris dinɡze tsamotsʰmuli okʰros becedia is aris lamazi da uckuo kʰali 
martʰaltʰa tsadili mxolod siketʰea uketʰurtʰa molodini risxva 
zoɡi aniavebs madls da upʰro emateba zoɡi ki zoɡavs motsqalebas da akldeba mas 
kurtʰxeulis suli damsuqdeba da vintsʰ sxvas asmevs tsqals tʰvitʰonatsʰ dartsqulebuli ikʰneba 
vintsʰ tʰavistʰan akavebs xorbals mas stsqevlis eri kurtʰxeva ki dampureblis tʰavzea 
vintsʰ siketʰisaken iltvis is edzebs motsonebas borotis madziebels ki boroteba etseva 
vintsʰ tʰavis simdidrezea daimedebuli daetsʰema martʰalni ki rtosavitʰ aqvavdebian 
tʰavisi saxlis ɡamtʃanaɡebeli kʰars daimkvidrebs suleli ki brdzenis monobas 
martʰlis naqopʰi sitsʰotsʰxlis xea da brdzeni sulebs izidavs 
martʰals am kʰveqnad miezɣveba mitʰumetes uketʰurs da tsʰodvils 
dariɡeba uqvars tsʰodnis moqvaruls mxileba umetsʰars sdzuls 
ketʰili motsonebas moixvecs upʰlisaɡan mzakvar katsʰs ki ɡaasamartʰlebs 
ver dapʰudzndeba adamiani uketʰurebitʰ martʰaltʰa pʰesvi ki ar ʃeirqeva 
ɡamrdʒe kʰali ɡvirɡvinia tʰavisi kʰmrisa ʃemartsʰxveneli ki roɡortsʰ xrətsna mis dzvlebʃi 
martʰaltʰa pʰikʰrebi samartʰalia uketʰurtʰa pʰandebi sitsʰrue 
uketʰurtʰa sitqvebi tʃasapʰrebaa sisxlis dasaɣvrelad martʰaltʰa baɡeni ki ixsnian matʰ 
daemxobian uketʰurni da aɣar ikʰnebian martʰaltʰa saxli ki dartʃeba 
misi ckuisamebr ʃeakʰeben katsʰs ɡulmrudi ki dasatsʰini ɡaxdeba 
sdʒobs iqo ʃeuratsʰxi da tʰavisi tʰavis patroni vidre pativmoqvare da ulukmapuro 
samartʰalma itsʰis tʰavisi sakʰonlis saciroeba xolo uketʰurtʰa sibralulitsʰ ki sastikia 
tʰavisi mitsis dammuʃavebeli puritʰ ɡadzɣeba amaoebis mdevneli ki uɡnuria 
uketʰurs borottʰa momxroba stsadia martʰaltʰa pʰesvi ki naqopʰs ɡamostsʰems 
av metqvelebaʃi boroti maxea daɡebuli martʰali ki ɡacirvebidan ɡamova 
tʰavisi piris naqopʰisɡan katsʰi siketʰitʰ ɡadzɣeba adamianis xelis sazɣauri ki masve daubrundeba 
sulelis ɡza stsoria mis tʰvalʃi brdzeni ki rtʃevas usmens 
suleli ɡamoamʒɣavnebs tʰavis sibrazes ɡonieri ki ʃeuratsʰxqopʰas pʰaravs 
ceʃmaritebis aɣmomsuntʰkʰveli simartʰles atsʰxadebs tsʰru motsme ki tsʰbierebas 
zoɡi ise laparakobs tʰitʰkʰos maxvilitʰ tʃxvletdes brdzentʰa ena ki kurnebaa 
ceʃmaritebis baɡeni samudamod dapʰudzndebian tsʰru ena ki tsamieria 
tsʰbierebaa borotis ɡanmzraxveltʰa ɡulʃi mʃvidobis mrtʃeveltʰ ki sixaruli akʰvtʰ 
aravitʰari ziani ar mouva martʰals uketʰurni ki ubedurebitʰ ɡaivsebian 
tsʰru baɡeni sdzuls upʰals ceʃmaritebitʰ mokʰmedni ki mistʰvis sasurvelia 
ɡonieri adamiani pʰaravs tsʰodnas reɡventʰa ɡuli ki sisuleles atsʰxadebs 
bedʒitʰi xeli ibatonebs zarmatsʰi ki xarkad ikʰneba 
ɡulʃi dardi katsʰs datʰrɡunavs ketʰili sitqva ki ɡaaxarebs 
martʰali tʰavis moqvass tsin udzɣvis uketʰurtʰa ɡza ki matʰve atsʰdunebs 
sizarmatsʰe ver moipovebs nanadirevs adamianis qvelaze didi kʰoneba sibedʒitʰea 
motsqalebis ɡzaze sitsʰotsʰxlea da misi biliki ukvdavebisken aris mimartʰuli 
brdzeni ʃvili ismens mamis dariɡebas tʰavkʰariani ki ar ismens saqvedurs 
tʰavisi piris naqopʰidan katsʰi siketʰes ʃecams moɣalatetʰa suli ki nadzartsʰvs 
vintsʰ tʰavis pirs upʰrətʰxildeba tʰavis sitsʰotsʰxles itsʰavs vintsʰ pʰartʰod aɣebs tʰavis baɡeebs ubedureba elis mas 
zarmatsʰis suls stsadia da ara akʰvs bedʒitʰtʰa suli ki ɡamsuqdeba 
martʰals sdzuls tquili sitqva uketʰuri ki auɡ da ʃemartsʰxvenel sakʰmeebs stʃadis 
simartʰle itsʰavs ubitso ɡzas uketʰureba ki atsʰdunebs ʃemtsʰodvels 
zoɡi mdidrad atʃvenebs tʰavs da arapʰeri ara akʰvs zoɡi ki ɣaribad da didi kʰoneba akʰvs 
sitsʰotsʰxlis ɡamosasqidi katsʰis simdidrea ɣaribs ki ar esmis saqveduri 
martʰaltʰa sinatʰle ɡabrətsqindeba uketʰurtʰa santʰeli ki tʃakʰreba 
mxolod ampartavnobisaɡan tsarmoiʃveba ɡanxetʰkʰileba mrtʃeveltʰ ki sibrədzne akʰvtʰ 
kʰoneba amaoebitʰ ʃedzenili mtsʰirdeba xelitʰ ʃemkrebeli ki ɡaamravlebs mas 
xanɡrədzlivi molodini ɡuls kʰantsʰavs aɣsrulebuli survili ki sitsʰotsʰxlis xea 
ɣmertʰis sitqvis abutʃad amɡdebi tʰavis tʰavs azianebs mtsʰnebis moʃiʃi ki dadʒildovdeba 
brdzenis modzɣvreba sitsʰotsʰxlis tsqaroa ratʰa ɡaeridos sikvdilis maxes 
ketʰili moxedva tsqalobas ɡastsʰems moɣalatetʰa ɡza ki mdzimea 
qoveli ɡonieri tsʰodnitʰ mokʰmedebs reɡveni ki sisuleles ɡamoapʰens 
uketʰuri matsʰne ɡacirvebaʃi vardeba ertʰɡuli motsʰikʰuli ki kurnebaa 
siɣaribe da damtsʰireba dariɡebis ukumɡdebels ʃeɡonebis damtsʰveli ki pativtsʰemuli ikʰneba 
aɣsrulebuli survili suls eameba reɡventʰatʰvis ki sisadzaɡlea borotebisaɡan ɡandɡoma 
brdzenebtʰan damavali dabrdzendeba reɡventʰa moqvasi ki ɡaubedurdeba 
tsʰodvilebs boroteba aedevneba martʰaltʰ ki ketʰili miezɣvebatʰ 
ketʰili katsʰi ʃviltʰaʃvilebs memkvidreobas utovebs tsʰodvilis kʰoneba ki martʰlisatʰvis inaxeba 
bevri sacmelia ɣaribtʰa qanaʃi zoɡni ki umarilobitʰ iɣupebian 
vintsʰ tʰavis ʃolts zoɡavs sdzuls tʰavisi dze xolo visatsʰ uqvars sdʒis mas 
martʰali dzɣomaze cams uketʰuris mutsʰeli ki tsʰarielia 
brdzeni kʰali aʃenebs tʰavis saxls suleli ki anɡrevs mas sakutʰari xelitʰ 
stsorad mavals eʃinia upʰlisa tʰavisi ɡzis ɡammrudebeli ki ɡmobs mas 
sulelis pirʃi medidurobis tskeplaa brdzenebs ki matʰi baɡeni itsʰaven 
sadatsʰ xarebi ar arian ikʰ tsʰarielia baɡa bevri mosavali ki xaris dzalitʰaa 
sartsmuno motsme ar itsʰruebs tsʰru motsme ki tquilebs aɣmoisunkʰavs 
tʰavkʰariani sibrədznes edziebs da ver poulobs ɡonierisatʰvis ki tsʰodna advilia 
ɡaneride briqv katsʰs radɡan ver ipovni tsʰodnis baɡetʰ 
ɡonieris sibrədzne tʰavisi ɡzis ɡaɡnebaa briqvtʰa sisulele ki tsʰdoma 
sulelni itsʰinian danaʃulze tsrpʰeltʰa ʃoris ki ketʰili nebaa 
ɡulma itsʰis tʰvisi sulis simtsare da mis sixaruls ar inatsilebs utsʰxo 
uketʰurtʰa saxli ɡanadɡurdeba tsrpʰeltʰa karavi ki aqvavdeba 
aris ɡza romelitsʰ stsorad tʃans katsʰis tsinaʃe misi bolo ki sikvdilis ɡzebia 
sitsʰilis drosatsʰ stkiva ɡuls mxiarulebitʰ bolovdeba sevdatsʰ 
tʰavisi ɡzebitʰ dzɣeba ɡarqvnili ɡuli ketʰili katsʰi ki matʰ ɡanerideba 
ɡulubrəqvilos stsams qoveli sitqva ɡonieri ki akvirdeba tʰavis nabidʒs 
brdzeni pʰrətʰxilobs da ɡaurbis borots briqvi ki tʰavɡasuli da tʰavdadʒerebulia 
ɡulpʰitsʰxi sisuleles tʃaidens avismzraxveli katsʰi ʃedzulebulia 
ɡulubrəqviloni sisuleles itsiladeben ɡonierni ki tsʰodnitʰ ɡvirɡvindebian 
borotni ketʰiltʰa tsinaʃe daitʃokʰeben uketʰurni ki martʰlis karibceebtʰan 
ɣaribi tʰvisi moqvasistʰvisatsʰ sadzulvelia mdidris moqvaruli ki mravalia 
tʰavisi moqvasis modzule stsʰodavs ɣaribtʰa motsqale ki netaria 
ɡana borotis ɡanmzraxvelni ar tsʰdundebian maɡram tsqaloba da ceʃmariteba akʰvtʰ ketʰilis ɡanmzraxveltʰ 
qovel ɡardʒaʃia mateba baɡetʰa amao sitqvisaɡan mxolod danaklisi 
brdzentʰa ɡvirɡvini matʰi simdidrea briqvtʰa sisulele ki sisulelea 
sartsmuno motsme sulebs ɡadaartʃens tquilis aɣmomsuntʰkʰveli ki moɣalatea 
upʰlis ʃiʃʃi dzlieria rətsmena da mis ʃvilebs ekʰnebatʰ tʰavʃesapʰari 
upʰlis ʃiʃi sitsʰotsʰxlis tsqaroa ratʰa ɡaneridos sikvdilis maxes 
eris simravle mepʰis didebaa uxalxoba ki mtʰavris dakʰtsʰeva 
sulɡrdzeli didad ɡonieria sulmokle ki sisuleles amʒɣavnebs 
xortsʰis sitsʰotsʰxlea mʃvidi ɡuli da dzvaltʰa xrətsna ʃuri 
ɡlaxakis mtʃaɡvreli ɡmobs tʰavis ɡamtʃens ɣatakis ʃemtsqale ki misi pativismtsʰemelia 
misive borotebitʰ daemxoba uketʰuri martʰali ki sikvdilʃitsʰ tʰavʃesapʰars hpovebs 
ɡonieris ɡulʃi sibrədzne ɡanisvenebs da briqvtʰa ʃoris ar ipoveba 
simartʰle aɣazevebs ers xalxtʰa sirtsʰxvili ki matʰi tsʰodvaa 
mepʰis tsqaloba ɡonier monas misi tsqroma ki sirtsʰxvileuls 
tkbili pasuxi miakʰtsʰevs ɡulistsqromas ʃeuratsʰxmqopʰeli sitqva ki aɣaɡznebs risxvas 
brdzentʰa ena saamurs xdis tsʰodnas briqvtʰa piri ki sisuleles ɡamotʰkʰvams 
qvelɡan aris upʰlis tʰvali xedavs borottʰa da ketʰiltʰ 
mʃvidi ena sitsʰotsʰxlis xea mitʰ mzakvroba sulis ʃemusvra 
suleli abutʃad iɡdebs mamis dariɡebas ʃeɡonebis damtsʰveli ki ɡonieri xdeba 
martʰlis saxlʃi mravali ɡandzia uketʰuris mosavalʃi ki vaeba 
brdzentʰa baɡeni tsʰodnas avrtsʰeleben briqvtʰa ɡuli asetʰi ar aris 
uketʰurtʰa msxverpli upʰlisatʰvis sisadzaɡlea patiosantʰa lotsʰva ki sixaruli 
upʰlis tsinaʃe sisadzaɡlea uketʰuris ɡza simartʰlis mdevneli ki uqvars mas 
sasdʒeli elis stsori ɡzis mimtovebels dariɡebis modzule ki mokvdeba 
ʃavetʰi da dʒodʒoxetʰi ɣiaa upʰlis tsinaʃe mitʰ upʰro adamis dzetʰa ɡulebi 
briqvs ar uqvars tʰavisi mamxilebeli brdzenebtʰan ar tsava iɡi 
mxiaruli ɡuli saxes axalisebs ɡulis dardisas suli ʃemusrvilia 
ɡonieris ɡuli tsʰodnas edziebs briqvis piri ki sisulelitʰ ikvebeba 
tʃaɡrulis qoveli dɣe tsʰudia ɡulitʰ mxiaruls ki lxini akʰvs mudam 
sdʒobs ɡkʰondes mtsʰiredi maɡram upʰlisadmi ʃiʃitʰ vidre didi saundʒe da mastʰan ertʰad ʃpʰotʰva 
sdʒobs ɡkʰondes mtsvanilis sadili da siqvaruli vidre nasukʰali xari da sidzulvili mastʰan ertʰad 
pʰitsʰxi katsʰi aɣvivebs ɡanxetʰkʰilebas sulɡrdzeli ki akʰrobs ʃuɣls 
zarmatsʰis ɡza eklian ɣobesavitʰaa patiosantʰa ɡza stsoria 
brdzeni ʃvili mamas axarebs briqvi adamiani ki abutʃad iɡdebs tʰavis dedas 
sisulele sixarulia briqvisa ɡonieri katsʰi ki stsorad mavalia 
rtʃevis ɡareʃe tʃaiʃleba ɡanzraxvani bevri mrtʃevlisas ki ʃesruldeba 
katsʰis sixaruli misi baɡis pasuxʃia da karɡia sitqva tʰavis droze 
ɡonieris tsʰxovrebis ɡza maɣla midis ratʰa dabla ɡaneridos ʃavetʰs 
ampartavantʰa saxls aɣmopʰxvris upʰali kʰvrivis sazɣvars ki aɣadɡens 
borotis ɡanzraxvani upʰlistʰvis sisadzaɡlea saamuri sitqvebi ki supʰtʰa 
is vintsʰ momxvecelobs tʰavis saxls aubedurebs kʰrtʰamis modzule ki itsʰotsʰxlebs 
martʰlis ɡuli dapʰikʰrdeba sapasuxod uketʰurtʰa piri borotebas ɣvris 
upʰali ʃorsaa uketʰurtʰaɡan martʰaltʰa lotsʰva ki ʃesmenil ikʰneba 
tʰvaltʰa sinatʰle axarebs ɡuls karɡi ambavi ki dzvals apoxierebs 
quri sasitsʰotsʰxlo mxilebis momsmeni brdzentʰa ʃoris ɡaatʰevs ɣames 
dariɡebis ukumɡdebels ezizɣeba mxilebis momsmeni ki ɡonebas ixvecs 
upʰlis ʃiʃi brədznuli dariɡebaa da pativze tsin aris mortʃileba 
ɡulis motsodebani adamians ekutʰvnis enis pasuxi ki upʰlisaɡan aris 
katsʰis qvela ɡza supʰtʰaa mis tʰvalʃi xolo upʰali stsonis sulebs 
ɡaande upʰals ʃeni sakʰmeni da ʃeni pʰikʰrebi aɣsruldeba 
upʰalma qvelapʰeri tʰavisi da tʰvitʰ uketʰuritsʰ ubedurebis dɣisatʰvis 
qvela ɡulzviadi upʰlisatʰvis sadzaɡelia xels xelze davartqam rom ver ɡaekʰtsʰeva sasdʒels 
tsqalobitʰa da ceʃmaritebitʰ ɡamoisqideba urdʒuloeba da upʰlis ʃiʃitʰ ɡanudɡebi borots 
tʰu sasurvelia upʰlisatʰvis katsʰis ɡzebi mis mtrebsatsʰ ʃeariɡebs mastʰan 
sdʒobs mtsʰiredi da simartʰlitʰ mravals moxvecils usamartʰlobitʰ 
adamiani irtʃevs tʰavis ɡzas da upʰali tsarmartʰavs mis nabidʒs 
ɡanatʃenia mepʰis baɡeebze samsdʒavroze ar ʃestsʰodavs misi piri 
sastsori da stsori pinebi akʰvs upʰals misi sakʰmea abɡis qvela satsoni kʰva 
sisadzaɡlea mepʰetʰatʰvis ukanonobis kʰmna radɡan simartʰlitʰ pʰudzndeba taxti 
satʰnoa mepʰetʰatʰvis martʰali baɡeni da tsrpʰelad molaparakeni uqvars mas 
mepʰis ɡulistsqroma sikvdilis anɡelozia brdzeni katsʰi ki ɡaaqutʃebs mas 
mepʰis saxis natʰelʃi sitsʰotsʰxlea misi tsqaloba ki ɡazapʰxulis tsvimis ɣrubelivitʰaa 
sibrədznis ʃedzena okʰroze uketʰesia da ckuis ʃedzena vertsʰxlze umdʒobesi 
tsrpʰeltʰa ɡza borotisaɡan ɡandɡomaa tʰavisi ɡzis damtsʰveli sitsʰotsʰxles inaxavs 
siamaqe tsin udzɣvis daɣupvas da datsʰemas tsin udzɣvis kʰedmaɣloba 
sdʒobs tʰavmdablebtʰan sulitʰ mortʃileba amaqebtʰan nadavlis ɡanatsilebas 
tʰavisi sakʰmis mompʰikʰrebeli siketʰes hpovebs da upʰalze daimedebuli netaria 
ɡulitʰ brdzeni ɡonierad itsodeba da tkbili baɡeni xels utsqoben stsavlas 
ckua tʰvisi patronisatʰvis sitsʰotsʰxlis tsqaroa suleltʰa dariɡeba ki sisulele 
brdzenis ɡuli ɡoniers xdis mis enas da mis baɡeze tsarumatebs stsavlebas 
sasiamovno natʰkʰvami ɡoleuli tʰapʰlivitʰaa sulisatʰvis tkbilia da xortsʰisatʰvis kurneba 
aris ɡza romelitsʰ stsori tʃans katsʰis tsinaʃe misi bolo ki sikvdilis ɡzebia 
mʃromeli tʰavistʰvis ʃromobs radɡan misi piri aidzulebs mas 
uɡvani katsʰi borotis amomtʰxrelia da mis baɡeebze damtsveli tsʰetsʰxlivitʰaa 
ukuɣmartʰi katsʰi ʃuɣls avrtsʰelebs da tsʰilismtsamebeli meɡobrebs aʃorebs 
modzalade katsʰi tʰavis moqvass atsʰdunebs da mihqavs uketʰur ɡzaze 
tʰvals xucavs ukuɣmartʰobis mosapʰikʰreblad pirs kumavs borotebas stʃadis 
didebis ɡvirɡvini caɣaraa simartʰlis ɡzaze ipoveba iɡi 
momtʰmeni sdʒobs mamatsʰs da is vintsʰ tʰavis sulze batonobs kʰalakʰis dampqrobs 
kaltʰaʃi iqreba tsili maɡram upʰlisɡanaa mtʰeli misi samartʰali 
sdʒobs naceri xmeli purisa mʃvidobastʰan ertʰad dakluli sakʰonlitʰ savse saxlsa da ʃuɣls 
ɡonieri msaxuri ibatonebs ʃemartsʰxvenel ʃvilze da dzmebs ʃoris ɡainatsilebs samkvidrebels 
saxmili vertsʰxlisatʰvisaa da brədzmedi okʰrosatʰvis ɡulebs ki upʰali ɡamostsʰdis 
borotmokʰmedi usamartʰlos baɡes uɡdebs qurs tsʰru usmens uxams enas 
ɣaribis abutʃad amɡdebi tʰavis ɡamtʃens ɡmobs moqvasis ubedurebis moxaruli ver ɡaekʰtsʰeva sasdʒels 
ʃviltʰaʃvili moxutsʰtʰa ɡvirɡvinia da ʃviltʰa dideba matʰi mamebisa 
ar uxdeba aramzadas qoqotʃuri ena mitʰ upʰro ketʰilʃobils tsʰru ena 
dzvirpʰasi kʰva kʰrtʰamia misi mpʰlobelis tʰvalʃi saitʰatsʰ ki mimartʰavs iɡi miaɣtsevs tsarmatebas 
danaʃaulis dampʰarveli siqvaruls edzebs xolo vintsʰ meɡobris danaʃauls ʃeaxsenebs is meɡobrebs aʃorebs 
mxileba upʰro mokʰmedebs ɡonierze vidre briqvze asi dartqma 
meamboxe mxolod borots edzebs maɡram sastiki anɡelozi mievlineba mas 
sdʒobs beldakarɡuli datʰvi ʃexvdes katsʰs vidre briqvi tʰavisi sisulelitʰ 
vintsʰ borots miuzɣavs ketʰilis tsil mis saxls ar moʃordeba boroteba 
tsqlis ɡamoxetʰkʰva ʃuɣlis dasatsqisia ʃetsqvite dava vidre aɣiɡznebodes 
uketʰuris ɡamamartʰlebeli da martʰlis ɡamamtqunebeli oriveni sadzaɡelia upʰlis tsinaʃe 
ristʰvisaa kʰoneba briqvis xeltʰ sibrədznis ʃesadzenad rodesatsʰ araa ɡaɡeba 
qoveltʰvis uqvarxar moqvass dzma ki ɡasaciristʰvis aris ʃobili 
uckuo adamiani xels urtqams tʰavdebad dɡeba tʰavisi moqvasis ɡulisatʰvis 
visatsʰ tʃxubi uqvars danaʃauli uqvars vintsʰ maɣla stsevs tʰavis kars damtvrevas edziebs 
ɡulmrudi ver hpovebs ketʰils da enitʰ ukuɣmartʰi ubedurebaʃi tʃavardeba 
vintsʰ briqvs ʃobs isev tʰavis cirad da ver xarobs aramzadis mama 
mxiaruli ɡuli xels utsqobs kurnebas xolo davrdomili suli dzvals axmobs 
kʰrtʰams ubidan iɣebs uketʰuri ratʰa ɡaamrudos simartʰlis ɡzebi 
ɡonieris saxis tsin sibrədznea briqvis tʰvalni ki mitsis kidezea 
briqvi ʃvili mamis dʒavria da tʰavisi mʃoblis mtsuxareba 
martʰlis dasdʒa ar aris karɡi mitʰ upʰro ketʰilʃobiltʰa tsʰema sitsrpʰelistʰvis 
tsʰodnis mtsʰodneli tʰavisi natʰkʰvamis momcirnea da tʰavʃekavebulia ɡonieri katsʰi 
tʰvitʰ sulelitsʰ dumilisas brədznad tʃaitʰvleba tʰavisi baɡis damxʃveli ki ɡonierad 
tʰavkerdza katsʰi ʒins istsorebs qovel saɣ azrs udʒanqdeba 
briqvs ɡoniereba ki ar surs aramed mxolod tʰavisi ɡulis ɡamomʒɣavneba 
uketʰuris mosvlas mohqveba zizɣitsʰ da upatiobas sirtsʰxvili 
katsʰis piris sitqvebi ɣrma tsqlebia mdinari nakaduli sibrədznis tsqaro 
uketʰuris mimxroba ar aris karɡi martʰlis dasamxobad sasamartʰloze 
briqvis baɡeni tʃxubʃi ʃedian da misi piri tsʰemas moutsodebs 
briqvis piri daɣupvaa mistʰvis da misi baɡeni maxe misi sulisa 
tsʰilismtsameblis sitqvebi tʃasatkbarunebelia da isini ɡulis siɣrmeʃi aɣtseven 
tʰavis sakʰmeʃi daudevari dzmaa tsamtsqmedlisa 
dzlieri koʃki upʰlis saxelia masʃi darbis martʰali da samʃvidobozea 
mdidris kʰoneba misi dzlieri kʰalakʰia da maɣali ɡalavanivitʰaa mis pʰikʰrebʃi 
damxobis tsin maɣldeba katsʰis ɡuli da didebis tsin tʰvinierdeba 
vintsʰ pasuxs stsʰems mosmenamde es misi sisulelea da sirtsʰxvili 
katsʰis suli itans tʰavis satkivars maɡram ʃemusrvil suls vin ɡadaitans 
ɡonieris ɡuli idzens tsʰodnas da brdzentʰa quri edzebs tsʰodnas 
adamianis satʃukʰari apʰartʰoebs mis ɡzas da didebulebamde miiqvans mas 
martʰali pirvelia davaʃi maɡram modis misi metokʰe da ɡamoidziebs mas 
tsilisqra bolos uɣebs davas da dzlierebs ɡaaʃvelebs 
ɡanmdɡari dzma ɡamaɡrebul kʰalakʰze miudɡomelia da dava sasaxlis klitetʰa msɡavsia 
katsʰis piris naqopʰisaɡan ɡadzɣeba misi mutsʰeli tʰavis baɡetʰa mosavlisaɡan ɡadzɣeba 
sikvdili da sitsʰotsʰxle enis xelʃia da misi moqvarulni iɡemeben mis naqopʰs 
vintsʰ karɡi tsʰoli hpova man siketʰe hpova da upʰlisaɡan madli moixveca 
vedrebitʰ ɣaribi laparakobs mdidari ki tʰavxedurad pasuxobs 
meɡobriani katsʰi ʃeidzleba ɡanadɡurdes maɡram aris moqvasi dzmaze upʰro axlobeli 
sdʒobs ɣaribi tʰavisi ubitsobitʰ mavali mrudebaɡian mdidars da tʰanatsʰ briqvs 
artsʰ tsʰodnis ɡareʃe varɡa suli da vintsʰ tʃkʰarobs ʃestsʰodavs 
adamianis sisulele rəqvnis mis ɡzas da upʰalze tsqreba misi ɡuli 
kʰoneba hmatebs bevr moqvass ukʰoneli ki tʰavisi meɡobrisɡan ɡanʃorebulia 
tsʰru motsme ar dartʃeba dausdʒeli da tquilis molakʰlakʰe ar ɡadartʃeba 
bevri edzebs tsqalobas didebultʰa tsinaʃe da satʃukʰris mimtsʰems qvela meɡobrobs 
ɣaribi sdzuls qvela dzmas mitʰ upʰro misi meɡobrebi ʃordebian mas ausrulebel danapirebtʰa mdevaria iɡi 
vintsʰ ɡuls idzens mas tʰavisi tʰavi uqvars ɡonebas inaxavs ratʰa siketʰe hpovos 
tsʰru motsme ar dartʃeba dausdʒeli da tquilis molakʰlakʰe daiɣupeba 
briqvs ar ʃeepʰereba pʰupʰuneba mitʰ upʰro monas batonoba mtʰavrebze 
adamianis ckua sulɡrdzels xdis mas da misi ɣirsebaa danaʃaulis miteveba 
lomis bokveris ɣrials hɡavs mepʰisɡan ʃerisxva da misi tsqaloba balaxze tsʰvris msɡavsia 
mamisatʰvis ubedurebaa briqvi ʃvili xolo tsʰolis cirveuloba ʃeutsqveteli tsvetʰa 
saxli da kʰoneba mamatʰa memkvidreobaa ɡonieri tsʰoli ki upʰlisaɡanaa 
sizarmatsʰe dzils mohɡvris katsʰs da ukʰnara suli iʃimʃilebs 
mtsʰnebis damtsʰveli tʰavis tʰavs itsʰavs upʰlis ɡzebis abutʃad amɡdebi mokvdeba 
ɣatakis mtsqalobeli upʰals adzlevs sesxs da samaɡieros is miuzɣavs mas 
dasadʒe ʃeni ʃvili maɡram ar ɡanatsqo ʃeni suli mis sasikvdilod 
didad mrisxanes daedos sasdʒeli radɡan tʰu daindob mas moɡitsevs sasdʒelis ɡakvladeba 
ismine rtʃeva da miiɣe dariɡeba ratʰa dabrdzende sabolood 
bevri ɡanzraxvaa katsʰis ɡulʃi maɡram upʰlis ɡadatsqvetileba asruldeba 
adamianis stsrapʰva misi siketʰea da ɣataki sdʒobs mzakvar katsʰs 
upʰlis ʃiʃs sitsʰotsʰxlisaken mihqavs katsʰi madzɣari ikʰneba da ar etseva mas boroti 
zarmatsʰi xels hqopʰs lanɡarʃi da tʰavis pirtʰanatsʰ ar moabrunebs mas 
urtqi tʰavkʰarians da briqvi ɡonieri ɡaxdeba ʃeaɡone ɡoniers ɡaiɡebs stsavlas 
mamis mdzartsʰveli da dedis ɡamɡdebi ʃemartsʰxveneli da upatio ʃvilia 
nu moismen tʃemo ʃvilo ʃeɡonebas romelitsʰ ɡirtʃevs ɡonieri sitqvebidan ɡadaxvevas 
uɡvani motsme kʰirdavs samartʰals da uketʰurtʰa piri qlapavs usamartʰlobas 
tʰavkʰariantʰatʰvis mzadaa sasdʒeli reɡventʰa zurɡze ki tsʰema tqepaa 
ɣvino mkʰirdavia maɡari sasmeli xmauriani da aravin matʰɡan ɡatatsʰebuli ar dabrdzendeba 
lomis bokveris ɣrialivitʰaa mepʰis risxva misi ɡanmarisxebeli tʰavis tʰavs stsʰodavs 
tʃxubisɡan tʰavʃekaveba adamianis ɣirsebaa qoveli suleli ki bobokʰrobs 
zarmatsʰi ar xnavs ʃemodɡomidan mkis dros ki moitʰxovs da ar ikʰneba 
zraxva katsʰis ɡulʃi ɣrma tsqalia xolo ɡonieri katsʰi amoxapavs mas 
bevri ɡaidzaxis tʰavis siketʰes maɡram ertʰɡul katsʰs vin ipovnis 
martʰali tʰavisi ubitsobitʰ dadis netar arian misi dzeni mis ʃemdeɡ 
mepʰe mdʒdomi samartʰlis taxtze pʰantavs tʰvisi tʰvalebitʰ qovelive borots 
vin itqvis me ɡavasupʰtʰave tʃemi ɡuli me ɡanvitsmide tʃemi tsʰodvebisaɡan 
orɡvari satsoni orɡvari sazomi ertʰitsʰ da meoretsʰ edʒavreba upʰals 
tʰvisi sakʰtsʰielis mixedvitʰatsʰ itsʰnoba qmatsvili tʰu supʰtʰaa an tʰu samartʰliania misi sakʰme 
msmeneli quri da mxilveli tʰvali ertʰitsʰ da meoretsʰ upʰalma ʃekʰmna 
nu ɡeqvareba dzili ratʰa ar ɡaɣatakde ɡaaxile ʃeni tʰvali ɡadzɣebi puritʰ 
ar varɡa ar varɡa ambobs mqidveli xolo rodesatsʰ tsava trabaxobs 
aris okʰro da mravali marɡaliti xolo tsʰodnis baɡeni dzvirpʰasi nivtʰia 
aiɣe misi tansatsʰmeli radɡan utsʰxos daudɡa tʰavdebad da utsʰxotomelis tsilad ɡamoartʰva mas ɡirao 
saamuria katsʰisatʰvis sitsʰruis puri mere ki ɣorɣitʰ ɡaivseba misi piri 
ɡanzraxvani rtʃevitʰ mtkitsʰdeba maɡram ɡonierebitʰ tsarmartʰe omi 
saidumlos ɡamamxeleli tsʰilismtsamebelia da pirmorɣveulebʃi nu ɡaerevi 
mamisa da dedis matsqevars santʰeli tʃaukʰreba ukunetʰ tsqvdiadʃi 
dasatsqisʃi stsrapʰad ʃedzenili samkvidro kurtʰxeuli ar ikʰneba sabolood 
nu itqvi mivaɡeb borotis tsil ende upʰals da is ɡixsnis ʃen 
orɡvari satsoni sadzulvelia upʰlisatʰvis da mrudi sastsori ar aris karɡi 
upʰlisaɡanaa mamakatsʰis nabidʒebi adamiani ki roɡor ɡaiɡebs tʰavis ɡzas 
maxea adamianisatʰvis tsmidaze laqboba xolo aɣtʰkʰmatʰa ʃemdeɡ ɡansdʒa 
ɡapʰantavs uketʰurtʰ brdzeni mepʰe da matʰze moakʰtsʰevs borbals 
upʰlis santʰelia adamianis suli misi tsiaɣis idumalebatʰa ɡamomkvleveli 
tsqaloba da simartʰle itsʰaven mepʰes da tsqalobitʰ uciravs tʰavisi taxti 
cabuktʰa dideba matʰi dzalaa xolo moxutsʰtʰa brətsqinvaleba caɣara 
crilobani kurnaven borotisaɡan da tsʰema ɡuls asupʰtʰavebs 
tsqlis nakadia mepʰis ɡuli upʰlis xelʃi sadatsʰ moisurvebs ikʰ mimartʰavs mas 
katsʰis qvela ɡza stsoria mis tʰvalʃi xolo upʰali stsonis ɡulebs 
simartʰlisa da samartʰlis kʰmna msxverplze uketʰesia upʰlisatʰvis 
ampartavani tʰvali da zviadi ɡuli uketʰurtʰa santʰeli tsʰodvaa 
bedʒitʰis zraxvani mxolod matebiskenaa xolo qoveli daudevrisa klebisken 
ɡandzeulobis moxveca matquara enitʰ sikvdilis mdzebneltʰa tsarmavali kʰrolvaa 
uketʰurtʰa dzaladoba matʰve tsaatʰrevs radɡan matʰ uarqves samartʰlis kʰmna 
daklaknilia ɡarqvnili katsʰis ɡza xolo vintsʰ supʰtʰaa tsrpʰelia misi mokʰmedeba 
binis kunculʃi tsʰxovreba sdʒobs antʃxl kʰaltʰan saertʰo saxlʃi tsʰxovrebas 
uketʰuris suli borots aris daxarbebuli tsqalobas ver hpovebs mis tʰvalʃi misi moqvasi 
tʰavkʰarianis dasdʒisas briqvi brdzendeba brdzeni ki ʃeɡonebisas idzens tsʰodnas 
martʰali tʰvalqurs adevnebs uketʰuris saxls ubedurebas ʃeamtʰxvevs uketʰurtʰ 
vintsʰ qurs daitsʰobs ɣaribis dzaxilisaɡan isitsʰ mouxmobs ertʰ dɣes maɡram aravin ɡastsʰems pasuxs 
satʃukʰari pʰarulad midzɣvnili atsʰxrobs risxvas da kʰrtʰami ubeʃi dzlier ɡulistsqromas 
simartʰlis kʰmna sixarulia martʰlisatʰvis da ʃiʃis zari borotmokʰmedistʰvis 
ɡonebis ɡzas atsʰdenili adamiani mkvdartʰa krebulʃi daisvenebs 
mxiarulebis moqvaruli upovari ikʰneba ɣvinisa da zetʰis moqvaruli ar ɡamdidrdeba 
martʰlistʰvis ɡamosasqidi uketʰuria da tsrpʰeltʰa sanatsʰvloa moɣalate 
sdʒobs udabnos kʰveqanaʃi dʒdoma antʃxl da brazian kʰaltʰan qopʰnas 
sanatreli saɡandzuri da zetʰi brdzenis savaneʃia xolo briqvi adamiani ʃtʰantʰkʰavs matʰ 
simartʰlisa da motsqalebis mdevneli sitsʰotsʰxles simartʰles da pativs hpovebs 
dzliertʰa kʰalakʰs aiɣebs brdzeni da daanɡrevs mis saimedo simaɡres 
vintsʰ baɡes da enas itsʰavs is itsʰavs tʰavis suls ubedurebisaɡan 
zviadi ampartavani da tʰavkʰariania misi saxeli vintsʰ ampartavnobis mdzvinvitʰ ikʰtsʰeva 
zarmatsʰs tʰavisi sixarbe moklavs radɡan misi xelebi uars amboben ʃromaze 
mtʰel dɣes is sixarbitʰ xarbobs xolo martʰali ɡaiɣebs da ar zoɡavs 
uketʰurtʰa msxverpli sisadzaɡlea mitʰ umetes tʰu tsʰbierebitʰ stsiravs mas 
tsʰru motsme daiɣupeba da momsmeni katsʰi mudam ilaparakebs 
uketʰuri katsʰi isastikebs saxes xolo tsrpʰelma itsʰis tʰavisi ɡza 
ar aris sibrədzne da ar aris ɡoneba ar aris rtʃeva upʰlis sapirispirod 
tsʰxeni ɡamzadebulia brdzolis dɣisatʰvis maɡram ɡamardʒveba upʰlisɡanaa 
uketʰesia saxeli did simdidreze vertsʰxlsa da okʰros ki tsqaloba sdʒobs 
mdidari da ɣataki ertʰmanetʰs xvdebian matʰi qvelas ɡamtʃeni upʰalia 
ɡonierma dainaxa boroti da ɡaerida briqvebma ki ɡadaiares da daisadʒnen 
sazɣauri mortʃilebisa upʰlis ʃiʃisa aris simdidre pativi da sitsʰotsʰxle 
eklebi da maxeebia tsʰbierebis ɡzaze tʰavisi sulis damtsʰveli ɡaerideba matʰ 
aɣzarde qmatsvili misi ɡzis mixedvitʰ kidevatsʰ rom moxutsʰdes ar ɡadauxvevs misɡan 
mdidari ɣatakebze mtʰavrobs da msesxebeli monaa ɡamsesxeblisa 
usamartʰlobis damtʰesavi ubedurebas moimkis da misi mrisxanebis kvertʰxi ɡadatqdeba 
ketʰilmosurne kurtʰxeul ikʰneba radɡan tʰavisi puridan mistsʰa ɣaribs 
ɡaaɡde briqvi da ɡava ɡanxetʰkʰilebatsʰ ʃetsqdeba tʃxubi da kilva 
spetaki ɡulis moqvaruls siame akʰvs baɡeze misi moqvasi mepʰea 
upʰlis tʰvalebi itsʰaven tsʰodnas moɣalatis natʰkʰvams ki ɡaabatʰilebs 
zarmatsʰi ambobs lomia ɡaretʰ ʃua kʰutʃaʃi vikʰnebi mokluli 
ɣrma tʰxrilia utsʰxotʰa piri viszedatsʰ ɡamtsqralia upʰali tʃavardeba ʃiɡ 
sisulele miekro qmatsvilis ɡuls dariɡebis keti moaʃorebs misɡan 
vintsʰ ɣaribs tʃaɡravs ratʰa ɡaimravlos tʰavisi da adzlevs mdidars mas daakldeba 
daxare ʃeni quri da ismine sitqvani brdzentʰa da ʃeni ɡuli miapqar tʃems tsʰodnas 
radɡan saamo ikʰneba ʃentʰvis tʰu ʃens tsiaɣʃi ʃeinaxav da qvela ertʰad ɡanmtkitsʰdeba ʃens baɡeebze 
rom iqos upʰalʃi ʃeni saqrdeni ʃentsʰ ɡastsavle dɣes 
ɡana ar moɡtsere samdʒer rtʃevitʰa da stsavlitʰ 
rom mestsavlebina ʃentʰvis ceʃmaritebis sitqvatʰa simtkitsʰe ratʰa miɡeɡo ceʃmariti sitqvebi ʃens ɡamomɡzavneltʰatʰvis 
nu ɡadzartsʰvav ɣaribs radɡan ɣaribia iɡi da nu datʃaɡrav ɣataks karibcestʰan 
radɡan upʰali idavebs matʰ davas da suls tsaartʰmevs matʰ tsamartʰmeveltʰ 
nu daemoqvrebi brazians da pʰitsʰx katsʰtʰan nu mixval 
rom ar ɡaitsvrətʰna mis ɡzebʃi da ar dauɡo maxe ʃens suls 
nu ikʰnebi matʰ ʃoris xels rom urtqamen tʰavdebad rom udɡebian sesxze 
tʰu arapʰeri ɡmartʰebs ristʰvis ɡamoɡatsʰlian kʰveʃaɡebs 
nu ɡadastsʰdebi saukuno sazɣvars romelitsʰ ʃenma mamebma dades 
ɡinaxavs ʃen katsʰi stsrapʰi tʰavis sakʰmeʃi mepʰetʰa tsinaʃe tsardɡeba iɡi ar tsardɡeba bneltʰa tsinaʃe 
tʰu dadʒdebi batontʰan puris sacmelad karɡad daakvirdi ra aris ʃens tsinaʃe 
da daade dana ʃens saqlapavs tʰu msunaɡi xar 
nu moisurveb mis sacmelebs radɡan is matquara puria 
nu ʃealev ɣones ɡamdidrebas ʃeeʃvi amaze pʰikʰrs 
moavleb mas tʰvals da aɣar aris iɡi radɡan ʃeisxams iɡi pʰrtʰebs artsivivitʰ da tsʰaʃi apʰrindeba 
nu ʃecam tʰvalborotis purs da mis sacmelebs nu isurveb 
radɡan roɡortsʰ is pʰikʰrobs tʰavis sulʃi isetʰia iɡi came da svi ɡetqvis misi ɡuli ki ʃentʰan araa 
ʃens lukmas romelitsʰ ʃecame amoartsqev da amaod daxardʒav tʰavazian sitqvebs 
briqvis ɡasaɡonad nu ilaparakeb radɡan is abutʃad aiɡdebs ʃeni sitqvebis ɡonivrulobas 
nu ɡadastsʰdebi dzvel sazɣvars da oboltʰa mindvrebʃi nu ʃexval 
radɡan matʰi ɡamomsqidveli dzlieria is idavebs matʰ davas ʃentʰan 
ʃeni ɡuli miapqar dariɡebas da ʃeni qurebi tsʰodnis natʰkʰvams 
nu moeridebi qmatsvilis dasdʒas radɡan tʰu ʃoltitʰ stsʰem mas ar mokvdeba 
ʃen ʃoltitʰ stsʰem mas mis suls ki ʃavetʰisaɡan ixsni 
tʃemo ʃvilo tʰu dabrdzendeba ʃeni ɡuli ɡaixarebs tʃemi ɡulitsʰ 
da ɡamxiaruldeba tʃemi pʰiltvebi rodesatsʰ ʃeni baɡeni stsors ilaparakeben 
nu ʃeʃurdeba ʃens ɡuls tsʰodvilebisa aramed upʰlis ʃiʃʃi iqos mtʰel dɣes 
radɡan aris momavali da ʃeni imedi ar moispoba 
ismine ʃvilo da dabrdzendi da mimartʰe ʃeni ɡuli sartsmuno ɡzaze 
nu ikʰnebi ɣvinis msmeltʰa ʃoris xortsʰitʰ ɡaumadzɣartʰa ʃoris 
radɡan lotʰi da msunaɡi ɡaɣatakdeba da mdzinara tʃaitsʰvams dzondzebs 
usmine ʃens mamas man ɡʃoba ʃen da abutʃad nu aiɡdeb ʃens dedas rodesatsʰ moxutsʰdeba iɡi 
simartʰle ʃeidzine da sibrədznes ʃeɡonebasa da ɡonebas nu ɡaqidi 
lxenitʰ ilxens martʰlis mama da brdzenis mʃobeli ixarebs misitʰ 
ɡaixaron mamaʃenma da dedaʃenma da ilxinos ʃenma mʃobelma 
me mometsʰi ʃvilo ʃeni ɡuli da ʃenma tʰvalebma daitsʰvan tʃemi ɡza 
radɡan ɣrma ormoa medzavi da vitsro ca utsʰxotomeli kʰali 
is qatʃaɣivitʰ ɡisapʰrdeba da moɣalateebs amravlebs adamianebʃi 
vis vai da vis ui vis ʃuɣli vis satʃivari vis amao crilobebi vis tʰvalebis sitsitʰle 
ɣvinoze ɡvianobamde damxanebeltʰ ɡanzavebuli ɣvinis sacaʃnikod mavaltʰ 
nu uqureb ɣvinos rom tsitʰelia tʰass rom adzlevs tʰavis pʰers pirdapir rom ɡadadis qelʃi 
ʃemdeɡ ki ɡvelivitʰ ɡikbens da aspitivitʰ ɡitʃxvlets 
ʃeni tʰvalebi utsʰxo xilvebs ixilaven da ʃeni ɡuli ukuɣmartʰobas ilaparakebs 
ikʰnebi zɣvis ɡulʃi mtsolaresavitʰ an andzis tsverze 
mtsʰemen ar metkineba mirtqamen ver viɡrədznob rodis ɡaviɣvidzeb isev mas davutsqeb dzebnas 
nu ʃeɡʃurdeba boroti katsʰisa da nu isurveb matʰtʰan qopʰnas 
radɡan dzartsʰvaze pʰikʰrobs matʰi ɡuli siborotitʰ laparakoben matʰi baɡeni 
sibrədznitʰ aʃendeba saxli da ɡonebitʰ ɡanmtkitsʰdeba 
da tsʰodnitʰ otʰaxebi ɡaivseba qoveli dzvirpʰasi da saamuri kʰonebitʰ 
brdzeni mamakatsʰi dzlieria da mtsʰodne katsʰi imtkitsʰebs dzalas 
radɡan ɡonivrulad tsarmartʰav ʃens oms da mraval mrtʃevelʃia xsna 
sulelisatʰvis sibrədzne dznelad misatsvdomia karibcestʰan ar ɡaxsnis tʰavis baɡes 
vintsʰ borotis kʰmnas pʰikʰrobs mas borotɡanmzraxvels utsodeben 
sulelis ɡanzraxva tsʰodvaa xolo tʰavkʰariani sadzulvelia adamianisatʰvis 
daiɣlebi ɡasaciris dɣes mtsʰirea ʃeni dzala 
daipʰare sasikvdilod tsarɡzavnilni da nutʰu miatoveb dasaxotsʰad ɡantsirultʰ 
tʰu itqvi aba tʃven ar vitsʰoditʰ es ɡana ɡultʰamxilavi ver ɡaiɡebs ʃeni sulis mpʰarvelma xom itsʰis da is miuzɣavs adamians misi sakʰmisamebr 
came ʃvilo tʰapʰli radɡan karɡia iɡi da ɡoleuli etkboba ʃens sasas 
asetʰia sibrədznis ʃetsʰnoba ʃeni sulisatʰvis tʰu hpove iɡi qopʰila momavali da ʃeni imedi ar moispoba 
nu tʃausapʰrdebi uketʰuro martʰlis savanes nu ɡadzartsʰvav mis tsamosatsols 
radɡan ʃviddʒer daetsʰema martʰali maɡram adɡeba xolo uketʰurni ubedurebaʃi tsabordzikdebian 
ʃeni mtris datsʰemisas nu ɡaixareb da misi tsabordzikebisas nu ilxens ʃeni ɡuli 
tʰorem ixilavs upʰali da tsʰudad ɡamotʃndeba mis tʰvalʃi da moakʰtsʰevs misɡan tʰavis risxvas 
nu ɡaedʒibrebi borotmokʰmedtʰ da nu ʃeɡʃurdeba uketʰurtʰa 
radɡan momavali ar ekʰneba borots uketʰurtʰa santʰeli tʃakʰreba 
ɡeʃinodes upʰlisa ʃvilo da mepʰisa da meamboxeebʃi nu ɡaerevi 
radɡan utsʰabedad mova matʰi daɣupva da orives zians vin ʃeitsʰnobs 
esenitsʰ brdzentʰatʰvisaa mikerdzoeba sasamartʰloze ar aris karɡi 
vintsʰ uketʰurs eubneba ʃen martʰali xar imas xalxebi dastsqevlian imas erebi ʃerisxaven 
xolo mamxilebeltʰ siame ekʰnebatʰ da matʰze ɡadmova ketʰili kurtʰxeva 
tutʃebze kotsʰnis vintsʰ pasuxobs sartsmuno sitqvebitʰ 
ʃeasrule ʃeni sakʰme ɡaretʰ da moamzade mindorʃi iɡi ʃemdeɡ ki aaʃene ʃeni saxli 
nu ikʰnebi umizezo motsme ʃeni moqvasisa da nu tsʰdundebi ʃeni baɡeebitʰ 
nu itqvi roɡortsʰ is momekʰtsʰa metsʰ ise movekʰtsʰevi mas mivuzɣav katsʰs tʰavisi sakʰmisamebr 
zarmatsʰi katsʰis mindortʰan ɡaviare da uɡunuri adamianis venaxtʰan 
da aha sulmtʰlad ɣvardzlad amosuliqo misi zedapiri ekal bardebs daepʰara da misi kʰvis zɣude danɡreuliqo 
da vixile ɡulisquri mivapqar davinaxe dariɡeba miviɣe 
tsʰota dzili tsʰota tʰvlema tsʰota ɡulxeldakrepʰa dasatsolad 
da mova mɡzavrivitʰ ʃeni siɣatake da ʃeni siɣaribe pʰariani katsʰivitʰ
