me ʃens tsin tsaval da oɣro tʃoɣroebs ɡavastsoreb spilendzis karebs ʃevletsav da rkinis urdulebs davamtvrev 
da moɡtsʰem ʃen sibnelis saundʒetʰ da dapʰarul saɡandzurebs ratʰa itsʰode rom me var upʰali ʃentʰvis saxelis mtsodebeli israelis ɣmertʰi 
tʃemi msaxuris iakobis da israelis tʃemi rtʃeulis ɡulisatʰvis moɡixme ʃen ʃeni saxelitʰ pativi daɡde tʰumtsʰa ar mitsʰnobdi 
me var upʰali da sxva aravin tʃems ɡarda ar aris sxva ɣmertʰi me ʃemoɡartqam ʃen sartqels tʰumtsʰa ar mitsʰnobdi me 
ratʰa itsʰodnen mzis aɣmosavletʰidan dasavletʰamde rom aravin aris tʃems ɡarda me var upʰali da sxva aravin 
me sinatʰlis ɡamomsaxveli da sibnelis ʃemkʰmneli mʃvidobis mqopʰeli da ubedurebis ɡamtʃeni me upʰali vikʰm qovelive amas 
tʃamoapkuretʰ tsʰano maɣlidan da ɣrublebma simartʰle tʃamoasxuron ɡaiɣos dedamitsa da ɡamoiɣos xsnis naqopʰi samartʰlianoba ertʰbaʃad aɣmotsʰendeba me upʰalma ʃevkʰmeni es 
vai tʰavis ɡamomsaxveltʰan moʃuɣlars natexs mitsis natextʰaɡan ɡana etqvis tʰixa tʰavis ɡamomsaxvels ras aketʰeb ʃen an ʃeni naketʰebi itqvis ara akʰvso mas xelebi 
vai mtʰkʰmels tʰavis mamisadmi ras ʃob ʃen da kʰalisadmi ristʰvis etsamebi mʃobiarobitʰ 
ase tʰkʰva upʰalma israelis tsmidam da misma ɡamomsaxvelma momavalze mekitʰxebitʰ tʃems dzeebze da tʃemi xelis naketʰebze mibrdzanebtʰ me 
me ʃevkʰmeni dedamitsa da ɡavatʃine adamiani masze me tʃemma xelebma ɡadapʰines zetsʰani da mtʰel matʰ mxedrobas mivetsʰi tsesi 
me ɡamovaɣvidze samartʰlianobaʃi da mis qvela ɡzas me movastsoreb is aaʃenebs tʃems kʰalakʰs da tʃems devnilebs is ɡauʃvebs maɡram artsʰ pʰasitʰ da artsʰ kʰrtʰamitʰ tʰkʰva upʰalma tsʰabaotʰma 
ase tʰkʰva upʰalma eɡviptis cirnaxuli kʰuʃis vacroba da ʃebelni tanadi xalxi ʃentʰan ɡadmovlen da ʃeni ikʰnebian ʃens ukan ivlian borkilebitʰ ɡaivlian da ʃen ɡtsʰemen tʰaqvans ʃen ʃeɡevedrebian mxolod ʃenʃia ɣmertʰi da sxva ɣmertʰi ar aris 
ʃena xar dapʰaruli ɣmertʰi israelis ɣmertʰi mxsneli 
ʃertsʰxvenilni da ɡatsbilebulnitsʰ arian qvelani ertʰad tʃatsʰvivian sirtsʰxvilʃi kerptʰa mketʰebelni 
israeli upʰlis mier aris xsnili saukuno xsnitʰ ar ʃertsʰxvebitʰ da artsʰ ɡatsbildebitʰ ukunitʰi ukunisamde 
radɡan ase tʰkʰva upʰalma zetsʰis ɡamtʃenma is aris ɣmertʰi dedamitsis ɡamomsaxveli da misi ʃemkʰmneli man daamqara iɡi sitsʰarieled ar ʃeukʰmnia dasasaxleblad ɡamosaxa me var upʰali da sxva ar aris 
pʰarulad ar milaparakia dedamitsis bnel adɡilze ar mitʰkʰvams me iakobis tʰeslistʰvis sitsʰarieleʃi medzebetʰ me me var upʰali simartʰlis mtʰkʰmeli sistsoris ɡamomtsʰxadebeli 
ʃeikribetʰ da moditʰ ertʰad ʃeɡrovditʰ xalxebidan ɡadartʃenilno arapʰeri itsʰian matʰ tʰaviantʰ xis kerps rom atareben da evedrebian ɣmertʰs romelitsʰ ver ixsnis 
ɡamoatsʰxadetʰ da tsarmoadɡinetʰ ertʰad itʰatʰbiretʰ vin asmina es dzveltʰaɡan tsindatsin vin ɡamoatsʰxada es ɡana me ara upʰalma da ar aris sxva ɣmertʰi tʃems ɡarda martʰali da mxsneli ɣmertʰi araa tʃems meti 
moikʰetsʰitʰ tʃemken da xsnilni ikʰnebitʰ radɡan me var ɣmertʰi da ar aris sxva 
tʃemi tʰavi davipʰitsʰe me tʃemi piridan simartʰle ɡamovida ʃeutsʰvleli sitqva rom tʃems tsinaʃe moidrikeba qoveli muxli da damipʰitsʰebs qoveli ena 
itqvian tʃemze mxolod upʰalʃia simartʰle da dzala mastʰan movlen da ʃertsʰxvebian qvelani masze ɡaɡulisebulni 
upʰalʃi ɡamartʰldeba da ɡandiddeba israelis mtʰeli modɡma 
tʃaimuxla belma moixara nebo matʰi kerpebi tsʰxovelebsa da sakʰonels ahkides tʰkʰvens mier natarebi tvirtʰi tvirtʰia daɣlili pirutqvistʰvis 
tʃaikuznen tʃaimuxles ertʰbaʃad ver ʃedzles tvirtʰis ɡadartʃena da tʰvitʰonatsʰ tqveobaʃi tsavidnen 
misminetʰ me iakobis saxlo da israelis saxlis mtʰelo nartʃeno dedis mutsʰlidan dedis saʃodan tʃems mier natarebno 
tʰkʰvens siberemde me iɡive var da tʰkʰvens caɣaramde ɡzidavtʰ tʰkʰven me ʃevkʰmeni da me vitvirtʰav me vzidav da me ɡadavartʃen 
vis mimamsɡavsebtʰ da ʃemadarebtʰ vis mimamɡvanebtʰ rom msɡavsni viqotʰ 
romlebitsʰ ɡadmoabneven kʰisidan okʰros da vertsʰxls sastsorze stsonian kʰiraoben okʰromcedels rom ɣmertʰi ɡaaketʰos misɡan kʰeds uxrian da tʰaqvans stsʰemen mas 
ɡaideben mas mxarze atareben da deben mis adɡilze dɡas da ar idzvris adɡilidan uqvirian da pasuxs ar stsʰems matʰ ɡasacirʃi ver ixsnis 
ɡaixsenetʰ es da ɡamxnevditʰ miitanetʰ damnaʃaveno ɡultʰan 
ɡaixsenetʰ pirvandelni ukunetʰidan radɡan me var ɣmertʰi da ar aris sxva ɣmertʰi var da ar aris tʃemi msɡavsi 
vautsqeb dasabamidan ukanasknels da dzveltʰaɡanve imas ratsʰ ar momxdara vambob tʃemi ɡadatsqvetileba aɣsruldeba da qovelive tʃems neba survils aɣvasruleb 
movuxmob aɣmosavletʰidan mtatsʰebel pʰrinvels ʃori kʰveqnidan tʃemi ɡadatsqvetilebis aɣmsrulebels me vtʰkʰvi da movatsev kidetsʰ amas davsaxe da aɣvasruleb kidetsʰ 
misminetʰ me ɡulmaɡarno simartʰles ɡanʃorebulno 
me movaaxlove tʃemi simartʰle ʃors ar aris da tʃemi xsna ar daaxanebs da movitan sionze xsnas da israelistʰvis tʃems didebas 
tʃamodi da tʃadʒekʰi mtverʃi kʰaltsulo babilonis asulo dadʒekʰi mitsaze utaxtod kʰaldeveltʰa asulo radɡan metad aɣar ɡitsodeben ʃen nazsa da satʰutʰs 
aiɣe dolabi da dapʰkʰvi pʰkʰvili ɡadaitsie sapʰarveli aitsie kaltʰa ɡaiʃiʃvle tsvivi ɡadaiare mdinareebi 
ɡamotʃndeba ʃeni siʃiʃvle da danaxul ikʰneba ʃeni sirtsʰxvili ʃurs vidzieb da veravin damabrkolebs 
tʃveni ɡamomxsnelis saxelia israelis tsmida 
tʃumad idʒekʰi midi sibneleʃi kʰaldeveltʰa asulo radɡan aɣar ɡitsodeben samepʰotʰa dedopʰals 
me ɡanvurisxdi tʃems xalxs ɡavarioʃe tʃemi samkvidro da ʃens xeltʰ ɡadmovetsʰi isini maɡram ʃen ar moiɣe matʰze tsqaloba moxutsʰs metismetad daumdzime ʃeni uɣeli 
ambobdi saukunod vikʰnebi dedopʰali ar miitane es ʃens ɡultʰan ar ɡaixsene misi bolo 
axla ki ismine es nebiero usapʰrətʰxod mdʒdomarev rom ambob ʃens ɡulʃi me var da aravinaa tʃems ɡarda ar davdʒdebi kʰvrivad da ar metsʰodineba ʃvilmkvdroba 
maɡram ɡetseva es ori utsʰbad ertʰ dɣes ʃvilmkvdroba da sikʰvrive srulad daɡatqdeba tʰavs miuxedavad ʃeni bevri dʒadokʰrobisa miuxedavad ʃens ɡrədzneulebatʰa dzalisa 
daimedebuli iqavi borotis kʰmnisas aravin mxedavs me ʃenma sibrədznem da ʃenma tsʰodnam ɡaɡrəqvna ʃen ki ambobdi ʃens ɡulʃi me var da aravinaa tʃems ɡarda 
tʰavs daɡatqdeba boroteba ar ɡetsʰodineba misi ʃelotsʰva daɡetsʰema ubedureba ver ʃesdzleb misɡan ɡamosqidvas utsʰeb daɡatqdeba tʰavs ubedureba rasatsʰ ar eli 
idekʰi axla ʃens ɡrədzneulebebze da ʃens uamrav dʒadokʰrobaze romeltʰa ɡamotsʰ ʃromobdi ʃeni siqmatsvilidan ikʰneb ʃedzlo sarɡeblobis miɣeba ikʰneb ɡamaɡrde 
dakʰantsʰuli xar mraval rtʃevatʰaɡan modɡnen varskvlavtʰmcvretelebi axalmtʰavrobatʰa mtsʰodneni da ɡixsnan imisɡan ratsʰ unda daɡatqdes tʰavs 
bzesavitʰ ɡaxdnen tsʰetsʰxlma datsva isini ver ixsnes sakutʰari tʰavi alisaɡan ar dartʃa nakvertsʰxali ɡasatʰbobad tsʰetsʰxli mis tsin tʃamosadʒdomad 
asetʰebi ɡaxdnen ʃentʰvis isini romlebtʰanatsʰ vacrobdi siqmatsvilidan tʰitʰoeuli tʰavis ɡzaze tsaxetialda aravin aris ʃeni mxsneli 
isminetʰ es iakobis saxlo israelis saxelitʰ tsodebulno da iudas tsqlebidan ɡamosulno dampʰitsʰebelno upʰlis saxelitʰ da israelis ɣmertʰis mxsenebelno maɡram artsʰ ceʃmaritebitʰa da artsʰ simartʰlitʰ 
radɡan tsmida kʰalakʰidan tsarmoʃobils utsodeben isini tʰaviantʰ tʰavs da israelis ɣmertʰze arian dandobilni upʰali tsʰabaotʰia misi saxeli 
pirvandelni didi xnitʰ adre ɡamovatsʰxade da tʃemi piridan ɡamovida da vautsqebdi matʰ da utsʰbad vikʰmodi da sruldeboda 
radɡan vitsʰodi rom dʒiuti xar da rkinis dzarɣvisaa ʃeni kʰedi ʃeni ʃubli ki spilendzisa 
ɡamoɡitsʰxade didi xnitʰ adre sanam es moxdeboda ɡautsqe rom ar ɡetʰkʰva tʃemma kʰandakma ɡaaketʰa es da tʃemma tʃamosxmulma kerpma mibrdzana es 
ʃen ɡaɡonili ɡakʰvs ixile es qvelapʰeri nutʰu ar aɣiareb me ɡautsqe ʃen axalni da dapʰarulnitsʰ ki ratsʰ ar itsʰodi 
axla ɡatʃnda isini da ara didi xnis tsin da dɣemde ar ɡsmenia ʃen matʰze rom ar tʰkʰva aha vitsʰodi es 
artsʰ ɡsmenia da artsʰ itsʰodi da artsʰ utsindlidan ar iqo ɡaxsnili ʃeni quri radɡan vitsʰodi rom miɣalatebdi da dedis mutsʰlidan ɡanmdɡari ɡitsodes 
tʃemi saxelis ɡulisatʰvis davatsʰxrob tʃems risxvas da tʃemi didebis ɡulisatʰvis viokeb tʰavs rom ar moɡkvetʰo ʃen 
aha me ɡamoɡadne maɡram ara roɡortsʰ vertsʰxli tsamebis brədzmedʃi ɡamoɡtsʰade 
tʃemi ɡulisatʰvis tʃemi ɡulisatʰvis vmokʰmedeb radɡan roɡor unda ɡarioʃdes tʃemi saxeli tʃems didebas sxvas ar mivtsʰem 
mismine me iakob da israel me iɡive var me var pirveli da me var ukanasknelitsʰ 
tʃemma xelma daapʰudzna dedamitsa da tʃemma mardʒvenam ɡadacima zetsʰa me movuxmob matʰ da ertʰad dadɡebian 
ʃeɡrovditʰ qvelani da isminetʰ matʰɡan vin ɡamoatsʰxada es upʰalma ʃeiqvara iɡi ʃeasrulebs mis nebas babilonze da misi mklavi kʰaldevelebze aɣimartʰeba 
me me vtʰkʰvi da movuxme mas me moviqvane is da tsarmatebuli ikʰneba misi ɡza 
momiaxlovditʰ me isminetʰ es tʰavidan pʰarulad ar milaparakia im droidan rotsʰa es moxda ikʰ viqavi axla ki upʰalma ɣmertʰma da misma sulma momavlina me 
ase ambobs upʰali ʃeni mxsneli israelis tsmida me var upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi romelitsʰ ɡastsavlis sarɡeblobas romelitsʰ miɡidzɣvis im ɡzaze romelzetsʰ unda dadiode 
qurad rom ɡeɣo tʃemi mtsʰnebebi mdinaresavitʰ ikʰneboda ʃeni mʃvidoba da ʃeni simartʰle zɣvis talɣebivitʰ 
kʰviʃasavitʰ mravali ikʰneboda ʃeni tʰesli da ʃeni tsiaɣis naʃierni kʰviʃis martsʰvlebivitʰ ar moikvetʰeboda da ar tsaiʃleboda misi saxeli tʃems tsinaʃe 
ɡamoditʰ babilonidan ɡaikʰetsʰitʰ kʰaldeveltʰaɡan mxiaruli xmitʰ ɡamoatsʰxadetʰ autsqetʰ es ɡaavrtsʰeletʰ kʰveqnis kidemde tʰkʰvitʰ ɡamoisqida upʰalma tʰavisi msaxuri iakobi 
matʰ ar stsqurodatʰ udabnoebʃi rotsʰa mihqavda isini kldidan tsqali udina matʰ da ɡaapo klde da ɡadmotʃkʰepʰa tsqalma 
ar aris mʃvidoba ambobs upʰali boroteultʰatʰvis 
misminetʰ me kundzulebo da qurad iɣetʰ ʃoreulo xalxebo upʰalma dedis mutsʰlidan momixmo me tʃemi dedis tsiaɣidan axsena tʃemi saxeli 
da dasdo tʃemi piri basri maxvilivitʰ tʰavis xelis tʃrdilʃi ʃemipʰara me da damdo me tsamaxul israd tʰavis kaparcʃi dammala me 
da mitʰxra tʃemi msaxuri xar ʃen romelʃitsʰ ɡavbrətsqindebi 
me vutʰxari amaod davʃveri pʰucad da tquilad davxardʒe tʃemi dzala maɡram tʃemi samartʰali upʰaltʰanaa da tʃemi sazɣauri tʃems ɣmertʰtʰan 
da axla tʰkʰva tʃemma upʰalma dedis mutsʰlidan tʰavis msaxurad tʃemma ɡamomsaxvelma ratʰa mivabruno misken iakobi da israeli mastʰan ʃeikribos ratʰa pativdebuli viqo upʰlis tʰvalʃi da tʃemi ɣmertʰi iqos tʃemi dzala 
da tʰkʰva man ar kmara iakobis ʃtotʰa aɣsadɡenad me ɡaɡxdi ʃen xalxebis sinatʰled ratʰa tʃemi xsna dedamitsis kidemde iqos 
ase utʰxra upʰalma israelis mxsnelma da misma tsmidam adamiantʰaɡan abutʃad aɡdebultʰ xalxtʰaɡan ʃedzulebultʰ batontʰa msaxurebs mepʰeni ixilaven da aɣdɡebian mtʰavarni ki tʰaqvans stsʰemen upʰlis ɡulisatʰvis romelitsʰ mtkitsʰea israelis tsmidas romelmatsʰ amoɡartʃia 
ase ambobs upʰali da xsnis dɣes ʃeɡetsie ʃeɡinaxav da ɡaɡxdi ʃen eris aɣtʰkʰmad ratʰa aɣadɡino kʰveqana da daumkvidro aoxrebuli samkvidroebi 
rom utʰxra tqvetʰ ɡamoditʰ da imatʰatsʰ vintsʰ bnelʃia ɡamotʃnditʰ ɡzispirebze ɡamoikvebebian da qovel xmel ɡoraze ikʰneba matʰi sadzovari 
ar moʃivdebatʰ da ar mostsqurdebatʰ da ar dahkravs matʰ papanakʰeba da mze radɡan matʰi ʃembralebeli tsarudzɣveba matʰ da tsqlis tsqaroebze miiqvans 
tʃems qvela mtʰas ɡzad vakʰtsʰev da tʃemi bilikebi aitseva 
aha eseni ʃoridan movlen da aha eseni tʃrdiloetʰidan da zɣvidan eseni ki sinimis kʰveqnidan 
imxiaruletʰ tsʰano da ilxine dedamitsav da ʃemosdzaxetʰ mtʰebo simɣera radɡan anuɡeʃa upʰalma tʰavisi eri da tʰavis datʃaɡrultʰ ʃeibralebs 
da tʰkʰva sionma damtova me upʰalma da damivitsqa me upʰalma 
ɡana daivitsqebs kʰali tʰavis dzudzutʰa bavʃvs da ar ʃeibralebs dzes tʰavisi mutsʰlisas imatʰatsʰ rom daivitsqon me ar daɡivitsqeb ʃen 
me xom tʃems xelis ɡulebze ɡamoɡxaze ʃeni zɣudeni mudam tʃems tsinaʃea 
istsrapʰian ʃenken ʃeni mʃenebelni ʃeni damarbevelni da amaoxrebelni ɡavlen ʃenɡan 
moavle irɡvliv ʃeni tʰvali da dainaxe qvelani ʃeikribnen modian ʃentʰan tsʰotsʰxali var ambobs upʰali radɡan matʰ qvelas samkaulebivitʰ ɡaiketʰeb tʃamoikideb matʰ roɡortsʰ patardzali 
radɡan ʃeni dakʰtsʰeuli da aoxrebuli adɡilebi dɣesatsʰ ki vitsro ikʰneba satsʰxovreblad da ʃeni tʃamqlapavni ʃors ikʰnebian 
kvlav itqvian ʃens ɡasaɡonad ʃeni dakarɡuli ʃvilebi vitsroa tʃemtʰvis es adɡili ɡaitsie rom davsaxlde 
da ʃen itqvi ʃens ɡulʃi vin miʃva me eseni me xom ʃvilmkvdari viqavi unaqopʰo devnili da ukuɡdebuli eseni ki vin ɡazarda me xom marto davrtʃi sad iqvnen eseni 
ase tʰkʰva upʰalma ɣmertʰma aha me aɣvmartʰav tʃems xels xalxebisaken da erebis tsinaʃe aɣvmartʰav tʃems alams isini moiqvanen ʃens vaʒebs kaltʰitʰ da ʃeni asulni mxrebitʰ ikʰnebian natarebi 
mepʰeni ikʰnebian ʃeni ɡamzrdelni da matʰi dedopʰalni ʃeni dzidzebi pirkʰve damxobitʰ tʰaqvans ɡtsʰemen ʃen da ʃens pʰerxtʰa mtvers alokaven da mixvdebian rom me upʰali var rom ar ʃertsʰxvebian tʃemi moimedeni 
tsaertʰmeva nadavli dzliers an ɡadartʃeba 
radɡan ase tʰkʰva upʰalma tʰu dzlieris tqvetsʰ tsaqvanili ikʰneba da sastikis nadavlitsʰ ɡadartʃeba me tʰavad ɡavumartʰav davas ʃens modaves da ʃens vaʒebs me vixsni 
vacmev ʃens ʃemcirvebeltʰ tʰaviantʰ xortsʰs da roɡortsʰ tkbili ɣvinitʰ datʰvrebian isini tʰaviantʰi sisxlitʰ da ʃeitqobs qvela xortsʰieli rom me var upʰali ʃeni mxsneli da ʃeni ɡamomsqidveli iakobis dzlieri 
ase tʰkʰva upʰalma sad aris ɡaqris tserili romlitʰatsʰ ɡauʃvi dedatʰkʰveni an romel tʃems movales miɡqidetʰ tʰkʰven xom tʰkʰveni urdʒuloebis ɡamo iqavitʰ ɡaqidulni da tʰkʰveni danaʃaulis ɡamo ikʰna dedatʰkʰveni ɡaʃvebuli 
ratom ar iqo aravin rotsʰa movedi vidzaxdi da ar iqo pasuxis ɡamtsʰemi ɡana damoklda tʃemi xeli ɡamosqidvistʰvis an aɣar aris tʃemʃi dzala ʃetsevnisa me xom tʃemi saqveduritʰ vaʃrob zɣvas da mdinareebs udabnod vakʰtsʰev aqroldebian matʰi tʰevzebi utsqlobis ɡamo da daixotsʰebian tsqurvilitʰ 
me vmosav zetsʰas tsqvdiaditʰ da dzadzas vdeb matʰ dasaburad 
upʰalma ɣmertʰma momtsʰa me mtsʰodnetʰa ena rom ʃevdzlo daɣlilis ɡamaɡreba sitqvitʰ maɣvidzebs is qovel dilitʰ aɣvidzebs tʃems qurs rom movismino mtsʰodnetʰa msɡavsad 
upʰalma ɣmertʰma ɡamixsna me quri me ki ar ʃevetsinaaɣmdeɡe ukan ar davixie 
tʃemi zurɡi mivetsʰi tʃems mtsʰemeltʰ da tʃemi loqebi tʰmis mɡledʒeltʰ tʃems saxes ar vipʰaravdi ɡinebisa da pʰurtʰxisaɡan 
upʰali ɣmertʰi mexmareba me amitom ara var ʃertsʰxvenili amitom ɡavikaʒe tʃemi saxe da vitsʰi ar ʃevrətsʰxvebi 
axlosaa tʃemi ɡammartʰlebeli vin idavebs tʃemtʰan davdɡetʰ ertʰad vin memartʰleba movides tʃemtʰan 
aha upʰali ɣmertʰi mexmareba me vin aris rom madanaʃaulebs qvela isini samoselivitʰ dadzveldebian tʃrtʃili ʃecams matʰ 
vin aris tʰkʰvenɡan visatsʰ eʃinia upʰlisa vintsʰ usmens xmas misi msaxurisa vintsʰ dadis bnelʃi da ara akʰvs natʰeli miendos upʰlis saxels da daeqrədnos tʰavis ɣmertʰs 
aha tsʰetsʰxlis ɡamɣvivebelno napertsklebis damkavebelno iaretʰ qvelam tʰkʰveni tsʰetsʰxlis alʃi da xandzrebʃi tʰkʰven rom daantʰetʰ tʃemi xelidan ɡekʰnebatʰ es tʰkʰven samtsuxareblad datsvebitʰ 
misminetʰ me simartʰlis mimdevarno upʰlis madziebelno ʃexedetʰ kldes saidanatsʰ xartʰ ɡamokvetʰilni da ormos siɣrmes romlisɡanatsʰ xartʰ amoqvanilni 
ʃexedetʰ abraams tʰkʰvens mamas da saras tʰkʰvens mʃobels radɡan im ertʰs movuxme me is vakurtʰxe da ɡavamravle 
radɡan upʰali anuɡeʃebs sions anuɡeʃebs mis qvela nanɡrevs da edemivitʰ akʰtsʰevs mis udabnos da mis tramals upʰlis tsalkotivitʰ sixaruli da mxiaruleba ikʰneba masʃi samadlobeli da simɣeris xma 
mismine me tʃemo ero da tʃemo xalxo quri damiɡde radɡan tʃemɡan ɡamova rdʒuli da tʃems samartʰals xalxebze sinatʰled movapʰen 
axlos aris tʃemi simartʰle ɡamovida tʃemi xsna da tʃemi mklavi xalxebs ɡanikitʰxavs kundzulebi me damendobian da tʃems mklavs daeqrədnobian 
tsʰas miapqaritʰ tʰkʰveni tʰvalebi da daxedetʰ dedamitsas kʰvemotʰ radɡan tsʰa bolivitʰ ɡaipʰanteba da dedamitsa samoselivitʰ dadzveldeba da misi mtsʰxovrebni matʰ kvalze daixotsʰebian tʃemɡan xsna ki saukunod ikʰneba da tʃemi simartʰle ar ʃetsqdeba 
misminetʰ me simartʰlis mtsʰodneno xalxo nu ɡeʃiniatʰ katsʰisɡan ʃeɡinebisa da matʰi landzɣva nu daɡapʰrətʰxobtʰ 
radɡan roɡortsʰ tansatsʰmels tʃrtʃili ʃecams matʰ da roɡortsʰ matqls matli ʃecams matʰ tʃemi simartʰle ki saukunod ikʰneba da tʃemi xsna tʰaobidan tʰaobaʃi 
ɡaiɣvidze ɡaiɣvidze ʃeimose dzala upʰlis mklavo ɡaiɣvidze roɡortsʰ tsina dɣeebʃi dzvel tʰaobebʃi ɡana ʃen ar daanakutse rahabi ʃen ar mohkali urtʃxuli 
ɡana ʃen ar amoaʃre zɣva tsqlebi didi upʰskrulisa zɣvis siɣrmeni ɡzad ar akʰtsʰie ɡamoxsniltʰa ɡasavlelad 
da upʰlis mier ɡamosqidulni dabrundebian da movlen sionʃi simɣeritʰ da saukuno sixaruli ikʰneba matʰ tʰavze ʃvebas da sixaruls hpoveben isini dardi da oxvra ɡankʰardeba 
tʰavad me var me tʰkʰveni nuɡeʃismtsʰemeli vin xar ʃen rom ɡeʃinia katsʰisa romelitsʰ kvdeba da adamis dzisa romelitsʰ balaxad aris ʃeratsʰxili 
da daivitsqe upʰali ʃeni ʃemkʰmneli tsʰis ɡadamcimeli da dedamitsis dampʰudznebeli da ɡeʃinia mudam ʃemacirveblis risxvisa rodesatsʰ is emzadeba mosaspobad maɡram sad aris ʃemacirveblis risxva 
male ɡantʰavisupʰldeba tselʃi moxrili da xaroʃi ar mokvdeba da ar daakldeba mas puri 
da me var upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi zɣvis amɣelvebeli da ɣrialeben misi talɣebi upʰali tsʰabaotʰia misi saxeli 
me tʃavde tʃemi sitqvebi ʃens pirʃi da tʃemi xelis tʃrdilʃi ʃeɡipʰare ʃen rom mometsqo zetsʰa da damepʰudznebina dedamitsa da metʰkʰva sionisatʰvis tʃemi eri xar 
ɡamoiɣvidze ɡamoiɣvidze aɣdekʰ ierusalimo ʃen romelmatsʰ ʃesvi upʰlis xelidan misi risxvis tʰasi satsamlavɡareuli pʰiala bolomde ʃesvi 
ara hqavs mas ɡamdzɣoli ara hqavs xelis damceri dzetʰa ʃoris romlebitsʰ ɡazarda man 
ori es ubedureba ɡetsia vin ɡaakʰnevs tʰavs ʃenze dzartsʰva da nɡreva ʃimʃili da maxvili tʃems meti vin ɡanuɡeʃebs 
ʃeni dzeni daudzlurdnen tsvanan qoveli kʰutʃis tʰavʃi roɡortsʰ ɡaretʰxa asmanakʃi savseni upʰlis risxvitʰ ʃeni ɣmertʰis mukʰaritʰ 
amitom ismine es tsamebulo da mtʰvralo maɡram ara ɣvinitʰ 
ase ambobs ʃeni meupʰe upʰali da ʃeni ɣmertʰi mosartʃle tʰavisi erisa aha aviɣe satsamlavɡareuli tʰasi ʃeni xelidan nalekʰi tʃemi risxvis tʰasisa metad aɣar ʃesvam mas 
da mivtsʰem mas ʃens mtandʒveltʰ xelʃi romlebitsʰ eubnebodnen ʃens suls daemxe da tʃven ɡadavivlitʰ ʃenze da ʃen daɡidevs ʃeni zurɡi mitsasavitʰ kʰutʃasavitʰ ɡamvleltʰatʰvis 
ɡaiɣvidze ɡaiɣvidze ʃeimose ʃeni dzala siono ʃeimose ʃeni brətsqinvalebis samosi ierusalimo tsmida kʰalakʰo radɡan metad aɣar ʃemova ʃenʃi tsinadautsʰvetʰeli da utsmiduri 
tʃamoibertqe mtveri adekʰi datqvevebulo ierusalimo ɡaixseni ʃeni kisris dʒacvebi datqvevebulo sionis asulo 
radɡan ase tʰkʰva upʰalma mukʰtʰad iqavitʰ tʰkʰven ɡaqidulni da vertsʰxlitʰ ver ɡamoisqidebitʰ 
radɡan ase tʰkʰva upʰalma ɣmertʰma eɡvipteʃi tʃavida tʃemi eri ertʰ dros rom etsʰxovra ikʰ aʃuri ki arapʰristʰvis tʃaɡravda mas 
axla ki ra damrtʃenia akʰ ambobs upʰali tʰu tʃemi xalxi mukʰtʰad aris tsaqvanili misi ɡanmɡebelni ɣmuian ambobs upʰali da mudam qoveldɣe ibɣaleba tʃemi saxeli 
amitom ʃeitqobs tʃemi eri tʃems saxels amitom ʃeitqobs im dɣes rom me var is vintsʰ ambobs akʰa var 
ra mʃvenieria mtʰebze pʰerxni maxaroblisa mʃvidobis mautsqeblisa siketʰis maxaroblisa xsnis mautsqeblisa romelitsʰ eubneba sions ɡamepʰda ʃeni ɣmertʰi 
xma ʃeni ɡuʃaɡebisa aɣavlenen isini xmas ertʰad imɣereben radɡan tʰavisi tʰvalitʰ dainaxaven upʰlis dabrunebas sionʃi 
mxiarulad ʃemosdzaxetʰ imɣeretʰ ertʰad ierusalimis nanɡrevebo radɡan anuɡeʃa upʰalma tʰavisi eri ɡamoisqida ierusalimi 
ɡaiʃiʃvla upʰalma tʰavisi tsmidis mklavi qvela xalxis tʰvaltsin da dainaxavs dedamitsis qoveli kide tʃveni ɣmertʰis mier xsnas 
ɡaʃorditʰ ɡaʃorditʰ ɡaditʰ ikʰidan utsmidurs ar ʃeexotʰ ɡamoditʰ misi tsiaɣidan ɡanitsmidetʰ upʰlis curclebis mtvirtʰvelno 
maɡram atʃkʰarebitʰ ar ɡamoxvaltʰ da artsʰ ltolvilivitʰ ivlitʰ radɡan tʰkʰvens tsin ivlis upʰali da tʰkʰvens ukan mtsʰvelad israelis ɣmertʰi 
aha tsaremartʰeba tʃems msaxurs aɣimartʰeba aitseva da didad amaɣldeba 
roɡortsʰ ɡantsʰvipʰrədnen mravalni ʃeni mnaxvelni radɡan damaxindʒebuli iqo misi pirisaxe da misi ieri adamis dzisas ar hɡavda 
ase ʃeaʃpʰotʰebs is bevr xalxebs mepʰeni mokumaven mis ɡamo pirs radɡan dainaxaven imas ratsʰ ar uambiatʰ matʰtʰvis da ratsʰ ar smeniatʰ imas ɡaiɡeben 
vin irtsmuna tʃvens mier mosmenili da visze ɡamotʃnda mklavi upʰlisa 
amovida roɡortsʰ qlorti mis tsinaʃe da roɡortsʰ pʰesvi urtsquli mitsidan artsʰ tanadoba hkʰonia mas artsʰ didebuleba rom ɡvetsʰkʰira mistʰvis artsʰ ɡareɡnoba rom mivezidetʰ 
ʃesazizɣi iqo is da katsʰtʰaɡan mitovebuli ɡatandʒuli da dasneulebuli da tʃven saxes varidebditʰ mas ʃesazizɣi iqo da arapʰrad vaɡdebditʰ 
maɡram itvirtʰa man tʃveni sneulebani da tʃveni tkivilebitʰ ɡaitandʒa tʃven ki vpʰikʰrobditʰ rom naɡvemi iqo ɣmertʰis mier natsʰemi da tsamebuli 
maɡram is dacrili iqo tʃvens danaʃaultʰa ɡamo daletsili tʃveni urdʒuloebis ɡamo tʃveni sasdʒeli masze iqo da misi crilobebitʰ tʃven ɡanvikurnetʰ 
tʃven qvelani tsʰxvrebivitʰ ɡzas avtsʰditʰ da tʰitʰoeuli tʃvenɡani tʰavis ɡzas daadɡa da upʰalma mas daakisra qvela tʃvenɡanis urdʒuloeba 
ʃevitsrovebuli iqo da tsamebuli maɡram ar ɡauxsnia tʰavisi baɡe roɡortsʰ kravi dasaklavad rom mihqavtʰ da roɡortsʰ tsʰxvari mis mparsveltʰa tsinaʃe rom dums 
patimrobidan da samsdʒavrodan ikʰna tsaqvanili da mis modɡmaze vin ilaparakebs radɡan mokvetʰil ikʰna tsʰotsʰxaltʰa kʰveqnidan tʃemi xalxis danaʃaulis ɡamo ɡaniɡmira 
da borotmokʰmedebtʰan mietsʰa sapʰlavi maɡram mdidrebtʰan iqo tʰavis sikvdilʃi tʰumtsʰa ar tʃaudenia mas dzaladoba da sitsʰrue ar iqo mis baɡeʃi 
maɡram upʰals surda misi daletsva misi dasneuleba tʰu dasdebs is tʰavis suls danaʃaulis msxverplad ixilavs is ʃtʰamomavlobas ɡaiɡrdzelebs dɣeebs da upʰlis neba misi xelitʰ miaɣtsevs tsarmatebas 
tʰavisi sulis dʒapʰisaɡan ixilavs natʰels da dakmaqopʰildeba tʰavisi sibrədznitʰ mravaltʰ ɡaamartʰlebs tʃemi martʰali msaxuri da matʰ tsʰodvebs is itvirtʰavs 
amitom bevrs mivtsʰem mas tsilad da dzlierebtʰan ɡainatsilebs is nadavls imis sanatsʰvlod rom sasikvdilod ɡatsira tʰavisi suli da borotmokʰmedebtʰan ʃeiratsʰxa da mravaltʰa tsʰodva itvirtʰa da damnaʃavetʰatʰvis iʃuamdɡomla 
ixare bertso visatsʰ arasdros ar ɡiʃobia ʃemosdzaxe simɣera da imxiarule utandʒvelo mʃobiarobitʰ radɡan martoxelas dzeni metni ikʰnebian vidre kʰmrianis dzeni ambobs upʰali 
ɡaapʰartʰove adɡili ʃeni karvisa da pʰardebi ʃeni satsʰxovreblisa dacime nu dainaneb daaɡrdzele ʃeni sabelebi da ʃeni paloebi ɡaamaɡre 
radɡan mardʒvniv da martsʰxniv ɡanivrtsʰobi da ʃeni tʰesli xalxebs daipqrobs da ukatsʰriel kʰalakʰebs daasaxlebs 
nu ɡeʃinia radɡan ar ʃertsʰxvebi da ar ɡatsbildebi radɡan aɣar ʃeɡrətsʰxveba radɡan siqmatsvilis sirtsʰxvils daivitsqeb da ʃeni kʰvrivobis upatiobas aɣar ɡaixseneb 
radɡan ʃeni kʰmari ʃeni ʃemkʰmnelia upʰali tsʰabaotʰia misi saxeli da ʃeni mxsneli israelis tsmida mtʰeli kʰveqnis ɣmertʰad itsodeba 
radɡan roɡortsʰ kʰali mitovebuli da sulmtsuxare moɡixmo ʃen upʰalma da roɡortsʰ siqmatsvilis tsʰoli romelitsʰ modzulebuli iqo ambobs ʃeni ɣmertʰi 
tsamierad daɡtove da didi motsqalebitʰ ʃeɡkreb ʃen 
risxvis ɡznebaʃi daɡimale tsamierad tʃemi saxe da saukuno tsqalobitʰ ʃeɡitsqaleb ambobs ʃeni mxsneli upʰali 
radɡan es tʃemtʰvis noes tsqlebivitʰ aris roɡortsʰ davipʰitsʰe rom noes tsqlebi a ise davipʰitsʰe me ar ɡanvrisxde ʃenze da ar ɡaɡkitsʰxo 
radɡan mtʰebi daidzvrebian da bortsʰvebi ʃeirqevian tʃemi tsqaloba ki ar daidzvreba ʃenɡan da tʃemi mʃvidobis aɣtʰkʰma ar ʃeirqeva ambobs ʃeni mtsqalobeli upʰali 
tsamebulo ɣelvilo unuɡeʃebelo aha me davatsqob ʃens kʰvebad antʰraks da ʃeni sapʰudzvlebi sapʰironi ikʰneba 
ɡavaketʰeb badaxʃitʰ ʃens kʰonɡurebs da ʃens ciʃkrebs lalis kʰvebitʰ da ʃens qvela zɣudes dzvirpʰasi kʰvebitʰ 
ʃeni qvela dze upʰlis ɡanstsavluli ikʰneba da didi ikʰneba ʃens dzetʰa mʃvidoba 
simartʰlitʰ dapʰudzndebi ʃors ikʰnebi tʃaɡvrisaɡan radɡan ar ʃeɡeʃindeba da dzrtsolisaɡan radɡan ar moɡiaxlovdeba 
aha tʰavs daɡesxmis ara tʃemɡan vintsʰ ʃen ʃeɡebrdzoleba ʃens tsin daetsʰema 
me ɡavatʃine mcedeli romelitsʰ uberavs tsʰetsʰxlʃi naxʃirs da ɡamohqavs iaraɣi tʰavisi sakʰmisatʰvis me ɡavatʃine damanɡreveli dasaɣupavad 
qoveli iaraɣi damzadebuli ʃens tsinaaɣmdeɡ ɡatsʰuddeba da qovel enas romelitsʰ ʃens tsinaaɣmdeɡ tsardɡeba samsdʒavroze ʃen daadanaʃauleb es aris xvedri upʰlis msaxurtʰa da matʰi ɡamartʰleba tʃemɡan aris ambobs upʰali 
hoi mtsqurvalno qvelani miditʰ tsqlebtʰan da pʰulis ukʰonelno miditʰ da iqidetʰ da cametʰ miditʰ da iqidetʰ ɣvino da rdze upʰulod da usasqidlod 
ratom ixditʰ vertsʰxls imisatʰvis ratsʰ puri ar aris da tʰkʰvens cirnaxuls imisatʰvis ratsʰ ar adzɣobs smenitʰ momisminetʰ da cametʰ ratsʰ karɡia da ɡantsʰxres tʰkʰveni suli simsuqeʃi 
moqavitʰ tʰkʰveni qurebi da moditʰ tʃemtʰan isminetʰ da itsʰotsʰxlebs tʰkʰveni suli da davdeb tʰkʰventʰan saukuno aɣtʰkʰmas roɡortsʰ sartsmuno tsqalobas ʃepirebuls davitʰisatʰvis 
aha erebis motsmed ɡanvatsese iɡi tsinamdzɣolad da mbrdzaneblad xalxebistʰvis 
aha xalxs romelsatsʰ ar itsʰnobdi mouxmob da xalxebi romelnitsʰ ar ɡitsʰnobdnen moɡaʃureben ʃeni upʰali ɣmertʰis da israelis tsmidis ɡulisatʰvis radɡan man ɡanɡadida ʃen 
edzietʰ upʰali sanam ʃeidzleba misi povna moutsodetʰ mas sanam axloa iɡi 
datovebs boroteuli tʰavis ɡzas da usamartʰlo katsʰi tʰavis zraxvebs daubrundeba upʰals da is ʃeitsqalebs mas da tʃvens ɣmertʰs radɡan is mravlis mimtevebelia 
radɡan tʃemi zraxvebi tʰkʰveni zraxvebi ar aris da tʰkʰveni ɡzebi tʃemi ɡzebi ar aris ambobs upʰali 
radɡan roɡortsʰ tsʰaa maɣali dedamitsaze ise tʃemi ɡzebia maɣali tʰkʰvens ɡzebze da tʃemi zraxvebi tʰkʰvens zraxvebze 
radɡan roɡortsʰ tsvima da tʰovli tʃamodis zetsʰidan da ikʰ aɣar brundeba tʰu ar daartsqula dedamitsa tʰu ar ɡaanaqopʰiera da ar aaqvava iɡi ar mistsʰa tʰesli mtʰesvels da puri mcamels 
asetʰi ikʰneba tʃemi sitqva ar damibrundeba tsʰarieli radɡan moimokʰmedebs imas ratsʰ me mtsadda da tsarmateba ekʰneba imaʃi ristʰvisatsʰ me mivavline 
radɡan mxiarulebitʰ ɡaxvaltʰ da mʃvidobitʰ ikʰnebitʰ tsaqvanilni mtʰani da bortsʰvni ʃemosdzaxeben tʰkʰvens tsinaʃe simɣeras da mindvris qvela xe taʃs ʃemohkravs 
kvrintʃxis natsʰvlad kviparosi amova da cincris natsʰvlad murti da ekʰneba es upʰals saxelad saukuno niʃnad moukvetʰelad 
ase tʰkʰva upʰalma daitsʰavitʰ samartʰali da kʰmenitʰ simartʰle radɡan tʃemi xsna male mova da tʃemi simartʰle ɡamotʃndeba 
netaria katsʰi ase rom ikʰtsʰeva da adamiani amas mocidebuli ʃeubɣalavad rom itsʰavs ʃabatʰs da borotis kʰmnisɡan itsʰavs tʰavis xels 
nu itqvis utsʰxotomelis dze upʰaltʰan ʃemoertʰebuli upʰalma ɡammidʒna erisaɡan da nu itqvis sacurisi me xom ɡamxmari xe var 
radɡan ase tʰkʰva upʰalma sacurisebi tʃemtʰvis satsadels irtʃeven da tʃems aɣtʰkʰmas inaxaven 
me mivtsʰem matʰ tʃems saxlʃi da saxels tʃems vaʒebze da asulebze uketʰess saukuno saxels mivtsʰem matʰ romelitsʰ ar tsaiʃleba 
da aseve utsʰxotomeltʰ ʃemoertʰebultʰ upʰaltʰan rom emsaxurebian mas da uqvartʰ upʰlis saxeli ratʰa iqvnen misi msaxurni qvelas ʃeubɣalavad rom itsʰavs ʃabatʰs da tʃems aɣtʰkʰmas mocidebultʰ 
me moviqvan matʰ tʃems tsmida mtʰaze da ɡavaxareb matʰ tʃems samlotsʰvelo saxlʃi matʰi sruladdasatsveli da ʃesatsiravebi sasurveli ikʰneba tʃems samsxverploze radɡan tʃemi saxli samlotsʰvelo saxlad itsodeba xalxebisatʰvis 
ambobs upʰali ɣmertʰi israelis ɡadzevebultʰa ʃemkrebi kidev sxvebs ʃevkreb me mastʰan mis ʃekrebilebtʰan 
moditʰ mindvris qvela tsʰxovelo tqis qvela mxetsʰo moditʰ sacmelad 
misi ɡuʃaɡni qvelani brmani arian utsʰodinarni arian qvelani mundʒi dzaɣlebia qvelani ar ʃeudzliatʰ qepʰa mdzinarebi arian tsvanan uqvartʰ tʰvlema 
es xarbi dzaɣlebia ɡaumadzɣarni mtsqemsebi arian isini maɡram ɡaɡeba ara akʰvtʰ qvela tʰavis ɡzitʰ ɡaemartʰa tʰitʰoeuli tʰavis anɡarebisaken 
da amboben moditʰ aviɣotʰ ɣvino da davtʰvretʰ sasmelitʰ da xvale dɣesavitʰ ikʰneba an uketʰesi 
iɣupeba martʰali da ar aris katsʰi ɡultʰan mimtani da madlis katsʰebi tsaqvanilni arian aravis esmis rom borotebis ɡamoa tsaqvanili martʰali 
is ʃedis mʃvidobaʃi ɡanisvenebs tʰavis saretsʰelze vintsʰ dadis tʰavis stsor ɡzaze 
moaxlovditʰ akʰ ɡrədzneuli kʰalis dzeno tʰeslo mruʃisa da medzavisa 
vis dastsʰinitʰ visze moɡirɣveviatʰ piri iɡrdzelebtʰ enas tʰkʰven xom danaʃaulis ʃvilebi xartʰ sitsʰruis tʰesli 
muxebʃi qoveli aqvavebuli xis dziras aɣɡznebulni xevebʃi da kldetʰa napralebis dzirʃi bavʃvebis mxotsʰvelni 
xevis sipebʃia ʃeni tsili isinia ʃeni xvedri matʰtʰvisatsʰ uɣvridi ʃen saɣvrels miartʰmevdi dzɣvens davtsqnardebi me amitʰ 
maɣal da aɣmartʰul mtʰaze moatsqve ʃeni satsoli ikʰatsʰ adixar msxverplis ʃesatsirad 
da karebs ukan da tsirtʰxls ukan dasde ʃeni samaxsovro niʃnebi radɡan ɡamʃordi ʃen da aɣzevdi pʰartʰe hqavi ʃeni satsoli da kavʃiri daamqare matʰtʰan matʰi satsolitsʰ ʃeiqvare da ixile matʰi katsʰoba 
etsʰxadebodi mepʰes zetʰitʰ ɡapoxili da auxvebdi ʃens nelsatsʰxeblebs da ɡzavnidi ʃens matsʰneebs ʃoretʰamde da ʃavetʰamde mdabldebodi 
ʃens ɡrdzel ɡzaze iɣlebodi maɡram ar ɡitʰkʰvams pʰuciao ʃens xelʃi sitsʰotsʰxles poulobdi amitom ar dzabundebodi 
vis upʰrətʰxodi da visi ɡeʃinoda rotsʰa momatque ɡultʰan ar miitane rom vdumdi didxans amitom ar ɡeʃinoda tʃemi 
me ɡamovatsʰxadeb ʃens simartʰles da ʃens sakʰmeebs da sarɡeblobas ar moɡitanen 
rotsʰa aqvirdebi ɡiʃvelos ʃeni kerpebis krebulma maɡram matʰ qvelas kʰari tsaiɣebs kʰrolva ɡaakʰanebs tʃemi moimede ki daimkvidrebs mitsas da tʃems tsmida mtʰas daepatroneba 
da tʰkʰva moastsoretʰ moastsoretʰ ɡaamzadetʰ ɡza moaʃoretʰ dabrkoleba tʃemi xalxis ɡzidan 
radɡan ɡandidebuli da amaɣlebuli ambobs ase maradmqopʰi da romlis saxeli tsmidaa maɣal da tsmida adɡilze vdɡavar me maɡram ʃemusvriltʰan da sulitʰ tʰviniertʰan ratʰa ɡamoatsʰotsʰxlos tʰviniertʰa suli da ɡamoatsʰotsʰxlos ʃemusvriltʰa ɡuli 
radɡan saukunod ar vidaveb da artsʰ ukunisamde vimrisxaneb me radɡan daudzlurdeba tʃems tsinaʃe suli da samʃvinelni me rom ʃevkʰmeni 
misi sixarbis tsʰodvis ɡamo ɡanvrisxdi davmale saxe da vmrisxanebdi is ki ɡandɡomili dadioda tʰvisi ɡulis ɡzitʰ 
misi ɡzebi vixile me maɡram ɡanvkurnav mas da tsaviqvan vanuɡeʃeb da ɡavamartʰleb mis mɡloviaretʰ 
da ɡavatʃen baɡetʰa naqopʰs mʃvidoba mʃvidoba ʃorebels da axlobels ambobs upʰali da ɡanvkurnav mas 
boroteulni ki zɣvasavitʰ bobokʰroben rotsʰa ver tsʰxreba da antʰxevs misi tsqali ʃlamsa da talaxs 
araa mʃvidoba ambobs 
iqvire mtʰeli qelitʰ nu dainaneb saqvirivitʰ aɣavline xma da ɡamoutsʰxade tʃems xalxs matʰi danaʃauli da iakobis saxls matʰi tsʰodvebi 
medzieben me qoveldɣe da surtʰ tʃemi ɡzebis tsʰodna roɡortsʰ eri romelitsʰ ikʰmda simartʰles da tʰavisi ɣmertʰis samartʰals ar arɣvevda mekitʰxebian me martʰal samartʰalze ɣmertʰis siaxlove stsadiatʰ matʰ 
ratom vmarxulobtʰ ʃen ki ver xedav vatsamebtʰ tʃvens suls ʃen ki ar itsʰi tʰkʰveni marxvis dɣes xom aɣtsevtʰ tsadils da tʰkʰvensave ʒins ikmaqopʰilebtʰ 
tʰkʰven xom davistʰvis da tʃxubisatʰvis marxulobtʰ da imisatʰvis rom uketʰuri muʃti urtqatʰ nu imarxulebtʰ roɡortsʰ dɣes ratʰa ʃesmenil ikʰnes tʰkʰveni xma tsʰaʃi 
ɡana asetʰia marxva romelitsʰ amovartʃie vitʰ lertsami idreks tʰavs da dzadzas da natsʰars iɡebs kʰveʃ amas vutsode marxva da upʰlis satsadeli dɣe 
ɡana es marxva araa romelitsʰ amovartʃie ɡaxseni sabelni boroteultʰa ʃexseni borkilni uɣlisa da ɡauʃvi tʃaɡrulni tʰavisupʰlad da qvela uɣeli ɡatsqvitetʰ 
ɡana imisatʰvis ar aris rom ɡaunatsilo ʃeni puri mʃiers da ɣaribni da usaxlkaroni ʃemoiqvano saxlʃi rodesatsʰ dainaxav ʃiʃvels ʃemose iɡi da ʃens sisxlsa da xortsʰs nu uɡulvebelhqopʰ 
maʃin tsʰiskarivitʰ amoskdeba ʃeni sinatʰle da ʃeni kurneba stsrapʰad aɣmotsʰendeba tsin tsaɡidzɣveba ʃeni simartʰle da upʰlis dideba ɡaremoɡitsʰavs 
maʃin daidzaxeb da upʰali ɡipasuxebs iɣaɣadeb da is itqvis akʰa var rotsʰa moitsʰileb ʃens ʃoris uɣels tʰitʰis miʃveras da dzviris tʰkʰmas 
da mistsʰem mʃiers ʃens suls da tsamebulis suls ɡaadzɣob maʃin ɡabrətsqindeba sibneleʃi ʃeni natʰeli da ʃeni tsqvdiadi ʃuadɣesavitʰ ikʰneba 
tsin tsaɡidzɣveba upʰali mudam da daakmaqopʰilebs ʃens survils ɡvalvebʃi ʃens dzvlebs ɡaamaɡrebs da ikʰnebi roɡortsʰ mortsquli baɣi da roɡortsʰ tsqlis satʰave romlis tsqlebitsʰ ar daiʃriteba 
da aɣadɡen ʃenɡnitʰ saukuno nanɡrevebs ɡanamtkitsʰeb dzveltʰadzvel sapʰudzvlebs da daɡerkʰmeva ʃenɡreulis ʃemomɣobeli satsʰxovreblad ɡzebis ɡanmaaxlebeli 
tʰu daakaveb ʃabatʰs ʃens pʰexs ʃeni survilis ʃesrulebisaɡan tʃems tsmida dɣes da utsodeb ʃabatʰs ʃvebas upʰlis tsmida dɣes ɡandidebuls da ɡanadideb ar ɡaaketʰeb ʃens sakutʰar sakʰmes ar edzieb satsadels da pʰucad ar ilaparakeb 
maʃin ɡaixareb ʃen upʰalʃi aɡiqvan dedamitsis simaɣleebze da ɡamoɡkvebav iakobis ʃeni mamis tsilxvedritʰ radɡan upʰlis baɡe laparakobs 
aha ar damoklebula upʰlis xeli rom ixsnas da ar damdzimebula misi quri rom isminos 
radɡan tʰkʰvenma urdʒuloebam ɡaɡmidʒnatʰ da tʰkʰvenma tsʰodvebma dapʰares misi saxe tʰkʰvenɡan rom ar esmina 
radɡan tʰkʰveni xelebi ɡasvrilia sisxlʃi da tʰkʰveni tʰitʰebi urdʒuloebaʃi tʰkʰveni baɡeni sitsʰrues laparakoben da tʰkʰveni ena usamartʰlobas tsarmotʰkʰvams 
aravin tʃivis samartʰlianad imedovneben amaoze da tsʰruoben pʰexmdzimdebian ubedurebitʰ da ʃoben usamartʰlobas 
aspitis kvertsʰxebs tʃeken matʰi kvertsʰxis mcameli mokvdeba da ɡacqletilisaɡan ikʰedne ɡamoitʃekeba 
matʰi kʰseli ɡamousadeɡaria ʃesamoslad da tʰaviantʰi naketʰobitʰ daipʰaraven tʰavs matʰi sakʰmeebi usamartʰlo sakʰmeebia da dzalmomreobaa matʰ xelebʃi 
pʰexebi borotisaken ɡaurbitʰ da udanaʃaulo sisxlis dasaɣvrelad istsrapʰian matʰi zraxvebi uketʰuri zraxvebia nɡreva da partaxia matʰ ɡzaze 
mʃvidobis ɡza ar itsʰian matʰ da samartʰali araa matʰ nakvalevze bilikebi ɡaimrudes matʰze ɡamvlelma ar itsʰis mʃvidoba 
amis ɡamo ɡaɡvʃorda tʃven samartʰali da simartʰle ver ɡvetsveva tʃven sinatʰlis imedi ɡvakʰvs maɡram bnelʃi vartʰ velitʰ ɡamobrətsqinebas maɡram tsqvdiadʃi davdivartʰ 
brmebivitʰ xelitʰ vsindʒavtʰ kedels da roɡortsʰ utʰvalistʃinoni xelis tsʰetsʰebitʰ davdivartʰ vbordzikobtʰ ʃuadɣisas roɡortsʰ bindʃi ukunetʰʃi roɡortsʰ mkvdrebi 
datʰvebivitʰ vɣrialebtʰ qvelani da voxravtʰ mtredebivitʰ velitʰ samartʰals da ar tʃans ɡadartʃenas da ʃorsaa tʃvenɡan 
radɡan ɡamravlda tʃveni danaʃauli ʃens tsinaʃe da tʃveni tsʰodvebi ɡvemotsmebian tʃvens tsinaaɣmdeɡ radɡan tʃveni danaʃauli tʃventʰanaa da tʃveni urdʒuloeba tʃven vitsʰitʰ 
danaʃauli da tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰoba upʰlis tsinaʃe da ɡandɡoma tʃveni ɣmertʰisaɡan laparaki dʒanqze da ɣalatze tʃasaxva da ɡulidan tsarmotʰkʰma tsʰru sitqvebisa 
ukan daixia samartʰalma da ʃors ɡandɡa simartʰle radɡan tsabordzikda simartʰle moedanze da patiosneba veɣar ʃemodis 
aɣar aris ceʃmariteba da borotisaɡan ɡamdɡari tsartqvevnilia dainaxa upʰalma da ar moetsona ar iqo samartʰali 
dainaxa rom ar iqo katsʰi da ɡaotsʰda rom ar iqo damtsʰveli da mieʃvela mas misi mklavi da misi simartʰle ʃeudɡa saqrdenad 
da ʃeimosa simartʰle roɡortsʰ dʒavʃani da xsnis muzaradi iqo mis tʰavze da ʃeimosa ʃurisɡebis samoseli tansatsʰmlad da moisxa mosasxamivitʰ ʃurisɡeba 
sazɣauris mixedvitʰ ɡadauxdis iɡi ɡulistsqromitʰ tʰavis ʃemcirvebeltʰ ʃurisɡebitʰ tʰavis mtrebs kundzulebs samaɡieros miuzɣavs 
da ʃeeʃindebatʰ dasavletʰidan upʰlis saxelisa da mzis aɣmosavletʰidan misi didebisa da mova ɡasaciri roɡortsʰ mdinare upʰlis sulitʰ modenili 
da mova mxsneli sionisatʰvis da danaʃaulisaɡan ukukʰtsʰeultʰatʰvis iakobʃi ambobs upʰali 
da me ki aha tʃemi aɣtʰkʰma matʰtʰan ambobs upʰali tʃemi suli romelitsʰ ʃenzea da tʃemi sitqvebi romlebitsʰ tʃaɡide baɡeʃi ar ɡandɡebian ʃeni baɡidan artsʰ ʃeni tʰeslis baɡidan artsʰ ʃens tʰesltʰa tʰeslis baɡidan amieridan da ukunisamde ambobs upʰali 
adekʰi ɡanatʰdi ierusalimo radɡan movida ʃeni natʰeli da upʰlis dideba ʃenze ɡabrətsqinda 
radɡan aha bneli dapʰaravs dedamitsas da burusi xalxebs ʃenze ki ɡabrətsqindeba upʰali da misi dideba ʃenze ɡamotʃndeba 
da ivlian xalxebi ʃens sinatʰleze da mepʰeni ʃeni amobrətsqinebis natʰelze 
aɣapqar ʃeni tʰvalni irɡvliv da dainaxe qvelani ikribebian modian ʃentʰan ʃeni dzeni ʃoridan modian da ʃeni asulni xelitʰ mohqavtʰ 
maʃin dainaxav da ɡanatʰdebi atʰrtʰoldeba da ɡapʰartʰovdeba ʃeni ɡuli radɡan ʃensken moikʰtsʰeva zɣvis simdidre xalxtʰa dovlatʰi ʃentʰan tsamova 
akʰlemtʰa simravle daɡpʰaravs ʃen midianisa da qepʰas kozakni qvelani ʃebadan movlen okʰrosa da ɡundruks moitanen da upʰlis didebas autsqeben 
kedaris mtʰeli tsʰxvari ʃeikribeba ʃentʰan verdzni nebaiotʰisa da ɡemsaxurebian ʃen sasurvel msxverplad avlen tʃems samsxverploze da tʃemi didebis saxls ɡanvadideb 
vin arian eseni rom dapʰrinaven ɣrubelivitʰ da roɡortsʰ mtredebi tʰaviantʰi samtredis sarkmelebtʰan 
diax kundzulebi damelodebian me da savacro xomaldni pirvelni movlen ratʰa moiqvanon ʃeni dzeni ʃoridan tʰaviantʰi vertsʰxlitʰa da okʰrotʰi ʃeni upʰali ɣmertʰisa da israelis tsmidis sasaxelod radɡan man ɡanɡadida ʃen 
utsʰxotomeltʰa dzeni aɡiʃeneben ɡalavnebs da matʰi mepʰeni daɡemsaxurebian radɡan tʃems risxvaʃi ɡsdʒidi tʃems siqvarulʃi ɡibralebdi 
da ɣia ikʰneba mudam ʃeni karibce artsʰ dilitʰ da artsʰ ɣamitʰ ar daiketeba ratʰa moitanon ʃentʰan xalxtʰa dovlatʰi da moiqvanon matʰi mepʰeebi 
radɡan xalxi da samepʰo da xalxebi aoxrdebian 
libanis dideba ʃentʰan mova kviparosi nekertʃxali da tsipʰeli ertʰad ratʰa damimʃvenon satsmidris adɡili da tʃems pʰerxtʰa adɡils ɡanvadideb 
moɡivlen kʰedmoxritʰ dzeni ʃens ʃemacirvebeltʰa da tʰaqvans stsʰemen ʃens pʰerxtʰa mtvers qvela ʃeni modzuleni da ɡitsodeben ʃen upʰlis kʰalakʰs israelis tsmidis sions 
imis tsil rom mitovebuli da modzulebuli da aravin iqo tʃamvleli me ɡaɡxdi ʃen saukuno siamaqed sixarulad tʰaobidan tʰaobaʃi 
da ʃen mostsov xalxebis rdzes da mepʰetʰa dzudzus mostsov da ɡaiɡeb rom me var upʰali ʃeni mxsneli da ɡamomsqidveli iakobis dzlieri 
spilendzis natsʰvlad movitan okʰros da rkinis natsʰvlad movitan vertsʰxls xeebis natsʰvlad spilendzs da kʰvebis natsʰvlad rkinas ɡavabatoneb ʃenze mʃvidobas da ʃens zedamxedvelad simartʰles 
aɣar ikʰneba dzaladoba ʃens kʰveqanaʃi dzartsʰva da nɡreva ʃens sazɣvrebʃi da utsodeb xsnas ʃens ɡalavnebs da ʃens karibces kʰeba didebas 
aɣar ɡekʰneba ʃen mze dɣis sinatʰled da mtʰvaris natʰeba ar ɡaɡinatʰebs aramed upʰali ɡeqoleba saukuno sinatʰled da ʃeni ɣmertʰi ʃens didebad 
aɣar tʃava metad ʃeni mze da ʃeni mtʰvare ar datsʰxreba radɡan upʰali ɡeqoleba saukuno sinatʰled da dɣeni ʃeni ɡlovisa dasruldeba 
da ʃeni eri ertʰianad martʰali ikʰneba saukunod daimkvidrebs kʰveqanas qlorts tʃemi nerɡisas tʃemi xelis kʰmnilebas sadideblad 
mtsʰire ikʰtsʰeva atʰasad da umtsʰrosi dzlier xalxad me upʰali tʰavis droze davatʃkʰareb amas 
upʰali ɣmertʰis sulia tʃemze radɡan mtsʰxo upʰalma rom vaxaro ʃecirvebultʰ tsarmomɡzavna me ɡulɡatexiltʰa ʃesaxvevad rom ɡamovutsʰxado tqveebs tʰavisupʰleba da patimartʰ borkilebis axsna 
ɡamovatsʰxado upʰlis sasurveli tseli da tʃveni ɣmertʰis ʃurisɡebis dɣe ratʰa vanuɡeʃo qvela mɡloviare 
davadɡen ratʰa sionis mɡloviaretʰ mietsʰes ɡvirɡvini natsʰris natsʰvlad mxiaruleba ɡlovis natsʰvlad kʰeba didebis samoseli sasotsarkvetʰis natsʰvlad da utsodeben matʰ muxebs upʰlis darɡultʰ mis sadideblad 
da aaʃeneben isini dzveltʰadzvel nanɡrevebs tsinandel naoxars aɣadɡenen da ɡanaaxleben danɡreul kʰalakʰebs dzvel tʰaobatʰa ukatsʰriel adɡilebs 
dadɡebian utsʰxoni da damtsqemsaven tʰkʰvens tsʰxvars da ikʰnebian tʰkʰveni mitsatʰmokʰmedni da tʰkʰveni mevenaxeni 
da upʰlis mɣvdlebad itsodebitʰ tʃveni ɣvtʰis msaxurni ariano itʰkʰmeba tʰkʰvenze xalxebis dovlatʰs ʃecamtʰ da matʰi didebitʰ daitrabaxebtʰ 
tʰkʰveni sirtsʰxvilis tsil ormaɡad moɡezɣvebatʰ da natsʰvlad kdemisa ilxenen tsilze tʰaviantʰ mitsaze daimkvidreben ormaɡ tsils da saukuno sixaruli ekʰnebatʰ 
radɡan me upʰals miqvars samartʰali mdzaɡs qatʃaɣoba sruladdasatsvelis mortʰmevisas me mivtsʰem matʰ sazɣaurs ceʃmaritebitʰ da saukuno aɣtʰkʰmas davudeb 
da tsʰnobili ikʰneba xalxebʃi matʰi tʰesli da matʰi ʃviltʰaʃvilni ertʰa ʃoris qvela matʰi mnaxveli ɡamoitsʰnobs matʰ radɡan upʰlis nakurtʰxi tʰeslia isini 
sixarulitʰ vixareb upʰalʃi moilxens tʃemi suli tʃems ɣmertʰʃi radɡan man tʃamatsʰva me xsnis tansatsʰmeli simartʰlis samoslitʰ ʃemmosa me roɡortsʰ nepʰe idɡams dʒiɣas da roɡortsʰ sasdzlo irtʰveba tʰavisi samkaulebitʰ 
radɡan roɡortsʰ mitsa aɣmoatsʰenebs mtsʰenares da roɡortsʰ baɣi zrdis tʰavis natʰess ise upʰali ɣmertʰi amozrdis samartʰals da kʰeba didebas qoveli xalxis tsinaʃe 
sionis ɡamo ar davdumdebi da israelis ɡamo ar davmʃviddebi sanam ar ɡamova misi simartʰle roɡortsʰ natʰeba da misi xsna roɡortsʰ antʰebuli tʃiraɣdani 
da dainaxaven xalxebi ʃens simartʰles da qoveli mepʰe ʃens didebas da ɡitsodeben ʃen axal saxels romelsatsʰ 
da ikʰnebi ʃen mʃvenebis ɡvirɡvinad upʰlis xelʃi da samepʰo diademad ʃeni ɣmertʰis xelʃi 
aɣar itʰkʰmis ʃenze mitovebuli da ʃens kʰveqanaze aɣar itʰkʰmis ukatsʰrieli radɡan ɡerkʰmeva ʃen masʃia tʃemi neba da ʃens kʰveqanas dapatronebuli radɡan moɡineba upʰalma da ʃeni kʰveqana dapatrondeba 
roɡortsʰ cabuki kʰortsindeba kʰaltsulze ise dakʰortsindebian ʃenze ʃeni dzeni da roɡortsʰ nepʰe xarobs patardzalze ise ʃeni ɣmertʰi ixarebs ʃenze 
ʃens ɡalavnebze o ierusalimo ɡuʃaɡni davaqene rom arasodes ar dadumdnen artsʰ dɣe da artsʰ ɣame ɡamxsenebelno upʰlisa nu ɡatʃumdebitʰ 
da nu moasveneb mas sanam ar ɡanamtkitsʰebs da ar ɡaxdis ierusalims kʰeba didebad dedamitsaze 
daipʰitsʰa upʰalma tʰavisi mardʒvena da dzala tʰavisi mklavisa ar mivtsʰem metad ʃens mtrebs ʃens xorbals sacmelad da ar daleven utsʰxotomelni ʃens macars 
radɡan misi momstʰvlelni ʃecamen mas da akʰeben upʰals da misi ʃemkrebni ʃesvamen mas tʃemi tsmidas ezoebʃi 
ɡaiaretʰ ɡaiaretʰ karibceebʃi ɡanumzadetʰ ɡza ers moastsoretʰ moastsoretʰ savali ɡaasupʰtʰavetʰ kʰvisaɡan aɣmartʰetʰ alami xalxebisatʰvis 
aha upʰali autsqebs dedamitsis kidemde utʰxaritʰ sionis asuls naxe movida ʃeni xsna naxe misi sazɣauri mastʰanaa da misi misaɡebeli mis tsinaʃea 
da utsodeben matʰ tsmida ers upʰlis ɡamosqidultʰ ʃen ki ɡitsodeben modziebuls miutovebel kʰalakʰs 
es vin aris edomidan rom modis metsamuli samoslitʰ botsʰradan es didebuli tʰavis samoselʃi moxrili tʰavisi diadi dzalitʰ es me var simartʰlitʰ molaparake xsnis ʃemdzlebeli 
ratom aris tsitʰeli ʃeni samoseli da ʃeni tansatsʰmeli satsnaxelʃi mtsuravivitʰ 
me ertʰma davtsure satsnaxelʃi da ar iqo tʃemtʰan aravin da vtsuravdi matʰ tʃems risxvaʃi da vsresdi matʰ tʃems ɡulistsqromaʃi da matʰi sisxli ʃeeʃxepʰa tʃems tansatsʰmels da mtʰeli tʃemi samoseli ʃevsvare 
radɡan ʃurisɡebis dɣea tʃems ɡulʃi da tseli tʃems ɡamosqidultʰa movida 
vixedebodi da ar iqo ʃemtse da mikvirda rom ar iqo mxardamceri da mixsna me tʃemma mklavma da tʃemma risxvam damicira mxari 
da davtʰrɡune me xalxebi tʃemi tsqromitʰ da davatʰvre isini tʃemi risxvitʰ da mitsaze davɣvare matʰi sisxli 
upʰlis tsqalobebs vaxseneb da upʰlis sadidebels qvelapʰristʰvis ratsʰ upʰalma moɡvizɣa didi siketʰistʰvis israelis saxlze tʰavisi motsqalebitʰ da mravali tsqalobitʰ rom miaɡo 
da tʰkʰva isini maintsʰ tʃemi eria dzeni romlebitsʰ ar miɣalateben da ʃeikʰna iɡi matʰi mxsneli 
mis qvela satandʒvelʃi tʰvitʰonatsʰ itandʒeboda da misi piris anɡelozi ixsnida matʰ tʰavisi siqvarulitʰa da tʰavisi motsqalebitʰ ɡamoisqida isini da aiqvana da atarebda matʰ dzvel dɣeebʃi 
maɡram isini eurtʃnen da daamtsuxres misi tsmida suli da is mtrad ekʰtsʰa matʰ da ebrdzoda matʰ 
da ɡaixsena misma xalxma moses dzveli dɣeebi sad aris iɡi vintsʰ amoiqvana isini zɣvidan tʰavisi samtsqsos mtsqemsebtʰan ertʰad sad aris iɡi vintsʰ tʃado matʰ tsiaɣʃi tʰavisi tsmida suli 
vintsʰ tsarmartʰa moses mardʒvena tʰavisi didebuli mklavitʰ vintsʰ ɡaapo tsqlebi matʰ tsinaʃe ratʰa ɡaetʰkʰva tʰavisi saukuno saxeli 
vintsʰ udzɣveboda matʰ upʰskrulebʃi roɡortsʰ tsʰxens mindorʃi da ar tsabordzikebulan 
roɡortsʰ naxiri tʃadis xeobaʃi ise upʰlis suls mihqavda isini dasasveneblad ase atarebdi ʃens ers ratʰa moɡepovebina ʃentʰvis didebuli saxeli 
ɡadmoixede zetsʰidan da ʃexede ʃeni tsmida da diadi savanidan sad aris ʃeni ʃurisɡeba da ʃeni dzlevamosileba ʃeni ɡulis dzvra da ʃeni motsqaleba ar movida tʃvenamdis 
radɡan ʃena xar tʃveni mama da israeli ar ɡvaɣiarebs ʃena xar upʰalo tʃveni mama tʃveni mxsnelia ukunisidan ʃeni saxeli 
ratom ɡvatsʰden tʃven upʰalo ʃeni ɡzebidan asastikeb tʃvens ɡulebs ratʰa ar ɡveʃinodes ʃeni dabrundi ʃeni monebis ɡulisatʰvis ʃeni tsilxvedrilis ʃtotʰa ɡulisatʰvis 
didxans ar daumkvidrebia mitsa ʃens tsmida ers tʃvenma mtrebma ɡatʰeles ʃeni satsmidari 
imatʰ davemsɡavsetʰ romlebzetsʰ arasodes ɡixelmtsipʰnia imatʰ romlebzetsʰ ar tsodebula ʃeni saxeli 
zetsʰa rom ɡaɡerɣvia tʃamosuliqavi mtʰebi tʃamodnebodnen ʃens tsinaʃe 
roɡortsʰ tsʰetsʰxli tsvavs pʰitʃxs tsqals atʰuxtʰuxebs tsʰetsʰxli ratʰa eutsqos ʃens mtrebs ʃeni saxeli ratʰa ʃeni saxis tsinaʃe ʃedzrtsundnen xalxebi 
rodesatsʰ ʃen ikʰmodi saʃinelebebs tʃamodiodi mtʰebi dnebodnen ʃens tsinaʃe 
arasodes smeniatʰ ar ɡauɡoniatʰ tʰvals ar unaxavs sxva ɣmertʰi ʃens ɡarda rom moemokʰmedos asetʰi ram tʰavis momlodinesatʰvis 
eɡebebi mxiarulsa da simartʰlis mkʰmnels vintsʰ ɡixsenebs ʃens ɡzebze aha ʃen mrisxaneb radɡan vtsʰodavtʰ sulmudam da roɡorɣa ɡadavrtʃebitʰ 
da ɡavxditʰ tʃven qvelani utsmidurivitʰ tsviriani samoselivitʰ ɡaxda qoveli tʃveni sikʰvele pʰotʰolivitʰ davcknitʰ qvelani da tʃveni urdʒuloeba kʰarivitʰ tsaɡviɣebs 
da aravinaa ʃeni saxelis mxmobeli ɡamoɣvidzebuli rom moɡecidos radɡan ɡvimalav ʃens saxes da davdnitʰ tʃveni urdʒuloebisaɡan 
da axla upʰalo tʃveni mama xar ʃen tʃven tʰixa vartʰ ʃen ki tʃveni ʃemkʰmneli ʃeni xelis naketʰebi vartʰ tʃven qvelani 
nu ɡanrisxdebi upʰalo metismetad da samudamod nu ɡexsomeba urdʒuloeba aha ʃexede ʃeni eri vartʰ tʃven qvelani 
ʃeni tsmida kʰalakʰebi ɡaudaburdnen sioni udabnoa ierusalimi ukatsʰrieli 
saxli tʃveni sitsmidisa da didebisa sadatsʰ ɡakʰebdnen tʃveni mamebi tsʰetsʰxlʃi dasatsveli ɡaxda da qovelive tʃventʰvis dzvirpʰasi nanɡrevebad ikʰtsʰa 
nutʰu amaze kidev ʃeikaveb tʰavs upʰalo ɡatʃumdebi da ɡaɡvtandʒav metismetad 
ɡamovetsʰxade matʰ vintsʰ ar mkitʰxulobda mipovnes matʰ vintsʰ ar medzebda da vutʰxari akʰa var akʰa var xalxs romelitsʰ ar iqo tʃemi saxelitʰ tsodebuli 
ɡatsvdili mkʰonda matʰken xelebi dɣeniadaɡ xalxisken uketʰuri ɡzitʰ rom dadian tʰaviantʰi zraxvebis kvalze 
xalxisken mudam rom madʒavreben pirʃi baɣebʃi msxverpls stsiraven da aɡurebze akmeven 
sapʰlavebs ʃoris sxedan da idumal adɡilebʃi ɣames atʰeven ɣoris xortsʰs camen sazizɣari tsveni akʰvtʰ tʰaviantʰ curclebʃi 
amboben ɡametsʰale nu momiaxlovdebi radɡan me ʃenze tsmida var eseni kvamlia tʃems nestoebʃi tsʰetsʰxlivitʰ antʰia mtʰel dɣes 
aha datserilia es tʃems tsinaʃe ar ɡavtʃumdebi sanam ar mivuzɣav da mivuzɣav matʰ ubeʃi 
tʰkʰveni urdʒuloebis da tʰkʰveni mamebis urdʒuloebis ɡamo romlebitsʰ ukmevdnen mtʰebze da bortsʰvebze ʃeuratsʰxmqopʰdnen me ambobs upʰali da ɡavzomav tsindatsin matʰ namokʰmedars matʰ ubeʃi 
ase ambobs upʰali rotsʰa qurdznis nu daɣupav mas radɡan kurtʰxevaa masʃi ase movikʰtsʰevi tʃems msaxurtʰatʰvis ratʰa ar davɣupo qvelani 
ɡamoviqvan iakobidan tʰesls da iudadan memkvidres tʃemi mtʰebisa da daimkvidreben mas tʃemi rtʃeulni da tʃemi msaxurni dasaxldebian ikʰ 
ikʰneba ʃaroni tsʰxvris sadzovari da qakʰoris xeoba naxiris tsamosatsoli tʃemi erisatʰvis romelmatsʰ momdzebna me 
tʰkʰven ki upʰlis mimtovebelno damvitsqebelno tʃemi tsmida mtʰisa ɡamamzadebelno ɡadistʰvis supʰrisa da ʃemavsebelno menistʰvis sasmelebisa 
me ɡadaɡtsʰemtʰ tʰkʰven maxvils da qvelani dasaklavad ikʰnebitʰ muxlmoqrilni radɡan me vxmobdi da ar ɡamomexmianetʰ me vlaparakobdi da tʰkʰven ar isminetʰ da borots stʃadioditʰ tʃems tʰvalʃi da ratsʰ ar msurda is airtʃietʰ 
amitom ase tʰkʰva upʰalma ɣmertʰma ai tʃemi msaxurni ʃecamen da tʰkʰven daimʃevitʰ tʃemi msaxurni ʃesvam da tʰkʰven tsqurvili ʃeɡipqrobtʰ da tʃemi msaxurni ɡaixareben da tʰkʰven ʃertsʰxvebitʰ 
tʃemi msaxurni imɣereben ɡulis siamitʰ da tʰkʰven iqvirebtʰ ɡulis tkivilitʰ da sulis ɡatexisaɡan akʰvitʰindebitʰ 
dautovebtʰ tʰkʰvens saxels satsqevrad tʃems rtʃeultʰ da daɡxotsʰavtʰ tʰkʰven upʰali ɣmertʰi da tʰavis msaxurtʰ utsodebs sxva saxels 
vintsʰ kurtʰxeulia kʰveqanaze ikurtʰxeba ceʃmariti ɣmertʰitʰ da dampʰitsʰebeli kʰveqanaze daipʰitsʰebs ceʃmarit ɣmertʰs radɡan davitsqebulia utsindeli ubedurebani da miepʰara tʃems tʰvalebs 
radɡan aha me ʃevkʰmni axal tsʰas da axal mitsas da ar ɡaixseneba tsinandelni da ar amova ɡultʰan 
maɡram ɡaixarebtʰ da ilxentʰ ukunisamde imitʰ rasatsʰ me ʃevkʰmni radɡan me vkʰmni ierusalims lxinad da mis ers sixarulad 
da me movilxen ierusalimʃi da ɡavixareb tʃems erʃi da metad aɣar ɡaismeba masʃi tirilis xma da kivilis xma 
metad aɣar ikʰneba ikʰ mtsʰiretslovani da moxutsʰi romelitsʰ ver asrulebs tʰavis dɣeebs radɡan qmatsvili asi tslisa mokvdeba da tsʰodvili tʰundatsʰ asi tslisa daitsqevleba 
aaʃeneben saxlebs da itsʰxovreben darɡaven venaxebs da ʃecamen matʰ naqopʰs 
ar aaʃeneben sxvis satsʰxovreblad da ar darɡaven sxvis ʃesacmelad radɡan xis dɣeebivitʰ ikʰneba tʃemi eris dɣeebi da tʰaviantʰi xelis naketʰebs ɡatsʰvetʰen tʃemi rtʃeulni 
ar daikʰantsʰebian amaod da ar ʃoben ʃpʰotʰisatʰvis radɡan upʰlis kurtʰxeuli tʰeslia isini da matʰi ʃtʰamomavloba matʰtʰan ertʰad 
da ikʰneba sanam momixmoben pasuxs ɡavtsʰem dʒer laparakʃi ikʰnebian rom me ɡaviɡoneb 
mɡeli da kravi ertʰad daimtsqesebian da lomi roɡortsʰ xari ʃecams tʰivas ɡveli ki mtveri ikʰneba misi sacmeli ar iboroteben da artsʰ avneben rasme mtʰels tʃems tsmida mtʰaze ambobs upʰali 
ase ambobs upʰali tsʰa tʃemi taxtia dedamitsa ki tʃemi kvartsʰxlbeki da sad aris is saxli romelitsʰ tʰkʰven unda amiʃenotʰ da sad aris tʃemi dasavanebeli adɡili 
qovelive es tʃemma xelma ʃekʰmna da ɡatʃnda qovelive es sitqva upʰlisa da amas movxedav damortʃilebuls da sulitʰ datsʰemuls akankalebuls tʃems sitqvaze 
urdʒulo xars rom miklavs tʰundatsʰ katsʰi daeklas kravs rom mtsiravs tʰundatsʰ dzaɣli ʃemoetsiros dzɣvens rom aɣmivlens tʰundatsʰ ɣoris sisxli ʃemoetsiros ɡundruks rom mikmevs tʰundatsʰ kerpi ekurtʰxebinos roɡortsʰ matʰ tʰavad airtʃies tʰaviantʰi ɡzebi da sisadzaɡleni surda matʰ suls 
ise metsʰ amovirtʃev matʰ abutʃad aɡdebas da imas risatsʰ eʃiniatʰ movatsev matʰze imis ɡamo rom vuxmobdi da ar iqo pasuxis ɡamtsʰemi vlaparakobdi da ar ismines borotebas stʃadiodnen tʃems tʰvalʃi da ratsʰ me ar msurda amoirtʃies 
isminetʰ sitqva upʰlisa da akankalditʰ mis sitqvaze tʰkʰves tʰkʰvenma dzmebma modzuleebma tʰkʰvenma uarmqopʰelebma tʃemi saxelis ɡulisatʰvis adidos upʰalma tʰavisi tʰavi da tʃven vnaxavtʰ tʰkʰvens mxiarulebas maɡram isini ʃertsʰxvebian 
xmauris xmaa kʰalakʰidan xmaa tadzridan xmaa upʰlisa tʰavisi mtrebisatʰvis ʃurismɡeblisa 
dʒer ar utsvalia da ukve ʃva dʒer ar mosvlia tkivilebi da ukve dabada vaʒi 
vis mousmenia asetʰi ram vis unaxavs amis msɡavsi ʃeudzlia dedamitsas mʃobiarobitʰ tsvaleba da ʃoba ertʰ dɣes ʃobila ki eri ertʰbaʃad radɡan itsvala da ʃva kidetsʰ sionma tʰavisi dzeni 
mivaɣtsevineb mʃobiarobamde da ar vamʃobiareb ambobs upʰali me ʃemidzlia ɡamovitsvio da ʃevtsqvito ʃoba ambobs ʃeni ɣmertʰi 
ɡaixaretʰ ierusalimtʰan ertʰad ɡaixaretʰ mastʰan sixarulitʰ qvelam vintsʰ masze mɡloviareni xartʰ 
ratʰa motsovotʰ da ɡadzɣetʰ misi nuɡeʃismtsʰemeli dzudzutʰi ratʰa tsovotʰ da daamdetʰ misi didebis dvrilisaɡan 
radɡan ase tʰkʰva upʰalma da movardnil ɣelesavitʰ xalxtʰa didebas da ɡamoikvebebitʰ tʃvilebivitʰ ikʰnebitʰ tarebulni da muxlebze naloliavebni 
roɡortsʰ deda stsʰems nuɡeʃs tʰavis ʃvils ise me ɡtsʰemtʰ tʰkʰven nuɡeʃs da ierusalimʃi ikʰnebitʰ nuɡeʃtsʰemulni 
da dainaxavtʰ da ɡaixarebs tʰkʰveni ɡuli tʰkʰveni dzvlebi balaxivitʰ abibindeba da ɡamoetsʰxadeba upʰlis xeli mis msaxurtʰ da tʰavis mtrebs ɡanurisxdeba 
radɡan upʰali tsʰetsʰxlʃi mova da ɡriɡalivitʰaa misi etlebi ratʰa miakʰtsʰios mdzvinvarebaʃi tʰavisi risxva da tʰavisi tsqroma tsʰetsʰxlis alebʃi 
radɡan upʰali ɡansdʒis tsʰetsʰxlitʰ da tʰavisi maxvilitʰ da bevrni ikʰnebian upʰlis daxotsʰilni 
isini vintsʰ tsmidavdebian da supʰtʰavdebian calebʃi tsasasvlelad vintsʰ mis ʃuaɡulʃi camen ɣoris xortsʰs sisadzaɡles da tʰaɡvebs ertʰianad moispobian sitqva upʰlisa 
me vitsʰi matʰi sakʰmeni da pʰikʰrebi modis dro qvela xalxisa da qvela enis ʃekrebisa da movlen da ixilaven tʃems didebas 
da me mivtsʰem matʰ niʃans da ɡavɡzavni matʰɡan ɡadartʃenilebs xalxebtʰan tʰarʃiʃʃi pʰulʃi da ludʃi mʃvildis damcimveltʰ tʰubalʃi da iabanʃi ʃoreul napirebze sadatsʰ ar smeniatʰ tʃemi da ar unaxavtʰ tʃemi dideba da autsqeben tʃems didebas xalxebʃi 
isini moiqvanen tʰkʰvens qvela dzmas qoveli xalxidan dzɣvnad upʰlisadmi tsʰxenebitʰ da etlebitʰ taxtrevnebitʰ dʒorebitʰa da akʰlemebitʰ tʃems tsmida mtʰaze ierusalimʃi ambobs upʰali roɡortsʰ israelianebs moakʰvtʰ dzɣveni supʰtʰa curclitʰ upʰlis saxlʃi 
da matʰɡanatsʰ aviqvan mɣvdlebad da levianebad ambobs upʰali 
radɡan roɡortsʰ axali tsʰa da axali mitsa romeltʰatsʰ me ʃevkʰmni dadɡebian tʃems tsinaʃe sitqva upʰlisa aseve dadɡeba tʰkʰveni tʰesli da tʰkʰveni saxeli 
da qovel tʰves da qovel ʃabatʰs mova qoveli xortsʰieli tʰaqvanissatsʰemlad tʃems tsinaʃe ambobs upʰali 
da ɡavlen da dainaxaven tʃemɡan ɡandɡomil adamiantʰa ɡvamebs radɡan matʰi matli ar mokvdeba da matʰi tsʰetsʰxli ar tʃakʰreba da ikʰnebian isini sisadzaɡled qoveli xortsʰielisatʰvis 
sitqva ieremiasi xilkiahus dzisa romelitsʰ qanatʰotʰel mɣvdeltʰaɡan iqo beniaminis kʰveqanaʃi 
romelzetsʰ iqo sitqva upʰlisa ioʃias qamonis dzis iudas mepʰis dɣeebʃi misi mepʰobis metsʰamete tsels 
da iqo iehoiakimis ioʃias dzis iudas mepʰis dɣeebʃi tsʰidkiahus iudas mepʰis ioʃias dzis metʰertʰmete tslis bolomde ierusalimis ɡandevnamde mexutʰe tʰves 
iqo sitqva upʰlisa tʃemdami 
sanam ɡamoɡsaxavdi mutsʰelʃi me ɡitsʰnobdi ʃen da sanam ɡamoxvidodi saʃodan me ɡanɡtsmide ʃen xalxebis tsinastsarmetqvelad ɡanɡatsese 
vtʰkʰvi upʰalo upʰalo me ar vitsʰi laparaki radɡan qmatsvili var 
da mitʰxra me upʰalma nu itqvi qmatsvili var radɡan qvelɡan sadatsʰ ki miɡavlen tsaxval da qovelives rasatsʰ ɡibrdzaneb 
nu ʃeɡeʃindeba matʰi radɡan ʃentʰana var ʃens ɡadasartʃenad sitqva upʰlisa 
da ɡamoitsvdina upʰalma tʰavisi xeli da ʃeexo tʃems baɡes da mitʰxra me upʰalma aha me tʃaɡidevi tʃemi sitqvebi baɡeʃi 
naxe me daɡaqene ʃen am dɣes xalxebsa da samepʰoebze ratʰa aɣmopʰxvra da ʃemusro mospo da daanɡrio aaʃeno da darɡo 
da iqo sitqva upʰlisa tʃemdami ras xedav ʃen ieremia da vutʰxari me nuʃis xis kvertʰxs vxedav me 
da mitʰxra me upʰalma karɡad xedav radɡan me vatʃkʰareb tʃems sitqvas ʃesasruleblad 
da iqo sitqva upʰlisa tʃemdami meored ase ras xedav ʃen da vutʰxari motʰuxtʰuxe kʰvabs vxedav tʃrdiloetʰisaken mimartʰuls 
da mitʰxra me upʰalma tʃrdiloetʰidan daitsqeba ubedureba kʰveqnis qvela mtsʰxovrebze 
radɡan me movuxmob tʃrdiloetʰis samepʰoebis qvela toms sitqva upʰlisa da movlen da dadɡams tʰitʰoeuli tʰavis taxts ierusalimis karibcetʰa ʃesasvlelʃi da mis qvela ɡalavanze irɡvliv da iudas qvela kʰalakʰze 
da tsarmovtʰkʰvam me tʃems samartʰals matʰze matʰi qvela borotmokʰmedebis ɡamo radɡan damtoves me da sxva ɣmertʰebs ukmevdnen da tʰaviantʰ naxelavs stsʰemdnen tʰaqvans 
ʃen ki ʃemoisartqle tseli da adekʰ da utʰxari matʰ qovelive rasatsʰ me ɡibrdzaneb nu dapʰrətʰxebi matʰ tsinaʃe rom metsʰ ar daɡapʰrətʰxo 
da me ɡakʰtsʰie ʃen dɣes ɡamaɡrebul kʰalakʰad da rkinis svetad da spilendzis ɡalavnad mtʰels am kʰveqanaze iudas mepʰeebis misi mtʰavrebis misi mɣvdlebis da mtʰeli kʰveqnis xalxis tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
da ʃeɡebrdzolebian isini maɡram ver daɡdzleven radɡan me ʃentʰana var ʃens ɡadasartʃenad sitqva upʰlisa 
da iqo sitqva upʰlisa tʃemdami ase 
tsadi da ɡamoatsʰxade ierusalimis ɡasaɡonad ase tʰkʰva upʰalma me maxsovs ʃeni ketʰilɡantsqobileba tʃemdami ʃens siqmatsvileʃi ʃeni tʃemdami siqvaruli rodesatsʰ patardzali iqavi ukan rom momdevdi udabnoʃi dautʰesav kʰveqanaʃi 
upʰlis tsmida iqo israeli pirvelnaqopʰi misi mosavlisa qvela misi ʃemcmeli dadanaʃauldeba ubedureba mietseva matʰ sitqva upʰlisa 
isminetʰ sitqva upʰlisa iakobis saxlo da israelis saxlis qvela saɡvareulov 
ase tʰkʰva upʰalma ra usamartʰloba hpoves tʰkʰvenma mamebma tʃemʃi rom ɡamʃordnen me da misdies amaoebas da ɡaxdnen amaoni 
da ar tʰkʰves sad aris upʰali romelmatsʰ ɡamoɡviqvana tʃven eɡviptis kʰveqnidan ɡvatarebda tʃven udabnoʃi moʃiʃvlebul da tʰxrilebian kʰveqanaʃi urtsqul da atʃrdiltʰa kʰveqanaʃi kʰveqanaʃi sadatsʰ aravis ar ɡauvlia da sadatsʰ aravin saxlobs 
da moɡiqvanetʰ naqopʰier kʰveqanaʃi ratʰa ɡecamatʰ misi naqopʰi da misi dovlatʰi moxveditʰ da ʃebiltsetʰ tʃemi kʰveqana da tʃemi samkvidrebeli sisadzaɡled akʰtsʰietʰ 
mɣvdlebi ar kitʰxulobdnen sad aris upʰali da rdʒulis damcerni ar mitsʰnobdnen me da mtsqemsni danaʃauls tʃadiodnen tʃems tsinaaɣmdeɡ tsinastsarmetqvelni baqalis saxelitʰ tsinastsarmetqvelebdnen da urɡebebs edevnebodnen 
amitom kidev daɡitsqebtʰ davas tʰkʰven sitqva upʰlisa da tʰkʰvens ʃviltʰaʃvilebsatsʰ davutsqeb davas 
radɡan daiaretʰ kʰitʰimeltʰa kundzulebi da naxetʰ da kedarʃi ɡaɡzavnetʰ da quradɣebitʰ daakvirditʰ da naxetʰ qopʰila ki amis msɡavsi 
ɡana ɡadatsʰvala romelime xalxma tʰavisi ɣmertʰebi tʰumtsʰa isini ar arian ɣmertʰebi tʃemma xalxma ki ɡadatsʰvala tʰvisi dideba urɡebʃi 
ɡaikvirvetʰ es tsʰano da ʃedzrtsunditʰ aoxrditʰ pʰriad sitqva upʰlisa 
radɡan ori siborote tʃaidina tʃemma erma me tsʰotsʰxali tsqlis tsqaro damtoves ratʰa tʰaviantʰtʰvis amoekvetʰatʰ cebi dabzaruli cebi romlebitsʰ ver daakaveben tsqals 
monaa israeli tʰu monis saxlʃia dabadebuli ratom ikʰtsʰa iɡi nadavlad 
masze ɣrialebdnen lomis bokverni ɡamostsʰemdnen tʰaviantʰ xmas da udaburad akʰtsʰies misi kʰveqana misi kʰalakʰebi ɡadamtsvari da ukatsʰrielia 
nopʰis da tʰaxpʰaneses dzeebmatsʰ daɡimsxvries ʃen kepʰa 
ɡana imis ɡamo ar daɡemartʰa es rom miatove ʃeni upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi im dros rodesatsʰ ɡzaze mihqavdi 
axla ki ra ɡinda ʃen eɡviptis ɡzaze nilosis tsqlis daleva ra ɡinda aʃuris ɡzaze evpʰratis tsqlis daleva 
ʃeni borotmokʰmedeba daɡsdʒis ʃen da ʃeni ɡandɡomilebani ɡamxilebs ʃen ɡaiɡeb da dainaxav ra tsʰudi da mtsarea rom datove upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi da ʃiʃi ar ɡakʰvs tʃems tsinaʃe sitqva upʰlisa qovladdzlieri ɣmertʰisa 
radɡan dzveltʰaɡan daletse ʃeni uɣeli datsqvite ʃeni borkilebi da tʰkʰvi ar vemsaxurebi metad kerpebs maɡram qovel maɣal bortsʰvze da qoveli amtsvanebuli xis kʰveʃ medzavivitʰ tsvebodi 
me ki daɡrɡe roɡortsʰ rtʃeuli vazi roɡortsʰ ceʃmariti tʰesli da roɡor ɡadamekʰetsʰi velur utsʰxo rtod 
amitom kidevatsʰ rom ɡairetsʰxo ɡvardʒilitʰ da mravlad ixmaro ʃen natsʰartuta lakʰad dartʃeba ʃeni urdʒuloeba tʃems tsinaʃe sitqva upʰali ɣmertʰisa 
roɡor itqvi ar ʃevbiltsulvar ar mivlia baqaltʰa kvalze ʃexede ʃens ɡzas xeobaʃi ʃeiɡne ra hkʰeni ʃen mardo akʰlemo motsantsalev ʃens ɡzebze 
udabnostʰan ʃetʃveul kandʒars tʰavisi sulis vnebitʰ rom isuntʰkʰavs haers vin moabrunebs misi avxortsʰobidan qoveli misi mdzebneli ar daiɣleba ipovnis mis tʰveʃi 
daitsʰavi ʃeni pʰexebi pʰexʃiʃvlobisɡan da ʃeni qeli tsqurvilisaɡan maɡram ʃen tʰkʰvi uimedoa radɡan miqvars utsʰxoni da vivli matʰ kvalze 
roɡortsʰ kʰurdia ʃertsʰxvenili rotsʰa tsaastsreben ise ʃertsʰxveba israelis saxli isini matʰi mepʰeni matʰi mtʰavarni da matʰi mɣvdlebi da matʰi tsinastsarmetqvelni 
romlebitsʰ eubnebian xes ʃen mama xar tʃemi da kʰvas ʃen mʃobe me radɡan zurɡi makʰtsʰies me da ara piri xolo tʰaviantʰi ubedurobis dros amboben adekʰi da ɡvixseni tʃven 
sad arian ʃeni ɣmertʰebi romlebitsʰ ɡaiketʰe ʃentʰvis adɡnen aba tʰu ɡixsnian ʃeni ubedurebis ʒams radɡan ʃeni kʰalakʰebis ritsʰxvisamebr iqvnen ʃeni ɣmertʰebi iuda 
ratom daobtʰ tʃemtʰan tʰkʰven qvelam tʃaidinetʰ danaʃauli tʃems tsinaʃe sitqva upʰali ɣmertʰisa 
amaod vtsʰemdi tʰkʰvens dzetʰ dariɡeba ar miiɣes tʰkʰvenma maxvilma roɡortsʰ momspobma lomma ʃecama tʰkʰveni tsinastsarmetqvelni 
tʰaobav ʃeiɡne upʰlis sitqva udabno viqavi israelisatʰvis tʰu tsqvdiadis kʰveqana ratom tʰkʰva tʃemma erma daɡʃorditʰ ʃen aɣar movaltʰ ʃentʰan 
ɡana daivitsqebs kʰaltsuli tʰavis mortʰulobas patardzali tʰavis bapʰtʰebs tʃemma xalxma ki damivitsqa me dɣeebs ara akʰvs ritsʰxvi 
ra karɡad martʰav ʃens ɡzas siqvarulis dzebnaʃi amitom tʰvitʰ borottʰatsʰ astsavle ʃeni ɡzebi 
ʃeni samoselis kaltʰebzetsʰ ikʰna napovni udanaʃaulo ɣataktʰa sulebis sisxli xvrelebʃi ar ɡipovnia ʃen isini maɡram qovelive amastʰan ertʰad 
ʃen tʰkʰvi radɡan udanaʃaulo var miikʰtsʰa misi risxva tʃemɡan maɡram aha me ɡaɡasamartʰleb ʃen ʃeni natʰkʰvamis ɡamo ar ʃemitsʰodavs 
roɡor amtsʰireb ʃens tʰavs ʃens ɡzas rom itsʰvli eɡviptisɡanatsʰ ʃertsʰxvebi ʃen roɡortsʰ aʃurisaɡan ʃertsʰxvi 
misɡanatsʰ ɡamoxval ʃen da xelebi tʰavze ɡekʰneba ʃemotsqobili radɡan moidzula upʰalma ʃeni imedebi da ar ɡekʰneba matʰtʰan tsarmateba 
ambobs upʰali tʰu katsʰi ɡauʃvebs tʰavis tsʰols misɡan tsava da sxva katsʰs ɡahqveba ɡana kidev dabrundeba es katsʰi im tsʰoltʰan ɡana sibiltsitʰ ar ʃeibiltseba is kʰveqana ʃen ki medzaobdi mraval saqvareltʰan da axla brundebi tʃemtʰan sitqva upʰlisa 
miapqar ʃeni tʰvalebi xriok maɣlobebs da naxe sad ar umruʃiatʰ ʃentʰan ɡzebze udʒekʰi matʰ roɡortsʰ arabi udabnoʃi da ʃebiltse ʃen kʰveqana ʃeni sidzvitʰa da ʃeni borotebitʰ 
da ʃekavebuli iqo tsvimebi da ɡazapʰxulis tsvima ar iqo maɡram ʃen ɡkʰonda medzavi kʰalis ʃubli ukuaɡde sirtsʰxvili 
ɡana axlaxan ar damidzaxe tʃemo mamav tʃemi siqmatsvilis meɡobari xar ʃen 
saukunod ʃeinartʃunebs tʰavis risxvas an samaradisod ʃeinaxavs tʰkʰvi es da tʃaidine borotebani roɡortsʰ ki ʃeɡedzlo 
da mitʰxra me upʰalma mepʰe ioʃias dɣeebʃi ʃen naxe ratsʰ ɡaaketʰa ɡandɡomilma israelma midioda is qvela maɣal mtʰaze da qoveli amtsvanebuli xis kʰveʃ da ikʰ medzaobda 
da vtʰkʰvi me qovelive amis ɡaketʰebis ʃemdeɡ mobrundeba tʃemsken da ar mobrunda da naxa es misma moɣalate dam iudam 
da davinaxe rom qovelive imis ɡamo rom imruʃa ɡandɡomilma israelma ɡavuʃvi iɡi da mivetsʰi mas ɡaqris tserili ar ʃeeʃinda mis moɣalate das iudas da tsavida da isidzva manatsʰ 
da tʰavisi tʰavkʰariani sidzvitʰ ʃebiltsa man es kʰveqana da mruʃobda is kʰvastʰan da xestʰan 
da maintsʰ ar mobrunda tʃemsken mtʰeli ɡulitʰ iuda misi moɣalate da aramed mxolod tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰurad sitqva upʰlisa 
da mitʰxra me upʰalma ɡandɡomili israelis suli moɣalate iudaze upʰro martʰalia 
tsadi da ɡamoatsʰxade es sitqvebi tʃrdiloetʰʃi da tʰkʰvi mobrundi ɡandɡomilo israelo me ar davtsʰem tʃems saxes tʰkʰvenze risxvitʰ radɡan ʃemtsqalebeli var me sitqva upʰlisa da ar ʃeɡinaxav borotebas saukunod 
oɣond ʃeitsʰani ʃeni urdʒuloeba rom ʃeni upʰali ɣmertʰis mimartʰ tʃaidine danaʃauli da ɡahpʰante ʃeni ɡzebi utsʰxoebʃi qoveli amtsvanebuli xis kʰveʃ da tʃems xmas ar mousminetʰ sitqva upʰlisa 
mobrunditʰ ɡandɡomilo dzeno sitqva upʰlisa radɡan me patroni var tʰkʰveni aɡiqvantʰ tʰkʰven ertʰi kʰalakʰidan da ori ɡvaridan da moɡiqvantʰ sionʃi 
da moɡtsʰemtʰ tʰkʰven mtsqemsebs tʃemi ɡulisamebr da daɡmtsqemsaven tʰkʰven tsʰodnitʰa da ɡaɡebitʰ 
da rodesatsʰ ɡamravldebitʰ da inaqopʰierebtʰ im dɣeebʃi sitqva upʰlisa aɣar itqvian metad kidobani upʰlis aɣtʰkʰmisa da ar mouvatʰ ɡulʃi da ar ɡaixseneben mas da ar moisakliseben mas da aɣar ɡaketʰdeba is 
im dros ierusalims utsodeben upʰlis taxts da qvela xalxebi upʰlis saxelitʰ ʃeikribebian ierusalimʃi da aɣar ivlian metad tʰaviantʰi boroti ɡulis ʃeupovrobitʰ 
im dɣeebʃi tsavlen iudas saxlis dzeni israelis saxltʰan ertʰad da mivlen tʃrdiloetʰis kʰveqnidan kʰveqanaʃi romelitsʰ me davumkvidre tʰkʰvens mamebs 
da me vtʰkʰvi roɡor daɡaqeno dzetʰa ʃoris da roɡor moɡtsʰe ʃen sanatreli kʰveqana umʃvenieresi samkvidrebeli xalxebisa da mitsodeb me tʃemo mamav da ar ɡandɡebi tʃemɡan 
martʰlatsʰ roɡortsʰ tsʰoli ɣalatobs tʰavis kʰmars ise miɣalatetʰ tʰkʰven israelis saxlo sitqva upʰlisa 
xriok maɣlobebze ismis xma israelis dzetʰa mavedrebeli tirili radɡan matʰ ɡaimrudes tʰaviantʰi ɡza daivitsqes upʰali matʰi ɣmertʰi 
mobrunditʰ ɡandɡomilo dzeno me ɡanvkurnav tʰkʰvens ɡandɡomas aha tʃven moveditʰ ʃentʰan radɡan ʃena xar upʰali tʃveni ɣmertʰi 
martʰlatsʰ mxolod sitsʰruea bortsʰvebidan da xmauri mtʰebidan martʰlatsʰ upʰalʃi tʃvens ɣmertʰʃia israelis xsna 
da sirtsʰxvili camda tʃveni siqmatsvilidan tʃveni mamebis nadʒapʰars matʰ tsʰxvarsa da matʰ dzroxas matʰ dzetʰ da matʰ asultʰ 
davtsvetʰ sirtsʰxvilʃi da tʃveni ʃertsʰxvena daɡvpʰaravs tʃven radɡan upʰals tʃvens ɣmertʰs ʃevtsʰodetʰ tʃven da tʃvenma mamebma tʃveni siqmatsvilidan da dɣemde ar vusmenditʰ upʰlis tʃveni ɣmertʰis xmas 
tʰu mobrundebi israel sitqva upʰlisa tʃemsken mobrundebi da tʰu momaʃoreb ʃens sisadzaɡleebs maʃin aɣar ixetialeb 
da tʰu daipʰitsʰeb roɡortsʰ tsʰotsʰxalia upʰali ceʃmaritebaʃi samartʰalsa da simartʰleʃi maʃin ikurtʰxebian masʃi xalxebi da masʃive ikʰnebian kʰebulni 
radɡan ase utʰxra upʰalma iudas katsʰebs da ierusalims moxanitʰ tʰkʰventʰvis aneuli da nu datʰesavtʰ ekaltʰa ʃoris 
tsinadaitsʰvitʰetʰ upʰlisatʰvis da moitsʰiletʰ tsinadautsʰvetʰloba tʰkʰveni ɡulisa iudas katsʰebo da ierusalimis mkvidrno tsʰetsʰxlivitʰ ar ɡamovides tʃemi ɡulistsqroma da ar aɡizɡizdes tʃaukʰroblad tʰkʰveni boroti namokʰmedaris ɡamo 
autsqetʰ iudaʃi da ierusalimʃi ɡamoatsʰxadetʰ da tʰkʰvitʰ aaxmianetʰ saqviri kʰveqanaʃi iqviretʰ mtʰeli xmitʰ da tʰkʰvitʰ ʃeɡrovditʰ da tsavidetʰ ɡamaɡrebul kʰalakʰebʃi 
sionisken aɣmartʰetʰ alami ɡaikʰetsʰitʰ nu ɡatʃerdebitʰ radɡan ubedureba da didi daɣupva momakʰvs tʃrdiloetʰidan 
lomi ɡamovida tʰavisi tevridan da xalxebis momspobi daidzra ɡamovida tʰavisi adɡilidan ratʰa ɡaatialos ʃeni kʰveqana aoxrdeba ʃeni kʰalakʰebi ɡaukatsʰrieldeba 
amis ɡamo ʃemoirtqitʰ dzadza iɡlovetʰ da ikʰvitʰinetʰ radɡan upʰlis risxvis ali ar mikʰtsʰeula tʃvenɡan 
da ikʰneba im dɣes sitqva upʰlisa tʃakvdeba mepʰis ɡuli da mtʰavartʰa ɡuli da ʃedzrtsundebian mɣvdlebi da tsinastsarmetqvelni ɡaotsʰdebian 
da vtʰkʰvi me oi upʰalo ɣmertʰo martʰlatsʰ ʃen moatque es xalxi da ierusalimi rom utʰxari mʃvidoba ɡekʰnebatʰ tʰkʰven maxvili ki mistsvda matʰ suls 
im dros natʰkʰvami ikʰneba am erisa da ierusalimis mimartʰ mtsveli kʰari modis udabnos xriok maɣlobebidan tʃemi eris asulis ɡzaze artsʰ ɡasaniaveblad da artsʰ ɡasatsmedad 
kʰari amatʰze dzlieri mova tʃemtʰan axla metsʰ tsarmovtʰkʰvam ɡanatʃens matʰze 
aha ɣrubelivitʰ amova iɡi da kʰariʃxalivitʰ misi etlebi artsivebze stsrapʰni arian misi tsʰxenebi vai tʃven radɡan ɡavidzartsʰvetʰ 
ɡairetsʰxe borotisaɡan ʃeni ɡuli ierusalimo ratʰa ɡadartʃe rodemde ibudeben ʃenʃi ʃeni boroteuli zraxvani 
radɡan xma autsqebs danidan da ubedurebas atsʰxadebs epʰremis mtʰidan 
ʃeaxsenetʰ xalxebs aha ɡamoatsʰxadetʰ alqis ʃemomrətqmelni modian ʃoreuli kʰveqnidan da tʰaviantʰi xmitʰ aqrueben iudas kʰalakʰebs 
roɡortsʰ velis mtsʰvelni mis tsinaaɣmdeɡ arian irɡvliv radɡan me aɣmidɡa sitqva upʰlisa 
ʃenma ɡzam da ʃenma sakʰmeebma moɡitana ʃen eseni es aris ʃeni boroteba rariɡ mtsarea radɡan miaɣtsia ʃens ɡulamde 
ʃiɡani tʃemi ʃiɡani tʃemi me vkankaleb mtkiva tʃemi ɡulis kedlebi mikvnesis ɡuli ar davdumdebi radɡan saqviris xma mesmis sulo tʃemo sabrdzolo qiʒina 
ubedureba ubedurebas mosdevs radɡan ɡaidzartsʰva mtʰeli kʰveqana utsʰeb ɡaidzartsʰva tʃemi karvebi tsamʃi tʃemi pʰardebi 
rodemde unda vuqurebde alams mesmodes rkʰis saqviris xma 
radɡan sulelia tʃemi xalxi me ar mitsʰnobs briqvi ʃvilebi arian isini uɡnurni arian isini maɡram brdzenni saborotod siketʰis ɡaketʰeba ar itsʰian 
vuqureb kʰveqanas da aha usaxuria da udaburi tsʰas da ar aris misɡan natʰeli 
vuqureb mtʰebs da aha irqevian isini da zanzarebs qvela bortsʰvi 
vuqureb da aha adamiani aɣar aris da tsʰis qvela pʰrinveli ɡapʰrinda 
vuqureb da aha naqopʰieri mxare udabnod ikʰtsʰa da qvela misi kʰalakʰi ɡatsʰamtverda upʰlis tsinaʃe misi risxvis alis tsinaʃe 
radɡan ase tʰkʰva upʰalma mtʰeli kʰveqana ɡaukatsʰrieldeba maɡram bolomde ar movspob 
amaze iɡlovebs kʰveqana da maɣla tsʰa dabneldeba radɡan me tsarmovtʰkʰvi me tʃavipʰikʰre ar vinaneb da ar davixev misɡan 
mxedartʰa da mʃvildosantʰa xmaze ɡarbis mtʰeli kʰalakʰi ʃevidnen uɣranebʃi da avidnen kldeebze mtʰeli kʰalakʰi mitovebulia da katsʰiʃvili ar tsʰxovrobs masʃi 
ʃen ki ɡadzartsʰvulo ras ɡaaketʰeb tʰumtsʰa tʃaitsʰmev metsamuls tʰumtsʰa ʃeimkobi okʰros samkaulebitʰ tʰumtsʰa ɡaipʰartʰoveb ʃens tʰvalebs saɡremlitʰ amaod lamazdebi ʃeɡizizɣes saqvarlebma ʃens suls edzieben 
radɡan xma mesma tʰitʰkʰos mʃobiare kʰalisa kivili pirvelad mʃobiarisa xma sionis asulisa kʰvitʰinitʰ ɡaitsvdis is tʰavis xelebs vaime daiɣala tʃemi suli mkvlelebis tsinaʃe 
ɡaiar ɡamoiaretʰ ierusalimis kʰutʃebʃi ɡaixed ɡamoixedetʰ da moikitʰxetʰ mis moednebze da tʰu ipovitʰ katsʰs samartʰlis mkʰmnels ceʃmaritebis mdzebnels maʃin metsʰ vapatiebdi mas 
da tʰu amboben isini roɡortsʰ tsʰotsʰxalia upʰali namdvilad tquilad ipʰitsʰebian 
upʰalo ʃeni tʰvali xom ceʃmaritebiskenaa mipqrobili ʃen stsʰem matʰ isini ki ver ɡrədznoben ʃen spob matʰ maɡram ar surtʰ dariɡebis miɣeba ɡaikʰvaves pirisaxe kldeze metad ar surtʰ mokʰtsʰeva 
da me vtʰkʰvi tʃemtʰvis eseni xom ɡlaxakebi arian ɡasuleldnen radɡan ar itsʰian upʰlis ɡza tʰaviantʰi ɣmertʰis samartʰali 
tsaval didebulebtʰan da vilaparakeb matʰtʰan radɡan matʰ itsʰian upʰlis ɡza tʰaviantʰi ɣmertʰis samartʰali maɡram matʰ ertʰad daletses uɣeli datsqvites borkilebi 
amis ɡamo dastsʰems matʰ lomi tqidan tramalis mɡeli ɡadzartsʰvavs matʰ vepʰxvi daudaradʒebs matʰ kʰalakʰebs qvela ikʰidan ɡamosuli daiɡlidʒeba radɡan ɡamravlda matʰi danaʃauli ɡaizarda matʰi ɡandɡoma 
roɡor ɡapatio es ʃenma dzeebma damtoves me da ipʰitsʰebdnen ɣmertʰebs romelnitsʰ ar arian ɣmertʰebi rodesatsʰ ɡavadzɣe me isini maʃin mruʃobdnen da medzavis saxlʃi ikribebodnen 
isini ɡamdzɣari atroqebuli tsʰxenebivitʰ arian qoveli katsʰi tʰavisi moqvasis tsʰols ecixvineba 
da amatʰ ɡamo ar daɡsdʒitʰ sitqva upʰlisa da asetʰ xalxze ar idziebs ʃurs tʃemi suli 
aditʰ mis mtskrivebze da mospetʰ maɡram srul mospobas nu ikʰmtʰ qlortebi moaʃoretʰ radɡan upʰlisani ar aris isini 
radɡan miɣalata me israelis saxlma da iudas saxlma sitqva upʰlisa 
upʰalze tsʰruobdnen da ambobdnen ar aris is da ar mova tʃvenze ubedureba da maxvilsa da ʃimʃils ar vixilavtʰ 
da tsinastsarmetqvelni kʰarad ikʰtsʰevian da sitqva ar aris matʰʃi ase daemartʰeba matʰ 
amitom ase tʰkʰva upʰalma mxedrobatʰa ɣmertʰma radɡan tʰkʰven ambobditʰ asetʰ sitqvas me vakʰtsʰev ʃens pirʃi tʃems sitqvebs tsʰetsʰxlad xolo am ers ʃeʃad romelsatsʰ is ʃtʰantʰkʰavs 
aha me moviqvan tʰkʰvenze xalxs ʃoridan israelis saxlo sitqva upʰlisa dzlieri xalxia iɡi dzveli xalxia iɡi xalxi romlis ena ar itsʰi ʃen da ver ɡaiɡeb ras ilaparakebs 
misi kaparci ɣia sapʰlavivitʰaa qvelani mamatsʰi meomarni arian 
da ʃecams is ʃens samkals da ʃens purs ʃecams ʃens dzetʰ da ʃens asultʰ ʃecams ʃens tsʰxvarsa da ʃens dzroxas ʃecams ʃens vazsa da ʃens leɣvs maxvilitʰ moaoxrebs ʃens ɡamaɡrebul kʰalakʰebs romlebzetsʰ daimedebuli xar 
da im dɣeebʃitsʰ sitqva upʰlisa ar moɡspobtʰ tʰkʰven mtʰlianad 
da tʰu itqvitʰ ris ɡamo ɡaɡviketʰa tʃven upʰalma tʃvenma ɣmertʰma es qovelive maʃin utʰxari matʰ roɡortsʰ tʰkʰven mimatovetʰ me da emsaxureboditʰ utsʰxo ɣmertʰebs tʰkʰvens kʰveqanaʃi aseve emsaxurebitʰ utsʰxoebs im kʰveqanaʃi romelitsʰ tʰkʰveni ar aris 
autsqetʰ es iakobis saxlʃi da ɡamoatsʰxadetʰ es iudaʃi ase 
isminetʰ es sulelo da uɡunuro xalxo tʰvalebi akʰvtʰ matʰ da ver xedaven qurebi akʰvtʰ matʰ da ver ismenen 
ɡana tʃemi ar ɡeʃiniatʰ sitqva upʰlisa tʃems tsinaʃe ar tʰrtʰixartʰ romelmatsʰ davde kʰviʃa zɣvis sazɣvrad saukuno midʒnad romelsatsʰ ver ɡadalaxavs da bobokʰroben misi talɣebi maɡram ver sdzleven da ɣrialeben maɡram ver ɡadalaxaven mas 
am ers ki urtʃi da meamboxe ɡuli hkʰonda ɡanmʃordnen isini da tsavidnen 
da ar tʰkʰves tʰaviantʰ ɡulʃi ɡveʃinodes upʰlisa tʃveni ɣmertʰisa romelitsʰ ɡvadzlevs tʃven ʃemodɡomis tsvimas da ɡazapʰxulis tsvimas tʰavis droze mkisatʰvis dadɡenil ʃvideulebs ɡvinaxavs tʃven 
tʰkʰvenma urdʒuloebam miakʰtsʰia eseni da tʰkʰvenma tsʰodvebma ʃeakaves tʰkʰvenɡan es siketʰe 
radɡan tʃems erʃi moipovebian boroteulni tʰavtsaxritʰ arian tʃasapʰrebulni roɡortsʰ pʰrinvelze monadireni dɡamen xapʰanɡebs ratʰa ʃeipqron adamianebi 
roɡortsʰ ɡaliaa savse pʰrinvelebitʰ ise matʰi saxlia savse sitsʰruitʰ amitom ɡandiddnen da ɡamdidrədnen isini 
dasukʰdnen daskʰeldnen ɡadaacarbes borotebis sakʰmeʃi sasamartʰlo sakʰmes oblis sakʰmes ar artʃevdnen rom tsarmatebuliqvnen da ɣaribtʰa upʰlebas ar itsʰavdnen 
amatʰ ɡamo ar daɡsdʒi sitqva upʰlisa ɡana asetʰ xalxze ar idziebs ʃurs tʃemi suli 
ɡasaotsʰari da saʃineli xdeba kʰveqanaze 
tsinastsarmetqvelni tquils tsinastsarmetqveleben da mɣvdlebi batonoben matʰi xelitʰ tʃems ers ki uqvars es maɡram ras izamtʰ sabolood 
tʰavi ʃeapʰaretʰ beniaminis dzeno ierusalimis ʃuaɡulidan da tʰekoaqʃi tʃahberetʰ saqvirs da betʰ hakʰeremze aɣmartʰetʰ niʃani radɡan ubedureba da didi daɣupva modis tʃrdiloetʰidan 
mʃvenieri da nebieri metʃveneboda me sionis asuli 
mastʰan movlen mtsqemsni da matʰi samtsqsoni da ɡaʃlian masze irɡvliv karvebs da tʰitʰoeuli tʰavis nakvetʰze damtsqesavs 
moemzadetʰ mastʰan sabrdzolvelad adekʰitʰ da avidetʰ ʃuadɣisas vai tʃven radɡan ɡadaixara dɣe radɡan tsaɡrdzelda saɣamos tʃrdilebi 
adekʰitʰ da avidetʰ ɣamitʰ da movspotʰ matʰi sasaxleebi 
radɡan ase tʰkʰva upʰalma tsʰabaotʰma datʃexetʰ xeebi da daqaretʰ ierusalimis tsin mitsaqrili es kʰalakʰi unda daisadʒos mxolod dzaladobaa mis ʃuaɡulʃi 
roɡortsʰ ca amoantʰxevs tsqals ise amoantʰxevs is tʰavis siborortes dzartsʰva da dzalmomreoba ismis masʃi tʃems tsinaʃe sneuleba da crilobebia ɡamudmebitʰ 
ʃeiɡne ierusalimo sanam zurɡs ʃeɡakʰtsʰevdes tʃemi suli sanam ɡakʰtsʰevde udabnod da ukatsʰriel kʰveqanad 
ase tʰkʰva upʰalma tsʰabaotʰma qurdzenivitʰ moimtsʰvreven israelis nartʃens ɡaitsode xeli vazisaken roɡortsʰ qurdznis mkrepʰavma 
vis velaparako vin ɡavapʰrətʰxilo rom moisminon aha tsinadautsʰvetʰelia matʰi sasmenelni da ar ʃeudzliatʰ ɡaɡoneba aha upʰlis sitqva ʃertsʰxvenad hkʰondatʰ matʰ ar mostsondatʰ iɡi 
da me ɡavivse upʰlis risxvitʰ ar ʃemidzlia misi ʃekaveba ɡadmoɣvare kʰutʃebʃi bavʃvebze da ertʰad ʃekrebil cabukebze radɡan kʰmaritsʰ tsʰoltʰan ertʰad ʃeipqroba moxutsʰi dɣeebsavsestʰan ertʰad 
da matʰi saxlebi sxvebs ɡadaetsʰema qanebtʰan da tsʰolebtʰan ertʰad radɡan ɡavitsvdi tʃems xels am kʰveqnis mtsʰxovreblebze sitqva upʰlisa 
radɡan pataridan didamde matʰɡan qvelani anɡarebitʰ arian ʃepqrobili da tsinastsarmetqvelidan mɣvdlamde qvela tquilis mokʰmedia 
tʃemi xalxis crilobas ki advilad kurnaven rom amboben mʃvidoba mʃvidoba maɡram ar aris mʃvidoba 
rətsʰxveniatʰ ki matʰ sisadzaɡle rom tʃaidines artsʰ rətsʰxveniatʰ artsʰ auɡi itsʰian amitom daetsʰemian isini datsʰemultʰa ʃoris im dros rodesatsʰ movkitʰxav matʰ tsaibordzikeben isini tʰkʰva upʰalma 
ase tʰkʰva upʰalma ʃetʃerditʰ ɡzebze da ɡaixedetʰ da ɡaikitʰxetʰ udzveless bilikebze romeli ɡzaa uketʰesi da iaretʰ masze da moupovetʰ ʃveba tʰkʰvens sulebs maɡram matʰ tʰkʰves ar vivlitʰ 
da daɡiqenetʰ daradʒebi quri dauɡdetʰ saqviris xmas maɡram matʰ tʰkʰves ar davuɡdebtʰ qurs 
amitom isminetʰ xalxebo da itsʰode sazoɡadoebav ratsʰ matʰʃi xdeba 
ismine dedamitsav aha me momakʰvs ubedureba am xalxtʰan naqopʰi matʰi ɡanzraxvisa radɡan tʃem sitqvebs ar dauɡdes quri da tʃemi rdʒuli moidzules 
ristʰvis minda me ɡundruki ʃebadan rom modis da ketʰilsurnelovani lertsami ʃoreuli kʰveqnidan tʰkʰveni sruladdasatsveli msxverplni ʃeutsqnarebelia da tʰkʰveni samsxverploebi uamuria tʃemtʰvis 
amitom ase tʰkʰva upʰalma aha me vudeb am xalxs dabrkolebebs da dabrkoldebian matʰze mamebi da ʃvilebi ertʰad mezobeli da misi moqvasi daiɣupebian 
ase tʰkʰva upʰalma aha xalxi modis tʃrdilo kʰveqnidan da didi eri iɣvidzebs kʰveqnis kideebidan 
mʃvildi da ʃubi uciravtʰ matʰ sastikni arian da daundobelni matʰi xma bobokʰar zɣvasavitʰaa da tsʰxenebze amxedrebuli modian roɡortsʰ ertʰi mzad arian ʃentʰan sabrdzolvelad sionis asulo 
ambavi ɡvesma masze da moɡvidunda xelebi ɡasacirma ʃeɡvipqro ise roɡortsʰ mʃobiare kʰali tkivilma 
nu ɡaxvaltʰ mindorʃi da ɡzaze nu ivlitʰ radɡan mters maxvili akʰvs da saʃinelebaa qoveli mxridan 
tʃemi eris asulo ʃemoirtqi dzadza da ɡaɡordi natsʰarʃi iɡlove roɡortsʰ dedisertʰaze mtsared motʰkʰvi radɡan utsʰeb daɡvetsʰema momspobi 
ɡamsindʒvelad ɡanɡatsese tʃems erʃi simaɡred rom ʃeitsʰno da ɡasindʒo matʰi ɡza 
qvelani ɡandɡomilni arian tsʰilistsamebitʰ mosiaruleni spilendzi da rkinaa qvelani damɣupvelni arian 
saberveli daitsva tqvia ʃtʰaintʰkʰa tsʰetsʰxlʃi amaod adnobda mdnobeli da borotni ar ɡamotsʰalkevdnen 
sadzulvel vertsʰxls utsodeben matʰ radɡan upʰalma moidzula isini 
sitqva upʰlisa romelitsʰ esma ieremias 
dadekʰi upʰlis saxlis karibceʃi da daidzaxe ikʰ es sitqva da tʰkʰvi isminetʰ upʰlis sitqva qvela iudaelo ʃemomsvlelno am karibceebʃi rom tʰaqvani stsʰetʰ upʰals 
ase ambobs upʰali tsʰabaotʰi israelis ɣmertʰi ɡamoastsoretʰ tʰkʰveni ɡzebi da tʰkʰveni mokʰmedebani da daɡasaxlebtʰ am adɡilze 
nu xartʰ dandobilni tsʰru sitqvebze rom amboben upʰlis tadzaria upʰlis tadzaria upʰlis tadzaria es 
maɡram tʰu ɡamoastsorebtʰ tʰkʰvens ɡzebsa da tʰkʰvens mokʰmedebebs tʰu ikʰmtʰ samartʰals katsʰsa da mis moqvass ʃoris 
mtsirs obolsa da kʰvrivs ar datʃaɡravtʰ da udanaʃaulo sisxls ar daɣvritʰ am adɡilze da tʰu sxva ɣmertʰebs ar ɡamoedevnebitʰ tʰkʰvens saubedurod 
maʃin daɡasaxlebtʰ am adɡilze kʰveqanaʃi romelitsʰ me mivetsʰi tʰkʰvens mamebs ukunitʰi ukunisamde 
aha tʰkʰven dandobili xartʰ tsʰru usarɡeblo sitqvebze 
roɡor iparavtʰ klavtʰ mruʃobtʰ tquilad ipʰitsʰebtʰ baqals ukmevtʰ da sxva ɣmertʰebs misdevtʰ romeltʰatsʰ ar itsʰnobtʰ 
da mere modixartʰ da dɡebitʰ tʃems tsinaʃe am saxlʃi tʃemi saxelitʰ rom itsodeba da ambobtʰ ɡadavrtʃitʰ ratʰa isev tʃaidinotʰ qovelive es sisadzaɡle 
avazaktʰa bunaɡad ikʰtsʰa tʰkʰvens tʰvalʃi es saxli romelitsʰ tʃemi saxelitʰ itsodeba aha metsʰ vxedav sitqva upʰlisa 
tsaditʰ tʃems adɡilze romelitsʰ ʃiloʃia ikʰ sadatsʰ pirvelad davavane tʃemi saxeli da naxetʰ ra ɡavuketʰe mas tʃemi eris israelis borotmokʰmedebis ɡamo 
axla ki radɡan tʰkʰven tʃaidinetʰ qvela es sakʰme sitqva upʰlisa me ki ɡeubneboditʰ tʰkʰven ɡantʰiadidan ɡelaparakeboditʰ da ar ɡesmodatʰ ɡixmobditʰ da ar mpasuxobditʰ 
iseve movekʰtsʰevi saxls romelitsʰ tʃemi saxelitʰ itsodeba da romelzetsʰ tʰkʰvena xartʰ dandobilni da im adɡils romelitsʰ me moɡetsʰitʰ tʰkʰven da tʰkʰvens mamebs roɡortsʰ movekʰetsʰi ʃilos 
da moɡisvritʰ tʰkʰven tʃemi piridan roɡortsʰ movisrole tʰkʰveni qoveli dzma epʰremis qvela tʰesli 
ʃen ki nu ilotsʰeb am xalxisatʰvis da nu aamaɣleb matʰtʰvis vedrebasa da lotsʰvas da nu ʃemexvetsebi radɡan ar moɡismen 
ɡana ver xedav ras aketʰeben isini iudas kʰalakʰebsa da ierusalimis kʰutʃebʃi 
ʃvilebi xeebs aɡroveben mamebi ki tsʰetsʰxls atʃaɣeben kʰalebi tsʰoms zelen rom daamzadon kverebi tsʰis dedopʰlis sapativtsʰemod da ɣvrian ʃesatsiravs sxva ɣmertʰebisatʰvis ratʰa ɡamabrazon me 
maɡram me mabrazeben isini sitqva upʰlisa tʰu tʰaviantʰ tʰavs ʃesartsʰxvenad 
amitom ase tʰkʰva upʰalma ɣmertʰma aha tʃemi risxva da tʃemi ɡulistsqroma ɡadmointʰxeva am adɡilze adamianze da sakʰonelze mindvris xeze da mitsis naqopʰze da ɡaɣvivdeba da ar tʃakʰreba 
ase tʰkʰva upʰalma tsʰabaotʰma israelis ɣmertʰma tʰkʰveni sruladdasatsveli msxverplebi daumatetʰ tʰkʰvens msxverplebs da cametʰ xortsʰi 
radɡan me ar veubnebodi tʰkʰvens mamebs da ar vubrdzanebdi matʰ eɡviptis kʰveqnidan matʰi ɡamoqvanis dɣes sruladdasatsvelisa da msxverplis ɡamo 
aramed mxolod es sitqva vubrdzane matʰ ase ɡaiɡonetʰ tʃemi sitqva da vikʰnebi tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰi da tʰkʰven ikʰnebitʰ tʃemi eri da ivlitʰ qvela im ɡzitʰ romelsatsʰ ɡibrdzanebtʰ tʰkʰven rom sasiketʰo iqos tʰkʰventʰvis 
maɡram matʰ ar ɡaiɡones da ar damiɡdes quri da iares tʰaviantʰi ɡonebitʰ tʰaviantʰi boroti ɡulis ʃeupovrobitʰ da ukan iqvnen da ara tsin 
im dɣidan rodesatsʰ tʰkʰveni mamebi ɡamovidnen eɡviptis kʰveqnidan dɣemde ɡiɡzavniditʰ tʃems msaxurtʰ tsinastsarmetqveltʰ ɡantʰiadidan vɡzavnidi matʰ 
maɡram ar mismines me da ar damiɡdes quri da ɡaimaɡres kiseri da tʰaviantʰ mamebze uaresad ikʰtsʰeodnen 
ʃen ki etqvi matʰ qvela am sitqvas maɡram ar moɡismenen mouxmob matʰ da ar ɡipasuxeben 
utʰxari matʰ esaa xalxi romelmatsʰ ar ismina upʰlis misi ɣmertʰis xma da ar miiɣo dariɡeba daikarɡa ceʃmariteba da amoikvetʰa matʰi baɡeebidan 
ʃeiceri tʰmebi da ɡadaqare da aamaɣle xriok maɣlobebze motʰkʰma radɡan upʰalma moidzula da datova misi tsqromis tʰaoba 
radɡan iudas dzeni borots stʃadian tʃems tʰvaltsin sitqva upʰlisa tʰaviantʰi sisadzaɡleni daatsqves saxlʃi romelitsʰ tʃemi saxelitʰ itsodeba ratʰa ʃebiltson 
da aaʃenes ɡorakebi tʰopʰetʰisa romelitsʰ ben hinomis calaʃia ratʰa daetsvatʰ tsʰetsʰxlʃi tʰaviantʰi dzeni da asulni ratsʰ ar mibrdzanebia da artsʰ ɡamivlia ɡulʃi 
amitom modian dɣeebi sitqva upʰlisa da aɣar itqvian metad tʰopʰetʰs da ben hinomis calas aramed mkvlelobis calas da damarxaven tʰopʰetʰʃi uadɡilobis ɡamo 
da ikʰneba am xalxis ɡvamebi tsʰis pʰrinveltʰa da kʰveqnis tsʰxoveltʰa sacmelad da aɣaravin ikʰneba matʰi dampʰrətʰxobi 
da ʃevtsqvet me iudas kʰalakʰebsa da ierusalimis kʰutʃebʃi mxiarulebis xmas da lxinis xmas nepʰis xmas da patardzlis xmas radɡan udabnod ikʰtsʰeva es kʰveqana 
im dros sitqva upʰlisa amoiɣeben matʰi sapʰlavebidan iudas mepʰetʰa da mis mtʰavartʰa mis mɣvdeltʰa mis tsinastsarmetqveltʰa da ierusalimis mtsʰxovrebtʰa dzvlebs 
da mimopʰantaven matʰ mzisa da mtʰvarisa da tsʰis mtʰeli mxedrobis tsin romlebitsʰ uqvardatʰ matʰ da romlebsatsʰ emsaxurebodnen da romeltʰatsʰ ukan misdevdnen da romeltʰatsʰ edzebdnen da romeltʰatsʰ tʰaqvans stsʰemdnen ar aikripʰebian isini da ar daimarxebian naɡvad ikʰnebian mitsis pirze
