amitomatsʰ ɡatsʰudda rdʒuli da aɣar cris samartʰali radɡan usamartʰlo dʒabnis martʰals amitomatsʰ ɡamodis ukuɣmartʰi msdʒavri 
ʃexedetʰ xalxebs daakvirditʰ da ɡantsʰvipʰrditʰ radɡan isetʰ rames movimokʰmedeb tʰkʰvens droʃi ambad ɡaɡonilsatsʰ ar daidʒerebditʰ 
radɡan aha aɣvdzrav kʰaldevelebs xalxs sastiksa da pʰitsʰxels da moivlian mtʰels dedamitsas rom daepatronon satsʰxovreblebs 
saʃiʃia da ʃemzaravi misɡan ɡamodis msdʒavri da sasdʒeli 
dʒikʰze ustsrapʰesia misi tsʰxenebi bindis mɡlebivitʰ mzeramaxvilni dadʒiritʰoben misi mxedrebi moɡrialdebian mxedrebi ʃoridan mopʰrindebian msxverpls daɣirebuli artsivebivitʰ 
ertʰianad modis dasarbevad aɣmosavletʰisken pirmikʰtsʰeuli da kʰviʃasavitʰ mixvetavs tqveebs 
amasxrebs mepʰeebs da mtʰavrebs sasatsʰilod iɡdebs dastsʰinis qovel tsʰixe simaɡres mitsaqrilebs axvavebs matʰ asaɣebad 
maʃin moitsʰems ɡuls sazɣvars ɡadava da ʃestsʰodavs misi dzala mis ɣmertʰʃia 
ɡana ukunisidan ara xar upʰalo tʃemo ɣmertʰo tʃemo tsmidav ar davixotsʰebitʰ upʰalo samsdʒavroda ɡqavs dadɡenili iɡi sapʰarvelo samxileblad ɡqavs ɡantsesebuli 
supʰtʰaa saxedvelni borotebis saqureblad da ar dzalɡidzs siavis cvreta ratom utsʰkʰer muxanatʰebs da dumxar rotsʰa uketʰuri qlapavs martʰals 
zɣvis tʰevzebivitʰ ɡaɡixdia adamianebi upatrono kʰvetsarmavlebivitʰ 
qvelani ankesitʰ hqavs amoqvanili tʰavisi satʰxevlitʰ amotʰreuli da tʰavis badeʃi ɡamomtsqvdeuli amitom xarobs da zeimobs 
amitom stsiravs msxverpls tʰavis satʰxevels da ukmevs tʰavis bades radɡan matʰɡan akʰvs msuqe kerdzi da noqieri sacmeli 
nutʰu amistʰvis unda isrodes tʰavis satʰxevels da utsqalod xotsʰavdes xalxebs ɡamudmebitʰ 
tʃems sadaradʒoze davdɡebi da ɡaval koʃkze davaquradeb rom vnaxo ras metqvis da ra vupasuxo tʃems mxilebaze 
momiɡo upʰalma da mitʰxra tʃatsere xilva kʰvis dapʰebze amokvetʰe rom stsrapʰad tsaikitʰxos mkitʰxvelma 
radɡan ukve datʰkʰmuli ʒamistʰvis aris xilva da bolos ɡatsʰxaddeba ar ɡamtqundeba tʰu daaɡviandes daelode radɡan usatʰuod mova ar dabrkoldeba 
aha ɡaibera ver ɡastsorda masʃi misi suli martʰali ki tʰavisi rətsmenitʰ itsʰotsʰxlebs 
matquara ɣvinosavitʰaa ampartavani ar moisvenebs dʒodʒoxetʰivitʰ ɡaibera suli da sikvdilivitʰ ɡaumadzɣaria tʰavisken ʃemoikrebs qvela xalxs da qvela ers tʰavistʰan ʃemoxvetavs 
xom qvelani saarakod ɡaxdian mas da masxarad aiɡdeben itqvian vai mas vintsʰ sxvisas iɡrovebs rodemdis da monaxvecitʰ imdzimebs tʰavs 
xom uetsʰrad aɣdɡebian ʃeni mkbenelni da aɣidzrebian ʃeni damapʰrətʰxobelni rom matʰ kerdzad ikʰtsʰe 
raki uamravi xalxi ɡqavs ɡadzartsʰvuli ʃentsʰ ɡaɡdzartsʰvavs qvela danartʃeni eri daɣvrili sisxlis tsil kʰveqnisa kʰalakʰis da mis mkvidrtʰa tʃaɡvris tsil 
vai mas vintsʰ usamartʰlod ixvecs tʰavisi saxlistʰvis da maɣalze ibudebs rom tʰavi daixsnas borotis xelidan 
sirtsʰxvili ɡadautsqvite ʃens xalxs rom mospe uamravi xalxi sakutʰar tʰavs ʃestsʰode 
radɡan kʰvebi ɣaɣadeben kedlebidan da xis kocebi epasuxebian 
vai mas vintsʰ sisxlze aʃenebs kʰalakʰs da usamartʰlobaze apʰudznebs darbazebs 
ɡana tsʰabaotʰ upʰlisɡan ar aris rom tsʰetsʰxlistʰvis iɣtsvian xalxebi da arapʰristʰvis daʃvrebian tomebi 
rom upʰlis didebis tsʰodnitʰ aivsos kʰveqana roɡortsʰ zɣva aris tsqlitʰ dapʰaruli 
vai mas vintsʰ tʰavis tʰvistoms asmevs tʰavisi risxvis tʰass da atʰrobs rom siʃiʃvles uquros 
pativis natsʰvlad damtsʰirebitʰ ɡadzɣebi ʃentsʰ svi da ɡaʃiʃvldi ʃentsʰ ʃeɡxvdeba upʰlis mardʒvenis tʰasi da ʃeni pativis damtsʰireba 
radɡan libanis tʰrɡunva ʃens tʰavze ɡadmova da pirutqvtʰa akleba ʃeɡaʃinebs radɡan katsʰis sisxli ɡakʰvs daɣvrili da kʰveqana kʰalakʰi da misi mtsʰxovrebni datʰrɡunuli 
ra sarɡebloba akʰvs mokʰandakis ɡamokvetʰil kerps tquilis modzɣvars maɡram mokʰandake esavs tʰavis nakʰandakevs tʰumtsʰa mundʒebia misi ʃekʰmnili ɣmertʰebi 
vai mas vintsʰ xes eubneba ɡaiɣvidzeo da mdumare kʰvas ɡamopʰxizldio es aris modzɣvari aha okʰro vertsʰxlʃia tʃasmuli suli ki ar udɡas 
upʰali ki tʰavis tsmida tadzarʃia dadumdes mtʰeli kʰveqana mis tsinaʃe 
abakum tsinastsarmetqvelis lotsʰva saɡaloblad 
upʰalo ɡaviɡone ʃenɡan ɡasaɡoni da ʃemeʃinda upʰalo ixsen ʃeni kʰmnileba sitsʰotsʰxlis ʃuadzalze ɡaatsʰxade sitsʰotsʰxlis ʃuadzalze rom risxvis drosatsʰ ki ɡaxsovs ʃetsqaleba 
tʰemanidan modis ɣmertʰi da tsmida pʰaranis mtʰidan dapʰara zetsʰa misma brətsqinvalebam da misma didebam aavso dedamitsa 
dɣesavitʰ brətsqinavs misi natʰeli ʃukʰs asxivebs misi xeli da akʰ imaleba misi dzliereba 
ʃavi ciri miudzɣveba tsin da pʰexdapʰex mihqveba ʒami 
ʃedɡa da ɡatʰela mitsa ɡaixeda da ʃeadzrtsuna xalxebi ɡatsʰamtverda saukuno mtʰebi tʃamoikʰtsʰa saukuno bortsʰvebi saukunoa misi ɡzasavali 
ɡansatsʰdelʃi vxedav kʰuʃanis karvebs irxevian midianis kʰveqnis pʰardebi 
nutʰu mdinareebs daatqda ʃeni risxva upʰalo nutʰu mdinareebs ʃeni mdzvinvareba da zɣvas ʃeni ɡulistsqroma ʃens tsʰxenebze ʃens dzlevis etlebze rom amxedrdi 
ʃen ɡaaʃiʃvle mʃvildi roɡortsʰ xalxebistʰvis ɡkʰonda dapʰitsʰebuli mdinareebad daɣare dedamitsa 
daɡinaxes da ʃedrəknen mtʰebi ɡadaiara tsqlis niaɣvarma xma ɡaiɣo tsqlis upʰskrulma aɣmartʰa xelebi 
mze da mtʰvare daqovndnen tʰaviantʰ sadɡomebʃi ʃeni isrebis ʃukʰze dadian isini ʃeni elvare ʃubis ʃaravandze 
risxvitʰ abidʒeb dedamitsaze da ɡulistsqromitʰ tʰelav xalxebs 
ʃeni eris ɡamosaxsnelad ɡamoxvedi ʃeni tsʰxebulis ɡamosaxsnelad ceri tʃaunɡrie uketʰuris saxls sapʰudzvlidan kʰedamde ɡaaʃiʃvle 
tʰavi ɡaupe matʰive kvertʰxebitʰ mis beladebs rotsʰa moɡrialdnen tʃems ɡasatsʰamtvereblad da qiʒinebdnen tʰitʰkʰos bedʃavi idumal tʃaeqlapos 
ʃeni tsʰxenebitʰ zɣva ɡakʰvs ɡatʰelili adidebuli tsqlebis zvirtʰebi 
ɡaviɡone da ʃemedzra ʃiɡneuli mis xmaze amitʰrtʰolda baɡeebi texa damitsqes dzvlebma da adɡilze davbarbatsʰdi maɡram mʃvidad davelodebi ɡasaciris dɣes rotsʰa tʃems xalxs ɡasadzartsʰvad daesxmian 
tʰundatsʰ aɣar aqvavdes leɣvi aɣar ɡamoisxas vazma mtevani ɡamtqundes zetʰisxilis naqopʰi qanebma sazrdo ar moitanon motsqdes pʰarexidan tsʰxvari da aɣar dartʃes boslebʃi sakʰoneli 
me maintsʰ upʰalʃi ɡavixarebdi tʃemi xsnis ɣmertʰʃi vnaxavdi ʃvebas 
upʰali ɣmertʰia tʃemi dzala irmis pʰexebs ʃemabams da tʃems ɡorakebs momatarebs lotbaristʰvis tʃems simebian sakravebze 
upʰlis sitqva romelitsʰ ɡamoetsʰxada sopʰonias dzes kʰuʃisa dzisa ɡedaliahusi dzisa amariasi dzisa xizkiahusi iudas mepʰisa ioʃiahu amonis dzis dros 
qvelapʰers avxvetav mitsis piridan ambobs upʰali 
avxvetav katsʰsa da pirutqvs ɡavxvetav tsʰis pʰrinvels da zɣvis tʰevzebs tsʰtʰunebebs uketʰurebtʰan ertʰad movkvetʰ katsʰtʰa modɡmas mitsis piridan ambobs upʰali 
xels movuɣereb iudas da ierusalimis qvela mkvidrs movkvetʰ am adɡilidan baqalis natamals kʰurumtʰa saxsenebels mɣvdlebtʰan ertʰad 
matʰ vintsʰ banebze tʰaqvans stsʰemen tsʰiur laʃkʰars vintsʰ tʰaqvans stsʰemen da upʰals ipʰitsʰaven da tʰaviantʰ mepʰes ipʰitsʰaven 
matʰ vintsʰ ɡanudɡnen upʰals da aɣar edziebdnen upʰals da aɣar kitʰxulobdnen 
idume upʰlis ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe radɡan axlosaa upʰlis dɣe radɡan ɡamzadebuli akʰvs msxverpli upʰals artʃeuli hqavs stumrebi 
dadɡeba saupʰlo msxverplis dɣe da msdʒavrs davdeb mtʰavrebs da upʰlistsulebs da qvelas utsʰxo samoslitʰ ʃemosils 
msdʒavrs davdeb im dɣes qvelas zɣurblis damlaxvels da tʰaviantʰi upʰlis saxlis mdzlavrobitʰa da sitsʰruitʰ amvsebels 
ɡaismeba im dɣes ambobs upʰali ɡodebis xma tʰevztʰa karibcidan da motʰkʰma sapirispiro mxridan didi ubedurebis ambavi mtʰaɡorebidan 
ivalaletʰ xeobis mkvidrno radɡan ɡadaʃendeba qoveli movacre amotsqdeba qvela vertsʰxlismtvirtʰveli 
stsored maʃin ikʰneba rom lampritʰ movatʰvaliereb ierusalims da msdʒavrs davdeb sakutʰar sapʰuarze ɡapʰuebultʰ ɡulʃi rom amboben artsʰ karɡs aketʰebs upʰali artsʰ tsʰudso 
ɡaniavdeba matʰi kʰoneba da ɡaukatsʰurdeba matʰi saxlebi aaʃeneben saxlebs da ʃiɡ ver itsʰxovreben tʃaqrian venaxebs da matʰ ɣvinos ver ʃesvamen 
axlos aris upʰlis didi dɣe axlos aris da mova sul male xma upʰlis dɣisa da mtsared iqvirebs maʃin maɡari vaʒkatsʰitsʰ 
risxvis dɣea is dɣe cirisa da simtsris dɣe nɡrevisa da mooxrebis dɣe sibnelisa da tsqvdiadis dɣe dʒanɣisa da burusis dɣe 
bukisa da qiʒinis dɣe tsʰixe kʰalakʰtʰa da maɣal koʃktʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
xalxs ʃevacirveb da brmebivitʰ ivlian radɡan ʃestsʰodes upʰals mtverivitʰ ɡaipʰanteba matʰi sisxli da nexvivitʰ matʰi xortsʰi 
vertsʰ vertsʰxli vertsʰ okʰro ver ixsnis matʰ upʰlis risxvis dɣes da misi ʃuris tsʰetsʰxli ʃtʰantʰkʰavs mtʰels kʰveqanas radɡan bolos mouɣebs utsʰabedad kʰveqnis qvela mkvidrs 
ɡons modi usirtsʰxvilo xalxo 
vidre moatsevdes ɡanɡeba bzesavitʰ ɡaniavdebodes dɣe vidre ar daɡtexiatʰ upʰlis risxvis ali vidre ar daɡtexiatʰ upʰlis risxvis dɣe 
edzietʰ upʰali kʰveqnis tʰvinierno vintsʰ misdevtʰ upʰlis rdʒuls edzietʰ simartʰle edzietʰ tʰviniereba vindzlo daimalotʰ upʰlis risxvis dɣes 
radɡan miatoveben ɣazas ɡaukatsʰurdeba aʃkeloni aiqreba aʃdodi ʃuadɣisas da amoidzirkveba qekroni 
vai zɣvispirelebs kʰeretʰel xalxs ʃenzea upʰlis sitqva kʰanaano pʰilistimeltʰa kʰveqanav ɡaɡanadɡureb da ɡaukatsʰurdebi 
ɡadaikʰtsʰeva zɣvispiretʰi sadzovrebad mtsqemstʰa binebad da tsʰxvris pʰarexebad 
iudas saxlis natamals erɡeba es mxare ikʰ daitsqeben dzovas aʃkelonis saxlebʃi tsamotsvebian saɣamoʒams radɡan moxedavs matʰ upʰali da tqveobidan daabrunebs 
mesmoda roɡor ilandzɣeboda moabi da roɡor avsitqvaobdnen qamonelebi roɡor landzɣavdnen tʃems ers da didɡulobdnen mis sazɣvrebtʰan 
amitomatsʰ vpʰitsʰav ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali israelis ɣmertʰi rom daemsɡavseba moabi sodoms da qamonelebi ɡomoras cincrian adɡils da tʃemi xalxis natamali daimkvidrebs matʰ 
es moelitʰ matʰi ampartavnebis ɡamo rom ilandzɣebodnen da edidɡulebodnen tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis ers 
saʃineli ikʰneba matʰtʰvis upʰali radɡan ɡaatsʰamtverebs kʰveqnierebis qvela ɣmertʰs da mas dautsqebs tʰaqvanistsʰemas qoveli katsʰi tʰavisi kʰveqnidan xalxebis qoveli kundzuli 
tʰkʰventsʰ kʰuʃelebo dailaxvrebitʰ tʃemi maxvilitʰ 
ɡaitsvdis xels tʃrdiloetʰisken da ɡaanadɡurebs aʃurs da ɡaatialebs nineves ɡaaxriokebs udabnosavitʰ 
qoveltʰa mxetsʰtʰa xrova daibudebs ikʰ varxvi da zɣarbitsʰ ki daiɣamebs mis buɣaurebze matʰi xma ɡaismeba sarkmlebʃi qorani daiqepʰs zɣurblze radɡan tʃamoixlitʃeba kedris kedlebi 
es moelis mxiarulsa da udardel kʰalakʰs romelitsʰ ambobda ɡulʃi me var da tʃems meti aravin aris roɡor ɡatialda roɡor ɡadaikʰtsʰa mxetsʰebis bunaɡad qoveli katsʰi vintsʰ tʃauvlis mas ʃoriaxlos daustvens da xels tʃaikʰnevs 
vai ɡadʒiutebuls da tsabiltsuls modzalade kʰalakʰs 
arapʰers ismens ar ʃeiɡonebs upʰals ar esavs tʰavis ɣmertʰs ar ekareba 
misi mtʰavrebi mbdɣvinavi lomebia mis ʃuaɡulʃi misi msadʒulebi saɣamos mɡlebia dilistʰvis dzvalsatsʰ rom ar toveben 
kʰarapʰʃuta xalxia misi tsinastsarmetqvelni ɡamqidvelni misi mɣvdlebi satsmidars biltsaven rdʒuls arɣveven 
samartʰliania mis tsiaɣʃi upʰali ar stʃadis simrudes dil dilobitʰ ɡaatsʰxadebs tʰavis samartʰals da ar brkoldeba maɡram ukuɣmartʰma ar itsʰis sirtsʰxvili 
ɡavtsqvite xalxi daikʰtsʰa matʰi tsʰixe simaɡreebi ɡavaukatsʰriele matʰi kʰutʃebi ar dartʃa ɡamvleli ɡatsʰamtverda matʰi kʰalakʰebi katsʰi ar dartʃa aɣaravinaa mtsʰxovrebi 
veubnebodi oɣond ɡeʃinodes tʃemi miiɣe ʃeɡoneba metʰkʰi ar ɡanadɡurdeboda misi samqopʰeli ramdendʒeratsʰ ar unda damesadʒa iɡi maɡram bedʒitʰad rəqvnidnen tʰaviantʰ znes 
amitomatsʰ melodetʰ me ambobs upʰali im dɣemde rotsʰa motsmed davdɡebi radɡan tʃemi ɡanɡebitʰ moiqrian tʰavs xalxebi ʃeikribebian samepʰoebi rom tʰavze davantʰxio tʃemi risxva mtʰeli tʃemi tsqroma radɡan tʃemi ʃuris tsʰetsʰxlʃi unda ʃtʰaintʰkʰas mtʰeli kʰveqana 
radɡan maʃin ɡavasupʰtʰaveb xalxtʰa baɡeebs rom qvelam axsenos upʰlis saxeli da ertʰsulovnad emsaxuron 
kʰuʃis mdinaretʰa ɡaɣmidan tʃemi ɡapʰantuli xalxi momartʰmevs dzɣvens 
im dɣes aɣaravin ʃeirtsʰxvens tʰavs ʃeni sakʰtsʰielitʰ ritʰatsʰ mtsʰodavdi radɡan maʃin movarideb ʃens tsiaɣs ʃeni didebitʰ mokʰadulebs rom aɣar ɡamedidurde tʃems tsmida mtʰaze 
davtoveb ʃens tsiaɣʃi tʰvinier da betʃav xalxs da ʃeuvrdebian upʰlis saxels 
aɣar tʃaidens usamartʰlobas israelis natamali aɣar itsʰruebs aɣar ikʰneba matʰ baɡeebʃi mzakvari ena mosdzoven da daisveneben aɣar ikʰneba damatʰrobeli 
ɡixarodes siono iqiʒine israelo imxiarule da ixalise mtʰeli ɡulitʰ ierusalimis asulo 
aɡxada upʰalma sasdʒeli ukuakʰtsʰia ʃeni mteri mepʰe israelisa upʰali ʃens tsiaɣʃia ubedurebas aɣar ixilav 
im dɣes etqvian ierusalims nu ɡeʃinia da sions numtsʰ moɡeɣleba mklavi 
upʰali ʃeni ɣmertʰi ʃens tsiaɣʃia ɡmiri romelitsʰ ɡixsnis sixarulitʰ ɡaixarebs ʃenze ɡanɡaaxlebs tʰavis siqvarulʃi simɣeritʰ izeimebs ʃens ɡamo 
ʃevkreb dɣesastsauls motsqvetiltʰ ʃenɡan rom ɡavidnen sirtsʰxvili atsevtʰ tvirtʰad 
aha ɡavustsordebi im dros qvela ʃens mtʃaɡvrels vixsni pʰexkocls ɡapʰantuls tʰavs movuqri didebas da saxels movuxvec qvelɡan matʰi ʃertsʰxvenis kʰveqanaʃi 
im dros tsamoɡiqvantʰ da im drosve tʰavs ertʰad moɡiqritʰ moɡixvectʰ saxels da didebas dedamitsis qvela xalxʃi rotsʰa davabruneb tʰkʰvens tqveebs tʰkʰvens tʰvaltsin ambobs upʰali 
darios mepʰis meore tsels meekʰvse tʰvis pirvel dɣes iqo upʰlis sitqva anɡia tsinastsarmetqvelis xelitʰ iudas ɡanmɡebel zerubabel ʃealtʰielis dzis da mɣvdelmtʰavar ieso iehotsʰadakis dzis mimartʰ 
ase tʰkʰva tsʰabaotʰ upʰalma es xalxi ambobs dʒer ar damdɡarao ʒami upʰlis saxlis aʃenebis ʒami 
iqo upʰlis sitqva anɡia tsinastsarmetqvelis xelitʰ 
imis ʒami ki aris rom ɡadaxurul saxlebʃi isxdetʰ es saxli ki miɡdebuli iqos 
axla ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali daukvirditʰ tʰkʰvens sakʰtsʰiels 
bevrs tʰesavtʰ maɡram tsʰotas imkitʰ camtʰ maɡram ver dzɣebitʰ svamtʰ maɡram ver iklavtʰ tsqurvils itsʰvamtʰ maɡram ver tʰbebitʰ ɡaxvretili kʰisistʰvis iɣebs mʃromeli ʃromis sazɣaurs 
ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali daukvirditʰ tʰkʰvens sakʰtsʰiels 
aditʰ mtʰaze aitanetʰ xe tqe da tadzari aaʃenetʰ movitsoneb amas da didebitʰ ɡamovtʃndebi ambobs upʰali 
bevris molodini ɡakʰvtʰ maɡram mtsʰiredi ɡisruldebatʰ ratsʰ saxlʃi miɡakʰvtʰ imasatsʰ vaniaveb ratom ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali imitom rom miɡdebulia tʃemi saxli tʰkʰven ki qvelani tʰkʰvens saxlebze zrunavtʰ 
amitom aris rom daɡikavatʰ tsʰam tsʰvari da mitsam daɡikavatʰ mosavali 
ɡamovixme ɡvalva mitsaze mtʰebze purze ɣvinoze zetʰisxilze da qvelapʰerze rasatsʰ mitsa aɣmoatsʰenebs adamianze pirutqvze da qovelive nacirnaxulevze 
ismines zerubabel ʃealtʰielis dzem ieso iehotsʰadakis dzem mɣvdelmtʰavarma da mtʰelma danartʃenma xalxma upʰlis matʰi ɣvtʰis xma da anɡia tsinastsarmetqvelis sitqvebi ramdenadatsʰ iɡi upʰlis matʰi ɣvtʰis movlinebuli iqo da ʃeeʃinda xalxs upʰlisa 
utʰxra anɡiam upʰlis motsʰikʰulma xalxs upʰlis motsʰikʰulobis dzalitʰ me tʰkʰventʰana var ambobs upʰali 
ɡaaɣvidza upʰalma iudas ɡanmɡebel zerubabel ʃealtʰielis dzis suli mɣvdelmtʰavar ieso iehotsʰadakis dzis suli da mtʰeli danartʃeni xalxis suli mividnen da daitsqes muʃaoba tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis matʰi ɣvtʰis saxlʃi 
meekʰvse tʰvis otsʰdameotʰxe dɣes darios mepʰis meore tsels 
meʃvide tʰves tʰvis otsʰdameertʰe dɣes iqo upʰlis sitqva anɡia tsinastsarmetqvelis xelitʰ 
utʰxari zerubabel ʃealtʰielis dzes iudas ɡanmɡebels ieso iehotsʰadakis dzes mɣvdelmtʰavars da mtʰels danartʃen xalxs 
vin aris dartʃenili tʰkʰvens ʃoris vintsʰ mostsrebia am saxlis pirvandel didebas ras xedavtʰ axla xom araraobad tʃans tʰkʰvens tʰvalʃi 
axla ɡamaɡrdi zerubabel ambobs upʰali ɡamaɡrdi ieso iehotsʰadakis dzev mɣvdelmtʰavaro mtʰeli kʰveqnis ero ambobs upʰali da iʃrometʰ radɡan tʰkʰventʰana var ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
sitqva eɡviptidan ɡamosvlisas rom daɡidevitʰ da tʃemi suli imqopʰebs tʰkʰvens ʃoris nu ɡeʃiniatʰ 
radɡan ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali kidev tsʰotatsʰ da ʃevarqev tsʰas da mitsas zɣvasa da xmeletʰs 
ʃevarqev qvela xalxs da aɣsruldeba qoveli xalxis satsadeli didebitʰ avavseb am saxls ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
tʃemia vertsʰxli da tʃemia okʰro ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
pirvandelze upʰro didi ikʰneba am ukanaskneli saxlis dideba ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali am adɡilze movapʰen mʃvidobas ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
metsʰxre tʰvis otsʰdameotʰxe dɣes dariosis meore tsels iqo upʰlis sitqva anɡia tsinastsarmetqvelis xelitʰ 
ase tʰkʰva tsʰabaotʰ upʰalma hkitʰxe mɣvdlebs rdʒuli 
aha miakʰvs katsʰs tsmida xortsʰi tʰavisi samoslis kaltʰitʰ ʃeexo kaltʰitʰ purs ʃecamads ɣvinos zetʰs an raime sacmels tʰu ɡaxdeba tsmida miuɡes mɣvdlebma da utʰxres ara 
tʰkʰva anɡiam tʰu ʃeexo amas qvelapʰers ɡautsmidurebuli katsʰi ɡautsmidurdeba es qvelapʰeri miuɡes mɣvdlebma da utʰxres ɡautsmidurdeba 
miuɡo anɡiam da utʰxra asetʰia es eri asetʰia es xalxi tʃems tsinaʃe ambobs upʰali asetʰia matʰi xelebis namokʰmedari matʰi motanili qvelapʰeri utsmiduria 
axla daakvirditʰ ra xdeboda dzvelad vidre kʰva kʰvaze daideboda upʰlis tadzarʃi 
mividodnen otsʰdznian zvintʰan da aɣmotʃndeboda atʰi mividodnen satsnaxeltʰan ormotsʰdaatʰi satsqaulis amosaxapavad da aɣmotʃndeboda otsʰi 
ɡinadɡurebditʰ mtʰels namuʃakevs xorʃakitʰ siqvitʰlitʰ da setqvitʰ da maintsʰ ar moikʰetsʰitʰ tʃemsken ambobs upʰali 
daakvirditʰ ra xdeboda dzvelad metsʰxre tʰvis otsʰdameotʰxe dɣidan im dɣidan ratsʰ upʰlis tadzari dapʰudznda daakvirditʰ 
tʰuɣa dartʃa beɣelʃi tʰesli akʰamde ar ɡamouɣia naqopʰi vazs leɣvs brotseuls da zetʰisxils amieridan ki vakurtʰxeb 
meored iqo upʰlis sitqva anɡias mimartʰ tʰvis otsʰdameotʰxe dɣes 
ase utʰxari zerubabels iudas ɡanmɡebels ʃevarqev tsʰas da mitsas 
davamxob samepʰotʰa taxtebs movspob xalxebis samepʰotʰa dzlierebas davamxob etlebs mxedrebitʰurtʰ da daetsʰemian tsʰxenebi da mxedrebi ertʰmanetʰis maxvilitʰ 
im dɣes ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali aɡiqvan ʃen zerubabel ʃealtʰielis dzeo tʃemo mortʃilo ambobs upʰali da becedivitʰ meqolebi radɡan tʃemi rtʃeuli xar ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
dariosis meore tsels merve tʰves iqo upʰlis sitqva tsinastsarmetqvel zakʰarias mimartʰ dzisa berekʰiasi dzisa qidosi 
risxvitʰ ɡanurisxda upʰali tʰkʰvens mamebs 
utʰxari matʰ ase ambobs tʰkʰo tsʰabaotʰ upʰali moikʰetsʰitʰ tʃemsken ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali da metsʰ movikʰtsʰevi tʰkʰvensken ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
nu ikʰnebitʰ roɡortsʰ tʰkʰveni mamebi romeltʰatsʰ moutsodebdnen tsinandeli tsinastsarmetqvelni ase ambobso tsʰabaotʰ upʰali miikʰetsʰitʰ tʰkʰveni boroti ɡzebidan da boroti sakʰmeebisɡan maɡram ar mismendnen da ar miɡonebdnen ambobs upʰali 
sadɣa arian tʰkʰveni mamebi da ɡana tsinastsarmetqvelnitsʰ saukunod tsʰotsʰxloben 
maɡram tʃemi sitqvebi da mtsʰnebebi romlebitsʰ vuanderdze tʃems msaxurtʰ tsinastsarmetqveltʰ xom mistsvda tʰkʰvens mamebs moikʰtsʰnen da tʰkʰves roɡortsʰ ɡanizraxa tsʰabaotʰ upʰalma moɡvkʰtsʰeoda tʃveni ɡzebisa da sakʰmeebis ɡamo ise moɡvekʰtsʰa tʃven 
metʰertʰmete tʰvis anu ʃebatis tʰvis otsʰdameotʰxe dɣes iqo upʰlis sitqva tsinastsarmetqvel zakʰarias mimartʰ dzisa berekʰiasi dzisa qidosi 
vixile ɣamitʰ da aha mxedaria tsitʰel tsʰxenze da dɡas iɡi murtis xetʰa ʃoris tʃrdilʃi mis ukan ki tsʰxenebia tsitʰlebi zerdaɡebi da tʰetʰrebi 
da vtʰkʰvi ra aris eseni tʃemo batono mitʰxra anɡelozma romelitsʰ melaparakeboda me ɡatʃveneb ra arian eseni 
xma ɡaiɣo katsʰma mdɡarma murtis xetʰa ʃoris da tʰkʰva eseni arian romlebitsʰ moavlina upʰalma kʰveqnis ʃemosavlelad 
miuɡes upʰlis anɡelozs murtis xetʰa ʃoris mdɡars da utʰxres ʃemoviaretʰ kʰveqana da aha mʃvidad ɡanisvenebs mtʰeli kʰveqana upʰali ar ketʰilnebobs xalxisadmi 
miuɡo upʰlis anɡelozma da tʰkʰva tsʰabaotʰ upʰalo rodemdis ar moiɣeb motsqalebas ierusalimze da iudas kʰalakʰebze romlebitsʰ aɡer samotsʰdaatʰi tselia ʃerisxuli ɡqavs 
miuɡo upʰalma anɡelozs romelitsʰ me melaparakeboda ketʰili sitqvebi nuɡeʃis sitqvebi 
mitʰxra anɡelozma romelitsʰ me melaparakeboda moutsode da tʰkʰvi ase ambobs tʰkʰo tsʰabaotʰ upʰali didi ʃuritʰ var aɣdzruli ierusalimis da sionis mimartʰ 
didi risxvitʰ vmrisxaneb tʰavɡasul xalxze radɡan odnav ɡanvrisxdi da ʃeetsivnen isini borotebas 
amitom ase ambobs upʰali motsqalebitʰ movbrundi ierusalimisken masʃi aiɡeba tʃemi saxli ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali da lari ɡadaicimeba ierusalimze 
kidev moutsode da tʰkʰvi ase ambobs tʰkʰo tsʰabaotʰ upʰali kvlav aivseba tʃemi kʰalakʰebi dovlatʰitʰ da kvlav ʃeitsqalebs upʰali sions da kvlav airtʃevs ierusalims 
avaxile tʰvalebi da aha otʰxi rkʰaa 
vutʰxari anɡelozs romelitsʰ me melaparakeboda ra aris eseni mitʰxra eseni rkʰebia romlebmatsʰ ɡapʰanta iuda israeli da ierusalimi 
da damanaxva upʰalma otʰxi mcedeli 
vtʰkʰvi ris ɡaketʰebas apireben eseni ase mitʰxra eseni rkʰebia romlebmatsʰ ɡapʰanta iuda ise rom aravis autsevia tʰavi es mcedlebi ki mosulni arian dasaʃineblad im xalxtʰa rkʰebis dasaxrelad romeltʰatsʰ rkʰa aɣumartʰavtʰ iudas kʰveqnis tsinaaɣmdeɡ mis ɡasapʰantavad 
avaxile tʰvalebi da vixile aha katsʰi ɡamzomi laritʰ xelʃi 
vkitʰxe sad midixar mitʰxra ierusalimis ɡasazomad rom davinaxo ramdenia misi siɡane da ramdenia misi siɡrdze 
aha ɡamodis anɡelozi romelitsʰ melaparakeboda da sxva anɡelozitsʰ ɡamodis tʃems ʃesaxvedrad 
utʰxra mas ɡaikʰetsʰi da elaparake am qmatsvils utʰxari ɡaʃlil dabad itsʰxovrebs ierusalimi uamravi xalxisa da pirutqvis ɡamo masʃi rom aris 
me vikʰnebi mistʰvis ambobs upʰali tsʰetsʰxlis kedlad irɡvliv da didebad mis ʃuaɡulʃi 
hoi hoi ɡaikʰetsʰitʰ tʃrdiloetʰis kʰveqnidan ambobs upʰali radɡan tsʰis otʰxi kʰarisken ɡaɡpʰantavtʰ ambobs upʰali 
hoi siono tʰavs uʃvele babilonis asultʰan rom tsʰxovrob 
radɡan ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali didebis ʃemdeɡ mimavlens xalxebtʰan romlebitsʰ ɡdzartsʰvaven ʃen radɡan tʰkʰveni ʃemxebare misi tʰvalis ɡuɡis ʃemxebarea 
radɡan aha movukʰnev xels da matʰi qmebis nadavlad ikʰtsʰevian mixvdebian rom tsʰabaotʰ upʰalma momavlina 
ixare da imxiarule sionis asulo radɡan aha movdivar da davivaneb ʃens ʃuaɡulʃi ambobs upʰali 
mietmasnebian uamravi xalxebi upʰals am dɣes da ɡaxdebian tʃemi eri davivaneb ʃens ʃuaɡulʃi da mixvdebi rom tsʰabaotʰ upʰalma momavlina ʃentʰan 
daimkvidrebs upʰali iudas tʰavis tsilxvedrad tsmida mitsaze da kvlav airtʃevs ierusalims 
iqutʃos qovelma xortsʰielma upʰlis tsinaʃe radɡan aha ɡaiɣvidza man tʰavis tsmida samqopʰelʃi 
damanaxva man ieso mɣvdelmtʰavari upʰlis anɡelozis tsinaʃe mdɡari da satana mis xelmardʒvniv mdɡari mis mosaqivneblad 
utʰxra upʰalma satanas ɡikrdzalavs upʰali satanav ɡikrdzalavs upʰali romelmatsʰ ierusalimi airtʃia ɡana es tsʰetsʰxlidan motsqvetili muɡuzali ar aris 
iesos tsviriani samoseli etsʰva da idɡa anɡelozis tsinaʃe 
miuɡo da utʰxra anɡelozma tʰavis tsinaʃe mdɡomtʰ ɡaxadetʰ tsviriani samoseli utʰxra mas aha tsarɡxotsʰe uketʰureba da sazeimo samoslitʰ ʃeɡmosav 
tʰkʰva daaxuron tʰavze supʰtʰa tʰavsaburveli da tʃaatsʰvan samoseli upʰlis anɡelozi ki idɡa 
ɡamoutsʰxada upʰlis anɡelozma iesos da utʰxra 
ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali tʰu tʃemi ɡzebitʰ ivli da tʃems samsaxurs ʃeasruleb ɡaudzɣvebi tʃems saxls da tʰvalqurs adevneb tʃems ezoebs moɡtsʰem misasvlels akʰ mdɡomaretʰa ʃoris 
ismine ieso mɣvdelmtʰavaro ʃen da ʃenma tʰvistomebma ʃens tsin rom sxedan radɡan sastsaulni arian es katsʰebi radɡan aha movavlineb tʃems mortʃils mortʃs 
radɡan aha is kʰva romelitsʰ davdevi iesos tsin ʃvidi tʰvalia am ertʰ kʰvaze aha amovkvetʰav masze amosakvetʰels ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali da ertʰ dɣeʃi tsarvxotsʰav am kʰveqnis tsʰodvebs 
im dɣes ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali ertʰmanetʰs miitsvevtʰ vazis kʰveʃ da leɣvis kʰveʃ 
mobrunda anɡelozi romelitsʰ melaparakeboda da ɡamaɣvidza roɡortsʰ dzilisɡan aɣvidzeben katsʰs 
mitʰxra ras xedav vutʰxari vxedav aha mtʰliani okʰros sasantʰlea mis tʰavze dʒamia da ʃvidi lampari da ʃvidi satsreti lamprebze romlebitsʰ mis tʰavzea 
ori zetʰisxilis xea mis ɡverditʰ ertʰi dʒami mardʒvniv meore mis martsʰxniv 
xma ɡaviɣe da vutʰxari anɡelozs me rom melaparakeboda ra aris eseni tʃemo batono 
momiɡo anɡelozma romelitsʰ me melaparakeboda da mitʰxra ɡana ar itsʰi ra aris eseni vutʰxari ara metʰkʰi tʃemo batono 
momiɡo da mitʰxra es aris upʰlis sitqva zerubabelis mimartʰ natʰkʰvami ara dzalitʰa da dzlierebitʰ aramed tʃemi sulitʰo ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
ra xar ʃen dido mtʰao zerubabelis tsinaʃe ɡastsordebi ɡamoitans tʰavkidur lods da ʃesdzaxeben madli madli mas 
iqo upʰlis sitqva tʃems momartʰ natʰkʰvami 
zerubabelis xelma tʃaqara am saxlis sapʰudzveli da misive xeli daasrulebs da mixvdebi rom tsʰabaotʰ upʰalma momavlina tʰkʰventʰan 
radɡan vintsʰ kninad ʃeratsʰxa es dɣe ɡaixarebs rotsʰa dainaxavs ʃveuls zerubabelis xelʃi upʰlis ʃvidi tʰvalia eseni mtʰels kʰveqanas rom cvreten 
mivuɡe da vutʰxari mas ra aris es ori zetʰisxilis xe sasantʰlis mardʒvniv da martsʰxniv 
mivuɡe meored da vutʰxari mas ra aris es ori akido zetʰisxilisa ori okʰros milakis ɡverditʰ saidanatsʰ zeitʰunis zetʰi iɣvreba 
mitʰxra ar itsʰi ra aris eseni vutʰxari ara metʰkʰi tʃemo batono 
mitʰxra orni tsʰxebulni arian eseni mtʰeli kʰveqnis upʰlis tsinaʃe mdɡarni 
kvlav avaxile tʰvali da vixile aha apʰrialebuli ɡraɡnili 
mitʰxra ras xedav vutʰxari me apʰrialebul ɡraɡnils vxedav siɡrdzitʰ otsʰi tsqrtʰa aris siɡanitʰ atʰi tsqrtʰa 
mitʰxra es aris tsqevla mtʰel kʰveqanaze ɡadmomavali radɡan qoveli mparavi amieridan unda moikvetʰos amis tʰanaxmad da qoveli mopʰitsʰari amieridan unda moikvetʰos amis tʰanaxmad 
ɡamovixme ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali da miadɡeba mparavis saxls da tʃemi saxelis tsʰudad mopʰitsʰaris saxls daiɣamebs mis saxlʃi da mospobs mas mis xesa da kʰvas 
ɡamovida anɡelozi romelitsʰ me melaparakeboda da mitʰxra aaxile tʰvali da dainaxe ra aris es rom tʃans 
vutʰxari ra aris metʰkʰi mitʰxra es satsqauli tʃans da tʰkʰva es aris matʰi uketʰureba mtʰels kʰveqanaze 
aha tqviis naceri amoitsia da ertʰi kʰali zis ʃuaɡul satsqaulʃi 
tʰkʰva es aris uketʰureba da tʃaaɡdo iɡi satsqaulʃi da tqviis zodi daaxura zed 
avaxile tʰvali da davinaxe aha ɡamotʃnda ori kʰali da kʰari hkʰondatʰ pʰrtʰebʃi pʰrtʰebad ki tseros pʰrtʰebi hkʰondatʰ da astsies matʰ satsqauli mitsasa da tsʰas ʃoris 
vutʰxari anɡelozs romelitsʰ me melaparakeboda sad miakʰvtʰ metʰkʰi es satsqauli 
mitʰxra ʃinearis kʰveqanaʃi rom saxli auʃenon da rotsʰa mzad ikʰneba tʰavis adɡilze daidɡmeba iɡi 
kvlav avaxile tʰvali da vixile aha otʰxi etli or mtʰas ʃoris ɡamomavali mtʰebi ki spilendzisa iqo 
pirvel etlʃi tsitʰeli tsʰxenebi iqo meore etlʃi ʃavi tsʰxenebi 
mesame etlʃi tʰetʰri tsʰxenebi meotʰxe etlʃi ulaqebi nislispʰerni 
xma ɡaviɣe da vutʰxari anɡelozs romelitsʰ melaparakeboda ra aris metʰkʰi eseni tʃemo batono 
momiɡo anɡelozma da mitʰxra tsʰis otʰxi sulia eseni im adɡilidan ɡamomavalni sadatsʰ mtʰeli kʰveqnis upʰlis tsinaʃe dɡanan 
matʰɡan ʃavi tsʰxenebi tʃrdiloetʰis kʰveqnisken arian ɡamosulni tʰetʰrebi matʰ ukan ɡamovidnen da ulaqebi samxretʰis kʰveqnisken midian 
nislispʰerni ɡamovidnen da kʰveqnis ʃemovla moindomes utʰxra tsaditʰ moiaretʰ kʰveqana da moiares kʰveqana 
damiqvira da ase damelaparaka ʃexede tʃrdiloetʰis kʰveqnisken ɡasulebma daatsʰxres tʃemi suli tʃrdiloetʰis kʰveqanaʃi 
iqo upʰlis sitqva tʃems momartʰ natʰkʰvami 
aiɣe dzɣveni ɡadasaxlebultʰaɡan xeldaisɡan tobiasɡan da iedaqiasaɡan da tsadi dɣesve da ʃedi ioʃia tsʰepʰanias dzis saxlʃi sadatsʰ isini mividnen babilonidan 
ɡamoartʰvi vertsʰxli da okʰro ɡaaketʰe ɡvirɡvinebi da daadɡi tʰavze ieso iehotsʰadakis dzes mɣvdelmtʰavars 
utʰxari ase ambobs tʰkʰo tsʰabaotʰ upʰali aha katsʰi mortʃia misi saxeli radɡan tʰavisi adɡilidan aɣmotsʰendeba da aaʃenebs upʰlis tadzars 
is aaʃenebs upʰlis tadzars da itvirtʰavs didebas dadʒdeba da ixelmtsipʰebs tʰavis taxtze is ikʰneba mɣvdeli tʰavis taxtze da tʰanxmoba ikʰneba am ortʰa ʃoris 
ɡvirɡvini hkʰondes xelems tobias iedaqias da xens tsʰepʰanias dzes samaxsovrod upʰlis tadzarʃi 
ʃorsmqopʰni movlen da aaʃeneben upʰlis tadzars da mixvdebitʰ rom tsʰabaotʰ upʰalma momavlina tʰkʰventʰan es moxdeba tʰu ɡaɡonebitʰ ɡaiɡonebtʰ upʰlis tʰkʰveni ɣvtʰis xmas 
darios mepʰis meotʰxe tsels iqo upʰlis sitqva zakʰarias mimartʰ metsʰxre tʰvis kʰislevis otʰxʃi 
ɡaɡzavna betʰelis xalxma ʃaretsʰeri da reɡem melekʰi matʰi katsʰebitʰurtʰ samxvetsrod upʰlis tsinaʃe 
da tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis saxlis mɣvdlebistʰvis da tsinastsarmetqveltʰatʰvis ʃesakitʰxavad vitiro mexutʰe tʰves da vimarxulo roɡortsʰ ukve mravali tselia vikʰtsʰevi 
iqo tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis sitqva tʃems momartʰ natʰkʰvami 
utʰxari kʰveqnis mtʰel xalxs da mɣvdlebs rotsʰa marxulobditʰ da ɡlovobditʰ mexutʰe da meʃvide tʰveʃi am samotsʰdaatʰi tslis mandzilze ɡana tʃemtʰvis marxulobditʰ 
rotsʰa camtʰ da rotsʰa svamtʰ ɡana tʰkʰventʰvis ara camtʰ da tʰkʰventʰvis ara svamtʰ 
ɡana es sitqvebi ar aris upʰalma rom ɡamoatsʰxada tsinandel tsinastsarmetqveltʰa piritʰ rotsʰa ierusalimi dasaxlebuli da uzrunveli iqo rotsʰa misi kʰalakʰebi mis ɡarʃemo samxretʰi da dablobi dasaxlebuli iqo 
iqo upʰlis sitqva zakʰarias mimartʰ natʰkʰvami 
ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali kʰmenitʰ ceʃmariti samartʰali siketʰitʰ da motsqalebitʰ moekʰetsʰitʰ ertʰmanetʰs 
kʰvrivs obols xizans ɣarib ɣataks nu datʃaɡravtʰ borots nu izraxavtʰ tʰkʰvens ɡulʃi ertʰmanetʰistʰvis 
maɡram matʰ ar isurves qurisɡdeba tsamostsies dʒiuti mxrebi da qurebi daimdzimes rom ar esminatʰ 
ɡuli ɡaikʰvaves rom ar esminatʰ rdʒuli da sitqvebi romlebitsʰ moavlina tsʰabaotʰ upʰalma tʰavisi sulitʰ tsinandel tsinastsarmetqveltʰa xelitʰ amitomatsʰ iqo didi risxva tsʰabaotʰ upʰlisɡan 
da roɡortsʰ is uxmobda da ar usmendnen aseve ar ismina matʰi rotsʰa uxmobdnen mas ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
ɡavpʰante isini qvela xalxs ʃoris romelsatsʰ ar itsʰnobdnen da ɡatialda mitsa matʰ ʃemdeɡ aravin iqo mimsvlel momsvleli da sanukvari kʰveqana udabnod akʰtsʰies 
iqo tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis sitqva natʰkʰvami 
ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali didi ʃuritʰa da didi risxvitʰ var aɣdzruli mis mimartʰ 
ase ambobs upʰali davbrundebi sionʃi da davivaneb ʃuaɡul ierusalimʃi daerkʰmeva ierusalims rətsmenis kʰalakʰi da tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis mtʰas tsmida mtʰa 
ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali kvlav isxdebian berikatsʰebi da dedabrebi ierusalimis kʰutʃebʃi qvelas arɡani ecireba xelʃi dɣetʰa simravlis ɡamo 
kʰalakʰis moednebi savse ikʰneba bicebitʰ da ɡoɡonebitʰ itʰamaʃeben mis moednebze 
ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali tʰu es ʃeudzlebelia xalxis natamalis tʰvalʃi im dɣeebʃi ɡana tʃems tʰvalʃitsʰ ʃeudzlebelia ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali me davixsni tʃems ers aɣmosavletʰis kʰveqnidan da mzis dasavletʰis kʰveqnidan 
da miviqvan matʰ da davasadɡureb ʃuaɡul ierusalimʃi tʃemi eri ikʰnebian isini da me matʰi ɣmertʰi vikʰnebi ceʃmaritebitʰ da simartʰlitʰ 
ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali upʰlis tadzris asaʃeneblad ɡaimaɡretʰ xelebi vintsʰ ismenditʰ im dɣeebʃi im tsinastsarmetqveltʰa natʰkʰvam sitqvebs romlebitsʰ iqvnen tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis saxlis dapʰudznebis ʒams 
radɡan am dɣeebamde ar arsebobda ɡasamrdʒelo artsʰ katsʰistʰvis da artsʰ pirutqvistʰvis ar hkʰonda mʃvidoba mimsvlel momsvlels mtris ʃiʃitʰ da ertʰi meoreze mqavda miseuli adamianebi 
axla isetʰi aɣar var roɡoritsʰ im dɣeebʃi am eris natamalistʰvis ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
radɡan ikʰneba mʃvidobis tʰesli vazi ɡamoiɣebs tʰavis naqopʰs mitsa moitans tʰavis mosavals da tsʰa mostsʰems tʰavis tsʰvars da am eris natamals davumkvidreb qvelapʰers amas 
da roɡortsʰ satsqevarad iqavitʰ xalxebʃi iudas saxlo da israelis saxlo ase ɡixsnitʰ da sakurtʰxevelad ikʰnebitʰ nu ɡeʃiniatʰ ɡaimaɡretʰ xeli 
ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali roɡortsʰ borotis kʰmna ɡanvizraxe tʰkʰventʰvis rotsʰa ɡanmarisxes tʰkʰvenma mamebma ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali da ar ʃevinane 
kvlav ɡanvizraxav am xanebʃi siketʰis kʰmnas ierusalimistʰvis da iudas saxlistʰvis nu ɡeʃiniatʰ 
ai ra unda ʃeasrulotʰ ceʃmariteba elaparaketʰ ertʰmanetʰs ceʃmariteba da samʃvidobo samartʰali ɡaatʃinetʰ tʰkʰvens karibceebtʰan 
avi ar izraxotʰ ertʰmanetʰze tʰkʰvens ɡulʃi da nu ɡiqvartʰ tsʰru pʰitsʰili radɡan mdzuls es qvelapʰeri ambobs upʰali 
iqo tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis sitqva tʃems momartʰ natʰkʰvami 
ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali meotʰxe tʰvis marxva mexutʰe tʰvis marxva meʃvide tʰvis marxva da meatʰe tʰvis marxva iqos iudas saxlistʰvis ʃvebad da sixarulad da ketʰil dɣesastsaulebad oɣond ceʃmariteba da mʃvidoba ɡiqvardetʰ 
ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali kidev is moxdeba rom movlen xalxebi da uamrav kʰalakʰtʰa mtsʰxovrebni 
ertʰi kʰalakʰis mtsʰxovrebni meoreʃi tsavlen itqvian tsamo tsavidetʰ samxvetsrad upʰlis tsinaʃe da tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis sadzieblado maʃin metsʰ tsaval 
movlen mravalritsʰxovani xalxebi da dzlieri erebi tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis sadzieblad ierusalimʃi da samxvetsrod upʰlis tsinaʃe 
ase ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali im xanebʃi ikʰneba rom moecideba atʰi katsʰi qoveli enis xalxidan moecideba iudaelis kaltʰebs da etqvian tʰkʰventʰan tsamovaltʰ radɡan ɡaɡebuli ɡvakʰvs rom tʰkʰventʰan aris ɣmertʰi 
ɡanatʃeni sitqva upʰlisa xadrakʰis kʰveqanaze da damaskoze mis ɡansasvenebelze radɡan upʰlis tʰvali dahqurebs adamianebs da israelis qovel ʃtos 
da xamatʰzetsʰ mas rom esazɣvreba tsʰorze da tsʰidonze radɡan metismetad ɡabrdzendnen 
aiʃena tsʰorma tsʰixe simaɡre da kʰviʃasavitʰ daaxvava vertsʰxli da okʰro kʰutʃis talaxivitʰ 
aha upʰali tsʰarielze datovebs mas da zɣvaʃi tʃaamxobs mis dovlatʰs tʰavad ki tsʰetsʰxlʃi ʃtʰaintʰkʰmeba 
ixilavs aʃkeloni da ʃeeʃindeba ɣazatsʰ ʃedzrtsundeba metismetad da qekronitsʰ radɡan ɡatsbildeba misi imedi ɡadaikarɡeba mepʰe ɣazadan da aɣar dasaxldeba aʃkeloni 
utsʰxo tʰesli itsʰxovrebs aʃdodʃi da aɣmovpʰxvri pʰilistimeltʰa ampartovnebas 
baɡeebidan amovɡledʒ sisxls da mis sisadzaɡleebs kbilebs ʃoridan isitsʰ tʃvens ɣmertʰs dartʃeba da ikʰneba roɡortsʰ ertʰi atʰaseuli iudaʃi qekroni ki iebuselis msɡavsad ʃeiratsʰxeba 
ʃemovakaveb tʃems saxls laʃkʰrisɡan dasatsʰavad mimsvlel momsvlelisɡan da aɣar miuva mas mtʃaɡvreli radɡan amieridan sakutʰari tʰvalitʰ vxedav mas 
ixare didad sionis asulo daetsʰi qiʒina ierusalimis asulo aha ʃeni mepʰe modis ʃentʰan martʰali da ɡamardʒvebuli tʰvinieria is da amxedrebulia saxedarze da tʃotʃorze caki viris naʃierze 
amovaɡdeb etlebs epʰremidan da tsʰxenebs ierusalimidan ʃeimusreba sabrdzolo mʃvildi mʃvidobas ɡamoutsʰxadebs upʰali xalxebs da damqardeba misi xelmtsipʰeba zɣvidan zɣvamde da mdinaridan kʰveqnis kidemde 
ʃen ki ʃeni aɣtʰkʰmis sisxlis ɡulistʰvis ɡavatʰavisupʰleb ʃens tqveebs cidan 
daubrunditʰ tsʰixe simaɡreebs imedis tqveno rasatsʰ dɣes ɡitsʰxadebtʰ ormaɡad moɡaɡebtʰ 
radɡan mʃvildivitʰ movzidav iudas da isrebitʰ avavseb epʰrems aɣvdzrav ʃens ʃvilebs siono ʃeni ʃvilebis tsinaaɣmdeɡ iavano da meomris maxvilad ɡakʰtsʰev 
upʰali ɡamotʃndeba matʰ zemotʰ da elvasavitʰ ɡamovardeba misi isari tʃahberavs saqvirs upʰali ɣmertʰi da tsamova ʃuadɣis kʰariʃxalʃi 
tsʰabaotʰ upʰali daipʰaravs matʰ ʃtʰantʰkʰaven da ɡatʰelaven ʃurdulis kʰvebs ɣvinosavitʰ ʃesvamen matʰ sisxls aivsebian sasxurebeli tʰasivitʰ samsxverplos kʰimebivitʰ 
ixsnis matʰ im dɣes upʰali matʰi ɣmertʰi roɡortsʰ tʰavisi xalxis pʰaras radɡan ɡvirɡvinis tʰvlebi arian isini da ɡabrətsqindebian mis mitsaze 
oh razom didia misi siketʰe razom didia misi mʃveneba cabukebs xorbali kʰaltsulebs macari aaɣordzinebs 
ʃestʰxovetʰ upʰals tsvima ɡviani tsvimobis ʒams upʰali moiɣebs ɣrubels da mistsʰems matʰ tsvimis ɣvars dʒedʒils qvelastʰvis qanaʃi 
radɡan tʰerapʰimebi amaod laparakoben misnebi tquils xedaven da tsʰru sizmrebs qvebian amaod imʃvideben tʰavs amitomatsʰ tsʰxvrebivitʰ daexetebian itandʒebian radɡan ara hqavtʰ mtsqemsi 
mtsqemsebis mimartʰ aintʰo tʃemi risxva da davsdʒi botebs maɡram moxedavs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali tʰavis pʰaras iudas saxls da tʰavis didebul raʃad ɡaixdis mas brdzolaʃi 
misɡan ikʰneba kʰvakutʰxedi misɡan ikʰneba samscvali misɡan ikʰneba sabrdzolo mʃvildi misɡan ɡamova qvela ɡanmɡebeli ertʰianad 
ikʰnebian roɡortsʰ ɡmirebi kʰutʃis talaxs rom tʰelaven brdzolaʃi ibrdzoleben radɡan upʰali ikʰneba matʰtʰan da ɡaatsbileben tsʰxenebze amxedrebultʰ 
ɡavadzliereb iudas saxls da vixsni iosebis saxls davabruneb matʰ radɡan ʃevitsqale isini da ise ikʰnebian tʰitʰkʰos arasodes mimetovebinos radɡan me var upʰali matʰi ɣmertʰi da ʃevismine matʰi 
ɡmirivitʰ ɡaxdeba epʰremi da ɡaxalisdeba matʰi ɡuli tʰitʰkʰos ɣvinisaɡan dainaxaven amas matʰi ʃvilebi da ɡaixareben moilxens matʰi ɡuli upʰalʃi 
davustven matʰ da tʰavs movuqri radɡan ɡamovisqide isini da bevrni ɡaxdebian roɡortsʰ bevrni iqvnen 
me ɡavabnie isini xalxebʃi da ʃoreul kʰveqnebʃi ɡamixseneben itsʰxovreben tʰaviantʰ ʃvilebtʰan ertʰad da dabrundebian 
davabruneb matʰ eɡviptis kʰveqnidan da aʃuridan ɡamovkreb matʰ ɡilqadis kʰveqnad da libans miviqvan matʰ da adɡili ar eqopʰatʰ 
tʃaivlis zɣvaze satandʒveli da dahkravs zɣvaʃi mis talɣebs amoʃreba nilosis siɣrmeebi daemxoba aʃuris dideba da tsaertʰmeva kvertʰxi eɡviptes 
ɡavadzliereb matʰ upʰalʃi da ivlian misi saxelitʰ ambobs upʰali 
ɡaaɣe libano ʃeni kari rom tsʰetsʰxlma ʃeɡicamos nadzvebi 
ivalale alvav radɡan daetsʰa nadzvi radɡan ɡaidzartsʰvnen dzlevamosilni ivalaletʰ baʃanis muxebo radɡan daemxo ɡauvali maɣnari 
ɡaismis mtsqemstʰa valalebis xma radɡan ɡaidzartsʰva matʰi mʃveneba lomtʰa brədɣvinvis xma radɡan ɡaidzartsʰva iordanes dideba 
ase ambobs upʰali tʃemi ɣmertʰi damtsqse dasaklavad ɡantsiruli tsʰxvari 
mqidvelni rom xotsʰaven ɡanukitʰxavad matʰi ɡamqidvelni ki amboben kurtʰxeulia upʰali ɡavmdidrdio matʰi mtsqemsebitsʰ ar indoben matʰ 
radɡan metsʰ aɣar davindob am kʰveqnis mtsʰxovrebtʰ ambobs upʰali aha tʃavuɡdeb qovel katsʰs tʰavis tʰvistoms xelʃi da tʰavis mepʰes xelʃi aikleben kʰveqanas da me ar davixsni matʰ matʰi xelidan 
davmtsqemsav dasaklav tsʰxvars dabetʃavebul tsʰxvars aviɣeb or kombals ertʰs siames vutsodeb meores sakvrelebs vutsodeb da davmtsqemsav tsʰxvars 
ertʰ tʰveʃi ɡavtsqvet sam mtsqemss da veɣar aitans matʰ tʃemi suli da matʰi sulitsʰ ʃemidzulebs me 
vitqvi aɣar daɡmtsqemsavtʰ tʰkʰven mosakvdomi mokvdes ɡasatsqveti ɡatsqdes danartʃenebma camon ertʰmanetʰis xortsʰi 
aviɣeb kombals siames da ɡadavtexav ratʰa ɡavtexo tʃemi aɣtʰkʰma romelitsʰ qvela xalxtʰan davdevi 
ɡatqdeba im dɣes da mixvdebian tʃemi ʃemqure dabetʃavebuli tsʰxvrebi rom es upʰlis sitqvaa 
vetqvi matʰ tʰu ɡetʰnevatʰ mometsʰitʰ tʃemi ɡasamrdʒelo tʰu ara da nu momtsʰemtʰ da momitsonian ɡasamrdʒelod otsʰdaatʰ vertsʰxls 
mitʰxra upʰalma tʃaqare isini saɡandzurʃi sauketʰeso sapʰasuri roɡortsʰ davpʰasdi matʰɡan metsʰ aviɣe otsʰdaatʰi vertsʰxli da tʃavqare upʰlis saxlis saɡandzurʃi 
ɡavtexav meore kombals sakvrelebs ratʰa ɡavtexo siqvaruli iudasa da israels ʃoris 
mitʰxra upʰalma kidev aiɣe uɡunuri mtsqemsis iaraɣi 
radɡan aha davaqeneb am kʰveqanaʃi mtsqemss miɡdebultʰ ar mixedavs patarebs ar modzebnis dasaxitʃrebuls ar ɡankurnavs pʰexze mdɡars ar ɡamokvebavs maɡram nasukʰaltʰa xortsʰs ʃecams da tʃlikʰebs aaɡledʒs 
vai umakʰnis mtsqemss tsʰxvris mimtovebels maxvili ikʰneba mis mklavze da mis mardʒvena tʰvalze mtʰlianad ʃeaxmeba mklavi da daevseba mtʰlianad mardʒvena tʰvali 
ɡanatʃeni sitqva upʰlisa israelze ase ambobs upʰali romelmatsʰ ɡadapʰina tsʰa daamqara mitsa da romelmatsʰ tʃaudɡa suli adamianebs matʰ tsiaɣʃi 
aha ɡavxdi ierusalims sibruvis tʰasad qoveli xalxistʰvis irɡvliv da tʰvitʰ iudastʰvis rotsʰa alqaʃi moekʰtsʰeva ierusalimi 
dadɡeba dro da ɡavxdi ierusalims sadʒildao kʰvad qoveli xalxistʰvis da qoveli misi amtsevi tselʃi ɡatsqdeba da kʰveqnis qoveli eri mis tsinaaɣmdeɡ ʃeikribeba 
im dɣes ambobs upʰali ɡavatsʰopʰeb qvela tsʰxens da ʃevʃli mis mxedars maɡram iudaze mekʰneba tʰvali ɡaxelili rotsʰa xalxebis qvela tsʰxens davabrmaveb 
itqvian iudas atʰaseulni tʰaviantʰ ɡulʃi tʃemi dzala ierusalimis mtsʰxovrebni arian tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis matʰi ɣvtʰis ʃetsevnitʰ 
im dɣes ɡavxdi iudas atʰaseultʰ antʰebul kʰurad xetʰa ʃoris da antʰebul tʃiraɣdnad dznebs ʃoris da ʃtʰantʰkʰaven mardʒvniv da martsʰxniv qvela xalxs irɡvliv ierusalimi ki kvlav dasaxldeba tʰavis adɡilze ierusalimʃi 
iudas karvebs ixsnis upʰali rom davitʰis saxlis didebam da ierusalimis mtsʰxovrebtʰa didebam ar ɡadaacarbos iudas didebas 
im dɣes daipʰaravs upʰali ierusalimis mtsʰxovrebtʰ da dzabuni matʰ ʃoris davitʰivitʰ ikʰneba im dɣes davitʰis saxli ki ɣmertʰivitʰ ikʰneba upʰlis anɡelozivitʰ ikʰneba matʰ tsinaʃe 
im dɣes ikʰneba rom ɡadavtsqvet qoveli xalxis ɡanadɡurebas vintsʰ ki ɡailaʃkʰrebs ierusalimze 
ɡadmovɣvri davitʰis saxlze da ierusalimis mtsʰxovrebtʰa tʰavze tsqalobisa da ʃetsqalebis suls da mixilaven isini romlebitsʰ ɡanɡmires matʰ daitireben mas roɡortsʰ mxolodʃobils tirian da ɡamtsardebian mis ɡamo roɡortsʰ pirmʃos ɡamo mtsardebian 
im dɣes ɡaimartʰeba didi ɡlova ierusalimʃi roɡortsʰ ɡlova hadad rimonisa meɡidonis xeobaʃi 
iɡlovebs kʰveqana qoveli saɡvareulo tsʰalke davitʰis saxlis saɡvareulo tsʰalke da matʰi rədzlebi tsʰalke natʰanis saxlis saɡvareulo tsʰalke da matʰi rədzlebi tsʰalke 
levis saxlis saɡvareulo tsʰalke da matʰi rədzlebi tsʰalke ʃimqis saɡvareulo tsʰalke da matʰi rədzlebi tsʰalke 
qvela dartʃenili saɡvareulo qoveli saɡvareulo tsʰalke da matʰi rədzlebi tsʰalke 
im dɣes ikʰneba rom ɡaiɣeba tsqaro davitʰis saxlistʰvis da ierusalimis mtsʰxovrebtʰatʰvis tsʰodvisa da utsmidurebis tsarsaxotsʰad 
im dɣes ikʰneba ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali rom movspob kerptʰa saxelebs kʰveqanaʃi rom metad aɣar ixseniebdnen da tsinastsarmetqvelebsatsʰ da utsmidur suls aɣvɡvi kʰveqnidan 
tʰu vinme kidev daitsqebs tsinastsarmetqvelebas da etqvian mas misi mʃobeli mama da deda ar unda tsʰotsʰxlobde radɡan tquils laparakob upʰlis saxelitʰo da ɡanɡmiraven mas misi mʃobeli mama da deda rotsʰa akʰadaɡdeba 
im dɣes ikʰneba rom ʃertsʰxvebatʰ tsinastsarmetqveltʰ tʰitʰoeuls tʰavisi xilvisa tsinastsarmetqvelebis dros da aɣar ʃeimosaven ʃavi balnis ʃesamosels tʰvalis asaxvevad 
itqvian ara var tsinastsarmetqveli mitsis mxvneli var radɡan qmad var naqidi siqmatsvilidanve 
etqvian eɡ ra nacrilobebi ɡakʰvs xelze miuɡebs tʃems moketʰetʰa saxlʃi var natsʰemi 
maxvilo aɣidzar tʃemi mtsqemsis tsinaaɣmdeɡ da tʃemi maxlobeli katsʰis tsinaaɣmdeɡ ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali dahkari mtsqemss da ɡaipʰanteba tsʰxvari maʃin mivqopʰ xels mtsqemsis bicebs 
mtʰels kʰveqanaze ambobs upʰali ori tsili ɡatsqdeba da daiɣupeba mesamedi ki ɡadartʃeba 
ɡavatareb tsʰetsʰxlʃi am mesameds da ɡavtsmend roɡortsʰ vertsʰxli itsmindeba da ɡamovtsʰdi matʰ roɡortsʰ okʰro ɡamoitsʰdeba maʃin axseneben tʃems saxels da metsʰ ʃevitsqnareb matʰ vitqvi es aris tʃemi eri itqvian isini upʰalia tʃemi ɣmertʰi 
aha dadɡeba dɣe upʰlisaɡan da danatsildeba ʃeni nadavli ʃens tsiaɣʃi 
tʰavs movuqri qvela xalxs ierusalimis tsinaaɣmdeɡ sabrdzolvelad aɣebuli ikʰneba kʰalakʰi saxlebi ɡaidzartsʰveba da kʰalebi ɡaupatiurdebian naxevari kʰalakʰi tqved tsava danartʃeni xalxi ki ar moikvetʰeba kʰalakʰidan 
ɡamova upʰali da ʃeebrdzoleba am xalxs roɡortsʰ odesɣatsʰ omobda brdzolis dɣes 
ʃedɡeba misi pʰexi am dɣes zetʰisxilis mtʰaze ierusalimis pirdapir rom aris aɣmosavletʰitʰ ʃuaze ɡaipoba zetʰisxilis mtʰa aɣmosavletʰidan dasavletʰitʰ da ɡatʃndeba dzalze didi xeoba mtʰis ertʰi naxevari tʃrdiloetʰisken tsava meore naxevari samxretʰisken 
ɡaikʰtsʰevitʰ tʃemi mtʰebis xeobaʃi radɡan xeoba mtʰebs ʃoris atsʰalamde miaɣtsevs ɡaikʰtsʰevitʰ roɡortsʰ mitsisdzvrisɡan ɡarboditʰ iudas mepʰis quzias dros maʃin mova upʰali tʃemi ɣmertʰi da qvela tsmida mastʰan ertʰad 
im dɣes aɣar ikʰneba natʰeli ikʰneba sitsʰive da qinva 
ikʰneba ertʰi dɣe upʰlistʰvis satsʰnauri artsʰ dɣe da artsʰ ɣame mxolod saɣamoʒams ikʰneba natʰeli 
im dɣes ikʰneba rom idinebs ierusalimidan sitsʰotsʰxlis tsqali ertʰi naxevari aɣmosavletʰis zɣvisken tsava meore naxevari dasavletʰis zɣvisken zamtʰar zapʰxul ase ikʰneba 
ikʰneba upʰali mepʰed mtʰels kʰveqanaze im dɣes ertʰi ikʰneba upʰali da misi saxelitsʰ ertʰi ikʰneba 
vaked ikʰtsʰeva mtʰeli kʰveqana ɡebaqidan rimonamde ierusalimis samxritʰ ierusalimi ki amaɣldeba da dartʃeba tʰavis adɡilze beniaminis karibcidan pirveli karibcis adɡilamde kutʰxis karibcemde da xananelis koʃkidan mepʰis satsnaxlebamde 
itsʰxovreben masʃi da aɣar ikʰneba ʃetʃveneba da mʃvidad itsʰxovrebs ierusalimi 
es ikʰneba satandʒveli romelitʰatsʰ datandʒavs upʰali qvela xalxs vintsʰ ki ɡailaʃkʰrebs ierusalimze zezeulad ʃemoalpebatʰ xortsʰi daulpebatʰ tʰvalebi pʰosoebʃi da ena daulpebatʰ pirʃi 
im dɣes ikʰneba rom didi areuloba tʃamovardeba matʰ ʃoris upʰlisaɡan xels tʃascideben ertʰimeores da ertʰis xeli meoris xelis tsinaaɣmdeɡ aɣimartʰeba 
iudatsʰ ʃeebrdzoleba ierusalims daxvavdeba qvela ɡareʃemo xalxis dovlatʰi okʰro vertsʰxli da diddzali samoseli 
asetʰive ikʰneba satandʒveli tsʰxentʰa da dʒortʰa akʰlemtʰa da saxedartʰa qoveli pirutqvisa romelitsʰ ki matʰ urdoebʃi ikʰneba 
moxdeba ise rom vintsʰ ki ɡadartʃeba im xalxebidan ierusalims rom esxmodnen tʰavs tslidan tslamde ivlian mepʰis tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis tʰaqvansatsʰemad da karvobis sadɣesastsaulod 
moxdeba ise rom tʰu vinme kʰveqnis tomtʰaɡani ar ava ierusalims mepʰis tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis tʰaqvanissatsʰemad tsvima ar ikʰneba matʰze 
tʰu eɡviptis tomi ar ava da ar ʃeva ikʰ tsvima ar ikʰneba masze ikʰneba satandʒveli ritʰatsʰ datandʒavs upʰali xalxebs romlebitsʰ ar adian karvobis sadɣesastsaulod 
es ekʰneba sasdʒelad eɡviptes da sasdʒelad qvela xalxs romelitsʰ ar ivlis karvobis sadɣesastsaulod 
im dɣes ikʰneba tsartserili tsʰxentʰa zanzalakebze sitsmide upʰals da kʰvabebi upʰlis saxlʃi ʃeiratsʰxeba roɡortsʰ sasxurebeli tʰasebi samsxverplos tsinaʃe 
qoveli kʰvabi ierusalimʃi da iudaʃi tsmida ikʰneba tsʰabaotʰ upʰlisatʰvis mova qoveli ʃemtsirveli aiɣebs matʰɡan da moxarʃavs matʰʃi aɣar ikʰneba im dɣes kʰanaaneli tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis saxlʃi 
ɡanatʃeni sitqva upʰlisa israelisadmi malakʰias piritʰ 
me ʃeɡiqvaretʰ tʰkʰven ambobs upʰali tʰkʰven ki ambobtʰ ristʰvis ʃeɡviqvare ɡana esavi iakobis dzma ar aris ambobs upʰali maɡram me iakobi ʃeviqvare 
esavi ki ʃevidzule da ɡavaukatsʰriele misi mtʰebi da udabnos turebs mivetsʰi misi samkvidro 
tʰumtsʰa ambobs edomi darbeuli vartʰ maɡram kvlav avaʃenebtʰ naoxars tsʰabaotʰ upʰali ase ambobs isini aaʃeneben da me davanɡrev daarkʰmeven matʰ borotebis mxares da isetʰ xalxs romelsatsʰ samudamod ʃemostsqra upʰali 
ixilaven amas tʰkʰveni tʰvalebi da itqvitʰ idida upʰalma israelis sazɣvrebs ɡaretʰ 
ʃvili pativs stsʰems mamas da qma tʰavis batons tʰu mama var sad aris tʃemi pativistsʰema tʰu matʰi batoni var sad aris tʃemdami ʃiʃi tʰkʰven ɡeubnebatʰ tsʰabaotʰ upʰali mɣvdlebo tʃemi saxelis ʃeuratsʰxmqopʰelno tʰkʰven ki ambobtʰ ritʰi ʃeuratsʰxvqavitʰ ʃeni saxeli 
moɡakʰvtʰ tsabiltsuli puri tʃems samsxverploze da ambobtʰ ritʰi tsaɡbiltsetʰo imitʰ rom ambobtʰ upʰlis tabla ra pativis ɣirsiao 
brmas rom mtsiravtʰ msxverplad tsʰudi ar aris kocli da sneuli rom moɡqavtʰ tsʰudi ar aris aba miartʰvi iɡi ʃens xelisupʰals tʰu moɡitsonos an tʰu ketʰilad ʃemoɡxedos ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
axla ki ʃeevedretʰ ɣmertʰs vindzlo ʃeɡitsqalotʰ roɡor ʃemoɡxedotʰ ketʰilad rotsʰa es ɡamodis tʰkʰveni xelidan ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
romelma tʰkʰvenɡanma daxʃa kari rom pʰucad ar antʰebdetʰ tsʰetsʰxls tʃems samsxverploze ar metʰnevitʰ ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali da ar meameba tʰkʰveni xelitʰ mortʰmeuli dzɣveni 
radɡan didi ikʰneba tʃemi saxeli xalxebʃi mzis aɣmosavalidan dasavalamde qovel adɡils daukmeven sakmevels tʃems saxels da tsmida dzɣvens ʃemomtsiraven radɡan didi ikʰneba tʃemi saxeli xalxebʃi ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
tʰkʰven ki ʃelaxetʰ iɡi tʰkʰveni natʰkʰvamitʰ upʰlis tabla tsabiltsuliao da naqopʰi misi ʃesazizɣiao sacmelad 
ambobtʰ aha ra damkʰantsʰveliao da ɡdzultʰ iɡi ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali da moɡqavtʰ natatsʰebi kocli da sneuli dzɣvenitsʰ asetʰive moɡakʰvtʰ roɡor meamos misi miɣeba tʰkʰveni xelidan ambobs upʰali 
tsqeulimtsʰ iqos is tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰi visatsʰ mamali pirutqvi hqavs pʰaraʃi maɡram dasaxitʃrebuls aɣutʰkʰvams msxverplad upʰals radɡan didi mepʰe var me ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali da saʃinelia tʃemi saxeli xalxebʃi 
axla tʰkʰventʰvis aris es mtsʰneba mɣvdlebo 
tʰu ar ɡaiɡonebtʰ da ɡulʃi ar tʃaidebtʰ mas rom pativi miaɡotʰ tʃems saxels ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali movavlen tʰkʰvenze tsqevlas da davtsqevli tʰkʰvens kurtʰxevebs davtsqevle kidetsʰ radɡan ar tʃaɡidviatʰ ɡulʃi 
aha daɡikavebtʰ tʰesls da pirisaxeze daɡaqritʰ saklavis skores tʰkʰveni dɣesastsaulebis skores da tʰan tsaiɣebtʰ mas 
mixvdebitʰ rom me ɡamoɡiɡzavnetʰ es mtsʰneba levianebtʰan tʃemi aɣtʰkʰmis ʃesanartʃuneblad ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
tʃemi aɣtʰkʰma mastʰan sasitsʰotsʰxlod da samʃvidobod iqo da me mivetsʰi es matʰ tʃemi ʃiʃisatʰvis ridi hkʰondatʰ tʃemi da ekrdzalvodnen tʃems saxels 
ceʃmariti rdʒuli iqo mis pirʃi da uketʰureba ar ipoveboda mis baɡeebʃi mʃvidobitʰ da sitsrpʰelitʰ dadioda tʃems tsinaʃe da mravali moakʰtsʰia borotebisɡan 
radɡan mɣvdlis baɡeebi unda imarxavdes tsʰodnas da misi piridan moelodnen rdʒuls radɡan tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis motsʰikʰulia iɡi 
tʰkʰven ki ɡadauxvietʰ ɡzidan bevri aatsʰdinetʰ rdʒuls da daarɣvietʰ leviantʰa aɣtʰkʰma ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
metsʰ sadzulvelad ɡaɡxditʰ da daɡamtsʰirebtʰ qoveli xalxis tʰvalʃi radɡan ar daitsʰavitʰ tʃemi ɡzebi da mikerdzoebas itʃenditʰ rdʒulʃi 
ɡana ertʰi mama ara ɡvqavs qvelas ɡana ertʰma ɣmertʰma ar ɡaɡvatʃina maʃ ratom vemuxanatʰebitʰ ertʰmanetʰs rom ʃevlaxotʰ tʃveni mamebis aɣtʰkʰma 
muxanatʰobs iuda da sisadzaɡle xdeba israelʃi da ierusalimʃi radɡan ʃelaxa iudam upʰlis sitsmide romelitsʰ uqvarda da utsʰxo ɣmertʰis asuls ekʰmro 
moikvetʰs upʰali iakobis karvebidan amis tʃamdens mɣvidzars da xmis ɡamtsʰems da dzɣvenis mimtans tsʰabaotʰ upʰlisadmi 
aha kidev ras aketʰebtʰ tsʰremlitʰ apʰarvinebtʰ samsxverplos tirilitʰa da kvnesitʰ ise rom veɣar xedavs dzɣvens da ketʰilɡantsqobitʰ veɣar iɣebs tʰkʰveni xelidan 
tʰkʰven ambobtʰ ristʰviso imistʰvis rom motsame iqo upʰali ʃensa da ʃeni sicabukis tsʰols ʃoris romelsatsʰ uɣalate is ki ʃeni meɡobari da ʃeni aɣtʰkʰmis tsʰoli iqo 
aravin tʃaidens amas visatsʰ ki sulis natamali ʃertʃenia ras itʰxovs katsʰi ʃtʰamomavlobas ɣvtʰisɡan da tʰkʰventsʰ ɡaupʰrətʰxilditʰ tʰkʰvens suls da nu uɣalatebtʰ siqmatsvilis tsʰols 
radɡan mdzuls ɡaqra ambobs upʰali israelis ɣmertʰi da tʰavisi samoselis dzaladobitʰ dampʰarveli ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali ɡaupʰrətʰxilditʰ tʰkʰvens suls da nu ikʰnebitʰ ɣalatianebi 
daɣaletʰ upʰali tʰkʰveni sitqvebitʰ da ambobtʰ ritʰi davɣaletʰo imitʰ rom ambobtʰ qoveli borotmokʰmedi ketʰilad utʃans upʰals da isini uqvarso mas an sad aris samartʰlis ɣmertʰio 
aha movavlen tʃems anɡelozs da ɡaamzadebs ɡzas tʃems tsinaʃe uetsʰrad mova tʰavis tadzarʃi upʰali romelsatsʰ tʰkʰven edziebtʰ da aɣtʰkʰmis anɡelozi romelitsʰ ɡsurtʰ aha modis ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
vin aitans misi mosvlis dɣes da vin ɡaudzlebs mis ɡamotsʰxadebas radɡan is ɡamomdnobelis tsʰetsʰxlivitʰ aris da mretsʰxavtʰa tutesavitʰ 
dadʒdeba vertsʰxlis ɡamomdnobeli da ɡanmtsmedeli ɡantsmeds levianebs da ɡaasupʰtʰavebs matʰ roɡortsʰ okʰrosa da vertsʰxls rom simartʰlitʰ miudzɣvnan upʰals ʃesatsiravi 
maʃin saamo ikʰneba upʰlisatʰvis iudas da ierusalimis ʃesatsiravi roɡortsʰ dzvel droʃi da ɡardasul tselitsadebʃi 
moval tʰkʰventʰan ɡansakitʰxavad da vikʰnebi pʰitsʰxeli motsame dʒadokʰartʰa da memruʃetʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ xiznis ɡamɡdebeltʰa da tʃems uʃiʃtʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
radɡan me upʰali ar vitsʰvlebi da tʰkʰventsʰ ar dailevitʰ iakobis dzeno 
tʰkʰveni mamebis dɣeebidan moqolebuli arɣvevditʰ tʃems tsesebs da ar itsʰavditʰ matʰ axla moikʰetsʰitʰ tʃemsken da metsʰ movikʰtsʰevi tʰkʰvensken ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali tʰkʰven ki ambobtʰ ristʰvis movikʰtsʰetʰo 
ɡana adamiani moatquebs ɣmertʰs rom matquebtʰ me da ambobtʰ raʃi ɡatquebtʰo meatʰedʃi da ʃesatsiravʃi 
tsqevlitʰa xartʰ datsqevlilni da maintsʰ matquebtʰ mtʰeli eri 
moitanetʰ mtʰeli meatʰedi saɡandzurʃi da iqos sazrdo tʃems saxlʃi aba ɡamomtsʰadetʰ amitʰ ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali tʰu ar ɡaɡixsnatʰ tsʰis sakʰanelni da ar ɡadmoɡitsʰalotʰ kurtʰxeva aurtsqvelad 
ʃentʰvis davakaveb mcamels rom ar tsaɡixdinotʰ mitsis naqopʰi da ar ɡaɡipartaxotʰ mindorʃi vazi ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
netarad tʃaɡtʰvlitʰ qoveli xalxi radɡan sanukvar kʰveqanaʃi itsʰxovrebtʰ ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
mdzlavroben tʃemze tʰkʰveni sitqvebi ambobs upʰali tʰkʰven ki ambobtʰ ra ɡvitʰkʰvams ʃenzeo 
tʰkʰven ambobtʰ pʰucia ɣvtʰis mortʃileba ras ɡvarɡebso misi samsaxuri da mtsuxared siaruli tsʰabaotʰ upʰlis tsinaʃe 
bednierebi arian ampartavnebio aʃendnen kidetsʰ borotmokʰmedni ɣmertʰitsʰ ki ɡamostsʰades da ɡadartʃneno 
rotsʰa upʰlis moʃiʃni laparakoben ertʰmanetʰʃi qurs uɡdebs upʰali esmis da itsereba mis tsinaʃe samaxsovro tsiɡni upʰlismoʃiʃtʰatʰvis da misi saxelis momxseniebeltʰatʰvis 
tʃemi ikʰnebian isini ambobs upʰali im dɣistʰvis rotsʰa undʒad ɡavamzadeb matʰ da ʃevibraleb roɡortsʰ katsʰi ʃeibralebs tʰavis ʃvils romelitsʰ mas mortʃilebs 
kvlav dainaxavtʰ ɡansxvavebas martʰalsa da uketʰurs ʃoris ɣvtʰis mortʃilsa da mis urtʃs ʃoris 
radɡan aha modis dɣe tʰonesavitʰ avarvarebuli da qvela ampartavani da uketʰurobis mokʰmedi tʃala ikʰneba da ɡadabuɡavs matʰ momavali dɣe ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali ise rom ar ʃeartʃens artsʰ dzirs da artsʰ rtos 
amoɡibrətsqindebatʰ tʃemi saxelis moʃiʃno mze simartʰlisa da kurneba ikʰneba mis pʰrtʰebze tʰkʰventsʰ ɡamoxvaltʰ da akuntruʃdebitʰ baɡis xborebivitʰ 
ɡatʰelavtʰ uketʰurtʰ radɡan unda ɡatsʰamtverdnen isini tʰkʰvens terpʰebkʰveʃ im dɣes romelsatsʰ me vamzadeb ambobs tsʰabaotʰ upʰali 
ɡaixsenetʰ moses tʃemi mortʃilis rdʒuli romelitsʰ vubrdzane mas xorebze mtʰeli israelistʰvis da mtsʰnebani da samartʰalni 
aha moɡivlentʰ elia tsinastsarmetqvels upʰlis didi da saʃineli dɣis dadɡomamde 
is daabrunebs mamebis ɡuls ʃvilebis ɡultʰan da ʃvilebis ɡuls mamebis ɡultʰan rom tʃemi mosvlisas ar ʃevmusro kʰveqana ʃetʃvenebitʰ 
tsiɡni tsarmoʃobisa ieso kʰristesi davitʰis dzisa abraamis dzisa 
abraamma ʃva isaki isakma ʃva iakobi iakobma ʃva iuda da misi dzmebi 
iudam ʃva pʰeretsʰi da zeraxi tʰamarisɡan pʰeretsʰma ʃva xetsʰroni xetsʰronma ʃva rami 
ramma ʃva qaminadabi qaminadabma ʃva naxʃoni naxʃonma ʃva salmoni 
salmonma ʃva boqazi raxabisɡan boqazma ʃva qobedi rutʰisɡan qobedma ʃva iese 
iesem ʃva davitʰ mepʰe davitʰ mepʰem ʃva solomoni urias tsʰolisɡan 
solomonma ʃva rexabqami rexabqamma ʃva abia abiam ʃva asa 
asam ʃva ioʃapʰati ioʃapʰatma ʃva iorami ioramma ʃva quzia 
quziam ʃva iotʰami iotʰamma ʃva axazi axazma ʃva xizkia 
xizkiam ʃva menaʃe menaʃem ʃva amoni amonma ʃva ioʃia 
ioʃiam ʃva iexonia da misi dzmani babilonʃi ɡadasaxlebis tsin 
babilonʃi ɡadasaxlebis ʃemdɡom iexoniam ʃva ʃealtʰieli ʃealtʰielma ʃva zerubabeli 
zerubabelma ʃva abihudi abihudma ʃva eliakimi eliakimma ʃva qazuri 
qazurma ʃva tsʰadoki tsʰadokma ʃva iakʰini iakʰinma ʃva elihudi 
elihudma ʃva eleazari eleazarma ʃva matʰani matʰanma ʃva iakobi 
iakobma ʃva iosebi kʰmari mariamisa romlisaɡanatsʰ iʃva ieso romelsatsʰ hkʰvia kʰriste 
amriɡad mtʰeli tʰaoba abraamidan davitʰamde tʰotʰxmeti tʰaoba davitʰidan babilonʃi ɡadasaxlebamde tʰotʰxmeti tʰaoba babilonʃi ɡadasaxlebidan kʰristemde tʰotʰxmeti tʰaoba 
xolo ieso kʰristes ʃoba ase moxda dedamisi mariami iosebze daniʃvnis ʃemdeɡ vidre isini ʃeuɣldebodnen sulitsmidisaɡan daorsulebuli aɣmotʃnda 
xolo iosebi misi kʰmari martʰali iqo da ar isurva misi mxileba undoda pʰarulad ɡaeʃva iɡi 
rotsʰa amas pʰikʰrobda aha etʃvena mas sizmarʃi upʰlis anɡelozi da utʰxra ioseb dzeo davitʰisa nu ɡaʃinebs ʃeni tsʰolis mariamis miɣeba vinaidan masʃi tʃasaxuli sulitsmidisɡan aris 
ʃobs dzes da daarkʰmev mas saxelad iesos vinaidan iɡi ixsnis tʰavis xalxs matʰi tsʰodvebisaɡan 
qovelive es moxda ratʰa aɣsruldes upʰlis natʰkʰvami tsinastsarmetqvelis mier romelitsʰ ambobs 
aha mutsʰlad iɣebs kʰaltsuli ʃobs dzes da utsodeben saxelad emanuels ratsʰ tʰarɡmanitʰ niʃnavs tʃventʰan ars ɣmertʰi 
sizmrisaɡan ɡamopʰxizlebuli iosebi ise moikʰtsʰa roɡortsʰ upʰlis anɡelozma ubrdzana da miiɣo tʰavisi tsʰoli 
da ar ʃeutsʰvnia iɡi vidre ara ʃva tʰavisi dze da daarkʰva mas iosebma saxelad ieso 
rotsʰa ieso iʃva iudeis betʰlemʃi mepʰe herodes dɣeebʃi ierusalimʃi movidnen moɡvebi aɣmosavletʰidan da tʰkʰves 
sad aris iudeveltʰa mepʰe romelitsʰ iʃva vinaidan vixiletʰ misi varskvlavi aɣmosavletʰʃi da moveditʰ ratʰa tʰaqvani vtsʰetʰ mas 
es rom ɡaiɡona ʃedzrtsunda mepʰe herode da mastʰan ertʰad mtʰeli ierusalimi 
ʃekriba qvela mɣvdelmtʰavari da eris mtsiɡnobarni da hkitʰxa matʰ sad unda ʃobiliqo kʰriste 
matʰ ki utʰxres mas iudeis betʰlemʃi vinaidan asea datserili tsinastsarmetqvelis mier 
da ʃen betʰlemo iudas mitsav arapʰritʰa xar umtsʰiresi iudas mtʰavrebs ʃoris vinaidan ʃenɡan ɡamova tsinamdzɣoli romelitsʰ damtsqemsavs tʃems xalxs israels 
maʃin herodem malulad daibara moɡvebi da ɡamoikitʰxa varskvlavis ɡamotʃenis ʒami 
tsarɡzavna isini betʰlems da utʰxra tsaditʰ ɡulmodɡined ɡamoikitʰxetʰ im qrmis ambavi da rotsʰa ipovitʰ ʃematqobinetʰ rom metsʰ mivide da tʰaqvani vtsʰe mas 
matʰatsʰ mousmines mepʰes da tsavidnen da aha varskvlavi romelitsʰ matʰ aɣmosavletʰʃi ixiles tsin udzɣoda matʰ vidre mividoda da dadɡeboda im adɡilze sadatsʰ qrma iqo 
varskvlavi rom dainaxes matʰ metismeti sixarulitʰ ɡaixares 
rotsʰa saxlʃi ʃevidnen dainaxes qrma mariamtʰan tʰavis dedastʰan daemxnen da tʰaqvani stsʰes mas ɡaxsnes tʰaviantʰi saundʒeni da miartʰves mas dzɣveni okʰro ɡundruki da muri 
da raki sizmarʃi iqvnen ɡapʰrətʰxilebulni rom ar dabrunebuliqvnen herodestʰan sxva ɡzitʰ tsavidnen tʰaviantʰ kʰveqanaʃi 
rotsʰa isini tsavidnen upʰlis anɡelozi ɡamoetsʰxada sizmarʃi iosebs da utʰxra adekʰi tsaiqvane qrma da dedamisi da ɡaikʰetsʰi eɡviptes da iqavi ikʰ vidre me ɡetqode radɡan herodes surs maɡ qrmis modzebna ratʰa daɣupos iɡi 
adɡa ɣamitʰ tsaiqvana qrma da dedamisi da mivida eɡviptes 
da iqo ikʰ herodes sikvdilamde ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo upʰlis natʰkʰvami tsinastsarmetqvelis mier romelitsʰ ambobs eɡviptidan movuxme tʃems dzes 
dzalian ɡanrisxda herode rotsʰa naxa rom ɡaatsbiles moɡvebma miavlina da moakvlevina qoveli qrma ori tslisa da imaze umtsʰrosebi betʰlemʃi da mtʰel mis sanaxebʃi im drois mixedvitʰ roɡortsʰ moɡvtʰaɡan ɡamoidzia 
maʃin aɣsrulda tsinastsarmetqvel ieremias mier natʰkʰvami romelitsʰ ambobs 
xma ɡaisma ramaʃi tirili da didi ɡodeba raxeli dastiris tʰavis ʃvilebs da ar surs tʰavi inuɡeʃos vinaidan aɣar arian isini 
herodes sikvdilis ʃemdeɡ ki aha eɡvipteʃi iosebs sizmrad ɡamoetsʰxada upʰlis anɡelozi 
da utʰxra adekʰi tsaiqvane qrma da dedamisi da tsadi israelis kʰveqanaʃi vinaidan daixotsʰnen vintsʰ maɡ qrmis suls edzebdnen 
isitsʰ adɡa tsaiqvana qrma da dedamisi da mivida israelis kʰveqanaʃi 
xolo rotsʰa ɡaiɡo rom arkʰelaosi mepʰobs iudeaʃi mamamisis herodes natsʰvlad ʃeeʃinda ikʰ tsasvlisa maɡram sizmrad miiɣo ɡapʰrətʰxileba da tsavida ɡalileis mxareʃi 
mivida da dasaxlda nazaretʰad tsodebul kʰalakʰʃi ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo tsinastsarmetqvelis mier natʰkʰvami rom mas nazareveli daerkʰmeoda 
im dɣeebʃi movida ioane natʰlismtsʰemeli da kʰadaɡebda iudeas udabnoʃi 
ambobda moinanietʰ vinaidan moaxloebulia tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli 
vinaidan es aris is viszetsʰ tʰkʰva esaia tsinastsarmetqvelma xma mɣaɣadeblisa udabnoʃi ɡanumzadetʰ ɡza upʰals moastsoretʰ misi bilikebi 
tʰvitʰon ioanes emosa akʰlemis betsvis samosi da tselze ertqa tqavis sartqeli xolo sazrdod hkʰonda kaliebi da veluri tʰapʰli 
maʃin mastʰan ɡamodioda ierusalimi mtʰeli iudea da mtʰeli iordanes sanaxebi 
inatʰlebodnen misɡan iordaneʃi da aɣiarebdnen tʰaviantʰ tsʰodvebs 
rotsʰa ioanem dainaxa misken mosanatʰlavad momavali mravali pʰariseveli da sadukeveli utʰxra matʰ ikʰednetʰa naʃobno vin ʃtʰaɡaɡonatʰ momaval risxvas ɡakʰtsʰeoditʰ 
maʃ ʃekʰmenitʰ monaniebis ɣirsi naqopʰi 
da nu ipʰikʰrebtʰ tʰkʰvatʰ tʰkʰventʰvis tʃven mamad abraami ɡvqavso vinaidan ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven ɣmertʰs ʃeudzlia am kʰvebidan aɣudɡinos abraams ʃvilebi 
tsʰulitsʰ ukve devs xetʰa pʰesvtʰan qovel xes romelitsʰ ketʰil naqopʰs ar ɡamoiɣebs mocrian da tsʰetsʰxlʃi tʃaaɡdeben 
me tsqlitʰ ɡnatʰlavtʰ mosananieblad maɡram tʃems ʃemdeɡ momavali tʃemze dzlieria visi sandlis tarebis ɣirsitsʰ ara var is moɡnatʰlavtʰ tʰkʰven sulitsmiditʰ da tsʰetsʰxlitʰ 
misi nitʃabi mis xeltʰaa is ɡatsmeds tʰavis kalos beɣelʃi moaɡrovebs tʰavis xorbals xolo bzes datsvavs tʃaukʰrobeli tsʰetsʰxlitʰ 
maʃin ɡalileidan iordaneze movida ieso ioanestʰan ratʰa mis mier monatʰluliqo 
xolo ioane akavebda da eubneboda me unda movinatʰlo ʃenɡan ʃen ki tʃemtʰan modixar 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra mas ase iqos vinaidan ase ɡvmartʰebs tʃven mtʰeli simartʰlis aɣsruleba maʃin miuʃva iɡi 
natʰelɣebuli ieso mqisve amovida tsqlidan da aha ɡaixsnen tsʰani da man ixila ɣvtʰis suli mtredivitʰ ɡardmomavali masze rom eʃveboda 
aha xma iqo tsʰidan romelitsʰ ambobda es aris tʃemi saqvareli dze romelitsʰ movitsone me 
maʃin sulma tsaiqvana ieso udabnoʃi eʃmakisaɡan ɡamosatsʰdelad 
ormotsʰ dɣes da ormotsʰ ɣames imarxula da bolos moʃivda 
miuaxlovda mas matsʰduri da utʰxra tʰu ʃen ɣvtʰis dze xar tʰkʰvi rom es kʰvebi purebad ikʰtsʰnen 
xolo man miuɡo da utʰxra datserilia rom ara mxolod puritʰ tsʰotsʰxlobs katsʰi aramed ɣvtʰis piridan ɡamomavali qoveli sitqvitʰ 
maʃin tsaiqvana iɡi eʃmakma tsmida kʰalakʰʃi da daaqena tadzris kʰimze 
utʰxra mas tʰu ɣvtʰis dze xar ɡadaiɡde tʰavi dzirs vinaidan datserilia tʰavis anɡelozebs ubrdzanebs ʃenze da isini xelʃi aqvanils ɡatareben ratʰa kʰvas pʰexi ar tsamohkra 
utʰxra mas aseve datserilia ar ɡamostsʰado upʰali ɣmertʰi ʃeni 
isev tsaiqvana iɡi eʃmakma dzalian maɣal mtʰaze utʃvena sopʰlis qvela samepʰo da matʰi dideba 
utʰxra mas qovelive amas ʃen moɡtsʰem tʰu damxobili tʰaqvans mtsʰem 
maʃin iesom utʰxra ɡanved satanav vinaidan datserilia upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs etsʰi tʰaqvani da mxolod mas emsaxure 
maʃin miatova iɡi eʃmakma da aha anɡelozebi mieaxlnen da emsaxurebodnen mas 
ɡaiɡo iesom rom ioane ɡatsʰemulia da tsavida ɡalileas 
miatova nazaretʰi mivida da dasaxlda zɣvis piras mdebare kapernaumʃi zebulunisa da nepʰtʰalis sazɣvrebʃi 
ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo natʰkʰvami esaia tsinastsarmetqvelis romelitsʰ ambobs 
zebulunis mitsa da nepʰtʰalis mitsa zɣvispira ɡza iordanes ɡaɣmitʰ tsarmartʰtʰa ɡalilea 
xalxma romelitsʰ bnelʃi isxda ixila didi natʰeli tʃrdilis kʰveqanaʃi msxdomtʰ natʰeli amoubrətsqindatʰ 
im droidan moqolebuli daitsqo iesom kʰadaɡeba da ambobda moinanietʰ vinaidan moaxloebulia tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli 
rotsʰa ɡalileis zɣvis napiras midioda man dainaxa ori dzma simoni petred tsodebuli da andria misi dzma badeebs isrodnen zɣvaʃi vinaidan mebadurebi iqvnen 
utʰxra matʰ momqevitʰ me da adamiantʰa mebadurebad ɡaɡxditʰ 
matʰ mqisve miatoves badeebi da ɡahqvnen mas 
ikʰidan tsavida da dainaxa sxva ori dzma iakobi zebedes dze da ioane misi dzma romelnitsʰ tʰaviantʰ mamastʰan zebedestʰan ertʰad navʃi badeebs amzadebdnen da mouxmo matʰ 
matʰ mqisve miatoves navitsʰ da mamatsʰ da ɡahqvnen mas 
da mimodioda ieso mtʰel ɡalileaʃi astsavlida matʰ sinaɡoɡebʃi kʰadaɡebda sasupʰevlis saxarebas da kurnavda qovelɡvar sens qovelnair udzlurebas adamianebʃi 
moedo misi ambavi mtʰel sirias da mohqavdatʰ mastʰan qvela udzluri sxvadasxva sneulebitʰ da satandʒvelitʰ ʃepqrobilni eʃmakeulni mtʰvareulni davrdomilni da is kurnavda matʰ 
diddzali xalxi misdevda mas ɡalileidan da dekapolisidan ierusalimidan da iudeadan da iordanes ɡaɣmidan 
dainaxa xalxi da avida mtʰaze rotsʰa dadʒda mividnen mastʰan misi motsapʰeebi 
man ɡaxsna baɡe astsavlida matʰ da eubneboda 
netar arian ɣaribni sulitʰ vinaidan matʰia tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli 
netar arian mɡloviareni vinaidan isini nuɡeʃtsʰemulni ikʰnebian 
netar arian tʰvinierni vinaidan isini daimkvidreben kʰveqanas 
netar arian simartʰlisatʰvis mʃier mtsqurvalni vinaidan isini ɡadzɣebian 
netar arian motsqaleni vinaidan isini ʃetsqalebul ikʰnebian 
netar arian ɡulitʰ supʰtʰani vinaidan isini ɣmertʰs ixilaven 
netar arian mʃvidobismqopʰelni vinaidan ɣvtʰis ʃvilebad itsodebian 
netar arian simartʰlisatʰvis devnilni vinaidan matʰia sasupʰeveli tsʰatʰa 
netar xartʰ tʰkʰven rotsʰa ɡaɡlandzɣaven ɡaɡdevnian da qovelnairad borots itqvian tʰkʰvenze tʃems ɡamo 
ixaretʰ da imxiaruletʰ vinaidan didia tʰkʰveni sazɣauri tsʰaʃi aseve devnidnen tsinastsarmetqveltʰ romlebitsʰ tʰkʰvenze utsin iqvnen 
tʰkʰven xartʰ marili mitsisa tʰu marili ɡankʰarda riɣatʰi damarildes is ukve aɣarapʰrad ɡamodɡeba mxolod ɡaretʰ unda ɡadaqaro katsʰtʰaɡan ɡasatʰelad 
tʰkʰven sopʰlis natʰeli xartʰ mtʰis tsverze mdebare kʰalakʰi ver daimaleba 
santʰels rom aantʰeben curcelkʰveʃ ki ar dɡamen aramed sasantʰleze rom qvelas ɡaunatʰos saxlʃi 
aseve anatʰebdes tʰkʰveni natʰeli adamiantʰa tsinaʃe ratʰa xedavdnen isini tʰkʰvens ketʰil sakʰmeebs da adidebdnen tʰkʰvens mamas romelitsʰ zetsʰaʃia 
ar ipʰikʰrotʰ tʰitʰkʰos rdʒulis an tsinastsarmetqveltʰa ɡasaukʰmeblad movedi ɡasaukʰmeblad ki ara aɣsasruleblad movedi 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven vidre tsʰa da mitsa ar ɡadaivlis artsʰ ertʰi iota anda artsʰ ertʰi tsertili ar ɡadaivlis rdʒulisa vidre qovelive ar aɣsruldeba 
amriɡad vintsʰ daarɣvevs ertʰs am umtsʰires mtsʰnebatʰaɡans da ise astsavlis adamianebs umtsʰiresi daerkʰmeva mas tsʰatʰa sasupʰevelʃi xolo vintsʰ asrulebs da astsavlis mas didi daerkʰmeva tsʰatʰa sasupʰevelʃi 
vinaidan ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tʰu tʰkʰveni simartʰle ar aɣemateba mtsiɡnobartʰa da pʰariseveltʰa simartʰles ver ʃexvaltʰ tsʰatʰa sasupʰevelʃi 
tʰkʰven ɡsmeniatʰ utʰkʰvamtʰ dzvelebistʰvis ara kla vintsʰ moklavs sasdʒelis tʰanamdebi ikʰneba 
me ki ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven vintsʰ umizezod ɡanurisxdeba tʰavis dzmas sasdʒelis tʰanamdebi ikʰneba vintsʰ tʰavis dzmas etqvis raka sinedrionis tʰanamdebi ikʰneba xolo romelitsʰ etqvis sulelo tsʰetsʰxlis ɡeenis tʰanamdebi ikʰneba 
amitom tʰu miitan ʃens dzɣvens samsxverploze da ikʰ ɡaɡaxsendeba rom ʃens dzmas raime akʰvs ʃens mimartʰ 
miatove ikʰ ʃeni dzɣveni samsxverplostʰan da tsadi dʒer ʃens dzmas ʃeuriɡdi mere modi da ʃestsire ʃeni dzɣveni 
ʃeuriɡdi ʃens metokʰes sastsrapʰod vidre mastʰan ertʰad ɡzas adɡaxar rom metokʰem ar ɡadaɡtsʰes msadʒuls xolo msadʒulma ar ɡadaɡtsʰes msaxurs da ar tʃaɡaɡdon sapqrobileʃi 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebi ʃen ikʰidan ver ɡamoxval vidre ukanasknel kodrants ar ɡadaixdi 
ɡsmeniatʰ rom tʰkʰmula ar imruʃo 
me ki ɡeubnebitʰ rom qvela vintsʰ kʰals ɡulistʰkʰmitʰ uqurebs man ukve imruʃa mastʰan tʰavis ɡulʃi 
tʰu ɡatsʰdunebs ʃeni mardʒvena tʰvali amoitʰxare da ɡadaaɡde vinaidan umdʒobesia ʃentʰvis rom ertʰi asotʰaɡani daɡeɣupos vidre mtʰeli ʃeni sxeuli ɡeenaʃi tʃavardes 
tʰu ʃeni mardʒvena xeli ɡatsʰdunebs moikvetʰe iɡi da ɡadaaɡde vinaidan umdʒobesia ʃentʰvis rom ertʰi asotʰaɡani daɡeɣupos vidre mtʰeli ʃeni sxeuli ɡeenaʃi tʃavares 
aseve natʰkʰvamia vintsʰ tʰavis tsʰols ɡauʃvebs mistsʰes mas ɡaqrilobis motsmoba 
me ki ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven qoveli vintsʰ tʰavis tsʰols ɡauʃvebs sidzvis mizezis ɡareʃe iɡi mas mruʃad akʰtsʰevs vintsʰ ɡaʃvebuls ʃeirtʰavs mruʃobs 
kidev ɡsmeniatʰ rom utʰkʰvamtʰ dzvelebistʰvis ar daipʰitsʰo tquilad aramed ʃeasrule ʃeni pʰitsʰi upʰlis tsinaʃe 
me ki ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven sul ar daipʰitsʰotʰ artsʰ tsʰa radɡan ɣvtʰis taxtia iɡi 
artsʰ kʰveqana radɡan mis pʰerxtʰa kvartsʰxlbekia iɡi artsʰ ierusalimi radɡan didi mepʰis kʰalakʰia iɡi 
artsʰ sakutʰari tʰavi daipʰitsʰo radɡan ertʰi ɣeri tʰmis ɡatʰetʰreba an ɡaʃaveba ar ʃeɡidzlia 
aramed iqos tʰkʰveni sitqva ho ho ara ara ratsʰ amaze metia is borotisɡanaa 
tʰkʰven ɡsmeniatʰ rom tʰkʰmula tʰvali tʰvalisa tsil da kbili kbilisa tsil 
me ki ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tsin nu aɣudɡebitʰ borots aramed tʰu vinmem mardʒvena loqaʃi ɡaɡatsnas meore loqatsʰ miuʃvire 
vintsʰ moisurvebs ʃens ɡankitʰxvas da ʃeni mosasxamis tsaɣebas samoselitsʰ tʰan ɡaatane mas 
vintsʰ ertʰ atʰas nabidʒze tsaqola ɡaidzulos orze ɡahqevi 
vintsʰ ɡtʰxovos mietsʰi zurɡs nu ʃeakʰtsʰev mas visatsʰ ʃenɡan sesxeba surs 
tʰkʰven ɡsmeniatʰ rom tʰkʰmula ʃeiqvare moqvasi ʃeni da ʃeidzule mteri ʃeni 
me ki ɡeubnebitʰ ɡiqvardetʰ tʰkʰveni mtrebi dalotsʰetʰ tʰkʰveni matsqevrebi siketʰe uqavitʰ tʰkʰvens modzuleebs da ilotsʰetʰ matʰtʰvis vintsʰ tʰkʰven ɡavitsroebtʰ da ɡdevnitʰ 
ratʰa iqotʰ tʰkʰveni zetsʰieri mamis dzeni visatsʰ tʰavisi mze amohqavs borottʰa da ketʰiltʰa tʰavze da tsvimas uɡzavnis martʰlebsa da usamartʰloebs 
vinaidan tʰu tʰkʰveni moqvarulebi ɡeqvarebatʰ ra ikʰneba tʰkʰveni sazɣauri ɡana mebaʒeebitsʰ aseve ar ikʰtsʰevian 
tʰu mxolod tʰkʰvens dzmebs moikitʰxavtʰ ɡansakutʰrebuls ras ɡaaketʰebtʰ ɡana tsarmartʰebitsʰ aseve ar ikʰtsʰevian 
maʃ iqavitʰ srulqopʰilni roɡortsʰ tʰkʰveni zetsʰieri mamaa srulqopʰili 
eridetʰ simartʰlis ketʰebas adamiantʰa tʰvaltsin matʰ dasanaxad tʰorem ver miiɣebtʰ sazɣaurs tʰkʰveni zetsʰieri mamisaɡan 
hoda rotsʰa motsqalebas ɡastsʰem nu ɡaaxmaureb ʃens tsinaʃe roɡortsʰ tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰni aketʰeben sinaɡoɡebsa da kʰutʃebʃi ratʰa xalxma akʰos isini ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven matʰ ukve miiɣes tʰaviantʰi sazɣauri 
ʃen ki rotsʰa motsqalebas ɡastsʰem ʃens martsʰxenas nu etsʰodineba ras aketʰebs ʃeni mardʒvena 
ratʰa ʃeni motsqaleba dapʰarulʃi iqos da mamaʃeni romelitsʰ xedavs dapʰarulʃi moɡizɣavs ʃen tsʰxadad 
rotsʰa lotsʰulobtʰ nu ikʰnebitʰ roɡortsʰ tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰni romeltʰatsʰ uqvartʰ sinaɡoɡebsa da kʰutʃis kutʰxeebʃi dɡoma da lotsʰva ratʰa xalxs tʰavi moatʃvenon ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven matʰ ukve miiɣes tʰaviantʰi sazɣauri 
ʃen ki rotsʰa lotsʰulob ʃedi ʃens otʰaxʃi tʃaikete kari da ilotsʰe dapʰarulʃi mqopʰi ʃeni mamisadmi da ʃeni mama romelitsʰ dapʰarulʃi xedavs moɡizɣavs ʃen 
xolo lotsʰvis dros nu ilaparakebtʰ zedmets tsarmartʰebivitʰ vinaidan matʰ hɡoniatʰ rom tʰaviantʰi mravalsitqvaobis ɡamo ʃesmenil ikʰnebian 
nu mibadzavtʰ matʰ vinaidan tʰkʰvenma mamam itsʰis ra ɡicirtʰ tʰkʰven vidre stʰxovdetʰ 
tʰkʰven ki ase ilotsʰetʰ mamao tʃveno romeli xar tsʰatʰa ʃina tsmida iqos saxeli ʃeni 
movides supʰeva ʃeni iqos neba ʃeni vitʰartsʰa tsʰatʰa ʃina eɡretsʰa kʰveqanasa zeda 
puri tʃveni arsobisa moɡvetsʰ tʃven dɣes 
da moɡviteve tʃven tʰananadebni tʃvenni vitʰartsʰa tʃven mivutevebtʰ tʰanamdebtʰa tʃventʰa 
da nu ʃeɡviqvan tʃven ɡansatsʰdelʃi aramed ɡvixsen tʃven borotisaɡan radɡan ʃenia supʰeva da dzali da dideba saukunetʰa mimartʰ amin 
vinaidan tʰu tʰkʰven miutevebtʰ adamianebs matʰ ʃetsʰodebebs tʰkʰventsʰ moɡitevebtʰ tʰkʰveni zetsʰieri mama 
xolo tʰu tʰkʰven ar miutevebtʰ adamianebs matʰ ʃetsʰodebebs artsʰ tʰkʰveni mama moɡitevebtʰ tʰkʰvens ʃetsʰodebebs 
aseve rotsʰa marxulobtʰ nu ikʰnebitʰ mtsuxareni roɡortsʰ tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰni vinaidan isini imtsuxreben saxeebs ratʰa adamianebs marxulebad atʃvenon tʰavi ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven matʰ ukve miiɣes tʰaviantʰi sazɣauri 
xolo ʃen rotsʰa marxulob itsʰxe tʰavze da daibane piri 
ratʰa adamianebs ki ar etʃveno marxulad aramed dapʰarulʃi mqopʰ ʃens mamas da ʃeni mama romelitsʰ xedavs dapʰarulʃi tsʰxadad moɡizɣavs 
nu daiundʒebtʰ mitsaze sadatsʰ tʃrtʃili da ʒanɡi spobs da sadatsʰ kʰurdebi tʰxrian da iparaven 
daiundʒetʰ tsʰaʃi sadatsʰ artsʰ tʃrtʃili da ʒanɡi spobs da sadatsʰ artsʰ kʰurdebi tʰxrian da iparaven 
vinaidan sadatsʰ ʃeni saundʒea ʃeni ɡulitsʰ ikʰve ikʰneba 
sxeulis santʰeli tʰvalia hoda tʰu ʃeni tʰvali supʰtʰaa mtʰeli ʃeni sxeulitsʰ natʰeli ikʰneba 
xolo tʰu ʃeni tʰvali borotia mtʰeli ʃeni sxeulitsʰ bneli ikʰneba tʰuki natʰeli romelitsʰ ʃenʃia sibnelea sibnele ramdenad didi ikʰneba 
aravis ar ʃeudzlia or batons emsaxuros an ertʰi unda sdzuldes da meore uqvardes anda im ertʰs ʃeetʰvisos da meore daamtsʰiros ver ʃedzlebtʰ ɣmertʰsatsʰ emsaxurotʰ da mamonasatsʰ 
amitom ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven nu zrunavtʰ tʰkʰveni sulisatʰvis ra camotʰ an ra svatʰ nurtsʰ tʰkʰveni sxeulisatʰvis tʰu ritʰi ʃeimosotʰ ɡana suli sazrdoze meti ar aris da sxeuli samoselze 
ʃexedetʰ tsʰis pʰrinvelebs isini artsʰ tʰesaven artsʰ mkian artsʰ beɣlebʃi aɡroveben da tʰkʰveni zetsʰieri mama asazrdoebs matʰ ɡana tʰkʰven matʰze bevrad uketʰesni ara xartʰ 
romel tʰkʰvenɡans ʃeudzlia zrunvitʰ tʰavis simaɣles ertʰi tsqrtʰa ʃematos 
samoselze raɣas zrunavtʰ ʃexedetʰ velis ʃroʃanebs roɡor izrdebian artsʰ ʃromoben artsʰ artʰaven 
maɡram ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom solomonitsʰ ki mtʰel tʰavis didebaʃi ar ʃemosila ise roɡortsʰ ertʰi amatʰɡani 
tʰuki mindvris balaxs romelitsʰ dɣes aris xval ki tʰoneʃi tʃaiqreba ɣmertʰi ase mosavs tʰkʰven upʰro metad ar ʃeɡmosavtʰ mtsʰired mortsmuneno 
nu zrunavtʰ da nu ambobtʰ ra vcamotʰ an ra vsvatʰ an ritʰ ʃevimosotʰo 
vinaidan qovelive amas tsarmartʰni edzeben vinaidan tʰkʰvenma zetsʰierma mamam itsʰis rom tʰkʰven ɡcirdebatʰ qovelive es 
tʰkʰven ki utsinares ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli edzietʰ da misi simartʰle da es qovelive ʃeɡematebatʰ 
nu zrunavtʰ xvalindel dɣeze vinaidan xvalindeli dɣe tʰvitʰon izrunebs tʰavis tʰavze qovel dɣes sakmarisad akʰvs tʰavisi sazrunavi 
nu ɡanikitʰxavtʰ ratʰa ar ɡanikitʰxnetʰ 
vinaidan romeli ɡankitʰxvitʰatsʰ ɡanikitʰxavtʰ da romeli satsqaotʰitsʰ miutsqavtʰ imavetʰi moɡetsqvebatʰ tʰkʰven 
rad uqureb tsvels ʃeni dzmis tʰvalʃi sakutʰar tʰvalʃi ki diresatsʰ ver amtʃnev 
anda roɡor etqvi ʃens dzmas mimiʃvi amoɡiɣo tʰvalidan tsvelio da aha ʃens tʰvalʃi ki direa 
tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰo dʒer ʃeni tʰvalidan dire amoiɣe da mere dainaxav roɡor amoiɣo tsveli ʃeni dzmis tʰvalidan 
nu mistsʰemtʰ tsmidas dzaɣlebs da nurtsʰ tʰkʰvens marɡalitebs dauqritʰ tsin ɣorebs ratʰa pʰexebitʰ ar ɡatʰelon da ʃemobrunebisas tʰkʰventsʰ ar daɡɡlidʒon 
itʰxovetʰ da moɡetsʰematʰ edzebetʰ da ipovitʰ dareketʰ da ɡaɡeɣebatʰ 
vinaidan qvela vintsʰ itʰxovs ɣebulobs vintsʰ edzebs poulobs da vintsʰ rekavs ɡaeɣeba 
aris ki tʰkʰvens ʃoris isetʰi katsʰi sakutʰarma ʃvilma puri stʰxovos man ki kʰva mistsʰes 
anda tʰevzi stʰxovs da ɡveli miatsodos 
hoda tʰu tʰkʰven borotebma itsʰitʰ ketʰil misatsʰemeltʰa mitsʰema tʰkʰveni ʃvilebistʰvis metadre tʰkʰveni zetsʰieri mama mistsʰems siketʰes imas vintsʰ stʰxovs 
amitom qvelapʰerʃi roɡortsʰ ɡindatʰ rom moɡekʰtsʰnen adamianebi tʰkʰventsʰ iseve moekʰetsʰitʰ matʰ vinaidan es aris rdʒuli da tsinastsarmetqvelni 
ʃeditʰ vitsro karibcitʰ vinaidan pʰartʰoa karibce da ɡanieria ɡza romelsatsʰ daɣupvisaken mihqavs da mravalni dadian masze 
vinaidan vitsroa karibce da vitsroa ɡza romelsatsʰ sitsʰotsʰxlisaken mihqavs da mtsʰiredni hpoveben mas 
eridetʰ tsʰrutsinastsarmetqvelebs romlebitsʰ tsʰxvris samositʰ modian tʰkʰventʰan ʃinaɡanad ki mtatsʰebeli mɡlebi arian 
matʰi naqopʰitʰ itsʰnobtʰ matʰ ɡana eklidan qurdzens krepʰen an kurostʰavidan leɣvs 
ase qoveli karɡi xe naqopʰsatsʰ karɡs idzleva xolo tsʰudi xe naqopʰsatsʰ tsʰuds idzleva 
ar ʃeudzlia karɡ xes tsʰudi naqopʰis ɡamoɣeba da artsʰ tsʰud xes karɡi naqopʰis ɡamoɣeba 
qovel xes romelsatsʰ karɡi naqopʰi ar moakʰvs crian da tsʰetsʰxlʃi aɡdeben 
ase matʰi naqopʰitʰ itsʰnobtʰ matʰ 
qvela vintsʰ meubneba upʰalo upʰalo rodi ʃeva tsʰatʰa sasupʰevelʃi aramed is vintsʰ aɣasrulebs tʃemi zetsʰieri mamis nebas 
bevri metqvis im dɣes upʰalo upʰalo ɡana ʃeni saxelitʰ ar vtsinastsarmetqvelebditʰ ɡana ʃeni saxelitʰ ar vdevniditʰ eʃmakebs da ɡana ʃeni saxelitʰ ar vaxdenditʰo mraval sastsauls 
maʃin me ɡanvutsʰxadeb matʰ me arasodes ar ɡitsʰnobditʰ tʰkʰven ɡamʃorditʰ urdʒuloebis mokʰmedno 
amitom qvelas vintsʰ ismens am tʃems sitqvebs da asrulebs matʰ vamsɡavseb ɡonier katsʰs romelmatsʰ saxli kldeze aiʃena 
movida tsvima ɡadmoskdnen mdinareebi amovardnen kʰarebi da ekvetʰnen im saxls is ki ar daetsʰa vinaidan kldeze iqo dapʰudznebuli 
xolo qvela vintsʰ ismens tʃems am sitqvebs da ar asrulebs emsɡavseba uɡunur katsʰs romelmatsʰ kʰviʃaze aiʃena saxli 
movida tsvima ɡadmoskdnen mdinareebi amovardnen kʰarebi da ekvetʰnen im saxls da is daetsʰa da dzalze didi iqo misi datsʰema 
rotsʰa iesom daasrula es sitqvebi xalxi ɡaotsʰebuli dartʃa misi modzɣvrebitʰ 
vinaidan iɡi astsavlida matʰ roɡortsʰ xelmtsipʰebis mkʰone da ara roɡortsʰ matʰi mtsiɡnobarni 
mtʰidan tʃamomavals diddzali xalxi misdevda mas ukan 
aha mivida mastʰan ketʰrovani tʰaqvani stsʰa da utʰxra upʰalo tʰu ɡinda ʃedzleb tʃems ɡantsmedas 
da ɡaitsoda xeli ʃeaxo mas da tʰkʰva ɡanitsmide da mqisve ɡanitsmida iɡi tʰavisi ketʰrisaɡan 
da utʰxra mas iesom itsʰode aravis utʰxra aramed tsadi da etʃvene mɣvdels da ʃestsire dzɣveni ratsʰ brdzana mosem matʰtʰvis dasamotsmeblad 
rotsʰa kapernaumʃi ʃevida asistʰavi mivida mastʰan ʃeevedra 
da utʰxra upʰalo tʃemi msaxuri saxlʃi mitsevs davrdomili da sastikad itandʒeba 
utʰxra mas me moval da ɡanvkurnav mas 
miuɡo asistʰavma da utʰxra upʰalo ara var ɣirsi rom tʃems cerkʰveʃ ʃemoxvide mxolod sitqva tʰkʰvi da ɡanikurneba tʃemi msaxuri 
vinaidan metsʰ xelmtsipʰebis kʰveʃ mqopʰi katsʰi var da tʃems xelkʰveitʰ mqvanan dʒariskatsʰebi ertʰs veubnebi tsadi metʰkʰi da midis sxvas modi metʰkʰi da modis tʃems monas ɡaaketʰe metʰkʰi es da aketʰebs 
es rom ɡaiɡona iesos ɡaukvirda da tʰavis mimdevrebs utʰxra ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven israelʃitsʰ ver vpove me asetʰi rətsmena 
xolo tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ rom mravalni movlen aɣmosavletʰidan da dasavletʰidan da dasxdebian abraamtʰan isaktʰan da iakobtʰan tsʰatʰa sasupʰevelʃi 
xolo sasupʰevlis dzeni ɡadaiqrebian ɡaresknelis bnelʃi ikʰneba ikʰ tirili da kbiltʰa ɣrcena 
da utʰxra iesom asistʰavs tsadi da roɡortsʰ irtsmune ise moɡeɡos da imave saatʰʃi ɡanikurna misi msaxuri 
ieso mivida petres saxlʃi da naxa misi sidedri mtsoliare tsʰxelebitʰ ʃepqrobili 
ʃeexo mis xels da tsʰxelebam ɡauara mas iɡi tsamodɡa da emsaxura matʰ 
rotsʰa mosaɣamovda mravali eʃmakeuli moiqvanes mastʰan da man sitqvitʰ ɡandevna sulebi da qvela sneuli ɡankurna 
ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo esaia tsinastsarmetqvelis mier natʰkʰvami romelitsʰ ambobs man aiɣo tʃveni udzlurebani da itvirtʰa tʃveni snebani 
tʰavis ɡarʃemo diddzali xalxi rom dainaxa iesom ubrdzana ɡaɣma ɡasuliqvnen 
miuaxlovda ertʰi mtsiɡnobari da utʰxra modzɣvaro ɡamoɡqvebi sadatsʰ ki tsaxval 
iesom utʰxra mas meliebs soroebi akʰvtʰ da tsʰis pʰrinveltʰ budeebi katsʰis dzes ki arsad ara akʰvs tʰavis misadrekeli 
xolo sxva motsapʰetʰaɡanma utʰxra mas upʰalo neba mometsʰi dʒer tsavide da mamatʃemi davmarxo 
iesom ki utʰxra mas ʃen me ɡamomqevi mkvdrebma ki tʰaviantʰi mkvdrebi damarxon 
tʃadʒda iɡi navʃi da misi motsapʰeebitsʰ mihqvnen 
da aha atqda didi ɣelva zɣvaze isetʰi rom navi talɣebitʰ ipʰareboda mas ki edzina 
da mividnen mastʰan ɡaaɣvidzes da utʰxres upʰalo ɡvixseni viɣupebitʰ 
da utʰxra matʰ ram ʃeɡaʃinatʰ mtsʰired mortsmuneno mere tsamodɡa ʃerisxa kʰarebi da zɣva da tʃamovarda didi mqudroeba 
adamianebs ki ukvirdatʰ da ambobdnen vin aris es kʰarebitsʰ da zɣvatsʰ rom mas emortʃilebian 
rotsʰa ɡaɣma ɣadarineltʰa kʰveqanaʃi mivida ʃemoxvda ori eʃmakeuli romlebitsʰ samarxebidan ɡamovidnen isetʰi mdzvinvareni rom veravin bedavda im ɡzaze ɡavlas 
da aha mortʰes qvirili ra ɡinda tʃvenɡan ɣvtʰis dzeo vadaze adre moxvedi akʰ tʃvens satandʒvelad 
matʰɡan moʃorebitʰ dzovda ɣorebis didi kolti 
eʃmakebi ʃeevedrnen mas tʰu ɡaɡvdevni ɣorebis koltʃi maintsʰ ʃeɡviʃvi 
utʰxra matʰ tsaditʰ isinitsʰ ɡamovidnen da ʃevidnen ɣorebʃi da aha mtʰeli kolti ɡadaeʃva kbodedan zɣvaʃi da tsqalʃi daiɣupa 
mtsqemsebi ki ɡaikʰtsʰnen mividnen kʰalakʰʃi da uambes qvelapʰeri ratsʰ eʃmakeulebs daemartʰatʰ 
da aha mtʰeli kʰalakʰi ɡamovida iesos ʃesaxvedrad da rom dainaxes iɡi ʃeevedrnen matʰ sazɣvrebs ɡastsʰloda 
da tʃadʒda navʃi ɡaɣma ɡavida da mivida tʰavis kʰalakʰʃi 
aha miuqvanes mas loɡinze mtsoliare davrdomili rotsʰa iesom ixila matʰi rətsmena utʰxra davrdomils ɡamaɡrdi ʃvilo moɡeteva ʃeni tsʰodvebi 
aha zoɡiertʰma mtsiɡnobarma tʰavistʰvis tʰkʰva ɣmertʰsa ɡmobs es katsʰi 
iesom dainaxa matʰi zraxvebi da utʰxra ratom pʰikʰrobtʰ tʰkʰvens ɡulʃi borots 
risi tʰkʰma upʰro advilia ʃeni tsʰodvebi moɡeteva tʰu imis tʰkʰma adekʰi da ɡaiare 
xolo ratʰa itsʰodetʰ rom katsʰis dzes mitsaze tsʰodvebis mitevebis xelmtsipʰeba akʰvs ase utʰxra davrdomils adekʰi aiɣe ʃeni satsoli da tsadi ʃens saxlʃi 
isitsʰ tsamodɡa da tsavida tʰavis saxlʃi 
amis ʃemqure xalxs ukvirda da adidebda ɣmertʰs romelmatsʰ asetʰi xelmtsipʰeba mistsʰa adamianebs 
ikʰaurobas rom ɡaʃorda iesom dainaxa katsʰi romelitsʰ sabaʒostʰan idʒda saxelad matʰe da utʰxra mas ɡamomqevi isitsʰ tsamodɡa da ɡahqva mas 
moxda ise rom rotsʰa is supʰrastʰan idʒda saxlʃi mravali mebaʒe da tsʰodvili movida da tʃamodʒda iesosa da misi motsapʰeebis ɡverditʰ 
es rom pʰarisevlebma dainaxes utʰxres mis motsapʰeebs ratom cams da svams tʰkʰveni modzɣvari mebaʒeebtʰan da tsʰodvilebtʰan ertʰad 
xolo man ɡaiɡona es da utʰxra matʰ mkurnali dʒanmrtʰelebs ki ara sneulebs scirdebatʰ 
tsaditʰ da istsavletʰ ras niʃnavs tsqaloba msurs da ara msxverpli martʰaltʰa ki ara tsʰodviltʰa mosaxmobad movedi 
maʃin mividnen mastʰan ioanes motsapʰeebi da utʰxres ratom aris rom tʃven da pʰarisevlebi vmarxulobtʰ ʃeni motsapʰeebi ki ar marxuloben 
utʰxra matʰ iesom ɡana ʃeudzliatʰ iɡlovon mekʰortsileebma vidre nepʰe matʰtʰan aris maɡram dadɡeba dɣeebi rotsʰa nepʰe tsaertʰmevatʰ da maʃin imarxuleben 
aravin daakerebs dzvel tanisamoss axaltʰaxal kʰsovilis sakerebels vinaidan axlad dakerebuli moexeva samosels da uaresad ɡamoixeva 
artsʰ axal ɣvinos tʃaasxamen dzvel tikebʃi tʰorem tikebi daskdeba ɣvinotsʰ daiɣvreba da tikebitsʰ moispoba aramed axal ɣvinos axal tikebʃi asxamen da orive ɡadartʃeba 
rotsʰa matʰ amas elaparakeboda mivida mastʰan ertʰi mtʰavari tʰaqvani stsʰa da utʰxra tʃemi kʰaliʃvili esesaa mokvda maɡram modi ʃeni xeli daade mas da ɡatsʰotsʰxldeba 
tsamodɡa ieso ɡahqva mas da mastʰan ertʰad misi motsapʰeebitsʰ 
aha ertʰi kʰali romelitsʰ tʰormet tselitsads itandʒeboda sisxlisdenitʰ uknidan miuaxlovda da ʃeexo misi samoslis kaltʰas 
vinaidan tʰavistʰvis ambobda mis samoselsatsʰ rom ʃevexo ɡanvikurnebio 
xolo ieso mibrunda dainaxa iɡi da utʰxra ɡamxnevdi asulo ʃenma rətsmenam ɡadaɡartʃina da kʰali imave ʒams ɡanikurna 
mivida ieso mtʰavris saxlʃi dainaxa ikʰ mestvireebi da ʃetʃotʃkʰolebuli xalxi 
utʰxra matʰ tsaditʰ akʰedan radɡan ɡoɡona ar momkvdara aramed sdzinavs da sasatsʰilod aiɡdes iɡi 
rotsʰa xalxi ɡaiqvanes is ʃevida xeli mohkida xelze da tsamodɡa ɡoɡona 
da mtʰel im mxares moedo es ambavi 
rotsʰa ieso ikʰidan modioda ori brma aedevna qvirodnen da ambobdnen ʃeɡvitsqale davitʰis dzeo
