saxlʃi ʃesuls miadɡnen brmebi da utʰxra matʰ iesom ɡtsamtʰ rom me ʃemidzlia amis ɡaketʰeba utʰxres mas ki upʰalo 
maʃin ʃeexo matʰs tʰvalebs da utʰxra tʰkʰveni rətsmenisamebr moɡeɡotʰ 
da aexilatʰ matʰ tʰvalebi iesom ki mkatsʰrad ɡaapʰrətʰxila isini da utʰxra itsʰodetʰ aravin ɡaiɡos 
matʰ ki rotsʰa ɡavidnen mtʰel im kʰveqanas mosdes misi ambavi 
isini rom ɡavidnen mouqvanes mas eʃmakeuli mundʒi katsʰi 
rotsʰa eʃmaki ɡanidevna mundʒma ena amoidɡa ɡakvirvebuli xalxi ambobda asetʰi ram arasodes ar momxdarao israelʃi 
pʰarisevlebi ki ambobdnen eʃmaktʰa mtʰavritʰ devnis eʃmakebso 
dadioda ieso qvela kʰalakʰsa da sopʰelʃi astsavlida matʰ sinaɡoɡebʃi kʰadaɡebda sasupʰevlis saxarebas kurnavda qovelɡvar sens da qovelɡvar udzlurebas 
xalxis brbo rom dainaxa ʃeebrala isini vinaidan daudzlurebulni da dapʰantulni iqvnen roɡortsʰ umtsqemso tsʰxvari 
maʃin tʰavis motsapʰeebs utʰxra samkali bevria muʃakni ki tsʰota 
amitom evedretʰ samklis upʰals rom ɡamoɡzavnos muʃakni tʰavis samkalʃi 
moutsoda tʰavis tʰormet motsapʰes da mistsʰa matʰ xelmtsipʰeba aratsmida sulebze rom ɡanedevnatʰ isini da ɡanekurnatʰ qovelɡvari seni da qovelɡvari udzlureba 
esenia im tʰormeti motsʰikʰulis saxelebi pirveli simoni petred tsodebuli da andria misi dzma iakob zebedes dze da misi dzma ioane 
pʰilipe da bartʰlome tʰoma da matʰe mebaʒe iakob alpʰes dze da lebeosi romelsatsʰ etsoda tʰadeozi 
simon kananeli da iuda iskarioteli romelmatsʰ ɡastsʰa iɡi 
es tʰormeti miavlina iesom daariɡa da utʰxra tsarmartʰtʰa ɡzaze ar iarotʰ da samarieltʰa kʰalakʰʃi ar ʃexvidetʰ 
aramed tsaditʰ israelis saxlis dakarɡul tsʰxvrebtʰan 
rotsʰa mixvaltʰ ikʰadaɡetʰ rom moaxloebulia tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli 
sneulni ɡankurnetʰ mkvdrebi aɣadɡinetʰ ketʰrovanni ɡantsmidetʰ eʃmakebi ɡandevnetʰ usasqidlod miɡiɣiatʰ da usasqidlodve ɡaetsʰitʰ 
nu tsaiɣebtʰ tʰan nurtsʰ okʰros nurtsʰ vertsʰxls nurtsʰ spilendzs tʰkʰveni sartqlebitʰ 
nurtsʰ ɡudas ɡzaʃi nurtsʰ or samosels nurtsʰ pʰexsatsʰmels nurtsʰ xeldʒoxs vinaidan mʃromeli tʰavisi sazrdos ɣirsia 
romel kʰalakʰʃi an sopʰelʃitsʰ ar unda ʃexvidetʰ ɡamoikitʰxetʰ vin aris ikʰ ɣirseuli da ikʰ dartʃitʰ vidre ɡamoxvidodetʰ 
saxlʃi ʃesvlisas miesalmetʰ mas da utʰxaritʰ mʃvidoba am saxls 
tʰu saxli ɣirsi ikʰneba tʰkʰveni mʃvidoba miuva mas xolo tʰu ar ikʰneba ɣirsi tʰkʰveni mʃvidoba tʰkʰvenve daɡibrundebatʰ 
vintsʰ ar miɡiɣebtʰ tʰkʰven da artsʰ moismenen tʰkʰvens sitqvebs maʃin saxlidan an kʰalakʰidan ɡamosvlisas tʃamoibertqetʰ mtveri tʰkʰvens pʰerxtʰaɡan 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven sodomisa da ɡomoras mitsas upʰro ɡauadvildeba ɡankitʰxvis dɣes vidre im kʰalakʰs 
aha me miɡavlentʰ tʰkʰven roɡortsʰ tsʰxvrebs mɡeltʰa ʃoris maʃ iqavitʰ ɡonierni roɡortsʰ ɡvelni da umankoni roɡortsʰ mtredni 
moeridetʰ adamianebs vinaidan isini miɡtsʰemen samartʰalʃi da tʰaviantʰ sinaɡoɡebʃi ɡaɡʃoltaven tʰkʰven 
tsaɡiqvanen ɡanmɡeblebtʰan da mepʰeebtʰan tʃems ɡamo matʰtʰvis da tsarmartʰtʰatʰvis dasamotsmeblad 
xolo rotsʰa ɡadaɡtsʰemen tʰkʰven nu izrunebtʰ ra vtʰkʰvatʰ an roɡor vtʰkʰvatʰo vinaidan maʃin moɡetsʰematʰ ratsʰ unda tʰkʰvatʰ 
vinaidan tʰkʰven ki ar ilaparakebtʰ aramed tʰkʰveni mamis suli ilaparakebs tʰkʰvenʃi 
dzma dzmas ɡadastsʰems sasikvdilod da mama ʃvils aɣdɡebian ʃvilebi mʃoblebis tsinaaɣmdeɡ da daxotsʰaven matʰ 
qvelasɡan modzulebulni ikʰnebitʰ tʃemi saxelis ɡamo bolomde momtʰmeni ki ɡadartʃeba 
rotsʰa ertʰ kʰalakʰʃi devnas daɡitsqeben meorisaken ɡaikʰetsʰitʰ ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven ver moastsrebtʰ israelis kʰalakʰebis ʃemovlas rom katsʰis dzetsʰ mova 
motsapʰe modzɣvarze meti araa artsʰ monaa tʰavis batonze meti 
sakmarisia motsapʰisatʰvis isetʰi iqos roɡortsʰ misi modzɣvaria da monisatʰvis roɡortsʰ misi batonia tʰu saxlis patrons belzebuli utsodes mitʰ umetes misi odʒaxis tsevrebs ara 
amitom nu ɡeʃiniatʰ matʰi vinaidan arapʰeria dapʰaruli rom ar ɡatsʰxaddes da damaluli rom ar ɡamʒɣavndes 
rasatsʰ tʰkʰven sibneleʃi ɡeubnebitʰ sinatʰleze ilaparaketʰ da rasatsʰ quritʰ moismentʰ erdoebze ikʰadaɡetʰ 
nu ɡeʃiniatʰ matʰi vintsʰ sxeuls klaven sulis mokvla ki ar dzaludztʰ upʰro metad misi ɡeʃinodetʰ visatsʰ sulis daɣupvatsʰ ʃeudzlia ɡeenaʃi da sxeulisatsʰ 
ɡana ori beɣura ertʰ asarad ar iqideba maɡram artsʰ ertʰi matʰɡani ar daetsʰema mitsaze tʰkʰveni mamis nebis ɡareʃe 
xolo tʰkʰven tʰavze tʰmebitsʰ ki datʰvlilia 
nu ɡeʃiniatʰ bevr beɣuraze uketʰesni xartʰ 
qvelas vintsʰ me maɣiarebs adamiantʰa tsinaʃe imas metsʰ vaɣiareb tʃemi zetsʰieri mamis tsinaʃe 
vintsʰ uarmqopʰs me adamiantʰa tsinaʃe mas metsʰ uarvqopʰ tʃemi zetsʰieri mamis tsinaʃe 
nu ɡɡoniatʰ tʰitʰkʰos mitsaze mʃvidobis mosatanad movedi mʃvidobis ki ara maxvilis mosatanad movedi 
radɡan movedi ratʰa ɡavqo katsʰi tʰavis mamisaɡan asuli tʰavis dedisaɡan da rdzali tʰavis dedamtʰilisaɡan 
katsʰis mtrebi misi ʃinaurebi ikʰnebian 
visatsʰ mama an deda tʃemze metad uqvars iɡi ar aris tʃemi ɣirsi da visatsʰ dze an asuli tʃemze metad uqvars iɡi ar aris tʃemi ɣirsi 
vintsʰ ar aiɣebs tʰavis dʒvars da ar ɡamomqveba ar aris tʃemi ɣirsi 
tʰavisi sulis mompovebeli daɣupavs mas xolo tʰavisi sulis tʃems ɡamo damɣupveli hpovebs mas 
vintsʰ tʰkʰven miɡiɣebtʰ me mimiɣebs vintsʰ me mimiɣebs tʃems momavlinebels miiɣebs 
vintsʰ tsinastsarmetqvels miiɣebs tsinastsarmetqvelis saxelitʰ tsinastsarmetqvelis sazɣaurs miiɣebs da vintsʰ martʰals miiɣebs martʰlis saxelitʰ martʰlis sazɣaurs miiɣebs 
vintsʰ ʃeasmevs ertʰs am mtsʰiretʰaɡans tʰundatsʰ ertʰ sasmis tsʰiv tsqals motsapʰis saxelitʰ ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven mas ar daekarɡeba tʰavisi sazɣauri 
rotsʰa daamtʰavra iesom tʰavisi tʰormeti motsapʰis dariɡeba tsavida ikʰidan matʰ kʰalakʰebʃi dasamodzɣvrad da sakʰadaɡeblad 
xolo ioanem sapqrobileʃi ɡaiɡo kʰristes sakʰmeni da tʰavisi motsapʰeebi ɡauɡzavna 
rom etʰkʰvatʰ mistʰvis ʃena xar is vintsʰ unda movides tʰu sxvas unda velodotʰ 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ tsaditʰ moaxsenetʰ ioanes rasatsʰ ismentʰ da xedavtʰ 
brmebi xedaven da xeibrebi dadian ketʰrovnebi itsmidebian da qruebs esmitʰ mkvdrebi dɡebian da ɣatakebs exarebatʰ 
netaria vintsʰ ar ʃetsʰdeba tʃemʃi 
rotsʰa isini midiodnen iesom dautsqo laparaki xalxs ioaneze ris sanaxavad ɡaxveditʰ udabnoʃi kʰarisaɡan ʃerxeuli lertsmisa 
aba ristʰvis ɡaxveditʰ pʰapʰukad ʃemosili katsʰis sanaxavad pʰapʰukad ʃemosilebi mepʰetʰa sasaxleebʃi imqopʰebian 
aba ristʰvis ɡaxveditʰ tsinastsarmetqvelis sanaxavad aba ɡetqvitʰ tʰkʰven tsinastsarmetqvelze metisatsʰ 
vinaidan es is aris viszedatsʰ datserilia aha me vɡzavni ʃens tsinaʃe tʃems anɡelozs romelitsʰ ɡanamzadebs ʃens ɡzas ʃens tsinaʃe 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven dedakatsʰtʰaɡan naʃobtʰa ʃoris ar aɣmdɡara ioane natʰlismtsʰemelze didi maɡram tsʰatʰa sasupʰevelʃi umtsʰiresi masze didia 
ioane natʰlismtsʰemlis dɣidan akʰamde tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli dzalisxmevitʰ aiɣeba da dzalismxmevelni tsaritatsʰeben mas 
vinaidan qvela tsinastsarmetqveli da rdʒuli ioanemde tsinastsarmetqvelebdnen 
tʰu miɣeba ɡsurtʰ is aris elia romelitsʰ unda movides 
visatsʰ qurebi akʰvs isminos 
maɡram vis vamsɡavso es modɡma iɡi tsaaɡavs bavʃvebs romlebitsʰ moednebze sxedan da ɡasdzaxian tʰaviantʰ amxanaɡebs 
da eubnebian salamurs ɡikravditʰ da ar tsʰekvavditʰ ɡiɡodebditʰ da ar iɡlovetʰ 
movida ioane artsʰ cams artsʰ svams da amboben eʃmaki hqavso 
movida katsʰis dze cams da svams da amboben aha katsʰi mcameli da ɣvinis msmeli mebaʒetʰa da tsʰodviltʰa meɡobari sibrədzne ki sakʰmeebitʰ martʰldeba 
maʃin itsqo iesom im kʰalakʰebis qvedreba sadatsʰ qvelaze metad ɡamovlinda misi dzalni imis ɡamo rom ar moinanies 
vai ʃen kʰorazino da vai ʃen betʰsaidav vinaidan tvirossa da tsʰidonʃi rom momxdariqo dzalni romlebitsʰ tʰkʰventʰan moxda isini didi xnis tsinatʰ dzadzebʃi da natsʰarʃi moinaniebdnen 
maɡram ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tvirossa da tsʰidons upʰro ɡauadvildebatʰ ɡankitʰxvis dɣes vidre tʰkʰven 
ʃen ki kapernaumo ɡana tsʰamde amaɣldebi dʒodʒoxetʰamde daeʃvebi vinaidan sodomʃi rom momxdariqo is dzalni ʃenʃi rom moxda iɡi am dɣemde idɡeboda 
xolo ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom sodomis mitsas upʰro ɡauadvildeba ɡankitʰxvis dɣes vidre ʃen 
maʃin tʰkʰva iesom ɡadideb ʃen mamao upʰalo tsʰisa da mitsisao radɡan daupʰare es brdzentʰa da ɡoniertʰ da ɡanutsʰxade tʃvilebs 
he mamao vinaidan asetʰi iqo ʃeni neba 
qovelive tʃemi mamis mier ɡadmometsʰa me da aravin itsʰnobs dzes ɡarda mamisa artsʰ mamas itsʰnobs vinme ɡarda dzisa da imisa visatsʰ dzes surs rom ɡamoutsʰxados 
moditʰ tʃemtʰan qovelno maʃvralno da tvirtʰmdzimeno da me moɡasvenebtʰ tʰkʰven 
itvirtʰetʰ tʃemi uɣeli da istsavletʰ tʃemɡan vinaidan me mʃvidi da tʰavmdabali var da hpovebtʰ sulis simʃvides 
vinaidan tʃemi uɣeli advilia da tʃemi tvirtʰi msubukʰi 
imxanad iesom qanebze ɡadaiara ʃabatʰ dɣes xolo mis motsapʰeebs moʃivdatʰ da itsqes tʰavtʰavebis tsqveta da cama 
pʰarisevlebma dainaxes es da utʰxres mas aha ʃeni motsapʰeebi imas aketʰeben ris ɡaketʰebatsʰ ʃabatʰ dɣes ar ʃeidzleba 
man ki utʰxra matʰ nutʰu ar tsaɡikitʰxavtʰ ra kʰna davitʰma rotsʰa moʃivda mas da mis mxleblebs 
roɡor ʃevida ɣvtʰis saxlʃi da cama satsinaʃeo purebi ratsʰ artsʰ mas unda ecama da artsʰ mis mxleblebs aramed mxoloddamxolod mɣvdlebs 
anda ar amoɡikitʰxavtʰ rdʒulʃi rom ʃabatʰobitʰ tadzarʃi mɣvdlebi texen ʃabatʰs maɡram ubraloni arian 
tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ rom akʰ aris is vintsʰ tadzarze metia 
rom ɡtsʰodnodatʰ ras niʃnavs tsqaloba mnebavs da ara msxvepli maʃin aɣar daadebditʰ msdʒavrs ubraloebs 
vinaidan katsʰis dze ʃabatʰis upʰalitsʰ aris 
da tsavida ikʰidan da mivida matʰ sinaɡoɡaʃi 
da aha iqo ikʰ xelɡamxmari katsʰi da hkitʰxes mas ratʰa brali daedotʰ mistʰvis ʃeidzleba tʰu ara ɡankurneba ʃabatʰs 
xolo man utʰxra matʰ romelime tʰkʰventʰaɡans ertʰi tsʰxvari rom hqavdes da ʃabatʰs ormoʃi tʃauvardes ar tʃaavlebs xels da ar amoiqvans 
adamiani ki ramdenad uketʰesia tsʰxvarze amitom ʃeidzleba ʃabatʰs siketʰis ketʰeba 
maʃin utʰxra im katsʰs ɡaitsode ʃeni xeli manatsʰ ɡaitsoda da isetʰive saɣi ɡauxda roɡortsʰ meore 
pʰarisevelni ki ɡamovidnen da moitʰatʰbires mis tsinaaɣmdeɡ tʰu roɡor daeɣupatʰ iɡi iesom ʃeitqo da ikʰaurobas ɡaetsʰala 
diddzali xalxi misdevda mas da qvela ɡankurna 
da aukrdzala matʰ amis ɡaxmaureba 
ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo esaia tsinastsarmetqvelis natʰkʰvami romelitsʰ ambobs 
aha msaxuri tʃemi romelitsʰ me amovirtʃie saqvareli tʃemi romelitsʰ moitsona tʃemma sulma tʃems suls davdeb masze da is autsqebs sasdʒels tsarmartʰebs 
ar idavebs da artsʰ iqvirebs da kʰutʃebʃitsʰ veravin ɡaiɡonebs mis xmas 
ɡadatexil lertsams ar daletsavs da mbʒutav patrukʰs ar tʃaakʰrobs vidre ɡankitʰxvas ɡamardʒvebamde ar miiqvans 
da mis saxels miendobian tsarmartʰebi 
maʃin moiqvanes mastʰan eʃmakeuli brma da mundʒi da man ɡankurna iɡi ise rom brma da mundʒi xedavda da laparakobda 
mtʰeli xalxi ɡakvirvebuli iqo da ambobda nutʰu es davitʰis dzea 
xolo pʰarisevlebma rom moismines es tʰkʰves namdvilad eʃmaktʰa mtʰavris belzebelis dzalitʰ devniso eʃmakebs 
iesom rotsʰa dainaxa matʰi pʰikʰrebi utʰxra matʰ qoveli samepʰo tʰavis tʰavis tsinaaɣmdeɡ ɡaqopʰili ɡaudaburdeba da qoveli kʰalakʰi an saxli romelitsʰ ɡaiqopʰa tʰavistʰavis tsinaaɣmdeɡ ver ɡadzlebs 
da tʰu satana satanas sdevnis tʰavisi tʰavis tsinaaɣmdeɡ ɡaiqopʰa roɡorɣa ɡadzlebs misi samepʰo 
tʰu me belzebelitʰ vdevni eʃmakebs tʰkʰveni dzeni viɣatʰi devnian amitom isini ikʰnebian tʰkʰveni msadʒulebi 
tʰu me ɣvtʰis sulitʰ vdevni eʃmakebs aba mosula tʰkʰventʰan ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli 
anda roɡor ʃedzlebs vinme ʃevides dzlieris saxlʃi da ɡaitatsʰos misi nivtʰebi tʰu dʒer dzliers ar ɡatʰokavs da maʃin ɡadzartsʰvavs mis saxls 
vintsʰ tʃemtʰan ar aris is tʃemi tsinaaɣmdeɡia da vintsʰ tʃemtʰan ar aɡrovebs is pʰantavs 
amitom ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven qoveli tsʰodva da ɡmoba mietevebatʰ adamianebs maɡram sulitsmidis ɡmoba ar mietevebatʰ 
vintsʰ sitqvas itqvis katsʰis dzis tsinaaɣmdeɡ mieteveba mas maɡram tʰu vinme itqvis sulitsmidis tsinaaɣmdeɡ ar mieteveba mas artsʰ am sopʰlad artsʰ momavalʃi 
an xetsʰ karɡad stsʰanitʰ da misi naqopʰitsʰ an xetsʰ tsʰudad stsʰanitʰ da misi naqopʰitsʰ vinaidan xe naqopʰitʰ ʃeitsʰnoba 
ikʰednetʰa naʃobno roɡor ʃeɡidzliatʰ ilaparakotʰ ketʰili rotsʰa borotebi xartʰ radɡan ɡulis sisavsisɡan metqvelebs piri 
ketʰil katsʰs ketʰili saɡandzuridan siketʰe ɡamoakʰvs borot katsʰs boroti saɡandzuridan boroteba ɡamoakʰvs 
tʰkʰven ki ɡeubnebitʰ rom qoveli pʰuci sitqvisatʰvis romelsatsʰ itqvian adamianebi pasuxs aɡeben ɡankitʰxvis dɣes 
vinaidan ʃeni sitqvebitʰ ɡamartʰldebi da ʃenive sitqvebitʰ ɡamtqundebi 
maʃin miuɡo mas zoɡiertʰma mtsiɡnobarma da pʰarisevelma modzɣvaro ɡvinda niʃani vixilotʰ ʃenɡan 
xolo man miuɡo pasuxad boroti da mruʃi modɡma edzebs niʃans maɡram niʃani ar mietsʰema mas ɡarda iona tsinastsarmetqvelis niʃnisa 
vinaidan roɡortsʰ iona iqo didi tʰevzis mutsʰelʃi sam dɣesa da sam ɣames aseve katsʰis dze ikʰneba sam dɣesa da sam ɣames mitsis ɡulʃi 
ninevielebi aɣdɡebian samsdʒavroze am modɡmastʰan ertʰad da msdʒavrs dasdeben mas vinaidan matʰ moinanies ionas kʰadaɡebitʰ da aha akʰ aris ionaze didi 
samxretʰis dedopʰali aɣdɡeba samsdʒavroze am modɡmastʰan ertʰad da msdʒavrs dasdebs mas vinaidan iɡi mitsis kididan movida solomonis sibrədznis mosasmenad da aha akʰ aris solomonze didi 
rotsʰa aratsmida suli ɡamodis adamianidan dadis urtsqulebʃi simʃvidis sadzebnelad da ver poulobs 
mere ambobs davbrundebi tʃems saxlʃi saidanatsʰ ɡamovedi rotsʰa miva ipovis mas tsʰariels daɡvilsa da movlils 
maʃin tsava da tʰan moiqvans ʃvid sxva suls tʰavisze uborotess ʃevlen da daisadɡureben ikʰ da im katsʰisatʰvis ukanaskneli dɣe pirvelze uaresi ikʰneba ase daemartʰeba am borot modɡmasatsʰ 
rotsʰa is xalxs elaparakeboda ɡaretʰ idɡnen misi deda da dzmebi romelnitsʰ salaparakod edzebdnen mas 
viɣatsʰam utʰxra mas aha dedaʃeni da ʃeni dzmebi dɡanan ɡaretʰ ʃentʰan laparaki surtʰ 
man ki miuɡo da utʰxra amis mtʰkʰmels vin aris dedatʃemi da vin arian tʃemi dzmebi 
xelitʰ utʃvena tʰavis motsapʰeebze da tʰkʰva aha dedatʃemi da tʃemi dzmebi 
vinaidan vintsʰ tʃemi zetsʰieri mamis nebas aɣasrulebs is aris tʃemi dzmatsʰ datsʰ da dedatsʰ 
im dɣes ɡamovida ieso saxlidan da dadʒda zɣvis piras 
diddzali xalxi moɡrovda mastʰan ise rom iɡi ʃevida da tʃadʒda navʃi xolo mtʰeli xalxi napirze idɡa 
bevrs astsavlida matʰ iɡavebitʰ da eubneboda aha ɡamovida mtʰesveli dasatʰesad 
tʰesvisas zoɡi martsʰvali ɡzispiras davarda movidnen pʰrinvelebi da akenkes iɡi 
zoɡi kldovanze datsʰvivda sadatsʰ mitsa bevri ar iqo da male aɣmotsʰenda vinaidan niadaɡs siɣrme ar hkʰonda 
xolo mze rom amovida dackna da raki pʰesvi ar hkʰonda ɡaxma 
zoɡi eklebʃi tʃatsʰvivda ɡaizarda eklebi da ɡaatʃanaɡa isini 
zoɡi ki karɡ mitsaze davarda da naqopʰi ɡamoiɣo zoɡma asi zoɡma samotsʰi da zoɡma otsʰdaatʰi 
visatsʰ qurebi akʰvs isminos 
mividnen mastʰan motsapʰeebi da utʰxres mas ratom elaparakebi matʰ iɡavebitʰ 
man pasuxad utʰxra matʰ imitom rom tʰkʰven motsʰemuli ɡakʰvtʰ tsʰodna tsʰatʰa sasupʰevlis saidumloebatʰa matʰ ki ara akʰvtʰ es mitsʰemuli 
vinaidan visatsʰ akʰvs mas mietsʰema da ekʰneba uxvad da visatsʰ ara akʰvs isitsʰ tsaertʰmeva ratsʰ akʰvs 
iɡavebitʰ imitom velaparakebi matʰ rom isini uqureben da ver xedaven usmenen da ar esmitʰ da ver xvdebian 
sruldeba matʰze esaias tsinastsarmetqveleba romelitsʰ ambobs smenitʰ moismentʰ maɡram ver mixvdebitʰ xilvitʰ ixilavtʰ maɡram ver dainaxavtʰ 
radɡan daexʃo am xalxs ɡuli quritʰ mdzimed esmitʰ da daxuces tʰvalebi rom tʰvalitʰ ar dainaxon da quritʰ ar moisminon ɡulitʰ ar ɡaiɡon da ar moikʰtsʰnen ratʰa ɡanvkurno isini 
xolo netar arian tʰkʰveni tʰvalebi rom xedaven da tʰkʰveni qurebi rom ismenen 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom mraval tsinastsarmetqvelsa da martʰals surda exila is rasatsʰ tʰkʰven xedavtʰ maɡram ver ixiles da esminatʰ rasatsʰ tʰkʰven ismentʰ maɡram ver moismines 
xolo tʰkʰven moisminetʰ mtʰesvelis iɡavi 
qvelas visatsʰ esmis sitqva sasupʰevelze da ver xvdeba miuva boroti da mostatsʰebs mis ɡulʃi tʃatʰesils ai ras niʃnavs ɡzispiras datʰesili 
xolo kldovanze datʰesili is aris vintsʰ sitqvas moismens da maʃinve sixarulitʰ miiɣebs mas 
maɡram pʰesvebi ara akʰvs tʰavisʃi da xanmoklea raʒams dadɡeba ɡasaciri anda devna sitqvis ɡamo maʃinve tsʰdundeba 
xolo eklebʃi datʰesili is aris vintsʰ sitqvas ismens maɡram sopʰlis sazrunavi da simdidris satsʰduri atʃanaɡeben sitqvas da iɡi unaqopʰo ʃeikʰmneba 
xolo karɡ mitsaze datʰesili is aris vintsʰ moismens sitqvas da ɡonebitʰ tʃastsvdeba da stsored is aris naqopʰieri da zoɡi ass ɡamoiɣebs zoɡi samotsʰs da zoɡitsʰ otsʰdaatʰs 
sxva iɡavi miatsoda matʰ da utʰxra tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli hɡavs adamians romelmatsʰ karɡi tʰesli datʰesa tʰavis qanaʃi 
rotsʰa xalxs edzina movida misi mteri xorbalʃi ɣvardzli tʃatʰesa da tsavida 
xolo rotsʰa dʒedʒili amovida da naqopʰi ɡamoiɣo ɣvardzlmatsʰ maʃin itʃina tʰavi 
mividnen monebi da utʰxres saxlis patrons batono ɡana ʃen karɡi tʰesli ar datʰese ʃens qanaʃi saidanɣa akʰvs mas ɣvardzli 
man ki utʰxra matʰ mterma katsʰma ɡaaketʰa es xolo monebma utʰxres mas ɡinda tsavaltʰ da ɡavmarɡlavtʰ 
man tʰkʰva ara ratʰa ɡamarɡvlisas ɣvardzltʰan ertʰad xorbalitsʰ ar ɡaɡlidʒotʰ 
daatsʰadetʰ ertʰad izardos orivem mkis dromde mkis dros ki vetqvi momkaltʰ dʒer ɣvardzli moaɡrovetʰ da dznebad ʃehkaritʰ rom datsvatʰ isini xorbali ki tʃems beɣelʃi ʃeaɡrovetʰ 
sxva iɡavi miatsoda matʰ da utʰxra tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli tsaaɡavs mdoɡvis martsʰvals romelitsʰ aiɣo katsʰma da datʰesa tʰavis bostanʃi 
iɡi qovelɡvar tʰeslze mtsʰirea maɡram rotsʰa izrdeba qovel mtsvanileulze didia da xed ikʰtsʰeva ise rom mopʰrindebian tsʰis pʰrinvelebi da mis totebʃi pouloben tʰavʃesapʰars 
mere sxva iɡavi utʰxra matʰ tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli tsaaɡavs sapʰuars romelitsʰ dedakatsʰma aiɣo da dapʰara sam tsqva pʰkʰvilʃi vidre mtʰlianad ar ɡapʰuvda 
qovelive amas iɡavebitʰ eubneboda ieso xalxs da iɡavis ɡareʃe arapʰers eubneboda 
ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo tsinastsarmetqvelis mier natʰkʰvami romelitsʰ ambobs iɡavebitʰ ɡavxsni tʃems pirs vitqvi ratsʰ dasabamidan dapʰarulia 
maʃin ɡauʃva iesom is xalxi da ʃin ʃevida mividnen mastʰan motsapʰeebi da utʰxres ɡaɡvimarte qanis ɣvardzlis iɡavi 
man miuɡo da utʰxra ketʰili tʰeslis mtʰesveli katsʰis dzea 
saqane ki sopʰelia ketʰili tʰesli sasupʰevlis dzeni arian xolo ɣvardzli borotis dzeni 
xolo mteri romelmatsʰ is datʰesa aris eʃmaki mka ki aris sopʰlis aɣsasruli xolo momkalni anɡelozebi arian 
amitom roɡortsʰ ɣvardzls aɡroveben da tsʰetsʰxlʃi tsvaven aseve ikʰneba sopʰlis dasasruls 
vinaidan moavlens katsʰis dze tʰavis anɡelozebs da moaɡroveben misi samepʰodan qovel satsʰdursa da urdʒuloebis mokʰmeds 
da tʃaqrian matʰ tsʰetsʰxlis kʰuraʃi ikʰneba ikʰ tirili da kbiltʰa ɣrcena 
maʃin martʰalni mzesavitʰ ɡabrətsqindebian tʰaviantʰi mamis sasupʰevelʃi visatsʰ qurebi akʰvs isminos 
tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli tsaaɡavs ɡandzs mindorʃi dapʰaruls romelsatsʰ tsaatsqdeba katsʰi da tʃamalavs sixarulitʰ midis da qidis qovelives ratsʰ abadia da qidulobs im mindors 
kidev tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli tsaaɡavs vacars romelitsʰ lamaz marɡalitebs edzebs 
rotsʰa tsaatsqdeba ertʰ dzvirpʰas marɡalits tsava ɡaqidis qvelapʰers ratsʰ abadia da imas ʃeidzens 
kidev tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli tsaaɡavs bades romelsatsʰ zɣvaʃi moisvrian da qovelnairi saxis tʰevzs iceren 
rotsʰa ivseba ɡamoakʰvtʰ napirze mere dasxdebian karɡebs curcelʃi moatʰavseben xolo tsʰudebs ɡaretʰ ɡadaqrian 
aseve ikʰneba sopʰlis aɣsasrulis dros ɡamovlen anɡelozebi da ɡanatsʰalkeveben borotebs martʰlebisaɡan 
da tʃaqrian matʰ tsʰetsʰxlis kʰuraʃi ikʰneba ikʰ tirili da kbiltʰa ɣrcena 
tʰu ɡaiɡetʰ qovelive es diaxo miuɡes mas 
man ki utʰxra matʰ amitom qoveli mtsiɡnobari romelitsʰ tsʰatʰa sasupʰevlis motsapʰe ɡaxda tsaaɡavs adamians saxlis patrons romelsatsʰ tʰavisi saundʒidan ɡamoakʰvs dzveli da axali 
iɡavebi rom daasrula iesom ikʰaurobas ɡaetsʰala 
mivida tʰavis samʃobloʃi da astsavlida matʰ tʰaviantʰ sinaɡoɡaʃi ise rom ukvirdatʰ da ambobdnen saidana akʰvs mas es sibrədzne da sastsaulebi 
ɡana es xuros dze ar aris dedamiss ɡana mariami ara hkʰvia mis dzmebs ki iakobi da iose simoni da iuda 
ɡana misi debi qvelani tʃvens ʃoris ar arian saidan akʰvs amas qovelive es 
da ʃebrkoldnen mis ɡamo iesom ki utʰxra matʰ tsinastsarmetqveli arsad ar aris upatiod ɡarda tʰavisi samʃoblosi da sakutʰari saxlisa 
da ar mouxdenia ikʰ bevri sastsauli matʰi urtsmunoebis ɡamo 
im dros esma herodes tetrarkʰs iesos ambavi 
da utʰxra tʰavis msaxurebs es ioane natʰlismtsʰemelia mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡa da amitom sastsaulni mokʰmedeben masʃi 
vinaidan herodem ʃeipqro ioane ʃeborka da sapqrobileʃi tʃasva tʰavisi dzmis pʰilipes tsʰolis herodias ɡamo 
vinaidan ioane eubneboda mas ʃentʰvis nebadartʰuli ar aris misi qola 
da undoda misi mokvla maɡram xalxisa eʃinoda radɡan tsinastsarmetqvelad miatʃndatʰ iɡi 
herodes dabadebis dɣes herodias asulma itsʰekva ʃekrebiltʰa tsinaʃe da aama herodes 
amitom pʰitsʰitʰ ʃehpirda mas mietsʰa ratsʰ ar unda etʰxova 
xolo man tʰavisi dedisaɡan dariɡebulma utʰxra mometsʰi akʰ lanɡritʰ ioane natʰlismtsʰemlis tʰavi 
da ʃetsuxda mepʰe maɡram pʰitsʰisa da tʰanameinaxetʰa ridis ɡamo brdzana mitsʰema 
da tsarɡzavna da ioanesatʰvis tʰavi moakvetʰina sapqrobileʃi 
da moitanes misi tʰavi lanɡritʰ da mistsʰes kʰaliʃvils man ki tʰavis dedas miartʰva 
da movidnen misi motsapʰeebi tsaiɣes misi neʃti da damarxes mividnen da autsqes iesos 
es rom iesom moismina tsavida ikʰidan navitʰ da ertʰ udabur adɡilas ɡanmartovda da es rom xalxma ɡaiɡo pʰexitʰ ɡaedevna mas kʰalakʰebidan 
ɡamovida da uamravi xalxi rom dainaxa ʃeebrala isini da ɡankurna matʰi sneulebi 
rotsʰa mosaɣamovda mividnen mastʰan motsapʰeebi da utʰxres akʰ udabno adɡilia ʒamitsʰ ɡviania ɡauʃvi es xalxi rom tsavidnen sopʰlebʃi da sacmeli iqidon tʰavistʰvis 
iesom ki utʰxra matʰ ar aris saciro matʰi tsasvla tʰkʰven mietsʰitʰ sacmeli 
matʰ utʰxres tʃven akʰ mxolod xutʰi puri da ori tʰevzi ɡvakʰvs 
man utʰxra akʰ momitanetʰ 
da ubrdzana xalxs balaxze damsxdariqvnen aiɣo xutʰi puri da ori tʰevzi zetsʰas axeda akurtʰxa daamtvria da dauriɡa purebi motsapʰeebs motsapʰeebma ki xalxs 
qvelam cama da ɡadzɣa xolo dartʃenili natexebisɡan akripʰes tʰormeti savse ɡodori 
mcameli ki xutʰi atʰasamde katsʰi iqo ɡarda kʰalebisa da bavʃvebisa 
da maʃinve aidzula iesom tʰavisi motsapʰeebi navʃi tʃamsxdariqvnen da masze adre ɡasuliqvnen ɡaɣma vidre is xalxs ɡauʃvebda 
rotsʰa ɡauʃva xalxi mtʰaze avida ratʰa ɡanmartoebitʰ elotsʰa mosaɣamovda da iɡi marto iqo ikʰ 
navi ukve mraval stadionze tsasuliqo xmeletʰidan da talɣebi exetʰkʰebodnen mas radɡan pirkʰari iqo 
ɣamis meotʰxe ɡuʃaɡobisas mivida matʰtʰan ieso pirdapir zɣvaze svlitʰ 
motsapʰeebma zɣvaze mavali rom dainaxes ʃedzrtsundnen da tʰkʰves es motʃvenebaao da ʃiʃisaɡan ʃehqvires 
maɡram ieso mqisve ɡamoelaparaka matʰ da utʰxra ɡamxnevditʰ me var nu ɡeʃiniatʰ 
miuɡo mas petrem da utʰxra upʰalo tʰu es ʃena xar mibrdzane movide ʃentʰan tsqaldatsqal 
utʰxra modi petre ɡadmovida navidan da tsqaldatsqal tsavida ratʰa iesostʰan misuliqo 
maɡram kʰari rom dainaxa ʃeeʃinda tʃadzirva daitsqo da iqvira upʰalo mixseni me 
iesom im tsamsve ɡautsoda xeli amoiqvana da utʰxra ratom daecvdi mtsʰiredmortsmunev 
rotsʰa isini navʃi avidnen kʰari tʃadɡa 
navʃi mqopʰebma tʰaqvani stsʰes mas da utʰxres ceʃmaritad ɣvtʰis dze xar ʃen 
ɡaɣma ɡavidnen da mividnen ɡenesaretʰis kʰveqanaʃi 
im adɡilis xalxma itsʰno iɡi tsarɡzavnes mtʰels im mxares da mohqavdatʰ mastʰan qvela avadmqopʰi 
da evedrebodnen mas rom misi samosis kaltʰas maintsʰ ʃexebodnen da vintsʰ ʃeexo ɡanikurna 
maʃin mividnen iesostʰan ierusalimeli pʰarisevelni da mtsiɡnobarni da utʰxres 
ratom arɣveven ʃeni motsapʰeebi uxutsʰestʰa tʃveulebas radɡan xels ar ibanen puris camis tsin 
man miuɡo da utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰven raɣatom arɣvevtʰ ɣvtʰis mtsʰnebas tʰkʰveni tʃveulebis ɡamo 
vinaidan ɣmertʰma tʰkʰva pativi etsʰi mamas da dedas da mamis an dedis auɡis mtʰkʰmeli sikvdilitʰ mokvdes 
tʰkʰven ki ambobtʰ tʰu vinme etqvis tʰavis mamas an dedas es ʃesatsiravia ritʰatsʰ tʃemɡan unda ɡesarɡeblao 
amitʰ pativs ar stsʰems tʰavis mamas da tʰavis dedas amriɡad tʰkʰven ɡaaukʰmetʰ ɣvtʰis mtsʰneba tʰkʰveni tʃveulebitʰ 
tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰno karɡad tsinastsarmetqvelebda esaia tʰkʰvenze rotsʰa ambobda 
es xalxi pativs mtsʰems baɡeebitʰ matʰi ɡuli ki ʃors aris tʃemɡan 
amaod mtsʰemen tʰaqvans raki adamiantʰa mtsʰnebebs modzɣvrebasavitʰ astsavlian 
moutsoda im xalxs da utʰxra matʰ isminetʰ da ʃeiɡnetʰ 
adamians biltsavs ara pirʃi ʃemavali aramed is ratsʰ piridan ɡamodis es biltsavs adamians 
maʃin mividnen motsapʰeebi da utʰxres mas itsʰi rom pʰarisevlebi am sitqvis mosmenitʰ dabrkoldnen 
man pasuxad utʰxra qoveli nerɡi romelitsʰ tʃemma zetsʰierma mamam ar darɡo dzirpʰesvianad aɣmoipʰxvreba 
moeʃvitʰ matʰ brmebi arian da brmatʰa tsinamdzɣolni xolo tʰu brmas brma mihqavs oriveni ormoʃi tʃatsʰvivdebian 
petrem pasuxad utʰxra mas ɡanɡvimarte es iɡavi 
xolo man utʰxra nutʰu kidev arapʰeri ɡaɡeɡebatʰ 
ar ɡesmitʰ rom qvelapʰeri ratsʰ pirʃi ʃedis mutsʰels ɡaivlis da zarulʃi ɡamodis 
piridan ɡamosuli ki ɡulidan amodis da es aris rom biltsavs adamians 
vinaidan ɡulidan amodis boroti zraxvani mkvlelobani mruʃobani medzaobani kʰurdobani tsʰrumotsmobani ɡmobani 
stsored es biltsavs adamians daubaneli xelitʰ cama ki ar biltsavs adamians 
ɡamovida ikʰidan ieso da mivida tvirosisa da sidonis mxareebʃi 
da aha kʰanaaneli dedakatsʰi ɡamovida im adɡilebidan da ʃehɣaɣada mas ʃemitsqale me upʰalo dzeo davitʰisa tʃemi kʰaliʃvili eʃmakeulia 
sitqvatsʰ ar ɡautsʰia mas motsapʰeebi mividnen mastʰan da stʰxoves ɡauʃvi iɡi radɡan moɡvqviris is tʃven 
man miuɡo da utʰxra me movlinebuli var mxolod israelis saxlis daɣupul tsʰxvrebtʰan 
dedakatsʰi ki miuaxlovda tʰaqvani stsʰa mas da utʰxra miʃvele me upʰalo 
man miuɡo da utʰxra ar aris karɡi rom ʃvilebs tsaartʰva puri da dzaɣlebs ɡadauɡdo 
dedakatsʰma utʰxra diax upʰalo maɡram dzaɣlebitsʰ xom camen namtsʰetsʰebs matʰi batonebis supʰridan rom tsʰviva 
maʃin iesom pasuxad utʰxra hoi dedakatsʰo didia ʃeni rətsmena moɡetsʰes roɡortsʰ ʃen ɡsurs da imave saatʰʃi ɡanikurna misi kʰaliʃvili 
tsavida ikʰidan ieso mivida ɡalileis zɣvastʰan avida mtʰaze da dadʒda ikʰ 
mivida mastʰan diddzali xalxi tʰan hqavdatʰ koclebi brmebi mundʒebi xeibrebi da mravali sxva dasxes mis pʰerxtʰitʰ da man ɡankurna isini 
ise rom ukvirda xalxs rotsʰa xedavda rom mundʒebi alaparakdnen xeibrebi ɡamodʒansaɣdnen koclebma ɡaiares da brmebma dainaxes da adidebdnen israelis ɣmertʰs 
iesom ki mouxmo tʰavis motsapʰeebs da utʰxra mebraleba es xalxi sami dɣe rom tʃemtʰan aris da sacmeli ki arapʰeri akʰvs ar minda matʰi ucmelad ɡaʃveba ratʰa ɡzaʃi ar daudzlurdnen 
utʰxres mas motsapʰeebma udabnoʃi sada ɡvakʰvs imdeni puri rom amdeni xalxi ɡavadzɣotʰ 
utʰxra matʰ iesom ramdeni puri ɡakʰvtʰ matʰ utʰxres ʃvidi da mtsʰireodeni tʰevzi 
da ubrdzana xalxs rom mitsaze damsxdariqvnen 
aiɣo is ʃvidi puri da tʰevzebi madli ʃestsira datexa da dauriɡa tʰavis motsapʰeebs motsapʰeebma ki xalxs 
qvelam cama da ɡadzɣa nartʃeni natexebisaɡan ki ʃvidi savse kalatʰa akripʰes 
mcameli otʰxi atʰasamde katsʰi iqo ɡarda kʰalebisa da bavʃvebisa 
da ɡauʃva xalxi tʃadʒda navʃi da mivida maɡdalas adɡilebʃi 
mividnen mastʰan pʰarisevelni da sadukevelni da ɡamosatsʰdelad stʰxoves etʃvenebina matʰtʰvis niʃani tsʰidan 
man miuɡo da utʰxra matʰ saɣamoxans tʰkʰven ambobtʰ xval motsmendili ikʰneba vinaidan tsʰa tsitʰeliao 
dilitʰ ki dɣes ɡaavdrdeba vinaidan tsʰa mokʰupʰruliao tsʰis piris ɡamotsʰnoba ʃeɡidzliatʰ drois niʃantʰa ki ara 
boroti da mruʃi modɡma edzebs niʃans maɡram niʃani ar mietsʰema mas ɡarda ionas niʃnisa da miatova isini da tsavida 
ɡaɣma ɡadasvlisas mis motsapʰeebs puris tsaɣeba daavitsqdatʰ 
da iesom utʰxra matʰ ixiletʰ moeridetʰ pʰariseveltʰa da sadukeveltʰa sapʰuars 
isini ki ɡulʃi pʰikʰrobdnen da ambobdnen puri ar tsamoɡviɣiao 
itsʰoda es iesom da utʰxra matʰ ras pʰikʰrobtʰ ɡulʃi mtsʰired mortsmuneno puri rom ar tsamoɡiɣiatʰ 
nutʰu kidev ver ɡaɡiɡiatʰ da aɣar ɡaxsovtʰ im xutʰi atʰasis xutʰi puri da ramdeni ɡodori aiɣetʰ 
aɣartsʰ otʰxi atʰasis ʃvidi puri da ramdeni kalatʰi aiɣetʰ 
ratom ver ɡaɡiɡiatʰ rom puris ɡamo ar mitʰkʰvams eridetʰ metʰkʰi pʰariseveltʰa da sadukeveltʰa sapʰuars 
maʃinɣa mixvdnen rom iɡi eubneboda moridebodnen ara puris sapʰuars aramed pʰariseveltʰa da sadukeveltʰa modzɣvrebas 
pʰilipes kesariis mxares rom midiodnen iesom hkitʰxa tʰavis motsapʰeebs ras ambobs xalxi vin ariso katsʰis dze 
matʰ utʰxres zoɡi ambobs ioane natʰlismtsʰemeliao zoɡi eliao da zoɡi ieremia an ertʰi tsinastsarmetqveltʰaɡanio 
utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰven ki ras itqvitʰ vina var me 
simon petrem utʰxra mas pasuxad ʃena xar kʰriste dze tsʰotsʰxali ɣvtʰisa 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra mas netar xar ʃen simon ionas dzev vinaidan ʃen es ɡamoɡitsʰxada ara xortsʰma da sisxlma aramed mamatʃemma romelitsʰ tsʰaʃia 
metsʰ ɡeubnebi ʃen ʃena xar petre da am kldeze avaʃeneb tʃems eklesias da mas ver dadzleven dʒodʒoxetʰis bceni 
moɡtsʰem ʃen tsʰatʰa sasupʰevlis ɡasaɣebebs da rasatsʰ ʃehkrav mitsaze zetsʰaʃitsʰ ʃekruli ikʰneba xolo rasatsʰ ɡaxsni mitsaze ɡaxsnili ikʰneba zetsʰaʃitsʰ 
maʃin ubrdzana motsapʰeebs aravistʰvis ɡaemxilatʰ rom is kʰristea 
mas ʃemdeɡ daitsqo iesom ɡamxela tʰavisi motsapʰeebisatʰvis rom unda tsasuliqo ierusalims da tandʒuliqo mɣvdelmtʰavrebisa da mtsiɡnobrebisaɡan mokluliqo da mesame dɣes aɣmdɡariqo 
petrem ɡaixmo iɡi da ʃeepasuxa ʃeitsqale tʰavi upʰalo numtsʰ qopʰila eɡre 
is ki miubrunda petres da utʰxra momtsʰildi satanav tʃemi satsʰduri xar vinaidan ɣmertʰisaze ki ar laparakob aramed katsʰisaze 
maʃin utʰxra iesom tʰavis motsapʰeebs visatsʰ unda rom momqves uarqos tʰavisi tʰavi aiɣos tʰavisi dʒvari da momdios me 
vinaidan visatsʰ surs tʰavisi suli ɡadaartʃinos is daɣupavs mas xolo vintsʰ tʃemi ɡulistʰvis daɣupavs suls is moipovebs mas 
ra sarɡebeli ekʰneba adamians tʰu mtʰel kʰveqanas ʃeidzens tʰavis suls ki daɣupavs an ras ɡaiɣebs adamiani tʰavisi sulis sanatsʰvlod 
vinaidan mova katsʰis dze tʰavisi mamis didebitʰ tʰavis anɡelozebtʰan ertʰad da maʃin miuzɣavs tʰitʰoeul katsʰs misi namokʰmedaris mixedvitʰ 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven arian zoɡiertʰebi akʰ mdɡomtʰaɡan romlebitsʰ ar iɡemeben sikvdils sanam ar ixilaven katsʰis dzes tʰavisi supʰevitʰ momavals 
ekʰvsi dɣis ʃemdeɡ tsaiqvana iesom petre iakobi da misi dzma ioane da aiqvana isini maɣal mtʰaze ɡanmartoebitʰ 
da pʰeri itsʰvala matʰ tsinaʃe ɡabrətsqinda misi saxe mzesavitʰ xolo misi samoseli ɡaspetakda roɡortsʰ natʰeli 
da aha ɡamoetsʰxaddnen matʰ mose da elia mastʰan mosaubreni 
utʰxra petrem iesos upʰalo ra karɡia tʃventʰvis akʰ qopʰna tʰu ɡnebavs ɡavaketʰeb akʰ sam karavs ertʰi ʃen ertʰi moses da ertʰitsʰ elias 
is dʒer kidev laparakobda rom aha natʰelma ɣrubelma datʃrdila isini da aha ambobs xma ɣrublidan es aris tʃemi saqvareli dze romelitsʰ movitsone me mas usminetʰ 
es rom esmatʰ motsapʰeebs pirkʰve daemxnen da dzalian ʃeeʃindatʰ 
ieso miuaxlovda da ʃeexo matʰ da utʰxra tsamodekʰitʰ da nu ɡeʃiniatʰ 
tʰvali rom aaxiles veɣaravin dainaxes ɡarda iesosi 
da rotsʰa mtʰidan tʃamodiodnen iesom ubrdzana matʰ da utʰxra aravis arapʰeri mouqvetʰ am xilvaze vidre dze katsʰisa mkvdretʰitʰ ar aɣdɡeba 
hkitʰxes mas motsapʰeebma ratom amboben mtsiɡnobrebi pirvelad elia unda movideso 
xolo man miuɡo da utʰxra elia namdvilad mova da qovelives moatsesriɡebs 
tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ rom elia ukve movida maɡram ver itsʰnes iɡi da ise moekʰtsʰnen roɡortsʰ undodatʰ katsʰis dzesatsʰ aseve moelis matʰɡan tandʒva 
maʃin mixvdnen motsapʰeebi rom is ioane natʰlismtsʰemelze elaparakebodatʰ 
da rotsʰa xalxtʰan mividnen ertʰi katsʰi miuaxlovda da muxli moidrika mis tsinaʃe 
da utʰxra upʰalo ʃeitsqale tʃemi dze mtʰvareulia da dzlier itandʒeba vinaidan tsaramara tsʰetsʰxlʃi da tsaramara kidev tsqalʃi vardeba 
mivuqvane iɡi ʃens motsapʰeebs maɡram matʰ ver ʃedzles misi ɡankurneba 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra hoi urtsmuno da ukuɣmartʰo modɡmav rodemde vikʰnebi tʰkʰventʰan rodemde moɡitʰmentʰ tʰkʰven akʰ momɡvaretʰ iɡi 
ʃerisxa iɡi iesom moqvanistʰanave da eʃmaki ɡamovida misɡan im saatʰʃive ɡanikurna qmatsvili 
maʃin ɡanmartoebitʰ miuaxlovdnen motsapʰeebi iesos da utʰxres tʃven ratom ver ʃevdzelitʰ misi ɡandevna 
man utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰveni mtsʰire rətsmenis ɡamo ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven mdoɡvis martsʰvlisodena rətsmenatsʰ rom ɡkʰondetʰ da utʰxratʰ am mtʰas akʰedan ikʰitʰ ɡadadio iɡi ɡadava da arapʰeri ikʰneba tʰkʰventʰvis ʃeudzlebeli 
es modɡma ki mxolod lotsʰvitʰa da marxvitʰ ɡanidevneba 
ɡalileaʃi qopʰnisas utʰxra matʰ iesom katsʰis dze ɡadatsʰemuli ikʰneba adamiantʰa xelʃi 
moklaven mas da mesame dɣes aɣdɡeba isini metismetad ʃetsuxdnen 
kapernaumʃi misvlisas mividnen petrestʰan didrakʰmis amkrebni da utʰxres tʰkʰveni modzɣvari xom ar ɡadaixdis didrakʰmas 
man utʰxra kio rotsʰa is saxlʃi ʃevida iesom daastsro da utʰxra ras pʰikʰrob simon mitsieri mepʰeni visɡan iɣeben xarks an baʒs tʰaviantʰ dzetʰaɡan tʰu utsʰxotʰaɡan 
rotsʰa tʰkʰva utsʰxotʰaɡan iesom utʰxra mas aba dzeni tʰavisupʰlebi qopʰilan 
maɡram rom ar davabrkolotʰ isini tsadi zɣvaze isrole ankesi da pirveli tʰevzi romelitsʰ moxvdes amoiqvane ɡauɣe piri da ʃiɡ ipovi statirs tsamoiɣe iɡi da mietsʰi tʃemtʰvis da ʃentʰvis 
im dros mividnen motsapʰeebi iesostʰan da utʰxres vin upʰro didia tsʰatʰa sasupʰevelʃi 
iesom daudzaxa bavʃvs da tʃaaqena matʰ ʃua 
da utʰxra ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tʰu ar moikʰtsʰevitʰ da ar ikʰnebitʰ roɡortsʰ bavʃvebi ver ʃexvaltʰ tsʰatʰa sasupʰevelʃi 
amriɡad vintsʰ tʰavs daimdablebs roɡortsʰ es bavʃvi is ikʰneba udidesi tsʰatʰa sasupʰevelʃi 
da vintsʰ miiɣebs ertʰ asetʰ bavʃvs tʃemi saxelitʰ me mimiɣebs 
xolo vintsʰ ertʰs am mtsʰiretʰaɡans romelsatsʰ tʃemi stsams atsʰdunebs mistʰvis adʒobebda tsiskʰvilis kʰva daekidatʰ kiserze da zɣvis upʰskrulʃi tʃaedziratʰ 
vai sopʰels tsʰtʰunebebisaɡan vinaidan tsʰdunebebi unda movides maɡram vai im katsʰs visɡanatsʰ modis tsʰduneba 
tʰu ɡatsʰdunebs ʃeni xeli an ʃeni pʰexi moikvetʰe da ɡadaaɡde ɡidʒobs dasaxitʃrebuli an kocli ʃexvide sitsʰotsʰxleʃi vidre ori xelitʰ an ori pʰexitʰ ikʰne tʃaɡdebuli saukuno tsʰetsʰxlʃi 
tʰu ɡatsʰdunebs ʃeni tʰvali amoitʰxare da ɡadaaɡde ɡidʒobs tsʰali tʰvalitʰ ʃexvide sitsʰotsʰxleʃi vidre ori tʰvali ɡkʰondes da tʃaɡdebul ikʰne tsʰetsʰxlis ɡeenaʃi 
itsʰodetʰ ar uɡulebelqotʰ artsʰ ertʰi am mtsʰiretʰaɡani ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom matʰi anɡelozebi zetsʰaʃi sulmudam xedaven tʃemi zetsʰieri mamis saxes 
vinaidan katsʰis dze daɣupulis saxsnelad movida 
ra ɡɡoniatʰ tʰkʰven katsʰs rom asi tsʰxvari hqavdes da ertʰ matʰɡans ɡza aebnes ɡana mtʰebʃi ar miatovebs otʰxmotsʰdatsʰxramets da ar tsava ɡzaabneulis mosadzebnad 
tʰu moxdeba da ipovis mas ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven upʰro metad ɡaixarebs imaze vidre otʰxmotsʰdatsʰxrametze romlebsatsʰ ɡza ar abneviatʰ 
aseve ar surs tʰkʰvens zetsʰier mamas rom daiɣupos ertʰi am mtsʰiretʰaɡani 
xolo tʰu ʃeni dzma ʃestsʰodavs ʃens tsinaaɣmdeɡ midi da amxile iɡi rotsʰa martoni ikʰnebitʰ tʰu ɡaɡiɡonebs ʃeɡidzenia ʃeni dzma 
xolo tʰu ar ɡaɡiɡonebs tsaiqole kidev ertʰi an ori sxva ratʰa ori an sami motsmis piritʰ damtkitsʰdes qoveli sitqva 
tʰu artsʰ matʰ ɡauɡonebs eklesias utʰxari tʰu artsʰ eklesias ɡauɡonebs maʃin iqos iɡi ʃentʰvis roɡortsʰ tsarmartʰi da mebaʒe 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rasatsʰ mitsaze ʃekravtʰ zetsʰaʃitsʰ ʃekruli ikʰneba da rasatsʰ ɡaxsnitʰ mitsaze ɡaxsnili ikʰneba zetsʰaʃitsʰ 
aseve ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tʰu orni tʰkʰvenɡan ʃetʰanxmdebian dedamitsaze itʰxovon nebismieri ram mietsʰematʰ matʰ tʃemi mamisaɡan romelitsʰ zetsʰaʃia 
vinaidan sadatsʰ ori an samia ʃekrebili tʃemi saxelitʰ metsʰ ikʰa var matʰ ʃoris 
maʃin mivida mastʰan petre da utʰxra upʰalo ramdendʒer unda mivutevo tʃems dzmas tʃems tsinaaɣmdeɡ tʰu ʃestsʰoda ʃviddʒer 
utʰxra mas iesom me ar ɡeubnebi ʃviddʒer metʰkʰi aramed samotsʰdaatʰɡzis ʃviddʒer 
amitom hɡavs tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli katsʰsa mepʰesa romelmatsʰ moisurva tʰavisi monebisatʰvis anɡariʃis ɡastsoreba 
rotsʰa daitsqo anɡariʃi tsarudɡines mas ertʰi romelsatsʰ atʰi atʰasi talanti emartʰa misi 
da raki arapʰeri ɡaatʃnda rom ɡadaexada batonma brdzana ɡaeqidatʰ iɡi misi tsʰoli ʃvilebi da qovelive ratsʰ ki ebada da ɡadaexada 
mona daemxo pirkʰve tʰaqvani stsʰa da utʰxra sulɡrdzeli iqav tʃems mimartʰ da qvelapʰers ɡadaɡixdio 
batons ʃeebrala is mona ɡauʃva da valitsʰ apatia 
am monas ɡamosvlistʰanave ʃexvda ertʰi tʰavisi tʰanamona romelsatsʰ misi asi dinari emartʰa daicira qelʃi stsvda da utʰxra ɡadamixade ratsʰ ɡmartʰebso 
pirkʰve daemxo tʰanamona ʃeevedra da utʰxra sulɡrdzeli iqav tʃems mimartʰ da qvelapʰers ɡadaɡixdio 
maɡram man ar indoma aramed tsavida da tʃaaɡdo iɡi sapqrobileʃi vidre vals ar ɡadauxdida 
misma tʰanamonebma rom naxes ratsʰ moxda ʃetsuxdnen mividnen tʰaviantʰ batontʰan da autsqes qovelive momxdari 
maʃin daibara iɡi misma batonma da utʰxra boroto monav raki mtʰxove me mtʰeli vali ɡapatie 
ɡana ar ɡmartʰebda ʃeɡetsqalebina ʃeni tʰanamona roɡortsʰ me ʃen ʃeɡitsqale 
ɡanrisxda batoni da ɡadastsʰa iɡi mtandʒvelebs vidre mtʰel tʰavis vals ar ɡadauxdida 
aseve moɡekʰtsʰevatʰ tʰkʰven tʃemi zetsʰieri mama tʰu qoveli tʰkʰvenɡani ɡulitʰ ar miutevebs tʰavis dzmas mis ʃetsʰodebebs 
es sitqvebi rom daasrula iesom tsavida ɡalileidan da mivida iudeis sazɣvrebʃi iordanes ɡaɣma 
diddzali xalxi misdevda mas da is kurnavda matʰ ikʰ 
da mividnen mastʰan pʰarisevelni da ɡamostsʰdiddnen da ekitʰxebodnen ʃeudzlia katsʰs ɡauʃvas tʰavisi tsʰoli qovelɡvari mizezitʰ 
man miuɡo da utʰxra matʰ nutʰu ar tsaɡikitʰxavtʰ rom ʃemokʰmedma dasabamidan mamakatsʰad da dedakatsʰad ʃekʰmna isini 
da tʰkʰva amitom miatovebs katsʰi mamas da dedas miekroba tʰavis tsʰols da orni ikʰnebian ertʰ xortsʰad 
amriɡad isini ukve orni ki aɣar arian aramed ertʰi xortsʰi amitom vintsʰ ɣmertʰma ʃeauɣla katsʰi nu daaʃorebs matʰ 
utʰxres mas aba mosem raɣatom dado mtsʰnebad ɡaqrilobis tserilis mitsʰema da ɡaʃveba 
utʰxra matʰ mosem tʰkʰveni ɡulkʰvaobis ɡamo moɡtsʰatʰ tʰkʰveni tsʰolebis ɡaʃvebis neba dasabamidan ki ase ar qopʰila 
maɡram me ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven vintsʰ tʰavis tsʰols ɡauʃvebs sidzvis mizezis ɡareʃe da sxvas ʃeirtʰavs mruʃobs 
utʰxres mas motsapʰeebma tʰuki asetʰi aris katsʰis movaleoba kʰalis mimartʰ umdʒobesia ar ʃeirtʰos tsʰoli 
utʰxra matʰ qvela ver daitevs am sitqvas aramed visatsʰ mitsʰemuli akʰvs 
vinaidan arian sacurisni romelnitsʰ tʰaviantʰi dedis mutsʰlidan iʃvnen asetʰebad da arian sacurisni romelnitsʰ adamianebma daasacurises arian sacurisni romeltʰatsʰ tʰvitʰon daisacurises tʰavi tsʰatʰa sasupʰevlisatʰvis visatsʰ ʃeudzlia dateva daitios 
maʃin miiqvanes mastʰan bavʃvebi rom xeli daedo da elotsʰa matʰtʰvis motsapʰeebi ki saqvedurobdnen matʰ 
iesom utʰxra matʰ ɡamouʃvitʰ bavʃvebi da nu abrkolebtʰ matʰ tʃemtʰan mosasvlelad vinaidan amatʰnairebisaa tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli 
da daado matʰ xeli da tsavida ikʰidan 
aha mivida mastʰan viɣatsʰ da utʰxra modzɣvaro ketʰilo ra siketʰe vkʰna rom saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle mkʰondes 
man utʰxra mas ratom mitsodeb ketʰils ketʰili mxolod ertʰi ɣmertʰia xolo tʰu sitsʰotsʰxleʃi ʃesvla ɡinda daitsʰavi mtsʰnebebi 
hkitʰxa mas romlebi iesom utʰxra ara kla ar imruʃo ar iparo ar ɡamoxvide tsʰru motsmed 
pativi etsʰi mamas da dedas da ʃeiqvare moqvasi ʃeni vitʰartsʰa tʰavi ʃeni 
cabukma mas utʰxra qovelive amas vitsʰavdi raɣa maklia kidev 
utʰxra mas iesom tʰu ɡinda srulqopʰili iqo tsadi ʃeni kʰoneba ɡaqide da mietsʰi ɣaribebs da ɡekʰneba saundʒe zetsʰaʃi mere modi da ɡamomqevi 
es sitqva rom moismina cabukma daɣonebuli ɡanʃorda vinaidan diddzali kʰoneba hkʰonda 
iesom ki utʰxra tʰavis motsapʰeebs ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven dznelia mdidrisatʰvis tsʰatʰa sasupʰevelʃi ʃesvla 
kidev ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven umal akʰlemi ɡadzvreba nemsis quntsʃi vidre mdidari ʃeva ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi 
es rom moismines dzalian ɡaukvirdatʰ mis motsapʰeebs da tʰkʰves aba viɣas ʃeudzlia ɡadartʃena 
ɡadaxeda matʰ iesom da utʰxra katsʰtʰaɡan es ʃeudzlebelia ɣvtʰisaɡan ki qovelive ʃesadzlebelia 
maʃin petrem pasuxad utʰxra mas aha tʃven qvelapʰeri mivatovetʰ da ʃen ɡamoɡqevitʰ ra ɡvekʰneba 
iesom utʰxra matʰ ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ rom vintsʰ me ɡamomqevitʰ meored ʃobisas rotsʰa katsʰis dze tʰavisi didebis taxtze dadʒdeba tʰkʰventsʰ dasxdebitʰ tʰormet taxtze israelis tʰormeti tomis ɡansakitʰxavad 
qvela vintsʰ miatova saxlebi an dzmebi an debi an mama an deda an ʃvilebi an qanebi tʃemi saxelis ɡulisatʰvis asmaɡad miiɣebs da saukuno sitsʰotsʰxles daimkvidrebs 
maɡram bevrni pirvelni ukanasknelni ikʰnebian xolo ukanasknelni pirvelni 
vinaidan tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli tsaaɡavs adamians saxlis patrons romelitsʰ dilaadrian ɡavida tʰavis venaxʃi muʃaktʰa dasakʰiraveblad 
muʃakebs dɣeʃi tʰitʰo dinarad mouriɡda da ɡaistumra tʰavis venaxʃi 
mesame saatʰi ikʰneboda rom ɡavida da dainaxa sxvebi bazarʃi ukʰmad mdɡarni 
utʰxra matʰ tsaditʰ tʰkʰventsʰ tʃems venaxʃi da ratsʰ ɡerɡebatʰ moɡtsʰemtʰo da isinitsʰ tsavidnen 
kidev ɡavida meekʰvse da metsʰxre saatʰze da aseve moikʰtsʰa 
ɡavida metʰertʰmete saatʰze naxa sxva ukʰmad mdɡomni da utʰxra matʰ ratom dɡaxartʰ akʰ mtʰel dɣes ukʰmad 
utʰxres mas imitom rom aravin daɡvikʰirava utʰxra matʰ tsaditʰ venaxʃi da ratsʰ ɡerɡebatʰ moɡtsʰemtʰ 
rom mosaɣamovda venaxis patronma utʰxra tʰavis mouravs daudzaxe muʃakebs da ɡadauxade kʰira ukanasknelidan pirvelamde 
mividnen metʰertʰmete saatʰze dakʰiravebulni da miiɣes tʰitʰo dinari 
piveladmosulebma ipʰikʰres mets miviɣebtʰo maɡram imatʰatsʰ tʰitʰo dinari miiɣes 
rotsʰa miiɣes buzɣuni dautsqes saxlis patrons 
ambobdnen am ukanasaknelebma mxolod ertʰi saatʰi tsaimuʃaves da isini tʃven ɡaɡvitole vintsʰ dɣis simdzime da sitsʰxe davitʰminetʰ 
man ki miuɡo ertʰ matʰɡans da utʰxra meɡobaro ar ɡatsqenineb ɡana dinarad ar momiriɡdi 
aiɣe ʃeni ɡasamrdʒelo da tsadi me ki minda am ukanasknelsatsʰ iɡive mivtsʰe ratsʰ ʃen 
ara makʰvs upʰleba rom tʃemi kutʰvnili tʃemi nebisamebr ɡanvaɡo ikʰneb ʃens tʰvals ʃurs ketʰili rom var 
ase ikʰnebian ukanasknelni pirvelni da pirvelni ukanasknelni vinaidan tsveuli bevria rtʃeuli ki tsʰota 
ierusalims rom adioda iesom tʰan ɡaiqola tʰormetni ɡantsʰalkevebitʰ da utʰxra matʰ ɡzaʃi 
aha tʃven avdivartʰ ierusalims da katsʰis dze ɡadaetsʰema mɣdelmtʰavrebsa da mtsiɡnobartʰ da sasikvdilo msdʒavrs dasdeben mas 
ɡadastsʰemen mas tsarmartʰebs rom ʃeaɡinon ɡaʃolton da dʒvars atsʰvan da mesame dɣes aɣdɡeba 
maʃin mivida mastʰan zebedes dzetʰa deda tʰavis vaʒebtʰan ertʰad tʰaqvansa stsʰemda da raɣatsʰas itʰxovda misɡan 
utʰxra mas ra ɡinda utʰxra mas tʰkʰvi rom es tʃemi ori dze dasxdnen ertʰi ʃens mardʒvniv da meore ʃens martsʰxniv ʃens sasupʰevelʃi 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra ar itsʰitʰ ras itʰxovtʰ ɡana ʃeɡidzliatʰ im sasmisis ʃesma romelsatsʰ me ʃevsvam utʰxres mas ʃeɡvidzlia 
utʰxra matʰ tʃems sasmiss ʃesvamtʰ maɡram tʃems mardʒvniv da martsʰxniv dadʒdomis nebartʰva tʃemɡan ar aris aramed vistʰvisatsʰ ɡamzadebulia mamatʃemis mier 
es rom im atʰma ɡaiɡona ɡuli mouvidatʰ or dzmaze 
iesom ki moixmo isini da utʰxra tʰkʰven itsʰitʰ rom tsarmartʰtʰa mtʰavarni batonoben matʰze da didebulni xelmtsipʰeben matʰze 
maɡram tʰkʰvens ʃoris ase nu ikʰneba aramed visatsʰ tʰkʰvens ʃoris didoba surs tʰkʰveni msaxuri iqos 
visatsʰ tʰkʰvens ʃoris pirveloba surs tʰkʰveni mona iqos 
iseve roɡortsʰ katsʰis dze ar mosula imisatʰvis rom emsaxuron aramed imisatʰvis rom tʰavad moemsaxuros da tʰavi ʃestsiros mravaltʰa ɡamosasqidad 
rotsʰa isini ierixodan ɡamodiodnen diddzali xalxi misdevda mas 
da aha ori brma idʒda ɡzis piras da rotsʰa ɡaiɡones ieso akʰetʰ modiso aqvirdnen da ambobdnen ʃeɡvitsqale tʃven upʰalo davitʰis dzeo 
xalxi ki utsqreboda matʰ da atʃumebda xolo isini upʰro metad aqvirdnen da ambobdnen ʃeɡvitsqale upʰalo davitʰis dzeo 
ieso ʃetʃerda daudzaxa matʰ da utʰxra ra ɡindatʰ rom ɡaɡiketʰotʰ 
utʰxres mas tʰvalebi rom aɡvixilo upʰalo 
ʃeebrala iesos isini da ʃeexo matʰ tʰvalebs mqisve aexilatʰ da ɡahqvnen mas 
rotsʰa ierusalims miuaxlovdnen da betʰbaɡeʃi mividnen zetʰisxilis mtʰastʰan iesom ɡaɡzavna ori motsapʰe 
utʰxra matʰ tsaditʰ sopʰelʃi romelitsʰ tʰkʰvens tsinaa da maʃinve ipovitʰ dabmul virs da mastʰan ertʰad tʃotʃors auʃvitʰ da momiqvanetʰ 
da tʰu vinme rames ɡetqvitʰ utʰxaritʰ upʰals scirdeba tʰkʰo da maʃinve ɡamoɡatantʰ matʰ 
qovelive es moxda ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo tsinastsarmetqvelis mier natʰkʰvami romelitsʰ ambobs 
utʰxaritʰ sionis asuls aha ʃeni mepʰe ʃentʰan modis mʃvidi da mdʒdari virze da tʃotʃorze saxedris naʃierze 
motsapʰeebi tsavidnen da ise moikʰtsʰnen roɡortsʰ iesom ubrdzana 
mohɡvares mas viri da tʃotʃori daupʰines zed tʰaviantʰi samoslebi da dadʒda matʰze 
diddzali xalxi tʰavis samosels upʰenda ɡzaze sxvebi ki xeebidan rtoebs cridnen da ɡzaze upʰendnen 
xolo xalxi tsin rom udzɣvoda da ukan misdevda ʃesdzaxoda osana davitʰis dzes kurtʰxeulia upʰlis saxelitʰ momavali osana maɣaltʰa ʃina 
rotsʰa is ʃevida ierusalimʃi mtʰeli kʰalakʰi ʃeidzra da ambobdnen es vin ariso 
xalxi ki ambobda es iesoa tsinastsarmetqveli ɡalileis nazaretʰidan 
ʃevida ieso tadzrad da ɡamoreka qvela ɡamqidveli da mqidveli vintsʰ tadzarʃi iqo da ɡadaaqirava mekermetʰa daxlebi da mtredebis ɡamqidveltʰa merxebi 
utʰxra matʰ datserilia tʃemi saxli samlotsʰvelo saxlad itsodeba tʰkʰven ki avazaktʰa bunaɡad ɡikʰtsʰeviatʰ iɡi 
mividnen mastʰan tadzarʃi brmebi da koclebi da man ɡankurna isini 
rotsʰa dainaxes mɣvdelmtʰavrebma da mtsiɡnobrebma sastsauli romelitsʰ man moaxdina da bavʃvebi romelnitsʰ tadzarʃi idzaxdnen da ambobdnen osana davitʰis dzeso ɡuli mouvidatʰ 
utʰxres mas tʰu ɡesmis ras amboben isini iesom utʰxra matʰ ho nutʰu arasodes tsaɡikitʰxavtʰ tʃviltʰa da dzudzumtsovartʰa piritʰ daimkvidre dideba 
da datova isini ɡavida kʰalakʰidan betʰaniaʃi da ɣame ikʰ ɡaatʰia 
ɡantʰiadisas kʰalakʰʃi rom brundeboda moʃivda 
ɡzaze ertʰi leɣvis xe dainaxa mivida axlos da verapʰeri ipova zed ɡarda pʰotʰlebisa da utʰxra mas nuɣarasdros ɡamoɡeɣos naqopʰi ukunisamde da mqisve ɡaxma leɣvi 
dainaxes es motsapʰeebma ɡaukvirdatʰ da tʰkʰves ra utsʰbad ɡaxma es leɣvi 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tʰu rətsmena ɡekʰnebatʰ da ar daecvdebitʰ marto imas ki ar ɡaaketʰebtʰ ratsʰ am leɣvs daemartʰa aramed am mtʰasatsʰ rom utʰxratʰ aitsie da zɣvaʃi tʃavardio ase moxdeba 
qvelapʰers rasatsʰ lotsʰvaʃi rətsmenitʰ itʰxovtʰ miiɣebtʰ 
rotsʰa tadzarʃi ʃevida da astsavlida mividnen mastʰan mɣvdelmtʰavrebi da xalxis uxutsʰesni da utʰxres mas romeli xelmtsipʰebitʰ aketʰeb amas an vin moɡtsʰa ʃen es xelmtsipʰeba 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ metsʰ ɡkitʰxavtʰ tʰkʰven ertʰ sitqvas da tʰu mipasuxebtʰ maʃin metsʰ ɡetqvitʰ tʰkʰven romeli xelmtsipʰebitʰ vaketʰeb amas 
saidan iqo ioanes natʰlistsʰema zetsʰidan tʰu katsʰtʰaɡan xolo isini ertʰmanetʰʃi msdʒelobdnen tʰu vitqvitʰ zetsʰidano ɡvetqvis aba ratom ar ertsmunetʰo mas 
tʰu vitqvitʰ katsʰtʰaɡano xalxisa ɡveʃinia vinaidan qvelas tsinastsarmetqvelad miatʃnia ioane 
miuɡes iesos da utʰxres ar vitsʰitʰo manatsʰ utʰxra matʰ artsʰ me ɡetqvitʰ tʰkʰven romeli xelmtsipʰebitʰ vaketʰeb amas 
aba ra ɡɡoniatʰ tʰkʰven ertʰ katsʰs ori ʃvili hqavda mivida pirveltʰan da utʰxra ʃvilo tsadi dɣes da imuʃave venaxʃi 
miuɡo da utʰxra ar minda bolos ki inana da tsavida 
mivida meorestʰan da iɡive utʰxra man ki pasuxad utʰxra tsaval batono maɡram ar tsavida 
am ortʰaɡan romelma ʃeasrula tʰavisi mamis neba utʰxres pirvelma utʰxra matʰ iesom ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom mebaʒeebi da medzavebi tʰkʰvenze tsin ʃevlen ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi 
vinaidan movida tʰkʰventʰan ioane simartʰlis ɡzitʰ da ar ertsmunetʰ mas xolo mebaʒeebi da medzavebi ertsmunen tʰkʰven ki ixiletʰ es da maintsʰ ar moinanietʰ ratʰa ɡertsmunatʰ iɡi 
moisminetʰ sxva iɡavi iqo ertʰi saxlis patroni romelmatsʰ vazi tʃaqara ɡars ɣobe ʃemoavlo ʃiɡnitʰ satsnaxeli amokvetʰa da koʃki aaɡo mitsismuʃaktʰ tʃaabara da tsavida 
rətʰveli rom moaxlovda tʰavisi monebi ɡauɡzavna mitsismuʃaktʰ misi naqopʰis misaɣebad 
mitsismuʃakebma ʃeipqres misi monebi zoɡsa stsʰemes zoɡni daxotsʰes zoɡni tʃakʰoles 
kidev ɡauɡzavna sxva monebi utsindelze meti imatʰatsʰ aseve moekʰtsʰnen 
bolos tʰavisi dze ɡaɡzavna matʰtʰan da tʰkʰva tʃemi dzisa moeridebatʰo 
maɡram mitsismuʃakebma dze rom dainaxes ertʰmanetʰs utʰxres es memkvidrea modi movklatʰ iɡi da davisakutʰrotʰ misi samkvidrebeli 
da ʃeipqres iɡi ɡaiqvanes venaxs ikʰitʰ da mokles 
aba rotsʰa venaxis patroni mova ras uzams am mitsismuʃaktʰ 
utʰxres mas am boroteultʰ borotad daxotsʰavs da venaxs ɡadastsʰems sxva mitsismuʃaktʰ romlebitsʰ naqopʰs tʰavis droze mistsʰemen 
utʰxra matʰ iesom nutʰu arasodes tsaɡikitʰxavtʰ tserilebʃi kʰva romelitsʰ mʃeneblebma daitsunes kʰvakutʰxedad ikʰtsʰa upʰlisaɡan moxda es da saotsʰaria tʃvens tʰvalʃi 
amitom ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom tsaɡertʰmevatʰ ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli da mietsʰema ers romelitsʰ ɡamoiɣebs tʰavis naqopʰs 
is vintsʰ am kʰvaze daetsʰema dailetseba xolo visatsʰ daetsʰema ɡasress 
mɣvdelmtʰavrebma da pʰarisevlebma iɡavi rom moismines mixvdnen rom matʰze ambobda 
tsʰdilobdnen mis ʃepqrobas maɡram xalxisa eʃinodatʰ vinaidan tsinastsarmetqvelad miatʃndatʰ iɡi 
da miuɡo iesom isev iɡavitʰ da utʰxra matʰ 
tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli hɡavs mepʰekatsʰs romelmatsʰ tʰavis dzes kʰortsili ɡadauxada 
ɡaɡzavna tʰavisi monebi kʰortsilʃi motsveultʰa dasadzaxeblad maɡram matʰ ar isurves mosvla 
kvlav ɡaɡzavna sxva monebi da utʰxra utʰxaritʰ motsveulebs aha movamzade tʃemi seroba tʃemi xarebi da nasukʰali pirutqvi daklulia qvelapʰeri mzad aris ɡvetsvietʰ kʰortsilʃi 
maɡram matʰ quri ar uɡdes da zoɡi tʰavis qanaʃi tsavida zoɡi tʰavis savacro sakʰmeze 
sxvebma ki ʃeipqres misi monebi ʃeuratsʰxqves da daxotsʰes 
es rom mepʰem ɡaiɡo ɡanrisxda ɡaɡzavna tʰavisi laʃkʰari da amoʒlita is katsʰismkvlelni matʰi kʰalakʰi ki tsʰetsʰxls mistsʰa 
maʃin utʰxra man tʰavis monebs es kʰortsili mzad aris maɡram motsveulebi ar iqvnen ɣirsni 
amitom ɡaditʰ ɡzadʒvaredinebze da qvela vintsʰ ʃemoɡxvdetʰ moitsvietʰ kʰortsilʃi 
da ɡavidnen monebi ɡzebze da ʃekribes qvela vintsʰ ki ʃemoxvdatʰ boroti tʰu ketʰili da sakʰortsilo darbazi aivso stumrebitʰ 
rotsʰa mepʰe ʃevida stumrebis sanaxavad da dainaxa ikʰ katsʰi romelsatsʰ sakʰortsilo samoseli ar etsʰva 
utʰxra mas meɡobaro akʰ roɡor ʃemoxvedi sakʰortsilo samoseli rom ar ɡatsʰvia is ki dumda 
maʃin utʰxra mepʰem tʰavis msaxurebs ɡaukaritʰ maɡas xel pʰexi da ɡadaaɡdetʰ ɡaresknelis bnelʃi ikʰ ikʰneba motʰkʰma da kbiltʰa ɣrcena 
vinaidan tsveuli bevria rtʃeuli ki tsʰota 
maʃin pʰarisevlebi tsavidnen da moitʰatʰbires roɡor daeciratʰ iɡi sitqvaʃi 
da miuɡzavnes mas tʰavisi motsapʰeebi herodianebtʰan ertʰad da utʰxres modzɣvaro vitsʰitʰ rom ceʃmariti xar ceʃmaritebitʰ astsavli ɣvtʰis ɡzas da aravis eridebi radɡan ar uqureb katsʰtʰa ɡareɡnobas 
hoda ɡvitʰxari tʃven roɡor pʰikʰrob unda vadzliotʰ xarki keisars tʰu ara 
iesom itsʰoda ra matʰi mzakvroba utʰxra matʰ ratom mtsʰditʰ tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰno 
mitʃvenetʰ saxarko moneta da miutanes mas dinari 
utʰxra matʰ visia es saxe da tsartsera 
utʰxres mas keisrisa maʃin utʰxra matʰ mietsʰitʰ keisrisa keisarsa da ɣvtʰisa ɣmertʰsa 
es rom ɡaiɡones ɡaukvirdatʰ miatoves iɡi da tsavidnen 
im dɣes mividnen mastʰan sadukevelni romelnitsʰ ambobdnen aɣdɡoma ar arsebobso da hkitʰxes mas 
modzɣvaro mosem tʰkʰva tʰu vinme uʃvilod mokvdes misma dzmam unda ʃeirtʰos misi tsʰoli da aɣudɡinoso tʰesli tʰavis dzmas 
tʃventʰan ʃvidi dzma iqo pirvelma ʃeirtʰo tsʰoli da mokvda ʃtʰamomavali ar hqavda da tʰavisi tsʰoli dzmas dautova 
aseve meorematsʰ mesamematsʰ meʃvidemde 
qvelas ʃemdeɡ kʰalitsʰ mokvda 
hoda aɣdɡomas im ʃvididan visi tsʰoli ikʰneba iɡi is xom qvelas hqavda 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ tsʰdebitʰ vinaidan artsʰ tserilebi itsʰitʰ da artsʰ ɣvtʰis dzala 
vinaidan aɣdɡomisas artsʰ tsʰols irtʰaven artsʰ tʰxovdebian aramed arian roɡortsʰ anɡelozebi tsʰaʃi 
xolo mkvdartʰa aɣdɡomaze nutʰu ar tsaɡikitʰxavtʰ ɣvtʰisaɡan tʰkʰventʰvis tʰkʰmuli 
me var ɣmertʰi abraamisa ɣmertʰi isakisa da ɣmertʰi iakobisa ɣmertʰi mkvdrebisa ki araa aramed tsʰotsʰxlebisa 
esmoda es xalxs da ukvirda misi modzɣvreba 
rotsʰa pʰarisevlebma ɡaiɡes sadukevelebi ɡaatʃumao ertʰad ʃeikribnen 
ertʰma matʰɡanma rdʒulis mtsʰodnem ɡamosatsʰdelad hkitʰxa mas 
modzɣvaro romeli mtsʰnebaa didi rdʒulʃi 
man utʰxra mas ʃeiqvare upʰali ɣmertʰi ʃeni mtʰeli ʃeni ɡulitʰ mtʰeli ʃeni sulitʰ da mtʰeli ʃeni ɡonebitʰ 
es aris pirveli da didi mtsʰneba 
da meore amis msɡavsi ʃeiqvare moqvasi ʃeni roɡortsʰ tʰavi ʃeni 
am or mtsʰnebaze hkidia mtʰeli rdʒuli da tsinastsarmetqvelni 
rotsʰa pʰarisevlebi ʃeikribnen iesom hkitʰxa matʰ 
ras pʰikʰrobtʰ tʰkʰven kʰristeze visi dzea iɡi matʰ utʰxres davitʰisa 
utʰxra matʰ aba roɡorɣa utsodebs davitʰi sulʃi mas upʰals rotsʰa ambobs 
utʰxra upʰalma tʃems upʰals dadʒekʰi tʃems mardʒvniv vidre davamxobde ʃens mtrebs ʃens pʰerxtʰa kvartsʰxlbekad 
tʰu davitʰi upʰals utsodebs mas misi dze roɡorɣaa 
veravin ʃedzlo mistʰvis sitqvis miɡeba im dɣidan mokidebuli kitʰxvas veɣaravin ubedavda 
maʃin ieso elaparaka xalxs da tʰavis motsapʰeebs 
utʰxra moses taxtze dasxdnen mtsiɡnobarni da pʰarisevelni 
amitom qvelapʰeri ris datsʰvasatsʰ isini ɡetqvian ʃeasruletʰ da daitsʰavitʰ oɣond matʰ sakʰmeebs nu mibadzavtʰ vinaidan isini amboben da arki asruleben 
kraven mdzime tvirtʰs da dznelad sazids da zurɡze hkideben adamianebs tʰavad ki tʰitʰitʰatsʰ ar surtʰ misi dadzvra 
qvelani tʰaviantʰ sakʰmeebs adamiantʰatʰvis satʃveneblad aketʰeben ipʰartʰoeben tʰaviantʰ pʰilakterionebs da iɡrdzeleben samosis pʰotʃebs 
uqvartʰ satʰaveʃi sxdoma nadimebze da tsina adɡilebze dʒdoma sinaɡoɡebʃi 
da misalmebani moednebze rom adamianebma udzaxon matʰ rabi 
tʰkʰven ki nu ɡitsodeben rabis vinaidan ertʰia tʰkʰveni modzɣvari kʰriste da tʰkʰven qvelani dzmebi xartʰ 
nurtsʰ mamas utsodebtʰ nuravis kʰveqanaze vinaidan ertʰi mama ɡqavtʰ zetsʰieri 
nurtsʰ tsinamdzɣvars ɡitsodeben vinaidan tsinamdzɣvari ertʰi ɡqavtʰ tʰkʰven kʰriste 
udidesi tʰkʰvens ʃoris tʰkʰveni msaxuri iqos 
vintsʰ tʰavs aimaɣlebs damdabldeba xolo vintsʰ tʰavs daimdablebs amaɣldeba 
vai tʰkʰven mtsiɡnobarno da pʰarisevelno tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰno rom tsʰatʰa sasupʰevels ketavtʰ adamiantʰa tsinaʃe radɡan artsʰ tʰkʰven ʃedixartʰ da artsʰ ʃemavaltʰ uʃvebtʰ 
vai tʰkʰven mtsiɡnobarno da pʰarisevelno tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰno vinaidan camtʰ kʰvrivtʰa saxlebs da mosatʃveneblad didxans lotsʰulobtʰ amisatʰvis upʰro did sasdʒels miiɣebtʰ 
vai tʰkʰven mtsiɡnobarno da pʰarisevelno tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰno rom ʃemoivlitʰ zɣvasa da xmeletʰs rom ertʰi vinme maintsʰ moakʰtsʰiotʰ rdʒulze da rotsʰa moakʰtsʰevtʰ ɡeenas dzed ɡaxditʰ sakutʰar tʰavze ordʒer metad 
vai tʰkʰven brma tsinamdzɣolno romlebitsʰ ambobtʰ vintsʰ tadzars daipʰitsʰebs arapʰeria xolo vintsʰ tadzris okʰros daipʰitsʰebs is valdebuliao 
uɡunurebo da brmebo ra upʰro didia okʰro tʰu tadzari okʰros rom tsmeds 
da vintsʰ samsxverplos daipʰitsʰebs arapʰeria xolo vintsʰ daipʰitsʰebs dzɣvens romelitsʰ maszea is valdebuliao 
brmebo romeli upʰro didia dzɣveni tʰu samsxverplo dzɣvens rom ɡantsmeds 
vinaidan vintsʰ samsxverplos ipʰitsʰebs is ipʰitsʰebs mas da qvelapʰers ratsʰ maszea 
da vintsʰ tadzars ipʰitsʰebs is ipʰitsʰebs masatsʰ da masʃi mqopʰsatsʰ 
da vintsʰ tsʰas ipʰitsʰebs is pʰitsʰulobs ɣvtʰis taxtsatsʰ da masze mdʒdomsatsʰ 
vai tʰkʰven mtsiɡnobarno da pʰarisevelno tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰno romlebitsʰ ixditʰ pitnis kamisa da kvliavis meatʰeds da mitovebuli ɡakʰvtʰ is ratsʰ upʰro mtʰavaria rdʒulʃi ɡankitʰxva tsqaloba da sartsmuneoba esetsʰ unda ɡaɡeketʰebinatʰ da artsʰ is unda miɡetovebinatʰ 
brma tsinamdzɣolebo koɣos mtsuravebo da akʰlemtʰa mqlapavebo 
vai tʰkʰven mtsiɡnobarno da pʰarisevelno tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰno romlebitsʰ ɡaredan ki asupʰtʰavebtʰ sasmissa tʰu dʒams maɡram ʃiɡnitʰ savsea mtatsʰeblobitʰ da usamartʰlobitʰ 
brma pʰarisevelo dʒer ʃiɡnidan ɡaasupʰtʰave sasmisi da dʒami rom ɡaredanatsʰ supʰtʰa iqos 
vai tʰkʰven mtsiɡnobarno da pʰarisevelno tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰno ʃetʰetʰrebul samarxebs rom hɡavxartʰ romlebitsʰ ɡaredan lamazebi tʃanan ʃiɡnitʰ ki savsea mkvdartʰa dzvlebitʰa da qovelɡvari utsmidurebitʰ 
aseve tʰkʰventsʰ ɡareɡnulad martʰlebi tʃanxartʰ adamiantʰa tsinaʃe ʃiɡnitʰ ki tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰobitʰ da urdʒuloebitʰ xartʰ aɣvsilni 
vai tʰkʰven mtsiɡnobarno da pʰarisevelno tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰno rom aʃenebtʰ tsinastsarmetqveltʰa samarxebs da amkobtʰ martʰaltʰa dzeɡlebs 
ambobtʰ tʃveni mamebis dɣeebʃi rom ɡvetsʰxovra ar vikʰneboditʰo matʰi tʰanamoziareni tsinastsarmetqveltʰa sisxlʃi 
amriɡad sakutʰar tʰavs umotsmebtʰ rom tsinastsarmetqveltʰa mkvlelebis dzeni xartʰ 
barem tʰkʰventsʰ bolomde aavsetʰ tʰkʰveni mamebis satsqao 
ikʰednetʰa naʃobo ɡvelebo roɡor ɡaekʰtsʰevitʰ ɡeenis sasdʒels 
amitom aha me moɡivlentʰ tsinastsarmetqveltʰ brdzenkatsʰebsa da mtsiɡnobrebs da tʰkʰven moklavtʰ zoɡiertʰ matʰɡans da dʒvars atsʰvamtʰ zoɡs ki ɡaʃoltavtʰ tʰkʰvens sinaɡoɡebʃi da ɡandevnitʰ kʰalakʰidan kʰalakʰʃi 
ɡetsevatʰ mtʰeli es martʰali sisxli mitsaze datʰxeuli abelis sisxlidan moqolebuli zakʰaria barakʰias dzis sisxlamde romelitsʰ tadzarsa da samsxverplos ʃoris mohkalitʰ 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom qovelive es moetseva am modɡmas 
ierusalimo ierusalimo tsinastsarmetqveltʰa damxotsʰvelo da ʃentʰan movlinebultʰa tʃamkʰolavo ramdendʒer mindoda ʃeni ʃvilebis ʃemokreba roɡortsʰ pʰrinveli ikrebs pʰrtʰebkʰveʃ tʰavis bartqebs maɡram ar indometʰ 
aha ɡrtʃebatʰ aoxrebuli tʰkʰveni saxli 
vinaidan ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven veɣar mixilavtʰ amieridan vidre ar itqvitʰ kurtʰxeulia upʰlis saxelitʰ momavali 
da ɡamovida ieso tadzridan da tsavida da mividnen mastʰan misi motsapʰeebi ratʰa etʃvenebinatʰ tadzris ʃenobebi 
xolo man miuɡo da utʰxra matʰ xedavtʰ qovelive amas ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven kʰva kʰvaze ar dartʃeba akʰ rom ar tʃamoikʰtsʰes 
xolo rotsʰa zetʰisxilis mtʰaze idʒda miuaxlovdnen mas motsapʰeebi ɡanmartoebitʰ da utʰxres ɡvitʰxari rodis moxdeba es da ra ikʰneba ʃeni mosvlisa da saukunis aɣsasrulis niʃani 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ ɡapʰrətʰxilditʰ rom aravin ʃeɡatsʰdinotʰ 
vinaidan bevrni movlen tʃemi saxelitʰ da itqvian me kʰriste varo da mravals ʃeatsʰdenen 
aseve moismentʰ omebze da omebis ambebs itsʰodetʰ nu ʃedzrtsundebitʰ vinaidan es unda moxdes maɡram es dʒer kidev ar aris aɣsasruli 
vinaidan aɣdɡeba eri eris tsinaaɣmdeɡ da samepʰo samepʰos tsinaaɣmdeɡ da ikʰneba ʃimʃilobebi sneulebani da mitsisdzvrani adɡil adɡil 
xolo qovelive es mʃobiarobis tkiviltʰa dasatsqisia 
maʃin ɡadaɡtsʰemen satandʒvelad da daɡxotsʰaven da moɡidzulebtʰ qvela eri tʃemi saxelis ɡamo 
maʃin tsʰdundebian bevrni ertʰmanetʰs ɡastsʰemen da ʃeidzuleben ertʰmanetʰs 
mravali tsʰru tsinastsarmetqveli aɣdɡeba da bevrs ʃeatsʰdenen 
da raki ɡamravldeba urdʒuloeba mravals ɡauneldeba siqvaruli 
bolomde damtʰmeni ki ɡadartʃeba 
ekʰadaɡeba es saxareba sasupʰevelze mtʰels msopʰlios qvela xalxistʰvis dasamotsmeblad ai maʃin dadɡeba aɣsasruli 
amriɡad rotsʰa ixilavtʰ ɡatialebis sibiltses tsmida adɡilze mdɡoms tsinastsarmetqvelma danielma rom tʰkʰva tsamkitʰxvelma ɡaiɡos 
maʃin vintsʰ iudeaʃia mtʰebs miaʃuron 
vintsʰ erdoze ikʰneba nu tʃamova ʃinidan raimes ɡamosatanad 
vintsʰ qanaʃi ikʰneba nu dabrundeba ukan tʰavisi tanisamosis tsasaɣebad 
xolo vai orsulebs da medzudzurebs im dɣeebʃi 
ilotsʰetʰ rom ar moɡixdetʰ ɡakʰtsʰeva zamtʰarʃi an ʃabatʰ dɣes 
vinaidan ikʰneba didi ɡasaciri roɡoritsʰ ar qopʰila sopʰlis dasabamidan dɣemde da aɣartsʰ arasodes ikʰneba 
is dɣeebi rom ar ʃemoklebuliqo vera xortsʰieli ver ɡadartʃeboda maɡram rtʃeultʰa ɡulisatʰvis ʃemokldeba is dɣeebi 
maʃin vinmem rom ɡitʰxratʰ aha akʰ aris kʰriste an ikʰ ar ertsmunotʰ 
vinaidan aɣdɡebian tsʰrukʰristeni da tsʰrutsinastsarmetqvelni da moaxdenen did sastsaulebs da niʃnebs ratʰa rtʃeulnitsʰ ʃeatsʰdinon tʰuki ʃedzleben 
aha tsinastsar ɡitʰxaritʰ tʰkʰven 
tʰu ɡitʰxran aha is udabnoʃiao nu ɡamoxvaltʰ aha is ʃida otʰaxebʃiao nu ertsmunebitʰ 
vinaidan roɡortsʰ elva ɡamodis aɣmosavletʰidan da tʰvitʰ dasavletʰamde anatʰebs aseve ikʰneba katsʰis dzis mosvlatsʰ 
leʃi sadatsʰ aris ikʰ moɡrovdebian orbebi 
da mqisve ɡasaciris im dɣeebis ʃemdɡom mze dabneldeba da mtʰvare aɣar ɡamostsʰems tʰavis natʰels varskvlavebi tʃamotsʰvivdebian tsʰidan da tsʰiuri dzalebi ʃeirqevian 
maʃin ɡamotʃndeba katsʰis dzis niʃani zetsʰaʃi da maʃin mohqveba motʰkʰmas mitsis qvela tomi da ixilaven katsʰis dzes tsʰis ɣrublebze momavals diadi dzalitʰa da didebitʰ 
moavlinebs tʰavis anɡelozebs didxmiani saqviritʰ da ʃekreben mis rtʃeulebs otʰxive kʰartʰaɡan tsʰatʰa ertʰi kididan meore kidemde 
leɣvisaɡan istsavletʰ maɡalitʰi rotsʰa misi rtoebi darbildeba da pʰotʰlebs ɡamoisxams itsʰitʰ rom axloa zapʰxuli 
aseve rotsʰa tʰkʰven ixilavtʰ qovelive amas itsʰodetʰ rom karzea momdɡari 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven ar ɡadava es modɡma vidre qovelive es ar moxdeba 
tsʰa da mitsa ɡadaivlian tʃemi sitqvebi ki ar ɡadaivlian 
maɡram im dɣeze da ʒamze aravin itsʰis artsʰ zetsʰiurma anɡelozebma artsʰ dzem aramed mxolod mamam 
vinaidan roɡortsʰ iqo noes dɣeebi iseve ikʰneba katsʰis dzis mosvlatsʰ 
vinaidan roɡortsʰ tsarɣvnamdel dɣeebʃi camdnen svamdnen tsʰols irtʰavdnen da tʰxovdebodnen im dɣemde vidre noe kidobanʃi ʃevidoda 
da ar itsʰodnen vidre tsarɣvna ar movida da qvela ar tsaleka aseve ikʰneba katsʰis dzis mosvlatsʰ 
maʃin orni ikʰnebian mindvrad ertʰi tsaritatsʰeba da ertʰi dartʃeba 
orni pʰkʰvavdnen dolabze ertʰi tsaritatsʰeba da ertʰi dartʃeba 
amitom pʰxizlad iqavitʰ radɡan ar itsʰitʰ romel dɣes mova tʰkʰveni upʰali 
es ki itsʰodetʰ saxlis patronma rom itsʰodes romel ɡuʃaɡobaze mova kʰurdi ipʰxizlebda da tʰavis saxls dzirs aravis ɡamoatʰxrevinebda 
amitom tʰkʰventsʰ mzad iqavitʰ vinaidan romel saatʰzetsʰ ar pʰikʰrobtʰ maʃin mova dze katsʰisa 
vin aris ertʰɡuli da ɡonieri mona romelitsʰ dauqena batonma tʰavis saxleuls rom droulad adzlevdes matʰ sazrdos 
netaria mona romlis batonitsʰ mova da amɡvarad mokʰmeds hpovebs mas 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom mtʰel tʰavis sabadebelze daaqenebs mas 
xolo tʰu es mona borotia da tʰavis ɡulʃi itqvis iɡvianebso tʃemi batoni 
da tsʰemas dautsqebs tʰavis tʰanamonebs da lotʰebtʰan camdes da svamdes 
mova im monis batoni im dɣes rotsʰa ar elis da im ʒams rotsʰa ar itsʰis 
ʃuaze ɡahkvetʰs mas da tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰebtʰan daudebs tsils ikʰ ikʰneba ɡodeba da kbiltʰa ɣrcena 
maʃin tsʰatʰa sasupʰeveli daemsɡavseba atʰ kʰaltsuls romeltʰatsʰ aiɣes tʰaviantʰi lamprebi da ɡamovidnen nepʰis ʃesaxvedrad 
xutʰi matʰɡani uɡunuri iqo da xutʰi ɡonieri 
uɡunurebma tʰaviantʰi lamprebi rom aiɣes zetʰi ar ɡaiqoles tʰan 
xolo ɡonierebma tʰaviantʰ lamprebtʰan ertʰad zetʰitsʰ ɡaiqoles curclebitʰ 
nepʰem rom ʃeiɡviana qvelas tʃatʰvlima da daedzina 
maɡram ʃuaɣamisas ɡaisma dzaxili aha nepʰe modis ɡamoditʰ ʃesaɡebeblad 
maʃin tsamodɡa qvela kʰaltsuli da ɡamartʰes tʰav tʰavisi lamprebi 
uɡunurebma utʰxres ɡonivrebs ɡvitsiladetʰ tʰkʰveni zetʰisaɡan vinaidan lamprebi ɡvikʰreba 
miuɡes ɡonivrebma da utʰxres rom artsʰ tʃven daɡvakldes da artsʰ tʰkʰven umdʒobesia tsaxvidetʰ vacrebtʰan da iqidotʰ tʰkʰventʰvis 
rotsʰa isini tsavidnen saqidlad movida nepʰe da ɡamzadebulnitsʰ mastʰan ertʰad ʃevidnen kʰortsilʃi da karitsʰ daixʃa 
ʃemdeɡ movidnen danartʃeni kʰaltsulebitsʰ da tʰkʰves upʰalo upʰalo ɡaɡviɣe 
xolo man miuɡo da utʰxra ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven ar ɡitsʰnobtʰ 
hoda ipʰxizletʰ vinaidan ar itsʰitʰ artsʰ dɣe artsʰ saatʰi rodis mova katsʰis dze 
vinaidan es im katsʰivitʰ ikʰneba romelmatsʰ ɡamɡzavrebisas mouxmo tʰavis monebs da tʃaabara tʰavisi kʰoneba 
ertʰs xutʰi talanti mistsʰa meores ori da sxvas ertʰi tʰitʰoeuls misi unarisda mixedvitʰ da tsavida 
xutʰi talantis mimɣebi maʃinve tsavida ivacra da sxva xutʰi moiɡo 
aseve oris mimɣebmatsʰ ori kidev sxva moiɡo 
xolo romelmatsʰ ertʰi miiɣo tsavida amotʰxara mitsa da dapʰla tʰavisi batonis vertsʰxli 
karɡa xnis ʃemdeɡ movida im monebis batoni da anɡariʃi mohkitʰxa matʰ 
mivida xutʰi talantis mimɣebi sxva xutʰi talantitsʰ miutana da utʰxra batono xutʰi talanti rom tʃamabare aha sxva xutʰi talanti moviɡe 
utʰxra mas misma batonma karɡi ketʰilo da ertʰɡulo monav mtsʰiredze ertʰɡuli iqavi mravalze daɡaqeneb ʃedi ʃeni batonis sixarulʃi 
mivida ori talantis mimɣebi da utʰxra batono ori talanti rom tʃamabare aha sxva ori talanti moviɡe 
utʰxra mas misma batonma karɡi ketʰilo da ertʰɡulo monav mtsʰiredze ertʰɡuli iqavi bevrze daɡaqeneb ʃedi ʃeni batonis sixarulʃi 
mivida isitsʰ romelmatsʰ ertʰi talanti miiɣo da utʰxra batono vitsʰodi rom sastiki katsʰi xar imki sadatsʰ ar daɡitʰesavs da krepʰ sadatsʰ ar daɡibnevia 
ʃemeʃinda tsavedi da mitsaʃi davpʰali ʃeni talanti aha ʃeni ʃenve ɡkʰondes 
miuɡo mas misma batonma da utʰxra boroto da zarmatsʰo monav ʃen itsʰodi rom vimki sadatsʰ ar damitʰesavs da vkrepʰ sadatsʰ ar damibnevia 
amitom tʃemi vertsʰxli movacretʰatʰvis unda miɡetsʰa da dabrunebisas tʃemsas sarɡeblitʰurtʰ miviɣebdi 
amitom tsaartʰvitʰ maɡas talanti da mietsʰitʰ atʰi talantis mkʰones 
vinaidan mkʰonebels qvelas mietsʰema da dauxvavdeba xolo ukʰonels isitsʰ tsaertʰmeva ratsʰ akʰvs 
xolo es uvarɡisi mona ɡadaaɡdetʰ ɡaresknelis bnelʃi ikʰ ikʰneba motʰkʰma da kbiltʰa ɣrcena 
da rotsʰa mova dze katsʰisa tʰavisi didebitʰ da qvela anɡelozi mastʰan ertʰad maʃin dadʒdeba tʰavisi didebis taxtze 
da ʃeiqreba mis tsinaʃe qoveli eri da ɡamoartʃevs matʰ ertʰi meorisaɡan roɡortsʰ mtsqemsi artʃevs tʰxebs tsʰxvrebisaɡan 
da daaqenebs tsʰxvrebs tʰavis mardʒvniv da tʰxebs martsʰxniv 
maʃin etqvis mepʰe tʰavis mardʒvniv mdɡomtʰ moditʰ mamatʃemis kurtʰxeulno daimkvidretʰ sopʰlis dasabamidan tʰkʰventʰvis ɡamzadebuli sasupʰeveli 
vinaidan mʃioda da sacmeli mometsʰitʰ mtsquroda da masvitʰ utsʰxo viqavi da mimiɣetʰ 
ʃiʃveli viqavi da ʃemmosetʰ sneuli viqavi da mominaxuletʰ sapqrobileʃi viqavi da momakitʰxetʰ 
maʃin miuɡeben mas martʰalni da etqvian upʰalo rodis ɡixiletʰ ʃen mʃieri da daɡapuretʰ an mtsqurvali da ɡasvitʰ 
rodis ɡixiletʰ utsʰxo da miɡiɣetʰ an ʃiʃveli da ʃeɡmosetʰ 
rodis ɡixiletʰ ʃen sneuli an sapqrobileʃi mqopʰi da moɡakitʰxetʰ 
miuɡebs mepʰe da etqvis matʰ ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven ratsʰ ɡauketʰetʰ ertʰs am tʃems umtsʰires dzmatʰaɡans me ɡamiketʰetʰ 
maʃin imatʰatsʰ etqvis vintsʰ martsʰxnivaa tsaditʰ tʃemɡan tsqeulno saukuno tsʰetsʰxlʃi romelitsʰ ɡamzadebulia eʃmakisa da misi anɡelozebisatʰvis 
vinaidan mʃioda da sacmeli ar mometsʰitʰ mtsquroda da ar masvitʰ 
utsʰxo viqavi da ar mimiɣetʰ ʃiʃveli viqavi da ar ʃemmosetʰ sneuli viqavi da sapqrobileʃi da ar mominaxuletʰ 
maʃin isinitsʰ miuɡeben da etqvian upʰalo rodis ɡixiletʰ ʃen mʃieri an mtsqurvali an utsʰxo an ʃiʃveli an sneuli an sapqrobileʃi da ar ɡemsaxuretʰ 
maʃin miuɡebs matʰ da etqvis ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven roɡortsʰ arapʰeri ɡauketʰetʰ artsʰ ertʰs am umtsʰirestʰaɡans artsʰ me ɡamiketʰetʰ 
da tsavlen eseni saukuno satandʒvelʃi xolo martʰalni saukuno sitsʰotsʰxleʃi 
qvela es sitqva rom daasrula iesom utʰxra tʰavis motsapʰeebs 
tʰkʰven itsʰitʰ rom ori dɣis ʃemdeɡ pasekʰi dadɡeba da katsʰis dze mietsʰema dʒvarze satsʰmelad 
maʃin ʃeikribnen mɣvdelmtʰavarni da xalxis uxutsʰesni kaiapʰad tsodebuli mɣvdelmtʰavris ezoʃi 
moitʰatʰbires mzakvrulad ʃeepqrotʰ ieso da moeklatʰ 
maɡram ambobdnen dɣesastsaulze ara xalxʃi ʃpʰotʰi ar atqdeso 
rotsʰa ieso betʰaniaʃi iqo simon ketʰrovnis saxlʃi 
mivida mastʰan ertʰi dedakatsʰi moitana dzvirpʰasi nelsatsʰxebeli alebastronis curclitʰ da inaxad mdʒdoms tʰavze daasxa 
motsapʰeebma rom dainaxes ɡabrazdnen da tʰkʰves ase pʰucad ratom daxardʒao 
vinaidan ʃeidzleboda am nelsatsʰxeblis ɡaqidva karɡ pʰasad da ɣaribebisatʰvis dariɡeba 
xolo ieso miuxvda da utʰxra matʰ ratom atsbilebtʰ am dedakatsʰs man xom ketʰili sakʰme ɡamiketʰa 
vinaidan ɣaribni mudam tʰkʰventʰana ɡqavtʰ me ki mudam ar ɡeqolebitʰ 
es nelsatsʰxebeli rom daasxa tʃems sxeuls me momamzada dasamarxad 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven sadatsʰ ki ikʰadaɡeben am saxarebas mtʰel kʰveqnierebaze itqvian ratsʰ aman ɡaaketʰa missave mosaɡoneblad 
maʃin ertʰi im tʰormettʰaɡani iuda iskariotelad tsodebuli tsavida mɣvdelmtʰavrebtʰan 
da utʰxra ras momtsʰemtʰ rom ɡadmoɡtsʰetʰ iɡi da miutsones mas otsʰdaatʰi vertsʰxli 
mas akʰetʰ edzebda mardʒve ʃemtʰxvevas rom ɡaetsʰa iɡi 
upʰuarobis pirvel dɣesve mividnen motsapʰeebi iesostʰan da utʰxres mas sad ɡinda rom moɡimzadotʰ sacmelad pasekʰi 
man utʰxra tsaditʰ kʰalakʰʃi ama da am katsʰtʰan da utʰxaritʰ ase ambobs tʰkʰo modzɣvari tʃemi ʒami moaxloebulia ʃentʰan daviqeneb pasekʰs tʃems motsapʰeebtʰan ertʰad 
motsapʰeebmatsʰ ise ɡaaketʰes roɡortsʰ iesom ubrdzana da moamzades pasekʰi 
rom mosaɣamovda dadʒda tʰormet motsapʰestʰan ertʰad 
da rotsʰa camdnen tʰkʰva ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven ertʰi tʰkʰvenɡani ɡamtsʰems 
isini dzalian ʃetsuxdnen da qvelam satʰitʰaod dautsqo kitʰxva me xom ara upʰalo 
man miuɡo da utʰxra vintsʰ tʃemtʰan ertʰad xels tʃamoatsobs dʒamʃi is ɡamtsʰems 
katsʰis dze ki midis roɡortsʰ datserilia masze maɡram vai im katsʰs vis mieratsʰ ɡaitsʰema dze katsʰisa udʒobda im katsʰs ar dabadebuliqo 
miuɡo iudam misma ɡamtsʰemma da utʰxra nutʰu me var rabi ʃen tʰkʰvi utʰxra mas 
rotsʰa camdnen aiɣo iesom puri akurtʰxa da ɡatexa mistsʰa motsapʰeebs da tʰkʰva aiɣetʰ cametʰ es tʃemi sxeulia 
aiɣo sasmisi madli ʃestsira mistsʰa matʰ da utʰxra qvelam ʃesvitʰ akʰedan 
vinaidan es aris tʃemi sisxli axali aɣtʰkʰmisa mravaltʰatʰvis daɣvrili tsʰodvatʰa misateveblad 
me ɡeubnebitʰ amieridan aɣar ʃevsvam am vazis naqopʰisaɡan im dɣemde rotsʰa tʰkʰventʰan ertʰad ʃevsvam axals mamatʃemis sasupʰevelʃi 
iɡalobes da ɡastsies zetʰisxilis mtʰisaken 
maʃin utʰxra matʰ iesom tʰkʰven qvelani tsʰdundebitʰ amaɣam tʃems ɡamo vinaidan datserilia davtsʰem mtsqemss da ɡaipʰantebian samtsqsos tsʰxvrebi 
xolo tʃemi aɣdɡomis ʃemdeɡ ɡaɡidzɣvebitʰ tsin ɡalileisaken 
miuɡo petrem da utʰxra mas qvelani rom tsʰdundnen ʃens ɡamo me arasodes vtsʰdundebi 
utʰxra mas iesom ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebi ʃen amaɣam sanam mamali iqivlebdes samdʒer uarmqopʰ me 
utʰxra mas petrem movkvdebi ʃentʰan ertʰad da ar uarɡqopʰ aseve ambobda qvela motsapʰe 
maʃin ieso mivida matʰtʰan im adɡilze romelsatsʰ ɡetʰsimania hkʰvia da utʰxra motsapʰeebs akʰ isxeditʰ vidre ikʰ tsavidode da vilotsʰebde 
tʰan tsaiqvana petre da zebedes orive dze da itsqo tsuxili da urva 
maʃin utʰxra matʰ damtsuxrebulia tʃemi suli sasikvdilod iqavitʰ akʰ da ipʰxizletʰ tʃemtʰan ertʰad 
da tsʰota rom ɡaiara pirkʰve daemxo lotsʰulobda da ambobda mamao tʃemo tʰu ʃesadzloa amaride es sasmisi maɡram ara roɡortsʰ me msurs aramed roɡortsʰ ʃen 
mivida motsapʰeebtʰan da hpova isini mdzinareni da utʰxra petres nutʰu ver ʃesdzelitʰ ertʰ saatʰs ɡepʰxizlatʰ tʃemtʰan ertʰad 
ipʰxizletʰ da ilotsʰetʰ rom ar tʃavardetʰ ɡansatsʰdelʃi suli mxnea xortsʰi ki udzluri 
meoredatsʰ tsavida lotsʰulobda da ambobda mamao tʃemo tʰu ʃeudzlebelia amarido es sasmisi rom ar ʃevsva iɡi iqos neba ʃeni 
kvlav mivida da isev mdzinareni hpova isini vinaidan tʰvalebi damdzimebodatʰ 
miatova isini kvlav tsavida da mesamed ilotsʰa kvlav iɡive sitqvebi tsarmotʰkʰva 
maʃin mivida motsapʰeebtʰan da utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰven isev ɡdzinavtʰ da isvenebtʰ aha moaxlovda ʒami da katsʰis dze mietsʰema tsʰodvilebs xelʃi 
adekʰitʰ tsavidetʰ aha moaxlovda tʃemi ɡamtsʰemi 
dʒer sitqva ar daemtʰavrebina rom aha movida iuda ertʰi tʰormettʰaɡani da mastʰan ertʰad diddzali xalxi maxvilebitʰ da ketebitʰ mɣvdelmtʰavartʰaɡan da xalxis uxutsʰestʰaɡan 
xolo misma ɡamtsʰemma mistsʰa matʰ niʃani da utʰxra visatsʰ me veamborebi is aris da ʃeipqaritʰ 
mqisve mivida iesostʰan da utʰxra ɡixarodes rabi da eambora 
xolo iesom utʰxra mas ristʰvis mosulxar meɡobaro maʃin mividnen xeli statsʰes iesos da ʃeipqres 
da aha ertʰ ertʰma iesostʰan mqopʰma xeli mihqo iʃiʃvla maxvili dahkra mɣvdelmtʰavris monas da quri tʃamoatʰala 
maʃin iesom utʰxra mas tʰavis adɡilas tʃaabrune maxvili vinaidan qvela maxvilis amɣebi maxvilitʰve daiɣupeba 
ikʰneb ɡɡonia ar ʃemedzlos ʃevevedro mamatʃems rom axlave tsarmomidɡinos anɡeloztʰa tʰormeti leɡioni da metitsʰ 
aba roɡor aɣsruldeba tserili es rom ar moxdes 
im ʒams utʰxra iesom xalxs tʰitʰkʰos avazakis tsinaaɣmdeɡ maxvilebitʰ da ketebitʰ ɡamoxveditʰ tʃems ʃesapqrobad qoveldɣe tadzarʃi vidʒekʰi da vastsavlidi da ar ʃeɡipqrivartʰ me 
maɡram qovelive es moxda imitom rom aɣsrulebuliqo tsinastsarmetqveltʰa tserilebi maʃin qvela motsapʰem miatova iɡi da ɡaikʰtsʰa 
iesos ʃempqroblebma ki tsaiqvanes iɡi mɣvdelmtʰavar kaiapʰastʰan sadatsʰ tʰavi moeqaratʰ mtsiɡnobrebsa da uxutsʰesebs 
xolo petre moʃorebitʰ mihqveboda mas mɣvdelmtʰavris ezomde ʃevida ʃiɡnitʰ da msaxurebtʰan dadʒda ratʰa enaxa aɣsasruli 
mɣvdelmtʰavarni da mtʰeli sinedrioni edzebdnen tsʰrumotsmobas iesos tsinaaɣmdeɡ ratʰa sikvdilitʰ daesadʒatʰ iɡi 
da ver poulobdnen tʰumtsʰa bevri tsʰrumotsme modioda bolos movidnen orni 
da tʰkʰves es ambobda ʃemidzlia ɣvtʰis tadzari davanɡrio da sam dɣeʃi avaʃenoo 
maʃin tsamodɡa mɣvdelmtʰavari da utʰxra mas arapʰers upasuxeb rasatsʰ eseni ʃens tsinaaɣmdeɡ motsmoben 
ieso dumda maʃin mɣvdelmtʰavrma utʰxra mas tsʰotsʰxal ɣmertʰs ɡapʰitsʰeb ɡvitʰxari ʃena xar kʰriste dze ɣvtʰisa 
utʰxra mas iesom ʃen tʰkʰvi maɡram me ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven amieridan ixilavtʰ katsʰis dzes dzalis mardʒvniv mdʒdomares da tsʰis ɣrublebze momavals 
maʃin mɣvdelmtʰavarma ʃemoixia samoseli da tʰkʰva man hɡmo raɣad ɡvinda motsmeni aha axla ɡaiɡonetʰ ɡmoba 
ras pʰikʰrobtʰ xolo matʰ miuɡes da utʰxres sikvdilis ɣirsia 
maʃin dautsqes pʰurtʰxeba saxeʃi da tsʰema zoɡiertʰni silas atsnavdnen 
da eubnebodnen ɡvitsinastsarmetqvele kʰriste vin daɡartqa 
petre ki idʒda ɡaretʰ ezoʃi mivida mastʰan ertʰi mxevali da utʰxra ʃentsʰ ieso ɡalileveltʰan iqavi 
man ki uarqo qvelas tsinaʃe da tʰkʰva ar vitsʰi ras laparakob 
rotsʰa karibcidan ɡamodioda sxvam dainaxa da utʰxra ikʰ mqopʰtʰ esetsʰ ieso nazareveltʰan iqo 
man kvlav uarqo pʰitsʰitʰ ar vitsʰnobo am katsʰs 
tsʰota xnis ʃemdeɡ miuaxlovdnen ikʰ mdɡomni da utʰxres petres namdvilad ʃentsʰ matʰɡani xar vinaidan ʃeni kilo ɡamxilebs ʃen 
maʃin itsqo tsqevla da pʰitsʰili ar vitsʰnobo am katsʰs da mqisve iqivla mamalma 
da ɡaaxsenda petres iesos natʰkʰvami sitqva sanam mamali iqivlebdes samdʒer uarmqopʰo da ɡamovida ɡaretʰ da mtsared atirda 
ɡatʰenebisas mɣvdelmtʰavrebma da xalxis uxutsʰesebma bcoba ɡamartʰes iesos tsinaaɣmdeɡ ratʰa moeklatʰ iɡi 
ʃekres iɡi tsaiqvanes da ɡadastsʰes pilates ɡanmɡebels 
rotsʰa iudam misma ɡamtsʰemma dainaxa rom mas msdʒavri dasdes inana da ukan miubruna otsʰdaatʰi vertsʰxli mɣvdelmtʰavrebs da uxutsʰesebs 
da utʰxra ʃevtsʰode martʰali sisxli rom ɡavetsʰi matʰ utʰxres tʃven ra ʃen itsʰi 
da daqara vertsʰxli tadzarʃi ɡamovida tsavida da tʰavi tʃamoixrtʃo 
mɣvdelmtʰavrebma aiɣes is vertsʰxli da tʰkʰves ar ikʰneba amis tadzris saɡandzurʃi dadeba vinaidan sisxlis sapʰasuria 
moitʰatʰbires da iqides imitʰ metʰunis mindori utsʰxotʰa dasamarxad 
amis ɡamo im mindors dɣemde etsodeba sisxlis mindori 
maʃin aɣsrulda tsinastsarmetqvel ieremias mier natʰkʰvami romelmatsʰ tʰkʰva da aiɣes otsʰdaatʰi vertsʰxli sapʰasi ʃepʰasebulisa vintsʰ ʃepʰasda israeliantʰa mier 
da mistsʰes iɡi metʰunis mindorʃi roɡortsʰ mibrdzana me upʰalma 
xolo ieso tsarsdɡa ɡanmɡeblis tsinaʃe da hkitʰxa mas ɡanmɡebelma ʃena xar iudeveltʰa mepʰe iesom utʰxra ʃen ambob 
da rotsʰa brals sdebdnen mas mɣvdelmtʰavarni da uxutsʰesebi arapʰeri upasuxia 
maʃin utʰxra mas pilatem ar ɡesmis ramdens motsmoben ʃens tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
artsʰ ertʰ mis sitqvaze ar ɡautsʰia pasuxi ise rom dzalian ukvirda ɡanmɡebels 
dɣesastsaulze tʃveulebad hkʰonda ɡanmɡebels xalxs utʰavisupʰlebda xolme patimars romelsatsʰ moisurvebdnen 
hqavdatʰ maʃin tsʰnobili patimari barabad tsodebuli 
rotsʰa matʰ tʰavi moiqares utʰxra matʰ pilatem vin ɡsurtʰ rom ɡaɡitʰavisupʰlotʰ baraba tʰu ieso kʰristed tsodebuli 
vinaidan itsʰoda rom ʃuritʰ ɡastsʰes iɡi 
rotsʰa is samsdʒavros taxtze idʒda misma tsʰolma ʃeutʰvala da utʰxra arapʰeri uqo maɡ martʰals vinaidan me dɣes sizmarʃi bevri vitandʒe maɡis ɡamo 
xolo mɣvdelmtʰavrebma da uxutsʰesebma daartsmunes xalxi rom baraba ɡamoetʰxovatʰ ieso ki daeɣupatʰ 
miuɡo ɡanmɡebelma da utʰxra matʰ am oridan romeli ɡsurtʰ rom ɡaɡitʰavisupʰlotʰ matʰ utʰxres baraba 
utʰxra matʰ pilatem iesos raɣa vuqo kʰristed tsodebuls qvelam tʰkʰva dʒvars etsʰvas 
xolo man tʰkʰva ra boroteba tʃaudenia maɡram isini kidev upʰro metad qvirodnen dʒvars etsʰvas 
rotsʰa pilatem dainaxa rom verapʰers ʃvelis aramed ʃpʰotʰitsʰ ki itsqeba aiɣo tsqali xelebi daibana xalxis tsinaʃe da tʰkʰva ubralo var am martʰlis sisxlisaɡan tʰkʰven itsʰitʰ 
miuɡo mtʰelma xalxma da utʰxra tʃvenze da tʃvens ʃvilebze iqos maɡis sisxli 
maʃin ɡautʰavisupʰla matʰ baraba xolo ieso ɡaaʃoltvina da ɡadastsʰa rom dʒvars etsʰvatʰ iɡi 
maʃin ɡanmɡeblis dʒariskatsʰebma tsaiqvanes ieso samsdʒavroʃi da tʰavs mtʰeli razmi daaxvies 
ɡaxades mas da moasxes dzotseulis mosasxami 
datsnes eklis ɡvirɡvini daadɡes mas tʰavze da mardʒvena xelʃi lertsami mistsʰes mis tsinaʃe muxls iqridnen dastsʰinodnen da eubnebodnen ɡixarodes iudeveltʰa mepʰeo 
da apʰurtʰxebdnen mas aiɣes lertsami da urtqamdnen tʰavʃi 
datsʰinvitʰ rom ɡuli idʒeres ɡaxades mosasxami tʃaatsʰves tʰavisive samoseli da tsaiqvanes rom dʒvars etsʰvatʰ 
rotsʰa ɡamodiodnen poves katsʰi kvirineli saxelad simoni da aidzules iɡi misi dʒvari etarebina 
mividnen adɡilas romelsatsʰ hkʰvia ɡolɡotʰa ratsʰ niʃnavs tʰxemis adɡils 
mistsʰes mas naɣvelnarevi ɣvino sasmelad da rom iɡema ʃesma ar indoma 
dʒvars rom atsʰves tsilis qritʰ ɡaiqves misi samoseli 
isxdnen da ikʰ daradʒobdnen mas 
tʰavs zemotʰ daudɡes datserili braldeba es aris ieso iudeveltʰa mepʰe 
maʃin mastʰan ertʰad dʒvars atsʰves ori avazaki ertʰi mardʒvniv da ertʰi martsʰxniv 
ɡamvlelebi ki tʰavs akʰnevdnen da ɡmobdnen mas 
ambobdnen tadzris damanɡrevelo da sam dɣeʃi amʃenebelo ixseni ʃeni tʰavi tʰu ɣvtʰis dze xar ɡadmodi dʒvridan 
aseve mɣvdelmtʰavarni mtsiɡnobrebtʰan da uxutsʰesebtʰan ertʰad dastsʰinodnen da ambobdnen 
sxvebs ixsnida sakutʰari tʰavis xsna ki ar ʃeudzlia tʰu israelis mepʰea ɡadmovides dʒvridan da vitsamebtʰ mas 
ɣmertʰs iqo mindobili da axla ixsnas iɡi tʰu nebavs vinaidan tʰkʰva ɣvtʰis dze varo 
mastʰan dʒvartsʰmuli avazakebitsʰ aseve landzɣavdnen mas 
xolo meekʰvse saatʰidan tsʰxra saatʰamde bnelma moitsʰva mtʰeli kʰveqana 
metsʰxre saatʰi ikʰneboda rom ʃesdzaxa iesom didi xmitʰ eli eli lama sabakʰtʰan ratsʰ niʃnavs ɣmertʰo tʃemo ɣmertʰo tʃemo rad mimatove 
ikʰ mdɡomtʰaɡan zoɡiertʰebma moismines da tʰkʰves elias uxmobso 
utsʰbad ɡaikʰtsʰa ertʰi matʰɡani aiɣo ɣrubeli dzmritʰ ɡaʒɣintʰa tsamoaɡo lertsamze da miatsoda sasmelad 
sxvebi ki ambobdnen moitsʰatʰ vnaxotʰ tʰu mova elia mis ɡamosaxsnelad 
xolo iesom kvlav ʃesdzaxa didi xmitʰ da suli ɡanuteva 
da aha tadzris kretsabmeli ɡaixa orad maɣlidan dablamde da ʃeidzra mitsa da kldeebi daskda 
samarxebi ɡaixsna da bevri ɡansvenebuli tsmidis sxeuli aɣdɡa 
ɡamovidnen samarxebidan misi aɣdɡomis ʃemdeɡ da ʃevidnen tsmida kʰalakʰʃi da bevrs etʃvennen 
xolo asistʰavsa da matʰ vintsʰ mastʰan ertʰad daradʒobda iesos mitsisdzvra da qovelive momxdari rom naxes metismetad ʃeeʃindatʰ da tʰkʰves es ceʃmaritad ɣvtʰis dze iqo 
ikʰ iqo aɡretʰve ʃoridan maqurebeli mravali dedakatsʰi romlebitsʰ ɡalileidan ɡamohqvnen iesos da emsaxurebodnen mas 
matʰ ʃoris iqvnen mariam maɡdaleli iakobisa da iosebis deda mariami da zebedes dzetʰa deda 
rotsʰa mosaɣamovda movida mdidari katsʰi arimatʰiidan saxelad iosebi isitsʰ iesos motsapʰe iqo 
mivida pilatestʰan da ɡamoitʰxova iesos ɡvami maʃin pilatem brdzana mietsʰatʰ 
aiɣo iosebma ɡvami da ʃeaxvia iɡi supʰtʰa tiloʃi 
da daasvena iɡi tʰavis axal samarxʃi romelitsʰ kldeʃi iqo ɡamokvetʰili samarxis karze lodi miaɡora da tsavida 
ikʰve iqvnen mariam maɡdaleli da sxva mariami romlebitsʰ samarxis tsin isxdnen 
meore dɣes romelitsʰ mosdevs paraskevs mɣvdelmtʰavarni da pʰarisevelni ʃeikribnen pilatestʰan 
da tʰkʰves batono ɡaɡvaxsenda rom im matquaram sanam tsʰotsʰxali iqo tʰkʰva sami dɣis ʃemdeɡ aɣvdɡebio 
amitom ubrdzane mesame dɣemde uqaraulon samarxs rom ar movidnen motsapʰeebi ar moiparon iɡi da xalxs ar utʰxran mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡao ukanaskneli tquili pirvelze uaresi ikʰneba 
utʰxra matʰ pilatem tʰkʰven ɡqavtʰ datsʰva tsaditʰ da usapʰrətʰxo hqavitʰ roɡortsʰ itsʰitʰ 
isini tsavidnen samarxi usapʰrətʰxo hqves dabecdes lodi da datsʰva dauqenes 
ʃabatʰis ɡasuls ertʰʃabatʰis tʰenebisas movidnen samarxis sanaxavad mariam maɡdaleli da sxva mariami 
da aha moxda didi mitsisdzvra upʰlis anɡelozi tʃamovida tsʰidan mivida lodi ɡadaaɡora da zed dadʒda 
misi ʃesaxedaoba elvasavitʰ iqo da misi tanisamosi tʰovlivitʰ spetaki 
misi ʃiʃitʰ ʃedrəknen mtsʰvelebi da mkvdrebivitʰ ɡaxdnen 
miuɡo anɡelozma da utʰxra dedakatsʰebs nu ɡeʃiniatʰ vitsʰi rom dʒvartsʰmul iesos edzebtʰ 
akʰ ar aris vinaidan aɣdɡa roɡortsʰ tʰkʰva moditʰ naxetʰ adɡili sadatsʰ esvena 
sastsrapʰod tsaditʰ da utʰxaritʰ mis motsapʰeebs rom iɡi aɣdɡa mkvdretʰitʰ da aha tsin miɡidzɣvitʰ ɡalileisaken ikʰ naxavtʰ mas aha ɡitʰxaritʰ tʰkʰven 
isini stsrapʰad ɡamoeʃurnen samarxidan ʃiʃitʰ da didi sixarulitʰ da ɡaikʰtsʰnen rom etsʰnobebinatʰ misi motsapʰeebisatʰvis 
da aha ieso ʃexvda matʰ da utʰxra ɡixarodetʰ isini mividnen pʰexebze moexvivnen da tʰaqvani stsʰes mas 
maʃin utʰxra matʰ iesom nu ɡeʃiniatʰ tsaditʰ da autsqetʰ tʃems dzmebs rom tsavidnen ɡalileas da ikʰ mnaxaven 
rotsʰa isini midiodnen aha mtsʰveltʰaɡan zoɡiertʰebi mividnen kʰalakʰʃi da autsqes mɣvdelmtʰavrebs qovelive ratsʰ moxda 
isini ʃeikribnen uxutsʰesebtʰan ertʰad moitʰatʰbires da diddzali vertsʰxli mistsʰes dʒariskatsʰebs 
da utʰxres tʰkʰvitʰ misi motsapʰeebi movidnen ɣamitʰ da moipares iɡi rotsʰa tʃven ɡvedzina tʰkʰo
