da tʰu amas ɡanmɡebeli ɡaiɡebs tʃven davartsmunebtʰ mas da aɡaridebtʰ usiamovnebas 
matʰatsʰ aiɣes vertsʰxli da ise moikʰtsʰnen roɡortsʰ daariɡes ɡavrtsʰelda es natʰkʰvami iudevelebs ʃoris dɣevandel dɣemde 
xolo tʰertʰmeti motsapʰe tsavida ɡalileaʃi im mtʰaze romelitsʰ iesom dautʰkʰva matʰ 
naxes iɡi da tʰaqvani stsʰes zoɡs ki ecvi epareboda 
mivida ieso matʰtʰan da utʰxra motsʰemuli makʰvs me mtʰeli xelmtsipʰeba zetsʰasa da mitsaze 
axla tsaditʰ da moimotsapʰetʰ qvela xalxi monatʰletʰ isini mamisa da dzisa da sulitsmidis saxelitʰ 
astsavletʰ matʰ qovelives datsʰva ratsʰ me ɡamtsʰnetʰ aha me tʰkʰventʰana var dɣeniadaɡ saukunis dasasrulamde amin 
dasatsqisi saxarebisa ieso kʰristesi ɣvtʰis dzisa 
roɡortsʰ esaia tsinastsarmetqvelʃi stseria aha me movavlen ʃeni saxis tsinaʃe tʃems anɡelozs romelitsʰ moamzadebs ʃens ɡzas 
xma mɣaɣadeblisa udabnoʃi ɡanumzadetʰ ɡza upʰals moastsoretʰ misi bilikebi 
ioane natʰlismtsʰemeli udabnoʃi mivida da kʰadaɡebda sinanulis natʰlistsʰemas tsʰodvatʰa misateveblad 
ɡamodioda mastʰan iudeveltʰa mtʰeli kʰveqana da qvela ierusalimeli da mdinare iordaneʃi mis mier inatʰlebodnen da tʰaviantʰ tsʰodvebs aɣiarebdnen 
ioanes emosa akʰlemis betsvi da tselze tqavis sartqeli ertqa da camda kaliebsa da velur tʰapʰls 
kʰadaɡebda da ambobda tʃems ʃemdeɡ tʃemze udzlieresi modis vis tsinaʃetsʰ ara var ɣirsi davixaro da sandlis tʰasma ɡavuxsna 
me tsqlitʰ ɡnatʰlavditʰ is ki sulitsmiditʰ moɡnatʰlavtʰ 
moxda im dɣeebʃi rom movida ieso ɡalileis nazaretʰidan da moinatʰla ioanes mier iordaneʃi 
da utsʰbad rotsʰa tsqlidan amodioda ixila ɡaxsnili tsʰa da suli mtredivitʰ ɡardamomavali masze 
da tsʰidan iqo xma ʃen xar tʃemi saqvareli dze romelitsʰ movitsone me 
da utsʰbad tsaiqvana iɡi sulma udabnoʃi 
udabnoʃi ormotsʰi dɣe iqo iɡi da satanisɡan itsʰdeboda mxetsʰebtʰan iqo da anɡelozebi emsaxurebodnen 
mas ʃemdeɡ ratsʰ ioane ɡadatsʰemul ikʰna ieso mivida ɡalileaʃi da ɣvtʰis saxarebas kʰadaɡebda 
da ambobda aɣsrulda ʒami da moaxlovda ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli moinanietʰ da itsametʰ saxareba 
rotsʰa ɡalileis zɣvis piras dadioda dainaxa simoni da simonis dzma andria romlebitsʰ zɣvaʃi bades isrodnen radɡan mebadurebi iqvnen 
iesom utʰxra matʰ momqevitʰ me da adamiantʰa mebadurebad ɡaɡxditʰ 
matʰ mqisve miatoves badeebi da ɡahqvnen mas 
tsʰota ɡaiara da dainaxa iakob zebedes dze da misi dzma ioane isini navʃi badeebs amzadebdnen 
mqisve moixmo isini da matʰ miatoves tʰaviantʰi mama zebede navʃi mqopʰ muʃebtʰan ertʰad da ɡahqvnen mas 
kapernaums mividnen da mqisve ʃabatʰ dɣes ʃevidnen sinaɡoɡaʃi da iɡi astsavlida matʰ 
ɡaotsʰebulni iqvnen misi modzɣvrebitʰ radɡan astsavlida matʰ roɡortsʰ xelmtsipʰebis mkʰone da ara roɡortsʰ mtsiɡnobarni 
utsʰbad matʰ sinaɡoɡaʃi mqopʰma aratsmida sulitʰ ʃepqrobilma katsʰma iqvira 
ra ɡinda tʃvenɡan ieso nazarevelo tʃvens dasaɣupavad moxvedi ɡitsʰnob vintsʰ xar ɣvtʰis tsmidav 
iesom ʃerisxa iɡi da utʰxra ɡatʃumdi da ɡadi maɡisɡan 
aratsmida sulma ʃeandʒɣria iɡi didi xmitʰ daikivla da ɡamovida misɡan 
ise ɡantsʰvipʰrədnen qvelani rom ertʰmanetʰs ekitʰxebodnen es ra ariso es ra axali modzɣvrebaa rom xelmtsipʰebitʰ aratsmida sultʰatsʰ ki ubrdzanebs da isinitsʰ emortʃilebiano mas 
misi ambavi mqisve moedo ɡalileis mtʰel mxares 
sinaɡoɡidan ɡamosvlistʰanave simonisa da andrias saxlʃi mividnen ioanestʰan da iakobtʰan ertʰad 
simonis sidedri itsva tsʰieb tsʰxelebitʰ ʃepqrobili mas mqisve utʰxres masze 
mivida xeli mohkida da tsamoaqena iɡi sitsʰxem ɡauara da moemsaxura matʰ 
saɣamo ʒams mzis tʃasvlisas miuqvanes mas qvela vintsʰ ki sneuli da eʃmakeuli iqo 
mtʰeli kʰalakʰi ʃekrebili iqo kartʰan 
bevri sneuli ɡankurna sxva da sxva senisaɡan bevri eʃmaki ɡandevna da nebas ar rtʰavda eʃmakebs elaparakatʰ radɡan isini itsʰnobdnen mas 
ɡantʰiadamde dʒer kidev ɣamianad adɡa ɡavida da tsavida udabno adɡilas da ikʰ lotsʰulobda 
simoni da mastʰan mqopʰni satʃkʰarod ɡaedevnen mas 
ipoves iɡi da utʰxres qvela ʃen ɡedzebs 
utʰxra matʰ tsavidetʰ sxva axlo maxlo kʰalakʰebʃi ratʰa ikʰatsʰ vikʰadaɡo radɡan amisatʰvis var mosuli 
da dadioda mtʰel ɡalileaʃi kʰadaɡebda matʰ sinaɡoɡebʃi da eʃmakebs devnida 
movida mastʰan ertʰi ketʰrovani muxli mouqara ʃeevedra da utʰxra tʰu ɡsurs ʃeɡidzlia tʃemi ɡantsmeda 
ʃeetsʰoda iɡi ɡaitsoda xeli ʃeaxo mas da utʰxra msurs ɡanitsmide 
da mqisve moʃorda ketʰri da ɡanitsmida 
mkatsʰrad ɡaapʰrətʰxila da mqisve ɡauʃva 
utʰxra mas uqure aravis utʰxra aramed tsadi da etʃvene mɣvdels da ʃestsire ʃeni ɡantsmedisatʰvis ratsʰ brdzana mosem matʰda dasamotsmeblad 
is ki ɡavida da daitsqo bevri laparaki da ise ɡaaxmaura es ambavi rom ieso tsʰxadad veɣar ʃedioda kʰalakʰʃi aramed ɡaretʰ udabno adɡilebʃi imqopʰeboda da qoveli mxridan miedinebodnen mastʰan 
ramdenime dɣis ʃemdeɡ kvlav mivida kapernaumʃi da xma dairxa rom saxlʃiao 
imdenma xalxma moiqara tʰavi rom karʃi teva ar iqo da eubneboda matʰ sitqvas 
mividnen da miuqvanes davrdomili romelitsʰ otʰxs mohqavda 
da radɡan mastʰan miqvana ʃeudzlebeli iqo xalxis ɡamo im saxls ɡadaxades saxuravi sadatsʰ iɡi imqopʰeboda tʃatʰxares xvreli da tʃauʃves satsoli romelzedatsʰ davrdomili itsva 
ixila iesom matʰi rətsmena da utʰxra davrdomils ʃvilo moɡeteva ʃeni tsʰodvebi 
ikʰ zoɡiertʰi mtsiɡnobari idʒda da tʰavis ɡulʃi pʰikʰrobda 
ratom laparakobs ase ɣmertʰsa ɡmobs vis dzaludzs tsʰodvebis miteveba ertʰi ɣvtʰis ɡarda 
ieso tʰavisi sulitʰ maʃinve mixvda rasatsʰ ɡulʃi pʰikʰrobdnen isini da utʰxra asetʰi ram ɡulʃi rad ɡaivletʰ 
ra upʰro advilia tʰkʰma davrdomilistʰvis ʃeni tsʰodvebi moɡeteva tʰu tʰkʰma adekʰi aiɣe ʃeni satsoli da ɡaiare 
xolo ratʰa itsʰodetʰ rom katsʰis dzes akʰvs kʰveqanaze tsʰodvebis mitevebis xelmtsipʰeba utʰxra davrdomils 
ʃen ɡeubnebi adekʰi aiɣe ʃeni satsoli da tsadi ʃens saxlʃi 
adɡa mqisve aiɣo tʰavisi satsoli da ɡamovida qvelas tʰvaltsin qvela ɡantsʰvipʰrda da adidebda ɣmertʰs ambobdnen arasodes ɡvinaxavs msɡavsi ram 
kvlav ɡavida zɣvaze da mtʰeli xalxi midioda mastʰan da ikʰ astsavlida matʰ 
ɡaiara da dainaxa sabaʒostʰan mdʒdomare levi alpʰesi da utʰxra ɡamomqevi me isitsʰ adɡa da ɡahqva mas 
rotsʰa mis saxlʃi dadʒda iesostʰan da mis motsapʰeebtʰan ertʰad idʒda bevri mebaʒe da tsʰodvili radɡan mravalni iqvnen ikʰ vintsʰ ɡahqva mas 
da raki pʰariseveltʰa mtsiɡnobrebma dainaxes rom is mebaʒeebtʰan da tsʰodvilebtʰan camda mis motsapʰeebs utʰxres ratom cams mebaʒeebtʰan da tsʰodvilebtʰan 
es rom iesom ɡaiɡona utʰxra matʰ mkurnali dʒanmrtʰelebs ki ara sneulebs scirdebatʰ martʰaltʰa ki ara tsʰodviltʰa mosaxmobad movedi 
ioanes motsapʰeebi da pʰarisevelni marxulobdnen mividnen mastʰan da utʰxres ratomaa rom ioanes motsapʰeebi da pʰariseveltʰa motsapʰeebi marxuloben ʃeni motsapʰeebi ki ar marxuloben 
iesom utʰxra matʰ ɡana ʃeudzliatʰ marxuloba mekʰortsileebs vidre nepʰe matʰtʰan aris vidre nepʰe tʰana hqavtʰ ar ʃeudzliatʰ marxuloba 
maɡram mova dɣeebi rotsʰa nepʰe tsaertʰmevatʰ da imarxuleben im dɣes 
dzvel tansatsʰmels aravin daakerebs axaltʰaxali kʰsovilis sakerebels tʰorem axaldakerebuli moexeva dzvels da uaresad ɡamoixeva 
aravin tʃaasxams axal ɣvinos dzvel tikebʃi tʰorem ɣvino tikebs daxetʰkʰavs da ɣvinotsʰ daiɣupeba da tikebitsʰ aramed axal ɣvinos axal tikebʃi asxamen 
mouxda mas ʃabatʰ dɣes qanebze ɡadavla da misma motsapʰeebma ɡzadaɡza tʰavtʰavebis tsqveta daitsqes 
pʰarisevlebma utʰxres mas aha ratom aketʰeben ratsʰ ʃabatʰ dɣes araa nebadartʰuli 
utʰxra matʰ arasodes ar tsaɡikitʰxavtʰ ra kʰna davitʰma rotsʰa ɡaucirda da moʃivdatʰ mas da mastʰan mqopʰtʰ 
roɡor ʃevida ɣvtʰis saxlʃi abiatʰar mɣvdelmtʰavris dros cama satsinaʃeo purebi risi camis nebatsʰ aravis hkʰonda ɡarda mɣvdlebisa da tʰavistʰan mqopʰebsatsʰ dauriɡa 
utʰxra matʰ ʃabatʰi adamianistʰvis aris ʃekʰmnili da ara adamiani ʃabatʰistʰvis 
amriɡad katsʰis dze ʃabatʰis upʰalitsʰ aris 
da kvlav ʃevida sinaɡoɡaʃi da iqo ikʰ katsʰi romelsatsʰ xeli hkʰonda ɡamxmari 
utʰvaltʰvalebdnen ʃabatʰ dɣisitʰatsʰ xom ar ɡankurnavda rom brali daedotʰ mistʰvis 
utʰxra xelɡamxmar katsʰs ʃuaʃi dadekʰi 
matʰ ki utʰxra ʃabatʰ dɣes ketʰilis ketʰebaa nebadartʰuli tʰu borotisa sulis xsna tʰu daɣupva da dumdnen isini 
iesom risxvitʰ ɡadaxeda matʰ matʰi ɡuldaxʃulobitʰ damtsuxrebulma da im katsʰs utʰxra ɡaitsode xeli manatsʰ ɡaitsoda da mourtʃa xeli 
pʰarisevlebi ɡamosvlistʰanave ʃeitʰkʰvnen herodianebtʰan ertʰad mis tsinaaɣmdeɡ roɡor daeɣupatʰ iɡi 
ieso ki tʰavis motsapʰeebianad zɣvisken ɡaemartʰa mas uamravi xalxi mihqveboda ɡalileidan da iudeidan 
ierusalimidan idumeadan iordanes ɡaɣmidan mravali xalxi mivida mastʰan tvirosisa da tsʰidonis sanaxebidan rotsʰa ʃeitqves ratsʰ moimokʰmeda 
da utʰxra tʰavis motsapʰeebs navi ɡaemzadebinatʰ mistʰvis ratʰa xalxs ar ʃeevitsrovebina iɡi 
radɡan bevri ɡankurna zed atsqdeboda qvela visatsʰ ram sneuleba scirda da tsʰdilobda ʃexeboda mas 
aratsmida sulebitsʰ roɡortsʰ ki dainaxavdnen etsʰemodnen mis tsinaʃe da qvirilitʰ ambobdnen ʃena xar dze ɣvtʰisa 
ieso mkatsʰrad ubrdzanebda matʰ ratʰa ar ɡaemʒɣavnebinatʰ iɡi 
da avida mtʰaze da mouxmo vintsʰ mas surda da tsavidnen mastʰan 
tʰormeti amoirtʃia rom mastʰan ertʰad qopʰiliqvnen ratʰa ɡaeɡzavna sakʰadaɡeblad 
da ratʰa hkʰonodatʰ matʰ ɡankurnebisa da eʃmaktʰa ɡamodevnis xelmtsipʰeba 
da amoartʃia tʰormeti metsaxelad mistsʰa simons petre 
iakob zebedesas da ioanes iakobis dzmas utsoda banerɡes ratsʰ niʃnavs kʰuxilis dzeni 
andria da pʰilipe bartʰlome da matʰe tʰoma da iakob alpʰesi tʰadeozi da simon kananeli 
da iuda iskarioteli romelmatsʰ ɡastsʰa iɡi 
mivida saxlʃi da kvlav imdenma xalxma moiqara tʰavi rom puritsʰ veɣara cames 
misianebs moesmatʰ da mis ʃesapqrobad tsamovidnen radɡan ambobdnen ʃeʃliliao 
ierusalimidan tʃamosulma mtsiɡnobrebma tʰkʰves belzebeli hqavs da eʃmakebs eʃmaktʰa mtʰavritʰ sdevniso 
mouxmo matʰ da iɡavebitʰ eubneboda roɡor ʃeudzlia satanas satanis ɡandevna 
tʰu samepʰo tʰavisive tʰavis tsinaaɣmdeɡ ɡaiqopʰa is samepʰo veɣar ɡadzlebs 
tʰu saxli tʰavisive tʰavis tsinaaɣmdeɡ ɡaiqopʰa is saxli veɣar ɡadzlebs 
da tʰu satana tʰavis tʰavs tsin aɣudɡa da ɡaiqo veɣar ɡadzlebs daudɡa aɣsasruli 
veravin ʃedzlebs ʃevides dzlieris saxlʃi da ɡaitatsʰos misi nivtʰebi tʰu dʒer dzliers ar ɡatʰokavs maʃinɣa ɡadzartsʰvavs mis saxls 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven qvela tsʰodva mieteveba katsʰtʰa ʃvilebs da ɡmoba ramdensatsʰ unda ɡmobdnen 
xolo vintsʰ sulitsmidas daɡmobs mas aɣarasodes mieteveba aramed saukuno tsʰodvis tʰanamdebia 
radɡan ambobdnen aratsmida suli hqavso 
mividnen misi dzmebi da deda ɡaretʰ dadɡnen da ɡaɡzavnes mis dasadzaxeblad 
mis ɡarʃemo xalxi isxda rotsʰa utʰxres ɡaretʰ ʃeni deda da ʃeni dani da ʃeni dzmani arian da ʃen ɡedzebeno 
pasuxad utʰxra vin arian tʃemi deda da tʃemi dzmebi 
mis ɡarʃemo msxdomtʰ ɡadaxeda da tʰkʰva aha tʃemi deda da tʃemi dzmebi 
radɡan is vintsʰ ɣvtʰis nebas ʃeasrulebs isaa tʃemi dzmatsʰ datsʰ da dedatsʰ 
kvlav daitsqo stsavleba zɣvis piras mastʰan bevrma xalxma moiqara tʰavi imdenma rom iɡi navʃi tʃadʒda da ɡavida zɣvaze mtʰeli xalxi ki zɣvis piras iqo xmeletʰze 
bevr rasme astsavlida iɡi iɡavebitʰ da tʰavis modzɣvrebaʃi ambobda 
isminetʰ aha ɡamovida mtʰesveli satʰesad 
tʰesvisas zoɡi ɡzispiras davarda movidnen pʰrinvelebi da akenkes 
zoɡi kldovanze davarda sadatsʰ bevri mitsa ar iqo da male aɣmotsʰenda vinaidan mitsas siɣrme ar hkʰonda 
xolo mze rom amovida dackna da raki pʰesvi ar hkʰonda ɡaxma 
zoɡi eklebʃi davarda ɡaizarda eklebi da ɡaatʃanaɡes iɡi da man naqopʰi veɣar ɡamoiɣo 
zoɡi karɡ niadaɡze davarda da ɡamoiɣo naqopʰi aɣmotsʰenda ɡaizarda da imata ertʰi otsʰdaatʰad ertʰi samotsʰad da ertʰi asad 
tʰkʰva visatsʰ quri akʰvs sasmenad isminos 
rotsʰa iɡi marto dartʃa matʰ vintsʰ ɡars exvia tʰormettʰan ertʰad hkitʰxes iɡavze 
man utʰxra tʰkʰven motsʰemuli ɡakʰvtʰ tsʰodna ɣvtʰis sasupʰevlis saidumlosi xolo ɡareʃetʰatʰvis qvelapʰeri iɡavebitʰ itʰkʰmis 
radɡan xedvitʰ xedaven da ver ʃeitsʰnoben smenitʰ ismenen da ver iɡeben ratʰa ar moikʰtsʰnen da ar mietevotʰ 
utʰxra matʰ es iɡavi ar ɡesmitʰ da roɡor mixvdebitʰ qvela sxva iɡavs 
mtʰesveli sitqvas tʰesavs 
isini ki im ɡzis piras arian sadatsʰ itʰeseba sitqva roɡortsʰ ki moismenen maʃinve modis satana da itatsʰebs matʰʃi datʰesil sitqvas 
aseve kldovanze datʰesilni isini arian romlebitsʰ roɡortsʰ ki sitqvas moismenen mqis sixarulitʰ miiɣeben mas 
maɡram pʰesvi ar ɡaatʃniatʰ tʰavis tʰavʃi da xanmokleni arian da roɡortsʰ ki dɡeba ɡasaciri anda devna sitqvis ɡamo mqisve tsʰdundebian 
sxvani ekaltʰa ʃoris datʰesilni isini arian romlebitsʰ sitqvas moismenen 
maɡram am sopʰlis sazrunavi simdidris satsʰduri da sxva ɡulistʰkʰmani matʰʃi ʃesvlisas aʃtʰoben sitqvas da iɡi unaqopʰo xdeba 
ketʰil niadaɡze datʰesilni isini arian romlebitsʰ sitqvas moismenen da miiɣeben da ɡamoakʰvtʰ naqopʰi ertʰi otsʰdaatʰad samotsʰad da asad 
utʰxra matʰ ɡana imistʰvis moakʰvtʰ santʰeli rom curclis an satsolis kʰveʃ ʃedɡan ɡana imisatʰvis ara rom sasantʰleze dadɡan 
ar arsebobs dapʰaruli rom ar ɡatsʰxaddes da artsʰ ram damaluli rom ar ɡamʒɣavndes 
tʰu vinmes quri akʰvs sasmenad isminos 
utʰxra matʰ daukvirditʰ rasatsʰ ismentʰ romeli satsqaotʰitsʰ miutsqavtʰ imavetʰi moɡetsqvebatʰ da moɡematebatʰ 
radɡan visatsʰ akʰvs mas mietsʰema da visatsʰ ara akʰvs isitsʰ tsaertʰmeva ratsʰa akʰvs 
tʰkʰva asetʰia ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli katsʰma rom tʰesli tʃaaɡdos mitsaʃi 
edzinos da dɡebodes ɣamitʰ tʰu dɣisitʰ tʰesli aɣmotsʰendeba da izrdeba man ki ar itsʰis roɡor 
radɡan mitsa tʰvitʰon ɡamoiɣebs naqopʰs pirvelad dʒedʒils mere tʰavtʰavs ʃemdeɡ ki savse martsʰvals tʰavtʰavʃi 
raʒams momtsipʰdeba naqopʰi mqisve ɡamoɡzavnis namɡals radɡan moatsia mkam 
tʰkʰva ras ʃevudarotʰ ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli an romeli iɡavitʰ ɡamovtʰkʰvatʰ 
iɡi mdoɡvis martsʰvalsa hɡavs romelitsʰ mitsaze datʰesvisas qvelaze mtsʰirea mitsaze arsebul tʰesltʰa ʃoris 
datʰesvis mere ki amodis da qvelaze did mtsvanilad ɡadaikʰtsʰeva did totebs ɡamoisxams ise rom mis tʃrdilʃi tsʰis pʰrinvelni ibudeben 
mravali asetʰi iɡavitʰ eubneboda iɡi sitqvas ramdenis ɡaɡebatsʰ ʃeedzlotʰ 
iɡavis ɡareʃe ar esaubreboda matʰ tʰavis motsapʰeebs ki tsʰalke ɡanumartavda qvelapʰers 
imave dɣes rom mosaɣamovda utʰxra matʰ ɡadavtsʰurotʰ ɡaɣma 
ɡauʃves xalxi da tsaiqvanes iɡi navitʰ romelʃitsʰ idʒda mastʰan sxva navebitsʰ iqo 
amovarda didi kʰariʃxali talɣebi navs exetʰkʰeboda ise rom navi ukve ivseboda 
is ki kitʃoze iqo da sastʰumalze edzina ɡaaɣvidzes da utʰxres modzɣvaro ar ɡenaɣvleba rom viɣupebitʰ 
tsamodɡa da ʃerisxa kʰari da utʰxra zɣvas dadumdi tʃadekʰ kʰari datsʰxra da didi mqudroeba tʃamodɡa 
da utʰxra matʰ ratom xartʰ ase mxdalni ratom ara ɡakʰvtʰ rətsmena 
da matʰ didi ʃiʃitʰ ʃeeʃindatʰ da ertʰmanetʰs ɡadaulaparakes vin aris es kʰaritsʰa da zɣvatsʰ rom mas emortʃileba 
ɡavidnen zɣvis ɡadaɣma ɡeraseneltʰa mxareʃi 
navidan ɡadmosuls miecra katsʰi samarxebidan aratsmida sulitʰ ʃepqrobili 
mas samqopʰeli samarxebʃi hkʰonda da dʒacvebitʰatsʰ ki aravis ʃeedzlo misi ʃekvra 
vinaidan ukve mravaldʒer iqo ʃekruli borkilebitʰa da dʒacvebitʰ maɡram tsqvetda dʒacvebs amsxvrevda borkilebs da aravis ʃeedzlo misi damortʃileba 
mudam dɣe da ɣam samarxebsa da mtʰebʃi ɣrialebda da exetʰkʰeboda lodebs 
roɡortsʰ ki dainaxa ʃoridan ieso miirbina mastʰan da tʰaqvani stsʰa 
xmamaɣla iqvira da utʰxra ra ɡinda tʃemɡan uzenaesi ɣvtʰis dzev ɣmertʰs ɡapʰitsʰeb nu mtandʒav 
radɡan utʰxra mas ɡadi am katsʰisaɡan aratsmida sulo 
hkitʰxa mas ra aris ʃeni saxeli utʰxra leɡionia tʃemi saxeli vinaidan bevrni vartʰ 
dzalian evedreboda rom am are maredan ar ɡaedzevebina isini 
ikʰ ki mtʰastʰan ɣorebis didi kolti dzovda 
ʃeevedrnen mas da utʰxres miɡvreke ɣorebtʰan rom ʃevidetʰ matʰʃi 
dartʰo matʰ neba da ɡamosuli aratsmida sulebi ʃevidnen ɣorebʃi da miatsqda kolti kbodedan zɣvas oriatʰasamde iqvnen da tʃaixrtʃo zɣvaʃi 
xolo matʰi madzovebelni ɡaikʰtsʰnen da ʃeatqobines kʰalakʰsa da sopʰlebs da ɡamovidnen rom enaxatʰ ra moxda 
movidnen iesostʰan da xedaven rom eʃmakeuli romelsatsʰ leɡioni hqavda zis ʃemosili da ɡontʰmosuli da ʃeʃindnen 
mxilvelebma uambes matʰ ratsʰ daemartʰa eʃmakeuls da ɣorebs 
da dautsqes xvetsna ɡastsʰloda matʰs sazɣvrebs 
rotsʰa adioda iɡi navʃi qopʰili eʃmakeuli ʃeevedra rom tʰavistʰan daetovebina 
neba ar dartʰo mas aramed utʰxra tsadi ʃens saxlʃi ʃenianebtʰan da utʰxari matʰ ra ɡiqo ɣmertʰma da roɡor ʃeɡitsqala 
da tsavida da ɡamoatsʰxada dekapolisʃi ratsʰ ɡauketʰa mas iesom da ukvirda qvelas 
da rotsʰa iesom kvlav ɡamoɣma ɡamostsʰura navitʰ diddzali xalxi moɡrovda mastʰan da iqo zɣvis piras 
da aha movida sinaɡoɡis ertʰi mtʰavartʰaɡani saxelad iairosi da rotsʰa dainaxa iɡi mis pʰerxtʰitʰ daetsʰa 
bevrs evedreboda mas da eubneboda tʃemi ɡoɡona sikvdilis pirasaa modi da daasxi xelebi rom ɡamodʒanmrtʰeldes da itsʰotsʰxlos 
da tsahqva mas diddzali xalxi aedevna da zed atsqdeboda 
ertʰma kʰalma romelsatsʰ tʰormeti tselitsadi iqo ratsʰ sisxlis dena scirda 
da mravali tandʒva hkʰonda ɡadatanili bevri mkurnalisaɡan da ratsʰ ki ebada qvelapʰeri daexardʒa maɡram arapʰers eʃvela uares dɣeʃi tʃavardniliqo 
moismina iesoze xalxʃi uknidan mouara da ʃeexo mis samosels 
radɡan ambobda mis samoselsatsʰ rom ʃevexo ɡanvikurnebio 
da mqisve daiʃrita misi sisxlis tsqaro da sxeulʃi iɡrədzno rom ɡanikurna satkivarisaɡan 
mqisve iɡrədzno iesom rom dzala ɡavida misɡan miubrunda xalxs da utʰxra vin ʃeexo tʃems samosels 
da utʰxres mas misma motsapʰeebma xedav xalxi zed ɡatsqdeba ʃen ki ambob vin ʃemexoo 
man mimoixeda rom daenaxa amis tʃamdeni 
kʰali romelmatsʰ itsʰoda ratsʰ tʰvitʰon daemartʰa ʃiʃitʰ da tʰrtʰolvitʰ mivida mis tsinaʃe daemxo da mtʰeli simartʰle utʰxra 
man ki utʰxra mas asulo ʃenma rətsmenam ɡixsna tsadi mʃvidobitʰ da mortʃenili xar ʃeni senisaɡan 
dʒer sitqva ar daemtʰavrebina rom movidnen sinaɡoɡis upʰrosisaɡan da utʰxres ʃeni asuli mokvda raɣad atsuxeb modzɣvars 
iesom ki am sitqvebis mosmenistʰanave utʰxra sinaɡoɡis upʰross nu ɡeʃinia oɣond ɡtsamdes 
aravistʰvis daurtʰavs neba tsahqoloda ɡarda petresi iakobisa da ioanesi iakobis dzmisa 
mividnen sinaɡoɡis upʰrosis saxlʃi da xedavs areulobaa tirian da bevrs motʰkʰvamen 
da ʃevida da utʰxra raze stsuxxartʰ da stiritʰ ar momkvdara bavʃvi sdzinavs mxolod 
isini ki dastsʰinodnen mas man qvelani ɡamoreka tsaiqvana bavʃvis ded mama da mastʰan mqopʰni da ʃevida sadatsʰ bavʃvi itsva 
aiɣo bavʃvis xeli da utʰxra talitʰa kumi ratsʰ niʃnavs ɡoɡona ʃen ɡeubnebi adekʰi 
da mqisve tsamodɡa ɡoɡona da ɡaiara tʰormeti tslisa iqo matʰ didad ɡaukvirdatʰ 
man mkatsʰrad ɡaapʰrətʰxila isini rom aravis ɡaeɡo es ambavi utʰxra sacmeli mietsʰatʰ ɡoɡonastʰvis 
da ɡavida ikʰidan da mivida tʰavis samʃobloʃi da ɡahqvnen tʰavisi motsapʰeebitsʰ 
ʃabatʰi rom dadɡa sinaɡoɡaʃi daitsqo stsavleba mravali msmeneli ɡaotsʰebuli ambobda saidana akʰvs am katsʰs es qvelapʰeri da ra sibrədzne akʰvs monicebuli ra sastsaulebi xdeba misi xelitʰ 
es xuro ar aris mariamis dze iakobis ioses iudas da simonis dzma akʰve tʃventʰan ar imqopʰebian misi debi da tsʰdundebodnen masʃi 
utʰxra matʰ iesom tsinastsarmetqveli arsad ar aris upatiod ɡarda tʰavisi samʃoblosi sanatʰesaosi da sakutʰari saxlisa 
ver moaxdina ikʰ veravitʰari sastsauli ɡarda imisa rom oriode sneuls xelebi daasxa da ɡankurna 
ukvirda matʰi urtsmunoeba dadioda ɡarʃemo sopʰlebʃi da astsavlida matʰ 
da mouxmo tʰormets da daitsqo matʰi or oris daɡzavna da adzlevda matʰ xelmtsipʰebas utsmidur sulebze 
da ɡamoutsʰxada matʰ arapʰeri tsaeɣotʰ ɡzaʃi ɡarda xeldʒoxisa artsʰ puri artsʰ ɡuda artsʰ spilendzi sartqlitʰ 
tʃaetsʰvatʰ sandlebi da ar moesxatʰ ori mosasxami 
utʰxra matʰ romel saxlʃitsʰ ʃexvaltʰ ikʰ dartʃitʰ sanam im adɡilidan ar ɡamoxvaltʰ 
tʰu vinme ar miɡiɣebtʰ da ar moɡismentʰ ikʰidan tsamosvlisas tʰkʰvens pʰerxtʰaɡan mtveri tʃamoibertqetʰ matʰda dasamotsmeblad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven sodomsa da ɡomoras upʰro ɡauadvildeba ɡankitʰxvis dɣes vidre im kʰalakʰs 
da ɡavidnen da daitsqes sinanulis kʰadaɡeba 
sdevnidnen mraval eʃmaks da stsʰxebdnen zetʰs da bevr sneuls kurnavdnen 
esma mepʰe herodes vinaidan tsʰnobili ɡaxda misi saxeli da tʰkʰva ioane natʰlismtsʰemeli aɣmdɡara mkvdretʰitʰ da amitom mokʰmedebeno dzalebi masʃi 
ertʰni ambobdnen rom eliaa sxvebi ki ambobdnen rom tsinastsarmetqvelia roɡortsʰ ertʰi tsinastsarmetqveltʰaɡani 
herodem rom ɡaiɡo tʰkʰva es ioanea me rom tʰavi movkvetʰe is aɣmdɡara mkvdretʰitʰ 
radɡan man herodem ʃeapqrobina ioane da sapatimroʃi daamtsqvdia tʰavisi dzmis pʰilipes tsʰolis herodias ɡamo tsʰolad rom hqavda iɡi 
radɡan ioane eubneboda herodes ar ɡerɡeba ʃeni dzmistsʰoli tsʰolad 
herodias ki ɡuli mosdioda masze da undoda misi mokvla maɡram ar ʃeedzlo 
radɡan herodes eʃinoda ioanesi itsʰoda rom martʰali da tsmida katsʰi iqo da ipʰaravda mas rotsʰa mas usmenda did saɡonebelʃi iqo da siamovnebitʰ uɡdebda qurs 
dadɡa mardʒve dɣe rotsʰa herodem tʰavis dabadebis dɣes lxini ɡaumartʰa tʰavis mtʰavrebs atʰasistʰavebs da ɡalilevel aznaurebs 
ʃevida herodias asuli tsʰekvavda da aamebda herodesa da mis tʰanameinaxeebs da utʰxra mepʰem kʰaliʃvils ratsʰ ɡinda mtʰxove da moɡtsʰem 
da aɣutʰkʰva mas ratsʰ ɡinda mtʰxovo moɡtsʰem tʃems naxevar samepʰosatsʰ ki 
ɡamovida da utʰxra tʰavis dedas ra vtʰxovo ioane natʰlismtsʰemlis tʰavio utʰxra man 
da mqisve sastsrapʰod ʃevida mepʰestʰan da mostʰxova minda rom axlave lanɡritʰ momartʰva ioane natʰlismtsʰemlis tʰavi 
ʃetsuxda mepʰe maɡram pʰitsʰisa da tʰanameinaxetʰa ridis ɡamo ar isurva misi ɡatsbileba 
mqisve ɡaɡzavna mepʰem dʒalatʰi da ubrdzana misi tʰavis motana 
da tsavida iɡi mohkvetʰa mas tʰavi sapqrobileʃi lanɡritʰ moitana misi tʰavi da ɡadastsʰa kʰaliʃvils xolo kʰaliʃvilma dedamiss mistsʰa 
ɡaiɡes misma motsapʰeebma mividnen aiɣes misi ɡvami da samarxʃi daasvenes 
ʃeikribnen iesostʰan motsʰikʰulebi da uambes mas qvelapʰeri ratsʰ ɡaaketʰes da ratsʰ astsavles 
utʰxra matʰ tsamoditʰ marto tʰkʰven udabur adɡilas da mtsʰired moisvenetʰ vinaidan mravali iqo mimsvlel momsvleli da sacmeladatsʰ ver itsʰlidnen 
da tsavidnen udabur adɡilas martoni navitʰ 
dainaxes isini rom midiodnen da bevrma itsʰno pʰexitʰ ɡaedevnen qoveli kʰalakʰidan da matʰze adre mividnen 
ɡamosulma uamravi xalxi rom dainaxa ʃeebrala isini vinaidan umtsqemso tsʰxvrebivitʰ iqvnen da dautsqo matʰ mravali ramis stsavleba 
ukve ɡviani xani iqo rom mividnen mastʰan misi motsapʰeebi da utʰxres udaburia es adɡili da ukve ɡviani droa 
ɡauʃvi isini rom tsavidnen axlomaxlo daba sopʰlebʃi da iqidon tʰavistʰvis sazrdo 
maɡram man miuɡo da utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰven mietsʰitʰ matʰ sacmeli matʰ utʰxres tsavidetʰ orasi dinaris puri viqidotʰ da amatʰ mivtsʰetʰ sacmelad 
utʰxra matʰ ramdeni puri ɡakʰvtʰ tsaditʰ naxetʰ ɡaiɡes da utʰxres xutʰi da oritsʰ tʰevzi 
maʃin ubrdzana matʰ qvelani dʒɡupʰ dʒɡupʰad damsxdariqvnen mtsvaneze 
dasxdnen mtsqobrad as asad da ormotsʰdaatʰ ormotsʰdaatʰad 
aiɣo xutʰi puri da ori tʰevzi tsʰas axeda akurtʰxa datexa purebi da mistsʰa tʰavis motsapʰeebs rom matʰtʰvis tʃamoeriɡebinatʰ da ori tʰevzitsʰ daunatsila qvelas 
qvelam cama da ɡadzɣa 
dartʃenili natexebidan da tʰevzidan tʰormeti savse ɡodori akripʰes 
purismcameli sul xutʰi atʰasamde mamakatsʰi iqo 
mqisve aidzula tʰavisi motsapʰeebi asuliqvnen navʃi da tsindatsin ɡasuliqvnen ɡaɣma betʰsaidisken vidre xalxs ɡauʃvebda 
isini rom ɡaistumra mtʰaze avida salotsʰavad 
da rotsʰa ʃesaɣamovda navi ʃua zɣvaʃi iqo is ki marto dartʃa xmeletʰze 
da dainaxa rom matʰ ucirdatʰ nitʃbebis mosma radɡan pirkʰari iqo ɣamis meotʰxe ɡuʃaɡobaze tsavida iɡi matʰken zɣvaze siarulitʰ da undoda matʰtʰvis ɡverdi aevlo 
xolo matʰ zɣvaze mosiarule rom dainaxes ipʰikʰres motʃveneba ariso da ʃehqvires 
qvelam dainaxa iɡi da ʃedzrtsundnen is ki mqisve ɡamoelaparaka matʰ da utʰxra ɡamxnevditʰ me var nu ɡeʃiniatʰ 
da avida navʃi matʰtʰan da tʃadɡa kʰari da upʰro ukvirdatʰ 
dʒer purebis ambavsatsʰ ver mimxvdariqvnen radɡan ɡoneba daxʃodatʰ 
ɡavidnen ɡaɣma da miadɡnen ɡenesaretʰis mitsas da tʃauʃves ɣuza 
roɡortsʰ ki navidan ɡadmovidnen umalve itsʰnes iɡi ikʰaurebma 
ʃemoirbines mtʰeli is kʰveqana da daitsqes satsolebitʰ sneultʰa ɡamoqvana qvelɡan sadatsʰ ki ɡaiɡebdnen akʰ ariso 
sadatsʰ ar unda ʃesuliqo dabebʃi kʰalakʰebʃi tʰu sopʰlebʃi dasxamdnen tʰaviantʰ sneulebs moednebze da evedrebodnen rom samoslis kaltʰaze ʃexebis neba maintsʰ mietsʰa matʰtʰvis vintsʰ ki exeboda ikurneboda kidetsʰ 
da ʃeikribnen mastʰan pʰarisevlebi da ierusalimidan mosuli zoɡiertʰi mtsiɡnobari 
da dainaxes rom zoɡiertʰi misi motsapʰetʰaɡani bindzuri ese iɡi daubaneli xelebitʰ camda purs 
radɡan pʰarisevelni da qvela iudeveli itsʰaven dzvelebis tʃveulebas da ise ar camen tʰu saɡuldaɡulod ar daibanes xeli 
bazridan dabrunebulebi ɡanbanis ɡareʃe ar camen da sxvatsʰ bevri ram aris ratsʰ miiɣes ʃesasruleblad sasmisebis tʰasebis spilendzis kʰvabebis ɡavleba tsqalʃi 
da hkitʰxes pʰarisevlebma da mtsiɡnobrebma ratom ar ikʰtsʰevian ʃeni motsapʰeebi dzvelebis ɡadmotsʰemisamebr da xeldaubaneli camen purs 
man utʰxra matʰ karɡad tsinastsarmetqvelebda esaia tsinastsarmetqveli tʰkʰvenistʰana tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰebze roɡortsʰ stseria es xalxi pativs mtsʰems baɡeebitʰ matʰi ɡuli ki ʃorsaa tʃemɡan 
amaod metʰaqvanebian astsavlian ra adamiantʰa mtsʰnebebs da modzɣvrebebs 
ɣvtʰis mtsʰnebatʰa mimtovebelni itsʰavtʰ katsʰtʰa ɡadmotsʰemas sasmisebis da tʰasebis retsʰxvas da mraval sxvas amɡvars aketʰebtʰ 
utʰxra matʰ karɡia rom ɣvtʰis mtsʰnebas aukʰmebtʰ ratʰa tʰkʰveni ɡadmotsʰema daitsʰvatʰ 
mosem tʰkʰva pativi etsʰi mamasa ʃensa da dedasa ʃensa mamis ɡind dedis auɡis mtʰkʰmeli sikvdilitʰ mokvdes 
tʰkʰven ki ambobtʰ tʰu katsʰi etqvis mamas an dedas korban ese iɡi dzɣvenio ɣmertʰs ritʰatsʰ tʃemɡan unda ɡesarɡebla 
mas tʰkʰven nebasa rtʰavtʰ aɣarapʰeri ɡaaketʰos mamistʰvis an dedisatʰvis 
aukʰmebtʰ ɣvtʰis sitqvas tʰkʰveni ɡadmotsʰemitʰ romelsatsʰ ɡadastsʰemtʰ da sxvasatsʰ bevrs amis msɡavss aketʰebtʰ 
moutsoda kvlav xalxs da utʰxra momisminetʰ qvelam da ʃeiɡnetʰ 
arapʰeria adamianis ɡaretʰ isetʰi rasatsʰ masʃi ʃesvlitʰ ʃeedzlos misi tsabiltsva aramed ratsʰ adamianisaɡan ɡamodis is biltsavs adamians 
tʰu vinmes qurebi akʰvs sasmenad isminos 
rotsʰa xalxs ɡaerida da saxlʃi ʃevida misma motsapʰeebma hkitʰxes mas iɡavze 
utʰxra matʰ nutʰu tʰkʰventsʰ ar ɡaɡeɡebatʰ da ver mimxvdarxartʰ rom arapʰers ratsʰ adamianʃi ɡaredan ʃedis ar dzaludzs misi tsabiltsva 
vinaidan mis ɡulʃi ki ar ʃedis aramed mutsʰelʃi da ɡamodis zarulʃi man ase ɡantsmida qovelɡvari sakvebi 
ʃemdeɡ utʰxra katsʰisaɡan ɡamomavali ʃebiltsavs katsʰs 
vinaidan adamianis ɡulidan ɡamodis boroti zraxvani sidzvani kʰurdobani mkvlelobani 
mruʃobani anɡarebani mzakvrobani veraɡobani ɡarqvnilebani tʰvalborotebani ɡmobani ampartavneba da uɡunureba 
qvela es boroteba ʃiɡnidan ɡamodis da biltsavs adamians 
adɡa ikʰidan da tvirosis sazɣvrisken tsavida da saxlʃi rom ʃevida ar undoda vinmes etsʰno maɡram ver ʃedzlo dapʰarva 
maɡram maʃinve ɡaiɡo ertʰma dedakatsʰma romlis asulitsʰ utsmiduri sulitʰ iɡvemeboda mivida da daemxo mis pʰerxtʰitʰ 
es dedakatsʰi ki berdzeni iqo tsarmoʃobitʰ siropʰinikieli zɣvis ɡaɣmeli da emudareboda ɡanedevna eʃmaki misi asulisaɡan 
da utʰxra mas moitʰmine dʒer ʃvilebi ɡadzɣnen tʰorem ar aris karɡi ʃvilebs tsaartʰva puri da dzaɣlebs ɡadauɡdo 
man miuɡo da utʰxra martʰalia upʰalo maɡram dzaɣlebitsʰ xom maɡidis kʰveʃ camen ʃvilebis namtsʰetsʰebs 
utʰxra maɡ sitqvisatʰvis tsadi ɡasulia eʃmaki ʃeni asulisaɡan 
da tsavida tʰavis saxlʃi da naxa rom bavʃvi satsolze itsva eʃmaki ki ɡasuli iqo 
kvlav ɡamobrunda tvirosis sazɣvrebidan da mivida tsʰidonis ɡzitʰ ɡalileis zɣvisken dekapolisis sazɣvrebis ɡavlitʰ 
da miuqvanes mas ertʰi qru da enablu da ʃeevedrnen xeli daedo mistʰvis 
ɡaiqvana iɡi tsʰalke xalxisaɡan moʃorebitʰ tʰitʰebitʰ quri dautsʰo daanertsqva da ʃeexo mis enas 
tsʰas axeda amoioxra da utʰxra mas epʰpʰatʰa ratsʰ aris ɡanixsen 
da mqisve ɡaexsna mas sasmeneli enis borkilitsʰ aexsna da ɡamartʰulad alaparakda 
ubrdzana matʰ aravistʰvis etʰkʰvatʰ maɡram ratsʰ upʰro metad ukrdzalavda mitʰ upʰro atsʰxadebdnen 
metismetad ukvirdatʰ da ambobdnen qovelives sasiketʰod aketʰebs qruebs asmeninebs da mundʒebs alaparakebs 
im dɣeebʃi diddzalma xalxma moiqara tʰavi da arapʰeri hkʰondatʰ rom ecamatʰ man mouxmo tʰavis motsapʰeebs da utʰxra 
metsʰodeba es xalxi radɡan ukve sami dɣea ratsʰ tʃemtʰan arian da arapʰeri akʰvtʰ rom camon 
mʃivrebi rom ɡavuʃva ʃin daudzlurdebian zoɡiertʰi matʰɡani dzalian ʃoridan aris mosuli 
da miuɡes mas misma motsapʰeebma saidan ʃeidzleba amdeni xalxis udabnoʃi dapureba 
hkitʰxa matʰ ramdeni puri ɡakʰvtʰ matʰ utʰxres ʃvidi 
da ubrdzana xalxs mitsaze damsxdariqvnen aiɣo ʃvidi puri madli ʃestsira datexa da mistsʰa tʰavis motsapʰeebs rom tʃamoeriɡebinatʰ matʰatsʰ tʃamouriɡes xalxs 
ramdenime tʰevzitsʰ hkʰondatʰ akurtʰxa da ubrdzana isitsʰ tʃamoeriɡebinatʰ 
cames da ɡadzɣnen dartʃenili natexebisɡan ʃvidi kalatʰi aiɣes 
isini ki otʰxi atʰasamde iqvnen da ɡauʃva qvelani 
da mqisve avida navze tʰavis motsapʰeebtʰan ertʰad da mividnen dalmanutʰis mxareʃi 
da ɡamovidnen pʰarisevelni da dautsqes dava da mostʰxoves tsʰidan niʃani rom ɡamoetsʰadatʰ 
sulitʰ amoioxra da tʰkʰva ristʰvis tʰxoulobs es modɡma niʃans ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom am modɡmas niʃani ar mietsʰema 
da miatova isini kvlav avida navze da ɡaɣma ɡavida 
da daavitsqdatʰ puris tsaɣeba navʃi ki ertʰi puris meti ara hkʰondatʰ 
daariɡa isini da utʰxra ɡapʰrətʰxilditʰ eridetʰ pʰariseveltʰa sapʰuars da herodiantʰa sapʰuars 
isini ki ertʰmanetʰʃi laparakobdnen albatʰ imitom rom puri ara ɡvakʰvso 
ieso mixvda da utʰxra matʰ ratom laparakobtʰ rom puri ara ɡakʰvtʰ nutʰu kidev ver ɡaɡiɡiatʰ da ver ʃeɡiɡniatʰ ɡuli ɡaɡikʰvavdatʰ 
tʰvalebi ɡakʰvtʰ da ver xedavtʰ quri ɡakʰvtʰ da ar ɡesmitʰ da artsʰ ɡaxsovtʰ 
rotsʰa xutʰi puri davtexe xutʰi atʰasi katsʰisatʰvis ramdeni ɡodori aiɣetʰ natexebitʰ savse utʰxres tʰormeti 
rotsʰa otʰxi atʰasisatʰvis ʃvidi puri davtexe ramdeni kalatʰi aiɣetʰ natexebitʰ savse utʰxres ʃvidi 
da utʰxra matʰ roɡor ver mixvditʰ 
mividnen betʰsaidaʃi da miuqvanes brma da evedrebodnen rom ʃexeboda mas 
da tʃahkida brmas xeli ɡaiqvana iɡi sopʰlidan tʰvalebze daanertsqva daado xeli da hkitʰxa xedav rames 
man aixeda da tʰkʰva irɡvliv mosiarule adamianebs vxedav xeebivitʰ 
ʃemdeɡ kvlav daado xeli tʰvalebze da mas tʰvalistʃini aɣudɡa ɡanikurna da qvelapʰeri natʰlad dainaxa 
da ɡaistumra ʃin da utʰxra sopʰelʃi nu ʃexval 
da datsavidnen ieso da misi motsapʰeebi pʰilipes kesariis sopʰlebʃi ɡzadaɡza elaparakeboda iɡi tʰavis motsapʰeebs da ekitʰxeboda ras ambobs xalxi vina var me 
matʰ utʰxres amboben ioane natʰlismtsʰemelio sxvebi eliao sxvebi ertʰ ertʰi tsinastsarmetqvelio 
da man hkitʰxa matʰ tʰkʰven raɣas itqvitʰ vin var me petrem utʰxra ʃen kʰriste xar 
da ɡaapʰrətʰxila isini rom aravistʰvis etʰkʰvatʰ masze 
da dautsqo stsavleba rom katsʰis dzes martʰebs mravali tandʒva aitanos uarqopʰil ikʰnes uxutsʰesebis mɣvdelmtʰavrebisa da mtsiɡnobrebis mier moiklas da mesame dɣes aɣdɡes 
da tsʰxadad ambobda sitqvas ɡverdze ɡaixmo petrem da dautsqo kitsʰxva 
is ki mobrunda da ɡadaxeda tʰavis motsapʰeebs petres ɡautsqra da utʰxra momtsʰildi satanav ɣvtʰisas rom ar pʰikʰrob aramed adamianisas 
da mouxmo xalxs tʰavis motsapʰeebtʰan ertʰad da utʰxra tʰu vinmes surs me momqves uarqos tʰavi aiɣos tʰavisi dʒvari da momdios me 
visatsʰ surs suli ʃeinartʃunos iɡi daɣupavs mas xolo vintsʰ tʃemi anda saxarebis ɡulistʰvis daɣupavs suls iɡi ʃeinartʃunebs mas 
ras arɡebs adamians tʰu mtʰel kʰveqnierebas ʃeidzens tʰavis suls ki avnebs 
an risi mitsʰema ʃeudzlia adamians tʰavisi sulis sanatsʰvlod 
radɡan visatsʰ ʃertsʰxveba tʃemi da tʃemi sitqvebisa am mruʃ da tsʰodvil modɡmaʃi katsʰis dzesatsʰ ʃertsʰxveba misi rotsʰa mova tʰavisi mamis didebaʃi tsmida anɡelozebtʰan ertʰad 
utʰxra matʰ ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven arian zoɡiertʰni akʰ mdɡomtʰaɡan romelnitsʰ ar iɡemeben sikvdils sanam ar ixilaven ɣvtʰis sasupʰevels dzlierebitʰ mosuls 
ekʰvsi dɣis ʃemdeɡ tsaiqvana iesom petre iakobi da ioane aiqvana maɣal mtʰaze ɡanmartoebitʰ da pʰeri itsʰvala matʰ tsinaʃe 
da ɡabrətsqinda misi samoseli da dzalze spetaki ɡaxda isetʰi rom ɡamtʰetʰrebels am kʰveqanaze ar dzaludzs ise ɡatʰetʰreba 
da etʃvena matʰ elia mosestʰan ertʰad da esaubrebodnen iesos 
miuɡo petrem da utʰxra iesos rabi karɡia tʃventʰvis akʰ qopʰna ɡavaketʰebtʰ sam karavs ertʰi ʃen ertʰi moses da ertʰitsʰ elias 
vinaidan ar itsʰoda ra etʰkʰva radɡan qvela ʃeʃinebuli iqo 
da ɡatʃnda ɣrubeli romelmatsʰ moutʃrdila matʰ da iqo xma ɣrublidan es aris tʃemi saqvareli dze isminetʰ misi 
uetsʰrad mimoixedes maɡram irɡvliv veravin dainaxes ɡarda iesosi 
rotsʰa mtʰidan tʃamodiodnen ubrdzana aravistʰvis etʰkʰvatʰ ratsʰ ixiles katsʰis dzis mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡomamde 
es sitqva ɡulʃi tʃaides da ertʰmanetʰs ekitʰxebodnen ras niʃnavso mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡoma 
da hkitʰxes mas ratom amboben mtsiɡnobrebi rom pirvelad elia unda movideso 
utʰxra matʰ martʰalia pirvelad elia unda movides da qovelive moatsesriɡos katsʰis dzeze ki roɡorɣaa datserili rom mas martʰebs bevri itandʒos da damtsʰirdes 
maɡram tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ rom elia movida da mas ise moekʰtsʰnen roɡortsʰ undodatʰ roɡortsʰ datserilia masze 
rotsʰa motsapʰeebtʰan mivida dainaxa matʰ irɡvliv diddzali xalxi da matʰtʰan modave mtsiɡnobrebi 
da mqisve dainaxa mtʰelma xalxma da ɡaukvirdatʰ da mirbodnen mastʰan da esalmebodnen 
hkitʰxa matʰ ras edavebitʰ amatʰ 
xalxidan ertʰ ertʰma miuɡo modzɣvaro ʃentʰan moviqvane tʃemi vaʒi romelsatsʰ utqvobis suli scirs 
sadatsʰ ki ʃeipqrobs dzirs anartsʰxebs da ɡadmosdis duʒi kbilebs aɣrcens da ʃeʃdeba vtʰxove ʃens motsapʰeebs rom ɡanedevnatʰ maɡram ver ʃedzles 
da man miuɡo matʰ da utʰxra hoi urtsmuno modɡmav rodemde vikʰnebi tʰkʰventʰan rodemde unda ɡitʰminotʰ tʰkʰven momiqvanetʰ iɡi 
da mouqvanes mas roɡortsʰ ki sulma dainaxa iɡi daanartsʰxa daetsʰa mitsaze da ɡoravda duʒmoreuli 
da hkitʰxa mis mamas ramdeni xania ratsʰ es daemartʰa utʰxra pataraobidan 
bevrdʒer tʃauɡdia tsʰetsʰxlsa da tsqalʃi rom daeɣupa tʰuki rame ʃeɡidzlia ɡviʃvele tʃven ʃeɡvibrale 
iesom utʰxra mas tʰu ki rame ʃeɡidzliao mortsmunisatʰvis qvelapʰeri ʃesadzlebelia 
bavʃvis mamam mqisve ʃesdzaxa tsʰremlitʰ da tʰkʰva mtsams uʃvele tʃems urtsmunoebas 
rotsʰa dainaxa iesom rom xalxi morbis ʃerisxa utsmiduri suli da utʰxra utqvo da qru sulo ɡibrdzaneb ɡadi maɡisɡan da aɣar ʃexvide masʃi 
ʃesdzaxa da maɡrad ʃeandʒɣria iɡi da ɡavida is ki mkvdarivitʰ ɡaxda ise rom bevri ambobda kidetsʰ rom is mokvda 
iesom daucira xeli tsamoaqena da isitsʰ pʰexze dadɡa 
ʃin rom ʃevida misma motsapʰeebma ɡanmartoebitʰ hkitʰxes mas tʃven ratom ver ɡavdevnetʰ iɡi 
utʰxra matʰ es modɡma verapʰritʰ ɡamova tʰu ara lotsʰvitʰa da marxvitʰ 
ikʰidan tsasulebi ɡalileaze ɡadiodnen ar undoda vinmes etsʰno 
astsavlida tʰavis motsapʰeebs da eubneboda katsʰis dze ɡadatsʰemul ikʰneba katsʰtʰa xelʃi moklaven mas da mesame dɣes aɣdɡeba 
matʰ ver ɡaiɡes es sitqvebi da eʃinodatʰ rom ʃekitʰxodnen mas 
da mividnen kapernaumʃi saxlʃi qopʰnisas hkitʰxa matʰ raze msdʒelobditʰ ɡzaʃi 
isini dumdnen vinaidan ɡzaʃi ertʰmanetʰʃi msdʒelobdnen vin upʰro didiao 
da dadʒda da daudzaxa tʰormets da utʰxra tʰu vinmes unda pirveli iqos is ikʰneba qvelaze ukanaskneli da qvelas msaxuri 
moiqvana bavʃvi tʃaaqena matʰ ʃua moexvia da utʰxra matʰ 
vintsʰ miiɣebs ertʰ asetʰ bavʃvs tʃemi saxelitʰ is me mimiɣebs xolo vintsʰ me mimiɣebs is me ki ar miɣebs aramed tʃems momavlinebels 
utʰxra mas ioanem modzɣvaro tʃven vnaxetʰ katsʰi romelitsʰ ʃeni saxelitʰ eʃmakebs devnis tʃven ki ar moɡvqveba da avukrdzaletʰ mas radɡan tʃven ar moɡvqveba 
iesom tʰkʰva nu ukrdzalavtʰ vinaidan aravis vintsʰ tʃemi saxelitʰ sastsauls axdens ar dzaludzs tʃemi ase iolad ɡmoba 
vinaidan vintsʰ tʃveni tsinaaɣmdeɡi ar aris is tʃventʰan aris 
vintsʰ tsqals ʃeɡasmevtʰ sasmisitʰ tʃemi saxelitʰ raki kʰristesni xartʰ ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven mas ar daekarɡeba tʰavisi sazɣauri 
xolo vintsʰ ertʰ am mtsʰiretʰaɡans tʃemi mortsmuneebidan atsʰdunebs mistʰvis adʒobebda tsiskʰvilis kʰva daekidatʰ kiserze da zɣvaʃi ɡadaeɡdotʰ 
tʰu ɡatsʰdunebs ʃeni xeli moikvetʰe iɡi ɡidʒobs dasaxitʃrebuli ʃexvide sitsʰotsʰxleʃi vidre ori xelis mkʰone ʃexvide dʒodʒoxetʰʃi uʃretel tsʰetsʰxlʃi 
sadatsʰ matli matʰi ar kvdeba da tsʰetsʰxli ar neldeba 
tʰu ɡatsʰdunebs ʃeni pʰexi moikvetʰe iɡi ɡidʒobs kocli ʃexvide sitsʰotsʰxleʃi vidre ori pʰexi ɡkʰondes da dʒodʒoxetʰʃi tʃaɡaɡdon 
sadatsʰ matli matʰi ar kvdeba da tsʰetsʰxli ar neldeba 
tʰu ɡatsʰdunebs ʃeni tʰvali amoitʰxare iɡi ɡidʒobs tsʰali tʰvalitʰ ʃexvide ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi vidre ori tʰvali ɡkʰondes da tʃaɡaɡdon dʒodʒoxetʰʃi 
sadatsʰ matli matʰi ar kvdeba da tsʰetsʰxli ar neldeba 
vinaidan qvela tsʰetsʰxlitʰ damarildeba da qoveli msxverpli marilitʰ damarildeba 
marili karɡia maɡram tʰu marili umarilo ɡaxdeba riɣatʰi ʃeanelebtʰ mas ikʰonietʰ tʰkʰvenʃi marili da mʃvidobianad iqavitʰ ertʰmanetʰʃi 
da adɡa ikʰidan da mivida iudeis mxareʃi da iordanes ɡaɣma kvlav moɡrovda mastʰan xalxi da tʰavis tʃveulebisamebr kvlav astsavlida matʰ 
movidnen pʰarisevelni da ekitʰxebodnen tʰu ʃeudzlia katsʰs tsʰolis ɡaʃveba da stsʰdidnen mas 
man miuɡo da utʰxra matʰ ra daɡitsesatʰ mosem 
matʰ tʰkʰves ɡaqris tsiɡnis datsera da ɡaʃveba 
iesom utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰveni ɡulkʰvaobis ɡamo daɡitseratʰ man es mtsʰneba 
maɡram ʃekʰmnis dasabamidan ɣmertʰma mamakatsʰad da dedakatsʰad ʃekʰmna isini 
amitom miatovebs katsʰi mamas da dedas da miekroba tʰavis tsʰols 
da orni ikʰnebian ertʰ xortsʰad amriɡad isini orni ki ar arian ertʰi xortsʰi arian 
amriɡad ratsʰ ɣmertʰma ʃeauɣla katsʰi nu ɡaqris matʰ 
saxlʃi motsapʰeebma kvlav hkitʰxes amaze 
da eubneba matʰ vintsʰ tʰavis tsʰols ɡauʃvebs da sxvas ʃeirtʰavs iɡi mruʃobs mis mimartʰ 
tʰu tsʰoli ɡaeqreba kʰmars da sxvas mistʰxovdeba mruʃobs 
da mohqavdatʰ mastʰan bavʃvebi ratʰa ʃexeboda matʰ motsapʰeebi ki saqvedurobdnen momqvanebs 
dainaxa iesom ɡatsqra da utʰxra matʰ ɡamouʃvitʰ bavʃvebi da nu dauʃlitʰ tʃemtʰan mosvlas vinaidan maɡatʰnairebisaa ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven vintsʰ bavʃvivitʰ ar miiɣebs ɣvtʰis sasupʰevels ver ʃeva ʃiɡ 
moexvia matʰ xelebi daasxa da akurtʰxa isini 
ɡzaze rom ɡamodioda viɣatsʰ katsʰma miirbina mastʰan muxli moiqara mis tsinaʃe da ʃeevedra ketʰilo modzɣvaro ra vkʰna rom saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle davimkvidro 
iesom utʰxra mas ratom mitsodeb me ketʰils aravin aris ketʰili ɡarda ertʰi ɣmertʰisa 
itsʰi mtsʰnebani ar imruʃo ar kla ar iparo ar iqo tsʰrumotsme ar moatquo pativi etsʰi ʃens mamas da dedas 
man utʰxra modzɣvaro qovelive amas tʃemi sicabukidan vitsʰavdi 
ieso daakvirda mas da ʃeuqvarda da utʰxra ertʰi ram ɡaklia tsadi ratsʰ ɡakʰvs ɡaqide da ɣaribebs dauriɡe da zetsʰaʃi ɡekʰneba saundʒe mere modi da ɡamomqevi 
is ʃetsuxda am sitqvebze da danaɣvlianebuli tsavida vinaidan diddzali kʰoneba hkʰonda 
iesom mimoixeda da utʰxra tʰavis motsapʰeebs ra dzneli ikʰneba simdidris mkʰonetʰa ʃesvla ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi 
motsapʰeebi ɡantsʰvipʰrədnen mis sitqvebze iesom kvlav miuɡo da utʰxra matʰ ʃvilebo ra dznelia ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi ʃesvla matʰtʰvis vintsʰ simdidrezea dandobili 
umal akʰlemi ɡadzvreba nemsis quntsʃi vidre mdidari ʃeva ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi 
imatʰ ki upʰro metad ɡaiotsʰes da ertʰmanetʰʃi ambobdnen visɣa ʃeudzlia ɡadartʃena 
ʃexeda matʰ iesom da tʰkʰva es katsʰtʰatʰvis aris ʃeudzlebeli da ara ɣvtʰisatʰvis radɡan ɣvtʰisatʰvis qovelive ʃesadzlebelia 
dautsqo petrem mas laparaki aha tʃven qvelapʰeri mivatovetʰ da ʃen ɡamoɡqevitʰ 
tʰkʰva iesom ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven aravin aris rom tʃemi ɡulistʰvis da saxarebis ɡulistʰvis mietovebinos saxli an dzmebi an debi an mama an deda an tsʰoli an ʃvilebi an mitsebi 
da astsilad ar mieɣos axla amʒamad saxlebi dzmebi da debi dedebi da ʃvilebi da mitsebi am devnastʰan ertʰad xolo momaval saukuneʃi saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle 
maɡram bevrni pirvelni ukanasknelni ikʰnebian xolo ukanasknelni pirvelni 
ierusalims mimaval ɡzas rom adɡnen tsin ieso miudzɣodatʰ da krtʰodnen isini tʰanmxlebtʰatsʰ eʃinodatʰ kvlav daudzaxa tʰormets da dautsqo laparaki imaze tʰu ra ʃeemtʰxveoda mas 
aha tʃven avdivartʰ ierusalims da katsʰis dze ɡadaetsʰema mɣvdelmtʰavrebsa da mtsiɡnobrebs sasikvdilo msdʒavrs dasdeben da tsarmartʰebs ɡadastsʰemen 
ʃeuratsʰqopʰen mas ɡaʃoltaven ʃeapʰurtʰxeben da moklaven mesame dɣes ki aɣdɡeba 
da mividnen mastʰan zebedes dzeni iakobi da ioane da utʰxres modzɣvaro ɡvinda ʃeɡvisrulo rasatsʰ ɡtʰxovtʰ 
man utʰxra matʰ ra ɡindatʰ rom ʃeɡisrulotʰ 
matʰ utʰxres mas neba moɡvetsʰi ertʰi tʃvenɡani ʃens mardʒvniv dadʒdes da meore martsʰxniv ʃens didebaʃi 
iesom utʰxra matʰ ar itsʰitʰ ras itʰxovtʰ ɡana ʃeɡidzliatʰ is sasmisi ʃesvatʰ romelsatsʰ me vsvam da is natʰloba miiɣotʰ romlitʰatsʰ me vinatʰlebi 
matʰ utʰxres ʃeɡvidzlia iesom utʰxra matʰ sasmiss romelsatsʰ me vsvam ʃesvamtʰ da natʰlobitʰ romlitʰatsʰ me vinatʰlebi moinatʰlebitʰ 
maɡram tʃems mardʒvniv an martsʰxniv dadʒdoma tʃemze ar aris aramed matʰze vistʰvisatsʰ ɡamzadebulia 
da moismina im atʰma da daitsqes drətvinva iakobze da ioaneze 
iesom uxmo matʰ da utʰxra tʰkʰven itsʰitʰ rom isini vintsʰ xalxebis mtʰavrebad arian mitʃneulni batonoben matʰze da matʰi didebulni xelmtsipʰeben matʰze 
maɡram tʰkʰvens ʃoris ase nu ikʰneba aramed visatsʰ tʰkʰvens ʃoris didoba surs is tʰkʰveni msaxuri iqos 
visatsʰ tʰkʰvens ʃoris pirveloba surs is iqos qvelas mona 
radɡan dze katsʰisa ar mosula imisatʰvis rom mas emsaxuron aramed imisatʰvis rom tʰavad emsaxuros da mistsʰes tʰavisi suli mravaltʰa ɡamosasqidad 
da mividnen ierixos ierixodan rom ɡadioda tʰavis motsapʰeebtʰan da diddzal xalxtʰan ertʰad ɡzis piras idʒda brma matʰxovari times dze bartimaiosi 
rotsʰa ɡaiɡo ieso nazareveliao mortʰo qvirili da ambobda ieso davitʰis dzeo ʃemitsqale 
bevri utsqreboda mas rom ɡaetʃumebinatʰ maɡram upʰro metad qviroda davitʰis dzeo ʃemitsqale 
da ʃedɡa ieso da tʰkʰva daudzaxetʰ mas da daudzaxes brmas da utʰxres nu ɡeʃinia adekʰi ɡedzaxis 
man ɡadaiɡdo mosasxami adɡa da mivida iesostʰan 
miuɡo mas iesom da tʰkʰva ra ɡinda rom ɡaɡiketʰo brmam utʰxra rabuni rom tʰvali amexilos 
iesom utʰxra mas tsadi ʃenma rətsmenam ɡixsna da mqisve aexila tʰvali da ɡaedevna mas ɡzaze 
rotsʰa miuaxlovdnen ierusalims betʰbaɡes da betʰanias zetʰisxilis mtʰastʰan ɡaaɡzavna ori tʰavisi motsapʰetʰaɡani 
utʰxra matʰ tsaditʰ sopʰelʃi tʰkʰvens tsin rom aris roɡortsʰ ki ʃiɡ ʃexvaltʰ maʃinve ipovitʰ dabmul tʃotʃors romelzetsʰ dʒer katsʰi ar ʃemdʒdara axsenitʰ da momiqvanetʰ 
tʰu vinmem ɡitʰxratʰ amas ras ʃvrebitʰo utʰxaritʰ rom upʰals scirdeba da umal daɡibrunebs tʰkʰo 
tsavidnen da ipoves kʰutʃaʃi kartʰan dabmuli tʃotʃori da auʃves iɡi 
ikʰ mdɡomtʰaɡan zoɡiertʰma utʰxra matʰ ras ʃvrebitʰ ratom xsnitʰ tʃotʃors 
matʰ utʰxres roɡortsʰ iesom utʰxratʰ da moeʃvnen matʰ 
da mihɡvares tʃotʃori iesos zed tʰaviantʰi tanisamosi daupʰines da ʃedʒda masze 
bevrma daupʰina ɡzaze mas tʰavisi tanisamosi zoɡma ki mindorʃi mocrili totebi 
tsin mimavalni da ukan mimqolnitsʰ ɣaɣadebdnen osana kurtʰxeul ars upʰlis saxelitʰ momavali 
kurtʰxeul ars tʃveni mamis davitʰis momavali samepʰo osana maɣaltʰa ʃina 
da ʃevida ieso ierusalimʃi tadzarʃi da daatʰvaliera qvelapʰeri ukve ɡviani iqo da tʰormettʰan ertʰad ɡavida betʰaniisaken 
meore dɣes betʰaniidan rom ɡavidnen moʃivda 
ʃoridan dainaxa ɡapʰotʰlili leɣvis xe da tsavida rom zed rame epova rom mivida verapʰeri ipova pʰotʰlebis meti ar iqo leɣvobis dro 
miubrunda da utʰxra mas nuɣaravin camos ukunisamde naqopʰi ʃeni da ɡaiɡones misma motsapʰeebma 
da mividnen ierusalimʃi da ʃevida tadzarʃi ieso da daitsqo ɡamqidveltʰa da mqidveltʰa ɡamorekva mekermetʰa daxlebi da mtredebis ɡamqidveltʰa merxebi aaqirava 
ar anebebda raime ɡaetar ɡamoetarebinatʰ tadzarze 
da astsavlida matʰ da eubneboda ar stseria tʃemi saxli qvela xalxis samlotsʰvelo saxlad itsodebao tʰkʰven ki avazaktʰa bunaɡad akʰtsʰietʰ 
ɡaiɡones mɣvdelmtʰavrebma da edzebdnen roɡor daeɣupatʰ iɡi radɡan eʃinodatʰ misi raki mtʰeli xalxi ɡaotsʰebuli iqo misi modzɣvrebitʰ 
rotsʰa mosaɣamovda ɡavidnen kʰalakʰidan 
dilitʰ tʃaiares da dainaxes rom leɣvi pʰesvebamde ɡamxmariqo 
da ɡaaxsenda petres da utʰxra mas rabi aha is leɣvi ʃen rom dastsqevle ɡamxmara 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ 
ikʰonietʰ ɣvtʰis rətsmena ceʃmaritad ɡetqvitʰ rom vintsʰ etqvis am mtʰas aitsie da zɣvaʃi tʃavardio da ɡulʃi ar ʃeecvdeba aramed irtsmunebs rom misi sitqvisamebr moxdeba ausruldeba mas 
amitom ɡeubnebitʰ qvelapʰers rasatsʰ lotsʰvaʃi itʰxovtʰ ɡtsamdetʰ rom miiɣebtʰ da tʰkʰveni ikʰneba 
rotsʰa lotsʰvad dɡaxartʰ miutevetʰ tʰu raime ɡakʰvtʰ vinmes tsinaaɣmdeɡ ratʰa tʰkʰvenma mamamatsʰ zetsʰaʃi moɡiteotʰ tʰkʰveni ʃetsʰodebani 
xolo tʰu tʰkʰven ar miutevebtʰ artsʰ tʰkʰveni mama romelitsʰ zetsʰaʃia moɡitevebtʰ tʰkʰvens ʃetsʰodebebs 
kvlav mividnen ierusalimʃi da rotsʰa iɡi tadzarʃi mimodioda mɣvdelmtʰavarni mtsiɡnobarni da uxutsʰesni mividnen mastʰan 
da utʰxres mas romeli xelmtsipʰebitʰ aketʰeb amas an vin moɡtsʰa ʃen es xelmtsipʰeba 
iesom utʰxra matʰ metsʰ ɡkitʰxavtʰ ertʰ sitqvas mipasuxetʰ da metsʰ ɡetqvitʰ romeli xelmtsipʰebitʰ vaketʰeb amas 
ioanes natʰlistsʰema zetsʰidan iqo tʰu katsʰtʰaɡan aba mipasuxetʰ 
isini ertʰmanetʰʃi bcobdnen tʰu vitqvitʰ rom zetsʰidano ɡvetqvis maʃ raɣatom ar itsametʰo misi 
xolo tʰu itqodnen katsʰtʰaɡano xalxisa eʃinodatʰ vinaidan qvelas miatʃnda rom ioane namdvilad tsinastsarmetqveli iqo 
da miuɡes iesos da utʰxres ar vitsʰitʰ iesom utʰxra matʰ artsʰ me ɡetqvitʰ romeli xelmtsipʰebitʰ vaketʰeb amas 
da daitsqo matʰtʰan iɡavebitʰ laparaki katsʰma vazi tʃaqara ɣobe ʃemoavlo satsnaxeli amokvetʰa da ʃiɡ koʃki tʃadɡa tʃaabara iɡi mitsismuʃakebs da tsavida 
ʒamma rom moatsia ertʰi mona ɡauɡzavna mitsismuʃaktʰ mitsismuʃaktʰaɡan venaxis naqopʰis misaɣebad 
matʰ ki ʃeipqres iɡi stsʰemes da xeltsʰarieli ɡauʃves 
kvlav sxva mona ɡauɡzavna iɡi tʰavʃi dacres da ʃeuratsʰxqves 
sxva ɡaɡzavna da mokles is da kidev bevri sxva zoɡsa stsʰemes da zoɡitsʰ mokles 
hqavda ertʰi saqvareli dze bolos isitsʰ ɡauɡzavna matʰ tʰkʰva tʃemi dzis moeridebatʰo 
mitsismuʃakebma utʰxres ertʰmanetʰs es misi memkvidrea moditʰ movklatʰ da memkvidreoba tʃven daɡvrtʃebao 
da ʃeipqres iɡi mokles da ɡadaaɡdes venaxidan 
ras izams venaxis patroni miva amotsqvets mitsismuʃaktʰ da venaxs sxvebs ɡadastsʰems 
nutʰu ar tsaɡikitʰxavtʰ es tserili kʰva mʃeneblebma rom daitsunes kʰvakutʰxedad ikʰtsʰa 
upʰlisɡan moxda es da saotsʰrebaa tʃvens tʰvalʃi 
ʃeetsʰadnen mis ʃepqrobas maɡram xalxisa ʃeeʃindatʰ vinaidan mixvdnen rom matʰze tʰkʰva es iɡavi da miatoves iɡi da tsavidnen 
da miuɡzavnes mas zoɡiertʰi pʰariseveltʰaɡan da herodiantʰaɡan rom daeciratʰ sitqvaʃi 
mividnen da utʰxres modzɣvaro vitsʰitʰ rom tsrpʰeli xar da qvelas mimartʰ miukerdzoebeli radɡan katsʰtʰa mdɡomareobas ar uqureb aramed sitsrpʰelitʰ astsavli ɣvtʰis ɡzas unda vadzliotʰ xarki keisars tʰu ara mivtsʰetʰ tʰu ar mivtsʰetʰ 
man itsʰoda matʰi tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰoba da utʰxra matʰ ratom mtsʰditʰ momitanetʰ dinari rom davxedo 
miutanes da maʃinve utʰxra matʰ visia es saxe da tsartsera keisrisao utʰxres mas 
iesom utʰxra matʰ mietsʰitʰ keisrisa keisars da ɣvtʰisa ɣmertʰs da ukvirdatʰ misi 
da mividnen mastʰan sadukevelni romelnitsʰ ambobdnen aɣdɡoma ar ariso da hkitʰxes mas 
modzɣvaro mosem daɡvitsera tʰu vinmes moukvdeba dzma da dartʃeba mas tsʰoli xolo ʃvili ar dartʃeba misma dzmam unda ʃeirtʰos is tsʰoli da aɣudɡinos tʰesli tʰavis dzmas 
iqo ʃvidi dzma pirvelma ʃeirtʰo tsʰoli da ise mokvda ʃtʰamomavloba ar dartʃenia 
meorem ʃeirtʰo iɡi da mokvda artsʰ mas dartʃenia ʃtʰamomavloba aseve mesamem 
ʃvidtʰaɡan artsʰ ertʰs ar dartʃenia ʃtʰamomavloba qvelas ʃemdeɡ ki dedakatsʰitsʰ mokvda 
aɣdɡomisas rotsʰa aɣdɡebian romeli matʰɡanis tsʰoli ikʰneba is xom ʃvidives hqavda tsʰolad 
utʰxra matʰ iesom imitom xom ar tsʰdebitʰ rom ar itsʰitʰ artsʰ tserilebi da artsʰ dzalni ɣvtʰisa 
radɡan mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡomisas artsʰ tsʰols irtʰaven artsʰ tʰxovdebian aramed arian roɡortsʰ anɡelozebi tsʰaʃi 
xolo imis tʰaobaze rom mkvdrebi aɣdɡebian nutʰu ar amoɡikitʰxavtʰ moses tsiɡnʃi roɡor utʰxra maqvlis butʃkʰtʰan ɣmertʰma mas me var ɣmertʰi abraamisa ɣmertʰi isakisa da ɣmertʰi iakobisa 
ɣmertʰi mkvdrebisa ki araa aramed tsʰotsʰxlebisa dzalian stsʰdebitʰ 
mivida mastʰan ertʰi mtsiɡnobartʰaɡani romelitsʰ qurs uɡdebda matʰ kamatʰs da itsʰoda rom man karɡi pasuxi ɡastsʰa matʰ da hkitʰxa romelia upirvelesi mtsʰneba 
miuɡo iesom pirveli aris ismine israelo upʰali ɣmertʰi tʃveni ertʰi upʰalia 
ʃeiqvare upʰali ɣmertʰi ʃeni mtʰeli ʃeni ɡulitʰ mtʰeli ʃeni sulitʰ mtʰeli ʃeni ɡonebitʰ mtʰeli ʃeni ʃedzlebitʰ es aris pirveli mtsʰneba 
meore aris ʃeiqvare moqvasi ʃeni roɡortsʰ tʰavi ʃeni amatʰze didi mtsʰneba ar arsebobs 
utʰxra mas im mtsiɡnobarma ketʰili modzɣvaro ceʃmariteba tʰkʰvi ʃen vinaidan ertʰia da sxva aravin aris mis ɡarda 
ɡiqvardes iɡi mtʰeli ɡulitʰ mtʰeli ɡonebitʰ mtʰeli sulitʰ mtʰeli dzalitʰ da ɡiqvardes moqvasi roɡortsʰ tʰavi ʃeni es qovel sruladdasatsvelsa da ʃesatsiravze metia 
iesom dainaxa rom man ɡonivrulad upasuxa da utʰxra mas ʃors ar dɡaxar ɣvtʰis sasupʰevlisaɡan amis ʃemdeɡ veɣaravin ʃebeda rame ekitʰxa 
miuɡo iesom da tʰkʰva rotsʰa kvlav astsavlida tadzarʃi roɡor amboben mtsiɡnobarni rom kʰriste davitʰis dzea 
tʰvitʰon davitʰma tʰkʰva sulitsmiditʰ utʰxra upʰalma tʃems upʰals dadʒekʰi tʃems mardʒvniv vidre davamxobde ʃens mtrebs ʃens pʰerxtʰa sadɡamad 
tʰvitʰon davitʰi upʰals utsodebs mas da roɡorɣa aris misi dze mravali xalxi usmenda mas motsadinebitʰ 
da tʰkʰva tʰavisi modzɣvrebidan eridetʰ mtsiɡnobrebs romeltʰatsʰ ɡrdzeli samoslitʰ siaruli da moednebze mokitʰxvani uqvartʰ 
xolo sinaɡoɡebʃi tsina riɡebi da nadimebze tsina adɡilebi 
romelnitsʰ camen kʰvrivtʰa saxlebs da mosatʃveneblad didxans lotsʰuloben isini upʰro did sasdʒels miiɣeben 
idʒda saɡandzuris tsin ieso da xedavda roɡor qrida xalxi pʰuls saɡandzurʃi mravalma mdidarma bevri tʃaqara 
movida ertʰi ɣaribi kʰvrivi dedakatsʰi da tʃado ori lepta romelitsʰ kodrants ʃeadɡens 
daudzaxa man tʰavis motsapʰeebs da utʰxra ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven am ɣaribma kʰvrivma saɡandzurʃi qvela tʃamdebze meti tʃado 
vinaidan qvelam tʰavisi mocarbebulidan tʃado aman ki tʰavisi sinaklulidan tʃado qvelapʰeri ratsʰ ki sasitsʰotsʰxlod ɡaatʃnda 
rotsʰa tadzridan ɡamodioda ertʰma motsapʰetʰaɡanma utʰxra ʃexede modzɣvaro ra lodebia da ra ʃenobebi 
iesom utʰxra mas xedav am did ʃenobebs kʰva kʰvaze ar dartʃeba akʰ rom ar tʃamoikʰtsʰes 
rotsʰa zetʰisxilis mtʰaze idʒda tadzris ɡastsvriv hkitʰxes mas ɡanmartoebitʰ mqopʰma petrem iakobma ioanem da andriam 
ɡvitʰxari rodis moxdeba es da ra ikʰneba imis niʃani rotsʰa qovelive es unda moxdes 
iesom dautsqo matʰ laparaki ɡapʰrətʰxilditʰ rom aravin ʃeɡatsʰdinotʰ 
radɡan bevrni movlen tʃemi saxelitʰ da itqvian me varo da mravals ʃeatsʰdenen 
rotsʰa moismentʰ omebze da omebis xmebze nu ʃedzrtsundebitʰ es unda moxdes maɡram dʒer kidev ar aris aɣsasruli 
aɣdɡeba eri eris tsinaaɣmdeɡ da samepʰo samepʰos tsinaaɣmdeɡ ikʰneba mitsisdzvrebi adɡil adɡil da ʃimʃilobebi es mʃobiarobis tkiviltʰa dasatsqisia 
tʰkʰven ki mixedetʰ tʰkʰvens tʰavs ɡadaɡtsʰemen samsdʒavroze ɡtsʰemen sinaɡoɡebʃi ɡanmɡebeltʰa da mepʰetʰa tsinaʃe tsarsdɡebitʰ tʃems ɡamo matʰ tsinaʃe dasamotsmeblad 
dʒer saxareba unda ekʰadaɡos qvela ers 
rotsʰa tsaɡiqvanen ɡadasatsʰemad nu izrunebtʰ tsinastsar ra ilaparakotʰ aramed ratsʰ im ʒams moɡetsʰematʰ is ilaparaketʰ vinaidan tʰkʰven ki ar ilaparakebtʰ aramed sulitsmida 
dzma dzmas ɡadastsʰems sasikvdilod da mama ʃvils aɣdɡebian ʃvilebi mʃoblebis tsinaaɣmdeɡ da daxotsʰaven matʰ 
modzulebulni ikʰnebitʰ qvelas mier tʃemi saxelis ɡamo xolo vintsʰ bolome moitʰmens ɡadartʃeba 
rotsʰa ixilavtʰ ɡatialebis sibiltses ikʰ sadatsʰ ar xams iudeaʃi mqopʰma mtʰebs miaʃuros 
vintsʰ erdoze ikʰneba nu tʃamova da nurtsʰ ʃeva ʃin raimes ɡamosatanad 
vintsʰ mindorʃi ikʰneba nu dabrundeba ukan tʰavisi samoslis ɡamosatanad 
xolo vai orsulebs da medzudzurebs im dɣeebʃi 
ilotsʰetʰ rom es zamtʰarʃi ar moxdes 
vinaidan im dɣeebʃi isetʰi ɡasaciri ikʰneba romlis msɡavsi ar qopʰila kʰveqnis dasabamidan romelitsʰ ʃekʰmna ɣmertʰma dɣevandel dɣemde da aɣartsʰ arasodes ikʰneba 
upʰals rom ar ʃeemoklebina is dɣeebi vera xortsʰieli ver ɡadartʃeboda maɡram is dɣeebi ʃeamokla im rtʃeultʰatʰvis romlebitsʰ man amoirtʃia 
maʃin tʰu vinme ɡetqvitʰ aha akʰ ariso kʰriste an aha ikʰo ar ertsmunotʰ 
vinaidan aɣdɡebian tsʰrukʰristeebi da tsʰrutsinastsarmetqvelni da moimokʰmedeben sastsaulebsa da niʃnebs ratʰa rtʃeulni ʃeatsʰdinon tʰu ki ʃedzleben 
tʰkʰven ki ɡapʰrətʰxilditʰ tsinastsar ɡitʰxaritʰ qvelapʰeri 
maɡram im dɣeebʃi im ɡasaciris ʃemdɡom mze dabneldeba da mtʰvare aɣar ɡamostsʰems tʰavis natʰels 
ikʰneba varskvlavtʰa tsʰvena da ʃeirqevian tsʰiuri dzalebi 
maʃin ixilaven katsʰis dzes ɣrublebze momavals diadi dzalitʰ da didebitʰ 
maʃin iɡi tsarɡzavnis tʰavis anɡelozebs da ʃekreben mis rtʃeulebs otʰxtʰav kʰartʰaɡan mitsis kididan tsʰis kidemde 
leɣvisaɡan istsavletʰ maɡalitʰi rotsʰa misi rtoebi darbildeba da ʃeipʰotʰleba itsʰitʰ rom axloa zapʰxuli 
aseve rotsʰa ixilavtʰ rom es qovelive xdeba itsʰodetʰ rom karsaa momdɡari 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven ar ɡadaivlis es tʰaoba vidre qovelive es ar moxdeba 
tsʰa da mitsa ɡadavlen tʃemi sitqvebi ki ar ɡadavlen 
maɡram im dɣeze da ʒamze aravin itsʰis artsʰ tsʰiurma anɡelozebma artsʰ dzem aramed mxolod mamam 
ipʰrətʰxiletʰ ipʰxizletʰ da ilotsʰetʰ radɡan ar itsʰitʰ rodis dadɡeba is ʒami 
roɡortsʰ ʃor ɡzaze mimavalma katsʰma miatovos tʰavisi saxli tʰavis monebs mistsʰes xelmtsipʰeba da qvelas tʰavisi sakʰme miutʃinos da mekares ubrdzanos pʰxizlad qopʰna 
ise ipʰxizletʰ radɡan ar itsʰitʰ rodis mova saxlis patroni saɣamotʰi tʰu ʃuaɣamisas mamlis qivilze tʰu ɡantʰiadisas 
ratʰa moulodnelad rom movides mdzinareni ar ɡpovotʰ 
rasatsʰ tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ qvelas veubnebi ipʰxizletʰ 
ori dɣis ʃemdeɡ pasekʰisa da upʰuarobis dɣesastsauli iqo mɣvdelmtʰavarni da mtsiɡnobarni edziebdnen roɡor ʃeepqrotʰ iɡi mzakvrobitʰ da moeklatʰ 
da ambobdnen oɣond dɣesastsaulze ara ratʰa xalxi ar aɣʃpʰotʰdeso 
rotsʰa ieso betʰaniaʃi iqo simon ketʰrovnis saxlʃi da inaxad idʒda mivida dedakatsʰi romelsatsʰ alebastronis curclitʰ hkʰonda supʰtʰa nelsatsʰxebeli dzvirad ɣirebuli nardisa da ɡatexa man alebastroni da tʰavze daasxa mas 
iqvnen zoɡiertʰni romlebitsʰ aɣʃpʰotʰebitʰ laparakobdnen ertʰmanetʰʃi ase rad daixardʒa nelsatsʰxebelio 
xom ʃeidzleboda am nelsatsʰxeblis ɡaqidva samas dinarze metad da ɣaribebisatʰvis dariɡeba da kitsʰxavdnen mas 
iesom tʰkʰva moeʃvitʰ maɡas ratom atsuxebtʰ maɡan xom siketʰe miqo 
vinaidan ɣaribni mudam tʰkʰventʰana ɡqavtʰ da tʰuki moisurvebtʰ ʃeɡidzliatʰ siketʰe uqotʰ matʰ me ki mudam ar ɡeqolebitʰ 
man is ɡaaketʰa ratsʰ ʃeedzlo tsinastsar stsʰxo tʃems sxeuls dasamarxavad 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven sadatsʰ ki ikʰadaɡeben saxarebas mtʰel sopʰelʃi itqvian ratsʰ man ɡaaketʰa mis mosaɡoneblad 
iuda iskarioteli ertʰi im tʰormettʰaɡani tsavida mɣvdelmtʰavrebtʰan ratʰa ɡaetsʰa iɡi 
matʰ moismines ɡaixares da aɣutʰkʰves mas vertsʰxlis mitsʰema is ki mardʒve ʃemtʰxvevas edzebda ratʰa ɡaetsʰa iɡi 
upʰuarobis pirvel dɣes rotsʰa sapasekʰo kravi ikvleboda misma motsapʰeebma utʰxres mas sad ɡinda rom tsavidetʰ da moɡimzadotʰ sacmelad pasekʰi 
ɡaɡzavna ori tʰavisi motsapʰetʰaɡani da utʰxra matʰ tsaditʰ kʰalakʰʃi da ʃemoɡeqrebatʰ katsʰi romelsatsʰ kokitʰ tsqali moakʰvs ɡahqevitʰ mas 
sadatsʰ ʃeva utʰxaritʰ saxlis patrons modzɣvarma tʰkʰva sad aris tʃemi sastumro otʰaxi tʃems motsapʰeebtʰan ertʰad rom vcamo pasekʰi 
is ɡitʃvenebtʰ zemotʰvals mopʰardaɡebulsa da ɡamzadebuls ikʰ moɡvimzadetʰ 
da ɡamovidnen misi motsapʰeebi ʃevidnen kʰalakʰʃi da ipoves roɡortsʰ man utʰxra da moamzades pasekʰi 
rom mosaɣamovda tʰormettʰan ertʰad movida iɡi 
rotsʰa isxdnen da camdnen iesom tʰkʰva ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven ertʰi tʰkʰvenɡani romelitsʰ tʃemtʰan ertʰad cams ɡamtsʰems me 
isini danaɣvliandnen da hkitʰxes satʰitʰaod me xom ara var 
man utʰxra matʰ ertʰi tʰormettʰaɡani tʃemtʰan ertʰad dʒamʃi tʃamtsobi 
radɡan katsʰis dze midis roɡortsʰ datserilia masze maɡram vai im katsʰs vis mieratsʰ ɡaitsʰema dze katsʰisa im katsʰisatʰvis umdʒobesi ikʰneboda ar dabadebuliqo 
rotsʰa isini camdnen aiɣo iesom puri akurtʰxa datexa mistsʰa matʰ da tʰkʰva aiɣetʰ da cametʰ es tʃemi sxeulia 
aiɣo sasmisi madli ʃestsira da mistsʰa matʰ da ikʰidan ʃesva qvelam 
utʰxra matʰ es aris tʃemi sisxli axali aɣtʰkʰmisa mravaltʰatʰvis daɣvrili 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven mets aɣar ʃevsvam vazis naqopʰisaɡan im dɣemde rotsʰa ʃevsvam axals ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi 
iɡalobes da ɡavidnen zetʰisxilis mtʰaze 
utʰxra matʰ iesom qvelani tsʰdundebitʰ vinaidan datserilia davtsʰem mtsqemss da ɡaipʰantebian tsʰxvrebi 
xolo tʃemi aɣdɡomis mere tsin tsaɡidzɣvebitʰ ɡalileaʃi 
petrem utʰxra mas tʰundatsʰ qvelani tsʰdundnen maɡram me ara 
utʰxra mas iesom ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebi ʃen amaɣam sanam mamali ordʒer iqivlebdes samdʒer uarmqopʰ 
is ki meti tʰavɡamodebitʰ eubneboda tʰundatsʰ rom movkvde ʃentʰan ertʰad ar uarɡqopʰo aseve ambobdnen sxvebitsʰ 
mividnen adɡilze romlis saxelia ɡetʰsimania da utʰxra tʰavis motsapʰeebs isxeditʰ akʰ sanam vlotsʰulob 
da tsaiqvana tʰavistʰan petre iakobi da ioane da itsqo tsuxili da urva 
utʰxra matʰ sasikvdilod aris damtsuxrebuli tʃemi suli iqavitʰ akʰ da ipʰxizletʰ 
tsʰota ɡaiara daemxo mitsaze da lotsʰulobda ratʰa tʰu ʃesadzlebeli iqo astsʰdenoda es ʒami 
tʰkʰva abba mamao ʃentʰvis qovelive ʃesadzlebelia amatsʰile es sasmisi maɡram ara ratsʰ me msurs aramed ratsʰ ʃen 
movida da naxa isini mdzinareni da utʰxra petres simon ɡdzinavs ver ʃesdzeli ertʰ saatʰs ɡepʰxizla 
ipʰxizletʰ da ilotsʰetʰ rom ar tʃavardetʰ ɡansatsʰdelʃi suli mxnea xolo xortsʰi udzluri 
kvlav tsavida lotsʰulobda da imave sitqvebs ambobda 
mobrunda da mdzinareni hpova isini vinaidan tʰvalebi damdzimebodatʰ da ar itsʰodnen ra epasuxatʰ mistʰvis 
da movida mesamed da utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰven isev ɡdzinavtʰ da isvenebtʰ kmara movida ʒami aha katsʰis dze ɡadaetsʰema tsʰodviltʰa xeltʰ 
adekʰitʰ tsavidetʰ aha moaxlovda tʃemi ɡamtsʰemi 
kidev laparakobda rom aha movida iuda ertʰi tʰormettʰaɡani da mastʰan ertʰad xalxi maxvilebitʰ da ketebitʰ mɣvdelmtʰavartʰaɡan mtsiɡnobartʰaɡan da uxutsʰestʰaɡan 
mis ɡamtsʰems mietsʰa matʰtʰvis niʃani da etʰkʰva visatsʰ me veamborebi is aris iɡi ʃeipqaritʰ da datsʰvitʰ tsaiqvanetʰ 
rotsʰa movida mqisve miecra mas da utʰxra rabi da eambora 
matʰ ki xeli daades mas da ʃeipqres iɡi 
ertʰma ikʰ mdɡomtʰaɡanma idzro maxvili dastsʰxo mɣvdelmtʰavris monas da quri tʃamoatʰala 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ ɡana avazaki var maxvilebitʰa da ketebitʰ rom moxveditʰ tʃems ʃesapqrobad 
qoveldɣe tʰkʰventʰan viqavi tadzarʃi da ɡastsavliditʰ da ar ʃeɡipqrivartʰ maɡram dae aɣsruldes tserilebi 
da miatoves iɡi da qvelani ɡaikʰtsʰnen 
ertʰi viɣatsʰ cabuki romelsatsʰ ʃiʃvel sxeulze tilo moesxa mihqveboda mas da ʃeipqres iɡi 
ʃeatova tilo da ʃiʃveli ɡaikʰtsʰa 
miiqvanes ieso mɣvdelmtʰavartʰan da tʰavi moiqara qvela mɣvdelmtʰavarma uxutsʰesma da mtsiɡnobarma 
petre ʃoridan mihqveboda mas tʰvitʰ mɣvdelmtʰavris ezomde da dadʒda msaxurebtʰan da tsʰetsʰxls miepʰitsʰxa 
mɣvdelmtʰavarni da mtʰeli sinedrioni edzebdnen motsmobas iesos tsinaaɣmdeɡ ratʰa moeklatʰ iɡi maɡram ver poulobdnen 
mravali stsamebda tsʰils maɡram es motsmobani ertʰmanetʰs ar emtʰxveoda 
zoɡni tsamodɡnen da tsʰils tsamebdnen mas ambobdnen 
tʃven movusminetʰ rom laparakobda me davanɡrev am xelitʰkʰmnil tadzars da sam dɣeʃi avaʃeneb sxvas xeltʰukʰmnelso 
maɡram artsʰ matʰi motsmobani emtʰxveoda ertʰmanetʰs 
dadɡa mɣvdelmtʰavari ʃuaze da hkitʰxa iesos arapʰers upasuxeb ra aris rasatsʰ eseni ʃens tsinaaɣmdeɡ motsmoben 
is dumda da arapʰers pasuxobda kvlav hkitʰxa mas mɣvdelmtʰavarma ʃena xar kʰriste dze kurtʰxeulisa 
iesom tʰkʰva me var tʰkʰven ixilavtʰ katsʰis dzes dzalis mardʒvniv mdʒdomares da tsʰis ɣrublebʃi momavals 
mɣvdelmtʰavarma ʃemoixia samoseli da tʰkʰva raɣad ɡvinda motsmeni 
tʰkʰven moisminetʰ ɡmoba ras itqvitʰ maʃin qvelam dasdo msdʒavri mas roɡortsʰ sikvdilis tʰanamdebs 
zoɡiertʰebma dautsqes mas pʰurtʰxeba saxe daubures da stsʰemdnen da eubnebodnen itsinastsarmetqveleo da msaxurni silas atsnavdnen 
rotsʰa petre kʰvemotʰ ezoʃi iqo mivida mastʰan mɣvdelmtʰavris ertʰi mxevaltʰaɡani 
dainaxa tsʰetsʰxls mipʰitsʰxebuli petre daakvirda da utʰxra ʃentsʰ ieso nazareveltʰan ertʰad iqavi 
man uarqo da tʰkʰva ar vitsʰi da artsʰ mesmis ras ambobo da petre ɡavida ezos ɡaretʰ da iqivla mamalma 
mxevalma dainaxa iɡi da kvlav utʰxra ikʰ mdɡomebs esetsʰ imatʰtʰaɡaniao 
man kvlav uarqo mtsʰirexnis ʃemdeɡ ikʰ mdɡomebma kvlav utʰxres petres namdvilad imatʰɡani xar radɡan ʃentsʰ ɡalileveli xar kilozetsʰ ɡetqoba 
da daitsqo man tʰavis tsqevla da pʰitsʰili ar vitsʰnob im katsʰs viszetsʰ melaparakebitʰo 
mqisve meored iqivla mamalma da petres ɡaaxsenda sitqva romelitsʰ iesom utʰxra sanam mamali ordʒer iqivlebdes samdʒer uarmqopʰo ɡaaxsenda da atirda 
mqisve dilaadrianad mɣvdelmtʰavrebma uxutsʰesebtʰan mtsiɡnobrebtʰan da mtʰel sinedriontʰan ertʰad moitʰatʰbires da ʃekres ieso tsaiqvanes da pilates ɡadastsʰes 
da hkitʰxa mas pilatem ʃena xar iudeveltʰa mepʰe xolo man miuɡo da utʰxra ʃen ambob 
mɣvdelmtʰavarni bevr rames abralebdnen mas 
pilatem kvlav hkitʰxa mas arapʰers upasuxeb xedav ramdens ɡabraleben 
maɡram ieso aɣarapʰerze pasuxobda da es aotsʰebda pilates 
dɣesastsaulze iɡi utʰavisupʰlebda xolme matʰ ertʰ patimars viszetsʰ stʰxovdnen 
da iqo vinme barabad tsodebuli meamboxeebtʰan ertʰad ʃeborkili romeltʰatsʰ amboxisas mkvleloba tʃaedinatʰ 
avida xalxi da dautsqo imis tʰxovna rasatsʰ iɡi tʃveulebisamebr usrulebda matʰ 
pilatem miuɡo matʰ da utʰxra ɡindatʰ ɡaɡitʰavisupʰlotʰ iudeveltʰa mepʰe 
vinaidan itsʰoda rom mɣvdelmtʰavrebma ʃuritʰ ɡadastsʰes iɡi 
maɡram mɣvdelmtʰavrebma aaɡulianes brbo rom baraba ɡaetʰavisupʰlebina matʰtʰvis 
pilatem kvlav miuɡo da utʰxra raɣa vuqo mas visatsʰ tʰkʰven iudeveltʰa mepʰes utsodebtʰ 
matʰ kvlav iqvires dʒvars atsʰvi iɡi 
pilatem utʰxra matʰ ra boroteba tʃaidina maɡram isini upʰro metad aqvirdnen dʒvars atsʰvi iɡi 
pilatem romelsatsʰ surda xalxis dakmaqopʰileba ɡautʰavisupʰla matʰ baraba xolo ieso ɡaʃoltvis ʃemdeɡ ɡadastsʰa ratʰa dʒvars etsʰvatʰ 
dʒariskatsʰebma ʃeiqvanes iɡi im ezos ʃiɡnitʰ anu pretoriaʃi da ʃekribes mtʰeli razmi 
ʃemoses iɡi dzotseulitʰ da daadɡes eklisɡan datsnuli ɡvirɡvini 
da dautsqes mas misalmeba ɡixarodes iudeveltʰa mepʰev 
lertsams urtqamdnen tʰavʃi apʰurtʰxebdnen da muxlmoqrilni stsʰemdnen tʰaqvans 
rotsʰa ʃeuratsʰqves ɡaxades dzotseuli da misive tansatsʰmeli tʃaatsʰves da ɡamoiqvanes rom dʒvars etsʰvatʰ 
aidzules ertʰi ɡamvleli simon kvirineli alekʰsandres da rupʰusis mama romelitsʰ mindvridan modioda ezida misi dʒvari 
da miiqvanes iɡi im adɡilas romelsatsʰ hkʰvia ɡolɡotʰa ratsʰ niʃnavs tʰxemis adɡils 
da miatsodes mas murnarevi ɣvino dasalevad maɡram ar miiɣo 
da dʒvars atsʰves da ɡaiqves misi samoseli tsilis qritʰ vis ra erɡeboda 
mesame saatʰi iqo rotsʰa dʒvars atsʰves iɡi 
iqo tsartserili tsartsera misi braldebisa mepʰe iudeveltʰa 
mastʰan ertʰad dʒvars atsʰves ori avazaki ertʰi mis mardʒvniv da meore martsʰxniv 
da aɣsrulda tserili romelʃitsʰ natʰkʰvamia borotmokʰmedtʰa ʃoris ʃeiratsʰxa 
ɡamvlelebi tʰavs akʰnevdnen da ɡmobdnen mas da ambobdnen ehe tadzris damanɡrevelo da sam dɣeʃi amʃenebelo 
ixsen sakutʰari tʰavi da ɡadmodi dʒvridan 
aseve mɣvdelmtʰavarni mtsiɡnobrebtʰan ertʰad dastsʰinodnen da ertʰmanetʰs eubnebodnen sxvebs ixsnida sakutʰari tʰavis xsna ki ar ʃeudzlia 
kʰriste mepʰe israelisa tʃamovides axla dʒvridan rom vixilotʰ da virtsmunotʰ mastʰan dʒvartsʰmulebitsʰ landzɣavdnen mas 
meekʰvse saatʰze bnelma moitsʰva mtʰeli kʰveqana metsʰxre saatʰamde 
metsʰxre saatʰze ʃesdzaxa iesom didi xmitʰ eloi eloi lama sabakʰtʰani ratsʰ niʃnavs ɣmertʰo tʃemo ɣmertʰo tʃemo rad mimatove 
ikʰ mdɡomtʰaɡan zoɡiertʰebma moismines da tʰkʰves aha elias uxmobso iɡi 
ertʰi viɣatsʰ ɡaikʰtsʰa ɣrubeli dzmritʰ ɡaʒɣintʰa tsamoaɡo lertsamze da miatsoda dasalevad tʰan ambobda aba vnaxotʰ tʰu mova elia mis tʃamosaxsnelado 
iesom xmamaɣla ʃesdzaxa da suli ɡanuteva 
da tadzris kretsabmeli orad ɡaipo tʰavidan bolomde 
rotsʰa mis tsinaʃe mdɡomma asistʰavma dainaxa rom ase ʃesdzaxa da ɡanuteva suli tʰkʰva ceʃmaritad ɣvtʰis dze iqo es katsʰi 
akʰ iqvnen kʰalebitsʰ romlebitsʰ ʃoridan umzerdnen matʰ ʃoris mariam maɡdalelitsʰ iakob mtsʰirisa da ioses deda mariami da salome 
romelnitsʰ maʃin rotsʰa is ɡalileaʃi iqo tʰan dahqvebodnen da emsaxurebodnen mas aseve mravali sxvatsʰ romlebitsʰ mastʰan ertʰad amovidnen ierusalims 
rotsʰa mosaɣamovda raki iqo paraskevi anu ʃabatʰis tsinadɣe 
movida ioseb arimatʰieli mrtʃeveltʰa ɡamotʃenili tsevri romelitsʰ tʰavadatsʰ moeloda ɣvtʰis sasupʰevels tʰamamad ʃevida pilatestʰan da ɡamoitʰxova iesos ɡvami 
pilates ɡaukvirda rom iɡi ukve mkvdari iqo daudzaxa asistʰavs da hkitʰxa didi xania mokvda 
es rom ʃeitqo asistʰavisaɡan ubodza iosebs ɡvami 
da man iqida tilo ɡardmoxsna iɡi ʃemoaxvia tilo da daasvena samarxʃi romelitsʰ kldeʃi iqo ɡamokvetʰili da lodi miaɡora samarxis karze 
mariam maɡdalelma da mariamma iesos dedam dainaxes sadatsʰ daasvenes iɡi 
ʃabatʰi rom ɡavida mariam maɡdalelma mariam iakobisam da salomem iqides surnelebani rom misuliqvnen da etsʰxotʰ mistʰvis 
ʃvideulis pirvel dɣes dilaadrianad mividnen samarxtʰan mzis amosvlisas 
ertʰmanetʰʃi ambobdnen vin ɡadaɡviɡorebs lods samarxis karidano 
ɡaixedes da dainaxes rom lodi ɡadaɡorebulia dzalian didi ki iqo 
da ʃevidnen samarxʃi da dainaxes mardʒvniv mdʒdomare cabuki spetaki samoslitʰ ʃemosili da ʃeʃpʰotʰdnen 
man utʰxra matʰ nu ʃeʃpʰotʰdebitʰ tʰkʰven edzebtʰ dʒvartsʰmul ieso nazarevels iɡi aɣdɡa akʰ ar aris aha adɡili sadatsʰ is daasvenes 
maɡram tsaditʰ utʰxaritʰ mis motsapʰeebs da petres aha tsin miɡidzɣvitʰ iɡi ɡalileisaken ikʰ naxavtʰ mas roɡortsʰ natʰkʰvami akʰvs tʰkʰventʰvis 
ɡamovidnen da ɡaikʰtsʰnen samarxidan radɡan atsʰaxtsʰaxebuli da tʰavzardatsʰemulni iqvnen aravis arapʰeri utʰxres radɡan eʃinodatʰ 
ʃvideulis pirvel dɣes adre aɣmdɡari pirvelad etʃvena mariam maɡdalels romlisɡanatsʰ ʃvidi eʃmaki ɡandevna 
isitsʰ tsavida da ʃeatqobina matʰ vintsʰ mastʰan iqvnen xolme mɡloviaretʰ da motiraltʰ 
xolo matʰ rotsʰa moismines rom tsʰotsʰxalia da mariamma ixila iɡi ar irtsmunes 
amis ʃemdeɡ sxva saxitʰ etʃvena or matʰɡans rotsʰa dabisken midiodnen 
isini mividnen da sxvebs ʃeatqobines maɡram artsʰ amatʰi irtsmunes 
moɡvianebitʰ etʃvena tʰertʰmets inaxitʰ msxdartʰ da usaqvedura urtsmunoeba da ɡulkʰvaoba radɡan ar irtsmunes matʰi romlebmatsʰ aɣmdɡari ixiles iɡi 
utʰxra matʰ moedetʰ mtʰels sopʰels da ukʰadaɡetʰ saxareba qovel kʰmnilebas 
vintsʰ irtsmunebs da moinatʰleba ɡadartʃeba vintsʰ ar irtsmunebs msdʒavri daedeba 
es sastsaulebi ikʰneba mortsmunetʰa tʰanmxlebi tʃemi saxelitʰ eʃmakebs ɡandevnian axali enebitʰ ilaparakeben 
xelʃi ɡvelebs aiqvanen da tʰundatsʰ raime sasikvdilo ʃesvan ar avnebtʰ avadmqopʰebs xelebs daasxamen da ɡanikurnebian isini 
ase matʰtʰan saubris ʃemdeɡ upʰali ieso amaɣlda zetsʰad da dadʒda ɣvtʰis mardʒvniv 
isinitsʰ tsavidnen da kʰadaɡebdnen qvelɡan da upʰali ʃeetseoda matʰ da ɡanamtkitsʰebda sitqvas tʰanamdevi sastsaulebitʰ amin 
raki ukve bevrma mihqo xeli tʃvens ʃoris aɣsrulebul ambavtʰa tʰanmimdevrul aɣtseras 
roɡortsʰ ɡadmoɡvtsʰes tʰavidanve tʰvitʰmxilvelebma da sitqvis msaxurebma 
metsʰ mivitʃnie rom mas ʃemdeɡ ratsʰ ɡuldasmitʰ ɡamovikvlie qovelive tʰavidan tʰanmimdevrulad aɡitsero ɣirseulo tʰeopʰile 
rom ʃeitsʰno im modzɣvrebis ceʃmariteba romelitsʰ ɡistsavlia 
iudeis mepʰis herodes dɣeebʃi iqo mɣvdeli vinme saxelad zakʰaria abias riɡidan xolo misi tsʰoli iqo aaronis asultʰaɡani saxelad elisabedi 
isini oriveni martʰlebi iqvnen ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe umtsikvlod ikʰtsʰeodnen upʰlis qoveli mtsʰnebitʰa da tsesdebitʰ 
matʰ ar hqavdatʰ ʃvili vinaidan elisabedi bertsi iqo da oriveni ukve xanɡadasulni iqvnen 
ertʰxel rotsʰa tʰavisi qoveldɣiuri riɡisamebr msaxurebda ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
mɣvdeltʰa samsaxuris tsesitʰ mas tsilad xvda kmeva da ʃevida upʰlis tadzarʃi 
uamravi xalxi lotsʰulobda ɡaretʰ kmevis dros 
etʃvena mas upʰlis anɡelozi sakmevlis samsxverplos mardʒvniv mdɡari 
da ʃekrtʰa misi xilvitʰ zakʰaria da ʃiʃi daetsʰa mas 
utʰxra mas anɡelozma nu ɡeʃinia zakʰaria vinaidan ʃesmenilia ʃeni lotsʰva da ʃeni tsʰoli elisabedi ɡiʃobs dzes da daarkʰmev mas saxelad ioanes 
ɡekʰneba ʃen sixaruli da mxiaruleba da mravali ɡaixarebs misi ʃobitʰ 
vinaidan didi ikʰneba is upʰlis tsinaʃe ɣvinosa da tʰapʰlucs ar dalevs da sulitsmiditʰ aɣivseba dedis mutsʰlidanve 
mraval israelians moakʰtsʰevs upʰlisaken matʰi ɣvtʰisaken 
da is ivlis mis tsinaʃe elias sulitʰ da dzalitʰ rom moakʰtsʰios mamatʰa ɡulebi ʃviltʰa mimartʰ xolo urtʃni martʰaltʰa ɡonebaze da tsarudɡinos upʰals momzadebuli xalxi 
utʰxra zakʰariam anɡelozs ritʰi ɡaviɡeb amas me xom moxutsʰebuli var da tʃemi tsʰolitsʰ ukve xanɡadasulia 
miuɡo anɡelozma da utʰxra mas me var ɡabrieli ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe mdɡomeli tsarmoɡzavnili var ratʰa ɡelaparako da ɡaxaro es 
da aha dadumdebi da ver ʃedzleb laparaks im dɣemde vidre es axdeba raki ar ertsmune tʃems sitqvebs romlebitsʰ aɣsruldeba tʰavis droze 
xalxi ki idɡa da eloda zakʰarias da ukvirdatʰ misi daqovneba tadzarʃi 
rotsʰa ɡamovida matʰtʰvis xmis ɡatsʰema ver ʃedzlo da mixvdnen rom tʃveneba ixila tadzarʃi aniʃnebda matʰ da dartʃa utqvad 
da rotsʰa dasrulda misi msaxurebis dɣeni ʃin tsavida 
im dɣeebis ʃemdeɡ daorsulda elisabedi misi tsʰoli xutʰ tʰves imaleboda da ambobda 
ase miqo upʰalma am dɣeebʃi rotsʰa momxeda rom moeʃorebina tʃemtʰvis sirtsʰxvili adamiantʰa tʰvalʃi 
meekʰvse tʰves ki tsarmoiɡzavna ɣvtʰisaɡan ɡabriel anɡelozi ɡalileis kʰalakʰs romlis saxelia nazaretʰi 
kʰaltsultʰan romelitsʰ daniʃnuli iqo katsʰze saxelad iosebze davitʰis saxlidan da kʰaltsulis saxeli iqo mariami 
da ʃevida mastʰan da utʰxra ɡixarodes mimadlebulo ʃentʰanaa upʰali kurtʰxeuli xar ʃen dedatʰa ʃoris 
is ʃeʃpʰotʰda am sitqvebze da tʃapʰikʰrda ras unda niʃnavdeso es misalmeba 
da utʰxra mas anɡelozma nu ɡeʃinia mariam vinaidan madli hpove ɣmertʰtʰan 
aha daorsuldebi da ʃob dzes da saxelad iesos daarkʰmev 
didi ikʰneba is da uzenaesis dzed itsodeba da mistsʰems mas upʰali ɣmertʰi misi mamis davitʰis taxts 
da saukunod imepʰebs iakobis saxlze da mis mepʰobas ar ekʰneba dasasruli 
utʰxra mariamma anɡelozs roɡor ikʰneba es rotsʰa me mamakatsʰi ar vitsʰi 
miuɡo anɡelozma da utʰxra sulitsmida ɡadmova ʃenze da maɣlis dzala moɡitʃrdilavs amitom tsmida ʃobili itsodeba ɣvtʰis dzed 
aha ʃens natʰesav elisabedsatsʰ sibereʃi tʃaesaxa dze da meekʰvse tʰveʃia ukve 
vinaidan ɣmertʰtʰan aravitʰari sitqva ar dartʃeba ʃeudzlebeli 
tʰkʰva mariamma aha upʰlis mxevali var meqos me ʃeni sitqvisamebr da ɡaneʃora mas anɡelozi adidebs suli tʃemi upʰalsa 
adɡa mariami im dɣeebʃi da satʃkʰarod tsavida mtʰian mxareʃi iudeis kʰalakʰʃi 
da ʃevida zakʰarias saxlʃi da miesalma elisabeds 
rotsʰa elisabedma mariamis misalmeba moismina qrma ʃeutokda mutsʰelʃi da aɣivso elisabedi sulitsmiditʰ 
da daidzaxa xmamaɣla da tʰkʰva kurtʰxeuli xar dedatʰa ʃoris da kurtʰxeulia ʃeni mutsʰlis naqopʰi 
vina var me rom tʃemi upʰlis deda movida tʃemtʰan 
vinaidan rotsʰa ʃeni mosalmebis xma mostsvda tʃems qurs sixarulitʰ ʃetokda qrma tʃems mutsʰelʃi 
netaria vintsʰ irtsmuna vinaidan aɣsruldeba upʰlis mier tʰkʰmuli mis mimartʰ 
da tʰkʰva mariamma adidebs suli tʃemi upʰalsa 
da izeima sulma tʃemma ɣmertʰʃi tʃems matsʰxovarʃi 
vinaidan moxeda tʰavisi mxevlis simdables da amieridan netarad tʃamtʰvlis me qoveli tʰaoba 
vinaidan didi sakʰme miqo dzlierma da tsmidaa saxeli misi 
da misi tsqaloba mis moʃiʃebs tʰaobidan tʰaobamde 
kʰmna simtkitsʰe tʰavisi mklavitʰ ɡapʰanta ampartavanni matʰi ɡuliszraxvebtʰan ertʰad 
taxtebidan ɡadmoqara dzlierni da aamaɣla tʰavmdabalni 
mʃierni siketʰitʰ aɣavso da mdidarni xeltsʰarieli ɡauʃva 
ʃeetsia tʰavis msaxurs israels ɡaixsena tsqaloba 
roɡortsʰ eubneboda tʃvens mamebs abraams da mis modɡmas saukunod 
dartʃa mariami mastʰan samiode tʰves da dabrunda tʰavis saxlʃi 
elisabeds ki daudɡa mʃobiarobis ʒami da ʃva vaʒi 
da esmatʰ mis mezoblebsa da natʰesavebs rom ɡanadida upʰalma tʰavisi tsqaloba mis mimartʰ da mastʰan ertʰad xarobdnen 
merve dɣes mividnen bavʃvis tsinadasatsʰvetʰad da undodatʰ daerkʰmiatʰ mamamisis saxeli zakʰaria 
miuɡo dedamisma da tʰkʰva ara ioane erkʰmeva mas 
utʰxres mas rom ʃens natʰesaobaʃi aravin aris rom eɡ saxeli erkʰvas 
niʃnebitʰ hkitʰxes mamamiss risi darkʰmeva surda 
da pʰitsʰari moitʰxova da datsera ioanea misi saxeli da qvelas ɡaukvirda es 
utsʰeb ɡaexsna mas piri da ena alaparakda da adida ɣmertʰi 
ʃiʃma moitsʰva qvela vintsʰ matʰ irɡvliv tsʰxovrobda da qovelive amaze didi mitʰkʰma motʰkʰma iqo mtʰeli iudeis mtʰianetʰʃi 
qvelam vintsʰ moismina es ɡulʃi tʃaido da tʰkʰva ra ikʰneba es qrma da upʰlis xeli iqo mastʰan 
mamamisi zakʰaria aɣivso sulitsmiditʰ da tsinastsarmetqvelebda da ambobda 
kurtʰxeul ars upʰali ɣmertʰi israelisa radɡan moxeda tʰavis xalxs da ɡaumzada mas ɡamosqidva 
aɣɡvidɡina rkʰa xsnisa tʰavisi msaxuris davitʰis saxlʃi 
roɡortsʰ elaparakeboda dzveltʰaɡanve tʰavis tsmida tsinastsarmetqveltʰa piritʰ 
rom ɡvixsnida tʃveni mtrebisa da qvela tʃveni modzulis xelidan 
tsqalobas uqopʰda tʃvens mamebs da ɡaixsenebda tʰavis tsmida aɣtʰkʰmas 
pʰitsʰs romlitʰatsʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa tʃvens mamas abraams rom ʃeɡvadzlebinebda tʃven 
tʃveni mtrebis xelidan tʰavdaxsniltʰ uʃiʃrad 
ɡvemsaxura mistʰvis sitsmiditʰ da simartʰlitʰ mis tsinaʃe mtʰeli tʃveni sitsʰotsʰxle 
da ʃen qrmao daɡerkʰmeva maɣlis tsinastsarmetqveli vinaidan itsinamdzɣvreb upʰlis tsinaʃe misi ɡzebis ɡasamzadeblad 
rom mistsʰe mis xalxs xsnis tsʰodna matʰi tsʰodvebis mitevebitʰ 
tʃveni ɣvtʰis ɡulmotsqalebitʰ romlitʰatsʰ ɡadmoɡvxeda aɣmosavletʰma maɣlidan 
bnelʃi da sikvdilis tʃrdilʃi msxdomaretʰatʰvis ɡasanatʰeblad tʃvens pʰerxtʰa tsasamartʰavad samʃvidobo ɡzaze 
qrma ki izrdeboda da sulitʰ mtkitsʰdeboda da udabnoʃi iqo im dɣeebamde vidre israels ɡamoetsʰxadeboda 
im dɣeebʃi ɡamovida keisar avɡustusis brdzaneba aɣetseratʰ mtʰeli msopʰlio 
es aɣtsera pirveli iqo siriaʃi kvireniosis mmartʰvelobisas 
qvelani midiodnen tʃasatserad tʰitʰoeuli tʰavis kʰalakʰʃi 
iosebitsʰ tsavida ɡalileidan kʰalakʰ nazaretʰidan iudeaʃi davitʰis kʰalakʰʃi romelsatsʰ etsodeba betʰlemi vinaidan iɡi davitʰis saxlisa da tomisa iqo 
ratʰa tʃatseriliqo mariamtʰan ertʰad romelitsʰ masze iqo daniʃnuli da orsulad iqo 
matʰi ikʰ qopʰnisas ʃeusrulda mariams mʃobiarobis dɣeebi 
da ʃva dze tʰavisi pirmʃo ʃeaxvia da miatsvina iɡi baɡaʃi vinaidan sastumroʃi ar iqo adɡili matʰtʰvis 
im mxareʃi mtsqemsebi iqvnen mindvrad da ɣamitʰ daradʒobdnen tʰaviantʰ samtsqsos 
da aha upʰlis anɡelozi daadɡa matʰ upʰlis dideba ɡamoubrətsqindatʰ da ʃeʃindnen didi ʃiʃitʰ 
da utʰxra matʰ anɡelozma nu ɡeʃiniatʰ aha ɡaxarebtʰ did sixaruls romelitsʰ mtʰeli xalxisa ikʰneba 
vinaidan dɣes davitʰis kʰalakʰʃi tʰkʰventʰvis iʃva matsʰxovari romelitsʰ aris kʰriste upʰali 
da niʃnad es ɡekʰnebatʰ ipovitʰ qrmas ʃexveuls da baɡaʃi mtsolares 
da uetsʰrad ɡatʃnda anɡeloztʰan ertʰad diddzali tsʰiuri laʃkʰari da akʰebdnen ɣmertʰs da ambobdnen 
dideba maɣaltʰa ʃina ɣmertʰs mʃvidoba kʰveqanad da katsʰtʰa ʃoris satʰnoeba 
rotsʰa anɡelozebi zetsʰad amaɣldnen mtsqemsebma utʰxres ertʰmanetʰs tsavidetʰ betʰlems da vnaxotʰ momxdari ambavi upʰalma rom ɡvautsqa 
ɡatʃkʰarebulni mividnen da naxes mariami da iosebi da baɡaʃi mtsolare qrma 
rotsʰa dainaxes moutʰxres ambavi ratsʰ emtsʰnotʰ matʰ am qrmaze 
vintsʰ ki ismenda qvelas ukvirda rasatsʰ mtsqemsebi eubnebodnen matʰ 
mariamma ki tʃaimarxa qoveli sitqva da tʃaido isini ɡulʃi 
da dabrundnen mtsqemsebi da adidebdnen da akʰebdnen ɣmertʰs qovelive imis ɡamo ratsʰ esmatʰ da ixiles roɡortsʰ emtsʰnotʰ matʰ 
da rotsʰa ʃesrulda rva dɣe ratʰa tsinadaetsʰvitʰatʰ mistʰvis daerkʰva misi saxeli ieso anɡelozis mier darkʰmeuli mutsʰelʃi tʃasaxvamde 
da rotsʰa ɡasrulda matʰi ɡantsmedis dɣeebi moses rdʒulisamebr aiqvanes iɡi ierusalims upʰlis tsinaʃe tsarsadɡenad 
roɡortsʰ upʰlis rdʒulʃi stseria qovel mamrovans romelmatsʰ ɡanapos saʃo upʰlis tsmida etsodos 
da ʃestsiron msxverplad roɡortsʰ upʰlis rdʒulʃia natʰkʰvami ori ɡvriti an ori martʰve mtredisa 
da aha iqo ierusalimʃi katsʰi saxelad simoni katsʰi martʰali da ɣvtʰismoʃiʃi romelitsʰ moeloda israelis nuɡeʃistsʰemas da sulitsmida iqo masze 
sulitsmidisɡan hkʰonda nautsqebi rom ar ixilavda sikvdils upʰlis tsʰxebulis xilvamde 
ʃevida sulitʰ tadzarʃi da rotsʰa mʃoblebma miiqvanes qrma ieso ratʰa mokʰtsʰeodnen mas rdʒulis tsesisamebr 
man miirkʰva qrma mklavebze adida ɣmertʰi da tʰkʰva 
axla ki ɡamiʃvi batono ʃeni mona mʃvidobitʰ roɡortsʰ natʰkʰvami ɡakʰvs 
vinaidan ixila tʃemma tʰvalma ʃeni xsna 
romelitsʰ ʃen ɡanamzade qoveli xalxis tsinaʃe 
tsarmartʰtʰatʰvis natʰlis ɡamosatsʰxadeblad da ʃeni xalxis israelis didebad 
iosebs da mis dedas ki ukvirdatʰ masze natʰkʰvami 
da akurtʰxa simonma isini da utʰxra mariams mis dedas aha ɡantsesebulia es mravaltʰa damxobad da aɣdɡenad israelʃi da satsʰilobel niʃnad 
da tʰvitʰ ʃens sulʃitsʰ ɡaivlis maxvili ratʰa ɡatsʰxaddes mraval ɡultʰaɡan zraxvebi 
da iqo ana tsinastsarmetqveli pʰenuelis asuli aʃeris tomidan ɣrmad moxutsʰebuli tʰavisi kʰaltsulobis ʃemdeɡ ʃvid tselitsads natsʰxovrebi kʰmartʰan 
iqo iɡi otʰxmotsʰdaotʰxi tslis kʰvrivi ar ʃordeboda tadzars marxvitʰ da vedrebitʰ emsaxureboda dɣe da ɣam 
isitsʰ imave ʒams iqo misuli da adidebda ɣmertʰs da elaparakeboda masze qvelas vintsʰ ki ɡamosqidvas moeloda ierusalimʃi 
rotsʰa aɣasrules qovelive upʰlis rdʒulisamebr dabrundnen ɡalileaʃi tʰaviantʰ kʰalakʰ nazaretʰʃi 
xolo qrma izrdeboda mtkitsʰdeboda sulitʰ da ivseboda sibrədznitʰ da ɣvtʰis madli iqo masze 
da dadiodnen misi mʃoblebi qovel tselitsads ierusalimʃi pasekʰis dɣesastsaulze 
da rotsʰa tʰormeti tslisa ɡaxda avidnen ierusalimʃi tʃveulebisamebr sadɣesastsaulod 
xolo dɣesastsaulis damtʰavrebis ʃemdeɡ ukan rom dabrundnen qrma ieso dartʃa ierusalimʃi da ar itsʰodnen iosebma da misma dedam 
eɡonatʰ rom mɡzavrtʰa ʃoris iqo da ertʰi dɣis ɡza rom ɡaiares dautsqes dzebna natʰesavebsa da natsʰnobebs ʃoris 
rom ver ipoves iɡi dabrundnen ierusalimʃi da edzebdnen mas 
sami dɣis ʃemdeɡ ipoves tadzarʃi mdʒdomi modzɣvartʰa ʃoris usmenda da ekitʰxeboda matʰ 
da ɡaotsʰebuli iqo qvela misi msmeneli misi ɡonebitʰa da pasuxebitʰ 
rom dainaxes iɡi ɡaukvirdatʰ da dedamisma utʰxra mas es ra ɡviqavi ʃvilo aha mamaʃeni da me ʃetsuxebulni daɡedzebtʰ 
man utʰxra matʰ ratom medzebditʰ nutʰu ar itsʰitʰ rom mamis saxlʃi unda viqo 
xolo matʰ ver ɡaiɡes sitqva ratsʰ utʰxra matʰ 
da ɡahqva matʰ da mivida nazaretʰs da emortʃileboda matʰ dedamisma ki ɡulʃi tʃaimarxa qovelive es 
xolo iesos emateboda sibrədzne da tani da madli ɣvtʰisa da adamiantʰa tsinaʃe 
tiberios keisris mtʰavrobis metʰxutʰmete tsels pontoeli pilates ɡanmɡeblobisas iudeaʃi da herodes tetrarkʰobisas ɡalileaʃi misi dzmis pʰilipes tetrarkʰobisas itureasa da traxonitis mxareʃi da lisaniasis tetrarkʰobisas abileneʃi 
anas da kaiapʰas mɣvdelmtʰavrobis dros iqo sitqva ɣvtʰisa ioanesadmi zakʰarias dzisadmi udabnoʃi 
dadioda iɡi iordanes mtʰels aremareʃi da kʰadaɡebda sinanulis natʰlisɣebas tsʰodvatʰa misateveblad 
roɡortsʰ stseria esaia tsinastsarmetqvelis sitqvatʰa tsiɡnʃi xma mɣaɣadeblisa udabnoʃi ɡanumzadetʰ ɡza upʰals moastsoretʰ misi bilikebi 
qoveli xevi amoivseba qoveli mtʰa da bortsʰvi dadabldeba mrude ɡastsordeba da oɣrotʃoɣro ɡza ɡavakdeba 
da qoveli xortsʰieli ixilavs xsnas ɣvtʰisaɡan 
mosanatʰlavad misul xalxs ioane eubneboda ikʰednetʰa naʃobno vin ɡaɡapʰrətʰxilatʰ rom ɡaekʰtsʰetʰ momaval risxvas 
maʃ ɡamoiɣetʰ monaniebis ɣirsi naqopʰni da nu mohqvebitʰ ertʰmanetʰʃi laparaks mamad abraami ɡvqavso vinaidan ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom ɣmertʰs ʃeudzlia am kʰvebidan aɣudɡinos abraams ʃvilebi 
tsʰulitsʰ ukve devs xetʰa pʰesvtʰan qovel xes romelitsʰ ketʰil naqopʰs ar ɡamoiɣebs crian da tsʰetsʰxlʃi aɡdeben 
ekitʰxeboda mas xalxi da eubneboda aba raɣa vkʰnatʰo 
miuɡebda da etqoda matʰ visatsʰ ori mosasxami akʰvs mistsʰes ukʰonels visatsʰ sazrdo akʰvs isitsʰ ase moikʰtsʰes 
movidnen mebaʒenitsʰ mosanatʰlavad da utʰxres mas modzɣvaro ra vkʰnatʰ 
man utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰventʰvis datsesebulis mets nurapʰers moitʰxovtʰ 
dʒariskatsʰebitsʰ ekitʰxebodnen tʃven raɣa vkʰnatʰ utʰxra matʰ nuravis ʃeavitsrovebtʰ tsʰils nu dastsamebtʰ da tʰkʰvens dʒamaɡirs dasdʒerditʰ 
rotsʰa xalxi molodinʃi iqo da qvela tʰavis ɡulʃi pʰikʰrobda ioaneze kʰriste xom ar ariso 
miuɡebda da etqoda qvelas ioane me tsqlitʰ ɡnatʰlavtʰ maɡram modis tʃemze dzlieri romlis sandlis tʰasmis ɡaxsnis ɣirsitsʰ ara var is moɡnatʰlavtʰ tʰkʰven sulitsmiditʰ da tsʰetsʰxlitʰ 
romlis xelʃia nitʃabi ratʰa ɡatsmidos tʰavisi kalo da tʰavis beɣelʃi moaɡrovos xorbali bze ki datsvas tʃaukʰrobeli tsʰetsʰxlitʰ 
kidev bevr sxva ramesatsʰ axarebda da ʃeaɡonebda xalxs 
xolo herodem tetrarkʰma romelsatsʰ iɡi amxilebda misi dzmis tsʰolis herodias ɡamo da qovelive imis ɡamo ra borotebatsʰ tʃaedina 
qvelapʰers amas isitsʰ miumata rom ioane sapqrobileʃi tʃasva 
rotsʰa mtʰeli xalxi inatʰleboda da iesotsʰ moinatʰla da lotsʰulobda ɡaixsna tsʰa 
da ɡadmovida masze sulitsmida xortsʰieli saxitʰ roɡortsʰ mtredi da ɡaisma zetsʰitʰ xma ʃen xar tʃemi saqvareli dze romelitsʰ movitsone me 
tʰvitʰ ieso rotsʰa itsqebda ikʰneboda otsʰdaatʰi tslisa da roɡortsʰ pʰikʰrobdnen iqo dze iosebisa qelisa 
matʰatʰisa levisa malkʰisa ianaisa iosebisa 
matʰitʰiasi amotsʰisa naxumisa xeslisa naɡaisa 
maxatʰisa matʰitʰiasi ʃimqisa iosebisa iodasi
