ioxananisa reʃasi zerubabelisa ʃealtʰielisa nerisa 
malkʰisa adisa kosamisa elmadamisa qerisa 
iesosi eleazarisa iorimisa matʰatʰisa levisa 
simonisa iudasi iosebisa ionamisa eliakimisa 
maleasi minasi matʰatʰasi natʰanisa davitʰisa 
iesesi qobedisa boqazisa salmonisa naxʃonisa 
qaminadabisa adminisa arnisa xetsʰronisa pʰeretsʰisa iudasi 
iakobisa isakisa abraamisa tʰeraxisa naxorisa 
seruɡisa requsi pʰeleɡisa qeberisa ʃalaxisa 
kenanisa arpʰakʰʃadisa semisa noesi lamekʰisa 
metʰuʃelaxisa xanokʰisa ieredisa mahalalelisa kenanisa 
enoʃisa ʃetʰisa adamisa ɣvtʰisa 
ieso sulitsmiditʰ aɣvsili dabrunda iordanedan da sulitʰ ɡaqvanil ikʰna udabnoʃi 
da ormotsʰ dɣes stsʰdida mas eʃmaki da arapʰeri ucamia im dɣeebʃi da matʰi ɡasvlis ʃemdeɡ moʃivda 
utʰxra mas eʃmakma tʰu ɣvtʰis dze xar utʰxari am kʰvas rom purad ikʰtsʰes 
miuɡo mas iesom datserilia rom ara mxolod puritʰ unda tsʰotsʰxlobdes katsʰi aramed ɣvtʰis qoveli sitqvitʰ 
da aiqvana iɡi maɣal mtʰaze da utʃvena ertʰ tsamʃi msopʰlios qvela samepʰo 
da utʰxra mas eʃmakma moɡtsʰem mtʰels am xelmtsipʰebas da matʰ didebas vinaidan me makʰvs motsʰemuli da visatsʰ minda imas vadzlev 
tʰu tʰaqvansa mtsʰem ʃeni ikʰneba qovelive 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra mas datserilia upʰals ʃens ɣmertʰs etsʰi tʰaqvani da mxolod mas emsaxure 
tsaiqvana iɡi ierusalims daaqena tadzris pʰrtʰaze da utʰxra tʰu ɣvtʰis dze xar tʰavi ɡadaiɡde akʰedan dzirs 
vinaidan datserilia rom tʰavis anɡelozebs ubrdzanebs ʃenze rom daɡitsʰvan 
da rom xelʃi aqvanili ɡataron ratʰa kʰvas pʰexi ar tsamohkra 
da miuɡo da utʰxra mas iesom natʰkʰvamia ar ɡamostsʰado upʰali ɣmertʰi ʃeni 
da rotsʰa daamtʰavra qvela ɡamotsʰda eʃmaki ɡaʃorda mas sxva ʒamis molodinʃi 
dabrunda ieso sulis dzalitʰ ɡalileaʃi da misi ambavi moedo mtʰel aremares 
astsavlida matʰ sinaɡoɡebʃi da ɡandidebul iqo qvelas mier 
da mivida nazaretʰs sadatsʰ aɣizarda da ʃevida ʃabatʰ dɣes tʰavisi tʃveulebisamebr sinaɡoɡaʃi da dadɡa tsasakitʰxavad 
da miatsodes mas esaia tsinastsarmetqvelis tsiɡni da ɡaʃala tsiɡni da ipova adɡili sadatsʰ datserili iqo 
upʰlis sulia tʃemze vinaidan man mtsʰxo ɡlaxaktʰa saxareblad momavlina ɡulʃemusvriltʰa ɡansakurneblad tqvetʰatʰvis tʰavisupʰlebis da brmatʰatʰvis tʰvalis axelis ɡamosatsʰxadeblad tʃaɡrultʰa ɡasatʰavisupʰleblad 
upʰlis ʃetsqalebis tslis ɡamosatsʰxadeblad 
da daxura tsiɡni ɡadastsʰa msaxurs da dadʒda qvelas tʰvali sinaɡoɡaʃi misken iqo mipqrobili 
da dautsqo laparaki matʰ dɣes aɣsrulda es tserili tʰkʰven rom moisminetʰ 
da qvelam daumotsma mas da ɡaotsʰebulni iqvnen misi piridan ɡamosuli madlis sitqvebitʰ da ambobdnen es iosebis dze ar aris 
utʰxra matʰ namdvilad metqvitʰ am andazas mkurnalo ɡanikurne ʃeni tʰavi qvelapʰeri ratsʰ ki kapernaumʃi moxda roɡortsʰ ɡaviɡetʰ moaxdine akʰatsʰ ʃens samʃobloʃi 
utʰxra ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom artsʰ ertʰi tsinastsarmetqveli araa miɣebuli tʰavis samʃobloʃi 
ceʃmaritebitʰ ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven mravali kʰvrivi iqo israelʃi elias dros rotsʰa daixʃo tsʰa sam tselitsadsa da ekʰvs tʰves ise rom didi ʃimʃiloba iqo mtʰel kʰveqanaze 
da artsʰ ertʰ matʰɡantʰan ar ikʰna mivlenili elia ɡarda kʰvrivi dedakatsʰisa tsʰidonis tsʰarpʰatʰʃi 
ketʰrovanitsʰ mravali iqo israelʃi elise tsinastsarmetqvelis dros maɡram artsʰ ertʰi matʰɡani ar ɡatsmendila ɡarda neeman sirielisa 
es rom moismines sinaɡoɡaʃi mqopʰtʰ qvelani mdzvinvarebitʰ aɣivsnen 
tsamodɡnen da ɡaadzeves iɡi kʰalakʰidan da miiqvanes im mtʰis tsveramde romelzetsʰ matʰi kʰalakʰi iqo ɡaʃenebuli ratʰa ɡadaeɡdotʰ iɡi 
maɡram man ɡaiara matʰ ʃoris da tsavida 
da tʃavida ɡalileis kʰalakʰ kapernaumʃi da ikʰ astsavlida matʰ ʃabatʰobitʰ 
da ɡaotsʰebulni iqvnen misi modzɣvrebitʰ vinaidan dzalmosili iqo misi sitqva 
sinaɡoɡaʃi iqo katsʰi utsmiduri sulitʰ ʃepqrobili da iqvira xmamaɣla 
ra ɡinda tʃvenɡan ieso nazarevelo tʃvens dasaɣupavad moxvedi ɡitsʰnob vintsʰa xar ɣvtʰis tsmidao 
iesom ʃerisxa iɡi da utʰxra ɡatʃumdi da ɡadi maɡisɡan da dastsʰa iɡi eʃmakma matʰ ʃuaʃi da ɡamovida misɡan da arapʰeri uvnia mistʰvis 
qvelani ɡantsʰvipʰrədnen da ambobdnen ertʰmanetʰʃi es ra sitqvaa rom xelmtsipʰebitʰa da dzalitʰ utsmidur sulebs ubrdzanebs da isinitsʰ ɡamodian 
da moepʰina xma mis ʃesaxeb im mxaris qovel adɡils 
adɡa sinaɡoɡidan da ʃevida simonis saxlʃi xolo simonis sidedri ʃepqrobili iqo didi sitsʰxitʰ da stʰxoves mistʰvis 
da daadɡa tʰavze da ʃerisxa sitsʰxe manatsʰ miatova iɡi mqisve tsamodɡa da emsaxureboda matʰ 
mzis tʃasvlisas qvelam visatsʰ hqavda sxvadasxva sneulebebitʰ daavadebulni mastʰan miiqvana da man qovel matʰɡans xelebi daasxa da ɡankurna 
bevrisɡan eʃmakebitsʰ ɡamodiodnen qvirodnen da ambobdnen ʃen xar kʰriste dze ɣvtʰisa is ki risxavda da ukrdzalavda laparaks radɡan itsʰodnen matʰ rom kʰristea iɡi 
dɣe rom ɡatʰenda ɡamovida ikʰidan da tsavida udabur adɡilas xalxma modzebna da mividnen mastʰan da akavebdnen rom ar tsasuliqo matʰɡan 
man ki utʰxra matʰ sxva kʰalakʰebsatsʰ unda vaxaro ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli vinaidan amistʰvis var movlenili 
da kʰadaɡebda ɡalileis sinaɡoɡebʃi 
ertʰxel rotsʰa xalxis brbo atsqdeboda mas rom ɣvtʰis sitqva moesminatʰ da is idɡa ɡenesaretʰis tbastʰan 
dainaxa tbastʰan mdɡomi ori navi navebidan ɡadmosuli mebadurebi badeebs retsʰxavdnen 
avida ertʰ navze romelitsʰ simonisa iqo stʰxova napirs tsʰota ɡaʃoreboda tʃadʒda da navidan astsavlida xalxs 
rotsʰa laparaki daamtʰavra utʰxra simons ʃetsʰurdi ɣrmad da moisroletʰ badeebi tʰevzis dasacerad 
miuɡo simonma da utʰxra modzɣvaro mtʰeli ɣame viʃrometʰ da verapʰeri daviciretʰ maɡram ʃeni sitqvitʰ visvri bades 
asetsʰ moikʰtsʰnen imdeni tʰevzi moimtsqvdies rom badeebi exeodatʰ 
niʃani mistsʰes amxanaɡebs meore navʃi rom mosuliqvnen mosaʃveleblad movidnen da ise aavses orive navi rom lamis idzirebodnen 
es rom dainaxa simon petrem daetsʰa iesos muxlebtʰan da utʰxra ɡamʃordi upʰalo vinaidan tsʰodvili katsʰi var 
radɡan ʃiʃma ʃeipqro iɡi da qvela mastʰan mqopʰi im tʰevzisceris ɡamo matʰ rom daicires 
aseve iakobi da ioane zebedes dzeni simonis moziareni da utʰxra simons iesom nu ɡeʃinia amieridan adamiantʰa damceri ikʰnebi 
miaqenes navebi mitsas qvelapʰeri miatoves da ɡahqvnen mas 
ertʰxel ertʰ ertʰ kʰalakʰʃi misi qopʰnisas aha movida ketʰritʰ dapʰaruli katsʰi dainaxa ieso da daemxo evedreboda da eubneboda upʰalo tʰu ɡsurs ʃeɡidzlia tʃemi ɡantsmeda 
da ɡaitsoda xeli ʃeaxo mas da tʰkʰva msurs ɡanitsmide da mqisve moʃorda ketʰri 
da ubrdzana mas aravis utʰxra aramed tsadi da etʃvene mɣvdels da ʃestsire ʃeni ɡantsmedistʰvis roɡortsʰ daudɡina matʰ mosem motsmobad 
da upʰro da upʰro vrtsʰeldeboda sitqva mis ʃesaxeb da diddzali xalxi dahqveboda mas ratʰa moesminatʰ da ɡankurnebuliqvnen tʰaviantʰ sneulebatʰaɡan 
is ki udabur adɡilebʃi midioda da lotsʰulobda 
ertʰ dɣes rotsʰa is astsavlida isxdnen ikʰ pʰarisevelni da rdʒulis modzɣvarni romelnitsʰ mosuliqvnen ɡalileisa da iudeis qoveli kutʰxidan da ierusalimidan da upʰlis dzala iqo mastʰan ɡansakurnavad 
aha katsʰebma satsolitʰ moiqvanes adamiani romelitsʰ davrdomili iqo da tsʰdilobdnen ʃiɡnitʰ ʃeeqvanatʰ da iesos tsin daetsvinatʰ 
da rom ver moaxerxes misi ʃeqvana xalxmravlobis ɡamo erdoze avidnen da kramitebs ʃoris satsolianad tʃauʃves ʃuaɡul otʰaxʃi iesos tsin 
rom dainaxa matʰi rətsmena utʰxra adamiano moɡeteva ʃeni tsʰodvebi 
da itsqes mtsiɡnobrebma da pʰarisevlebma msdʒeloba urtʰiertʰʃoris da ambobdnen vin aris es ɣmertʰs rom ɡmobs vis dzaludzs tsʰodvebis miteveba ertʰi ɣvtʰis ɡarda 
ieso mixvda matʰ zraxvebs da miuɡo da utʰxra ras kitʰxulobtʰ tʰkʰvens ɡulʃi 
ra upʰro advilia tʰkʰma ʃeni tsʰodvebi moɡeteva tʰu tʰkʰma adekʰ da ɡaiare 
ratʰa itsʰodetʰ rom katsʰis dzes mitsaze akʰvs tsʰodvebis mitevebis xelmtsipʰeba eubneba davrdomils ʃen ɡeubnebi adekʰ aiɣe ʃeni satsoli da ʃin tsadi 
da mqisve tsamodɡa matʰ tsinaʃe aiɣo razetsʰ itsva da tsavida tʰavis saxlʃi da adidebda ɣmertʰs 
da ɡantsʰvipʰrebam ʃeipqro qvela da adidebdnen ɣmertʰs da ʃeʃinebulebi ambobdnen saotsʰrebani vixiletʰo dɣes 
amis ʃemdeɡ ɡamovida da dainaxa mebaʒe saxelad levi romelitsʰ idʒda sabaʒoʃi da utʰxra mas ɡamomqevi me 
manatsʰ miatova qovelive tsamodɡa da ɡahqva mas 
da moumzada levim mas didi nadimi tʰavis saxlʃi da iqo ikʰ bevri mebaʒe da sxvani romlebitsʰ matʰtʰan ertʰad usxdnen supʰras 
matʰi mtsiɡnobarni da pʰarisevelni drətvinavdnen da eubnebodnen mis motsapʰeebs ratom camtʰ da svamtʰ mebaʒeebtʰan da tsʰodvilebtʰan ertʰad 
da miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ mkurnali dʒanmrtʰelebs ki ara sneulebs scirdebatʰ 
movedi ara martʰaltʰa mosatsodeblad aramed tsʰodviltʰa ratʰa moinanion 
matʰ ki utʰxres mas ioanes motsapʰeebi xʃirad marxuloben da lotsʰvebs aɣavlenen aseve pʰariseveltʰanitsʰ ʃenebi ki camen da svamen 
iesom utʰxra matʰ roɡor aidzulebtʰ mekʰortsileebs imarxulon vidre nepʰe matʰtʰan aris 
maɡram dadɡeba dɣeebi rotsʰa nepʰe tsaertʰmevatʰ da maʃin imarxuleben im dɣeebʃi 
iɡavitsʰ utʰxra matʰ aravin moxevs sakerebels axal samosels da ar daadebs dzvel samosels tʰorem axalsatsʰ daxevs da dzvelsatsʰ ar ɡamoadɡeba axali samoslis sakerebeli 
aravin tʃaasxams axal ɣvinos dzvel tikebʃi tʰorem axali ɣvino tikebs daxetʰkʰavs da ɣvinotsʰ daiɣvreba da tikebitsʰ daiɣupeba 
aramed axali ɣvino axal tikebʃi unda tʃaisxas 
artsʰ ertʰi dzvelis msmeli ar moisurvebs axals radɡan itqvis dzveli sdʒobiao 
ertʰxel ʃabatʰs qanebze ɡadavla mouxda da misi motsapʰeebi tsqvetdnen tʰavtʰavebs xelitʰ pʰʃvnetdnen da camdnen 
pʰariseveltʰaɡan zoɡiertʰebma utʰxres matʰ ratom aketʰebtʰ imas risi ɡaketʰebatsʰ ʃabatʰs araa nebadartʰuli 
da miuɡo da utʰxra matʰ iesom nutʰu ar tsaɡikitʰxavtʰ ra kʰna davitʰma rotsʰa moʃivda mas da mastʰan mqopʰebs 
roɡor ʃevida ɣvtʰis saxlʃi aiɣo da ʃecama satsinaʃeo purebi da tʰavistʰan mqopʰtʰatsʰ dauriɡa romlis camis nebatsʰ aravis hkʰonda ɡarda mɣvdlebisa 
da utʰxra matʰ ʃabatʰis batonitsʰ aris katsʰis dze 
da moxda rom ertʰ sxva ʃabatʰsatsʰ ʃevida sinaɡoɡaʃi da astsavlida matʰ ikʰ iqo katsʰi romelsatsʰ mardʒvena xeli ɡamxmari hkʰonda 
mtsiɡnobarni da pʰarisevelni utʰvaltʰvalebdnen mas aba ʃabatʰs tʰu ɡankurnavso ratʰa epovatʰ roɡor daedotʰ brali mistʰvis 
man itsʰoda matʰi zraxvebi da utʰxra katsʰs romelsatsʰ xeli ɡamxmari hkʰonda adekʰ da ɡamodi ʃuaʃi isitsʰ adɡa da dadɡa ʃuaʃi 
utʰxra iesom matʰ ɡekitʰxebitʰ tʰkʰven ʃabatʰ dɣes ketʰilis ketʰeba ʃeidzleba tʰu borotisa sulis xsna ʃeidzleba tʰu daɣupva 
da tʰvali moavlo qvelas da utʰxra mas ɡaitsode ʃeni xeli asetsʰ moikʰtsʰa da mourtʃa xeli 
isini ki risxvitʰ aɣivsnen da urtʰiertʰʃoris msdʒelobdnen ra ekʰnatʰ iesostʰvis 
im dɣeebʃi tsavida iɡi mtʰaze salotsʰavad da mtʰeli ɣame ɣvtʰisadmi lotsʰvaʃi ɡaatara 
dɣe rom dadɡa daudzaxa tʰavis motsapʰeebs da amoirtʃia matʰɡan tʰormeti romeltʰatsʰ motsʰikʰulebi utsoda 
simoni romelsatsʰ petre ʃearkʰva misi dzma andria iakobi da ioane pʰilipe da bartʰolome 
matʰe da tʰoma iakob alpʰesi da simoni moʃurned tsodebuli 
iuda iakobis dze da iuda iskarioteli romelitsʰ ɡamtsʰemi ɡaxda 
da tʃavida matʰtʰan ertʰad da dadɡa vake adɡilas ikʰ iqo mravali misi motsapʰe da bevri xalxi iudeidan da ierusalimidan da zɣvispiretʰidan tvirosidan da tsʰidonidan 
romelnitsʰ movidnen rom mistʰvis moesminatʰ da tʰaviantʰi sneulebebisɡan ɡankurnebuliqvnen utsmiduri sulitʰ ɡatandʒulnitsʰ da ikurnebodnen 
mtʰeli xalxi tsʰdilobda ʃexeboda mas vinaidan misɡan ɡamodioda dzala da qvelas kurnavda 
aɣmartʰa mzera tʰavis motsapʰeebze da utʰxra netarni xartʰ ɡlaxakni vinaidan tʰkʰvenia ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli 
netarni xartʰ visatsʰ axla ɡʃiatʰ vinaidan ɡadzɣebitʰ netarni xartʰ vintsʰ axla tiritʰ vinaidan ɡaitsʰinebtʰ 
netarni xartʰ rotsʰa ʃeɡidzuleben adamianebi rotsʰa ɡaɡqrian da ɡaɡlandzɣaven xolo tʰkʰvens saxels ɡandevnian roɡortsʰ borots katsʰis dzis ɡamo 
ɡaixaretʰ im dɣes da ɡamxiarulditʰ vinaidan aha didia tʰkʰveni sazɣauri tsʰaʃi vinaidan aseve ekʰtsʰeodnen tsinastsarmetqveltʰ matʰi mamebi 
maɡram vai tʰkʰven mdidarno vinaidan ukve miiɣetʰ tʰkʰveni nuɡeʃistsʰema 
vai tʰkʰven madzɣarno ats vinaidan moɡʃivdebatʰ vai tʰkʰven vintsʰ axla itsʰinitʰ vinaidan iɡlovebtʰ da itirebtʰ 
vai tʰkʰven rotsʰa qvelani karɡs ilaparakeben tʰkʰvenze aseve ekʰtsʰeodnen tsʰrutsinastsarmetqveltʰ matʰi mamebi 
xolo tʰkʰven vintsʰ mismentʰ ɡetqvitʰ ɡiqvardetʰ tʰkʰveni mtrebi da siketʰe uqavitʰ tʰkʰvens modzuleebs 
akurtʰxebdetʰ tʰkʰvens matsqevrebs da lotsʰulobdetʰ tʰkʰvensave ʃeuratsʰxmqopʰeltʰatʰvis 
vintsʰ loqaʃi ɡaɡartqas meoretsʰ miuʃvire vintsʰ samoseli tsaɡartʰvas mosasxamsatsʰ nu daucer 
qvelas vintsʰ ɡtʰxovos mietsʰi da vintsʰ ɡamoɡartʰmevs ukan nuɣar mostʰxov 
roɡortsʰ tʰkʰven ɡindatʰ rom moɡekʰtsʰnen adamianebi tʰkʰventsʰ iseve moekʰetsʰitʰ matʰ 
tʰu tʰkʰveni moqvarulni ɡeqvarebatʰ tʰkʰventʰvis ra madlia vinaidan tsʰodviltʰatsʰ uqvartʰ tʰaviantʰi moqvarulni 
tʰu siketʰes uzamtʰ tʰkʰvens ketʰilismqopʰeltʰ tʰkʰventʰvis ra madlia tsʰodvilnitsʰ aseve aketʰeben 
tʰu sesxs adzlevtʰ imas visi imeditsʰ ɡakʰvtʰ rom ukan daɡibrunebtʰ es raɣa madlia tsʰodvilnitsʰ asesxeben tsʰodviltʰ rom daibrunon imdenive 
xolo tʰkʰven ɡiqvardetʰ tʰkʰveni mtrebi siketʰe uqavitʰ da asesxetʰ da nurapʰers moelitʰ da didi ikʰneba tʰkʰveni sazɣauri maɣlis dzeni ikʰnebitʰ vinaidan iɡi ketʰilia umadurtʰa da borottʰa mimartʰatsʰ 
iqavitʰ ɡulmotsqaleni iseve roɡortsʰ tʰkʰveni mamaa ɡulmotsqale 
nu ɡanikitʰxavtʰ da ar ɡanikitʰxebitʰ msdʒavrs nu dasdebtʰ da ar daɡedebatʰ msdʒavri miutevetʰ da moɡetevebatʰ 
mietsʰitʰ da tʰkʰventsʰ moɡetsʰematʰ karɡi satsqao datkepnili ɡatenili da pirtʰamde savse moɡetsʰematʰ tʰkʰvensave kaltʰaʃi radɡan romeli satsqaotʰitsʰ miutsqavtʰ imavetʰi moɡetsqvebatʰ 
iɡavitsʰ utʰxra matʰ ɡana ʃeudzlia brmas brmis meɡzuroba ɡana oriveni ormoʃi ar tʃatsʰvivdebian 
motsapʰe mastsavlebelze meti ar aris xolo qvela stsavlaɡasrulebuli isetʰive ikʰneba roɡortsʰ misi mastsavlebeli 
rad uqureb tsvels ʃeni dzmis tʰvalʃi sakutʰar tʰvalʃi ki dires ver amtʃnev 
anda roɡor ʃeɡidzlia utʰxra ʃens dzmas dzmao mimiʃvi amoɡiɣo tʰvalidan tsveli sakutʰar tʰvalʃi ki dires ver xedav tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰo dʒer ʃeni tʰvalidan amoiɣe dire da mere dainaxav tʰu roɡor unda amouɣo ʃens dzmas tʰvalidan tsveli 
ar arsebobs karɡi xe romelmatsʰ tsʰudi naqopʰi ɡamoiɣos artsʰ tsʰudi xe romelmatsʰ karɡi naqopʰi ɡamoiɣos 
vinaidan qoveli xe tʰavisi naqopʰitʰ ʃeitsʰnoba ekalze xom ver mokrepʰen leɣvs da artsʰ maqvlis butʃkʰebze ikripʰeba qurdzeni 
ketʰili katsʰi tʰavisi ɡulis ketʰili saundʒidan siketʰes ɡamoiɣebs boroti katsʰi ki borotisɡan borots ɡamoiɣebs vinaidan ɡulis savsebisaɡan metqvelebs misi piri 
ratom mitsodebtʰ upʰalo upʰalo da imas ki ar aketʰebtʰ rasatsʰ ɡeubnebitʰ 
qvela vintsʰ tʃemtʰan modis tʃems sitqvebs ismens da matʰ asrulebs ɡitʃvenebtʰ visatsʰa hɡavs 
iɡi hɡavs saxlis mʃenebel katsʰs romelmatsʰ motʰxara tʃaaɣrmava da kldeze dado sadzirkveli tsqaldidobisas mdinare ekvetʰa im saxls da dzvra ver uqo vinaidan karɡad iqo naʃeni 
xolo vintsʰ ismens da ar asrulebs iɡi hɡavs katsʰs romelmatsʰ saxli aaʃena mitsaze usadzirkvlod da rotsʰa mdinare ekvetʰa umal dainɡra da dzalze didi iqo im saxlis tʃamokʰtsʰeva 
rotsʰa man daasrula qvela tʰavisi sitqva xalxis sasmeneltʰa mimartʰ ʃevida kapernaumʃi 
ertʰ asistʰavs avad hqavda da ukvdeboda mona romelitsʰ mistʰvis dzvirpʰasi iqo 
iesoze rom moismina ɡaɡzavna mastʰan iudeveltʰa uxutsʰesebi satʰxovnelad ratʰa mosuliqo da ɡanekurna misi mona 
isini mividnen iesostʰan stʰxoves mxurvaled da utʰxres iɡi ɣirsia rom es ɡauketʰo 
vinaidan uqvars tʃveni xalxi da sinaɡoɡa man aɡviʃena 
ieso tsahqva matʰ da ukve im saxlis ʃori axlos iqvnen rotsʰa asistʰavma ɡamouɡzavna meɡobrebi mistʰvis satʰkʰmelad upʰalo nu ɡairdʒebi vinaidan ɣirsi ara var rom tʃems cerkʰveʃ ʃemoxvide 
amitom tʃemi tʰavitsʰ ar mivitʃnie ʃentʰan mosvlis ɣirsad mxolod sitqva tʰkʰvi da ɡanikurneba tʃemi mona 
radɡan metsʰ dzalaupʰlebas damortʃilebuls tʃems xelkʰveitʰ mqvanan dʒariskatsʰebi ertʰs veubnebi tsadi da midis da sxvas modi da modis tʃems monas ɡaaketʰe es da aketʰebs 
es rom ɡaiɡona iesos ɡaukvirda misi miubrunda tʰavis ukan momaval xalxs da utʰxra ɡeubnebitʰ rom israelʃitsʰ ver vpove me asetʰi rətsmena 
tsarɡzavnilebma saxlʃi dabrunebisas ɡamoketʰebuli naxes is mona 
amis ʃemdeɡ ieso tsavida kʰalakʰʃi romelsatsʰ erkʰva naini da tʰan mihqvebodnen misi motsapʰeni da diddzali xalxi 
kʰalakʰis karibces rom miuaxlovda aha moasvenebdnen mitsʰvalebuls dedisertʰa vaʒs xolo deda kʰvrivi iqo diddzali xalxi mosdevda mas kʰalakʰidan 
kʰvrivis danaxvisas upʰals ʃeetsʰoda iɡi da utʰxra nu stiri 
mivida da ʃeexo tsʰxedars ɡamsveneblebi ʃedɡnen da man tʰkʰva cabuko ʃen ɡeubnebi adekʰ 
mkvdari tsamodʒda da itsqo laparaki da iesom tʃaabara iɡi tʰavis dedas 
qvelani ʃiʃma ʃeipqro ɣmertʰs adidebdnen da ambobdnen didi tsinastsarmetqveli aɣmdɡara tʃvens ʃoris da ɣmertʰma moxeda tʰavis xalxs 
es sitqva moedo mtʰel iudeas da mtʰel ʃemoɡarens 
autsqes ioanes misma motsapʰeebma qovelive es 
ioanem daibara ori tʰavisi motsapʰe da iesostʰan ɡaɡzavna ʃesakitʰxavad ʃena xar is vintsʰ unda mosuliqo tʰu sxvas unda velodotʰ 
mividnen isini mastʰan da utʰxres ioane natʰlismtsʰemelma ɡamoɡvɡzavna ʃentʰan sakitʰxavad ʃena xar is vintsʰ unda mosuliqo tʰu sxvas unda velodotʰ 
imʒamad man bevri ɡankurna sneulebatʰa da satkivartʰaɡan da avi sulebisaɡan da mraval brmas utsqaloba mxedveloba 
miuɡo da utʰxra matʰ tsaditʰ da utʰxaritʰ ioanes ratsʰ naxetʰ da moisminetʰ brmebs mxedveloba ubrundebatʰ xeibrebi dadian ketʰrovanebi ɡanitsmidebian qruebs esmitʰ mkvdrebi dɡebian da ɣatakebs exarebatʰ 
netaria vintsʰ ar ʃetsʰdeba tʃemʃi 
rotsʰa ioanes motsʰikʰulebi tsavidnen daitsqo laparaki xalxtʰan ioaneze ris sanaxavad ɡaxveditʰ udabnoʃi kʰarisaɡan ʃerxeuli lertsmisa 
maʃ ris sanaxavad ɡaxveditʰ katsʰisa romelsatsʰ pʰapʰuki samoseli atsʰvia aha isini vintsʰ mdidrulad arian ʃemosilni da pʰupʰunebitʰ tsʰxovroben samepʰo karze imqopʰebian 
riɣas sanaxavad tsaxveditʰ tsinastsarmetqvelisa diax ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tsinastsarmetqvelze metisatsʰ 
vinaidan es aris is romlis ʃesaxebatsʰ datserilia aha me vɡzavni tʃems anɡelozs ʃeni saxis tsinaʃe romelitsʰ ɡanamzadebs ʃens ɡzas ʃens tsinaʃe 
vinaidan ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven dedakatsʰtʰa naʃobtʰa ʃoris aravin aris ioaneze didi maɡram ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi umtsʰiresitsʰ ki masze upʰro didia 
mtʰelma xalxma romelitsʰ mas usmenda da mebaʒeebmatsʰ ki ɡanadides ɣmertʰi da ioanes natʰlobitʰ moinatʰlnen 
xolo pʰarisevlebma da rdʒulis mtsʰodneebma uarqves ɣvtʰis rtʃeva matʰ mimartʰ da ar inatʰlebodnen misɡan 
maʃin upʰalma tʰkʰva vis vamsɡavso es modɡma da visi msɡavsni arian isini 
isini hɡvanan qrmebs romlebitsʰ moednebze sxedan da ertʰmanetʰs ɡasdzaxian salamurs ɡikravditʰ da ar tsʰekvavditʰ ɡiɡodebditʰ da ar stiroditʰ 
vinaidan movida ioane natʰlismtsʰemeli da artsʰ purs cams artsʰ ɣvinos svams da tʰkʰven ambobtʰ eʃmaki hqavso 
movida katsʰis dze da cams da svams da ambobtʰ aha katsʰi mcameli da ɣvinis msmeli mebaʒetʰa da tsʰodviltʰa meɡobario 
ɡamartʰlebulia sibrədzne misi qvela ʃvilis mier 
vinme pʰariseveltʰaɡani stʰxovda mas mastʰan ecama puri ʃevida im pʰarisevlis saxlʃi da miudʒda supʰras 
im kʰalakʰʃi iqo tsʰodvili dedakatsʰi roɡortsʰ ki ɡaiɡo iɡi pʰarisevlis saxlʃi ziso moitana nelsatsʰxebeli alebastronis curclitʰ 
da dadɡa ukan mis pʰerxtʰitʰ tsʰremlebitʰ usvelebda pʰexebs da tʰavisi tʰmebitʰ uxotsʰavda pʰexebs ukotsʰnida da nelsatsʰxebels stsʰxebda 
pʰarisevelma romelmatsʰ ieso miitsvia amis danaxvaze tʰavistʰvis tʰkʰva es rom tsinastsarmetqveli iqos ʃeitqobda vin da ranairi dedakatsʰi exeba mas radɡan tsʰodvilia iɡi 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra mas simon raɣatsʰ makʰvs ʃentʰan satʰkʰmeli man ki utʰxra tʰkʰvi modzɣvaro 
tʰkʰva ertʰ mevaxʃes ori movale hqavda ertʰs xutʰasi dinari emartʰa meores ormotsʰdaatʰi 
maɡram raki arapʰeri hkʰondatʰ rom ɡadaexadatʰ orives miuteva axla mitʰxari romels upʰro metad ʃeuqvardeba iɡi 
miuɡo simonma da tʰkʰva me vpʰikʰrob romelsatsʰ upʰro meti miuteva xolo man utʰxra mas stsorad ɡansadʒe 
mibrunda dedakatsʰisaken da simons utʰxra xom xedav am dedakatsʰs ʃens saxlʃi ʃemovedi da tsqali ar mometsʰi pʰerxtʰatʰvis aman ki tsʰremlitʰ damisvela pʰerxni da tʰavisi tʰmebitʰ ʃemixotsʰa 
ʃen ar ɡikotsʰnia tʃemtʰvis amas ki ratsʰ akʰ ʃemovida ar ʃeutsqvetia tʃems pʰerxtʰa kotsʰna 
ʃen zetʰi ar ɡitsʰxia tʃems tʰavze aman ki nelsatsʰxebeli stsʰxo tʃems pʰerxtʰ 
amis ɡamo ɡeubnebi maɡas mieteva mravali tʰavisi tsʰodva radɡan dzlier ʃemiqvara xolo visatsʰ tsʰota mieteva tsʰotatʰi uqvars 
da utʰxra mas miɡeteva ʃeni tsʰodvani 
mastʰan msxdomebma itsqes laparaki tʰavistʰvis vin aris es tsʰodvebsatsʰ rom miutevebs 
man ki utʰxra dedakatsʰs ʃenma rətsmenam ɡixsna ʃen tsadi mʃvidobitʰ 
amis ʃemdeɡ dadioda kʰalakʰidan kʰalakʰʃi da sopʰlidan sopʰelʃi kʰadaɡebda da axarebda ɣvtʰis sasupʰevels da tʰormetnitsʰ mastʰan iqvnen 
aseve zoɡi dedakatsʰitsʰ romelnitsʰ ɡanikurnen avi sulebisa da sneulebebisaɡan mariami maɡdalelad tsodebuli romlisɡanatsʰ ʃvidi eʃmaki ɡavida 
ioana herodes mouravis kʰuzas tsʰoli susana da bevri sxva romelnitsʰ emsaxurebodnen mas tʰaviantʰi kʰonebitʰ 
rotsʰa diddzali xalxi moɡrovda mastʰan da kʰalakʰis qvela mtsʰxovrebi mieaxla man daitsqo iɡavitʰ laparaki 
ɡamovida mtʰesveli tʰavisi tʰeslis dasatʰesad da tʰesvisas zoɡi ɡzis piras datsʰvivda ɡaitʰela da tsʰis pʰrinvelebma akenkes 
zoɡi kldovanze datsʰvivda aɣmotsʰenda da ɡaxma vinaidan sinotive aklda 
zoɡi eklebʃi tʃatsʰvivda ekali ɡaizarda da ɡaatʃanaɡa 
zoɡi ki karɡ niadaɡze datsʰvivda aɣmotsʰenda da asmaɡi naqopʰi ɡamoiɣo es tʰkʰva da daidzaxa visatsʰ qurebi akʰvs sasmenad isminos 
hkitʰxes mas misma motsapʰeebma ras niʃnavda es iɡavi 
man tʰkʰva tʰkʰven moɡetsʰatʰ rom itsʰodetʰ ɣvtʰis sasupʰevlis saidumloebani xolo sxvebs iɡavebitʰ mietsʰatʰ rom uqurebdnen da ver xedavdnen ismendnen da ver iɡebdnen 
es iɡavi ki amas niʃnavs is tʰesli ɣvtʰis sitqvaa 
ɡzastʰan datsʰvenilebi ki isini arian visatsʰ esmitʰ mere modis eʃmaki da miakʰvs sitqva matʰi ɡulidan rom ar itsamon da ar ɡadartʃnen 
eseni ki kldeze rom arian isinia vintsʰ moismenen sitqvas da sixarulitʰ miiɣeben maɡram pʰesvi ara akʰvtʰ da mxolod mtsʰire xans stsamtʰ ɡansatsʰdelis ʒams ki ɡandɡebian 
xolo eklebʃi tʃatsʰvenilni isini arian vintsʰ ismenen maɡram tsʰxovrebis ɡzaze sazrunavi simdidre da ɡantsʰxromani atʃanaɡeben matʰ da naqopʰi veɣar mtsipʰdeba 
xolo karɡ mitsaze datsʰvenilni isini arian vintsʰ ketʰili da tsrpʰeli ɡulitʰ ismenen sitqvas itsʰaven da motʰminebitʰ idzlevian naqopʰs 
aravin antʰebs santʰels rom curceli daaxuros zed an satsol kʰveʃ ʃeedɡas aramed sasantʰleze dadebs ratʰa ʃemomsvlelebma ixilon natʰeli 
vinaidan ar arsebobs dapʰaruli romelitsʰ tsʰxadi ar ɡaxdes artsʰ damaluli romelitsʰ ar ɡamʒɣavndes da ar ɡatsʰxaddes 
amitom daukvirditʰ roɡor ismentʰ visatsʰ akʰvs mas mietsʰema visatsʰ ara akʰvs isitsʰ tsaertʰmeva ratsʰ hɡonia rom ekʰneba 
mividnen mastʰan misi deda da dzmebi da ver ʃedzles axlos misvla xalxis ɡamo 
ʃeatqobines mas dedaʃeni da ʃeni dzmebi ɡaretʰ dɡanan ʃeni naxva surtʰo 
xolo man miuɡo da utʰxra matʰ dedatʃemi da tʃemi dzmebi isini arian vintsʰ ɣvtʰis sitqvas ismenen da asruleben 
moxda ise rom ertʰ dɣes iɡi tʃadʒda navʃi tʰavis motsapʰeebtʰan ertʰad da utʰxra matʰ ɡadavidetʰ tbis ɡaɣma da ɡatsʰures 
rotsʰa mitsʰuravdnen mas tʃaedzina da tbaze kʰariʃxali amovarda navi tsqlitʰ evsebodatʰ da sapʰrətʰxeʃi iqvnen 
mividnen ɡaaɣvidzes da utʰxres modzɣvaro modzɣvaro viɣupebitʰ da man ɡaɣvidzebulma ʃerisxa kʰari da tsqlis ɣelva da datsʰxrnen da tʃamovarda mqudroeba 
utʰxra matʰ sad aris tʰkʰveni rətsmena isini ʃiʃitʰa da ɡaotsʰebitʰ eubnebodnen ertʰimeores vin aris es kʰarebsatsʰ rom ubrdzanebs da tsqalsatsʰ da emortʃilebian mas 
ɡadatsʰures ɡeraseneltʰa kʰveqnisken romelitsʰ ɡalileis ɡaɣma mxares aris 
rotsʰa ɡavida xmeletʰze tsin ʃemoxvda ertʰi katsʰi kʰalakʰidan mas eʃmakebi daupʰlebodnen didi xanis tsin da artsʰ samosels itsʰvamda da artsʰ saxlʃi tsʰxovrobda aramed samarxebʃi 
roɡortsʰ ki dainaxa ieso daikivla mis tsin daetsʰa da xmamaɣla iqvira ra ɡinda tʃemɡan ieso dzeo maɣali ɣvtʰisa ɡevedrebi nu mtandʒav 
vinaidan ubrdzana aratsmida suls am katsʰisɡan ɡamosuliqo vinaidan did xans standʒavda mas hkravdnen dʒacvebitʰ da borkilebitʰ rom daekavebinatʰ iɡi maɡram is tsqvetda borkilebs da idevneboda eʃmakis mier udabnoebʃi 
hkitʰxa mas iesom ra aris ʃeni saxeli man utʰxra leɡioni vinaidan bevri eʃmaki iqo masʃi ʃesuli 
da evedrebodnen iesos rom ar ebrdzanebina matʰtʰvis upʰskrulʃi tʃasvla 
ikʰ iqo ɣorebis didi kolti romelitsʰ mtʰaze dzovda eʃmakebi ʃeevedrnen iesos rom neba daertʰo ʃesuliqvnen matʰʃi da man dartʰo neba 
ɡamovidnen eʃmakebi im katsʰidan da ʃevidnen ɣorebʃi kolti kbodedan ɡadaeʃva tbaʃi da tʃaixrtʃo 
es ambavi rom dainaxes mtsqemsebma ɡaikʰtsʰnen da ʃeatqobines kʰalakʰsa da sopʰlebs 
ɡamovidnen momxdaris sanaxavad movidnen iesostʰan da naxes katsʰi romlisɡanatsʰ ɡavidnen eʃmakebi iɡi ʃemosili da ɡonsmoɡebuli idʒda iesos pʰerxtʰitʰ da ʃeeʃindatʰ 
mxilvelebma uambes roɡor ɡadartʃa eʃmakeuli 
evedreboda ɡeraseneltʰa sanaxebis mtʰeli xalxi ratʰa ɡastsʰloda matʰ vinaidan didma ʃiʃma moitsʰva isini isitsʰ tʃadʒda navʃi da ɡabrunda 
is katsʰi romlisɡanatsʰ eʃmakebi ɡavidnen ʃeevedra iesos tʰavistʰan daetovebina maɡram man ɡauʃva da utʰxra 
dabrundi ʃin da uambe ratsʰ ɡiqo ɣmertʰma isitsʰ tsavida da mtʰel kʰalakʰs amtsʰnobda ra ɡauketʰa iesom 
rotsʰa ieso dabrunda xalxma miiɣo iɡi vinaidan qvelani elodnen mas 
da aha movida katsʰi saxelad iairosi romelitsʰ sinaɡoɡis mtʰavari iqo daemxo iesos pʰerxtʰitʰ da evedreboda ʃin ɡahqoloda 
vinaidan ertʰadertʰi asuli hqavda tʰormeti tslisa da ukvdeboda ieso rom midioda xalxi zed atsqdeboda mas 
iqo ertʰi kʰali romelitsʰ tʰormeti tseli sisxlis denitʰ itandʒeboda mtʰeli kʰoneba ekʰimebs daaxardʒa da veravin ɡankurna 
uknidan miepara da misi tansatsʰmlis kaltʰas ʃeexo imtsamsve ʃeutsqda sisxlis dena 
tʰkʰva iesom vin ʃemexo rotsʰa qvelam iuara petrem da mastʰan mqopʰebma utʰxres modzɣvaro xalxi ɡars ɡaxvevia da zed ɡatsqdeba ʃen ki ambob vin ʃemexoo 
xolo iesom tʰkʰva viɣatsʰ ʃemexo me radɡan vɡrədznob rom dzala ɡavida tʃemɡan 
kʰalma raki dainaxa rom ver daimala miuaxlovda dzrtsolitʰ daemxo mis tsinaʃe da sadʒarod ɡanatsʰxada ra mizezitʰatsʰ ʃeexo da roɡor utsʰbad ɡanikurna 
utʰxra mas asulo ʃenma rətsmenam ɡadaɡartʃina tsadi mʃvidobitʰ 
dʒer sitqva ar daemtʰavrebina rom viɣatsʰ movida sinaɡoɡis mtʰavris saxlidan da utʰxra ʃeni asuli mokvda nuɣar ʃeatsuxeb modzɣvars 
iesom es rom moismina miuɡo mas nu ɡeʃinia mxolod irtsmune da ɡanikurneba 
saxlʃi rom mividnen aravis dartʰo neba ʃesuliqo petres iakobis ioanes da ɡoɡonas ded mamis ɡarda 
qvela motʰkʰvamda da dastiroda mas man ki utʰxra nu stiritʰ is ar momkvdara sdzinavs mxolod 
isini ki dastsʰinodnen mas vinaidan itsʰodnen rom mkvdari iqo 
xeli xelʃi tʃascida ʃesdzaxa da tʰkʰva ɡoɡonav adekʰ 
da daubrunda suli utsʰeb tsamodɡa iɡi da man brdzana sacmeli mietsʰatʰ ɡoɡonastʰvis 
da ɡaukvirdatʰ mis mʃoblebs man ubrdzana matʰ aravistʰvis etʰkʰvatʰ momxdaris ʃesaxeb 
mouxmo tʰormets mistsʰa matʰ dzala da xelmtsipʰeba qvela eʃmakze rom ɡanekurnatʰ sneulebani 
miavlina isini ɣvtʰis sasupʰevlis sakʰadaɡeblad da sneultʰa ɡansakurnavad 
utʰxra matʰ arapʰeri tsaiɣotʰ ɡzaʃi artsʰ xeldʒoxi artsʰ ɡuda artsʰ puri artsʰ vertsʰxli da artsʰ ori mosasxami ikʰoniotʰ 
romel saxlʃitsʰ ʃexvaltʰ ikʰ dartʃitʰ da ikʰidanve ɡaemɡzavretʰ 
xolo tʰu sadme ar miɡiɣon im kʰalakʰidan ɡamosvlisas tʰkʰvens pʰerxtʰaɡan mtveri tʃamoibertqetʰ matʰ tsinaaɣmdeɡ dasamotsmeblad 
tsavidnen da itsqes sopʰel sopʰel siaruli axarebdnen da qvelɡan kurnavdnen 
moismina herodem tetrarkʰma qoveli misi namokʰmedari da ɡaoɡnda vinaidan ertʰni imas ambobdnen ioane aɣdɡao mkvdretʰitʰ 
meoreni elia ɡamotʃndao sxvebi ambobdnen ertʰi dzveli tsinastsarmetqveltʰaɡani aɣdɡao mkvdretʰitʰ 
herodem tʰkʰva ioanes me movkvetʰe tʰavi es ki vin aris viszetsʰ asetʰi ram mesmis da undoda misi naxva 
dabrundnen motsʰikʰulebi da uambes mas ratsʰ ɡaaketʰes man tsaiqvana isini da ɡanmartovda betʰsaidad tsodebuli kʰalakʰisaken 
ʃeitqo diddzalma xalxma da ɡahqva mas is ɣebulobda matʰ da elaparakeboda ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelze xolo visatsʰ ɡankurneba esaciroeboda kurnavda matʰ 
rotsʰa dɣem itsqo ɡadaxra mividnen mastʰan tʰormetni da utʰxres ɡauʃvi es xalxi rom tsavidnen ɡaremo sopʰlebsa da dabebʃi ɣamis ɡasatʰevad da sazrdos saʃovnelad vinaidan akʰ udabur adɡilas vimqopʰebitʰ 
utʰxra matʰ mietsʰitʰ sacmeli matʰ utʰxres xutʰi purisa da ori tʰevzis meti arapʰeri ɡaɡvatʃnia tʰu ar tsavaltʰ da sacmels ar vuqiditʰ mtʰel am xalxs 
radɡan ikʰ xutʰi atʰasamde katsʰi ikʰneboda man utʰxra tʰavis motsapʰeebs dasxitʰ isini dʒɡupʰebad tʰitʰoʃi ormotsʰdaatʰamde iqos 
ase moikʰtsʰnen da dasxes qvelani 
man aiɣo xutʰi puri da ori tʰevzi zetsʰas axeda akurtʰxa datexa da mistsʰa motsapʰeebs rom tʃamoeriɡebinatʰ xalxistʰvis 
qvelam cama da ɡadzɣa xolo dartʃenili natexebitʰ tʰormeti ɡodori ɡaavses 
ertʰxel rotsʰa ɡanmartoebuli lotsʰulobda da motsapʰeebitsʰ mastʰan iqvnen iesom hkitʰxa matʰ ras ambobs xalxi vina var me 
matʰ miuɡes da tʰkʰves ioane natʰlismtsʰemelio sxvebi eliao sxvebi ki vinme dzveli aɣmdɡari tsinastsarmetqvelio 
iesom utʰxra tʰkʰven ki raɣas ambobtʰ vina var me petrem pasuxad utʰxra ɣvtʰis tsʰxebuli 
maɡram man aukrdzala matʰ ubrdzana aravistʰvis ɡaemxilatʰ es 
utʰxra matʰ katsʰis dzis xvedria mravali tandʒva aitanos da uarqopʰil ikʰnes uxutsʰestʰa mɣvdelmtʰavartʰa da mtsiɡnobartʰa mier moklul ikʰnes da mesame dɣes aɣdɡes 
qvelas ɡasaɡonad ki ase tʰkʰva tʰu vinmes surs ɡamomqves uarqos tʰavisi tʰavi qoveldɣe itvirtʰavdes tʰavis dʒvars da momqvebodes 
vinaidan visatsʰ surs tʰavisi suli ixsnas iɡi daɣupavs mas xolo vintsʰ tʃemi ɡulistʰvis daɣupavs mas iɡi ixsnis mas 
radɡan ras arɡebs adamians tʰu mtʰels sopʰels moiɡebs tʰavis tʰavs ki daɣupavs an avnebs 
radɡan visatsʰ ʃertsʰxveba tʃemi da tʃemi sitqvebisa katsʰis dzesatsʰ ʃertsʰxveba misi rotsʰa mova tʰavisi mamisa da tsmida anɡelozebis didebitʰ 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven arian zoɡiertʰebi akʰ mdɡomtʰaɡan romlebitsʰ ar iɡemeben sikvdils rom ukve ixilaven ɣvtʰis sasupʰevels 
am sitqvebidan rva dɣis ʃemdeɡ petre ioane da iakobi tsaiqola tʰan da mtʰaze avida salotsʰavad 
rotsʰa lotsʰulobda misi saxis ieri ʃeitsʰvala da misi samoseli tʰetʰrad mokʰatʰkʰatʰe ʃeikʰna 
da aha mastʰan saubrobda ori katsʰi eseni iqvnen mose da elia 
isini ɡamotʃndnen didebitʰ da laparakobdnen mis tsasvlaze romelitsʰ ierusalimʃi unda aɣsrulebuliqo 
petre da mastʰan mqopʰni damdzimebulni iqvnen dzilitʰ da rotsʰa ɡaeɣvidzatʰ ixiles misi dideba da mastʰan mdɡomare ori katsʰi 
xolo rotsʰa isini ʃordebodnen mas petrem utʰxra iesos modzɣvaro ra karɡia tʃventʰvis akʰ qopʰna ɡavaketʰebtʰ akʰ sam karavs ertʰi ʃen ertʰi moses da ertʰi elias vinaidan ar itsʰoda ras laparakobda 
amas rom ambobda ɡamotʃnda ɣrubeli da miutʃrdila matʰ ɣrubelʃi rom ʃevidnen ʃeeʃindatʰ 
ɣrublidan ɡaisma xma romelitsʰ ambobda es aris dze tʃemi saqvareli mas usminetʰ 
es xma rom ɡaisma ieso marto dartʃa isini ki dadumdnen da im dɣeebʃi aravistʰvis utʰkʰvamtʰ ratsʰ ixiles 
meore dɣes rotsʰa mtʰidan tʃamovidnen bevri xalxi ʃeeɡeba mas 
da aha im xalxʃi viɣatsʰ katsʰma ʃehqvira modzɣvaro ɡevedrebi moxede tʃems dzes radɡan es ertʰadertʰi mqavs 
sulsa hqavs ʃepqrobili uetsʰrad tsamoaqvirebs akʰetʰ ikʰitʰ axetʰkʰebs mas duʒs adens da rotsʰa daaosebs dzlivsdzlivobitʰ ɡaetsʰleba 
vtʰxove ʃens motsapʰeebs rom ɡamoedevnatʰ maɡram ver ʃedzles 
miuɡo iesom da tʰkʰva hoi urtsmuno da ukuɣmartʰo modɡmav rodemde viqo tʰkʰventʰan da ɡitʰminotʰ akʰ momiqvane ʃeni dze 
vidre movidoda eʃmakma daaxetʰkʰa da dautsqo kruntʃxva iesom ʃerisxa aratsmida suli ɡankurna qrma da tʃaabara tʰavis mamas 
qvelani ɡaotsʰebulni iqvnen ɣvtʰis sidiaditʰ rotsʰa qvelas ukvirda qovelive rasatsʰ is aketʰebda utʰxra tʰavis motsapʰeebs 
qurad iɣetʰ es sitqvebi dze katsʰisa ɡadaetsʰema katsʰtʰa xelʃi 
maɡram isini ver mixvdnen am natʰkʰvams da iɡi dapʰaruli iqo matʰtʰvis ise rom ver tʃastsvdnen mas da eʃinodatʰ ekitʰxatʰ mistʰvis am sitqvebis ɡamo 
ertʰi pʰikʰri ki daebadatʰ vin upʰro didi iqo matʰ ʃoris 
iesom romelitsʰ xvdeboda matʰi ɡulis zraxvebs moiqvana bavʃvi da tʰavis tsin daaqena 
utʰxra matʰ vintsʰ miiɣebs am bavʃvs tʃemi saxelitʰ is me mimiɣebs xolo vintsʰ me mimiɣebs is tʃems momavlinebelsatsʰ miiɣebs xolo vintsʰ tʰkʰvens ʃoris umtsʰiresia is aris didi 
miuɡo ioanem da tʰkʰva modzɣvaro tʃven vnaxetʰ katsʰi romelitsʰ ʃeni saxelitʰ eʃmakebs devnis da tʃven davuʃaletʰ mas radɡan ar daɡvqveba tʃven 
utʰxra mas iesom nu dauʃlitʰ vinaidan is vintsʰ tʰkʰvens tsinaaɣmdeɡ ar aris is tʰkʰventʰanaa 
rotsʰa moaxlovda misi amaɣlebis dɣeebi ibruna piri ierusalimʃi asasvlelad 
tsindatsin miavlina matsʰneebi da isini tsavidnen da ʃevidnen samarieltʰa sopʰelʃi ratʰa ɡaemzadebinatʰ mistʰvis 
maɡram ikʰ ar miiɣes iɡi vinaidan piri mikʰtsʰeuli hkʰonda ierusalimʃi tsasasvlelad 
dainaxes es misma motsapʰeebma iakobma da ioanem da utʰxres upʰalo tʰu ɡinda vitqvitʰ rom tsʰetsʰxli tʃamovides tsʰidan da mospos isini roɡortsʰ eliam ɡaaketʰa 
maɡram is mibrunda matʰken ɡautsqra da utʰxra ar itsʰitʰ visi sulisani xartʰ 
vinaidan dze katsʰisa movida ara adamiantʰa sulebis dasaɣupavad aramed saxsnelad da tsavidnen sxva sopʰelʃi 
ɡzaze rom midiodnen viɣatsʰam utʰxra mas ɡamoɡvqvebi sadatsʰ ki tsaxval 
iesom utʰxra mas meliebs soroebi akʰvtʰ da tsʰis pʰrinveltʰ budeebi katsʰis dzes ki ara akʰvs tʰavis misadreki 
meores ki utʰxra ɡamomqevi man tʰkʰva upʰalo neba mometsʰi dʒer tsavide da mamatʃemi davmarxo 
man ki utʰxra mas daanebe mkvdrebs tʰaviantʰi mkvdrebis damarxva ʃen ki tsadi da ikʰadaɡe ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli 
sxvamatsʰ tʰkʰva me ɡamoɡqvebi upʰalo oɣond dʒer neba mometsʰi tʃems ʃinaurebs davemʃvidobo 
utʰxra mas iesom aravin ɡamodɡeba ɣvtʰis sasupʰevlisatʰvis visatsʰ ɡutʰani uciravs xelʃi da ukan iqureba 
amis ʃemdeɡ amoartʃia upʰalma sxva samotsʰdaatʰi da tsinastsar miavlina or ori qovel kʰalakʰsa da sopʰelʃi sadatsʰ misvlas apirebda 
utʰxra matʰ samkali bevria muʃaki tsʰota amitom evedretʰ samklis patrons rom ɡamoɡzavnos muʃakni tʰavis samkalʃi 
tsaditʰ aha ɡaɡzavnitʰ tʰkʰven roɡortsʰ kravebs mɡlebs ʃoris 
artsʰ kʰisa tsaiɣotʰ tʰan artsʰ ɡuda artsʰ pʰexsatsʰmeli artsʰ aravin moikitʰxotʰ ɡzaʃi 
romel saxlʃitsʰ ʃexvidetʰ utsin es stʰkʰvitʰ mʃvidoba am saxls 
tʰu ikʰneba ikʰ mʃvidobis dze masze daivanebs tʰkʰveni mʃvidoba tʰu ara da tʰkʰvenve daɡibrundebatʰ 
imave saxlʃi dartʃitʰ cametʰ da svitʰ ratsʰ matʰ akʰvtʰ vinaidan muʃaki ɣirsia tʰavisi sazɣaurisa ertʰi saxlidan meore saxlʃi nu ɡadaxvaltʰ 
romel kʰalakʰʃitsʰ mixvaltʰ da miɡiɣeben cametʰ ratsʰ ʃemoɡtʰavazon 
ɡankurnetʰ ikʰ mqopʰi sneulni da utʰxaritʰ ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli moɡiaxlovdatʰ 
xolo tʰu romelime kʰalakʰʃi ʃesvlisas ar miɡiɣeben kʰutʃaʃi ɡamosvlisas tʰkʰvitʰ 
tʰkʰveni kʰalakʰis mtvers romelitsʰ tʃvens pʰexebs miekro vibertqavtʰ tʰkʰvens mimartʰ oɣond esetsʰ itsʰodetʰ rom ɡiaxlovdebatʰ ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli 
ɡeubnebitʰ sodoms upʰro ɡauadvildeba im dɣes vidre im kʰalakʰs 
vai ʃen kʰorazino da vai ʃen betʰsaidav vinaidan tvirossa da tsʰidonʃi rom momxdariqo dzaltʰakʰmedebani romelnitsʰ tʰkʰventʰan moxda isini didi xnis tsin dzadzebsa da natsʰarʃi msxdomareni moinaniebdnen 
maɡram tvirossa da tsʰidons upʰro ɡauadvildeba ɡankitʰxvisas vidre tʰkʰven 
ʃen ki kapernaumo ɡana tsʰamde amaɣldebi dʒodʒoxetʰamde daeʃvebi 
vintsʰ tʰkʰven moɡismentʰ metsʰ momismens tʰkʰveni uarmqopʰeli metsʰ uarmqopʰs tʃemi uarmqopʰeli uarqopʰs tʃems momavlinebels 
sixarulitʰ dabrundnen samotsʰdaatʰni da utʰxres upʰalo ʃeni saxelitʰ eʃmakebitsʰ ki ɡvemortʃilebian 
man ki utʰxra matʰ davinaxe satana elvasavitʰ tsʰidan ɡadmovardnili 
aha ɡadzlevtʰ tʰkʰven xelmtsipʰebas ɡveltʰa da morieltʰa dasatʰrɡunavad da mtris qoveli dzalisa tʰkʰven ki arapʰeri ɡevnebatʰ 
oɣond nu xarobtʰ rom sulebi ɡemortʃilebian aramed ɡixarodetʰ rom tʰkʰveni saxelebi tsʰaʃia tʃatserili 
im dros sulʃi ɡaixara iesom da tʰkʰva ɡadideb ʃen mamao upʰalo tsʰisa da mitsisa radɡan daupʰare es brdzentʰa da ɡoniertʰ tʃvilebs ki ɡanutsʰxade hei mamao vinaidan ase iqo mosatsoni ʃens tsinaʃe 
qovelive tʃemi mamisɡan ɡadmometsʰa xolo aravin itsʰis vin aris mama ɡarda dzisa da aravin itsʰis vin aris dze ɡarda mamisa da imisa visatsʰ dzes surs rom ɡanutsʰxados 
miubrunda motsapʰeebs tsʰalke da utʰxra netaria tʰvalebi romelnitsʰ xedaven rasatsʰ tʰkʰven xedavtʰ 
radɡan ɡetqvitʰ rom mraval tsinastsarmetqvelsa da mepʰes surda enaxa rasatsʰ tʰkʰven xedavtʰ maɡram ver ixila da esmina rasatsʰ tʰkʰven ismentʰ da ver moismina 
aha ertʰi rdʒulis mtsʰodne tsamodɡa da ɡamosatsʰdelad tʰkʰva ra unda ɡavaketʰo modzɣvaro rom saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle davimkvidro 
man utʰxra mas rdʒulʃi roɡor stseria ʃen roɡor kitʰxulob 
man miuɡo da utʰxra ʃeiqvare upʰali ɣmertʰi ʃeni mtʰeli ʃeni ɡulitʰ mtʰeli ʃeni sulitʰ mtʰeli ʃeni dzalitʰa da mtʰeli ʃeni ɡonebitʰ da moqvasi ʃeni roɡortsʰ tʰavi ʃeni 
utʰxra mas stsorad mipasuxe eɡre moikʰetsʰi da itsʰotsʰxleb 
maɡram mas tʰavis ɡamartʰleba undoda da utʰxra iesos vin aris tʃemi moqvasi 
upasuxa iesom da utʰxra ertʰi katsʰi midioda ierusalimidan ierixos da daesxnen qatʃaɣebi tansatsʰmeli ɡaxades dacres da tsavidnen is ki tsʰotsʰxal mkvdari miatoves 
ʃemtʰxvevitʰ ertʰma mɣvdelma tʃaiara im ɡzaze dainaxa iɡi da ɡverdi aukʰtsʰia 
aseve levianma tʃaiara im adɡilas dainaxa da ɡverdi aukʰtsʰia 
mere viɣatsʰ samarielma ɡamoiara dainaxa da ʃeitsʰoda 
mivida mastʰan crilobebi ʃeuxvia zetʰi da ɣvino daasxa ʃesva tʰavis pirutqvze miiqvana sastumroʃi da izruna masze 
meore dɣes amoiɣo ori dinari mistsʰa sastumros patrons da utʰxra izrune masze da tʰu zedmeti xardʒi moɡiva rom davbrundebi moɡtsʰemo 
ras pʰikʰrob im samidan romeli upʰro iqo qatʃaɣebis xelʃi tʃavardnilis moqvasi 
man tʰkʰva romelmatsʰ tsqaloba uqo mas utʰxra mas iesom tsadi da ʃentsʰ aseve moikʰetsʰi 
ɡanaɡrdzes ɡza da ʃevida iɡi ertʰ sopʰelʃi da ertʰma dedakatsʰma saxelad martʰam miitsvia iɡi saxlʃi 
mas hqavda da saxelad mariami romelitsʰ iesos pʰerxtʰitʰ dadʒda da ismenda mis sitqvas 
martʰa ki zrunavda ɡuluxvad ɡamaspindzlebaze mivida mastʰan da utʰxra upʰalo ar ɡanaɣvlebs rom tʃemma dam martod damtova samaspindzlod utʰxari momexmaros 
da utʰxra mas upʰalma pasuxad martʰa martʰa ʃen bevr rameze zrunav da tsuxxar 
saciro ki mxolod ertʰia mariamma uketʰesi tsili amoirtʃia romelitsʰ ar tsaertʰmeva mas 
ertʰxel rotsʰa iɡi ertʰ adɡilas lotsʰulobda da daasrula lotsʰva ertʰma motsapʰetʰaɡanma mimartʰa upʰalo ɡvastsavle lotsʰva roɡortsʰ ioane astsavlida tʰavis motsapʰeebs 
utʰxra matʰ rotsʰa lotsʰulobtʰ tʰkʰvitʰ mamao tʃveno romeli xar tsʰatʰa ʃina tsmida iqos saxeli ʃeni movides supʰeva ʃeni iqos neba ʃeni vitʰartsʰa tsʰatʰa ʃina eɡretsʰa kʰveqanasa zeda 
puri tʃveni arsobisa moɡvetsʰ tʃven dɣitʰi dɣe 
da moɡviteve tʃveni tsʰodvebi radɡan tʃventsʰ mivutevebtʰ qvela tʃvens tʰanamdebs da nu ʃeɡviqvan tʃven ɡansatsʰdelʃi 
da utʰxra matʰ romelime tʰkʰvenɡans rom meɡobari hqavdes da ʃuaɣamisas miadɡes da utʰxras meɡobaro masesxe sami puri 
vinaidan meɡobari momivida namɡzavri da arapʰeri ɡamatʃnia tsin rom davudo 
da man ʃiɡnidan ɡamosdzaxos nu matsuxeb kari daketilia bavʃvebitsʰ loɡinʃi mitsvanan ar ʃemidzlia tsamodɡoma da puris motsʰema 
ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tʰu ar adɡeba da meɡobrobis ɡamo ar mistsʰems purs misi abezrobis ɡamo maintsʰ adɡeba da mistsʰems imden purs ramdenitsʰ scirdeba 
da me ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven itʰxovetʰ da moɡetsʰematʰ edzietʰ da ipovitʰ dareketʰ da ɡaɡeɣebatʰ 
vinaidan qvela vintsʰ itʰxovs ɣebulobs da vintsʰ edziebs poulobs da vintsʰ reks ɡauɣeben 
romeli mama ikʰneba tʰkʰvenʃi rom ʃvilma puri stʰxovos da kʰva mistsʰes anda tʰevzi stʰxovos da tʰevzis tsil ɡveli mistsʰes 
anda kvertsʰxi rom stʰxovos morieli mistsʰes 
hoda tʰu tʰkʰven borotebma itsʰitʰ ketʰil misatsʰemtʰa mitsʰema tʰkʰveni ʃvilebisatʰvis metadre zetsʰieri mama mistsʰems sulitsmidas imatʰ vintsʰ stʰxovs 
devnida iɡi eʃmaks katsʰisaɡan romelitsʰ mundʒi iqo da rotsʰa eʃmaki ɡavida mundʒi alaparakda da ɡaotsʰda xalxi 
zoɡiertʰi ambobda belzebulitʰ eʃmaktʰa mtʰavritʰ devniso eʃmakebs 
zoɡi ki ɡamosatsʰdelad moitʰxovda misɡan niʃans tsʰidan 
xolo man itsʰoda matʰi zraxvebi da utʰxra matʰ qoveli samepʰo romelitsʰ tʰavisave tsinaaɣmdeɡaa ɡaqopʰili ɡapartaxdeba da saxli saxlze daemxoba 
da tʰu satana ɡaqopʰilia tʰavisave tsinaaɣmdeɡ roɡorɣa ɡadzlebs misi samepʰo tʰkʰven ki ambobtʰ vitʰomtsʰ me belzebulitʰ vdevnide eʃmakebs 
tʰu me belzebulitʰ vdevni eʃmakebs tʰkʰveni ʃvilebi viɣatʰi devnian amitom isini ikʰnebian tʰkʰveni msadʒulebi 
da tʰu me ɣvtʰis tʰitʰitʰ vdevni eʃmakebs aba daɡdɡomiatʰ ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli 
rotsʰa dzlieri katsʰi iaraɣitʰ itsʰavs tʰavis karmidamos maʃin misi kʰoneba mʃvidobitʰ aris 
xolo rotsʰa masze dzlieri tʰavs daesxmis da daamartsʰxebs tsaartʰmevs iaraɣs romlis imeditsʰa hkʰonda da nadavls daariɡebs 
vintsʰ tʃemtʰan ar aris is tʃems tsinaaɣmdeɡaa da vintsʰ tʃemtʰan ar aɡrovebs is pʰantavs 
rotsʰa utsmiduri suli ɡamova adamianisɡan dadis urtsqulebʃi edzebs simʃvides maɡram ver poulobs maʃin ambobs davbrundebi tʃems saxlʃi saidanatsʰ ɡamovedio 
miva da ipovis mas daɡvilsa da movlils 
maʃin tsava da moiqvans ʃvid sxva suls tʰavisze uborotess ʃevlen da dasaxldebian ikʰ da im katsʰistʰvis ukanaskneli pirvelze uaresi ikʰneba 
sanam is amas laparakobda ertʰma dedakatsʰma xma aɣimaɣla xalxidan da tsarmotʰkʰva netaria mutsʰeli romelmatsʰ ʃen ɡatara da dzudzuni romeltʰatsʰ stsovdi 
man ki tʰkʰva netar arian isini vintsʰ moismenen da daitsʰaven ɣvtʰis sitqvas 
rotsʰa xalxi moatsqda da itsqo man laparaki es modɡma boroti modɡmaa itʰxovs niʃans da niʃani ar mietsʰema mas ɡarda ionas niʃnisa 
vinaidan roɡortsʰ iona iqo niʃani nineveltʰatʰvis aseve ikʰneba am modɡmisatʰvis dze katsʰisa 
samxretʰis dedopʰali tsamodɡeba samsdʒavroze am modɡmis adamianebtʰan ertʰad da msdʒavrs dasdebs matʰ vinaidan iɡi dedamitsis kididan movida solomonis sibrədznis mosasmenad da aha akʰ aris solomonze didi 
ninevelebi aɣdɡebian samsdʒavroze am modɡmastʰan ertʰad da msdʒavrs dasdeben mas vinaidan matʰ moinanies ionas kʰadaɡebitʰ da aha akʰ aris ionaze didi 
aravin antʰebs santʰels rom dadɡas mopʰarebulʃi anda curclis kʰveʃ aramed sasantʰleze ratʰa ʃemosulebi xedavdnen natʰels 
sxeulis santʰeli ʃeni tʰvalia rotsʰa ʃeni tʰvali supʰtʰaa mtʰeli ʃeni sxeulitsʰ natʰelia maɡram rotsʰa iɡi borotia ʃeni sxeulitsʰ bnelia 
amitom uqure natʰeli romelitsʰ ʃenʃia bneli xom ar aris 
tʰu ki mtʰeli ʃeni sxeuli natʰelia da bneli arapʰeri akʰvs mtʰlianad natʰeli ikʰneba iɡi roɡortsʰ santʰeli elvarebitʰ ɡinatʰebdes 
amas rom laparakobda ertʰma pʰarisevelma stʰxova mastʰan ecama puri ʃevida da supʰras miudʒda 
pʰarisevels ɡaukvirda rotsʰa dainaxa rom man ar daibana camis tsin 
utʰxra mas upʰalma axla tʰkʰven pʰarisevelno sasmissa da tʰepʰʃs ɡaredan asupʰtʰavebtʰ tʰkʰveni ʃinaɡani ki savsea mtatsʰeblobitʰ da borotebitʰ 
uɡunurno ɡana ɡareɡanis ʃemkʰmnelma ar ʃekʰmna ʃinaɡanitsʰ 
aramed ɡaetsʰitʰ motsqaleba ratsʰ ʃiɡnitʰaa da aha qvelapʰeri supʰtʰa ɡekʰnebatʰ 
maɡram vai tʰkʰven pʰarisevelno rom ɡamohqopʰtʰ pitnis teɡanisa da qovelnairi bostneulis meatʰeds da ɡverds ukʰtsʰevtʰ ɣvtʰis samartʰalsa da siqvaruls es unda ɡaɡeketʰebinatʰ da artsʰ is unda daɡetovebinatʰ 
vai tʰkʰven pʰarisevelno rom ɡiqvartʰ tsina adɡilze dʒdoma sinaɡoɡebʃi da mosalmebani moednebze 
vai tʰkʰven radɡan xartʰ utʃinari samarxebivitʰ romlebzetsʰ adamianebi dadian da ar ki itsʰian 
amaze ertʰ ertʰma rdʒulis mtsʰodnem utʰxra modzɣvaro amas rom ambob amitʰ tʃventsʰ ɡvaqeneb ʃeuratsʰxqopʰas 
man ki utʰxra vai tʰkʰventsʰ rdʒulis mtsʰodneno rom ahkidebtʰ adamianebs mdzime tvirtʰs tʰvitʰon ki im tvirtʰs tʰitʰsatsʰ ar akarebtʰ 
vai tʰkʰven samarxebs rom uʃenebtʰ tsinastsarmetqveltʰ romelnitsʰ tʰkʰvenma mamebma daxotsʰes 
amitʰ tʰkʰven emotsmebitʰ da etʰanxmebitʰ tʰkʰveni mamebis sakʰmeebs vinaidan matʰ daxotsʰes tsinastsarmetqvelni tʰkʰven ki matʰ samarxebs uʃenebtʰ 
amitom tʰkʰva ɣvtʰis sibrədznem mivuvlen matʰ tsinastsarmetqvelebsa da motsʰikʰulebs da matʰɡan zoɡs daxotsʰaven zoɡs ɡandevnian 
ratʰa moikitʰxos qvela tsinastsarmetqvelis sisxli ratsʰ sopʰlis ʃekʰmnidan daɣvrila 
abelis sisxlidan moqolebuli zakʰarias sisxlamde romelitsʰ samsxverplosa da tadzars ʃoris daiɣupa aha ɡeubnebitʰ am modɡmas mohkitʰxaven 
vai tʰkʰven rdʒulis mtsʰodneno rom tsaritatsʰetʰ tsʰodnis ɡasaɣebi artsʰ tʰkʰven ʃexveditʰ da ʃemsvlelebitsʰ daabrkoletʰ 
rotsʰa amas eubneboda matʰ mtsiɡnobrebma da pʰarisevlebma dautsqes didad ʃevitsroeba da bevrze salaparakod ɡamotsveva 
ratʰa maxe daeɡotʰ raime daetsʰdeninebinatʰ da brali daedotʰ mistʰvis 
amasobaʃi atʰasobitʰ xalxi ʃeiqara ise rom ertʰmanetʰs tʰelavdnen dʒer daitsqo laparaki tʰavisi motsapʰeebis mimartʰ moeridetʰ pʰariseveltʰa sapʰuars romelitsʰ pirmotʰneobaa 
arapʰeria dapʰaruli rom ar ɡatsʰxaddes da damaluli rom ar ɡamʒɣavndes 
amitom ratsʰ bnelʃi ɡitʰkʰvamtʰ natʰelʃi moismenen da ratsʰ qurʃi itʃurtʃuletʰ otʰaxebʃi erdo banebze ɡaxmaurdeba 
ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tʃemo meɡobrebo nu ɡeʃiniatʰ matʰi vintsʰ sxeulsa klavs da amis metis arapʰris ɡaketʰeba ʃeudzlia 
maɡram ɡatʃvenebtʰ visi unda ɡeʃinodetʰ ɡeʃinodetʰ misi visatsʰ mokvlis ʃemdeɡ akʰvs xelmtsipʰeba ɡeenaʃi tʃaɡdebisa aha ɡeubnebitʰ misi ɡeʃinodetʰ 
anda ɡana xutʰi beɣura ori asari ara ɣirs da artsʰ ertʰi matʰɡani davitsqebuli ar aris ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
tʰkʰvens tʰavze tʰmebitsʰ datʰvlilia hoda nu ɡeʃiniatʰ tʰkʰven bevr beɣuraze uketʰesni xartʰ 
amasatsʰ ɡetqvitʰ qvelas vintsʰ me maɣiarebs adamiantʰa tsinaʃe katsʰis dze aɣiarebs ɣvtʰis anɡeloztʰa tsinaʃe 
xolo vintsʰ uarmqopʰs adamiantʰa tsinaʃe isitsʰ uarqopʰili ikʰneba ɣvtʰis anɡeloztʰa tsinaʃe 
qvelas vintsʰ itqvis sitqvas katsʰis dzis tsinaaɣmdeɡ mieteveba maɡram sulitsmidis tsinaaɣmdeɡ ɡmoba ar mieteveba 
rotsʰa ʃeɡiqvanen sinaɡoɡebʃi mtʰavartʰa da xelisupʰaltʰa tsinaʃe nu izrunebtʰ imaze roɡor an ra upasuxotʰ an ra ilaparakotʰ 
vinaidan sulitsmida ɡastsavlitʰ maʃin ratsʰ unda ilaparakotʰ 
xalxidan viɣatsʰam utʰxra mas modzɣvaro utʰxari tʃems dzmas rom ɡamiqos memkvidreoba 
man utʰxra mas adamiano vin damaqena tʰkʰvens msadʒulad an ɡamqopʰad 
utʰxra matʰ daukvirditʰ da daitsʰavitʰ tʰavi qoveli anɡarebisaɡan vinaidan adamianis sitsʰotsʰxle misi kʰonebis siuxveze rodia damokidebuli 
da utʰxra matʰ iɡavi ertʰ mdidar katsʰs qanaʃi karɡi mosavali mouvida 
ipʰikʰra tʰavistʰvis ra vkʰna arapʰeri mabadia rom sadme davabinavo tʃemi mosavali 
tʰkʰva ai ras vizam tʃems beɣlebs davanɡrev upʰro didebs avaʃeneb da ikʰ ʃevaɡroveb mtʰel tʃems xorbals da dovlatʰs 
da vetqvi tʃems suls sulo bevri siketʰe ɡakʰvs daɡrovili mravali tslisatʰvis moisvene came svi imxiarule 
maɡram utʰxra mas ɣmertʰma uɡunuro amaɣam suls moɡtʰxoven da ratsʰ daimzade viɣas dartʃeba 
isitsʰ asevea vintsʰ tʰavistʰvis iundʒebs da ɣmertʰʃi ar mdidrdeba 
utʰxra tʰavis motsapʰeebs amitom ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven nu zrunavtʰ tʰkʰveni tʰavisatʰvis ra camotʰ nurtsʰ tʰkʰveni sxeulisatʰvis ritʰ ʃeimosotʰ 
vinaidan suli sazrdoze metia da sxeuli samoselze 
daakvirditʰ qornebs isini artsʰ tʰesaven artsʰ mkian artsʰ beɣeli akʰvtʰ da artsʰ satsqobi da ɣmertʰi artʃens matʰ tʰkʰven ki ramdenad sdʒobixartʰ pʰrinvelebs 
romel tʰkʰvenɡans ʃeudzlia zrunvitʰ tʰavis simaɣles ertʰi tsqrtʰa ʃematos 
hoda tʰu umtsʰiresitsʰ ar ʃeɡidzliatʰ sxvaze raɣas zrunavtʰ 
ʃexedetʰ ʃroʃnebs roɡor izrdebian artsʰ ʃromoben artsʰ artʰaven maɡram ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom solomonitsʰ ki mtʰeli tʰavisi didebitʰ ar ʃemosila ise roɡortsʰ ertʰi amatʰɡani 
tʰuki velis balaxs romelitsʰ dɣes aris xval ki tʰoneʃi tʃaiqreba ɣmertʰi amɡvarad mosavs tʰkʰven upʰro metad ar ʃeɡmosavtʰ mtsʰired mortsmuneno 
tʰkʰventsʰ nu edzebtʰ ra camotʰ da ra svatʰ da nu ʃpʰotʰavtʰ 
vinaidan qovelive amas edziebs am sopʰlis qvela xalxi tʰkʰvenma mamam itsʰis rom ɡcirdebatʰ eseni 
aramed edzietʰ ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli da qovelive es moɡetsʰematʰ tʰkʰven 
nu ɡeʃinia mtsʰire samtsqsov vinaidan tʰkʰvenma zetsʰierma mamam moisurva tʰkʰventʰvis sasupʰevlis motsʰema 
ɡaqidetʰ tʰkʰveni kʰoneba da ɡaiɣetʰ motsqaleba daimzadetʰ utsʰvetʰeli kʰisebi saukunod uleveli saundʒe zetsʰaʃi sadatsʰ kʰurdi ver miekareba da tʃrtʃili ver avnebs 
vinaidan sadatsʰ tʰkʰveni saundʒea tʰkʰveni ɡulitsʰ ikʰ ikʰneba 
iqos tʰkʰveni tseli ʃemosartqluli da sasantʰleni tʰkʰveni antʰebuli 
tʰkʰven ki iqavitʰ msɡavsni im adamianebisa romlebitsʰ elian tʰaviantʰi batonis dabrunebas kʰortsilidan rom rotsʰa mova da dareks imtsamsve ɡauɣon 
netar arian is monebi romlebsatsʰ ʃin dabrunebuli batoni pʰxizlebs naxavs ceʃmaritad ɡetqvitʰ rom is ʃemoirtqams sartqels da dasxams matʰ miva da moemsaxureba 
tʰu meore da tʰundatsʰ mesame ɡuʃaɡobisas movida da ase naxa netar arian is monebi 
es ki itsʰodetʰ saxlis patronma rom itsʰodes romel saatʰze mova kʰurdi ipʰxizlebda da tʰavisi saxlis dziris ɡamotʰxras ar daanebebda 
amitom tʰkʰventsʰ mzad iqavitʰ vinaidan romel ʒamzetsʰ ar pʰikʰrobtʰ stsored maʃin mova dze katsʰisa 
utʰxra mas petrem upʰalo am iɡavs tʃven ɡveubnebi tʰu qvelas 
upʰalma utʰxra vin aris ertʰɡuli da ɡonieri mne romelsatsʰ daaqenebs batoni tʰavis msaxurebze ratʰa droulad mistsʰes matʰ ulupʰa 
netaria mona romlis batoni mova da amis mokʰmeds naxavs mas 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom mtʰel tʰavis kʰonebaze daaqenebs mas 
xolo tʰu es mona tʰavis ɡunebaʃi itqvis aɡvianebs tʃemi batoni mosvlaso da daitsqebs msaxurebisa da mxevlebis tsʰemas cama smas da lotʰobas 
mova im monis batoni im dɣes rotsʰa ar elis da im ʒams rotsʰa ar itsʰis da ʃuaze ɡahkvetʰs mas da urtsmunoebtʰan daudebs tsils 
xolo mona romelmatsʰ itsʰoda tʰavisi batonis neba da ar moemzada an ar moikʰtsʰa misi nebisamebr maɡar tsʰemas miiɣebs 
xolo romelmatsʰ ar itsʰoda da ise moikʰtsʰa rom tsʰema daimsaxura naklebad itsʰemeba qvelas visatsʰ meti mietsʰa mets mostʰxoven da visatsʰ mets miandoben mas metsatsʰ mohkitʰxaven 
amkʰveqnad tsʰetsʰxlis mosatanad movedi da roɡor minda rom entʰos 
natʰlobitʰ unda movinatʰlo da roɡor var ʃecirvebuli vidre es aɣsruldeba 
ɡɡoniatʰ vitʰom kʰveqnad mʃvidobis mosapʰenad movedi ara ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven ɡasaqopʰad 
vinaidan amieridan xutʰni ɡaiqopʰian ertʰ saxlʃi sami ortʰaɡan da ori samtʰaɡan 
ɡaiqopʰa mama dzisaɡan da dze mamisaɡan deda asulisaɡan da asuli dedisaɡan dedamtʰili tʰavisi rədzlisaɡan da rdzali dedamtʰilisaɡan 
xalxsatsʰ utʰxra rotsʰa dasavletʰitʰ amomaval ɣrubels dainaxavtʰ ambobtʰ imtsamsve tsvima movao da asetsʰ xdeba 
xolo rotsʰa samxretʰis kʰari uberavs ambobtʰ sitsʰxe ikʰnebao da xdeba 
tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰno tsʰisa da mitsis piris ɡamotsʰnoba ʃeɡidzliatʰ es ʒami ki roɡor ver ɡamoɡitsʰvniatʰ 
tʰavad ratom ar ɡansdʒitʰ ra aris samartʰliani 
rotsʰa ʃens modavestʰan ertʰad mtʰavartʰan midixar etsʰade ɡzaʃive ɡatʰavisupʰlde misɡan rom man ar miɡiqvanos mosamartʰlestʰan mosamartʰlem ar miɡtsʰes bokʰauls da bokʰaulma ar tʃaɡaɡdos sapqrobileʃi 
ɡeubnebi ver ɡamoxval ikʰidan vidre ukanasknel leptas ar ɡadaixdi 
am dros movidnen zoɡiertʰebi da uambes mas ɡalileveltʰa ʃesaxeb romeltʰa sisxli pilatem ʃeuria matʰ msxverplebs 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰven ɡɡoniatʰ vitʰom es ɡalilevelebi qvela ɡalilevelze upʰro tsʰodvilebi iqvnen ase rom evnen 
ara ɡeubnebitʰ maɡram tʰu ar moinaniebtʰ qvelani matʰsavitʰ daiɣupebitʰ 
an ra ɡɡoniatʰ is tʰvrameti katsʰi romeltʰatsʰ ʃiloaxis koʃki daetsʰa zed da amotsqvita upʰro damnaʃaveni iqvnen vidre qvela is adamiani ierusalimʃi rom tsʰxovrobs 
ara ɡeubnebitʰ maɡram tʰu ar moinaniebtʰ qvelani matʰsavitʰ daiɣupebitʰ 
utʰxra es iɡavi ertʰ katsʰs tʰavis venaxʃi leɣvi edɡa mivida rom zed naqopʰi moedzebna da ver ipova 
utʰxra mevenaxes aha sami tselia movdivar am leɣvis naqopʰis sadzebnelad da ver vpoulob moceri iɡi rad unda pʰitavdes mitsas 
man ki miuɡo da utʰxra mas batono datove am tselitsadsatsʰ vidre dzirs ʃemovutʰoxnide da nakels davuqride 
ikʰneb moisxas naqopʰi tʰu ara da mocri mas 
astsavlida matʰ ertʰ sinaɡoɡaʃi ʃabatʰs 
da aha ikʰ iqo dedakatsʰi romelitsʰ tʰvramet tselitsads ʃepqrobili iqo sneulebis sulitʰ da iqo dakruntʃxuli da tselʃi ver imartʰeboda 
dainaxa iɡi iesom daudzaxa da utʰxra mas dedakatsʰo tʰavisupʰali xar ʃeni sneulebisaɡan 
daado xelebi da maʃinve ɡaimartʰa iɡi da adidebda ɣmertʰs 
ɡanrisxda sinaɡoɡis mtʰavari ʃabatʰs rom ɡankurna iesom da utʰxra xalxs ekʰvsi dɣea rotsʰa ʃeidzleba raimes ketʰeba am dɣeebʃi moditʰ da ɡanikurnetʰ oɣond ʃabatʰs ara 
miuɡo mas upʰalma da utʰxra tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰo ɡana qoveli tʰkʰvenɡani ar uʃvebs ʃabatʰobitʰ baɡidan tʰavis xars an virs da ar mihqavs tsqlis dasalevad 
xolo es abraamis asulia romelitsʰ ukve tʰvrameti tselitsadia ʃekruli hqavda satanas ʃabatʰ dɣes ar ʃeidzleboda ɡamoxsniliqo am xundebidan 
rotsʰa amas laparakobda qvela mis motsinaaɣmdeɡes rətsʰxvenoda xolo mtʰeli xalxi xarobda mis didebulebatʰa ɡamo rasatsʰ stʃadioda 
is ambobda ras ʃehɡavs ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli da ras vamsɡavso iɡi 
iɡi ʃehɡavs mdoɡvis martsʰvals romelitsʰ aiɣo katsʰma da datʰesa tʰavis bostanʃi ɡaizarda iɡi da ikʰtsʰa xed da mis totebʃi tsʰis pʰrinvelebma daibudes 
da kidev tʰkʰva ras vamsɡavso ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli 
iɡi ʃehɡavs sapʰuars romelitsʰ dedakatsʰma aiɣo da tʃapʰla sam satsqao pʰkʰvilʃi vidre mtʰlianad ɡapʰuvdeboda 
mimodioda kʰalakʰebsa da sopʰlebʃi astsavlida da tʰan ierusalimis ɡzas adɡa 
viɣatsʰam utʰxra mas upʰalo nutʰu tsʰotani ɡadartʃebian man ki utʰxra matʰ 
iɣvatsetʰ ratʰa ʃexvidetʰ vitsro karidan radɡan ɡeubnebitʰ mravali etsʰdeba ʃesvlas da ver ʃedzlebs 
rotsʰa saxlis patroni adɡeba da daketavs kars maʃin tʰkʰven ɡaretʰ mdɡomni daitsqebtʰ karze rekvas da etqvitʰ batono batono ɡaɡviɣe maɡram is moɡiɡebtʰ da ɡetqvitʰ tʰkʰven ar ɡitsʰnobtʰ sadaurebi xartʰ 
maʃin dautsqebtʰ laparaks ʃens tsinaʃe vcamditʰ da vsvamditʰ da tʃvens kʰutʃebʃi astsavlidi 
da ɡetqvitʰ ɡeubnebitʰ ar ɡitsʰnobtʰ sadaurebi xartʰ ɡamʃorditʰ qvelani usamartʰlobis mokʰmedno 
ikʰneba ikʰ tirili da kbiltʰa ɣrcena rotsʰa ixilavtʰ abraams da isaks da iakobs da qvela tsinastsarmetqvels ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi tʰkʰvens tʰavs ki ɡaretʰ ɡandevnilebs 
movlen aɣmosavletʰidan da dasavletʰidan tʃrdiloetʰidan da samxretʰidan da inaxad dasxdebian ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi 
da aha arian ukanasknelni romelnitsʰ pirvelni ikʰnebian da arian pirvelni romelnitsʰ ukanasknelni ikʰnebian 
am dros movidnen zoɡiertʰni pʰariseveltʰaɡan da utʰxres mas tsadi ɡaetsʰale akʰaurobas radɡan herodes ʃeni mokvla unda 
da utʰxra matʰ tsaditʰ da utʰxaritʰ im melas aha vdevni eʃmakebs da vkurnav dɣesa da xval mesame dɣes ki davasruleb 
maɡram me unda viaro dɣes xval da zeɡ vinaidan ar ikʰneba rom tsinastsarmetqveli ierusalimis ɡaretʰ daiɣupos ierusalimo ierusalimo 
ierusalimo ierusalimo damxotsʰvelo tsinastsarmetqveltʰa da tʃamkʰolavo ʃentʰan movlinebultʰa ramdendʒer mindoda ʃeni ʃvilebis ʃekreba roɡortsʰ pʰrinveli ikrebs pʰrtʰebkʰveʃ tʰavis bartqebs maɡram tʰkʰven ar isurvetʰ 
aha saxli aoxrebuli ɡrtʃebatʰ ɡeubnebitʰ veɣar mixilavtʰ amieridan vidre ar itqvitʰ kurtʰxeulia upʰlis saxelitʰ momavali 
ertʰxel rotsʰa ʃevida iɡi pʰariseveltʰa romeliɣatsʰ mtʰavris saxlʃi ʃabatʰs puris sacmelad da isini utʰvaltʰvalebdnen mas 
aha mis tsinaʃe tsardɡa ertʰi katsʰi tsqalmankitʰ daavadebuli 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra rdʒulis mtsʰodneebsa da pʰarisevlebs ʃeidzleba tʰu ara ɡankurneba ʃabatʰs 
isini dumdnen da ʃeexo mas ɡankurna da ɡauʃva 
da matʰ utʰxra romelime tʰkʰvenɡans viri an xari rom tʃauvardes caʃi ɡana im tsamsve ar amoiqvans ʃabatʰi dɣetsʰ rom iqos 
da ver ʃedzles amaze pasuxis mitsʰema 
utʰxra tsveulebs iɡavi rotsʰa ʃeamtʃnia rom tsina adɡilebs irtʃevdnen da utʰxra matʰ 
tʰu vinmem kʰortsilʃi miɡitsvios nu dadʒdebi tsina adɡilze radɡan ʃeidzleba ʃenze upʰro sapatio sxva hqavdes motsveuli 
rom ar movides ʃeni da misi matsvevari da ar ɡitʰxras dautʰme amas adɡili maʃin ʃertsʰxvenilma unda daikavo ukanaskneli adɡili 
maɡram rotsʰa moɡitsveven midi da dadʒekʰi bolo adɡilze rom movides ʃeni matsvevari da ɡitʰxras meɡobaro ɡadabrdzandi upʰro maɣla maʃin ɡekʰneba meti dideba qoveli tʰanameinaxis tsinaʃe 
vinaidan qvela vintsʰ tʰavs aimaɣlebs damdabldeba da vintsʰ tʰavs daimdablebs amaɣldeba 
tʰavis matsvevarsatsʰ utʰxra rotsʰa sadils an vaxʃams ɡamartʰav nu moitsvev ʃens meɡobrebs nurtsʰ ʃens dzmebs nurtsʰ ʃens natʰesavebs nurtsʰ mdidar mezoblebs ratʰa mere imatʰatsʰ ar miɡitsvion da ar miiɣo samaɡiero 
aramed rotsʰa lxins ɡamartʰav moitsvie ɡlaxakni xeibrebi koclebi da brmebi 
netari ikʰnebi radɡan matʰ arapʰeri akʰvtʰ rom moɡizɣan maɡram ʃen martʰaltʰa aɣdɡomisas moɡezɣveba 
es rom ɡaiɡona ertʰma mastʰan mdʒdomma utʰxra mas netaria vintsʰ cams purs ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi 
man ki utʰxra mas ertʰma katsʰma didi puroba ɡamartʰa da bevri moitsvia 
purobis drom rom moaɣtsia ɡaɡzavna tʰavisi mona ratʰa tsveultʰatʰvis etʰkʰva mobrdzanditʰ qvelapʰeri mzad ariso 
qvelam ertʰxmad daitsqo mobodiʃeba pirvelma tʰkʰva qana viqide da mis sanaxavad unda tsavide ɡtʰxov mapatioo 
meorem utʰxra xutʰi uɣeli xari viqide da matʰ ɡamosatsʰdelad mivdivar ɡtʰxov mapatioo 
mesamem utʰxra tsʰoli ʃevirtʰe da amis ɡamo ar ʃemidzlia mosvlao 
dabrunda mona ukan da autsqa es tʰavis batons ɡanrisxda maʃin maspindzeli da utʰxra tʰavis monas ɡadi sastsrapʰod kʰalakʰis moednebze da kʰutʃebʃi momiqvane ɡlaxakni xeibrebi brmebi da koclebi 
da utʰxra monam batono aɣsrulebulia ratsʰ brdzane da kidev dartʃa adɡili 
da utʰxra batonma monas ɡadi ɡzebze da orɣobeebʃi daiqolie isini rom movidnen ratʰa aivsos tʃemi saxli 
radɡan ɡeubnebitʰ veravin im tsveultʰaɡan ver iɡemebs tʃems purobas 
mivida mastʰan diddzali xalxi da is miubrunda matʰ da utʰxra 
tʰu vinme mova tʃemtʰan da ar moidzulebs tʰavis mamas da dedas tsʰolsa da ʃvilebs dzmebsa da debs sakutʰar sulsatsʰ ki iɡi ver ɡaxdeba tʃemi motsapʰe 
vintsʰ ar atarebs tʰavis dʒvars da ise ar ɡamomqveba ver ɡaxdeba tʃemi motsapʰe 
radɡan romelime tʰkʰvenɡanma rom koʃkis aʃeneba moisurvos ɡana tʰavdapirvelad ar dadʒdeba da ar ianɡariʃebs im pʰass ratsʰ mis dasamtʰavreblad ikʰneba saciro 
radɡan sadzirkvels tʰu tʃaqris da ver daamtʰavrebs qvela vintsʰ dainaxavs datsʰinvas dautsqebs 
da itqvis am katsʰma ʃeneba daitsqo da veɣar daamtʰavrao 
anda romeli mepʰea rom meore mepʰis tsinaaɣmdeɡ omis ɡanmzraxveli dʒer satʰatʰbirod ar dadʒdes ʃeudzlia tʰu ara atʰi atʰasitʰ dauxvdes otsʰi atʰas momxvdurs 
tʰu ara da vidre dʒer kidev ʃors aris iɡi eltʃobas miuɡzavnis da zavsa stʰxovs 
asevea qoveli tʰkʰvenɡani vintsʰ uars ar itqvis qvelapʰerze ratsʰ abadia ver ʃedzlebs tʃems motsapʰeobas 
marili karɡia maɡram tʰu marili ɡankʰarda riɣatʰi damarildes 
artsʰ mitsistʰvis ɡamodɡeba artsʰ nakelistʰvis amitom ʃors ɡadaqrian visatsʰ qurebi akʰvs mosasmenad isminos 
axlos midioda mastʰan qvela mebaʒe da tsʰodvili da usmenda mas 
pʰarisevelni da mtsiɡnobarni buzɣunebdnen da ambobdnen tsʰodvilebs ɣebulobs da matʰtʰan camso 
utʰxra matʰ es iɡavi 
romelime tʰkʰvenɡans rom asi tsʰxvari hqavdes da ertʰi daekarɡos ɡana ar datovebs otʰxmotsʰdatsʰxramets udabnoʃi da ar tsava dakarɡulis sadzebrad vidre ar ipovis 
rom ipovis sixarulitʰ mxrebze ʃeisvams 
ʃin rom dabrundeba daudzaxebs meɡobrebs mezoblebs da etqvis tʰkʰventsʰ ixaretʰ tʃemtʰan ertʰad dakarɡuli tsʰxvari vipoveo 
tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ rom aseve meti sixaruli ikʰneba zetsʰaʃi ertʰi tsʰodvilis ɡamo romelmatsʰ moinania vidre im otʰxmotsʰdatsʰxrameti martʰlis ɡamo romeltʰatsʰ monanieba ar scirdebatʰ 
anda dedakatsʰi romelsatsʰ atʰi drakʰma akʰvs ertʰi drakʰma rom daekarɡos ɡana ar aantʰebs santʰels da ar ɡamoɡvis saxls da ɡulmodɡinetʰ ar dautsqebs dzebnas vidre ar ipovis 
rotsʰa ipovis daudzaxebs meɡobrebs da mezoblebs da etqvis tʃemtʰan ertʰad ixaretʰ vinaidan vipove dakarɡuli drakʰmao 
tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ aseve ikʰneba sixaruli ɣvtʰis anɡelozebtʰan ertʰi momnaniebeli tsʰodvilis ɡamo 
tʰkʰva ertʰ katsʰs ori vaʒi hqavda 
umtsʰrosma vaʒma utʰxra mamas mometsʰi tʃemi kutʰvnili tsili kʰonebisa da mamam ɡauqo matʰ kʰoneba 
ramdenime dɣis ʃemdeɡ umtsʰrosma vaʒma moaɡrova qvelapʰeri tsavida ʃoreul kʰveqanaʃi da ɡapʰlanɡa tʰavisi kʰoneba tʰavaʃvebuli tsʰxovrebitʰ 
rotsʰa qvelapʰeri ʃemoexardʒa im kʰveqanaʃi didi ʃimʃiloba tʃamovarda da mas ɡaucirda 
tsavida da im kʰveqnis ertʰ mtsʰxovrebs miekedla romelmatsʰ tʰavis mindvrebʃi ɡaɡzavna ɣorebis sadzoveblad 
enatreboda mutsʰeli im rkotʰi maintsʰ amoeqora romelsatsʰ ɣorebi camdnen maɡram aravin arapʰers adzlevda 
rotsʰa ɡons moeɡo tʰkʰva mamatʃemtʰan ramden modʒamaɡires puri tʰavsaqreli akʰvs me ki ʃimʃilitʰ vkvdebi 
avdɡebi tsaval mamatʃemtʰan da vetqvi mama ʃevtsʰode zetsʰis mimartʰ da ʃens tsinaʃe 
ɣirsi aɣara var rom ʃens dzed vitsodebode mimiɣe roɡortsʰ ertʰi ʃeni modʒamaɡiretʰaɡani 
adɡa da tsavida tʰavis mamastʰan rotsʰa dʒer kidev ʃors iqo mamam dainaxa da ʃeebrala ɡaikʰtsʰa qelze moexvia da akotsʰa 
vaʒma ki utʰxra mama ʃevtsʰode zetsʰis mimartʰ da ʃens tsinaʃe ɣirsi aɣara var rom ʃens dzed vitsodebode 
utʰxra mamam tʰavis monebs moutanetʰ sauketʰeso samoseli da tʃaatsʰvitʰ ɡauketʰetʰ becedi xelze da sandlebi tʃaatsʰvitʰ pʰexebze 
moiqvanetʰ nasukʰali xbo da dakalitʰ vcamotʰ da vimxiarulotʰ 
vinaidan es tʃemi vaʒi mkvdari iqo da ɡatsʰotsʰxlda dakarɡuli iqo da ɡamotʃnda da daitsqes mxiaruleba 
upʰrosi vaʒi ki mindorʃi imqopʰeboda rom dabrunda da saxls miuaxlovda simɣerisa da tsʰekva tʰamaʃis xma ʃemoesma 
daudzaxa ertʰ msaxurtʰaɡans da hkitʰxa es ra ambavia 
man utʰxra mas ʃeni dzma movida da mamaʃenma nasukʰali xbo dakla raki mrtʰeli daubrunda 
is ki ɡabrazda da ʃesvla aɣar undoda mamamisi ɡamovida da itsvevda 
man miuɡo da utʰxra tʰavis mamas aɡer ramdeni tselia ɡemsaxurebi arasodes ʃens brdzanebas ar ɡadavsulvar da ertʰxelatsʰ ar moɡitsʰia tsʰikani rom tʃems meɡobrebtʰan memxiarula 
xolo rotsʰa movida es ʃeni vaʒi romelmatsʰ tʰavisi kʰoneba medzavebtʰan ɡapʰlanɡa nasukʰali xbo daukali 
man utʰxra mas ʃvilo ʃen mudam tʃemtʰan xar da ratsʰ ki makʰvs ʃenia 
maɡram unda vxarobdetʰ da vmxiarulebdetʰ vinaidan ʃeni dzma mkvdari iqo da ɡatsʰotsʰxlda dakarɡuli iqo da ɡamotʃnda 
utʰxra tʰavis motsapʰeebsatsʰ iqo ertʰi mdidari katsʰi da hqavda mne romelzetsʰ ambavi miutanes rom mis kʰonebas aniavebda 
daibara da utʰxra es ra mesmis ʃenze tʃamabare ʃeni samneos anɡariʃi vinaidan veɣar ikʰnebi mne 
mnem tʰkʰva tʰavistʰvis roɡor movikʰtsʰe tʃemi batoni martʰmevs samneos barva ar ʃemidzlia matʰxovrobis mrətsʰxvenia 
vitsʰi roɡortsʰ unda movikʰtsʰe rom mimiɣon tʰaviantʰ saxlebʃi rotsʰa mneobas tʃamomaʃoreben 
daibara tʰavisi batonis qvela movale pirvels utʰxra ramdeni ɡmartʰebs tʃemi batonisa 
man tʰkʰva asi satsqauli zetʰi utʰxra mas miiɣe ʃeni xeltserili dadʒekʰi sastsrapʰod da datsere ormotsʰdaatʰi 
mere sxvas utʰxra ʃen ramdeni ɡmartʰebs man tʰkʰva asi kodi xorbali man utʰxra miiɣe ʃeni xeltserili da datsere otʰxmotsʰi 
ʃeakʰo batonma usamartʰlo mne xerxianad rom moikʰtsʰa radɡan am sopʰlis dzeni natʰlis ʃvilebze moxerxebulni arian tʰaviantʰ modɡmaʃi 
da metsʰ ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven ʃeidzinetʰ meɡobrebi usamartʰlobis mamonisɡan rom rotsʰa ɡaɣaribdebitʰ miɡiɣon saukuno savaneʃi 
mtsʰiredʃi ertʰɡuli bevrʃitsʰ ertʰɡulia da vintsʰ mtsʰiredʃitsʰ usamartʰloa bevrʃitsʰ usamartʰloa 
hoda tʰu usamartʰlo mamonas ar uertʰɡuletʰ ceʃmarits vin ɡandobtʰ 
da tʰu sxvisas ar uertʰɡuletʰ tʰkʰvensas vin moɡtsʰemtʰ 
artsʰ ertʰ msaxurs ar ʃeudzlia or batons emsaxuros an ertʰi unda sdzuldes da meore uqvardes an im ertʰs ʃeetʰvisos da meore daamtsʰiros ver ʃedzlebtʰ ɣmertʰsatsʰ emsaxurotʰ da mamonasatsʰ 
qovelive es esmodatʰ pʰarisevlebsatsʰ romlebitsʰ vertsʰxlis moqvarulni iqvnen da dastsʰinodnen mas 
da utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰven tʰavs imartʰlebtʰ adamiantʰa tsinaʃe maɡram ɣmertʰma itsʰis tʰkʰveni ɡuli vinaidan ratsʰ katsʰtʰa ʃoris maɣalia ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe sisadzaɡlea 
rdʒuli da tsinastsarmetqvelni ioanemde iqo mas ʃemdeɡ ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli ixareba da qvela dzalitʰ ʃedis masʃi 
umal tsʰa da mitsa ɡadaivlis vidre ertʰi tsertili amovardeba rdʒulidan 
qoveli vintsʰ tʰavis tsʰols ɡauʃvebs da sxvas ʃeirtʰavs mruʃobs da vintsʰ kʰmris mier ɡaʃvebuls ʃeirtʰavs mruʃobs 
iqo ertʰi mdidari katsʰi dzotseulsa da bisons itsʰvamda qoveldɣe didebulad nadimobda 
aseve iqo ertʰi ɡlaxaki saxelad lazare romelitsʰ mis ciʃkartʰan itsva datsqlulebuli 
enatreboda mdidris supʰridan ɡadmotsʰvenili namtsʰetsʰebitʰ ɡadzɣoma dzaɣlebi modiodnen da tsqlulebs ulokavdnen 
mokvda is ɡlaxaki da anɡelozebma miiqvanes abraamis tsiaɣʃi mdidaritsʰ mokvda da damarxes 
da dʒodʒoxetʰʃi tandʒva tsamebaʃi mqopʰma aaxila tʰvalebi da dainaxa ʃoridan abraami da lazaretsʰ mis tsiaɣʃi 
ʃesdzaxa da tʰkʰva mamao abraam ʃemitsqale da momivline lazare rom daisvelos tʰavisi tʰitʰis tsveri tsqalʃi da ena ɡamiɡrilos vinaidan vitandʒebi am alʃi 
utʰxra abraamma ʃvilo ɡaixsene rom ukve miiɣe ʃens sitsʰotsʰxleʃi siketʰe da lazarem ki siave axla is akʰ nuɡeʃtsʰemulia ʃen ki itandʒebi 
qovelive amis ɡarda tʃvensa da tʰkʰvens ʃoris didi upʰskrulia damqarebuli ase rom ɡadmosvlis msurvelebi vertsʰ tʃvenɡan tʰkʰvensken ɡadmovlen da vertsʰ tʰkʰvenɡan tʃvensken 
tʰkʰva raki asea ɡexvetsebi mamao miavline eɡ mamatʃemis saxlʃi 
vinaidan xutʰi dzma mqavs ratʰa matʰ daumotsmos rom ar moxvdnen am satandʒvel adɡilas 
utʰxra mas abraamma matʰ hqavtʰ mose da tsinastsarmetqvelni imatʰ usminon 
man tʰkʰva ara mamao abraam tʰu vinme mkvdartʰaɡani miva matʰtʰan moinanieben 
utʰxra mas tʰu mosesa da tsinastsarmetqveltʰ ar mousmenen mkvdretʰitʰatsʰ rom aɣdɡes vinme ar irtsmuneben 
utʰxra tʰavis motsapʰeebs ʃeudzlebelia ar movides tsʰdunebebi maɡram vai mas visi meʃveobitʰatsʰ mova 
mistʰvis umdʒobesi ikʰneboda tsiskʰvilis kʰva daekidatʰ kiserze da zɣvaʃi ɡadaeɡdotʰ vidre ertʰi am mtsʰiretʰaɡani etsʰdunebina 
pʰrətʰxilad iqavitʰ tʰu ʃenma dzmam ʃeɡtsʰodos ɡautsqeri mas tʰu moinanios miuteve 
dɣeʃi ʃviddʒer rom ʃeɡtsʰodos da ʃviddʒerve moikʰtsʰes da ɡitʰxras vinaniebo miuteve 
utʰxres motsʰikʰulebma upʰals moɡvimate rətsmena 
tʰkʰva upʰalma mdoɡvis martsʰvlisodena rətsmenatsʰ rom ɡkʰondetʰ da utʰxratʰ am leɣvis xes aɣmoipʰxveri da zɣvaʃi ɡadainerɡeo ɡaɡiɡonebdatʰ 
romelime tʰkʰvenɡans mona rom hqavdes mxvneli anda mtsqemsi mindvridan dabrunebisas nutʰu etqvis tsadi tʃkʰara supʰras miudʒekʰio 
ɡana ar etqvis momimzade vaxʃami da sartqelʃemortqmuli memsaxure vidre vcam da vsvam mere ki ʃentsʰ came da svio 
nutʰu madlobas etqvis monas imisatʰvis rom misi brdzaneba ʃeasrula ara mɡonia 
aseve tʰkʰventsʰ rotsʰa ʃeasrulebtʰ qvelapʰers ratsʰ nabrdzanebi ɡkʰondatʰ tʰkʰvitʰ ubralo monebi vartʰ radɡan ɡavaketʰetʰ is ratsʰ unda ɡaɡveketʰebina 
ertʰxel ierusalims mimavalma samariasa da ɡalileas ʃoris ɡaiara 
ertʰ sopʰelʃi rom ʃedioda atʰi ketʰrovani katsʰi ʃemoxvda romlebitsʰ moʃorebitʰ ɡatʃerdnen 
xma aɣimaɣles da ambobdnen ʃeɡvitsqale ieso modzɣvaro 
isini rom dainaxa utʰxra tsaditʰ etʃvenetʰ mɣvdlebs roɡortsʰ ki tsavidnen ɡanitsmidnen 
ertʰi matʰɡani rom dainaxa ɡanvikurneo mobrunda da maɣali xmitʰ adidebda ɣmertʰs 
pirkʰve daemxo mis pʰerxtʰitʰ da madli ʃestsira is katsʰi samarieli iqo 
miuɡo iesom da tʰkʰva nutʰu atʰiveni ar ɡanitsmidnen tsʰxra sadɣa aris 
roɡor moxda rom utsʰxotomelis ɡarda aravin dabrunda ɣvtʰis sadideblad 
utʰxra mas adekʰi da tsadi ʃenma rətsmenam ɡixsna 
hkitʰxes mas pʰarisevlebma rodis mova ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli miuɡo da utʰxra matʰ ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli ar mova tʰvalsatʃinod 
artsʰ itqvian aɡer akʰ ariso an aɡer ikʰ ariso vinaidan aha tʰvitʰon tʰkʰvenʃia ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli 
utʰxra motsapʰeebs dadɡeba dɣeebi rotsʰa inatrebtʰ tʰundatsʰ ertʰi dɣitʰ ixilotʰ dze katsʰisa da ver ixilavtʰ 
ɡetqvian aɡer akʰ ariso an aɡer ikʰ ariso nu tsaxvaltʰ da nu ɡaedevnebitʰ 
vinaidan roɡortsʰ elva elavs tsʰis ertʰi kididan da anatʰebs meore kidemde aseve ikʰneba dze katsʰisa tʰavis dɣes 
oɣond tʰavdapirvelad misi xvedria mravali tandʒvis atana da uarqopʰa am modɡmis mier 
da roɡortsʰ noes dɣeebʃi iqo aseve ikʰneba katsʰis dzis dɣeebʃitsʰ 
camdnen svamdnen tsʰols irtʰavdnen tʰxovdebodnen im dɣemde vidre noe kidobanʃi ʃevidoda mere movida tsarɣvna da qvela daɣupa 
iseve roɡortsʰ lotis dros iqo camdnen svamdnen qiddnen qidulobdnen rɡavdnen da aʃenebdnen 
xolo im dɣes rotsʰa loti sodomidan ɡavida tsʰetsʰxlma da ɡoɡirdma itsvima zetsʰidan da qvela daɣupa 
aseve ikʰneba im dɣesatsʰ rotsʰa dze katsʰisa ɡamotʃndeba 
im dɣes vintsʰ erdoze ikʰneba xolo misi nivtʰebi saxlʃi nu tʃamova asaɣebad vintsʰ qanaʃi ikʰneba ukan nu ɡabrundeba 
ɡaixsenetʰ lotis tsʰoli 
vintsʰ tsʰdilobs tʰavisi suli ʃeinartʃunos daɣupavs mas xolo vintsʰ daɣupavs tʰavis suls ʃeinartʃunebs mas 
tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ im ɣames orni ikʰnebian ertʰ satsolze ertʰs tsaiqvanen da meore dartʃeba 
orni dapʰkʰvaven ertʰad ertʰs tsaiqvnen meore dartʃeba 
orni ikʰnebian mindorʃi ertʰs tsaiqvanen meore dartʃeba 
miuɡes da utʰxres mas sad upʰalo xolo man utʰxra matʰ leʃi sadatsʰ aris ikʰ moɡrovdebian orbebi 
utʰxra matʰ iɡavi imis ʃesaxeb rom qoveltʰvis unda ilotsʰon da ar mobezrdetʰ 
tʰkʰva ertʰ kʰalakʰʃi iqo ertʰi msadʒuli ɣvtʰisa ar eʃinoda da xalxisa ar rətsʰxvenoda 
imave kʰalakʰʃi tsʰxovrobda ertʰi kʰvrivi mivida mastʰan da utʰxra damitsʰavi tʃemi mokʰiʃpisaɡan 
didxans uarobda mere tʰavistʰvis tʰkʰva martʰalia ɣvtʰisa ar meʃinia da xalxisa ar mrətsʰxvenia 
maɡram raki es kʰvrivi mosvenebas ar madzlevs davitsʰav rom aɣar movides da tʰavi ar momabezros 
tʰkʰva upʰalma ɡesmitʰ ras ambobs usamartʰlo msadʒuli 
ɡana ɣmertʰi ar daitsʰavs tʰavis rtʃeultʰ romelnitsʰ dɣedaɣam mas ʃeɣaɣadeben da ar ikʰneba sulɡrdzeli matʰdami 
tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ male daitsʰavs matʰ maɡram rotsʰa dze katsʰisa mova neta hpovebs amkʰveqnad rətsmenas 
zoɡiertʰebs visatsʰ sdʒeroda rom martʰalni iqvnen sxvebs ki amtsʰirebdnen utʰxra es iɡavi 
ori katsʰi ʃevida tadzarʃi salotsʰavad ertʰi pʰariseveli da meore mebaʒe 
pʰariseveli idɡa da tʰavistʰvis lotsʰulobda ɡmadlob ʃen ɣmertʰo rom ara var roɡortsʰ sxva adamianebi arian mdzartsʰvelebi usamartʰloni mruʃni an roɡortsʰ es mebaʒea 
kviraʃi ordʒer vmarxulob da meatʰeds vidzlevi qoveli tʃemi ʃenadzenidan 
xolo mebaʒe moʃorebitʰ idɡa da vertsʰ ki bedavda rom tsʰisken aɣepqro tʰvali mkerdʃi mdʒiɣs itsʰemda da ambobda ɣmertʰo ʃemitsqale me tsʰodvili 
tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ es upʰro ɡamartʰlebuli tsavida ʃin vidre iɡi vinaidan qvela vintsʰ tʰavs aimaɣlebs damdabldeba da vintsʰ tʰavs daimdablebs amaɣldeba 
mouqvanes mas qrmebitsʰ rom ʃexeboda matʰ es rom motsapʰeebma dainaxes atʃerebdnen matʰ 
iesom daudzaxa matʰ da tʰkʰva ɡamouʃvitʰ bavʃvebi da xels nu uʃlitʰ tʃemtʰan mosasvlelad vinaidan maɡatʰnairebisaa ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven vintsʰ ise ar miiɣebs ɣvtʰis sasupʰevels roɡortsʰ bavʃvi ver ʃeva ʃiɡ 
hkitʰxa mas ertʰma mtʰavartʰaɡanma da utʰxra ketʰilo modzɣvaro ra vkʰna rom saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle davimkvidro 
utʰxra mas iesom ratom mitsodeb me ketʰils aravin aris ketʰili ɡarda ertʰi ɣvtʰisa 
itsʰi mtsʰnebani ar imruʃo ar mokla ar moiparo ar iqo tsʰrumotsme pativi etsʰi ʃens mamas da dedas 
man tʰkʰva qovelive amas tʃemi sicabukidanve vitsʰavdi 
es rom moismina iesom utʰxra ertʰiɣa ɡaklia ratsʰ ɡakʰvs qvelapʰeri ɡaqide da mietsʰi ɣaribebs da ɡekʰneba saundʒe zetsʰaʃi modi da ɡamomqevi 
amis ɡaɡonebaze iɡi daɣonda radɡan dzalian mdidari iqo 
ʃexeda mas iesom da tʰkʰva raoden dznelia simdidris mkʰonetʰa ʃesvla ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi 
vinaidan umal akʰlemi ɡadzvreba nemsis quntsʃi vidre mdidari ʃeva ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi 
msmenelebma tʰkʰves viɣas ʃeudzlia ɡadartʃena 
man tʰkʰva katsʰtʰatʰvis ʃeudzlebeli ɣvtʰistʰvis ʃesadzlebelia 
tʰkʰva petrem aha tʃven qvelapʰeri mivatovetʰ da ʃen ɡamoɡqevitʰ 
man utʰxra matʰ ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven aravin aris rom ɣvtʰis sasupʰevlis ɡulisatʰvis datovos saxli an tsʰoli an mʃoblebi an dzmebi an ʃvilebi 
da axlave ar miiɣos mravalɡzis meti xolo momavalʃi saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle 
tsaiqvana tʰavisi tʰormeti motsapʰe da utʰxra matʰ aha avdivartʰ ierusalims da aɣsruldeba tsinastsarmetqveltʰa qoveli datserili katsʰis dzeze 
radɡan tsarmartʰebs ɡadaetsʰema ʃeaɡineben ʃeuratsʰxqopʰen ʃeapʰurtʰxeben 
ɡaʃoltaven moklaven da mesame dɣes aɣdɡeba 
matʰ ki akʰedan verapʰeri ɡaiɡes da es sitqva dapʰaruli iqo matʰtʰvis da ver xvdebodnen natʰkʰvams 
ierixos rom miuaxlovdnen viɣatsʰ brma idʒda ɡzaze da motsqalebas itʰxovda 
ɡamvleli xalxis xma ɡaiɡona da ikitʰxa ra ambavia 
utʰxres ieso nazareveli modiso 
maʃin man daiqvira ieso davitʰis dzeo ʃemitsqale 
tsin mimavalni ɡautsqrnen rom ɡaetʃumebinatʰ maɡram is kidev upʰro aqvirda davitʰis dzeo ʃemitsqale 
ʃetʃerda ieso da brdzana mastʰan moeqvanatʰ rotsʰa iɡi miuaxlovda hkitʰxa 
ra ɡinda rom ɡaɡiketʰo utʰxra upʰalo rom tʰvali amexilos 
iesom utʰxra mas aaxile ʃenma rətsmenam ɡixsna ʃen 
da imtsamsve aexila mihqveboda mas da adidebda ɣmertʰs mtʰeli xalxi xedavda amas da akʰebda ɣmertʰs 
ʃevida da ɡaiara ierixoze 
da aha iqo katsʰi vinme saxelad zakʰe mebaʒetʰa upʰrosi da mdidari 
surda mas iesos xilva rom ɡaeɡo vin iqo iɡi maɡram ver ʃedzlo xalxis simravlis ɡamo vinaidan tanad dabali iqo 
tsin ɡaikʰtsʰa da leɣvis xeze avida ratʰa daenaxa radɡan iesos akʰetʰ unda ɡamoevlo 
im adɡilas rom mivida iesom aixeda maɣla da utʰxra zakʰe tʃamodi stsrapʰad dɣes ʃens saxlʃi unda davrtʃe 
stsrapʰad tʃamovida da sixarulitʰ miiɣo iɡi 
vintsʰ ki dainaxa qvelani buzɣuns mohqvnen da ambobdnen tsʰodvil katsʰtʰan ʃevidao 
zakʰe tsamodɡa da utʰxra upʰals aha upʰalo tʃemi kʰonebis naxevars ɣaribebs mivtsʰem da tʰu vinmestʰvis rame ɡamomidzalavs otʰxmaɡad mivaɡeb 
utʰxra mas iesom dɣes moxda am saxlis xsna raki isitsʰ abraamis dzea 
radɡan dze katsʰisa movida dakarɡulis mosadzebnad da saxsnelad 
rotsʰa isini ismendnen amas man daurtʰo iɡavi radɡan axlos iqo ierusalimtʰan da matʰ eɡonatʰ uetsʰriv ɡamotʃndeboda ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli 
amis ɡamo tʰkʰva ertʰi didɡvarovani katsʰi tsavida ʃoreul kʰveqanaʃi rom mepʰoba mieɣo da ukan dabrunebuliqo 
daudzaxa tʰavis atʰ monas mistsʰa atʰi mna da utʰxra vidre davbrundebode ivacretʰo 
maɡram mis mokʰalakʰeebs sdzuldatʰ iɡi da ukan eltʃoba daadevnes da daabares ara ɡvsurs rom maɡan imepʰos tʃvenze 
rotsʰa mepʰoba miiɣo da ukan dabrunda brdzana mistʰvis moeɡvaratʰ is monebi romlebsatsʰ vertsʰxli mistsʰa ratʰa ɡaeɡo vin ra ivacra 
movida pirveli da utʰxra batono ʃenma mnam atʰi mna moiɡo 
utʰxra mas karɡi ketʰilo monav raki mtsʰiredze ertʰɡuli iqavi atʰ kʰalakʰze ɡkʰondes xelmtsipʰeba 
movida meore da utʰxra batono ʃenma mnam xutʰi mna moitana 
masatsʰ utʰxra ʃentsʰ xutʰ kʰalakʰze iqav 
mesame movida da utʰxra batono aha ʃeni mna romelitsʰ xelsaxotsʰʃi mkʰonda ɡamokruli 
vinaidan ʃemeʃinda radɡan sastiki xar iɣeb ratsʰ ar daɡidia da imki ratsʰ ar daɡitʰesavs 
utʰxra mas ʃenive piritʰ ɡanɡikitʰxav boroto monav itsʰodi rom sastiki katsʰi var viɣeb ratsʰ ar damidia da vimki ratsʰ ar damitʰesia 
aba raɣatom ar ɡauʃvi tʃemi vertsʰxli brunvaʃi rom dabrunebuls sarɡeblitʰurtʰ mimeɣo 
da ikʰ mdɡomtʰ utʰxra tsaartʰvitʰ amas is ertʰi mna da mietsʰitʰ atʰi mnis mkʰones 
matʰ utʰxres upʰalo mas atʰi mna akʰvs 
ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom qovel mkʰones mietsʰema xolo ukʰonels isitsʰ tsaertʰmeva ratsʰa akʰvs 
xolo tʃemi mtrebi romlebsatsʰ ar surdatʰ rom matʰze memepʰa momɡvaretʰ akʰ da daxotsʰetʰ tʃems tsinaʃe 
tʰkʰva es da tsin tsavida ierusalimʃi asasvlelad 
rotsʰa miuaxlovda betʰbaɡes da betʰanias mtʰas romelsatsʰ zetʰisxilis mtʰa etsodeba miavlina ori motsapʰe 
utʰxra matʰ tsaditʰ mezobel sopʰelʃi rom ʃexvaltʰ ipovitʰ dabmul tʃotʃors romelzetsʰ dʒer katsʰi ar mdʒdara auʃvitʰ da moiqvanetʰ 
tʰu vinmem ɡkitʰxotʰ ratom uʃvebtʰo ase utʰxaritʰ upʰals scirdeba tʰkʰo 
tsavidnen tsarɡzavnilebi da ipoves roɡortsʰ man utʰxra 
da rotsʰa tʃotʃors uʃvebdnen misma patronebma utʰxres ratom uʃvebtʰ am tʃotʃors 
matʰ tʰkʰves imitom rom upʰals scirdeba 
mihɡvares iɡi iesos tanisamosi daapʰines tʃotʃors da zed ʃesves ieso 
rotsʰa iɡi midioda xalxi tʰavis tanisamoss ɡzaze upʰenda 
rotsʰa zetʰisxilis mtʰis daɣmartʰs miuaxlovda motsapʰetʰa mtʰelma simravlem sixarulitʰ itsqo xmamaɣla ɣvtʰis kʰeba dideba qvela sastsaulisatʰvis ratsʰ matʰ ixiles 
ambobdnen kurtʰxeulia upʰlis saxelitʰ momavali mepʰe mʃvidoba tsʰaze da dideba maɣaltʰa ʃina 
xalxidan zoɡiertʰma pʰarisevelma utʰxra mas modzɣvaro ɡautsqeri ʃens motsapʰeebs 
man miuɡo da utʰxra tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ eseni rom dadumdnen kʰvebi iɣaɣadeben 
rotsʰa miuaxlovda da dainaxa kʰalakʰi atirda mis ɡamo 
da tʰkʰva netav am dɣes maintsʰ ɡtsʰodnoda ratsʰ samʃvidoboa ʃentʰvis maɡram axla es dapʰarulia ʃens tʰvaltʰaɡan 
radɡan daɡidɡeba dɣeebi rotsʰa mtrebi ʃens tsinaaɣmdeɡ aɣmartʰaven zvinuls ʃemoɡertqmian da ʃeɡavitsroeben qoveli mxridan 
mitsastʰan ɡaɡastsoreben ʃen da ʃens ʃvilebs ʃenʃi kʰvas kʰvaze aɣar datoveben ʃenʃi radɡan ver ɡaiɡe ʃeni moxedvis ʒami 
ʃevida tadzarʃi da daitsqo movacretʰa ɡamorekva 
utʰxra matʰ datserilia tʃemi saxli samlotsʰvelo saxli unda iqos tʰkʰven ki avazaktʰa bunaɡad akʰtsʰietʰ iɡi 
da astsavlida qoveldɣe tadzarʃi xolo mɣvdelmtʰavarni mtsiɡnobarni da erismtʰavarni tsʰdilobdnen mis daɣupvas 
maɡram verapʰeri moiɡones ra unda ekʰnatʰ radɡan mtʰeli xalxi mouʃoreblad usmenda mas 
ertʰ dɣes rotsʰa is xalxs astsavlida tadzarʃi da axarebda miutsʰvivdnen mɣvdelmtʰavarni da mtsiɡnobarni uxutsʰesebtʰan ertʰad 
da utʰxres mas ɡvitʰxari romeli xelmtsipʰebitʰ aketʰeb amas an vin moɡtsʰa ʃen es xelmtsipʰeba 
miuɡo da utʰxra matʰ metsʰ ɡkitʰxavtʰ ertʰ sitqvas da mitʰxaritʰ 
ioanes natʰlistsʰema zetsʰidan iqo tʰu katsʰtʰaɡan 
isini ertʰmanetʰʃi msdʒelobdnen tʰu vitqvitʰ rom zetsʰidano itqvis maʃ raɣatom ar itsametʰo misi 
tʰu vitqvitʰ katsʰtʰaɡan mtʰeli xalxi tʃaɡvkʰolavs vinaidan sdʒeratʰ rom ioane tsinastsarmetqveli iqo 
da miuɡes ar vitsʰitʰ saidan 
iesom utʰxra matʰ metsʰ ar ɡetqvitʰ romeli xelmtsipʰebitʰ vaketʰeb amas 
dautsqo xalxs am iɡavis moqola ertʰma katsʰma vazi tʃaqara da mitsismuʃaktʰ tʃaabara tʰvitʰon ki sxva kʰveqanaʃi tsavida karɡa xnitʰ 
rotsʰa dro movida mona ɡauɡzavna mitsismuʃaktʰ rom mietsʰatʰ venaxis naqopʰtʰaɡan maɡram mitsismuʃakebma stsʰemes mas da xeltsʰarieli ɡauʃves 
kvlav ɡauɡzavna matʰ sxva mona masatsʰ stsʰemes ɡalandzɣes da xeltsʰarieli ɡauʃves 
mere mesametsʰ ɡaɡzavna dacres iɡi da ɡaaɡdes ɡaretʰ 
maʃin venaxis patronma tʰkʰva roɡor movikʰtsʰe tʃems saqvarel dzes ɡavuɡzavni ikʰneb misi moeridotʰ 
maɡram mitsismuʃakebma is rom dainaxes ertʰmanetʰʃi moitʰatʰbires da tʰkʰves es memkvidrea modi movklatʰ da memkvidreoba tʃven daɡvrtʃeba 
ɡaaɡdes venaxis ɡaretʰ da mokles ras uzams matʰ venaxis patroni 
mova amotsqvets im mitsismuʃaktʰ da venaxs sxvebs tʃaabarebs vintsʰ moismines tʰkʰves numtsʰ moxdeba 
man ki ʃexeda matʰ da tʰkʰva ras niʃnavs es datserili kʰva romelitsʰ mʃeneblebma daitsunes kʰvakutʰxedad ikʰtsʰa 
qvela vintsʰ im kʰvaze daetsʰema dailetseba xolo visatsʰ is daetsʰema ɡasress 
mɣvdelmtʰavarni da mtsiɡnobarni stsored am dros ʃeetsʰadnen rom xeli daedotʰ mistʰvis maɡram xalxisa eʃinodatʰ radɡan itsʰodnen rom matʰze tʰkʰva es iɡavi 
utʰvaltʰvalebdnen mas da miuɡzavnes mstovrebi romlebitsʰ tʰavs martʰal adamianebad atʃvenebdnen ratʰa sitqvaʃi daeciratʰ da mtʰavrobisatʰvis da ɡanmɡeblis xelmtsipʰebaʃi ɡadaetsʰatʰ 
hkitʰxes mas da utʰxres modzɣvaro vitsʰitʰ rom simartʰles laparakob da astsavli aravis mihkerdzeb aramed ceʃmaritebitʰ astsavli ɣvtʰis ɡzas 
ʃeidzleba tʰu ara mivtsʰetʰ xarki keisars 
iɡi miuxvda matʰ mzakvrobas da utʰxra 
mitʃvenetʰ dinari visia es xati da tsartsera tʰkʰves keisrisao 
utʰxra matʰ hoda mietsʰitʰ keisrisa keisars da ɣvtʰisa ɣmertʰs 
ver ʃedzles misi sitqvaʃi dacera xalxis tsinaʃe ɡaukvirdatʰ misi pasuxi da dadumdnen 
miuaxlovda ramdenime sadukeveli romlebitsʰ ambobdnen aɣdɡoma ar ariso da hkitʰxes mas 
modzɣvaro mosem daɡvitsera tʰu vinmes moukvdeba dzma romelsatsʰ tsʰoli hqavda maɡram uʃvilod ɡadaeɡo misma dzmam ʃeirtʰos misi tsʰoli da aɣudɡinos tʰesli tʰavis dzmas 
iqvnen ʃvidni dzmani pirvelma ʃeirtʰo tsʰoli da mokvda uʃvilod 
da meorematsʰ 
da mesamematsʰ ʃeirtʰes iɡi ʃvidtʰaɡan artsʰertʰs ar dartʃenia ʃvilebi da daixotsʰnen 
bolos dedakatsʰitsʰ mokvda 
hoda aɣdɡomisas romeli ertʰis tsʰoli ikʰneba radɡan ʃvidives hqavda tsʰolad 
da utʰxra matʰ iesom am saukunis ʃvilebi irtʰaven tsʰolebs da tʰxovdebian 
xolo vintsʰ ɣirsni arian moipovon is saukune da mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡoma artsʰ tsʰols irtʰaven artsʰ tʰxovdebian 
vinaidan aɣartsʰ sikvdili ʃeudzliatʰ matʰ raki anɡeloztʰa stsorni da ɣvtʰis dzeni arian isini dzeni aɣdɡomis 
xolo mkvdrebi rom aɣdɡebian es mosematsʰ mianiʃna maqvlis butʃkʰitʰ rotsʰa abraamis ɣmertʰs isakis ɣmertʰs da iakobis ɣmertʰs utsoda upʰali 
xolo ɣmertʰi mkvdrebisa ki ar aris aramed tsʰotsʰxlebisa vinaidan mistʰvis qvela tsʰotsʰxalia 
miuɡo zoɡiertʰma mtsiɡnobarma da utʰxra karɡad tʰkʰvio modzɣvaro 
da veɣar ɡabedes rame ekitʰxatʰ mistʰvis xolo man utʰxra matʰ 
roɡor amboben rom kʰriste davitʰis dzea 
tʰvitʰon davitʰi ki ambobs tsiɡnʃi utʰxra upʰalma tʃems upʰals dadʒekʰi tʃems mardʒvniv 
vidre ʃens mtrebs davamxobde ʃens pʰerxtʰa kvartsʰxlbekad 
aha davitʰi upʰals utsodebs mas da roɡorɣa aris misi dze 
da rotsʰa mtʰeli xalxi usmenda utʰxra tʰavis motsapʰeebs 
eridetʰ mtsiɡnobrebs romlebsatsʰ surtʰ ɡrdzeli samoslitʰ siaruli da moednebze mokitʰxvani sinaɡoɡebʃi tsina savardzlebi da tsina adɡilebi nadimebze 
romelnitsʰ camen kʰvrivtʰa saxlebs da mosatʃveneblad didxans lotsʰuloben isini upʰro did sasdʒels miiɣeben 
aixeda da dainaxa rom saɡandzurʃi hqridnen mdidrebi tʰaviantʰ ʃesatsiravs 
dainaxa aɡretʰve ɣaribi kʰvrivi romelmatsʰ ori lepta tʃaaɡdo 
tʰkʰva ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom am ɣaribma kʰvrivma qvelaze meti tʃado
