vinaidan qvelam tʰavisi mocarbebulisɡan tʃado man ki tʰavisi siduxcirisaɡan tʃado mtʰeli sartʃo ratsʰ ebada 
rotsʰa zoɡiertʰebi ambobdnen tadzarze dzvirpʰasi kʰvebitʰ da ʃetsirulebebitʰ ariso damʃvenebuli iesom tʰkʰva 
dadɡeba dɣeebi rotsʰa amatʰɡan rasatsʰ akʰ xedavtʰ kʰva kʰvaze ar dartʃeba rom ar tʃamoiʃalos 
isini eubnebodnen mas da ekitʰxebodnen modzɣvaro rodis ikʰneba es da ra ikʰneba niʃani es rom unda moxdes 
man tʰkʰva ɡapʰrətʰxilditʰ rom ar ʃetsʰdetʰ vinaidan bevri mova tʃemi saxelitʰ da itqvis me varo da is ʒami moaxloebuliao tʰkʰven nu ɡahqvebitʰ matʰ 
rotsʰa moismentʰ omebsa da ʃpʰotʰebze nu ʃedzrtsundebitʰ vinaidan dʒer es unda moxdes radɡan utsʰeb ar ikʰneba aɣsasruli 
maʃin utʰxra matʰ aɣdɡeba xalxi xalxis tsinaaɣmdeɡ da samepʰo samepʰos tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
ikʰneba didi mitsisdzvrani adɡil adɡil mosrva da ʃimʃilobani saʃinelebani da didi niʃnebi zetsʰidan 
amis utsinares xels daɡadeben tʰkʰven da daɡitsqeben devnas ɡadaɡtsʰemen sinaɡoɡebsa da sapqrobileebs mepʰetʰa da ɡanmɡebeltʰa tsinaʃe miɡiqvanen tʃemi saxelis ɡamo 
es ɡekʰnebatʰ tʰkʰven dasamotsmeblad 
amitom tʰkʰvens ɡulebʃi tʃaidetʰ rom tsinastsar ar izrunotʰ ritʰi imartʰlotʰ tʰavi 
vinaidan me moɡtsʰemtʰ tʰkʰven pirsa da sibrədznes romeltʰatsʰ ver daupirispirdebian da vertsʰ ʃeepasuxebian tʰkʰveni motsinaaɣmdeɡeni 
aseve ɡatsʰemul ikʰnebitʰ mʃoblebisa da dzmebis natʰesavebisa da meɡobrebis mier xolo zoɡiertʰ tʰkʰvenɡans moklaven 
da qvela moɡidzulebtʰ tʃemi saxelis ɡamo 
maɡram betsvitsʰ ki ar daikarɡeba tʰkʰveni tʰavidan 
motʰminebitʰ moipovetʰ tʰkʰveni suli 
da rotsʰa ixilavtʰ ierusalims laʃkʰritʰ ɡarsʃemortqmuls maʃin itsʰodetʰ rom moaxlovda misi aoxreba 
maʃin iudeaʃi mqopʰni mtʰebʃi ɡaixiznon vintsʰ ierusalimʃia ɡaretʰ ɡavides vintsʰ sopʰlad aris nuɣar ʃeva masʃi 
vinaidan es ʃurisɡebis dɣeebia ratʰa aɣsruldes qovelive datserili 
xolo vai orsultʰ da medzudzurtʰ im dɣeebʃi vinaidan didi ikʰneba ubedureba mitsaze da risxva am xalxze 
daetsʰemian maxvilis piritʰ tqved tsaasxamen qvela xalxʃi ierusalimi ɡatʰelili ikʰneba tsarmartʰtʰa mier vidre dasruldeba tsarmartʰtʰa ʒami 
da ikʰneba niʃnebi mzeze da mtʰvareze da varskvlavebze xolo mitsaze xalxebi ʃeʃpʰotʰdebian tʰavɡzaabneulni zɣvis xmaurisa da bobokʰrobis ɡamo 
xalxs ɡuli ʃeutsuxdeba ʃiʃitʰ da msopʰlioze mosavaltʰa molodinitʰ vinaidan tsʰiuri dzalebi ʃeirqevian 
maʃin ixilaven dzes katsʰisas ɣrubelze momavals diadi dzalitʰa da didebitʰ 
xolo rotsʰa amis axdena daitsqeba ɡaimartʰetʰ da tʰavi astsietʰ radɡan axlovdeba tʰkʰveni xsna 
utʰxra matʰ iɡavi ʃexedetʰ leɣvs da qvela xes 
rotsʰa isini ukve ipʰotʰlebian ʃexedavtʰ da itsʰitʰ rom axlosaa zapʰxuli 
aseve tʰkʰven rotsʰa ixilavtʰ qovelive amis axdenas itsʰodetʰ rom axlosaa ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli 
ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven ar ɡadaivlis es modɡma vidre qvelapʰeri ar axdeba 
tsʰa da mitsa ɡadaivlian tʃemi sitqvebi ki ar ɡadaivlian 
ɡapʰrətʰxilditʰ ar damdzimdes tʰkʰveni ɡulebi ɣreobitʰ lotʰobitʰa da sitsʰotsʰxleze zrunvitʰ da im dɣem ar ɡitsiotʰ utsʰabedad 
radɡan is etseva roɡortsʰ maxe qvela mkvidrs mtʰels mitsis pirze 
maʃ qovelʒams ipʰxizletʰ da ilotsʰetʰ ratʰa ʃeɡedzlotʰ qovelɡvar am mosaxdentʰaɡan tʰavis daɣtseva da tsardɡoma katsʰis dzis tsinaʃe 
dɣisitʰ ieso tadzarʃi imqopʰeboda da astsavlida ɣam ɣamobitʰ ki adioda mtʰaze romelsatsʰ zetʰisxilisa etsodeba 
mtʰeli xalxi dilidan midioda mastʰan tadzarʃi mis mosasmenad 
axlovdeboda pasekʰad tsodebuli upʰuarobis dɣesastsauli 
da daedzebdnen mas mɣvdelmtʰavarni da mtsiɡnobarni rom roɡorme moeklatʰ iɡi maɡram xalxisa eʃinodatʰ 
ʃevida satana iudaʃi iskariotelad tsodebulʃi romelitsʰ ertʰi tʰormettʰaɡani iqo 
tsavida elaparaka mɣvedlmtʰavrebsa da mtsʰveltʰa upʰrosebs roɡor mietsʰa matʰtʰvis ieso 
matʰ ɡauxardatʰ da datʰanxmdnen mietsʰatʰ mistʰvis vertsʰxli 
manatsʰ aɣutʰkʰva da edzebda mardʒve ʃemtʰxvevas rom xalxis daustsreblad mietsʰa iɡi matʰtʰvis 
dadɡa upʰuarobis dɣe rotsʰa unda dakluliqo pasekʰi 
miavlina petre da ioane da utʰxra tsaditʰ moamzadetʰ tʃventʰvis pasekʰi rom vcamotʰ 
matʰ utʰxres mas sad ɡinda rom movamzadotʰ 
man utʰxra matʰ aha kʰalakʰʃi ʃesvlisas ʃemoɡxvdebatʰ katsʰi romelsatsʰ tsqali miakʰvs kokitʰ mihqevitʰ mas im saxlamde sadatsʰ ʃeva 
da utʰxaritʰ saxlis patrons modzɣvari ɡeubneba sad aris sastumro otʰaxi rom tʃems motsapʰeebtʰan ertʰad vcamoo pasekʰi 
is ɡitʃvenebtʰ did mopʰardaɡebul zemotʰvals ikʰ moamzadetʰ 
tsavidnen da ipoves roɡortsʰ man utʰxra da moamzades pasekʰi 
rotsʰa moaɣtsia ʒamma dadʒda iɡi da motsʰikʰulebitsʰ mastʰan ertʰad 
utʰxra matʰ survilitʰ msurda tʰkʰventʰan ertʰad mecama es pasekʰi tʃemi tandʒvis tsin 
radɡan ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rom aɣar vcam mas vidre ar aɣsruldeba ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi 
aiɣo sasmisi madli ʃestsira da utʰxra matʰ miiɣetʰ da ɡaiqavitʰ ertʰmanetʰs ʃoris 
radɡan ɡetqvitʰ tʰkʰven amieridan aɣar ʃevsvam vazis naqopʰisɡan vidre ar mova ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli 
aiɣo puri madli ʃestsira datexa dauriɡa matʰ da utʰxra es tʃemi sxeulia romelitsʰ tʰkʰventʰvis mietsʰema es ɡaaketʰetʰ tʃems mosaɡoneblad 
aseve aiɣo sasmisi serobis ʃemdeɡ da tʰkʰva es sasmisi aris axali aɣtʰkʰma tʃems sisxlʃi tʰkʰventʰvis rom iɣvreba 
da aha tʃemi ɡamtsʰemis xeli tʃemtʰan ertʰad aris am supʰraze 
radɡan dze katsʰisa midis ɡantʃinebisamebr maɡram vai im katsʰs vis mieratsʰ ɡaitsʰema iɡi 
da matʰ daitsqes ertʰmanetʰis ɡamokitʰxva romeli matʰɡani ɡaaketʰebda amas 
aseve iqo dava matʰ ʃoris romeli matʰɡani unda tʃatʰvliliqo didad 
man ki utʰxra matʰ xalxtʰa mepʰeebi batonoben matʰze da matʰi xelmtsipʰeni mtsqaloblebad itsodebian 
tʰkʰven ki ase rodi xartʰ tʰkʰvens ʃoris upʰrosi umtsʰrosivitʰ iqos xolo vintsʰ upʰrosobs msaxurivitʰ 
vinaidan vin aris upʰro didi meinaxe tʰu msaxuri ɡana meinaxe ara me ki tʰkʰven ʃoris var roɡortsʰ msaxuri 
tʰkʰven ki isini xartʰ romelnitsʰ tʃemtʰan dartʃitʰ tʃems ɡansatsʰdelʃi 
metsʰ iseve aɣɡitʰkʰvitʰ roɡortsʰ me aɣmitʰkʰva tʃemma mamam sasupʰeveli 
rom camotʰ da svatʰ tʃems supʰraze tʃems sasupʰevelʃi da dasxdetʰ taxtebze israelis tʰormeti tomis ɡansakitʰxavad 
tʰkʰva upʰalma simon simon aha satanam ɡamoɡitʰxovatʰ tʰkʰven rom xorbalivitʰ ɡaɡtsʰxrilotʰ 
maɡram me vilotsʰe ʃentʰvis rom ar dailios ʃeni rətsmena da rotsʰa kvlav moikʰtsʰevi ɡaamxneve ʃeni dzmebi 
man ki utʰxra mas upʰalo ʃentʰan me mzad var sapqrobileʃitsʰ tsamovide da sasikvdilodatsʰ 
xolo man tʰkʰva ʃen ɡeubnebi petre mamali ar iqivlebs dɣes sanam samdʒer ar uarqopʰ rom mitsʰnob 
utʰxra matʰ rotsʰa kʰisis ɡudis da pʰexsatsʰmlis ɡareʃe ɡɡzavniditʰ raime ɡakldatʰ tʰkʰves arapʰerio 
utʰxra matʰ axla ki visatsʰ kʰisa akʰvs aiɣos aseve ɡuda xolo visatsʰ ara akʰvs tʰavisi tansatsʰmeli ɡaqidos da maxvili iqidos 
tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ rom es datserili tʃemze unda aɣsruldes borotmokʰmedebtʰan ʃeiratsʰxa radɡan mas ratsʰ tʃems ʃesaxebaa dasasruli akʰvs 
matʰ tʰkʰves upʰalo aha akʰ ori maxvilia man ki utʰxra matʰ kmara 
ɡamovida ikʰidan da tʃveulebisamebr tsavida zetʰisxilis mtʰaze motsapʰeebitsʰ ɡahqvnen mas 
adɡilze misvlistʰanave utʰxra matʰ ilotsʰetʰ rom ar tʃatsʰvivdetʰ ɡansatsʰdelʃi 
tʰvitʰon ɡanʃorda matʰ kʰvis sasrol mandzilze muxli moiqara da lotsʰulobda 
ambobda mamao tʰu ɡsurs amatsʰdine es sasmisi maɡram tʃemi neba ki ara ʃeni iqos 
etʃvena mas tsʰidan anɡelozi da adzlierebda 
am aɡoniaʃi mqopʰi umxurvalesad lotsʰulobda da ɡaxda misi opʰli roɡortsʰ sisxlis msxvili tsvetʰebi romlebitsʰ mitsaze tsʰvioda 
lotsʰvis ʃemdeɡ tsamodɡa mivida motsapʰeebtʰan da naxa isini mtsuxarebisaɡan tʃadzinebulebi 
utʰxra matʰ ras ɡdzinavtʰ adekʰitʰ ilotsʰetʰ rom ar tʃatsʰvivdetʰ ɡansatsʰdelʃi 
dʒer sitqva ar daemtʰavrebina rom aha movida xalxi da matʰ tsin moudzɣvis ertʰi tʰormettʰaɡani saxelad iuda da mivida iesostʰan saamboreblad 
iesom utʰxra mas iuda amboritʰ ɡastsʰem katsʰis dzes 
mastʰan mqopʰebma rom dainaxes ratsʰ xdeboda utʰxres upʰalo davkratʰ maxvili 
ertʰma matʰɡanma dastsʰa mɣvdelmtʰavris monas da mardʒvena quri tʃamoatʰala 
miuɡo iesom da tʰkʰva tʰavi daanebetʰ sakmarisia da ʃeexo qurs da ɡaumrtʰela iɡi 
utʰxra iesom mis tsinaaɣmdeɡ mosul mɣvdelmtʰavrebs tadzris mtsʰveltʰa upʰrosebs da uxutsʰesebs roɡortsʰ avazakis tsinaaɣmdeɡ maxvilebitʰ da ketebitʰ ɡamoxveditʰ tʃems ʃesapqrobad 
qoveldɣe tʰkʰventʰan ertʰad viqavi tadzarʃi da tʃemze xeli ar aɡimartʰavtʰ maɡram es tʰkʰveni ʒamia da sibnelis xelmtsipʰeba 
da ʃeipqres iɡi tsaiqvanes da mɣvdelmtʰavris saxlʃi ʃeiqvanes petre ki moʃorebitʰ mihqveboda 
rotsʰa ʃua ezoʃi tsʰetsʰxli daantʰes da ɡars ʃemousxdnen petretsʰ matʰ ʃoris dadʒda 
ertʰma mxevalma iɡi tsʰetsʰxltʰan mdʒdomare rom dainaxa daakvirda da tʰkʰva esetsʰ imastʰan iqo 
maɡram man uarqo da tʰkʰva dedakatsʰo ar vitsʰnob imas 
tsʰota moɡvianebitʰ sxvam dainaxa iɡi da tʰkʰva ʃentsʰ imatʰɡani xar maɡram petrem utʰxra adamiano ara var 
tʰitʰkʰmis ertʰi saatʰi iqo ɡasuli rom viɣatsʰ sxvam daitsqo mtkitsʰeba da ambobda ceʃmaritad esetsʰ imastʰan iqo vinaidan ɡalilevelia 
tʰkʰva petrem adamiano ar vitsʰi ras ambob da utsʰeb rotsʰa amas ambobda mamalma iqivla 
da mobrunda upʰali da ʃexeda petres da ɡaaxsenda petres upʰlis sitqva rom utʰxra dɣes sanam mamali iqivlebdes samdʒer uarmqopʰo 
da ɡavida ɡaretʰ da mtsared atirda 
xolo katsʰebi romlebsatsʰ ʃepqrobili hqavdatʰ ieso aɡinebdnen da stsʰemdnen mas 
tʰavi daupʰares saxeʃi stsʰemdnen da ekitʰxebodnen aba itsinastsarmetqvele vin daɡartqa 
da kidev mraval sxva ɡmobas ambobdnen mis tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
rotsʰa ɡatʰenda ʃeikribnen xalxis uxutsʰestʰa sabco mɣvdelmtʰavarni da mtsiɡnobarni da miiqvanes iɡi tʰaviantʰ sinedrionʃi 
da utʰxres tʰu kʰriste xar ɡvitʰxari utʰxra matʰ rom ɡitʰxratʰ ar damidʒerebtʰ 
da tʰu ʃeɡekitʰxebitʰ ar mipasuxebtʰ 
amieridan dze katsʰisa ikʰneba ɣvtʰis dzalis mardʒvniv mdʒdomare 
tʰkʰva qvelam maʃ ʃena xar dze ɣvtʰisa man utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰven ambobtʰ rom me var 
matʰ tʰkʰves meti raɣa motsmoba ɡvcirdeba vinaidan tʃven tʰvitʰon movisminetʰ misi piridan 
da tsamoiʃala mtʰeli es xalxi da tsaiqvanes iɡi pilatestʰan 
ʃeudɡnen mis dadanaʃaulebas da ambobdnen tʃven vnaxetʰ rom es rəqvnis tʃvens xalxs da krdzalavs keisrisatʰvis xarkis mitsʰemas tʰavis tʰavze ki ambobs kʰriste mepʰe varo 
pilatem hkitʰxa mas ʃen xar iudeveltʰa mepʰe xolo man miuɡo mas da tʰkʰva ʃen ambob 
pilatem utʰxra mɣvdelmtʰavrebs da xalxs me veravitʰar danaʃauls ver vpoulob am katsʰʃi 
maɡram isini daʒinebitʰ ambobdnen eɡ aʃpʰotʰebs xalxs astsavlis mtʰel iudeaʃi ɡalileidan moqolebuli akʰamde 
pilatem es rom ɡaiɡona ikitʰxa ɡana ɡalilevelia es katsʰi 
rotsʰa ʃeitqo rom herodes sampʰlobelodan iqo ɡauɡzavna iɡi herodes radɡan im dɣeebʃi isitsʰ ierusalimʃi imqopʰeboda 
herodem ieso rom dainaxa dzalian ɡauxarda radɡan didi xnidan surda misi xilva raki ɡaɡonili hkʰonda masze da imedi hkʰonda raime sastsauls naxavda misɡan 
bevrs ekitʰxeboda maɡram iɡi arapʰers pasuxobda 
mɣvdelmtʰavarni da mtsiɡnobarni ki idɡnen da ɡatsʰxarebitʰ brals sdebdnen mas 
xolo herode tʰavis dʒariskatsʰebitʰurtʰ amtsʰirebda mas da dastsʰinoda tʃaatsʰva brətsqinvale samoseli da ukan ɡauɡzavna pilates 
im dɣes pilate da herode dameɡobrədnen tʰumtsʰa adre mtrobdnen ertʰimeores 
pilatem mouxmo mɣvdelmtʰavrebs mtʰavrebs da xalxs 
da utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰven moiqvanetʰ tʃemtʰan es katsʰi roɡortsʰ xalxis ɡamrəqvneli da aha me tʰkʰvens tsinaʃe ɡamovidzie da veravitʰari danaʃauli ver vpove am katsʰʃi raʃitsʰ tʰkʰven adanaʃaulebtʰ mas 
da vertsʰ herodem radɡan ukan ɡamoɡviɡzavna iɡi da aha sikvdilis ɣirsi arapʰeri tʃaudenia mas 
amitom ckuas vastsavli da ɡavuʃveb 
mas ki stsored ertʰi unda ɡaeʃva sadɣesastsaulod 
maɡram mtʰeli xalxi auqvirda moaʃore eɡ da ɡaɡvitʰavisupʰle barabao 
romelitsʰ tʃaɡdebuli iqo sapqrobileʃi kʰalakʰʃi momxdari raɣatsʰ ʃpʰotʰisa da mkvlelobisatʰvis 
pilatem kvlav mimartʰa matʰ vinaidan surda iesos ɡaʃveba 
maɡram isini ɡahqvirodnen dʒvars atsʰvi dʒvars atsʰvi eɡ 
mesamed utʰxra matʰ ra boroteba akʰvs tʃadenili me verapʰeri sasikvdilo brali ver vpove masʃi amitom ckuas vastsavli da ɡavuʃveb 
isini ki daʒinebitʰ xmamaɣla moitʰxovdnen rom dʒvars etsʰvatʰ iɡi da imdzlavra matʰma xmam da mɣvdelmtʰavrebis xmam 
da pilatem ɡadatsqvita ʃeesrulebina matʰi motʰxovna 
ɡauʃva ʃpʰotʰisa da mkvlelobisatʰvis sapqrobileʃi tʃaɡdebuli romelsatsʰ isini moitʰxovdnen ieso ki matʰ nebas ɡadastsʰa 
rotsʰa iɡi mihqavdatʰ ɡzaʃi daicires mindvridan momavali vinme simon kvirineli da ahkides dʒvari rom etarebina iesos kvaldakval 
misdevdnen mas diddzali xalxi da dedakatsʰebi romlebitsʰ tirodnen da motʰkʰvamdnen mis ɡamo 
ieso miubrunda matʰ da utʰxra ierusalimis asulno nu stiritʰ tʃemze aramed tʰkʰven tʰavze da tʰkʰvens ʃvilebze itiretʰ 
radɡan aha modis dɣeebi rotsʰa itqvian netar arian unaqopʰoni da saʃoni romeltʰatsʰ ar uʃviatʰ da dzudzuni romeltʰatsʰ ar utsovebiatʰ 
maʃin etqvian mtʰebs daɡvemxetʰ zed da bortsʰvebs daɡvpʰaretʰ tʃven 
vinaidan tʰu nedl xes ase ekʰtsʰevian xmels raɣas uzamen 
mastʰan ertʰad sasikvdilod mihqavdatʰ sxvebitsʰ ori avazaki 
rotsʰa im adɡilas mividnen romelsatsʰ tʰxemis adɡili hkʰvia ikʰ dʒvars atsʰves isitsʰ da borotmokʰmednitsʰ ertʰi mis mardʒvniv da ertʰi mis martsʰxniv 
ieso ambobda mamao miuteve amatʰ radɡan ar itsʰian ras aketʰeben da ɡaiqves misi samoseli tsilisqritʰ 
idɡa xalxi da ʃehqurebda mtʰavrebitsʰ dastsʰinodnen da ambobdnen sxvebs ixsnida axla tʰavisi tʰavi ixsnas tʰu eɡ kʰristea ɣvtʰis rtʃeuli 
aseve dʒariskatsʰebitsʰ dastsʰinodnen mas midiodnen da dzmari mihkʰondatʰ mastʰan 
eubnebodnen tʰu iudeveltʰa mepʰe xar ixseni ʃeni tʰavi 
mis zemotʰ iqo tsartsera berdznuli romauli da ebrauli sitqvebitʰ datserili es aris iudeveltʰa mepʰe 
ertʰi tʃamokidebuli borotmokʰmedi ɡmobda mas ɡana ʃen kʰriste ara xar ixseni ʃeni tʰavi da tʃventsʰ 
miuɡo meorem ɡautsqra da tʰkʰva nutʰu ɣvtʰisa ar ɡeʃinia rotsʰa ʃentsʰ imave sasdʒelʃi xar 
tʃven samartʰlianad davimsaxuretʰ vinaidan tʃven ratsʰ ɡavaketʰetʰ imisi sakadrisi miviɣetʰ maɡas ki arapʰeri udʒero ar tʃaudenia 
da tʰkʰva ieso ɡamixsene rotsʰa ʃens sasupʰevelʃi mixval 
da utʰxra mas ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebi ʃen dɣesve tʃemtʰan ertʰad ikʰnebi samotʰxeʃi 
dɣis ekʰvsi saatʰi ikʰneboda da mtʰeli mitsa bnelma moitsʰva tsʰxra saatʰamde 
dabnelda mze da tadzris pʰarda ʃuaze ɡaipo 
da ʃesdzaxa iesom didi xmitʰ da tʰkʰva mamao ʃens xeltʰ ɡabareb tʃems suls es tʰkʰva da suli ɡanuteva 
asistʰavma rom ixila momxdari ɣmertʰi adida da tʰkʰva ceʃmaritad es katsʰi martʰali iqo 
am sanaxaobaze ʃekrebili mtʰeli xalxi rom xedavda ratsʰ xdeboda ɡulʃi mdʒiɣis tsʰemitʰ brundeboda ukan 
qvela vintsʰ mas itsʰnobda da dedakatsʰebi ɡalileidan rom mohqvnen moʃorebitʰ idɡnen da uqurebdnen amas 
aha ertʰi katsʰi saxelad iosebi sabcos tsevri ketʰili da martʰali katsʰi 
romelitsʰ ar daetʰanxma matʰ tʰatʰbirsa da sakʰmianobas iudeveltʰa kʰalakʰ arimatʰiidan romelitsʰ moeloda ɣvtʰis sasupʰevels 
mivida pilatestʰan da ɡamoitʰxova iesos ɡvami 
ɡardamoxsna iɡi ɡaaxvia tiloʃi da daasvena kldeʃi ɡamokvetʰil samarxʃi sadatsʰ dʒer kidev aravin daesvenebinatʰ 
is dɣe paraskevi iqo da ʃabatʰi dɡeboda 
ukan ɡahqvnen dedakatsʰebitsʰ romelnitsʰ iesostʰan ertʰad movidnen ɡalileidan da uqurebdnen samarxs roɡor daido misi ɡvami 
amis ʃemdeɡ dabrundnen moamzades surnelebani da nelsatsʰxebeli ʃabatʰs ki moisvenes mtsʰnebisamebr 
ertʰʃabatʰs utʰenia movidnen samarxtʰan da moitanes surnelebani romlebitsʰ momzadebuli hkʰondatʰ 
da naxes lodi samarxidan ɡadaɡorebuli 
maɡram rom ʃevidnen ver naxes upʰal iesos ɡvami 
amis ɡamo ʃepʰikʰriandnen da aha matʰ tsinaʃe tsarsdɡa ori mamakatsʰi brətsqinvale samoslitʰ mosili 
raki ʃedzrtsundnen da saxe mitsad daxares matʰ utʰxres rad edzebtʰ tsʰotsʰxals mkvdrebs ʃoris 
ar aris akʰ aramed aɣdɡa ɡaixsenetʰ ras ɡeubnebodatʰ rotsʰa dʒer kidev ɡalileaʃi iqo 
rom dze katsʰisa tsʰodvil katsʰtʰa xeltʰ unda ɡadaetsʰes dʒvars etsʰvas da mesame dɣes aɣdɡeso 
da matʰ ɡaixsenes misi sitqvebi 
dabrundnen samarxidan da qovelive es uambes im tʰertʰmets da qvela danartʃens 
eseni iqvnen mariam maɡdaleli ioana da iakobis deda mariami da danartʃenebi matʰtʰan ertʰad romlebmatsʰ moutʰxres motsʰikʰulebs es ambavi 
maɡram es sitqvebi pʰucad etʃvenatʰ da ar daudʒeres matʰ 
xolo petre adɡa ɡaikʰtsʰa samarxisken da rom daixara mxolod tiloebi dainaxa da dabrunda momxdaris ɡamo ɡakvirvebuli 
da aha imave dɣes ori matʰɡani midioda ertʰ sopʰelʃi romelitsʰ samotsʰi stadionitʰ iqo daʃorebuli ierusalimidan da erkʰva emausi 
isini ertʰmanetʰʃi laparakobdnen qovelive amis ɡamo 
am laparaksa da msdʒelobaʃi rom iqvnen tʰavad ieso miuaxlovda da daemɡzavra matʰ 
maɡram tʰvalebi dabmuli hkʰondatʰ da ver itsʰnes iɡi 
utʰxra matʰ raze msdʒelobditʰ ɡzaze ertʰmanetʰʃi isini ʃetʃerdnen daɣonebulni 
miuɡo ertʰma matʰɡanma saxelad kleopam da utʰxra mas nutʰu ertʰi ʃena xar utsʰxo ierusalimʃi rom ar itsʰi ratsʰ ikʰ am dɣeebʃi moxda 
da utʰxra matʰ ra moxda matʰ utʰxres mas ieso nazarevelze vlaparakobtʰ romelitsʰ iqo katsʰi tsinastsarmetqveli dzlieri sakʰmitʰa da sitqvitʰ ɣvtʰisa da mtʰeli xalxis tsinaʃe 
roɡor ɡadastsʰes iɡi tʃvenma mɣvdelmtʰavrebma da mtʰavrebma sikvdilis misasdʒelad da dʒvars atsʰves 
tʃven ki imedi ɡvkʰonda rom iɡi stsored is iqo visatsʰ unda ɡamoexsna israeli qvelapʰer amastʰan ertʰad ukve mesame dɣea ratsʰ es moxda 
maɡram zoɡiertʰma tʃvenianma dedakatsʰma ɡaɡvaotsʰa isini dilaadrian iqvnen samarxtʰan 
da ver ipoves misi ɡvami movidnen da tʰkʰves rom ixiles tʃveneba anɡeloztʰa romeltʰatsʰ utʰkʰvamtʰ tsʰotsʰxaliao 
zoɡiertʰi tʃventʰaɡanitsʰ tsavida samarxisaken da martʰlatsʰ iɡive dainaxes rasatsʰ dedakatsʰebi ambobdnen is ki ver naxes 
man utʰxra matʰ hoi uɡunurno da ɡulitʰ mdzimeno qvelapʰris imis sartsmuneblad rasatsʰ tsinastsarmetqvelebi ambobdnen 
ɡana ase ar unda datandʒuliqo kʰriste da ʃesuliqo tʰavis didebaʃi 
da daitsqo mosedan da qvela tsinastsarmetqvelidan da ɡanumartavda matʰ qovel tserilʃi masze natʰkʰvams 
miuaxlovdnen im sopʰels sadatsʰ midiodnen is ki tʰitʰkʰos ɡzis ɡaɡrdzelebas apirebda 
maɡram isini akavebdnen mas da eubnebodnen dartʃi tʃventʰan vinaidan dɣe ukve miitsura da mtsuxri tʃamodɡa isitsʰ ʃevida rom dartʃeniliqo matʰtʰan 
rotsʰa matʰtʰan idʒda aiɣo puri akurtʰxa ɡatexa da miatsoda matʰ 
maʃin tʰvali aexilatʰ da itsʰnes maɡram is utʃinari ʃeikʰna matʰtʰvis 
utʰxres ertʰmanetʰs ɡana ar ɡizɡizebda tʃveni ɡuli tʃvenʃi rotsʰa ɡzaʃi ɡvelaparakeboda da rotsʰa tserilebs ɡanɡvimartavda 
adɡnen imave ʒams da dabrundnen ierusalimʃi monaxes ʃekrebilni tʰertʰmetni da matʰtʰan mqopʰni 
romelnitsʰ ambobdnen rom upʰali ceʃmaritad aɣdɡa da etʃvena simons 
matʰatsʰ uambes ɡzaʃi momxdari da isitsʰ roɡor itsʰnes iɡi puris ɡatexisas 
am laparakʃi rom iqvnen tʰvitʰon ieso tʃadɡa matʰ ʃua da utʰxra mʃvidoba tʰkʰvenda 
ʃedzrtsunebulebsa da ʃeʃinebulebs eɡonatʰ rom suls xedavdnen 
maɡram man utʰxra ratom ʃedzrtsunditʰ da ratom ɡebadebatʰ ɡulʃi asetʰi pʰikʰrebi 
ʃexedetʰ tʃems xelebsa da tʃems pʰexebs es me var tʰvitʰon ʃemexetʰ me da naxetʰ radɡan suls ara akʰvs xortsʰi da dzvlebi me ki makʰvs roɡortsʰ xedavtʰ 
es rom utʰxra utʃvena matʰ xelebi da pʰexebi 
radɡan sixarulisaɡan matʰ dʒer kidev ar edʒerebodatʰ da ɡakvirvebulni iqvnen utʰxra matʰ ɡakʰvtʰ akʰ rame sacmeli 
matʰ miatsodes mas ʃemtsvari tʰevzis naceri da tʰapʰlis ɡoleuli 
ɡamoartʰva da ʃecama matʰ tsinaʃe xolo mortʃenili aiɣo da mistsʰa matʰ 
utʰxra matʰ es aris tʃemi sitqvebi romeltʰatsʰ ɡeubneboditʰ vidre tʰkʰventʰan viqavi unda ʃesruldes qovelive ratsʰ datserilia tʃemze moses rdʒulʃi tsinastsarmetqvelebʃi da pʰsalmunebʃi 
maʃin ɡauxsna matʰ ɡoneba tseriltʰa ɡasaɡebad 
da utʰxra matʰ ase stseria rom kʰriste unda daitandʒos da mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡes mesame dɣes 
da misi saxelitʰ nakʰadaɡebi unda iqos monanieba tsʰodvatʰa misateveblad qvela xalxʃi ierusalimidan moqolebuli 
tʰkʰven ki amis motsmeni xartʰ 
da aha me movavlen tʰkʰvenze mamatʃemis aɣtʰkʰmuls tʰkʰven ki dartʃitʰ kʰalakʰʃi vidre maɣlidan dzalitʰ ʃeimosebodetʰ 
da ɡaiqvana isini betʰaniamde da aɣapqro xelebi da akurtʰxa isini 
roɡortsʰ ki akurtʰxa ɡanʃorda matʰ da amaɣlda zetsʰaʃi 
matʰ tʰaqvani stsʰes mas da dabrundnen ierusalimʃi didi sixarulitʰ 
da sulmudam tadzarʃi iqvnen ɣvtʰis madidebelni da makurtʰxevelni amin 
dasatsqisʃi iqo sitqva da sitqva iqo ɣmertʰtʰan da sitqva iqo ɣmertʰi 
is iqo dasatsqisʃi ɣmertʰtʰan 
qovelive mis mier ʃeikʰmna da uimisod arapʰeri ʃekʰmnila ratsʰ ki ʃekʰmnila 
masʃi iqo sitsʰotsʰxle da sitsʰotsʰxle iqo adamiantʰa natʰeli 
natʰeli bnelʃi anatʰebs da bnelma ver moitsʰva iɡi 
iqo katsʰi movlinebuli ɣvtʰisɡan saxeli misi iqo ioane 
iɡi movida dasamotsmeblad ratʰa daemotsmebina natʰlis ʃesaxeb ratʰa qvelas ertsmuna misi meʃveobitʰ 
iɡi ar iqo natʰeli aramed ratʰa daemotsmebina natʰlis ʃesaxeb 
iqo natʰeli ceʃmariti romelitsʰ unatʰebs sopʰlad momsvlel qovel adamians 
iqo sopʰelʃi da sopʰeli mis mier ʃeikʰmna da sopʰelma ver itsʰno iɡi 
tʰavisianebtʰan movida da tʰavisianebma ar miiɣes iɡi 
xolo vintsʰ miiɣo iɡi da irtsmuna misi saxeli mistsʰa matʰ xelmtsipʰeba ɣvtʰis ʃvilebad ɡaxdomisa 
isini iʃvnen ara sisxlisaɡan ara xortsʰis ndomisaɡan ara mamakatsʰis ndomisaɡan aramed ɣvtʰisaɡan 
sitqva xortsʰi ikʰmna da daemkvidra tʃvens ʃoris madlitʰa da ceʃmaritebitʰ aɣsavse da tʃven vixiletʰ misi dideba roɡortsʰ dideba mamisaɡan mxolodʃobilisa 
ioane motsmobs masze da ɣaɣadebs es iqo viszetsʰ vtʰkʰvi tʃems ʃemdeɡ momavali tʃemze upiratesia vinaidan tʃemze utsin iqo 
misi sisavsidan miviɣetʰ qvelam madli madlisa tsil 
vinaidan rdʒuli motsʰemulia moses mier xolo madli da ceʃmariteba ieso kʰristes mier ikʰmna 
ɣmertʰi arasodes aravis unaxavs mxolodʃobilma dzem mamis tsiaɣʃi mqopʰma ɡaatsʰxada 
aha motsmoba ioanesi rotsʰa iudevelebma miuɡzavnes ierusalimidan mɣvdelni da levianebi ratʰa ekitʰxatʰ mistʰvis vin xar ʃen 
man aɣiara da ar uarqo aɣiara me ara var kʰriste 
da hkitʰxes mas kvlav maʃ vina xar elia xar ambobs ara var tsinastsarmetqveli xar miuɡebs ara 
maʃin utʰxres mas vina xar rom pasuxi ɡavtsʰetʰ tʃvens tsarmomɡzavneltʰ ras itqvi ʃenze 
tʰkʰva me var xma mɣaɣadeblisa udabnoʃi moustsoretʰ ɡza upʰals roɡortsʰ tʰkʰva esaia tsinastsarmetqvelma 
tsarmoɡzavnilebi ki pʰariseveltʰaɡan iqvnen 
da hkitʰxes mas da utʰxres aba raɣatom natʰlav tʰu artsʰ kʰriste xar artsʰ elia artsʰ tsinastsarmetqveli 
miuɡo matʰ ioanem da utʰxra me vnatʰlav tsqlitʰ maɡram tʰkʰvens ʃoris dɡas visatsʰ ver itsʰnobtʰ 
is tʃems ʃemdeɡ modis maɡram me mis sandlebze tʰasmis ʃexsnis ɣirsitsʰ ara var 
es betʰaniaʃi moxda iordanes ɡaɣma sadatsʰ ioane natʰlavda 
meore dɣes ixila man misken momavali ieso da tʰkʰva aha ɣvtʰis kravi romelmatsʰ aiɣo sopʰlis tsʰodva 
es aris viszetsʰ vtʰkʰvi tʃems ʃemdeɡ modis katsʰi romelitsʰ tʃemze upiratesia vinaidan tʃemze utsin iqo metʰkʰi 
me ar vitsʰnobdi mas maɡram imitom movedi tsqlitʰ sanatʰlavad rom is ɡamoetsʰxados israels 
motsmobda ioane da ambobda me vixile tsʰidan mtredivitʰ ɡadmomavali suli romelmatsʰ daivana masze 
me ar vitsʰnobdi mas maɡram vintsʰ momavlina tsqlitʰ sanatʰlavad man mitʰxra viszetsʰ dainaxo suli ɡadmomavali da davanebuli is aris sulitsmiditʰ natʰlismtsʰemeli 
me davinaxe da davamotsme rom es aris dze ɣvtʰisa 
meore dɣes kvlav idɡa ioane da ori misi motsapʰetʰaɡani 
dainaxa momavali ieso da tʰkʰva aha ɣvtʰis kravi 
orma motsapʰem ɡaiɡona misi sitqva da ɡahqva iesos 
ieso mobrunda da dainaxa rom mihqvebian da eubneba matʰ ras edzebtʰ matʰ utʰxres rabi ratsʰ tʰarɡmanitʰ niʃnavs modzɣvaro sad dɡaxar 
eubneba matʰ tsamoditʰ da naxavtʰ tsavidnen da naxes sadatsʰ idɡa is dɣe mastʰan dahqves ikʰneboda ase meatʰe saatʰi 
ertʰi am ortʰaɡani romeltʰatsʰ ioanesɡan moismines da ɡahqvnen iesos iqo andria dzma simon petresi 
man pirvelad tʰavisi dzma simoni naxa da utʰxra tʃven vipovetʰ mesia ratsʰ tʰarɡmanitʰ niʃnavs kʰristes 
miiqvana iɡi iesostʰan ʃexeda mas iesom da utʰxra ʃen xar simoni ioanes dze amieridan ʃen ɡerkʰmeva kepʰa ratsʰ tʰarɡmanitʰ niʃnavs kldes petres 
meore dɣes moisurva ɡalileas tsasvla da ipova pʰilipe utʰxra mas iesom ɡamomqevi 
xolo pʰilipe betʰsaididan iqo andrias da petres kʰalakʰidan 
pʰilipe ʃexvda natʰanaels da utʰxra tʃven vnaxetʰ is viszetsʰ datseres rdʒulʃi mosem da tsinastsarmetqvelebma ieso iosebis dze nazaretʰidan 
utʰxra mas natʰanaelma nazaretʰidan ra siketʰe ʃeidzleba iqos utʰxra mas pʰilipem tsamodi da naxe 
iesom rom dainaxa misken momavali natʰanaeli tʰkʰva masze aha namdvili israeliani romelʃitsʰ ar aris mzakvroba 
eubneba mas natʰanaeli saidan mitsʰnob miuɡo iesom da utʰxra mas vidre pʰilipe daɡidzaxebda leɣvis kʰveʃ daɡinaxe 
miuɡo mas natʰanaelma rabi ʃen xar dze ɣvtʰisa ʃen xar mepʰe israelisa 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra mas ʃen imis ɡamo ɡtsams rom ɡitʰxari leɣvis kʰveʃ daɡinaxe metʰkʰi amaze metsatsʰ ixilav 
eubneba mas ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven amieridan ixilavtʰ ɡaxsnil tsʰas da ɣvtʰis anɡelozebs katsʰis dzeze aɣmavaltʰ da tʃamomavaltʰ 
mesame dɣes kʰortsili iqo ɡalileis kanaʃi da iesos dedatsʰ ikʰ iqo 
ieso da misi motsapʰeebitsʰ iqvnen mitsveulni kʰortsilʃi 
da rotsʰa ɣvino ʃemoakldatʰ eubneba iesos dedamisi ɣvino aɣara akʰvtʰ 
eubneba mas ieso ra ɡinda tʃemɡan dedakatsʰo tʃemi ʒami dʒer ar damdɡara 
eubneba dedamisi msaxurebs ɡaaketʰetʰ qvelapʰeri rasatsʰ is ɡetqvitʰ 
iqo ikʰ ekʰvsi kʰvis curceli iudeveltʰa satseso ɡantsmedistʰvis tʰitʰoʃi ori tʰu sami satsqauli tʃadioda 
eubneba matʰ ieso daavsetʰ tsqlitʰ eɡ curclebi da matʰatsʰ daavses pirtʰamde 
da eubneba matʰ axla amoiɣetʰ da miartʰvitʰ supʰris ɡamriɡes da miartʰves 
rotsʰa supʰris ɡamriɡem ɡemo unaxa ɣvinod kʰtsʰeul tsqals ar itsʰoda saidan iqo es itsʰodnen mxolod msaxurebma romlebmatsʰ amoiɣes tsqali maʃin supʰris ɡamriɡem daudzaxa nepʰes 
da eubneba mas qvela katsʰi dʒer karɡ ɣvinos tʃamodɡams xolo rotsʰa ʃetʰvrebian mdares ʃen ki akʰamde inaxavdi karɡ ɣvinos 
ase daitsqo iesom sastsaulebis moxdena ɡalileis kanaʃi da ɡamoavlina tʰavisi dideba da irtsmunes misma motsapʰeebma 
amis ʃemdeɡ tʃavidnen kapernaums is da dedamisi dzmebi da misi motsapʰeebi da ikʰ dartʃnen ramdenime dɣes 
axlovdeboda iudeveltʰa pasekʰi da ieso avida ierusalims 
naxa tadzarʃi xarebis tsʰxvrebis da mtredebis ɡamqidvelni da msxdomare mekermeni 
ɡaaketʰa sablis ʃolti da ɡamoreka tadzridan qvela aɡretʰve xarebitsʰ da tsʰxvrebitsʰ kermis ɡadamtsʰvlelebs kerma daubnia da daxlebi auqirava 
mtredebis ɡamqidvelebs utʰxra ɡaiqvanetʰ eseni akʰedan da tʃemi mamis saxls nu ɡaxditʰ savacro saxlad 
ɡaaxsendatʰ mis motsapʰeebs rom datserilia ʃeni saxlis ʃuri ʃemcams me 
miuɡes iudevelebma da utʰxres mas ra niʃans ɡvitʃveneb amas rom aketʰeb 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ daanɡrietʰ es tadzari da sam dɣeʃi aɣvadɡen mas 
utʰxres iudevelebma es tadzari ormotsʰdaekʰvs tselitsads ʃendeboda da ʃen sam dɣeʃi aɣadɡen mas 
is ki tʰavisi sxeulis tadzarze laparakobda 
rotsʰa is mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡa misma motsapʰeebma ɡaixsenes amas rom ambobda da itsames tserili da sitqva romelitsʰ iesom tʰkʰva 
xolo rotsʰa ierusalimʃi pasekʰis dɣesastsaulze iqo bevrma naxa mis mier moxdenili sastsaulebi da itsama misi saxeli 
tʰvitʰon ieso ar endoboda matʰ vinaidan qvelas itsʰnobda 
artsʰ scirdeboda rom vinmes daemotsmebina katsʰis ʃesaxeb radɡan itsʰoda ra iqo katsʰʃi 
iqo ertʰi katsʰi pʰariseveltʰaɡan saxelad nikodemosi iudeveltʰa mtʰavari 
iɡi ɣamitʰ mivida mastʰan da utʰxra rabi tʃven vitsʰitʰ rom ʃen xar modzɣvari ɣvtʰisaɡan mosuli vinaidan aravis dzaludzs isetʰi sastsaulebis moxdena roɡorsatsʰ ʃen axden tʰu mastʰan ɣmertʰi ar aris 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra mas ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebi ʃen vintsʰ xelaxlad ar iʃveba ver ixilavs ɣvtʰis sasupʰevels 
eubneba mas nikodemosi roɡor ʃeudzlia katsʰs iʃvas tʰu iɡi moxutsʰia nutʰu ʃedzlebs rom tʰavisi dedis mutsʰelʃi meored ʃevides da iʃvas 
miuɡo iesom ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebi ʃen vintsʰ tsqlisa da sulisɡan ar iʃveba ver ʃeva ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi 
xortsʰisaɡan ʃobili xortsʰia da sulisaɡan ʃobili sulia 
nu ɡaɡikvirdeba rom ɡitʰxari tʰkʰven xelaxlad unda iʃvatʰ metʰkʰi 
kʰari kʰris sadatsʰ moisurvebs misi xma ɡesmis maɡram ar itsʰi saidan modis da sad midis asevea qvela vintsʰ sulisaɡan aris ʃobili 
nikodemosma miuɡo da utʰxra mas roɡor ʃeidzleba moxdes es 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra mas ʃen israelis modzɣvari xar da ɡana es ar itsʰi 
ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebi ʃen vlaparakobtʰ imaze ratsʰ vitsʰitʰ da vmotsmobtʰ ratsʰ ɡvinaxavs maɡram tʰkʰven ar ɣebulobtʰ tʃvens motsmobas 
tʰu mitsierze ɡitʰxaritʰ da ar ɡtsamtʰ roɡor itsamebtʰ zetsʰierze rom ɡitʰxratʰ 
aravin asula tsʰaʃi ɡarda tsʰidan tʃamosuli katsʰis dzisa romelitsʰ tsʰaʃia 
roɡortsʰ mosem aɣamaɣla ɡveli udabnoʃi aseve unda amaɣldes dze katsʰisa 
ratʰa artsʰ ertʰi misi mortsmune ar daiɣupos aramed hkʰondes saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle 
radɡan ikʰamde ʃeiqvara ɣmertʰma sopʰeli rom mistsʰa tʰavisi ertʰadertʰi dze ratʰa aravin vintsʰ mas irtsmunebs ar daiɣupos aramed hkʰondes saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle 
radɡan imistʰvis ki ar moavlina ɣmertʰma tʰavisi dze sopʰlad rom ɡanekitʰxa sopʰeli aramed ɡadartʃeniliqo sopʰeli mis mier 
visatsʰ is stsams ar ɡanikitʰxeba xolo visatsʰ ar stsams ukve ɡankitʰxulia radɡan ar irtsmuna saxeli ɣvtʰis mxolodʃobili dzisa 
ɡankitʰxva ki is aris rom natʰeli movida sopʰelʃi da adamianebma natʰelze metad bneli ʃeiqvares vinaidan boroti iqo matʰi sakʰmeebi 
vinaidan qvelas vintsʰ borotebas stʃadis sdzuls natʰeli da ar midis natʰlisken ratʰa ar ikʰnes mxilebuli misi sakʰmeebi 
xolo ceʃmaritebis mokʰmedi natʰlisken midis ratʰa tsʰxadi ɡaxdes misi sakʰmeebi radɡan ɣmertʰʃia kʰmnili 
amis ʃemdeɡ ieso tʰavis motsapʰeebtʰan ertʰad mivida iudeas kʰveqanaʃi ikʰ dartʃa matʰtʰan da natʰlavda 
ioane ki natʰlavda enonʃi salimis maxloblad vinaidan bevri tsqali iqo ikʰ da midiodnen da inatʰlebodnen 
vinaidan ioane dʒer kidev ar iqo sapqrobileʃi tʃaɡdebuli 
maʃin ioanes motsapʰeebsa da iudevelebs ʃoris dava tʃamovarda ɡantsmedis ɡamo 
mividnen ioanestʰan da utʰxres rabi is vintsʰ ʃentʰan iqo iordenes ɡaɣma da viszetsʰ ʃen motsmobdi aha is natʰlavs da qvelani mastʰan midian 
miuɡo ioanem da tʰkʰva adamians arapʰris miɣeba ar ʃeudzlia tʰu zetsʰidan ara akʰvs mitsʰemuli 
tʰkʰven tʰvitʰon damemotsmebitʰ rom vtʰkʰvi me ara var kʰriste aramed movlenili var mis tsin 
visatsʰ satsʰole hqavs is sidzea xolo sidzis meɡobari romelitsʰ dɡas da usmens mas sixarulitʰ xarobs sidzis xmaze es tʃemi sixaruli ukve aɣsrulda 
is unda izrdebodes me ki vmtsʰirdebode 
maɣlidan momavali qvelaze maɣlaa xolo vintsʰ mitsidan aris mitsieria da mitsis ʃesaxeb laparakobs zetsʰidan momavali ki qvelaze maɣlaa 
ratsʰ man ixila da moismina imas motsmobs da mis motsmobas aravin ɣebulobs 
vintsʰ miiɣo misi motsmoba dabecda rom ɣmertʰi ceʃmaritia 
radɡan is vintsʰ ɣmertʰma moavlina ɣvtʰis sitqvebs laparakobs vinaidan ɣmertʰi ɡamozomilad ar idzleva suls 
mamas uqvars dze da qvelapʰeri mas mistsʰa xeltʰ 
visatsʰ dze stsams saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle akʰvs xolo dzis urtʃi ver ixilavs sitsʰotsʰxles aramed ɣvtʰis risxva dartʃeba masze 
rotsʰa ʃeitqo iesom rom pʰarisevlebs ɡaɡebuli hkʰondatʰ ieso upʰro met motsapʰeebs idzens da natʰlavs vidre ioaneo 
tʰumtsʰa natʰlavda ara tʰvitʰ ieso aramed misi motsapʰeebi 
datova iudea da kvlav ɡalileas tsavida 
mas samariaze unda ɡaevlo 
mivida samarieltʰa kʰalakʰʃi sikʰari rom etsodeba im mindvris maxloblad romelitsʰ iakobma mistsʰa tʰavis dzes iosebs 
ikʰ iqo iakobis ca ɡzitʰ dakʰantsʰuli ieso tsqarostʰan tʃamodʒda ase ekʰvsi saatʰi ikʰneboda 
movida kʰali samariidan tsqlis amosaɣebad eubneba mas ieso tsqali damalevine 
radɡan misi motsapʰeebi kʰalakʰʃi iqvnen tsasuli sacmelis saqidlad 
eubneba mas samarieli kʰali roɡor mtʰxov ʃen iudeveli samariel dedakatsʰs damalevineo radɡan iudevelebs ara akʰvtʰ urtʰiertʰoba samarielebtʰan 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra mas ʃen rom itsʰode ras idzleva ɣmertʰi da vin aris is vintsʰ ɡeubneba tsqali damalevineo maʃin ʃen tʰvitʰon stʰxovdi mas da isitsʰ moɡtsʰemda tsʰotsʰxal tsqals 
eubneba mas kʰali batono artsʰ asavsebi curceli ɡakʰvs da es catsʰ ɣrmaa saidan ɡakʰvs tsʰotsʰxali tsqali 
nutʰu ʃen meti xar tʃvens mama iakobze romelmatsʰ es ca moɡvtsʰa da tʰvitʰonatsʰ akʰedan svamda misi ʃvilebitsʰ da misi sakʰonelitsʰ 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra mas qvelas am tsqlis ʃemsmels kvlav mostsqurdeba 
xolo vintsʰ ʃesvams tsqlidan romelsatsʰ me mivtsʰem mas saukunod ar mostsqurdeba radɡan tsqali me rom mivtsʰem masʃi ɡadaikʰtsʰeva tsqlis tsqarod romelitsʰ saukuno sitsʰotsʰxled idinebs 
eubneba mas kʰali batono mometsʰi is tsqali rom aɣar momtsqurdes da aɣartsʰ tsqlis amosaɣebad movide akʰ 
eubneba mas tsadi daudzaxe ʃens kʰmars da modi akʰ 
miuɡo kʰalma da utʰxra me ar mqavs kʰmari eubneba mas ieso martʰali tʰkʰvi kʰmari ara mqavso 
radɡan xutʰi kʰmari ɡqavda da vintsʰ axla ɡqavs artsʰ isaa ʃeni kʰmari martʰali tʰkʰvi 
eubneba mas kʰali batono vxedav rom tsinastsarmetqveli xar 
tʃveni mamebi am mtʰaze stsʰemdnen tʰaqvans tʰkʰven ki ambobtʰ ierusalimʃia adɡili sadatsʰ unda stsʰemdneno tʰaqvans 
eubneba mas ieso kʰalo mertsmune dɡeba ʒami rotsʰa artsʰ am mtʰaze da artsʰ ierusalimʃi tʰaqvans aɣar stsʰemtʰ mamas 
tʰkʰven ar itsʰitʰ ras stsʰemtʰ tʰaqvans tʃven ki vitsʰitʰ ras vtsʰemtʰ tʰaqvans radɡan xsna iudeveltʰaɡanaa 
maɡram dɡeba ʒami da ukve akʰ aris rotsʰa ceʃmariti tʰaqvanismtsʰemelni tʰaqvans stsʰemen mamas sulitʰa da ceʃmaritebitʰ radɡan mamatsʰ stsored asetʰ tʰaqvanismtsʰemlebs edzebs tʰavistʰvis 
ɣmertʰi aris suli da misi tʰaqvanismtsʰemelni tʰaqvans unda stsʰemdnen sulitʰa da ceʃmaritebitʰ 
eubneba mas kʰali vitsʰi rom modis mesia romelsatsʰ hkʰvia kʰriste is rom mova qvelapʰers ɡaɡvitsʰxadebs 
eubneba mas ieso me var vintsʰ ʃen ɡelaparakeba 
am dros movidnen misi motsapʰeebi da ɡaukvirdatʰ rom iɡi kʰaltʰan saubrobda maɡram artsʰ ertʰs ar utʰkʰvams ras edzieb an ras elaparakebio mas 
datova tʰavisi curceli kʰalma da tsavida kʰalakʰʃi da eubneba adamianebs 
tsaditʰ naxetʰ adamiani romelmatsʰ qvelapʰeri mitʰxra ratsʰ ki tʃamidenia is xom ar aris kʰriste 
ɡamovidnen kʰalakʰidan da ɡaemartʰnen misken 
amasobaʃi motsapʰeebma stʰxoves mas da utʰxres rabi came 
man utʰxra matʰ me makʰvs sacmeli romelitsʰ tʰkʰven ar itsʰitʰ 
amitom motsapʰeebma ertʰmanetʰs ɡadaulaparakes nutʰu vinmem moutana mas sacmeli 
eubneba matʰ ieso tʃemi sacmelia vkʰmna tʃemi momavlineblis neba da aɣvasrulo misi sakʰme 
ɡana tʰkʰven ar ambobtʰ rom kidev otʰxi tʰve da dadɡeba mka aha me ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven aaxiletʰ tʰvalebi da ʃexedetʰ qanebs roɡor ɡadatʰetʰrebulan samkalad 
momkeli ɣebulobs tʰavis sazɣaurs da moaɡrovebs naqopʰs saukuno sitsʰotsʰxlisatʰvis ise rom mtʰesveli da momkeli ertʰad ɡaixareben 
amɡvarad ceʃmaritia andaza ertʰi tʰesavs da sxva imkiso 
me tʰkʰven miɡavlentʰ imis mosamkelad razetsʰ ar ɡiʃromiatʰ sxvebma iʃromes tʰkʰven ki matʰ namuʃakevʃi ʃexveditʰ 
bevrma im kʰalakʰʃi mtsʰxovrebma samarielma irtsmuna iɡi im kʰalis sitqvitʰ romelitsʰ amotsmebda qvelapʰeri mitʰxra ratsʰ tʃamideniao 
amitom rotsʰa movidnen mastʰan samarielebi stʰxoves matʰtʰan dartʃeniliqo da iɡi or dɣes dartʃa ikʰ 
kidev mravalma irtsmuna misi sitqvitʰ 
kʰals utʰxres ukve ɡvtsams ara ʃeni natʰkʰvamis ɡamo aramed tʰvitʰon movusminetʰ da vitsʰitʰ rom ceʃaritad is aris sopʰlis mxsneli 
ori dɣe rom ɡavida tsamovida ikʰidan ɡalileaʃi 
radɡan tʰavad ieso motsmobda rom tsinastsarmetqvels tʰavis samʃobloʃi ara akʰvs pativi 
rotsʰa ɡalileaʃi mivida ɡalilevelebma miiɣes iɡi raki qvelapʰeri naxes ratsʰ moimokʰmeda ierusalimʃi dɣesastsaulze radɡan isinitsʰ estsrebodnen dɣesastsauls 
ase rom ieso kvlav mivida ɡalileis kanaʃi sadatsʰ tsqali ɣvinod akʰtsʰia da iqo ikʰ ertʰi mepʰis moxele romelsatsʰ ʃvili hqavda avad kapernaumʃi 
roɡortsʰ ki ɡaiɡo ieso mosula iudeidan ɡalileaʃio mivida mastʰan da ʃeevedra tsahqoloda da ɡanekurna misi ʃvili radɡan sikvdilis piras iqo 
utʰxra iesom mas ar irtsmunebtʰ tʰuki niʃnebsa da sastsaulebs ar ixilavtʰ 
eubneba mas mepʰis moxele upʰalo tsamodi sanam tʃemi bavʃvi ar momkvdara 
eubneba mas ieso tsadi tsʰotsʰxalia ʃeni ʃvili irtsmuna katsʰma ratsʰ iesom utʰxra mas da tsavida 
ʃin rom brundeboda misi msaxurebi mieɡebnen mas da utʰxres rom tsʰotsʰxalia misi vaʒi 
hkitʰxa tʰu romel saatʰze ɡamomdʒobinda utʰxres rom ɡuʃin meʃvide saatʰze ɡauarao sitsʰxem 
amitʰ mixvda mama rom es is saatʰi iqo rotsʰa iesom utʰxra tsʰotsʰxalia ʃeni ʃvili da irtsmuna man da mtʰelma misma saxlma 
es meore sastsauli moaxdina iesom mas ʃemdeɡ ratsʰ iudeidan ɡalileaʃi dabrunda 
amis ʃemdeɡ iudeveltʰa dɣesastsauli iqo da avida ieso ierusalims 
ierusalimʃi tsʰxvris ciʃkartʰan auzia romelsatsʰ ebraulad betʰ xazda etsodeba da xutʰi stoa akʰvs 
ikʰ itsva dzalian bevri sneuli brma xeibari da tʃamomxmari romlebitsʰ tsqlis amɣvrevas elodnen 
radɡan upʰlis anɡelozi tʃamodioda drodadro auzʃi da amɣvrevda tsqals xolo mas ʃemdeɡ ratsʰ tsqali aimɣvreoda vintsʰ pirveli tʃavidoda ɡanikurneboda ra senitʰatsʰ ar unda qopʰiliqo ʃepqrobili 
akʰ iqo katsʰi romelitsʰ otsʰdatʰvrameti tseli itandʒeboda tʰavisi senitʰ 
iesom ixila iɡi mtsolare da ʃeatqo rom ukve didi xania sneulia da utʰxra ɡinda ɡanikurno 
miuɡo mas sneulma upʰalo katsʰi ara mqavs tsqlis ʃemɣvrevisas rom tʃamiʃvas auzʃi manam me mival sxva mastsrebs 
eubneba mas ieso adekʰi aiɣe ʃeni saretsʰeli da ɡaiare 
da maʃinve ɡadʒansaɣda es katsʰi aiɣo tʰavisi saretsʰeli da ɡaiara im dɣes ʃabatʰi iqo 
utʰxres iudevelebma ɡankurnebuls dɣes ʃabatʰia neba ara ɡakʰvs saretsʰlis aɣebisa 
man miuɡo matʰ vintsʰ ɡanmkurna man mitʰxra aiɣe ʃeni saretsʰeli da ɡaiareo 
hkitʰxes mas vin aris is katsʰi vintsʰ ɡitʰxra aiɣe da ɡaiareo 
ɡankurnebulma ar itsʰoda vin iqo iɡi radɡan ieso im adɡilas mqopʰ brbos ʃeeria 
amis ʃemdeɡ ieso tadzarʃi ʃexvda mas da utʰxra aha ʃen ɡadʒansaɣdi nuɣar ʃestsʰodav ratʰa rame uaresi ar daɡemartʰos 
is katsʰi tsavida da iudevelebs utʰxra rom iesoa misi ɡanmkurnebeli 
iudevelebma devna dautsqes iesos imis ɡamo rom ʃabatʰs asetʰi ram ɡaaketʰa 
iesom miuɡo matʰ mamatʃemi akʰamde ase aketʰebs da metsʰ vaketʰeb 
amitom iudevelebma upʰro metad dautsqes dzebna mosaklavad radɡan ara marto ʃabatʰs texda aramed ɣmertʰs sakutʰar mamad ixsenebda da tʰavs ɣmertʰs utolebda 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven dze tʰvitʰon verapʰers ɡaaketʰebs rom ar exilos rasatsʰ mama aketʰebs radɡan rasatsʰ is aketʰebs dzetsʰ imasve aketʰebs 
radɡan mamas uqvars dze da rasatsʰ aketʰebs qvelapʰers utʃvenebs mas amaze upʰro did sakʰmeebsatsʰ atʃvenebs isetʰebs rom ɡaɡikvirdebatʰ 
radɡan roɡortsʰ mama aɣadɡens mkvdrebs da atsʰotsʰxlebs aseve dzetsʰ atsʰotsʰxlebs mas visi ɡatsʰotsʰxlebatsʰ surs 
radɡan mama aravis ɡanikitʰxavs aramed mtʰeli ɡankitʰxva dzes ɡadastsʰa 
ratʰa qvelam stsʰes pativi dzes roɡortsʰ mamas stsʰemen pativs vintsʰ dzes ar stsʰems pativs is artsʰ mamasa stsʰems pativs mis momavlinebels 
ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven vintsʰ tʃems sitqvebs ismens da tʃemi momavlinebeli stsams mas akʰvs saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle da ɡankitʰxvaze ar midis aramed ukve sikvdilidan sitsʰotsʰxleʃi ɡadavida 
ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven modis ʒami da ukve aris axla rotsʰa mkvdrebi moismenen ɣvtʰis dzis xmas da vintsʰ mas moismenen itsʰotsʰxleben 
radɡan roɡortsʰ mamas akʰvs sitsʰotsʰxle tʰavis tʰavʃi aseve dzesatsʰ mistsʰa ratʰa hkʰondes sitsʰotsʰxle tʰavis tʰavʃi 
samartʰlis ɡatʃenaʃitsʰ xelmtsipʰeba mistsʰa mas radɡan katsʰis dze aris iɡi 
nu ɡaikvirvebtʰ amas radɡan modis ʒami rotsʰa qvelani vintsʰ samarxebʃi arian mis xmas moismenen 
ketʰilis mkʰnelni sitsʰotsʰxlis aɣdɡomistʰvis ɡamovlen siavis mokʰmedni ki ɡankitʰxvis aɣdɡomistʰvis 
tʃemtʰavad arapʰris ɡaketʰeba ar ʃemidzlia roɡortsʰ vismen ise ɡanvikitʰxav da tʃemeuli ɡankitʰxva samartʰliania radɡan me tʃems nebas ar vedzeb aramed tʃemi momavlineblis nebas 
tʰu me vmotsmob tʃems tʰavze tʃemi motsmoba araa ceʃmariti 
sxva aris dammotsmebeli tʃemze da vitsʰi rom ceʃmaritia is motsmoba romlitʰatsʰ is amotsmebs tʃemze 
tʰkʰven ɡaɡzavnetʰ ioanestʰan da man daamotsma ceʃmariteba 
tʰumtsʰa adamianisɡan ar viɣeb motsmobas maɡram amas imitom vambob rom tʰkʰven ɡadartʃetʰ 
iɡi antʰebuli da manatʰobeli santʰeli iqo da tʰkʰven ɡindodatʰ ɡexaratʰ ertʰxans mis natʰelʃi 
me ki makʰvs upʰro didi motsmoba vidre ioanesia radɡan sakʰmeni romelnitsʰ mamam momtsʰa aɣsasruleblad tʰvitʰ tʃems mier ɡaketʰebuli sakʰmeni motsmoben tʃemze rom mamam momavlina 
da mama romelmatsʰ me momavlina motsmobda tʃemze tʰkʰven ki arasodes moɡismeniatʰ misi xma da artsʰ xati ɡixilavtʰ misi 
misi sitqva ara ɡakʰvtʰ ʃetsqnarebuli radɡan ara ɡtsamtʰ misi romelitsʰ man moavlina 
ikvlevtʰ tserilebs radɡan ɡɡoniatʰ rom matʰʃi ɡakʰvtʰ saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle isini ki tʃemze motsmoben 
tʰkʰven ki ar ɡsurtʰ tʃemtʰan mosvla rom sitsʰotsʰxle ɡkʰondetʰ 
didebas ar vɣebulob katsʰtʰaɡan 
maɡram me ɡitsʰnobtʰ tʰkʰven ɣvtʰis siqvaruli ar aris tʰkʰvenʃi 
me movedi mamatʃemis saxelitʰ da ar mɣebulobtʰ sxva vinme tʰu mova tʰavisi saxelitʰ mas miiɣebtʰ 
roɡor ʃeɡidzliatʰ irtsmunotʰ rotsʰa ertʰimeorisaɡan ɣebulobtʰ didebas xolo didebas ertʰadertʰi ɣvtʰisaɡan ar edzebtʰ 
nu ɡɡoniatʰ rom mamis tsinaʃe me daɡdebtʰ brals tʰkʰveni bralmdebeli mosea visi imeditsʰa ɡakʰvtʰ 
radɡan tʰkʰven rom mosesi ɡtsamdetʰ metsʰ mitsamebditʰ vinaidan man tʃemze datsera 
xolo tʰu misi datserilisa ar ɡtsamtʰ roɡor itsamebtʰ tʃems sitqvebs 
amis ʃemdeɡ ɡavida ieso ɡalileis anu tiberiis zɣvis ɡaɣma 
uamravi xalxi mihqveboda radɡan ixiles sastsaulebi romlebsatsʰ is axdenda sneulebze 
avida mtʰaze ieso da dadʒda ikʰ tʰavis motsapʰeebtʰan ertʰad 
axlovdeboda pasekʰi iudeveltʰa dɣesastsauli 
iesom ɡaixeda da dainaxa rom uamravi xalxi modioda misken da eubneba pʰilipes sad viqidotʰ puri amatʰ rom vacamotʰ 
amas ɡamosatsʰdelad eubneboda tʰorem tʰavad ki itsʰoda rasatsʰ moikʰmedebda 
miuɡo mas pʰilipem orasi dinaris puritsʰ ar eqopʰatʰ rom tʰitʰoeul matʰɡans tsʰotaodeni maintsʰ erɡos 
eubneba mas ertʰi misi motsapʰetʰaɡani andria simon petres dzma 
akʰ aris ertʰi bici romelsatsʰ xutʰi kʰeris puri da ori tʰevzi akʰvs maɡram amden xalxs es ras eqopʰa 
tʰkʰva iesom utʰxaritʰ xalxs dasxdnen xolo im adɡilze xʃiri balaxi iqo ritsʰxvitʰ xutʰi atʰasamde katsʰi dadʒda 
aiɣo purebi iesom madli ʃestsira da tʃamouriɡa motsapʰeebs motsapʰeebma ki ikʰ msxdomtʰ aseve tʰevzitsʰ visatsʰ ramdeni undoda 
rotsʰa danaqrədnen utʰxra tʰavis motsapʰeebs moaɡrovetʰ namusrevi rom arapʰeri ar daikarɡos 
moaɡroves da aavses tʰormeti ɡodori im xutʰi kʰeris puris namusrevitʰ ratsʰ camis ʃemdeɡ dartʃa 
maʃin iesos mier moxdenili sastsaulis mxilvelma xalxma tʰkʰva esaa ceʃmaritad is tsinastsarmetqveli romelitsʰ sopʰelʃi unda mosuliqo 
iesom itsʰoda rom apireben mosvlas mis mosatatsʰeblad ratʰa ɡaemepʰebinatʰ iɡi da kvlav ɡanmartovda mtʰaze 
rotsʰa mosaɣamovda tʃavidnen misi motsapʰeebi zɣvaze 
avidnen navze da ɡaemartʰnen zɣvis ɡaɣma kapernaumisken ukve tʃamobnelebuli iqo ieso ki dʒeratsʰ ar misuliqo matʰtʰan 
dzlierma kʰarma daubera da zɣva aɣelda 
otsʰdaxutʰi tʰu otsʰdaatʰi stadioni rom ɡatsʰures dainaxes zɣvaze momavali ieso romelitsʰ navs uaxlovdeboda da ʃeeʃindatʰ 
is ki eubneba matʰ me var nu ɡeʃiniatʰ 
undodatʰ navze aeqvanatʰ iɡi da navi maʃinve im kʰveqanaʃi ɡatʃnda sadatsʰ midiodnen 
meore dɣes zɣvis ɡaɣma mdɡomma xalxma dainaxa rom ikʰ sxva navi ar iqo ɡarda ertʰisa romelʃitsʰ misi motsapʰeebi tʃasxdnen da rom artsʰ ieso tʃamdʒdara navʃi tʰavis motsapʰeebtʰan ertʰad aramed mxolod motsapʰeebma ɡatsʰures 
sxva navebitsʰ movida tiberiidan im adɡilis maxloblad sadatsʰ cames puri mas ʃemdeɡ ratsʰ upʰalma madli ʃestsira 
rotsʰa dainaxa xalxma rom ikʰ artsʰ iesoa da artsʰ misi motsapʰeebi tʃasxdnen navebʃi da mividnen kapernaums iesos sadzebrad 
da naxes iɡi zɣvis ɡaɣma da utʰxres mas rabi rodis moxvedi akʰ 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven imitom ki ar medzebtʰ me rom sastsauli ixiletʰ aramed imis ɡamo rom puri cametʰ da ɡadzexitʰ 
nu irdʒebitʰ xrətsnadi sazrdosatʰvis aramed im sazrdosatʰvis ɡaisardʒetʰ romelitsʰ rtʃeba saukuno sitsʰotsʰxlisatʰvis romelsatsʰ dze katsʰisa moɡtsʰemtʰ tʰkʰven radɡan mas daasva becedi mama ɣmertʰma 
utʰxres mas roɡor movikʰtsʰetʰ rom ɣvtʰis sakʰmeni vaketʰotʰ 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ ɣvtʰis sakʰme is aris rom irtsmunotʰ iɡi romelitsʰ man moavlina 
utʰxres mas ra niʃans idzlevi rom davinaxotʰ da ɡertsmunotʰ ras moimokʰmedeb 
tʃveni mamebi mananas camdnen udabnoʃi roɡortsʰ datserilia puri zetsʰidan mistsʰa matʰ sazrdod 
utʰxra matʰ iesom ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven mosem ki ar moɡtsʰatʰ puri zetsʰidan aramed tʃemi mama ɡadzlevtʰ ceʃmarit purs zetsʰidan 
radɡan ɣvtʰis puri isaa romelitsʰ zetsʰidan tʃamodis da sitsʰotsʰxles adzlevs sopʰels 
utʰxres mas upʰalo mudam ɡvadzlie es puri 
utʰxra matʰ iesom me var puri sitsʰotsʰxlisa tʃemtʰan momsvlels ar moʃivdeba da tʃems mortsmunes arasodes mostsqurdeba 
me ki ɡitʰxaritʰ rom kidevatsʰ mixilavtʰ maɡram ar itsamebtʰ 
qvelapʰeri rasatsʰ mama madzlevs tʃemtʰan mova tʃemtʰan mosuls ɡaretʰ ar ɡavadzeveb 
radɡan zetsʰidan tʃemi nebis aɣsasruleblad ki ar tʃamovedi aramed misi nebisa vintsʰ me momavlina 
es aris neba imisi vintsʰ me momavlina ratʰa ratsʰ momtsʰa arapʰeri damekarɡos aramed aɣvadɡino ukanasknel dɣes 
tʃemi mamis neba isaa rom qvelas vintsʰ dzes ixilavs da irtsmunebs saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle hkʰondes da me aɣvadɡen mas ukanasknel dɣes 
iudevlebi drətvinavdnen mis ɡamo radɡan tʰkʰva me var puri zetsʰidan tʃamosuli 
tʰkʰves es ieso ar aris iosebis dze romlis mamas da dedas vitsʰnobtʰ roɡorɣa ambobs zetsʰidan tʃamovedio 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ nu drətvinavtʰ ertʰmanetʰs ʃoris 
aravis ʃeudzlia tʃemtʰan mosvla tʰu iɡi mamam tʃemma momavlinebelma ar moiqvana da me aɣvadɡen mas ukanasknel dɣes 
tsinastsarmetqvelebs utseriatʰ qvela ɡanistsavleba ɣvtʰis mier qvela vintsʰ usmens mamas da stsavlobs tʃemtʰan modis 
ise ki araa tʰitʰkʰos qvelas exilos mama vintsʰ ɣvtʰisɡanaa mxolod man ixila mama 
ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven visatsʰ tʃemi stsams mas saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle akʰvs 
me var puri sitsʰotsʰxlisa 
tʰkʰvenma mamebma cames manana udabnoʃi da daixotsʰnen 
es aris puri zetsʰidan ɡadmomavali rom katsʰma ʃecamos iɡi da ar mokvdes 
me tsʰotsʰxali puri var zetsʰidan ɡadmomavali vintsʰ am purs ʃecams saukunod itsʰotsʰxlebs puri romelsatsʰ ɡavtsʰem tʃemi xortsʰia romelsatsʰ sopʰlis sitsʰotsʰxlisatʰvis ɡavtsʰem 
iudevelebma daitsqes kamatʰi ertʰmanetʰʃi da ambobdnen roɡor ʃeudzlia tʰavisi xortsʰi moɡvtsʰes sacmelad 
utʰxra matʰ iesom ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tʰu ar ʃecamtʰ katsʰis dzis xortsʰs da ar ʃesvamtʰ mis sisxls ar ɡekʰnebatʰ sitsʰotsʰxle tʰkʰvenʃi 
tʃemi xortsʰis mcamels da tʃemi sisxlis ʃemsmels saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle akʰvs da me mas aɣvadɡen ukanasknel dɣes 
radɡan tʃemi xortsʰi ceʃmariti sacmelia da tʃemi sisxli ceʃmariti sasmeli 
tʃemi xortsʰis mcameli da tʃemi sisxlis ʃemsmeli tʃemʃi rtʃeba da me masʃi 
roɡortsʰ me momavlina tsʰotsʰxalma mamam da me mamaʃi vtsʰotsʰxlob aseve tʃemi mcameli itsʰotsʰxlebs tʃemʃi 
es aris tsʰidan tʃamosuli puri isetʰi ki ara tʰkʰvenma mamebma rom cames manana da daixotsʰnen am puris mcameli saukunod itsʰotsʰxlebs 
amas ambobda sinaɡoɡaʃi rotsʰa kapernaumʃi astsavlida 
bevri misi motsapʰetʰaɡani amis mosmenisas ambobda mdzime sitqvaa vis ʃeudzlia amis mosmena 
iesom itsʰoda rom misi motsapʰeebi buzɣunebdnen tʰavistʰvis amis ɡamo da utʰxra matʰ es ɡatsʰdunebtʰ tʰkʰven 
tʰu ixilavtʰ katsʰis dzes ikʰ aɣmavals sadatsʰ tsinatʰ iqo 
suli tsʰxovelmqopʰelia xolo xortsʰi usarɡeblo sitqvebi romlebitsʰ ɡitʰxaritʰ suli da sitsʰotsʰxlea 
maɡram tʰkʰven ʃoris arian isetʰebitsʰ romeltʰatsʰ ar stsamtʰ radɡan iesom tʰavidanve itsʰoda vin arian urtsmunoni da vin aris misi ɡamtsʰemi 
da tʰkʰva amitom ɡeubneboditʰ rom tʃemtʰan aravis ʃeudzlia mosvla tʰu mamisɡan ar ekʰneba mitsʰemuli 
amis ʃemdeɡ bevri misi motsapʰetʰaɡani ɡabrunda ukan da aɣar misdevda mas 
maʃin utʰxra iesom tʰormets tʰkʰventsʰ xom ar ɡindatʰ tsasvla 
miuɡo mas simon petrem upʰalo vistʰan unda tsavidetʰ saukuno sitsʰotsʰxlis sitqvebi ʃena ɡakʰvs 
tʃven vitsametʰ da ʃevitsʰanitʰ rom ʃen xar kʰriste ɣvtʰis tsmida 
miuɡo matʰ iesom tʰormeti ar aɡirtʃietʰ ertʰi tʰkʰvenɡani eʃmakia 
tʰkʰva iuda simonis dzeze iskariotelze radɡan iɡi ertʰi tʰormettʰaɡani apirebda mis ɡatsʰemas 
amis ʃemdeɡ ieso ɡalileaʃi mimodioda radɡan iudeaʃi ar surda siaruli raki iudevelni mosaklavad daedzebdnen 
axlovdeboda iudeveltʰa dɣesastsauli karvoba 
utʰxres mas misma dzmebma tsadi akʰedan da midi iudeaʃi ratʰa ʃenma motsapʰeebmatsʰ ixilon ʃeni sakʰmeebi romeltʰatsʰ aketʰeb 
radɡan pʰarulad aravin arapʰers aketʰebs aramed tʰavis ɡamotʃenas edzebs raki asetʰ sakʰmeebs aketʰeb ɡamoetsʰxade sopʰels 
radɡan mis dzmebsatsʰ ki ar stsamdatʰ misi 
eubneba matʰ ieso tʃemi ʒami dʒer ar damdɡara tʰkʰveni dro ki mudam motseulia 
sopʰels ar ʃeudzlia tʰkʰveni ʃedzuleba me ki vdzulvar imis ɡamo rom me vamotsmeb masze rom misi sakʰmeebi borotia 
tʰkʰven aditʰ dɣesastsaulze me ki ar aval am dɣesastsaulze radɡan tʃemi ʒami dʒer ar aɣsrulebula 
es rom utʰxra dartʃa ɡalileaʃi 
maɡram rotsʰa misi dzmebi dɣesastsaulze avidnen maʃin tʰvitʰonatsʰ avida mxolod ara ɡatsʰxadebulad aramed pʰarulad 
iudevelni ki edzebdnen mas dɣesastsaulze da ambobdnen sad ariso 
xalxʃi bevri mitʰkʰma motʰkʰma iqo masze ertʰni ambobdnen ketʰiliao meoreni ambobdnen ara xalxs atsʰdunebso 
oɣond tsʰxadad aravin ar laparakobda masze radɡan iudevelebisa eʃinodatʰ 
ukve ʃua dɣesastsaulze avida ieso tadzarʃi da astsavlida 
ɡaukvirdatʰ iudevelebs da tʰkʰves roɡor itsʰis tserilebi ustsavlelado 
miuɡo matʰ iesom da tʰkʰva tʃemi modzɣvreba tʃemi araa aramed misia vintsʰ me momavlina 
visatsʰ surs aɣasrulos misi neba iɡi ɡaiɡebs am modzɣvrebis ʃesaxeb ɣvtʰisɡanaa tʰu tʃemitʰ vlaparakob 
vintsʰ tʰavisitʰ laparakobs sakutʰar didebas edzebs xolo vintsʰ edzebs imis didebas vintsʰ iɡi moavlina ceʃmaritia da usamartʰloba ar aris masʃi 
ɡana mosem ar moɡtsʰatʰ rdʒuli maɡram artsʰ ertʰi tʰkʰvenɡani ar asrulebs rdʒuls ratom medzebtʰ mosaklavad 
miuɡo xalxma eʃmakia ʃenʃi vin ɡedzebs mosaklavad 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra matʰ ertʰi sakʰme ɡavaketʰe da qvelas ɡikvirtʰ 
mosem moɡtsʰatʰ tsinadatsʰvetʰa tʰumtsʰa iɡi mosesɡan ki ara mamebisɡanaa da ʃabatʰobitʰ tsinadatsʰvetʰtʰ adamians 
tʰu adamiani tsinadatsʰvetʰas miiɣebs ʃabatʰs ratʰa moses rdʒuli ar dairɣves me raɣad mrisxavtʰ imis ɡamo rom mtʰeli xalxi ɡanvkurne ʃabatʰs 
nu ɡanikitʰxavtʰ ɡareɡnobitʰ aramed samartʰliani ɡankitʰxvitʰ ɡanikitʰxetʰ 
tʰkʰves zoɡiertʰebma ierusalimeltʰaɡan es is araa mosaklavad rom edzeben 
aha aʃkarad laparakobs da verapʰers eubnebian xom ar dartsmundnen mtʰavrebi rom iɡi namdvilad kʰristea 
maɡram tʃven xom vitsʰitʰ saidanatsʰaa iɡi xolo kʰriste rom mova aravis etsʰodineba saidan aris 
ʃesdzaxa iesom tadzarʃi stsavlebisas da tʰkʰva me mitsʰnobtʰ da itsʰitʰ saidan var tʃemitʰ ar movsulvar maɡram ceʃmaritia tʃemi momavlinebeli romelsatsʰ tʰkʰven ar itsʰnobtʰ 
me vitsʰnob mas radɡan misɡan var da man momavlina 
tsʰdilobdnen mis ʃepqrobas maɡram xeli veravin daado mas radɡan misi ʒami ar damdɡariqo 
xalxidan bevri ertsmuna mas da tʰkʰves rotsʰa kʰriste mova ɡana iɡi imaze met sastsaulebs moaxdens ratsʰ aman moaxdina 
moismines pʰarisevlebma xalxis asetʰi mitʰkʰma motʰkʰma masze da msaxurebi ɡaɡzavnes mis ʃesapqrobad mɣvdelmtʰavrebma da pʰarisevlebma 
tʰkʰva iesom me kidev mtsʰire xans var tʰkʰventʰan da tsaval tʃems momavlinebeltʰan 
dzebnas damitsqebtʰ da ver mipovitʰ sadatsʰ me vikʰnebi ikʰ ver moxvaltʰ 
utʰxres ertʰmanetʰs iudevelebma sad unda tsavides rom ver vipovotʰ berdznetʰa ʃoris ɡantʰesilebtʰan xom ar tsava da berdznebs xom ar dautsqebs stsavlas 
es ra sitqvaa romelitsʰ tʰkʰva dzebnas damitsqebtʰ da ver mipovitʰ sadatsʰ me vikʰnebi ikʰ ver moxvaltʰo 
dɣesastsaulis ukanasknel did dɣes adɡa ieso ʃesdzaxa da tʰkʰva tʰu vinmes stsquria tʃemtʰan movides da ʃesvas 
visatsʰ tʃemi stsams roɡortsʰ tserili ambobs misi tsiaɣidan idineben tsʰotsʰxali tsqlis mdinareebi 
es man im sulze tʰkʰva mis mortsmuneebs rom unda mieɣotʰ radɡan dʒer kidev ar iqo motsʰemuli suli raki ieso dʒer ɡandidebuli ar iqo 
xalxidan bevrma am sitqvebis ɡaɡonebaze tʰkʰva es ceʃmaritad tsinastsarmetqvelia 
sxvebma tʰkʰves es kʰristea sxvebi ambobdnen ɡana ɡalileidan mova kʰriste 
ɡana tserili ar ambobs rom kʰriste davitʰis modɡmidan mova betʰlemidan im dabidan saidanatsʰ davitʰi iqo 
da tʃamovarda xalxʃi ɡanxetʰkʰileba mis ɡamo 
zoɡiertʰ matʰɡans misi ʃepqroba undoda maɡram xeli veravin daakara 
mividnen msaxurni mɣvdelmtʰavrebtʰan da pʰarisevlebtʰan da matʰ utʰxres ratom ar moiqvanetʰ iɡi 
miuɡes msaxurebma arasodes katsʰs ise ar ulaparakia roɡortsʰ es katsʰi laparakobs 
miuɡes matʰ pʰarisevlebma nutʰu tʰkʰventsʰ ɡatsʰdunatʰ 
nutʰu mtʰavartʰaɡan an pʰariseveltʰaɡan vinmem itsama iɡi 
maɡram es xalxi rdʒulis umetsʰari datsqevlilia 
eubneba matʰ nikodemosi romelitsʰ ɣamitʰ mivida mastʰan da ertʰi imatʰtʰaɡani iqo 
ɡana ɡanikitʰxavs tʃveni rdʒuli adamians tʰu tsinastsar ar mousmina da ar ɡaiɡo ratsʰ man tʃaidina 
miuɡes da utʰxres mas ʃentsʰ ɡalileidan ara xar ɡamoikvlie da naxe rom ɡalileidan tsinastsarmetqveli ar aɣdɡeba 
qvelani tʰav tʰaviantʰ saxlebʃi tsavidnen 
ieso tsavida zetʰisxilis mtʰisken 
dilitʰ ki ʃebrunda tadzarʃi mtʰeli xalxi mastʰan mivida da mdʒdomare astsavlida matʰ 
moiqvanes mtsiɡnobrebma da pʰarisevlebma kʰali romlistʰvisatsʰ mruʃobaze tsaestsrotʰ da ʃuaʃi tʃaaqenes 
eubnebian mas modzɣvaro es kʰali mruʃobazea tsastsrebuli 
mosem ki rdʒulʃi mtsʰnebad daɡvido asetʰebis tʃakʰolva ʃen ras itqvi 
amas ɡamosatsʰdelad eubnebodnen ratʰa misi satsinaaɣmdeɡo braldeba hkʰonodatʰ maɡram ieso daixara da mitsaze tʰitʰitʰ tserda 
rom ar moeʃvnen ʃemkitʰxvelni ɡastsorda da utʰxra matʰ vintsʰ tʰkʰvens ʃoris utsʰodvelia pirvelad man dahkras kʰva 
kvlav daixara da ɡanaɡrdzo tsera mitsaze 
es rom moismines uxutsʰesebidan moqolebuli satʰitʰaod ɡaikribnen sindismxilebulni da dartʃa marto ieso da ʃuaʃi mdɡomi kʰali 
tsamoimartʰa ieso veravin dainaxa im kʰalis meti da utʰxra mas kʰalo sad arian ʃeni bralmdebelni aravin daɡdo msdʒavri 
utʰxra man aravin upʰalo utʰxra iesom artsʰ me ɡdeb msdʒavrs tsadi da amieridan nuɣar ʃestsʰodav 
kvlav elaparaka matʰ ieso da utʰxra me var natʰeli sopʰlisa vintsʰ tsamomqveba bnelʃi aɣar ivlis aramed sitsʰotsʰxlis natʰeli ekʰneba mas 
utʰxres mas pʰarisevlebma ʃen tʰvitʰon motsmob ʃens tʰavze ʃeni motsmoba araa ceʃmariti 
miuɡo iesom matʰ da utʰxra me tʰu tʃems tʰavze vmotsmob tʃemi motsmoba ceʃmaritia radɡan vitsʰi saidan movedi da sad mivdivar tʰkʰven ki ar itsʰitʰ saidan movedi da sad mivdivar 
tʰkʰven xortsʰis mixedvitʰ ɡanikitʰxavtʰ me ki aravis ar ɡanvikitʰxav 
me tʰu ɡanvikitʰxav tʃemeuli ɡankitʰxva ceʃmaritia radɡan me marto ki ar var aramed me da mama tʃemi momavlinebeli 
tʰkʰvens rdʒulʃitsʰ stseria rom ori adamianis motsmoba ceʃmaritia 
me tʃems tʰavze vmotsmob da tʃemzeve motsmobs mama tʃemi momavlinebeli 
utʰxres mas sad aris ʃeni mama utʰxra matʰ iesom artsʰ me mitsʰnobtʰ artsʰ tʃems mamas me rom mitsʰnobdetʰ tʃemi mamatsʰ ɡetsʰnobebodatʰ 
es sitqvebi tsarmotʰkʰva iesom saɡandzurtʰan rotsʰa tadzarʃi astsavlida veravin ʃeipqro iɡi radɡan dʒer ar mosuliqo misi ʒami 
kvlav utʰxra matʰ iesom me mivdivar da tʰkʰven dzebnas damitsqebtʰ maɡram tʰkʰvens tsʰodvaʃi daixotsʰebitʰ sadatsʰ mivdivar tʰkʰven ver moxvaltʰ 
tʰkʰves iudevelebma tʰavi xom ar unda moiklas rom ambobs sadatsʰ me mivdivar tʰkʰven ver ʃedzlebtʰ mosvlaso 
utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰven kʰvemodan xartʰ me ki maɣlidan var tʰkʰven sopʰlisani xartʰ me ki sopʰlisa ara var 
amitom ɡitʰxaritʰ tʰkʰvens tsʰodvebʃi daixotsʰebitʰ metʰkʰi radɡan tʰu ar itsamebtʰ rom me var tʰkʰvensave tsʰodvebʃi daixotsʰebitʰ 
utʰxres mas vin xar ʃen utʰxra matʰ iesom tʰavidanve ɡitʰxaritʰ da axlatsʰ ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven 
bevri makʰvs tʰkʰvenze salaparako da ɡansakitʰxveli maɡram vintsʰ me momavlina ceʃmaritia da ratsʰ misɡan movismine imas vlaparakob sopʰelze 
ver mixvdnen rom mamaze eubneboda matʰ 
utʰxra matʰ iesom rotsʰa aamaɣlebtʰ katsʰis dzes maʃin ɡaiɡebtʰ rom es me var da arapʰers vaketʰeb tʃemitʰ aramed ratsʰ mamam mastsavla imas vlaparakob 
vintsʰ me momavlina tʃemtʰanaa marto ar damtova radɡan mudam imas vaketʰeb ratsʰ mistʰvis aris mosatsoni 
rotsʰa amas ambobda bevrma irtsmuna iɡi 
utʰxra iesom im iudevelebs romlebitsʰ ertsmunen mas tʰu tʃems sitqvaʃi dartʃebitʰ ceʃmaritad tʃemi motsapʰeebi xartʰ 
ʃeitsʰnobtʰ ceʃmaritebas da ceʃmariteba ɡaɡatʰavisupʰlebtʰ tʰkʰven 
miuɡes mas tʃven abraamis ʃtʰamomavalni vartʰ da arasodes aravisi monebi ar vqopʰilvartʰ roɡorɣa ambob tʰavisupʰlebi ɡaxdebitʰo 
miuɡo matʰ iesom ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven qvela tsʰodvis tʃamdeni tsʰodvis monaa 
maɡram mona ar rtʃeba saxlʃi saukunod dze rtʃeba saukunod 
tʰu dze ɡaɡatʰavisupʰlebtʰ namdvilad tʰavisupʰlebi ikʰnebitʰ 
vitsʰi rom abraamis ʃtʰamomavalni xartʰ maɡram tʃems mokvlas tsʰdilobtʰ radɡan tʃemi sitqva ver eteva tʰkʰvenʃi 
me imas vlaparakob ratsʰ tʃems mamastʰan vnaxe tʰkʰven ki aketʰebtʰ imas ratsʰ tʰkʰveni mamisaɡan moisminetʰ 
miuɡes da utʰxres mas tʃveni mama abraamia utʰxra matʰ iesom tʰkʰven rom abraamis ʃvilebi iqotʰ abraamis sakʰmeebs ɡaaketʰebditʰ 
axla ki tʃems mokvlas edzebtʰ katsʰisas romelmatsʰ ɡitʰxaritʰ ceʃmariteba ratsʰ ɣvtʰisaɡan movismine abraams asetʰi ram ar ɡauketʰebia 
tʰkʰven mamatʰkʰvenis sakʰmeebs aketʰebtʰ utʰxres mas tʃven sidzvitʰ ʃobilni rodi vartʰ tʃven ertʰi mama ɡvqavs ɣmertʰi 
utʰxra matʰ iesom ɣmertʰi rom mama iqos tʰkʰveni maʃin me ɡeqvareboditʰ radɡan me ɡamovedi da movedi ɣvtʰisɡan vinaidan me tʃemitʰ ki ar movsulvar aramed man momavlina 
ratom ver iɡebtʰ tʃems natʰkʰvams imitom rom ar ʃeɡidzliatʰ moisminotʰ tʃemi sitqva 
tʰkʰveni mama aris eʃmaki da mamatʰkʰvenis ɡulistʰkʰmis ʃesruleba ɡtsadiatʰ is katsʰis mkvleli iqo tʰavidan da ceʃmaritebaʃi ver dadɡa radɡan araa masʃi ceʃmariteba rotsʰa sitsʰrues ambobs tʰavisas ambobs radɡan tsʰrua iɡi da sitsʰruis mamaa 
xolo raki me ceʃmaritebas vlaparakob ara ɡtsamtʰ tʃemi 
romeli tʰkʰvenɡani mamxilebs tsʰodvis ɡamo da tʰu ceʃmaritebas vambob ratom ara ɡtsamtʰ tʃemi 
vintsʰ ɣvtʰisɡanaa ɣvtʰis sitqvebs ismens tʰkʰven imitom ar ismentʰ rom ɣvtʰisɡan ara xartʰ 
maʃin miuɡes iudevelebma da utʰxres mas ɡana karɡad ar vambobtʰ rom ʃen samarieli xar da eʃmakia ʃenʃi 
miuɡo iesom tʃemʃi ar aris eʃmaki aramed me pativs vtsʰem tʃems mamas tʰkʰven ki upatiomqobtʰ me 
tʰumtsʰa me ar vedzeb tʃems didebas aris mdzebneli da ɡanmkitʰxveli 
ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven vintsʰ tʃems sitqvas inaxavs iɡi ar ixilavs sikvdils ukunisamde 
utʰxres mas iudevelebma axla ki mivxvditʰ rom eʃmaki ɡqavs abraami da tsinastsarmetqvelni daixotsʰnen ʃen ki ambob vintsʰ tʃems sitqvas inaxavs ar iɡemebso sikvdils ukunisamde 
ɡana ʃen tʃvens mama abraamze didi xar romelitsʰ mokvda tsinastsarmetqvelnitsʰ daixotsʰnen ra ɡɡonia ʃeni tʰavi 
miuɡo iesom me tʰu tʃems tʰavs ɡanvadideb tʃemi dideba arapʰeria me ɡanmadidebs tʃemi mama viszetsʰ ambobtʰ tʃveni ɣmertʰi ariso 
tʰkʰven is ver ʃeitsʰanitʰ me ki vitsʰnob mas tʰu vitqvi rom ar vitsʰnob mas tʰkʰvenistʰana tsʰru vikʰnebi maɡram vitsʰnob mas da vinaxav mis sitqvas 
abraams mamatʰkʰvens uxaroda rom ixilavda tʃems dɣes ixila da ɡaixara 
utʰxres mas iudevelebma dʒer ormotsʰdaatʰi tslisatsʰ ara xar da abraami ɡinaxavs 
utʰxra matʰ iesom ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven sanam abraami ikʰneboda me var 
maʃin aiɣes kʰvebi mis tʃasakʰolad maɡram ieso tʰvals miepʰara da ɡavida tadzridan 
mimavalma dainaxa katsʰi dabadebidan brma 
da ʃeekitʰxnen motsapʰeebi rabi vin ʃestsʰoda man tʰu misma mʃoblebma brma rom daibada 
miuɡo iesom artsʰ mas ʃeutsʰodavs da artsʰ mis mʃoblebs aramed ratʰa ɣvtʰis sakʰmeni ɡamotsʰxaddes masʃi 
tʃven unda vaketʰotʰ imisi sakʰmeebi vintsʰ me momavlina sanam dɣea modis ɣame rotsʰa veɣaravin ʃedzlebs ketʰebas 
sanam sopʰelʃi var sopʰlis natʰeli var 
es rom tʰkʰva mitsaze daanertsqva nertsqvitʰ talaxi mozila da tʰvalebze tsausva brmas 
utʰxra mas tsadi da moibane ʃiloaxis sabanelʃi ratsʰ niʃnavs movlinebuls tsavida moibana da movida tʰvalaxelili 
mezoblebma da matʰ visatsʰ adre enaxatʰ rom matʰxovari iqo tʰkʰves es is ar aris rom idʒda da matʰxovrobda 
ertʰni ambobdnen es stsored isaao sxvebma tʰkʰves ara maɡram imasa hɡavso man ki tʰkʰva me varo 
maʃin utʰxres mas roɡor aɡexila tʰvalebi 
miuɡo man katsʰma ieso rom hkʰvia mozila talaxi tsamisva tʰvalebze da mitʰxra tsadi ʃiloaxs da moibane tsavedi movibane da amexila tʰvalebi 
da utʰxres mas sadaa iɡi ambobs ar vitsʰi 
miiqvanes pʰarisevlebtʰan is katsʰi tsinatʰ rom brma iqo 
ʃabatʰi iqo is dɣe iesom rom talaxi mozila da tʰvalebi auxila 
kvlav hkitʰxes mas pʰarisevlebmatsʰ tʰu roɡor aexila tʰvalebi utʰxra matʰ talaxi damado tʰvalebze movibane da vxedav 
tʰkʰves zoɡiertʰebma pʰariseveltʰaɡan es katsʰi ar aris ɣvtʰisaɡan raki ʃabatʰs ar inaxavs sxvebma ki tʰkʰves roɡor ʃedzlebs tsʰodvili katsʰi asetʰi sastsaulebis moxdenas da iqo matʰ ʃoris ɡanxetʰkʰileba 
kvlav eubnebian brmas ʃen ras itqvi masze tʰvalebi rom aɡixila man tʰkʰva rom tsinastsarmetqveliao iɡi 
ar daudʒeres iudevelebma rom brma iqo da tʰvalebi aexila sanam tʰvalaxelilis mʃoblebs ar daudzaxes 
da hkitʰxes matʰ esaa tʰkʰveni vaʒi viszetsʰ ambobtʰ rom brma daibadao axla roɡorɣa xedavs 
miuɡes misma mʃoblebma da tʰkʰves vitsʰitʰ rom es tʃveni ʃvilia da brma daibada 
maɡram axla roɡor xedavs ar vitsʰitʰ an vin auxila tʰvalebi artsʰ eɡ vitsʰitʰ xom srultslovania mas hkitʰxetʰ da tʰvitʰon itqvis tʰavis tʰavze 
ase utʰxres misma mʃoblebma radɡan eʃinodatʰ iudevelebisa vinaidan ukve ʃetʰkʰmuliqvnen iudevelebi rom sinaɡoɡidan moekvetʰatʰ qvela vintsʰ mas kʰristed aɣiarebda 
amitom utʰxres mʃoblebma srultslovania mas hkitʰxetʰo 
meored daudzaxes im katsʰs brma rom iqo da utʰxres miaɡe dideba ɣmertʰs tʃven vitsʰitʰ rom tsʰodvilia is katsʰi 
miuɡo man ar vitsʰi is katsʰi tsʰodvilia tʰu ara ertʰi ram vitsʰi brma viqavi da axla vxedav 
kvlav utʰxres mas ra ɡaɡiketʰa roɡor aɡixila tʰvalebi 
miuɡo matʰ me ukve ɡitʰxaritʰ da ar misminetʰ rad ɡindatʰ kvlav mosmena an ikʰneb mis motsapʰeebad ɡaxdoma ɡsurtʰ 
matʰ ɡalandzɣes iɡi da tʰkʰves ʃena xar misi motsapʰe tʃven ki moses motsapʰeebi vartʰ 
tʃven vitsʰitʰ rom moses elaparakeboda ɣmertʰi amaze ki arapʰeri vitsʰitʰ saidanaa iɡi 
miuɡo katsʰma da utʰxra matʰ sakvirveli stsored isaa rom tʰkʰven ar itsʰitʰ saidanaa iɡi man ki tʰvalebi amixila 
tʃven ki vitsʰitʰ rom tsʰodvilebs ar usmens ɣmertʰi aramed vintsʰ ɣvtʰis moʃiʃia da mis nebas asrulebs imas usmens 
saukunitʰɡan ar ɡaɡonila rom vinmes brmad dabadebulistʰvis tʰvalebi aexilos 
es rom ɣvtʰisaɡan ar qopʰiliqo verapʰers ɡaxdeboda 
miuɡes da utʰxres mas ʃen mtʰlianad tsʰodvebʃi daibade da tʃven ɡvastsavli da ɡaretʰ ɡaaɡdes iɡi 
ɡaiɡo iesom rom ɡaretʰ ɡaaɡdes iɡi monaxa da utʰxra mas ʃen ɡtsams dze katsʰisa 
miuɡo man da tʰkʰva vinaa iɡi upʰalo rom vitsamo 
utʰxra iesom ʃen ɡinaxavs iɡi da vintsʰ ʃen ɡelaparakeba isaa 
man tʰkʰva mtsams upʰalo da tʰaqvani stsʰa mas 
da tʰkʰva iesom ɡansakitʰxavad movedi am sopʰelʃi ratʰa brmebma dainaxon mxedvelni ki dabrmavdnen 
ɡaiɡona mastʰan mqopʰma zoɡiertʰma pʰarisevelma es da utʰxra mas nutʰu tʃventsʰ brmebi vartʰ 
utʰxra matʰ iesom brmebi rom qopʰiliqavitʰ tsʰodva ar ɡekʰnebodatʰ maɡram raki ambobtʰ tʰvalxilulni vartʰo tʰkʰveni tsʰodva ɡrtʃebatʰ 
ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven vintsʰ karidan ar ʃedis tsʰxvris pʰarexʃi da sxva ɡzitʰ ɡadadis kʰurdia iɡi da avazaki 
vintsʰ karidan ʃedis tsʰxvris mtsqemsia iɡi 
mekare uɣebs mas tsʰxvars esmis misi xma iɡi saxelitʰ mouxmobs tʰavis tsʰxvars da ɡamohqavs isini 
rotsʰa tʰavisebs ɡamouʃvebs imatʰ tsin miudzɣvis da tsʰxvaritsʰ misdevs mas radɡan stsʰnobs mis xmas 
utsʰxos ar ɡahqveba ɡaekʰtsʰeva radɡan utsʰxotʰa xmas ar stsʰnobs 
es iɡavi utʰxra matʰ iesom matʰ ki ver ɡaiɡes ras eubneboda 
kvlav utʰxra iesom ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven me var kari tsʰxvartʰa 
qvela vintsʰ tʃemze tsin movida kʰurdi da avazakia da tsʰxvarma ar usmina matʰ 
me var kari vintsʰ ʃedis tʃemitʰ ɡadartʃeba da ʃeva da ɡamova da hpovebs sadzovars 
kʰurdi mxolod imisatʰvis modis rom moiparos moklas da mospos me imistʰvis movedi rom sitsʰotsʰxle hkʰondetʰ matʰ da uxvad hkʰondetʰ 
me var mtsqemsi ketʰili mtsqemsi ketʰili tʰavis suls ɡastsiravs tsʰxvartʰatʰvis 
modʒamaɡire ki romelitsʰ ar aris mtsqemsi da artsʰ tsʰxvari ekutʰvnis mosuli mɡlis danaxvaze tovebs tsʰxvrebs da ɡarbis mɡeli ki itatsʰebs matʰ da pʰantavs 
modʒamaɡire ki ɡarbis radɡan modʒamaɡirea iɡi da ar zrunavs tsʰxvrebze 
me var mtsqemsi ketʰili me vitsʰnob tʃemsas da tʃemi mitsʰnobs me 
roɡortsʰ mama mitsʰnobs me da me vitsʰnob mamas tʃems suls vdeb tsʰxvartʰatʰvis 
me sxva tsʰxvrebitsʰa mqavs ara am pʰarexisa me isinitsʰ unda moviqvano da moismenen tʃems xmas da ikʰneba ertʰi pʰara da ertʰi mtsqemsi 
imitom vuqvarvar mamas rom me tʃems sitsʰotsʰxles vdeb ratʰa kvlav miviɣo iɡi 
veravin tsamartʰmevs mas maɡram me tʰvitʰon vdeb mas me makʰvs xelmtsipʰeba mis dasadebad da makʰvs xelmtsipʰeba kvlavatsʰ mis misaɣebad es mtsʰneba tʃemi mamisaɡan makʰvs miɣebuli 
am sitqvebis ɡamo kvlav tʃamovarda ɡanxetʰkʰileba iudeveltʰa ʃoris 
tʰkʰva bevrma matʰɡanma eʃmakeulia iɡi da ʃeʃlili ristʰvis usmentʰ mas 
sxvebma tʰkʰves es sitqvebi eʃmakeulisa ar aris ɡana ʃedzlebs eʃmaki brmas tʰvali auxilos 
maʃin satpʰurebis dɣesastsauli iqo ierusalimʃi zamtʰari idɡa 
da mimodioda ieso tadzarʃi solomonis stoaʃi 
ʃemoexvivnen mas iudevelni da utʰxres rodemde unda ɡvaecvebde tʰu kʰriste xar ɡvitʰxari tsʰxadad 
miuɡo matʰ iesom ɡitʰxaritʰ da ar irtsmunetʰ tʃemi sakʰmeebi tʃemi mamis saxelitʰ rom vaketʰeb motsmoben tʃemze 
maɡram tʰkʰven ar ɡdʒeratʰ radɡan tʃemi tsʰxvrisani ara xartʰ roɡortsʰ ɡitʰxaritʰ 
tʃemi tsʰxvrebi tʃems xmas ismenen da me vitsʰnob matʰ da isini me momqvebian 
me matʰ saukuno sitsʰotsʰxles vadzlev da ar daiɣupebian saukunod da xelidan veravin ɡamomtatsʰebs 
tʃemi mama romelmatsʰ momtsʰa isini qvelaze didia da veravin ɡaitatsʰebs matʰ tʃemi mamis xelidan 
me da mama ertʰi vartʰ 
kvlav akripʰes iudevelebma kʰvebi mis tʃasakʰolad 
miuɡo matʰ iesom bevri karɡi sakʰme ɡatʃvenetʰ mamisɡan romeli matʰɡanistʰvis mkʰolavtʰ 
miuɡes mas iudevelebma ketʰili sakʰmistʰvis ki ar ɡkʰolavtʰ aramed ɣvtʰisɡmobisatʰvis da imistʰvis rom katsʰi xar da ɣmertʰad xdi ʃens tʰavs 
miuɡo matʰ iesom ɡana tʰkʰvens rdʒulʃi ar stseria rom me vtʰkʰvi tʰkʰven ɣmertʰebi xartʰ 
tʰu ɣmertʰebi utsoda matʰ vis mimartʰatsʰ ɣvtʰis sitqva iqo da vis mimartʰatsʰ tserili ar irɣveva 
mas romelitsʰ mamam ɡantsmida da moavlina sopʰelʃi eubnebitʰ ɣmertʰs ɡmobo raki vtʰkʰvi ɣvtʰis dze var metʰkʰi 
tʰu tʃemi mamis sakʰmeebs ar vaketʰeb nu mertsmunebitʰ 
da tʰu vaketʰeb da ar mertsmunebitʰ sakʰmeebs ertsmunetʰ ratʰa ɡaiɡotʰ da itsʰodetʰ rom tʃemʃia mama da me mamaʃi var 
kvlav ʃeetsʰadnen mis ʃepqrobas maɡram dausxlta matʰ xelidan 
tsavida kvlav iordanes ɡaɣma im adɡilas sadatsʰ tsinatʰ natʰlavda ioane da ikʰ dartʃa 
bevrni midiodnen mastʰan da ambobdnen rom ioanes ar mouxdenia artsʰ ertʰi sastsauli maɡram qvelapʰeri ratsʰ ioanem tʰkʰva masze ceʃmariti iqoo 
da ikʰ bevri ertsmuna mas 
iqo vinme avadmqopʰi lazare betʰanieli mariamisa da misi dis martʰas sopʰlidan 
es is mariami iqo upʰals rom nelsatsʰxebeli stsʰxo da pʰexebi tʰavisi tʰmebitʰ ʃeumʃrala misi dzma lazare iqo avad 
ɡauɡzavnes misma debma katsʰi da ʃeutʰvales upʰalo aha vintsʰ ʃen ɡiqvars avadaa 
moismina iesom da utʰxra es sneuleba sasikvdilo ar aris aramed ɣvtʰis sadidebladaa ratʰa misitʰ ɡandiddes dze ɣvtʰisa 
iesos uqvarda martʰa misi da da lazare 
rotsʰa ɡaiɡo rom avad iqo ori dɣe dartʃa im adɡilze sadatsʰ imqopʰeboda 
amis ʃemdeɡ eubneba motsapʰeebs isev iudeaʃi tsavidetʰ 
utʰxres mas motsapʰeebma rabi iudevelebi axlaxan ʃens tʃakʰolvas tsʰdilobdnen da kidev ikʰ midixar 
miuɡo iesom tʰormeti saatʰi ar aris dɣeʃi vintsʰ dɣisitʰ dadis ar tsaibordzikebs radɡan am sopʰlis natʰels xedavs 
ɣamitʰ moaruli ki tsaibodzikebs radɡan natʰeli ar aris masʃi 
es tʰkʰva da mere eubneba matʰ lazarem tʃvenma meɡobarma daidzina maɡram me mis ɡasaɣvidzeblad mivdivar 
utʰxres motsapʰeebma mas upʰalo tʰu daidzina ɡamoketʰdeba 
iesom mis sikvdilze tʰkʰva matʰ ki eɡonatʰ rom bunebriv dzilze ambobda 
maʃin utʰxra matʰ iesom ɡatsʰxadebitʰ lazare mokvda 
mixaria tʰkʰvens ɡamo ikʰ rom ar viqavi ratʰa irtsmunotʰ maɡram moditʰ tsavidetʰ mastʰan 
maʃin tʰomam tqupis tsʰalad tsodebulma utʰxra tʰanamotsapʰeebs tʃventsʰ tsavqvetʰ ratʰa mastʰan ertʰad davixotsʰotʰ 
ieso mivida da naxa rom is ukve otʰxi dɣis damarxuli iqo 
betʰania axlos iqo ierusalimidan ase tʰxutʰmeti stadionis mandzilze 
bevri mivida iudeveltʰaɡan martʰastʰan da mariamtʰan ratʰa enuɡeʃebinatʰ isini dzmis ɡamo 
rom ɡaiɡo martʰam ieso modiso ʃeeɡeba mas mariami ki ʃin idʒda 
martʰam utʰxra iesos upʰalo akʰ rom qopʰiliqavi tʃemi dzma ar mokvdeboda 
maɡram axlatsʰ vitsʰi rasatsʰ stʰxov ɣmertʰs moɡtsʰems ɣmertʰi 
eubneba mas ieso aɣdɡeba ʃeni dzma 
eubneba mas martʰa vitsʰi rom aɣdɡeba aɣdɡomisas ukanasknel dɣes 
utʰxra mas iesom me var aɣdɡoma da sitsʰotsʰxle vintsʰ me mitsamebs kidetsʰ rom mokvdes itsʰotsʰxlebs 
qvela vintsʰ tsʰotsʰxalia da tʃemi mortsmunea ar mokvdeba ukunisamde ɡtsams es 
eubneba mas ho upʰalo me mtsams rom ʃen kʰriste xar dze ɣvtʰisa am sopʰlad momavali 
es rom tʰkʰva tsavida da tʰavis das mariams mouxmo da tʃumad utʰxra modzɣvari akʰ aris da ʃen ɡixmobs 
roɡortsʰ ki ɡaiɡona sastsrapʰod tsamodɡa da mivida mastʰan 
ieso dʒer dabaʃi ar iqo ʃesuli imave adɡilze idɡa sadatsʰ martʰa ʃeeɡeba 
iudevelebma romlebitsʰ mastʰan iqvnen saxlʃi da anuɡeʃebdnen rotsʰa dainaxes rom mariami sastsrapʰod tsamodɡa da ɡavida ɡahqvnen ukan eɡonatʰ samarxisken midioda satirlad 
mariami mivida im adɡilas sadatsʰ ieso iqo da rom ixila iɡi daemxo mis pʰerxtʰitʰ da utʰxra upʰalo akʰ rom qopʰiliqavi tʃemi dzma ar mokvdeboda 
rotsʰa iesom dainaxa rom tiroda iɡi da mastʰan ertʰad mosuli iudevelebitsʰ tirodnen ʃeidzra sulitʰ da aɣelda 
utʰxra sad daasvenetʰ iɡi eubnebian upʰalo modi da naxe 
da atsʰremlda ieso 
tʰkʰves iudevelebma naxe roɡor hqvarebia 
zoɡiertʰma matʰɡanma ki tʰkʰva nutʰu brmis tʰvalis amxels ar ʃeedzlo ise ɡaeketʰebina rom es ar momkvdariqo 
ieso ki kvlav ʃedzruli mivida samarxtʰan es iqo ɡamokʰvabuli romelsatsʰ lodi hkʰonda apʰarebuli 
ambobs ieso aiɣetʰ lodi eubneba mas mitsʰvalebulis da martʰa upʰalo ukve qars radɡan meotʰxe dɣea ratsʰ davmarxetʰ 
eubneba mas ieso ɡana ar ɡitʰxari tʰu irtsmuneb ɣvtʰis didebas ixilav metʰkʰi 
aiɣes lodi iesom tʰvalebi maɣla aɣapqro da tʰkʰva mamao ɡmadlob rom mismine 
me vitsʰodi rom qoveltʰvis mismen me mxolod ɡarʃemokrebili xalxis ɡasaɡonad vtʰkʰvi ratʰa irtsmunon rom ʃen momavline 
es tʰkʰva da didi xmitʰ ʃesdzaxa lazare ɡamodi 
da ɡamovida mitsʰvalebuli xel pʰexi saxvevebitʰ hkʰonda ʃekruli da saxetsʰ sudaritʰ hkʰonda ʃexveuli eubneba matʰ ieso ɡaxsenitʰ da ɡauʃvitʰ iaros 
maʃin bevrma iudeveltʰaɡan romlebitsʰ movidnen mariamtʰan da ixiles ratsʰ man moaxdina irtsmuna iɡi 
zoɡiertʰi matʰɡani ki tsavida pʰarisevlebtʰan da utʰxra ratsʰ moaxdina iesom 
ʃekribes mɣvdelmtʰavrebma da pʰarisevlebma sinedrioni da tʰkʰves ra vkʰnatʰ radɡan es katsʰi bevr sastsauls axdens 
tʰu mivuʃvebtʰ tʰavis nebaze qvela irtsmunebs mas movlen romaelebi da daipqroben tʃvens adɡilsatsʰ da ersatsʰ 
ertʰma matʰɡanma kaiapʰam romelitsʰ mɣvdelmtʰavrobda im tselitsads utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰven arapʰeri ɡaɡeɡebatʰ 
ver moɡipʰikʰrebiatʰ rom ɡvidʒobs ertʰi adamiani mokvdes xalxistʰvis vidre mtʰeli eri daiɣupos 
es tʰavisitʰ ar utʰkʰvams aramed mɣvdelmtʰavari iqo im tselitsads da itsinastsarmetqvela rom ieso eristʰvis mokvdeboda 
da ara marto eristʰvis aramed imistʰvisatsʰ rom ɣvtʰis ɡapʰantuli ʃvilebi ʃeekriba ertʰad 
im dɣidan ɡadatsqvites moeklatʰ iɡi 
aɣar uvlia iesos iudeveltʰa ʃoris ɡatsʰxadebulad aramed ɡaetsʰala ikʰaurobas udabnos maxlobel mxareʃi kʰalakʰʃi epʰremi rom etsodeba da ikʰ dartʃa motsapʰeebtʰan ertʰad 
axlovdeboda iudeveltʰa pasekʰi da am mxaridan mravali avida pasekʰamde ierusalimʃi ɡansatsmedad 
edzebdnen iesos da tadzarʃi mdɡomni ertʰmanetʰs eubnebodnen roɡor pʰikʰrobtʰ ar mova dɣesastsaulze 
mɣvdelmtʰavrebma da pʰarisevlebma ɡankarɡulebebi ɡastsʰes rom vintsʰ ʃeitqobda sad iqo iɡi etsʰnobebina ratʰa ʃeepqrotʰ 
pasekʰamde ekʰvsi dɣitʰ adre mivida ieso betʰaniaʃi sadatsʰ iqo lazare romelitsʰ iesom aɣadɡina mkvdretʰitʰ 
ɡaumartʰes mas puroba ikʰ da martʰa emsaxureboda lazare ki misi ertʰ ertʰi tʰanameinaxe iqo 
mariamma aiɣo ertʰi litra supʰtʰa dzvirpʰasi nardis nelsatsʰxebeli pʰexebze stsʰxo iesos da tʰavisi tʰmebitʰ ʃeumʃrala pʰexebi saxli nelsatsʰxeblis surnelebitʰ aivso 
ambobs iuda iskarioteli ertʰi misi motsapʰetʰaɡani romelsatsʰ undoda ɡaetsʰa iɡi 
ratom ar ɡaiqida es nelsatsʰxebeli samas dinarad da ɣaribebs ar dauriɡda 
es imitom ki ar tʰkʰva rom ɣaribebze zrunavda aramed imitom rom kʰurdi iqo qulaba mas hkʰonda da rasatsʰ tʃaqridnen iɣebda 
utʰxra iesom daanebe tʰavi man tʃemi damarxvis dɣistʰvis ɡadainaxa iɡi 
radɡan ɣaribebi qoveltʰvis tʰkʰventʰana ɡqavtʰ me ki qoveltʰvis ar ɡeqolebitʰ 
ɡaiɡo diddzalma xalxma iudeveltʰaɡan rom is ikʰ iqo da mividnen ara marto iesos ɡulistʰvis aramed lazares sanaxavadatsʰ romelitsʰ man mkvdretʰitʰ aɣadɡina 
ɡadatsqvites mɣvdelmtʰavrebma lazaretsʰ moeklatʰ 
radɡan mis ɡamo bevri iudeveli modioda da ertsmuneboda iesos 
meore dɣes sadɣesastsaulod mosulma diddzalma xalxma ɡaiɡo rom ieso ierusalimʃi midioda 
aiɣes palmis rtoebi mis ʃesaɡebeblad ɡavidnen da idzaxdnen osana kurtʰxeul ars upʰlis saxelitʰ momavali da mepʰe israelisa 
ipova iesom ertʰi tʃotʃori da zed ʃedʒda roɡortsʰ datserilia 
nu ɡeʃinia sionis asulo aha ʃeni mepʰe modis tʃotʃorze mdʒdomi 
es ver ɡaiɡes motsapʰeebma pirvelad maɡram rotsʰa ieso ɡandidda maʃin ɡaixsenes rom es masze iqo datserili da ase moekʰtsʰnen mas 
emotsmeboda xalxi romelitsʰ mastʰan iqo rotsʰa lazare sapʰlavidan ɡamoixmo da mkvdretʰitʰ aɣadɡina 
amitom ʃeeɡeba mas xalxi raki ɡaɡonili hkʰonda rom es sastsauli moaxdina 
pʰarisevelebma ki ertʰmanetʰs utʰxres xedavtʰ rom veɣarapʰers xdebitʰ mtʰeli kʰveqana mas mihqveba 
iqvnen ikʰ berdznebitsʰ amosultʰaɡan rom tʰaqvani etsʰatʰ dɣesastsaulze 
mividnen isini pʰilipestʰan romelitsʰ ɡalileis betʰsaididan iqo stʰxoves da utʰxres batono iesos naxva ɡvsurs 
pʰilipe mivida andriastʰan da utʰxra ʃemdeɡ andriam da pʰilipem utʰxres iesos 
iesom miuɡo matʰ da utʰxra movida ʒami rom ɡandiddes dze katsʰisa 
ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tʰu mitsaʃi tʃavardnili xorblis martsʰvali ar mokvda marto dartʃeba da tʰu mokvda bevr naqopʰs ɡamoiɣebs 
visatsʰ tʰavisi suli uqvars karɡavs mas xolo visatsʰ tʰavisi suli sdzuls am sopʰelʃi saukuno sitsʰotsʰxlisatʰvis ʃeinaxavs mas 
vintsʰ me memsaxureba me momqves da sadatsʰ me var tʃemi msaxuritsʰ ikʰ ikʰneba vintsʰ me memsaxureba mas pativs miaɡebs mama 
axla ʃpʰotʰavs tʃemi suli da ra vtʰkʰva mamao mixseni am ʒamisaɡan tʰumtsʰa amistʰvis movedi am ʒams 
mamao ɡanadide saxeli ʃeni movida zetsʰidan xma ɡanvadide da kvlavatsʰ ɡanvadideb 
ikʰ mdɡomma xalxma amis ɡaɡonebaze tʰkʰva kʰuxiliao sxvebma ki tʰkʰves anɡelozi elaparakebodao 
miuɡo iesom da tʰkʰva tʃemtʰvis ki ar iqo es xma aramed tʰkʰventʰvis 
axlaa am sopʰlis samsdʒavro am sopʰlis mtʰavari axla ɡaretʰ ɡaidevneba 
da rotsʰa avmaɣldebi mitsidan qvelas tʃemtʰan mivizidav 
amas imis misaniʃneblad laparakobda tʰu roɡori sikvdilitʰ apirebda sikvdils 
miuɡo mas xalxma rdʒulidan ɡaɡviɡonia rom kʰriste samudamod rtʃeba roɡorɣa ambob dze katsʰisa unda amaɣldeso vinaa es dze katsʰisa 
utʰxra matʰ iesom kidev mtsʰire xans aris tʰkʰvens ʃoris natʰeli iaretʰ sanam natʰeli ɡakʰvtʰ ratʰa bnelma ar moɡitsʰvatʰ bnelʃi moarulma ar itsʰis saitʰ midis 
sanam natʰeli ɡakʰvtʰ itsametʰ natʰeli ratʰa iqotʰ dzeni natʰlisa es ilaparaka iesom da tsavida da matʰ tʰvals miepʰara 
amdeni sastsauli moaxdina matʰ tsinaʃe da maintsʰ ar ertsmunen mas 
ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo esaia tsinastsarmetqvelis sitqva romelmatsʰ tʰkʰva upʰalo vin irtsmuna tʃvenɡan smenili da upʰlis mklavi vis ɡamoetsʰxada 
imitomatsʰ ver irtsmunes rom roɡortsʰ kidev tʰkʰva esaiam 
man tʰvalebi daubrmava matʰ da ɡuli dauxʃo ratʰa tʰvalebitʰ ver exilatʰ da ɡulitʰ ver mimxvdariqvnen da ar mokʰtsʰeuliqvnen rom ɡanmekurna isini 
es tʰkʰva esaiam raki ixila misi dideba da laparakobda masze 
tʰumtsʰa bevri mtʰavaritsʰ ertsmuna mas maɡram pʰariseveltʰa ɡamo ver aɣiarebdnen ratʰa sinaɡoɡidan ar moekvetʰatʰ 
radɡan adamiantʰa dideba upʰro uqvardatʰ vidre ɣvtʰis dideba 
iesom ʃesdzaxa da tʰkʰva visatsʰ tʃemi stsams tʃemi ki ar stsams aramed imisi vintsʰ me momavlina 
da tʃemi mxilveli xedavs mas vintsʰ me momavlina 
me natʰeli movedi sopʰelʃi rom artsʰ ertʰi tʃemi mortsmune bnelʃi ar dartʃes 
tʰu vinme moismens tʃems sitqvebs da ar daitsʰavs me ar ɡanvikitʰxav mas radɡan sopʰlis ɡansakitʰxad ki ar movedi aramed sopʰlis saxsnelad 
vintsʰ me uarmqopʰs da ar itsqnarebs tʃems sitqvebs hqavs ɡanmkitʰxveli sitqva romelitsʰ tsarmovtʰkʰvi ɡanikitʰxavs mas ukanasknel dɣes 
radɡan me tʃemitʰ ki ar milaparakia aramed mamam tʃemma momavlinebelma momtsʰa mtsʰneba ra vtʰkʰva da ra vilaparako 
da me vitsʰi rom misi mtsʰneba saukuno sitsʰotsʰxlea amitom rasatsʰ vlaparakob roɡortsʰ mamam mitʰxra ise vlaparakob 
pasekʰis dɣesastsaulis tsin itsʰoda iesom rom dadɡa am sopʰlidan mamastʰan misi ɡadasvlis ʒami roɡortsʰ ʃeiqvara tʰavisianebi romlebitsʰ am sopʰelʃi iqvnen iseve bolomde uqvarda isini 
serobis dros rotsʰa eʃmakma ukve tʃaudo ɡulʃi iudas simon iskariotelis dzes rom ɡaetsʰa iɡi 
iesom itsʰoda ra rom mamam qvelapʰeri mistsʰa mas xeltʰ rom ɣvtʰidan ɡamovida da ɣmertʰtʰan midis 
tsamodɡa serobidan ɡadaidzro zeda samoseli aiɣo tilo da tselze ʃemoirtqa 
mere tʃaasxa tsqali sabanelʃi da daitsqo motsapʰeebis pʰerxtʰbana da im tilotʰi ʃemʃraleba tselze rom ertqa 
mivida simon petrestʰan is ki eubneba upʰalo ʃen unda dambano pʰexi 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra mas rasatsʰ vaketʰeb axla ver xvdebi mere ki ɡaiɡeb 
eubneba mas petre ukunisamde ar damban pʰexs miuɡo iesom tʰu ar daɡban tʃemtʰan ar ɡekʰneba tsili 
eubneba mas simon petre upʰalo marto pʰexi ki ara aramed xelitsʰ da tʰavitsʰ 
eubneba mas ieso ɡanbanils aɣar scirdeba dabana ɡarda pʰexisa radɡan is mtʰlianad supʰtʰaa da tʰkʰventsʰ supʰtʰani xartʰ oɣond qvela ara 
radɡan itsʰoda vintsʰ ɡastsʰemda amitom tʰkʰva qvelani ar xartʰo supʰtʰa 
pʰerxni rom dabana matʰ da tʰavisi samoseli aiɣo da kvlav dadʒda utʰxra matʰ itsʰitʰ ra ɡiqavitʰ 
tʰkʰven me mitsodebtʰ modzɣvars da upʰals da stsorad ambobtʰ radɡan var 
amitom tʰuki me upʰalma da modzɣvarma daɡbanetʰ pʰerxni tʰkʰventsʰ ertʰmanetʰs unda dabanotʰ pʰerxni 
radɡan maɡalitʰi moɡetsʰitʰ ratʰa roɡortsʰ me moɡekʰetsʰitʰ tʰkʰventsʰ ise moikʰtsʰetʰ 
ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven mona araa tʰavis batonze didi da movlinebuli ar aris momavlinebelze didi 
raki es itsʰitʰ netarni xartʰ tʰu amas aɣasrulebtʰ 
qvela tʰkʰvenɡanze ar vlaparakob me vitsʰi vintsʰ amovartʃie maɡram unda aɣsruldes tserili tʃemi puris mcamelma tʃemze aɣmartʰa kʰusli 
axla ɡeubnebitʰ sanam es axdebodes ratʰa rotsʰa axdeba irtsmunotʰ rom me var 
ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven vintsʰ miiɣebs imas visatsʰ me mivavlen me mimiɣebs xolo vintsʰ me mimiɣebs tʃems momavlinebelsatsʰ miiɣebs 
amis tʰkʰmis ʃemdeɡ ieso sulitʰ aɣelda daamotsma da tʰkʰva ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven ertʰi tʰkʰvenɡani ɡamtsʰems me 
ɡadaxedes motsapʰeebma ertʰmanetʰs ɡaoɡnebulebma visze tʰkʰvao 
iesos ubes miqrədnoboda ertʰi motsapʰetʰaɡani romelitsʰ uqvarda iesos 
simon petrem aniʃna mas da utʰxra hkitʰxe vin aris viszetsʰ tʰkʰvao 
ɡadaixara iɡi iesos mkerdisken da eubneba upʰalo vinaa iɡi 
miuɡebs ieso es isaa visatsʰ amovutseb lukmas da mivtsʰem amoatso lukma aiɣo da mistsʰa iudas simon iskariotelis dzes 
am lukmis ʃemdeɡ satana ʃevida masʃi eubneba mas ieso ratsʰ ɡasaketʰebeli ɡakʰvs male ɡaaketʰe 
maɡram meinaxetʰaɡan veravin mixvda rad utʰxra es 
zoɡiertʰma ipʰikʰra raki qulaba iudas hkʰonda ieso eubneba sadɣesastsaulod ɡviqide ratsʰ ɡvcirdebao an kidev rom raime mietsʰa ɣaribebisatʰvis 
is ki roɡortsʰ ki lukma aiɣo dauqovnebliv ɡavida da iqo ɣame 
rotsʰa ɡavida ambobs ieso axla ɡandidda dze katsʰisa da ɣmertʰi ɡandidda masʃi 
raki ɣmertʰi ɡandidda masʃi ɣmertʰitsʰ ɡanadidebs mas tʰavistʰan da umalve ɡanadidebs mas 
ʃvilebo kidev mtsʰire xansɣa var tʰkʰventʰan dzebnas damitsqebtʰ roɡortsʰ iudevelebs vutʰxari sadatsʰ mivdivar tʰkʰven ver ʃedzlebtʰ metʰkʰi mosvlas tʰkʰventsʰ imasve ɡeubnebitʰ axla 
axal mtsʰnebas ɡadzlevtʰ tʰkʰven ɡiqvardetʰ ertʰmanetʰi roɡortsʰ me ʃeɡiqvaretʰ tʰkʰven tʰkʰventsʰ ise ɡiqvardetʰ ertʰmanetʰi 
tʃemi motsapʰeebi rom xartʰ amitʰ ɡaiɡeben qvelani tʰu ertʰmanetʰis siqvaruli ɡekʰnebatʰ 
eubneba mas simon petre upʰalo sad midixar miuɡo mas iesom axla ikʰ ver ɡamomqvebi sadatsʰ me mivdivar mere ki ɡamomqvebi 
eubneba mas petre upʰalo axlave ratom ver ɡamoɡqvebi suls davdeb ʃentʰvis 
miuɡo iesom suls dadeb tʃemtʰvis ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebi ʃen mamali ar iqivlebs sanam samdʒer ar uarmqopʰ 
nu ʃekrtʰeba tʰkʰveni ɡuli itsametʰ ɣmertʰi da mitsametʰ me 
tʃemi mamis saxlʃi bevri savanea ase rom ar iqos ar ɡetqoditʰ me mivdivar ratʰa adɡili ɡaɡimzadotʰ 
rotsʰa tsaval da adɡils ɡaɡimzadebtʰ isev moval da tʃemtʰan tsaɡiqvantʰ ratʰa sadatsʰ me var tʰkʰventsʰ ikʰ iqotʰ 
sadatsʰ me mivdivar tʰkʰven itsʰitʰ is ɡza 
eubneba mas tʰoma upʰalo ar vitsʰitʰ sad midixar da ɡza roɡorɣa ɡvetsʰodineba
