eubneba mas ieso me var ɡza ceʃmariteba da sitsʰotsʰxle mamastʰan veravin miva tʰu ara tʃemitʰ 
me rom mitsʰnobdetʰ tʃemi mamatsʰ ɡetsʰnobebodatʰ amieridan itsʰnobtʰ mas da nanaxi ɡqavtʰ iɡi 
eubneba mas pʰilipe upʰalo ɡvatʃvene mama da sakmarisia tʃventʰvis 
eubneba mas ieso ra xania tʰkʰventʰan var da ver mitsʰnob pʰilipe vintsʰ me mixila man mamatsʰ ixila roɡorɣa ambob mama ɡvatʃveneo 
ar ɡtsams rom me mamaʃi var da mama tʃemʃia sitqvebs romeltʰatsʰ ɡeubnebitʰ tʃemitʰ ar vambob tʃemʃi mqopʰi mama aketʰebs sakʰmeebs 
mertsmunetʰ rom me mamaʃi var da mama tʃemʃia tʰu ara da tʰvitʰ sakʰmeebs maintsʰ ertsmunetʰ 
ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven visatsʰ tʃemi stsams im sakʰmeebs rasatsʰ me vaketʰeb tʰavadatsʰ ɡaaketʰebs da matʰze didsatsʰ ɡaaketʰebs radɡan me mamastʰan mivdivar 
rasatsʰ itʰxovtʰ tʃemi saxelitʰ ɡavaketʰeb ratʰa ɡandiddes mama dzeʃi 
tʰu rames itʰxovtʰ tʃemi saxelitʰ ɡavaketʰeb 
tʰu me ɡiqvarvartʰ tʃemi mtsʰnebani daitsʰavitʰ 
me mamas ʃevevedrebi da is sxva nuɡeʃismtsʰemels moɡivlentʰ ratʰa tʰkʰventʰan iqos saukunod 
ceʃmaritebis suls risi miɣebatsʰ ar ʃeudzlia sopʰels radɡan ver xedavs da ar itsʰnobs mas tʰkʰven ki itsʰnobtʰ mas radɡan tʰkʰventʰan rtʃeba da tʰkʰvenʃi ikʰneba 
oblad ar daɡtovebtʰ moval tʰkʰventʰan 
kidev tsʰotatsʰ da sopʰeli veɣar mixilavs tʰkʰven ki mixilavtʰ radɡan me tsʰotsʰxali var da tʰkʰventsʰ itsʰotsʰxlebtʰ 
im dɣes ɡaiɡebtʰ rom me tʃems mamaʃi var da tʰkʰven tʃemʃi da me tʰkʰvenʃi 
visatsʰ tʃemi mtsʰnebebi akʰvs da itsʰavs matʰ mas vuqvarvar me tʃems moqvaruls ki tʃemi mamatsʰ ʃeiqvarebs metsʰ ʃeviqvareb mas da me tʰavad ɡamovetsʰxadebi 
eubneba mas iuda iskarioteli ki ara upʰalo roɡor ikʰneba rom ʃen tʰavad ɡamoɡvetsʰxadebi tʃven da ara sopʰels 
miuɡo iesom da utʰxra mas visatsʰ vuqvarvar is tʃems sitqvas daitsʰavs da tʃemi mamatsʰ ʃeiqvarebs mas tʃventsʰ mivaltʰ da mastʰan davidebtʰ savanes 
visatsʰ ar vuqvarvar ar itsʰavs tʃems sitqvebs sitqva romelsatsʰ ismentʰ tʃemi ki araa tʃemi momavlinebeli mamisaa 
amas ɡelaparakeboditʰ tʰkʰventʰan qopʰnisas 
xolo nuɡeʃismtsʰemeli ki sulitsmida romelsatsʰ tʃemi saxelitʰ moavlinebs mama qvelapʰers ɡastsavlitʰ da qvelapʰers ɡaɡaxsenebtʰ ratsʰ tʰkʰventʰvis mitʰkʰvams 
mʃvidobas ɡitovebtʰ tʰkʰven tʃems mʃvidobas ɡadzlevtʰ tʰkʰven sopʰeli rom idzleva ise ki ar ɡadzlevtʰ nu ʃekrtʰeba tʰkʰveni ɡuli da nurtsʰ ʃeʃindeba 
xom moisminetʰ rom ɡitʰxaritʰ mivdivar da davbrundebi tʰkʰventʰan rom ɡqvareboditʰ ɡaɡixardebodatʰ raki mamastʰan mivdivar radɡan tʃemze didia mama 
axla ɡitʰxaritʰ es sanam axdebodes ratʰa irtsmunotʰ rotsʰa axdeba 
bevrs aɣar vilaparakeb tʰkʰventʰan radɡan sopʰlis mtʰavari modis da mas tʃemʃi arapʰeri ekutʰvnis 
maɡram ratʰa ɡaiɡos sopʰelma rom mama miqvars da roɡortsʰ mamam mibrdzana ise vaketʰeb adekʰitʰ tsavidetʰ akʰedan 
me var vazi ceʃmariti mamatʃemi ki mitsismuʃakia 
qovel unaqopʰo lertss tʃemʃi is maʃorebs da qovel naqopʰiers ki ɡantsmeds ratʰa meti naqopʰi ɡamoiɣos 
tʰkʰven ukve ɡantsmedilni xartʰ im sitqvitʰ romelitsʰ ɡitʰxaritʰ 
tʰkʰven tʃemʃi dartʃitʰ me ki tʰkʰvenʃi roɡortsʰ lertsi ver moisxams naqopʰs tʰavisitʰ tʰu vazze ar dartʃeba iseve tʰkʰventsʰ tʰu tʃemʃi ar dartʃebitʰ 
me vazi var tʰkʰven ki lertsebi vintsʰ tʃemʃi rtʃeba da me masʃi iɡi bevr naqopʰs isxams radɡan utʃemod arapʰris ketʰeba ar ʃeɡidzliatʰ 
vintsʰ tʃemʃi ar dartʃeba ɡaretʰ ɡadaiɡdeba roɡortsʰ lertsi da dackneba moaɡroveben matʰ tsʰetsʰxlʃi tʃaqrian da daitsveba 
tʰu tʃemʃi dartʃebitʰ da tʃemi sitqvebi tʰkʰvenʃi dartʃeba rasatsʰ isurvebtʰ itʰxovetʰ da ɡekʰnebatʰ 
amitʰ ɡandiddeba tʃemi mama tʰu bevr naqopʰs ɡamoiɣebtʰ da tʃemi motsapʰeebi ikʰnebitʰ 
roɡortsʰ mamam ʃemiqvara me metsʰ aseve ʃeɡiqvaretʰ tʰkʰven dartʃitʰ tʃems siqvarulʃi 
tʰu tʃems mtsʰnebebs daitsʰavtʰ tʃems siqvarulʃi dartʃebitʰ roɡortsʰ me davitsʰavi tʃemi mamis mtsʰnebebi da vrtʃebi mis siqvarulʃi 
es qvelapʰeri imitom ɡitʰxaritʰ rom tʃemi sixaruli iqos tʰkʰvenʃi da tʰkʰveni sixaruli savse iqos 
es aris tʃemi mtsʰneba ɡiqvardetʰ ertʰmanetʰi roɡortsʰ me ʃeɡiqvaretʰ tʰkʰven 
imaze didi siqvaruli aravis akʰvs rotsʰa vinme tʰavs stsiravs tʰavisi meɡobrebisatʰvis 
tʰkʰven tʃemi meɡobrebi xartʰ tʰu aketʰebtʰ imas rasatsʰ mtsʰnebad ɡidebtʰ 
me aɣar ɡitsodebtʰ monebs vinaidan monam ar itsʰis ras aketʰebs misi batoni aramed meɡobrebi ɡitsodetʰ radɡan qvelapʰeri ratsʰ tʃemi mamisɡan movismine tʰkʰven ɡamtsʰnetʰ 
tʰkʰven ar aɡirtʃevivartʰ aramed me aɡirtʃietʰ tʰkʰven da daɡadɡinetʰ ratʰa tsaxvidetʰ da naqopʰi ɡamoiɣotʰ da tʰkʰveni naqopʰi dartʃes ratʰa rasatsʰ ki stʰxovtʰ mamas tʃemi saxelitʰ moɡtsʰetʰ tʰkʰven 
amas ɡidebtʰ mtsʰnebad ratʰa ɡiqvardetʰ ertʰmanetʰi 
tʰu tʰkʰven sopʰels sdzulxartʰ itsʰodetʰ rom tʰkʰvenze utsin me ʃemidzula 
tʰkʰven rom sopʰlisani qopʰiliqavitʰ sopʰels eqvareboda tʰavisianebi da raki ar xartʰ sopʰlisani aramed me ɡamoɡartʃietʰ sopʰlidan amitom sdzulxartʰ sopʰels 
ɡaixsenetʰ sitqva romelitsʰ ɡitʰxaritʰ mona ar aris metʰkʰi tʰavis batonze didi me tʰu mdevnidnen tʰkʰventsʰ daɡitsqeben devnas tʰu tʃemi sitqva daitsʰves tʰkʰvensasatsʰ daitsʰaven 
maɡram qovelive amas tʃemi saxelis ɡamo ɡaɡiketʰeben radɡan ar itsʰnoben tʃems momavlinebels 
me rom ar movsuliqavi da ar metʰkʰva matʰtʰvis ar ekʰnebodatʰ tsʰodva axla ki ara akʰvtʰ patieba tʰaviantʰi tsʰodvebisatʰvis 
tʃems modzules tʃemi mamatsʰ sdzuls 
me rom ar ɡameketʰebina matʰ ʃoris sakʰmeebi raomelnitsʰ sxvas aravis ɡauketʰebia tsʰodvatsʰ aɣar ekʰnebodatʰ axla ki ixiles da ʃeɡvidzules metsʰ da tʃemi mamatsʰ 
maɡram aɣsruldes matʰ rdʒulʃi datserili sitqva umizezod ʃemidzules 
rotsʰa mova nuɡeʃismtsʰemeli romelsatsʰ me moɡivlentʰ mamisɡan ceʃmaritebis suli romelitsʰ mamisɡan ɡamodis is daamotsmebs tʃemze 
tʰkʰventsʰ daamotsmebtʰ vinaidan tʰavidanve tʃemtʰana xartʰ 
es qvelapʰeri ɡelaparaketʰ ratʰa ar dabrkoldetʰ 
sinaɡoɡidan moɡkvetʰen maɡram modis ʒamitsʰ rotsʰa qvela tʰkʰvens mkvlels eɡoneba rom amitʰ ɣmertʰs emsaxureba 
ase moɡekʰtsʰevian radɡan ar itsʰnes artsʰ mama artsʰ me 
maɡram es ɡelaparaketʰ ratʰa rotsʰa mova ʒami ɡaixsenotʰ rom me ɡitʰxaritʰ es ar mitʰkʰvams tʰavidanve radɡan tʰkʰventʰan viqavi 
axla mivdivar mastʰan vintsʰ me momavlina da artsʰertʰi tʰkʰvenɡani ar mekitʰxeba saitʰ midixar ʃen 
maɡram mtsuxarebitʰ aɣivso tʰkʰveni ɡuli es rom ɡitʰxaritʰ 
maɡram ceʃmaritebas ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tʰkʰventʰvis uketʰesia rom tsavide radɡan tʰu ar tsavedi nuɡeʃismtsʰemeli ver mova tʰkʰventʰan tʰu tsaval me moɡivlentʰ 
da rotsʰa is mova amxilebs sopʰels tsʰodvis simartʰlisa da ɡankitʰxvis ɡamo 
tsʰodvis ɡamo rom ar mitsames 
simartʰlis ɡamo mamastʰan rom mivdivar da verasodes mixilavtʰ 
ɡankitʰxvis ɡamo rom mtʰavari am sopʰlisa ɡankitʰxulia 
kidev bevri ram makʰvs tʰkʰventʰvis satʰkʰmeli maɡram veɣar itvirtʰavtʰ 
rotsʰa mova iɡi suli ceʃmaritebisa ʃeɡidzɣvebatʰ srul ceʃmaritebaʃi tʰavisitʰ ki ar ilaparakebs aramed imas ilaparakebs rasatsʰ ismens da momavals ɡautsqebtʰ tʰkʰven 
iɡi ɡanmadidebs me radɡan tʃemɡan miiɣebs da tʰkʰven ɡautsqebtʰ 
qvelapʰeri ratsʰ mamas akʰvs tʃemia amitom ɡitʰxaritʰ tʃemɡan miiɣebs da tʰkʰven ɡautsqebtʰ metʰkʰi 
tsʰotatsʰ da veɣar mixilavtʰ kidev tsʰotatsʰ da mixilavtʰ radɡan me mamastʰan mivdivar 
zoɡiertʰma misma motsapʰem ertʰmanetʰs ɡadaulaparaka amas ras ɡveubneba tsʰotatsʰ da veɣar mixilavtʰo kidev tsʰotatsʰ da mixilavtʰ radɡan mamastʰan mivdivaro 
ase laparakobdnen amas ras ambobs tsʰotatsʰo ar vitsʰitʰ ras ambobso 
mixvda ieso rom undodatʰ mistʰvis ekitʰxatʰ da utʰxra matʰ imitom ekitʰxebitʰ ertʰmanetʰs me rom vtʰkʰvi tsʰotatsʰ da veɣar mixilavtʰ da kidev tsʰotatsʰ da mixilavtʰ metʰkʰi 
ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven itirebtʰ da ivalalebtʰ sopʰeli ki ɡaixarebs tʰkʰven damtsuxrdebitʰ maɡram tʰkʰveni mtsuxareba sixarulad ikʰtsʰeva 
dedakatsʰi mʃobiarobisas tsuxs radɡan misi ʒami dadɡa xolo bavʃvs rom ɡaatʃens sixarulisɡan aɣar axsovs tandʒva radɡan adamiani iʃva sopʰelʃi 
tʰkʰventsʰ damtsuxrebulni xartʰ axla maɡram kvlav ɡixilavtʰ da ɡaixarebs tʰkʰveni ɡuli da tʰkʰvens sixaruls veɣaravin tsaɡartʰmevtʰ 
im dɣes arapʰers mkitʰxavtʰ ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven rasatsʰ stʰxovtʰ mamas tʃemi saxelitʰ moɡtsʰemtʰ tʰkʰven 
akʰamde arapʰeri ɡitʰxoviatʰ tʃemi saxelitʰ itʰxovetʰ da miiɣebtʰ ratʰa tʰkʰveni sixaruli srulqopʰili iqos 
amas iɡavebitʰ ɡelaparakeboditʰ maɡram modis ʒami rotsʰa aɣar daɡelaparakebitʰ iɡavebitʰ aramed pirdapir ɡautsqebtʰ mamis ʃesaxeb 
im dɣes ʃestʰxovtʰ tʃemi saxelitʰ amitomatsʰ ar ɡeubnebitʰ rom mamas vtʰxov tʰkʰventʰvis 
vinaidan tʰvitʰ mamas uqvarxartʰ raki me ʃemiqvaretʰ da irtsmunetʰ rom ɣvtʰisɡan ɡamovedi 
mamisɡan ɡamovedi da sopʰelʃi movedi kvlav vtoveb sopʰels da mivdivar mamastʰan 
utʰxres misma motsapʰeebma aha axla pirdapir laparakob da aravitʰar iɡavs ar ambob 
axla vitsʰitʰ rom qvelapʰeri itsʰi ar ɡcirdeba rom vinmem ɡkitʰxos amis ɡamo ɡvtsams rom ɣvtʰisɡan ɡamoxvedi 
miuɡo matʰ iesom axla ɡtsamtʰ 
aha modis ʒami da movida kidetsʰ rotsʰa qvela satʰitʰaod ɡaipʰanteba me damtovebtʰ maɡram me ara var marto vinaidan mamaa tʃemtʰan 
es imitom ɡitʰxaritʰ rom mʃvidoba ɡkʰondetʰ tʃemʃi sopʰelʃi ɡasaciri ɡekʰnebatʰ maɡram ɡamaɡrditʰ me vdzlie sopʰels 
es ilaparaka iesom da tsʰas miapqro tʰvalebi da tʰkʰva mamao dadɡa ʒami ɡanadido ʃeni dze ratʰa dzem ɡanɡadidos ʃen 
radɡan mietsʰi mas xelmtsipʰeba qvela xortsʰielze ratʰa qvelas vintsʰ mas tʃaabare saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle mistsʰes 
esaa saukuno sitsʰotsʰxle rom ɡitsʰnobdnen ʃen ertʰ ceʃmarit ɣmertʰs da mas vintsʰ moavline ieso kʰristes 
me ɡanɡadide mitsaze im sakʰmis aɣsrulebitʰ romelitsʰ mometsʰi rom ɡameketʰebina 
axla ki ʃen ɡanmadide mamao imave didebitʰ ratsʰ mkʰonda ʃentʰan sopʰlis ɡatʃenamde 
ʃeni saxeli ɡamovutsʰxade adamianebs romlebitsʰ ʃen mometsʰi sopʰlisɡan ʃenebi iqvnen isini da me mometsʰi ʃeni sitqva daitsʰves matʰ 
axla ʃeitsʰnes rom qvelapʰeri ratsʰ mometsʰi ʃenɡanaa 
radɡan sitqvebi romlebitsʰ ʃen mometsʰi matʰ ɡadavetsʰi miiɣes matʰ da tsʰnes ceʃmaritad rom me ʃenɡan tsamovedi da irtsmunes rom ʃen momavline 
matʰtʰvis ɡevedrebi sopʰlistʰvis ki ar ɡevedrebi aramed matʰtʰvis romlebitsʰ ʃen mometsʰi radɡan ʃenebi arian isini 
qvelapʰeri tʃemi ʃenia ʃeni ki tʃemi da me matʰʃi ɡanvdiddi 
me aɣara var sopʰelʃi maɡram isini arian sopʰelʃi me ki ʃentʰan movdivar tsmidao mamao daitsʰavi ʃeni saxelitʰ eseni romlebitsʰ ʃen mometsʰi ratʰa tʃvensavitʰ ertʰni iqvnen 
rotsʰa matʰtʰan viqavi vitsʰavdi matʰ ʃeni saxelitʰ isini romlebitsʰ ʃen mometsʰi me davipʰare da matʰɡan aravin daɣupula daɣupvis dzis ɡarda ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo tserili 
axla ki ʃentʰan movdivar da amas sopʰelʃi vlaparakob ratʰa aivsnen tʃemi sixarulitʰ 
me matʰ mivetsʰi ʃeni sitqva da sopʰelma ʃeidzula isini radɡan ar arian sopʰlisani roɡortsʰ me ara var sopʰlisa 
ar ɡevedrebi rom sopʰlidan tsaiqvano isini aramed daitsʰva borotisaɡan 
isini sopʰlisani ar arian roɡortsʰ me ara var sopʰlisa 
ɡantsmide isini ceʃmaritebitʰ ʃeni sitqva ceʃmaritebaa 
roɡortsʰ ʃen momavline sopʰelʃi metsʰ aseve mivavline isini sopʰelʃi 
tʃems tʰavs ɡanvtsmed matʰtʰvis ratʰa isinitsʰ tsmidani iqvnen ceʃmaritebaʃi 
me mxolod amatʰze ar ɡtʰxov aramed imatʰzetsʰ vintsʰ tʃemi mortsmuneni ikʰnebian tʰaviantʰi sitqvitʰ 
ratʰa qvela ertʰi iqos roɡortsʰ ʃen tʃemʃi mamao me ki ʃenʃi ratʰa isinitsʰ iqvnen tʃvenʃi ratʰa irtsmunos sopʰelma rom ʃen momavline 
da dideba romelitsʰ ʃen mometsʰi matʰ mivetsʰi ratʰa ertʰi iqvnen roɡortsʰ tʃven vartʰ ertʰni 
me matʰʃi da ʃen tʃemʃi ratʰa srulqopʰilni iqvnen ertʰʃi da ratʰa itsʰodes sopʰelma rom ʃen momavline da ise ʃeiqvare isini roɡortsʰ me ʃemiqvare 
mamao msurs rom sadatsʰ me var isinitsʰ tʃemtʰan iqvnen romelnitsʰ ʃen mometsʰi ratʰa naxon tʃemi dideba romelitsʰ ʃen mometsʰi radɡan ʃemiqvare sopʰlis dapʰudznebamde 
mamao martʰalo sopʰelma ar ʃeɡitsʰno me ki ʃeɡitsʰan da amatʰatsʰ ʃeitsʰnes rom ʃen momavline 
me vautsqe matʰ ʃeni saxeli da kvlavatsʰ vautsqeb ratʰa siqvaruli romlitʰatsʰ ʃemiqvare iqos matʰʃi da me matʰʃi viqo 
es tʰkʰva iesom da ɡavida tʰavis motsapʰeebtʰan ertʰad kedronis xevs ɡaɣma sadatsʰ baɣi iqo romelʃitsʰ ʃevidnen tʰvitʰon da misi motsapʰeebi 
itsʰoda iudamatsʰ misma ɡamtsʰemma es adɡili radɡan ieso da misi motsapʰeebi xʃirad ikribebodnen ikʰ 
iudam ki tsaiqvana razmi da mɣvdelmtʰavartʰa da pʰariseveltʰaɡan mxlebelni da mividnen ikʰ lamprebitʰ tʃiraɣdnebitʰa da sacurvelitʰ 
iesom itsʰoda qvelapʰeri ratsʰ moeloda da ɡamovida da utʰxra matʰ vis edzebtʰ 
miuɡes mas ieso nazarevels eubneba matʰ me var misi ɡamtsʰemi iudatsʰ matʰtʰan idɡa 
rotsʰa utʰxra me varo daixies ukan da mitsaze daemxen 
kvlav hkitʰxa matʰ vis edzebtʰ matʰ utʰxres ieso nazarevels 
miuɡo iesom ɡitʰxaritʰ me var metʰkʰi me tʰu medzebtʰ eseni ɡauʃvitʰ tsavidnen 
ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo misi natʰkʰvami sitqva vintsʰ ʃen mometsʰi matʰɡan aravin damiɣupavs 
simon petrem romelsatsʰ maxvili hkʰonda amoiɣo da dahkra mɣvdelmtʰavris monas da mardʒvena quri tʃamoatʰala monas malkʰosi erkʰva 
utʰxra iesom petres tʃaaɡe maxvili kʰarkʰaʃʃi sasmisi romelitsʰ mamam momtsʰa ar ʃevsva 
maʃin razmma atʰasistʰavma da iudeveltʰa mxleblebma ʃeipqres ieso da ʃekres 
da pirvelad anastʰan tsaiqvanes is iqo simamri kaiapʰasi romelitsʰ mɣvdelmtʰavari iqo im tselitsads 
es is kaiapʰa iqo romelmatsʰ iudevelebs urtʃia umdʒobesia ertʰi katsʰi mokvdes xalxistʰviso 
iesos mihqvebodnen simon petre da sxva motsapʰe is motsapʰe mɣvdelmtʰavris natsʰnobi iqo da iesostʰan ertʰad mɣvdelmtʰavris ezoʃi ʃevida 
petre ki kars ɡaretʰ idɡa ʃemdeɡ sxva motsapʰe mɣvdelmtʰavris natsʰnobi ɡamovida ɡadaulaparaka mekare kʰals da petre ʃeiqvana 
eubneba petres mxevali mekare ɡana ʃentsʰ im katsʰis motsapʰetʰaɡani ara xar eubneba iɡi ara var 
idɡnen monebi da msaxurni da nakvertsʰxlebi ɡaeɣvivebinatʰ radɡan sitsʰive iqo da tʰbebodnen petretsʰ matʰtʰan idɡa da tʰbeboda 
mɣvdelmtʰavarma hkitʰxa iesos mis motsapʰeebze da mis modzɣvrebaze 
miuɡo mas iesom me aʃkarad velaparakebodi sopʰels da mudam vastsavlidi sinaɡoɡasa da tadzarʃi sadatsʰ qvela iudeveli ikribeba pʰarulad arapʰeri milaparakia 
me ras mekitʰxebi hkitʰxe msmenelebs ras velaparakebodi matʰ aha matʰ itsʰian rasatsʰ vambobdi 
am sitqvebs rom ambobda ertʰma msaxurtʰaɡanma ikʰ mdɡomma ɡaartqa iesos da utʰxra ase pasuxob mɣvdelmtʰavars 
miuɡo iesom tʰu tsʰudad vtʰkʰvi daamotsme tsʰudi da tʰu karɡad rada mtsʰem 
anam ʃebocili ɡaɡzavna iɡi mɣvdelmtʰavar kaiapʰastʰan 
simon petre ki idɡa da tʰbeboda utʰxres mas ʃentsʰ misi motsapʰetʰaɡani ara xar uarqo da tʰkʰva ara var 
mɣvdelmtʰavris ertʰertʰma monam petrem rom quri tʃamoatʰala imis natʰesavma utʰxra ɡana mastʰan ertʰad ar ɡnaxe baɣʃi 
petrem kvlav uarqo da mqisve mamalma iqivla 
kaiapʰasɡan ieso pretoriumʃi tsaiqvanes adre iqo da pretoriumʃi ar ʃesulan ratʰa ar ɡautsmidurebuliqvnen rom pasekʰis cama ʃesdzlebodatʰ 
ɡamovida pilate matʰtʰan ɡaretʰ da tʰkʰva ra bralsa sdebtʰ am katsʰs 
miuɡes da utʰxres mas es rom borotmokʰmedi ar iqos ar ɡadmoɡtsʰemditʰ 
utʰxra matʰ pilatem tsaiqvanetʰ tʰkʰventʰan da tʰkʰveni rdʒulitʰ ɡanikitʰxetʰ utʰxres mas iudevelebma tʃven aravis mokvlis upʰleba ara ɡvakʰvs 
ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo iesos sitqva romelitsʰ tʰkʰva imis misaniʃneblad tʰu roɡori sikvdilitʰ unda momkvdariqo 
pilate kvlav ʃevida pretoriumʃi iesos daudzaxa da utʰxra mas ʃena xar iudeveltʰa mepʰe 
miuɡo iesom ʃenitʰ ambob amas tʰu sxvebma ɡitʰxres tʃemze 
miuɡo pilatem ɡana me iudeveli var ʃenma erma da mɣvdelmtʰavrebma ɡadmomtsʰes ʃeni tʰavi ra ɡakʰvs tʃadenili 
miuɡo iesom tʃemi mepʰoba ar aris am sopʰlisa tʃemi mepʰoba rom am sopʰlisa qopʰiliqo maʃin tʃemi mxlebelni ibrdzolebdnen rom iudevelebs xelʃi ar tʃavvardnodi ara tʃemi mepʰoba saakʰao ar aris 
utʰxra mas pilatem maʃ mepʰe xar miuɡo iesom ʃen tʰavad ambob rom mepʰe var me imitom davibade da imitom movedi sopʰelʃi rom ceʃmariteba davamotsmo qvela vintsʰ ceʃmaritebisɡanaa ismens tʃems xmas 
eubneba mas pilate ra aris ceʃmariteba es tʰkʰva da kvlav ɡamovida iudevelebtʰan da utʰxra matʰ veravitʰar brals ver vpoulob masʃi 
xom ɡakʰvtʰ tʃveuleba rom pasekʰze ertʰi ɡaɡitʰavisupʰlotʰ ɡsurtʰ rom ɡaɡitʰavisupʰlotʰ iudeveltʰa mepʰe 
kvlav aqvirdnen da tʰkʰves es ki ara baraba baraba ki avazaki iqo 
maʃin tsaiqvana pilatem ieso da ɡaaʃoltvina 
dʒariskatsʰebma eklis ɡvirɡvini datsnes da tʰavze daadɡes da dzotseuli moaxures 
midiodnen mastʰan da eubnebodnen ɡixarodes iudeveltʰa mepʰev da saxeʃi stsʰemdnen 
kvlav ɡamovida pilate ɡaretʰ da utʰxra matʰ aha me ɡamomqavs iɡi tʰkʰventʰan ratʰa itsʰodetʰ rom veravitʰar brals ver vpoulob masʃi 
ɡamovida ieso ɡaretʰ eklis ɡvirɡvinitʰ da dzotseulitʰ ʃemosili da utʰxra matʰ pilatem aha katsʰi 
rotsʰa ixiles iɡi mɣvdelmtʰavrebma da mxleblebma iqvires dʒvars atsʰvi dʒvars atsʰvi eubneba matʰ pilate tʰavad tsaiqvanetʰ da atsʰvitʰ dʒvars vinaidan me ver vpoulob masʃi brals 
miuɡes mas iudevelebma tʃven ɡvakʰvs rdʒuli da tʃveni rdʒulitʰ unda mokvdes vinaidan tʰavi ɣvtʰis dzed ɡaixada 
rotsʰa moismina pilatem es sitqva upʰro ʃeeʃinda 
kvlav ʃevida pretoriumʃi da utʰxra iesos saidan xar maɡram iesom pasuxi ar ɡastsʰa mas 
eubneba mas pilate me ar melaparakebi ɡana ar itsʰi rom xelmtsipʰeba makʰvs ʃens ɡantevebaze da ʃens dʒvartsʰmaze 
miuɡo iesom aravitʰari xelmtsipʰeba ar ɡekʰneba tʃemze maɣlidan tʰu ar moɡetsʰa amitom mas vintsʰ tʃemi tʰavi ɡadmoɡtsʰa ʃen upʰro didi tsʰodva akʰvs 
amis ʃemdeɡ pilate ʃeetsʰada mis ɡatʰavisupʰlebas maɡram iudevelebi aqvirdnen da tʰkʰves tʰu amas ɡaatʰavisupʰleb ara xar meɡobari keisrisa radɡan vintsʰ mepʰed xdis tʰavs keisars eurtʃeba 
pilatem rom es sitqvebi moismina ieso ɡaretʰ ɡaiqvana da dadʒda msadʒulis taxtze adɡilze romelsatsʰ kʰvapʰenili etsodeboda ebraulad ki ɡabatʰa 
pasekʰis paraskevi iqo ikʰneboda meekʰvse saatʰi da utʰxra iudevelebs aha tʰkʰveni mepʰe 
matʰ ki iqvires ʃors ʃors dʒvars atsʰvi eubneba matʰ pilate tʰkʰveni mepʰe vatsʰva dʒvars miuɡes mɣvdelmtʰavrebma tʃven ar ɡvqavs mepʰe ɡarda keisrisa 
maʃin ɡadastsʰa matʰ dʒvarze satsʰmelad da tsaiqvanes ieso 
tʰavad moikida dʒvari da ɡavida tʰxemis adɡilze romelsatsʰ ebraulad ɡolɡotʰa hkʰvia 
sadatsʰ dʒvars atsʰves iɡi mastʰan ertʰad akʰetʰ ikʰitʰ ori sxva ʃuaʃi ki ieso 
pilatem tsartseratsʰ ɡaaketʰebina pʰitsʰarze da dʒvars miamaɡra etsera ieso nazareveli iudeveltʰa mepʰe 
bevri iudeveli kitʰxulobda am tsartseras radɡan iesos dʒvartsʰmis adɡili axlos iqo kʰalakʰtʰan da datserili iqo ebraulad romaulad da berdznulad 
utʰxres pilates iudevelma mɣvdelmtʰavrebma nu datser iudeveltʰa mepʰe aramed roɡortsʰ tʰavad tʰkʰva iudeveltʰa mepʰe var 
miuɡo pilatem ratsʰ davtsere davtsere 
dʒariskatsʰebma rotsʰa dʒvars atsʰves ieso aiɣes misi samoseli da ɡaqves otʰx tsilad tʰitʰoeul dʒariskatsʰs ʃexvda tʰitʰo tsili da tsʰalke iqo kvartʰi kvartʰi ki ukerveli iqo tʰavidan bolomde nakʰsovi 
utʰxres ertʰmanetʰs nu davxevtʰ tsili vqarotʰ masze vnaxotʰ vis ʃexvdeba ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo tserili ɡainatsiles tʃemi samoseli da tsili hqares tʃems kvartʰze dʒariskatsʰebmatsʰ ase ɡaaketʰes 
idɡnen iesos dʒvartʰan dedamisi dedamisis da mariam kleopasi da mariam maɡdaleli 
iesom dainaxa ikʰ mdɡomi deda da motsapʰe romelitsʰ uqvarda da eubneba dedas kʰalo aha ʃeni dze 
mere motsapʰes eubneba aha dedaʃeni da motsapʰem maʃinve tʰavistʰan tsaiqvana iɡi 
amis ʃemdeɡ itsʰoda ra iesom rom ukve dasrulda qvelapʰeri tserilis aɣsasruleblad tʰkʰva mtsquria 
ikʰ dzmritʰ savse curceli idɡa dzmritʰ ɡaʒɣentʰili ɣrubeli tsamoatsʰves usups da pirtʰan miutanes 
rotsʰa miiɣo dzmari iesom tʰkʰva aɣsrulda da miidrika tʰavi da suli ɡanuteva 
iudevelebma raki paraskevi iqo da ɡvamebi ʃabatʰs rom ar dartʃeniliqo dʒvarze is ʃabatʰi ki didi dɣe iqo stʰxoves pilates tsvivebi daemtvriatʰ matʰtʰvis da tʃamoexsnatʰ 
movidnen dʒariskatsʰebi da tsvivebi daumtvries mastʰan ertʰad dʒvartsʰmulebs ertʰsatsʰ da meoresatsʰ 
iesostʰan misulebma rotsʰa dainaxes rom ukve momkvdariqo aɣar daumtvries tsvivebi 
maɡram ertʰma dʒariskatsʰma ʃubitʰ ɡauɡmira pʰerdi da mqisve ɡadmoskda sisxli da tsqali 
mxilvelma daamotsma es da misi motsmoba ceʃmaritia man itsʰis rom ceʃmaritebas ambobs ratʰa tʰkʰven irtsmunotʰ 
radɡan es moxda ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo tserili misi dzvali ar ʃeimusreba 
aseve sxva tserilitsʰ ambobs ʃexedaven mas romelsatsʰ uɡmires 
amis ʃemdeɡ stʰxova pilates ioseb arimatʰielma romelitsʰ iesos motsapʰe iqo oɣond pʰaruli iudeveltʰa ʃiʃis ɡamo neba mietsʰa mistʰvis tsaeɣo iesos tsʰxedari pilatem dartʰo neba mivida iɡi da tsaiɣo misi tsʰxedari 
movida nikodemositsʰ utsin ɣamitʰ rom etsvia iesos da moutana asiode litra smirnisa da aloes nazavi 
aiɣes da ʃeaxvies iesos tsʰxedari tiloʃi surnelebastʰan ertʰad roɡortsʰ miɣebulia iudevelebʃi damarxvisas 
im adɡilas sadatsʰ dʒvars atsʰves iɡi baɣi iqo baɣʃi ki axali samarxi romelʃitsʰ dʒer aravin tʃaesvenebinatʰ 
ikʰ tʃaasvenes ieso iudeveltʰa paraskevis ɡamo radɡan axlos iqo samarxi 
ertʰʃabatʰs dilaadrian rotsʰa dʒer isev bneloda mivida mariam maɡdaleli samarxtʰan da xedavs rom lodi ɡadaɡorebulia samarxidan 
ɡaikʰtsʰa da mivida simon petrestʰan da sxva motsapʰestʰan romelitsʰ uqvarda iesos da utʰxra matʰ upʰali tsauɣiatʰ samarxidan da ar vitsʰitʰ sad dades 
maʃinve ɡamovidnen petre da sxva motsapʰe da mividnen samarxtʰan 
oriveni ertʰad mirbodnen maɡram meore motsapʰe petreze stsrapʰad ɡaikʰtsʰa da pirveli mivida samarxtʰan 
daixara da dainaxa datsqobili tiloebi maɡram ar ʃesula 
mivida simon petretsʰ mis ʃemdeɡ da ʃevida samarxʃi da dainaxa datsqobili tiloebi 
sudara tʰavze rom exvia im tiloebtʰan ki ar ido aramed tsʰalke iqo daxveuli ertʰ adɡilas 
maʃin ʃevida sxva motsapʰetsʰ samarxtʰan pirveli rom mivida da ixila da itsama 
radɡan akʰamde ar itsʰodnen tserilidan rom iɡi mkvdretʰitʰ unda aɣmdɡariqo 
tsavidnen kvlav tʰav tʰavistʰvis motsapʰeebi 
mariami ki idɡa samarxtʰan ɡaretʰ da tiroda da mtiriali samarxisaken daixara 
da dainaxa tʰetʰrebʃi ʃemosili ori anɡelozi msxdomareni ertʰi tʰavtʰitʰ da meore pʰerxtʰitʰ sadatsʰ iesos ɡvami esvena 
utʰxres mas kʰalo ratom stiri eubneba matʰ tʃemi upʰali tsaiɣes da ar vitsʰi sad dades 
amis tʰkʰmisas motrialda da dainaxa mdɡomare ieso maɡram ver itsʰno rom ieso iqo 
eubneba mas ieso kʰalo ratom stiri vis edzeb mas mebaɣe eɡona iɡi da eubneba mas batono tʰu ʃen tsaiɣe mitʰxari sad dade da me tsamoviɣeb 
eubneba mas ieso mariam motrialda mariami da ebraulad utʰxra rabuni ratsʰ niʃnavs modzɣvaro 
eubneba mas ieso ar ʃemexo radɡan dʒer ar avsulvar mamastʰan tsadi tʃems dzmebtʰan da utʰxari avdivar tʃems mamastʰan da tʰkʰvens mamastʰan tʃems ɣmertʰtʰan da tʰkʰvens ɣmertʰtʰan 
mariam maɡdaleli mivida da autsqa motsapʰeebs rom upʰali ixila da es utʰxra mas 
imave dɣis saɣamoʒams ertʰʃabatʰs rotsʰa iudeveltʰa ʃiʃis ɡamo daketili iqo kari sadatsʰ motsapʰeebi iqvnen mivida ieso da dadɡa ʃuaʃi da utʰxra matʰ mʃvidoba tʰkʰvenda 
es rom tʰkʰva utʃvena xelebitsʰa da pʰerditsʰ motsapʰeebma ɡaixares upʰlis xilvitʰ 
kvlav utʰxra matʰ iesom mʃvidoba tʰkʰvenda roɡortsʰ me momavlina mamam metsʰ miɡavlentʰ tʰkʰven 
es rom tʰkʰva suli ʃeubera da eubneba miiɣetʰ sulitsmida 
visatsʰ miutevebtʰ tsʰodvebs mietevebatʰ visatsʰ daukavebtʰ daekavebatʰ 
tʰoma ertʰi tʰormettʰaɡani tqupistsʰalad tsodebuli ar iqo matʰtʰan rotsʰa ieso movida 
utʰxres mas sxva motsapʰeebma tʃven vixiletʰ upʰali man utʰxra matʰ tʰu mis xelebze nalursmevs ar vixilav da nalursmevʃi sakutʰar tʰitʰs ar tʃavqopʰ da mis pʰerdʃi sakutʰar xels ar vitsameb 
rva dɣis ʃemdeɡ misi motsapʰeebi kvlav ʃin iqvnen da tʰomatsʰ matʰtʰan iqo ʃevida ieso tʃaketil karebʃi dadɡa ʃuaʃi da tʰkʰva mʃvidoba tʰkʰvenda 
mere tʰomas eubneba moita akʰ ʃeni tʰitʰi da ɡasindʒe tʃemi xelebi moita ʃeni xeli da tʃade tʃems pʰerdʃi urtsmuno ki nu ikʰnebi mortsmune iqav 
miuɡo tʰomam da utʰxra mas upʰali tʃemi da ɣmertʰi tʃemi 
eubneba mas ieso ʃen mirtsmune imitom rom mixile netar arian isini visatsʰ ar vunaxivar da mirtsmunes 
bevri sxva niʃanitsʰ moimokʰmeda iesom motsapʰeebis tsinaʃe ratsʰ am tsiɡnʃi ar datserila 
es ki daitsera ratʰa irtsmunotʰ rom ieso aris kʰriste dze ɣvtʰisa da ratʰa mortsmuneebs ɡkʰondetʰ sitsʰotsʰxle misi saxelitʰ 
amis ʃemdeɡ kvlav ɡamoetsʰxada ieso motsapʰeebs tiberiis zɣvaze ase ɡamoetsʰxada 
ertʰad iqvnen simon petre tqupistsʰalad tsodebuli tʰoma natʰanaeli ɡalileis kanadan zebedes dzeni da ori sxva misi motsapʰetʰaɡani 
eubneba matʰ simon petre satʰevzaod mivdivar utʰxres mas tʃventsʰ tsamoɡqvebitʰ ɡavidnen da tʃasxdnen navʃi im ɣames verapʰeri daicires 
ukve ɡatʰenebuli iqo da ieso idɡa napirze motsapʰeebma ki ar itsʰodnen rom es ieso iqo 
eubneba matʰ ieso ʃvilebo ara ɡakʰvtʰ sacmeli miuɡes mas ara 
utʰxra matʰ isroletʰ bade navis mardʒvena mxares da ipovitʰ isroles da veɣar ɡamoatʰries tʰevzis simravlis ɡamo 
motsapʰe romelitsʰ uqvarda iesos eubneba petres es upʰalia simon petrem rom ɡaiɡona upʰaliao mosasxami moixvia radɡan ʃiʃveli iqo da zɣvaʃi ɡadaeʃva 
sxva motsapʰeebi ki patara navitʰ movidnen radɡan ʃors ar iqvnen xmeletʰidan ase oras tsqrtʰaze da ɡamoatʰries bade tʰevzianad 
xmeletʰze rom ɡadmovidnen naxes datsqobili nakvertsʰxlebi da matʰze dadebuli tʰevzi da puri 
eubneba matʰ ieso im tʰevzisa moitanetʰ axla rom daiciretʰ 
tsavida simon petre da xmeletʰze ɡamoatʰria bade savse as ormotsʰdatsʰameti didi tʰevzitʰ da simravlis miuxedavad bade ar ɡaxeula 
eubneba matʰ ieso moditʰ isauzmetʰ motsapʰetʰaɡan vertsʰ ertʰma ver ɡabeda ekitʰxa vin xaro radɡan itsʰodnen rom upʰali iqo 
mivida ieso aiɣo puri da mistsʰa matʰ aseve tʰevzitsʰ 
es ukve mesamed ɡamoetsʰxada ieso motsapʰeebs mkvdretʰitʰ aɣmdɡari 
rom isauzmes ieso eubneba simon petres simon ioaneso amatʰze metad ɡiqvarvar eubneba mas diax upʰalo ʃen itsʰi rom miqvarxar eubneba mas adzove tʃemi kravebi 
eubneba mas kvlav meored simon ioaneso ɡiqvarvar eubneba mas diax upʰalo ʃen itsʰi rom miqvarxar eubneba mas damtsqse tʃemi tsʰxvrebi 
eubneba mas mesamed simon ioaneso ɡiqvarvar petre daɣonda mesamed rom utʰxra ɡiqvarvar da eubneba mas upʰalo ʃen qvelapʰeri itsʰi itsʰi rom miqvarxar eubneba mas ieso adzove tʃemi tsʰxvrebi 
ceʃmaritad ceʃmaritad ɡeubnebi ʃen sanam axalɡazrda iqavi ʃen tʰvitʰon ʃemoirtqamdi sartqels da midiodi sadatsʰ ɡsurda rotsʰa daberdebi ɡaʃli xelebs da sxva ʃemoɡartqams sartqels da tsaɡiqvans ikʰ sadatsʰ ar ɡsurs 
es tʰkʰva imis misaniʃneblad tʰu roɡori sikvdilitʰ ɡanadidebda ɣmertʰs es rom tʰkʰva utʰxra momqevi 
motrialda petre da dainaxa rom motsapʰe romelitsʰ uqvarda iesos mosdevda matʰ stsored is misi mkerdisken rom ɡadaixara serobisas da utʰxra upʰalo vin ɡaɡtsʰemso 
es rom dainaxa petrem eubneba iesos upʰalo amas ra 
eubneba mas ieso tʰu me msurs rom dartʃes tʃems mosvlamde ʃen ra ʃen me ɡamomqevi 
da ɡavrtsʰelda es sitqva dzmebs ʃoris rom is motsapʰe ar mokvdeboda maɡram iesos ar utʰkʰvams masze ar mokvdebao aramed tʰu me msurs rom dartʃes tʃems mosvlamde ʃen rao 
es aris is motsapʰe romelitsʰ amotsmebs amas da romelmatsʰ datsera es da vitsʰitʰ rom misi motsmoba ceʃmaritia 
kidev bevri sxvatsʰ aris ratsʰ iesom moimokʰmeda romelitsʰ datsvrilebitʰ rom datseriliqo vpʰikʰrob mtʰeli sopʰelitsʰ ki ver daitevda datseril tsiɡnebs amin 
pirveli tsiɡni tʰeopʰile me ʃevadɡine qovelive imis ʃesaxeb risi ketʰeba da stsavlebatsʰ daitsqo iesom 
im dɣemde vidre amaɣldeboda sulitsmiditʰ modzɣvravda motsʰikʰulebs romlebitsʰ man amoirtʃia 
romeltʰatsʰ tsarudɡa tsʰotsʰxlad tʰavisi tandʒvis ʃemdeɡ mravali sartsmuno niʃnitʰ ormotsʰ dɣes etʃveneboda matʰ da moutʰxrobda ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelze 
da ʃekriba isini da ubrdzana ar ɡastsʰilebodnen ierusalims aramed dalodebodnen mamis aɣtʰkʰmuls razetsʰ utʰxra tʃemɡan moisminetʰ 
vinaidan ioane natʰlavda tsqlitʰ tʰkʰven ki artsʰtʰu mravali dɣis ʃemdeɡ moinatʰlebitʰ sulitsmiditʰ 
amitom ʃekrebilni ekitʰxebodnen mas am xanebʃi xom ar aɣudɡen upʰalo israels samepʰos 
utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰveni sakʰme ar aris itsʰodetʰ droebi an vadebi romelitsʰ mamam daadɡina tʰavisi xelmtsipʰebitʰ 
aramed tʰkʰven miiɣebtʰ dzalas rotsʰa ɡadmova sulitsmida tʰkʰvenze da ikʰnebitʰ tʃemi motsmeni ierusalimʃi mtʰel iudeasa da samariaʃi da kʰveqnis kidemde 
es tʰkʰva da sanam isini uqurebdnen mas amaɣlda da ɣrubelma moapʰara matʰ tʰvals 
rotsʰa isini xedavdnen mis tsʰad amaɣlebas aha tsarudɡa matʰ ori katsʰi tʰetʰri samositʰ 
utʰxres ɡalilevelo katsʰebo ras dɡaxartʰ da ʃehqurebtʰ zetsʰas es ieso romelitsʰ tʰkʰvenɡan amaɣlda zetsʰad kvlav mova iseve roɡortsʰ zetsʰad aɣmavali ixiletʰ 
maʃin isini dabrundnen ierusalimʃi zetʰisxilisad tsodebuli mtʰidan romelitsʰ mdebareobs ierusalimis axlos ʃabatʰis ɡzaze 
ʃesvlistʰanave avidnen zedatʰvalʃi sadatsʰ imqopʰebodnen petre da ioane iakobi da andria pʰilipe da tʰoma bartʰlome da matʰe iakob alpʰesi da simon moʃurne da iuda iakobisa 
isini qvelani ertʰsulovnad ɡamudmebul lotsʰva vedrebaʃi iqvnen dedakatsʰebtʰan iesos dedastʰan mariamtʰan da mis dzmebtʰan ertʰad 
im dɣeebʃi tsamodɡa petre ʃekrebil dzmebs ʃoris da tʰkʰva ikʰneboda im adɡilas sul asotsʰamde katsʰi 
katsʰno dzmano unda aɣsrulebuliqo tserili ratsʰ tsinastsar tʰkʰva sulitsmidam davitʰis piritʰ iudaze romelitsʰ tsaudzɣva iesos ʃempqroblebs 
vinaidan iɡi tʃaritsʰxuli iqo tʃventʰan da tsilad xvda es samsaxuri 
man ʃeidzina mitsa usamartʰlobis sazɣaurad da rotsʰa daenartsʰxa ʃuaze ɡaskda da mtʰeli ʃiɡneuloba ɡadmoepʰanta 
es tsʰnobili ɡaxda ierusalimis qvela mkvidrisatʰvis amɡvarad matʰs sakutʰar enaze etsoda im mitsas xakeldama anu sisxlis qana 
vinaidan pʰsalmuntʰa tsiɡnʃi stseria ɡatialdes misi saxl kari nu ikʰneba masʃi mkvidri da misi ɡansaɡebeli sxvam miiɣos 
amɡvarad dʒer ars im katsʰtʰaɡan vintsʰ mudam tʰan ɡvaxldnen rotsʰa tʃvens ʃoris dadioda upʰali ieso 
ioanes natʰlistsʰemidan moqolebuli tʃvenɡan misi amaɣlebis dɣemde ertʰ ertʰi matʰɡani ɡaxdes tʃventʰan ertʰad misi aɣdɡomis motsme 
da daaqenes orni iosebi barʃabad tsodebuli romelsatsʰ iustosi ʃearkʰves da matʰia 
ilotsʰes da tʰkʰves upʰalo qvelas ɡultʰamxilvelo ɡvitʃvene am ortʰaɡan ertʰi romelitsʰ ʃen amoirtʃie 
rom miiɣos adɡili am msaxurebisa da motsʰikʰulobisa romelsatsʰ ɡamoaklda iuda ratʰa tʰavis adɡilze tsasuliqo 
da tsili uqares matʰ da erɡo tsili matʰias da mietʰvala tʰertʰmet motsʰikʰuls 
ormotsʰdameatʰe dɣe rom sruldeboda qvelani ertʰad iqvnen imave adɡilas 
da ikʰmna moulodnelad xmauri zetsʰidan tʰitʰkʰos dzlierma kʰarma daberao da aavso mtʰeli saxli sadatsʰ isini isxdnen 
da etʃvenatʰ matʰ ɡaqopʰili enebi tʰitʰkʰos tsʰetsʰxlisani da satʰitʰaod moepʰina qovel matʰɡans 
qvelani aɣivsnen sulitsmiditʰ da itsqes laparaki sxvadasxva enebze roɡortsʰ suli ametqvelebda matʰ 
xolo ierusalimʃi tsʰxovrobdnen iudevelni ɣvtʰis moʃiʃi katsʰebi qvela xalxtʰaɡan romelnitsʰ ki tsʰiskʰveʃetʰʃi arian 
rotsʰa es xmauri moxda bevrma moiqara tʰavi da ʃeʃpʰotʰda vinaidan tʰitʰoeuli ismenda roɡor metqvelebdnen mis sakutʰar enaze 
qvelani ɡaoɡnebuli iqvnen da ukvirdatʰ ambobdnen ɡana qvela eseni vintsʰ laparakoben ɡalilevelebi ar arian 
roɡor ɡvesmis tʰitʰoeul tʃvenɡans sakutʰar enaze romelʃitsʰ viʃvitʰ 
partʰni da midielni qelamelni da mkvidrni ʃuamdinaretʰisa iudeisa kabadukiisa pontosi da aziisa 
pʰriɡiisa da pampʰiliisa eɡviptisa da kvirineis mxares mdebare libiis olkʰebisa da romidan amosulni 
iudevelni da rdʒulʃetsʰvlilni kretelni da arabebi vusmentʰ matʰ tʃven tʃveni enebitʰ rom laparakoben ɣvtʰis diad sakʰmeebze 
ɡaoɡnda qvela da saɡonebelʃi tʃatsʰvivdnen ertʰmanetʰs eubnebodnen netav es ras unda niʃnavdes 
sxvebi ki datsʰinvitʰ ambobdnen tkbilitʰ arian ɡamtqvralni 
xolo tʰertʰmettʰan ertʰad mdɡomi petre tsamodɡa xma aɣimaɣla da utʰxra matʰ iudevelno da ierusalimis qvela mkvidrno iqos es tʰkʰventʰvis tsʰnobili da quri dauɡdetʰ tʃems sitqvebs 
isini ar arian mtʰvralebi roɡortsʰ tʰkʰven ɡɡoniatʰ vinaidan axla dɣis mesame saatʰia 
maɡram esaa natʰkʰvami ioel tsinastsarmetqvelis mier 
ikʰneba ukanasknel dɣeebʃi ambobs ɣmertʰi rom tʃemi sulisaɡan movapʰen qvela xortsʰielze da itsinastsarmetqveleben tʰkʰveni dzeni da tʰkʰveni asulni da tʰkʰveni cabukni tʃvenebas ixilaven da tʰkʰvens moxutsʰebulebs sizmrebi daesizmrebatʰ 
tʃems monebze da tʃems mxevlebze movapʰen im dɣeebʃi tʃemi sulisaɡan da atsinastsarmetqveldebian 
vatʃveneb sastsaulebs maɣla tsʰaʃi da niʃnebs dabla mitsaze sisxlsa da tsʰetsʰxls da kvamlis bolkʰvebs 
mze tsqvdiadad ikʰtsʰeva da mtʰvare sisxlad vidre dadɡebodes upʰlis dɣe diadi da ɡatsʰxadebuli 
da ikʰneba qoveli vintsʰ mouxmobs upʰlis saxels ɡadartʃeba 
katsʰno israelianno isminetʰ es sitqvebi ieso nazareveli katsʰi damtkitsʰebuli ɣvtʰisaɡan tʰkʰventʰvis dzalitʰ sastsaulebitʰa da niʃnebitʰ romlebitsʰ ɣmertʰma moaxdina misi xelitʰ tʰkʰvens ʃoris roɡortsʰ tʰvitʰonve itsʰitʰ 
iɡi ɣvtʰis ɡantʃinebuli zraxvitʰ da tsinastsartsʰnobitʰ ɡadatsʰemuli urdʒulotʰa xelitʰ mialursmetʰ da mokalitʰ 
maɡram ɣmertʰma aɣadɡina iɡi ʃexsna ra sikvdilis borkilebi vinaidan sikvdili mas ver daakavebda 
vinaidan davitʰi ambobs masze tʃems tsinaʃe vxedavdi qoveltʰvis upʰals radɡan is tʃems mardʒvnivaa ratʰa ar ʃevdrke 
amitom ɡaixara tʃemma ɡulma da ɡamxiarulda tʃemi ena tʃemi xortsʰitsʰ ki sasoebitʰ iʃvebs 
vinaidan tʃems suls ar miatoveb dʒodʒoxetʰʃi da ar ɡaimeteb ʃens tsmidas xrətsnilebis saxilvelad 
ʃen ʃematsʰnobine tsʰxovrebis ɡza sixarulitʰ aɣmavseb ʃeni saxis tsinaʃe 
katsʰno dzmano aʃkarad unda ɡitʰxratʰ mamamtʰavar davitʰze rom is aɣesrula da daikrdzala da dɣevandlamde tʃvens ʃorisaa misi samarxi 
raki tsinastsarmetqveli iqo da itsʰoda rom pʰitsʰitʰ ʃehpʰitsʰa mas ɣmertʰma rom misi sazardulis naqopʰs dasvamda mis taxtze 
man tsinastsarxedvitʰ tʰkʰva kʰristes aɣdɡomaze rom mitovebuli ar aris dʒodʒoxetʰʃi da mis xortsʰs ar uxilavs xrətsnileba 
es ieso aɣadɡina ɣmertʰma risi motsmenitsʰ tʃven qvelani vartʰ 
amɡvarad ɣvtʰis mardʒvenitʰ amaɣlebulma mamisaɡan miiɣo sulitsmidis aɣtʰkʰma da mohpʰina is rasatsʰ tʰkʰven xedavtʰ da ismentʰ 
davitʰi xom ar amaɣlebula zetsʰad tʰvitʰonve ambobs utʰxra upʰalma tʃems upʰals dadʒekʰi tʃems mardʒvniv 
vidre ʃens mtrebs davamxobde ʃens pʰerxtʰa kvartsʰxlbekad 
amriɡad mtkitsʰed itsʰodes israelis mtʰelma saxlma rom ɣmertʰma ɡaxada upʰlad da kʰristed es ieso romelitsʰ tʰkʰven dʒvars atsʰvitʰ 
es rom moismines ɡulze moxvdatʰ da utʰxres petresa da danartʃen motsʰikʰulebs roɡor movikʰtsʰetʰ katsʰno dzmano 
xolo petrem moinanietʰ da qoveli tʰkʰvenɡani moinatʰlos ieso kʰristes saxelitʰ tsʰodvebis misateveblad da miiɣebtʰ sulitsmidis nics 
vinaidan tʰkʰven ɡekutʰvnitʰ aɣtʰkʰma da tʰkʰvens ʃvilebs da qvela ʃoreuls visatsʰ ki mouxmobs upʰali ɣmertʰi tʃveni 
da mravali sxva sitqvitʰatsʰ umotsmebda ʃeaɡonebda da eubneboda ixsenitʰ tʰavi am ɡarqvnili modɡmisaɡano 
amriɡad vintsʰ miiɣo misi sitqva moinatʰlnen da im dɣes ʃeemata sami atʰasamde suli 
da iqvnen isini ɡamudmebitʰ motsʰikʰultʰa modzɣvrebaʃi tʰanamoziarobaʃi puris ɡatexasa da lotsʰvebʃi 
qoveli suli ʃiʃitʰ iqo motsʰuli da mravali sastsauli da niʃani xdeboda motsʰikʰultʰa mier 
qvela mortsmune ertʰad iqo da qvelapʰeri saertʰo hkʰondatʰ 
kʰonebas da sartʃo sabads hqiddnen da unatsilebdnen qvelas saciroebisamebr 
dɣeniadaɡ ertʰsulovnad tadzarʃi imqopʰebodnen saxlebʃi texdnen purs iɣebdnen sazrdels mxiarulebitʰ da ɡulubraloebitʰ 
akʰebdnen ɣmertʰs da mtʰeli xalxis tʰvalʃi madls hpovebdnen upʰali ki qovel dɣe umatebda daxsnilebs matʰ ritsʰxvs 
petre da ioane adiodnen tadzarʃi lotsʰvis metsʰxre saatʰze 
iqo katsʰi vinme dedis mutsʰlidanve sapqari qoveldɣe mohqavdatʰ iɡi da svamdnen tadzris kartʰan romelsatsʰ mʃvenieri etsodeboda ratʰa tadzarʃi ʃemomsvleltʰaɡan motsqaleba etʰxova 
rotsʰa dainaxa tadzarʃi ʃemavali petre da ioane stʰxova matʰ motsqaleba 
petre ioanestʰan ertʰad daakvirda mas da utʰxra ʃemoɡvxede tʃven 
iɡi daʒinebitʰ uqurebda matʰ im imeditʰ rom raimes ɡamortʃeboda 
utʰxra petrem vertsʰxli da okʰro ara makʰvs xolo ratsʰ makʰvs imas ɡadzlev ieso kʰriste nazarevelis saxelitʰ ɡaiare 
mardʒvenaze mohkida xeli da tsamoaqena da mas utsʰbad ɡaumaɡrda pʰexebi da kocebi 
tsamoxta dadɡa da siaruli daitsqo matʰtʰan ertʰad ʃevida tadzarʃi dadioda xtoda da akʰebda ɣmertʰs 
da xedavda mtʰeli xalxi mas moarulsa da ɣvtʰis makʰebars 
itsʰnes iɡi rom es iqo tadzris mʃvenier karibcestʰan motsqalebis satʰxovrad mdʒdomi isini ʃiʃitʰ aɣvsilni da ɡaoɡnebulni iqvnen imis ɡamo ratsʰ mas ʃeemtʰxva 
da raki iɡi tʃabɣaucebuli iqo petresa da ioanes mtʰeli xalxi ɡantsʰvipʰrebuli miatsqda matʰ solomonis stoaʃi roɡortsʰ itsodeba 
dainaxa petrem da upasuxa xalxs katsʰno israelianno rad ɡikvirtʰ es anda ratom ɡviqurebtʰ ase ɡana tʃveni sakutʰari dzalitʰ da sitsmiditʰ davatsqebinetʰ mas siaruli 
abraamis isakisa da iakobis ɣmertʰma tʃveni mamebis ɣmertʰma ɡanadida tʰavisi msaxuri ieso romelitsʰ tʰkʰven ɡaetsʰitʰ da uarqavitʰ pilates tsinaʃe rotsʰa iɡi apirebda mis ɡatʰavisupʰlebas 
tʰkʰven uarqavitʰ tsmida da martʰali da moitʰxovetʰ rom katsʰismkvleli etʃukʰebina tʰkʰventʰvis 
sitsʰotsʰxlis tsinamdzɣvari mohkalitʰ romelitsʰ ɣmertʰma aɣadɡina mkvdretʰitʰ risi motsmenitsʰ tʃven vartʰ 
misi saxelis rətsmenitʰ misma saxelma ɡaamaɡra es katsʰi romelsatsʰ tʰkʰven xedavtʰ da itsʰnobtʰ da misma rətsmenam mistsʰa mas es simrtʰele qoveli tʰkʰvenɡanis tʰvaltsin 
axla vitsʰi dzmebo rom tʰkʰven roɡortsʰ tʰkʰvenma mtʰavrebma umetsʰrebitʰ tʃaidinetʰ es 
xolo ɣmertʰma roɡortsʰ tsindatsin ɡvamtsʰno qvela tʰavisi tsinastsarmetqvelis piritʰ rom kʰriste unda tsamebuliqo aseve aɣasrula kidetsʰ 
aba moinanietʰ da moikʰetsʰitʰ rom aɣixotsʰos tʰkʰveni tsʰodvebi 
ratʰa dadɡes ɡanaxlebis dɣeebi upʰlis pirisaɡan da moɡivlinotʰ man tʰkʰventʰvis tsinastsar ɡantsesebuli kʰriste ieso 
romelitsʰ zetsʰam unda miiɣos vidre qvelapʰeri aɣdɡebodes rasatsʰ ɣmertʰi dasabamidan ambobda tʰavis tsmida tsinastsarmetqveltʰa piritʰ 
vinaidan mosem tʰkʰva tsinastsarmetqvels roɡoritsʰ me var aɣɡidɡentʰ tʰkʰveni upʰali ɣmertʰi tʰkʰvens dzmatʰaɡan ɡauɡonetʰ mas qvelapʰeri rasatsʰ ɡetqvitʰ 
da moxdeba rom qoveli suli vintsʰ ar ɡauɡonebs im tsinastsarmetqvels moikvetʰeba xalxidan 
qvela tsinastsarmetqvelni samuelidan da mas akʰetʰ ramdens laparakobdnen da aseve tsinastsar iutsqebodnen am dɣeebze 
tʰkʰven xartʰ dzeni tsinastsarmetqveltʰa da im aɣtʰkʰmisa romelitsʰ aɣutʰkʰva ɣmertʰma tʰkʰvens mamebs rotsʰa utʰxra abraams ʃens tʰeslʃi ikurtʰxeba mitsis qoveli tomi 
ɣmertʰma aɣadɡina ra tʰavisi msaxuri pirvelad tʰkʰven moɡivlinatʰ tʰkʰvens sakurtʰxeblad ratʰa moɡakʰtsʰiotʰ qoveli tʰkʰveni boroti sakʰmidan 
rotsʰa isini xalxs elaparakebodnen tʰavs daadɡnen matʰ mɣvdlebi tadzris mtsʰveltʰa upʰrosi da sadukevelni 
ɡabrazebulni xalxs rom astsavlidnen da ukʰadaɡebdnen iesos mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡomas 
da daades xelebi matʰ da datsʰvas tʃaabares meore dɣemde vinaidan ukve saɣamovdeboda 
bevrma ki vintsʰ ismina sitqva irtsmuna matʰma ritsʰxvma xutʰi atʰasamde miaɣtsia 
meore dɣes ierusalimʃi ʃeikribnen matʰi mtʰavrebi uxutsʰesebi da mtsiɡnobrebi 
da ana mɣvdelmtʰvari da kaiapʰa ioane da alekʰsandre aɡretʰve sxvebi mɣvdelmtʰavris modɡmidan 
ʃuaʃi tʃaiqenes isini da ekitʰxebodnen romeli dzalitʰ an visi saxelitʰ tʃaidinetʰ es 
maʃin petre aɣivso sulitsmiditʰ da utʰxra matʰ xalxis mtʰavarno da uxutsʰesno 
tʰu dɣes tʃven moɡvetʰxoveba pasuxi am udzluri katsʰisatʰvis ɡatseul siketʰeze tʰu roɡor ɡanikurna iɡi 
tsʰxadi iqos qvela tʰkʰvenɡanisa da mtʰeli israelis xalxisatʰvis rom iɡi tʰkʰvens tsinaʃe dʒanmrtʰeli dɡas ieso kʰriste nazarevelis saxelitʰ romelitsʰ tʰkʰven dʒvars atsʰvitʰ da romelitsʰ ɣmertʰma aɣadɡina mkvdretʰitʰ 
es aris kʰva romelitsʰ ukuaɡdetʰ tʰkʰven maʃeneblebma da romelitsʰ kʰvakutʰxedad ikʰtsʰa 
sxvaʃi aravisʃi ar arsebobs xsna artsʰ aris tsʰis kʰveʃ xalxisatʰvis mitsʰemuli sxva saxeli romlitʰatsʰ ɡadavrtʃebitʰ 
rotsʰa xedavdnen petresa da ioanes esoden simtkitsʰes da mixvdnen rom isini utsiɡnuri da ubralo adamianebi arian ɡaukvirdatʰ tʰanatsʰ itsʰodnen rom isini iesostʰan namqopʰebi iqvnen 
xolo matʰtʰan mdɡom ɡankurnebul katsʰs rom xedavdnen satsinaaɣmdeɡos verapʰers eubnebodnen 
ubrdzanes matʰ sinedrionidan ɡasvla da ertʰmanetʰʃi itsqes msdʒeloba 
ambobdnen ra vuqotʰ am xalxs matʰi xelitʰ rom moxda es tsʰxadi sastsauli tsʰnobilia ierusalimis qoveli mkvidristʰvis da amas tʃven ver uarvqopʰtʰ 
maɡram upʰro metad rom ar ɡaxmaurdes es xalxʃi davemukʰrotʰ matʰ rom katsʰiʃvils aɣar elaparakon am saxelitʰ 
daudzaxes matʰ da ubrdzanes amieridan aɣar elaparakatʰ da aɣar estsavlebinatʰ iesos saxelitʰ 
maɡram petrem da ioanem miuɡes da utʰxres ɡansadʒetʰ martʰebulia ɡana ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe tʰkʰven upʰro ɡisminotʰ vidre ɣmertʰs 
tʃven ar ʃeɡvidzlia ar vilaparakotʰ is ratsʰ vixiletʰ da movisminetʰ 
xolo matʰ mukʰaritʰ ɡauʃves isini radɡan ver poulobdnen mizezs matʰ dasasdʒelad xalxis ɡamo radɡan qvela adidebda ɣmertʰs momxdarisatʰvis 
vinaidan ormotsʰ tsels ɡadatsʰilebuli iqo is katsʰi romelzetsʰ moxda ɡankurnebis sastsauli 
xolo isini vintsʰ ɡauʃves mividnen tʰavisianebtʰan da uambes ras eubnebodnen matʰ mɣvdelmtʰavarni da uxutsʰesni 
matʰ ki rom mousmines ertʰsulovnad aɣimaɣles xma ɣvtʰis mimartʰ da ʃehɣaɣades ɣmertʰo ʃemokʰmedo tsʰisa da mitsisa zɣvisa da qvelapʰrisa ratsʰ matʰʃia 
tʃveni mamis ʃeni msaxuris davitʰis baɡe alaparake sulitsmiditʰ rad ʃpʰotʰaven tsarmartʰni da xalxebi ɡanizraxaven amaoebas 
aɣdɡnen mepʰeni kʰveqnisa da mtʰavrebi ertʰad ʃeikribnen upʰlisa da misi tsʰxebulis tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
vinaidan namdvilad ʃeikribnen am kʰalakʰʃi ʃeni tsmida msaxuris ʃeni tsʰxebulis iesos tsinaaɣmdeɡ herode da pontoeli pilate tsarmartʰebtʰan da israelis xalxtʰan ertʰad 
rom moemokʰmedatʰ is risi moxdenatsʰ tsinastsar ɡansazɣvra ʃenma xelma da ʃenma zraxvam 
axla ki dainaxe upʰalo matʰi mukʰara da mietsʰi ʃens monebs dzala mtʰeli ɡabedulebitʰ ilaparakon ʃeni sitqva 
rotsʰa ɡaitsvdi ʃens xels ɡansakurneblad niʃnebisa da sastsaulebis mosaxdenad ʃeni tsmida msaxuris iesos saxelitʰ 
rotsʰa lotsʰulobdnen ʃeidzra is adɡili sadatsʰ isini iqvnen ʃekrebilni da qvelani aɣivsnen sulitsmiditʰ da ɡabedulad laparakobdnen ɣvtʰis sitqvas 
mortsmunetʰa simravles ertʰi ɡuli da suli hkʰonda da aravin tʰavis kʰonebas ar utsodebda tʰavisas aramed qvelapʰeri saertʰo hkʰondatʰ 
didi dzalitʰ motsmobdnen motsʰikʰulebi upʰal iesos aɣdɡomas da didi madli iqo qovel matʰɡanze 
aravin iqo matʰ ʃoris ɡacirvebuli vinaidan qvela vintsʰ mindvrebis an saxlebis mesakutʰre iqo qidda da ɡaqidulis sapʰasuri mohkʰonda 
da debda motsʰikʰultʰa pʰerxtʰitʰ da tʰitʰoeuls unatsildeboda visatsʰ ra scirdeboda 
aseve iosebmatsʰ romelsatsʰ motsʰikʰulebma ʃearkʰves barnaba ratsʰ nuɡeʃistsʰemis dzed itʰarɡmneba levianma tsarmoʃobitʰ kviproselma 
ɡaqida tʰavisi mindori pʰuli moitana da motsʰikʰultʰa pʰerxtʰitʰ dado 
ertʰma katsʰma ki saxelad ananiam tʰavis tsʰoltʰan sapʰirastʰan ertʰad ɡaqida mindori 
da ɡadamala sapʰasuridan es misma tsʰolmatsʰ itsʰoda xolo raɣatsʰ natsili moitana da dado motsʰikʰultʰa pʰerxtʰitʰ 
utʰxra petrem anania ratom aɣavso ʃeni ɡuli satanam rom moɡetquebina sulitsmida da ɡadaɡemala mitsis sapʰasuridan 
ɡana ratsʰ ɡkʰonda ʃeni ar iqo da ɡaqidulitsʰ ʃens xelʃi ar iqo raɣatom tʃaide es sakʰme ɡulʃi adamianebs ki ar etsʰrue aramed ɣmertʰs 
amis ɡamɡone anania daetsʰa da suli ɡanuteva vintsʰ es moismina didma ʃiʃma moitsʰva qvela 
tsamodɡnen cabukebi ʃesudres iɡi ɡaitanes da damarxes 
samiode saatʰma ɡanvlo da ʃevida misi tsʰolitsʰ romelmatsʰ ar itsʰoda ra moxda 
hkitʰxa mas petrem mitʰxari ɡana amdenad ɡaqidetʰ mitsa tʰkʰva diax amdenad 
petrem utʰxra mas ratom ʃeitʰkʰvitʰ rom ɡamoɡetsʰadatʰ upʰlis suli aha karʃi dɡanan ʃeni kʰmris dammarxavtʰa pʰerxni da ʃentsʰ ɡaɡitanen 
daetsʰa iɡi utsʰbad mis pʰexebtʰan da suli ɡanuteva ʃemosulma cabukebma mkvdari ipoves iɡi ɡaitanes da kʰmris ɡverditʰ damarxes 
didma ʃiʃma moitsʰva mtʰeli eklesia da qvela vintsʰ es moismina 
motsʰikʰultʰa xelitʰ mravali niʃani da sastsauli xdeboda xalxʃi da iqvnen ertʰsulovnad qvelani solomonis stoaʃi 
danartʃentʰaɡan veravin bedavda ʃeertʰeboda matʰ maɡram akʰebda matʰ xalxi 
sul upʰro da upʰro ematebodnen upʰals mortsmuneebi mravali mamakatsʰi da dedakatsʰi 
ise rom avadmqopʰebi kʰutʃaʃi ɡamohqavdatʰ da sakatsʰeebze da satsolebze atsvendnen rom tʃavlili petres tʃrdili maintsʰ dapʰenoda romelime matʰɡans 
bevrni modiodnen ierusalimis ɡarʃemo kʰalakʰebidanatsʰ mohqavdatʰ sneulebi da utsmiduri sulebitʰ ʃepqrobilni da qvelani ikurnebodnen 
aɣdɡnen mɣvdelmatʰavari da qvela mastʰan mqopʰi romlebitsʰ sadukeveltʰa mtsvaleblobas ekutʰvnodnen da ʃuritʰ aɣivsnen 
daades xeli motsʰikʰulebs da saertʰo sapatimroʃi tʃasxes 
maɡram upʰlis anɡelozma ɣamitʰ ɡaaɣo sapqrobilis kari ɡamoiqvana isini da utʰxra 
tsaditʰ dadekʰitʰ tadzarʃi da ukʰadaɡetʰ xalxs am sitsʰotsʰxlis qoveli sitqva 
es rom moismines ɡantʰiadisas ʃevidnen tadzarʃi da astsavlidnen amasobaʃi movidnen mɣvdelmtʰavari da mastʰan mqopʰni moitsvies sinedrioni da israeliantʰa uxutsʰesebis sabco da ɡaɡzavnes sapatimroʃi matʰ mosaqvanad 
mxlebelni rom mividnen ver naxes isini sapqrobileʃi ukan ɡamobrundnen da moaxsenes 
utʰxres sapatimro saɡuldaɡulod daketili daɡvixvda da mtsʰvelebi karebtʰan mdɡomni rom ɡavaɣetʰ ʃiɡ veravin vnaxetʰ 
es sitqvebi rom esmatʰ tadzris mtsʰveltʰa upʰrossa da mɣvdelmtʰavrebs saɡonebels mietsʰnen ra unda momxdariqo 
viɣatsʰ mivida da moaxsena matʰ aɡer is katsʰebi tʰkʰven rom sapqrobileʃi tʃaamtsqvdietʰ tadzarʃi dɡanan da astsavlian xalxs 
maʃin tsavida mtsʰveltʰa upʰrosi mxleblebtʰan ertʰad da moiqvana isini idzulebis ɡareʃe vinaidan xalxisa eʃinodatʰ ar tʃaɡvkʰolono 
moiqvanes sinedrionis tsinaʃe da daaqenes da hkitʰxa matʰ mɣvdelmtʰavarma 
da utʰxra sastikad aɡikrdzaletʰ rom ar ɡestsavlebinatʰ am saxelitʰ aha tʰkʰveni modzɣvrebitʰ aavsetʰ ierusalimi da ɡindatʰ im katsʰis sisxlma ɡvitsios tʃven 
miuɡes petrem da motsʰikʰulebma da utʰxres ɣmertʰs upʰro metad unda vemortʃilebodetʰ vidre adamianebs 
tʃveni mamebis ɣmertʰma aɣadɡina ieso romelitsʰ tʰkʰven mohkalitʰ dzelze dakidebitʰ 
iɡi ɣmertʰma tsinamdzɣvrad da matsʰxovrad aɣamaɣla tʰavisi mardʒvenitʰ rom mietsʰes israels monanieba da tsʰodvebis miteveba 
da motsmeni vartʰ am sitqvebisa tʃven da sulitsmida romelitsʰ ɣmertʰma mistsʰa tʰavis mortʃiltʰ 
es rom moismines ɡanrisxdnen da moindomes matʰi daxotsʰva 
tsamodɡa sinedrionʃi ertʰi pʰariseveltʰaɡani saxelad ɡamalieli rdʒulis modzɣvari mtʰeli xalxis mier pativdebuli da brdzana motsʰikʰulebi mtsʰire xnitʰ ɡaretʰ ɡaeqvanatʰ 
utʰxra matʰ katsʰno israelianno dapʰikʰrditʰ am xalxze rasatsʰ upirebtʰ matʰ 
vinaidan am dɣeebis tsin aɣdɡa tʰevda da tʰavi did vinmed mohkʰonda da otʰxasamde katsʰi ɡahqva mas maɡram is mokles da qvela vintsʰ mortʃilebda mas ɡaipʰanta da ararad ikʰtsʰa 
amis ʃemdeɡ aɣtseris dros aɣdɡa iuda ɡalileveli da diddzali xalxi ɡaiqolia isitsʰ daiɣupa da qvela vintsʰ mas mortʃilebda ɡaipʰanta 
axla ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tʃamoʃorditʰ am xalxs da moeʃvitʰ matʰ vinaidan tʰu katsʰisaɡan aris es zraxva anda sakʰme tʃaipʰuʃeba 
xolo tʰu ɣvtʰisaɡan aris maʃin tʰkʰven ver tʃapʰuʃavtʰ mas da vaitʰu ɣvtʰis motsinaaɣmdeɡeni aɣmotʃndetʰ 
daudʒeres es da daudzaxes motsʰikʰulebs stsʰemes da ubrdzanes rom aɣar elaparakatʰ iesos saxelitʰ da ɡauʃves 
xolo isini tsavidnen sinedrionidan da uxarodatʰ rom misi saxelisatʰvis ʃeuratsʰxqopʰis ɣirsni ɡaxdnen 
qoveldɣe dautsʰxromlad astsavlidnen da axarebdnen tadzarʃi da saxlebʃi kʰriste iesos 
am dɣeebʃi rotsʰa momravldnen motsapʰeebi atqda ɡaberdznebultʰa drətvinva ebraelobis tsinaaɣmdeɡ vinaidan uɡulebelqopʰili iqo matʰi kʰvrivebis qoveldɣiuri momsaxureba 
maʃin tʰormetma moitsvia motsapʰetʰa simravle da utʰxra matʰ ar ʃeɡvʃvenis ɣvtʰis sitqvis mitoveba da supʰrebis momsaxureba 
amoirtʃietʰ dzmebo tʰkʰvenɡan ʃvidi sartsmuno sulitsmiditʰ da sibrədznitʰ aɣsavse katsʰi isini ɡavamtsesotʰ am sakʰmeze 
tʃven ki viqotʰ lotsʰvasa da sitqvis msaxurebaʃi 
mtʰel simravles moetsona es sitqva da amoirtʃies stepʰane rətsmenitʰa da sulitsmiditʰ savse katsʰi aɡretʰve pʰilipe proxori nikanori timoni parmenasi da ɡaiudevebuli antiokʰieli nikolozi 
tsarudɡines isini motsʰikʰulebs ilotsʰes da xelebi daades matʰ 
da vrtsʰeldeboda ɣvtʰis sitqva da didad mravldeboda motsapʰetʰa ritsʰxvi ierusalimʃi da mɣvdeltʰaɡanitsʰ bevri emortʃileboda rətsmenas 
stepʰane ki madlitʰ da dzalitʰ aɣsavse did sastsaulebsa da niʃnebs axdenda xalxʃi 
adɡnen zoɡiertʰebi eɡretʰ tsodebul libertineltʰa kvirineltʰa da alekʰsandrieltʰa sinaɡoɡidan zoɡiertʰebitsʰ kilikiidan da aziidan da kamatʰi dautsqes stepʰanes 
da ver ʃedzles dapirispirebodnen sibrədznesa da suls romlitʰatsʰ is laparakobda 
maʃin moisqides katsʰebi da atʰkʰmevines tʃven ɡaviɡonetʰ roɡor laparakobda iɡi moses da ɣvtʰis saɡmob sitqvebs 
aaɣelves xalxi uxutsʰesebi da mtsiɡnobrebi miuxdnen mas ʃeipqres da sinedrionʃi miiqvanes 
tsarmoudɡines tsʰru motsmeni romlebitsʰ ambobdnen es katsʰi dɣeniadaɡ am tsmida adɡilisa da rdʒulis satsinaaɣmdeɡo sitqvebs laparakobso 
vinaidan tʃven movisminetʰ roɡor ambobda rom es ieso nazareveli daarɣvevs am adɡils da ʃetsʰvlis tses tʃveulebebs romlebitsʰ mosem ɡadmoɡvtsʰao 
uqurebdnen mas qvelani sinedrionʃi msxdomni da xedavdnen mis saxes roɡortsʰ anɡelozis saxes 
utʰxra mɣvdelmtʰavarma martʰalia rasatsʰ amboben 
man tʰkʰva katsʰno dzmano da mamano isminetʰ didebis ɣmertʰi etʃvena tʃvens mamas abraams ʃuamdinaretʰʃi qopʰnisas vidre xaranʃi dasaxldeboda da utʰxra mas 
ɡamodi ʃeni kʰveqnidan da ʃeni sanatʰesaodan da tsadi im kʰveqanaʃi romelsatsʰ me ɡitʃveneb 
maʃin ɡamovida kʰaldeveltʰa kʰveqnidan da dasaxlda xaranʃi mamamisis sikvdilis ʃemdeɡ ki ɣmertʰma ɡadmoasaxla iɡi am kʰveqanaʃi sadatsʰ axla tʰkʰven saxlobtʰ 
masʃi pʰexis mosakidebeli adɡilitsʰ ki ar mistsʰa samkvidrod maɡram aɣutʰkʰva rom mistsʰemda sampʰlobelod mas da mis tʰesls mis ʃemdeɡ rotsʰa dʒer kidev ar hqavda ʃvili 
ase elaparaka ɣmertʰi rom misi tʰesli mdɡmurad ikʰneboda utsʰxo kʰveqanaʃi daimonebdnen mas da avad moekʰtsʰeodnen otʰxas tselitsads 
im xalxs ki visatsʰ daemonebian me ɡanvikitʰxav tʰkʰva ɣmertʰma da amis ʃemdeɡ ɡamovlen ikʰidan da momemsaxurebian am adɡilas 
da mistsʰa mas tsinadatsʰvetʰis aɣtʰkʰma man ʃva isaki da tsinadastsʰvitʰa mas merve dɣes xolo isakma iakobi iakobma tʰormeti mamamtʰavari 
mamamtʰavrebs ʃeʃurdatʰ iosebisa da ɡaqides iɡi eɡvipteʃi maɡram ɣmertʰi iqo mastʰan 
da ixsna iɡi qvela misi ɡasaciridan da ubodza mas madli da sibrədzne pʰaraonis eɡviptis mepʰis tsinaʃe romelmatsʰ daaqena iɡi eɡviptisa da mtʰeli tʰavisi saxlis ɡanmɡeblad 
movida ʃimʃili da didi ɡasaciri mtʰel eɡviptesa da kʰanaanʃi da tʃveni mamebi ver ʃoulobdnen sazrdos 
xolo iakobma ɡaiɡo rom eɡvipteʃi aris puri ɡaɡzavna pirvelad tʃveni mamebi 
meored tʃasvlisas ɡaumʒɣavna iosebma tʰavi tʰavis dzmebs da pʰaraonma ʃeitqo iosebis ɡvartomoba 
ɡaɡzavna iosebma da moitsvia tʰavisi mama iakobi da mtʰeli tʰavisi sanatʰesao samotsʰdatʰxutʰmeti suli 
da tʃavida iakobi eɡvipteʃi da ɡardaitsʰvala iɡi da tʃveni mamebitsʰ 
ɡadmoasvenes isini ʃekʰems da tʃaasvenes samarxʃi romelitsʰ abraamma iqida vertsʰxlis pʰasad ʃekʰemʃi emoris dzetʰaɡan 
da rotsʰa axlovdeboda aɣtʰkʰmis ʃesrulebis ʒami ɣmertʰma rom mistsʰa abraams es xalxi matulobda eɡviteʃi da mravldeboda 
vidre eɡvipteze aɣdɡeboda sxva mepʰe romelitsʰ ar itsʰnobda iosebs 
is veraɡulad ekʰtsʰeoda tʃvens modɡmas aidzulebda tʃvens mamebs ratʰa ɡadaeqaratʰ tʰaviantʰi tʃvilebi rom ar etsʰotsʰxlatʰ 
am dros daibada mose da iqo satʰno ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe sam tʰves tʰavisi mamis saxlʃi izrdeboda 
rotsʰa ɡadaaɡdes aiqvana iɡi pʰaraonis asulma da ʃvilad ɡazarda 
da ɡanistsavla mose eɡvipteltʰa mtʰeli sibrədznitʰ da iqo dzlieri tʰavisi sitqvebitʰa da sakʰmeebitʰ 
rotsʰa ormotsʰi tseli ʃeusrulda ɡulitʰ moisurva tʰavisi dzmebis israelianebis monaxuleba 
rotsʰa dainaxa rom ertʰs tʃaɡravdnen ɡamoesartʃla da im datʃaɡrulis ʃuri idzia da ɡanɡmira eɡvipteli 
eɡona miuxvdebodnen dzmebi rom ɣmertʰi misi xelitʰ ixsnida matʰ maɡram ver mixvdnen 
meore dɣes moevlina matʰ rotsʰa isini tʃxubobdnen matʰi ʃeriɡeba moindoma da utʰxra katsʰebo tʰkʰven xom dzmebi xartʰ ratom tʃaɡravtʰ ertʰmanetʰs 
maɡram moqvasis damtʃaɡvrelma xeli hkra mas da utʰxra vin daɡniʃna tʃvens mtʰavrad da msadʒulad 
xom ar ɡinda metsʰ momkla roɡortsʰ ɡuʃin eɡvipteli mokali 
am sitqvebze ɡaikʰtsʰa mose da ɡaxda mdɡmuri midiamis kʰveqanaʃi sadatsʰ ʃeedzina ori vaʒi 
rotsʰa ʃesrulda ormotsʰi tseli etʃvena mas sinais mtʰis udabnoʃi upʰlis anɡelozi almodebuli maqvlovanidan 
mosem dainaxa da ɡantsʰvipʰrda am xilvaze rotsʰa dasakvirveblad miuaxlovda iqo upʰlis xma 
me var ʃeni mamebis ɣmertʰi ɣmertʰi abraamisa isakisa da iakobisa ʃedzrtsunda mose da ver ɡabeda dakvirveba 
utʰxra mas upʰalma ɡaidzre pʰexsamosi pʰexze radɡan adɡili romelzetsʰ dɡaxar tsmida mitsaa 
me vxedav tʃemi xalxis ɡacirvebas eɡvipteʃi da mesmis misi kvnesa da tʃamovedi matʰ ɡamosaxsnelad axla tsadi me miɡavlen eɡvipteʃi 
es is mosea romelitsʰ matʰ uarqves da utʰxres vin daɡniʃna mtʰavrad da msadʒulado ɣmertʰma mtʰavrad da mxsnelad es miavlina im anɡelozis xelitʰ romelitsʰ mas maqvlovanʃi etʃvena 
man ɡamoiqvana isini da axdenda sastsaulebs da niʃnebs eɡviptis kʰveqanaʃi metsamul zɣvaze da udabnoʃi ormotsʰi tseli 
es aris mose romelmatsʰ utʰxra israelianebs tsinastsarmetqvels roɡoritsʰ me var aɣɡidɡentʰ ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni dzmebidan mas usminetʰ 
es aris vintsʰ iqo krebulʃi udabnod anɡeloztʰan ertʰad romelitsʰ mas elaparakeboda sinais mtʰaze da tʃvens mamebtʰan ertʰad vintsʰ miiɣo tsʰotsʰxali sitqvebi rom tʃventʰvis ɡadmoetsʰa 
visi mortʃilebatsʰ ar isurves tʃvenma mamebma aramed ɡanudɡnen da tʰaviantʰi ɡulebitʰ eɡviptisken miikʰtsʰnen 
utʰxres aarons ɡaɡviketʰe ɣmertʰebi romlebitsʰ tsin tsaɡvidzɣvebian vinaidan ar vitsʰitʰ ra daemartʰa am moses romelmatsʰ eɡviptis kʰveqnidan ɡamoɡviqvana 
da ɡaaketʰes im dɣeebʃi xbo ʃestsires msxverpli kerps da ʃehxarodnen tʰaviantʰi xelis kʰmnilebas 
zurɡi ʃeakʰtsʰia matʰ ɣmertʰma da tsʰiuri mxedrobis samsaxurs mianeba isini roɡortsʰ tsinastsarmetqveltʰa tsiɡnʃi stseria tʰu moɡitaniatʰ tʃemtʰvis saklavi da msxverpli udabnoʃi ormotsʰ tselitsads saxlo israelisa 
daatarebditʰ molekʰis karavs da tʰkʰveni ɣmertʰis rempʰas varskvlavs ɡamosaxulebebs romlebitsʰ tʰkʰven ɡaaketʰetʰ rom tʰaqvani ɡetsʰatʰ matʰtʰvis da metsʰ ɡadaɡasaxlebtʰ babilons ikʰitʰ 
motsmobis karavi hkʰondatʰ tʃvens mamebs udabnoʃi roɡortsʰ daudɡina moses mastʰan molaparakem ratʰa ɡaeketʰebina im saxis tʰanaxmad romelitsʰ ixila 
miiɣes iɡi tʃvenma mamebma da iesostʰan ertʰad ʃeitanes im xalxtʰa samkvidrebelʃi romlebitsʰ ɣmertʰma ɡandevna tʃveni mamebis tsinaʃe ase iqo davitʰis dɣeebamde 
man hpova madli ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe da stʰxovda nebas rom iakobis ɣvtʰistʰvis savane epova 
saxli ki solomonma auɡo mas 
maɡram maɣali ar aris xelitʰ kʰmnilʃi damkvidrebuli roɡortsʰ tsinastsarmetqveli ambobs 
tsʰa taxtia tʃemi da kʰveqana tʃems pʰerxtʰa kvartsʰxlbeki ambobs upʰali roɡor saxls amiɡebtʰ me an romeli adɡilia tʃemi dasasvenebli adɡili 
ɡana tʃemma xelma ar ʃekʰmna qovelive es 
kʰedpʰitsʰxelno ɡulitʰ da quritʰ tsinadautsʰvetʰelno tʰkʰven qoveltʰvis etsinaaɣmdeɡebitʰ sulitsmidas roɡortsʰ tʰkʰveni mamebi aseve tʰkʰventsʰ 
romels ar devnidnen tsinastsarmetqveltʰaɡan tʰkʰveni mamebi matʰ daxotsʰes tsinastsarmautsqebelni martʰlis mosvlisa visi ɡamtsʰemebi da mkvlelebitsʰ axla tʰkʰven ɡaxditʰ 
tʰkʰven romlebmatsʰ miiɣetʰ rdʒuli anɡelozebis ɡankarɡulebitʰ da ar daitsʰavitʰ iɡi 
amas rom ismendnen ɡulze skdebodnen da kbilebs aɣrcialebdnen masze 
axeda man tsʰas aɣsavsem sulitsmiditʰ da dainaxa ɣvtʰis dideba da ɣvtʰis mardʒvniv mdɡari ieso 
da tʰkʰva aha me vxedav ɡaxsnil tsʰas da katsʰis dzes ɣvtʰis mardʒvniv mdɡars 
maɡram matʰ xmamaɣali qvirili mortʰes qurebi daitsʰves da ertʰsulovnad daedzɡernen mas 
da ɡaatʰries kʰalakʰɡaretʰ da tʃakʰoles motsmeebma tʰaviantʰi tanisamosi daatsqves ertʰi cabukis pʰerxtʰitʰ romelsatsʰ savle erkʰva 
rom kʰolavdnen stepʰane uxmobda da ambobda upʰalo ieso miibare tʃemi suli 
muxli moiqara da xmamaɣla ʃehɣaɣada upʰalo nu miutʰvli amatʰ am tsʰodvas es tʰkʰva da miidzina 
savlem moitsona misi mokvla im dɣeebʃi moxda ierusalimis eklesiis didi devna da qvela motsʰikʰultʰa ɡarda ɡaipʰanta iudeasa da samariis mxareebʃi 
dakrdzales stepʰane ɣvtʰismoʃiʃma katsʰebma da didad iɡloves iɡi 
savle ki arbevda eklesias icreboda saxlebʃi da dzalitʰ ɡamohqavda mamakatsʰebi da dedakatsʰebi da sapqrobileʃi hqrida matʰ 
amasobaʃi ɡapʰantulebi mimodiodnen da axarebdnen sitqvas 
pʰilipe tʃavida samarieltʰa kʰalakʰʃi da matʰ ukʰadaɡebda kʰristes 
xalxi ertʰsulovnad qurs uɡdebda rasatsʰ pʰilipe laparakobda usmenda da xedavda ra niʃnebs axdenda iɡi 
vinaidan mravaltʰaɡan romlebitsʰ utsmiduri sulebitʰ iqvnen ʃepqrobilni xmamaɣali qvirilitʰ ɡamodiodnen mravali davrdomili da kocli ikurneboda 
didi sixaruli iqo im kʰalakʰʃi 
imave kʰalakʰʃi iqo ertʰi katsʰi saxelad simoni romelitsʰ adreve dʒadokʰrobas etseoda da aotsʰebda samariel xalxs tʰavi did vinmed mohkʰonda 
qurs uɡdebda mas qvela didian patarianad da ambobda es is ɣvtʰiuri dzalaa didad rom itsodeba 
qurs ki imitom uɡdebdnen mas rom didi xnidan aoɡnebda matʰ dʒadokʰrobitʰ 
rotsʰa ertsmunen pʰilipes romelitsʰ axarebda ɣvtʰis sasupʰevlsa da ieso kʰristes saxels inatʰlebodnen mamakatsʰebitsʰ da dedakatsʰebitsʰ 
tʰvitʰon simonmatsʰ irtsmuna da moinatʰla aɣar ʃordeboda pʰilipes da moxdenil did sastsaulebsa da niʃnebs rom xedavda ɡaoɡnebuli iqo 
ɡaiɡes ierusalimʃi mqopʰma motsʰikʰulebma rom samariam miiɣo ɣvtʰis sitqva da ɡaɡzavnes matʰtʰan petre da ioane 
romlebitsʰ tʃavidnen ikʰ da ilotsʰes matʰtʰvis rom mieɣotʰ sulitsmida 
vinaidan manamde artsʰertʰ matʰɡanze ar iqo ɡadmosuli mxolod monatʰlulebi iqvnen upʰal iesos saxelitʰ 
maʃin daasxes xelebi matʰ da matʰatsʰ miiɣes sulitsmida 
rotsʰa dainaxa simonma rom motsʰikʰultʰa xelebis dasxmitʰ edzleodatʰ sulitsmida pʰuli miutana matʰ 
tʰkʰva metsʰ mometsʰitʰ xelmtsipʰeba rom tʃemɡan xeldasxmulmatsʰ miiɣos sulitsmida 
petrem utʰxra mas ʃeni vertsʰxli ʃenve ɡkʰondes ʃens dasaɣupad vinaidan ɣvtʰis nicis pʰulitʰ mopoveba ɡanizraxe 
ara ɡakʰvs ʃen tsili da xvedri sitqvaʃi vinaidan ʃeni ɡuli ar aris tsrpʰeli ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
maʃ moinanie ʃeni uketʰureba da ʃeevedre upʰals vindzlo moɡeteos ʃeni ɡuliszraxva 
vinaidan ɡxedav mtsare naɣvlitʰa da usamartʰlobitʰ ʃeborkils 
miuɡo simonma da utʰxratʰ ʃeevedretʰ tʃemtʰvis upʰals rom arapʰeri etsios tʰkʰveni natʰkʰvamidan 
xolo rotsʰa matʰ daamotsmes da ilaparakes upʰlis sitqva ɡamobrundnen ierusalimisken da samarieltʰa mraval sopʰelʃi axarebdnen 
upʰlis anɡelozma utʰxra pʰilipes adekʰi da tsadi samxretʰisaken im ɡzaze romelitsʰ ierusalimidan ɣazaʃi tʃadis ukatsʰrielia iɡi 
adɡa da tsavida da aha ertʰi etʰiopeli katsʰi sacurisi etʰiopiis dedopʰlis kandakes didebuli mtʰeli misi saɡandzuris mtsʰveli romelitsʰ tʰaqvanis satsʰemad mosuliqo ierusalimʃi 
ukan brundeboda da tʰavis etlʃi mdʒdomi kitʰxulobda esaia tsinastsarmetqvels 
utʰxra sulma pʰilipes midi da axlos daudekʰi maɡ etls 
miirbina pʰilipem da rotsʰa moismina rom iɡi esaia tsinastsarmetqvels kitʰxulobda utʰxra tʰu ɡesmis rasatsʰ kitʰxulob 
man utʰxra roɡor ɡaviɡeb tʰu aravin ɡanmimartavs da stʰxova pʰilipes asuliqo da mis ɡverditʰ damdʒdariqo 
tserilis adɡili romelsatsʰ is kitʰxulobda es iqo kravivitʰ dasaklavad miiqvanes da roɡortsʰ tsʰxvari dums mparsveltʰa tsinaʃe ise masatsʰ ar daudzravs baɡe 
damtsʰirebaʃi tsaertʰva samartʰali da vin moikitʰxavda mis tsarmoʃobas radɡan tsʰotsʰxaltʰa kʰveqanas mostsqda tʃemi xalxis tsʰodvebistʰvis ʃexvda satandʒveli 
miuɡo sacurisma pʰilipes da utʰxra ɡevedrebi visze ambobs amas tsinastsarmetqveli tʰavis tʰavze tʰu sxva vinmeze 
ɡaxsna pʰilipem baɡeebi daitsqo am tserilitʰ da axara iesos ʃesaxeb 
rotsʰa ɡza ɡanaɡrdzes miadɡnen ertʰ tsqals da tʰkʰva sacurisma aha tsqali ra mabrkolebs rom movinatʰlo 
utʰxra mas pʰilipem tʰu mtʰeli ɡulitʰ ɡtsams ʃeidzleba miuɡo da utʰxra man mtsams rom ieso kʰriste ɣvtʰis dzea 
da ubrdzana etli ɡaetʃerebinatʰ da oriveni tʃavidnen tsqalʃi pʰilipe da sacurisi da monatʰla iɡi 
rotsʰa tsqlidan amovidnen upʰlis sulma pʰilipe tsaritatsʰa da veɣar dainaxa iɡi sacurisma tsavida tʰavis ɡzaze ɡaxarebuli 
pʰilipe ki aɣmotʃnda aʃdodʃi mimodioda da axarebda qvela kʰalakʰs vidre kesariaʃi mividoda 
savle ki romelitsʰ dʒer kidev sikvdilis mukʰaritʰ suntʰkʰavda upʰlis motsapʰetʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ mɣvdelmtʰavartʰan mivida 
da stʰxova baratʰebi damaskos sinaɡoɡebisadmi rom visatsʰ ipovida am ɡzaze mdɡoms mamakatsʰebs tʰu dedakatsʰebs ʃeborkili mieqvana ierusalimʃi 
ɡzad mimavals rotsʰa damaskos uaxlovdeboda uetsʰrad moepʰina natʰeli tsʰidan 
da daetsʰa mitsaze da moesma xma romelitsʰ eubneboda savle savle rad mdevni me 
tʰkʰva vin xar ʃen upʰalo man ki me var ieso romelsatsʰ ʃen sdevni 
ʃedzrtsunebulma da ɡaoɡnebulma utʰxra ra ɡsurs upʰalo rom ɡavaketʰo da utʰxra mas upʰalma adekʰi da ʃedi kʰalakʰʃi da ɡetqvian ratsʰ unda ɡaaketʰo 
katsʰebi ki romlebitsʰ mastʰan ertʰad midiodnen usitqvod idɡnen xma ki esmodatʰ maɡram veravis xedavdnen 
tsamodɡa savle mitsidan tʰvalebi ɡaxelili hkʰonda maɡram verapʰers xedavda xeli mohkides mas da ʃeiqvanes damaskoʃi 
sami dɣe ver xedavda artsʰ camda da artsʰ svamda 
iqo ertʰi motsapʰe damaskoʃi saxelad anania da utʰxra upʰalma mas tʃvenebaʃi anania man tʰkʰva aha me upʰalo 
utʰxra mas upʰalma adekʰi da midi kʰutʃaze romesatsʰ hkʰvia stsori da iudas saxlʃi ikitʰxe tarsuseli katsʰi saxelad savle aha lotsʰulobs iɡi 
da ixila man tʃvenebaʃi katsʰi saxelad anania romelitsʰ mivida da xelebi daasxa mas ratʰa tʰvali aexila 
miuɡo ananiam upʰalo bevrisɡan msmenia am adamianze raodeni boroteba uqo ʃens tsmidebs ierusalimʃi 
da akʰatsʰ mɣvdelmtʰavrebisaɡan akʰvs xelmtsipʰeba ʃeborkos qvela vintsʰ ʃens saxels axsenebs 
utʰxra mas upʰalma tsadi vinaidan is aris tʃemi rtʃeuli curceli ratʰa ataros tʃemi saxeli tsarmartʰtʰa mepʰetʰa da israeliantʰa tsinaʃe 
me vatʃveneb mas ramdeni unda itandʒos tʃemi saxelis ɡulistʰvis 
tsavida anania ʃevida im saxlʃi daasxa mas xelebi da utʰxra dzmao savle upʰalma ɡamomɡzavna me iesom romelitsʰ ɡetʃvena ɡzaze sadatsʰ midiodi rom tʰvali aɡexilos da aɣivso sulitsmiditʰ 
da maʃinve tʰitʰkʰos kʰertsʰli mosdzvrao mis tʰvalebs aexila adɡa da moinatʰla 
da miiɣo sacmeli da momaɡrda da dartʃa iɡi damaskoʃi mqopʰ motsapʰeebtʰan ramdenime dɣe 
da sastsrapʰod daitsqo sinaɡoɡebʃi kʰadaɡeba iesoze rom is aris dze ɣvtʰisa 
ɡaoɡnebuli iqo qvela msmeneli da ambobda nutʰu es is katsʰia ierusalimʃi rom spobda am saxelis mxmobeltʰ da akʰatsʰ xom imisatʰvis movida rom ʃeborkilni tsaeqvana isini mɣvdelmtʰavrebtʰan 
savle ki sul upʰro dzlierdeboda da ɡanatsʰvipʰrebda damaskoʃi mtsʰxovreb iudevelebs da amtkitsʰebda rom es aris kʰriste 
ɡanvlo mravalma dɣem da iudevelebi ʃeitʰkʰvnen mis mosaklavad 
tsʰnobili ɡaxda savlestʰvis matʰi ʃetʰkʰmulebis ambavi isini ki dɣedaɣam sdaradʒobdnen karibcestʰan rom moeklatʰ iɡi 
aiqvanes motsapʰebma ɣamitʰ da ɡalavnidan tʃauʃves ɡodritʰ 
mivida ierusalimʃi da tsʰdilobda motsapʰeebs ʃeertʰeboda maɡram qvelas eʃinoda misi ar sdʒerodatʰ rom motsapʰe iqo 
barnabam tsaiqvana iɡi miiqvana motsʰikʰulebtʰan da moutʰxro matʰ tʰu roɡor ixila ɡzaʃi upʰali romelitsʰ elaparaka mas da roɡor ɡabedulad laparakobda iɡi damaskoʃi iesos saxelitʰ 
da dartʃa iɡi matʰtʰan ɡamodioda da ʃedioda ierusalimʃi da ɡabedulad kʰadaɡebda upʰlis saxelitʰ 
laparakobda da epaekʰreboda kidetsʰ ɡaberdznebultʰ isini ki mis mokvlas tsʰdilobdnen 
rotsʰa ʃeitqves es dzmebma tsaiqvanes iɡi kesarias da ɡaɡzavnes tarsusʃi 
amɡvarad eklesias mtʰel iudeaʃi ɡalileasa da samariaʃi mʃvidoba hkʰonda ʃendeboda vidoda upʰlis moʃiʃebitʰ da sulitsmidis nuɡeʃistsʰemitʰ mravldeboda 
ertʰxel qvela adɡilis ʃemovlisas petre mivida tsmidebtʰanatsʰ romlebitsʰ lidaʃi tsʰxovrobdnen 
naxa ikʰ ertʰi katsʰi saxelad eneasi romelitsʰ rva tselitsads davrdomili itsva saretsʰelze 
da utʰxra mas petrem eneas ɡkurnavs ʃen ieso kʰriste adekʰ da ɡaistsore loɡini da maʃinve tsamodɡa 
xedavda mas qvela vintsʰ lidasa da ʃaronʃi tsʰxovrobda da moikʰtsʰnen isini upʰlisaken 
iqo iapʰoʃi ertʰi motsapʰe dedakatsʰi saxelad tabitʰa ratsʰ tʰarɡmanitʰ niʃnavs kʰurtsʰiks iɡi savse iqo ketʰili sakʰmeebitʰa da motsqalebitʰ rasatsʰ ikʰmoda 
im dɣeebʃi iqo rom avad ɡaxda iɡi da mokvda ɡanbanes da daasvenes zedatʰvalʃi 
axlos iqo lida iapʰostʰan da motsapʰeebma ʃeitqes petre ikʰ ariso da ori katsʰi ɡauɡzavnes satʰxovnelad rom ar daeqovnebina matʰtʰan misvla 
adɡa petre da tsavida matʰtʰan rotsʰa mivida aiqvanes zedatʰvalʃi da mis tsinaʃe tsardɡa qvela kʰvrivi isini tirodnen da utʃvenebdnen mosasxamebsa da samosels romlebsatsʰ kʰurtsʰiki umzadebda sanam matʰtʰan iqo 
ɡauʃva ɡaretʰ qvelani petrem muxli moiqara da ilotsʰa moutrialda tsʰxedars da tʰkʰva tabitʰa adekʰi man aaxila tʰvali da petre rom dainaxa tsamodʒda 
xeli ɡautsoda tsamoaqena daudzaxa tsmidebsa da kʰvrivebs da tsʰotsʰxali tsarudɡina iɡi 
tsʰnobili ɡaxda es mtʰel iapʰoʃi da mravalma itsama upʰali 
man mravali xani dahqo iapʰoʃi vinme simontʰan metqavestʰan 
iqo ertʰi katsʰi kesariaʃi saxelad korneliosi italiurad tsodebuli kohortis asistʰavi 
ketʰilmsaxuri da ɣvtʰismoʃiʃi iqo da mtʰels tʰavis saxltʰan ertʰad bevr motsqalebas ɡastsʰemda xalxisatʰvis da qoveltʰvis lotsʰulobda ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
ixila man tʃvenebaʃi tsʰxadad ase dɣis metsʰxre saatʰze ɣvtʰis anɡelozi romelitsʰ ʃevida mastʰan da utʰxra kornelios 
ʃexeda mas ʃeʃinebulma da tʰkʰva ra aris upʰalo man utʰxra ʃeni lotsʰvani da motsqalebani amaɣlda ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe mosaxseneblad 
axla miavline katsʰebi iapʰoʃi da daudzaxe vinme simons romelitsʰ petred itsodeba 
iɡi stumrad aris vinme simon metqavestʰan romlis saxli zɣvis pirasa dɡas 
rotsʰa tsavida mastʰan mosaubre anɡelozi man daudzaxa tʰavis or msaxurs da ertʰ ketʰilmsaxur meomars romelitsʰ tʰan axlda 
uambo matʰ qovelive da ɡaɡzavna iapʰoʃi 
meore dɣes rotsʰa isini ɡzaʃi iqvnen da kʰalakʰs uaxlovdebodnen ikʰneboda ase ekʰvsi saatʰi rom petre erdoze avida salotsʰavad 
moʃivda da cama mounda vidre rames moumzadebdnen ɡarindebam moitsʰva iɡi 
da ixila ɡaxsnili tsʰa da ɡardmomavali raɣatsʰ curceli didi tilos msɡavsi romelitsʰ otʰxi kiditʰ eʃveboda mitsaze 
masʃi iqo mitsis qovelnairi otʰxpʰexi kʰvetsarmavali da tsʰis pʰrinveli 
da iqo xma mis mimartʰ adekʰi petre dakali da came 
petrem tʰkʰva ara upʰalo arasodes arapʰeri micamia ʃebiltsuli da utsmiduri 
meored kvlav iqo mis mimartʰ xma ratsʰ ɣmertʰma ɡantsmida nu miitʃnev ʃebiltsulad 
ase moxda samɡzis da curceli mqisve tsʰad amaɣlda 
rotsʰa ɡulʃi pʰikʰrobda petre tʰu ra iqo es tʃveneba romelitsʰ man ixila aha korneliosis ɡamoɡzavnili katsʰebi kitʰxulobdnen simonis saxls da ciʃkartʰan idɡnen 
daudzaxes da hkitʰxes akʰaa stumrad simoni petred tsodebuli 
vidre petre tʃvenebaze pʰikʰrobda sulma utʰxra mas aɡer sami katsʰi ɡedzebs ʃen 
adekʰi tʃadi da ɡahqevi matʰ nu qoqmanob vinaidan me movavline isini 
tʃavida petre im katsʰebtʰan da utʰxra me var visatsʰ tʰkʰven edzebtʰ ristʰvis mosulxartʰ 
matʰ tʰkʰves asistʰav kornelioss martʰals da ɣvtʰismoʃiʃ katsʰs romelsatsʰ emotsmeba iudeveltʰa mtʰeli eri tsmida anɡelozisɡan ebrdzana moɡixmos tʰavis saxlʃi da moisminos ʃeni sitqvebi 
maʃin miitsvia isini da umaspindzla meore dɣes ki adɡa da ɡahqva matʰ da zoɡiertʰi iapʰoeli dzmatsʰ tʰan axlda 
meore dɣes ʃevidnen kesariaʃi korneliosi eloda matʰ ʃemoekriba tʰavisi natʰesavebi da axlo meɡobrebi 
rotsʰa ʃedioda petre korneliosi ʃeeɡeba mas pʰexebʃi tʃauvarda da tʰaqvani stsʰa 
petrem ki tsamoaqena da utʰxra adekʰi metsʰ katsʰi var 
da mastʰan saubritʰ ʃevida da mravali ʃekrebili hpova ikʰ 
utʰxra matʰ tʰkʰven utsqitʰ rom iudevel katsʰs ekrdzaleba urtʰiertʰoba da daaxloeba utsʰxotomeltʰan maɡram me mitʃvena ɣmertʰma rom artsʰ ertʰi adamianistʰvis ar metsodebina ʃebiltsuli an utsmiduri 
amitom rotsʰa momixmes uqoqmanod movedi amitom ɡekitʰxebitʰ ra sakʰmeze momixmetʰ 
korneliosma tʰkʰva otʰxi dɣis tsin am saatʰamde vmarxulobdi metsʰxre saatʰze tʃems saxlʃi vlotsʰulobdi da aha tʃems tsinaʃe dadɡa katsʰi elvare samositʰ 
tʰkʰva kornelios ʃesmenilia ʃeni lotsʰva da ʃeni motsqalebani moxsenebulia ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
axla ɡaɡzavne iapʰoʃi da daudzaxe simons romelitsʰ petred itsodeba metqave simonis saxlʃi dɡas zɣvis piras 
maʃinve ɡamovɡzavne ʃentʰan da karɡad moikʰetsʰi rom moxvedi axla tʃven qvelani vdɡavartʰ ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe rom movisminotʰ qovelive ratsʰ upʰlisaɡan ɡakʰvs nabrdzanebi 
ɡaxsna petrem baɡe da tʰkʰva ceʃmaritad vrətsmundebi rom ɣmertʰi mikerdzoebuli ar aris 
aramed qovel xalxʃi misi moʃiʃi da simartʰlis mokʰmedi satʰnoa mistʰvis 
man mouvlina israelianebs sitqva da axara mʃvidoba ieso kʰristes meʃveobitʰ is aris qoveltʰa upʰali 
tʰkʰven itsʰitʰ ra moxda mtʰels iudeaʃi ɡalileidan datsqebuli im natʰlisɣebis ʃemdeɡ romelsatsʰ kʰadaɡebda ioane 
roɡor stsʰxo ɣmertʰma sulitsmiditʰ da dzalitʰ ieso nazarevels dadioda kʰvelmokʰmedebda da kurnavda qvelas eʃmakisaɡan ʃepqrobilebs vinaidan ɣmertʰi iqo mastʰan 
tʃven qvelapʰris motsmeni vartʰ ratsʰ man ɡaaketʰa iudeis kʰveqanaʃi da ierusalimʃi da rom bolos iɡi mokles dzelze dakidebitʰ 
iɡi ɣmertʰma aɣadɡina mesame dɣes da ɡamoatsʰxadebina tʰavi 
ara mtʰeli xalxistʰvis aramed ɣvtʰis mier tsinastsar amortʃeul motsapʰetʰatʰvis tʃventʰvis romlebitsʰ mastʰan ertʰad vcamditʰ da vsvamditʰ misi mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡomis ʃemdeɡ 
ɡvibrdzana vukʰadaɡotʰ xalxs da vumotsmotʰ rom is aris ɣvtʰisɡan ɡantsesebuli tsʰotsʰxaltʰa da mkvdartʰa msadʒulad 
masze qvela tsinastsarmetqveli amotsmebs rom qoveli misi mortsmune misi saxelitʰ miiɣebs tsʰodvebis mitevebas 
dʒer kidev laparakobda petre am sitqvebs rom sulitsmida ɡadmovida qvelaze visatsʰ esmoda sitqva 
mortsmuneni tsinadatsʰvetʰiltʰaɡan romlebitsʰ petres mohqvnen ɡaotsʰdnen rom sulitsmidis nici tsarmartʰebsatsʰ moepʰinatʰ 
radɡan esmodatʰ rom laparakobdnen enebze da adidebdnen ɣmertʰs maʃin miuɡo petrem 
vis ʃeudzlia tsqlitʰ natʰlisɣeba daukavos imatʰ vintsʰ tʃvensavitʰ miiɣes sulitsmida 
ubrdzana matʰ monatʰluliqvnen ieso kʰristes saxelitʰ maʃin stʰxoves mas dartʃeniliqo matʰtʰan ramdenime dɣes 
ɡaiɡes motsʰikʰulebma da dzmebma romlebitsʰ iudeaʃi iqvnen rom tsarmartʰebmatsʰ miiɣes ɣvtʰis sitqva 
rotsʰa petre avida ierusalimʃi saqvedurobdnen mas tsinadatsʰvetʰilebi 
da eubnebodnen tsinadautsʰvetʰel xalxtʰan ʃexvedi da matʰtʰan ertʰad cameo 
dautsqo matʰ petrem ɡanmarteba tʰanamimdevrulad roɡortsʰ moxda da tʰkʰva 
me viqavi kʰalakʰ iapʰoʃi vlotsʰulobdi da ɡarindebaʃi vixile tʃveneba ɡardmomavali raɣatsʰ curceli didi tilos msɡavsi otʰxi kiditʰ eʃveboda zetsʰidan da tʃemamde daeʃva 
ʃevxede mas davakvirdi da davinaxe ʃiɡ mitsis otʰxpʰexni mxetsʰni kʰvetsarmavalni da tsʰis pʰrinvelni 
momesma xma romelmatsʰ mitʰxra adekʰi petre dakali da came 
vtʰkʰvi ara upʰalo radɡan tʃems pirʃi arasodes arapʰeri tʃasula ʃebiltsuli da utsmiduri 
meored momiɡo xmam tsʰidan ratsʰ ɣmertʰma ɡantsmida nu miitʃnev ʃebiltsulad 
es moxda samdʒer da qvelapʰeri isev tsʰad amaɣlda 
da aha maʃinve kesariidan tʃemtʰan ɡamoɡzavnili sami katsʰi moadɡa im saxlis ciʃkars sadatsʰ me viqavi 
mitʰxra sulma rom uqoqmanod ɡavqolodi matʰ tsamomqva es ekʰvsi dzma da ʃeveditʰ im katsʰis saxlʃi 
ɡviambo roɡor ixila tʰavis saxlʃi mdɡomare anɡelozi romelmatsʰ utʰxra ɡaɡzavne iapʰoʃi da mouxme simons petred tsodebuls 
is ɡetqvis sitqvebs romlitʰatsʰ ɡadartʃebitʰ ʃen da mtʰeli ʃeni saxli 
rotsʰa laparaki davitsqe sulitsmida ɡadmovida matʰze iseve roɡortsʰ tʃvenze tʰavdapirvelad 
ɡamaxsenda upʰlis sitqva roɡor ambobda ioane tsqlitʰ natʰlavda tʰkʰven ki sulitsmiditʰ moinatʰlebitʰo 
tʰuki ɣmertʰma isetʰive nici mistsʰa matʰ roɡortsʰ tʃven romeltʰatsʰ virtsmunetʰ upʰali ieso kʰriste me vin viqavi rom ʃemdzleboda tsin aɣvdɡomodi ɣmertʰs 
es rom moismines dadumdnen ɣmertʰs adidebdnen da ambobdnen aha tsarmartʰebsatsʰ mistsʰa ɣmertʰma monanieba sasitsʰotsʰxlod 
xolo dapʰantulebi devnisaɡan stepʰanes ɡamo rom moxda mividnen pʰiniakamde kviprosamde da antiokʰiamde da ebraelebis ɡarda aravis eubnebodnen sitqvas 
iqvnen matʰɡan zoɡiertʰni kviproselni da kvirenelni romlebitsʰ antiokʰiaʃi misvlisas elaparakebodnen berdznebsatsʰ da axarebdnen matʰ upʰal iesos 
da iqo upʰlis xeli matʰtʰan dzalian bevrma irtsmuna da moikʰtsʰa upʰlisaken 
miaɣtsia am ambavma ierusalimʃi mqopʰi eklesiis quramde da miavlines barnaba antiokʰiaʃi 
rodesatsʰ mivida da ixila ɣvtʰis madli ɡaixara da qvelas ʃeaɡonebda tsrpʰeli ɡulitʰ dartʃeniliqvnen upʰalʃi 
vinaidan iɡi ketʰili katsʰi iqo sulitsmiditʰa da rətsmenitʰ aɣsavse da mravali xalxi ʃeemata upʰals 
tsavida tarsusʃi savles sadzebnelad da naxa iɡi da antiokʰiaʃi moiqvana 
mouxdatʰ matʰ rom mtʰel tselitsads ikribebodnen eklesiaʃi astsavlidnen diddzal xalxs da pirvelad antiokʰiaʃi etsodatʰ motsapʰeebs kʰristianebi 
im dɣeebʃi movidnen mkʰadaɡebelni ierusalimidan antiokʰiaʃi 
tsamodɡa ertʰi matʰɡani saxelad aɡabosi ɡamoatsʰxada sulitʰ rom didi ʃimʃiloba tʃamovardeboda mtʰel msopʰlioʃi ratsʰ moxda kidetsʰ klavdiusis dros 
xolo matʰ ɡadatsqvites rom motsapʰeebs tʰitʰoeuls tʰavisi ʃedzlebisamebr ʃetsevna ɡaeɡzavnatʰ dzmebisatʰvis romlebitsʰ iudeaʃi imqopʰebodnen 
asetsʰ moikʰtsʰnen da ɡauɡzavnes uxutsʰesebs barnabasa da savles xelitʰ 
im xanebʃi xeli aɣmartʰa mepʰe herodem eklesiis zoɡiertʰ tsevrze saborotod 
da maxvilitʰ moakvlevina iakobi ioanes dzma 
rotsʰa dainaxa rom amitʰ asiamovna iudevelebs daapatimra petretsʰ upʰuarobis dɣeebi iqo 
ʃeipqro iɡi da tʃasva sapqrobileʃi da ubrdzana misi daradʒoba dʒariskatsʰtʰa otʰx otʰxeuls ɡanzraxuli hkʰonda rom pasekʰis ʃemdeɡ ɡamoeqvana xalxis tsinaʃe 
damtsqvdeuli iqo petre sapqrobileʃi eklesia ki mxurvaled evedreboda ɣmertʰs mistʰvis 
rotsʰa daapira misi ɡamoqvana herodem im ɣames petres or dʒariskatsʰs ʃoris edzina ormaɡi borkilitʰ ʃekruls kartʰan mdɡari mtsʰvelebi ki daradʒobdnen sapqrobiles 
da aha upʰlis anɡelozi tsardɡa da natʰeli ɡabrətsqinda ʃenobaʃi pʰerdʃi tsahkra petres ɡaaɣvidza da utʰxra adekʰi tʃkʰara da dastsʰvivda borkilebi xelebidan 
utʰxra mas anɡelozma sartqeli ʃemoirtqi da tʃaitsʰvi sandlebi asetsʰ ɡaaketʰa eubneba mas moisxi ʃeni mosasxami da ɡamomqevi 
ɡavida da ɡahqva mas ar itsʰoda rom rasatsʰ anɡelozi ikʰmoda tsʰxadi iqo aramed pʰikʰrobda rom tʃvenebas xedavda 
ɡastsʰdnen pirvel da meore saɡuʃaɡos da miuaxlovdnen kʰalakʰʃi ʃesasvlel darkinul karibces romelitsʰ tʰavisitʰ ɡaiɣo matʰ tsinaʃe ɡavidnen da ɡaiares ertʰi kʰutʃa da anɡelozi imtsams ɡanʃorda mas 
ɡons rom moeɡo tʰkʰva petrem axla ceʃmaritad vitsʰi rom upʰalma ɡamoɡzavna tʰavisi anɡelozi da damixsna herodes xelidan da qvelapʰrisaɡan rasatsʰ iudeveli xalxi eloda 
ɡons mosuli miadɡa ioanes markozs rom edzaxdnen dedis mariamis saxls sadatsʰ mravalni ʃekrebiliqvnen da lotsʰulobdnen 
ciʃkarze rom daakakuna ertʰi moaxle saxelad rode karis ɡasaɣebad ɡamovida 
itsʰno petres xma da ise ɡauxarda rom ciʃkaritsʰ ar ɡauɣia ʃin ʃevarda da ʃeatqobina rom petre idɡa ciʃkartʰan 
matʰ utʰxres mas ʃeiʃale is ki amtkitsʰebda tʰavisas xolo matʰ tʰkʰves es misi anɡelozi ikʰnebao 
petre ki ɡanaɡrdzobda kakuns rotsʰa ɡauɣes dainaxes da saxtad dartʃnen 
aniʃna matʰ xelitʰ rom ɡatʃumebuliqvnen da uambo matʰ roɡor ɡamoiqvana upʰalma sapqrobilidan da tʰkʰva ʃeatqobinetʰ es iakobsa da dzmebs mere ɡavida da sxvaɡan tsavida 
rotsʰa ɡatʰenda dʒariskatsʰebs ʃoris didi ɡanɡaʃi atqda imis ɡamo tʰu ra ikʰna petre 
herode ki edzebda mas da ver ipovna dahkitʰxa mtsʰvelebi da brdzana matʰi tsaqvana dasaxotsʰad mere iudeidan kesariaʃi tʃavida da ikʰ dartʃa 
herode ɡulmosuli iqo tvirelebsa da tsʰidonelebze isini ki ertʰsulovnad mividnen mastʰan miimxres blastosi mepʰis mesatsole da itʰxovdnen mʃvidobas vinaidan matʰi kʰveqana herodes samepʰodan sazrdoobda 
datsesebul dɣes herodem tʃaitsʰva samepʰo ʃesamoseli dadʒda taxtze da mimartʰa matʰ 
xalxi ki ɣaɣadebda ɣvtʰis xmaa da ara katsʰisa 
uetsʰrad upʰlis anɡelozma dastsʰa iɡi radɡan ar miaɡo dideba ɣmertʰs da matlebisɡan ʃecmulma suli ɡanuteva 
upʰlis sitqva ki izrdeboda da vrtsʰeldeboda 
barnabam da savlem ɡaasrules tʰaviantʰi samsaxuri da ɡamobrundnen ierusalimidan tʰan tsamoiqvanes ioanetsʰ markozad tsodebuli 
iqvnen antiokʰiaʃi ikʰaur eklesiaʃi tsinastsarmetqvelni da modzɣvarni barnaba da simoni romelsatsʰ niɡeri erkʰva lukios kvireneli da manaini tetrarkʰis herodes dzudzumte da savle 
rotsʰa isini upʰals emsaxurebodnen da marxulobdnen tʰkʰva sulitsmidam ɡamomiqavitʰ barnaba da savle im sakʰmeze razetsʰ matʰ movutsode 
maʃin imarxules ilotsʰes xelebi daasxes matʰ da ɡauʃves 
amriɡad sulitsmidis mier mivlinebulni tʃavidnen isini selevkiaʃi da ikʰidan ɡastsʰures kviprosze 
salamisʃi qopʰnisas ɣvtʰis sitqvas kʰadaɡebdnen iudeveltʰa sinaɡoɡebʃi ioanetsʰ tʰan hqavdatʰ msaxurad 
rotsʰa mtʰeli kundzuli moiares papʰosamde naxes ertʰi katsʰi moɡvi tsʰrutsinastsarmetqveli iudeveli saxelad bariesusi 
romelitsʰ iqo prokonsul serɡis pavlestʰan ɡonier katsʰtʰan man mouxmo barnabas da savles surda moesmina ɣvtʰis sitqva 
tsinaɣudɡa matʰ elimas moɡvi vinaidan ase itʰarɡmneba misi saxeli da tsʰdilobda rətsmenisaɡan ɡadaetsʰdina prokonsuli 
xolo savle iɡive pavle aɣivso sulitsmiditʰ miapqro mas mzera 
da utʰxra hoi qovelɡvari mzakvrobitʰa da qovelɡvari siborotitʰ aɣvsilo eʃmakis dzeo da qovelive martʰlis mtero moeʃvebi tʰu ara upʰlis stsori ɡzebis ɡamrudebas 
aha ʃenzea axla upʰlis xeli ʃen dabrmavdebi da ertʰxans veɣar dainaxav mzes da mqisve daetsʰa mas dʒanɣi da sibnele akʰetʰ ikʰitʰ atsqdeboda da edzebda ɡamdzɣols 
maʃin dainaxa prokonsulma ratsʰ moxda da irtsmuna upʰlis modzɣvrebitʰ ɡantsʰvipʰrebulma 
papʰosidan ɡamɡzavrebuli pavle da mastʰan mqopʰni pampʰiliis perɡeʃi mividnen xolo ioane tʃamoʃorda matʰ da ierusalimʃi dabrunda 
isini ki perɡes ɡavlitʰ mividnen pisidiis antiokʰiaʃi sinaɡoɡaʃi ʃevidnen ʃabatʰ dɣes da dasxdnen 
rdʒulisa da tsinastsarmetqveltʰa kitʰxvis ʃemdeɡ sinaɡoɡis upʰrosebma miuɡzavnes matʰ da utʰxres katsʰno dzmano tʰu rame manuɡeʃebeli sitqva ɡakʰvtʰ am xalxisatʰvis satʰkʰmeli tʰkʰvitʰ 
adɡa pavle xelitʰ aniʃna da tʰkʰva katsʰno israelianno da ɣvtʰis moʃiʃno isminetʰ 
am eris israelis ɣmertʰma amoartʃia tʃveni mamebi da aɣamaɣla es xalxi eɡviptis kʰveqanaʃi mdɡmurobisas da maɣali mklavitʰ ɡamoiqvana ikʰidan 
da ormotsʰiode tselitsads asazrdoebda matʰ udabnoʃi 
mospo ʃvidi xalxi kʰanaanis kʰveqanaʃi da matʰ daumkvidra matʰi kʰveqana 
amis ʃemdeɡ ase otʰxas ormotsʰdaatʰ tselitsads adzlevda matʰ msadʒulebs tsinastsarmetqvel samuelamde 
mere moitʰxoves mepʰe da mistsʰa matʰ ɣmertʰma sauli kiʃis dze katsʰi beniaminis tomidan ormotsʰi tslis mandzilze 
misi ɡadaqenebis ʃemdeɡ mepʰed dauqena matʰ davitʰi romlis ʃesaxeb tʰkʰva damotsmebitʰ vpove davitʰi dze iesesi tʃemi ɡulis sandomi katsʰi romelitsʰ ʃeasrulebs qvela tʃems neba survils 
misi ʃtʰamomavlobisaɡan ɣmertʰma aɣtʰkʰmisamebr aɣudɡina israels mxsneli ieso 
misi mosvlis tsin ioane ukʰadaɡebda mtʰel israelis xalxs monaniebis natʰlisɣebas 
rotsʰa amtʰavrebda tʰavis sarbiels ioane ambobda vin ɡɡonivartʰ me me ara var aramed aha modis tʃems ʃemdeɡ is vis pʰexze sandlis ʃexsnis ɣirsitsʰ ara var 
katsʰno dzmano abraamis modɡmis dzeno da tʰkʰvens ʃoris ɣvtʰismoʃiʃno tʰkʰven moɡevlinatʰ xsnis sitqva 
vinaidan ierusalimis mkvidrebma da matʰma mtʰavrebma ar itsʰnes iɡi dasadʒes da amitʰ aɣasrules tsinastsarmetqveltʰa sitqvebi romlebitsʰ qovel ʃabatʰs ikitʰxeba 
da raki veravitʰari sasikvdilo braldeba ver mounaxes pilates stʰxoves misi mokvla 
rotsʰa aɣsrulda qovelive masze datserili tʃamoxsnes dzelidan da daasvenes samarxʃi 
xolo ɣmertʰma mkvdretʰitʰ aɣadɡina iɡi 
mravali dɣis ɡanmavlobaʃi etʃveneboda matʰ romlebitsʰ mastʰan ertʰad ɡamovidnen ɡalileidan ierusalimʃi da romlebitsʰ axla misi motsameni arian xalxis tsinaʃe 
da tʃven ɡaxarebtʰ rom aɣtʰkʰma romelitsʰ mamebs mistsʰa ɣmertʰma tʃven matʰ ʃvilebs ʃeɡvisrula da aɣɡvidɡina ieso 
roɡortsʰ meore pʰsalmunʃi stseria tʃemi dze xar dɣes ɡʃobe ʃen 
xolo raki man aɣadɡina mkvdretʰitʰ ratʰa is aɣarasodes dabruneboda xrətsnilebas ase tʰkʰva me moɡtsʰemtʰ tʰkʰven davitʰis sartsmuno sitsmideebs 
amitom sxvaɡanatsʰ ambobs xrətsnilebas ar axilvineb ʃens tsmidas 
maɡram davitʰma romelitsʰ msaxurebda tʰavis tʰaobaʃi ɣvtʰis nebitʰ ɡanisvena ʃeertʰo tʰavis mamebs da ixila xrətsnileba 
xolo mas vintsʰ ɣmertʰma aɣadɡina ar uxilavs xrətsnileba 
tsʰnobili iqos tʰkʰventʰvis katsʰno dzmano rom misitʰ tsʰodvebis miteveba ɡeutsqebatʰ 
qovelivesɡan risɡanatsʰ moses rdʒulitʰ ver ʃesdzelitʰ ɡamartʰleba masʃi martʰldeba qvela mortsmune 
ɡapʰrətʰxilditʰ rom ar ɡetsiotʰ tsinastsarmetqveltʰa mier tʰkʰmuli 
ixiletʰ modzuleno da ɡantsʰvipʰrditʰ da ɡautʃinarditʰ radɡan isetʰ sakʰmes movimokʰmedeb tʰkʰvens dɣeebʃi romelsatsʰ ar daidʒerebditʰ vinmes rom moetʰxro tʰkʰventʰvis 
rotsʰa iudeveltʰa sinaɡoɡidan ɡamodiodnen xalxi evedreboda matʰ rom momaval ʃabatʰsatsʰ elaparaka matʰtʰvis es sitqvebi 
krebuli rom daiʃala bevri iudeveltʰaɡani da ɣvtʰismosavi rdʒulʃetsʰvlili misdevda pavles da barnabas isini esaubrebodnen da artsmunebdnen rom dartʃeniliqvnen ɣvtʰis madlʃi 
meore ʃabatʰs tʰitʰkʰmis mtʰelma kʰalakʰma moiqara tʰavi ɣvtʰis sitqvis mosasmenad 
rotsʰa iudevelebma amdeni xalxi dainaxes ʃuritʰ aɣivsnen da ʃeuratsʰxmqopʰelad uarqopʰdnen imas rasatsʰ pavle laparakobda 
mxneoba moikribes barnabam da pavlem ɡabedes da tʰkʰves pirvelad tʰkʰventʰvis unda tʰkʰmuliqo ɣvtʰis sitqva maɡram vinaidan uarqopʰtʰ mas da tʰkʰven tʰvitʰonve saukuno sitsʰotsʰxlis uɣirsad miɡatʃniatʰ tʰavi maʃin tʃven tsarmartʰebs mivmartʰavtʰ 
vinaidan ase ɡvibrdzana tʃven upʰalma me daɡaqene tsarmartʰtʰa natʰlad rom iqo xsnad kʰveqnis kidemde 
es rom esmodatʰ tsarmartʰebi xarobdnen da adidebdnen upʰlis sitqvas da qvelam irtsmuna vintsʰ saukuno sitsʰotsʰxlisatʰvis iqo ɡantsesebuli
