ratʰa aɣsrulebuliqo rdʒulis simartʰle tʃvenʃi romlebitsʰ vtsʰxovrobtʰ ara xortsʰielad aramed sulierad 
vinaidan isini romlebitsʰ xortsʰielad arian xortsʰielze pʰikʰroben xolo romlebitsʰ sulierad arian sulierze 
radɡan xortsʰieli pʰikʰrebi sikvdilia xolo sulieri pʰikʰrebi sitsʰotsʰxle da mʃvidoba 
imitom rom xortsʰieli pʰikʰrebi ɣvtʰis mtrobaa vinaidan ar emortʃileba ɣvtʰis rdʒuls da artsʰ ʃeudzlia 
amitom matʰ romelnitsʰ xortsʰielad tsʰxovroben ar dzaludztʰ aamon ɣmertʰs 
tʰkʰven ki tsʰxovrobtʰ ara xortsʰielad aramed sulierad tʰuki ɣvtʰis suli tsʰxovrobs tʰkʰvenʃi xolo visatsʰ kʰristes suli ara akʰvs is misi ar aris 
da tʰu kʰriste tʰkʰvenʃia sxeuli mkvdaria tsʰodvisatʰvis xolo suli tsʰotsʰxalia simartʰlisatʰvis 
xolo tʰu tʰkʰvenʃi imqopʰeba misi suli vintsʰ mkvdretʰitʰ aɣadɡina ieso maʃin is vintsʰ kʰriste ieso aɣadɡina mkvdretʰitʰ tʰkʰvens mokvdav sxeulebsatsʰ ɡaatsʰotsʰxlebs tʰavisi sulitʰ romelitsʰ tʰkʰvenʃia damkvidrebuli 
amitom dzmebo tʃven xortsʰis movaleni ara vartʰ rom xortsʰielad vitsʰxovrotʰ 
vinaidan tʰu xortsʰielad tsʰxovrobtʰ sikvdili ar aɡtsʰdebatʰ xolo tʰu sulitʰ akvdinebtʰ xortsʰiel sakʰmeebs itsʰotsʰxlebtʰ 
radɡan isini vintsʰ ɣvtʰis sulitʰ tsarimartʰebian ɣvtʰis ʃvilebi arian 
vinaidan ar miɡiɣiatʰ monobis suli ratʰa kvlav ʃiʃitʰ iqotʰ aramed miɣebuli ɡakʰvtʰ ʃvilobis suli romlitʰatsʰ vɣaɣadebtʰ abba mamao 
stsored es suli emotsmeba tʃvens suls rom ɣvtʰis ʃvilebi vartʰ 
xolo tʰu ʃvilebi memkvidrenitsʰ ɣvtʰis memkvidreni da kʰristes tʰanamemkvidreni tʰu sinamdvileʃi mastʰan ertʰad vitandʒebitʰ ratʰa mastʰan ertʰad vididotʰ kidetsʰ 
vinaidan vpʰikʰrob rom axlandeli tandʒvani arapʰeria im didebastʰan romelitsʰ ɡamotsʰxaddeba tʃvens mimartʰ 
vinaidan kʰmnileba imeditʰ moelis ɣvtʰis ʃviltʰa ɡamotsʰxadebas 
radɡan kʰmnileba tʰavisi nebitʰ ki ar daemortʃila amaoebas aramed misi dammortʃileblis mier sasoebitʰ 
rom tʰvitʰ kʰmnilebatsʰ ɡatʰavisupʰldeba xrətsnilebis monobisaɡan ɣvtʰis ʃviltʰa didebis tʰavisupʰlebisatʰvis 
vinaidan vitsʰitʰ rom mtʰeli kʰmnileba ertʰad kvnesis da itandʒeba akʰamde 
da ara marto is aramed tʃventsʰ romeltʰatsʰ sulis pirveli naqopʰebi ɡvakʰvs tʃven tʰvitʰonatsʰ vkvnesitʰ ɡulʃi movelitʰ ra ʃvilebas da tʃveni sxeulis ɡamosqidvas 
vinaidan sasoebitʰ vikʰenitʰ daxsnilni xolo xiluli sasoeba ar aris sasoeba vinaidan tʰuki xedavs katsʰi raɣas esavs 
xolo tʰu imis sasoeba ɡvakʰvs rasatsʰ ver vxedavtʰ motʰminebitʰ movelitʰ mas 
aseve sulitsʰ exmareba tʃvens udzlurebas vinaidan ar vitsʰitʰ roɡor unda vilotsʰotʰ aramed tʰvitʰ suli ʃuamdɡomlobs tʃventʰvis ɡamoutʰkʰmeli oxvritʰ 
xolo ɡultʰamxilavma itsʰis ra aris sulis zraxva imitom rom iɡi ɣvtʰis nebitʰ ʃuamdɡomlobs tsmidatʰatʰvis 
tʃven ki vitsʰitʰ rom ɣvtʰis moqvarulebs misi ɡanzraxvitʰ motsodebulebs qovelmxriv etseva sasiketʰod 
vinaidan romelnitsʰ tsinastsar itsʰno matʰ tsinastsarve ɡanusazɣvra tʰavisi dzis xatebis msɡavsad qopʰna ratʰa iqos iɡi pirmʃo mraval dzmatʰa ʃoris 
xolo visatsʰ ɡanusazɣvra matʰ kidetsʰ moutsoda da visatsʰ moutsoda kidetsʰ ɡaamartʰla da vintsʰ ɡaamartʰla kidetsʰ ɡanadida 
amaze raɣa vtʰkʰvatʰ tʰu ɣmertʰi tʃvensken aris vin ɡamova tʃvens tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
is vintsʰ tʰavisi sakutʰari dze ar daindo aramed ɡastsira tʃventʰvis qvelasatʰvis ɡana mastʰan ertʰad qovelives ar moɡvmadlebs 
vin ɡaamtqunebs ɣvtʰis rtʃeulebs ɣmertʰi ɡamamartʰlebeli 
vin dasdebs msdʒavrs kʰriste ieso romelitsʰ mokvda da metitsʰ romelitsʰ aɣdɡa mkvdretʰitʰ ɣvtʰis mardʒvniv aris da is ʃuamdɡomlobs tʃventʰvis 
vin tʃamoɡvaʃorebs kʰristes siqvaruls ciri tʰu ʃevitsroeba devna tʰu ʃimʃili siʃiʃvle tʰu sapʰrətʰxe anda maxvili 
roɡortsʰ stseria radɡan ʃens ɡamo ɡvxotsʰaven qoveldɣe dasaklav tsʰxvrebad vartʰ ʃeratsʰxilni 
maɡram qovelive amas vdzlevtʰ tʃveni moqvarulis meʃveobitʰ 
da mtsams rom vertsʰ sikvdili da vertsʰ sitsʰotsʰxle vertsʰ anɡelozebi da vertsʰ mtʰavrobani vertsʰ dzalni vertsʰ atsmqo da vertsʰ mqopʰadi 
vertsʰ simaɣle da vertsʰ siɣrme vertsʰ veravitʰari sxva kʰmnileba ver ʃedzlebs tʃvens tʃamoʃorebas ɣvtʰis siqvarulisaɡan tʃvens upʰal kʰriste iesoʃi 
ceʃmaritebas vlaparakob kʰristeʃi ara vtsʰruob tʃemi sindisi mimotsmebs sulitsmidaʃi 
rom didia tʃemda mtsuxareba da ɡanutsqvetelia tʃemi ɡulis tandʒva 
netav me tʰvitʰon vqopʰiliqavi kʰristesaɡan mokvetʰili tʃemi dzmebistʰvis tʃems xortsʰiel tʰvistomtʰatʰvis 
romelnitsʰ israelianebi arian da ekutʰvnitʰ ʃvileba da dideba aɣtʰkʰmani da rdʒulmdebloba msaxurebani da dapirebani 
matʰni arian mamani da matʰɡanaa xortsʰielad kʰriste romelitsʰ aris ɣmertʰi qoveltʰa zeda ukunisamde kurtʰxeuli amin 
maɡram ara ise rom ɣvtʰis sitqva daetsʰa vinaidan vintsʰ israelisaɡan aris qvela israeliani rodia 
da qvela vintsʰ abraamis tʰeslia rodia misi ʃvili vinaidan natʰkʰvamia isakʃi ikʰneba tsodebuli ʃeni tʰesli 
ese iɡi ara es xortsʰieli ʃvilebi arian ɣvtʰis ʃvilebi aramed aɣtʰkʰmis ʃvilebi ʃeiratsʰxebian tʰeslad 
radɡan asetʰia aɣtʰkʰmis sitqva roɡortsʰ natʰkʰvamia am dros moval da saras eqoleba dze 
ara mxolod aramed rotsʰa rebekasatsʰ ertʰisaɡan tʃveni mamis isakisaɡan tʃaesaxa 
vinaidan dʒer kidev dabadebulni ar iqvnen misi ʃvilebi da dʒer kidev arapʰeri hkʰondatʰ ɡaketʰebuli karɡi an tsʰudi rom ɣvtʰis ɡanzraxva misi artʃevanis tʰanaxmad momxdariqo 
ara sakʰmetʰaɡan aramed momtsodeblisaɡan etʰkʰva mas upʰrosi daemoneba umtsʰross 
roɡortsʰ stseria ʃeviqvare me iakobi xolo esavi ʃevidzule 
tʰu asea raɣa vtʰkʰvatʰ nutʰu usamartʰlobaa ɣmertʰtʰan aramtsʰ da aramtsʰ 
radɡan moses eubneba vintsʰ msurs ʃevitsqalo ʃevitsqaleb da vintsʰ msurs ʃevitsqnaro ʃevitsqnareb 
amriɡad es damokidebulia ara msurvelze da ara mtsʰdelze aramed ʃemtsqale ɣmertʰze 
vinaidan tserili eubneba pʰaraons stsored amisatʰvis daɡaqene ʃen rom ʃenze vatʃveno tʃemi dzala ratʰa ɡanitʰkʰvas tʃemi saxeli mtʰel kʰveqanaze 
amriɡad vintsʰ surs mas ʃeitsqalebs da vintsʰ surs mas ɡaadʒiutebs 
ʃen metqvi aba raɣas ɡvdebs brals mis nebas vin aɣudɡeba tsin 
vin xar ʃen adamiano ɣmertʰs rom edavebi ɡana kʰmnileba etqvis ʃemokʰmeds ratom ʃemkʰmeni ase 
nutʰu meketsʰes upʰleba ara akʰvs tʰixaze rom tʰavisi mozelili tʰixidan zoɡi sapatio curceli ɡaaketʰos zoɡitsʰ upatio 
maʃ ra tʰu ɣmertʰi romelsatsʰ surs tʰavisi risxvis tʃveneba da dzlierebis utsqeba mravali sulɡrdzelebitʰ itʰmens dasaɣupavad ɡamzadebul risxvis curclebs 
ratʰa ɡamoatʃinos tʰavisi didebis siuxve tsqalobis curclebze romlebitsʰ tsinastsar ɡaamzada sadidblad 
tʃvenze romeltʰatsʰ moɡvitsoda ara marto iudeveltʰaɡan aramed tsarmartʰtʰaɡanatsʰ 
roɡortsʰ osiastʰanatsʰ ambobs ara tʃems ers vitqvi tʃems erad da ara saqvarels saqvarlad 
da im adɡilze sadatsʰ matʰ etʰkʰvatʰ ara tʃemi eri xartʰ tʰkʰven ikʰ etsodebatʰ tsʰotsʰxali ɣvtʰis dzeni 
xolo esaia ɣaɣadebs israelze israeliantʰa ritsʰxvi zɣvis kʰviʃasavitʰatsʰ rom iqos natsili ɡadartʃeba 
radɡan tʰavis sitqvas bolomde da dauqovnebliv ʃeasrulebs upʰali kʰveqanaze 
da roɡortsʰ tʰkʰva esaiam tsinastsar upʰal tsʰabaotʰs rom ar daetovebina tʃveni tʰesli sodomelebivitʰ vikʰneboditʰ da ɡomorelebs davemsɡavseboditʰ 
maʃ raɣa vtʰkʰvatʰ tsarmartʰebma romlebitsʰ simartʰles ar misdevdnen miiɣes simartʰle simartʰle rətsmenisaɡan 
xolo israelma romelitsʰ simartʰlis rdʒuls edzebda ver miaɣtsia simartʰlis rdʒuls 
ratom imitom rom rətsmenaʃi ki ar edzebda aramed rdʒulis sakʰmeebʃi ʃebrkoldnen ʃebrkolebis kʰvaze 
roɡortsʰ stseria aha davdeb sionʃi ʃebrkolebis kʰvas da tsatquebis kldes da qoveli visatsʰ stsams iɡi ar ʃertsʰxveba 
dzmebo tʃemi ɡulis survili da tʃemi vedreba ɣvtʰisadmi israelisatʰvis aris ratʰa ɡadartʃnen 
vinaidan vumotsmeb matʰ rom akʰvtʰ ɡulmodɡineba ɣvtʰisadami oɣond ara ʃetsʰnobilad 
radɡan ɣvtʰis simartʰle ver ʃeitsʰnes da tsʰdilobdnen sakutʰari simartʰlis dadɡenas da ɣvtʰis simartʰles ar daemortʃilnen 
vinaidan kʰristea rdʒulis dasasruli qoveli mortsmunis ɡasamartʰleblad 
mose rdʒulis samartʰlianobaze tsers rom misi ʃemsrulebeli katsʰi misitʰ itsʰotsʰxlebs 
xolo rətsmenismieri samartʰlianoba ase ambobs nu itqvi ʃens ɡulʃi vin ava zetsʰaʃi ese iɡi kʰristes tʃamosaqvanad 
anda vin tʃava upʰskrulʃi ese iɡi kʰristes mkvdretʰitʰ amosaqvanad 
maɡram ras ambobs iɡi axloa ʃentʰan sitqva ʃens baɡeʃi da ʃens ɡulʃi ese iɡi rətsmenis sitqva romelsatsʰ vkʰadaɡebtʰ 
imitom rom tʰu ʃeni baɡitʰ aɣiareb rom ieso upʰalia da ʃeni ɡulitʰ irtsmuneb rom ɣmertʰma aɣadɡina iɡi mkvdretʰitʰ ɡadartʃebi 
vinaidan ɡulitʰ stsamtʰ simartʰle xolo baɡitʰ aɣiareben ɡadasartʃenad 
radɡan tserili ambobs artsʰ ertʰi misi mortsmune ar ʃertsʰxveba 
amaʃi ar aris ɡansxvaveba iudevelsa da tsarmartʰs ʃoris vinaidan ertʰi upʰali aris qvelaze is uxvia qvelasatʰvis vintsʰ mas mouxmobs 
radɡan qoveli vintsʰ upʰlis saxels mouxmobs ɡadartʃeba 
maɡram roɡor mouxmon mas visitsʰ ar irtsmunes roɡor irtsmunon viszetsʰ ar smeniatʰ roɡor moisminon mkʰadaɡeblis ɡareʃe 
da roɡor ikʰadaɡon tʰu tsarɡzavnilebi ar arian roɡortsʰ stseria ra mʃvenieria siketʰis maxarebeltʰa pʰerxni 
maɡram qvelam rodi ismina saxareba radɡan esaia ambobs upʰalo vin irtsmuna tʃvenɡan mosmenili 
amriɡad rətsmena mosmenisaɡan xolo mosmena kʰristes sitqvisaɡan 
maɡram vambob nutʰu ar mousmeniatʰ pirikʰitʰ mtʰel msopʰlios moedo matʰi xma da kʰveqnis kideebs matʰi sitqvebi 
maɡram vambob nutʰu israelma ar itsʰoda pirveli mose ambobs me ʃurs aɣvdzrav tʰkʰvenʃi ara eritʰ ɡaɡarisxebtʰ uɡunuri eritʰ 
xolo esaia ɡabedulad ambobs mipoves matʰ vintsʰ ar medzebda ɡamovetsʰxade matʰ vintsʰ ar mkitʰxulobda 
xolo israels eubneba mtʰel dɣes vitsvdidi tʃems xelebs urtʃi da ɡauɡonari xalxisaken 
maʃ vambob nutʰu ɣmertʰma uarqo tʰavisi xalxi aramtsʰ da aramtsʰ radɡan metsʰ israeliani var abraamis tʰeslisaɡan beniaminis tomidan 
ar uaruqvia ɣmertʰs tʰavisi xalxi romelitsʰ tsinastsar itsʰno ɡana ar itsʰitʰ ras ambobs tserili elias ʃesaxeb roɡor tʃivis israelze ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe da ambobs 
upʰalo ʃeni tsinastsarmetqvelni amoxotsʰes da ʃeni samsxverploebi daanɡries davrtʃi marto me da tʃems mokvlas tsʰdiloben 
maɡram ras eubneba mas ɣvtʰis pasuxi davitove me tʃemtʰvis ʃvidi atʰasi katsʰi romeltʰatsʰ muxli ar moidrikes baqalis tsinaʃe 
aseve amʒamadatsʰ arsebobs natamali madlitʰ amortʃeuli 
xolo tʰu madlitʰ ukve ara sakʰmeebitʰ tʰorem madli aɣar ikʰneba madli xolo tʰu sakʰmeebitʰ iqo es ukve madli aɣar aris tʰorem sakʰmetsʰ aɣar aris sakʰme 
maʃ ra rasatsʰ edzebda israeli ver miaɣtsia mxolod rtʃeulebma miaɣtsies danartʃenebs ki ɡuli daexʃotʰ 
roɡortsʰ stseria mistsʰa matʰ ɣmertʰma uɡrədznoblobis suli tʰvalebi ratʰa ar xedavdnen da qurebi ratʰa ar esmodetʰ dɣevandel dɣemde 
xolo davitʰi ambobs matʰi supʰra iqos maxe bade da satsʰduri da matʰda misaɡebeli 
daibindos matʰi tʰvalebi ratʰa ver xedavdnen xolo matʰi xerxemali samudamod mrudi iqos 
maʃ vambob imdenad unda tsabordzikdnen rom daetsʰnen aramtsʰ da aramtsʰ maɡram matʰi datsʰemitʰ xsna eɣirsatʰ tsarmartʰebs ratʰa aɣdzruliqo matʰʃi ʃuri 
da tʰu matʰi datsʰema sopʰlis simdidrea da matʰi damtsʰroba tsarmartʰtʰa simdidre mitʰ umetes matʰi savseba 
xolo tʰkʰven ɡeubnebitʰ tsarmartʰno ramdenadatsʰ tsarmartʰtʰa motsʰikʰuli var tʃems msaxurebas vadideb 
neta ʃemdzleboda ʃuris ɡaɣviveba tʃems axloblebʃi da zoɡiertʰi matʰɡanis xsna 
vinaidan tʰu matʰi ɡandevna sopʰlis ʃeriɡebaa ɣmertʰtʰan aba raɣa ikʰneba matʰi miɣeba tʰu ara sitsʰotsʰxle mkvdartʰaɡan 
tʰu pirvelnaqopʰi tsmidaa maʃ tsʰomitsʰ da tʰu pʰesvi tsmidaa maʃ rtotsʰ 
xolo tʰu zoɡi rto ɡadatqda da ʃen veluro zetʰisxilo daemqen matʰ adɡilas da ɡaxdi zetʰis xilis pʰesvisa da tsvenis tʰanaziari 
nu iampartavneb rtotʰa tsinaʃe xolo tʰu iampartavneb itsʰode ʃen ki ar ɡikavia pʰesvi aramed pʰesvs ukavixar ʃen 
ʃen itqvi rtoebi ɡadatqdnen ratʰa me davemqnoo 
ketʰili isini ɡadatqdnen vinaidan ar stsamdatʰ ʃen ki dɡaxar rətsmenitʰ nu ɡaamaqdebi aramed ɡeʃinodes 
vinaidan tʰu ɣmertʰma ar daindo bunebrivi rtoebi ʃentsʰ ar daɡindobs 
amriɡad xedav ɣvtʰis saxierebas da simkatsʰres simkatsʰres datsʰemulebze da saxierebas ʃenze tʰu idɡebi mis saxierebaʃi tʰu ara da ʃentsʰ moikvetʰebi 
da isinitsʰ tʰu urtsmunoebaʃi ar idɡebian daemqnobian radɡan ɣmertʰs dzaludzs matʰi kvlav damqnoba 
xolo tʰu ʃen mokvetʰili xar bunebitʰ veluri zetʰisxilisɡan da arabunebrivad daemqne karɡ zetʰisxils mitʰ umetes eseni bunebrivebi daemqnobian tʰaviantʰ zetʰisxils 
radɡan ar minda dzmebo ar itsʰodetʰ es saidumlo ratʰa ar eqrədnobodetʰ tʰkʰvens sibrədznes manamde axlavs natsilobriv sibrmave israels vidre mtʰeli tsarmartʰoba ar miva ɣmertʰtʰan 
ase mtʰeli israeli ɡadartʃeba roɡortsʰ stseria mova sionidan mxsneli da uɣvtʰoebas aatsʰdens iakobs 
es aris tʃemi aɣtʰkʰma matʰtʰvis rotsʰa tsarvxotsʰav matʰ tsʰodvebs 
diax saxarebis mixedvitʰ isini mtrebi arian tʰkʰveni ɡulisatʰvis xolo amortʃevis mixedvitʰ saqvarelni mamebis ɡulisatʰvis 
vinaidan utsʰvalebelia ɣvtʰis nici da motsodeba 
iseve roɡortsʰ tʰkʰventsʰ odesɣatsʰ eurtʃeboditʰ ɣmertʰs axla ki ʃetsqalebuli xartʰ matʰi urtʃobitʰ 
ise axla isinitsʰ urtʃoben imisatʰvis rom isinitsʰ ʃetsqalebulni ikʰnen im tsqalobitʰ romelitsʰ tʰkʰven ɡedzlevatʰ 
vinaidan qvelani urtʃobaʃi tʃaketa ɣmertʰma ratʰa qvelani ʃeitsqalos 
o ɣvtʰis simdidretʰa da sibrədznisa da ʃemetsʰnebis siɣrme ra tʃautsvdomelni arian misi samartʰalni da miukvlevelni misi ɡzebi 
radɡan vin ʃeitsʰno upʰlis ɡoneba vin iqo misi mrtʃeveli 
an tsinastsar vin mistsʰa mas rom miuzɣos 
radɡan qovelive misɡan mis mier da mis mimartʰ aris mas dideba ukunisamde amin 
amriɡad ʃeɡaɡonebtʰ dzmebo ɣvtʰis tsqalobebitʰ rom ʃestsirotʰ tʰkʰveni sxeuli tsʰotsʰxal tsmida ɣvtʰis sasurvel msxverplad ratsʰ tʰkʰveni sulieri msaxureba ikʰneba 
da nu miesadaɡebitʰ am tsutʰisopʰels aramed ʃeitsʰvalenitʰ tʰkʰveni ɡonebis ɡanaxlebitʰ ratʰa ʃeitsʰnotʰ ra aris ɣvtʰis neba ketʰili sasurveli da srulqopʰili 
tʃemtʰvis motsʰemuli madlitʰ veubnebi qovel tʰkʰvenɡans tʰkʰvens tʰavze imaze metad nu ipʰikʰrebtʰ vidre unda pʰikʰrobdetʰ aramed ipʰikʰretʰ saɣad im rətsmenis kvalobaze ratsʰ ɣmertʰma ɡitsiladatʰ tʰitʰoeuls 
vinaidan tʃven ertʰ sxeulʃi mravali aso ɡvakʰvs maɡram qvela asos rodi akʰvs ertʰi da iɡive sakʰme 
aseve tʃven mravalni ertʰ sxeulad vartʰ kʰristeʃi xolo ertʰimeorisatʰvis asoni 
da ɡvakʰvs madlitʰ sxvadasxva nici tʃventʰvis motsʰemuli tʰu kʰadaɡebaa rətsmenis mixedvitʰ 
tʰu msaxurebaa msaxurebaʃi tʰu modzɣvaria damodzɣvraʃi 
tʰu ɡamamxnevebelia ɡamxnevebaʃi ɡamnatsilebelia ubraloebaʃi tsinamdɡomia sibedʒitʰeʃi da mtsqalobelia mxiarulebaʃi 
siqvaruli tsrpʰeli iqos ɡdzaɡdetʰ boroti da miekvrodetʰ ketʰils 
dzmatʰmoqvareobaʃi ertʰmanetʰisadmi ɡultʰbili siqvarulitʰ pativistsʰemaʃi ertʰmanetʰs daastsaritʰ 
ibedʒitʰetʰ da nu daiɣlebitʰ sulitʰ aɣeɡznetʰ emsaxuretʰ upʰals 
ixaretʰ imedʃi momtʰmenni iqavitʰ ɡasacirʃi lotsʰvaʃi urqevni 
monatsileoba miiɣetʰ tsmidatʰa saciroebaʃi estsrapʰetʰ stumartʰmoqvareobas 
lotsʰetʰ tʰkʰveni mdevnelebi lotsʰetʰ da nu tsqevlitʰ 
moxarulebtʰan ixaretʰ da motiralebtʰan itiretʰ 
ertʰsulovanni iqavitʰ ertʰmanetʰʃi kʰedmaɣluri pʰikʰrebi nu ɡekʰnebatʰ aramed mortʃilebs misdietʰ brdzeni nu ɡeɡonebatʰ sakutʰari tʰavi 
nuravis miaɡebtʰ borotis tsil borots tsʰdilobdetʰ ketʰils qvela adamianis tsinaʃe 
tʰu tʰkʰvenis mxriv ʃesadzlebelia qvela adamiantʰan mʃvidobianad iqavitʰ 
ʃurs nu idziebtʰ tʰkʰventʰvis saqvarelno aramed adɡili mietsʰitʰ upʰlis risxvas vinaidan stseria tʃemia ʃurisɡeba da me mivaɡeb ambobs upʰali 
amitom tʰu ʃeni mteri mʃieria daapure iɡi tʰu stsquria daalevine vinaidan amis ɡaketʰebitʰ nakvertsʰxlebs aɡroveb mis tʰavze 
ar daɡdzlios borotma aramed sdzlie borots ketʰilitʰ 
qoveli suli daemortʃilos umaɣles xelmtsipʰebas vinaidan ar arsebobs xelmtsipʰeba tʰu ara ɣvtʰisaɡan xolo arsebulni ɣvtʰis mier arian dadɡenilni 
amitom xelmtsipʰebis motsinaaɣmdeɡe etsinaaɣmdeɡeba ɣvtʰis dadɡenilebas xolo motsinaaɣmdeɡeni msdʒavrs daitexen tʰavze 
radɡan mtʰavarni saʃiʃni arian ara ketʰili sakʰmeebisatʰvis aramed borottʰatʰvis tʰu ɡsurs rom xelmtsipʰebisa ar ɡeʃinodes ketʰili aketʰe da kʰebas miiɣeb misɡan 
vinaidan iɡi ɣvtʰis msaxuria ʃenda sasiketʰod maɡram tʰu borotebas ikʰm ɡeʃinodes radɡan tquilad rodi atarebs maxvils is ɣvtʰis msaxuria da risxvitʰ ʃurismadziebeli borotmokʰmedze 
amitom tʃven unda davemortʃilotʰ ara marto risxvis ɡamo aramed sindisis ɡamotsʰ 
stsored amisatʰvis ixditʰ xarks vinaidan isini ɣvtʰis msaxurebi arian da dɣeniadaɡ amas aketʰeben 
amriɡad mietsʰitʰ qvelas ratsʰ ekutʰvnis visatsʰ xarki xarki visatsʰ baʒi baʒi visatsʰ ʃiʃi ʃiʃi visatsʰ pativi pativi 
aravisi arapʰeri daɡedotʰ valad ɡarda ertʰimeoris siqvarulisa vinaidan sxvisi moqvaruli asrulebs rdʒuls 
radɡan ar imruʃo ar mokla ar moiparo ar iqo tsʰrumotsme ar indomo da sxva ram mtsʰnebatsʰ ʃedis am sitqvaʃi ɡiqvardes moqvasi ʃeni vitʰartsʰa tʰavi ʃeni 
siqvaruli ar uborotebs moqvass amitom siqvaruli rdʒulis aɣsrulebaa 
maʃ ase imokʰmedetʰ radɡan itsʰitʰ dro rom dadɡa dzilisaɡan tʰkʰveni ɡamoɣvidzebis ʒami vinaidan axla upʰro axloa tʃveni xsna vidre maʃin rotsʰa virtsmunetʰ 
ɣame tsavida da dɣe moaxlovda amitom moviʃorotʰ sibnelis sakʰmeebi da ʃevimosotʰ natʰlis sacurveli 
movikʰtsʰetʰ tʰavdacerilad roɡortsʰ dɣisitʰ ara msunaɡobitʰ da lotʰobitʰ ara avxortsʰobitʰa da tʰavaʃvebulobitʰ ara tʃxubitʰ da ʃuritʰ 
aramed ʃeimosetʰ upʰali kʰriste da xortsʰze zrunvas ɡulistʰkʰmad nu ɡaixditʰ 
rətsmenaʃi udzlurni miiɣetʰ oɣond ara azrebze sakamatʰod 
zoɡs sdʒera rom qvelapʰris cama ʃeidzleba udzluri ki mxolod mtsvanileuls cams 
vintsʰ cams nu daamtsʰirebs imas vintsʰ ara cams da vintsʰ ara cams nu ɡanikitʰxavs imas vintsʰ cams imitom rom ɣmertʰma miiɣo iɡi 
vin xar ʃen sxvisi monis ɡamkitʰxvelo tʰavisi upʰlis tsinaʃe iɡi dɡas an etsʰema maɡram tsamoqenebuli ikʰneba vinaidan ɣmertʰs dzaludzs misi tsamoqeneba 
zoɡi dɣes dɣisɡan ɡanartʃevs zoɡi ki qvela dɣes ertʰnairad ɡanikitʰxavs qvela tʰavis rətsmenaʃi iqos mtkitsʰe 
vintsʰ pativs miaɡebs dɣes upʰlisatʰvis miaɡebs da vintsʰ cams upʰlisatʰvis cams radɡan madlobas stsiravs ɣmertʰs xolo vintsʰ ar cams upʰlisatʰvis ar cams da madlobas stsiravs ɣmertʰs 
vinaidan artsʰ ertʰi tʃvenɡani ar tsʰotsʰxlobs sakutʰari tʰavisatʰvis da aravin kvdeba sakutʰari tʰavisatʰvis 
vinaidan tʰu vtsʰotsʰxlobtʰ upʰlisatʰvis vtsʰotsʰxlobtʰ da tʰu vkvdebitʰ upʰlisatʰvis vkvdebitʰ da amitom vtsʰotsʰxlobtʰ tʰu vkvdebitʰ upʰlisani vartʰ 
radɡan imisatʰvis mokvda kʰriste da ɡatsʰotsʰxlda rom iupʰlos mkvdrebzetsʰ da tsʰotsʰxlebzetsʰ 
maʃ ʃen ratom ɡanikitʰxav ʃens dzmas anda ratom amtsʰireb ʃens dzmas tʃven xom qvelani tsarvdɡebitʰ ɣvtʰis samsdʒavros tsinaʃe 
radɡan stseria me tsʰotsʰxali var ambobs upʰali tʃems tsinaʃe moidrikeba qoveli muxli da qoveli ena aɣiarebs ɣmertʰs 
amriɡad qoveli tʃvenɡani sakutʰari tʰavisatʰvis pasuxs aɡebs ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
amitom nuɣar ɡanvikitʰxavtʰ ertʰmanetʰs aramed upʰro imas ɡanikitʰxavdetʰ rom dzmam dzma ar daabrkolos da ar atsʰdunos 
me vitsʰi da dartsmunebuli var upʰal iesoʃi rom tʰavistʰavad arapʰeria ɡautsmidurebuli mxolod mistʰvis aris ɡautsmidurebuli vintsʰ ɡautsmidurebulad tʃatʰvlis raimes 
tʰu sacmlis ɡamo ʃetsuxdeba ʃeni dzma ʃen ukve aɣar ikʰtsʰevi siqvarulitʰ ʃeni sacmlitʰ nu daɣupav mas vistʰvisatsʰ mokvda kʰriste 
dasaɡmobi nu ɡaxdeba tʰkʰveni siketʰe 
vinaidan ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli sacmel sasmeli ki ar aris aramed simartʰle mʃvidoba da sixaruli sulitsmidaʃi 
xolo vintsʰ amitʰ emsaxureba kʰristes iɡi sasurvelia ɣvtʰisatʰvis da mosatsoni adamiantʰatʰvis 
maʃ vestsrapʰotʰ imas ratsʰ mʃvidobasa da ertʰmanetʰis aɣʃenebas emsaxureba 
sacmlisatʰvis nu daarɣvev ɣvtʰis sakʰmeebs qovelive tsmidaa maɡram borotia imisatʰvis vintsʰ ʃebrkolebitʰ cams 
umdʒobesia ara camo xortsʰi ar dalio ɣvino da artsʰ sxva ram ritʰatsʰ ʃeni dzma ʃebrkoldeba 
ɡakʰvs rətsmena ɡkʰondes ʃentʰvis ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe netaria is vintsʰ tʰavis tʰavs ar sdebs msdʒavrs imis ɡamo rasatsʰ irtʃevs 
vintsʰ ecvobs camisas damnaʃavea vinaidan rətsmenitʰ ar ikʰtsʰeva xolo qovelive ratsʰ rətsmenitʰ araa tsʰodvaa 
xolo mas visatsʰ dzaludzs tʰkʰveni ɡanmtkitsʰeba tʃemi saxarebis da ieso kʰristes kʰadaɡebis mixedvitʰ im saidumlos ɡamotsʰxadebitʰ romelitsʰ ukunisidan midumebuli iqo 
xolo axla ɡatsʰxadebulia tsinastsarmetqvelur tserilebʃi maradiuli ɣvtʰis brdzanebitʰ eutsqa qvela ers rom daemortʃilon rətsmenas 
ertʰadertʰ brdzen ɣmertʰs ieso kʰristes meʃveobitʰ dideba ukunitʰi ukunisamde amin 
xolo tʃven dzliertʰ ɡvmartʰebs vzidotʰ ususurtʰa udzlureba da ar vedzebotʰ sakutʰari tʰavis siame 
qoveli tʃvenɡani unda aamebdes moqvass sasiketʰo aɣʃenebisatʰvis 
vinaidan kʰristetsʰ ar edzebda siames tʰavistʰvis aramed roɡortsʰ stseria ʃeni mlandzɣvelebis landzɣva damatqda me 
radɡan qovelive ratsʰ tsinatʰ daitsera tʃvens sastsavleblad daitsera ratʰa motʰminebitʰ da tseriltʰa nuɡeʃitʰ ɡvkʰondes sasoeba 
xolo motʰminebisa da nuɡeʃis ɣmertʰma moɡtsʰetʰ tʰkʰven ertʰmanetʰʃi ertʰsulovneba kʰriste iesos mier 
ratʰa ertʰsulovnad ertʰi piritʰ adidotʰ ɣmertʰi tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes mama 
amitom miiɣetʰ ertʰmanetʰi iseve roɡortsʰ kʰristem miɡiɣotʰ tʰkʰven ɣvtʰis sadideblad 
xolo me vambob rom kʰriste ɡaxda tsinadatsʰvetʰiltʰa msaxuri ɣvtʰis ceʃmaritebisatʰvis ratʰa ʃesrulebuliqo mamebisatʰvis aɣtʰkʰmuli 
da ratʰa tsarmartʰebs ɡanedidebinatʰ ɣmertʰi tsqalobisatʰvis roɡortsʰ stseria amisatʰvis ɡaɣiareb tsarmartʰebs ʃoris da vuɡalobeb ʃens saxels 
da kvlav ambobs ixarebdetʰ tsarmartʰno mis xalxtʰan ertʰad 
da kvlav tsarmartʰebo akʰebdetʰ upʰals da xalxebo adidebdetʰ mas 
da kvlav esaia ambobs iqos ieses pʰesvi romelitsʰ aɣdɡeba tsarmartʰebze saupʰlod misi sasoeba ekʰnebatʰ tsarmartʰebs 
xolo sasoebis ɣmertʰma aɡavsotʰ qovelɡvari sixarulitʰ da mʃvidobitʰ rətsmenaʃi ratʰa sulitsmidis dzalitʰ iuxvotʰ sasoebaʃi 
da tʰvitʰon metsʰ dzmano dartsmunebuli var rom tʰkʰven tʰvitʰonatsʰ savse xartʰ satʰnoebitʰ savse xartʰ qoveli tsʰodnitʰ da ʃeɡidzliatʰ ertʰmanetʰis dariɡeba 
maɡram tsʰota ɡavkadnierdi rotsʰa ɡtserditʰ akʰa ikʰ roɡortsʰ tʰkʰvendami ʃexsenebas ɣvtʰis mier tʃemtʰvis motsʰemuli madlitʰ 
viqo ieso kʰristes msaxuri tsarmartʰebtʰan da ɣvtʰis saxarebis mɣvdelmsaxuri ratʰa tsarmartʰtʰa ʃesatsiravi iqos sasurveli da sulitsmidis mier ɡantsmedili 
amitom ʃemidzlia viamaqo kʰriste iesoʃi ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
radɡan isetʰi ramis laparaks ver ɡavbedav ratsʰ kʰristes ar ɡaeketʰebinos tʃemi meʃveobitʰ tsarmartʰtʰa dasamortʃileblad sitqvitʰ da sakʰmitʰ 
niʃnebisa da sastsaulebis dzalitʰ ɣvtʰis sulis dzalitʰ ise rom ierusalimidan da misi ʃemoɡarenidan ilirikamde ɡavavrtsʰele kʰristes saxareba 
tʰanatsʰ vtsʰdilobdi mexarebina ara ikʰ sadatsʰ ukve tsʰnobili iqo kʰristes saxeli ratʰa ar meʃenebina sxvis sadzirkvelze 
aramed roɡortsʰ stseria vistʰvisatsʰ ar ɡamoutsʰxadebiatʰ dainaxaven da visatsʰ ar mousmenia mixvdebian 
amis ɡamotsʰ iqo rom mravalɡzis ʃemipʰerxda tʰkʰventʰan mosvla 
xolo axla rotsʰa dʒer kidev ara makʰvs adɡili am mxareebʃi xolo mravali tselia msurs tʰkʰventʰan mosvla 
roɡortsʰ ki davapireb espanetʰʃi ɡamɡzavrebas ɡamoɡivlitʰ vinaidan vimedovneb rom ɡnaxavtʰ ɡavlisas da tʰkʰven ɡamatsʰilebtʰ ikʰ da ertʰxans maintsʰ davtkbebi tʰkʰventʰan qopʰnitʰ 
xolo axla ierusalimʃi mivdivar tsmidatʰa samsaxurad 
radɡan makedoniam da akʰaiam inebes motsqalebis ɡaziareba ɣaribi tsmidebisatʰvis romlebitsʰ ierusalimʃi arian 
inebes da movalenitsʰ arian matʰ tsinaʃe vinaidan tʰu tsarmartʰebi eziarnen matʰ sulierʃi xortsʰieladatsʰ unda moemsaxuron matʰ 
amriɡad rotsʰa davamtʰavreb amas da beceds davasvam matʰ naqopʰs tʰkʰventʰan ɡamovlitʰ tsaval espanetʰisken 
xolo vitsʰi rom tʰkʰventʰan mosvlisas moval kʰristes saxarebis sruli kurtʰxevitʰ 
ʃeɡaɡonebtʰ tʰkʰven dzmano tʃveni upʰlitʰ ieso kʰristetʰi da sulis siqvarulitʰ tʃemtʰan ertʰad ibedʒitʰotʰ tʃemtʰvis ɣvtʰisadmi lotsʰvebʃi 
ratʰa ɡadavurtʃe urtsmunoebs iudeaʃi da tsmidatʰatʰvis sasiamovno iqos tʃemi samsaxuri ierusalimʃi 
ratʰa sixarulitʰ movide tʰkʰventʰan ɣvtʰis nebitʰ da davisveno tʰkʰventʰan 
mʃvidobis ɣmertʰi iqos qvela tʰkʰvenɡantʰan amin 
aha tsarmoɡidɡentʰ tʃvens das pʰebes romelitsʰ aris kenkʰreltʰa eklesiis msaxuri 
ratʰa miiɣotʰ iɡi upʰalʃi roɡortsʰ tsmidebs ʃeepʰereba da daexmarotʰ qvelapʰerʃi ratsʰ dascirdeba tʰkʰventʰan vinaidan isitsʰ bevris ʃemtse iqo da piradad tʃemitsʰ 
moikitʰxetʰ priska da akvila tʃemi tʰanamʃromelni kʰriste iesoʃi 
romelnitsʰ tʰavs stsiravdnen tʃemi sitsʰotsʰxlisatʰvis da romeltʰatsʰ ara marto me vemadlierebi aramed tsarmartʰtʰa eklesiebitsʰ 
da matʰi saʃinao eklesiatsʰ moikitʰxetʰ tʃemi saqvareli epenetosi romelitsʰ aziaʃi pirveli naqopʰia kʰristesatʰvis 
moikitʰxetʰ mariami romelmatsʰ bevri iʃroma tʰkʰventʰvis 
moikitʰxetʰ andronike da iunia tʃemi natʰesavebi da tʃemi tʰanatqveebi romelnitsʰ ɡantʰkʰmuli arian motsʰikʰultʰa ʃoris da tʃemze utsinatsʰ irtsmunes kʰriste 
moikitʰxetʰ ampliasi tʃemi saqvareli upʰalʃi 
moikitʰxetʰ urbanosi tʃveni tʰanamʃromeli kʰristeʃi da tʃemi saqvareli stakʰisi 
moikitʰxetʰ kʰristeʃi ɡamotsʰdili apelesi moikitʰxetʰ aristobules ʃinaurebi 
moikitʰxetʰ tʃemi natʰesavi irodioni moikitʰxetʰ narkisusis ʃinaurebi upʰalʃi mqopʰni 
moikitʰxetʰ upʰalʃi mʃromelebi tripʰena da tripʰosasi moikitʰxetʰ saqvareli persisi romelmatsʰ bevri iʃroma upʰalʃi 
moikitʰxetʰ upʰalʃi rtʃeuli rupʰusi da deda misi da tʃemi 
moikitʰxetʰ asvinkritosi pʰleɡoni hermesi patrobasi hermasi da matʰtʰan mqopʰi dzmebi 
moikitʰxetʰ pʰiloloɡosi da iulia nireasi da misi da olimpasi da matʰtʰan mqopʰi qvela tsmida 
moikitʰxetʰ ertʰmanetʰi tsmida amboritʰ mokitʰxvas ɡitʰvlitʰ kʰristes qvela eklesia 
ʃeɡaɡonebtʰ dzmano moeridetʰ matʰ vintsʰ ɡanxetʰkʰilebasa da satsʰdurs kʰmnis tsinaaɣmdeɡ im modzɣvrebisa romelitsʰ tʰkʰven nastsavli ɡakʰvtʰ da ʃeakʰtsʰietʰ matʰ zurɡi 
vinaidan asetʰi adamianebi emsaxurebian ara tʃvens upʰals ieso kʰristes aramed tʰaviantʰ mutsʰels da lamazi sitqvebitʰ da mopʰerebitʰ atsʰduneben umankotʰa ɡulebs 
radɡan tʰkʰveni mortʃileba qvelasatʰvis tsʰnobilia amitom moxaruli var tʰkʰvens ɡamo maɡram minda rom brdzenebi iqotʰ siketʰisatʰvis da ubraloni borotisatʰvis 
xolo mʃvidobis ɣmertʰi male tʰkʰvens pʰerxtʰitʰ ʃemusravs satanas tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes madli tʰkʰventʰanaa amin 
mokitʰxvas ɡitʰvlian tʃemi tʰanamʃromeli timotʰe da tʃemi natʰesavebi lukiosi iasoni da sosipatrosi 
mokitʰxvas ɡitʰvlitʰ upʰalʃi tertosi romelmatsʰ davtsere es tserili 
mokitʰxvas ɡitʰvlian tʃemi maspindzeli ɡaiozi da mtʰeli eklesia mokitʰxvas ɡitʰvlian kʰalakʰis meɡandzuri erastosi da dzma kvartosi 
tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes madli qovel tʰkʰvenɡantʰan amin 
pavle ieso kʰristes motsodebuli motsʰikʰuli ɣvtʰis nebitʰ da dzma sostʰeni 
ɣvtʰis eklesias romelitsʰ korintʰoʃia kʰriste iesoʃi ɡantsmendiltʰ motsodebul tsmidebs qvelastʰan ertʰad vintsʰ mouxmobs tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes saxels qvela adɡilas matʰtʰan da tʃventʰan 
madli tʰkʰven da mʃvidoba tʃveni mama ɣmertʰisa da upʰal ieso kʰristesaɡan 
maradis vmadlob ɣmertʰs tʰkʰventʰvis ɣvtʰis madlisatʰvis romelitsʰ ɡebodzatʰ tʰkʰven kʰriste iesoʃi 
imitom rom ɡamdidrditʰ masʃi qovelivetʰi qovelɡvari sitqvitʰ da qovelɡvari tsʰodnitʰ 
radɡan kʰristes motsmoba ɡanmtkitsʰda tʰkʰvenʃi 
ise rom ar ɡakliatʰ aravitʰari nici tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes ɡamotsʰxadebis molodinʃi 
vintsʰ ɡanɡamtkitsʰebtʰ tʰkʰven bolomde ratʰa umtsikvlo iqotʰ tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes dɣes 
sartsmunoa ɣmertʰi romlisɡanatsʰ ikʰenitʰ motsodebulni mis dzestʰan tʃvens upʰal ieso kʰristestʰan tʰanaziarebisatʰvis 
xolo me ʃeɡaɡonebtʰ dzmano tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes saxelitʰ rom qvelani ambobdetʰ ertʰsa da imaves da ar iqos tʰkʰvenʃi ɡanxetʰkʰileba aramed ɡaertʰianebulni iqotʰ ɡonebitʰ da azritʰ 
radɡan tʃemtʰvis tsʰnobili ɡaxda dzmano kʰloes xalxisɡan rom tʰkʰvens ʃoris davaa 
me vɡulisxmob rom qoveli tʰkʰvenɡani ambobs me pavlesi var me apolosisa me kepʰasi me ki kʰristesio 
ɡana ɡaiqo kʰriste ɡana pavle etsʰva dʒvars tʰkʰventʰvis an pavles saxelitʰ moinatʰletʰ 
madlobas vtsirav ɣmertʰs rom artsʰertʰi tʰkʰvenɡani ar mominatʰlavs ɡarda krisposis da ɡaiozisa 
ratʰa vinmem ar tʰkʰvas rom tʃemi saxelitʰ moinatʰletʰ 
movnatʰle aɡretʰve stepʰanas saxli matʰ ɡarda ki ar vitsʰi tʰu movnatʰle vinme 
radɡan kʰristes ar movuvlenivar sanatʰlavad aramed saxareblad ara brədznuli sitqvebitʰ ratʰa ar ɡaukʰmebuliqo kʰristes dʒvari 
vinaidan sitqva dʒvris ʃesaxeb sisulelea matʰtʰvis romelnitsʰ iɣupebian xolo tʃventʰvis romelnitsʰ ɡadavrtʃebitʰ ɣvtʰis dzalaa 
radɡan stseria brdzentʰa sibrədznes movspob da ɡoniertʰa ɡonierebas arad tʃavaɡdeb 
sad aris brdzeni sad aris mtsiɡnobari sad aris am saukunis mokamatʰe ɡana sisuleled ar akʰtsʰia ɣmertʰma sibrədzne am sopʰlisa 
vinaidan raki ɣvtʰaebriv sibrədzneʃi ver itsʰno ɣmertʰi sopʰelma tʰavisi sibrədznitʰ ɣvtʰistʰvis satʰno iqo mortsmunetʰa xsna kʰadaɡebis uɡunurebitʰ 
radɡan iudevelni moitʰxoven sastsaulebs da berdznebi sibrədznes edzeben 
xolo tʃven vkʰadaɡebtʰ dʒvartsʰmul kʰristes iudeveltʰatʰvis satsʰdurs da berdzentʰatʰvis uɡunurebas 
xolo motsodebultʰatʰvis iudevelebistʰvisatsʰ da berdznebistʰvisatsʰ vkʰadaɡebtʰ kʰristes ɣvtʰis dzalas da ɣvtʰis sibrədznes 
radɡan uɡnureba ɣvtʰisa adamianebze ubrdzenesia da udzlureba ɣvtʰisa adamianebze udzlieresi 
naxetʰ dzmano vin xartʰ motsodebulni bevri ar aris xortsʰielad brdzeni bevri ar aris dzlieri da bevri ar aris tsartʃinebuli 
aramed sopʰlis umetsʰarni amoartʃia ɣmertʰma ratʰa ʃeartsʰxvinos brdzenni da sopʰlis udzlurni amoartʃia ɣmertʰma ratʰa ʃeartsʰxvinos dzlierni 
mdabioni amoartʃia ɣmertʰma da damtsʰirebulni da ararsebuli ratʰa ɡaaukʰmos arsebuli 
rom artsʰ ertʰi xortsʰieli ar ikʰadodes ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
imisɡan xartʰ tʰkʰven kʰriste iesoʃi romelitsʰ ɡaxda tʃventʰvis sibrədzned ɣvtʰismier simartʰled ɡantsmedad da ɡamosqidvad 
ratʰa iqos roɡortsʰ stseria vintsʰ ikʰadis upʰlitʰ daikʰados 
da metsʰ movedi tʰkʰventʰan dzmebo movedi ɣvtʰis motsmobis sautsqeblad ara amaɣlebuli sitqvitʰ an sibrədznitʰ 
radɡan ɡadavtsqvite arapʰeri mtsʰodnoda tʰkʰvens ʃoris ɡarda ieso kʰristesi da isitsʰ dʒvartsʰmulisa 
da viqavi tʰkʰventʰan udzlurebaʃi ʃiʃʃi da did dzrtsolaʃi 
da tʃemi sitqva da kʰadaɡeba tʃemi sibrədznis damartsmunebeli sitqvebitʰ ki ar iqo aramed sulisa da dzalis ɡamotsʰxadebitʰ 
ratʰa tʰkʰveni rətsmena iqos ara katsʰtʰa sibrədznitʰ aramed ɣvtʰis dzalitʰ 
oɣond sibrədznes vlaparakobtʰ sulierad motsipʰultʰa ʃoris ara sopʰlis sibrədznes artsʰ sopʰlis mtʰavartʰa tsarmavaltʰa 
aramed vlaparakobtʰ ɣvtʰis sibrədznes saidumloebaʃi dapʰaruls romelitsʰ tsinastsar ɡansazɣvra ɣmertʰma saukunetʰa utsinares tʃveni didebistʰvis 
ratsʰ veravin ʃeitsʰno sopʰlis mtʰavartʰaɡan vinaidan rom ʃeetsʰnotʰ dʒvars ar atsʰvamdnen didebis upʰals 
maɡram roɡortsʰ stseria ratsʰ tʰvals ar unaxavs qurs ar smenia katsʰs ɡulʃi ar ɡauvlia ɣmertʰma is moumzada tʰavis moqvarulebs 
tʃven ki ɡaɡvimxila ɣmertʰma tʰavisi sulitʰ vinaidan suli cvrets qovelives ɣvtʰis siɣrmeebsatsʰ 
vinaidan romelma adamianma itsʰis ra aris adamianʃi ɡarda adamianis sulisa romelitsʰ masʃia aseve ɣvtʰisa aravin arapʰeri itsʰis ɡarda ɣvtʰis sulisa 
xolo tʃven miviɣetʰ ara sopʰlis suli aramed suli ɣvtʰisaɡan ratʰa vitsʰodetʰ ɣvtʰisaɡan tʃventʰvis monicebuli 
da amas vlaparakobtʰ ara adamiantʰa sibrədznitʰ ʃestsavlili sitqvebitʰ aramed sulitsmidisaɡan ʃestsavlilitʰ suliers sulieritʰ ɡanvmartavtʰ 
ai mitsieri adamiani ar ɣebulobs imas ratsʰ ɣvtʰis sulisaɡan aris vinaidan uɡunurebad miitʃnevs da artsʰ dzaludzs ʃetsʰnoba radɡan sulierad aris ɡansasdʒeli 
xolo sulieri ɡansdʒis qovelives tʰavad ki aravisɡan ar ɡanisdʒeba 
radɡan vin ʃeitsʰno upʰlis azri ratʰa astsavlos mas tʃven ki ɡvakʰvs kʰristes azri 
xolo me dzmano ar ʃemedzlo tʰkʰventʰan laparaki roɡortsʰ sulierebtʰan aramed roɡortsʰ xortsʰielebtʰan roɡortsʰ tʃvilebtʰan kʰristeʃi 
rdzes ɡasmevditʰ tʰkʰven da ara sacmels vinaidan maʃin ar ʃeɡedzlotʰ da axlatsʰ ar dzalɡidztʰ 
imitom rom dʒer kidev xortsʰielni xartʰ vinaidan tʰu ʃuri da davaa tʰkʰvens ʃoris ɡana xortsʰielni ara xartʰ da adamianiseburad ar ikʰtsʰevitʰ 
radɡan rotsʰa ertʰi ambobs me pavlesi varo xolo meore me apolosisa varo ɡana xortsʰielni ara xartʰ 
aba vin aris pavle vin aris apolosi mxolod msaxurni romeltʰa meʃveobitʰatsʰ irtsmunetʰ roɡortsʰ tʰitʰoeuls mistsʰa upʰalma 
me davrɡe apolosma mortsqa maɡram ɣmertʰma ɡazarda 
amitom artsʰ damrəɡvelia arapʰeri artsʰ momrətsqveli aramed ɡamzrdeli ɣmertʰi 
damrəɡveli da momrətsqveli ertʰi da iɡivea xolo tʰitʰoeuli miiɣebs tʰavis sazɣaurs tʰavisi ʃromisamebr 
vinaidan tʃven ɣvtʰis tʰanamʃromelni vartʰ tʰkʰven ki ɣvtʰis qana da ɣvtʰis ʃenoba 
me ɣvtʰis mier tʃemtʰvis bodzebuli madlitʰ roɡortsʰ brdzenma xurotʰmodzɣvarma sadzirkveli davude xolo sxva aʃenebs masze maɡram tʰitʰoeulma uquros roɡor aʃenebs masze 
vinaidan aravis dzaludzs daudos sxva sadzirkveli ɡarda imisa ratsʰ dadebulia romelitsʰ aris ieso kʰriste 
da tʰu vinme aʃenebs am sadzirkvelze okʰros vertsʰxls patiosan kʰvebs dzels namdʒas 
tʰitʰoeulis sakʰme ɡamomʒɣavndeba vinaidan dɣe ɡamoatʃens radɡan is tsʰetsʰxlitʰ ɡamotsʰxaddeba da tʰitʰoeulis sakʰmes roɡoritsʰ aris tsʰetsʰxli ɡamotsʰdis 
visi daʃenebulitsʰ ɡadzlebs is miiɣebs sazɣaurs 
visi sakʰmetsʰ daitsveba is izaralebs tʰvitʰon ki ɡadartʃeba maɡram roɡortsʰ tsʰetsʰxlidan 
nutʰu ar itsʰitʰ rom ɣvtʰis tadzari xartʰ da ɣvtʰis suli tsʰotsʰxlobs tʰkʰvenʃi 
tʰu vinme azianebs ɣvtʰis tadzars ɣmertʰi daazianebs mas radɡan tsmidaa ɣvtʰis tadzari da es tʰkʰvena xartʰ 
nuravin itsʰdunebtʰ tʰavs tʰu vinmes am sopʰelʃi tʰavisi tʰavi brədznad tsarmoudɡenia ɡauɡunurdes ratʰa brdzeni ɡaxdes 
vinaidan am sopʰlis sibrədzne uɡunurebaa ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe roɡortsʰ stseria matʰ tsʰbierebaʃi ʃeipqrobs brdzenebs 
da kidev itsʰis upʰalma brdzentʰa zraxvani rom amaoa isini 
amitom nuravin daikvexnis adamianebitʰ vinaidan qovelive tʰkʰvenia 
ɡind pavle ɡind apolosi ɡind kepʰa ɡind sopʰeli ɡind sitsʰotsʰxle ɡind sikvdili ɡind atsmqo da ɡind mqopʰadi qovelive tʰkʰvenia 
tʰkʰven xom kʰristesi xartʰ kʰriste ki ɣvtʰisaa 
adamianma ise ʃeɡvratsʰxos tʃven roɡortsʰ kʰristes msaxurni da ɣvtʰis saidumlotʰa mneebi 
da upʰro metitsʰ mnetʰa ʃoris edzeben rom aɣmotʃndes sartsmuno vinme 
xolo tʃemtʰvis umniʃvneloa tʰkʰven ɡanmsdʒitʰ me tʰu adamiantʰa samsdʒavro maɡram me namdvilad ar ɡanvsdʒi tʃems tʰavs 
vinaidan arapʰeri vitsʰi tʃems tʰavze maɡram amitʰ ar vmartʰldebi tʃemi ɡanmsdʒeli xom upʰalia 
amitom nu ɡansdʒitʰ uʒamod vidre movidodes upʰali romelitsʰ ɡaanatʰebs bnelʃi damaluls da ɡamoatʃens ɡulis zraxvebs da maʃin ekʰneba tʰitʰoeuls kʰeba ɣvtʰisaɡan 
da es dzmano nimuʃad davude tʃems tʰavs da apoloss tʰkʰveni ɡulisatʰvis ratʰa istsavlotʰ tʃvenɡan rom ar ɡadaxvidetʰ datserils da ar ɡauqoqotʃdetʰ ertʰmanetʰs 
radɡan vin ɡanɡasxvavebs ra ɡakʰvs ratsʰ ar miɡiɣia xolo tʰu miiɣe rad ikvexni tʰitʰkʰos ar miɡeɣos 
diax ukve ɡadzexitʰ ukve ɡamdidrditʰ tʃvens ɡareʃe ɡamepʰditʰ da neta martʰla mepʰobdetʰ rom tʃventsʰ vmepʰobdetʰ tʰkʰventʰan ertʰad 
radɡan vpʰikʰrob rom tʃven motsʰikʰulebs ɣmertʰma ukanaskneli adɡili moɡvitʃina roɡortsʰ sikvdilmisdʒilebs vinaidan sanaxaobad ɡavxditʰ sopʰlisatʰvis anɡelozebistʰvisatsʰ da adamianebistʰvisatsʰ 
tʃven uɡunurebi vartʰ kʰristes ɡulisatʰvis tʰkʰven ki brdzenebi xartʰ kʰristeʃi tʃven udzlurni vartʰ tʰkʰven ki dzlierni tʰkʰven didebulni tʃven ki upationi 
tʃven am ʒamamde mʃivrebi da mtsqurvlebi vartʰ ʃiʃvlebi da naɡvemni da moxetialeni 
vʃromobtʰ tʃveni xelebitʰ vmuʃaobtʰ ɡaɡvlandzɣaven vlotsʰavtʰ ɡvdevnian vitʰmentʰ 
saxels ɡvitexen vepʰerebitʰ da ɡavxditʰ ɡanaxveti sopʰlisa qvelapʰris naɡavi akʰamde 
tʰkʰvenda ʃesartsʰxvenad rodi vtser amas aramed ʃeɡaɡonebtʰ roɡortsʰ tʃems saqvarel ʃvilebs 
vinaidan tʰundatsʰ atʰi atʰasi aɣmzrdeli ɡqavdetʰ kʰristeʃi mamebi bevri ara ɡqavtʰ radɡan me ɡʃobetʰ tʰkʰven kʰriste iesoʃi saxarebitʰ 
amitom ʃeɡaɡonebtʰ tʰkʰven mombadzetʰ me 
amisatʰvis ɡamovɡzavne tʰkʰventʰan timotʰe tʃemi saqvareli da ertʰɡuli ʃvili upʰalʃi da is ɡaɡaxsenebtʰ tʃems ɡzebs kʰriste iesoʃi roɡor vastsavli qovel adɡilas qovel eklesiaʃi 
zoɡiertʰebi ɡaampartavndnen tʰitʰkʰos ar movidode tʰkʰventʰan 
maɡram male moval tʰkʰventʰan tʰu upʰali inebebs da ɡamovtsʰdi ara kʰedmaɣlur sitqvebs aramed dzalas 
radɡan ɣvtʰis sasupʰeveli aris ara sitqvaʃi aramed dzalaʃi 
ra ɡsurtʰ arɡnitʰ movide tʰkʰventʰan tʰu siqvarulitʰ da tʰavmdablobis sulitʰ 
xma dadis saertʰod rom mruʃobaa tʰkʰvenʃi tʰanatsʰ isetʰi mruʃoba romlis msɡavsi tsarmartʰebʃitsʰ ki ar aris rom viɣatsʰas mamis tsʰoli hqavs 
da tʰkʰven kidetsʰ kʰedmaɣlobtʰ imis natsʰvlad rom ɡlovobdetʰ ratʰa moikvetʰos tʰkʰvenɡan asetʰi sakʰmis tʃamdeni 
tʰumtsʰa sxeulitʰ ara var tʰkʰventʰan sulitʰ vimqopʰebi ukve msdʒavri davde mas tʰitʰkʰos tʰkʰventʰan vqopʰiliqavi vintsʰ asetʰi sakʰme tʃaidina 
tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes saxelitʰ rotsʰa ʃeikribebitʰ tʃemi sulis tʰandastsrebitʰ tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes dzalitʰ 
asetʰi katsʰi ɡadaetsʰes satanas xortsʰis dasaɣupavad ratʰa suli ɡadartʃes tʃveni upʰlis iesos dɣes 
ar ʃeɡpʰeritʰ kvexna nutʰu ar itsʰitʰ rom mtsʰireodeni sapʰuari mtʰel tsʰoms apʰuebs 
ɡantsmidetʰ dzveli sapʰuari ratʰa iqotʰ axali tsʰomi ramdenadatsʰ xmiadebi xartʰ vinaidan tʃveni pasekʰi kʰriste tʃvens ɡamo ʃeetsira 
amitom vidɣesastsaulotʰ ara dzveli sapʰuaritʰ ara borotebisa da uketʰurebis sapʰuaritʰ aramed sitsmidisa da ceʃmaritebis xmiaditʰ 
tserilʃi ɡtserditʰ rom ar ikʰoniotʰ urtʰiertʰoba ɡarqvnil xalxtʰan 
ara marto am sopʰlis ɡarqvnilebtʰan an xarbebtʰan mtatsʰeblebtʰan an kerptʰaqvanismtsʰemlebtʰan vinaidan maʃin tʰkʰven unda ɡanʃoreboditʰ sopʰels 
aramed ɡtserditʰ tʰkʰven rom ar ikʰoniotʰ kavʃiri imastʰan vintsʰ dzmad itsodeba maɡram ɡarqvnilia an xarbi an kerptʰaqvanismtsʰemeli an maɡinebeli an lotʰi an mtatsʰebeli asetʰtʰan artsʰ ki camotʰ 
vinaidan me ratom ɡanvikitʰxo ɡareʃeebi ɡana tʰkʰven ʃinaurebs ar ɡanikitʰxavtʰ 
ɡareʃeebs ɣmertʰi ɡanikitʰxavs moiʃoretʰ boroti tʰkʰvenɡan 
nutʰu bedavs romelime tʰkʰvenɡani tʰavisiantʰan dava rom akʰvs samartʰlis dziebas usamartʰloebtʰan da ara tsmidebtʰan 
nutʰu ar itsʰitʰ rom tsmidebi ɡanikitʰxaven sopʰels xolo tʰu sopʰels ɡanikitʰxavtʰ mtsʰire sakʰmetʰa ɡankitʰxvis ɣirsni ara xartʰ 
nutʰu ar itsʰitʰ rom anɡelozebi unda ɡanvikitʰxotʰ mitʰ umetes tsʰxovrebiseuli raɣa ɡaxda 
tʰkʰven ki rotsʰa tsʰxovrebiseuli sakʰmeebi ɡakʰvtʰ tʰkʰvens ɡanmsdʒelebad matʰ aqenebtʰ vintsʰ arapʰrad aris mitʃneuli eklesiaʃi 
tʰkʰvenda samartsʰxvinod vambob amas nutʰu tʰkʰvenʃi ar moipoveba ertʰi brdzeni rom ʃeedzlos ɡankitʰxva tʰavis dzmebs ʃoris 
maɡram dzma dzmas edaveba da tʰanatsʰ urtsmunotʰa tsinaʃe 
da isitsʰ metad damamtsʰirebelia tʰkʰventʰvis rom ertʰmanetʰs edavebitʰ ratom ar artʃevtʰ natsqenad dartʃenas ratom ar artʃevtʰ dazaralebulad dartʃenas 
maɡram tʰkʰven usamartʰlod ekʰtsʰevitʰ da artʰmevtʰ tʰanatsʰ tʰkʰvens dzmebs 
nutʰu ar itsʰitʰ rom usamartʰloni ver daimkvidreben ɣvtʰis sasupʰevels tʰavs nu moitquebtʰ vertsʰ medzavni vertsʰ kerptʰaqvanismtsʰemelni vertsʰ mruʃni vertsʰ dadedlebulni vertsʰ mamatʰmavalni 
vertsʰ mparavni vertsʰ xarbni vertsʰ lotʰebi vertsʰ mlandzɣvelni vertsʰ mtatsʰebelni ver daimkvidreben ɣvtʰis sasupʰevels 
asetʰi iqo zoɡiertʰi tʰkʰvenɡani maɡram ɡanibanetʰ maɡram tsmida ɡaxditʰ maɡram ɡamartʰlditʰ tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes saxelitʰ da tʃveni ɣvtʰis sulitʰ 
qovelive nebadartʰulia tʃemtʰvis maɡram qvelapʰeri sasarɡeblo rodia qovelive nebadartʰulia tʃemtʰvis maɡram me arapʰers davemonebi 
sacmeli mutsʰlisatʰvis xolo mutsʰeli sacmlisatʰvis maɡram ɣmertʰi mospobs ertʰsatsʰ da meoresatsʰ sxeuli ki aris ara mruʃobisatʰvis aramed upʰlisatʰvis xolo upʰali sxeulisatʰvis 
ɣmertʰma aɣadɡina upʰali da tʃventsʰ aɣɡvadɡens tʰavisi dzalitʰ 
nutʰu ar itsʰitʰ rom tʰkʰveni sxeulebi kʰristes asoebia ɡana aviɣeb kʰristes asoebs da medzavis asoebad vakʰtsʰev aramtsʰ da aramtsʰ 
anda nutʰu ar itsʰitʰ rom vintsʰ medzavs uertʰdeba ertʰi sxeuli xdeba mastʰan ertʰad radɡan natʰkʰvamia ori ertʰ xortsʰad ikʰneba 
xolo vintsʰ upʰals uertʰdeba ertʰ sulad ikʰneba upʰaltʰan 
ɡaurbodetʰ sidzvas qoveli tsʰodva romelsatsʰ adamiani stʃadis sxeulis ɡareʃea xolo medzavi sakutʰari sxeulis tsinaaɣmdeɡ stsʰodavs 
anda nutʰu ar itsʰitʰ rom tʰkʰveni sxeulebi tadzaria tʰkʰvenʃi sulitsmidisa romelitsʰ ɣvtʰisaɡan ɡakʰvtʰ da rom tʰkʰvens tʰavs ar ekutʰvnitʰ 
vinaidan pʰasitʰ xartʰ naqidni amitom adidetʰ ɣmertʰi tʰkʰveni sxeulitʰ da tʰkʰveni sulebitʰ romlebitsʰ ɣvtʰisaa 
xolo imis ʃesaxeb ratsʰ tʰkʰven momtseretʰ katsʰisatʰvis karɡia ar ɡaekaros dedakatsʰs 
maɡram sidzvis tʰavidan asatsʰileblad qovel mamakatsʰs hqavdes tʰavisi tsʰoli da qovel dedakatsʰs tʰavisi kʰmari 
kʰmarma dʒerovani pativi unda stsʰes tsʰols aɡretʰve tsʰolmatsʰ kʰmars 
tsʰoli ar xelmtsipʰebs tʰavis sxeulze aramed kʰmari aseve kʰmaritsʰ ar xelmtsipʰebs tʰavis sxeulze aramed tsʰoli 
nu ɡanʃordebitʰ ertʰmanetʰs ɡarda ʃetʰanxmebisa droebitʰ rom moitsʰalotʰ marxvisa da lotsʰvisatʰvis da kvlav ertʰad iqotʰ ratʰa ar ɡamoɡtsʰadotʰ satanam tʰkʰveni tʰavʃeukaveblobitʰ 
xolo amas vambob dasaʃvebad da ara brdzanebitʰ 
vinaidan msurs qvela adamiani iqos roɡortsʰ me var maɡram qvelas tʰavisi nici akʰvs ɣvtʰisaɡan zoɡs asetʰi da zoɡs isetʰi 
xolo daukʰortsineblebs da kʰvrivebs veubnebi rom matʰtʰvis karɡia tʃemsavitʰ dartʃnen 
tʰu tʰavs ver ikaveben ikʰortsinon vinaidan umdʒobesia dakʰortsindnen vidre aɣiɡznebodnen 
xolo dakʰortsinebulebs vamtsʰneb ara me aramed upʰali tsʰoli ar ɡaeqaros kʰmars 
xolo tʰu ɡaeqreba ukʰortsinod dartʃes anda kʰmars ʃeuriɡdes da kʰmari nu datovebs tʰavis tsʰols 
sxvebs ki veubnebi me da ara upʰali tʰu vinme dzmas hqavs urtsmuno tsʰoli da is kʰali tʰanaxmaa mastʰan itsʰxovros nu datovebs im tsʰols 
dedakatsʰi romelsatsʰ urtsmuno kʰmari hqavs da katsʰs surs mastʰan tsʰxovreba nu datovebs kʰmars 
vinaidan urtsmuno kʰmari ɡanitsmideba tsʰolitʰ da urtsmuno tsʰoli ɡanitsmideba kʰmritʰ tʰorem tʰkʰveni ʃvilebi aratsmidebi ikʰnebodnen axla ki tsmidebi arian 
maɡram tʰu urtsmunos surs ɡaqra ɡaeqaros asetʰ vitʰarebaʃi dzma an da damonebulni ar arian radɡan mʃvidobisaken moɡvitsoda ɣmertʰma 
vinaidan ra itsʰi ʃen tsʰolo ikʰneb ixsna kʰmari anda ra itsʰi ʃen kʰmaro ikʰneb ixsna tsʰoli 
tʰitʰoeuli ise moikʰtsʰes roɡortsʰ ɣmertʰma utsilxvedra da tʰvitʰoeuli roɡortsʰ upʰalma moutsoda da ase vutseseb me qovel eklesias 
tʰu romelime motsodebuli tsinadatsʰvetʰilia nu damalavs tʰu romelime motsodebuli tsinadautsʰvetʰelia nu tsinadaitsʰvetʰs 
arapʰeria tsinadatsʰvetʰa da arapʰeria tsinadautsʰvetʰloba aramed ɣvtʰis mtsʰnebatʰa datsʰva 
dae tʰitʰoeuli dartʃes im motsodebaʃi romlitʰatsʰ moutsodes 
tʰu motsodebuli xar roɡortsʰ mona nu itʰakileb maɡram tʰu dzalɡidzs ɡatʰavisupʰleba umdʒobesia isarɡeblo 
vinaidan upʰalʃi motsodebuli mona upʰlis tʰavisupʰalia msɡavsadve motsodebuli tʰavisupʰali kʰristes monaa 
pʰasitʰ xartʰ naqidni nu ɡaxdebitʰ adamiantʰa monebi 
dzmano tʰitʰoeuli im motsodebitʰ dartʃes ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe romelʃitsʰ motsodebuli iqo 
ukʰortsinebeltʰa ʃesaxeb ara makʰvs brdzaneba upʰlisaɡan mxolod tʃems rtʃevas ɡautsqebtʰ radɡan ʃemitsqala upʰalma rom misi sartsmuno viqo 
me vpʰikʰrob rom axlandel ɡasacirʃi adamianisatʰvis umdʒobesia dartʃes roɡortsʰ aris 
tʰu ʃeertʰebuli xar tsʰoltʰan ɡaqras nu edzeb xolo tʰu utsʰolo xar tsʰols nu edzeb 
tsʰolitsʰ rom ʃeirtʰo ar ʃestsʰodav da tʰu kʰaltsuli ɡatʰxovdeba ar ʃestsʰodavs maɡram asetʰebs xortsʰieli ɡasaciri ekʰnebatʰ da ar metʰmobitʰ 
xolo amas ɡetqvitʰ dzmano ʒami itsureba amitom amieridan tsʰolianebi iqavitʰ roɡortsʰ utsʰoloni 
motiralni roɡortsʰ ara motiralni moxarulni roɡortsʰ ara moxarulni mkʰoneni roɡortsʰ ara mkʰonelni 
sopʰlitʰ mosarɡebleni roɡortsʰ ara mosarɡebleni vinaidan tsarmavalia sopʰlis saxe 
me msurs rom uzrunvelad iqotʰ utsʰolo upʰlisaze zrunavs roɡor aamos upʰals 
xolo tsʰoliani sopʰlis sakʰmeebze zrunavs roɡor aamos tsʰols 
aris ɡansxvaveba kʰmriansa da kʰaltsuls ʃoris kʰali ukʰmro da kʰaltsuli zrunavs upʰlisaze ratʰa sxeulitʰatsʰ tsmida iqos da sulitʰatsʰ kʰmriani ki sopʰlis sakʰmeebze zrunavs roɡor aamos kʰmars 
amas ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰvenda sasarɡeblod ara imisatʰvis rom marquʒi moɡdotʰ aramed ratʰa ɣirseulad da tsrpʰelad emsaxurotʰ upʰals ʃpʰotʰis ɡareʃe 
tʰu vinmes ʃeupʰereblad miatʃnia rom misi daniʃnuli kʰaltsuli siqmatsvilis asaks ɡadastsʰda roɡortsʰ enebos ise moikʰtsʰes ar ʃestsʰodavs dae dakʰortsindnen 
xolo vintsʰ tʰavisi ɡulitʰ mtkitsʰed dɡas da idzulebuli ar aris aramed akʰvs xelmtsipʰeba tʰavis nebaze da ɡadatsqvita tʰavis ɡulʃi tʰavisi kʰaltsulis datsʰva karɡad ikʰtsʰeva 
amitom vintsʰ ɡaatʰxovebs tʰavis kʰaltsuls karɡad ikʰtsʰeva da vintsʰ ar ɡaatʰxovebs uketʰesad ikʰtsʰeva 
tsʰoli rdʒulitʰ ʃekrulia sanam tsʰotsʰxalia misi kʰmari xolo tʰu kʰmari moukvdeba tʰavisupʰalia ɡahqves visatsʰ surs oɣond upʰalʃi 
maɡram upʰro netaria tʰu ase dartʃeba tʃemi rtʃevitʰ vpʰikʰrob rom metsʰ makʰvs ɣvtʰis suli 
axla nakerpavebze vitsʰitʰ radɡan qvelas ɡvakʰvs tsʰodna maɡram tsʰodna aampartavnebs siqvaruli ki aʃenebs 
vintsʰ pʰikʰrobs rom raime itsʰis man dʒeratsʰ arapʰeri itsʰis ise roɡortsʰ unda itsʰodes 
maɡram visatsʰ ɣmertʰi uqvars iɡi ʃetsʰnobilia misɡan 
amɡvarad nakerpavebis sacmelad ɡamoqenebis ʃesaxeb vitsʰitʰ rom kerpi arapʰeria sopʰelʃi da ar arsebobs ɣmertʰi ɡarda ertʰisa 
da tʰu kidev arian eɡretʰtsodebuli ɣmertʰebi an tsʰaʃi an mitsaze radɡan aris mravali ɣmertʰi da mravali upʰali 
tʃven ki ertʰi mama ɣmertʰi ɡvqavs romlisɡanatsʰ aris qoveli da tʃven mistʰvis vartʰ da ertʰi upʰali ieso kʰriste romlis mier aris qoveli da tʃventsʰ mis mier 
tʰumtsʰa qvelas rodi akʰvs tsʰodna zoɡiertʰebi tʃveulebitʰ akʰamde camen kerptʰaɡan roɡortsʰ nakerpavs da amriɡad matʰi daudzlurebuli sindisi ibɣaleba 
sacmeli ar miɡaaxlovebtʰ ɣmertʰtʰan vinaidan tʰu vcamtʰ verapʰers vimatebtʰ da tʰu ar vcamtʰ arapʰeri ɡvakldeba 
maɡram ɡapʰrətʰxilditʰ rom es tʰkʰveni tʰavisupʰleba dabrkoleba ar ɡaxdes udzlurtʰatʰvis 
vinaidan tʰu vinme daɡinaxavs ʃen romelsatsʰ tsʰodna ɡakʰvs sakerpeʃi mdʒdomares ɡana misi udzluri sindisi ar ɡanatsqobs mas nakerpavtʰa camistʰvis 
da daiɣupeba ʃeni tsʰodnis meoxebitʰ ʃeni udzluri dzma romlistʰvisatsʰ mokvda kʰriste 
amriɡad ʃestsʰodavtʰ ra dzmebis mimartʰ da dacritʰ matʰ udzlur sindiss kʰristes mimartʰ ʃestsʰodavtʰ 
amitom tʰu sacmeli atsʰdunebs tʃems dzmas saukunod ar vcam xortsʰs ratʰa ar davabrkolo tʃemi dzma 
ɡana me motsʰikʰuli ara var ɡana me tʰavisupʰali ara var ɡana me ar vnaxe tʃveni upʰali ieso kʰriste ɡana tʰkʰven tʃemi naɣvatsi ara xartʰ upʰalʃi 
tʰu sxvebisatʰvis ara var motsʰikʰuli tʰkʰventʰvis xom maintsʰ var vinaidan tʃemi motsʰikʰulobis becedi xartʰ upʰalʃi 
ai ra pasuxs ɡavtsʰem tʃems mkitsʰxvelebs 
ɡana ara ɡvakʰvs cama smis upʰleba 
ɡana ara ɡvakʰvs upʰleba davimɡzavrotʰ mortsmune tsʰoli roɡortsʰ danartʃenma motsʰikʰulebma upʰlis dzmebma da kepʰam 
tʰu marto me da barnabas ara ɡvakʰvs upʰleba rom ar vmuʃaobdetʰ 
romel dʒariskatsʰs umsaxuria odesme sakutʰar xardʒze vin rɡavs vazs da misi naqopʰisaɡan ara cams vin mtsqesavs pʰaras da pʰaris rdzes pirs ar akarebs 
ɡana adamianurad ar vlaparakob ase ɡana rdʒulitsʰ amasve ar ambobs 
radɡan moses rdʒulʃi stseria pirs nu aukrav xars letsvisas xarebze zrunavs ɣmertʰi 
tʰu namdvilad tʃventʰvis ambobs diaɣatsʰ tʃventʰvis stseria mxvnelma unda xnas imeditʰ mletsavma ki tsilis imeditʰ 
tʰu sulieri daɡitʰesetʰ ɡana didi ambavia rom tʰkʰvenɡan xortsʰieli movimkatʰ 
tʰu sxvebs xelmtsipʰeba akʰvtʰ tʰkʰvenze ɡana tʃven upʰro metad ara maɡram tʃven ar ɡamoviqenetʰ es xelmtsipʰeba aramed qovelɡvar tandʒvas vitantʰ ratʰa raime dabrkoleba ar ʃeekʰmnas kʰristes saxarebas 
nutʰu ar itsʰitʰ rom tsmidatʰa msaxurni tadzrisaɡan camen xolo samsxverplos msaxurni msxverplidan iɣeben tsils 
aseve upʰalma dautsesa saxarebis mkʰadaɡeblebs saxarebisaɡan tsʰxovreba 
xolo me artsʰ ertʰi matʰɡani ar ɡamomiqenebia da esetsʰ imitom ki ar davtsere rom ase qopʰiliqo tʃemtʰvis vinaidan sikvdili midʒobs vidre vinmem ɡaabatʰilos tʃemi kʰadili 
radɡan tʰu vaxareb arapʰeri makʰvs sasikʰadulo vinaidan es tʃemi autsʰilebeli movaleobaa da vai me tʰu ar vaxareb 
vinaidan tʰu survilitʰ vaketʰeb amas sazɣauri mkʰonia xolo tʰu survilis ɡareʃe mxolod mneoba mkʰonia mondobili 
maʃ ra aris tʃemi sazɣauri is rom rotsʰa saxarebas vkʰadaɡeb ʃemidzlia vikʰadaɡo usasqidlod da ar viqeneb tʃems upʰlebas xarebaʃi 
vinaidan qvelasɡan tʰavisupʰali qvelas davemone ratʰa upʰro meti ʃemedzina 
iudeveltʰatʰvis ɡavxdi roɡortsʰ iudeveli ratʰa iudevelebi ʃemedzina rdʒulis kʰveʃ mqopʰtʰatʰvis roɡortsʰ rdʒulis kʰveʃ mqopʰi tʰumtsʰa tʰvitʰon rdʒulis kʰveʃ umqopʰeli ratʰa rdʒulis kʰveʃ mqopʰni ʃemedzina 
urdʒulotʰatʰvis roɡortsʰ urdʒulo tʰumtsʰa ara var ɣmertʰis urdʒulo aramed kʰristes rdʒulieri ratʰa urdʒuloebi ʃemedzina 
udzlurtʰatʰvis ɡavxdi udzlurivitʰ ratʰa udzlurni ʃemedzina qvelastʰvis qvelapʰeri ɡavxdi ratʰa zoɡiertʰebi mexsna roɡorme 
da qovelive amas vaketʰeb saxarebisatʰvis ratʰa metsʰ ɡavxde misi tʰanamonatsile 
ɡana ar itsʰitʰ rom asparezze morbenalni qvelani ɡarbian maɡram mxolod ertʰi miiɣebs dʒildos maʃ irbinetʰ ise rom moipovotʰ 
qvela vintsʰ iɣtsvis tʰavs ikavebs qvelapʰrisɡan isini xrətsnadi ɡvirɡvinis misaɣebad tʃven ki uxrətsnadisa 
amitom me ɡavrbivar ara umiznod vibrədzvi ara ise vitʰomtsʰ haers vɡvemde 
aramed vtʰrɡunav da vimoneb tʃems sxeuls ratʰa sxvebs rom vukʰadaɡeb me tʰvitʰon uɣirsi ar davrtʃe 
ar minda dzmebo ar itsʰodetʰ rom tʃveni mamebi qvelani ɣrubelkʰveʃ iqvnen da qvelam ɡaiara zɣvaʃi 
da qvelani moinatʰlnen moses mier ɣrubelʃi da zɣvaʃi 
da qvelani camdnen ertʰsa da imave sulier sacmels 
da qvelani svamdnen ertʰsa da imave sulier sasmels vinaidan svamdnen sulieri kldidan romelitsʰ tʰan dahqveboda matʰ xolo es klde iqo kʰriste 
maɡram matʰɡan umravlesoba rodi moitsona ɣmertʰma vinaidan isini udabnoʃi daetsʰnen 
es ki tʃventʰvis maɡalitʰi iqo ratʰa ar ʃevnatrodetʰ borots roɡortsʰ ʃenatrodnen isini 
artsʰ kerptʰaqvanismtsʰemlebi iqotʰ roɡortsʰ zoɡiertʰi matʰɡani roɡortsʰ stseria dasxda xalxi sacmel sasmelad da tsamodɡnen satʰamaʃod 
nurtsʰ vimedzavebtʰ roɡortsʰ zoɡiertʰi matʰɡani medzaobda da ertʰ dɣes otsʰdasami atʰasi katsʰi daetsʰa 
nurtsʰ ɡamovtsʰditʰ upʰals roɡortsʰ zoɡiertʰma matʰɡanma ɡamostsʰada da isini ɡvelebisaɡan daiɣupnen 
artsʰ idrətvinotʰ roɡortsʰ zoɡiertʰi matʰɡani drətvinavda da daiɣupnen ʃemmusvrelisaɡan 
qovelive es matʰ daemartʰatʰ samaɡalitʰod da aɣtserilia tʃvens dasariɡeblad romlebmatsʰ mivaɣtsietʰ sopʰlis aɣsasruls 
amitom vintsʰ pʰikʰrobs rom dɡas ipʰrətʰxilos rom ar tsaikʰtsʰes 
ar ʃeɡmtʰxveviatʰ ɡansatsʰdeli ɡarda adamianurisa da sartsmuno ɣmertʰi romelitsʰ ar dauʃvebs rom tʰkʰvens ʃesadzleblobaze metad ɡamoitsʰadotʰ aramed ɡansatsʰdelʃi ɡamosavalsatsʰ moɡtsʰemtʰ rom ʃesdzlotʰ atana 
amitom tʃemo saqvarelno ɡaneridetʰ kerptʰaqvanismtsʰemlobas 
roɡortsʰ ɡonierebs ɡelaparakebitʰ tʰavad ɡansadʒetʰ rasatsʰ vambob 
kurtʰxevis sasmisi romelsatsʰ tʃven vakurtʰxebtʰ ɡana kʰristes sisxlis tʰanaziareba ar aris puri romelsatsʰ tʃven vtextʰ ɡana kʰristes sxeulis tʰanaziareba ar aris 
vinaidan puri ertʰia tʃven ki mravalni ertʰi sxeuli radɡan qvela ertʰi puridan veziarebitʰ 
ʃexedetʰ israels xortsʰis mixedvitʰ vintsʰ msxverplidan cams ɡana isini samsxverplos ziarni ar arian 
maʃ ras vambob ɡana imas rom raimea kerpi an imas rom raimes niʃnavs nakerpavi 
aramed rasatsʰ isini stsiraven eʃmaks stsiraven da ara ɣmertʰs me ki ar minda rom eʃmaktʰa ziarni iqotʰ 
ar ʃeɡidzliatʰ svatʰ upʰlis sasmisi da eʃmakis sasmisi ar ʃeɡidzliatʰ upʰlis supʰrasatsʰ eziarotʰ da eʃmakis supʰrasatsʰ 
nutʰu vbedavtʰ upʰlis ɡanrisxebas ɡana masze dzlierebi vartʰ 
qovelive nebadartʰulia tʃemtʰvis maɡram qvelapʰeri sasarɡeblo rodia qovelive nebadartʰulia tʃemtʰvis maɡram qvelapʰeri rodi aʃenebs 
aravin edzebos tʰavisi sarɡebeli aramed sxvisi 
qvelapʰeri ratsʰ bazarʃi iqideba cametʰ da nurapʰers ɡamoidziebtʰ sindisis ɡamo 
radɡan upʰlisaa mitsa da misi sisavse 
xolo tʰu miɡitsvevtʰ romelime urtsmunotʰaɡani da moisurvebtʰ mastʰan tsasvlas qvelapʰeri cametʰ rasatsʰ tʰkʰvens tsin daatsqoben da nurapʰers ɡamoidziebtʰ sindisis ɡamo 
xolo tʰu vinme ɡetqvitʰ es nakerpaviao nu ʃecamtʰ mtʰkʰmelis ɡamo da sindisis ɡamo radɡan upʰlisaa mitsa da misi sisavse 
sindiss vambob ara ʃensas aramed sxvisas vinaidan ratom ikʰnas ɡankitʰxuli tʃemi tʰavisupʰleba sxvisi sindisitʰ 
xolo tʰu madlierebitʰ vcam raɣad ʃevibɣalo imis ɡamo ristʰvisatsʰ madlieri var 
amitom camtʰ svamtʰ tʰu sxva rames aketʰebtʰ qvelapʰeri aketʰetʰ ɣvtʰis sadideblad 
nu ʃeuratsʰxqopʰtʰ nurtsʰ iudevelebs nurtsʰ tsarmartʰebs da nurtsʰ ɣvtʰis eklesias 
iseve roɡortsʰ metsʰ vaameb qvelas qvelapʰerʃi da sarɡeblobas vedzeb ara tʃemtʰvis aramed mravaltʰatʰvis ratʰa ɡadartʃnen 
tʃemi mombadzavi iqavitʰ roɡortsʰ me kʰristesi 
amisatʰvis ɡakʰebtʰ tʰkʰven dzmano rom qvelapʰerʃi ɡaxsovartʰ da inaxavtʰ modzɣvrebebs roɡortsʰ ɡadmoɡetsʰitʰ 
maɡram aseve minda itsʰodetʰ rom qoveli mamakatsʰis tʰavi kʰristea tsʰolis tʰavi kʰmari da kʰristes tʰavi ɣmertʰi 
qoveli mamakatsʰi romelitsʰ tʰavdapʰaruli lotsʰulobs an tsinastsarmetqvelebs tʰavis tʰavs irtsʰxvens 
da qoveli dedakatsʰi romelitsʰ tʰavdaupʰaravi lotsʰulobs an tsinastsarmetqvelebs tʰavs irtsʰxvens vinaidan es iɡivea rom ɡadaparsuli iqos 
vinaidan tʰu dedakatsʰi tʰavs ar daipʰaravs ɡadaiparsos xolo tʰu dedakatsʰs rətsʰxvenia iqos ɡakrecili an ɡadaparsuli tʰavdapʰaruli iqos 
amɡvarad mamakatsʰma martʰlatsʰ ar unda daipʰaros tʰavi vinaidan is ɣvtʰis xateba da didebaa tsʰoli ki kʰmris didebaa 
vinaidan mamakatsʰi ki ar aris dedakatsʰisaɡan aramed dedakatsʰi mamakatsʰisaɡan 
aseve mamakatsʰi ki ar ʃekʰmnila dedakatsʰis ɡulisatʰvis aramed dedakatsʰi mamakatsʰis ɡulisatʰvis 
amitom dedakatsʰi valdebulia tʰavze hkʰondes xelmtsipʰebis niʃani anɡelozebis ɡulisatʰvis 
tʰumtsʰa artsʰ kʰmaria tsʰolis ɡareʃe da artsʰ tsʰolia kʰmris ɡareʃe upʰalʃi 
vinaidan iseve roɡortsʰ dedakatsʰi mamakatsʰisaɡan aris mamakatsʰitsʰ dedakatsʰis meoxebitʰ aris xolo qovelive ɣvtʰisaɡan aris 
tʰkʰven tʰvitʰon ɡansadʒetʰ ʃeʃvenis dedakatsʰs ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe tʰavdaupʰaravad lotsʰva 
anda ɡana tʰvitʰ bunebatsʰ ar ɡastsavlitʰ rom mamakatsʰis ɡrdzeltʰmianoba samartsʰxvinoa mistʰvis 
maɡram dedakatsʰis ɡrdzeltʰmianoba didebaa mistʰvis ɡrdzeli tʰma mas saburvelis natsʰvlad akʰvs mitsʰemuli 
da tʰu vinme ɡanizraxavs idaos tʃven ara ɡvakʰvs asetʰi tʃveuleba artsʰ ɣvtʰis eklesiebs 
xolo amas rom ɡamtsʰnebtʰ ar ɡakʰebtʰ rom ikribebitʰ ara umdʒobesisatʰvis aramed uaresisatʰvis 
vinaidan dʒer ertʰi ɡaɡebuli makʰvs rom rotsʰa eklesiad ikribebitʰ daqopʰa arsebobs tʰkʰvens ʃoris rasatsʰ natsilobriv vudʒereb 
vinaidan azrtʰa sxvaobatsʰ unda iqos tʰkʰvenʃi ratʰa ɡamotʃndnen ɡamotsʰdilni tʰkʰvens ʃoris 
rotsʰa ikribebitʰ ertʰad upʰlis sers ara camtʰ 
vinaidan qvela tsinastsar cams tʰavis sakutʰar sers da zoɡi mʃieria da zoɡi mtʰvrali 
nutʰu saxlebi ara ɡakʰvtʰ rom ikʰ camotʰ da svatʰ tʰu uɡulebelqopʰtʰ ɣvtʰis eklesias da artsʰxventʰ ukʰoneltʰ ra ɡitʰxratʰ ʃeɡakʰotʰ amisatʰvis ar ɡakʰebtʰ 
vinaidan me miviɣe upʰlisaɡan ratsʰ tʰkʰventsʰ ɡadmoɡetsʰitʰ rom upʰalma iesom im ɣames romelsatsʰ ɡaitsʰemoda aiɣo puri 
madli ʃestsira ɡatexa da tʰkʰva miiɣetʰ cametʰ es aris tʃemi sxeuli tʰkʰventʰvis damtvreuli es aketʰetʰ tʃems mosaɡonrad 
aseve astsia sasmisitsʰ serobis ʃemdeɡ da tʰkʰva es sasmisi axali aɣtʰkʰmaa tʃems sisxlʃi es aketʰetʰ tʃems mosaɡonrad ramdendʒeratsʰ svamdetʰ 
radɡan qoveltʰvis rotsʰa am purs camtʰ da am sasmiss svamtʰ autsqetʰ upʰlis sikvdili vidre movidodes 
amitom vintsʰ ʃecams am purs an dalevs upʰlis sasmiss uɣirsad damnaʃave ikʰneba upʰlis sxeulisa da sisxlis tsinaʃe 
adamianma dʒer tʰavi ɡamostsʰados da ase camos am puridan da ʃesvas am sasmisidan 
vinaidan vintsʰ uɣirsad cams da svams tʰavisi tʰavis daɡmobas cams da svams ver artʃevs ra upʰlis sxeuls 
amis ɡamo tʰkʰvens ʃoris bevria udzluri da avadmqopʰi da bevritsʰ mokvda 
xolo tʃven tʰvitʰonve rom ɡanɡvekitʰxa tʃveni tʰavi aɣar vikʰneboditʰ msdʒavrdadebulni 
xolo msdʒavrdadebulni vitsvrətʰnebitʰ upʰlis mier ratʰa sopʰeltʰan ertʰad ar viqotʰ msdʒavrdadebulni 
amitom tʃemo dzmano rotsʰa ertʰad ʃeikribebitʰ sacmelad ertʰimeores daelodetʰ 
da tʰu vinmes ʃiodes tʰavis saxlʃi camos ratʰa msdʒavris dasadebad ar ʃeikribotʰ danartʃens rotsʰa moval maʃin movaɡvareb 
axla sulier nicze ar minda dzmano utsʰodinarni iqotʰ 
itsʰitʰ rom rodesatsʰ tsarmartʰebi iqavitʰ utqv kerpebtʰan dadioditʰ tʰitʰkʰos viɣatsʰ ɡetseodatʰ 
amitom ɡautsqebtʰ rom veravin vintsʰ ɣvtʰis sulitʰ laparakobs ver itqvis ʃetʃvenebuliao ieso da aravis ʃeudzlia upʰali utsodos iesos tʰu ara sulitsmiditʰ 
sxvadasxvanairia nici maɡram suli ertʰia 
msaxurebanitsʰ sxvadasxvanairia upʰali ki ertʰia 
mokʰmedebanitsʰ sxvadasxvanairia xolo ɣmertʰi ertʰia romelitsʰ amokʰmedebs qvelas qvelaʃi 
maɡram tʰitʰoeuls edzleva sulis ɡamovlineba sasiketʰod 
vinaidan ertʰs sulis mier edzleva sibrədznis sitqva meores tsʰodnis sitqva imave sulitʰ 
zoɡs rətsmena imave sulitʰ da zoɡs ɡankurnebatʰa nici imave sulitʰ 
zoɡs sastsaultʰmokʰmedeba zoɡs tsinastsarmetqveleba zoɡs sulebis ɡartʃeva zoɡs sxvadasxva enebi zoɡs enebis ɡanmarteba 
xolo qovelive amas aketʰebs ertʰi da iɡive suli romelitsʰ tʰitʰoeuls sakutʰriv unatsilebs roɡortsʰ nebavs 
radɡan roɡortsʰ sxeuli ertʰia maɡram mravali aso akʰvs da sxeulis qvela aso tʰumtsʰa bevrni arian ertʰi sxeulia asevea kʰristetsʰ 
vinaidan qvelani ertʰi sulitʰ movinatʰletʰ ertʰ sxeulad iudevelebi tʰu elinebi monebi tʰu tʰavisupʰlebi da qvelas ertʰi suli ɡvisvams 
vinaidan sxeulitsʰ ertʰi aso ki ar aris aramed bevri 
pʰexma rom tʰkʰvas me xeli ara var amitom sxeuls ar vekutʰvnio ɡana amitom ar ekutʰvnis sxeuls 
anda qurma rom tʰkʰvas me tʰvali ara var amitom sxeuls ar vekutʰvnio ɡana amitom ar ekutʰvnis sxeuls 
tʰu mtʰeli sxeuli tʰvalia sadɣaa smena tʰu qvelapʰeri smenaa sadɣaa qnosva 
da aha ɣmertʰma ɡanalaɡa asoebi sxeulʃi tʰitʰoeuli matʰɡani roɡortsʰ nebavda 
da qvela rom ertʰi aso iqos sadɣa ikʰneba sxeuli 
aha asoebi bevria sxeuli ki ertʰi 
tʰvali ver etqvis xels ar mcirdebio vertsʰ tʰavi pʰexs ar mcirdebitʰo 
aramed sxeulis is asoebi romlebitsʰ qvelaze udzlurni tʃanan upʰro metad sacironi arian 
xolo romlebitsʰ nakleb sapatiod ɡvetʃveneba sxeulʃi matʰ upʰro uxvad ɡaremovitsʰavtʰ pativitʰ da tʃvens usaxurtʰ upʰro uxvad akʰvtʰ saxiereba 
tʃvens saxierebs ar scirdebatʰ pativi maɡram ɣmertʰma ise ʃeazava sxeuli rom upʰro uxvi pativi arɡuna imas romelsatsʰ naklebad akʰvs 
ratʰa ar iqos ɡanxetʰkʰileba sxeulʃi aramed qvela aso ertʰnairad zrunavdes sxvaze 
da tʰu ertʰi aso itandʒeba mastʰan ertʰad qvela aso itandʒeba xolo tʰu ertʰi aso didebas moixvecs mastʰan ertʰad qvela aso xarobs 
tʰkʰven ki kʰristes sxeuli xartʰ xolo tsʰal tsʰalke misi asoebi 
daaqena ɣmertʰma eklesiaʃi pirvelad motsʰikʰulebi meored mkʰadaɡebelni mesamed modzɣvarni mere kurnebatʰa nicebi ʃetsevnani martʰvani sxvadasxva enebi 
qvela motsʰikʰulia qvela mkʰadaɡebelia qvela modzɣvaria qvelas sastsaultʰmokʰmedeba akʰvs 
qvelas akʰvs ɡankurnebatʰa nici qvelani laparakoben enebitʰ qvelani ɡanmartaven 
eʃuretʰ did nicebs da ɡatʃvenebtʰ upʰro aɣmatebul ɡzas 
tʰu me adamiantʰa da anɡeloztʰa enebitʰ vlaparakob xolo siqvaruli ara makʰvs maʃin ʒɣaruna rvali var an tʃxaruna tsintsila 
tsinastsarmetqvelebatsʰ rom mkʰondes qoveli saidumlo da mtʰeli tsʰodnatsʰ rom vutsqode sruli rətsmenatsʰ rom mkʰondes isetʰi mtʰebis ɡadaadɡileba rom ʃemedzlos xolo siqvaruli ar mkʰondes araraoba vikʰnebodi 
mtʰeli tʃemi kʰoneba rom davariɡo da tʃemi sxeuli dasatsvavad ɡavtsiro xolo siqvaruli ar mkʰondes arapʰrad vevarɡebi 
siqvaruli sulɡrdzelia siqvaruli kʰvelmokʰmedia ar ʃurs ar qoqotʃobs ar ampartavnobs 
ar stʃadis utsesobas tʰavisas ar edziebs ar mrisxanebs da ar ɡanizraxavs borots 
ar xarobs sitsʰruitʰ aramed ceʃmariteba axarebs 
qovelives itans qvelapʰeri stsams qvelapʰris sasoeba akʰvs da qovelives itʰmens 
siqvaruli arasodes mtʰavrdeba tsinastsarmetqvelebani iqos ɡaukʰmdeba enebi iqos ʃetsqdeba tsʰodna iqos ɡaukʰmdeba 
vinaidan natsilobrivi vitsʰitʰ da natsilobrivs vtsinastsarmetqvelebtʰ 
da rotsʰa srulqopʰili mova natsilobrivi ɡankʰardeba 
rotsʰa bavʃvi viqavi bavʃvurad vmsdʒelobdi rotsʰa katsʰi ɡavxdi qovelive bavʃvuri mivatove 
vinaidan axla tʃven vxedavtʰ sarkitʰ bundovnad maʃin ki pirispir axla vitsʰi mtsʰireodeni xolo maʃin ʃevitsʰnob ise roɡortsʰ me var ʃetsʰnobili 
axla ki rtʃeba rətsmena sasoeba siqvaruli es sami matʰɡan udidesi ki siqvarulia 
estsrapʰetʰ siqvaruls da eʃuretʰ sulier nicebs upʰro ki rom itsinastsarmetqvelotʰ 
vinaidan vintsʰ enitʰ laparakobs is adamianebs ki ar elaparakeba aramed ɣmertʰs radɡan aravis esmis radɡan sulitʰ laparakobs iɡi saidumloebebs 
xolo vintsʰ tsinastsarmetqvelebs is adamianebs elaparakeba aɣsaʃeneblad sanuɡeʃeblad da ɡasamxneveblad 
enitʰ molaparake tʰavis tʰavs aʃenebs xolo vintsʰ tsinastsarmetqvelebs eklesias aʃenebs 
me msurs rom tʰkʰven qvelani laparakobdetʰ enebitʰ da upʰro metad rom tsinastsarmetqvelebdetʰ vinaidan is vintsʰ tsinastsarmetqvelebs enebitʰ molaparakeze metia tʰu ɡanmartavs kidetsʰ ratʰa eklesia aɣʃendes 
axla ki dzmano tʰu moval tʰkʰventʰan da vilaparakeb enebitʰ ra sarɡeblobas moɡitantʰ tʰu ar ɡetqvitʰ an ɡamotsʰxadebitʰ an tsʰodnitʰ an tsinastsarmetqvelebitʰ an modzɣvrebitʰ 
aseve usulo saɡnebi romlebitsʰ xmas ɡamostsʰemen stviri an ebani tʰu xmebʃi ar idzlevian ɡansxvavebebs roɡor ʃeitsʰnoba ras ukraven stvirze an ebanze 
saqviritsʰ tʰu ɡaurkvevel xmas ɡamostsʰems vin ɡaemzadeba sabrdzolvelad 
aseve tʰkʰventsʰ tʰu enitʰ ɡaurkvevel sitqvas tsarmotʰkʰvamtʰ roɡor ɡaiɡeba nalaparakevi haerʃi ilaparakebtʰ 
maɡalitʰad ramdeni ɡansxvavebuli sitqvaa sopʰelʃi da matʰɡan artsʰ ertʰi ar aris umniʃvnelo 
amitom tʰu sitqvis mniʃvneloba ar vitsʰi utsʰxo vikʰnebi molaparakisatʰvis xolo molaparake utsʰxo tʃemtʰvis 
aseve tʰkʰventsʰ rotsʰa eʃurebitʰ sulier nicebs etsʰadetʰ iuxvotʰ eklesiis aɣsaʃeneblad 
amitom ilotsʰos enitʰ molaparakem ratʰa ɡanmartos kidetsʰ 
vinaidan rotsʰa enitʰ vlotsʰulob tʃemi suli lotsʰulobs tʃemi ɡoneba ki unaqopʰoa 
maʃ ra vkʰnatʰ vilotsʰeb sulitʰ da ɡonebitʰatsʰ vilotsʰeb viɡalobeb sulitʰ da ɡonebitʰatsʰ viɡalobeb 
vinaidan tʰu sulitʰ akurtʰxeb roɡor itqvis amins ʃens madlobaze umetsʰartʰaɡani vinme tʰu ar esmis ras ambob ʃen 
ai ʃen ketʰilad stsirav madls maɡram sxva ar ʃendeba 
vmadlob tʃems ɣmertʰs rom qvela tʰkʰvenɡanze mets vlaparakob enebitʰ 
maɡram mirtʃevnia eklesiaʃi xutʰi sitqva vtʰkʰva tʃemi ɡonebitʰ ratʰa sxvebsatsʰ vastsavlo vidre atʰi atʰasi sitqva enebitʰ 
dzmano nu ikʰnebitʰ bavʃvebi ɡonebitʰ mxolod borotebisatʰvis ɡaxditʰ bavʃvebi ɡonebistʰvis ki srultslovanni iqavitʰ 
rdʒulʃi stseria sxva enebitʰ da sxvatʰa baɡeebitʰ davelaparakebi am xalxs da maintsʰ ar momismenen me ambobs upʰali 
amitom ena mortsmunetʰatʰvis ki ar aris niʃani aramed urtsmunotʰatʰvis da tsinastsarmetqveleba urtsmunotʰatʰvis ki ar aris aramed mortsmunetʰatʰvis 
da ai tʰu mtʰeli eklesia ertʰad ʃeikribeba da qvelani ilaparakeben enebitʰ da ʃemovlen umetsʰarni an urtsmunoni ɡana ar itqvian ʃeʃlilebi xartʰo 
maɡram tʰu qvelani tsinastsarmetqveleben da ʃemova vinme urtsmuno an umetsʰari mas qvela amxels da qvela ɡansdʒis 
da amriɡad ɡamomʒɣavndeba misi ɡulis dapʰarulni is daemxoba dzirs tʰaqvans stsʰems ɣmertʰs da itqvis rom ceʃmaritad tʰkʰvens ʃoris aris ɣmertʰi 
maʃ raɣa dzmano rotsʰa tʰkʰven ikribebitʰ qovels akʰvs pʰsalmuni akʰvs stsavla akʰvs ena akʰvs ɡamotsʰxadeba akʰvs ɡanmarteba qovelive es xdebodes aɣsaʃeneblad 
tʰu vinme laparakobs enebitʰ ilaparakos or orma an didi didi samma ertʰimeoris miqolebitʰ da ertʰma ɡanmartos 
tʰu ar aris ɡanmmartebeli maʃin ɡatʃumdes eklesiaʃi da elaparakos tʰavis tʰavs da ɣmertʰs 
tsinastsarmetqvelebma ki ilaparakon orma an samma xolo sxvebma ɡansadʒon 
tʰu sxvas ɡamoetsʰxadeba ikʰ mdʒdomtʰaɡans pirveli ɡatʃumdes 
vinaidan qvelas satʰitʰaod ʃeɡidzliatʰ tsinastsarmetqveleba ratʰa qvelam istsavlos da qvelam inuɡeʃos 
tsinastsarmetqveltʰa sulebi emortʃilebian tsinastsarmetqveltʰ 
vinaidan ɣmertʰi utsesriɡobis ki ar aris aramed mʃvidobisaa roɡortsʰ tsmidatʰa qvela eklesiaʃi 
dedakatsʰebma iqutʃon eklesiebʃi radɡan upʰleba ara akʰvtʰ ilaparakon aramed mortʃilad iqvnen roɡortsʰ rdʒulitsʰ ambobs 
xolo tʰu ramis ʃestsavla surtʰ hkitʰxon tʰaviantʰ kʰmrebs saxlʃi vinaidan samartsʰxvinoa dedakatsʰisatʰvis eklesiaʃi laparaki 
ɡana tʰkʰvenɡan ɡamovida ɣvtʰis sitqva an marto tʰkʰvenamde moaɣtsia 
tʰu vinmes tʰavi tsinastsarmetqveli eɡonos anda sulieri dae ɡaiɡos rom rasatsʰ me tʰkʰvena ɡtsertʰ upʰlis mtsʰnebaa 
xolo tʰu vinme uvitsʰia uvitsʰi iqos 
maʃ ase dzmano eʃuretʰ rom itsinastsarmetqvelotʰ maɡram enebze laparaks nu akrdzalavtʰ 
qvelapʰeri ʃesapʰerisad da tsesierad xdebodes 
ɡautsqebtʰ tʰkʰven dzmano saxarebas romelitsʰ me ɡaxaretʰ romelitsʰ kidetsʰ miiɣetʰ da romelzetsʰ dɡaxartʰ 
romlitʰatsʰ ɡadartʃebitʰ kidetsʰ tʰu daitsʰavtʰ sitqvas me rom ɡaxaretʰ tʰu pʰucad ar irtsmunebtʰ 
vinaidan tʰavidanve ɡadmoɡetsʰitʰ is ratsʰ me tʰavad miviɣe rom kʰriste mokvda tʃveni tsʰodvebisatʰvis roɡortsʰ tserilebʃia 
da rom damarxul ikʰna da rom aɣdɡa mesame dɣes roɡortsʰ tserilebʃia 
da rom ɡamoetsʰxada kepʰas da ʃemdeɡ tʰormets 
ʃemdeɡ ɡamoetsʰxada xutʰasze met dzmas ertʰdroulad romeltʰaɡan umravlesni akʰamde tsʰotsʰxalni arian zoɡma ki ɡanisvena 
ʃemdeɡ ɡamoetsʰxada iakobs da mere qvela motsʰikʰuls 
xolo qvelaze bolos roɡortsʰ udɣeurs ɡamometsʰxada metsʰ 
vinaidan umtsʰiresi var motsʰikʰultʰa ʃoris da motsʰikʰulad tsodebis ɣirsitsʰ ara var radɡan vdevnidi ɣvtʰis eklesias 
maɡram ɣvtʰis madlitʰ var ratsʰa var da misi madli ar iqo tʃems momartʰ pʰuci aramed qvela matʰɡanze mets vʃromobdi ara me aramed ɣvtʰis madli romelitsʰ tʃemtʰanaa 
da aha me var tʰu isini ase vkʰadaɡebtʰ da tʰkʰventsʰ ase irtsmunetʰ 
xolo tʰu kʰristeze ikʰadaɡeba rom is aɣdɡa mkvdretʰitʰ roɡorɣa ambobs zoɡiertʰi tʰkʰvenɡani ar aris mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡomao 
mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡoma tʰu ar aris kʰristetsʰ ar aɣmdɡara 
xolo kʰriste tʰu ar aɣmdɡara tʃveni kʰadaɡebatsʰ pʰucia da pʰucia tʰkʰveni rətsmenatsʰ 
maʃin tʃven vikʰneboditʰ ɣvtʰis tsʰru motsmeni radɡan davamotsmebditʰ ɣmertʰze rom man aɣadɡina kʰriste romelitsʰ ar aɣudɡenia tʰu martʰlatsʰ ar aɣdɡebian mkvdrebi 
radɡan tʰu mkvdrebi ar aɣdɡebian artsʰ kʰriste aɣmdɡara 
xolo tʰu kʰriste ar aɣdɡa tʰkʰveni rətsmena pʰucia da kvlav tʰkʰvens tsʰodvebʃi xartʰ 
maʃin isinitsʰ daɣupulan romeltʰatsʰ kʰristeʃi ɡanisvenes 
da tʰu tʃven mxolod am tsʰxovrebaʃi vartʰ kʰristes moimedeni qvela adamianze satsʰodavni vqopʰilvartʰ 
maɡram mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡa kʰriste ɡansvenebultʰa natʰavari 
vinaidan roɡortsʰ katsʰis mier movida sikvdili aseve katsʰis mier mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡoma 
vinaidan roɡortsʰ adamʃi kvdeba qvela aseve ɡatsʰotsʰxldebian kʰristeʃi 
da tʰitʰoeuli tʰavisi tsesitʰ pirvelad kʰriste xolo ʃemdeɡ kʰristesni misi mosvlisas 
mere ki dasasruli rotsʰa mepʰobas ɡadastsʰems upʰalsa da mamas mas ʃemdeɡ ratsʰ ɡaaukʰmebs qovel mtʰavrobas qovel upʰlebasa da dzalas 
vinaidan man unda imepʰos vidre tʰavis pʰexkʰveʃ moakʰtsʰevdes tʰavis qvela mters 
xolo ukanaskneli mteri romelitsʰ ɡankʰardeba sikvdilia 
imitom rom qovelive daamortʃila mis pʰexkʰveʃ xolo rotsʰa natʰkʰvamia rom qovelive mas daemortʃila tsʰxadia ɡarda imisi romelmatsʰ mas daumortʃila qovelive 
da rotsʰa qovelives mas daumortʃilebs maʃin tʰvitʰ dzetsʰ daemortʃileba imas vintsʰ qovelive mas daumortʃila ratʰa ɣmertʰi iqos qvelapʰeri qvelapʰerʃi 
tʰorem ras aketʰeben mkvdartʰatʰvis monatʰlulni tʰu mkvdrebi saertʰod ar aɣdɡebian ratom inatʰlebian mkvdartʰatʰvis 
da tʃventsʰ qovelʒams ratom vartʰ sapʰrətʰxeʃi 
vpʰitsʰav tʰkʰvendami tʃems sikʰaduls dzmano romelitsʰ tʃvens upʰal kʰriste iesoʃi makʰvs rom qoveldɣe vkvdebi 
tʰu adamianurad vebrdzodi av mxetsʰebs epʰesoʃi ra sarɡebeli makʰvs tʰu mkvdrebi ar aɣdɡebian vcamotʰ da vsvatʰ radɡan xval davixotsʰebitʰ 
nu daibnevitʰ tsʰudi sazoɡadoebani xrətsnian ketʰil tʃvevebs 
ɡamopʰxizlditʰ dʒerovnad da nu stsʰodavtʰ vinaidan tʰkʰvenda samartsʰxvinod vambob rom zoɡiertʰebi ar itsʰnoben ɣmertʰs 
maɡram itqvis vinme roɡor aɣdɡebian mkvdrebi da romel sxeulʃi movleno 
uɡunuro rasatsʰ datʰesav ar ɡatsʰotsʰxldeba tʰu ar mokvda 
da rotsʰa tʰesav im sxeuls ki ar tʰesav romelitsʰ ikʰneba aramed ʃiʃvel martsʰvals xorblis ikʰneba tʰu romelime sxvisa 
xolo ɣmertʰi adzlevs mas sxeuls roɡortsʰ nebavs tʰitʰoeul tʰesls tʰavis sxeuls 
qoveli xortsʰi ertʰi xortsʰi rodia aramed adamianis xortsʰi sxvanairia tsʰxovelis xortsʰi sxvanairi pʰrinvelis xortsʰi sxvanairi tʰevzisa sxvanairi 
aris tsʰiuri sxeulebi da aris mitsieri sxeulebi maɡram tsʰiuris dideba sxvaa da mitsierisa sxva 
sxvanairia mzis dideba sxvanairia mtʰvaris dideba da sxvanairia varskvlavtʰa dideba radɡan varskvlavitsʰ ɡanirtʃeva varskvlavisaɡan didebitʰ 
aseve mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡomatsʰ itʰeseba xrətsnilebitʰ da aɣdɡeba uxrətsnelebitʰ 
itʰeseba damtsʰirebitʰ da aɣdɡeba didebitʰ itʰeseba udzlurebaʃi da aɣdɡeba dzlierebaʃi 
itʰeseba mitsieri sxeuli da aɣdɡeba sulieri sxeuli aris mitsieri sxeuli da aris sulieri sxeuli 
asetsʰ stseria pirveli katsʰi adami ɡaxda tsʰotsʰxal arsebad xolo ukanaskneli adami matsʰotsʰxlebel sulad 
maɡram pirvelad sulieri ki ar aris aramed mitsieri da ʃemdeɡ sulieri 
pirveli katsʰi mitsisɡanaa mitsieri xolo meore katsʰi tsʰisaɡan 
da roɡortsʰ mitsieri iseve mitsierni da roɡortsʰ zetsʰieri iseve zetsʰierni 
da roɡortsʰ vatarebditʰ mitsieris xatebas aseve vatarotʰ zetsʰieris xatebatsʰ 
amas ki ɡetqvitʰ dzmano rom xortsʰsa da sisxls ar dzaludztʰ ɣvtʰis sasupʰevlis damkvidreba da xrətsnatsʰ ver daimkvidrebs uxrətsnelebas 
ai me saidumlos ɡeubnebitʰ qvelani ar ɡanvisvenebtʰ maɡram qvelani ʃevitsʰvlebitʰ 
ertʰ tsamʃi tʰvalis daxamxamebaze ukanasknel saqvirze vinaidan dasdzaxebs saqviri da mkvdrebi aɣdɡebian uxrətsnelad xolo tʃven ʃevitsʰvlebitʰ 
vinaidan es xrətsnadi uxrətsnelebitʰ unda ʃeimosos da es mokvdavi ukvdavebitʰ unda ʃeimosos 
xolo rotsʰa es xrətsnadi uxrətsnelebitʰ ʃeimoseba da es mokvdavi ukvdavebitʰ maʃin axdeba datserili sitqva sikvdili ʃtʰaintʰkʰa dzlevitʰ 
sad aris sikvdilo ʃeni nestari sad aris dʒodʒoxetʰo ʃeni dzleva 
sikvdilis nestaria tsʰodva xolo tsʰodvis dzala rdʒulia 
maɡram madloba ɣmertʰs romelitsʰ ɡvadzlevs dzlevas tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes mier 
amitom tʃemo saqvarelo dzmano iqavitʰ mtkitsʰeni da ʃeurqevelni mudam iuxvetʰ upʰlis sakʰmeʃi radɡan itsʰitʰ rom pʰuci araa tʰkʰveni ʃroma upʰlis tsinaʃe 
ratsʰ ʃeexeba tsmidatʰatʰvis ʃesatsiravs roɡortsʰ ɡalatiis eklesiebs davutsese tʰkʰventsʰ ise moikʰetsʰitʰ 
qovel ertʰʃabatʰs tʰitʰoeulma tʰkʰvenɡanma ɡadados tʰavistʰan da ɡadainaxos ramdenadatsʰ xeiri naxos ratʰa tʃemi mosvlisas ar itsqebodes ʃeɡroveba 
xolo rotsʰa moval visatsʰ tʰkʰven stsʰnobtʰ sandod imatʰ movavlen tserilebitʰ tʰkʰveni dzɣvenis tsasaɣebad ierusalimʃi 
da tʰu ikʰ tʃemi tsasvlatsʰ ɣirs maʃin tʃemtʰan ertʰad tsamovlen 
xolo me moval tʰkʰventʰan rotsʰa makedoniaze ɡavivli vinaidan makedoniaze unda ɡaviaro 
tʰkʰventʰan ki ʃesadzloa ɡavtʃerde an ikʰneb ɡamovizamtʰro ratʰa ɡamatsʰilotʰ ikʰ sadatsʰ tsaval 
vinaidan axla ar minda tʰkʰveni naxva ɡavlitʰ aramed vimedovneb ramdenime xans davrtʃe tʰkʰventʰan tʰu upʰali inebebs 
xolo epʰesoʃi davrtʃebi ormotsʰdameatʰe dɣemde 
vinaidan tʃemtʰvis ɣiaa ɣvatslis pʰartʰe kari da motsinaaɣmdeɡenitsʰ mravlad arian 
da tʰu timotʰe mova etsʰadetʰ rom uʃiʃrad iqos tʰkʰventʰan vinaidan is upʰlis sakʰmes aketʰebs iseve roɡortsʰ me 
amitom aravin uɡulebelqos iɡi ɡamoistumretʰ mʃvidobitʰ ratʰa movides tʃemtʰan vinaidan velodebi mas dzmebtʰan ertʰad 
ratsʰ ʃeexeba dzma apoloss dzalian vexvetsebodi rom mosuliqo tʰkʰventʰan dzmebitʰurtʰ maɡram ar isurva axla tsamosvla maɡram mova rotsʰa ʃedzlebs 
ipʰxizletʰ idekʰitʰ rətsmenaʃi iqavitʰ mamatsʰni ɡamaɡrditʰ 
qovelive tʰkʰveni siqvarulʃi iqos 
xolo ʃeɡaɡonebtʰ dzmano xom itsʰitʰ stepʰanas saxloba romelitsʰ akʰaias pirveli naqopʰia da rom matʰ tʰaviantʰi tʰavi miudzɣvnes tsmidatʰa msaxurebas 
tʰkʰventsʰ daemortʃiletʰ asetʰebs da qvelas vintsʰ tʰanamʃromeli da moɣvatsea 
da ai mixaria stepʰanas pʰortunates da akʰaikosis mosvla vinaidan matʰ ʃemivses tʰkʰveni arqopʰna 
da daamʃvides tʃemi sulitsʰ da tʰkʰvenitsʰ amitom stsʰanitʰ asetʰebi 
moɡikitʰxaven aziis eklesiebi didad moɡikitʰxaven upʰlis mier akvila da priskila da aseve matʰi saʃinao eklesia 
moɡikitʰxavtʰ qvela dzma moikitʰxetʰ ertʰmanetʰi tsmida amboritʰ 
moɡikitʰxavtʰ tʃemi pavles xelitʰ 
visatsʰ ar uqvars upʰali ieso kʰriste iqos ʃetʃvenebuli maranatʰa 
tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes madli iqos tʰkʰventʰan 
da tʃemi siqvaruli qvela tʰkʰvenɡanis mimartʰ kʰriste iesoʃi amin 
pavle ɣvtʰis nebitʰ ieso kʰristes motsʰikʰuli da dzma timotʰe ɣvtʰis eklesias romelitsʰ korintʰoʃia mtʰel akʰaiaʃi mqopʰ qvela tsmidastʰan ertʰad 
madli tʰkʰven da mʃvidoba tʃveni mama ɣmertʰisa da upʰal ieso kʰristesaɡan 
kurtʰxeulia ɣmertʰi da mama tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristesi motsqalebis mama da qoveli nuɡeʃis ɣmertʰi 
tʃveni nuɡeʃismtsʰemeli tʃvens qovelɡvar ɡasacirʃi rom tʃventsʰ ʃevdzlotʰ nuɡeʃistsʰema qovelɡvar ɡasacirʃi mqopʰtʰatʰvis imave nuɡeʃitʰ romlitʰatsʰ ɡvanuɡeʃebs ɣmertʰi 
radɡan roɡortsʰ kʰristes tandʒvani arian mravlad tʃvenʃi aseve mravldeba tʃveni nuɡeʃistsʰema kʰristes mier 
da aha tʰu ɡasacirʃi vartʰ es tʰkʰveni nuɡeʃistsʰemisa da xsnisatʰvis aris romelitsʰ xdeba imave tandʒvatʰa tʰmenitʰ romlitʰatsʰ tʃventsʰ vitandʒebitʰ 
mtkitsʰea tʃveni sasoeba tʰkʰvens mimartʰ vinaidan vitsʰitʰ rom roɡortsʰ tandʒvatʰa monatsileni xartʰ aseve nuɡeʃistsʰemisatsʰ 
radɡan ar ɡvinda dzmebo ar itsʰodetʰ tʃveni ɡasaciri ratsʰ aziaʃi ɡadavitanetʰ rom metismetad daɡvimdzimda vidre amis motʰmena ʃeɡvedzlo 
xolo tʃven tʰavad ɡvkʰonda sasikvdilo msdʒavri ratʰa tʃveni tʰavis imedi ki ar ɡvkʰonoda aramed ɣvtʰisa romelitsʰ aɣadɡens mkvdrebs 
romelmatsʰ ɡvixsna kidetsʰ asetʰi sikvdilisaɡan da ɡvixsnis romlis imedi ɡvakʰvs rom kvlavatsʰ ɡvixsnis 
tʰkʰveni tʃvendami ʃetsevnitʰi lotsʰvitʰatsʰ ratʰa mravalma ʃestsiros madloba tʃventʰvis rom moɡvenica madli mravaltʰa ʃuamdɡomlobitʰ 
radɡan es tʃveni kʰadili aris tʃveni sindisis motsmoba rom tʃven ɣvtʰaebrivi sitsmiditʰ da ɡultsrpʰelobitʰ vikʰtsʰeoditʰ sopʰelʃi ɡansakutʰrebitʰ tʰkʰventʰan ara xortsʰieli sibrədznitʰ aramed ɣvtʰis madlitʰ 
vinaidan sxvas arapʰers ɡtsertʰ tʰkʰven tʰu ara imas rasatsʰ kitʰxulobtʰ anda ʃeitsʰnobtʰ da rasatsʰ roɡortsʰ vimedovneb bolomde ʃeitsʰnobtʰ 
roɡortsʰ natsilobriv ʃeɡvitsʰanitʰ tʃven rom tʃven tʰkʰveni dideba vartʰ iseve roɡortsʰ tʰkʰven ikʰnebitʰ tʃveni upʰlis iesos dɣes 
da am ndobitʰ mindoda dʒer tʰkʰventʰan mosvla ratʰa meored miɡeɣotʰ madli 
da tʰkʰventʰan ɡavlitʰ tsavide makedoniaʃi xolo makedoniidan kvlav tʰkʰventʰan davbrunde da tʰkʰven ɡamistumrotʰ iudeaʃi 
natʃkʰarevi xom ar iqo tʃemi ɡanzraxva an ikʰneb ratsʰ ɡanvizraxe xortsʰielad ɡanvizraxe ase rom tʃemi ho ho iɡivea ratsʰ ara ara 
maɡram motsmea ɣmertʰi rom tʃveni sitqva tʰkʰvens mimartʰ ar qopʰila hotsʰ da aratsʰ 
vinaidan dze ɣvtʰisa ieso kʰriste romelsatsʰ tʰkʰven ʃoris vkʰadaɡebditʰ tʃven me siloane da timotʰe ar iqo hotsʰ da aratsʰ aramed ho iqo masʃi 
radɡan ɣvtʰis qvela aɣtʰkʰmani masʃi ho aris da misitʰ itʰkʰmis amini ɣvtʰis sadideblad tʃvens mier 
is romelitsʰ tʰkʰventʰan ertʰad ɡvamtkitsʰebs kʰristeʃi da romelmatsʰ ɡvtsʰxo tʃven ɣmertʰia 
romelmatsʰ aɣɡvbecda kidetsʰ da moɡvtsʰa tʃvens ɡulebʃi sulis satsindari 
da me movuxmob ɣmertʰs tʃemi sulis motsmed rom tʰkʰven ɡzoɡavditʰ da akʰamde imitom ar movdiodi korintʰoʃi 
ara imitom rom vibatonotʰ tʰkʰvens rətsmenaze aramed xels vutsqobtʰ tʰkʰvens sixaruls vinaidan rətsmenaʃi mtkitsʰeni xartʰ 
maɡram tʃemtʰvis ase ɡadavtsqvite aɣar movide tʰkʰventʰan dasamtsuxreblad 
vinaidan tʰu me ɡamtsuxrebtʰ maʃ vinɣa ɡamaxarebs tʰu ara is vintsʰ damtsuxrebulia tʃemɡan 
stsored es moɡtseretʰ tʰkʰven ratʰa tʃemi mosvlisas ar mkʰondes tsuxili matʰɡan visitʰatsʰ unda ɡamexara xolo qvela tʰkʰvenɡanʃi dartsmunebuli var rom tʃemi sixaruli qvela tʰkʰvenɡanis sixarulitsʰaa 
vinaidan didi ɡulistkivilitʰa da naɣvelitʰ ɡtserditʰ da uamravi tsʰremlitʰ da ara imitom rom damemtsuxrebinetʰ aramed ɡeɡrədznotʰ is uzomo siqvaruli romelitsʰ tʰkʰvendami makʰvs 
da tʰu vinmem damamtsuxra me ki ar damamtsuxra aramed ramdenadme ɡadacarbebulad rom ar vtʰkʰva tʰkʰven qvelani 
asetʰisatʰvis sakmarisia es sasdʒeli mravaltʰaɡan 
ase rom pirikʰitʰ apatietʰ da nuɡeʃi etsʰitʰ ratʰa metismetma naɣvelma ar ʃtʰantʰkʰas iɡi 
amitom ʃeɡaɡonebtʰ siqvaruli ɡamoitʃinotʰ mis mimartʰ 
vinaidan imistʰvisatsʰ davtsere rom ɡamometsʰadetʰ qvelapʰerʃi mortʃilni xartʰ tʰu ara 
da visatsʰ tʰkʰven apatiebtʰ rames metsʰ vinaidan me tʰu vinmes raime vapatie tʰkʰveni ɡulisatʰvis vapatie kʰristes saxis tsinaʃe 
ratʰa ziani ar moɡvaqenos satanam vinaidan tʃventʰvis utsʰnobi ar aris misi zraxvebi 
xolo me rotsʰa troadaʃi movedi kʰristes saxarebis ɡulisatʰvis kari ɣia iqo tʃemtʰvis upʰalʃi 
maɡram ar mkʰonda sulis simʃvide radɡan ver vpove ikʰ tʃemi dzma tite ɡamovemʃvidobe matʰ da ɡavemartʰe makedoniisaken 
maɡram madloba ɣmertʰs romelitsʰ qoveltʰvis dzlevas ɡvanicebs kʰristeʃi da tʃveni xelitʰ avrtsʰelebs tʰavisi tsʰodnis ketʰilsurnelebas qovel adɡilas 
vinaidan kʰristes ketʰilsurneleba vartʰ ɣvtʰisatʰvis daxsniltʰa ʃorisatsʰ da daɣupultʰa ʃorisatsʰ 
zoɡistʰvis sikvdilis surnelia sasikvdilod da zoɡistʰvis sitsʰotsʰxlis surnelia sasitsʰotsʰxlod vinaa ɣirsi amisatʰvis 
vinaidan tʃven ar vmetsvrilmaneobtʰ roɡortsʰ mravalni ɣvtʰis sitqvitʰ aramed tsrpʰelad roɡortsʰ ɣvtʰisaɡan ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe vkʰadaɡebtʰ kʰristeʃi 
nutʰu kidev davitsqotʰ sakutʰar tʰavtʰa tsardɡena nutʰu saciroa tʃventʰvis roɡortsʰ zoɡiertʰebisatʰvis tsardɡenis tserilebi tʰkʰvendami an tʰkʰvenɡan 
tʰkʰven xartʰ tʃveni tserili tʃvens ɡulebʃi datserili romelsatsʰ itsʰnobs da kitʰxulobs qoveli adamiani 
tʰkʰven atʃvenebtʰ rom tʰkʰven xartʰ kʰristes tserili tʃvenɡan ɡaɡzavnili datserili ara melnitʰ aramed tsʰotsʰxali ɣvtʰis sulitʰ ara kʰvis pʰitsʰrebze aramed ɡulis xortsʰiel pʰitsʰrebze 
asetʰi ndoba ɡvakʰvs kʰristes mier ɣvtʰis mimartʰ 
ara imitom rom tʃven dzalɡvedvas tʃven tʰvitʰon ɡanvsadʒotʰ raime vitʰomtsʰ tʃvenɡan iqos da ara ɣvtʰisaɡan tʃveni ʃemdzleoba 
man ʃeɡvadzlebina vqopʰiliqavitʰ msaxurni axali aɣtʰkʰmisa ara asoebisa aramed sulisa vinaidan aso klavs suli ki atsʰotsʰxlebs 
xolo tʰu sikvdilis msaxureba kʰvaze asoebitʰ ɡamosaxuli ise didebuli iqo rom israelianebma ver ʃedzles moses saxis xilva mis saxeze ɡadmosuli didebis ɡamo 
ramdenad didi ikʰneba sulis msaxurebis dideba 
vinaidan tʰu ɡankitʰxvis msaxureba didebaa mitʰ upʰro uxvobs didebitʰ samartʰlianobis msaxureba 
radɡan amriɡad ɡandidebuli ar tʃaitʰvleba didebulad am aɣzevebul didebastʰan ʃedarebitʰ 
vinaidan tʰu tsarmavals hkʰonda dideba ramdenad meti akʰvs dideba mas ratsʰ rtʃeba 
amitom raki amdeni tʰavisupʰleba ɡvakʰvs didi ɡabedulebitʰatsʰ vmokʰmedebtʰ 
da ara roɡortsʰ mose romelmatsʰ ride tʃamoipʰara saxeze rom ar exilatʰ israelianebs tsarmavali didebis dasasruli 
maɡram daexʃatʰ matʰ ɡoneba vinaidan dzveli aɣtʰkʰmis kitʰxvisas dɣemde rtʃeba iɡive auxdeli ride radɡan iɡi kʰristeʃia moxsnili 
maɡram dɣemde rotsʰa moses kitʰxuloben ride adevtʰ ɡulze 
xolo rotsʰa upʰlisaken miikʰtsʰevian ride exdebatʰ 
xolo upʰali sulia da sadatsʰ upʰlis sulia ikʰ tʰavisupʰlebaa 
tʃven ki qvelani axdili saxitʰ vxedavtʰ upʰlis didebas roɡortsʰ sarkeʃi da ɡardavisaxebitʰ imave saxed didebidan didebaʃi roɡortsʰ upʰlis sulisaɡan 
amitom raki asetʰi msaxureba ɡvakʰvs roɡoritsʰ ɡvetsqaloba ar vtsʰxrebitʰ 
aramed uarvqavitʰ sasirtsʰxvilos dapʰarva da ara tsʰbieri kʰtsʰevitʰ da ɣvtʰis sitqvis damaxindʒebitʰ aramed ceʃmaritebis ɡamotʃenitʰ tsarvadɡentʰ tʃvens tʰavs qvela adamianis sindisis mimartʰ ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
da tʰu tʃveni saxareba dapʰarulia daɣupultʰatʰvis aris dapʰaruli 
urtsmunotʰatʰvis visatsʰ am saukunis ɣmertʰma daubrmava ɡoneba ratʰa matʰtʰvis ar ebrətsqina saxarebiseul natʰels kʰristes didebisa romelitsʰ uxilavi ɣvtʰis xatia 
vinaidan tʃvens tʰavs ki ar vkʰadaɡebtʰ aramed kʰriste iesos upʰals xolo tʃven tʰkʰveni monebi vartʰ iesostʰvis 
vinaidan ɣmertʰma romelmatsʰ brdzana rom natʰeli bnelidan ɡamobrətsqinebuliqo manve ɡaanatʰa tʃvens ɡulebʃi ratʰa ɡaɡvinatʰos ɣvtʰis didebis tsʰodnitʰ ieso kʰristes saxeʃi 
maɡram es ɡandzi tʃven ɡvakʰvs tʰixis curclebʃi ratʰa ɡadametebuli dzliereba ɣvtʰisɡan iqos da ara tʃvenɡan 
qvelapʰerʃi ʃevitsroebulni vartʰ maɡram ara vartʰ datʰrɡunulni ʃetsuxebulni vartʰ maɡram ara sasotsarkvetʰilni 
devnilni vartʰ maɡram ara mitovebulni ɡadaqrilni vartʰ maɡram ara daɣupulni 
da mudam sxeulʃi vatarebtʰ upʰal iesos sikvdils ratʰa iesos sitsʰotsʰxletsʰ tʃvens sxeulʃi ɡamotʃndes 
vinaidan tʃven tsʰotsʰxlebi mudam vedzlevitʰ sikvdils iesosatʰvis ratʰa iesos sitsʰotsʰxletsʰ tʃvens mokvdav xortsʰʃi ɡamotʃndes 
amitom tʃvenʃi sikvdili mokʰmedebs xolo tʰkʰvenʃi sitsʰotsʰxle 
da raki rətsmenis iɡive suli ɡvakʰvs roɡortsʰ stseria mtsamda da amitom vlaparakobdi tʃventsʰ ɡvtsams da amitom vlaparakobtʰ 
raki vitsʰitʰ rom vintsʰ aɣadɡina upʰali ieso tʃventsʰ aɣɡvadɡens iesostʰan ertʰad da tsarɡvadɡens tʰkʰventʰan ertʰad 
vinaidan qovelive tʰkʰventʰvis aris ratʰa mravlis mier madlis ɡamravlebitʰ ɡavrtsʰeldes madliereba ɣvtʰis sadideblad 
amitom ar vtsʰxrebitʰ maɡram tʰu ɡareɡani katsʰi ixrətsneba tʃveni ʃinaɡani maintsʰ ɡanaxldeba dɣitʰi dɣe 
vinaidan tʃveni msubukʰi da xanmokle tandʒva did da mometebul saukuno didebas kʰmnis tʃventʰvis 
rotsʰa vuqurebtʰ ara xiluls aramed uxilavs vinaidan xiluli droebitʰia xolo uxilavi saukuno 
radɡan vitsʰitʰ rom rotsʰa dainɡreva es tʃveni mitsieri saxli karavi ɣvtʰisaɡan ɡvakʰvs ʃenoba tsʰaʃi xeltʰukʰmneli saxli saukuno 
vinaidan martʰlatsʰ voxravtʰ da vnatrobtʰ tʃveni zetsʰiuri saxlitʰ ʃemosvas
