tʰu ʃemosilnitsʰ ʃiʃvlebi ar aɣmovtʃnditʰ 
vinaidan martʰlatsʰ am karavʃi tvirtʰkʰveʃ voxravtʰ radɡan ɡaxda ki ara ɡvsurs aramed ʃemosva ratʰa mokvdavi ʃtʰaintʰkʰas sitsʰotsʰxlis mier 
stsored amisatʰvis ʃeɡvamzada tʃven ɣmertʰma da moɡvtsʰa suli satsindrad 
amitom qoveltʰvis mxneda vartʰ da vitsʰitʰ rom sanam damkvidrebulni vartʰ sxeulʃi ɡanʃorebulni vartʰ upʰlisaɡan 
vinaidan rətsmenitʰ davdivartʰ da ara xilvitʰ 
mxneda vartʰ da ɡvirtʃevnia sxeuls ɡanvʃordetʰ da upʰaltʰan davbinavdetʰ 
amitom vtsʰdilobtʰ kidetsʰ akʰ vikʰnebitʰ tʰu ikʰ mistʰvis sasurvelni viqotʰ 
vinaidan tʃven qvelani unda ɡamovtsʰxaddetʰ kʰristes samsdʒavros tsinaʃe ratʰa tʰitʰoeulma miiɣos imis mixedvitʰ rasatsʰ sxeulis sitsʰotsʰxlis dros aketʰebda ketʰils tʰu borots 
da raki upʰlis ʃiʃi vitsʰitʰ adamianebs ʃtʰavaɡonebtʰ ɣvtʰistʰvis ki ɡatsʰxadebuli vartʰ da vimedovneb rom tʰkʰveni sindisistʰvisatsʰ ɡatsʰxadebuli vartʰ 
xelaxla ki ar tsarmoɡidɡentʰ tʃvens tʰavs aramed sababs ɡadzlevtʰ mohkvexdetʰ tʃvenitʰ rom satʰkʰmeli ɡkʰondetʰ matʰtʰvis vintsʰ zereled ikvexnis da ara ɡulitʰ 
vinaidan tʰu ɡons ɡadasulni vartʰ ɣvtʰisatʰvis xolo tʰu ɡonierebi tʰkʰventʰvis 
kʰristes siqvarulitʰ vartʰ motsʰulni rotsʰa ase vmsdʒelobtʰ tʰu ertʰi mokvda qvelastʰvis qvelani daixotsʰnen 
kʰriste ki qvelastʰvis mokvda ratʰa tsʰotsʰxlebma tʰaviantʰtʰvis ki aɣar itsʰotsʰxlon aramed imistʰvis vintsʰ matʰtʰvis mokvda da aɣdɡa 
amitom amieridan aɣaravis vitsʰnobtʰ xortsʰielad tʰu xortsʰielad vitsʰnobditʰ kidetsʰ kʰristes axla aɣar vitsʰnobtʰ 
maʃasadame is vintsʰ kʰristeʃia is axali kʰmnilebaa dzveli ɡadavida da axla qovelive axalia 
qovelive ɣvtʰisaɡan aris romelmatsʰ ʃeɡviriɡa ieso kʰristes meʃveobitʰ da moɡvtsʰa ʃeriɡebis msaxureba 
imitom rom ɣmertʰma kʰristeʃi ʃeiriɡa sopʰeli da ar tʃautʰvala matʰ matʰi danaʃaulebani da ɡvibodza ʃeriɡebis sitqva 
amɡvarad tʃven eltʃebi vartʰ kʰristestʰvis da vitʰomtsʰ tʰavad ɣmertʰi ʃeɡaɡonebdetʰ tʃveni meʃveobitʰ kʰristes saxelitʰ ɡtʰxovtʰ ʃeuriɡditʰ ɣmertʰs 
vintsʰ tsʰodva ar itsʰoda is ɡaxada tsʰodvad tʃvens ɡamo ratʰa ɡavxdetʰ ɣvtʰis samartʰlianoba masʃi 
da tʃven roɡortsʰ tʰanamʃromelni ʃeɡaɡonebtʰ rom pʰucad ar miiɣotʰ ɣvtʰis madli 
vinaidan is ambobs motsqalebis ʒams ʃeɡitsqnare da xsnis dɣes ʃeɡetsie aha axlaa motsqalebis ʒami aha axlaa xsnis dɣe 
tʃven arapʰerʃi ar vidzlevitʰ dabrkolebis sababs ratʰa msaxureba ar ʃeibɣalos 
aramed qvelapʰerʃi tsarmovdɡebitʰ roɡortsʰ ɣvtʰis msaxurni did motʰminebaʃi mtsuxarebaʃi ɡacirvebaʃi ʃevitsroebaʃi 
tsʰemaʃi sapqrobileebʃi ʃpʰotʰʃi udzilobaʃi marxvaʃi 
sitsmideʃi tsʰodnaʃi saxierebaʃi sulitsmidaʃi da uanɡaro siqvarulʃi 
ceʃmaritebis sitqvaʃi ɣmertʰis dzalaʃi mardʒvenisa da martsʰxenis simartʰlis iaraɣitʰ 
didebasa da sirtsʰxvilʃi ɡmobitʰ da kʰebitʰ vitʰomtsʰ matsʰdurni maintsʰ ceʃmaritni 
roɡortsʰ utsʰnobni maɡram tsʰnobilni roɡortsʰ momakvdavni da aha vtsʰotsʰxlobtʰ roɡortsʰ dasdʒilni maɡram ar vkvdebitʰ 
roɡortsʰ mtsuxareni maɡram mudam moxarulni roɡortsʰ ɣatakni maɡram mravaltʰa ɡamamdidrebelni roɡortsʰ ukʰonelni maɡram qvelapʰris mkʰonebelni 
tʃveni baɡe ɡaxsnilia tʰkʰvens mimartʰ korintʰelno da ɡaʃlilia tʃveni ɡuli 
tʰkʰven vitsrotʰ ara xartʰ tʃvenʃi aramed tʰkʰvenʃivea sivitsrove 
xolo amaze samaɡierod ɡeubnebitʰ roɡortsʰ ʃvilebs iqavitʰ tʰkʰventsʰ ɡaʃlilni 
nu ʃeebmebitʰ utsʰxo uɣelʃi urtsmunoebtʰan ertʰad radɡan ra monatsileoba akʰvs simartʰles urdʒuloebastʰan ra akʰvs saziaro natʰels bneltʰan 
ra tʰanxmoba akʰvs kʰristes beliartʰan an ra tsili akʰvs mortsmunes urtsmunostʰan 
ra kavʃiri akʰvs ɣvtʰis tadzars kerpebtʰan radɡan tʰkʰven xartʰ tsʰotsʰxali ɣvtʰis tadzari roɡortsʰ ɣmertʰma tʰkʰva davmkvidrdebi da vivli matʰ ʃoris vikʰnebi matʰi ɣmertʰi da isini ikʰnebian tʃemi xalxi 
amitom ɡamoditʰ matʰɡan da ɡamoeqavitʰ ambobs upʰali utsmidurs nu miekarebitʰ da me miɡiɣebtʰ tʰkʰven 
vikʰnebi tʰkʰventʰvis mama da tʰkʰven ikʰnebitʰ tʃemtʰvis dzeni da asulni ambobs upʰali qovlismpqrobeli 
amitom tʃemo saqvarelno rotsʰa asetʰi aɣtʰkʰmani ɡvakʰvs ɡanvitsmidotʰ xortsʰisa da sulis qovelɡvari bitsisaɡan ɣvtʰis moʃiʃebitʰ aɣvasrulotʰ sitsmide 
ʃeɡvitʰvisetʰ aravis movkʰtsʰevivartʰ usamartʰlod aravistʰvis ɡvivnia aravisɡan ɡvidzebnia ɡamortʃena 
msdʒavris dasadebad ar vambob radɡan tsinastsarve vtʰkʰvi rom tʃvens ɡulebʃi xartʰ ratʰa tʰkʰventʰan movkvdetʰ da tʰkʰventʰan vitsʰotsʰxlotʰ 
didi ndoba makʰvs tʰkʰveni bevrs vikvexni tʰkʰvenitʰ aɣvsili var nuɡeʃitʰ ɡulnadʒeri var sixarulitʰ miuxedavad mtʰeli tʃveni ɡasacirisa 
vinaidan rotsʰa makedoniaʃi moveditʰ tʃvens sxeuls ar hkʰonia mosveneba aramed ʃevitsroebulni viqavitʰ qvelapʰerʃi ɡaretʰ brdzolebi ʃin ʃiʃi 
maɡram ɣmertʰma romelitsʰ mortʃiltʰa nuɡeʃismtsʰemelia nuɡeʃi ɡvtsʰa tites mosvlitʰ 
da ara marto misi mosvlitʰ aramed aɡretʰve nuɡeʃitʰ romlitʰatsʰ nuɡeʃtsʰemuli iqo iɡi tʰkʰvenitʰ rotsʰa ɡviambo tʰkʰvens sibedʒitʰeze tʰkʰvens tirilze tʰkʰvens tʰavɡamodebaze tʃems mimartʰ da amriɡad upʰro metad ɡavixare 
amitom tʰu kidetsʰ daɡamtsuxretʰ tserilitʰ ar vnanob tʰumtsʰa kinaɣam vinane vinaidan vxedav rom am tserilma daɡamtsuxratʰ tʰundatsʰ droebitʰ 
axla me vxarob ara imitom rom damtsuxrditʰ aramed imitom rom damtsuxrditʰ mosananieblad radɡan damtsuxrditʰ ɣvtʰis ɡulisatʰvis ase rom arapʰeri daɡzianebiatʰ tʃvenɡan 
vinaidan ɣvtʰis ɡulisatʰvis damtsuxreba tsarmoʃobs sinanuls saxsnelad da ar ɡaxdeba sananebeli xolo sopʰlis tsuxili sikvdils tsarmoʃobs 
vinaidan iman ɣvtʰis ɡulisatʰvis rom damtsuxrditʰ daxetʰ ramdeni ram tsarmoʃva tʰkʰvenʃi roɡori sibedʒitʰe roɡori ɡamartʰleba roɡori ɡulistsqroma roɡori ʃiʃi roɡori survili roɡori moʃurneoba roɡori sasdʒeli da qvelapʰerʃi atʃvenetʰ rom supʰtʰani xartʰ am sakʰmeʃi 
amitom tʰu kidetsʰ moɡtseretʰ tʰkʰven artsʰ ʃeuratsʰxmqopʰelis ɡulisatʰvis da artsʰ ʃeuratsʰxqopʰilis ɡulisatʰvis aramed ratʰa tʰkʰveni ɡulmodɡineba tʃvendami ɡamotʃndes tʰkʰvenʃi ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
da amitom vinuɡeʃetʰ tʰavi tʰkʰveni nuɡeʃitʰ xolo umetesad ɡavixaretʰ tites sixarulitʰ rom tʰkʰven qvelam daamʃvidetʰ misi suli 
tʰu rameʃi davikvexe tʰkʰvens ʃesaxeb mis tsinaʃe ar ʃevrətsʰxvenilvar maɡram roɡortsʰ qvelapʰers ceʃmaritad ɡelaparakeboditʰ aseve ceʃmariti ɡamodɡa tʃveni kvexna tites tsinaʃe 
upʰro dzlierdeba misi siqvaruli tʰkʰvens mimartʰ ixsenebs ra qvela tʰkʰvenɡanis mortʃilebas da imas rom moʃiʃobitʰ da tʰrtʰolvitʰ miiɣetʰ iɡi 
amriɡad moxaruli var rom ʃemidzlia qvelapʰerʃi moɡendotʰ 
da aha ɡautsqebtʰ dzmano ɣvtʰis madlis ʃesaxeb romelitsʰ mietsʰa makedoniis eklesiebs 
vinaidan miuxedavd didi ʃevitsroebitʰ ɡamotsʰdisa matʰi sixarulis siuxve da matʰi siɣatakis siɣrme uxvad ɡamoixata matʰi xelɡaʃlilobis simdidreʃi 
vinaidan vadastureb rom tʰaviantʰi dzalis ʃesabamisad da upʰro metadatsʰ ɡuluxvni iqvnen 
didi daʒinebitʰ ɡvtʰxoves madli da tʰanaziareba tsmidatʰa momsaxurebaʃi 
da ara marto is risi imeditsʰ ɡvkʰonda aramed matʰ sakutʰari tʰavi mistsʰes dʒer upʰals da mere tʃven ɣvtʰis nebitʰ 
amitom tites vtʰxovetʰ rom roɡortsʰ daitsqo aseve daemtʰavrebina tʰkʰventʰan es ketʰili sakʰme 
xolo roɡortsʰ siuxve ɡakʰvtʰ qvelapʰritʰ rətsmenitʰ da sitqvitʰ tsʰodnitʰ da qovelɡvari sibedʒitʰitʰ da tʰkʰvenʃi tʃveni siqvarulitʰ ase iuxvetʰ am madlʃitsʰ 
amas brdzanebitʰ ki ar vambob aramed ratʰa sxvatʰa sibedʒitʰitʰ ɡamovtsʰado tʰkʰveni siqvarulis sitsrpʰeletsʰ 
vinaidan itsʰitʰ tʰkʰven tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes madli rom iɡi tʰumtsʰa mdidari iqo tʰkʰvens ɡamo ɡaɣatakda ratʰa tʰkʰven ɡamdidrebuliqavitʰ misi siɣatakitʰ 
tʃems rtʃevas vidzlevi amaze radɡan sasarɡeblo ikʰneba tʰkʰventʰvis imis aɣsruleba ratsʰ ʃarʃan tsamoitsqetʰ da xalisitʰatsʰ 
axla ki daasruletʰ kidetsʰ sakʰme ratʰa risi ɡaketʰebatsʰ ɡulmodɡined ɡsurdatʰ daamtʰavrotʰ kidetsʰ tʰkʰveni ʃedzlebisamebr 
vinaidan rotsʰa ɡulmodɡineba aris es miiɣeba imis mixedvitʰ visatsʰ ra akʰvs da ara imis mixedvitʰ ratsʰ ara akʰvs 
ara imisatʰvis rom sxvebs ʃveba hkʰondetʰ da tʰkʰven ɡacirveba aramed tʰanastsorobistʰvis 
amʒamad tʰkʰveni nameti ʃeavsebs matʰs naklulebas ratʰa matʰma nametmatsʰ ʃeavsos tʰkʰveni nakluleba rom iqos tʰanastsoroba 
roɡortsʰ stseria vintsʰ bevri akripʰa zedmeti ar hkʰonda xolo vintsʰ naklebi ar aklda 
da madloba ɣmertʰs romelitsʰ asetʰsave sibedʒitʰes adzlevs tʰkʰvens mimartʰ tites ɡuls 
vinaidan martʰlatsʰ miiɣo tʃveni ʃeɡoneba da mometebuli sibedʒitʰitʰ da sakutʰari survilitʰ tsamovida tʰkʰventʰan 
mastʰan ertʰad ɡamovɡzavnetʰ dzma romelsatsʰ qvela eklesiaʃi akʰeben saxarebis kʰadaɡebistʰvis 
ɡarda amisa is artʃeulia eklesiebis mier tʃvens tʰanamɡzavradatsʰ am samadlo sakʰmeʃi rasatsʰ tʃven vemsaxurebitʰ tʰvitʰ upʰlis sadideblad da tʰkʰveni ɡulmodɡinebis ʃesabamisad 
vpʰrətʰxilobtʰ rom aravin ɡamovides boroti saqveduritʰ tʃvenze rotsʰa esoden uxvia es ʃemotsiruleba romelitsʰ tʃveni msaxurebitʰ ikʰna mopovebuli 
vinaidan vtsʰdilobtʰ ketʰilisatʰvis ara marto upʰlis tsinaʃe aramed adamiantʰa tsinaʃetsʰ 
ɡamovɡzavnetʰ matʰtʰan ertʰad tʃveni dzma romlis sibedʒitʰe mravaldʒer ɡamovtsʰadetʰ bevr rameʃi xolo axla upʰro metad bedʒitʰia radɡan didi ndoba akʰvs tʰkʰvendami 
ratsʰ ʃeexeba tites is tʃemi meɡobari da tʰanamʃromelia tʰkʰventʰan xolo ratsʰ ʃeexeba tʃvens dzmebs eklesiebis tsarɡzavnilni da kʰristes dideba arian 
amitom utʃvenetʰ da daumtkitsʰetʰ matʰ eklesiebis tsinaʃe tʰkʰveni siqvaruli da is ritʰatsʰ tʃven vikvexnitʰ tʰkʰvenitʰ 
tʰumtsʰa zedmetia tʃemtʰvis moɡtserotʰ tsmidantʰa momsaxurebaze 
vinaidan vitsʰi tʰkʰveni ɡulmodɡineba da vikvexni tʰkʰvenitʰ makedoneltʰa tsinaʃe rom akʰaia momzadebulia ʃarʃandlidan da mravali tsaaxalisa tʰkʰvenma moʃurneobam 
xolo dzmebi ɡamovɡzavne imisatʰvis rom pʰuci ar iqos tʃveni kvexna tʰkʰvenitʰ am sakʰmeʃi da ratʰa mzad iqotʰ roɡortsʰ vtʰkʰvi 
ratʰa rotsʰa makedonelni movlen tʃemtʰan ertʰad da ɡpoveben moumzadebeltʰ ar ʃevrətsʰxvetʰ ar vambob tʰkʰven metʰkʰi raki esoden dabedʒitʰebitʰ davikvexetʰ 
amitom sacirod mivitʃnie metʰxova dzmebisatʰvis rom tsinastsar mosuliqvnen tʰkʰventʰan da ɡaemzadebinatʰ tʰkʰveni ukve dapirebuli dzɣveni ratʰa mzad iqos roɡortsʰ dzɣveni da ara roɡortsʰ anɡareba 
amastʰan ɡetqvitʰ vintsʰ dzuntsad tʰesavs is dzuntsad moimkis xolo vintsʰ kurtʰxevitʰ tʰesavs is kurtʰxevitʰ moimkis 
tʰitʰoeulma roɡortsʰ ɡulitʰ airtʃia artsʰ ʃetsuxebitʰ da artsʰ dzaldatanebitʰ vinaidan sixarulitʰ ɡamtsʰemi uqvars ɣmertʰs 
xolo ɣmertʰs dzaludzs ɡaɡamdidrotʰ qovelɡvari madlitʰ ratʰa tʰkʰven qvelapʰerʃi mudam qovelives sakmarisad mkʰoneni mdidarni iqotʰ qovel ketʰil sakʰmeʃi 
roɡortsʰ stseria ɡapʰanta ɣaribebs dauriɡa misi simartʰle rtʃeba saukunod 
xolo is vintsʰ tʰesls adzlevs mtʰesvels da purs sacmelad moɡtsʰemtʰ da ɡaamravlebs tʰkʰvens tʰesls da ɡazrdis tʰkʰveni simartʰlis naqopʰtʰ 
qvelapʰerʃi ɡamdidrdebitʰ qovelɡvari xelɡaʃlilobisatʰvis ratsʰ tʃvens mier ɣvtʰisadmi madlierebas ɡamoitsvevs 
vinaidan am sakʰmis samsaxuri ara marto avsebs tsmidatʰa naklebobas aramed uxvobs kidetsʰ ɣvtʰisadmi mravali madlierebitʰ 
am samsaxuris ɡamotsʰdilebitʰ adideben ɣmertʰs tʰkʰvens mier kʰristes saxarebis mortʃili aɣiarebisatʰvis aɡretʰve xelɡaʃlilobisatʰvis matʰtʰan da qvelastʰan tʰanaziarebaʃi 
xolo isini rotsʰa lotsʰuloben tʰkʰventʰvis ʃemoɡnatrian tʰkʰven ɣvtʰis madlisatʰvis romelitsʰ tʰkʰvenʃi mometebulad aris 
madloba ɣmertʰs misi auratsʰxeli nicisatʰvis 
tʰavad me pavle moɡitsodebtʰ kʰristesmieri tʰvinierebitʰ da ketʰilɡantsqobitʰ me romelitsʰ tʰkʰventʰan pirispir mqopʰi tʰavmdabali var ʃoridan ki kadnieri 
da ɡevedrebitʰ rom tʃemi mosvlisas ar damcirdes simkatsʰre romlis ɡamoqenebas vpʰikʰrob zoɡiertʰebis mimartʰ visatsʰ hɡonia tʰitʰkʰos xortsʰis mixedvitʰ davdiodetʰ 
vinaidan tʰumtsʰa xortsʰʃi davdivartʰ xortsʰielad ar vibrədzvitʰ 
vinaidan tʃveni sabrdzolo iaraɣi xortsʰieli ar aris aramed aris ɣvtʰiuri dzliereba simaɡretʰa dasanɡrevad 
imitʰ vamxobtʰ zraxvebs da qovel simaɣles romelitsʰ aɣmartʰulia ɣvtʰis tsʰodnis tsinaaɣmdeɡ da vatqvevebtʰ qovelɡvar azrs kʰristestʰvis dasamortʃileblad 
da mzad vartʰ ʃuri vidziotʰ qovelɡvar urtʃobaze rotsʰa tʰkʰveni mortʃileba aɣsruldeba 
ʃexedetʰ imas ratsʰ tʰkʰvens tsinaʃea visatsʰ sdʒera rom kʰristesia tʰvitʰonve dapʰikʰrdes rom roɡortsʰ tʰavad aris kʰristesi aseve tʃventsʰ kʰristesni vartʰ 
da tʰu upʰro metad davikvexni tʃveni xelmtsipʰebitʰ romelitsʰ upʰalma moɡvtsʰa asaʃeneblad da ara tʰkʰvens dasakʰtsʰevad ar ʃevrətsʰxvebi 
amitom ar moɡetʃvenotʰ tʰitʰkʰos ɡemukʰrebodetʰ tserilebitʰ 
amboben tserilebʃi is mdzime da dzlieriao maɡram rodesatsʰ piradad imqopʰeba sustia da misi sitqvatsʰ araraobaao 
dae itsʰodes asetʰma rom roɡorebitsʰ sitqvebitʰ vartʰ tserilebʃi arqopʰnisas isetʰive vartʰ sakʰmeʃi tʰkʰventʰan qopʰnisas 
vinaidan ver vbedavtʰ davupirispirdetʰ anda ʃevedarotʰ imatʰ romeltʰatsʰ tʰavi moakʰvtʰ isini uckuobitʰ tʰavisi tʰavitʰ zomaven tʰavs da tʰaviantʰ tʰavs tʰavis tʰavtʰan adareben 
xolo tʃven uzomod ar davikvexnitʰ aramed im zomitʰ ra xvedritsʰ ɣmertʰma ɡvitsilada rom tʰkʰvenamde movaɣtsiotʰ 
vinaidan tʃven xom metismetad ar vidzabebitʰ tʰitʰkʰos ar moɡveɣtsios tʰkʰvenamde imitom rom tʰkʰvenamdetsʰ movaɣtsietʰ kʰristes saxarebitʰ 
uzomod ar vikvexnitʰ sxvisi ʃromitʰ maɡram imedi ɡvakʰvs rom tʰkʰveni rətsmenis zrdis kvalobaze uxvad ɡavadidebtʰ tʰkʰvenʃi tʃvens xvedrs 
ratʰa tʰkʰvens ikʰitʰatsʰ vaxarotʰ da ar vikvexnidetʰ imitʰ ratsʰ ukve ɡamzadebulia sxvatʰa xvedrʃi 
vintsʰ ikvexnis upʰlitʰ daikvexos 
vinaidan is ki ar aris motsonebuli vintsʰ tʰavs ikʰebs aramed visatsʰ upʰali akʰebs 
o netav odnav maintsʰ ʃeitsqnarebdetʰ tʃems sisuleles tʰumtsʰa mitsqnarebtʰ kidetsʰ 
vinaidan tʰavɡamodebuli var tʰkʰvens mimartʰ ɣvtʰiuri tʰavɡamodebitʰ radɡan daɡtsindetʰ tʰkʰven ertʰ katsʰze ratʰa tsmida kʰaltsulad tsarɡadɡinotʰ kʰristes tsinaʃe 
maɡram vʃiʃob rom roɡortsʰ ɡvelma tʰavisi mzakvrobitʰ atsʰduna eva aseve ar ɡairqvnes tʰkʰveni azrovneba da ar ɡardaxdetʰ sitsrpʰelesa da sitsmides kʰristeʃi 
vinaidan tʰu mova vinme da ɡikʰadaɡebtʰ sxva iesos romelitsʰ tʃven ar ɡvikʰadaɡia anda rom miiɣotʰ sxva suli romelitsʰ ar miɡiɣiatʰ an sxva saxareba romelitsʰ ar miɡiɣiatʰ maʃin tʰkʰven metismetad ʃemtsqnarebelni ikʰneboditʰ 
radɡan vpʰikʰrob arapʰerʃi tʃamovuvardebi aɣmatebul motsʰikʰulebs 
da tʰumtsʰa sitqvitʰ umetsʰari var ara tsʰodnitʰ maintsʰ qvelapʰerʃi ɡatsʰxadebulni vartʰ tʰkʰventʰvis 
anda nutʰu tsʰodva tʃavidine tʰavis damdablebitʰ ratʰa tʰkʰven amaɣlebuliqavitʰ radɡan usasqidlod ɡaxarebditʰ ɣvtʰis saxarebas 
sxva eklesiebs vartʰmevdi viɣebdi matʰɡan kʰiras ratʰa tʰkʰven moɡmsaxureboditʰ xolo rotsʰa tʰkʰventʰan viqavi da maklda kidetsʰ aravin ʃemitsuxebia 
vinaidan tʃems naklulebas avsebdnen makedoniidan mosuli dzmebi da qvelapʰerʃi vtsʰdilobdi tvirtʰad ar daɡtsoloditʰ tʰkʰven da kvlavatsʰ vetsʰdebi 
kʰristes ceʃmaritebitʰ romelitsʰ tʃemʃia ɡeubnebitʰ rom es sikʰaduli ar tsamertʰmeva akʰaiis mxareebʃi 
ratom ɡana imitom rom ar miqvarxartʰ ɣmertʰma utsqis 
maɡram rasatsʰ vaketʰeb imasve ɡavaketʰeb ratʰa sababi movkvetʰo matʰ vintsʰ sababs edzebs ratʰa isini tʃvenistʰanani aɣmotʃndnen imaʃi ritʰatsʰ ikvexnian 
vinaidan asetʰebi arian tsʰru motsʰikʰulni mzakvari muʃakni kʰristes motsʰikʰulebad ɡardasaxulni 
da ar aris sakvirveli radɡan tʰvitʰ satanatsʰ xom natʰlis anɡelozad ɡardaisaxeba 
amitom didi ambavi ar aris tʰu misi msaxurnitsʰ simartʰlis msaxurebad ɡardaisaxebian maɡram matʰi bolo matʰi sakʰmetʰamebr ikʰneba 
kvlavatsʰ vitqvi nuravin tʃamtʰvlis uɡunurad da tʰu ara ise maintsʰ mimiɣetʰ roɡortsʰ uɡunuri ratʰa mtsʰireodenitʰ metsʰ vikvexno 
rasatsʰ vambob upʰlis mixedvitʰ ki ar vambob asetʰ tʰavdadʒerebul kvexnaze aramed tʰitʰkʰos uɡunurebitʰ 
raki bevri ikvexnis xortsʰielad amitom metsʰ davikvexi 
vinaidan tʰkʰven ɡonierni xalisitʰ itsqnarebtʰ uɡunurebs 
radɡan itsqnarebtʰ tʰu vinme daɡimonebtʰ tʰu vinme ʃeɡsanslavtʰ tʰu vinme daɡipqrobtʰ tʰu vinme ɡaqoqotʃdeba tʰu vinme saxeʃi ɡtsʰemtʰ 
ʃesartsʰxvenad vambob amas tʰitʰkʰos davudzlurditʰ maɡram tʰu vinme ɡakadnierdeba da raimetʰi daikvexnis uɡunurebitʰ vitqvi amas metsʰ ɡavkadnierdebi 
isini ebraelebi arian metsʰ israelianebi arian metsʰ abraamis tʰeslni arian metsʰ 
kʰristes msaxurni arian uɡunurivitʰ vambob me upʰro metad upʰro metad ʃromaʃi bevrad upʰro metad tandʒvaʃi upʰro metad sapqrobileʃi da mravalɡzis sikvdilis piras 
xutʰdʒer miviɣe iudeveltʰaɡan ormotsʰze ertʰitʰ naklebi dartqma 
samdʒer kvertʰxitʰ mtsʰemes ertʰxel tʃamkʰoles da samdʒer ɡemis msxvreva ɡanvitsʰade ɣame da dɣe ʃua zɣvaʃi davqavi 
mravaldʒer moɡzaurobebʃi ɡansatsʰdelʃi mdinareebze ɡansatsʰdelʃi qatʃaɣebisaɡan ɡansatsʰdelʃi tʰanatomeltʰaɡan ɡansatsʰdelʃi tsarmartʰtʰaɡan ɡansatsʰdelʃi kʰalakʰad ɡansatsʰdelʃi udabnod ɡansatsʰdelʃi zɣvaze ɡansatsʰdelʃi tsʰru dzmatʰa ʃoris 
ʃromasa da ɡacirvebaʃi ɡamudmebul sipʰxizleʃi ʃimʃilsa da tsqurvilʃi ɡamudmebul marxulobaʃi qinvasa da siʃiʃvleʃi 
kidev ɡarda sxvatʰa dɣitʰi dɣe rom mixdeba zrunva qvela eklesiaze 
vinme daudzlurda da me ar davudzlurdi vinme dabrkolda da me ar aventʰe 
tʰu dasakvexnia tʃemi udzlurebitʰ davikvexni 
ɣmertʰma tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes mamam kurtʰxeulma ukunitʰi ukunisamde utsqis rom ar vtsʰruob 
damaskoʃi mepʰe aretas olkʰis ɡanmɡebeli daradʒobda damaskeltʰa kʰalakʰs ratʰa ʃevepqari 
sarkmlidan ɡadmomiʃves ɡodritʰ kedelze da xelidan davusxlti mas 
martʰlatsʰ sasarɡeblo ar aris tʃemtʰvis kvexna vinaidan mival upʰlis xilvebtʰan da ɡamotsʰxadebebtʰan 
vitsʰi katsʰi kʰristeʃi romelitsʰ tʰotʰxmeti tslis tsinatʰ ar vitsʰi sxeulʃi ar vitsʰi sxeulis ɡaretʰ ɣmertʰma itsʰis atatsʰebul ikʰna mesame tsʰamde 
vitsʰi asetʰ katsʰze sxeulʃi iqo tʰu sxeulis ɡareʃe ar vitsʰi ɣmertʰma itsʰis 
rom is atatsʰebul ikʰna samotʰxeʃi da ismenda ɡamoutʰkʰmel sitqvebs romeltʰa ɡamotʰkʰma nebadartʰuli ara akʰvs adamians 
asetʰi katsʰitʰ davikvexni tʃemi tʰavitʰ ki ar davikvexni mxolod tʃemi udzlurebebitʰ 
xolo tʰu movisurveb davikvexno uɡunuri ar vikʰnebi vinaidan ceʃmaritebas vitqvi maɡram tʰavs vikaveb ratʰa aravin tʃamtʰvalos imaze metad rasatsʰ tʃemʃi xedavs an tʃemɡan ismens 
ratʰa ar ɡavmedidurde metismeti ɡamotsʰxadebebitʰ ekali mometsʰa sxeulʃi satanis anɡelozi rom damkʰedʒnos ratʰa ar ɡavmedidurde 
samdʒer ʃevevedre upʰals rom ɡanmaʃoros iɡi 
da mitʰxra ɡeqopʰa tʃemi madli vinaidan udzlurebaʃi xdeba srulqopʰili tʃemi dzala amitom upʰro xalisitʰ davikvexni tʃemi udzlurebebitʰ ratʰa kʰristes dzala damkvidrdes tʃemʃi 
amitom kmaqopʰili var udzlurebaʃi ʃeuratsʰxqopʰaʃi ɡacirvebaʃi devnaʃi da ʃevitsroebaʃi kʰristes ɡulisatʰvis vinaidan rotsʰa udzluri var maʃin var dzlieri 
uɡunuri ʃevikʰeni raki vikvexni tʰkʰven maidzuletʰ tʰkʰven ɡevalebodatʰ tʃemi kʰeba vinaidan arapʰritʰ var aɣmatebul motsʰikʰulebze naklebi tʰumtsʰa arapʰeri var 
motsʰikʰulis niʃnebi amokʰmedda tʰkʰven ʃoris qovelɡvari motʰminebitʰ niʃnebitʰ sastsaulebitʰ da dzalebitʰ 
vinaidan ra ɡakliatʰ sxva eklesiebtʰan ʃedarebitʰ ɡarda imisa rom me ar daɡatsekʰitʰ mdzime tvirtʰad mapatietʰ es danaʃauli 
aha me mzad var mesamed movide tʰkʰventʰan da ar daɡatsvebitʰ mdzime tvirtʰad vinaidan me tʰkʰven ɡedzebtʰ da ara tʰkʰvensas radɡan ʃvilebi ki ar unda aɡrovebdnen simdidres mʃoblebisatʰvis aramed mʃoblebi ʃvilebisatʰvis 
xolo me xalisitʰ davixardʒebi da ɡamovipʰitebi tʰkʰveni sulebisatʰvis tʰumtsʰa miuxedavad tʃemi tʰkʰvendami didi siqvarulisa naklebad ɡiqvarvartʰ 
maɡram tʰu asea da me ar daɡimdzimditʰ tʰkʰven ikʰneb roɡortsʰ matquaram mzakvrobitʰ tsarɡitatsʰetʰ 
an vedziebdi anɡarebas vinmes meʃveobitʰ romelitsʰ tʰkʰventʰan ɡamovɡzavne 
me vtʰxove tites da mastʰan ertʰad ɡamovɡzavne ertʰ ertʰi dzma ɡana ɡamoɡiqenatʰ tʰkʰven titem ertʰi sulitʰ ar davdioditʰ ertʰi ɡzitʰ ar davdioditʰ 
kidev xom ar pʰikʰrobtʰ rom tʰavs vimartʰlebditʰ tʰkʰventʰan ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe vlaparakobtʰ kʰristeʃi da qovelive es saqvarelno tʰkʰvens aɣsaʃenebladaa 
vinaidan vʃiʃob rom rotsʰa moval ɡipovitʰ tʰkʰven ara isetʰebs roɡortsʰ me msurs da tʰkʰventsʰ mipovitʰ isetʰs roɡortsʰ ar ɡsurtʰ ratʰa ar iqos tʰkʰvenʃi ʃuɣli ʃuri mdzvinvareba davidaraba tsʰilistsameba enatanioba ɡulzvaoba da ʃpʰotʰi 
ratʰa rotsʰa kvlav moval ar damamdablos tʃemma ɣmertʰma tʰkʰventʰan da ar viɡlovo mravalni romeltʰatsʰ adre ʃestsʰodes da ar moinanies utsmidureba sidzva da ɡarqvnileba rasatsʰ stʃadiodnen 
es mesamed movdivar tʰkʰventʰan ori motsmis an sami motsmis piritʰ damtkitsʰdeba qoveli sitqva 
me tsinastsar veubnebodi da axlatsʰ veubnebi roɡortsʰ tʰkʰventʰan meored qopʰnisas ise axlatsʰ arqopʰnisas matʰ vintsʰ adre ʃestsʰoda da qvela sxvas rom tʰu kvlav moval aravis davindob 
raki tʰkʰven edzebtʰ imis mtkitsʰebas laparakobs tʃemʃi tʰu ara kʰriste romelitsʰ udzluri ar aris tʰkʰventʰvis aramed dzlieria tʰkʰvenʃi 
vinaidan tʰumtsʰa udzlurebisɡan iqo dʒvartsʰmuli maɡram tsʰotsʰxalia ɣvtʰis dzalisɡan da tʃventsʰ udzlurni vartʰ masʃi maɡram vitsʰotsʰxlebtʰ mastʰan ertʰad ɣvtʰis dzalisɡan tʰkʰventʰvis 
sakutʰari tʰavi ɡamostsʰadetʰ tʰu xartʰ rətsmenaʃi sakutʰari tʰavi ɡamoarkvietʰ nutʰu ar itsʰnobtʰ sakutʰar tʰavs rom tʰkʰvenʃia ieso kʰriste tʰu ara da maʃ ɡamotsʰdas ver udzlebtʰ 
maɡram vimedovneb tʃvenze ki ɡaiɡebtʰ rom ara vartʰ ɡamoutsʰdelni 
vlotsʰulobtʰ ɣvtʰisadmi rom aravitʰari boroteba ar tʃaidinotʰ ara imisatʰvis rom tʃven ɡamotsʰdilni ɡamovtʃndetʰ aramed ratʰa siketʰes aketʰebdetʰ tʃven ki tʰundatsʰ ɡamoutsʰdelni viqotʰ 
vinaidan arapʰris ɡaketʰeba dzalɡvidzs ceʃmaritebis tsinaaɣmdeɡ aramed ceʃmaritebisatʰvis 
radɡan ɡvixaria rotsʰa tʃven udzlurni vartʰ tʰkʰven ki dzlierni amaze vlotsʰulobtʰ kidetsʰ tʰkʰvens srulqopʰaze 
amitom vtser amas ʃoridan ratʰa mosvlisas ar movikʰtsʰe mkatsʰrad im dzalaupʰlebisamebr romelitsʰ upʰalma momtsʰa aɣsaʃeneblad da ara dasanɡrevad 
maʃ dzmebo ixaretʰ da ɡanmtkitsʰditʰ tʰavi inuɡeʃetʰ da iqavitʰ ertʰsulovanni mʃvidobianni da siqvarulisa da mʃvidobis ɣmertʰi tʰkʰventʰan ikʰneba 
moikitʰxetʰ ertʰmanetʰi tsmida amboritʰ moɡikitʰxavtʰ qvela tsmida 
madli upʰlisa ieso kʰristesi siqvaruli ɣvtʰisa da tʰanaziareba sulitsmidisa iqos qvelastʰan tʰkʰventʰan amin 
pavle motsʰikʰuli ara katsʰtʰaɡan da artsʰ katsʰis mier aramed ieso kʰristes da mama ɣvtʰis mier romelmatsʰ mkvdretʰitʰ aɣadɡina iɡi 
da tʃemtʰan mqopʰi qvela dzma ɡalatiis eklesiebs 
madli tʰkʰven da mʃvidoba tʃemi mama ɣmertʰisa da upʰal ieso kʰristesaɡan 
romelmatsʰ tʰavisi tʰavi ɡadastsʰa tʃveni tsʰodvebisatʰvis ratʰa vexsenitʰ axlandeli boroti saukunisaɡan tʃveni mama ɣvtʰis nebitʰ 
romelsatsʰ ekutʰvnis dideba ukunitʰi ukunisamde amin 
mikvirs rom ase male ɡadadixartʰ sxva saxarebaze imisɡan romelmatsʰ moɡitsodatʰ kʰristes madlitʰ 
ar arsebobs sxva maɡram arseboben adamianebi romeltʰatsʰ areuloba ʃeakʰvtʰ tʰkʰvenʃi da surtʰ daamaxindʒon kʰristes saxareba 
maɡram tʰundatsʰ tʃven an anɡelozma zetsʰidan ɡaxarotʰ ara is rasatsʰ tʃven ɡaxarebditʰ ʃetʃvenebuli iqos iɡi 
roɡortsʰ ukve vtʰkʰvitʰ axla kvlav vambob tʰu vinmem ɡaxarotʰ tʰkʰven ara is ratsʰ miiɣetʰ ʃetʃvenebuli iqos 
axla adamianebs vartsmuneb tʰu ɣmertʰs an ikʰneb vtsʰdilob adamianebs vaamo akʰamde isev adamianebs rom vaamebde kʰristes mona aɣar vikʰnebodi 
xolo ɡautsqebtʰ tʰkʰven dzmebo rom saxareba romelsatsʰ vaxarebdi ar aris katsʰtʰmieri 
vinaidan metsʰ ar mimiɣia da ar mistsavlia iɡi katsʰisaɡan aramed ieso kʰristes ɡamotsʰxadebitʰ 
radɡan ɡsmeniatʰ tʰkʰven tʃemi tsinandeli mimosvla iudevelobaʃi rom me sastikad vdevnidi ɣvtʰis eklesias da varbevdi mas 
aɣvematebodi iudevelobaʃi mraval tʃems tols tʃems tomʃi vinaidan tʃemi mamebis ɡadmotsʰemebis moʃurne viqavi metismetad 
xolo rotsʰa ketʰilineba ɣmertʰma romelmatsʰ ɡamomartʃia dedis saʃodan da momitsoda tʰavisi madlitʰ 
ɡamoetsʰxadebina tʃemʃi tʰavisi dze rom mexarebina iɡi tsarmartʰtʰatʰvis mqisve rodi davetʰatʰbire xortsʰsa da sisxls 
artsʰ ierusalimʃi avsulvar tʃems tsinamorbed motsʰikʰulebtʰan aramed arabetʰʃi tsavedi da kvlav davbrundi damaskos 
mere sami tslis ʃemdeɡ avedi ierusalimʃi petres sanaxavad da tʰxutʰmeti dɣe davqavi mastʰan 
sxva motsʰikʰultʰaɡan aravin minaxavs ɡarda upʰlis dzmis iakobisa 
xolo rasatsʰ me tʰkʰven ɡtsertʰ martʰalia da ar vtsʰruob ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
amis ʃemdeɡ tsavedi siriisa da kilikiis kʰveqnebʃi 
maɡram iudeaʃi kʰristes eklesiebisatʰvis piradad ar viqavi tsʰnobili 
mxolod is ɡaeɡonatʰ rom katsʰi romelitsʰ odesɣatsʰ ɡvdevnida axla axarebs im sartsmuneobas romelsatsʰ tsinatʰ ebrdzodao 
da adidebdnen ɣmertʰs tʃems ɡamo 
mere tʰotʰxmeti tslis ʃemdeɡ kvlav avedi ierusalimʃi barnabastʰan ertʰad titetsʰ tʰan tsaviqvane 
avedi ikʰ ɡamotsʰxadebitʰ da tsarvudɡine matʰ saxareba romelsatsʰ vkʰadaɡebdi tsarmartʰebs ʃoris ɡansakutʰrebitʰ tsarvudɡine iɡi tsartʃinebulebs amaod xom ar davrbivar an davrbodi 
maɡram tʃemtʰan mqopʰi titetsʰ ki tʰumtsʰa is berdzeni iqo ar aidzules rom tsinadaetsʰvitʰa 
xolo tsʰru dzmebs romlebitsʰ ʃemoiparnen rom etʰvaltʰvalatʰ tʃveni tʰavisupʰlebisatʰvis romelitsʰ ɡvakʰvs ieso kʰristeʃi ratʰa davemonebinetʰ 
ertʰi saatʰitsʰ ki ar davutʰmetʰ da ar davemortʃiletʰ ratʰa saxarebis ceʃmariteba datsʰuliqo tʰkʰvenʃi 
xolo ratsʰ ʃeexeba matʰ vintsʰ ramed tʃanan roɡorebitsʰ ar unda iqvnen isini tʃemtʰvis sul ertʰia ɣmertʰi ɡareɡnobis mixedvitʰ ar ɡansdʒis am xalxs meti arapʰeri daukisrebia tʃemtʰvis 
pirikʰitʰ rotsʰa dainaxes rom me mondobili makʰvs xareba tsinadautsʰvetʰeltʰatʰvis iseve roɡortsʰ petres tsinadatsʰvetʰiltʰatʰvis 
vinaidan is vintsʰ petrestʰan iɣtsvoda tsinadatsʰvetʰilebtʰan motsʰikʰulobaʃi tʃemtʰanatsʰ iɣtsvoda tsarmartʰebtʰan motsʰikʰulobaʃi 
da rotsʰa tʃemtʰvis motsʰemuli madlis ʃesaxeb ʃeitqves iakobma kepʰam da ioanem romelnitsʰ svetebad itʰvlebian ɡamoɡvitsodes me da barnabas tʰanaziarebis mardʒvena rom tʃven tsarmartʰebtʰan tsavsuliqavitʰ isini ki tsinadatsʰvetʰilebtʰan 
oɣond unda ɡvxsomeboda ɣatakebi da metsʰ amis ketʰebis moʃurne viqavi 
rotsʰa kepʰa antiokʰiaʃi movida me tsin aɣvudekʰi mas sadʒarod vinaidan masze satʃivari iqo 
vinaidan vidre zoɡiertʰebi movidodnen iakobisɡan tsarmartʰebtʰan ertʰad camda xolo matʰi mosvlistʰanave daitsqo tʃamoʃoreba da ɡanze ɡadɡoma tsinadatsʰvetʰiltʰa riditʰ 
mastʰan ertʰad pirpʰerobdnen sxva iudevelebitsʰ ise rom barnabatsʰ ki tʃaitʰria matʰma pirpʰerobam 
maɡram rotsʰa davinaxe rom isini stsorad ar mihqvebian saxarebis ceʃmaritebas qvelas tʰandastsrebitʰ vutʰxari kepʰas tʰu ʃen iudeveli tsarmartʰivitʰ tsʰxovrob da ara iudevelivitʰ aba tsarmartʰebs raɣad aidzuleb metʰkʰi rom ɡaiudeveldnen 
tʃven bunebitʰ iudevelni vartʰ da ara tsʰodvilni tsarmartʰtʰaɡan 
maɡram raki ʃevitqvetʰ rom adamiani ɡamartʰldeba ara rdʒulis sakʰmeebitʰ aramed ieso kʰristeʃi rətsmenitʰ tʃventsʰ virtsmunetʰ ieso kʰriste ratʰa ɡavmartʰldetʰ kʰristeʃi rətsmenitʰ da ara rdʒulis sakʰmeebitʰ vinaidan rdʒulis sakʰmeebitʰ vera xortsʰieli ver ɡamartʰldeba 
xolo tʰu kʰristeʃi ɡamartʰlebis mdzebnelni tsʰodvilni aɣmovtʃnditʰ ɡana kʰriste tsʰodvis msaxuria aramtsʰ da aramtsʰ 
vinaidan tʰu me kvlav vaʃeneb ratsʰ davanɡrie amitʰ tʃems tʰavs damnaʃaved vxdi 
me rdʒulitʰ movkvdi rdʒulisatʰvis ratʰa ɣvtʰisatʰvis vitsʰotsʰxlo me kʰristestʰan ertʰad var dʒvartsʰmuli 
me ukve aɣar vtsʰotsʰxlob aramed kʰriste tsʰotsʰxlobs tʃemʃi axla rom xortsʰielad vtsʰotsʰxlob rətsmenitʰ vtsʰotsʰxlob ɣvtʰis dzeʃi romelmatsʰ ʃemiqvara da tʰavi ɡadastsʰa tʃemtʰvis 
ar uɡulebelvqopʰ ɣvtʰis madls vinaidan tʰu rdʒulitʰaa simartʰle aba amaod momkvdara kʰriste 
hoi uɡunuro ɡalatelebo vin moɡadʒadovatʰ tʰkʰven rom ar damortʃileboditʰ ceʃmaritebas tʰkʰven romeltʰa tʰvaltsin aɣitsera tsʰxadad ieso kʰristes dʒvartsʰma 
mxolod es msurs vitsʰode tʰkʰvenɡan rdʒulis sakʰmeebitʰ miiɣetʰ suli tʰu rətsmenis ʃesmenitʰ 
nutʰu imdenad uɡunurni xartʰ rom sulitʰ daitsqetʰ da axla xortsʰitʰ amtʰavrebtʰ 
amaod itandʒetʰ amdeni neta martʰla amaod 
vintsʰ suli moɡtsʰatʰ tʰkʰven da tʰkʰvens ʃoris sastsaulebs axdenda rdʒulis sakʰmeebitʰ aketʰebda amas tʰu rətsmenis ʃesmenitʰ 
rotsʰa ɣmertʰi irtsmuna abraamma es simartʰled tʃaetʰvala mas 
amitom ɡaiɡetʰ rom vintsʰ rətsmenisaɡan arian abraamis ʃvilebi arian 
tserilma rotsʰa tsinastsar ɡancvrita rom ɣmertʰi rətsmenitʰ ɡaamartʰlebs tsarmartʰebs tsinastsar axara abraams da ikurtʰxeba ʃenʃi qvela eri 
amitom isini vintsʰ rətsmenisaɡan arian mortsmune abraamtʰan ertʰad ikurtʰxebian 
vinaidan qvelani vintsʰ rdʒulis sakʰmetʰaɡan arian tsqevlis kʰveʃ imqopʰebian vinaidan datserilia tsqeulia qoveli vintsʰ ar ʃeasrulebs qovelives ratsʰ rdʒulis tsiɡnʃia datserili ratʰa qvelapʰeri ʃeasrulos 
tsʰxadia rom rdʒulitʰ veravin ɡamartʰldeba ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe vinaidan martʰali rətsmenitʰ itsʰotsʰxlebs 
xolo rdʒuli rətsmenitʰ ar aris maɡram vintsʰ mas ʃeasrulebs misitʰ itsʰotsʰxlebs 
kʰristem ɡamoɡvisqida rdʒulis tsqevlisaɡan da ɡaxda tsqeuli tʃvens natsʰvlad vinaidan datserilia tsqeulia qoveli dakidebuli dzelze 
ratʰa abraamis kurtʰxeva kʰriste iesos mier iqos tsarmartʰebze rom sulis aɣtʰkʰma miviɣotʰ rətsmenitʰ 
dzmebo adamianurad vambob adamianis mier damtkitsʰebul anderdzsatsʰ ki veravin ukuaɡdebs da vertsʰ verapʰers daumatebs 
xolo abraams etʰkʰva es aɣtʰkʰmani da mis tʰesls ar tʰkʰmula ʃens tʰesltʰ roɡortsʰ mravalze aramed roɡortsʰ ertʰze ʃens tʰesls romelitsʰ aris kʰriste 
amas ki vambob rom ɣvtʰis mier tsinatʰ damtkitsʰebul aɣtʰkʰmas otʰxas otsʰdaatʰi tslis ʃemdeɡ mosuli rdʒuli ver daarɣvevs ise rom aɣtʰkʰmuli ɡaukʰmdes 
vinaidan tʰuki rdʒulitʰaa memkvidreoba maʃin aɣaraa aɣtʰkʰmitʰ abraams ɣmertʰma aɣtʰkʰmitʰ mihmadla 
aba rdʒuli raɣaa danaʃaultʰa ɡamo mietsʰa rdʒuli vidre movidoda tʰesli romlisadmitsʰaa aɣtʰkʰma da ɡadaetsʰa iɡi anɡeloztʰa mier ʃuamavlis xelitʰ 
ertʰis ʃuamavali ar arsebobs xolo ɣmertʰi ertʰia 
aba rdʒuli etsinaaɣmdeɡeba ɣvtʰis aɣtʰkʰmebs aramtsʰ da aramtsʰ vinaidan tʰu motsʰemuli iqo rdʒuli romelsatsʰ dzaludzs tsʰxovelmqopʰeloba maʃin namdvilad ikʰneboda simartʰle rdʒulis mier 
maɡram tserilma qvela moamtsqvdia tsʰodvis kʰveʃ ratʰa mortsmuneebs ieso kʰristes rətsmenitʰ mistsʰemodatʰ aɣtʰkʰmuli 
rətsmenis mosvlamde ki momtsqvdeulebi viqavitʰ rdʒulis metʰvalqureobis kʰveʃ vidre rətsmena ɡamotʃndeboda 
amriɡad rdʒuli iqo tʃveni tsarmmartʰveli kʰristesaken ratʰa ɡavmartʰlebuliqavitʰ rətsmenitʰ 
maɡram rotsʰa rətsmena ukve movida tsarmmartʰvelis xelkʰveitʰ aɣar vimqopʰebitʰ 
vinaidan tʰkʰven qvelani ɣvtʰis ʃvilebi xartʰ kʰriste iesoʃi rətsmenitʰ 
vinaidan raki qvela moinatʰletʰ kʰristeʃi kʰristeʃi ʃeimosenitʰ 
ukve aɣar arsebobs artsʰ iudeveli da artsʰ berdzeni artsʰ mona da artsʰ tʰavisupʰali artsʰ mamri da artsʰ mdedri vinaidan tʰkʰven qvelani ertʰi xartʰ kʰriste iesoʃi 
da tʰu kʰristesni xartʰ maʃ abraamis tʰesli xartʰ da aɣtʰkʰmitʰ memkvidreni 
vambob memkvidre metʰkʰi maɡram vidre is qrmaa arapʰritʰ ar ɡanirtʃeva monisaɡan tʰumtsʰa qovlis patronia 
aramed meurvetʰa da mnetʰa xelkʰveitʰ imqopʰeba iɡi mamamisis mier daniʃnul vadamde 
aseve tʃventsʰ vidre qrmani viqavitʰ damonebulni vqavditʰ am sopʰlis tsesebs 
da rotsʰa movida sisavse ʒamsa moavlina ɣmertʰma tʰavisi dze romelitsʰ dedakatsʰisaɡan iʃva da daemortʃila iɡi rdʒuls 
rdʒulis kʰveʃ mqopʰtʰa ɡamosasqidad ratʰa miɡveɣo ʃviloba 
da rakiɣa tʰkʰven ʃvilebi xartʰ ɣmertʰma moavlina tʰkʰvens ɡulebʃi tʰavisi dzis suli romelitsʰ ʃesdzaxis abba mamao 
amitom ʃen ukve aɣar xar mona aramed dze xolo tʰu dze memkvidretsʰa xar ɣvtʰis mier 
xolo maʃin rotsʰa ar itsʰnobditʰ ɣmertʰs emsaxureboditʰ matʰ romlebitsʰ bunebitʰ ɣmertʰebi ar arian 
axla ki rotsʰa ɣmertʰi itsʰanitʰ upʰro metitsʰ rotsʰa ɣmertʰma ɡitsʰnotʰ roɡorɣa ubrundebitʰ udzlur da ɣatak tsesebs da ɡindatʰ xelaxla daemonotʰ matʰ 
dɣeebs itsʰavtʰ tʰkʰven da tʰveebs vadebsa da tselitsadebs 
vʃiʃob amaod xom ar ɡavisardʒe tʰkʰvens ʃoris 
iqavitʰ tʃemistʰanebi vinaidan metsʰ tʰkʰvenistʰana var dzmebo ɡevedrebitʰ tsʰudi arapʰeri ɡaɡiketʰebiatʰ tʃemtʰvis 
es itsʰitʰ rom xortsʰis udzlurebitʰ ɡaxaretʰ tʰkʰven pirvelad 
tʰkʰven ki ar ʃeidzuletʰ da artsʰ uɡulebelqavitʰ tʃemi ɡansatsʰdeli xortsʰielad aramed mimiɣetʰ roɡortsʰ ɣvtʰis anɡelozi roɡortsʰ kʰriste ieso 
sad aris tʰkʰveni maʃindeli netareba vmotsmob tʰkʰvenze rom ʃeɡdzlebodatʰ tʰvalebs amoitʰxriditʰ da me momtsʰemditʰ 
maʃ nutʰu tʰkʰveni mteri ɡavxdi ceʃmaritebas rom ɡelaparakebitʰ 
ketʰilad rodi moʃurneoben tʰkʰventʰvis aramed surtʰ tʰkʰveni datsʰileba tʃvenɡan ratʰa tʰkʰven tʰavi ɡamoidotʰ matʰtʰvis 
karɡia sasiketʰod moʃurneoba qoveltʰvis da ara mxolod tʰkʰventʰan tʃemi qopʰnisas 
tʃemo ʃvilebo romeltʰatʰvisatsʰ dʒeratsʰ ɡanvitsʰdi mʃobiarobis tkivilebs vidre tʰkʰvenʃi ɡamoisaxeba kʰriste 
mindoda tʰkʰventʰan vqopʰiliqavi da ɡamometsʰvala tʃemi kilo vinaidan ɡaoɡnebuli var tʰkʰvens ɡamo 
mitʰxaritʰ visatsʰ rdʒulis kʰveʃ qopʰna ɡsurtʰ ɡana ar usmentʰ rdʒuls 
vinaidan datserilia rom ori dze hqavda abraams ertʰi mxevlisɡan da meore tʰavisupʰlisɡan 
maɡram romelitsʰ mxevlisɡan iqo is xortsʰielad ʃobili iqo xolo romelitsʰ tʰavisupʰlisɡan aɣtʰkʰmis tʰanaxmad 
amaʃi aris kʰaraɡma es aris ori aɣtʰkʰma ertʰi sinais mtʰidan monobisatʰvis ʃobili romelitsʰ aris aɡari 
vinaidan aɡari aris sinais mtʰa arabetʰʃi da amʒamindel ierusalims ʃeesabameba vinaidan is monobaʃia tʰavis ʃvilebtʰan ertʰad 
xolo zena ierusalimi tʰavisupʰalia is qvela tʃvenɡanis dedaa 
radɡan datserilia ixarebde bertso uʃobelo sixarulitʰ aqiʒindi salmobis ɡanutsʰdelo radɡan mitovebuls meti ʃvilebi eqoleba vidre ɡatʰxovils 
da tʃven dzmebo isakis kvalze aɣtʰkʰmis ʃvilebi vartʰ 
da roɡortsʰ maʃin xortsʰielad ʃobili sdevnida sulitʰ ʃobils asevea axlatsʰ 
maɡram tserili ras ambobs ɡandevne mxevali da misi dze vinaidan mxevlis dze ver daimkvidrebs tʰavisupʰlis dzestʰan ertʰad 
amriɡad dzmebo tʃven mxevlis ʃvilebi ki ar vartʰ aramed tʰavisupʰalisa 
tʰavisupʰlebisatʰvis ɡaɡvatʰavisupʰla kʰristem maʃ idekʰitʰ da nuɣar ʃeudɡebitʰ monobis uɣels 
aha me pavle ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven tʰu tsinadaitsʰvetʰtʰ aravitʰari sarɡebloba ar ɡekʰnebatʰ kʰristesaɡan 
da kidev vumotsmeb qovel adamians romelitsʰ tsinadaitsʰvetʰs rom is valdebulia mtʰeli rdʒuli ʃeasrulos 
tʰkʰven romlebitsʰ rdʒulitʰ imartʰlebtʰ tʰavs ukʰristeod dartʃitʰ da mostsqditʰ madls 
tʃven ki sulitʰ velitʰ simartʰlis sasos rətsmenisaɡan 
vinaidan kʰristeʃi dzala ara akʰvs artsʰ tsinadatsʰvetʰas artsʰ tsinadautsʰvetʰelobas aramed siqvarulitʰ mokʰmed rətsmenas 
ketʰilad rboditʰ da vin daɡabrkolatʰ rom ar daemortʃilotʰ ceʃmaritebas 
es dartsmuneba imisaɡan ar aris vintsʰ tʰkʰven moɡitsodebtʰ 
mtsʰire sapʰuari mtʰel tsʰoms ɡaapʰuebs 
tʰkʰveni mtsams me upʰalʃi rom ar ipʰikʰrebtʰ sxvanairad xolo tʰkʰveni aɣmaʃpʰotʰebeli vintsʰ unda iqos msdʒavrs itvirtʰavs 
me ki ristʰvis var devnili dzmebo tʰu ki kvlav vkʰadaɡebdi tsinadatsʰvetʰas maʃin dʒvris tsʰduneba ʃetsqdeboda 
o neta ɡanidevnebodnen tʰkʰveni ʃemaʃpʰotʰarni 
xolo tʰkʰven tʰavisupʰlebisatʰvis xartʰ motsodebulni dzmebo oɣond es tʰavisupʰleba ar ɡaxdes sababi xortsʰis saameblad aramed siqvarulitʰ emsaxuretʰ ertʰmanetʰs 
vinaidan mtʰel rdʒuls es ertʰi mtsʰneba moitsʰavs ɡiqvardes moqvasi ʃeni vitʰartsʰa tʰavi ʃeni 
maɡram tʰu kbentʰ da camtʰ ertʰmanetʰs pʰrətʰxilad iqavitʰ ertʰmanetʰi ar mospotʰ 
aha me vambob moikʰetsʰitʰ sulierad da ar aɣasrulebtʰ xortsʰis ɡulistʰkʰmebs 
vinaidan xortsʰs sulis satsinaaɣmdeɡo surs suls ki xortsʰis satsinaaɣmdeɡo ertʰmanetʰs etsinaaɣmdeɡebian ratʰa aketʰotʰ ara is ratsʰ ɡsurtʰ 
da tʰu sulitʰ iarebitʰ rdʒulis kʰveʃ aɣar xartʰ 
xortsʰis sakʰmeebi aʃkaraa es aris sidzva utsmidureba da tʰavaʃvebuleba 
kerptʰmsaxureba misnoba mtroba tʃxubi ʃuri risxva ʃuɣli utʰanxmoebani mtsvalebloba 
sidzulvili mkvleloba lotʰoba ɡaumadzɣroba da sxva asetʰi ɡeubnebitʰ tsinastsar roɡortsʰ adre mitʰkʰvams rom amis tʃamdenni ɣvtʰis sasupʰevels ver daimkvidreben 
xolo sulis naqopʰia siqvaruli sixaruli mʃvidoba sulɡrdzeleba saxiereba siketʰe ertʰɡuleba 
simʃvide tʰavʃekaveba amatʰ tsinaaɣmdeɡ ar aris rdʒuli 
xolo matʰ vintsʰ kʰristesni arian dʒvars atsʰves tʰaviantʰi xortsʰi vnebebtʰan da ɡulistʰkʰmastʰan ertʰad 
tʰu sulitʰ vtsʰotsʰxlobtʰ sulitʰve unda viarotʰ 
nu vikʰnebitʰ pativmoqvareni ertʰmanetʰis ɡamaɣizianebelni da ertʰmanetʰis moʃurneni 
dzmebo tʰu katsʰi raime ʃetsʰodebaʃi tʃavardeba tʰkʰven sulierebma ɡamoastsoretʰ iɡi tʰavmdablobis sulitʰ da ɡapʰrətʰxildi rom ʃentsʰ ar tʃavarde ɡansatsʰdelʃi 
ataretʰ ertʰmanetʰis tvirtʰi da amitʰ aɣasrulebtʰ kʰristes rdʒuls 
vinaidan visatsʰ tʰavisi tʰavi raime hɡonia da arapʰeritsʰ ar aris is tʰavis tʰavs atquebs 
xolo qvelam tʰavisi sakʰme ɡamostsʰados da maʃin ekʰneba sikʰaduli tʰavisitʰ da ara sxvisitʰ 
vinaidan qvelam tʰavisi satarebeli ataros 
sitqvaʃi damodzɣvrili qovelive siketʰes uziarebdes dammodzɣvrels 
nu motquvdebitʰ ɣmertʰi ar ʃeuratsʰxqopʰs vinaidan rasatsʰ datʰesavs katsʰi imas moimkis 
vintsʰ tʰavis xortsʰistʰvis tʰesavs xortsʰisɡan moimkis xrətsnilebas xolo vintsʰ sulistʰvis tʰesavs sulisɡan moimkis saukuno sitsʰotsʰxles 
siketʰis ketʰeba nu moɡvetsqineba radɡan tʰavis droze movimkitʰ tʰu ar movdundebitʰ 
maʃ vidre dro ɡvakʰvs siketʰe vaketʰotʰ qvelam da upʰro metad matʰ vintsʰ tʃveniania rətsmenitʰ 
naxetʰ ramxela tserili moɡtseretʰ tʃemi xelitʰ 
xortsʰitʰ ɡandidebis msurvelebi ɡaidzuleben tsinadatsʰvetʰas mxolod imitom rom kʰristes dʒvristʰvis ar idevnebodnen 
vinaidan tʰvitʰ tsinadatsʰvetʰilebitsʰ ar itsʰaven rdʒuls oɣond undatʰ rom tsinadaitsʰvitʰotʰ ratʰa tʰkʰveni xortsʰitʰ daikvexon 
me ki tʰu davikvexo mxolod tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes dʒvritʰ romlitʰatsʰ sopʰelia dʒvartsʰmuli tʃemtʰvis da me sopʰlistʰvis 
vinaidan kʰriste iesoʃi arapʰers niʃnavs artsʰ tsinadatsʰvetʰa da artsʰ tsinadautsʰvetʰeloba aramed mxolod axali kʰmnileba 
vintsʰ am tsesis mixedvitʰ moikʰtsʰevian mʃvidoba da tsqaloba matʰze da ɣvtʰis israelze 
amieridan nuɣaravin ʃematsuxebs radɡan upʰal iesos tsqlulebs vatareb tʃemi sxeulitʰ 
tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes madli tʰkʰvens sultʰan dzmebo amin 
pavle ɣvtʰis nebitʰ ieso kʰristes motsʰikʰuli epʰesoʃi mqopʰ tsmidatʰ da mortsmunetʰ ieso kʰristeʃi 
madli da mʃvidoba tʃveni mama ɣmertʰisa da upʰal ieso kʰristesaɡan 
kurtʰxeulia tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes ɣmertʰi da mama romelmatsʰ ɡvakurtʰxa kʰristeʃi qovelɡvari sulieri kurtʰxevitʰ tsʰatʰa ʃina 
roɡortsʰ amoɡvartʃia tʃven masʃi sopʰlis ʃekʰmnamde ratʰa tsmidani da ubitsoni vqopʰiliqavitʰ mis tsinaʃe siqvarulitʰ 
tsinastsar ɡansazɣvra tʃveni ʃvileba ieso kʰristes meʃveobitʰ tʰavisi nebisamebr 
tʰavisi madlis didebis sakʰebrad romlitʰatsʰ moɡvmadla tʰavis saqvarelʃi 
romlis mier ɡvakʰvs ɡamosqidva misi sisxlitʰ tsʰodvebis moteveba misive madlis simdidritʰ 
romelitsʰ uxvad moɡvtsʰa qovelɡvari sibrədznitʰ da ɡonebitʰ 
raki ɡvautsqa tʰavisi nebis saidumlo tʰavisive survilitʰ romelitsʰ tsinastsar ɡanizraxa masʃi 
samneod ʒamtʰa aɣvsebisa ratʰa kʰristeʃi moiqaros tʰavi qovelivem ratsʰ tsʰaʃia da ratsʰ mitsazea 
masʃi artʃeulni vikʰenitʰ kidetsʰ memkvidreebad ristʰvisatsʰ tsinastsar ɡansazɣvruli viqavitʰ misi ɡanzraxvitʰ vintsʰ qovelives ikʰms tʰavisi nebitʰ 
ratʰa viqotʰ misi didebis sakʰebad tʃven romeltʰatsʰ tsinastsar ɡvkʰonda kʰristes imedi 
masʃi xartʰ tʰkʰventsʰ vintsʰ moisminetʰ ceʃmaritebis sitqva tʰkʰveni xsnis saxareba itsametʰ iɡi da daibecdetʰ sulitsmidis mier aɣtʰkʰmuli 
romelitsʰ tʃveni memkvidreobis satsindaria sakutʰrebis ɡamosasqidad misi didebis sakʰebrad 
amitom metsʰ rotsʰa movismine tʰkʰveni rətsmena upʰal iesoʃi da tʰkʰveni siqvaruli qvela tsmidis mimartʰ 
ar vtsqvet ɣvtʰisadmi madlobas tʰkʰventʰvis ɡixsenebtʰ tʃems lotsʰvebʃi 
ratʰa moɡtsʰetʰ tʰkʰven tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes ɣmertʰma didebis mamam sibrədznisa da ɡamotsʰxadebis suli mis ʃesatsʰnobad 
da ɡaanatʰlos tʰkʰveni ɡulis tʰvalebi ratʰa itsʰodetʰ ra aris misi motsodebis imedi da roɡoria misi didebuli memkvidreobis simdidre tsmidatʰatʰvis 
da ra ɡanuzomelia misi dzalis sidiade tʃvenʃi romeltʰatsʰ sakʰmitʰ ɡvtsams misi dzalis dzliereba 
romlitʰatsʰ man imokʰmeda kʰristeʃi mkvdretʰitʰ aɣadɡina ra iɡi da tʰavis mardʒvniv dasva zetsʰaʃi 
qvela mtʰavrobaze xelmtsipʰebaze dzalze upʰlebaze da qovelive saxelze maɣla ratsʰ ki itsodeba ara marto am saukuneʃi aramed momavalʃitsʰ 
da qovelive daumortʃila mis pʰerxtʰa kʰveʃ da daadɡina iɡi qvelapʰerze tʰavad eklesiisa 
romelitsʰ misi sxeulia sisavse aɣmavseblisa qovelivesi qoveliveʃi 
da tʰkʰventsʰ mkvdrebi rom iqavitʰ tʰkʰveni danaʃaulitʰ da tsʰodvebitʰ 
romlebitʰatsʰ odesɣatsʰ iareboditʰ am sopʰlis ʒamisamebr haeris dzaltʰa mtʰavris im sulis nebitʰ amʒamad urtʃ ʃvilebʃi rom mokʰmedebs 
tʃventsʰ qvelani matʰ ʃoris vtsʰxovrobditʰ odesɣatsʰ tʃveni xortsʰieli ɡulistʰkʰmebitʰ da vasrulebditʰ xortsʰisa da ɡonebis nebas da bunebitʰ risxvis ʃvilebi viqavitʰ sxvebis msɡavsad 
maɡram tsqalobitʰ mdidarma ɣmertʰma tʰavisi didi siqvarulitʰ romlitʰatsʰ tʃven ʃeɡviqvara 
tʃven danaʃaultʰa ɡamo mkvdrebi ɡaɡvatsʰotsʰxla kʰristestʰan ertʰad madlitʰa xartʰ daxsnilni 
da tʰanaaɣɡvadɡina da tsʰatʰa ʃina tʰanadaɡvsxa kʰriste iesoʃi 
ratʰa momaval saukuneebʃi atʃvenos tʰavisi madlis ɡardametebuli simdidre tʃvendami motsqalebitʰ kʰriste iesoʃi 
vinaidan madlitʰ xartʰ ɡadartʃenilebi rətsmenis meʃveobitʰ da es tʰkʰvenɡnitʰ ki ar aris aramed ɣvtʰis nicia 
ara sakʰmetʰaɡan ratʰa aravin daikvexos 
vinaidan misi kʰmnilebani vartʰ kʰriste iesoʃi ʃekʰmnilni ketʰili sakʰmeebisatʰvis romlebitsʰ tsinastsar ɡaɡvimzada ɣmertʰma ratʰa am sakʰmeebitʰ viarotʰ 
amitom ɡaxsovdetʰ rom tʰkʰven odesɣatsʰ xortsʰitʰ tsarmartʰebi romeltʰatsʰ tsinadautsʰvetʰlebs ɡitsodebdnen isini visatsʰ erkʰvatʰ tsinadatsʰvetʰilebi xortsʰis tsindatsʰvetʰitʰ ratsʰ xelitʰ sruldeboda 
rom im dros tʰkʰven kʰristes ɡareʃe iqavitʰ israelis krebulisɡan ɡautsʰxoebulni aɣtʰkʰmis mtsʰnebatʰaɡan utsʰxoni ar ɡaɡatʃndatʰ saso da uɣvtʰoni iqavitʰ sopʰelʃi 
axla ki ieso kʰristeʃi odesɣatsʰ ʃors mqopʰni axloblebi ɡaxditʰ kʰristes sisxlitʰ 
vinaidan is aris tʃveni mʃvidoba romelmatsʰ ori ertʰad akʰtsʰia da daanɡria matʰ ʃua mdɡari zɣude 
ɡaaukʰma mtroba tʰavisi xortsʰitʰ mtsʰnebatʰa rdʒuli mtsʰnebebitʰ ratʰa orisaɡan tʰavis tʰavʃi ʃeekʰmna ertʰi axali katsʰi mʃvidobismqopʰeli 
da ertʰ sxeulʃi orive ʃeeriɡebina ɣmertʰtʰan dʒvris meʃveobitʰ mtrobis mokvdinebitʰ masʃi 
movida da ɡaxaratʰ mʃvidoba tʰkʰven ʃorebeltʰ da axlobeltʰ 
vinaidan misi meʃveobitʰ orives ɡvakʰvs ertʰi sulitʰ misadɡomi mamastʰan 
amitom tʰkʰven ukve aɣara xartʰ utsʰxoebi da mdɡmurebi aramed tsmidatʰa tʰanamokʰalakʰeni da ɣvtʰis saxleulni 
daʃenebulni motsʰikʰultʰa da tsinastsarmetqveltʰa sadzirkvelze sadatsʰ tʰvitʰon kʰriste iesoa kʰvakutʰxedi 
razedatsʰ mtʰeli ʃenatsevrebuli ʃenoba izrdeba upʰalʃi tsmida tadzrad 
romelzetsʰ ʃendebitʰ tʰkʰventsʰ ɣvtʰis dasamkvidreblad sulʃi 
amisatʰvis me pavle kʰristes patimari tʰkʰventʰvis tsarmartʰebisatʰvis 
roɡortsʰ tʰkʰven isminetʰ ɣvtʰis madlis mneobaze romelitsʰ me damevala tʰkʰventʰvis 
radɡan ɡamotsʰxadebitʰ meutsqa saidumlo romlis ʃesaxebatsʰ ukve moɡtseretʰ mokled 
rotsʰa tsaikitʰxavtʰ ʃeɡedzlebatʰ ɡaiɡotʰ tʃemi tsʰodna kʰristes saidumlosi 
ratsʰ adrindel tʰaobebʃi ar ɡamotsʰxadebia adamiantʰa ʃvilebs roɡortsʰ axla ɡamoetsʰxadatʰ mis tsmida motsʰikʰulebs da tsinastsarmetqvelebs sulitʰ 
ratʰa tsarmartʰebitsʰ tʰanamemkvidreni tʰanasxeulni da aɣtʰkʰmis tʰanaziarni qopʰiliqvnen kʰristeʃi xarebis meʃveobitʰ 
romlis msaxuri ɡavxdi ɣvtʰis madlis nicitʰ tʃemtʰvis motsʰemuli misi dzalisxmevitʰ 
me qvela tsmidas ʃoris umtsʰiress mometsʰa es madli mexarebina tsarmartʰtʰatʰvis kʰristes auratsʰxeli simdidre 
da ɡametsʰxadebina qvelasatʰvis ra aris saukunetʰaɡan dapʰaruli saidumlos ɡanɡebuleba qovlis ʃemkʰmnel ɣmertʰʃi 
ratʰa axla eklesiis meʃveobitʰ mtʰavrobatʰ da xelmtsipʰebatʰ eutsqos tsʰaʃi ɣvtʰis mravalmxrivi sibrədzne 
maradiuli ɡantʃinebitʰ romelitsʰ ɡanaxortsʰiela tʃvens upʰal kʰriste iesoʃi 
romelʃitsʰ ɡvakʰvs sitʰamame da saimedo misadɡomi misi rətsmenis meʃveobitʰ 
amitom ɡtʰxovtʰ ɡuli ar ɡaitexotʰ tʰkʰventʰvis tʃemi ɡasaciris ɡamo romelitsʰ tʰkʰveni didebaa 
amisatʰvis vidrek muxls mamis tsinaʃe 
vis mieratsʰ itsodeba qoveli mamoba tsʰaʃi da kʰveqanaze 
rom moɡtsʰetʰ dzala tʰavisi didebis simdidritʰ tʰavisi sulitʰ ʃinaɡan katsʰʃi ɡansamtkitsʰeblad 
kʰristes dasamkvidreblad rətsmenitʰ tʰkʰvens ɡulebʃi da iqotʰ tʰkʰven pʰesvɡadɡmulebi da dapʰudznebulebi siqvarulʃi 
ratʰa ʃedzlotʰ qvela tsmidastʰan ertʰad tʃatsvdetʰ ra aris ɡani da siɡrdze da simaɣle da siɣrme 
da ʃeitsʰnotʰ kʰristes siqvaruli tsʰodnas rom aɣemateba ratʰa aɣivsotʰ sruli ɣvtʰiuri sisavsitʰ 
xolo mas visatsʰ tʃvenʃi mokʰmedi dzalitʰ ʃeudzlia ɡanuzomlad metis ketʰeba vidre tʃven vtʰxovtʰ an vpʰikʰrobtʰ 
mas dideba eklesiaʃi kʰriste iesoʃi qvela tʰaobaʃi ukunitʰi ukunisamde amin 
amitom ʃeɡaɡonebtʰ me patimari upʰalʃi moikʰtsʰetʰ im motsodebis ɣirsad romelʃitsʰ motsodebulni xartʰ 
mtʰeli tʰavmdablobitʰ simʃviditʰa da sulɡrdzelebitʰ ʃeitsqnaretʰ ertʰmanetʰi siqvarulʃi 
etsʰadetʰ ʃeinartʃunotʰ sulis ertʰoba mʃvidobis sakvrelitʰ 
ertʰia sxeuli da ertʰia suli roɡortsʰ xartʰ kidetsʰ motsodebulni tʰkʰveni motsodebis ertʰ sasoebaʃi 
ertʰia upʰali ertʰia rətsmena ertʰia natʰlisɣeba 
ertʰia ɣmertʰi da mama qoveltʰa romelitsʰ aris qoveltʰa zeda qvelas mier da qvela tʃvenɡanʃi 
xolo qovel tʃvenɡans motsʰemuli akʰvs madli kʰristesmieri nicis zomisamebr 
amisatʰvis ambobs avida maɣlobze daatqveva tqve da nicebi ubodza adamians 
xolo avida ras niʃnavs tʰu ara imas rom iɡi pirvelad mitsis kʰvesknelʃi tʃavida 
tʃasuli ki iɡivea ratsʰ asuli qvela tsʰaze maɣla ratʰa aɣavsos qovelive 
man daaqena ertʰni motsʰikʰulebad meoreni tsinastsarmetqvelebad zoɡni maxareblad zoɡni mtsqemsebad da modzɣvrebad 
ratʰa sruleqotʰ tsmidebi msaxurebis sakʰmisatʰvis kʰristes sxeulis aɣsaʃeneblad 
vidre qvelani mivaɣtsevdetʰ rətsmenis ertʰianobas da ɣvtʰis dzis ʃetsʰnobas srul katsʰad kʰristes sisavsis asakis zomas 
ratʰa aɣar viqotʰ bavʃvebi romeltʰatsʰ arqevs da itatsʰebs modzɣvrebis qovelɡvari kʰari adamiantʰa tsʰbierebitʰ tsʰdunebis mzakvruli xelovnebitʰ 
aramed ceʃmaritebis metqvelni siqvarulitʰ qvelapʰerʃi vizrdebodetʰ mis mimartʰ vintsʰ aris tʰavi kʰriste 
vis mieratsʰ mtʰeli sxeuli ʃenatsevrebuli da ʃemtkitsʰebuli qovelnairi matsʰotsʰxlebeli kavʃirebis saʃualebitʰ sxeulis tʰitʰoeuli asos zomierad mokʰmedebitʰ izrdeba tʰavisi tʰavis siqvarulʃi aɣsaʃeneblad 
amitom amas vambob da vmotsmob upʰalʃi ratʰa aɣar moikʰtsʰetʰ ise roɡortsʰ tsarmartʰebi ikʰtsʰevian tʰaviantʰi ɡonebis amaoebitʰ 
ɡonebadabnelebulni da ɣvtʰis tsʰxovrebisaɡan ɡautsʰxoebulni tʰaviantʰi umetsʰrebisa da ɡulkʰvaobis ɡamo 
isini romeltʰatsʰ ɡrədznoba dakarɡes da ɡarqvnilebas mietsʰnen ratʰa qovelɡvari utsmidureba tʃaidinon ɡaumadzɣrobitʰ 
xolo tʰkʰven ase rodi ɡistsavliatʰ kʰriste 
radɡan moɡismeniatʰ mistʰvis da masʃi xartʰ ɡanstsavlulni vinaidan iesoʃia ceʃmariteba 
mitovebuli ɡakʰvtʰ tsinandeli tsʰxovreba dzveli katsʰisa matsʰduri ɡulistʰkʰmebitʰ ɡaxrətsnili 
da ɡanaxlebuli xartʰ tʰkʰveni ɡonebis sulitʰ 
da ʃeɡimosiatʰ axali katsʰi romelitsʰ ʃekʰmnilia ɣvtʰisamebr simartʰlitʰa da ceʃmaritebis sitsmiditʰ 
amitom ɡaniʃoretʰ sitsʰrue da tʰvitʰoeulma tʰkʰvenɡanma tʰavis moqvass ceʃmariteba elaparakos vinaidan ertʰimeoris asoebi vartʰ 
ɡanrisxditʰ oɣond nu ʃestsʰodavtʰ mze nu tʃava tʰkʰvens risxvaze 
adɡili ar mistsʰetʰ eʃmaks 
vintsʰ iparavda nuɣar moiparavs uketʰesia iʃromos da tʰavisi xelitʰ aketʰos ketʰili ratʰa hkʰondes ɡacirvebulisatʰvis misatsʰemad 
aravitʰari uʃveri sitqva ar daɡtsʰdetʰ piridan aramed mxolod ketʰili aɣsaʃeneblad ratʰa madli mianicos ɡamɡonetʰ 
nu daanaɣvlianebtʰ ɣvtʰis sulitsmidas romlitʰatsʰ tʰkʰven aɣbecdetʰ ɡamosqidvis dɣisatʰvis 
qovelɡvari simtsare mdzvinvareba risxva qvirili da ɡmoba ɡanɡʃordetʰ qvela borotebastʰan ertʰad 
maɡram iqavitʰ ketʰilni ertʰimeoris mimartʰ tʰanauɡrədznetʰ da miutevetʰ ertʰmanetʰs roɡortsʰ kʰristeʃi moɡitevatʰ tʰkʰven ɣmertʰma 
maʃ mibadzetʰ ɣmertʰs roɡortsʰ saqvarelma ʃvilebma 
iaretʰ siqvarulʃi iseve roɡortsʰ kʰristem ʃeɡviqvara tʃven da tʰavisi tʰavi mistsʰa tʃventʰvis ɣmertʰs ʃesatsiravad da msxverplad saamo ketʰilsurnelebad 
oɣond sidzva qovelɡvari utsmidureba da anɡareba aɣar ixsenebodes tʰkʰvens ʃoris roɡortsʰ tsmidebs ʃeʃvenitʰ 
aseve biltssitqvaoba lakʰlakʰi da datsʰinva ar ʃeɡpʰeritʰ aramed upʰro samadlobeli 
radɡan itsʰodetʰ rom artsʰ ertʰ medzavs an utsmidurs an anɡars romelitsʰ kerptʰmsaxuria ara akʰvs memkvidreoba kʰristeʃi da ɣvtʰis sasupʰevelʃi 
aravin ɡatsʰdunotʰ pʰuci sitqvebitʰ vinaidan amisatʰvis ɣvtʰis risxva etseva urtʃ ʃvilebs 
amitom nu ikʰnebitʰ matʰi tʰanaziarni 
vinaidan odesɣatsʰ bneli iqavitʰ axla ki natʰeli xartʰ upʰalʃi iaretʰ roɡortsʰ natʰlis ʃvilebs ʃeʃvenitʰ 
radɡan natʰlis naqopʰi aris qovelive siketʰeʃi simartʰlesa da ceʃmaritebaʃi 
ɡamostsʰadetʰ ra aris upʰlis mosatsoni 
nu ʃeeziarebitʰ bnelis unaqopʰo sakʰmeebs aramed amxiletʰ 
vinaidan rasatsʰ isini pʰarulad aketʰeben salaparakodatsʰ ki samartsʰxvinoa 
da maintsʰ mxilebuli natʰlitʰ mʒɣavndeba 
vinaidan qovelive ratsʰ ɡamomʒɣavndeba natʰelia amitom ambobs ɡaiɣvidze mdzinarev da aɣsdekʰ mkvdretʰitʰ da ɡaɡinatʰebs ʃen kʰriste 
maʃ pʰrətʰxlad moikʰetsʰitʰ ara roɡortsʰ uɡunurni aramed roɡortsʰ brdzenni 
moivacretʰ ʒami vinaidan dɣeebi muxtʰalia 
maʃ nu ikʰnebitʰ uɡunurebi aramed ʃeitsʰanitʰ ra aris ɣvtʰis neba 
nu datʰvrebitʰ ɣvinitʰ romelʃitsʰ aɣviraxsnilobaa aramed aɣivsenitʰ sulitʰ 
elaparaketʰ ertʰmanetʰs pʰsalmunitʰ ɡalobitʰa da sulieri saɡaloblebitʰ umɣeretʰ da epʰsalmunetʰ upʰals ɡulebʃi 
madlobdetʰ qoveltʰvis qvelapʰrisatʰvis ɣmertʰs da mamas tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes saxelitʰ 
daemortʃiletʰ ertʰmanetʰs ɣvtʰis moʃiʃebitʰ 
tsʰolebo daemortʃiletʰ tʰkʰvens kʰmrebs roɡortsʰ upʰals 
vinaidan kʰmari aris tsʰolis tʰavi iseve roɡortsʰ kʰriste aris eklesiis tʰavi da is aris sxeulis matsʰxovari 
maɡram roɡortsʰ eklesia emortʃileba kʰristes aseve tsʰolebitsʰ tʰaviantʰ kʰmrebs qvelapʰerʃi 
mamakatsʰebo ɡiqvardetʰ tʰkʰveni tsʰolebi iseve roɡortsʰ kʰristem ʃeiqvara eklesia da tʰavi ɡastsira mistʰvis 
ratʰa tsmidaeqo iɡi da ɡanetsmida tsqalʃi ɡanbanitʰ sitqvis meʃveobitʰ 
ratʰa ɡanemzadebina iɡi tʰavistʰvis didebul eklesiad ar hkʰonoda mtsikvli an manki an raime misi msɡavsi aramed pirikʰitʰ ratʰa tsmida da ubitso qopʰiliqo 
ise unda uqvardetʰ mamakatsʰebs tʰaviantʰi tsʰolebi roɡortsʰ sakutʰari sxeulebi visatsʰ tʰavisi tsʰoli uqvars mas sakutʰari tʰavi uqvars 
vinaidan aravis arasodes mosdzulebia tʰavisi xortsʰi aramed kvebavs da uvlis mas iseve roɡortsʰ upʰali eklesias 
imitom rom misi sxeulis asoebi vartʰ misi xortsʰtʰaɡanni da misi dzvaltʰaɡanni 
amitom miatovebs katsʰi tʰavis mamas da tʰavis dedas da miekroba tʰavis tsʰols da oriveni ertʰ xortsʰad ikʰnebian 
didia es saidumlo me vambob kʰristeze da eklesiaze 
aseve qovel tʰkʰventʰaɡans uqvardes tʰavisi tsʰoli roɡortsʰ sakutʰari tʰavi tsʰolsatsʰ eʃinodes kʰmrisa 
daemortʃiletʰ ʃvilebo tʰkʰvens mʃoblebs upʰalʃi vinaidan es samartʰliania 
pativi etsʰi ʃens mamas da dedas es aris pirveli mtsʰneba aɣtʰkʰmitʰ 
ratʰa moɡetsʰes siketʰe da dɣeɡrdzeli iqo kʰveqanaze 
tʰkʰven ki mamebo nu ɡaaɣizianebtʰ tʰkʰvens ʃvilebs aramed aɣzardetʰ isini upʰlis modzɣvrebitʰa da dariɡebitʰ 
daemortʃiletʰ monebo tʰkʰvens xortsʰiel upʰaltʰ ʃiʃitʰa da dzrtsolitʰ ɡultsrpʰelad roɡortsʰ kʰristes 
ara tʰvaltʰmakʰtsʰuri samsaxuritʰ roɡortsʰ pirmotʰneni aramed roɡortsʰ kʰristes monebi romlebitsʰ sulitʰ arsuleben ɣvtʰis nebas 
da ɡulmodɡinebitʰ emsaxurebian upʰals da ara adamianebs 
itsʰodetʰ rom qvela vintsʰ siketʰes stʃadis masve miiɣebs upʰlis mona ikʰneba is tʰu tʰavisupʰali 
tʰkʰven ki batonebo matʰatsʰ aseve moekʰetsʰitʰ tʰavi ʃeikavetʰ sisastikisaɡan da itsʰodetʰ rom matʰatsʰ da tʰkʰventsʰ upʰali ɡqavtʰ tsʰaʃi da mis tsinaʃe ar arsebobs pirmotʰneoba 
da bolos tʃemo dzmebo ɡamaɡrditʰ upʰlitʰ da misi dzalis simtkitsʰitʰ 
ʃeimosetʰ ɣvtʰis sruli sacurveli ratʰa ʃedzlotʰ tsinaɣudɡetʰ eʃmakis mzakvrobas 
radɡan tʃveni brdzola ar aris sisxlisa da xortsʰis tsinaaɣmdeɡ aramed mtʰavrobatʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ xelmtsipʰebatʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ am sopʰlis sibnelis mpqrobeltʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ tsʰiskʰveʃetʰis borotebis sultʰa tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
amitom xeli mohkidetʰ ɣvtʰis srul sacurvels ratʰa ʃedzlotʰ tsinaɣdɡoma borot dɣes da qovlis mdzlevlebma ɡasdzlotʰ 
maʃ idekʰitʰ ceʃmaritebitʰ tselʃemosartqlulni da simartʰlis dʒavʃnitʰ ʃemosilebi 
da pʰexʃemosilni mzadqopʰnaʃi mʃvidobis saxareblad 
da qovelive amastʰan ertʰad aiɣetʰ rətsmenis pʰari romlitʰatsʰ ʃedzlebtʰ borotis ɡavarvarebuli isrebis tʃakʰrobas 
aiɣetʰ xsnis tʃatʃkʰani da sulis maxvili romelitsʰ aris ɣvtʰis sitqva 
qovelɡvari lotsʰvitʰ da vedrebitʰ ilotsʰetʰ qovel ʒams sulitʰ da mudam ipʰxizletʰ amaze qovelɡvari simedɡritʰ da lotsʰvitʰ qvela tsmidisatʰvis 
tʃemtʰvisatsʰ ratʰa mometsʰes sitqva da tʃemi piritʰ ɡatsʰxadebitʰ vautsqo romlis eltʃitsʰa var 
saxarebis saidumlo borkildadebulma ratʰa ɡatsʰxadebitʰ vilaparako risi tʰkʰmatsʰ mmartʰebs 
ratʰa tʰkʰventsʰ itsʰodetʰ tʃemi ɡaremoebani da sakʰmeebi qovelives ɡautsqebtʰ tvikʰikosi saqvareli dzma da upʰlis sartsmuno msaxuri 
romelitsʰ stsored imitom ɡamovɡzavne tʰkʰventʰan ratʰa ʃeitqotʰ tʃveni ambavi da manatsʰ anuɡeʃos tʰkʰveni ɡulebi 
mʃvidoba dzmebs da siqvaruli rətsmenitʰurtʰ mama ɣvtʰisaɡan da upʰal ieso kʰristesaɡan 
madli iqos qvelastʰan visatsʰ uxrətsnelebaʃi uqvars tʃveni upʰali ieso kʰriste amin 
pavle da timotʰe ieso kʰristes monebi qvela tsmidas kʰriste iesoʃi romelnitsʰ pʰilipeʃi imqopʰebian episkoposebitʰa da diakvnebitʰurtʰ 
madli tʰkʰven da mʃvidoba tʃveni mama ɣmertʰisa da upʰal ieso kʰristesaɡan 
vmadlob tʃems ɣmertʰs tʰkʰvens qovel ɡaxsenebaze 
mudam tʃems qvela vedrebaʃi sixarulitʰ vevedrebi qoveli tʰkʰvenɡanisatʰvis 
saxarebaʃi tʰkʰveni tʰanaziarebisatʰvis pirveli dɣidan akʰamomde 
dartsmunebuli var rom damtsqebi tʰkʰvenʃi ketʰili sakʰmisa ʃeasrulebs kidetsʰ mas ieso kʰristes dɣemde 
stsoredatsʰ rom mmartʰebs pʰikʰri qovel tʰkʰvenɡanze radɡan ɡulʃi mqavxartʰ tʃems borkilebʃi da saxarebis datsʰvisas da ɡanmtkitsʰebisas qvelani tʰanaziarni xartʰ tʃems madlʃi 
vinaidan ɣmertʰia tʃemi motsame rom qvelani miqvarxartʰ ieso kʰristes siqvarulitʰ 
amaze vlotsʰulob rom upʰro da upʰro ɡaizardos tʰkʰveni siqvaruli tsʰodnasa da qovel ɡrədznobaʃi 
ratʰa ɡamostsʰadotʰ umdʒobesi da iqotʰ tsrpʰelni da daubrkolebelni kʰristes dɣes 
simartʰlis naqopʰitʰ aɣvsilni ieso kʰristes mier ɣvtʰis sadideblad da sakʰebrad 
dzmebo msurs itsʰodetʰ rom ratsʰ tʰavs ɡadamxda saxarebis tsarmatebas upʰro emsaxurnen 
ise rom tʃemi borkilebi kʰristeʃi tsʰnobili ɡaxda mtʰeli pretoriisatʰvis da qvela danartʃentʰatʰvis 
upʰalʃi dzmatʰa umravlesoba ɡamxnevda tʃemi borkilebitʰ da ɡabeda rom upʰro metad da uʃiʃrad elaparaka ɣvtʰis sitqva 
tʰumtsʰa zoɡiertʰni ʃurianobitʰ da dʒibritʰ kʰadaɡeben kʰristes zoɡni ki ketʰili zraxvitʰ 
eseni siqvarulitʰ vinaidan itsʰian rom saxarebis dasatsʰavad var daqenebuli 
zoɡni ki dʒibritʰ kʰadaɡeben kʰristes aratsmidad radɡan pʰikʰroben daamdzimon tʃemi borkilebi 
mereda ra roɡortsʰ ar unda ikʰadaɡon kʰriste raɣatsʰ mizezitʰ tʰu ɡultsrpʰelad me asetsʰ mixaria da kvlavatsʰ ɡavixareb 
vinaidan vitsʰi rom es tʃemi xsna ikʰneba tʰkʰveni lotsʰvitʰa da ieso kʰristes sulis ʃetsevnitʰ 
tʰanaxmad molodinisa da sasoebisa rom arapʰerʃi ar ʃevrətsʰxvebi aramed mtʰeli sitsʰxaditʰ roɡortsʰ qoveltʰvis ise axlatsʰ ɡandiddeba kʰriste tʃems sxeulʃi sitsʰotsʰxlitʰ ikʰneba tʰu sikvdilitʰ 
vinaidan tʃemtʰvis sitsʰotsʰxle kʰristea da sikvdili monaɡebi 
tʰu xortsʰieli tsʰxovreba naqopʰs ʃematebs tʃems sakʰmes ar vitsʰi ra amovirtʃio 
mizidavs orive msurs tsavide da viqo kʰristestʰan raki es bevrad uketʰesia 
maɡram xortsʰʃi dartʃena upʰro metad tʰkʰventʰvis aris saciro 
me ki danamdvilebitʰ vitsʰi rom davrtʃebi da vikʰnebi tʰkʰventʰan qvelastʰan ertʰad tʰkʰveni tsarmatebisa da rətsmenis sixarulisatʰvis 
ratʰa tʃemi meʃveobitʰ ɡamravldes tʰkʰveni kʰeba kʰriste iesoʃi rotsʰa kvlav moval tʰkʰventʰan 
oɣond moikʰetsʰitʰ kʰristes saxarebis ɣirsad ratʰa an rotsʰa moval da ɡnaxavtʰ an tʰu ar vikʰnebi tʰkʰventʰan movismino tʰkʰvenze rom dɡaxartʰ ertʰi sulitʰ da ertʰsulovnad iɣtsvitʰ saxarebis rətsmenisatʰvis 
nurapʰerʃi ʃeuʃindebitʰ motsinaaɣmdeɡes es matʰtʰvis daɣupvis niʃania tʰkʰventʰvis ki xsnisa es ɣvtʰisaɡan aris 
vinaidan kʰristes ɡulisatʰvis moɡetsʰatʰ tʰkʰven ara marto rətsmena aramed mistʰvis tandʒvatsʰ 
isetʰive ɣvatslitʰ romelitsʰ tʃemʃi naxetʰ da romelsatsʰ axla ismentʰ tʃemze 
amriɡad tʰu aris raime nuɡeʃistsʰema kʰristeʃi tʰu aris raime salbuni siqvarulisa tʰu aris raime tʰanamoziareoba sulisa tʰu aris raime tʰanaɡrədznoba da ʃetsqaleba 
ʃeavsetʰ tʃemi sixaruli ratʰa ertʰsa da imaves pʰikʰrobdetʰ ɡkʰondetʰ ertʰi da iɡive siqvaruli iqotʰ ertʰsulovanni da ertʰazrovanni 
arapʰeri ɡaaketʰotʰ dʒibritʰ an pativmoqvareobitʰ aramed tʰavmdablobitʰ sakutʰar tʰavze metad ʃeratsʰxetʰ ertʰmanetʰi 
tʰitʰoeuli marto tʰavis tʰavze ki nu izrunebs aramed sxvebzetsʰ 
tʰkʰvenʃiatsʰ im sapʰikʰralze ipʰikʰretʰ ratsʰ kʰriste iesoʃia 
romelitsʰ ɣvtʰis xateba iqo da mitatsʰebad ar tʰvlida ɣvtʰis tʰanastsorad qopʰnas 
aramed tsarmoitsʰariela tʰavi da miiɣo monis xateba ɡaxda katsʰtʰa msɡavsi da ʃesaxedaobitʰ katsʰs daemsɡavsa 
daimdabla tʰavi da mortʃili ɡaxda tʰvitʰ sikvdilamde dʒvartsʰmitʰ sikvdilamde 
amitom ɣmertʰmatsʰ aɣamaɣla iɡi da mianica mas qvela saxelze uzenaesi saxeli 
ratʰa iesos saxelis tsinaʃe muxli moidrikos qovelma zetsʰierma mitsierma da kʰvesknelelma 
qvela enam aɣiaros rom ieso kʰriste aris upʰali mama ɣmertʰis sadideblad 
amitom tʃemo saqvarelno roɡortsʰ qoveltʰvis iqavitʰ mortʃilni ara marto tʃemi qopʰnisas aramed upʰro metad axla tʃemi arqopʰnis dros ʃiʃitʰ da dzrtsolitʰ iɣvatsetʰ tʰkʰvens saxsnelad 
ɣmertʰi dabadebs tʰkʰvenʃi survilsatsʰ da mokʰmedebasatsʰ tʰavisi satʰnoebitʰ 
qvelapʰeri ɡaaketʰetʰ udrətvinvelad da uqoqmanod 
ratʰa iqotʰ umtsikvloni da ubraloni ɣvtʰis umanko ʃvilebi mrud da ukuɣmartʰ tʰaobaʃi romelʃitsʰ anatʰebtʰ roɡortsʰ mnatʰobni samqaroʃi 
sitsʰotsʰxlis sitqvis mpʰlobelni ratʰa davikvexo kʰristes dɣes rom amaod ar davrbodi da amaod ar viɣvtsodi 
da tʰu viɣvrebi tʰkʰveni rətsmenis msxverplad ɣvtʰismsaxurebaʃi mixaria da vxarob tʰkʰventʰan ertʰad 
aseve tʰkʰventsʰ ixaretʰ da xarobdetʰ tʃemtʰan ertʰad 
imedi makʰvs upʰal iesoʃi male ɡamoɡiɡzavnotʰ timotʰe ratʰa ɡavmxnevde tʰkʰveni ambis ʃetqobitʰ 
vinaidan aravin mqavs isetʰi tʰanamoziare ase bedʒitʰad rom zrunavdes tʰkʰvenze 
imitom rom qvelani tʰavisas edzeben da ara imas ratsʰ ieso kʰristesia 
tʰkʰven itsʰitʰ misi ɡamotsʰda rom roɡortsʰ mamastʰan ʃvili ise msaxuroboda tʃemtʰan ertʰad saxarebistʰvis 
imedi makʰvs rom male ɡamoɡiɡzavnitʰ mas roɡortsʰ ki vnaxav roɡor ikʰneba tʃemi sakʰme 
mdʒera upʰlisa rom metsʰ male moval tʰkʰventʰan 
sacirod mivitʃnev ɡamoɡiɡzavnotʰ epapʰroditosi tʃemi dzma tʰanamʃromeli da tʰanamebrdzoli iɡive tʰkʰveni motsʰikʰuli da msaxuri tʃems saciroebaʃi 
radɡan dzalian surda qvela tʰkʰventʰaɡanis xilva da dzalian ʃetsuxda rom ʃeitqetʰ misi avadmqopʰoba 
radɡan daavadda da sikvidilis pirzetsʰ iqo maɡram ɣmertʰma ʃeitsqala is da ara marto is aramed metsʰ ratʰa tʃems mtsuxarebas mtsuxareba ar dartʰvoda 
amitom vitʃkʰare misi ɡamoɡzavna tʰkʰventʰan ratʰa ɡenaxatʰ da kvlav ɡaɡexaratʰ da metsʰ momkleboda dardi 
aba miiɣetʰ iɡi qovelɡvari sixarulitʰ upʰalʃi da pativistsʰemitʰ moepqaritʰ mistʰanebs 
vinaidan kʰristes sakʰmisatʰvis sikvdils miuaxlovda da sapʰrətʰxeʃi tʃaiɡdo sitsʰotsʰxle ratʰa ʃeevso tʃemdami tʰkʰveni samsaxuris danaklisi 
amriɡad tʃemo dzmebo ixaretʰ upʰalʃi tʰkʰvendami msɡavsi ramis motsera sadznelo ar aris tʃemtʰvis tʰkʰventʰvis ki ɡamxnevebaa 
eridetʰ dzaɣlebs eridetʰ tsʰud muʃakebs eridetʰ tsinadatsʰvetʰas 
vinaidan tsinadatsʰvetʰiloba tʃven vartʰ ɣvtʰis msaxurni sulitʰ vadidebtʰ kʰriste iesos da ar ɡveimedeba xortsʰi 
tʰumtsʰa ʃemedzlo xortsʰis imedi mkʰonoda tʰu sxva vinme pʰikʰrobs xortsʰis imedze me mitʰ umetes 
tsinadatsʰvetʰili var merve dɣes me israeliani beniaminis tomidan ebraeli ebraeltʰaɡani rdʒulitʰ pʰariseveli 
moʃurned mdevneli eklesiisa rdʒulis simartʰlitʰ umtsikvlod 
maɡram ratsʰ tʃemtʰvis moɡeba iqo tsaɡebad tʃavtʰvale kʰristes ɡulisatʰvis 
axlatsʰ qvelapʰeri tsaɡebad mimatʃnia tʃemi upʰlis ieso kʰristes tsʰodnis upiratesobistʰvis ris ɡamotsʰ uari vtʰkʰvi qoveliveze da qvelapʰers naɡvad mivitʃnev ratʰa kʰriste ʃevidzino 
da aɣmovtʃnde masʃi ara tʃemi simartʰlitʰ ratsʰ rdʒulidanaa aramed imitʰ ratsʰ aris kʰristes rətsmena ɣvtʰiuri simartʰle rətsmenis mixedvitʰ 
ratʰa ʃevitsʰno iɡi da misi aɣdɡomis dzala da mis tandʒvebʃi tʰanaziareba da mis sikvdils vemsɡavso 
ratʰa roɡorme mivtsvde mkvdretʰitʰ aɣdɡomas 
ara imitom rom ukve mivaɣtsie an srulkʰmnili ɡavxdi aramed vistsrapʰi vindzlo mivaɣtsio roɡortsʰ me momaɣtsia kʰriste iesom 
dzmebo ar mɡonia rom ukve mivaɣtsie ertʰia rom vivitsqeb ratsʰ tʃems ukan aris da imas veltvi ratsʰ tʃems tsin aris 
viltvi miznisaken ɣvtʰis uzenaesi motsodebis pativisaken kʰriste iesoʃi 
amitom vintsʰ tʃvens ʃoris srulkʰmnilia ase unda iazrovnos da tʰu sxvanairad azrovnebtʰ amasatsʰ ɣmertʰi ɡamoɡitsʰxadebtʰ 
amriɡad rasatsʰ mivaɣtsietʰ iɡive unda ʃevinartʃunotʰ 
dzmebo iqavitʰ tʃemi mombadzvelni da uquretʰ matʰ vintsʰ ise ikʰtsʰeva risi nimuʃitsʰ tʃvenʃi ɡakʰvtʰ 
vinaidan bevrni romeltʰa ʃesaxeb xʃirad mitʰkʰvams tʰkʰventʰvis da axla tsʰremlebitʰatsʰ ɡeubnebitʰ ise ikʰtsʰevian roɡortsʰ kʰristes dʒvris mtrebi 
matʰi bolo daɣupvaa matʰi ɣmertʰi mutsʰelia matʰi dideba ki sirtsʰxvilʃia isini mitsierze pʰikʰroben 
radɡan tʃveni mokʰalakʰeoba zetsʰaʃia saidanatsʰ velitʰ matsʰxovars upʰal ieso kʰristes 
romelitsʰ tʃvens damdablebul sxeuls ɡardakʰmnis tʰavisi didebis sxeulis ʃesapʰerisad dzalisxmevitʰ ratsʰ ʃeadzlebinebs mas qovelive daimortʃilos 
aba tʃemo saqvarelo da sasurvelo dzmebo tʃemo sixarulno da ɡvirɡvinno idekʰitʰ ase upʰalʃi saqvarelno 
evodias ʃevaxseneb da svintikʰes ʃevaɡoneb tʰanamoazreni iqvnen upʰalʃi 
ʃen ki tʃemo ertʰɡulo tʰanamʃromelo ʃentsʰ ɡtʰxov daexmaro matʰ romelnitsʰ iɣtsvodnen tʃemtʰan ertʰad saxarebaʃi klementostʰan da sxva tʃems tʰanamʃromlebtʰan ertʰad romeltʰa saxelebi sitsʰotsʰxlis tsiɡnʃia 
maradis ixaretʰ upʰalʃi da kidev vitqvi ixaretʰ 
tʰkʰveni tʰavmdabloba tsʰnobili iqos qvela adamianisatʰvis axloa upʰali 
arapʰerze izrunotʰ mxolod lotsʰvasa da vedrebaʃi madlierebitʰ autsqetʰ tʰkʰveni survili ɣmertʰs 
da ɣvtʰis mʃvidoba romelitsʰ qovelɡvar ɡonebas aɣemateba daipʰaravs tʰkʰvens ɡulebs da tʰkʰvens pʰikʰrebs kʰriste iesoʃi 
aba ase tʃemo dzmebo qovelive ratsʰ ceʃmaritia ratsʰ patiosania ratsʰ martʰalia ratsʰ tsmidaa ratsʰ saqvarelia ratsʰ sakʰebaria qovelive ratsʰ satʰno da kʰebulia imaze ipʰikʰretʰ 
ratsʰ tʃemɡan istsavletʰ da miiɣetʰ moisminetʰ da dainaxetʰ tʃemʃi is ʃeasruletʰ da mʃvidobis ɣmertʰi ikʰneba tʰkʰventʰan 
me ki didad ɡavixare upʰalʃi radɡan axla kvlav itsqetʰ tʃemze zrunva utsinatsʰ zrunavditʰ maɡram ver axerxdebitʰ 
ɡacirvebis ɡamo ar vambob amas vinaidan vistsavle imitʰ dakmaqopʰileba ratsʰa makʰvs 
vitsʰi xelmokleobaʃi tsʰxovreba da vitsʰi siuxveʃi tsʰxovrebatsʰ mitʃveuli var qvelapʰers da qovelives ɡadzɣomas da ʃimʃils siuxvesa da xelmokleobas 
qovelive dzalmidzs tʃems ɡanmamtkitsʰebelʃi kʰristeʃi 
xolo tʰkʰven karɡad moikʰetsʰitʰ tʃemi ciri rom ɡaiziaretʰ 
tʰkʰventsʰ itsʰitʰ pʰilipelno rom xarebis datsqebisas rotsʰa makedoniidan ɡamovedi artsʰ ertʰma eklesiam ar miiɣo monatsileoba tʃemtʰan miɣeba ɡatsʰemaʃi tʰkʰvens ɡarda 
tʰesalonikeʃitsʰ ɡamomiɡzavnetʰ ratsʰ mcirdeboda ertʰi ordʒer 
ara imitom rom mosakitʰxs vedzebde aramed vedzeb naqopʰs romelitsʰ tʰkʰvens sasarɡeblod mravldeba 
miviɣe qovelive da uxvad makʰvs kmaqopʰili var rom miviɣe epapʰroditosisɡan tʰkʰvens mier ɡamoɡzavnili ketʰilsurneleba saamebeli msxverpli ɣvtʰistʰvis mosatsoni 
xolo tʃemi ɣmertʰi aɣavsebs tʰkʰvens qovel saciroebas tʰavisi siuxvisamebr didebitʰ kʰriste iesoʃi 
xolo ɣmertʰs da tʃvens mamas dideba ukunitʰi ukunisamde amin 
moikitʰxetʰ qvela tsmida kʰriste iesos saxelitʰ moɡikitʰxaven tʃemtʰan mqopʰi dzmani 
moɡikitʰxavs qvela tsmida da upʰro metad keisris saxlidan 
upʰal ieso kʰristes madli tʰkʰvens sultʰan amin 
pavle ɣvtʰis nebitʰ ieso kʰristes motsʰikʰuli da dzma timotʰe 
koloseʃi mqopʰ tsmidatʰ da mortsmune dzmebs kʰristeʃi 
madli tʰkʰven da mʃvidoba tʃveni mama ɣmertʰisa da upʰal ieso kʰristesaɡan vmadlobtʰ ɣmertʰs tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes mamas qoveltʰvis rotsʰa tʰkʰventʰvis vlotsʰulobtʰ 
rom ɡvesmis tʰkʰveni rətsmena kʰriste iesoʃi da tʰkʰveni siqvaruli qoveli tsmidis mimartʰ 
tʰkʰventʰvis zetsʰaʃi ɡamzadebuli sasoebis ɡamo romelitsʰ tsinastsar ɡesmatʰ saxarebis ceʃmariti sitqvitʰ 
romelitsʰ movida tʰkʰventʰan iseve roɡortsʰ mtʰel sopʰelʃi da moakʰvs naqopʰi da izrdeba iseve roɡortsʰ tʰkʰvens ʃorisatsʰ im dɣidan mokidebuli ratsʰ tʰkʰven isminetʰ da ʃeitsʰanitʰ ɣvtʰis madli ceʃmaritebaʃi 
roɡortsʰ istsavletʰ tʃven saqvarel tʰanamsaxur epapʰrasaɡan romelitsʰ ertʰɡulad emsaxureba kʰristes tʰkʰventʰvis 
manve ɡvautsqa tʰkʰveni siqvaruli sulitʰ 
amisatʰvis tʃventsʰ im dɣidan ratsʰ es movisminetʰ ɡanutsqvetliv vlotsʰulobtʰ tʰkʰventʰvis ratʰa aɣivsotʰ misi nebis ʃetsʰnobitʰ qovelnairi sibrədznitʰa da sulieri ɡonebitʰ 
ratʰa moikʰtsʰetʰ upʰlis ɣirsad da qvelapʰerʃi aamotʰ mas qovel ketʰil sakʰmeʃi naqopʰis ɡamoɣebitʰ da ɣvtʰis ʃetsʰnobaʃi zrditʰ 
mtʰeli dzalitʰ ɡadzlierdetʰ misi didebis simtkitsʰisamebr qovelɡvar motʰminebaʃi da sulɡrdzelebaʃi sixarulitʰ 
hmadlobdetʰ mamas romelmatsʰ tsmidantʰa memkvidreobis monatsileobis ɣirsi ɡaɡvxada natʰelʃi 
romelmatsʰ ɡvixsna sibnelis xelmtsipʰebisaɡan da ʃeɡviqvana tʰavisi saqvareli dzis sasupʰevelʃi 
romelʃitsʰ ɡvakʰvs misi sisxlitʰ ɡamosqidva da tsʰodvebis miteveba 
vintsʰ aris uxilavi ɣvtʰis xateba pirmʃo qoveli kʰmnilebisa 
vinaidan misitʰ ʃeikʰmna qoveli ratsʰ tsʰaʃi da mitsazea xiluli da uxilavi saqdarni tʰu upʰlebani mtʰavrobani tʰu xelmtsipʰebani qvelapʰeri mis mier da mistʰvis aris ʃekʰmnili 
iɡi aris utsinares qovlisa da qovelive misitʰ dɡas 
is aris eklesiis sxeulis tʰavi is aris dasabami pirmʃo mkvdartʰaɡan ratʰa mas hkʰondes pirveloba qvelapʰerʃi 
radɡan masʃi moitsona mtʰeli sisavsis damkvidreba 
ratʰa misitʰ ʃemoeriɡebina qoveli daemʃvidebina misi dʒvris sisxlitʰ mitsaze tʰu tsʰaʃi 
tʰkʰventsʰ romelnitsʰ odesɣatsʰ iqavitʰ ɡautsʰxoebulni da ɡonebitʰ mtrebi tʰkʰveni boroti sakʰmeebis ɡamo 
axla ʃeɡiriɡatʰ misi sxeulis xortsʰʃi misi sikvdilitʰ ratʰa tsarɡadɡinotʰ tʰavis tsinaʃe tsmidebi ubitsoni da ubraloni 
oɣond tʰu dartʃebitʰ mtkitsʰe da ʃeurqeveli rətsmenaʃi da ar ɡadauxvevtʰ saxarebis sasoebas romelitsʰ tʰkʰven isminetʰ romelitsʰ ekʰadaɡa qovel kʰmnilebas tsʰiskʰveʃetʰʃi da romlis msaxuritsʰ ɡavxdi me pavle 
axla ki vxarob tʃemi tandʒvebitʰ tʰkʰvens ɡamo da cirs ratsʰ kʰristes daaklda vavseb sakutʰari xortsʰitʰ misi sxeulisatʰvis romelitsʰ eklesiaa 
romlis msaxuritsʰ me ɡavxdi saɣvtʰo mneobis mixedvitʰ romelitsʰ nabodzebi makʰvs tʰkʰveni ɡulistʰvis aɣsasruleblad ɣvtʰis sitqvisa 
saidumlosi romelitsʰ dapʰaruli iqo saukunetʰa da tʰaobatʰaɡan da axla ɡaemxilatʰ mis tsmidebs 
romeltʰatʰvisatsʰ ɣmertʰma ineba etsʰnobebina tʰu ra aris simdidre am saidumlos didebisa tsarmartʰebs ʃoris ratsʰ aris kʰriste tʰkʰvenʃi didebis sasoeba 
romelsatsʰ vkʰadaɡebtʰ tʃven ratʰa ʃevaɡonotʰ qovel adamians da vastsavlotʰ qovel adamians qovelɡvari sibrədzne ratʰa qoveli katsʰi tsarvadɡinotʰ srulkʰmnilad kʰriste iesoʃi 
amisatʰvis metsʰ vʃromob da viɣtsvi misi dzalitʰ romelitsʰ dzlierad mokʰmedebs tʃemʃi 
minda itsʰodetʰ raodeni ɣvatsli makʰvs tʰkʰvenze laodikielebze da qvelaze visatsʰ xortsʰielad ar uxilavs tʃemi saxe 
ratʰa inuɡeʃon siqvarulitʰ ʃeertʰebulma matʰma ɡulebma srulkʰmnili ɡonebis qovelɡvari simdidrisatʰvis ɣvtʰisa da kʰristes saidumlos ʃetsʰnobisatʰvis 
romelʃitsʰ dapʰarulia sibrədznisa da tsʰodnis qvela ɡandzi 
amas imitom ɡeubnebitʰ ratʰa aravin ʃeɡatsʰdinotʰ matsʰduri sitqvitʰ 
vinaidan tʰumtsʰa xortsʰielad ʃors var tʰkʰvenɡan sulitʰ tʰkʰventʰan vimqopʰebi da mixaria rom vxedav tʰkʰvens tsesierebas da tʰkʰveni rətsmenis simtkitsʰes kʰristeʃi 
amitom roɡortsʰ miiɣetʰ kʰriste ieso upʰali aseve iaretʰ masʃi 
pʰesvɡadɡmulebma da misitʰ aɣʃenebulebma ɡanmtkitsʰebulebma rətsmenitʰ roɡortsʰ ɡistsavliatʰ da tsarmatebulebma madlierebaʃi 
ɡapʰrətʰxilditʰ aravin ɡaɡitatsʰotʰ sibrədznismoqvarebitʰa da pʰuci tsʰdunebitʰ katsʰtʰamieri ɡadmotsʰemisa da am sopʰlis tsesisamebr da ara kʰristesamebr 
vinaidan masʃi damkvidrebulia xortsʰielad ɣvtʰaebis mtʰeli sisavse 
da tʰkʰven savseni xartʰ masʃi vintsʰ qoveli mtʰavrobisa da xelmtsipʰebis tʰavia 
tʰkʰven masʃi tsinadatsʰvetʰilebitsʰ xartʰ xeltʰukʰmneli tsinadatsʰvetʰitʰ xortsʰis tsʰodvili sxeulis ɡandzartsʰvitʰ kʰristeseuli tsinadatsʰvetʰitʰ 
mastʰan natʰlisɣebitʰ damarxulebi mastʰanve aɣdekʰitʰ ɣvtʰis dzalisadmi rətsmenitʰ romelmatsʰ aɣadɡina iɡi mkvdretʰitʰ 
tʰkʰventsʰ mkvdrebi ʃetsʰodebebʃi da tʰkʰveni xortsʰis tsinadautsʰvetʰlobaʃi ɡaɡatsʰotsʰxlatʰ mastʰan ertʰad da moɡitevatʰ qvela ʃetsʰodeba 
ɡantʃinebebitʰ tsaʃala tʰananadebtʰa xelitʰ tserili romelitsʰ tʃvens tsinaaɣmdeɡ iqo aiɣo iɡi ʃuaɡulidan da dʒvars miamscvala 
ɡanaiaraɣa mtʰavrobani da xelmtsipʰebani saaʃkaraod ʃeartsʰxvina da dʒvritʰ izeima matʰze ɡamardʒveba 
amitom nuravin ɡanɡsdʒitʰ tʰkʰven sacmelisa tʰu sasmelisatʰvis an raime dɣesastsaulisatʰvis anda axalmtʰvarobisa da ʃabatʰebisatʰvis 
es momavlis tʃrdilia sxeuli ki kʰristesi 
nuravin ʃeɡatsʰdentʰ simdablitʰ da anɡelozebis samsaxuritʰ vintsʰ epotineba imas ratsʰ ar unaxavs da pʰucad ampartavnebs tʰavisi xortsʰieli ɡonebitʰ 
ar ecideba tʰavs romlisɡanatsʰ mtʰeli sxeuli saxsrebitʰa da kavʃirebitʰ ʃenivtʰebuli da ʃeertʰebuli izrdeba ɣvtʰismieri zrditʰ 
tʰu kʰristestʰan ertʰad moukvditʰ am sopʰlis tsesebs sopʰelʃi mtsʰxovrebtʰa msɡavsad raɣad emortʃilebitʰ matʰ 
nu miekarebi nu iɡemeb nu ʃeexebi 
nurapʰers ratsʰ ixrətsneba xmarebisaɡan katsʰtʰa mtsʰnebebisa da modzɣvrebis tʰanaxmad 
es qvelapʰeri mxolod ɡareɡnulad hɡavs sibrədznes tsʰrutʰaqvanebitʰ simdablitʰ da sxeulis datʰrɡunvitʰ maɡram qovelive es ar aris ɡamiznuli xortsʰis ɡantsʰxromis tsinaaɣmdeɡ 
amɡvarad tʰu tʰkʰven aɣdekʰitʰ kʰristestʰan ertʰad edzietʰ maɣla sadatsʰ kʰriste zis ɣvtʰis mardʒvniv 
zetsʰierze ipʰikʰretʰ da ara mitsierze 
vinaidan tʰkʰven mokvditʰ da tʰkʰveni sitsʰotsʰxle dapʰarulia kʰristestʰan ɣmertʰʃi 
rotsʰa ɡamotʃndeba kʰriste tʰkʰveni sitsʰotsʰxle maʃin tʰkʰventsʰ ɡamotʃndebitʰ mastʰan ertʰad didebitʰ 
maʃ moakvdinetʰ tʰkʰveni mitsieri asoebi sidzva utsmidureba vneba boroti ɡulistʰkʰma da anɡareba ratsʰ kerptʰmsaxurebaa 
romeltʰa ɡamotsʰ ɣvtʰis risxva modis 
romeltʰa ʃorisatsʰ tʰkʰventsʰ dadioditʰ rotsʰa matʰ ʃoris tsʰxovrobditʰ 
axla ki ɡaniʃoretʰ qovelive es risxva mdzvinvareba boroteba ɡmoba tʰkʰveni baɡeebis biltssitqvaoba 
nu etsʰruebitʰ ertʰmanetʰis mimartʰ radɡan ʃemodzartsʰuli ɡakʰvtʰ dzveli adamiani misi sakʰmeebitʰurtʰ 
da ʃeimosetʰ axali romelitsʰ ɡanaxlebulia tsʰodnitʰ misi ʃemokʰmedis xatisamebr 
sadatsʰ ar aris artsʰ berdzeni artsʰ iudeveli artsʰ tsinadatsʰvetʰa artsʰ tsinadautsʰvetʰeloba ar aris barbarosi skvitʰi mona da tʰavisupʰali aramed kʰristea qovelive da qoveliveʃi 
amitom roɡortsʰ ɣvtʰis rtʃeulebma tsmidebma da saqvarlebma ʃeimosetʰ motsqaleba saxiereba tʰavmdabloba simʃvide sulɡrdzeleba 
ʃeitsqnaretʰ ertʰmanetʰi da miutevetʰ ertʰmanetʰs tʰu vinmestʰan raime sadao akʰvs vinmes roɡortsʰ kʰristem moɡitevatʰ aseve tʰkʰventsʰ 
da qovelive amas daurtʰetʰ siqvaruli ratsʰ srulkʰmnilebis kavʃiria 
batonobdes tʰkʰvens ɡulebʃi ɣvtʰis mʃvidoba romliskenatsʰ motsodebulni xartʰ ertʰ sxeulad da iqavitʰ madlierni 
upʰlis sitqva uxvad damkvidrdes tʰkʰvenʃi sruli sibrədznitʰ astsavletʰ da ʃtʰaaɡonetʰ ertʰmanetʰi pʰsalmunitʰ sadideblitʰ da sasuliero saɡaloblebitʰ da uɡalobetʰ ɣmertʰs tʰkʰvens ɡulebʃi madlierebitʰ 
da qovelive rasatsʰ tʰkʰven aketʰebtʰ sitqvitʰ tʰu sakʰmitʰ qovelive ɡaaketʰetʰ upʰal iesos saxelitʰ da mis mier hmadlobdetʰ mama ɣmertʰs 
tsʰolebo daemortʃiletʰ tʰkʰvens kʰmrebs roɡortsʰ upʰalʃia sakadrisi 
kʰmrebo ɡiqvardetʰ tʰkʰveni tsʰolebi da nu ikʰnebitʰ sastikni matʰ mimartʰ 
ʃvilebo daemortʃiletʰ tʰkʰvens mʃoblebs qvelapʰerʃi vinaidan asea mosatsoni upʰlisatʰvis 
mamebo nu ɡaaɣizianebtʰ tʰkʰvens ʃvilebs ratʰa tʰavi ar moabezrotʰ 
monebo qvelapʰerʃi daemortʃiletʰ tʰkʰvens xortsʰiel batonebs ara motʃvenebitʰi samsaxuritʰ roɡortsʰ katsʰtʰmaameblebma aramed ɡultsrpʰelad roɡortsʰ ɣvtʰismoʃiʃebma 
qovelive rasatsʰ aketʰebtʰ ɡaaketʰetʰ sulitʰ roɡortsʰ ɣvtʰisatʰvis da ara katsʰtʰatʰvis 
itsʰodetʰ rom memkvidreobas miiɣebtʰ upʰlisaɡan sazɣaurad vinaidan upʰal kʰristes emsaxurebitʰ 
xolo vintsʰ usamartʰlod moikʰtsʰeva iɡi miiɣebs tʰavisi usamartʰlobisatʰvis da ar aris mikerdzoeba 
batonebo miaɡetʰ monebs ratsʰ stsori da samartʰliania itsʰodetʰ rom tʰkʰventsʰ ɡqavtʰ upʰali zetsʰaʃi 
ibedʒitʰetʰ lotsʰvaʃi da pʰxizlad iqavitʰ masʃi madlierebitʰ 
ilotsʰetʰ tʃventʰvisatsʰ rom ɣmertʰma ɡaɡviɣos sitqvis kari rom vautsqotʰ kʰristes saidumlo romlistʰvisatsʰ ʃeborkili var 
ratʰa ɡavatsʰxado iɡi roɡortsʰ mmartʰebs rom vautsqo 
sibrədznitʰ moikʰetsʰitʰ ɡareʃetʰa mimartʰ da moivacretʰ ʒami 
tʰkʰveni sitqva qoveltʰvis madliani iqos marilitʰ ʃezavebuli ratʰa itsʰodetʰ vis ra pasuxi ɡastsʰetʰ 
tʃems ʃesaxeb qvelapʰers ɡatsʰnobebtʰ tvikʰikosi saqvareli dzma ertʰɡuli msaxuri da tʰanamʃromeli upʰalʃi 
romelitsʰ imisatʰvis ɡamoɡiɡzavnetʰ rom ʃeitqotʰ tʃveni ambavi da nuɡeʃi stsʰes tʰkʰvens ɡulebs 
onisimestʰan ertʰɡul da saqvarel dzmastʰan ertʰad romelitsʰ tʰkʰveniania isini ɡiamboben qvela akʰaur ambavs 
mokitʰxvas ɡitʰvlitʰ aristarkʰosi tʃemtʰan ertʰad tqved mqopʰi da markozi barnabas distsuli romlis ʃesaxebatsʰ moɡividatʰ utsqeba tʰu movides tʰkʰventʰan miiɣetʰo 
aseve ieso romelsatsʰ iustoss edzaxian orive tsinadatsʰvetʰiltʰaɡania mxolod eseni iqvnen ɣvtʰis sasupʰevlistʰvis tʰanamʃromelni me rom manuɡeʃebdnen 
mokitʰxvas ɡitʰvlitʰ tʰkʰveniani epapʰra kʰriste iesos msaxuri romelitsʰ mudam tʰkʰventʰvis iɣtsvis lotsʰvebʃi ratʰa tsardɡetʰ mtkitsʰed srulni da savseni ɣvtʰis qoveli nebitʰ 
me vamotsmeb masze rom didi moʃurnea tʰkʰventʰvis aɡretʰve laodikieltʰatʰvis da ierapoleltʰatʰvis 
moikitʰxetʰ saqvareli mkurnali luka da demasi 
moikitʰxetʰ laodikieli dzmebi numpʰa da misi saʃinao eklesia 
rotsʰa am tserils tsaikitʰxaven tʰkʰventʰan ise moikʰetsʰitʰ rom laodikieltʰa eklesiaʃitsʰ tsaikitʰxon xolo romelitsʰ laodikiidan aris tʰkʰventsʰ tsaikitʰxetʰ 
ase utʰxaritʰ arkʰiposs quradɣebitʰ iqavi rom ʃeasrulo msaxureba romelitsʰ upʰlisɡan miiɣe tʰkʰo 
mokitʰxva tʃemi pavles xelitʰ ɡaxsovdetʰ tʃemi borkilebi madli tʰkʰventʰan amin 
pavle siloane da timotʰe tʰesalonikeltʰa eklesias mama ɣmertʰʃi da upʰal ieso kʰristeʃi madli tʰvkʰven da mʃvidoba tʃveni mama ɣmertʰisa da upʰal ieso kʰristesaɡan 
vmadlobtʰ ɣmertʰs maradis qvela tʰkʰvenɡanisatʰvis da ɡixseniebtʰ tʃvens lotsʰvebʃi 
ɡanutsqvetliv vixsenebtʰ tʰkʰveni rətsmenis sakʰmes da siqvarulis ʃromas da tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristesadmi tʃveni ɣvtʰisa da mamis tsinaʃe tʰkʰvens imedian motʰminebas 
vitsʰitʰ ra tʰkʰveni rtʃeuleba ɣvtʰis saqvarelno dzmano 
radɡanatsʰ tʃveni saxareba tʰkʰvendami ar iqo mxolod sitqvitʰ aramed aɡretʰve dzalitʰ sulitsmiditʰ da sruli damadʒereblobitʰ roɡortsʰ tʰkʰven tʰavadatsʰ itsʰitʰ rani viqavitʰ tʰkʰvens ʃoris tʰkʰventʰvis 
tʰkʰven ɡaxditʰ tʃveni da upʰlis mobadzavni radɡan did ɡasacirʃi miiɣetʰ sitqva sulitsmidis sixarulitʰ 
ise rom ɡaxditʰ nimuʃi qvela mortsmunisatʰvis makedoniasa da akʰaiaʃi 
vinaidan tʰkʰvenɡan ɡaisma upʰlis sitqva ara marto makedoniasa da akʰaiaʃi aramed qovel adɡilas mistsvda tʰkʰveni rətsmena ɣvtʰisadmi ise rom aɣarapʰeri ɡvakʰvs satʰkʰmeli 
radɡan tʰvitʰon qvebian tʃvenze roɡori ʃemosvla ɡvkʰonda tʰkʰventʰan da roɡor ʃemobrunditʰ kerpebisaɡan ɣvtʰisken ratʰa emsaxurotʰ tsʰotsʰxal da ceʃmarit ɣmertʰs 
da elodotʰ zetsʰidan mis dzes romelitsʰ mkvdretʰitʰ aɣadɡina iesos romelitsʰ momavali risxvisaɡan ɡvixsnis tʃven 
tʰkʰven tʰavad itsʰitʰ dzmebo rom tʃveni tʰkʰventʰan ʃemosvla ar iqo amao 
oɣond manamde pʰilipeʃi ɡatandʒulebma da ɡalandzɣulebma roɡortsʰ itsʰitʰ ɡavbedetʰ tʃvens ɣmertʰʃi rom tʰkʰventʰvis ɡvekʰadaɡa saxareba didi brdzolitʰ 
vinaidan tʃvens ʃeɡonebaʃi ar aris artsʰ tsʰduneba artsʰ utsmidureba da artsʰ tsʰbiereba 
aramed roɡortsʰ ɣvtʰisɡan ɡamovitsʰadetʰ rom tʃventʰvis moendo saxareba ise vlaparakobtʰ da vaamebtʰ ara adamianebs aramed ɣmertʰs romelitsʰ tsʰdis tʃvens ɡulebs 
radɡan arasodes ɡvilaparakia mosapʰerebeli sitqvebitʰ roɡortsʰ itsʰitʰ anɡarebis miznitʰ ɣmertʰia motsame 
artsʰ vedziebtʰ katsʰtʰaɡan didebas artsʰ tʰkʰvenɡan artsʰ sxvebisɡan 
tʰumtsʰa ki ʃeɡvedzlo mdzime tvirtʰad daɡtsoloditʰ roɡortsʰ kʰristes motsʰikʰulebi maɡram mʃvidad vikʰtsʰeoditʰ tʰkʰvens ʃoris roɡortsʰ medzudzuri tʰavis balɣebs rom ʃepʰopʰinebs 
aseve tʃventsʰ tʰkʰvendami ɡulmxurvaltʰ ɡvsurda moɡvetsʰa tʰkʰventʰvis ara marto ɣvtʰis saxareba aramed tʃveni sulitsʰ imitom rom saqvarelni ɡaxditʰ tʃventʰvis 
xom ɡaxsovtʰ dzmebo tʃveni ʃroma da dʒapʰa dɣedaɣam vʃromobditʰ ratʰa aravis davtsoloditʰ tvirtʰad da ise vkʰadaɡebditʰ tʰkʰvens ʃoris saxarebas 
tʰkʰven motsmeni xartʰ da ɣmertʰitsʰ tʰu ra tsrpʰelad samartʰlianad da umtsikvlod vikʰtsʰeoditʰ tʰkʰvendami mortsmunetʰa mimartʰ 
radɡan tʰkʰven itsʰitʰ roɡortsʰ mama ʃvilebs ise ʃevaɡonebditʰ tʰitʰoeul tʰkʰvenɡans 
ɡanuɡeʃebditʰ da ɡartsmunebditʰ rom ɡevlotʰ ɣvtʰis ɣirsad vintsʰ moɡitsodebtʰ tʰavisi sasupʰevlisa da didebisaken 
amisatʰvis tʃventsʰ ɡanutsqvetliv vmadlobtʰ ɣmertʰs rom tʰkʰven rotsʰa miiɣetʰ tʃvenɡan mosmenili ɣvtʰis sitqva miiɣetʰ iɡi ara roɡortsʰ katsʰtʰa sitqva aramed roɡortsʰ ɣvtʰis sitqva roɡortsʰ sinamdvileʃia romelitsʰ mokʰmedebs kidetsʰ tʰkʰvenʃi mortsmuneebʃi 
radɡan tʰkʰven ɡaxditʰ dzmebo iudeaʃi mqopʰi ɣvtʰis eklesiebis mobadzvni kʰriste iesoʃi vinaidan tʰkʰventsʰ iɡemetʰ tandʒva tʰkʰveni tʰvistomebisɡan ieseve roɡortsʰ matʰ iudeveltʰaɡan 
romeltʰatsʰ upʰali iesotsʰ mokles da misi tsinastsarmetqvelnitsʰ da tʃventsʰ ɡamoɡvrekes ɣmertʰs ar aameben da qvela adamians etsinaaɣmdeɡebian 
ɡvabrkoleben tsarmartʰebtʰan laparakʃi rom ar vixsnatʰ isini ritʰatsʰ mudam avseben tʰaviantʰ tsʰodvebs maɡram mietsevatʰ risxva sabolood 
tʃven ki dzmebo mtsʰire xnitʰ rom daɡʃorditʰ saxitʰ da ara ɡulitʰ mitʰ upʰro meti tsadilitʰ vestsrapʰoditʰ tʰkʰveni pirisxilvas 
amisatʰvis ɡvindoda ɡansakutʰrebitʰ ki me pavles ertʰi ordʒer tʰkʰventʰan mosvla maɡram satana ɡvabrkolebda 
radɡan ra aris tʃveni sasoeba an tʃveni sixaruli an tʃveni kvexnis ɡvirɡvini tʰu ara tʰkʰven tʃveni upʰlis ieso kʰristes tsinaʃe misi mosvlisas 
vinaidan tʰkʰvena xartʰ tʃveni dideba da sixaruli 
amitom raki metis motʰmena veɣar ʃevdzelitʰ movisurvetʰ atʰenʃi martod dartʃena 
da ɡamovɡzavnetʰ timotʰe tʃveni dzma da ɣvtʰis msaxuri da tʃveni tʰanamʃromeli kʰristes saxarebaʃi ratʰa ɡaɡvemtkitsʰebinetʰ da ɡvenuɡeʃebinetʰ tʰkʰvens rətsmenaʃi 
ratʰa aravin ʃemdrkaliqo am ɡasacirʃi vinaidan tʰvitʰon itsʰitʰ rom tʃven saamisod vartʰ dadɡenilni 
vinaidan maʃinatsʰ rotsʰa tʰkʰventʰan vimqopʰeboditʰ tsinastsar ɡeubneboditʰ ciri moɡvelis metʰkʰi ratsʰ axda kidetsʰ da tʰavadatsʰ moɡexsenebatʰ 
amitom veɣartsʰ me ʃevdzeli metis motʰmena da ɡamovɡzavne tʰkʰveni rətsmenis ambis ʃesatqobad vaitʰu ɡanɡtsʰadatʰ matsʰdurma da tʃveni ʃroma pʰuci ɡamodɡa 
axla ki rotsʰa timotʰe tʰkʰvenɡan daɡvibrunda da ɡvaxara tʰkʰveni rətsmenisa da siqvarulis ambavi rom tʰkʰven qoveltʰvis ketʰilad ɡaxsovartʰ da ɡsurtʰ tʃveni xilva iseve roɡortsʰ tʃven tʰkʰveni 
maʃin tʰkʰvenitʰ vinuɡeʃetʰ tʰavi dzmebo qvela tʃvens ubedurebasa tʰu ɡasacirʃi tʰkʰveni rətsmenis meʃveobitʰ 
radɡan axla vtsʰotsʰxlobtʰ rakiɣa mtkitsʰed dɡaxartʰ upʰalʃi 
roɡori madloba ʃeɡvidzlia ʃevtsirotʰ ɣmertʰs tʰkʰveni ɡulisatʰvis qvela im sixarulis ɡamo romlitʰatsʰ vxarobtʰ tʰkʰvenitʰ tʃveni ɣvtʰis tsinaʃe 
dɣedaɣam mxurvaled rom vlotsʰulobtʰ ratʰa vixilotʰ tʰkʰveni saxe da ʃevavsotʰ ratsʰ aklia tʰkʰvens rətsmenas 
tʰvitʰ tʃvenma ɣmertʰma da mamam da tʃvenma upʰalma iesom tsarmartʰos tʃveni ɡza tʰkʰvensken 
upʰalma ɡaɡizardotʰ da ɡimatotʰ siqvaruli ertʰmanetʰisa da qvelas mimartʰ roɡortsʰ tʃvena vartʰ tʰkʰvendami 
ratʰa ɡanmtkitsʰdes tʰkʰveni ɡuli umtsikvlod sitsmideʃi tʃveni ɣvtʰis da mamis tsinaʃe rotsʰa mova tʃveni upʰali ieso kʰriste qvela tʰavis tsmidastʰan ertʰad 
dabolos dzmebo ɡevedrebitʰ da ʃeɡaɡonebtʰ upʰal iesoʃi tʃven ɡastsavletʰ tʰkʰven roɡor ɡevlotʰ ɣvtʰis saameblad da aki kidevatsʰ dadixartʰ ase maɡram kidev tsin unda tsaxvidetʰ 
radɡan itsʰitʰ roɡori mtsʰnebani moɡetsʰitʰ tʰkʰven upʰal iesosɡan 
vinaidan ɣvtʰis nebaa tʰkʰveni ɡantsmeda ratʰa ɡaneridotʰ sidzvas 
ratʰa qovelma tʰkʰvenɡanma itsʰodes tʰavisi curclis ʃenaxva sitsmiditʰ da pativitʰ 
da ara ɡarqvnilebis avxortsʰobitʰ tsarmartʰebis msɡavsad romlebitsʰ ar itsʰnoben ɣmertʰs 
ratʰa aravin ɡadavides zɣvars da ar moatquos tʰavisi dzma sakʰmeʃi vinaidan ʃurismɡebelia upʰali qovelive imis ɡamo roɡortsʰ adretsʰ ɡitʰxaritʰ da daɡimotsmetʰ 
vinaidan ɣmertʰma moɡvitsoda tʃven ara utsmidurebisaken aramed sitsmidisaken 
amitom urtʃi eurtʃeba ara adamians aramed ɣmertʰs romelitsʰ ɡadzlevtʰ tʰkʰven tʰavis tsmida suls 
xolo dzmatʰmoqvareobaze saciro ar aris tʰkʰventʰvis motsera tʰkʰven ɣvtʰivɡanstsavlulni xartʰ ertʰimeoris siqvarulʃi 
radɡan aseve ikʰtsʰevitʰ qvela dzmis mimartʰ mtʰel makedoniaʃi maɡram ʃeɡaɡonebtʰ dzmano upʰro da upʰro 
da ɡulmdɡined etsʰadotʰ iqotʰ mʃvidni aketʰotʰ tʰkʰveni sakʰme sakutʰari xelebitʰ roɡortsʰ tʃven ɡamtsʰnetʰ 
ratʰa ɣirseulad ikʰtsʰeodetʰ ɡareʃeebtʰan da arapʰeri ɡaɡicirdetʰ 
ɡvsurs itsʰodetʰ dzmebo simartʰle ɡansvenebultʰa ʃesaxeb ratʰa ar inaɣvlotʰ sxvebivitʰ romeltʰatsʰ sasoeba ar ɡaatʃniatʰ 
vinaidan tʰu ɡvtsams rom ieso mokvda da aɣdɡa maʃin ɣmertʰi iesoʃi ɡansvenebulebsatsʰ moiqvans mastʰan ertʰad 
radɡan amas ɡeubnebitʰ tʰkʰven upʰlis sitqvitʰ rom tʃven vintsʰ davrtʃitʰ upʰlis mosvlamde ver davastsrebtʰ ɡansvenebulebs
